xota ðo akpa ɔ ji e etɛwu mi ðo nɔ ðɔ nugbo
hitoshi nɔ ɖo tɔn ɖo nɔ nu mɛ e ɖe ɖo japon
hwenu e ɖo akwɛzinzan ɖe xa gan tɔn wɛ e ɔ gan ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ sɔgbe a e ɖo nukun wɛ emi ɖe ɖo asi tɔn
hitoshi tinmɛ ɖɔ ayixa emitɔn kun yi gbe bonu emi wa byɔ nugbomaɖɔ e o
e sin enɛ wu bɔ gan ɔ adan ɖɔ emi nya ɛ sin bɔ ɖo gudo mɛ ɔ gble do e nugbo
ðo bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ awakanmɛ wa ku hitoshi bi do e wa e biba wu
ði ɔ hwenu hitoshi ɖo wɛ gbe ɖokpo bɔ e ɖo nu kanbyɔ ɛ wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun sixu wa nugbomaɖɔ e o
mɛ ɖo nu kanbyɔ ɛ wɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ linlin towe lɛ bu do mɛ
hɛnnumɔ hitoshi tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɖɔ e zunfan ku e kudeji ɖɔ emi nɔ ɖɔ nugbo e e ɖo co e wa jɛ ji kpɛɖe kpɛɖe
ði ɔ e ɖɔ nɔ wa kanbyɔ nyiɖee ɖɔ gbejininɔ nu nuɖiɖi nyi nu ɖagbe a ji
nu nyanya enɛ xa hitoshi e nɔ flin mi ɖɔ nugboɖiɖɔ kun nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛ bi nukunmɛ o
nu e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ mɛɖe lɛ tlɛ sixu nugboɖiɖɔ do mɔ agban kpinkpɛn ɖe ɖo taji ɔ ɖo lɛ tɛntin
xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie wa yi ɔ robert
feldman nyi dotoo nɔ walɔ tɔn ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔxwe massachusetts amherst tɔn e do nu nu ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi e mɛxo ɖo ɔ mɛ nɔ bɔ cobonu ɖɔ xo ɖo xa mɛ nu cɛju wo ɔ e hwe bi ɔ nɔ ɖo adingban ɖokpo
e blawu ɖɔ enyi e ɖo adingban nu mɛ gege ɔ e nɔ nu co mɛ gege nɔ ɖo adingban
etɛwu adingban ɖiɖo ajojija kpo nugbomaɖɔ alɔkpa alɔkpa ɖevo lɛ kpo gbakpe ɖo egbe
etɛ mɛ nugbomaɖɔ nɔ kɔ do
bɔ ee ɖo taji hu enɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi sixu nyi alɔ nu walɔ nugbomaɖɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ gbɔn
ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn nugbomaɖɔ kpɛɖe sixu ɖeɖɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖe hwebinu samantha afrique du
nugbo wɛ nyi xo enɛ a
samantha ɖɔhun ɔ mi mɛ bi wɛ kpannukɔn ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ hweɖelɛnu
mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ nɔ mi nɔ nugbomaɖɔ mi lɛ e mɛ e sixu ɖe nugbododo nɔ xɔ akwɛ nu mi lɛ e
ði ɔ enyi winnya ɖu nɔ mya nukun nu mi hu nu bi ɔ mi sixu nugbomaɖɔ do mɔ nu ɖo dandan e ɖe
e ɖo co enyi nugbo ɔ wa jɛ agbawungba ɔ nugbomaɖɔ nɔ hɛn nu gege gble do mi wu hwɛhwɛ
tamɛ do nu elɔ lɛ wu
kancica ɖagbe lɛ ɖiɖo nɔ jinjɔn jiɖedomɛwu ji
hwenu mɛ we ɖeji do yeɖee lɛ wu e ɔ ayi yetɔn nɔ do yeɖee lɛ wu
e nɔ gbe ɖokpo kpowun nɔ ɖeji do mɛ wu a
e ɖo co nugbomaɖɔ ɖokpo gee sixu bɔ e gɔn jiɖedomɛwu
mɛ ɖɔ e nyi ɖagbe nu e ɖe a
enyi wɛ ɔ e ci nu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e nu tawun bɔ tlɛ ɖɔ e zan emi
nu sixu ci nu mɛ nugbo
nugbomaɖɔ sixu hɛn kancica ɖagbe ɖe sin dodonu gble
robert innes ee nyi ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔxwe californie tɔn e do nu nu mɔ ɖɔ nugbomaɖɔ ci azɔn e nɔ ɖo mɛ wu e ɖe ɖɔhun
enɛ wu ɔ e hɛn ɔ e nugbomaɖɔ do azɔnkwin ɖe wu enyi nɔ sɛkpɔ ɖe hwɛhwɛ ɔ hwi lɔ ɖibla nugbomaɖɔ sin azɔn
sixu xo glo nugbomaɖɔ tɔn gbɔn
biblu sixu
mi ɖeji ɖɔ ayixa mitɔn ɖo mi ɖo jlo nɔ zan ɖagbe ɖo nu bi mɛ eblee lɛ
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ xokwin dodo glɛkigbe tɔn e lilɛ do ɖagbe ɖo fi e sin tinmɛ nɔ nyi nugboɖiɖɔ hweɖelɛnu nu bɔ nu bi vɔ e alo walɔ dɔn mɛ e ɖe
klisanwun lɛ nɔ xo elɔ mawu ze mɛ nu pɔlu wlan e ylɔ ɖɔ nujɔnu mi ɖo jlo nɔ zan ɖagbe alo nɔ ɖɔ nugbo ɖo nu bi mɛ
etɛ enɛ byɔ
mɛ gege wɛ nɔ mɛ zanzan tɛgbɛ cobo nɔ yi toxo mɛ
etɛwu
ðo nɔ jlo wutu
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ nunyanyawiwa wɛ mi nɔ
sin do wɛ ɖo ayi nyanya sin wɛ ɖɔ
enɛ wu ɔ bonu mi nyi ɔ mi ɖo ahwan xa jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn sin gu mi ɖu e
pɔlu ɖɔ xo do ahwan eɖesunɔ nɔ xa hwɛhuhu e wu ɖɔ ðo linlin mɛ ɔ ɔ wɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mi
ɖevo tiin ɖo agbaza mɛ ɖo hun xo xa ɖo linlin mɛ e wɛ mi do ɖo nu hwɛhuhu ɖo agbaza mɛ e hlɔmanu lɛ
ðewagbɛn han bi ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ a
enyi mi jlo nyi alɔ nu linlin nyanya lɛ ɔ nugbomaɖɔ do mi co mi hɛn ɔ mi kpo ɖo nyi wɛ
do sixu nɔ ɖɔ nugbo ɔ mi ɖo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn lɛ sin hudo
e ɖo co e blawu ɖɔ mɛ gege nɔ zan hwenu do tamɛ do nu do lɛ e ji hu ee nɔ zan do tamɛ do walɔ ɖagbe tɔn xwedo lɛ ji e
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ nɔ hwɛjujɔ nu nugbomaɖɔ wɔbuwɔbu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ yetɔn e
wema ɖe ɖɔ kpowun ɖɔ ðo taji ɔ mi nɔ wa dove nɔ kpo ɖo mimɔ wɛ ɖɔ mi nyi
dishonesty nujlɛnu mi bɔ mi kanɖeji ɖɔ nugbomaɖɔ alɔkpa ɖebu kun sɔgbe o e ɖe a
mi doku ɖɔ e ɖe
livi mɔkpan gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ mɔ ɖɔ biblu su hudo enɛ sin do bɔ nu bi vɔ
e nɔ mɔ walɔ ɖagbe tɔn e sixu do nuɖe wu a lɛ e ɖo biblu mɛ
ðɛhan e nɔ mɛ lɛ do gbɛzinzan xwedo tɔn zinzan ɖagbe kpo kancica ɖagbe ɖiɖo xa mawu kpo wu
e ca gbeɖe a
tɔn lɛ kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo zan nu to bi akɔta bi gbe bi kpodo togun bi kpo
enyi mi kije biblu ɔ tamɛ do nu e ɖɔ lɛ e ji zan weɖexamɛ tɔn lɛ ɔ mi sixu ayi mitɔn nɔ ɖɔ nugbo
biblu tuuntuun ganji kɛɖɛ wɛ mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo ahwanfunfun xa nugbomaɖɔ ji a
bli ɖo walɔ ɖagbe linu e mɛ wɛ mi ɖe nɔ gbidi kɔ nu mi bonu mi xwedo nugbododo tɔn blibli lɛ
nu wu mi ɖo xoɖɛ mawu ɖɔ e mi jɛhun do mi ji e nɛ
filipunu lɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu ɖo adɔgbigbo zunfan nujlɔjlɔwiwa nɔ ɖɔ nugbo ɖo nu bi mɛ
hitoshi xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e ɖu le ɖo e nyi nɔ ɖɔ nugbo e wutu
din ɔ e nɔ wa nu nugboɖiɖɔ tɔn su nukunmɛ e ɖe
nu nyi nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ

xwe wɛ ɖo jo wemaxɔmɛ do jɛ wa xa lɛ ji
akwɛ nɔ mɔ lɛ e ɖo ji wɛ nugbomaɖɔ nɔ hɛn wa nu mi
nukɔnmɛ ɔ wa wli alɔ bɔ nyi kpo asu kpo wa jɛ biblu xa jehovah tɔn lɛ ji
mi ɖɔ jehovah mawu wan nu walɔ nugbomaɖɔ tɔn lɛ enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖyɔ gbɛzinzan mitɔn
ðo ɔ mi ze miɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm huzu jehovah tɔn nunywɛxo
ɔ nu e lilɛ jɔ lɛ ɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ xwe gbe din ɔ nu mɔhun ɖe ɖe a bɔ enɛ bɔ ɖo ayixa ɖe

nyɔna ɖe wɛ e nyi nu mi ɖɔ nɔ ɖo mitɔn

yi gbe ɖɔ wa
e ɖo co ee jɛ e ɔ yawu jɛ xoxo ɔ zan ji

flin akpa do nu annunziato e bɔ kanbyɔ ɔ ɖɔ e sixu biblu xa mi a ji
nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e jiwu nu mi ɖesu
ði ɔ jaan do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi tawun e ɖɔ enyi mi ɖɔhwɛ mitɔn lɛ nu mawu ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖeji do wu tɔn ɖo nu jlɔjlɔ wɛ e nɔ wa e hwɛ mitɔn lɛ kɛ mi mi we
wemafɔ enɛ jɛ nu ji nu mi ɖesu ɖo mɔ nyiɖee do mɔ mɛ blibli tawun ɖo gbɛzan wu

lɛ yi mi kpo wanyiyi kpo
ee mɔ ɖo bu gbɔn e ɔ e jlo mi ɖɔ nɔ agun yetɔn ci xwedo ɖɔhun e mɛ ɖo nuɖe wɛ bɔ ɖo biba wɛ lin
azɔgblegble nunu kpo nublibliwiwa kpo jijodo vɛwu nu mi a co e vɛwu nu mi tawun bonu jla alɔkpa nyi e ɖo

tlɛ kpo ɖo xa jijɔ nyanya ɖe lɛ wɛ

xota bible transforme des vies je sortais jamais arme ba mɔ annunziato lugara tɔn ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe liyasun tɔn mɛ wexwɛ
wema mlamla anyu kpo anyuwema tɔn kpo ɖeɖee ji e wlan wema biblu tɔn nɔ nyi e do e sin xwe kanweko
wɛnɖagbe wema luki tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ jezu gbeyiɖɔ ezayii sin wema alo wema mlamla ɖo gbe dodo ɔ mɛ xa nu bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e mla
ðo wɛnɖagbe wema jaan tɔn sin vivɔnu ɔ jaan lɔ ɖɔ wema alo wema mlamla sin xo ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun sixu kpewu wlan nu jezu lɛ e bi do wema mlamla emitɔn mɛ o luki jaan
e nɔ blo wema mlamla lɛ gbɔn
e nɔ anyu anyuwema alo ɖo nɔ blo nɔ ci bandi ɖɔhun
enɛ gudo ɔ e nɔ mla ɖo alɔkpa ɖe do kpo kɔ bɔ fi e wlan nu do e nɔ nɔ xomɛ
nuwlanwlan lɛ nɔ ɖi a bɔ ɖe nɔ ɖo ɖe glɔ
enyi wema mlamla ɔ ɖi ɔ kpo nɔ ɖo to ɖokpo ɖokpo sin vivɔnu bɔ ɔ nɔ alɔ ɖokpo do ɖo wɛ nɔ wegɔ ɔ do ɖo mlamla wɛ jɛ hwenu e mɔ fi wɛ e ɖe e
bible ɖɔ nu ɖo wema mlamla ɖe mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ ɖiga hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ yi mɛtlu sixu hɛn wema biblu tɔn ɖokpo blebu bɔ nu e mla ɔ e nɔ hwe sin
ði ɔ dobanunu ɖɔ wema mlamla tɔn yi mɛtlu adaɖe e ji wɛ e wlan wɛnɖagbe wema luki tɔn ɖo
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ kpa wema mlamla ɖe sin to tɔn kpo do tɔn kpo nɔ awinnya ɖe do ɖiɖi nɔ do
hwenu izlayɛli vi lɛ jɛ ɖo ji e ɔ mɛ ɖokpo gee wɛ nɔ wa ɖaxo sin bɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ blo jɛ ku
enɛ gudo ɔ wɛ e nɔ nyi bɔ visunnuɖaxo ɔ wɛ e nɔ
sunnu ɖo kunkan tɔn mɛ lɛ e gege wɛ wa loɔ mɛ kpɛɖe jɛn nyi ɖaxo
hwenu jonɔ lɛ jɛ acɛ kpa nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ji e ɔ nyi izlayɛli vi a lɛ e wɛ nɔ jwifu lɛ ɖaxo nɔ gan e jlo gbɔn e
e ɖo co e ci ɖɔ nɔ ɖo xwedo nukunɖeji cyancyan ɖe lɛ mɛ hwɛhwɛ bɔ xwedo enɛ lɛ gege nɔ gosin kunkan tɔn mɛ
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ xogbe lɛ ɔ nɔ do gesi mɛ nukunɖeji ɖo lɛ mɛ lɛ e
lɛ sixu nyi lɛ sin gan lɛ xwedo ɖaxo tɔn lɛ sin mɛ nukunɖeji lɛ kpo ɖaxo e gan lɛ e kpo ɖi matie
nugbododo biblu tɔn hu o matie
sɔgbe kpo xokwintinmɛwegbo biblu tɔn ɖe kpo ɔ xokwin glɛkigbe tɔn e lilɛ do hu mɛ e sixu do gesi mɛɖe nɔ wa nu gbɔn ɖo jɔwamɔ linu ɖo yajiji xovɛ kpo ɖevo ɖeɖee e sixu mɔ ɖo gbɛzinzan tɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn mɛ lɛ e wu
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu ɖeɖee sixu wa jɛ ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e sin mɛ ninɔ wɛ adohuhu nɔ nyi
e sɔgbe ɖɔ hudo agbaza tɔn mitɔn lɛ kpo ganjininɔ mitɔn lɛ tɔn kpo ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi xwedo weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn
etɛwu
wema ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi e nu din ɔ tamɛfɔn mɛtɔn nɔ ɖo wa wɛ magbokɔ le ninɔmɛ enɛ ca kan xa azɔn ɖe lɛ ɖi xomɛjizozɔn hunzɔn kpo kpo
jezu hwɛjijɔ ɖu ɖo mɛ ji bɔ e nyi alɔ nu adohuhu zɛ xwe wu e e wɛ nyi e nɔ wa ɖagbe ti a
matie ayi ɖo mitɔn lɛ ji sixu do kpɛvi titi ɖe mitɔn ji alo blo bɔ e a
ɔ xɛsi ɖi wɛ mi nɔ ɖe lɛ e ɔ nu lɛ tlɛ nɔ wa yi ɖo hwɛhwɛ a
akɔwe ɖokpo ɖɔ gbɔn le sɔgudo ɔ tagba jɛ do wɛ hwɛhwɛ ɔ sɔgudo nɔ hu mi nɔ gbɔn ɖɔ e ci e
nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖeji do mawu wu
enyi mawu nɔ nuɖuɖu xɛ lɛ nɔ nu folowa lɛ ɔ e dandannu gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ mawu ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ lɛ e a ce
matie wegɔ ɔ nɔ ɖɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn
jezu ɖɔ sɔ ja ɔ o ɖo sɔ ja ɔ wa kpodo tagba eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
yi gbe ɖɔ tagba ɖokpo ɖokpo hɛn wa ɔ kpe nu enɛ ɔ a ce matie
weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn enɛ nunywɛ kpe e xwixwedo sixu nya tagba lɛ do zɔ nu mi
hu ɔ mi ɖo vivo ayi mɛ tɔn enɛ wɛ biblu nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ fifa mawu tɔn filipunu lɛ
bible pennsylvania
xojlawema elɔ nyi atɔxwɛ e nɔ kpa nu jehovah mawu axɔsu wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn
e nɔ do gbɔ nu lɛ gbɔn wɛnɖagbe elɔ gblamɛ zaanɖe din ɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖo jixwe ɖe nunyanyawiwa lɛ bi siin blo bɔ ayikungban ɔ huzu palaɖisi ɖe
e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖɔ e ɖi nu nu jezu klisu ku do mitɔn mɛ bonu mi do sixu mɔ mavɔmavɔ e eyɛ wɛ nyi axɔsu nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ din
sin wɛ e ɖo xojlawema elɔ wɛ
e nɔ ɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ mɛ a jinjɔn biblu kɛɖɛ ji
e nɔ sa wema elɔ a
e blo nu biblu kpinkplɔnmɛ tɔn e nɔ wa gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ kpo alɔdo jlo ɖagbenɔ lɛ tɔn kpo e
nuwlanwlan ɖeɖee nya lɛ e ɔ miɖesu wɛ ɖo

mɛkuku lɛ

biblu kpo ðo gbɛzan towe huzu wɛ a
mawu tuun nu hugan e koɖo
vi o
e nɔ ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ bebe tɔn wɛ ku ɖo alitawovi ɖe mɛ ɖo ɖiɖi tɔn tɛnmɛ
bebe kpo tɔn kpo tawun
xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖo linlin ɖagbe e ɖe wɛ ɖɔ xo enɛ xo enɛ ayi bebe tɔn wu hu ɖɔ e do gbɔ
ku tɔn nyi nu hugan e a wɛ e nɔ ɖo ɖiɖɔ nu eɖee wɛ
hwenu bebe ɖo nu enɛ jɛ e ɖɔ do wema ɖe mɛ wɛ ɖo xwe mɔkpan gudo e ɔ e mɔ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e kpo ɖo aluwɛ mɛ
ði bebe wa mɔ ɖo e ɔ e nɔ byɔ hwenu gege cobɔ mɛɖe nɔ sixu gosin aluwɛ mɛ ɖo taji ɔ hwenu mɛ ɔ kpo mɛ ku e kpo tawun e
enɛ wu ɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ biblu ylɔ ku ɖɔ gudo tɔn
kɔlɛntinu lɛ e nɔ gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ lobɔ nu ɖebu sixu ɖo e a bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ fyan mi nɔ mitɔn lɛ
mi mɛ ɖebu sixu xoglo nu e nɔ hɛn gble lɛ e a
enɛ wu ɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi dan do nu mi sixu ɖu ɖo ku kpo nu e nɔ ji lɛ e kpo ji gbɔn e
boya kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ taan nabi e nɔ byɔ cobɔ e nɔ gosin aluwɛ mɛ
sixu do gbɔ nu mɛ mɛ ku e ɖe gbɔn
xota ðo akpa ɔ ji e hwenu ðe ku e
azɔn doya nu nu hwenu klewun ɖe a
vlafo e yawu xwɛ nu bɔ ɖibla wɔn e nyi gbɔn e lɔ
aluwɛ ɖo a
nu mɔhun ɖe ɖe ci aluwɛ ji ɖuɖu ɖe ɖɔhun a wɛ dr wolfelt wlan ɖo wema tɔn ɖokpo mɛ
ði ɔ mitɔn ablaxamu wa nu gbɔn hwenu asi tɔn ku e
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ ablaxamu jɛ ale ji jɛ sala vi ji
xogbe jɛ ji ɔ ɖɔ hwenu ɖe lɛ wa yi cobɔ e ɖu ɖo aluwɛ tɔn ji
ɖevo wɛ nyi jakɔbu tɔn eyɛ ɔ e ɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ gbekanlin ɖe wɛ hu vi tɔn jozɛfu ɔ
e nɔ aluwɛ mɛ xɔ azan bɔ xwedo tɔn sin lɛ kpewu do gbɔ a
wɛ e nyi gbɔn nu mɛ ɖo ku ɖe tɔn sin aluwɛ mɛ ehɔnmɛ lɛ e gege
we ɖie
asu robert ku ɖo azan liyasun tɔn
zanzan gbe gbe alitawovi ɔ jɛ ku e gbɔn vo do azan ɖe lɛ a
ðo zanzan sin nuɖuɖu ɔ gudo mi nɔ blo gbɔn nu e xwe ɔ e ɔ mi kisi nu miɖee kɔ nu miɖee ɖɔ nu miɖee ɖɔ yi wan nu
xwe gudo ɔ se wɛ ɖe ɔ kpo ɖo finɛ
ɖɔ ɖu ɖo ku tɔn nɔ hɛn wa nu mi e ji a gail xwe
xwe hu din bɔ asi ku jo mi do e ɖo co kpo ɖo do tɔn jɛ wɛ kpo ɖo aluwɛ tɔn mɛ
hweɖebunu mɔ nuɖe ɖo ɔ mɛ e ɔ ayi bi nɔ yi ji tɔn bɔ nɔ ɖɔ nu nyiɖee ɖɔ e vivi tawun ɖɔ e mɔ nu mɔ wɛ ɖe e etienne xwe
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ jɔwamɔnu wɛ kpo aluwɛ magbokɔ mɔhun lɛ kpo nyi
mɛ bi nɔ nɔ aluwɛ mɛ ɖo alɔkpa ɖokpo ɔ mɛ a bɔ xlonɔnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e mɔ xo ɖɔ do mɛɖe wa nu gbɔn hwenu awe xo e ɔ wu
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ enyi mi mɔ ɖɔ aluwɛ mɛ ninɔ mitɔn zɛkpa hwenu mɛɖe ku nu mi e ɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu hwɛ dido miɖee
mi sixu ɖu ɖo aluwɛ mɛ ninɔ ji gbɔn
ablaxamu sin vi izaki nɔ aluwɛ mɛ nu hwenu gege
nɔ tɔn sala ku e ɔ e nɔ aluwɛ tɔn mɛ nu xwe atɔn
weɖexamɛ tiin do xota elɔ ji e hwe a
bi wɛ nɔ mɛ a
ði ɔ mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ nu ɖɔ hwi alo ɖe nu ci nu e ɖo ali ɖebu o
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu ɖɔ hwi blo flijɛ enɛ tɔn ɖe nu ci nu e bi
biblu nɔ ji do xo enɛ wu bɔ dobanunu egbe tɔn lɛ nɔ gudo
ðo aca ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ enyi sunnu ɖe hun e nyi sunnu jɔ sunnu a nɛ
winnya ɖo hu mɛ ɖɔ e ɖasin nu e tlɛ nyi ɖo mɛ mɛ ɔ wɛ a
mɛ nɔ wa taglomɛ nɔ ganji lɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖasin kunkun nyi aluwɛ sin akpaxwe ɖe sɔgbe
bɔ aluwɛ mɛ ninɔ sixu wa bɔ jo xo do enyi towe syɛn gbɔn ɖebu ɔ nɛ
aluwɛ mɛ nɔ sixu hɛn nu gble hu ɖagbe e wa e
biblu yi gbe nu linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun bonu e kun ɖasin o alo e wa hun e kun nyi sunnu jɔ sunnu o e a
ði ɔ tamɛ do jezu ji
hwɛhwɛ ɔ xomɛ sinsin nu hwenu kpɛɖe nɔ nyi aluwɛ sin akpaxwe ɖe ɖo taji ɔ hwenu ku hu mɛ mɛtɔn vawun e
nu gege wɛ sixu sin xomɛ nu mɛ nu wa e ɖi xomaɖixo kpo xomasɔgbe kpo ee mɛ e nɔ ɖo sisi e ɖe ɖɔ lɛ e
xwe jɛn ɖo hwenu ku e wɛ nya nɔ nyi nɔ nɔ afrique du e ɖɔ
ðo cyɔ ɔ ɖiɖi hwenu ɔ sinsɛngan anglicane tɔn ɔ ɖɔ ji mawu ɖo hudo mɛ ɖagbe lɛ tɔn nɔ yawu
nu enɛ sin xomɛ nu mi ɖo mi jɛ mitɔn sin do tawun
din ɖo xwe gudo ɔ e kpo ɖo nu mi wɛ
hwenu ku mɛɖe vawun e ɔ mɛ nu wa e sixu nɔ ɖɔ nu eɖee magbokɔ ɖɔ enyi blo le alo le wɛ din ɔ nu enɛ sixu nɔ jɛ mɛ
abi e sixu nyi ɖɔ jlɛ wɛ hwi kpo mɛ ku e kpo ɖɔ azɔn gudo tɔn mɔ miɖee e
enɛ sixu bɔ hwɛ do hwiɖee wɛ ɖe e syɛn
enyi hwɛ do mɛɖee alo xomɛsin ɖo do nu wɛ hun e ɖo taji ɖɔ hwla o
e wa ɔ ɖɔ nu ɖoto jiɖe ɖɔ mɛ nu wa e gege nɔ ɖo linlin masɔgbe mɔhun lɛ e ɖe
biblu flin mi ɖɔ ɔ e nɔ mɔ ɛ ɖo gudo hu nɔvi nunywɛxo
ɖagbe hugan mɛ nu wa e ɖe sixu ɖo e wɛ nyi mitɔn jehovah mawu
xoɖɛ ɖɔ xomɛ ɖo e ɖo nukun kpe do wu wɛ
filipunu lɛ ɔ yi gbe bonu mawu nu mɔ hwiɖee mɛ gbɔn gbɔdonumɛ sin xo tɔn biblu ɔ gblamɛ

e jlo ɔ sixu hɛn ɖe lɛ do tamɛ

hwɛhwɛ wɛ nɔ zanmɛ bɔ nɔ mi
enyi xa linlin gbɔdonumɛ tɔn lɛ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ tamɛ do ji wa xoɖɛ ɖɔ nu ci nu mi ɖo ayi mɛ e bi gudo ɔ vivo kpo fifa ɖaxo ɖe kpo nɔ byɔ mɛ bɔ taglomɛ kpo ayi kpo bi nɔ lobɔ nɔ kpewu nɔ

jehovah ɖoto ɖɛ lɛ mi hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo ɖo e hwebinu
biblo sixu hɛn awajijɛ wa sixu ɖe aluwɛ mɛɖe tɔn kpo

mawu nɔ se xa ðɛhan
mawu nɔ ku hun nɔ ɖoto tɔn lɛ sin ɖɛ ðɛhan tɛsalonikinu lɛ
mawu nɔ jɛ mɛ ku lɛ e sin do jɔbu
mawu ɖɔ emi mɛkuku lɛ ezayii jaan
mɛɖe ɖo xa towe mɛ bɔ tɔn ɖe ku ɖo aluwɛ mɛ bɔ dan do nu nu sixu wa e a
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu nɔ tuun nu mi wa alo ɖɔ e nɔ gbɔ nɔ ci kpowun
nuɖe lɛ tiin bɔ mi sixu wa do mɛ mɔhun
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu sin hudo mɛ mɔhun lɛ nɔ ɖo e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ xa do xogbe klewun ɖe lɛ nu ɖi e nu mi tawun
ðo akɔ gege mɛ ɔ asi kpikpla kɔ nu mɛ alo alɔ nina mɛ kpo kpo nyi nuɖe nɔ ɖɔ nu mɛ ɔ tɔn ɖo ayi mɛ ɖu nu mɛ wɛ
nu mɛ nu wa e jlo ɖɔ xo hun ɖoto e hwiɖee ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ
nu hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ wa nuɖe nu xwedo nu wa e vlafo mɛ nu wa e kpewu wa a e ɖe ɖi nuɖiɖa nukunkpikpe do vi lɛ wu alo nuɖe wiwa ɖo tuto cyɔ ɔ ɖiɖi tɔn lɛ mɛ enyi e jlo ɔ nɛ
nuwiwa mɔhun lɛ sixu wa ɖagbe hugan xo vivi sin hu bi e ɖiɖɔ
sixu ɖo ayi bɔ wa ɖɔ mɛ ku e sin xo do xo mɛ vlafo jijɔ tɔn ɖagbe ɖe lɛ alo awajijɛ sin vivi ɖu e ɖe lɛ
mɔhun tlɛ sixu mɛ nu wa e nu ɖo kpa
lɛ ɖo gbe ɖɔ mɛ mɛ ku lɛ e gege nɔ mɔ alɔdo ɖo loɔ yetɔn lɛ nɔ yawu wɔn hudo yetɔn lɛ hwenu lɛkɔ yi nuwiwa yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ yi towe mɛ ku e ɖe ɖo hwɛhwɛ
biblo nɔ su nukunmɛ nu mɛ nu wa lɛ e gege bɔ nɔ mɔ kɔ do sa fun ɖo aluwɛ magbokɔ si
tamɛ do kaori tɔn ji ɖyɔvi japon ɖe wɛ bɔ nɔ tɔn ku ɖo gudo e ɔ tɔn ku
mi doku ɖɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ gudo ganmɛ ganmɛ
mɛ ɖokpo nɔ nyi ritsuko eyɛ wa ɖaxo kaori tawun cobo jlo ɖɔ emi nyi tɔn
kaori ɖɔ nu ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ nu enɛ vivi nu mi a
jlo ɖɔ mɛɖebu yi nɔ sin tɛnmɛ a lɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe sixu kpewu a
e ɖo co mama ritsuko wa nu xa mi gbɔn e bɔ nyi kpo e kpo wa bi
ðo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ mi nɔ jla mawuxo ɖo nɔ yi kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ ɖo
azɔn gege wɛ e ylɔ mi bɔ sin zozo the xa ɛ hɛn nuɖuɖu wa nu mi wlan wema mi
linlin ɖagbe mama ritsuko ɖo e wa ɖagbe nu mi
kaori sin nɔ ku din e ɔ e blo xwe lobɔ e kpo asu tɔn kpo nyi hwebinu tɔn
kaori ɖɔ mama ritsuko kpo ɖo wɛ ɖɔ nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu emi
hweɖebunu lɛkɔ yi xwe e ɔ nɔ yi ɛ nɔ nɔ xa ɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
ɖe wɛ poli sin asu sozos nyi nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖo ɖagbe e ɖe e nɔ ylɔ lɛ nɔcyɔvi lɛ kpo asukusi lɛ kpo do xwegbe bɔ nɔ ɖu nu ɖo
jaki e blawu ɖɔ sozos ɖo xwe e ɔ e ku ɖo nutitɛ tamɛfɔn tɔn ɖe wu
hɛn asu kpo nyi kpo nɔ nu xwe e bu wɛ poli ɖɔ
ðo cyɔ ɔ ɖiɖi gudo ɔ poli tɛn yi kpo daniel vi tɔn sunnu kpode xwe mɛvi ɔ kpo
ðo finɛ ɔ jɛ do xa jehovah tɔn lɛ sin agun ɖe ji
poli flin ɖɔ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e tuun nuti do nu wa mi wa yi e kpo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn mitɔn lɛ kpo wu a
enɛ bonu gɔn sisɛkpɔ mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi gbɔn xogbe tɔn lɛ kpo alɔdido mi kpo gblamɛ a
alɔdo enɛ xɔ akwɛ tawun ɖo taji ɔ ɖo hwe enɛ vi ɖo tɔn sin hudo hugan e
mɛ ɖo nukun kpe do nu wu wɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e ayi ɖo daniel ji tawun
mɛ ɖokpo ɖo mɛ bɔ e nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ kpla daniel hwenu e kpo lɛ kpo e alo hwenu e xwe xo gbe e
nɔ ɔ kpo vi ɔ kpo bi wɛ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ egbe
nugbo ɔ ali gege wɛ mi sixu mɛ ɖo aluwɛ mɛ lɛ e ɖe do gbɔ nu
biblu do gbɔ nu mi gbɔn nukunɖiɖo akpakpa mɛ e ɖe gblamɛ
sixu flin ɖɔ gail xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ lɛ tɔn e xo nu ɖɔ emi sixu wa ɖu ɖo ku asu emitɔn tɔn sin aluwɛ ji a ji
e ɖo co e ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ mɔ ɛ ɖo sin akpa mawu do e mɛ
wemafɔ yi wan hugan e wɛ nyi wɛ e ɖɔ
wemafɔ enɛ ɖɔ mawu ɖesunɔ nɔ xa nyi mawu yetɔn
gail ɖɔ akpa enɛ ɖɔ nu ɔ bi
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖe ku bɔ tuun ɖɔ nukunɖiɖo ɖe bɔ wa mɔ a lɛ e sin nu nɔ byɔ lanmɛ nu mi tawun
gbeɖe
wɛ sixu ɖɔ
tamɛ do nya nɔ nyi jɔbu e tɔn ji
e jɛ azɔn baɖabaɖa ɖe
jɔbu jɔbu ɖeji ɖɔ mawu jɛ do emitɔn lɛkɔ nu emi wa alo akpakpa ɛ
zaanɖe din ɔ mawu blo nu jɔbu kpo maxamaxa ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo hwenu ayikungban elɔ huzu palaɖisi ɖe e
ðɛhan jaan biblu do zogbe ji ɖo mɛ ɖɔ mawu wa mɛ sin ku
jaan jɔbu mɔ akpa enɛ sin jijɛ
e ɖo nuwukpikpe bɔ wa wu tɔn bɔ agbaza tɔn winnya nɔ sɔyi
jɔbu nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ jɛ do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖi nu nu tuto nublawukunumɛ tɔn mawu blo mɛ sin ku bɔ e su nukun yetɔn mɛ lɛ e bi wu
enyi towe ɖe ku bɔ jiya tɔn ɔ nu xo mi ɖɔ jɛ fi din lɛ e sixu nɔ ɖe aluwɛ towe siin bi kpatakpata
tamɛ linlin do akpa mawu tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ji sixu bɔ ɖo nukunɖiɖo jɔ nukunɖiɖo hlɔnhlɔn bɔ ɖo aluwɛ ji ɖu ɖe wɛ zɔn mi yi tɛsalonikinu lɛ

enyi e kɔ tɔn ɖokpo ɔ fifa sixu hwa alo gble bɔ nuvinuvi lɛ sixu ɖu ɖo taji ɔ lɛ hwenu e ɖi e

enyi biblu ɔ gble wɛ ɔ wɛn e lɔ bu kpo e kpo
biblu ɔ geze gbɔn e jwifu lɛ tɔn byɔ ɖo axɔsu lɛ bi si ɖɔ ɖo wlan ɔ hɛn e wɛ nyi wema biblu tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ
hu ɔ wema lɛ blo alɔnuwema biblu ɔ tɔn gege bɔ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn ɔ e hɛn ɔ e mɔ mawuxowema ɔ ɖo lɛ ɖo izlayɛli tlɛ mɔ ɖo masedwani nyi to ya to ɖe e mɛ
luki alɔnuwema biblu tɔn doxo tawun e ɖe lɛ geze jɛ hwe mitɔn gbɔn
alɔnuwema e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ wema mlamla xu kuku ɔ tɔn lɛ e nɔ ayi nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɖo lɛ mɛ bɔ e xwe do so lɛ xomɛ ɖo axeko ji
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ lɔ kan do aca enɛ
enɛ wu ɔ alɔnuwema biblu tɔn nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e mɔ ɖo lɛ mɛ mɔ ɖo xɔ kpɛvi kpo so xomɛ lɛ e kpo mɛ mɔ ɖo axeko ɖe lɛ ji
nu mɛ e kɔ do e alɔnuwema biblu tɔn sin akpaxwe lɛ mɔkpan ee ɖe lɛ ɖo xwe hu e kpo ɖo ayi jɛ egbe
wema hwexonu tɔn ɖebu ɖe bonu akpaxwe tɔn kpo ɖo ayi sin hwenu linlin lɛ ɖie e a
nu ji e nɔ wlan nu do e ɖe wɛ nyi ɔ atin tɔmɛ tɔn ɖe wɛ nɔ nyi bɔ e do blo
kanlin sin anyu lɛ wɛ e do blo anyuwema ɔ
ði ɔ anyuwema ji wɛ e wlan xoɖiɖɔ mijɛmiɖesunɔsi tɔn etats unis tɔn ɖo
ðo egbe ɖo xwe na yi gudo ɔ e ca bɔ xixa tɔn nɔ vɛwu tawun
ɔ kpo sinsɛngan gege kpo sin tuto wɛ jɛ agɔ do wɛn ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ e
hwɛhwɛ wɛ zan acɛ yetɔn do su ali do lɛ bonu ɖo biblu ɔ alo lilɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ o
we ɖie
xwe axɔsu antiochus epiphanes nyi akɔhɛnnugan ɖaxo seleucide lɛ tɔn ɖe hɛn jwifu lɛ gannugannu bɔ byɔ sinsɛn glɛkinu lɛ tɔn mɛ e ɖegbe ɖɔ e su kun do nu akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ lɛ e bi
hwenuxo heinrich graetz wlan ɖɔ ɖɔ tɔn lɛ vun wema mlamla mɛ ɔ ɖe lɛ e do ɖo fi ɖebu mɔ ɖe e hu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo gbigbeje wɛ ba mɔ hlɔnhlɔn kpo gbɔdonumɛ kpo bɔ mɔ lɛ e
xwe kanweko ɔ jɛ ɔ mɛ katolika tɔn sin xomɛ ɖɔ agunvi lɛ ɖo nu biblu mɛ lɛ e jla wɛ jo sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ katolika tɔn do lɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ wɛ nu agunvi ɖebu ɖo wema biblu tɔn lɛ zɛ ðɛhan wema ɖo mɛ e wu e
vaxɔ yetɔn ɖokpo hlɔnhlɔn enɛ ɖe mɛ yetɔn lɛ bɔ nɔ lɛ tɛnwin lɛnwin kpo gbejininɔ kpo hwɛhwɛ gbɔn xwe kpo xɔ ɖo doglɔ bɔ e vɛ nu mɔhun do lɛ e kpo bi kijekije gblamɛ
e ɖo gba xwe gbe e mɔ ɖebu ɖe e
e biblu william tyndale lilɛ do glɛnsigbe mɛ e e do hu tyndale ɔ ɖesu ɖo co lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn enɛ ɔ geze
biblu ɔ geze gbɔn e axɔsu antiochus ayi tɔn bi ɖo kun susu do nu biblu ɔ ɖo izlayɛli ji jwifu lɛ ɖo gɔnu yetɔn lɛ gege ayi ɖo gbe ɖevo lɛ ji
nugbo ɔ akɔwe lɛ ɖɔ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn ɔ hugan jwifu ɖo ji wɛ jɛ gbe
fɔ mawuxowema ɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo yetɔn lɛ mawuxowema ɖokpo enɛ lɛ wɛ jijimɛ wa bɔ lɛ e zan jɛ klisanwun lɛ ji
ðo xwe kanweko ɔ jɛ ɔ mɛ ɔ mɛ yi wan nu biblu ɔ lɛ e yi gbe jiya ɖokan do mawuxowema ɔ lilɛ lilɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ kpo wlan tɔn kpo wu
akpaxwe biblu ɔ tɔn lɛ tiin do gbe mɛ ɖo xwe kanweko ɔ sin tɛntin cobɔ e wa ɖe mɔ nɔ zin wema bɔ e sixu tɛn e
hwenɛnu ɔ e lilɛ biblu ɔ do gbe ɖevo lɛ mɛ hugan tɔn lɛ
nu mɛ e kɔ do e lɛ e kpo sinsɛngan bu ali lɛ e kpo ba su kun do nu biblu ɔ co biblu ɔ wɛ nyi wema e ma hu bi lilɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ hu bi ɖo hwenuxo mɛ e
ɔ ɖe lɛ ɖi gblegble kpo gbeklanxamɛ kpo kpewu su kun do nu biblu ɔ a
e ɖo co wema kpo ɖe lɛ kpo tɛnkpɔn ɖyɔ wɛn biblu tɔn ɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ tɛnkpɔn ɖyɔ biblu ɔ sɔgbe xa nukplɔnmɛ yetɔn lɛ nukplɔnmɛ yetɔn lɛ ɖyɔ sɔgbe xa biblu ɔ
nɔtɛn sinsɛn biblo tɔn ðo xwe kanweko ɛnɛgɔ ɔ kpo wegɔ ɔ kpo tɔn tɛntin ɔ mɛ wlan pɛntateki samaliinu lɛ tɔn lɛ e xo nu ɖɔ ɖo aargaareezem
bɔ finɛ wɛ ɖo blo vɔsakpe ɖe ɖo
mɛ ɔ samaliinu lɛ blo bɔ mawuxowema ɔ nɔ gudo nu tɛmpli gba ɖo aargaareezem alo galizimu so ji e
nukplɔnmɛ atɔnɖobu tɔn e fo biblu ɔ kpo kpɛɖe blo xwe e ɔ wema nɔ jɛhun do atɔnɖobu ji e ɖe xo nu jaan ɖɔ ɖo jixwe ɔ xo ɔ kpo gbigbɔ ɔ kpo bɔ atɔn enɛ lɛ nyi ɖokpo
xo enɛ lɛ ɖo nuwlanwlan dodo ɔ mɛ a
akɔwe biblu tɔn bruce metzger wu ɖɔ ji xwe kanweko ayizɛngɔ ɔ e nɔ mɔ xogbe enɛ lɛ hwɛhwɛ ɖo alɔnuwema biblu tɔn xoxo tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo mɛ
nyikɔ mawu tɔn biblu tɔn gege nɔ ɖo do tangblo jwifu lɛ tɔn ɖe wu nɔ ɖe nyikɔ mawu tɔn sin mawuxowema ɔ mɛ
e zan tɛnmɛ nyikɔ enɛ lɛ ɖo biblu mɛ nu ɔ kɛɖɛ a loɔ e zan nu lɛ numɛsɛn lɛ jɛ awovi ji jaan kɔlɛntinu lɛ kɔlɛntinu lɛ
ðo xwe kanweko ɔ kpo wo ɔ kpo tɔn vlamɛ ɔ massorete lɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e wlan bɔ e nɔ ylɔ yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ nuwlanwlan massorete lɛ tɔn lɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ xa xokwin lɛ kpo wekwin lɛ kpo do kudeji ɖɔ emi kun wa nyi do o
enyi mɔ ɖɔ nuwanyido lɛ ɖo wema dodo zan wɛ ɖe e mɛ ɖo fi ɖe ɔ nɔ ɖo wuntun ɖo tɛnmɛ ɖo fi ɔ kpa lɛ e
massorete lɛ lɔn ɖyɔ nuwlanwlan biblu tɔn lɛ a
moshe goshen gottstein wlan ɖɔ jlo do ɖyɔ nu e ci hwɛ syɛn hu bi e huhu ɖɔhun nu
wegɔ ɔ alɔnuwema biblu tɔn tobutobu tiin ɖo egbe lɛ e akɔwe biblu tɔn lɛ bɔ nuwanyido lɛ wu
ði ɔ sinsɛngan lɛ mɛ nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɖɔ biblu tɔn emi nɔ zan e mɛ wɛ nuwlanwlan biblu tɔn adodwe ɔ ɖe
e ɖo co ɖo jaan mɛ ɔ xogbe masɔgbe mi mɔ ɖo xota elɔ tɔn lɛ e
nuwanyido enɛ tlɛ ɖo biblu nukunɖeji jacques tɔn ɖo glɛnsigbe mɛ e mɛ
loɔ ee e mɔ alɔnuwema biblu tɔn ɖevo lɛ e ɔ etɛ
bruce metzger wlan ɖɔ nukɛgbe ɔ ee e nu jaan e ɖo alɔnuwema biblu tɔn xoxo lɛ syriaque copte gbe armenie gbe ethiopie gbe arabe gbe gbe ɖebu mɛ zɛ tɔn kɛɖɛ wu a
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ e ɖe nukɛgbe agɔ ɔ sin biblu jacques tɔn e jla ɖo e kpo biblu ɖevo lɛ kpo mɛ
beatty alɔnuwema biblu tɔn e do blo ɖo xwe e ɖe
alɔnuwema biblu tɔn xoxo lɛ ɖɔ wɛn e ɖo alɔji a
hwenu e mɔ wema mlamla xu kuku ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo e ɔ akɔwe biblu tɔn lɛ wa kpewu nuwlanwlan massorete lɛ tɔn ɖo ebleegbe mɛ lɛ e do nu ɖo wema mlamla biblu tɔn e wlan sin xwe jɛji jɛ nukɔn lɛ mɛ e wu
ɖe wema mlamla xu kuku ɔ tɔn lɛ e sin ɖe wa ɖɔ ɖɔ wema mlamla ɖokpo wɛ kunnuɖenu e sixu a e ɖɔ wema jwifu lɛ nɔ gbeji ɖo wema biblu tɔn lɛ wlan mɛ blo kpo sɔxwixwe kpo nu xwe jɛji
ðo wemasɛxwetɛn beatty dublin tɔn ɖo irlande ɔ e ji akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e sin wema ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖe e bɔ alɔnuwema biblu tɔn xwe kanweko wegɔ tɔn lɛ e fo biblu ɔ wlanwlan e ɔ xwe kpowun gudo sin alɔnuwema wɛ nyi enɛ lɛ
e hɛn ɔ e ɖɔ kpo jiɖiɖe kpo ɖɔ e kun wema hwexonu tɔn ɖe wlan sɔgbe sɔ ɛ o
biblu ɔ geze bi
e sin enɛ wu bɔ hɛn ɔ ɖo ɖokpo egbe nɔ xa
enyi ɖo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ mawuxowema ɔ tɔn ɖagbe ɖe ɔ sixu ɖeji ɖɔ nuwlanwlan dodo lɛ mɛ wɛ e ɖe sin bɔ e sixu ɖeji
aniwu biblu ɔ xo gblegble gbeklanxamɛ syɛnsyɛn kpo wɛn e ɖyɔɖyɔ kpo zlɛ jiwu
etɛ bɔ wema enɛ nyi wema bunɔ ɖe
mɛ nɔ biblu ɔ lɛ e gege wɛ wa gbeta ɖokpo ɔ kɔn kpo pɔlu kpo ɖɔ nu e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɔ mawu wɛ bi do ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ
timɔtee ɖi nu ɖɔ biblu ɔ wɛ nyi xo mawu tɔn ɖokpo ɖe e bɔ mawu cyɔn alɔ ji tɔn jɛ egbe wutu wɛ bɔ e do geze
faizal xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e wa biblu ɔ do sixu gbeje xo enɛ lɛ
nu e mɔ e kpaca ɛ
e lin a bɔ e mɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ gbakpe klisanwun lɛ mɛ lɛ e gege tiin kun ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ o
ɔ linlin mawu ɖo nu ayikungban ɔ bɔ xo tɔn e byɔ lanmɛ tawun
kudeji din ɖɔ biblu ɖo asi e ɔ nunina ɖe wɛ gosin mawu wɛ e ɖɔ
e ɖɔ lɔ ɔ enyi mawu kpewu da wɛkɛ ɔ ɔ e ɖo hlɔnhlɔn wema ɖe mi cyɔn alɔ ji a ce
enyi e ɖɔ nu kun nyi o hun hlɔnhlɔn mawu tɔn hlɔnhlɔn ɔ tɔn ɖo dogbo wɛ e ɖe nɛ
xota choisir une bonne bible
ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe nuxwasun tɔn mɛ
xota ɖebɔdoɖewu wa yi lɛ e ɖɔ xo do e cyɔn alɔ biblu ɔ ji gbɔn e wu
sixu wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ biblu ɔ mawuxo wɛ e nyi nugbo kun nyi xɛxo kpo tangblo kpo bɔ e xokple o
tɛsalonikinu lɛ klewun xota tɔn nyi mi sixu wa gbɔn tuun ðɔ nu ðo biblu mɛ ɔ nyi nugbo
jwifu hwexonu tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖi xɛsi tawun nu gudu alɔkpa gbakpe ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ e
azɔn baɖabaɖa enɛ sixu do wujɔnu agbaza tɔn mɛ ɖo jijɛ wɛ e tɔn lɛ wu hɛn nu gble do wu tɔn sɔyi
gudu sin amasin ɖe ɖe bonu e tuun a
e wa ɔ e nɔ ɖe mɛ doya wɛ e ɖe lɛ e sin mɛ mɛ bɔ ɖo nɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ do ninɔmɛ yetɔn wu levii vi lɛ
sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ do lɛ do gudu wu hugan ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ hɛn ɖo dandan a lɛ e wa nu mɛ nɔ jɛ lɛ e
ði ɔ yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ mɛɖebu nɔ nɔ mɛtlukpo do gudunɔ ɖe o
enyi jɔhɔn ɖo nyinyi wɛ ɔ mɛɖebu ɖo nɔ mɛtlukpo do gudunɔ lɛ a
mɛ wlan talmud e ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mawuxowema ɔ tɔn ɖɔ gudunɔ lɛ nɔ fi e ɖo gɔnu ɖo e a e sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ kun nɔ toxo e do do lɛ e mɛ o
jezu wa nu gbɔn e gbɔn vo tawun
e nɔ nya do gbe a e wa ɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wu tlɛ gbɔ azɔn nu matie
mɛ wema xwe tɔn ɖe
sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ nɔ dɔn nu do alo xo ɔ ji ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn mɛ
mɔyizi ɔ gbe sunnu ɖe ɖɔ e sixu asi tɔn enyi e mɔ nujɛdo ɖe ɖo wu tɔn ɔ nɛ
ðo jezu sin taan mɛ ɔ lɛ we wɛ ɖe bɔ nɔ mɔjɛmɛ vovo lɛ do tinmɛ enɛ tɔn wu
shammai nyi syɛn nukun hugan e ɖɔ ɖɔ enɛ sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ ɖokpo wu e asi e wɛ nyi nublibliwiwa e wɛ nyi ɖɔ afɔdogbe
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ hillel tɔn nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ sunnu ɖe hɛn ɔ e asi tɔn ɖo alɔwliwli tɔn ɖebu wu enyi ɔ tlɛ nuɖe a ɔ nɛ
enɛ ɔ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi sunnu ɖe tiin bonu asi tɔn nɔ hɛn nuɖuɖu tɔn gble alo enyi sunnu ɔ mɔ nyɔnu ɖevo bonu e ɖɛkpɛ hugan ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ ɔ e hɛn ɔ e asi tɔn
xosin tɛ jezu falizyɛn lɛ
e ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ enyi nyɔnu ɖe do afɔ gbe a bonu asu tɔn nya ɛ nyɔnu ɖevo ɔ wɛ sunnu enɛ ɔ matie
e xo daka wu alo mɛ towe ɖe wu a
nuɖe ɖɔ nu mɔhun sixu wa gbo wɛ a
e ɖɔ ɖɔ adakaxixo nyi jɛmɛji ɖo gbigbakpe ɔ mɛ wɛ e ɖe
ɖe lɛ ɖie
adakaxixo ðo xwegbe kpo xoðoxamɛ gannugannu kpo nyɔnu ɖokpo ɖo atɔn ji wɛ wanyinamɔ yetɔn gblewu alo ɖoxo xa gannugannu ɖo hweɖenu ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ wɛ nations unies ɖo gbe ɖɔ
adakaxixo ðo toxo mɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ jaguda sin nu hu wɛ ɖo ayi gba wɛ ɖo etats unis
ðo amerique latine ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo ji wu wɛ e wa alannu do
mɛhuhu e ɖɔ ɖɔ livi vlɔ wɛ e hu ɖo enɛ hugan mɛ nabi ahwan hu xwe enɛ xwe e
enyi e ma ɖo ɔ tofɔligbe aflika tɔn kpo tɛntin amɛlika tɔn kpo wɛ e hu mɛ ɖe hugan enɛ hu to ɖe lɛ tɔn donu ɛnɛ
hugan wɛ e hu ɖo amerique latine ɖo xwe ɖokpo mɛ bɔ bresil tɔn ɔ yi
adakaxixo wa vɔ bi gbidigbidi a
etɛwu adakaxixo gbakpe
nu e ɖɔ nugbo ɔ e tɛnkpɔn ɖe adakaxixo kpo ɖo ɔ sin akpaxwe ɖe lɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo toxo ɖaxo bresil tɔn sao paulo mɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ hu mɛ gbɔn e ɖekpo ɖo ji tɔn ɖo xwe wo wa yi lɛ e mɛ
e ɖo co adakaxixo alɔkpa lɛ bi wɛ gbakpe toxo enɛ mɛ bɔ e kpo ɖo ɖo ji hu wɛ
etɛ su kun do nu adakaxixo bi gbidigbidi
bonu adakaxixo vɔ bi gbidigbidi ɔ e sin lɛ sin linlin kpo walɔ kpo wu
cobonu lɛ huzu ɔ ɖo jo jijɔ ɖe lɛ do ɖi goyiyi kpo cejɛnnabi kpo ɖo wanyiyi kpo sisi kpo bɔ ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu
etɛ sixu mɛɖe blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo enɛ lɛ
wan yi nu mawu wɛ nyi e nyi tɔn lɛ tɔn lɛ nyi a jaan
sisi ɖo nu alo xɛsi ɖi nu mawu mavɔmavɔ wɛ nyi wan nu nu nyanya nunywɛxo
wan yi nu mawu kpo xɛsi ɖiɖi gble ɖo asi tɔn o kpo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn sixu mɛ tlɛ nɔ xo daka tawun lɛ e bɔ huzu gbɛzan yetɔn huzu bi
nu nɔ nyi doo a
tamɛ do alex ee zan xwe wa yi lɛ e ɖo gankpa bresil tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo adakaxixo gege wutu e sin ji
e biblu kpo ɖe kpo wa huzu jehovah tɔn ɖo
e jo dakaxixo do nugbo a
ganji lobɔ nu nyanya alex wa lɛ e bi wɛ tawun
e ɖɔ wa yi wan nu mawu ɖo mɔ mɔ ɖɔ e hwɛ kɛ mi nugbo nugbo e wu
ðo bresil ɖokpo ɔ ɔ cesar gbo ali nu mɛ ze tu do mɛ ji do
e zan nu xwe e nɛ
etɛ bɔ e huzu
hwenu e ɖo ganxo e ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖekunnu bɔ e biblu
cesar tinmɛ ɖɔ nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo ɖe nɛ
wan yi nu mawu
xɛsi ɖiɖi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ xɛsi ɖiɖi do kɔlilɛ wa nu nyanya do xomɛsin xomɛ nu jehovah wu
jlo ɖɔ nyi ɖumakpamɛsinɔ nu tɔn a
sixu nɔ mɛ adakaxixo han ɖe e mɛ gbɔn e
etɛ enɛ lɛ mi
e mi ɖɔ biblu ɖo hlɔnhlɔn huzu mɛ lɛ nɔ nu gbɔn e ɖyɔ gbɛzan yetɔn bi
efɛzinu lɛ alex xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ci sin wɛ e kɔn do ayi mɛ ɖɔhun bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ e linlin nyanya lɛ bi siin
gbeɖe ɖɔ kpewu jo linlin enɛ lɛ do a
nugbo ɔ enyi mi blo bonu wɛn ɖo biblu mɛ e ayi mitɔn mɛ ɔ e hɛn ɔ e ɖe nu nyanya bi sin mɛ alo
xo mawu tɔn ɖo hlɔnhlɔn nɔ mɛ we e
efɛzinu lɛ wagbɔ tɔn ɔ mɛ nyi kpo cejɛnnabinɔ kpo e sixu ɖyɔ jijɔ wa huzu kpo fifa kpo
hlɔmanu lɛ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan nɔ vivo ezayii
jehovah tɔn livi tantɔn jɛji ɖo to mɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu su kun do nu adakaxixo e mɛ
mɛ nyi akɔ vovo ɖo ninɔmɛ kpo aca vovo lɛ kpo e wan yi nu mawu kpo xɛsi ɖiɖi kpo wan yi nu yeɖee lɛ nɔ nɔ fifa mɛ xwedo ɖe ɖɔhun gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
kunnuɖenu gbɛɖe gbɛɖe wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ adakaxixo han ɖe e ɖe wa tiin

klisanwun ɖe wɛ nu a
enyi hun hwi lɔ ɖo liva we jɛji ɖo ayikungban ji e ɖibla blo mɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji e ɖo ji nɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi ahwanvu klisu tɔn e mɛ nɛ
egbe ɔ sinsɛn mɔkpan lɛ wɛ nɔ ylɔ yeɖee ɖɔ klisanwun loɔ nukplɔnmɛ yetɔn lɛ yeɖee lɛ tɔn lɛ bɔ ɖo linlin vovo lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ nu ɖi nu lɛ e sixu gbɔn vo tawun do mɛ ɖevo nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi klisanwun lɛ e tɔn lɛ
nu ɖi nu e ɖo taji wɛ a
ɛɛn e ɖo taji enyi jlo nyi klisanwun biblu mɛ ɖo e ɔ nɛ
e wa ylɔ ahwanvu jezu klisu tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ
nwt e byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo nyikɔ ɖevo nu a ɖo nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn kwin ɖokpo wɛ ɖe

sinsɛn towe
ɖɔ e nɔ nu klisu mɛ lɛ e kpo nu ahwanvu klisu tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖi nu lɛ e kpo mɛ a
sixu tuun gbɔn
wlɛnwin ɖokpo jɛn ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ zan biblu do gbeje
tamɛ do nu elɔ ji jezu klisu ɖo sisi ɖaxo ɖe nu mawuxowema ɔ nɔ do mɔ xo mawu tɔn
xomɛ tɔn hun ɖebu do mɛ ɖeɖee do sin nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn lɛ ji gbɔn hwɛndo mɛ sin nu lɛ ɖo gblamɛ e wu a
enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ ɖɔ nu ahwanvu jezu tɔn nugbo lɛ ɖi nu lɛ e ɖo gosin biblu mɛ

do mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ ɔ etɛwu nu sinsɛn towe nɔ mɛ lɛ e do nu biblu ɖɔ tawun lɛ e wu a
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu sinsɛn mitɔn ɖo jinjɔn nugbo ɖo biblu mɛ e ji
jaan bɔ pɔlu ɖɔ ji hwlɛngan mitɔn sin tuun mi tuun nugbo ɔ bi degbedegbe e wu
timɔtee enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e jinjɔn nugbo biblu tɔn sɔgbe e ji
ðo e kunkpla mitɔn
mi byɔ ɖɔ xa nukanbyɔ zɔn kpo xota elɔ kpo lɛ e xosin biblu nu e wu
xa wemafɔ biblu tɔn e ɖe lɛ e tamɛ do xosin lɛ ji

alo sixu yi tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn jw org ji
nukanbyɔ nyi mawu
xosin jehovah jezu sin wɛ nyi mawu mavɔmavɔ kpo da nu bi e kpo
enyi mi ɖo ɖɛ xo do mitɔn mɛ wɛ hweɖebunu ɔ mi nɔ doku nu mawu aklunɔ mitɔn jezu klisu sin kolosinu lɛ

nukanbyɔ nyi jezu klisu
xosin jezu wɛ nyi nukɔngbevi mawu tɔn
e da jezu hun e ɖo nɛ
jezu eɖee do mawu glɔ nɔ wa jlo tɔn
ɔ hugan mi jaan
nukɔngbevi wɛ e nyi hugan nu mawu blo lɛ bi kolosinu lɛ
matie kɔlɛntinu lɛ
nukanbyɔ etɛ nyi gbigbɔ
xosin gbigbɔ ɔ hlɔnhlɔn mawu nɔ zan do wa jlo tɔn e wɛ
e nyi mɛɖe a
gbigbɔ sixu ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ hlɔnhlɔn
ee elizabɛti se gbedomɛ tɔn le e ɔ vi ɖo xo tɔn mɛ e danwu bɔ gbigbɔ ayi mɛ nu elizabɛti luki
mɔ acɛ yi hwenu gbigbɔ jɛte wa ji e

nyi nu mawu kpo klisu kpo ɖu axɔsu xa klisu
nukanbyɔ etɛ nyi jlo mawu tɔn nu ayikungban ɔ kpo lɛ kpo

mɛðe lɛ ɖɔ lɛ wɛ do sinsɛn xo wa mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ mawu nɔ zan sinsɛn do lɛ bonu sɛkpɔ ɛ

nɔ kpo ɖo biblu ɔ wɛ ɖo nuglɔ wa yi wan nu nukplɔnmɛ lɛ e

hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ adakaxixo tɔn bɔ gbɔ jɛ gbe

mi ji nukɔnvi mitɔn nyi nyɔnu e ɖo xwe atɔn gudo bɔ tamɛ do nu ɖo taji ɖo gbɛzan mɛ e ji

asi wan nu lɛ tawun

e wa ya e ɔ kpodo alɔdo ɖaxo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ ɖu ɖo kannumɔ nyi nu fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ kpinkpɔn e ji

ganji
davidi ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ alɔ nu mi xomɛ ɖo hunhun mi wɛ ðɛhan
mawu jlo ɖɔ jezu wa taji ɖe ɖo gbɔ dido nu mɛ sin ɔ mɛ
ðo ɖeɖee mawu jezu lɛ e mɛ ɔ jezu ɖo hɛn sɔ mɛ ɖo mɔ wɛ ɖo ayi mɛ lɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ alo do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo aluwɛ mɛ lɛ
ezayii ði e ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ jezu ayi ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee agban kpinkpɛn hinhɛn cikɔ lɛ e ji tawun matie
jezu do gbɔ nu mɛ lɛ gbɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖe we nunywɛ kpe lɛ e xa e wa nu xa kpo kpo tlɛ gbɔ azɔn nu mɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ
gudunɔ ɖe savo nu jezu gbe ɖokpo ɖɔ nu e jlo ɔ hɛn ɔ gbɔ azɔn nu mi
nya ɔ sin nu blawu nu jezu ɖɔ jlo azɔn towe gbɔ
vi mawu tɔn ɔ ɖo ayikungban ji do gbɔ nu mi tlɔlɔ a co tɔn jehovah mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e kpo ɖo alɔdo mɛ ɖo hudo mɛ lɛ e wɛ
kɔlɛntinu lɛ tamɛ do ali taji nu mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖe e ɛnɛ elɔ lɛ ji
biblu
nu e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ xoxo lɛ bi ɔ e wlan do nu mi bonu mi ɖo nukun nu gbɔn sɔxwixwe kpo akɔnkpinkpan alo gbɔdonumɛ mawuxowema ɔ nɔ mi ɔ kpo gblamɛ hlɔmanu lɛ
gbigbɔ mawu tɔn
jezu ku ɖo hwenu klewun ɖe gudo e ɔ agun klisanwun tɔn ɔ blebu byɔ taan fifa tɔn ɖe mɛ
nɔ ɖo sisi ɖo nu aklunɔ wɛ ɖo nuwiwa yetɔn lɛ mɛ bɔ gbigbɔ alɔ nu wutu wɛ
gbigbɔ ee nyi hlɔnhlɔn mawu nɔ do e ɖo tawun
mawu hɛn ɔ e zan do do gbɔ nu mɛɖebu ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ e
ðɛxixo
hu do nu ɖebu wu o wɛ biblu ɖɔ nu mi
enɛ ɔ fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi ɔ blo ayixa mitɔn kpodo linlin mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖo filipunu lɛ
klisanwun mitɔn lɛ sixu nyi jɔ mi mɔ gbɔdonumɛ ɖe lɛ e hwenu mi ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe mɛ e
pɔlu ɖɔ do tɔn lɛ wu ɖɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu emi ɖesu ɖo adangbomɛ kpo lɛ kpo hwenu kolosinu lɛ tɛsalonikinu lɛ
sixu ɖo kinkanbyɔ hwiɖee wɛ ɖɔ nu nɔ nyi nugbo a ji
nu mi gbeje mɛ ɖeɖee mɔ tagba xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn
ɖɔhun ɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ mawu kpo ɖo akpa wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn elɔ e do e ɖe wɛ do gbɔ nu vinɔ ɖo gbɔ do nu vi tɔn wɛ ɖɔhun ezayii
jehovah wɛ mawu nɔ nyi bɔ biblu
mawu mitɔn ɖɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun ezayii
mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖɔ
do gbɔ nu vinɔ ɖo gbɔ do nu vi tɔn wɛ ɖɔhun ezayii
nu nu mɛ ɖo aluwɛ mɛ lɛ ɖo e do gbɔ nu matie
nu ɖo nyi nu wɛ lɛ bi sin agban ɖo ji mawu tɔn ɖo e ɖo nukun kpe do wu wɛ
ɔ alɔkpa alɔkpa tɔn wɛ ɖe
mi sixu ɖɔ xo do bi xwii ji ɖo fi a nu mi gbeje ɛnɛ sin mi wa yi lɛ e
mɛ mɔ tagba vovo lɛ e mɔ gbɔdonumɛ nugbo nugbo sin mawu gbɔn e wu
tɛnkpɔn nɔ yi gbe nu lɛ bi wiwa bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu akwɛzinzan ɖo dandan a lɛ e bi jonathan
ɖɔ nyi kpo asi kpo bi wɛ gble do hwe ɖokpo ɔ
alɔ e nɔ do xwedo lɛ e kpo taan klewun tɔn kpo ɖe lɛ jɛn mi kpɛnzɔn nu xwe we
mi ɖi xwi xa gbɔn
priscilla nɔ flin xogbe jezu tɔn ɖo matie mɛ e eɖee hwɛhwɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ mi kun ɖo sɔ ja e o ɖo ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo tagba eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ
ðɛ priscilla nɔ xo kpo ayi bi kpo e nɔ ɛ hlɔnhlɔn bonu e kpo ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ
ðɛhan wɛ do gbɔ nu nyɛ
ðɛhan ɔ ɖɔhun ɔ linlin lɛ bi do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah bɔ mɔ ɖɔ e mi nugbo
wa mɔ din co mi hɛn gbɛzan mitɔn bɔkun sɔgbe kpo weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn ɖo matie mɛ e kpo
hu bi ɔ mi sɛkpɔ mawu sɛkpɔ miɖee lɛ
e sin akwɛyozo ɖo to ɔ mɛ e wu bɔ xwe sin syɛnsyɛn mi wa e wa huzu nu yaya
nyi kpo asi kpo jɛ jlɛ ɖɔ do akwɛ wu ji
mi tlɛ sixu nya akwɛ do xɔ nu a ɖo mi nɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ mɛ nɔ nya akwɛ nu mi lɛ e kun yi gbe o
xo mawu tɔn kpo gbigbɔ tɔn kpo mi bɔ mi wa gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn
tɛnkpɔn nɔ yi gbe nu lɛ bi wiwa bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu akwɛzinzan ɖo dandan a lɛ e bi
ðo mi nyi jehovah tɔn wutu ɔ mitɔn lɛ lɔ nɔ alɔ nu mi
hwenu asu jo mi do ajijimɛ e ɔ e do akpa ayi ɖo nu mi wɛ raquel ɖɔ
aluwɛ aditi ɖe ɖi bu mi
sɛkpɔ mawu bɔ e do gbɔ nu mi
fifa mawu tɔn nɔ cyɔn alɔ ayi ji hwenu nɔ sɛkpɔ ɛ ɖo ɖɛ mɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e
mɔ ɖɔ e fifa ayi
xo tɔn biblu ɔ bɔ ɖu ɖo xomɛsin kpo kpo ji
hɛn xo pɔlu ɖɔ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ e do ayi mɛ e ɖɔ jo hwiɖee do nu nunyanyawiwa ɖu ɖo ji towe o e wa ɔ nɔ wa nu ɖagbe do ɖu ɖo nu nyanya ji
hwenu mi ɖo hɛn nu bu do e ɖe
nu lɛ gbe nya wɛ ɖe din raquel
ɖe mi bɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo yi nukɔn
e mi ɖɔ nu mi kpo kpo ɖɔ hwenu mi ɖo hɛn nu bu do e ɖe
weɖexamɛ enɛ ɔ syɛn ɖesu nu sin hudo ɖo e nɛ
nu lɛ gbe nya wɛ ɖe din
ɖo nɔ gudo nu mi e
kudeji ɖɔ jehovah zan ɛ do fifa ayi
enyi xoɖɛ mawu gudo ɔ nɔ mɔ bɔ gbigbɔ tɔn nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi luis
luis xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e nɔ jɛ hunzɔn baɖabaɖa ɖe bɔ ku wan do e azɔn we
din ɔ e ɖo nɔ nɔ jɔhɔn oxygene nu ganxixo gbe ɖokpo
e ɖɔ nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah hwɛhwɛ
bɔ enyi xoɖɛ mawu gudo ɔ nɔ mɔ bɔ gbigbɔ tɔn nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi
ðɛxixo nɔ mi akɔnkpinkpan bonu ma kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo ɖi nu tuun ɖɔ e ɖo nukun kpe do wɛ
mɔ mɔ ɖɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ e vɛwu nu mi tawun
gan vɔ ɖo bi bɔ kpo nu kɛɖɛ
hwɛhwɛ wɛ nɔ flin jezu byɔ tɔn ɖɔ nu e blo hun e ɖe do zɔ nu emi e
jehovah hlɔnhlɔn jezu lobɔ e hlɔnhlɔn nyi
ðɛxixo wɛ nyi amasin nɔ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e
enyi ɖɔ xo nu mawu gudo ɔ nɔ mɔ nyiɖee mɛ ganji matie
nu ci nu julian eyɛ ɖo xwi ɖi xa azɔn syɛnsyɛn nɔ hu agbaza sin wujɔnu ɖe lɛ e ɖe wɛ sin ɖibla yi xwe ɖie
sekunɔ sin kɛkɛ wɛ do ɖyɔ sin fɔtɛyi wɛ e ɖɔ
tawun din ɖo nɔ zan do mɛ ɖevo lɛ tamɛ wutu
nunamɛ sixu ɖe mitɔn kpo bɔ akpa jehovah do ɖɔ emi mi hlɔnhlɔn hwenu mi ɖo hudo tɔn e ɔ e nɔ ɖe jɛn wɛ
pɔlu ɖɔhun ɔ sixu ɖɔ nugbo ɖɔ mɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi ɔ wɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ sixu kpe nu enɛ lɛ bi wu filipunu lɛ
hwenu ku ɖo alitawovi ɖe mɛ e ɔ sixu ɖi a wɛ antonio ɖɔ
acɛ tawun wɛ e gba wu tɔn ɖo afɔ tɔn zɔn wɛ e ɖe kpowun ɖo yiyi wɛ bɔ e wa xobli
nuɖe ɖe bonu sixu wa a
e nɔ komaa mɛ nu azan cobo wa nyi
tɛnkpɔn ɖu ɖo nyiɖee ji ɖo nɔ nukunmɛ a ee wa ɖo nyiɖokpo e ɔ tawun
ðo taan baɖabaɖa enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo byɔbyɔ jehovah wɛ ɖɔ e mi fifa mi bonu ma ɖu ɖo nyiɖee ji
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ wa mɔ nyiɖee mɛ
flin ɖɔ biblu tinmɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ numaɖonukun lɛ sixu gbo mi mɛ ɖebu
ðo mawu sixu a wutu ɔ kudeji ɖɔ wa mɔ ɖo sin ku hwenu nwt jaan titu
vi sunnu mitɔn ku hwenu jɔmɛhun ɔ gba e co mi zan hwenu awajijɛ tɔn gege ɖo kpo ɖo flinflin wɛ robert
robert xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e ɖo linlin mɔhun lɛ
e ɖɔ nyi kpo asi kpo mɔ fifa xo e ɖɔ ɖo filipunu lɛ mɛ e
ðɛ mi nɔ xo jehovah lɛ e wɛ nɔ fifa enɛ mi
vivo ayi mɛ tɔn enɛ mi bɔ mi ɖɔ nukunɖiɖo sin ku tɔn mitɔn sin xo nu lɛ
mi nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ ayi mitɔn bi ɖo nu enɛ lɛ ji
hwenu mitɔn lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi mɔ mi ɖo telee mɛ bɔ mi vo ɖo miɖee mɛ tinmɛ nuɖiɖi mitɔn e ɔ mi ɖɔ nu ɖɔ ɖɛ tobutobu e xo do mitɔn mɛ lɛ e wɛ
gbɔdonumɛ sin xo maxamaxa ɖɔ lɛ e mi ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ jehovah ɖo gudo mitɔn
ði wa yi lɛ e gbɔn e ɔ mawu sixu do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo tagba kpo tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ kpo mɔ wɛ e
hwɛ
enyi mɔ tagba ɖebu ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ ɔ gbɔdonumɛ bɔ xo hwenu vɛwu enɛ lɛ zlɛ e tiin
enɛ wu ɔ aniwu byɔ alɔdo jehovah tɔn a
e wɛ nyi mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e kɔlɛntinu lɛ
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɖo xota elɔ mɛ e ɖe lɛ
enyi ɖɔ e bonu sɛkpɔ mawu do gbɔ nu hun kɛnklɛn mɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo xa towe mɛ lɛ e alo wlan wema alaxɔ sɛkpɔ e ɖe
ði nu ðɔhun davidi
davidi nya eɖee wun ɖo sɔja kanwezun gbligbli gbɔn wu tɔn lɛ e wutu
xɛsi ɖaxo ɖe ji wɛ ɖe hwenu hɔn sin fi ahwan ɖe wɛ ɖe e
etɛ do xɛsi
azɔn mɔkpan wɛ davidi se bɔ ɖo xokwin ɖokpo ɔ ɖɔ wɛ kpo xomɛsin kpo
nya ɖe sin nyikɔ wɛ
nya ɔ ɖesu nɛ ɖo jaguda ɖo tɔdo ɔ mɛ nɛ vlafo davidi mɔ mɛɖe bɔ e a
davidi mɔ nu wu sɔja lɛ ɖi xɛsi e agba wɛ e do a
enyi e tlɛ fɔ ahwanfunnu tɔn lɛ kpla a ɔ e ɖo zin hu sunnu jinganjingan weɖobu
e ahwannu ɖesu e tawun tuun ahwanfunfun sin we
goliyati adan kpo xosusu kpo
do nukun xosusu tɔn ɖo nu ɖɔ gbɔn so lɛ mɛ wɛ hwenu e ɖo ahwankpa izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn kpo axɔsu yetɔn sawulu kpo sɛkpɔ wɛ e mɛ
e gla nyi gbehwan izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo do bonu emi kpo mɛ ɔ kpo kpe hun le emi ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji ɖo cɛju mɛ samuwɛli
izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖi xɛsi
axɔsu sawulu ɖi xɛsi
davidi se xo ɔ se ɖɔ e ɖo sin ɖokpo jɛji ɖie
davidi byɔ mɛ
do nukun mɛ axɔsu izlayɛli tɔn kpo sɔja tɔn lɛ kpo jɛ davidi sin fofo atɔn ji ɖo xɛsi ɖi wɛ gbɔn e nu nɛ hu winnya
ðo davidi sin nukunmɛ ɔ enyi ahwankpa izlayɛli tɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ goliyati pagawun enɛ do winnya a e ɖo jehovah mawu izlayɛli tɔn zun wɛ tawun
etɛ davidi mɛ nyi yɔkpɔvu e sixu wa din
etɛ nuɖiɖi davidi ɖo e sixu mi ɖo egbe samuwɛli
nu mi lɛkɔ yi gudo kpɛɖe
gbadanu su bɔ davidi ɖo nukun kpe do tɔn sin lɛ wu wɛ ɖo sokan mɛ ɖo bɛteleyɛmu kpa
nuɖiɖo mawu tɔn lɛ ɖɛkpɛ gbɔn e kpinkpɔn nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ lobɔ nuwukpikpe nuxixo tɔn e ɖo e kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɖo e zan hwenu gege do xo kpo awajijɛ kpo wutu
ɖo gbadanu xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e ɔ e ylɔ davidi
tɔn jlo mɔ ɛ din tlolo samuwɛli
e mɔ bɔ tɔn jɛsee ɖo xo ɖɔ xa nya kpo tawun e ɖe wɛ
gbeyiɖɔ samuwɛli wɛ
jehovah ɛ do bonu e kɔn do nu vi sunnu jɛsee tɔn lɛ ɖokpo bonu e nyi izlayɛli xɔsu bɔ e
samuwɛli mɔ davidi sin fofo tɛnwe lɛ jehovah samuwɛli nyi wɛn ɖɔ emi kun mɛ ɖe o
loɔ ee davidi wa e ɔ jehovah ɖɔ nu samuwɛli ɖɔ kɔn do ɛ axɔsu
ðo davidi sin fofo lɛ bi nukunmɛ ɔ samuwɛli hun lanzo mɛ bunɔ ɔ ɖe e kɔn ɖe do nu davidi
davidi sin gbɔn vo bi sese ee e kɔn do gudo e
biblu ɖɔ gbigbɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn wa davidi ji gbe enɛ gbe nɔ ji tɔn sɔyi samuwɛli
kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo ɔ davidi ɖuɖeji e ɖo do gbekanlin lɛ ji e sin jo nu jehovah
acɛkpikpa jɛ davidi jlo ji wɛ a
ðo avla enɛ mɛ ɔ e kpo ɖo sin tɔn wa wɛ
ɖe wɛ bɔ e ze eɖee bi jo nɔ wa kpo adɔgbigbo kpo
kinnikinni ɖe kpo lɔnmɔ ɖe kpo wa doya nu tɔn sin lɛngbɔhwan azɔn we
azɔn we lɛ bi wɛ eɖokponɔ hu gbekanlin baɖabaɖa lɛ samuwɛli ezayii
hweɖenu ɔ e ylɔ davidi ɖevo
davidi nɔ wa nu gbɔn e jɛ axɔsu sawulu to mɛ
sawulu kpo ɖo hlɔnhlɔnnɔ nyi wɛ co e jehovah tɔn kpo ɖo e tlito nu mawu wutu
jehovah ɖe gbigbɔ tɔn sin sawulu ji enɛ wu ɔ gbigbɔ nyanya ɖe nɔ wa ji tɔn hwɛhwɛ bɔ e nɔ ɖo xomɛsin ji nɔ vɛ nu do mɛ nɔ nylahun
enyi gbigbɔ nyanya enɛ wa sawulu ji ɔ nu ɖokpo sixu bɔ e mɔ kɔ do sa fun e wɛ nyi nuxixo
sawulu sin mɛɖe lɛ se xo do davidi wu ɖɔ e nyi ɖe nyi ɖe
enɛ wu ɔ e ylɔ davidi wa bɔ ɖo malin malin mɛ ɔ e huzu ɖokpo ɖo mɛ nɔ xo nu ɖo sawulu sin hɔnmɛ lɛ e mɛ nɔ hɛn ahwanfunnu nu axɔsu ɔ samuwɛli
davidi ɖe nuɖiɖi ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ gbɔn e sixu nu gege mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ e zan vivo hwenu tɔn lɛ do nya nu ɖeɖee bɔ e kpo jehovah kpo lɛ e sin gbe
ɔ e xwe sɔ nu ɖeɖee sixu bɔ e kpewu nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e
ee ɖo taji hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e xwedo gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn tɔn
nukplɔnmɛ titewungbe ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ nu mi mɛ bi
hwenu davidi ɖo wa nu sawulu wɛ e ɔ e nɔ lɛkɔ wa yi tɔn sin lɛ kɔn hwɛhwɛ nɔ xɔ azan hweɖelɛnu ɖo
hwe enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ jɛsee davidi do bonu e yi fofo tɔn atɔn ɖo ahwangɔnu sawulu tɔn mɛ lɛ e
davidi setonu do nuɖuɖu gban nu fofo tɔn lɛ tunta tɔdo elah tɔn tɔdo telebɛntitin tɔn mɛ
ee e wa e ɔ wu ku hwenu e mɔ ahwangɔnu we lɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ tɔn e mɛ e
kpannukɔn yeɖee ɖo tɔdo gblɛlɛ enɛ ɔ sin akpaxwe we lɛ samuwɛli
davidi sixu yi gbe nu nu enɛ ɔ a
ahwangɔnu jehovah mawu gbɛɖe ɔ tɔn sixu ɖi xɛsi hɔn ɖo yaya pagawun ɖe kpowun sin nukɔn gbɔn
davidi mɔ ɖɔ adan goliyati e ɔ jehovah wɛ e zun tlɔlɔ
enɛ wu ɔ e jɛ xo ɖɔ nu sɔja lɛ do e sixu ɖu ɖo goliyati ji gbɔn e wu ji
ðo malin malin mɛ ɔ eliavu davidi sin fofo ɖaxo ɔ se xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e
e adan do nɔvi tɔn kpɛvi ɔ ji syɛnsyɛn dohwɛ ɛ ɖɔ e ɖo ahwan ɔ gbɔn wɛ e gbe wɛ e
davidi yi gbe ɖɔ etɛ wa nyi do din
nu wɛ kanbyɔ kpowun a ce
enɛ gudo ɔ e jɛ e ɖu ɖo goliyati ji gbɔn e sin xo ɖɔ ji kpo jiɖiɖe kpo bɔ mɛɖe wa yi ɖɔ xo tɔn lɛ nu axɔsu sawulu
axɔsu ɔ ɖegbe ɖɔ e kpla davidi wa nukɔn emitɔn samuwɛli
davidi ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ e nu axɔsu ɔ do goliyati wu mɛ ɖokpo ɖi xɛsi nu nya enɛ ɔ o
sawulu kpo mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ɖi xɛsi nu goliyati nugbo
vlafo ze yeɖee jlɛ do nya jinganjingan enɛ wu mɔ ɖɔ jɛn emi wa nu nya ɔ
ɖɔ jinganjingan enɛ wa nu emitɔn blewun
davidi nu gbɔn a
mi wa mɔ gbɔn e ɔ linlin vo sese wɛ e ɖo do ninɔmɛ ɔ wu
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ emiɖesu yi kpe hun xa goliyati samuwɛli
sawulu ɖɔ ɖɔ sixu kpe hun xa enɛ ɔ a ɖo yɔkpɔvu wɛ nu eyɛ ɖo ahwan mɛ sin vu
davidi kpo ɖo yɔkpɔvu nugbo a
eo e kpo ɖo vu nu ahwanfunfun bɔ e sixu yɔkpɔvu ɖo nukunmɛ
e ɖo co e tuun davidi ɖi titewungbe ɖe bɔ e ɖo mɛxo nyi wɛ ɖo hwenɛnu samuwɛli
davidi kpi nu e jlɛ xa kinnikinni kpo lɔnmɔ kpo e sin do jiɖe sawulu
go yi wɛ e ɖe a
davidi tuun nu wu e ɖu ɖo ahwan enɛ lɛ ji e
e ɖɔ mawu nɔ hwlɛn mi sin kinnikinni fɛn mɛ nɔ hwlɛn mi sin lɔnmɔ fɛn mɛ ɔ hwlɛn mi sin enɛ si
jlo ɖi nu davidi ɖɔhun a
wu ɖɔ nuɖiɖi davidi tɔn kun nyi jlo sin linlin ɖe kpowun o
e ɖi nu nu mawu tɔn ɖo nu e tuun e kpo nu e mɔ lɛ e kpo wutu
e tuun ɖɔ jehovah nyi mɛɖe nɔ cyɔn alɔ mɛ ji kpo wanyiyi kpo nɔ ɖe akpa e do lɛ e
enyi mi jlo ɖo nuɖiɖi mɔhun ɔ mi ɖo kpo ɖo nu wɛ do mawu xo biblu ɖɔ e wu
hwenu mi ɖo zan sɔgbe xa nu mi lɛ e wɛ e ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ nu ɖagbe mɛ e kɔ do e hɛn nuɖiɖi mi tɔn lido eblee lɛ
jɛ nukɔn ɔ sawulu tɛnkpɔn fɔ ahwanwu eɖesu tɔn lɛ do nu davidi
ahwanwu enɛ lɛ ci goliyati tɔn ɖɔhun bɔ e ganvɔ do blo bɔ awu ɖaxo ci hweviza ɖɔhun e lɔ
ee davidi tɛnkpɔn ɖi zɔnlin ɖo ahwanwu ɖaxo kpinkpɛn enɛ mɛ e ɔ e wa mɔ ɖɔ e kun nu emi o
e ahwanfunfun sɔja lɛ ɖɔhun a enɛ wu ɔ ahwanwu dido ma ɛ a ɖo taji ɔ ahwanwu sawulu nyi mɛ hu mɛ bi ɖo akɔta izlayɛli tɔn mɛ e tɔn
samuwɛli e ɖe bi nu e nɔ do e e wɛ nyi nu ɖe nɔ do do cyɔn alɔ lɛngbɔhwan tɔn ji e samuwɛli
davidi do sin nu tɔn lɛ glo ɖe kpla klohwan ɖe
egbe ɔ klohwan sixu nɔ nuɖe hwenɛnu ɔ alyannu titewungbe ɖe wɛ
alyannu titewungbe tɔn enɛ ɔ akpo kpɛvi ɖe wɛ bɔ e bla anyukan gaga we
e nɔ hwan ɖe do akpo ɔ mɛ nɔ lilɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖo mɛtɔn nɔ jo anyukan lɛ ɖokpo do bɔ hwan ɔ nɔ yi jɛ fi e nyi e
alyannu enɛ nɔ bɔ ahwankpa gege zan mɛ nɔ nyi klohwan lɛ e sin gege do fun ahwan
kpo ahwanfunnu tɔn kpo ɔ davidi kanwezun yi kpe tɔn
ðɛ syɛnsyɛn davidi xo hwenu e fɛ ɖo ayikungban xuxu tɔdo ɔ tɔn ji hwan kpɛvi kpɛvi wutu yetɔn ɖiɖi lɛ e ɔ nukun jɛn mi sixu
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖido fi ahwan ɖe wɛ e ɖe e e ɖi zɔnlin a wezun wɛ e kan
hwenu goliyati mɔ tɔn e ɔ etɛ e
mi xa ɖɔ e hu ɖo e mɔ ɖɔ e kpo ɖo yɔkpɔvu nyi nyavi vɔvɔ ɖagbeɖagbe ɖe
goliyati suxo kanbyɔ ɖɔ cuku wɛ emi nyi bɔ e ja emi hɛn kpo a ji
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e mɔ kpo davidi hɛn e e klohwan ɔ wu a
e donu davidi ɖo vodun lɛ tɔn nyikɔ mɛ xwle nu ɖɔ emi enɛ ɔ tɔn xɛ lɛ kpo gbekanlin lɛ kpo samuwɛli
jɛ egbe ɔ xosin davidi e nyi nuɖiɖi ɖaxo tɔn ɖe
davidi tuun ɖɔ hlɔnhlɔn e ɖo e kpo ahwanfunnu e fɔ kpla lɛ e kpo kun sɔ nuti o
goliyati ɖe mɛmasi jehovah mawu bɔ jehovah ɖo kɛnu
davidi ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ wɛ nɔ ɖuɖeji mɛ samuwɛli
davidi agba goliyati do e kpo ahwanfunnu tɔn lɛ kpo wu ganji
e ɖo co davidi ɖɔ emi kun jo nu mɔhun lɛ do bɔ do awakanmɛ ku nu emi o
e jɛ mɔ mɛ sawulu kpo tɔn lɛ kpo jɛ e a
davidi eɖee do goliyati wu a
e wa ɔ e goliyati do jehovah wu
kpodo gaɖiɖi tɔn ɖibla yi mɛtlu atɔn e kpo ɔ goliyati yi ji hu mɛ lɛ bi nu e ɛ do ɔ wu ɔ fitɛ e jɛ
nugbo ɔ lɛ bi ɖɔhun ɔ e ayisinzɛn a ɖo jehovah ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa nu tɔn blewun
davidi kan wezun ɖido tɔn glo tɔn mɛ hwan ɖokpo
e hwan ɔ do klohwan tɔn mɛ lilɛ ɖo tɔn bɔ e ɖɔ nu ganji
goliyati sɛkpɔ davidi vlafo e ɖo tɔn gudo tututu
goliyati ɖi e nyi awovinu ɖo kpaa ɖe sixu dlɛn gaglonu ɔ yi cyɔn alɔ nya jinganjingan enɛ ɔ tɔn ji a
fi enɛ wɛ davidi samuwɛli
davidi mɔ ɖɔ mɛ jinganjingan ɖe kun tlɛ sɔ nuti ɖo jehovah mawu kpa o
davidi hwan tɔn
fi bi ci too hwenu hwan ɔ viin xwe fi e nyi e gbɔn e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah blo bɔ davidi nyi hwan ɔ ɖevo a
hwan ɔ yi xo goliyati tɔn byɔ mɛ
nya jinganjingan enɛ ɔ xwe agbɔnnusu do viwun
ɔ bɔ afɔ nyi caɖa mɛ
davidi sɛkpɔ goliyati hwi tɔn gbo ɛ samuwɛli
sawulu kpo sɔja tɔn lɛ kpo mɔ hlɔnhlɔn
kpo xosusu ɖaxo ɖe kpo ɔ zun do lɛ ji
ahwanfunfun ɔ ci davidi ɖɔ nu goliyati ɖɔ e ci gbɔn e mawu mavɔmavɔ jo nu mi samuwɛli
ðo egbe ɔ mawu lɛ nɔ ahwan a
hwe enɛ wa yi
matie e ɖo co mi ɖo ɖi nu davidi ɖɔhun
eɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo nɔ jehovah do mɔ mɛ tiin nugbo e ɖe mawu ɖokpo e ɖo ɖi xɛsi e
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu ci nu mi ɖɔ tagba mitɔn lɛ hugan mi ɖɔhun tagba mitɔn lɛ sɔ nuti ɖo hlɔnhlɔn maɖodogbo jehovah tɔn kpa a
enyi mi jehovah do ɖo mawu mitɔn ɖi nu davidi ɖɔhun ɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖebu tagba ɖebu sixu do xɛsi mi a
nu ɖebu sixu glo hlɔnhlɔn jehovah tɔn a
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ davidi kpo goliyati kpo tɔn ɔ nugbo jɛn wɛ a ji alo xɛxo kpowun wɛ
mɔhun wa ayi mɛ nu hwi lɔ hwenu ɖo xota wa yi e xa wɛ e wɛ a
enyi wɛ hun kɛnklɛn gbeje nukanbyɔ atɔn elɔ lɛ
biblu ɖɔ ji goliyati sin yi mɛtlukpo atɔn
samuwɛli mɛɖe lɛ nɔ zyan va ɖɔ goliyati kun sixu ɖo enɛ o tamɛ do xo elɔ wu ðo hwe mitɔn ɔ mɛ ɖi hu mɛ bi bɔ e do wema mɛ e sin hugan mɛtlu
e vɛwu nugbo ɖɔ goliyati ɖi a
akɔta hlafa tɔn mɛ wɛ e jɔ ɖe mɛ enɛ lɛ nɔ ɖi zɛ wu bɔ e tuun
wema ejipu tɔn xwe kanweko tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ do xɛsi nɔ nɔ kanaa sin xa mɛ lɛ e sin nɔ hugan mɛtlu
enɛ wu ɔ gaɖiɖi goliyati tɔn zɛ wu co e vɛwu tawun ɖɔ e nyi o
hweɖenu wa yi ɔ akɔwe ɖe lɛ tɛnkpɔn xwe axɔsu davidi do xɛxo sin mɛ lɛ mɛ biblo wa vɛwu
dobanunu dokunkun tɔn sin ɖe lɛ mɔ nuwlanwlan hwexonu tɔn ɖe bɔ xogbe xwe davidi tɔn
ɔ jezu klisu ɖɔ davidi sin xo
matie jezu tɔn lɛ e ɖo ali we e ɖɔ e wɛ nyi mɛsiya ɔ nugbo gosin axɔsu davidi sin kunkan mɛ
matie luki e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ davidi nɔ nugbo
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ tɔdo telebɛntitin tɔn tɔdo elah tɔn mɛ wɛ ahwan ɔ ɖe
izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo gɔnu ɖo akpa ɖe ɔ xwe ɖo sokan mɛ bɔ tɔdo ɔ ɖo tɛntin yetɔn
fi enɛ lɛ tiin nugbo a
nu mɛ ɖisa yi xa ɔ mɛ ayisɔnmɔ e ɖe ɖɔ e ɖie mitɔn ɔ kpla mi yi tɔdo elah tɔn ɔ mɛ e nyi sinsɛnnɔ a
mi ali ɖe kpla mi yi so ɖe sin ahɔn mɛ
ee mi ɖo tɔdo ɔ mɛ wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ mi xa samuwɛli
e dlɛn alɔ tɔdo ɔ gudo ɖɔ doglin soko tɔn lɛ nɛ ɖo amyɔ mitɔn xwe nɛ
e lilɛ ɖɔ ðo aɖisi mitɔn xwe de ɔ doglin azeka tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖo finɛ
lɛ ɖo gɔnu ɖo toxo enɛ lɛ tɛntin ɖo fi ɖe ɖo sokan kpannukɔn e mɛ
hun fi izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo gɔnu ɖo e wɛ mi sixu ɖe
do nukun mɛ ɖɔ sawulu kpo davidi kpo ɖo ɖo fi ɖe din e
enɛ gudo ɔ mi jɛte bɔ ɖo tɔdodo ɔ mɛ ɔ mi fi sin ɔ nɔ sa gbɔn e ɖe ɖibla xu bi lobɔ awinnya mɛ
do nukun mɛ davidi fɛ yi do ɖo fi hwan wutu tɔn ɖiɖi e bɔ ɖokpo hu goliyati e gbɔn e
ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e sin lɛ sɔgbe gbɔn e jiwu nu enɛ kpo mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ kpo
nu ɖebu ɖe sixu bɔ e xo nu do gbesisɔ enɛ ɔ tɔn ji a
mɛ nɔ nugbo lɛ e kpo fi tiin nugbo lɛ e kpo wɛ
hu ɔ xo mawu do ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ bɔ wlan e sin akpaxwe wɛ enɛ wu ɔ mawu nugbo nɔ ɖo adingban a e wɛ e gosin titu timɔtee
mɛðe lɛ ði nu ðɔ e nɔte nu acɛkpikpa mawu tɔn ɖo ayi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn mɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ gan ɖeɖee lɛ do hɛn fifa kpo buninɔ kpo wa ɔ mɛ e wɛ
etɛ midɛɛ
mawu jixwe tɔn ɖe axɔsuɖuto mɛɖe sixu gba a e ɖokpo
daniyɛli acɛkpikpa jɔ acɛkpikpa ɖe wɛ nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn
axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɔ nɔ kpacɛ sin jixwe matie luki
mawu zan axɔsuɖuto ɔ blo bɔ jlo tɔn nyi wiwa ɖo jixwe kpo ayikungban ji kpo matie
malin malin mɛ
e wa a
matie enyi e jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ wa su kun do nu nyanya din tɔn ɔ
mɛɖebu ɖo ayikungban ji tuun hwenu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wa do e a matie
biblu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ wa ɖo malin malin mɛ matie
nu ɖo mɔjɛmɛ hun wemata wema elɔ tɔn etɛ biblu mɛ tawun jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
pourquoi
dieu va il
mɛ tɔn wɛ e adrian fuente
to mexique
dɔnkpɛvu
e ji mi ɖo ciudad mante toxo ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɖe wɛ ɖo tokpɔn tamaulipas tɔn mɛ ɖo mexique
ðo kpaa mɛ ɔ toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ yi mɛ nɔ xomɛ ɖesu
e blawu ɖɔ ɖo adanuwiwa sin tuto e nɔ blo lɛ e wutu ɔ xa ɔ mɛ do xɛsi tawun
nyi wɛ nyi mɛ wegɔ ɔ ɖo vi sunnu ɛnɛ lɛ ji e mɛ
lɛ blo baptɛm nu mi ɖo sinsɛn katolika tɔn mɛ bɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ nɔ xa ɔ mɛ tɔn mɛ
mawu nukunmɛ ɖo nɔ ɖi xɛsi tawun ɖɔ e wa ɖɔhwɛ do mi bɔ fyɔ ɖo sɔyi
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ jo mi do
nu enɛ bɔ nɔ wubla mɛ tawun bɔ e kun do ɖaxo ɖe do ayi mɛ
mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu mi yi wan tawun co e jo mi do e mɛ a
nɔ ɖo nu hwenu gege ɖo toxo mɛ cobo kpewu kpe nukun do mi mɛ sunnuvi ɛnɛ lɛ wu
gbɔn yɛkan enɛ mɛ nɔ gɔn nɔ yi nu vi hu xwe mi lɛ e
mi bɔ nɔ zun mɛ azɔ nɔ kwin
ðo nɔ kpacɛ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ ji wutu ɔ kwin nyinyi alɔdido kalatekaa kpo e nɔ zan ahwanfunnu lɛ gbɔn e kpo
huzu dɔnkpɛvu ɖe
nɔ ɖo hunxixo kpo tu kpo mɛ hwɛhwɛ bɔ azɔn mɔkpan wɛ nɔ gblewu vantankannya nɔ ɖo beɖebeɖe ɖo alixo
dɔn nɔ do aluwɛ mɛ tawun hwenu e nɔ wa mɔ mi ɖo ɖo mi yi dotooxwe e
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ jorge kpo nyi kpo nyi ɖo vu e wa mi ɖo xwegbe
e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ nu emi bɔ emi jlo ma wɛn taji ɖe xa mi
e zan biblu do jɛ nu e ɖi nu lɛ e tinmɛ nu mi ji
xa biblu a bɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo e vivi nu mi tawun
nugbo ɔ tuuntuun do xo ɔ wu ɖɔ e kun nyi nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn ɖe o wa ɖagbe nu mi tawun
ðɛhan ee enɛ gudo e ɔ nɔ ɖi xɛsi togblo ɖe nu mawu a
e wa ɔ nɔ ɛ do mɔ wanyiyinɔ nɔ ɖagbe vi tɔn lɛ tɔn e ɖe
ee ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo biblu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ e ɔ wa mɔ ɖɔ ɖo blo huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ
ɖo mɛɖesɔhwe jo dakaxixo do
weɖexamɛ ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e mi
e ɖɔ nyanya lɛ ɔ walɔ ɖagbe e ɖo ɔ wɛ nɔ hɛn gble
wa mɔ ɖɔ enyi jlo huzu jijɔ ɔ ɖo nɔ do mɛ nɔ nu nyanya mi lɛ e tɔn ɖe a
enɛ wu ɔ jo xoxo lɛ do zun xa agun klisanwun tɔn nugbo ɔ sin lɛ mɛ enɛ lɛ nɔ akpotokwin alo daka do ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ a loɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ zan do wa
wemafɔ mawuxowema ɔ tɔn ɖevo wa ɖagbe nu mi e wɛ nyi hlɔmanu lɛ
tɛnkpɔn gbɔn alɔkpa bi mɛ kpewu gbɔn e nɔ fifa mɛ xa lɛ bi
miɖesunɔ nɔ hlɔn o ɖo e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ nyɛ wɛ nɔ hlɔn nyɛ wɛ nɔ su nu e wa ɔ sin axɔ mɛ aklunɔ wɛ ɖɔ mɔ
wa yi gbe ɖɔ jehovah ɖeɖɛ nuagɔwiwa e jlo gbɔn e ɖo hwetɔnnu
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ jo dakaxixo sin gbɛzan do
wɔn nu jɛ gbadanu gbe ɖokpo hwenu wa xweyigbe xwegbe e a
dɔnkpɛvu jaguda nyi e tɔn ɖe jɛ xixo mi ji bɔ gan yetɔn zin nu do nɛgbe suxo ɖɔ jɛhun do hwiɖee ji
hwe enɛ ɔ xoɖɛ klewun ɖe jehovah byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e mi bonu ma dɛ ɖo nuɖɔbamɛ ɔ
akpakpa mi tawun bonu ma hlɔn co kpewu ɖu
ayihɔngbe tɔn ɔ yi mɔ gan ɔ ɖokponɔ
xomɛ sin mi bɔ hlɔnbiba jlo mi savo nu jehovah mɛ ɖɔ e mi bonu ma ɖu ɖo nyiɖee ji
e kpaca mi ɖɔ nyavi ɔ wa kpe mi ɖɔ nu jɛ sɔ e kɛ mi
nu a ɔ ci hwi ɖɔhun
jlo biblu
ðu ɖu ɖo xomɛsin ji e vivi nu mi
enɛ wɛ bɔ mi jɛ biblu ji ɖo
e ɖo co kudeji ɖɔ kpo ɖo nu ɔ wɛ lɔn bonu mɛɖebu alo nu ɖebu lɛkɔ nu mi a
tuun ɖɔ xa togun mawu tɔn hwɛhwɛ hu akpa ayi yi e mi xwedo sin hudo ɖo e
kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ bɔ ɖo ɔ blo baptɛm huzu jehovah tɔn
nɔ ɖo mi hwɛhwɛ nɔ kpacɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ xo daka
xo mawu tɔn ɖyɔ gbɛzan bi kpatakpata
din ɔ nɔ ma fifa wɛn ɖo biblu mɛ e xa mɛɖebu jlo se e
e jɔwu mi bɔ wa hwebinu tɔn sin nu xwe wa yi lɛ e
ze nyiɖee jo ɖo alaxɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn mexique tɔn mɛ nu taan ɖe
hwenu ɖo finɛ e ɔ xo go claudia ɖyɔvi klisanwun ɖe wɛ bɔ mi wli alɔ ɖo
doku nu jehovah tawun ɖɔ e mi enɛ
mi wa ɖo tokunɔgbe mexique tɔn sin agun ɖe mɛ nɔ tokunɔ lɛ bɔ nu do jehovah wu
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi tɛn yi belize biblu xa mɛ lɛ ɖo to enɛ mɛ
gbɛzan mitɔn bɔkun ɖo fi co nu sin hudo mi ɖo ɖo awajijɛ e bi wɛ mi ɖo
mi nu ɖebu do ɖyɔ a
hweɖenu wa yi ɔ nɔ jɛ biblu ji wa blo baptɛm
ɔ fofo asi tɔn kpo vi yetɔn lɛ kpo nyi jehovah tɔn din
xoxo ma axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin wɛn xa e ɖe lɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ din
e blawu ɖɔ xwedo sin mɛ ɖe lɛ ku ɖo huzu jijɔ adakaxixo tɔn yetɔn a wutu
enyi jo ali enɛ do wɛ a ɔ xo nyi tɔn sixu fo yetɔn ɖɔhun
doku ɖɔ jehovah dɔn mi bɔ sɛkpɔ e kpo tɔn lɛ kpo bɔ ɖo suulu xomɛ mi zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ ɖo gbɛzan mɛ gbɔn e
egbe tɔn mɛ ninɔ ɖo tawun
fi ɖe ɖe bɔ mi sixu mɔ alɔdo kpo gbɔdonumɛ kpo ɖe a
biblu ɖɔ mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ kɔlɛntinu lɛ
atɔxwɛ elɔ ɖɔ xo do mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo gbɔn e ji

nu e ɖo alɔkpa ɖevo mɛ a ɔ wemafɔ e ɖe do wema elɔ mɛ lɛ e gosin biblu fɔngbe tɔn mawuxowema mɛ bɔ mi wlan ɖo alɔkpa mɛ e nɔ wlan nu gbɔn ɖo egbe e
xota ðo akpa ɔ ji e numimɔ zawe lɛ e do nuðiðo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji
tamɛ do nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo fi nɔ nɔ e kpo wu a
enyi hun tuun ɖɔ e kun nyi hwiɖokponɔ wɛ o
mɛ lɛ tinmɛ nu gege do xo enɛ wu nu xwe mɔkpan
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ tɔgbo lɛ wɛ nɔ nɔ yɛswimɛ bɔ e ɖo kpa nu
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ fi ɖe tiin nyi vivotɛn jiwu ɖe bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ jixwe lobɔ wɛnsagun lɛ kpo mɛ ɖagbe ku lɛ e kpo nɔ nɔ finɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ jixwe do mɔ fi numɛsɛn livi kanweko mɔkpan nɔ nɔ e ɖe
mɛ gege nɔ dɔn nu ɖɔ mi kun sixu tuun nu ɖe do jixwe wu o ɖo mɛɖe kun gosin ɖekunnu o
loɔ linlin enɛ ɔ sɔgbe a
jezu klisu nɔ ɖo jixwe nyi nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe cobo wa ayikungban ji
e ɖɔ nu sinsɛngan lɛ ceɖeceɖe ɖo agbawungba ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɖɔ jɛte sin jixwe blo jlo a loɔ nu jlo mɛ mi do ɔ blo gbe ja wa
enɛ wu ɔ nujɔnu ɖɔ nu tɔn lɛ wɛ jezu ɖe hwenu e ɖɔ xo elɔ e nɔtɛn gege wɛ ɖo xwe jaan
jezu sin ɔ wɛ nyi mawu bɔ nyikɔ tɔn nɔ nyi jehovah bɔ jehovah sin xwe ɔ jixwe wɛ e ɖe
ðɛhan nwt enɛ wu ɔ mɛɖebu sixu jixwe ci e sɔ jehovah mawu kpo jezu klisu kpo a
ɖe nu gege do jixwe wu gbɔn numimɔ jiwu blo bɔ ɖe lɛ mɔ e gblamɛ
xota bɔ e ɖɔ xo do akpaxwe biblu tɔn tinmɛ nu lɛ mɔ ɖo numimɔ ɖe lɛ mɛ e ji
hwenu ɖo numimɔ enɛ lɛ gbeje wɛ e ɔ flin ɖɔ fi nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ nɔ e kun nyi nu hɛn kpo alɔ kpo ɖe alo nuɖe bɔ e sixu mɔ ɖo nukun wu o
mɛ ɔ mawu zan xogbe nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu e do tinmɛ nu lɛ nu mi a e wa ɔ e zan xogbe mɛ mi sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ lɛ e do tinmɛ jixwe ci e ɖo numimɔ lɛ mɛ
numimɔ enɛ lɛ bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ nɔ nɔ nɔtɛn gege ɖo jixwe lɛ e wu

mi byɔ ɖɔ gbeje ganji
nu e tinmɛ ɖo numimɔ lɛ mɛ e bi wɛ mi yi bluju tɔn a e ɖo co numimɔ lɛ sixu bɔ do nukun mɛ nɔ nɔ jixwe lɛ e mɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu sixu wa nu lɛ e wu
axɔsuzinkpo ɖokpo ɖo jixwe bɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo axɔsuzinkpo enɛ ji
mɛ ɖo ayijinjɔn ɔ sin ninɔmɛ ci awinnya xɔ akwɛ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ jasipee ɔ kpodo ee e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ sadwani ɔ kpan ɖɔhun
mɔ ɖɔ nu ɔ ɖo wɛ e ɖiɖi wu ɔ ɖɔhun e ci myɔ wɛ do ɖɔhun mɔ nu myɔ ɖɔhun ɖe bɔ e zawe
weziza ɔ ci ji nɔ ja bɔ nyi nɔ ɖi ɔ ɖɔhun
mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn sin wɛ ezekiyɛli
numimɔ enɛ lɛ jaan kpo gbeyiɖɔ ezekiyɛli kpo mɔ lɛ e zan nu mɛ mi sixu do nukun lɛ e do jehovah mawu ajalɔnnɔ ɔ tɔn wɛ nyi awinnya xɔ akwɛ nɔ mlamla lɛ e nyi alo ayiɖohwɛɖo ɖe kpo axɔsuzinkpo jiwu ɖe kpo
mi ɖɔ ninɔmɛ jehovah tɔn ɖɛkpɛ ɔ jiwu dɔn mɛ ɖo fifa mɛ tawun
nu enɛ e ɖɔ do mawu wu e sɔgbe kpo xogbe ɖɛhan ɔ tɔn kpo e wlan ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ e jɛxa tawun ɖɔ e kpa
e syɛn hu numɛsɛn lɛ bi
ðo nu akɔta lɛ nɔ lɛ ɖe nyi nuɖe a nuvlɛnu wɛ

kpo nujiwu kpo wɛ do e hlɔnhlɔn kpo awajijɛ kpo wɛ ɖo xwe tɔn gbe ðɛhan
ðɛhan mawu yi wan nu mi nɔ kpe nukun do mi wu bɔ jaan wlan ɖɔ mawu ɔ wanyiyi wɛ e nyi jaan

mɔ jixwe ɖo hunhun mɔ ɔ ɖo ɖo ɖisixwe nu mawu
taan kpɛɖe jɛ nukɔn nu numimɔ enɛ etyɛni mɔ e ɔ sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ ɖɔ xo wɛ etyɛni ɖe din lɛ e bɔ e hu jezu
numimɔ ɔ do zogbe ji ɖɔ jezu ɖo le e ɛ sin ku xɔ
pɔlu wlan do enɛ wu ɖɔ mawu ɛ su ɛ ɖo tɛn nyi ɖaxo bi ɔ mɛ ɛ nyikɔ hugan nyikɔ ɖe lɛ bi e bonu e ylɔ jezu sin nyikɔ hweɖebunu ɔ mɛ ɖo jixwe lɛ bi kpo mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ bi kpo kpodo mɛ ɖo ayikungban glɔ lɛ bi kpan jɛkpo kpo sisi kpo filipunu lɛ
nu tɛn ɖaxo mɛ jezu ɖe e tintinmɛ ɔ mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ jezu nɔ kpe nukun do lɛ wu tawun jehovah ɖɔhun

gbɔn vɔsisa sin ku e ku e gblamɛ ɔ e ɖɔ emi yi wan nu mawu kpo lɛ kpo tawun

gbeyiɖɔ daniyɛli kpo ɖo nu mɔ wɛ ɖe ɔ wɛ mɔ axɔsuzinkpo ɖe lɛ ɖo bɔ degenɔ kpikpoe ɖokpo jehovah wa jinjɔn ayi
mɛ ɖo nukɔn tɔn ɛ daniyɛli

numimɔ enɛ ɔ jiwu tawun mɛ

biblu ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ xo hugan azɔn
mɛɖe lɛ ɖi nu ɖɔ mɛ ku lɛ e ɖe lɛ wɛ huzu wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo jixwe
mawu da wɛnsagun lɛ lin tawun cobɔ e wa da
hwenu e ɖo ayikungban ɔ ayi e ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo finɛ nu suxo kpo xomɛhunhun kpo jɔbu
wɛnsagun lɛ nɔ wa nu mawu e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ ɖo taji hugan wa wɛ e ɖe ɖo ayikungban ji egbe e mɛ e wɛ nyi wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn jijla
matie e ɖe alɔ nɔ ɖo ɖo enɛ mɛ e jaan ɖo numimɔ ɖe mɛ bɔ e wlan ɖɔ mɔ wɛnsagun ɖevo bɔ e ɖo zinzɔn wɛ gbɔn jɔhɔn mɛ e ɖo wɛnɖagbe mavɔmavɔ ɖe do mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e do wɛn ɔ to bi akɔta bi gbe bi kpodo togun bi kpo
wɛnsagun lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo nu lɛ egbe blo gbɔn hweɖelɛnu ɖo hwexonu e a co nɔ ali mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ wɛ e
e ze ɖaxo ɔ nyi do ayikungban ji e wɛ nyi xoxo e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ awovi abi sataan e e wɛ flu ɔ bi e ze e nyi do ayikungban ji e kpodo wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ kpo
hwebinu wɛ fifa tiin ɖo jixwe a
ðo hwenuxo tɔn tlolo ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖokpo jlo tawun ɖɔ e emi gu do jehovah ji wa huzu sataan tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi
nukɔnmɛ ɔ wɛnsagun ɖevo lɛ xo kpoɖo gu wa huzu awovi lɛ
baɖa ɔ klan gbe xa jehovah syɛnsyɛn lɛkɔ nu gege sin ali jehovah tɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ ji
sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo gble tawun nyi
lɛ tɔn wɛ nu bɔ mimɔ ɖo ayikungban ji e gege sin wu
ði ɔ sataan hu nya jɔbu sin kanlin lɛ kpo lɛ kpo
bɔ ɔ e blo bɔ jɔhɔn ɖaxo ɖe nyi hihɔ xɔ mɛ jɔbu sin vi wo lɛ ɖe e hu bi

e su kun do nu sataan ɖo malin malin mɛ
sin hwenu e nya ɛ ayikungban ɔ sin xa mɛ e ɔ e tuun ɖɔ hwenu kpɛɖe jɛn wɛ kpo nu emi

do blo axɔsuɖuto do blo lɛ sin axɔsuɖuto bonu wa nu mawu mitɔn ɖu axɔsu do ayikungban ji
ði e jezu sin ayikungban ji do jixwe gbɔn e ɔ e mɛ ɖevo lɛ lɔ gbɔn

linlin ɖe wu wɛ mɛ nɔ yi jixwe lɛ e nɔ yi
kpo jezu kpo nyi axɔsuɖuto ɖe bɔ acɛkpikpa enɛ wa do mɛ nɔ nɔ ayikungban ɔ ji lɛ e ji hɛn nyɔna lɛ wa nu
jaan se gbe ɖaxo ɖe gosin axɔsuzinkpo ɔ kɔn ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ din ɔ nɔtɛn mawu tɔn ɖo lɛ tɛntin
e sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku tiin a aluwɛ tiin a alenina tiin a mimɔ tiin a nu xoxo lɛ bu

nu ɖeɖee hɛn kpo kpo wa nu lɛ e tiin a
ku tlɛ tiin a
liva mɔkpan ku sin ku do jixwe a lɛ e lo
e sin ku ɖo sɔgudo bɔ sixu nɔ sɔyi ɖo palaɖisi mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji matie
ði ɖeɖee ɖo wlɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ livi mɔkpan wɛ gblo kpo xɛsi ɖiɖi nu yɛ nyanya lɛ kpo wli do ganmɛ
nɔ ganjɛ bo lɛ tila lɛ kpo majiki sin amasin lɛ kpo wu ɖɔ cyɔn alɔ emi ji
hwɛ ɖo wa a
biblu jiɖiɖe elɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ e mi nukun jehovah tɔn ɖo ayikungban ɔ bi ji bɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ yi wan kpo ayixa yetɔn bi kpo lɛ
jehovah mawu nugbo ɔ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn hu sataan flafla tɔn enyi ganjɛ wutu tɔn ɔ e nya xɛ ɖo ji towe
enyi ɖɔ jehovah nya xɛ ɖo emi ji ɔ ɖo nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ lɛ e nɔ blo
ði ɔ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ klisanwun ɖo toxo efɛzi tɔn mɛ lɛ e xo majikiwema yetɔn lɛ kple do
ɖokpo ɔ enyi mawu cyɔn alɔ ji towe ɔ ɖo bo tila majikiwema atinkpavi kpo nu ɖebu ca kan xa awovinuwiwa lɛ e bi kpo kɔn nyi gbe
biblu ɖɔ miɖee ɖo mawu glɔ lo do ɖo wovi nukɔn enɛ ɔ e hɔn nu
jaki enyi hwiɖee ɖo jehovah glɔ gbɔn tonusise gblamɛ ɛ ɔ hɛn ɔ kudeji ɖɔ sataan kpo awovi lɛ kpo kun sixu kpe wu o

nu ɖo mɔjɛmɛ nu ɖevo wa lɛ e tɔn ɔ mi byɔ ɖɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ alo yi tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn www jw org ji yi wema etɛ biblu mɛ tawun
kan nu byɔ xɛ lɛ xɛ ɖe ɖo ali ji
sin xwe jɛji ɖie ɔ jɔbu mɔ ɖɔ xɛ lɛ sixu nu gege mi do mawu tɔn wu
nɔ wa nu gbɔn e bɔ e sixu zan do nu do nu wu
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ fi e ɖɔ xɛ lɛ sin xo ɖe lɛ e gege nu taji lɛ mi do kpo kancica ɖo mi kpo mawu kpo tɛntin e kpo wu
nu mi gbeje ɖe lɛ
jeluzalɛmunu lɛ tuun xɛ nɔ nyi azɔnxɛ lɛ e ganji ɖo nɔ yawu xo yetɔn lɛ nyi xɔzwe lɛ mɛ ɖo
ðe lɛ xo yetɔn lɛ nyi sin tɛmpli mɛ
e ci ɖɔ azɔnxɛ ɖeɖee nɔ xo yetɔn lɛ ɖo tɛmpli ɔ sin xa mɛ lɛ e mɔ ɖɔ finɛ ganji bɔ emi sixu nɔ kpe nukun do vi emitɔn lɛ wu bɔ nu nyanya ɖe jɛ do wu a
mɛ kpa ðɛhan ɔ e nyi ɖokpo ɖo kolee sin vi sunnu lɛ mɛ nɔ wa ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo ɖo lɛ bi mɛ e ɖo ayi enɛ lɛ wu ɖo tɛmpli ɔ sin xa mɛ
azɔnxɛ ɖo fi e nɔ sɔyi ɖo xwe jehovah tɔn gbe e ɖe ɖɔhun cici jlo e tawun bɔ e ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ yi wan nu nɔtɛn towe lɛ mɛ nya
kɔxo towe lɛ wiwa ɖo nukun mya nu mi wɛ ɖesu
mawu mavɔmavɔ axɔsu mawu vɔsakpe towe lɛ kpa wɛ nyi fi bi mɔ e
ðɛhan akpakpa ɖokpo ɔ nɔ mi kpodo vi mitɔn lɛ kpo bonu mi nɔ nɔ xa togun mawu tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo kple lɛ ji a ðɛhan
aɖɔwe lɛ tuun hwenu wa do ɔ wɛ gbeyiɖɔ jelemii wlan
e tuun mɛ aɖɔwe lɛ nɔ tɛn nɔ xo akpadido yikungban ɔ zlɛ e ganji
ðo mars alo avril mɛ ɔ aɖɔwe jɛji wɛ nɔ gosin aflika yi totaligbe elɔpu tɔn nɔ gbɔn tɔdo ɔ mɛ din
xomɛ tɔn yetɔn nɔ ɖɔ nu nu bɔ nɔ lɛkɔ wa yi fi nɔ fle vi ɖe lɛ e ɖo hwetɔnnu
ði xɛ ɖevo nɔ tɛn sin to ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ tuun hwenu nɔ lɛkɔ do ɔ jelemii
nu jiwu tawun ɖo tɛnsisɛ enɛ mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ wa ɖo jɔwamɔ linu wɛ ɖɔ
jehovah mawu nunywɛ jɔwamɔ tɔn xɛ ɖeɖee nɔ tɛn sin to ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ lɛ e do hwenu lɛ wu e blo bɔ lɛ ɖo nuwukpikpe nɔ tuun hwenu lɛ ɖe ɖo vo nu ɖe
luki nutuuntuun mawu tɔn ɔ gbɔn vo nu nunywɛ jɔwamɔ tɔn aɖɔwe lɛ ɖo e e wɛ nɔ bɔ e nɔ tuun nu ɖeɖee ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo hwe mitɔn din lɛ e sin tinmɛ
izlayɛli vi ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo jelemii hwenu lɛ e ɖo ayi wuntun mɔhun lɛ wu a
mawu ɖɔ nu wu wɛ e ɖɔ hu nu mawu mavɔmavɔ xo ɔ bɔ nunywɛ tɛ ɖo jelemii
timɔtee mi nɔ wa nu aɖɔwe lɛ ɖɔhun nɔ hwenu ɔ wu a
azɔn gege wɛ e ɖɔ xɛ nɔ nyi e xo ɖo biblu mɛ bɔ xɛ enɛ lɛ tiin tawun ɖo akpadido yikungban ɔ ji
jɔbu nuwukpikpe ɖo nɔ mɔ nu e syɛn bɔ e hɛn ɔ e mɔ azwi lin do e nu kilomɛtlu ɖokpo e
ði ɖe sixu mɔ nu do gbɔn e ɔ jehovah kpewu mɔ nu jɛ sɔgudo
enɛ wu wɛ jehovah mawu ɖɔ ɖɔ nu wa wɛ ɖe ɔ sin do
nu jɛ a wa jɛ ɔ ɖɔ sin tɛgbɛ
ezayii enyi mi xwedo weɖexamɛ jehovah tɔn ɔ nunywɛ tɔn kpo e nɔ mɔ nu zɔ gbɔn bɔ e kpe we a e kpo sixu hɛn le wa nu mi ezayii
biblu mɛ nɔ ɖeji do mawu wu lɛ e do lɛ wu ɖɔ mɛ nɔ ganjɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ wu lɛ ɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖevo nɔ wa nu nɔ zɔn ɖɔhun
ezayii jɔhɔn zozo nɔ ɖo nyinyi yi jinukunsin lɛ e wɛ nɔ zan nɔ do zɔn
enyi ɔ mɔ fi jɔhɔn ɔ ɖo zozo ɖe e ɖe ɔ e nɔ kɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo wɛ ɖo fi enɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ nɔ ɖo yi wɛ
nɔ ganjɛ hlɔnhlɔn eɖesunɔ tɔn wu do sixu zɔn yi fi linlin ɖo a
ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɖeji do jehovah wu lɛ e sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ e wɛ nyi mɛ hlɔnhlɔn aditi ɔ e kɔlɛntinu lɛ
azɔn mɔkpan wɛ jlo kple do lɛ glɔ koklo nɔ kple vi tɔn lɛ do tɔn lɛ glɔ ɔ ɖɔhun
loɔ jlo a matie
nunina jɔwamɔ tɔn syɛn hu bi bɔ xɛ lɛ ɖo e ɖokpo wɛ nyi jlo nɔ ɖo ba nya xɛ ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ ji e
xɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ lɛ e ɖi koklo lɛ nɔ ɖo aceji tawun do awovinu lɛ wu
enyi koklo mɔ ɖe bonu e ɖo gbɔn jinukunsin wɛ ɔ e nɔ suxo akpagbanumɛ tɔn ɖe bɔ koklovi lɛ nɔ kan wezun wa hwla yeɖee do tɔn lɛ glɔ
koklovi lɛ nɔ hwla yeɖee do nɔ yetɔn sin glɔ hwenu hwesivɔ syɛn ganji e kpo hwenu ji ɖaxo ɖo jija wɛ e kpo
ɖokpo ɔ wɛ jezu jlo nya xɛ ɖo jeluzalɛmunu lɛ ji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e nɛ
egbe ɔ jezu ylɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa mɔ fifa kpo alɔcyɔnmɛji kpo ɖo emitɔn ɖo tagba kpo adohu adohu kpo gbɛzinzan ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn nɔ hɛn wa nu mi lɛ e si matie
nugbo ɔ nuɖiɖo enɛ lɛ nɔ zɔn e sixu nu gege mi
hwenu ɖo nɔ wa nu gbɔn e wɛ e ɔ tɛnkpɔn flin nujlɛdonuwu mawuxowema ɔ tɔn ɖɔ xo do wu lɛ e
azɔnxɛ bonu xwe gbe e nɔ jehovah ɖe e nɔ su nukun towe mɛ
byɔ mawu ɖɔ e nukunɖiɖo sixu bɔ zɔn ɖɔhun e
wa nugbo gbigbɔ tɔn cyɔn alɔ ji towe koklo vinɔ ɖe nɔ nya xɛ ɖo vi tɔn lɛ ji gbɔn e ɖo jezu
gbe ɖokpo ɖo aklunɔzangbe zanzan ɖo xwe lɛ sin ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ toxo kpɛvi ɖo paris kpa nɔ nyi meaux e mɛ lɛ e sixu ɖi nu se ɖo amisa e a se bɔ e xa wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ do anɔnugbe yetɔn flansegbe ɔ mɛ bɔ e nyi do mɛ a
biblu tɔn bɔ nu do nyi e jacques lefevre faber stapulensis ɖo mɛ wa ɖɔ do wema e wlan tɔn ɖe e mɛ ɖɔ mɛ gege gbɔn wɛ mawu ɖe bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo tɔn mɛ e ɔ sixu ɖi a
etɛ lefevre bɔ e lilɛ biblu ɔ do flansegbe mɛ
e tɛnpkɔn kpaa lɛ bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo mawu tɔn mɛ gbɔn
cobonu lefevre huzu biblu ɖe ɔ e ze eɖee jo wema tamɛ nukplɔnmɛ tɔn kpo sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ tɔn kpo xoxo lɛ tinmɛ ɖo ɖe e
e wu ɖɔ e nu agɔ lɛ mɛ do nu ɖo wema xoxo lɛ mɛ e wu nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan
tinmɛ nugbo nu ɖo wema xoxo lɛ mɛ e tɔn biba bɔ e jɛ biblu igleja katolika nɔ zan tawun e gbeje ji do nujɔnu mɛ e wɛ nyi tɔn
mawuxowema ɔ e do nujɔnu mɛ e bɔ e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nugbo mawu tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ kplɔnkplɔn nɔ hɛn awajijɛ hugan bi e wa
enɛ wu ɔ lefevre jo tamɛ nukplɔnmɛ wɛ e ɖe e do eɖee bi jo nu lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn sin ɔ
ðo ɔ lefevre ɖe wema ɖe ðɛhanwema ɖo mɛ e vovo do yeɖee wu bɔ tɔn eɖesunɔ jla ɖo e
e ci sinsɛn hwetɔnnu tɔn lɛ ɖɔhun a loɔ e do gan lilɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn lɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ ɖiɖi bɔkun
e nɔ tinmɛ mawuxowema ɔ gbɔn e akɔwe biblu tɔn ɖevo lɛ kpo lɛ kpo tawun gbavi lefevre luther gbɔn e
akpataxwi mɛ tɛnmɛ nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖo ðɛhanwema mɛ lɛ e ɖe e ɖo tɔn mɛ
katolika mɛ wɛ e ji lefevre do bɔ e kudeji ɖɔ mawuxowema ɔ kpinkplɔn mɛ kpaa lɛ e jɛxa gbɔn e kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu bɔ e jla sinsɛn ɔ ɖo
eɖie mɛ wɛ mawuxowema ɔ ɖe hugan e bɔ nuwlanwlan enɛ lɛ sixu hɛn le wa nu mɛ kpaa lɛ gbɔn
wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ tɔn do zogbe ji ɖɔ lefevre jlo tawun blo bɔ mɛ bi sixu ɖo biblu ɔ do anɔnugbe yetɔn mɛ
wanyiyi ɖaxo lefevre ɖo nu xo mawu tɔn e bɔ e kudeji blo bɔ mɛ gege sixu ɖo
do kpe nu enɛ wu ɔ e ɖe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ tɔn akpomɛ tɔn do flansegbe mɛ do akpaxwe we ji ɖo juin
akpomɛ tɔn enɛ ɔ akwɛ nɔ xɔ ee nyi akpomɛ tɔn a e sin vlɔ wɛ nɔ xɔ bɔ mɛ tlɛ ɖo nu ɖe a lɛ e sixu ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe
mɛ kpaa lɛ yawu xɔ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
jlo sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo bi ɖo xa xo jezu tɔn lɛ do anɔnugbe yetɔn mɛ e syɛn bɔ lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ enɛ e zin ɖo e vɔ tlolo ɖo yɔywɛ ɖe gudo
ðo wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ tɔn mɛ ɔ lefevre tinmɛ ɖɔ emi lilɛ do flansegbe mɛ bonu mɛ kpaa ɖo sinsɛn ɔ mɛ lɛ e do sixu ɖo mɔjɛmɛ ɖokpo ɔ do nugbo ɖo wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ mɛ e wu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo ɖo mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun
etɛwu akpakpa lefevre nu e mɛ kpaa lɛ bɔ lɛkɔ wa nu biblu mɛ lɛ e ji
lefevre mɔ nu jɛ wu ganji ɖɔ sin nukplɔnmɛ lɛ kpo tamɛ nukplɔnmɛ lɛ kpo hɛn sinsɛn katolika bli
kolosinu lɛ bɔ e kudeji ɖɔ hwe ɔ su bɔ wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ ɔ e jla tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bonu nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ flu mɛ lɛ ɖe o
lefevre tɛnkpɔn sin hwɛjijɔ masɔgbe ɖeɖee mɛ ɖɔ e kun lilɛ biblu ɔ do flansegbe mɛ o lɛ e lɛ e ji
zaan ɔ nu kpaca mɛ a e ɖe jɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ kplɔnyiji alavɔ xwe paris tɔn sorbonne sin sinsɛn lɛ tɛnkpɔn xwe lefevre sin do xɔ
ðo aout ɔ ɖɔ e kun lilɛ biblu ɔ do gbe ɖevo mɛ ɖe o e kun blo tinmɛ lɛ do biblu ji do wema mɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ ɖe o le nu enɛ lɛ nyi awovinu nu sinsɛn ɔ
nuɖe nyi axɔsu france tɔn francois iwɛ a ɔ e ɖo hwɛ nu lefevre ɖɔ e nyi
lefevre lɔn bonu xo tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ ɖɔ do tɔn lɛ wu wɛ e ɖe e ayi tɔn sin biblu ɔ lilɛ lilɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ ji a
ðo hwenu e lilɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ alɛnuwema e do gbe ɖevo mɛ gudo e ɔ e ɖe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ðɛhanwema lɛ tɔn do flansegbe mɛ bonu lɛ do sixu xoɖɛ kpo mɛɖeezejo ɖaxo kpo kpodo wanyiyi ɖaxo kpan
sinsɛn ɖo sorbonne lɛ e yawu gbeje lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ lefevre tɔn tɛnwin lɛnwin
zaan ɔ ɖegbe ɖɔ e do akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ bɔ e lilɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ e ɖo agbawungba bɔ dohwɛ nu e wlan e ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ hun ali nu luther tɔn
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ nuwiwa tɔn kun nyi akɔnkpinkpan sin nu o co e mɔ ɖɔ ali ɖagbe hugan e sixu sinkɔn mɛ ɖeɖee nugbo biblu tɔn sin ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖebu a lɛ e gbɔn e nɛ matie
ee lefevre hɔn yi ɖibla ɖo xwe ɖokpo gudo e ɔ axɔsu francois ɛ nɔ nu vi tɔn charles xwe ɛnɛ mɛvi ɔ
enɛ hwenu lefevre bɔ e do fo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn blo wɛ e ɖe e
ðo ɔ charles yi gbe bɔ e ɖe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu ɔ blebu tɔn e blo e ɖo antwerp belgique e nyi ɖo france a
lefevre ɖo nukun ɖo gbɛhwenu tɔn bi ɖɔ sinsɛn ɔ jo aca tɔn lɛ xwixwedo do lɛkɔ wa nutuuntuun ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ e ji
e ɖi nu tawun ɖɔ nugbo ɔ klisanwun ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo acɛ xa biblu ɔ eɖesunɔ bɔ e nyi tɔn
nu wu e syɛnsyɛn bonu mɛ bi do sixu ɖo biblu ɔ e nɛ
xwe gudo ɖo ɔ france olivetan ɖe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn junjɔn gbe dodo lɛ ji e eyɛtɔn
luther gbeje wema lefevre e tɛnwin lɛnwin co e kpo ɖo ablu mɛ
dɔnkpɛvu luther wu ɖɔ lefevre tinmɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn lɛ ɖo alixo ɖe mɛ bɔ ɖiɖi bɔkun e kun zan nujlɛdonuwu jiwu lɛ akɔwe hwenɛnu tɔn lɛ ɖɔhun o
wlɛnwin lefevre nɔ zan do mɔjɛmɛ nu lɛ tɔn e luther tawun biblu tɔn william tyndale kpo john calvin kpo
lefevre nɔ katolika mɛ jɛ ku co e wa lɛ e hɛn huzuhuzu titewungbe ɖe wa lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn biblo mɛ hun ali nu nuvɔjlaɖo ɔ
mɛ tɔn wɛ e bernhard merten
enyi lɛ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo ayi jɛ wɛ ɔ nɔ zunfan nuɖe
nyɛ sixu wa a ɖo ɖo alɔ kpo kpo ɖe a
xwe tɛnwe ɖo wɛ ɖe bɔ e lɛ do hwlɛn mi
xwe wɛ nɔ ɖo ji mi ɖo
jo nɔ do cobɔ e ji mi
nɔ kpo nyi kpo nɔ xa tɔn lɛ ɖo toxo kpɛvi republique democratique alo allemagne tɔn tɔn ɖe wɛ
mɛ gege ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu ɖe kun tiin o bɔ xwedo mitɔn ɖi nu ɖokpo ɔ
nuti nyi mawu nu mi a
ee ɖo wɛ e ɔ nɔ kpe nukun do wu
e nɔ gege mi ɖi atin lɛ ji mi do bonu ma jla nu
vo ɖo gbɛzan mɛ ɖo awajijɛ
nu baɖabaɖa ɖe jɛ gbe ɖokpo hwenu ɖo xwe tɛnwe e
xɔ wegɔ ɔ wɛ ɖo wemaxɔmɛ tlolo
lɛkɔ ja xwe e ɔ xa kulaan sin gijagija e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ pylone e ɖe ji
ee ɖo yi wɛ ɖo mɛtlukpo tantɔn do e ɔ kulaan gbi mi syɛnsyɛn bɔ nyiɖee kpo
hwenu wa ɖo dotooxwe e ɔ sixu ze lɛ a
lɛ fyɔ tawun blo agada manyaa byɔ ɖɔ e we lɛ bi bonu wa byɔ hun mɛ o
sixu ɖo e ɔ nɔ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo byɔ lele mɛ
e ɖo co ɖo kpo ɖo vu wutu ɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu ɖo wa wa do gbɛzan wu e mɛ bi a
ee gosin dotooxwe gudo e ɔ
yɔkpɔvu lɛ nɔ ca nu mi nɔ ɖedo mi nɔ nyi nu do mi ɖo sixu jɛ ahwan do nyiɖee ji a wutu
alannu nɔ ɖɔ nu mi lɛ e kpo gan nɔ blo e kpo nɔ mi tawun
gudo mɛ ɔ e wa mi do wemaxɔmɛ lɛ tɔn birkenwerder tɔn bɔ yɔkpɔvu lɛ nɔ nɔ finɛ
ðo wemaxɔmɛ ɔ lin do xwe wutu ɔ nɔ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ sixu mɔ akwɛ wa mi a
enyi mi yi azan ɔ jɛn nɔ mɔ
xwe wo bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ nɔ xa nɔ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo a
nɔ wa nu gege kpo afɔ lɛ kpo
sixu do nukun afɔvi towe lɛ hɛn gafu alo civi bɔ do ɖu nu gbɔn e ci e mɛ a
tɛnkpɔn kpe nu mɔhun wu
nɔ zan afɔ lɛ do mɛ nɔ zan do vun ɖa
nu ɖo xo ɖɔ nu mɛ lɛ wɛ ɔ tlɛ nɔ jɛ afɔ blo ji
nugbo ɔ afɔ lɛ wa huzu alɔ lɛ
hwenu jɛ winnyawinnya ji e ɔ yi wan nu nunywɛ xwitixwiti sin wema lɛ xixa
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti lɛ e do sixu wa nu bi
jɛ azɔ ji hwenu ɖo xwe e
ɖɔ e mi bɔ nɔ ɖeji do nyiɖee wu ci mɛ bi ɖɔhun
e ci ɖɔ ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ ɛɛn nyi lɔ hɛn ɔ blo
hɛn alɔnu jan nɔ ɖo ɖagbewanumɛ sin lɛ mɛ
byɔ tutoblonunu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ tɔn acɛkpikpa nɔ bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ jeunesse libre e mɛ nyi nu mɛ ɖo lɛdo ɔ mɛ lɛ e
byɔ ɖe mɛ nɔ wlan xo lomilomi lɛ ɖo lɔnyiji lɔnfɔnkan sin ayihun lɛ tɔn lɛ mɛ
ee ɖe gudo e ɔ jɛ wa ji ɖo ɖe ɖo toxo mitɔn mɛ
ɖo wɛ e ɔ nɔ do nu nɔ nɔ lɛ domɛ e bleble ɖo nyi mɛ nu bi sɔgbe e
ɖo pipan do yi e gbe ɖokpo bɔ nya ɖe sɛkpɔ mi
e kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ nyi ɖɔ mawu sixu blo bɔ lɛ jɛ tɛn yetɔn mɛ a ji
ɖi a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ lɛ jɛ tɛn yetɔn mɛ mɔ ɖɔ nu mɔhun kun sixu jɛ gbeɖe o
kudeji ɖɔ mawu ɖe kun tiin o
sin hwenɛnu ɔ nɔ xo go nya enɛ a
taan ɖe lɛ gudo ɔ ɖe ɖɔ nyi kpla emi nu mi yi mɛ emitɔn lɛ
hwenu mi ɖo kafee wɛ e ɔ tɔn lɛ jɛ xo ɖɔ do jehovah mawu wu ji
azɔn nukɔntɔn se ɖɔ mawu ɖo nyikɔ ɖe e nɛ
ðɛhan nwt ɖɔ do ayi mɛ ɖɔ mawu ɖe sixu tiin a e ɖo nyikɔ ɖebu ɔ nɛ
mɛ elɔ lɛ ɖɔ adingban ɖo wɛ ɖe
ganjɛ linlin lɛ wu yi gbe bɔ mi ɖɔ xo ɖo do biblu ji
e kpaca mi ɖɔ kun kpewu ɖɔ mawu ɖe kun tiin o o
hwenu mi ɖo biblu tɔn lɛ do wɛ e ɔ linlin ɖo ɖɔ mawu ɖe kun tiin o e jɛ ɖyɔɖyɔ ji
mawu tɔn gege tiin bɔ e wlan e ɔ xwe kanweko alo mɔkpan wa yi co jɛnu
ðo biblu kplɔnkplɔn lɛ ɖokpo hwenu ɔ mi ninɔmɛ mɛ ɔ ɖe din lɛ e do ɖo matie wemata luki wemata kpo timɔtee wemata kpo mɛ lɛ e wu
ði nu ɖo azinzɔnnɔ ɖe wa wɛ lɛ e sixu dotoo ɖe tuun azɔn jɛ wɛ e ɖe tawun e gbɔn e ɖɔhun ɔ nu ɖeɖee wu enɛ lɛ ɖɔ xo do lɛ e mi bɔ tuun ɖɔ hwenu biblu ylɔ ɖɔ azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ e wɛ mi ɖe
e jiwu tawun nu mi
enɛ lɛ ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo awɔntin
kudeji ɖɔ nugbo ɔ wɛ ɖe
jɛ ɖɛ xo jehovah mawu ji bɔ azɔ tawun nu xwe wo jɛji co jo azɔ nunu do
gbɛkan do biblu kplɔnkplɔn ɔ nu xwe ɖokpo
bɔ ɖo avril ɔ blo baptɛm ɖo nuglɔ ɖo wulɛdo baignoire ɖe mɛ ɖo e lɛ sin hwenɛnu ɖo allemagne wutu
ðo e mitɔn wutu ɔ mi nɔ kple ɖo klewun klewun lɛ mɛ ɖo nuglɔ ɖo xwe lɛ gbe bɔ kpɛɖe jɛn tuun
ɖo nukun tɔn a bɔ acɛkpikpa lɛ yi gbe nu mi bɔ yi allemagne e lɛ tɔn ɖo finɛ a
azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ ɖo mɛ bɔ kpewu yi ɖaxo lɛ mɔ nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo mɔkpan
nu bunɔ ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi nu mi
do tɔn gudo e ɔ e yi gbe nu jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn
mi wa vo jehovah mawu
ɖo alɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ hu tɔn
e ɖo co nɔ ɖi xɛsi do mɛ tuun a lɛ e sisɛkpɔ wu
ðo nyi zan yɔkpɔvumɛ gege ɖo lɛ sin xwe ɖe gbe wutu ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ kun nyi nuɖewanu o
ɖo ɔ ganxixo zinzan do ɖɔ mawuxo ɖo ɖokpo mɛ
e kpa mi bɔ mɔ awajijɛ tawun
enɛ wu ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ blo ɖo lɛ bi mɛ tɛnkpɔn blo nu xwe atɔn
hɛn xo elɔ ɖo biblu mɛ e mɛ enyi mɛɖe ɖo gan a ɔ nɔ ɖɔ nyɛ lɔ kun ɖo gan o
enɛ wu ɔ wa nu wu kpe e bi do mɛ ɖevo lɛ
ðo ɖo ɖe a wutu ɔ sixu se xa mɛ ɖeɖee hwedo nuɖe lɛ wu lɛ e
enyi nuɖe biblo jlo mɛ tawun bɔ e sixu blo a ɔ tuun e nɔ ci nu mɛ e bi
tɛnkpɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ nu ci lɛ e
nu nina mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn do xomɛhunhun nu mi tawun
hweɖelɛnu nɔ wa su bɔ nɔ flu kpɛɖe
nɔ ɖɔ nu bi sɔgbe ɖo wutu
nyiɖesunɔ sixu wa nu e nɔ wa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe lɛ e gege nɔ ɖu taan ɖo asi hu ee ɖo ɖu e
xo nɔ ɖo gbebigbe e wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi ɔ wɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ sixu kpe nu enɛ lɛ bi wu
filipunu lɛ jehovah nɔ mi hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo ɖo wa nu e gbebigbe
mɔ ɖɔ jehovah kun gɔn alɔdo mi o
enɛ wu wɛ nyi lɔ gbeɖe gɔn wa a
jehovah mi nu sin do jɛ tawun ɖo yɔkpɔvumɛ kpo winnyawinnya mɛ kpo e e wɛ nyi xwedo ɖe
ɖo asi ɖagbeɖagbe ɖe elke wɛ e nɔ nyi e yi wan nu mi tawun nɔ se xa mi
ɔ jehovah tɔn livi mɔkpan huzu nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo bɔ mi nyi xwedo ɖe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
nyi kpo elke kpo
palaɖisi sin akpa mawu do nu lɛ bi do huzu nu jɛ lɛ ji e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi
enyi tamɛ do nu ɖeɖee jezu wa hwenu e ɖo ayikungban ji e ji ɔ nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ akpa enɛ mɛ
ðo cɛju mɛ ɔ e gbɔ azɔn nu alɔkunanɔ lɛ tlɛ blo bɔ nya e kpa to e ɖe sin to jɛ to tɛnmɛ

nɔ nyla gbe nu tawun

e sixu mɔ nu mɛɖe nyi ɖo xomɛ e kpo nu mɛ ɔ sixu wa huzu ɖo alɔ tɔn hlɔnhlɔnnɔ lɛ mɛ e kpo

etɛwu yi wan nu jehovah nɔ mɛ e
sixu se bɔ mɛɖe ɖɔ nu lehun wa ɖo vi cobo mɔ nukunnu jɛ lɛ mi e wu bi

e jlo ɖɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ yi wan nu emi

jehovah ɖo mi wɛ gbɔn ɖo egbe
mɛkplɔnkplɔn enɛ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo sɔgudo gbɔn
ðo mi ci vi mawu sin xomɛ do ɔ ɖɔhun wutu ɔ mi ɖo jijɔ mawu wan lɛ e gege vlafo jijɔ kanlin lɛ tɔn ɖe lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ ninɔmɛ mɛ jehovah ɖo wa ɖo mi wu ɖe wɛ din e do mɔ palaɖisi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe
do mi e baɖa co mi nɔ mɔ miɖee ɖo bibɛtɛn kpo ayijayi kpo mɛ
hu ɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ mi mɛ su ɖo xwedo mɛ wanyiyi ɖe a bɔ nu lɛ yi ɖo nu ji a mɛ lɛ e wa mɔ wanyiyi jɔ wanyiyi
jaan bɔ mi yi wan nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
ðo ɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖu vivi palaɖisi gbigbɔ tɔn sin nyɔna lɛ tɔn bi
enɛ gudo ɔ palaɖisi gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn ɖo hoxo tɔn ɔ e wɛ nyi palaɖisi jɔ palaɖisi ɔ ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin acɛkpikpa glɔ
hu ɔ mawu ɖe sin linlin mitɔn kpo agbaza mitɔn kpo wu bi bonu mi do sixu yi nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ wa jlo tɔn kpikpe tɔn
jezu ɖe ðaxo ɔ sin suuluɖiɖo kpo tuuntuun kpo gbɔn
ði ɖe ɖɔhun ɔ jehovah tuun alɔkpa ɖo asa tɔn mɛ e nɔ e jɛ gbɔn e xa ðɛhan
nugbo ɔ e nɔ ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ dogbo mitɔn lɛ kpo ba mɛ mi su ɖo ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e kpo do wa nu xa mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
vi tɔn ɖe e nɔ wa nu xa tɔn lɛ gbɔn e
tamɛ do jezu ɖeɖɛ tɔn lɛ sin nuwanyido lɛ gbɔn e ji ɖo taji ɔ hwenu nɔ dɔn nu do mɛ nyi nuɖaxo ɖo mɛ e ji e
enyi ɖo nu lɛ dɔn kpo adan kpo e tɛnmɛ ɔ do mɔ yi gbe nu lɛ e a

e tuun ɖɔ kpo suulu kpo do ɖe we xa emitɔn lɛ kpodo mɛɖesɔhwe tɔn emitɔn kpo mimɔ sixu ɖo wu mak
luk ee e jezu sin ku wa kɔn gbigbɔ do ahwanvu lɛ ji gudo e ɔ lɛ ayi ɖo tɛn ɖaxo mɛ ninɔ alo nuɖaxo nyinyi ji a loɔ e e ji wɛ ayi ɖo mɛ
ali tɛ lɛ davidi ci bɔ e ɖɔhun ɖe
mi sixu wa nu eɖɔhun gbɔn

xo mawu tɔn sixu ɖo mi wu hwenu mi kudeji nɔ xa tamɛ byɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi bonu mi zan e
e wlan ɖɔ doku nu mawu mavɔmavɔ e wɛ nɔ nu mi
zanmɛ ɖesu ɔ ayi nɔ ɖɔ xo nu mi do nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ wu
mɛɖesɔhwe tɔn kpo mɛɖee tɔn kpo ɖagbe ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ bɔ davidi ze nu mi a ce

akpaxwe enɛ tɔn ɖokpo wɛ nyi wanyiyi
mi yi wan nu mawu jlo setonu nu e ɖo mi wu tuun ɖɔ tɔn lɛ kun nyi o
gbigbɔ sixu mi hlɔnhlɔn bɔ mi ɖu ɖo nu ɔ kpo gbigbɔ tɔn nyanya ɔ kpo nɔ mi do ɖɔ e ji
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi kpo ɖo gbigbɔ byɔ wɛ pɔlu ɖɔhun
jehovah ɖekɔ do vosisa do nujɔnu mɛ lɛ tɔn a ðɛh
jehovah nɔ zan mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ do ɖo mi wu mi lɔ ɖo wa mitɔn akpaxwe kpo kpo
jehovah nɔ zan agun klisanwun tɔn kpo tɔn lɛ kpo do ɖo mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wu
ði ɔ enyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ wu ɖɔ mi ɖo tagba lɛ mɔ wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ mi nɔ xwedo nunywɛ tɔn do wa a
nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa ɖɛ yetɔn lɛ nɔ do nu nu do ninɔmɛ mitɔn ji ɖo xo mawu tɔn kpo wema mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ
enɛ sixu bɔ mi sɔgbe kpo hudo mitɔn lɛ kpo
enyi wa towe kpo kpo kpodo wanyiyi kpo vlafo do nɔ sɔnu gbɔn e ji ɔ yi gbe nu weɖexamɛ yetɔn mɔ ɖɔ wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu e sin wɛ a
enyi wa ɔ ɖɔ emi ci bɔ e ɖɔhun ɖo jehovah sin alɔ mɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu e ɖo wu bɔ ɖu le tɔn
