jehovah ɖo acɛ do ɔ ji co e nɔ ɖo sisi nu mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn gbɔn
nukunnu mimɔ jɛ mawu sixu ɖo wa ɖo mi wu wɛ gbɔn e wu hɛn ɔ e mi ɖo kancica mi ɖo xa mitɔn lɛ e kpo linlin mi nɔ ɖo do mɛ ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ lɛ e jɛ biblu mitɔn lɛ ji wu e mɛ
ðo taan biblu tɔn mɛ ɔ ɖe nɔ kun nɔ jɛ do ji tlolo a
e nɔ to ɖo ɔ wu nɔ awinnya kpo nu ɖevo a lɛ e kpo sin mɛ
ðo gbigbɔ lixo ɖesu ɔ mawu nɔ sɔnu nu mɛ ɖo jlo lɛ e do sixu ɖo wu
e nɔ hɛn gannugannu bonu huzu a loɔ e nɔ sin nugbododo tɔn lɛ ji nu bonu do sixu jla gbɛzan yetɔn ɖo alo blo huzuhuzu lɛ kpo jlo kpo
biblu lɛ nɔ ɖɔ emi jlo ɖɔ jehovah ɖo emi wu gbɔn
na ɖe
tamɛ do nɔvi nyɔnu australie tɔn nɔ nyi tessie e sin ji
nugbo biblu tɔn kplɔnkplɔn bɔwu kpɛɖe nu tessie wɛ nɔvi nyɔnu nu xa ɛ e ɖɔ
e ɖo co e yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɖebu a e tlɛ nɔ wa kple agun tɔn lɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ ee xoɖɛ do ninɔmɛ ɔ ji azɔn gege gudo e ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn ɔ
nukpacamɛ ɖe jɛ
ðo biblu kplɔnkplɔn ɖɔ gudo tɔn ɔ ɖie e hwenu ɔ tessie ɖɔ xomɛ nu mi
e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ci ɖe ɖɔhun ɖo emi yi wan nu akɔxixo
din ɔ emi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn jo walɔ enɛ do
nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e wa ya e ɔ tessie blo baptɛm wa nyi gbexosin hwebinu tɔn hwenu e tlɛ ɖo nyɔnuvi atɔn kpo sunnuvi ɖokpo kpo e
nugbo ɔ enyi biblu lɛ jɛ gbɛzan yetɔn jla ɖo ji ba mawu nukunmɛ ɔ e sɛkpɔ ɖo wu bɔ huzu alyannu ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ
etɛ nukun towe mɛ ɖo towe jehovah nyi e mɛ
wiwa ɖo mɛ wu sin akpaxwe tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
ɖokpo ɔ mitɔn ɖesunɔ nɔ ɖe we xa mi kpo suulu kpo do ɖo mi wu nɔ mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn e wu
xa ðɛhan
nɔ wu ɖɔ nu towe nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu jehovah a
nɔ mɔ hwiɖee ɖo alɔ tɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ mɛ ɖo wa ɖo wu wɛ a
enyi wɛ ɔ jijɔ ɖevo tɛ lɛ sixu bɔ kpo ɖo bɔ zan e nyi wɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ
jijɔ tɛ lɛ ɖo nyi alɔ wa syɛn alo zan a
lɛ sixu ɖo gbe xa jehovah ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ wu gbɔn
xota bɔ e xosin lɛ
nɔ ci gbɔn ɖo lɔ mɛ ɔ wɛ ɖe ɖo alɔ mɛ jel
jijɔ tɛ lɛ sixu bɔ mi weɖexamɛ jehovah tɔn
jijɔ tɛ lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi bɔ ɖo mawu sin alɔ mɛ
klisanwun lɛ sixu ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi emitɔn gbɔn
mi sixu setonu daniyɛli ɖɔhun gbɔn
hwenu jwifu lɛ yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu hwexonu tɔn e ɔ mɔ bɔ vodunxɔ kpo bocyɔ lɛ kpo toxo ɔ mɛ bɔ lɛ nyi kannumɔ nu yɛ nyanya lɛ
bɔ e kpa
ðo taan biblu tɔn mɛ ɔ ɖe sixu zin ɔ do ɖe mɛ bonu e do sixu ci alɔ wɛ e ɖe e ji
mawu nugbo egbe tɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn nyi mɛ ɖo acɛ ɖo togun lɛ kpo akɔta lɛ kpo wu e xa jelemii
mawu ɖo acɛ ɖo mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wu
e ɖo co e nɔ tuun mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn nu mi nɔ jlo ɖɔ miɖesunɔ miɖee do emi glɔ kpo jlo kpo
nu mi do nu mi sixu ci bibɔ ɖɔhun ɖo alɔ mawu tɔn mɛ gbɔn e ɖo ali atɔn elɔ lɛ mi sixu ɖo wu zɔ nu jijɔ bɔ mi weɖexamɛ mawu tɔn lɛ e gbɔn
mi sixu tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ ɖeɖee mi bɔ mi bɔ miɖee e gbɔn
klisanwun lɛ sixu yeɖee do mawu glɔ hwenu ɖo wa ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ wu wɛ e gbɔn
jijɔ tɛ lɛ sixu hɛn ayi mitɔn syɛn
hɛn ayi towe hu nu bi ɖo fi towe sin azinkan ɖe ɔ nɛ wɛ nunywɛxo ɖɔ
jijɔ nɔ hɛn ayi mɛtɔn syɛn e tɛ lɛ wu mi ɖo miɖee do
jijɔ enɛ lɛ sixu bɔ e ɖo gbigbɔ tonumase kpo kpo tɔn
xa
tlolo ɔ oziyasi wa nu nɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ nukunmɛ e do gan nɔ wa mawu mavɔmavɔ sin jlo
mawu ɛ hlɔnhlɔn ee acɛkpikpa tɔn jinjɔn ayi ɔ e jɛ go yi ji
e tlɛ tɛnkpɔn do gbe ɖokpo ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ vi lɛ wɛ ɖo acɛ enɛ
hwenu lɛ huzu kpannukɔn oziyasi e ɔ e jɛma
etɛ jɛ tunu tɔn
enyi mi miɖee do goyiyi wu a ɔ etɛ sixu jɛ
tamɛ do mɛxo agun tɔn nɔ nyi jim ɖo gbe xa mɛxo agun tɔn tɔn lɛ do agun ɔ sin xo ɖe wu a e sin ji
jim ɖɔ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ kun ɖo wanyiyi o gosin kple mɛxo lɛ tɔn ɔ tɛnmɛ
gudo ɔ e tɛn yi agun sɛkpɔ finɛ e ɖe mɛ e mɛxo agun tɔn sin ɖo finɛ a
e yi gbe ɖɔ flu bi
nɔ nyiɖee do mɔ e ɖu ɖo ji bɔ gosin nugbo ɔ mɛ
jim sin awakanmɛ gbɔjɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nu xwe wo
e ɖɔ goyiyi byɔ mɛ bɔ jɛ hwɛ do jehovah ji ɖɔ e wɛ nu jɛ e
jim tɔn goyiyi sixu bɔ mi hwɛjijɔ nu nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ bɔ wa ɖo mi wu ɖebu a e gbɔn e jel
jim tinmɛ ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ sin hwɛ jɔ gbɔn a e ji jɛn ayi nɔ ɖe hwebinu
klisanwun ɖe jɛ do nu a alo e yi agun tɔn ɖe lɛ sin asi towe wɛ a
enyi wɛ ɔ wa nu gbɔn
jɛ go yi ji wɛ a
abi hwɛ dido gbɔ xa nɔvi towe kpo kpo ɖo gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn e kpo wɛ mya nukun nu hugan a xa ðɛhan kolosinu lɛ
enyi mi hwɛhuhu do ɖo aca ɔ etɛ sixu jɛ
hwɛhuhu do ɖo aca vlafo nunyanyawiwa do nuglɔ sixu bɔ mɛɖe weɖexamɛ mawu tɔn
hwɛhuhu sixu wa do mɛ ɔ tɔn
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ e wa ya e ɔ walɔ blibli emitɔn kun nɔ ɖɔ nuti nu emi o
jijɔ enɛ hɛn nu gble do wu tɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
gudo mɛ ɔ walɔ tɔn wa jɛ wexo bɔ e mɔ alɔdo sin hudo e ɖo lɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mi bi wɛ nyi
enyi mi jɛ xomɔɖɔdomɛwu ji abi jɛ hwɛjijɔ nu zinzan nyanya ɖe ji hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ mawu tɔn kpo alɔdo tɔn kpo ɔ ayi mitɔn sixu ɖo syɛnsyɛn wɛ nɛ
izlayɛli vi hwexonu tɔn lɛ sin numaɖi nɔ hɛn nu gble do mɛ wu gbɔn e gbɔn
etɛ enɛ mi
mi mɔ numaɖi sixu hɛn ayi mɛtɔn syɛn gbɔn e tɔn ɖo izlayɛli vi jehovah hwlɛn sin ejipu lɛ e sin nuwiwa mɛ
akɔta ɔ mɔ bɔ mawu blo nujiwu gege do yetɔn mɛ bɔ ɖe lɛ tlɛ do xɛsi mɛ lɔ
nu ɖo co hwenu togun ɔ sɛkpɔ akpadido yikungban ɔ e ɔ ɖi nu a
ɖeji do jehovah wu a ɖi xɛsi hlun nu ɖɔ do mɔyizi wu
tlɛ jlo lɛkɔ yi ejipu fi nyi kannumɔ ɖe e
ðo egbe mi ɖo ɔ sɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ nuɖiɖi mitɔn ɖo tɛnkpɔn mɔ wɛ
mi ɖo gbeje nuɖiɖi alɔkpa mi ɖo e
ði ɔ mi sixu do nu nu mi nɔ do xo jezu ɖɔ ɖo matie mɛ e wu e
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ nu nɔ mya nukun nu mi lɛ e kpo gbeta kɔn nɔ wa lɛ e kpo nɔ ɖɔ ɖi nu nu xo jezu tɔn nugbo a
enyi kɔgbidinumɛ nɔ wa e tɔn ɖo jijɛji wɛ ɔ etɛ wa
jo nyiɖee do bɔ ɔ huzu mi ɖo alɔ tɔn ji vlafo tlɛ ɖe mi sin nugbo ɔ mɛ wɛ a
mi sixu wa gbɔn
ɖevo ɖie tamɛ do jehovah nɔ nu nugbododo biblu tɔn kunkpla mɛ ɖiɖe sin agun mɛ alo ayiɖeɖayi e xwixwedo e ɖe wu
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ wɛ nyi lɔ nɔ wa nu gbɔn vlafo a ce
enyi mi wu ɖɔ jijɔ ayi syɛnsyɛn tɔn mɔhun ɖo ɖɔ do do wɛ ɖo mi mɛ ɔ mi ɖo yawu gbeje nuɖiɖi mitɔn
mi ɖo nɔ gbeje miɖee do nujɔnu mɛ gbɔn xo mawu tɔn gblamɛ hwɛhwɛ
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ci bɔ e ɖɔhun ɖo alɔ jehovah tɔn mɛ
xo mawu tɔn agun klisanwun tɔn kpo ɔ kpo ɖo nu ɖeɖee mawu sɔnu do mi bɔ mi ci bɔ e ɖɔhun e mɛ
ði sin nɔ blo bɔ nɔ bɔ gbɔn e ɔ biblu xixa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe kpo tamɛ linlin kpo sixu mi bɔ mi bɔ ɖo jehovah sin alɔ mɛ
jehovah byɔ ɖɔ axɔsu izlayɛli tɔn lɛ ɖo wlan mawu ɔ hɛn nɔ xa gbe bi gbe
ɖe xo sin akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ azɔn kanweko mɔkpan wlan do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖɔ mawuxo ɔ lɛ e ɖɔ lɔ nɔ xa mawuxowema ɔ nɔ tamɛ mɛ
ðo egbe ɔ mi lɔ tuun ɖɔ xo mawu tɔn xixa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe xoɖɛ tamɛ ɖo taji tawun tim
biblo nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ miɖee hwe ɖo jehovah nukɔn nɔ bɔ ɖo alɔ tɔn mɛ
zan nu mawu sɔnu lɛ e do nɔ bibɔ ji tɛgbɛ akpaxwe
jehovah sixu zan agun klisanwun tɔn do ɖo mi wu sɔgbe xa hudo mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn lɛ gbɔn
gbɔn agun klisanwun tɔn gblamɛ ɔ jehovah hɛn ɔ e ɖo mi wu sɔgbe xa hudo mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn lɛ
jim xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e jɛ sin do walɔ tɔn ji ji hwenu mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ayi ɖo ji tɔn ɛ e
jim ɖɔ ji e dohwɛ mi ɖo ninɔmɛ wu alo mɔ xo ɖɔ do wu azɔn ɖokpo a
e wa ɔ e ɖo linlin sɔgbe e ɖɔ emi jlo tawun mi
atɔn gudo ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn ɔ ylɔ jim ɖɔ e wa kple
jɛ mimɔ ji ɖɔ e kun nyi nu nɔ ci nu mi e wɛ nyi nu taji ɔ o
alɔdo nɔvi lɛ tɔn kpo ee gbɔjɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a e tɔn kpo bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
xota jehovah dona whegbledo gba kpo jehovah nugbono yinyin kpo ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe liyasun tɔn mɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi tawun
e wa ya e ɔ jim wa nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe
sin hwenɛnu ɔ e nɔvi ɖevo lɛ bɔ ɖu ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu mɔhun lɛ ji mɔ gan ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e wa ɖɔ gbɔn gudo ɖɔ vɛdo ɖɔ nyi kpo jehovah kpo wɛ sin loɔ nuti nyi a
e nu mi tawun ɖɔ jo goyiyi do nukun mi bɔ mɔ nu ɖo taji hugan lɛ e a bɔ ayi ɖo nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ji xwe wu kɔ
ɔ sixu ɖo mi wu nu ɖagbe mitɔn gbɔn
wɛnɖagbe ɔ mima xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi tɛnkpɔn ɖo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn sin akpaxwe vovo lɛ kpo
tamɛ do jijɔ ɖagbe tɛnkpɔn ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e ji
hu ɔ hwenu mi ɖo nu wa wɛ klisu ɖɔhun e ɔ mi nɔ nu wɛn mitɔn bɔ enɛ sixu ɖyɔ linlin ɖe lɛ tɔn
ði ɔ australie tɔn we ci xwii ɖoto do gbe nu e ɖe kpo sisi kpo
e wa nu gbɔn e wa tawun ɖo gudo mɛ bɔ e wlan wema alaxɔ mɛ
e ɖɔ ɖo akpaxwe ɖe ɖɔ jlo do kɛnklɛn nu mɛ we enɛ lɛ ɖo suulu ɖesu yeɖee hwe tawun lɛ e ɖo nyiɖee do mɔ dingan e kpo nyi wɛ sɔ le sin nuwiwa kpo wutu
xlo wɛ jɔ nɔte ɖo mɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn jla wɛ e we sin nukɔn wa nu xa gbɔn
enyi lɛ sin xomɛ tiwuntiwun ɖe wɛ ɔ ɔ wlan nu mɔhun wɛ a
e vɛwu tawun
nugbo ɔ mitɔn ɖo le nu miɖesunɔ kpo nɔzo mitɔn lɛ kpo tawun
enyi lɛ ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ wu kpa ɔ etɛ ɖo wa
vi gege nɔ jlo tawun nu lobɔ nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba yeɖee hwe
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ bonu e kpa lɛ ɔ ɖo to do nugbo ɔ do ayi yeɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ nɔ zan sɔgbe xa nugbo ɔ
enyi lɛ wa ɔ vi yetɔn lɛ nɔ ɖoto nugbo ɔ nɔ mɔ sixu zan gbɔn e
hu ɔ nɔ yetɔn lɛ nɔ e do mɔ wanyiyi jehovah ɖo nu e sin
enyi e ɖe vi ɖe sin agun mɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖɔ emi ɖeji do mawu wu gbɔn
vi ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e ɖo klisanwun ji co nukɔnmɛ ɔ sin nugbo ɔ mɛ alo e ɖe sin agun mɛ nɔ ku wu nu xwedo yetɔn tawun
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo afrique du ɖɔ hwenu e ɖe fofo sin agun mɛ e ɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ ku wɛ e ku ɖɔhun
e ku wu nu mi ɖesu nu mi tawun
e kpo tɔn lɛ kpo wa nu gbɔn
xwedo ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
lɛ ɖɔ mi kudeji zan nu biblu ɖɔ e tuun ɖɔ enyi mi blo nu lɛ mawu jlo gbɔn e ɔ e hɛn le ɖagbe hugan ɔ wa
mi mɛ ɖiɖe sin agun mɛ do mɔ todɔnnumɛ mawu tɔn ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah nɔ dɔn to nu mɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖo ba mɛ e jɛ ɖo e
e ci nu vi ɔ
e ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ mɛ lɛ kun wan nu mi o loɔ jehovah kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo setonu wɛ ɖe
e ɖɔ ji enyi e hɛn gannugannu bonu savo nu jehovah byɔ alɔdo kpo hwɛsɔkɛ kpo ɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo tɔn tawun
e vivi nu xwedo ɔ sɔ hwenu e yi do agun mɛ e
nugbo ɔ enyi mi ɖeji do mawu wu ɖo nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ bi mɛ ɔ mi sixu mɔ le ɖagbe hugan ɔ nux
gbeyiɖɔ ezayii ɖɔ xo do hwenu jwifu lɛ gosin kannumɔgbenu e wu ɖɔ mɛ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn gudo lɛ e mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ hwi wɛ nyi mitɔn
midɛɛ lɛ ɔ wɛ mi nyi hwi wɛ nyi ɔ mi bi wɛ nyi alɔ towe nuwiwa
enɛ gudo ɔ savo ɖɔ hwɛ mi hu lɛ ɔ ɖo flinflin wɛ sɔyi o
ɖokpo ɔ enyi mi miɖee hwe miɖee do jehovah glɔ nɔ zan mɛɖee sin ɔ e mi do mɔ wanyinamɔ tɔn e blo gbɔn nu gbeyiɖɔ daniyɛli e ɖɔhun
hu ɔ jehovah kpo ɖo wa ɖo mi wu wɛ gbɔn xo tɔn gbigbɔ tɔn kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo gblamɛ bɔ gbe ɖokpo wa su bɔ mi kpewu nyi mawu vi ɖo a lɛ e ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ hlɔ
ðo hwe mitɔn ɔ nya hɛn nuwlannu e nɔte nu jezu klisu e wɛ nyi mɛ e mɔ a nɔ ɖo wuntun mɛ gan lɛ e e
wɛnsagun ɖeɖee ɖo kun susu do nu jeluzalɛmu mɛ ɖo kun susu do nu nyanya sataan tɔn mɛ ɖo haamagedɔni hwenu e wɛ nɔte
etɛwu nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ enɛ sɔgbe
ee ezekiyɛli mɔ nu nyanya dosin wɛ jeluzalɛmunu lɛ ɖe cobɔ e wa gba to ɔ ɖo e gudo e ɔ e ɛ nu ɖeɖee jɛ cobɔ e gba toxo ɔ e e mɔ sunnu bɔ alyannu ɖo alɔ yetɔn mɛ
e ɖɔ nu nya enɛ ɖɔ gbɔn toxo ɔ bi mɛ ɖo wuntun nukɔn nu mɛ ɖo ale wɛ ɖo mɔ wɛ ɖo nu baɖabaɖa dosin wɛ e ɖe ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ wu lɛ
xwe wɛ e ɖɔ enɛ bɔ jijɛ tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ nyi kun ahwangɔnu babilɔnu tɔn su do nu jeluzalɛmu e xwe gudo kpowun jɛn nu enɛ jɛ
babilɔnunu pagawun lɛ gba toxo ɔ co jehovah wɛ ɖe
e nɔ kan kwin nu atakin a
e hu nu mɛ nyanya a
wanyiyi jehovah bɔ e blo tuto hwlɛn jwifu ɖeɖee yi gbe nu nu nyanya dosin wɛ e ɖe ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ a lɛ e gan
ezekiyɛli ɖo wuntun ɖiɖo mɛ wu ɔ kpo kun susu do nu mɛ ɔ kpo mɛ a
e wa ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ wɛ nɔ hwɛɖonumɛ ɔ
enɛ wu ɔ gbɔn enɛ gblamɛ ɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ mi ɖo mɔjɛmɛ nu jɛ ɖo jixwe bɔ nukun a lɛ e tɔn
jehovah ɖegbe nu wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ blo tuto nu kun susu do nu mɛ nyanya lɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo vo nu gan
mi ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yi wɛn jla wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e ɔ wuntun ɖo wɛ e ɖe bonu gan nɛ
e ɖo co ɖo xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie ɔ e wa mɔ nu jɛ wu ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e ɖo jla tinmɛ enɛ ɔ ɖo
sɔgbe kpo nu e ɖɔ ɖo matie mɛ e kpo ɔ jezu wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ ɖɔhwɛ xa togun lɛ e
e ɖɔhwɛ tɔn gudogudo tɔn ɔ ɖo ɖaxo ɔ hwenu mɛ ci ɖɔhun gan lɛ e ɖo vo nu mɛ ci gbagba ɖɔhun dɔn lɛ e
sɔgbe kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ enɛ ɔ kpo ɔ etɛ lɛ numimɔ ezekiyɛli tɔn mi
ðo taan jɛ nukɔn nu kun susu do nu jeluzalɛmu e mɛ ɔ wɛ ezekiyɛli wa nu jelemii ezayii lɔ blo gbɔn jɛ nukɔn nu e
egbe ɔ jehovah ɖo tɔn yi do ɖe lɛ sin kpɛvi ɖe zan wɛ bɔ nɔ nuɖuɖu togun tɔn nɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ cobonu ɖaxo ɔ
mɛ ɖo klisu xwegbe lɛ e bi nɔ so nu akpagbanumɛ ɔ
ezekiyɛli ɖo wuntun ɖiɖo mɛ gan lɛ e wu sin ɔ mɛ a mawu lɛ lɔ nɔ wa egbe a
wɛn jehovah tɔn wɛ nɔ do mɛ lɛ kpowun wɛn enɛ nyi nɔ wa ɖo wɛnsagun lɛ tɔn glɔ e sin akpaxwe ɖe nuɖe
ðo ezekiyɛli hwenu ɔ e ɖo wuntun nukɔn nu mɛɖebu gannaganna le a
wɛ e nɔ nyi gbɔn ɖo egbe
etɛ mɛ lɛ ɖo wa bonu e ɖo wuntun ɖo ali ɖe bɔ gan
ɖeɖee nɔ blo nu enɛ lɛ e ɔ e ɖo wuntun bɔ gan e ɖo ɖaxo jawe e hwenu
e ɖo wuntun mɛ wɔbuwɔbu ɔ hwenu e ɖɔ hwɛ yetɔn ɖɔ nyi lɛ e ɖo ɖaxo ɔ hwenu
e flin mi ɖɔ ɔ ɖo taji tawun ɖo hwe mitɔn
mɛ lɛ bi wɛ ɖo se akpagbanumɛ ɔ cobɔ ɔ vɔ
e ɖo wuntun ɖo ali ɖe
e byɔ ɖɔ mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ yi wuntun enɛ bɔ e gan e a
e wa ɔ yi wuntun yetɔn gudo tɔn ɔ jɛ nukɔn nu ku yetɔn alo cobɔ ɖaxo ɔ nuɖe
etɛ ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ jehovah mawu mitɔn nyi jehovah ɖokpo
mi sixu ɖɔ mi ɖo jehovah wɛ tuun ɖɔ jehovah ɖokpo wɛ e nyi gbɔn
etɛ mi sixu wa hɛn fifa kpo buteninɔ mitɔn kpo ɖo
etɛwu e tuun xo ɖo mɛ lɛ e ganji
etɛwu mɔyizi ɖɔ xo enɛ lɛ
sinsɛn jwifu lɛ tɔn zan xokwin ebleegbe tɔn ɖo mɛ lɛ e nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan nyi ɖɛ sinsɛn biblo tɔn sin akpaxwe ɖe
nɔ xoɖɛ enɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe zanzan gbada
e nɔ ylɔ ɖɛ enɛ ɖɔ shema xokwin nukɔntɔn wemafɔ ɔ tɔn wɛ
mɛ yeɖee jo nu sinsɛn jwifu tɔn lɛ e nɔ xoɖɛ enɛ do ɖɔ emi ze emiɖee bi jo nu mawu
xokwin enɛ lɛ ɖo xo gudogudo tɔn mɔyizi ɖɔ nu togun izlayɛli tɔn kple ɖo ayikungban wɛnjɛ mɔwabu tɔn ji ɖo e mɛ
mɔyizi nyi yetɔn ɖo xwe wa yi lɛ e mɛ e jlo ɖɔ togun ɔ hwenu mɔ tagba lɛ ɖo nukɔnmɛ e
ɖo ɖeji do jehovah wu nɔ gbeji ɛ do ɖo mawu yetɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ xo gudogudo tɔn mɔyizi ɖɔ lɛ e togun ɔ tawun
ee mɔyizi xa wo lɛ kpo ɖevo jehovah togun ɔ lɛ e kpo gudo e ɔ e wa ɖɔ xo ɖo mɛ lɛ e xa ɖo du monde nouveau mɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
izlayɛli vi kple ɖo finɛ xa mɔyizi lɛ e tuun ɖɔ jehovah mawu yetɔn nyi jehovah ɖokpo a wɛ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ tuun
mawu ɖokpo gee jɛn izlayɛli vi lɛ tuun nɔ e wɛ nyi mawu yetɔn ablaxamu izaki kpo jakɔbu kpo tɔn
bɔ aniwu mɔyizi ɖɔ nu ɖɔ jehovah mawu yetɔn nyi jehovah ɖokpo
nuɖe dɔn ɖokpo jehovah nyi e kpo e ayi mɛtɔn bi mɛtɔn bi nu hlɔnhlɔn mɛtɔn bi do yi wan ee xo wemafɔ ɔ ɖɔ e kpo ca wɛ a
etɛ xo ɖo mɛ e mi ɖo egbe
ðɔ tinmɛ xogbe jehovah ɖokpo ɔ tɔn ɖe vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo jehovah kpo numɛsɛn akɔta lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo tɛntin
ðo ebleegbe kpo gbe gege ɖevo lɛ kpo mɛ ɔ xokwin ɖokpo ɔ sin tinmɛ sixu nɔ nyi nulɛnkwin ɖe kɛɖɛ kpowun
e sixu zan do ɖɔ nu nyi nu bunɔ kwin ɖokpo ɖe we a e xo
e ci ɖɔ e kun nyi adingban nukplɔnmɛ sinsɛn tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu nyi atɔnɖobu lɛ e wɛ mɔyizi ɖe o
jehovah wɛ nyi mɛ blo jixwe kpo ayikungban kpo e nyi wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn
mawu jɔ mawu alo mawu nugbo ɖe ɖe zɛ eyɛ wu a numɛsɛn ɖe ci eɖɔhun a
enɛ wu ɔ mɔyizi ɖo flinflin izlayɛli vi lɛ wɛ ɖɔ jehovah kɛɖɛ wɛ ɖo
ɖo wa nu togun do nɔ numɛsɛn tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun a
ðe lɛ ɖo numɛsɛn enɛ lɛ mɛ bɔ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ kpacɛ nu nuɖe lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ
ðevo lɛ tiin nɔ nyi akpaxwe numɛsɛn ɖe tɔn
ði ɔ ejipunu lɛ yɛhwe hwesivɔ tɔn yɛhwe jinukunsin tɔn yɛhwe ayikungban tɔn geb yɛhwe nilu tɔn hapi kpo kanlin ɖeɖovo maxamaxa lɛ kpo
numɛsɛn enɛ lɛ gege wɛ jehovah ɖegba gbɔn awe wo lɛ gblamɛ
numɛsɛn nukunɖeji kanaanu lɛ tɔn nɔ nyi baalu yɛhwe vijiji tɔn nɔ nyi yɛhwe jinukunsin tɔn ji tɔn kpo jɔhɔn ɖaxo tɔn kpo nu e
izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo flin ɖɔ mawu emitɔn mawu nugbo ɔ ɔ jehovah ɖokpo wɛ
nwt tinmɛ ɖevo tɛ ɖokpo sixu ɖo
jehovah ɖɔ emi nyi ɖokpo gbɔn
nɔ huzu a nɔ nɔ gbeji
xokwin ɖokpo ɔ nɔ do gesi linlin ɖokpo ɔ ɖiɖo kpo nu ɖokpo ɔ wiwa kpo
jehovah mawu nyi tɔdema alo aganma a
e wa ɔ hwebinu wɛ e nɔ nɔ gbeji wa nu jlɔjlɔ ɖɔ nugbo nɔ huzu a
jehovah nu ablaxamu ɖɔ kunkan tɔn ɖu akpadido yikungban ɔ sin gu blo nujiwu gege do ɖe akpa enɛ
xwe wa yi do akpa enɛ e hu acɛ nu alɔ jehovah zin wa e a bib tin
mawu ɖe ɖe do nukɔn nu mi a ɖo gudo ɔ mawu ɖe ɖe a
do ji ɖɔ linlin emitɔn kun nɔ huzu o ɔ jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɔ nyi wɛ jɛn kpo ɖe tɛgbɛ
etɛ jehovah byɔ ɖo tɔn lɛ si
jezu xo mɔyizi tɔn lɛ ɖo taji e ji gbɔn
mɔyizi flin togun ɔ ɖɔ jehovah nɔ nɔ gbeji kun nɔ huzu o ɖo wanyiyi kpo nukunkpedomɛwu tɔn kpo sin ali
enɛ wu ɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ ze yeɖee jo nu eɖokponɔ yi wan nu eɖokponɔ kpo ayi yetɔn yetɔn kpo hlɔnhlɔn yetɔn bi kpo
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ lɔ ɖo ze yeɖee bi jo nu jehovah gbɔn ɖo lɛ ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo ali lɛ bi
ðo jlo jehovah tɔn kpo linlin tɔn kpo nɔ huzu a nɔ nɔ gbeji wutu ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu taji e byɔ ɖo mawu nugbo lɛ si lɛ e lɔ kun huzu ɖo egbe o
bonu e yi gbe nu sinsɛn biblo mitɔn ɔ mi lɔ ɖo ze miɖee bi jo yi wan kpo ayi mitɔn linlin mitɔn kpo hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn bi kpo
xosin jezu klisu tlɛ nya kan nu byɔ ɛ e ɖe e nɛ xa
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi mi sixu ɖo nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɖɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu nugbo nugbo ɖɔ jehovah mawu mitɔn ɔ jehovah ɖokpo wɛ gbɔn e
ali tɛ mi nɔ jehovah kɛɖɛ ɖe
dɔnkpɛvu eblee lɛ ɖɔ emi ze emiɖee bi jo nu jehovah kɛɖɛ ɖo babilɔnu gbɔn
bonu jehovah nyi mawu mitɔn kwin ɖokpo gee ɔ ɔ mi ɖo ze miɖee bi jo nu eɖokponɔ
mi nɔ ɛ e ɖo nyi agboɖe a alo mi ɖo eyɛ kpo numɛsɛn ɖevo lɛ kpo a mi ɖo caka sinsɛn biblo alɔkpa ɖevo lɛ sin linlin kpo nuwiwa lɛ kpo xa eyɛtɔn a
mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ jehovah kun nyi numɛsɛn ɖokpo ɖo numɛsɛn lɛ mɛ kpowun o e nyi numɛsɛn hugan ɖe lɛ e alo hu e kpowun a
jehovah kɛɖɛ wɛ e ɖo xa
ðo wema daniyɛli tɔn mɛ ɔ mi xa dɔnkpɛvu eblee nɔ nyi daniyɛli hananiya micaɛli kpo azalya kpo e tɔn
ɖɔ emi kun ɖu nuɖuɖu bli lɛ e o ɖɔ emi kun nu sika bocyɔ tɔn o do ɖɔ emi ze emiɖee bi jo nu jehovah kɛɖɛ
do ze miɖee bi jo nu jehovah kɛɖɛ ɔ etɛ wu mi ɖo miɖee do
do ze miɖee bi jo nu jehovah kɛɖɛ ɔ mi ɖo lɔn bonu nu ɖebu yi tɛn mɛ jehovah ɖokponɔ ɖo nɔ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ e alo ma xa nu ɔ a
etɛ nu mɔhun lɛ sixu nyi
ðo wo lɛ mɛ ɔ jehovah tinmɛ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ togun emitɔn kun ɖo ɖo numɛsɛn ɖebu nu emi o kun ɖo ɖo vodunsinsɛn alɔkpa ɖebu mɛ o
nu jehovah byɔ ɖo mi si lɛ e huzu a jehovah ɖokpo nyi wɛ jɛn e kpo ɖe
nu mi nu enɛ ɖo mi e
etɛ mi sixu jɛ wan yi ji hu jehovah
ðo kolosinu lɛ xa mɛ ɔ mi mɔ weɖexamɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe do nu sixu bɔ kancica ɖo klisanwun lɛ kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble e wu
wu ɖɔ wemafɔ ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ci vodunsinsɛn ɖɔhun
nu nyi ɖo nu nɔ jlo mɛɖe e ɖi dɔkun jijɛ alo mɛjɔmɛ nyinyi sixu wa syɛn ci numɛsɛn ɖe ɖɔhun ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
enyi mi gbeje wemafɔ ɔ bi ɔ e bɔwu bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ nu nyanya ɖevo xo e ɖɔ lɛ e ca kan kpo kpo ɖo ali ɖe bɔ mɛ ɔ lɔ nyi vodunsinsɛn
nu mɔhun lɛ biba nukunmyatakin sixu wa yi tɛnmɛ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu mawu e tɔn
mi lɔn bɔ nu enɛ lɛ ɖebu do ji mitɔn bɔ jehovah nyi jehovah ɖokpo nu mi a wɛ a
gbeɖe
akpa tɛ jaan gba nu mɛ
jaan nu ɖokpo ɔ ji ganji nu mi ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe yi wan nu nu ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi sin jlo nyanya lɛ nukun ɖo mɛ gban mɛ kpo goyiyi dɔkun jijɛ nɔ mɛ e kpan ɔ e kun ɖo wanyiyi nu ɔ o
jaan enɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ gbeje ayi mitɔn hwɛhwɛ nɔ ɖɔ ayiɖeɖayi nu nusisɔ kpo ɔ tɔn kpo ɖo jlojlo e wɛ wɛ a ji
mi ɖo nu sin akpa mawu do e
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ mi hɛn xo titewungbe mɔyizi ɖɔ lɛ e mɛ ganji
enyi mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ jehovah mawu mitɔn ɔ jehovah ɖokpo wɛ ɖi nu bi ɔ mi blo nu wu mi kpe e bi ze miɖee bi jo nu eɖokponɔ ɛ e nɔ gbɔn e ebl
ðokpo jehovah nyi e kunkpla buteninɔ kpo linlin ɖokpo ɔ ɖiɖo kpo jijɔ ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ lɛ bɔ mi mɛ nɔ ɛ lɛ e ɖo ɖo
jwifu lɛ glɛkinu lɛ hlɔmanu lɛ kpo toɖevomɛnu lɛ kpo wɛ nɔ agun klisanwun tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn mɛ
nɔ sinsɛn vovo lɛ mɛ ɖo aca vovo lɛ bɔ nu nɔ ci nu e gbɔn vo do yeɖee lɛ tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ e vɛwu nu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ ali sinsɛn biblo tɔn ɔ alo jo ali ji ɖe lɛ e do
pɔlu mɔ ɖɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e flin ɖɔ mawu ɖokpo wɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖo e wɛ nyi jehovah xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
tɛ ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo hwe mitɔn
etɛ enɛ
etɛ sixu nu buteninɔ mitɔn
enɛ ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e hun xomɛ nu mi tawun
enɛ wɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ mɛ nyi akɔ vovo ɖo aca vovo se gbe vovo lɛ e ɖo agun gege mɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ kpa nu jehovah
e ɖo co vogbingbɔn enɛ lɛ sixu dɔn ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ wa bɔ mi ɖo ɖebu a
nɔ ɖo buteninɔ agun klisanwun tɔn tɔn mɛ a
akpaxwe
ði ɔ nu nɔ ci nu do klisanwun sin aca gbɔn vo nu hwɛ tɔn bi sese lɛ e wu
anɔnugbe yetɔn nɔ sɔnu gbɔn e zinzan yetɔn lɛ kpo nuɖuɖu yetɔn lɛ kpo sixu nɔ ma
nɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu do xa mɛ ɖo aca ɖokpo ɔ hwi ɖɔhun lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ a
alo enyi mɛ ɖeɖee e ɖe bɔ nyi ɖo agun lɛdo alo alaxɔ towe mɛ lɛ e ɖo xwe sɔ a abi ɖo aca ɖevo kabi nyi akɔ ɖevo ɔ lo
nɔ lɔn bɔ nu mɔhun lɛ nɔ nu buteninɔ kpo linlin ɖokpo ɔ ɖiɖo kpo ɖo nɔ togun jehovah tɔn mɛ e wɛ a
weɖexamɛ tɛ ɖo efɛzinu lɛ mɛ
etɛ mi sixu wa bonu buteninɔ agun ɔ tɔn nɔte
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi jɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ a
pɔlu ɖe we ɖagbeɖagbe ɖe lɛ xa klisanwun ɖo toxo hunnukun kpo akɔjɔkple toxo efɛzi tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo xa efɛzinu lɛ
wu ɖɔ pɔlu ɖɔ xo do jijɔ ɖe lɛ wu jɛ nukɔn wɛ nyi mɛɖesɔhwe xomɛfifa suuluɖiɖo kpo wanyiyi kpo
e sixu jijɔ enɛ lɛ do dotin hɛn xɔ ɖe ɖo lɛ e wu
gbɔn vo nu dotin syɛnsyɛn xɔ ɖe ɖo ɖo lɛ e ɔ e ɖo nɔ jla xɔ ɔ ɖo hwɛhwɛ e nyi a ɔ e sixu jɛ gblegble ji
pɔlu byɔ klisanwun efɛzi tɔn lɛ ɖɔ do gan hɛn buteninɔ gbigbɔ ɔ ɖo
mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mitɔn wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi wa nu bonu buteninɔ agun ɔ tɔn nɔte
etɛ mi sixu wa
jɛ nukɔn ɔ tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ xo pɔlu ɖɔ lɛ e nɔ ɖe wɛ nyi mɛɖesɔhwe xomɛfifa suuluɖiɖo kpo wanyiyi kpo
enyi mi ɖo wa wɛ ɔ fifa kpo buteninɔ xɔ akwɛ mitɔn kpo jijlaɖo mɛ ɖe wɛ mi ɖe nɛ
mi sixu ɖɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ jehovah mawu mitɔn ɔ jehovah ɖokpo wɛ gbɔn
jehovah mawu mitɔn ɔ jehovah ɖokpo wɛ
nuflinmɛ enɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ bɔ xa mɔ hwenu xwe akpadido yikungban ɔ ji lɛ e
xo enɛ lɛ hinhɛn do ayi mɛ hlɔnhlɔn mi bɔ mi kpannukɔn ɖaxo ɔ sɛkpɔ bi e so nu fifa kpo buteninɔ kpo ɖo palaɖisi ɔ mɛ
nu mi ze miɖee bi jo nu jehovah kɛɖɛ yi wan ɛ kpo mitɔn bi kpo do gan syɛnsyɛn hɛn buteninɔ ɖo kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn mɛ e ɖo
enyi mi ɖo wa wɛ zɔn mi yi ɔ mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ mi mɔ xo jezu ɖɔ do mɛ ɖeɖee e ɖɔhwɛ yetɔn ɖɔ nyi lɛ e wu e sin jijɛ wa mɛ ji xoɖɛ ɖagbe do lɛ
gletoxo mɛ e nɔ hu hwe ɖe e gege wɛ gbɔn xuto trinite et tobago tɔn lɛ
jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ yi fi enɛ lɛ hwɛhwɛ nɔ ɖekunnu nu nɔ mɔ lɛ e
mɛ nabi wa flin e
ɖo nɔ hwɛ kɛ miɖee
etɛwu tutoblonunu mawu tɔn nyi bunɔ ɖe
biblu ɖɔ mi bi wɛ nyi gbɔn
mi sixu wa nu gbɔn hwenu mi wa nu nyi do nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e kpo hwenu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu nyi do nu mi e kpo
biblu ɖɔ togun jehovah tɔn sin nukɔnyiyi gbɔn
jehovah ɖo ayikungban ji nyi tɔn lɛ e nyi tutoblonunu bunɔ ɖe
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ lɛ wɛ nɔ wa nu nyi do
e ɖo co gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ɖo gudo nu agun tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e bonu e su yi nukɔn
tamɛ do nujiwu ɖeɖee jehovah ɖo wiwa wɛ gbɔn togun tɔn nyi ɖo jlo e gblamɛ lɛ e kpɛɖe ji
hwenu azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo e ɔ mawu nugbo lɛ kpɛɖe jɛn ɖo ayikungban ji
jehovah kɔn nyɔna do yetɔn ji
ðo xwe bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛ livi mɔkpan nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ huzu jehovah tɔn lɛ
jehovah mɔ nukɔnyiyi jiwu enɛ ɔ ɖɔ xweta hwe hu xweta lɛ bi ɔ ɖo xweta ɖo gan ɖebu a ɖo xweta lɛ mɛ ɔ huzu togun syɛnsyɛn
nyɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ e jɛ hwetɔnnu ɔ blo nu enɛ blewun
enɛ wu ɔ to gege tiin bɔ mɛ nabi ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji din lɛ e hugan tovi yetɔn lɛ
mawu nugbo lɛ ɖe wanyiyi gbɔn
ðo hwe mitɔn ɔ jehovah togun tɔn bɔ e tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ tɔn hugan bi e tawun e wɛ nyi wanyiyi
jaan jezu ee ɖo wanyiyi mawu ɖɔhun e ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ ɖo ɖokpo wɛ yi wan nu miɖee
wanyiyi ɖo nu miɖee ɔ wɛ mɛ lɛ bi ɖɔ nyi ahwanvu nugbo
jaan xwe wa yi lɛ e ɖɔ nu enɛ ɖo taji tawun ɖo ahwan akɔta lɛ hu mɛ gbɔn fi bi e wu
ði ɔ livi wɛ wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ hu
jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo kun e su do nu mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e mɛ a xa micee
enɛ bɔ sin hun lɛ bi tɔn mɛ mɛ
nwt etɛwu nukɔnyiyi togun jehovah tɔn tɔn jiwu
e nɔ zan elɔ tɔn lɛ kpo xojlajla sin gɔnu ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
e sixu ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla a
etɛwu mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu do xomɛsin xomɛ nu mi hweɖelɛnu
fɔtoo ɖo e
agun klisanwun tɔn nɔ ji ɖɔ wan yi nu mawu kpo mi ɖɔhun lɛ kpo ɖo taji tawun
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ wɛ e ɖo nyi
hwenu e kan ɖo taji hu bi e byɔ ɛ e ɔ e yi gbe ɖɔ yi wan nu aklunɔ mawu towe kpodo ayi towe bi kpo kpodo towe bi kpo kpodo linlin towe bi kpo
ɖaxo jɛ nukɔn nu lɛ bi ɔ nɛ
wegɔ ɔ bɔ ɖi nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖie yi wan nu nɔzo towe hwiɖesu ɖɔhun
e ɖo co biblu ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ hwɛhuhu adamu tɔn bɔ e ji mi bi kpo hwɛhuhu kpo xa hlɔmanu lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e ɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ nuɖe alo wa nuɖe nu mi hweɖelɛnu
enɛ sixu wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah kpo togun tɔn kpo e
etɛ mi wa ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhunkɔtɔn lɛ mɛ
mawu hwexonu tɔn ɖe lɛ tlɛ ɖɔ alo wa nuɖe lɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ lobɔ nu biblu ɖɔ do wu lɛ e sixu nu mi
enyi nɔ ɖo izlayɛli ɖo eli kpo vi sunnu tɔn lɛ kpo hwenu wɛ ɔ wa nu gbɔn
eli kpewu dɔn to nu vi sunnu tɔn lɛ a gbɔn
ði ɔ ðaxo eli ɖo vi sunnu we bɔ jɛhun do jehovah tɔn lɛ ji a
yetɔn nɔ nukɔn ɖo hunjijɛ do sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ji mɛ co vi sunnu tɔn we lɛ hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ
eli tuun nu enɛ ɖo dɔn to nu e boɖo
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ mawu ɖo hwɛ nu xwedo eli tɔn tlili
enyi nɔ ɖo eli hwenu wɛ ɔ wa nu gbɔn nu eli do nu hwɛ vi sunnu tɔn lɛ hu lɛ e
lɔn bɔ enɛ nyi nu bɔ jo mawu sinsɛn do wɛ a
hwɛ davidi hu e syɛn sɔ etɛ mawu wa
mɛ davidi wa do afɔ gbe nu bɛtisabe mɔ xo
nu enɛ jɛ hwenu asu tɔn ulii ɖo ahwangbenu e
hwenu ulii lɛkɔ wa xwegbe klewun e ɔ davidi tɛnkpɔn bonu e ɖoxo xa bɛtisabe nyi ɖɔ e wɛ do xo ɔ
davidi sun sin adanuwiwa enɛ tɔn nu nyanya lɛ gbo e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo
enyi nɔ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ hwenɛnu wɛ ɔ wa nu gbɔn
walɔ nyanya davidi tɔn nyi nu wɛ a
ɖɔ gbe wa gbe a gbɔn
ee wa nu nyi do gudo e ɔ aniwu jehovah zan ɛ
ɖevo biblu e wɛ nyi tɔn
jezu ɛ nyi ɖokpo ɖo lɛ mɛ e ɖo co ɖɔ alo wa nuɖe lɛ hweɖelɛnu wa ɖo nukɔnmɛ
ði ɔ lɛ hɔn jo jezu do ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu ɖe mɛ
ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi mɛ ɖe lɛ tlɛ wa ɔ emilɛ kun wa o
mak nu ɖo co hwenu e wli jezu xwe hwɛ nukɔn e ɔ lɛ bi hɔn jo e do jɛ ji
azɔn nabi ɖe ɖɔ emi kun tlɛ tuun jezu o
enyi nyi ahwanvu hwenɛnu wɛ ɔ nu wa lɛ e gbejininɔ towe nu jehovah wu wɛ a
etɛwu ɖeji ɖɔ mawu nɔ wa nu jlɔjlɔ hwebinu
mɛ wa nu nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e sin klewun ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ lɛ
e sixu xwe kanweko wa yi lɛ e tɔn alo agaɖanu tɔn gege ɖevo lɛ bɔ mɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ e ɖe lɛ wa nu nyanya lɛ hɛn nu gble do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu
nukanbyɔ ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ wa nu gbɔn
lɔn bɔ nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ nyi nu bɔ jo jehovah kpo togun tɔn kpo do jɛ agun ɖo xa towe mɛ e ji wɛ a
alo yi gbe ɖɔ jehovah sixu jo hwenu do nu lɛ bɔ lɛkɔ lobɔ e jla nuwanyido lɛ ɖo wa nu e jɛxa gbɔn e a
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ e nɔ wa jɛ bɔ mɛ hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ e nɔ nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn nɔ lɛkɔ a
ðo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɔ ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah wa ɖɔhwɛ xa mɔhun lɛ vlafo ɖe sin agun ɔ mɛ a
etɛ mɛ jezu mɔ nukunnu jɛ do nuwanyido judasi isikaliɔti kpo kpo tɔn wu
mawu mɛ do lɛ e ɖo nu wa nyi do wɛ syɛnsyɛn co nɔ gbeji nu jehovah kpo togun tɔn kpo e sin gege wɛ ɖo biblu mɛ
ði ɔ ee jezu xoɖɛ zan ɖokpo mɛ bɔ ayi gudo e ɔ e lɛ
judasi isikaliɔti ɖo mɛ
jezu tuun ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ kun sin jehovah alo togun tɔn wu o
ahwanvu jezu tɔn ɖe lɛ do winnya ɛ co e kpo ɖo ɖagbeɖagbe wa wɛ e ɖe e wa wɛ
etɛ biblu ɖɔ do jehovah tɔn hwe mitɔn tɔn lɛ wu
hwɛjijɔ jɔ hwɛjijɔ lɛ wu wɛ jezu ɖeji do jehovah kpo togun tɔn kpo wu kpo ɖo egbe
nugbo ɔ enyi mi tamɛ do nu jehovah ɖo wiwa wɛ gbɔn tɔn lɛ gblamɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ e ji ɔ e nɔ jiwu ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ kpowun wɛ
togun ɖevo ɖebu ɖe ɖo nugbo ɔ jla wɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ a ɖo jehovah ɖo ali mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e gbɔn nu agun tɔn ɖo bu egbe e a
ezayii tinmɛ ninɔmɛ mɛ togun mawu tɔn ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɖɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo xo su wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo ɖo nu nu
linlin tɛ mi ɖo ɖo do nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wu
jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo awajijɛ mɛ ɖo nu ɖagbe jehovah ɖo ali wɛ bɔ ɖo wiwa wɛ lɛ e wu
ɖo sataan sin acɛ glɔ e ɖo ale wɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖo nylanyla wɛ wutu
xlonɔnu kpo ali bubu kpo wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e dohwɛ jehovah alo agun tɔn ɖo nuwanyido tɔn kpɛɖe tɔn wutu
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ ɖo suulu do miɖee lɛ wu
akpa tɛ mi ɖo nɔ flin
mi sixu ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ mɛ mawu ɖe ɖɔ nuɖe alo wa nuɖe mi e gbɔn
mi ɖo flin ɖɔ mi mɛ bi wɛ e ɖe sin ninɔmɛ tɔn ɖe ɖo edɛni mɛ e mɛ sin xwe ɖie
lɛ sixu xoglo nuwanyido lɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖebu ɖɔ mi ɖo nukun nu gege ɖo mitɔn lɛ si bɔ nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ awajijɛ togun mawu tɔn mɛ ninɔ nɔ hɛn wa nu mi ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ e sin asi mitɔn a
nuwanyido tlɛ nyla hu e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi lɔn bɔ hwɛhuhu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn nyi nu mi bɔ mi jo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn do
enyi nu nyi gbeɖe ɔ mi wu mawu jɔ mi bɔ mi wa jlo tɔn e kpo mawu tɔn ɖo nukun wɛ mi ɖe e kpo kpo
do zunfan awajijɛ ɖaxo kpo nukunɖiɖo tewungbeju mi ɖo e kpo ɔ mi ɖo hɛn gbɔdonumɛ sin akpa elɔ jehovah do e mɛ eɖie blo jinukunsin blo ayikungban
etɛ jezu ɖɔ mi ɖo wa hwenu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu nyi do nu mi e
e ɖo co ɖo mi ɖo ɔ mɛ a wutu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ gbeje jehovah ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ lɛ gbɔn e hwenu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ nuɖe alo wa nuɖe mi e
ði ɔ nugbododo mi ɖo flin e ɖokpo wɛ nyi nu jezu ɖɔ e enyi nɔ nu ɖeɖee lɛ wa nyi do nu lɛ kɛ ɔ mitɔn ɖo jixwe ɔ tɔn lɛ kɛ
flin ɖɔ hwenu kanbyɔ jezu ɖɔ azɔn tɛnwe wɛ mi ɖo hwɛ kɛ mɛ a e ji e ɔ jezu yi gbe ɖɔ yi azɔn tɛnwe kɛɖɛ kpowun wɛ e nyi a loɔ azɔn kanɖe gban kanɖe gban donu tɛnwe
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖiɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ jlo do hwɛ kɛ mɛ hwebinu nu nukɔntɔn ayi mitɔn ɖo nɔ hugan e nɛ
ɖagbe tɛ jozɛfu ze
jozɛfu ze e ɖeɖɛ nuwanyido lɛ gbɔn e sin ɖagbe ɖe eyɛ wɛ nyi vi nukɔntɔn ɖo vi sunnu we hlacɛli ji nu jakɔbu e mɛ
jozɛfu tɔn wo lɛ hwanwu do wu tɔn ɖo yetɔn yi wan wutu
enɛ gudo ɔ sa jozɛfu do kannumɔgbenu
xwe mɔkpan gudo ɔ ɖagbe jozɛfu wa ɖo ejipu e bɔ e huzu azaglɔgan nukɔntɔn axɔsu to ɔ tɔn tɔn
hwenu adɔ ɖe ɖo xa ɔ mɛ e ɔ jozɛfu tɔn lɛ wa nuɖuɖu xɔ gbe ɖo ejipu tuun a
jozɛfu hɛn ɔ e zan acɛ e ɖo e hlɔn ɖo nu nyanya tɔn lɛ wa xa ɛ e wu
e tɔn lɛ ɖɔ huzu jijɔ a ji
e wa ɖɔ nu ɖɔ xɛsi ɖi o kpe nukun do kpo mɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo wu
etɛ jlo wa hwenu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu nyi do e
enyi mi wu ɖɔ mi wa ɔ biblu tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi yi mɔ mɛ mi wa nu nyi do e tɛnkpɔn dohwɛ gbɔ
xa matie
enyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ hwɛ mitɔn lɛ kɛ mi ɔ e nɔ vivi nu mi enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ nu
kolosinu lɛ byɔ mi ɖɔ nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ enyi mɛɖe wa nu nyi do nu mɛɖe ɖo mɛ hweɖebunu hun nɔ kɛ miɖee
ɖo nɔ hwɛ kɛ miɖee aklunɔ kɛ e ɖɔhun
wanyiyi klisanwun tɔn nɔ hɛn mɛ do xomɛ a wɛ kɔlɛntinu lɛ ɖɔ
enyi mi ɖo aca nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɔ jehovah hwɛ kɛ mi lɔ
nugbo ɔ hwenu mi jlo ɖeɖɛ nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn e ɔ mi wa nu klisanwun ɖɔhun gbɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi xwedo mitɔn ɔ nɔ wa nu xa mi gbɔn hwenu mi hu hwɛ e sin xa ðɛhan
nu xɔ akwɛ tawun wɛ diamaa nyi sin do
ðe lɛ nɔ xɔ liva mɔkpan
nuɖe lɛ ɖe xɔ akwɛ ɖo mawu nukunmɛ hu diamaa alo awinnya xɔ akwɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ a
haykanush nyi blo baptɛm a nɔ nɔ armenie e mɔ togudo yiyi wema ɖe ɖo xwe tɔn kpa
kati e nɔ do yi akwɛ e ɖe lɛ kpo akwɛ wosuwosu ɖe kpo ɖo togudo yiyi wema ɔ mɛ
e ɖɔ nu asu tɔn blo baptɛm a e wɛ nu e
akwɛyozo ɖaxo ɖe mɛ wɛ asu kpo asi kpo enɛ ɖe ɖu axɔ e ɖo co akwɛ ɔ yi jo nu mɛ tɔn wɛ bɔ adlɛsi tɔn ɖo togudo yiyi wema ɔ mɛ e
e kpaca nya tɔn wɛ e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo tawun
haykanush kpo asu tɔn kpo tinmɛ ɖɔ nu wɛ ɖe ɖo biblu mɛ e wɛ bɔ nɔ ɖɔ nugbo
mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo nɔ ɖɔ nugbo gbɔn yɛkan enɛ mɛ tinmɛ nu nu xwedo ɔ do jehovah tɔn lɛ wu jo xojlawema ɖe lɛ do nu
xwedo ɔ jlo akwɛ ɔ kpɛɖe haykanush do ɛ bɔ e
ayihɔngbe tɔn ɔ nyɔnu ɔ wa asu kpo asi kpo ɔ ɖo xwegbe hɛn e diamaa do blo e ɖe wa nu haykanush ɖɔ e ɖo yi dandan nyi wuntun ɖe ɖɔ wa nu gbɔn e su xwedo emitɔn nukunmɛ
ði xwedo enɛ ɖɔhun ɔ nugboɖiɖɔ haykanush kpo asu tɔn kpo tɔn kpaca mɛ gege
e kpaca jehovah wɛ a
linlin tɛ e ɖo do nugboɖiɖɔ yetɔn wu
e byɔ ɖɔ jɛ tagba ɖɔ nugbo wɛ a
xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ tɔn vɛwu a
ðo mawu lɛ ɖi nu ɖɔ jijɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ hu diamaa sika alo agbaza sin nu ɖevo lɛ
nugbo ɔ linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nu xɔ akwɛ e kpo ee xɔ a e kpo wu e gbɔn vo nu mɛ gege tɔn
nu biblu ɖɔ do nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo nunywɛ kpo wu e ɖe enɛ mi
nunywɛxo ɖɔ ji nu nu mɛ huzu e
nu nu mɛ ɖo tamɛbibɔ alo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nwt e
nunywɛ ɖiɖo hu akwɛ ɖiɖo le nɔ sin nunywɛ mɛ e xɔ akwɛ hu sika nunywɛ xɔ akwɛ hu
etɛ mi sixu ɖɔ do nugboɖiɖɔ wu
e wɛ nu jehovah ɖesunɔ e nɔ ɖo adingban a
jezu klisu ze nugboɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖagbe ɖe
ði ɔ flin hwenu ðaxo kayifu ɖɔ xo elɔ e ðo mawu gbɛɖe ɔ sin nyikɔ mɛ ɔ enyi hwi wɛ nyi klisu mawu vi ɔ nugbo hun ɖɔ nu mi
enyi jezu ɖɔ nugbo ɔ hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo jwifu lɛ tɔn ɔ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ e nyla do mawu wu bɔ e sixu hu e ɖo co e ɖɔ nugbo ɖɔ emi wɛ nyi mɛsiya ɔ
midɛɛ lɛ lo
mi ɖɔ nugbo ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee mɛ nu kpɛɖe hizihizi sixu hɛn le wa nu mi ɖo agbaza lixo lɛ e a
bonu e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ nugboɖiɖɔ vɛwu tawun ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ e mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ emitɔn jɛn nɔ yi wan nu akwɛ e
mɛ gege nɔ ɖɔ hwɛ emitɔn jɔ bɔ emi hizi nu alo zan nugbomaɖɔ sin walɔ ɖevo lɛ
linlin enɛ gbakpe bɔ enyi e wa sin do le agbaza tɔn lɛ ji ɔ mɛ gege nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nugboɖiɖɔ kun ɖo atɛ mɛ o
e ɖo co gege klisanwun lɛ tɔn nɔ wa nu jezu ɖɔhun
mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ jijɔ mawu tɔn ɖɔhunkɔ lɛ ɖo taji hugan dɔkun alo le ɖebu
enɛ wu ɔ klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ nu ɖo wemaxɔmɛ do mɔ ɖagbe a
nux nugboɖiɖɔ sixu nɔ hɛn ajɔ wa nu mɛ haykanush ɖɔhun hwebinu
e ɖo co nu ɖagbe wɛ nugboɖiɖɔ nyi ɖo mawu nukunmɛ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo ayixa ɖe enɛ ɔ xɔ akwɛ tawun
gagik tɔn ɖe enɛ ceɖeceɖe
ðo nyi wɛ nɔ kpe nukun do nu lɛ wu wutu ɔ e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ do akwɛ nu mɛ nɔ gbeje takwɛ e bonu e mɔ tɛn do myɔ nukun do ahizi ɔ tɔn lɛ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ huzu
hwenu mɔ nugbo ɔ e ɔ ɔ kpekwɛ tawun co ɖɔ kun blo ɖe o
nyiɖesunɔ gbɔ hun
gagik ɖɔ ji akwɛ nɔ wa xwe nu mi e ɖekpo yi vlɔ nɔ vɛwu nu mi tawun bonu kpe nukun do xwedo wu
e ɖo co xomɛ nɔ hun mi tawun din
ɖo ayixa ɖe ɖo jehovah nukɔn
ɖagbe ɖe wɛ nyi nu vi sunnu we lɛ bɔ mɔ wujɔmɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
mɛ nɔ gbeje takwɛ lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖevo nɔ xa lɛ e kpo bi nɔ mi do mɔ ɖe din
hwliti ɔ tɔn ɖe enɛ
ee asu tɔn nɔ nɔemii kpo e ɔ e jo e do a e wa ɔ e do wu tɔn
hwliti tɛn yi izlayɛli fi e sixu mawu nugbo ɔ ɖe e
ðo taji ɔ nu jehovah blo nu hwliti e hugan agbaza sin nu lɛ nina ɛ
jehovah ɖe lɛ sixu mɔ yeɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ bɔ dandannu gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ mimɔ vɛwu tawun
nɔ zan nugbomaɖɔ sin wlɛnwin ɖe do sin mɛ a loɔ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ syɛnsyɛn nɔ ɖokan do nu wu
ði hwliti hwexonu tɔn ɖɔhun ɔ klisanwun nugbo gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e ɖi nu ɖɔ jehovah ɖo hlɔnhlɔn emi
jehovah azɔn mɔkpan ɖɔ emi kpewu ɖemaɖoɖenanɔ nɔ ɖɔ nugbo ɖo nu bi mɛ lɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ diamaa kpo nu xɔ akwɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo sixu nɔ xɔ akwɛ tawun nu lɛ
mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖeji ɖɔ ɖo mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ nukunmɛ ɔ nugboɖiɖɔ kpo jijɔ tɔn ɖevo mi nɔ lɛ e kpo xɔ akwɛ tawun hugan nu ɖevo ɖebu
nugboɖiɖɔ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo ayixa ɖe nɔ vo ɖɔ xo ɖo ɔ mɛ
xa atɔxwɛ wa yi lɛ e ganji a
e ɖɔ sixu xosin nu nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ a ji
mi ɖo wa nu xa mɛ ɖu wɔxuxu ɔ vɛɛn ɔ flin hwenu e ɖe gbɔn
klisanwun lɛ nɔ mɛ mɔhun lɛ ɖo ajo a
mɛ nyi mɛ yi do ɖe nugbo nugbo e jlo gbeɖe ɖɔ e emi ɖo ajo a jɛn e nɔ jla tɛn mɛ e ɖe ɖo mawu nukɔn e a e nɛ
ablaxamu jɛ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo do mawu wu ji vlafo gbɔn sɛmu gblamɛ
bɔ mawu wa nu xa e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo gbɔn e nu tawun
mɛ ɖetɛ lɛ nyi lɛ xo biblu ɖɔ e
ahun nɔ gba fo nɔ fa ɖo dandan nu
nugbo kabi adingban
jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖeji do dotoo lɛ wu a
adingban
ði ɔ mi nɔ yi gbe nu hundido a ɖo biblu hun ɖuɖu wutu
lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ gege wɛ mi nɔ zan hwenu mi ɖo biblu wɛ e
enyi les saintes ecritures
du monde nouveau ɖe ɖo gbe mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi nɔ zan eyɛ hugan ɖo e zan nyikɔ mawu tɔn e sɔgbe ɖo wɛn
tamɛ kpɛɖe do nyikɔ mawu tɔn jehovah ɔ zinzan ji
e ɖo co biblu ɖokpo enɛ ɔ ɖe jehovah mawu nyi tɔn e sin nyikɔ sin mɛ
adingban
cobonu mi wa jɛ les saintes ecritures
du monde nouveau ji ɖo ɔ lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn ɖe hwe ɔ lɛ e wɛ mi zan ze nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e jinjɔn ji
ze yeɖee jo kpo jlo kpo ðo ghana
axɔsuɖuto ɔ nyi nu lɛ o
jezu mi ɖɔ axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn nɔ mya nukun nu mi jɛ nukɔn nyi nu agbaza tɔn lɛ o
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu tɔn hɛn gbɛzan mitɔn bɔkun do sixu nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo taji hugan lɛ e gbe gbɔn
tamɛ do wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ sin xo jezu tɔn ɖo matie mɛ ɖɔ ɖo xoɖiɖɔ so ji tɔn ɔ hwenu e ji
etɛwu mi ðo nɔ aceji
do wa ɔ mi ɖo miɖee do nu nyanya sixu bɔ mi nɔ wunzɛn do wiwa jezu tɔn wu a lɛ e wu
xota elɔ tinmɛ mi sixu nyi alɔ nu nu ayi mitɔn sin acejininɔ mitɔn ji lɛ e gbɔn e
ði xɛsi o alɔ nu
mawu tɔn nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
jla wɛnɖagbe mawu tɔn tɔn
xota we elɔ lɛ ɖɔ xo do ali mi ɖu jehovah tɔn sin le ɖe e gege ji
kpo kpo
kan nu lehun lɛ byɔ hwiɖee a etɛ bɔ yi wa ɖo to ɖevo mɛ
sɔnu nu alɔkpa enɛ gbɔn
nyi lɔ sixu wa nu mɔhun a
xosin nukanbyɔ mɔhun lɛ tɔn mimɔ sin wlɛnwin ɖagbe ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e jo xo nu nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo enɛ lɛ
bonu mi wa
etɛ bɔ jɛ linlin ji ɖɔ emi yi wa ɖo to ɖevo mɛ fi hudo ɖe e
ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ din e gosin etats unis e ɖɔ tamɛ do ɖo to ɖevo mɛ ji nu xwe gege e ci ɖɔ kun kpewu gbeɖe o ɖɔhun
etɛ ɖyɔ linlin tɔn
ðo ɔ asu kpo asi kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo belize e ɖe ylɔ mi ɖɔ ma wa wa gbexosin xa emi nu ɖokpo
nu wa e nɛ vivi nu mi tawun
xwe ɖokpo gudo ɔ tɛn yi ghana nyi gbexosin ɖo
aaron kpo stephanie kpo
xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie ɔ stephanie ɖibla ɖo xwe din bɔ e lɔ gosin etats unis e gbeje ninɔmɛ tɔn ganji ɖɔ lanmɛ ɖo ganji bɔ xwedo sin agban ɖe ɖo kɔ a
hɛn ɔ wa nu nu jehovah zɛ ee wa wɛ ɖe din e wu sin
mɛɖee gbigbeje do nujɔnu mɛ enɛ ɛ tɛn yi ghana gblo ada nu tɔn
filip kpo ida kpo nyi asu kpo asi kpo gbexosin ɖo xwe jɛji e ɖe gosin danemark e nɔ jlo tɛgbɛ tɛgbɛ ɖɔ tɛn yi fi hudo ɖe e
wlɛnwin zan bɔ jlo yetɔn nyi wiwa lɛ e
filip ɖɔ ee ali tɔn wa hun nu mi e ɔ e ci ɖɔ jehovah ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ e ya ɖido wɛ ɖɔhun
ðo ɔ tɛn yi ghana wa ɖo finɛ nu nu hu xwe atɔn
kpo hans kpo
hans kpo kpo nyi asu kpo asi kpo gbexosin ɖe ɖo xwe hu e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo etats unis
ðo ɔ yi mɛ lɛ hwenu jɔhɔn ðaxo katrina gba nu e
nukɔnmɛ ɔ nyikɔ wa lɛ ɖo togudo e ylɔ a
hans flin ɖɔ enɛ gudo ɔ mi se ɖo xoɖiɖɔ ɖe mɛ ɖo ɖaxo ɖe ji ɖɔ axɔsu davidi yi gbe nu mawu ɖɔ e kun gba tɛmpli ɔ o e nya nu ɖevo gbe
nu enɛ mi bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ e ɖyɔ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu gbe nya wɛ e ɖe lɛ e
ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi xuxu hɔn ɖevo
ee hans kpo se nu ɖagbeɖagbe ɖeɖee sin vivi yetɔn ɖo wa wɛ ɖo to ɖevo lɛ mɛ lɛ e ɖu e gudo e ɔ akpakpa bɔ gbexosin nyinyi ɖo to ɖevo mɛ
ðo ɔ yi ghana wa ɖo nu ɛnɛ agun tokunɔgbe tɔn ɖe
wa lɛkɔ yi etats unis co vivi ɖu ɖo ɖo ghana mɛ e bɔ jlo ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ e syɛn
sin hwenɛnu ɔ ɖo alaxɔ gbigba sin ɖe mɛ ɖo micronesie
sɔnu do sixu wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e gbɔn
do nu nu ɖo xota atɔxwɛ tɔn ɖɔ xo do ɖo fi hudo ɖe lɛ e mɛ wɛ stephanie ɖɔ
ɖɔ xo xa mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nu lɛdo tɔn kpo asi tɔn kpo do jlo ɖo wa ɖo to ɖevo mɛ e ji
ðo taji bi ɔ nɔ ɖɔ nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe e nu jehovah ɖo ɖɛ mɛ hwɛhwɛ
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ stephanie zan bɔkun e ɖe ɛ bɔ e kple akwɛ ba do kpe nukun do eɖee wu hwenu e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ e
hans ɖɔ mi xoɖɛ jehovah ɖɔ e ali mi ɖo mi jlo yi fi e mi do e
mi nɔ ɖɔ azan ji mi tɛn ɔ e ɖo ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ mɛ
asu kpo asi kpo ɔ wlan wema alaxɔ ɛnɛ
ee alaxɔ ghana tɔn yi gbe nu gudo e ɔ tɛn yi kpo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ emi xɔ we ɖo finɛ
hans ɖɔ xa agun ɔ vivi nu mi bɔ mi kan do taan mi jlo xɔ ɖo finɛ e
adria kpo george kpo
george kpo adria kpo nyi asu kpo asi kpo ɖibla ɖo xwe gosin e hɛn mɛ ɖɔ jehovah kun nɔ kɔn nyɔna do jlo ɖagbe lɛ ji kpowun o loɔ gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn wiwa ji wɛ e nɔ kɔn do
enɛ wu ɔ ɖe afɔ titewungbe ɖe lɛ ba do kpe nu nya wɛ ɖe e wu
ɖɔ xo xa nɔvi nyɔnu ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi hudo ɖe ɖo ghana e ɖe kan nu gege byɔ ɛ
wlan wema alaxɔ tɔn kpo alaxɔ ghana tɔn kpo
adria ɖɔ mi wlɛnwin lɛ hɛn gbɛzinzan mitɔn bɔkun hu mi blo gbɔn e
gbeta enɛ lɛ kɔn wa e bɔ tɛn yi ghana ɖo
nukɔntɔn mɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e jɛ mɛ tɔn lɛ sin do tawun nu lɛ bi wɛ gbɔn vo nu nu ma mi lɛ e
etɛ ɛ
kan mɛ lɛ nɔ tɛ mi ɖɔ nyitɔn nɔ su nukun emitɔn mɛ e mi bɔ hɛn nu wu tɛn ɔ e do ayi mɛ
e wa ya e ɔ nyi kpo mɛ lɛ kpo jɛ xo ɖɔ miɖee ji gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji
ðo mi nɔ mɔ miɖee wutu ɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ mɛ lɛ lin do mi a
ɖɔ ɖɔ zunzun xa nɔvi nyɔnu xa ɔ mɛ tɔn zin e ɖe emi bɔ emi mɔ nukunnu jɛ aca vovo lɛ wu
huzu mɛ wu ɖeji do nɔ yi alɔdo tɔn e ɖo hweɖebunu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu lɛ wa nu ɖo alixo ɖe mɛ e wu a e
george kpo adria kpo ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu emi tɛn yi ghana tlolo e ɔ e ci nu emi ɖɔ emi lɛkɔ yi hwexonu wɛ ɖɔhun
adria ɖɔ basya mɛ wɛ mi nɔ nya nu ɖe e nyi ɖo macinu nɔ nya nu e mɛ a
taan nɔ zan do ɖa nuɖuɖu ɖokpo e donu wo wɛ nɔ zan din
hwenu klewun ɖe gudo ɔ nu ci nuvɛwu ɖɔhun lɛ e wa ma mi bi
ɖɔ mi mɛ gbexosin lɛ nɔ mɔ lɛ co gbɛzinzan mitɔn nɔ jɛmɛ nu mi
enyi mi xo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ sin nu mi mɔ lɛ e bi kple ɔ nɔ nyi flin ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ nu mi nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
etɛwu byɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ wa mɔhun
mawuxoɖiɖɔ ɖo xa mɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo jlo tawun tuun nugbo ɔ bɔ biblu xa hwebinu e nɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo mɛ wɛ stephanie ɖɔ
ɖo fi hudo ɖe e wɛ nyi gbeta kɔn wa ɖo gbɛzan mɛ hu bi e
ðo ɔ stephanie kpo aaron kpo wli alɔ bɔ egbe din ɔ nɔ wa ɖo alaxɔ ghana tɔn mɛ
nu ɔ din wɛ christine nyi gbexosin ɖe gosin allemagne ɖibla ɖo xwe e ɖɔ
christine wa ɖo bolivie cobo wa tɛn yi ghana
e ɖɔ ɖɔ ðo lin do mɛ lɛ tawun wutu ɔ nɔ xoɖɛ byɔ alɔdo jehovah tɔn hwebinu
e wa huzu mɛ titewungbe ɖe nu mi hu tɔn
ɖu vivi buteninɔ jiwu ɖo togun jehovah tɔn mɛ e tɔn
elɔ hɛn tawun
e lin din a bɔ christine kpo gideon kpo wli alɔ bɔ mɛ bi kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ghana
christine kpo gideon kpo
filip kpo ida kpo ɖɔ nu wa do biblu lɛ bɔ yi nukɔn e nu mi mɛ alo hu wɛ mi ɖo mi nɔte ɖo ji do sixu nu mitɔn lɛ ganji
lɛ mɔ le a
filip ɖɔ nu xa nyavi ɖe nɔ nyi michael
e hɛn ɔ e nu gbe bi gbe nɔ sɔnu ganji bɔ mi fo wema biblu mɛ ɔ ɖo ɖokpo mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ michael huzu blo baptɛm a e
azɔn nukɔntɔn e wa kunnuɖegbe e ɔ e kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ sixu mi nu ma kpe nukun do biblu lɛ wu a
e kpaca mi tawun
michael tinmɛ ɖɔ emi jɛ biblu xa mɛ atɔn ji ɖɔ e emi bonu emi kpe nukun do wu
bo e ɖo hudo tɔn bɔ biblu lɛ tlɛ huzu biblu lɛ
ida kpo filip kpo
ɖɔ e yawu hudo ɖaxo ɖe wu gbɔn e mi wa ghana nɔ zaan e ɔ mi ɖɔ mawuxo ɖo gletoxo kpɛvi ɖe mɛ tokunɔ lɛ
tokunɔ tantɔn wɛ mi mɔ ɖo gletoxo kwin ɖokpo enɛ mɛ
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ kpo kpo wli alɔ bɔ bi nyi gbexosin titewungbe
ɖo tokunɔgbe sin agun ɖe mɛ nɔ tokunɔ kpo kpo jɛji ɖo to ɔ mɛ e ɖe lɛ
ɖo ghana bɔ george kpo adria kpo mɔ nu nyinyi nɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ si lɛ e yeɖesunɔ
enɛ wu ɔ e vivi nu tawun hwenu e ylɔ bɔ yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn sin klasi ɔ e
egbe ɔ nyi ɖo
wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ sin nu ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ toɖevomɛnu gege nɔ syɛnsyɛn xa nɔvi xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖo nukun ɔ mɛ
jaan enyi e ma ɖo ɔ wɛ nɔ blo baptɛm ɖo ghana ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
ði e nyi gbɔn nu mɛ tɛn yi ghana nɔ ɖo fi hudo ɖe lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ wan yi nu jehovah mɔkpan gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bɔ ze yeɖee jo kpo jlo kpo
nɔ wa ɖo fi e ɖo hudo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gege ɖe lɛ e
kpo hie sogan seten yi makedonia
kpo atɔxwɛ gungbe lidosun kpo woosun tɔn kpo
sixu yi togudo yiyi wema jɛxa e ɖe a
tamɛ do ayi mɛ nɔ ci e kpo aca to ɔ mɛ tɔn kpo wu a
blo tuto jɛxa lɛ e bonu lanmɛ nɔ ganji a
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ gbe to ɔ tɔn a
sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu agun ɔ ɖesu a
mi bi mɔ yi do ji jaan
jehovah tɔn lɛ mɔ e ɖetɛ hugan bi
mi sixu ɖɔ hwɛhuhu kun nu mi o loɔ mawu tɔn wɛ nu mi gbɔn
nyɔna tɛ lɛ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo jehovah tɔn wu
ðɔ lo jezu do do viwunglenɔ ɖe wu e ɔ jijɔ nunamɛ kpo kpo tɔn gbɔn
viwunglenɔ ɖe yi tokpletɛn zanzan tɛɛn mɛ bonu ɖo viwungle tɔn mɛ
mɛ e mɔ lɛ e yi gbe nu e ɖɔ e ɖido ɔ wa gbe
e ɖo co glenɔ ɔ ɖo hudo tɔn hu lɛkɔ yi tokpletɛn ɔ azɔn nabi ɖe ɖo keze ɔ mɛ nɔ ɖo mɛ wɛ tlɛ ɖɔ emi su jɛxa ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee e do gle ɔ mɛ hwelɛkɔ bi lɛ e
ee mɛ e jɛ nukɔn lɛ e mɔ e ɔ hlun nu ɖɔ
viwunglenɔ ɔ ɖɔ yi gbe nu ɖɔ su e sin
nu ɖebu jlo mi e lɛ bi a e
wu hwan wɛ ɖe ɖo ɖagbe wa wɛ ɖe e wutu a
lo jezu tɔn enɛ flin jijɔ jehovah tɔn ɖokpo mi bɔ e ɖɔ xo tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ azɔn gege e wɛ nyi tɔn
xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ ɖeɖee nu ganxixo ɖokpo kpowun lɛ e jɛxa yi kpikpe a ɖɔhun viwunglenɔ ɔ xomɛ do wu
etɛwu jehovah jɔwu ɖaxo ɖe lɛ
e wa gbɔn mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ nunina mawu tɔn tɔn sin xo
mi nɔ kpewu a
enɛ wu ɔ axɔsu wlan ɖɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ nɔ wa ɖagbe nɔ hu hwɛ a e ɖokpo gee tiin ɖo ayikungban ji fi a
nut ɖokpo ɔ pɔlu ɖɔ lɛ bi wɛ hu hwɛ bɔ mawu nɔ mɛ ɔ ɖo ɖe a bɔ axɔ hwɛhuhu nɔ su mɛ ɔ wɛ nyi ku
e ɖo co jehovah jɔwu ɖaxo ɖe lɛ do ɖɔ emi yi wan nu
nunina tɔn hugan bi e wɛ nyi viɖokponɔ tɔn e ayikungban ji wa ku do mitɔn mɛ e
jaan enɛ wu wɛ pɔlu wlan do jezu wu ɖɔ e ku do lɛ bi tamɛ gbɔn mawu tɔn gblamɛ bɔ mi ɖo mimɔ ɛ wɛ din bɔ e kpodo kpan sin axɔsugbakun xwe ɖo e ji ku ɔ wu ebl
nugbo ɔ nu mawu nɔ mɛ ɔ wɛ nyi mavɔmavɔ mi ɖo ɖo bu mi ɖe xa klisu jezu aklunɔ mitɔn mɛ e hlɔ
le tɛ mi mɔ hwenu hwɛhuhu kpa acɛ do mi ji e
hwenu kpa acɛ do mi ji e
lɛ ɖu gu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo sin ninɔmɛ mi bi ɖo e tɔn gbɔn
xomɛ hun mi ɖɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi blo bɔ hwɛhuhu kpa acɛ alo nyi gan nu mi a
gbɔn nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn klisu tɔn gblamɛ ɔ mi nɔ miɖee ɖo jehovah tɔn sin acɛkpikpa glɔ
gbɔn e
fi hwɛhuhu ɖe ɔ mawu tɔn nɔ tunfla ɖo finɛ
mi kpo ɖo nyi wɛ co mi ɖo jo miɖee do bonu hwɛhuhu kpa acɛ nu gbɛzan mitɔn a
pɔlu nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ hwɛhuhu ɖo acɛ ɖo ji a ɖo ɖo ɔ sin acɛ mɛ a loɔ mawu tɔn mɛ wɛ ɖe
bɔ le tɛ
etɛ nyi tinmɛ jehovah nɔ tɔn mi ɖo ali tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ tɔn
fɔtoo ɖo lɛ e
etɛ nyi tinmɛ enɛ tɔn
mawu tɔn sin nuwiwa ɖe ɖe jɛn wɛ hwebinu sɔgbe xa mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖokpo ɖokpo
nugbo ɔ ali tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ wɛ jehovah nɔ tɔn mi ɖe
jaan wlan ɖɔ nyɔna tɔn mɛ wɛ mi bi mɔ dɔkun nyi mitɔn ɔ yi ɖe mɔ yi do ji
jaan jehovah mi ɖo ali tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ e bɔ mi mɔ nyɔna gege
le tɛ jehovah tɔn mi
mi sixu ɖɔ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
enyi mi lɛkɔ sin hwɛ mitɔn lɛ gudo ɖo xwi ɖi xa jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn mitɔn lɛ wɛ ɔ jehovah hwɛ mitɔn lɛ kɛ mi ɖo tɔn wutu xa jaan
pɔlu wlan klisanwun yi do ɖe tɔn lɛ ɖɔ jehovah yi mi sin zinflu sin hlɔnhlɔn si mi ɖo vi tɔn ɔ sin axɔsuɖuto mɛ
hwɛ mitɔn lɛ e kɛ mi e hun nyɔna ɖaaɖagbe gege ɖevo lɛ sin ali nu mi
etɛ sin vivi mi nɔ ɖu ɖo mawu tɔn wu
mi ɖo fifa mɛ xa mawu
mawu tɔn lɛ wɛ mi nyi sin do ɖo ninɔmɛ hwɛhuhu tɔn mitɔn wu
pɔlu yi gbe nu xo enɛ ɖɔ mawu tɔn wɛ mi nyi loɔ mawu dohwɛ gbɔ xa mi gbɔn ku vi tɔn ku ɔ gblamɛ
mawu tɔn sin ɖe lɛ e jɔwu mi bɔ mi se wɛnɖagbe ɔ akpaxwe ɔ
mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ hɛn ɖevo lɛ wa hwɛjijɔ ji gbɔn
gbeyiɖɔ daniyɛli ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ lɛ e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ yi do ɖe kpo lɛ e nɔ hɛn mɛ gege wa nujlɔjlɔwiwa kɔn xa daniyɛli ɖo du monde nouveau mɛ
gbɔn kpo yetɔn kpo gblamɛ ɔ hɛn ɖevo lɛ livi mɔkpan wa ninɔmɛ nujlɔjlɔwiwa tɔn mɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ
jaan e ɖo co jehovah tɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi tɔn bɔ nu do nyi
pɔlu tinmɛ ɖɔ mawu ɔ ɖo alo tɔn mɛ ɔ e mɛ ɖi nu nu klisu jezu lɛ bi do huzu hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ gbɔn klisu jezu nɔ ɖe sin hwɛ mɛ ɔ ji hlɔ
nyɔna ɖɛxixo tɔn akpaxwe ɔ
ɖɛxixo ca kan xa mawu tɔn gbɔn
mi nɔ sɛkpɔ axɔsuzinkpo mawu tɔn gbɔn ɖɛxixo gblamɛ
gbɔn jehovah tɔn gblamɛ ɔ e hun ali nu mi bɔ mi nɔ sɛkpɔ axɔsuzinkpo tɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ gbɔn ɖɛxixo gblamɛ
pɔlu tlɛ ylɔ axɔsuzinkpo jehovah tɔn ɖɔ fi ɖe ɔ byɔ mi ɖɔ mi sɛkpɔ kpodo jiɖiɖe kpan
ebl jehovah jɔwu enɛ ɔ mi gbɔn vi tɔn gblamɛ bɔ bu mi ɖe xa klisu e kpo nuɖiɖi mi ɖo e kpo bɔ mi gla sɛkpɔ ɛ kpo jiɖiɖe ɖaxo ɖe kpo efɛ
nugbo ɔ jehovah tɔn sin ɖagbeɖagbe ɖokpo wɛ ɖɛxixo sɛkpɔ ɛ kpo jiɖiɖe kpo nyi
mi nɔ mɔ alɔdo ɖo hwetɔnnu akpaxwe ɔ
mawu tɔn sixu mi ɖo hwetɔnnu gbɔn
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ xoɖɛ sɛkpɔ jehovah faa bonu e hwɛ kɛ mi bɔ mi mɔ bonu e mi ɖo nu hudo mi lɛ mɛ ɖo hwetɔnnu
ebl hweɖebunu mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ alo tagba lɛ vunbla mi e ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi suxo ylɔ jehovah ɖɔ e ku nublanɔwu mitɔn mi
mi jɛxa a co hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ sɔ mitɔn gbɔn klisanwun lɛ gblamɛ bonu mi do sixu ɖɔ kpodo jiɖiɖe kpo ɖɔ aklunɔ wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ mi e
ɖi xɛsi nu nuɖe a
ðagbe tɛ jehovah tɔn nɔ wa nu ayi mitɔn
nyɔna ɖaxo mi nɔ mɔ gbɔn jehovah tɔn gblamɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ xo mi hwenu ayi mitɔn gbado e
tuun mi tuun ɖɔ jehovah yi wan nu mi nɔ kpe nukun do mi wu ɖo tɔn tunfla e wutu e do gbɔ nu mi tawun
nukunɖiɖo tɛ sin ali mawu tɔn hun nu mi
mi ɖo nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn
ðo mi nyi wutu ɔ nukunɖiɖo ɖe ɖe nu mi a
xa ðɛhan jehovah mi nukunɖiɖo jiwu ɖe
jezu nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nu jlo ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ mɔ vi ɔ ɖi nu lɛ mɔ mavɔmavɔ
jaan nugbo ɔ nunina ɖe wɛ nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn ɔ nyi nyi mawu tɔn sin jiwu ɖe
nu enɛ su pɔlu nukunmɛ ɖɔ mawu ɖe tɔn ji hwlɛngan lɛ bi tɔn jinjɔn ɔ
klisanwun dohwenu tɔn ɖe lɛ mawu tɔn do gbɔn
jehovah tɔn hɛn nyɔna gege wa nu mi co mi ɖo gla gbeɖe ɖɔ e nɔ myɔ nukun do walɔ lɛ bi a
ee nyla hu e wɛ nyi ɖɔ tɛnkpɔn dɔn nɔvi lɛ nu xo kpoɖo nu ɖo ali gblegble lɛ e ji
jɛ egbe ɔ mɛɖebu nɔ blo e zun gbigbɔ ɔ ebl
egbe ɔ sataan flu klisanwun ɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖɔ mɛ ji ɖo mawu nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ wutu ɔ emi hɛn ɔ emi nɔ hu hwɛ bɔ ba ti kun xo emi o
jehovah ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwɛ kɛ lɛkɔ lɛ e co e ɖɔ mi nɔ xa jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn mitɔn lɛ
e mɛ nu wlan ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ midɛɛ lɛ ɔ e ɖɔ xo enɛ lɛ nu din
hun miɖee jo miɖee nu nuwanyido nyanya lɛ tɔn dɔn bu o gɔn aceji ɖe ɔ nɔ o
tɛ lɛ jehovah tɔn nɔ byɔ ɖo mi si
ðo ali tɛ lɛ
mɛ nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ e ɔ nwt nɔ blo kpodo xomɛhunhun kpo
tɛ nyi mitɔn bɔ mi gbeje ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
jla wɛnɖagbe ɖɔ xo do mawu tɔn wu e yi fo mɛ
etɛ jehovah tɔn ɖo mi bɔ mi wa
axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe mawu tɔn ji gbɔn
jehovah ɖe tɔn ɖo ɔ mɛ gbɔn
pɔlu ɖɔ mawu tɔn su nukun emitɔn mɛ gbɔn
pɔlu tuun ganji ɖɔ emi kun jɛxa cobonu mawu ku nublawu nu emi o ɖo emi doya nu klisanwun lɛ
tɛ nyi enɛ
taji tɛ e do alɔ mɛ nu pɔlu
ɖiɖe ɖo e
wɛnɖagbe tɛ pɔlu jla jehovah tɔn ji
e ɖɔ nu klisanwun efɛzi tɔn lɛ ɖɔ mawu mi ɖo alo tɔn mɛ ɖɔ wa nu ɔ ɖi ɖɔ se
efɛ e pɔlu ɖɔ e jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e bonu do sixu nu mɛ e ylɔ bɔ nɔ axɔsuɖuto mɛsiya ɔ tɔn sin acɛkpikpa mɛ kpo klisu kpo lɛ e xa efɛzinu lɛ
pɔlu ɖokan do tɔn wu gbɔn e nyi titewungbe ɖe nu klisanwun egbe tɔn lɛ ɖɔ mawu tɔn e kɔn do ji tɔn e kun nyi nu yaya o
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe kpo wɛnɖagbe ɖɔ xo do mawu tɔn wu e kpo nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ
ðo din mi sɛkpɔ gbɛvivɔ ɔ e ɔ e togun jehovah tɔn ɖɔ e jla axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bonu e nyi kunnuɖiɖe nu lɛ bi
ðokpo ɖokpo mitɔn nɔ xwedo pɔlu tɔn nɔ ɖɔ jehovah tɔn su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn alɔɖiɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo gblamɛ a xa hlɔmanu lɛ
ðo xota wa yi e mɛ ɔ mi mi nyi cobo ɖu jehovah tɔn sin le gbɔn e ɖo ali gege
enɛ wu wɛ mi ɖu axɔ do mɛ lɛ bi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ jehovah ɖo wanyiyi tɔn gbɔn wɛ e kpo e sixu hɛn le wa nu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo gbɔn e kpo wu
mawu tɔn tɛ lɛ mi ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun yetɔn mɛ
hwenu mi ɖo gbɛxixɔ ɔ tinmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e ɔ mi nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe mawu tɔn tɔn gbɔn
ðo elɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ nu nu bi ɖe e mɛ ɔ hwɛhuhu nɔ nyi winnyanu ɖe a bɔ mɛ gege tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo hwlɛngan tɔn a
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mɛ gege nɔ ɖo mimɔ wɛ ɖɔ sin zinzan kun nɔ hɛn awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ wa nu mɛ o
jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ mɛ gege ɖɔ xo xa cobo wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu hwɛhuhu nyi e e nɔ wa nu do mi wu gbɔn e kpo nu mi ɖo wa bɔ e ɖe mi sin kannumɔgbenu hwɛhuhu tɔn e kpo wu
ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ sin nɔ jɛ do hwenu se ɖɔ wanyiyi kpo jehovah tɔn kpo ɛ vi tɔn do ayikungban ji bonu e wa xɔ nu mi ɖo hwɛhuhu kpo ku e nɔ ji e kpo si e jaan
vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn klisu tɔn wɛ ɖe wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu mi e hugan ɖe dɔkun ɖo tɔn mɛ e
wɛnɖagbe ɖe wɛ bɔ e ɖo ma xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ dandan
etɛwu lɛ ɖo dohwɛ gbɔ xa mawu
mitɔn wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi blo bonu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ emi hɛn ɔ emi zun xa emitɔn
cobonu lɛ wa ɖi nu nu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu tɔn ɔ wɛ mawu nɔ do mɔ
jaan wlan ɖɔ mɛ ɖi nu nu vi ɔ mɔ mavɔmavɔ mɛ setonu nu vi ɔ a ɔ e mɔ mavɔmavɔ a loɔ xomɛsin mawu tɔn ɖo ji tɔn
jaan awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ vɔsisa klisu tɔn bɔ e hɛn ɔ e dohwɛ gbɔ xa mawu
tɛ klisu ɖe nu nɔvi tɔn yi do ɖe lɛ
ɖevo lɛ ɖo alɔ do nɔvi yetɔn yi do ɖe lɛ wɛ gbɔn
klisu nu pɔlu ylɔ ɖɔ hwɛdogbɔ sin e nɔvi tɔn yi do ɖe ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e
hwenu pɔlu ɖo enɛ tinmɛ wɛ e ɔ e wlan klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖɔ mawu dohwɛ gbɔ xa mi gbɔn klisu ji ɔ sin wɛ nyi nu enɛ lɛ bi e wɛ ze do asi nu mi bɔ mi dɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa bɔ e dohwɛ gbɔ xa
ðo mawu ɖo wa wɛ gbɔn klisu ji dohwɛ gbɔ xa lɛ bi e do nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ wu a
hwɛdogbɔ sin enɛ wa wɛ e ɖe ɔ e do asi nu mi ɖɔ mi jla
ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ wu wɛ e jɔ emi bonu emi nɔvi yi do ɖe emitɔn lɛ ɖo enɛ mɛ
jaan ði klisu tɔn lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ wɛ ɖo nugbo biblu tɔn kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ kpo alɔdido bonu ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe xa jehovah kpo tɔn sin akpaxwe ɖaxo hugan ɔ wa wɛ
wɛnɖagbe ɖɔ xo do mawu tɔn wu e jijla sin akpaxwe taji ɖokpo wɛ nyi enɛ
etɛwu e nyi wɛnɖagbe ɖe nu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ se ɖɔ emi hɛn ɔ emi xoɖɛ jehovah
mɛ gege nɔ xoɖɛ ɖo e nɔ wa ɖagbe nu wutu nɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu nɔ se ɖɛ emitɔn lɛ a
ɖo tuun ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nɔ se ɖɛ
ðɛhan davidi wlan ɖɔ hwi wɛ nɔ se ɖɛ enɛ wu ɔ lɛ bi wa towe
hwɛ hu lɛ hugan mi
hwɛ ɔ sunsun hwɛ sin kɔ nu mi ðɛh
jaan e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu ɖebu ɔ sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi nu ɖebu sɔgbe xa jlo jehovah tɔn e
jaan mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ mi ɖo ganjɛwu kpikpe ɖo mawu nukɔn ɖɔ mi byɔ nu ɖebu nu e sɔgbe xa jlo tɔn ɔ e nɔ ɖoto mi
enyi mi nɔ mɛ lɛ ɖɔ nɔ xoɖɛ e jɛxa gbɔn e mɛ jɛxa e do nu sɔgbe lɛ e ji ɔ mi nɔ bɔ nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah nɔ mɔ alɔdo ɖo adangbomɛ lɛ hwenu ðɛh
wujɔmɛ jiwu tɛ ɖo mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ ɖo sɔgudo
jiwu tɛ mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ wa nu lɛ
jehovah tɔn nɔte ɖo vivɔnu nyanya elɔ tɔn a
pɔlu ɖɔ xo do wu mawu jɔ mɛ e ylɔ bɔ xa klisu ɖo axɔsuɖuto jixwe tɔn mɛ e wu wlan ɖɔ mawu tɔn bɔ e ɖo wanyiyi nu mi e bɔ hwenu mi kpo ɖo mɛkuku ɖɔhun ci wɛ ɖo nukɔn tɔn ɖo hwɛ mitɔn lɛ wu ɔ e blo bɔ mi lɛ wa kpodo klisu kpo mawu tɔn mɛ wɛ mɔ hwlɛngan ɖe
ðo bu mi ɖe xa klisu jezu ɔ mɛ ɔ mawu mi kpo e kpo wa bonu mi ɖu axɔsu xa ɛ ɖo mi ɖo mimɔ wɛ a e mɛ
jaan jehovah ɖe dɔkun maɖokpodo ɖo tɔn mɛ ɔ yedɛɛ lɛ hugan
gbɔ azɔn nu to lɛ xa klisu ali lɛ yi nu ɖe agban hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo tɔn sin kɔ nu e kɔn blo bɔ huzu mɛ xa
jehovah ɖe tɔn ɖevo lɛ gbɔn ɖo sɔgudo
ðo efɛzinu lɛ mɛ ɔ mi xa ɖɔ mawu ɖe tɔn ɖo ayi wa ɖo sɔgudo lɛ ɔ mɛ
jaan e sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo hwexonu tɔn ɖeɖee ku jɛ nukɔn nu vɔsisa klisu tɔn e nu ɖevo ku ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ e wa bonu kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ
e livi mɔkpan ɖeɖee tuun mawu a ku lɛ e sin ku
e hun ali nu bonu yeɖee do jehovah nyi e glɔ
jaan wlan ɖɔ mɔ mɛkuku lɛ mɛxo kpo yɔkpɔvu kpo ɖo ɖo axɔsuzinkpo ɔ nukɔn bɔ e hun wema mlamla lɛ
e hun wema mlamla ɖevo wema mlamla tɔn ɔ wɛ
e ɖɔhwɛ xa mɛkuku lɛ sɔgbe xa nu e wlan do wema mlamla lɛ mɛ lɛ e sɔgbe xa walɔ yetɔn lɛ
nwt e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e byɔ ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ e e si ɖɔ zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ gbɔn e
nu ɖo wema enɛ lɛ mɛ bɔ e lɛ e nyi jehovah tɔn sin ɖevo
etɛ mi ɖo hɛn mɛ hwenu mi ɖo mitɔn wa wɛ e
ee vivɔnu ɔ ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ mitɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn bɔ e ɖo taji din hu hwenu ɖebu
mi ɖo hɛn enɛ do ayi mɛ hwenu mi ɖo mitɔn wa wɛ e
nɔ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo ɖagbe mawu e tɔn ɖɔhun
akpaxwe
mi nɔ jehovah tɔn su gbɔn
hwenu mi ɖo kunnu ɖe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e ɔ mi sixu tinmɛ ɖɔ ɖo acɛkpikpa klisu tɔn glɔ ɔ lɛ ɖu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn ɔ sin le bi bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ huzu mɛ lɛ
jiwu jehovah tɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi tɔn bɔ nu nyi
e jɔwu mi bɔ mi ma akpa jiwu ɖo mɛ e xa mɛ ɖoto lɛ e bi e ɖɔ mawu sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku tiin a aluwɛ tiin a alenina tiin a mimɔ tiin a nu xoxo lɛ bu
e ɖɔ wlan ɖo xo nugbo wɛ nyi xo enɛ lɛ nyi xo wu e ɖeji do lɛ
enyi mi ɖokan do wɛnɖagbe enɛ jijla mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ jehovah tɔn su nugbo nugbo
nya ɖe wa ɖo xuto terrenas tɔn bɔ gbexosin titewungbe ɖe zan biblu do ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla ɛ wɛ
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo nu sin hudo mi ɖo e kpo nu jlo mi e kpo tɛntin
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖu ɖo agbaza sin nu gege jlojlo ji
etɛwu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah kpewu nu sin hudo ɖo ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe lɛ e
e nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu kpɛɖe sin hudo wɛ nɔ ɖo nu nɔ jlo e ɖo dogbo a
e ci ɖɔ mɛ gege kun tuun vogbingbɔn ɖo hudo agbaza tɔn lɛ kpo jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ kpo tɛntin e o ɖɔhun
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo mɛ
hudo ɔ nu ɖo ɖo e wɛ ɖo e kan towe
nuɖuɖu nuzinzan kpo xɔ kpo nyi dandannu sɔgbe lɛ e
jlo ɔ nu ɖo e wɛ ɖo dandan cobɔ nɔ a
ðɔ nu nɔ jlo lɛ e ɖe lɛ
nu nɔ jlo lɛ e sixu gbɔn vo tawun do yeɖee lɛ tɔn ɖo fi nɔ nɔ e wu
ðo to ɖo yeɖee nyi wɛ lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛ gege sixu jlo kpowun mɔ akwɛ xɔ alokan zokɛkɛ alo ayikungban klewun ɖe
ðo to nyi yeɖee lɛ e mɛ ɔ nu nɔ mya nukun e sixu nyi avɔgba kpinkpɛn ɖe xwe ɖaxo ɖe alo ɖe
awovinu ɖe ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ bi mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e sixu jɛ tɔn mɛ nɔ ɖo nu gege wɛ kpowun enyi mi ɖo hudo yetɔn kpo mi gbɔ kpo alo mi ɖo akwɛ yetɔn kpo mi gbɔ kpo ɔ nɛ
etɛ nɔ nyi
agbaza sin nu lɛ gbe nyinya jo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ do wɛ
nɔ jinjɔn nujlomɛ lɛ nu nɔ mya nukun nu mɛ lɛ e kpo nu ji ayi mɛtɔn nɔ ɖe ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo ji
e nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo nuɖokan gege
mɛ nyi e ɖe sixu nɔ ɖo akwɛ alo wa akwɛnu
sataan nɔ zan jlo nukun tɔn lɛ gbɔn
sataan nɔ zan tito tɔn ɔ tɔn do dɔn mi bɔ mi ɖi ɖɔ agbaza sin nu gege ɖiɖo zɛ ee sin hudo mi ɖo doo e wu ɖo dandan cobɔ mi ɖu vivi
mɛ dindɔn do jlo nukun tɔn lɛ mɛ bi alɔ tawun
e jɛ bɔ xɔ nuɖe ɖo ɖo hudo tɔn wutu a loɔ ɖo nukun towe mɔ ɖo ɖe mɛ alo ɖo agban ɖe ji wutu a
wa mɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ hɛn ɔ kpo ɖo nu enɛ mɛvo wɛ a
nu mɔhun ɖo dandan a lɛ e nɔ wlu gbɛzan mitɔn nɔ hwin mi ɖo do kpowun wɛ
sixu nyi nu mi ɖe ayi mitɔn sin aca mi ɖo ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nɔ biblu sɔnu nu kple lɛ yi nɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ hwɛhwɛ e ji
flin ɖɔ jaan nu mi ɖɔ elɔ ɔ wiwayi wɛ e ɖe bɔ mɛ nɔ blo jlo elɔ tɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo wiwayi wɛ
etɛ baluki tɔn mi
tamɛ do jelemii tɔn baluki ji
hwenu kun susu do nu jeluzalɛmu sin ɔ ɖo jɛ wɛ e ɔ baluki jɛ do ji alo ɖo nu ɖaxo lɛ wɛ nwt nu enɛ lɛ nɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mawu kun cyɔn alɔ nuɖokan mɛɖebu tɔn ji ɖo toxo enɛ su kun do wɛ e ɖe e mɛ o
jel ðo mi sɛkpɔ vivɔnu elɔ tɔn wutu ɔ din wɛ mi ɖo agbaza sin nu xokple wɛ kpowun a
jezu ɖe we ɖagbe bi ɔ xa mi do mi sixu kpe nukun do dandannu gbɛmɛ tɔn mitɔn lɛ wu bɔ ayi mitɔn wa bɔ mi jɛ do ji alo ɖo adohu adohu ɖo dandan a lɛ e nu miɖee a gbɔn e wu
xoɖiɖɔ e xwle mɛ ɖo so ji e mɛ wɛ weɖexamɛ enɛ ɖe
nu mi xa akpaxwe ɖo matie mɛ e gbeje
biblo bɔ mi kudeji ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ wɛ ɖo mya nukun nu mi enyi nu lɛ a luk
etɛwu ɖo hu mi din do nu sin hudo mi ɖo lɛ e wu a
etɛ jezu tuun do lɛ kpo hudo yetɔn lɛ kpo wu
xa matie
jezu ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖɔ hu do nu ɖu e wu o
nɔ hu do nu ɖo hu nu a e wu
jezu ɖɔ ɖo wiwa bɔ hwɛ tɔn jɔ
adohuhu do nu tlɛ sɔgbe e ji sixu gba ayi do nu mɛ bɔ ayi mɛtɔn sixu sin nu taji gbɛmɛ tɔn gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ nyi e ji
etɛwu jezu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ hu mi do nu mi ɖu e nu mi e alo nu mi do e wu o
dandannu gbɛmɛ tɔn ɖe lɛ wɛ nu mɔhun lɛ nyi a ce
e wɛ nyi nugbo
enyi ɖewagbɛn mɔ nu enɛ lɛ glo ɔ hu mi a ce
ganji bɔ jezu tuun
e mɔ nu jɛ hudo lɛ tɔn gbe ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn wu ganji
nu lɛ tɔn nuɖuɖuhwedomɛ kpo kloklo mɛ mɛɖe lɛ ɖe e kpo ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
e ɖo co jezu wu ɖɔ xɔ akwɛ hu nuɖuɖu bɔ agbaza xɔ akwɛ hu nuzinzan
hwenu jezu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖo xoɖɛ gbɔn e e ɔ etɛ ɖo ɖo taji hugan ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ bɔ e ɖɔ
alo e wa ɖɔ gbɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ e ɔ nɔ nuɖuɖu mi ɖu e mi ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
luk ɖiɖɔ wɛ weɖexamɛ enɛ ɔ ɖe ɖɔ nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo hun mɛ nu mi a
do blo bonu ayi lɛ tɔn ɔ jezu wa jehovah nyi kpe we a gbɔn e ji
etɛ jehovah nɔ kpe nukun do xɛ lɛ wu gbɔn e mi
mi ɖo xɛ lɛ ganji
kanlin enɛ lɛ hwe co nɔ ɖu atin atinkwin nuvinuvi we alo wanvu gege
kpo zin nɔ ɖo e kpo ɔ ɖu nu hu lɛ
e ɖo co nɔ gle a nɔ do nukun a
jehovah nɔ nu sin hudo ɖo e bi ðɛh
enyi e nɔ kɛ yetɔn nɔ nuɖuɖu ɔ wɛ a
ɖo yi nuɖuɖu ɔ loɔ nɔ mɔ gege
e nuɖuɖu ɔ do mitɔn lɛ mɛ a e hɛn ɔ e kɔn nyɔna do gan mi nɔ do ba mɔ nuɖuɖu sin hudo mi ɖo e alo ba mɔ akwɛ do xɔ nu mi ɖu ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe lɛ e ji
enyi e glo mi jɛn wɛ ɔ e sixu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ ma nu ɖo e xa mi
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah nɔ gba xɔ nu xɛ lɛ a co jehovah nuwukpikpe kpo azɔwanu sin hudo ɖo lɛ e kpo bɔ yeɖesunɔ nɔ blo yetɔn lɛ
jehovah sixu mi lɔ gbɔn bɔ mi mɔ xɔ sɔgbe xa xwedo mitɔn lɛ e
etɛ ɖɔ mi xɔ akwɛ hu xɛ lɛ
jezu kanbyɔ lɛ ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ ɔ xɔ akwɛ hu xɛ enɛ lɛ a ce
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu flin ɖɔ malin malin mɛ ɔ emi emitɔn jo do lɛ tamɛ
do luk wu
e sɔnu nu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn klisu tɔn do nuɖiɖo ɖevo lɛ ɖebu tamɛ a
jezu ku do xɛ lɛ tamɛ a loɔ midɛɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ wɛ e ku do bonu mi do sixu ɖu vivi mavɔmavɔ tɔn
etɛ mɛ nɔ ɖo nu wɛ e ɖe sixu wa gbeɖe a
aniwu jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖo nu wɛ e kun sixu do azan tiwuntiwun ɖe gbɛzan eɖesu tɔn ji o
ðo adohu adohu ɖo dandan e ji ninɔ do hudo mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn lɛ ji mi bonu mi a
e wa ɔ adohu adohu ɖaxo ji ninɔ sixu yawu ɖo nu mitɔn
etɛ jehovah nɔ kpe nukun do folowa gbehan mɛ tɔn lɛ wu gbɔn e mi
fɔtoo ɖo e nu tɛ lɛ mi ɖo kanbyɔ miɖee etɛwu
nɔ sɔnu ganji ɖo taji ɔ hwenu e ɖo klisanwun sin lɛ wa wɛ e ɖi alɔɖiɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ alo kple lɛ kpo lɛ kpo yiyi a
jezu dɔn ayi mitɔn wa jehovah tɔn ɖevo ji
ðo ninɔmɛ elɔ mɛ ɔ folowa lɛ nɔ ci ɖo gbehan lɛ mɛ e sixu nu gege mi
e byɔ ɖɔ nuɖiɖo enɛ lɛ avɔ alo lɔn avɔ yeɖesunɔ a
e ɖo co nɔ
axɔsu ɖesu ɔ e ɖo dɔkun sɔ ɔ nɛ co e ɖo avɔ sɔ ɖokpo yetɔn nɛ
nu nu ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe e yi tɛ o enyi mawu nu gbehan ɔ wɛ e nu do lɛ a gbɔn nuɖiɖi kpɛvinɔ emi
e mi jɛn wɛ
nuɖiɖi hwedo ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ kpɛɖe
ɖo hudo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo tɔn ɖo ɖeji do jehovah wu
mi ɖi nu syɛnsyɛn ɖɔ jehovah ɖo jlo kpewu mi nu sin hudo mi ɖo e a
etɛ sixu hɛn kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble
mi ɖo nɔ wa nu mɛ ɖi nu nu mawu ɖɔ e nyi wanyiyinɔ ɖe nɔ kpe nukun do mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ lɛ e wu a lɛ e ɖɔhun a
tintɛnkpɔn ɖo nu ɖeɖee mɛ ɖi nu nu mawu a lɛ nɔ ɖo wezun do wɛ ba ɖo lɛ e hɛn kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble
e wa ɔ mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ enyi mi wa nu mi ɖo wa e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi mi gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ ɔ jehovah tɛ nu e mi a
mawu sinsɛn mitɔn ɖo mi bɔ enyi mi mɔ nu ɖu mɔ avɔ do ɔ e kpe mi tim
etɛ jehovah tuun do mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wu
etɛ e wa nu mi
axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖo mya nukun nu ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ jɛ nukɔn ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ
enyi mi blo ɔ mawu nu enɛ lɛ bi mi jezu ɖɔ gbɔn e
etɛwu e ɖɔ
e tinmɛ ɖo wemafɔ jɛ nukɔn nu enɛ e mɛ ɖɔ mitɔn ɖo jixwe ɔ tuun ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ hudo nu lɛ wɛ nyi dandannu gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ
e bɔwu nu jehovah bɔ e hɛn ɔ e sɔnu nu nuɖuɖu nuzinzan kpo xɔ kpo sin hudo mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo e cobɔ miɖesunɔ wa wu fili
e tuun nuzinzan mitɔn ca alo vun malin malin mɛ bɔ dido tɔn glo mi e
e tuun nuɖuɖu alɔkpa sin hudo mi ɖo e kpo xɔ sɔgbe xa mi kpe xwedo mitɔn e kpo
jehovah blo bɔ nu sin hudo mi ɖo doo e han mi a
etɛwu ɖo nɔ hu mi do nu sixu jɛ sɔgudo e wu a
wu ɖɔ jezu ɖɔ sɔ ja ɔ o
e ɖɔ mi nɔ xo hudo keze ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn sin kan ɖeji bi ɖɔ jehovah mi
sixu hɛn gbɛzan towe bɔkun ayi ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ ji hugan a
etɛ sin gbe sixu nya ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ
etɛ sixu wa hɛn gbɛzan towe bɔkun
tagba jɛ do wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ nyinya do mɔ tɛn do ɖo nu kan
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe
ði ɔ sixu tɛn yi agun mɛ e ɖo hudo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖe hugan e ɖe mɛ a
kpewu ba nyi gbexosin a
enyi nyi gbexosin wɛ ɔ sixu nyikɔ ba yi wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ a
sixu nɔ gosin xwe hwiɖesunɔ tɔn gbe nɔ wa wa ɖo betɛli alo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn ɖe nu hwenu klewun ɖe a
sixu ze hwiɖee jo ɖo nɔ blo tuto xɔgbigba tɔn ðo alaxɔ mɛ e nɔ nu hwenu klewun ɖe ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbigba hwenu a
tamɛ do nu sixu wa bɔ gbɛzan towe bɔkun bonu do sixu ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ lɛ e ji
xoɖɛ gbeje gbavi sixu hɛn gbɛzan towe bɔkun gbɔn e jɛ afɔ ɖo ɖe lɛ e ɖe ji ba kpe nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe e wu
etɛ bɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah
hwɛ jezu tɔn jɔ bɔ e mi ɖɔ mi nɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ nɔ nyi nu lɛ o
mɛ ɔ nɔ hu mi do hudo agbaza tɔn mitɔn lɛ wu gbeɖe a
mi nɔ ɖeji do jehovah wu nɔ blo nu nɔ jlo mi e bi alo xɔ nu ɖebu ɔ nɔ xwle mɛ lɛ e enyi mi tlɛ ɖo akwɛ tɔn ɔ a nɔ bɔ mi nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah
gbɛzan mitɔn hinhɛn bɔkun din mi bɔ mi mɔ jɔ ɔ yi ɖo malin malin mɛ tim
akpaxwe ɔ do mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu jehovah sixu hweɖelɛnu bɔ klisanwun ɖe nuɖuɖu kpe e kpo e ɔ nu lɛ kanbyɔ lɛ e ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe zosun tɔn mɛ wex
sɔnu nu tuto akwɛzinzan tɔn sɔgbe e ɖe
ðeɖɛ nu ɖeɖee nɔ zan a lɛ e
ðeɖɛ axɔ ɖo kɔ towe lɛ e bi
ðe kan kpo nu nɔ wa e
to gblo ada nu towe gbɔn e
gbavi monter ɖo reveillez vous
juillet tɔn mɛ wex
tuun azan gbe aklunɔ mitɔn lɛkɔ wa do e a
do nu awovi nɔ mɛ do ɖɔ lɛ e wu
do nu gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn nɔ mɛ do ɖɔ lɛ e wu
ɛnɛ atɔn we ɖokpo
hwenu mi mɔ bɔ cɛju kpo bɔ ɖaxo sin akpaxwe ɖe e ɖo do yi wɛ ɖo ɔ ji e ɔ mi nɔ tuun ɖɔ hwe ɔ su bɔ mi jinjɔn ayi ɖu vivi nuxixo hun nu sin akpaxwe ɔ e tɔn
ɔ xo bɔ mi ci xwii ɖoto tɔn sin nuxixo ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ bɔ ee ɖo taji hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi sɔnu nu ayi mitɔn kpodo linlin mitɔn lɛ kpo nu xoɖiɖɔ bɔ lɛ e
enyi mɛɖe lɛ sin ayi ɖo fi ɖokpo a bɔ deyideyi ɔ jɛn wɛ alo ɖɔ ɖo xo ɖɔ xa yetɔn lɛ wɛ tlɛ tuun ɖɔ tuto ɔ tɔn a ɔ lo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kun ɖo aceji do ɖo xixo wɛ e alo nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo kpa lɛ e wu o nu lɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ zinkponɔ ɔ jinjɔn ayi ɖo ataa ɔ ji nuxixo ɔ bɔ lɛ jinjɔn ayi
nu enɛ nɔ jɛ e sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu ɖaxo ɖe sin ɖo xixo wɛ gbɔn e mɛ nu enɛ byɔ ɖo mi si ɖɔ mi ɖo ayi nu ɖo jɛ wɛ ɖo malin malin mɛ e wu ceɖeceɖe
etɛ nyi nu ɔ
etɛwu jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ aceji
hwenu jezu klisu ɖo xo ɖɔ do hwenu elɔ vɔ do e wu wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ miɖee ɖo aceji ɖo tuun hwe ɔ a
enɛ gudo ɔ jezu nɔ nu azɔn gege ɖɔ nɔ aceji
hun nɔ aceji ɖo nyɛ ɔ wa hwenu ɖo nukun mi do a e
etɛwu mi nɔ akpagbanumɛ jezu tɔn do ayihun a
ðo mi nyi jehovah tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ akpagbanumɛ jezu tɔn enɛ do ayihun a
nwt mi mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo ahwan baɖabaɖa lɛ wɛ nublibliwiwa kpo adanuwiwa kpo ɖo jijɛji wɛ nu lɛ bi wlu ɖo sinsɛn linu nuɖuɖuhwedomɛ jɛmɛji lɛ kpo ayikungban danwu kpo nɔ tiin gbɔn ɔ mɛ
mi tuun ɖɔ togun jehovah tɔn ɖo wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla sin kpligidi ɖe wa wɛ gbɔn fi bi
luk akpakpa ɖo mi wɛ bonu mi mɔ nu aklunɔ sin wiwa ɔ hɛn wa nu mi lɛ e kpo linlin jehovah tɔn jɛnu gbɔn e kpo mak
etɛwu mi sixu ɖi nu ɖɔ jezu tuun hwenu haamagedɔni wa do e din
mi tuun hwenu ɖaxo ɔ do e a co ganjɛwu tɛ mi ɖo
mi tuun ɖɔ ɖaxo sin akpaxwe ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo mɛ e nɔ do e
e ɖo co enyi mi tlɛ tɛnkpɔn gbɔn ɖebu ɔ mi sixu tuun xwe xwe ɖaxo ɔ e wa ɖɔ azan ɔ kpo ɔ mɛ kpo a
enɛ wu ɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ jezu tuun hwenu haamagedɔni wa do e din
midɛɛ lɛ tuun a
e ɖo dandan ɖɔ mi nɔ aceji jɛ hwenu ɖaxo ɔ e
e tuun hwenu ɔ vɔ do e
e ɖo hwenu kpo bɔ ɖaxo ɔ e sin ganmɛ xa wɛ bɔ e jɛ jɛn wɛ
xa xabakuku
etɛwu mi ganjɛ enɛ wu
na ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ bi wɛ nɔ jɛnu do hwetɔnnu e ɖokpo
jehovah tɔn lɛ bi wɛ nɔ jɛnu do hwetɔnnu
e nɔ ganmɛ ji gbɔn hwenu e hwlɛn izlayɛli vi lɛ sin ejipu e
xwe afɔwe gban enɛ lɛ hwenu akɔ jehovah jɛ xa ablaxamu e jɛ wa ji ɖo e
nugbo ɔ xwe afɔwe jɛ nukɔn wɛ jehovah ɖɔ azan ji e hwlɛn togun tɔn e
etɛwu mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah hwlɛn togun tɔn
jozuwee ɖo mɛ e hwlɛn sin ejipu lɛ e mɛ e flin izlayɛli vi lɛ bi ɖɔ tuun kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo kpodo mitɔn bi kpo ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu mitɔn kun gɔn akpa e do nu lɛ ɖebu ɖe o bi wɛ e ɖe yi fo
mi hɛn ɔ mi kudeji ɖɔ akpa jehovah do ɖɔ emi hwlɛn mi lɔ ɖo ɖaxo ɔ hwenu e kun gbla o
e ɖo co enyi mi jlo gan ɖo elɔ sin vivɔ hwenu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ aceji
tɛ ɖe nɔ wa ɖo hwexonu
etɛ enɛ mi
nu jɛ hwexonu lɛ e sixu nuɖe mi do nu wu acejininɔ ɖo taji e wu
ðo hwexonu ɔ toxo ɖaxo gege wɛ ahoho lɛ nɔ do ɖi jeluzalɛmu
ahoho lɛ nɔ cyɔn alɔ toxo ɔ ji ɖo lɛ si nɔ yi ji tawun ɖo fi ɖe lɛ bɔ e nɔ ci nɔ mɔ nu jɛ zɔ
zan keze ɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo ahoho lɛ kpo hɔntogbo lɛ kpo
ku kpo kpo sin xo wɛ nyi wunzɛn lɛ nɔ ɖo tɛn yetɔn lɛ mɛ e kpo aceji nɔ e kpo ezek
hwenuxo jwifu josephe wlan ɖɔ ɖo xwe ɔ ahwangɔnu hlɔma tɔn lɛ kpewu yi atɔxwɛ antonia tɔn ɖo ahoho jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ kpa e ɖo ɖo hɔntogbo ɔ lɛ e wutu
hlɔmanu lɛ hwlɛn do sin finɛ yi do tɛmpli ɔ bɔ enɛ hɛn adangbomɛ ɖaxo hugan jeluzalɛmu kpo akɔta jwifu lɛ tɔn kpo mɔ e wa nu
etɛ mɛ mɛ gege mɔ nukun jɛ ɖo egbe a
to gege wɛ ɖo lɛ ɖo egbe nɔ nyi sɔja nɔ ɖo dogbo lɛ wɛ lɛ e kpo tuto ji tɔn e nɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo
nɔ ɖo nu sixu byɔ to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo sixu nyi awovinu nu to ɔ ɖo ayijayi linu lɛ e kpo wɛ
e ɖo co awovinu gosin acɛkpikpa lɛ tɔn alo lɛ ɖesu e kɛɖɛ jɛn mɔhun lɛ sixu mɔ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ enyi mi nɔ wunzɛn nɔ aceji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo hweɖebunu hwɛɖɔzan enɛ wa e ðɛh
etɛ wu mi ɖo miɖee do aniwu
etɛ ɖɔ awovi flu mɛ lɛ bɔ nɔ nu biblu tɔn lɛ
tamɛ do nɔ wunzɛn zanmɛ bɔ ayi ɖibla hɔn e ɖe wu
nu wa cikɔ tawun bɔ nukun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ emi byɔ akpa mɛ jɛn wɛ
ɖokpo ɔ enyi mi ɖo sisɛkpɔ vivɔnu elɔ tɔn wɛ ɔ e ɖo nu mi wɛ ɖɔ mi nɔ wunzɛn
enyi mi nɔ aceji a ɔ e nyla e
nu mi gbeje nu sixu ɖe acejininɔ mitɔn kpo wunzɛnninɔ mitɔn kpo kpo e atɔn
awovi ɖo amlɔ ɖo nu mɛ lɛ wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ku jezu tɔn kpo zaan e ɔ e nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ azɔn atɔn do axɔsu elɔ tɔn wu
sataan nɔ zan kplekple sinsɛn nuvu ɔ tɔn lɛ tɔn do nukun nu ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn
etɛ wu nɔ hwenu ɖo xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e
azɔn nabi se bɔ mɛ lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun se wɛn ɔ o
enyi mi tɛnkpɔn ɖɔ fi elɔ xwe e nu ɔ mɛ gege nɔ keya a
etɛwu mi ɖo lɔn bonu awovi flu mi a
lɔn bonu yamakenunu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn tuntun awakanmɛ nu alo bɔ gɔn aceji nɔ o
tuun nu gege
pɔlu wlan tɔn lɛ ɖɔ miɖesunɔ ɔ tuun ganji ɖɔ aklunɔzan ɔ wa ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ fyan mɛ zanmɛ e ɖɔhun xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
jezu nu mi ɖɔ nɔ aceji ɖo mɛ ɖo ayi tɔn do a ɔ wɛ nyɛ ɔ wa luk
ðo malin malin mɛ ɔ sataan flu mɛ lɛ bɔ yi gbe nu linlin agɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ fifa tiin bɔ ayi e
e flu bɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ bi wɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ
enyi mi nɔ wunzɛn bɔ ayi mitɔn ɖo ɔ hwɛɖɔzan enɛ ɔ fyan mi ɖɔhun a
nu wu mi ɖo nɔ xa xo mawu tɔn ɔ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe nɔ tamɛ do nu ɖɔ wɛ jehovah ɖe nu mi lɛ e ji e nɛ
gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn ɖo nu wa do lɛ wu wɛ gbɔn
mi sixu nɔ zɔ nu gbigbɔ nyanya enɛ gbɔn
gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn ɖo mɛ lɛ xwe do amlɔ mɛ wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
nu mɛ gege nɔ wa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e hɛn hun nu bɔ tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ tɔn a
nu wu pɔlu ɖɔ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ blo tuto nu jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ ɖe o e nɛ hlɔ nwt
akpagbanumɛ tɛ mi mɔ ɖo luki mɛ
kɔ e ɖo co mi mɔ ɖɔ nu kpɛɖe jɛn nɔ bɔ mɛɖe nɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɛmɛ sin nu kpaa lɛ wa enyi mi lɔn bɔ yi tɛnmɛ ɖo mitɔn lɛ si ɔ nɛ
xa luki
e wa ɔ mi ɖo nɔ nɔ xa klisanwun mitɔn lɛ hwɛhwɛ ɖo kple agun tɔn mitɔn lɛ ji fi gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ɖe e
ɖo nu wu kpe e bi wa wɛ do sixu nɔ wunzɛn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
etɛ gbo jaki kpo jaan kpo nu enɛ sixu xa mi lɔ gbɔn
hwɛhuhu gbaza mitɔn sixu nu ku mi kudeji nɔ wunzɛn e
jezu tuun ɖɔ lɛ nɔ jɛ ganmaɖo agbaza tɔn yetɔn lɛ sin mɔ mɛ
nu jɛ ɖo zan jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn e mɛ e
do sixu kpo ɖo gbeji ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e hlɔnhlɔn ɖo tɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ
jezu byɔ jaki kpo jaan kpo ɖɔ nɔ wunzɛn hwenu emi ɖo ɖɛ xo wɛ e
mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ nu ja jijɛ gbe e kun nyi ayihundanu o a
nɔ wunzɛn gan yetɔn gbɔn e a jo yeɖee do nu nu byɔ wɛ agbaza yetɔn ɖe e amlɔ
nu cikɔ nu jezu co eyɛ nɔ wunzɛn ceɖeceɖe xoɖɛ tɔn
nu tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo biblo wɛ e nɛ mak
sɔgbe kpo luki kpo ɔ jezu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ wunzɛn gbɔn
e nɔ wunzɛn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nyi linlin ɖagbe lɛ ɖiɖo xo kpowun a
azan yɔywɛ ɖe jɛ nukɔn nu nu enɛ jɛ ɖo jikpa jɛtisemanii tɔn mɛ e ɔ jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu ɖokpo enɛ lɛ ɖɔ ɖo ɖɛ xo jehovah wɛ xa luki
enɛ wu ɔ do nɔ aceji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ mi lɔ ɖo nɔ wunzɛn gbɔn ɖɛxixo gblamɛ
mi sixu blo gbɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu nu ja ɖo malin malin mɛ e
ðo jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ vivɔnu ɔ wa ɖo hwenu mi ɖo nukun emi do a e wutu ɔ hwenu e sa amlɔgɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɖie a taan ɔ ɖie bonu mi nya nuvlɛnu nu gblo sataan kpo tɔn kpo nɔ xwle mɛ bɔ agbaza mitɔn nɔ jlo tawun lɛ e gbe a
mawu kpo klisu kpo ɖɔ nu ɖo nu mi ɖo malin malin mɛ lɛ e kpo mi sixu nɔ aceji gbɔn e kpo nu mi ɖo biblu mɛ
mi ɖo kpe nukun ganjininɔ mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e kpo nu ɖo taji nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ lɛ e kpo wu
mi ɖo mɔ nukunnu jɛ hwenu mi ɖe e kpo nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ lɛ e kpo wu do sixu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu nu ja e nuɖe
mitɔn wɛ ɖo atɛ ji
akpaxwe ɔ wemata wema le royaume dieu
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo yiyi wɛ ɖo ali ji ɖo zan xoxo mɛ
ajijimɛ kpowun ɔ wu ɖɔ mɛɖe ɖo xwixwedo wɛ
enyi nɔte ɔ afɔgbe se wɛ a ɖe ɖo gudo towe e nɔ nɔte
enyi ya afɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ wa
wezun byɔ towe lin do finɛ a e ɖe sin xwegbe
hwenu towe ɔ hun hɔn ɔ yi do xwe tɔn gbe e ɔ towe jɛ do
nu enɛ sixu nɔ jɛ do ji towe vlafo adohu adohu gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ sixu nɔ nyi nu
ði ɔ ɖo xa ganmaɖo ji ɖu ɖe e ɖe cobo nɔ nɔ ɖo afɔ ɖokpo ɔ wɛ tɛgbɛ wɛ wɛ a
gble do sin hwenu linlin lɛ ɖie bɔ tɛnkpɔn mɔ ɖokpo glo wɛ a
kpikpo kpo lanmɛ ɖo ganji sin tagba ɖo lɛ e kpo nɔ hu nu wɛ a
alo nu ɖevo sese wɛ ɖo nyi nu wɛ a
tagba ɖebu wɛ e nyi ɔ enyi mɛɖe sixu ɖɔ xa hwenu ɖo hudo tɔn do e ɔ e vivi nu a ce
ɖo mɔhun a
ganji
jehovah wɛ nyi mɔhun nu e nyi nu ablaxamu bɔ mi mɔ ɖo ezayii mɛ gbɔn e ɖɔhun
ðo wemafɔ kpo kpo mɛ ɔ jehovah ɖɔ nu tɔn ɖɔ ɖi xɛsi o ɖo ɖo xa
ɖo nukun do gbɛmɛ wɛ o ɖo nyi wɛ nyi mawu towe
akɔnkpinkpan alɔ nu ɖo xɛ nya ɖo ji wɛ kpodo aɖisi lɔ ɖuɖeji lɔ ɔ kpo
ðo nyɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ nyi wɛ nyi mawu towe
xogbe enɛ lɛ ganjɛwu a ce
hwiɖee do ninɔmɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ jehovah ɖe nu mi e mɛ
ðo fi ɔ zɔnlin zin wɛ ɖe alɔ ɖo alɔ mɛ xa jehovah a enyi linlin mɔhun tlɛ ɔ nɛ
enyi zɔnlin zin wɛ ɖe alɔ ɖo alɔ mɛ xa jehovah ɔ amyɔ lɔ towe wɛ ɖisi lɔ tɔn hɛn
jehovah dlɛn aɖisi lɔ tɔn ɖuɖeji lɔ ɔ hɛn alɔ towe ɖisi ɔ ci nu ɖɔ e jlo dɔn sin ninɔmɛ vɛwu gbɛmɛ tɔn ɖe mɛ wɛ ɖɔhun
ee e ɖo wa wɛ e ɔ e do xogbe elɔ lɛ do ganjɛwu ɖɔ ɖi xɛsi o alɔ nu
e nɔ keya nu ganjininɔ towe nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ bɔ e kudeji
hwenu ɖo lɛ mɛ e ɔ jehovah jlo ɖɔ ayi towe ɖo e yi wan nu ɖesu
ðo adangbomɛ hwenu ɔ e nɔ ɛ kpo gbeɖe ɖo gudo a ðɛh
enyi wɛ nu ci nu hwi lɔ hun tamɛ do nya jɔbu yi gbe nu hwɛ e hu sin vu e ji e
mi bi wɛ hu hwɛ bɔ mawu nɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖo ɖe a hlɔ
e ɖo co mawu nu do hwenu e hwlɛn mɛ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn lɛ gudo lɛkɔ wa tɔn lɛ e ji
tamɛ do takuya ee tɛnkpɔn ba ɖu ɖo fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ kpinkpɔn kpo do kpo ji e wu
azɔn mɔkpan wɛ e afɔ
nu ci
nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nuvɔnɔ ɖe kpowun wɛ nu mi enyi xoɖɛ byɔ hwɛsɔkɛ jehovah ɔ e nɔ mi sin
jehovah nɔ blo gbɔn
mɛxo agun mɛ takuya ɖe e tɔn lɛ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ hweɖebunu e afɔ ɔ e ɔ e nɔ ɖɔ nu emi
e yi gbe ɖɔ e nɔ bɔwu bonu ɖɔ nu a hweɖebunu wa e ɔ nɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn
e wa ya e ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ blo tuto bɔ lɛdo tɔn yi takuya
ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ yaya wɛ wa towe a
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ jlo ɖɔ nyi wa wutu wɛ
jlo ɖɔ hwi ɖu tɔn elɔ sin vivi
takuya flin ɖɔ nyi wɛ ɖo hwɛ hu wɛ co jehovah alɔ nu mi gbɔn mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ gblamɛ
takuya yi nukɔn huzu gbexosin hwebinu tɔn bɔ din ɔ e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo alaxɔ ɖe mɛ
e nyi gbɔn nu nɔvi enɛ e ɔ wɛ mawu hwi lɔ sin e nɛ
nɔ ɖo adohu adohu nu mɛ gege
gble do mɛɖe lɛ bɔ e vɛwu nu bonu mɔ ɖevo
enyi gan ɖe ɖɔ emi kun yi do mɛ o ɔ ɖe ɔ lɔ nɔ ɔ nu ci nu e
ðo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo emitɔn e
jehovah sixu gbɔn
e sixu nɔ mɔ jɛxa e nu tlolo e sixu bɔ flin nu axɔsu davidi ɖɔ e nɔ dɔnkpɛ mɛ cobo wa kpo din mɔ mawu jo hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ do a mɔ vi yetɔn lɛ ɖe byɔ nu ɖu a ðɛh
nugbo ɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ bɔ kpo aɖisi lɔ tɔn ɖuɖeji lɔ ɔ kpo ɔ e bɔ mɔ nu sin hudo ɖo kpo ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ e
enyi gble do ɔ jehovah sixu gbɔn
sara nɔ nɔ colombie e mɔ lɔ jehovah tɔn
e nɔ su akwɛ tawun ɖo e nɔ wa e mɛ ɔ nɔ ɛ taan ɖebu a
loɔ e jlo nu jehovah enɛ wu ɔ e jo enɛ do huzu gbexosin
e ɖo co e yawu mɔ hwenu klewun tɔn sin hudo e ɖo e a
e hun klɛmu creme glacee sa tɛn ɖe kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ akwɛ ɔ vɔ bɔ e gbɔ su hɔn
xwe atɔn kwiɖikwiɖi wa yi jehovah blo bɔ kpewu dɛ wɛ sara ɖɔ
gudo mɛ ɔ gan tɔn xoxo ɔ ylɔ ɛ xwle e e nɔ wa e
e yi gbe ɖɔ enyi e ɖe ɔ kpo emi hwenu bonu emi sixu wa emitɔn ɔ jɛn emi sixu wa ɔ
sara nɔ ɖu akwɛ e nɔ ɖu gbɔn e a e kpewu kpo ɖo gbexosin nyi wɛ
e wa ɖɔ ɖɔ mɔ wanyiyi lɔ jehovah tɔn
nu taji ɖevo nɔ hu nu mɛ e wɛ nyi kpikpo
mɛ gege nɔ byɔ gbɔjɛ yetɔn ɖaxo ɔ mɛ nɔ kanbyɔ yeɖee ɖɔ emi ɖo akwɛ bɔ emi vo zan kpɛ kpo nu emi e a ji
nɔ hu do lanmɛ nɔ ganji sin tagba nɔ wa ɖo kpikpo hwenu lɛ e wu
ɖo kpo ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖo nu mawu wɛ ɖeji ɖɔ e emi nu sin hudo emi ɖo lɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ enyi zan mɛjɔmɛ nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ hɛn gbɛzan yetɔn bɔkun bɔ nu kpɛ ɖo ɖo agbaza linu e ɖo kpe
nwt enyi xomɛ jehovah tɔn hinhɛn hun ji wɛ ayi towe ɖe ɔ e kɔn nyɔna do ji towe ɖo kpikpo hwenu
jose kpo kpo nu kpo wendy kpo
jose kpo kpo jehovah ɖo hwebinu tɔn mɛ nu xwe jɛji e tɔn
nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ kpe nukun do sin wu ɖo mɛɖe ɖo nɔ nɔ tɔn zan keze
ɔ jose ɖo syɛnlin ɖo e wa ɖo wu e kpo amasin syɛnsyɛn lɛ zinzan kpo
jehovah dlɛn alɔ tɔn ɖisi ɔ do asu kpo asi kpo enɛ lɛ a
xwe mɔkpan jɛ nukɔn ɖo hwenu ɖo wemaxɔmɛ linsinmɛ tɔn e ɔ e nɔ mɔ jose kpo kpo gbɔn flɛtɛli bɔ nɔ yi kunnuɖegbe hwɛhwɛ
e yi wan nu ɖo kanɖodonuwu yetɔn wu bɔ enɛ byɔ lanmɛ tawun
ðo kpo wendy kpo mɔ bɔ asu kpo asi kpo mɛxomɔ enɛ lɛ zan yetɔn bi nu jehovah wutu ɔ yi do xwegbe
ðo xwe wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ jose kpo kpo ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ din e
mɛxomɔ enɛ lɛ nɔ alɔ asu kpo asi kpo winnyawinnya enɛ nɔ do e do mɔ nunina ɖe sin jehovah
mawu ɖo ɖisi lɔ tɔn ɖuɖeji lɔ ɔ dlɛn do hwi wɛ
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɖe lɛ
jehovah do wɛn nukunɖiɖo tɔn ɖe ezekiyɛli ɖɔ akɔta izlayɛli tɔn ɔ nɔ bu hwenu yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji gudo e
wɛn enɛ ɖɔ buninɔ togun mawu tɔn tɔn bɔ nu ɖo nyi wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
jehovah ɖɔ nu gbeyiɖɔ ezekiyɛli ɖɔ e wlan nu do kpo we ji
e wlan do kpo ɖokpo ji ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto judaa tɔn kpo mɛ lɛ kpo bi wɛ nyi izlayɛli vi wlan do wegɔ ɔ ji ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto izlayɛli tɔn tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi jozɛfu vi lɛ alo kpo eflayimu tɔn nwt kpo mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ mɛ lɛ kpo bi wɛ nyi izlayɛli vi
etɛ xokwin eflayimu ɔ nɔte
jozɛfu sin jakɔbu xoɖɛ bunɔ ɖe do ji tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ e sɔgbe bɔ e ylɔ kpo nɔte nu axɔsuɖuto akɔta wo tɔn e ɖɔ kpo eflayimu tɔn
hwenu ezekiyɛli wlan kunkpla kpo we lɛ e ɔ asiliinu lɛ wli mɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto totaligbe tɔn izlayɛli tɔn mɛ lɛ e hɛn yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo lin tawun nɛ axɔ
enɛ wu ɔ gege izlayɛli vi enɛ lɛ tɔn gbakpe axɔsuɖuto babilɔnu tɔn ɖyɔ axɔsuɖuto asilii tɔn e mɛ hwenɛnu
ðo ɔ e wli akɔta we tofɔligbe tɔn kpo vlafo mɛ kpo ɖo axɔsuɖuto totaligbe tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo hɛn yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu
axɔsu sin kunkan judaa tɔn mɛ lɛ e nu axɔsuɖuto we enɛ lɛ bɔ lɛ nu ɖo nɔ wa yetɔn ɖo tɛmpli mɛ ɖo jeluzalɛmu
enɛ wu ɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ kpo nyi judaa tɔn e nɔte nu axɔsuɖuto akɔta we tɔn ɔ
hwetɛnu e ca kpo enɛ lɛ nɔte nu nuɖe e
hwenu izlayɛli vi lɛ lɛkɔ yi jeluzalɛmu ɖo tɛmpli ɔ gba e wɛ
axɔsuɖuto akɔta we tɔn ɔ kpo axɔsuɖuto akɔta wo tɔn ɔ kpo sin lɛ lɛkɔ sin kannumɔgbenu ɖo
kinklan ɖe ɖo izlayɛli vi lɛ tɛntin din a
ezek izlayɛli vi lɛ jɛ jehovah ji ɖo
nugbo taji tɛ kunkpla sinsɛn biblo ɔ bɔ elɔ ji
eɖie jehovah blo bɔ tɔn lɛ huzu ɖokpo gee
ezek buninɔ enɛ sin akpa e do e jɛ ɖo hwe mitɔn a
jɛ nukɔn ɔ ɔ jɛ jijɛ ji ɖo hwenu e tuto blo nu togun mawu tɔn kpɛɖe kpɛɖe dɔn ɖo bu e
gan sataan do klan sɔyi e cifo
hwe enɛ ɔ gege mɛ e dɔn ɖo bu lɛ e tɔn wɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo huzu axɔsu kpo kpo ɖo jixwe xa jezu
ci kpo jozɛfu tɔn ɔ ɖɔhun yedɛɛ lɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖu axɔsu xa klisu a
jezu xoɖɛ ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ bi nyi ɖokpo tɔn ɖo eyɛ mɛ bɔ e lɔ ɖo tɔn mɛ e ɖɔhun
jaan jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ lɛngbɔhwan kpɛvi ahwanvu tɔn yi do ɖe lɛ tɔn kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo nyi ɖokpo
bɔ bi nɔ ɖokpo glɔ
jaan xo jezu tɔn lɛ tinmɛ togun jehovah tɔn ɖo bu tawun egbe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn e enyi ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖebu ɔ nɛ
e tawun ɖɔ e lo ɖeɖee jezu do bɔ wa nyi fi ɖiɖe tɔn sin wuntun sin akpaxwe lɛ e wu
jɛ nukɔn ɔ e ɖɔ devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ xo e wɛ nyi mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ sin kpɛvi kpe nukun nu lɛ wu e
gudo mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn nɔ gudo nu nɔvi klisu tɔn lɛ e xo
ɖokpo ɔ ezekiyɛli tɔn sin jijɛ egbe tɔn ɔ to do gesi nu jɛ do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nukunɖiɖo jixwe tɔn lɛ wu e
axɔsuɖuto akɔta wo tɔn ɔ nɔte nu mɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn lɛ e a co buninɔ xo elɔ ɖɔ e flin mi buninɔ ɖo mɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo jixwe tɔn lɛ e kpo tɛntin e
mɛ tɔn wɛ e ronald
hwenu ɖo xwe e wɛ mɔ nu jɛ wu azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖɔ ɖo nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe mɛ
ðo ɖe hwenu ɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖe kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ nyi jlo jla mawuxo a ji
ɖɔ mawuxo a co ɖɔ ɛɛn
mi yi fi mi ɖɔ mawuxo ɔ ɖe e bɔ e mi akpomɛwema ɖɔ xo do axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ji e ɖe lɛ
e ɖɔ yi mɛ ɖo ali ɔ gudo lɛ e bɔ nyɛ yi mɛ ɖo fi lɛ e
kpo xɛsi kpo wɛ jɛ xwegbe xwegbe gbɔn ji bɔ e kpaca mi ɖɔ blewun jɛn ma akpomɛwema lɛ bi nu mɛ lɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛ gege ɖo nu ɖo mɛ e wɛ
e ji mi ɖo ɖo chatham angleterre bɔ su ɖo mɛ cikɔ lɛ e tɛntin
wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hɛn e gbɔn e a
sinsɛngan baptiste tɔn lɛ flu lɛ ɖo nukɔnyiyi yeɖesunɔ tɔn wɛ nɔ mya nukun nu hugan
hwenu ɖo xwe tɛnnɛ e ɔ nɔ jɛ kplexɔ internationale des etudiants bible tɔn mɛ yi ji fi enɛ wɛ mɛ wa nyi jehovah tɔn lɛ e nɔ blo kple yetɔn lɛ ɖe
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖokpo nɔ nu mi mɛ yɔkpɔvu lɛ do biblu kpo wema harpe dieu kpo ji
yi wan nu nu wɛ ɖe lɛ e
hwenu ɖo dɔnkpɛvu mɛ e ɔ nukunɖiɖo ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e mima xa mɛ lɛ nɔ vivi nu mi
nyiɖokponɔ nɔ jla wɛn ɔ gbɔn xwegbe xwegbe hwɛhwɛ co kunnuɖiɖe xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ lɔ nu mi
nɔvi sunnu ɔ gan kɛkɛ tɔn ɖɔ nyi wa mi jinjɔn ayi ɖo atinkpo ɖe ji
nu mi jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ lɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo kpowun jo hwɛɖiɖɔ ɔ do nu jehovah
asi tɔn yi wan nu jehovah tɔn lɛ a
gbe ɖokpo ɔ e ylɔ mi do xwe tɔn gbe nu wa fa kɔ
xomɛ sin nawe ɔ do mawuxo asu tɔn yi ɖɔ e wu bɔ e jɛ tii the gbavi lɛ nyi do mi ji
sunnu ɔ ɖu zingidi a e wa ɔ e tii gbavi lɛ do tɛn yetɔn mɛ kpodo xomɛhunhun kpo
jlo ɖo ma nukunɖiɖo sɔgudo tɔn ɔ xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ e ɖo jijɛji wɛ bɔ ɖo xwejisun tɔn mɛ ɔ nyi kpo nɔ kpo blo baptɛm ɖo
grande bretagne ahwan allemagne ɖo zosun tɔn mɛ hwenu ɖo xwe e
ðo ayidosun tɔn mɛ ɔ ɖo hɔn mitɔn linu mɔ bɔ e sɔja mɔkpan e gble wu lɛ e do gbawungbaloke lɛ mɛ wa xweyigbe mɛ ahwan dunkirk tɔn ɖu kpo lɛ e wɛ
mɔ nukunɖiɖo ɖe ɖo nukun yetɔn lɛ ji a bɔ e jlo mi tawun ɖɔ ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin xo nu
e nɔ zaan ɖo xwe enɛ mɛ e ɔ e jɛ bɔnbu do grande bretagne ji
