zan ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ allemagne sin jɔmɛhun nɔ bɔnbu lɛ e gege bɔ nɔ gbɔn mitɔn wa yi
bɔnbu lɛ nɔ ɖɔ nu swii nɔ wu gbuwun bɔ adohu adohu ɔ nɔ jɛji
enyi mi ayihɔngbe tɔn ɔ mi nɔ mɔ xa blebu gege bɔ xwe ɖo mɛ lɛ e nɔ gba hannya
wɛ gbɛzan bɔ ɖo awajijɛ tawun e
ɖe wɛ nyi ɖo ɖo chatham ɖe wɛ ɖo akwɛ tawun bɔ mɛ gege nɔ jlo
e lin din bɔ jehovah lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ kun ɖo nɔ to ɖe ji ahwan xa to ɖevo o
ðo ɔ mi wa jɛ nukunnu mɔ jɛ wu ji ɖɔ mi kun ɖo wa ɖo ɖeɖee nɔ blo ahwanfunnu lɛ e o
jaan ðo tɔjihunblotɛn ɔ nɔ blo ahwanhun tɔglɔ tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ hwenu su bonu jo enɛ do hwebinu tɔn
fi e mi do jɛ nukɔn e wɛ nyi cirencester toxo ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɖe wɛ ɖo cotswolds sin kan mɛ
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ e wli mi su nu tɛnnɛ ɖo ɖɔ kun yi ahwan o wutu
ee e su hɔn do mi ɖo gankpa mɛ kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo bɔ e wa kpo nyiɖokpo e ɔ hun bi wɛ gbado
e nɔ zaan e ɔ lɛ kpo lɛ kpo jɛ nu wu e wli mi e kanbyɔ mi ji bɔ tinmɛ nuɖiɖi nu kpodo awajijɛ kpo
ee sin gankpa mɛ gudo e ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ nu leonard jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo toxo vovo lɛ mɛ ɖo xa mɛ mi gosin ɖo e
ɔ jɔmɛhun bɔnbu bɔ ɖo kunkun wɛ a e jɛji wɛ wu ɖo
fi jɔmɛhun lɛ nɔ gbɔn ɖo akpaxwe elɔpu tɔn nazi lɛ yi e kpo londres kpo vlamɛ e wɛ mi ɖe
e nɔ ylɔ jɔmɛhun bɔnbunɔ enɛ lɛ ɖɔ jɔɖujɔɖu
ahwanfunfun enɛ do xɛsi tawun ɖo enyi se bɔ jɔmɛhun ɔ ci mi nɔ se gbɔn hwɛhwɛ e ɔ tuun ɖɔ ɖo segɔndu bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ jɔmɛhun ɔ wu
mi nɔ biblu xa xwedo mɛ ɖe e ɖe
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi nɔ jinjɔn tavo gannɔ blo bonu e cyɔn alɔ ji hwenu xɔ ɔ gba e glɔ
mɛ ɖo xwedo enɛ mɛ lɛ e bi wɛ wa blo baptɛm ɖo gudo mɛ
ɖo mɛ lɛ ylɔ do ɖaxo ɖe tɛnmɛ wɛ ɖo hwenu gbexosin tlolo e do
ðo ahwan ɔ gudo ɔ wa gbexosin nu xwe we ɖo tofɔligbe irlande tɔn
mi tuun irlande gbɔn vo do angleterre sɔ e a
mi nɔ gbɔn xwegbe xwegbe nɔ ɖo xɔ wɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ wɛ nu mi bɔ mi nɔ xwle xojlawema mitɔn lɛ mɛ lɛ ɖo ali ɔ ji
xlonɔnu tawun wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e wa nu gbɔn ɖo katolika to ɖe mɛ
hwenu nya ɖe adan nu mi syɛnsyɛn e ɔ yi jɛ hwɛ nu kponɔ ɖe ɖɔ etɛ vɛdo wɛ ɖe
mi tuun ɖɔ yɛhwenɔ lɛ ɖo acɛ a
enyi mɛ lɛ yi wema mitɔn lɛ ɔ nɔ blo bɔ e nɔ nya sin yetɔn mɛ blo bɔ e nɔ nya mi sin fi mi nɔ lɛ e
ðo kilkenny ɔ lɛ ɖo adan nu mi wɛ co mi nɔ nu xa dɔnkpɛvu ɖe azɔn atɔn ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo mɛ
nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ kpinkplɔn mɛ nɔ vivi mi bɔ nyikɔ yi wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn galadi tɔn ba nyi
tɔjihun sibia wɛ nyi lɛ sin xwe mitɔn sin jɛ
ee mi nu nu ɖo gudo e ɔ e mi mɛ yi kunnuɖewema galadi tɔn lɛ e ɛnɛ do xu caraibe tɔn sin tɔtɛntinto kpɛvi ɔ mɛ
ðo abɔxwisun tɔn mɛ ɔ mi do tɔjihun mɛtlu nɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ sibia e gosin
do tɔjihun a enɛ wu ɔ akpakpa mi tawun
ɖo mi mɛ ɖe wɛ e nyi
e mi nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ do tɔjihun kunkun wu ɖi e sixu sun hun ɔ alo glin gbɔn e e sixu tɔjihun ɔ ɖo ali tɔn ji gbɔn e kpo e sixu xo jɔhɔn zlɛ gbɔn e kpo
kun tɔjihun mitɔn ɔ kpo tuuntuun kpo nu azan gbɔn jɔhɔn nyanya lɛ tɛntin bɔ mi yi jɛ bahamas
mi jla mawuxo ɖo tɔtɛntinto kpɛvi bahamas tɔn lɛ mɛ nu yɔywɛ ɖe gudo e ɔ mi sun hun ɔ yi tɔtɛntinto tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɖiga nu kilomɛtlu iles vierges ɖo rico kpa ɖibla yi trinite
tɔtɛntinto jɛ gblolo mɛ fi ɖe ɖe a lɛ e mɛ wɛ mi jla mawuxo ɖe tawun nu xwe
e ɖo co kpodo awajijɛ ɖaxo kpo wɛ mi nɔ ɖo xo jehovah tɔn jla gbɔn tɔtɛntinto lɛ mɛ wɛ jel
lɛ tɔn ɖo sibia ɔ mɛ amyɔxwe yi aɖisixwe ron ryde kpo stanley kpo
enyi mi glin hun ɖo age ɖe ji ɔ wiwa mitɔn nɔ bɔ gletoxo ɔ bi nɔ xo zin bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ kple ɖo age ɔ ji nɔ mɛ alɔkpa mi nyi e
mɛɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ mɔ tɔjihun alo yovo a
tɔtɛntintomɛnu lɛ nyi sinsɛnnɔ jɔ tawun tuun biblu ɔ ganji lɛ e
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ mi hwevi mu avokaa kpo azin kpo
tɛn ɖaxo ɖe ɖo tɔjihun mitɔn mɛ bonu mi ɖa nu alo nya avɔ a co mi nɔ blo gbɔn ɖe
mi nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ wa se xoɖiɖɔ jinjɔn biblu ji e ɖe enɛ ɔ nu e jɛ gbadanu ɔ mi nɔ xo ɖo tɔjihun ɔ wu e
enyi mɛ lɛ jɛ wiwa ji ɔ e nɔ vivi nu mi tawun
yetɔn lɛ nɔ ci sunvi ɖeɖee ɖo wɛ sin so lɛ ji jawe e ɖɔhun
hweɖelɛnu ɔ kanweko nɔ wa bɔ nɔ ɖo nukanbyɔ wɛ bɔ zan wiwi ɔ nɔ do bi
hanjiji nɔ vivi nu tawun enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ zan macinu nɔ wlan nu e do wlan axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ nɔ ma nu
mi mɛ ɛnɛ lɛ nɔ wa nu wu mi kpe e bi jihan ɔ bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ so lobɔ gbe yetɔn lɛ nɔ jɛ hun gbe nɔ jɛ gbe
hwe enɛ lɛ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu mi tawun
enyi mi biblu xa mɛɖe fo ɔ ɖe lɛ nɔ xwedo mi yi xwedo mɛ mi biblu xa mɛ ɖe bɔ e do sixu nu ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn lɔ tɔn hwenu
enyi mi xɔ aklunɔzan gblamɛ yɔywɛ ɖe ɖo fi ɖe lɛ jlo yi ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖo jlo ɖesu lɛ e hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ nɔ kpo ɖo nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ jɛ hwenu mi lɛkɔ do e
mɛ ɖe lɛ yetɔn ylɔ ɖɔ nujɔnu gbɔn e jɛ tawun
egbe ɔ tɔtɛntinto enɛ lɛ gege mɛ wɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo hwe enɛ ɔ fi jɛ gblolo tawun lɛ e wɛ nyi bɔ we tete lɛ e xuta kpo detin lɛ kpo nɔ ɖo fi enɛ lɛ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ zanmɛ wɛ mi nɔ tɛn sin tɔtɛntinto ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ
hwevi ɖaxo lɛ nɔ ɖo ayihun ɖo tɔjihun ɔ kpa wɛ bɔ e nɔ se nuɖe zɛ sin xo zlɛ wɛ tɔjihun ɔ ɖe e sin gbe wu a
ɔ nɔ ɖo xu e ji nɔ zawe jɛ vovolivwe
ee mi blo xwe do ɖɔ mawuxo ɖo tɔtɛntinto lɛ mɛ gudo e ɔ mi yi rico yi ɖyɔ tɔjihun ɔ kpo tɔjihun e ɖe kpo
hwenu mi wa e ɔ xo go maxine boyd nyi nɔvi nyɔnu e ɖe jɛ wan yi ji
ɖe wɛ e nyi sin vu nukɔnmɛ ɔ e nyi ɖo republique dominicaine jɛ hwenu acɛkpikpa katolika tɔn ɔ wa nya ɛ sin to ɔ mɛ ɖo e
ðo nɔ kun tɔjihun wutu ɔ rico ninɔ nu ɖokpo gee sin wema jɛn e mi
zaanɖe ɔ zɛ hwɛ jɛ tɔtɛntinto lɛ mɛ gbɔn ji nu xwe yɔywɛ ɖe lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖɔ nu nyiɖee ɖɔ ronald enyi jlo vi elɔ ɔ ɖo yawu
ðo aklunɔzan gblamɛ atɔn gudo ɔ ɖɔ xo bɔ ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ gudo ɔ mi wli alɔ
e nyi kpo maxine kpo do rico bɔ mi nyi ɖo enɛ wu ɔ afɔ jɛ tɔjihun ɔ mɛ a
ðo ɔ mi lɛdo tɔn sin jɛ agun lɛ ji
ði ɔ ɖo gletoxo potala pastillo tɔn mɛ ɔ xwedo lɛ tɔn we ɖo finɛ ɖo vi gege bɔ ɖo aca nɔ kun kpete nu
kanbyɔ ɖyɔvivu lɛ ɖokpo hilda ɖɔ e jlo xwedo mi yi jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ a ji
e ɖɔ e jlo mi sixu a
ɖo afɔkpa ɖe a
mi xɔ afɔkpa ɔ bɔ e xwedo mi yi kunnuɖegbe
xwe mɔkpan gudo ɖo hwenu nyi kpo maxine kpo ɖisa yi betɛli brooklyn tɔn e ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu yi kunnuɖewema wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn tlolo e ɖe sɛkpɔ mi
nyi wɛ nyi ɖyɔvivu gosin pastillo ɖo afɔkpa ɖe a e
hilda wɛ
xomɛ hun mi bɔ ɖasin wa yi do mi
ðo ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi yi wa ɖo alaxɔ rico tɔn ɖo singbo we ɖe ji ɖo santurce juan e mɛ
ðo ɔ lennart johnson kpo nyi kpo wɛ nɔ ɖibla wa ɔ bi
e kpo asi tɔn kpo wɛ nyi jehovah tɔn republique dominicaine tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ bɔ wa rico ɖo
e wa ya e ɔ maxine kpe nukun do mɛ e nɔ xojlawema lɛ do e wu jɛji ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
e yi wan nu enɛ wiwa ɖo mɛ ɖo nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖu wɛ lɛ e bi sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ
yi wan nu ɖo betɛli ɖo nunamɛ sin gbɛzinzan wɛ
e lɔ ɖo tagba tɔn lɛ
ði ɔ ɖo akɔjɔkple tɔn rico tɔn nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu ɖo ɔ ɔ hugan mi
nathan knorr nɔ kpe nukun do jehovah tɔn lɛ sin wu hwenɛnu e wa rico
blo tuto nu yiyi kpo wiwa kpo wa lɛ e tɔn co e tuun a ɖɔ ɖɔ nyi
gudo mɛ ɔ e ɖe we xa mi syɛnsyɛn do titojininɔ wu ɖɔ ɖɔ nyi do winnya emi
jlo dɔn nu xa ɛ a mɔ ɖɔ e tafu mi bɔ ɖo mi nu taan ɖe
e ɖo co ee nyi kpo maxine kpo wa mɔ nɔvi knorr hweɖevonu e ɔ ylɔ mi do xɔ tɔn mɛ ɖa nuɖuɖu nu mi
azɔn mɔkpan wɛ mi gosin rico wa yi mɛ lɛ ɖo angleterre
yi nugbo ɔ hwenu nyi kpo mamaa kpo yi e a
enyi gosin betɛli lɛ e wa ɔ nɔ nɔ yi do xwegbe hwɛhwɛ
mɔ ɖɔ betɛli tɔn enɛ lɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe tawun gbɔn vo nu sinsɛngan wan nu emi syɛnsyɛn xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie e
gudo mɛ ɔ e blo baptɛm ɖo huzu jehovah tɔn
nyi kpo maxine kpo ɖo rico hwenu mi wli alɔ gudo zaan e kpo hwenu mi ɖu xwekpexwenu alɔwliwli mitɔn tɔn ɖo e
maxine asi ɔ ku ɖo
ɖo nukunɖiɖo mɛ mɔ ɛ ɖo sin ku hwenu
linlin mɔhun nɔ mi awajijɛ tawun
ðo xwe nyi kpo maxine kpo zan ɖo lɛ e mɛ ɔ mi mɔ bɔ togun jehovah tɔn ɖo rico e jɛji jɛ
ðo ɔ e alaxɔ rico tɔn ɔ yi xu alaxɔ etats unis tɔn ji bɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ nyi wa ɖo wallkill
ðo xwe blo ɖo tɔtɛntinto ɔ mɛ e gudo ɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ rico wɛ nyi ɖɔhun ci bese kpɛvi rico tɔn nɔ nyi coqui nɔ nɔ atinkanmɛ nɔ ɖo kee kee ɖɔ wɛ gbadanu lɛ e ɖɔhun
ɔ xo bonu wa nu ɖevo
kpo ɖo awajijɛ mɔ wɛ ɖo mawu sinsɛn mɛ ɖo betɛli
ɖo hu xwe din bɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu xwedo betɛli tɔn ɔ sin lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mɛ jɛji wɛ sin hwenu wa walkill e
mɛ nɔ wa lɛ e ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo do tagba mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ alo xɔsa tɔn lɛ ji
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ weɖexamɛ do sixu blo gbɔn bɔ wa wɛ ɖe ɖo betɛli e kpa gbɔn e wu
e ɖo co mɛ wli alɔ agaɖanu din lɛ e ɖe lɛ nɔ kan nu byɔ do alɔwliwli ji
e mɛ ɖe lɛ do gle ɔ mɛ
nɔ ɖoto mɛ nɔ wa ɖɔ xo nu mi lɛ e bi bɔ nu e sɔgbe ɔ nɔ ɖɔ nu hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ mawu yi wan nu mɛ nɔ nu mɛ kpodo xomɛhunhun kpo e
enɛ wu ɔ wa towe kpo awajijɛ kpo
jehovah blo wɛ ɖe kɔ
nu ɖebu mi nɔ blo ɖo betɛli e ɔ wɛ
mi ɖo jehovah wɛ ɖo fi ɖebu ɔ ali gege wɛ hun nu mi bɔ mi kpa
bonu mi wa nu e mi e kpo awajijɛ kpo ɖo mawu yi wan nu mɛ nɔ nu mɛ kpodo xomɛhunhun kpo e
gbɛzan tɔn leonard tɔn ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe lidosun tɔn mɛ
mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖɔ e bonu nɔ eɖokponɔ a
blo ɖokpo bib
etɛwu e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ alɔwliwli nyi nunina ɖe gosin mawu
kpi alɔwliwli tɔn ɔ sin adamu hwenu jɛ jezu hwenu
etɛ sixu klisanwun ɖe wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi wli alɔ alo gbɔ
alɔwliwli gbɔn
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɛ sunnu nukɔntɔn ɔ kpo nyɔnu nukɔntɔn ɔ kpo sixu ɖo do alɔwliwli wu
alɔwliwli nyi gbɛzinzan sin akpaxwe ɖaxo ɖe
do biba nu mɛ e kpo nu wu wɛ e kpo sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo linlin sɔgbe e do kancica enɛ wu ɖu vivi nyɔna e nɔ mɔ lɛ e tɔn
hwenu mawu blo sunnu nukɔntɔn ɔ adamu gudo e ɔ e kpla kanlin lɛ wa tɔn bonu e ɖo nyikɔ nu
loɔ eyɛ ɖo mɛ jɛxa ɛ alɔ ɔ a
enɛ wu ɔ mawu ɖo sɛnmlɔ nu adamu ɖe adajaxu tɔn ɖokpo do blo nyɔnu ɖokpo kpla ɛ yi jo nu sunnu ɔ xa
hun alɔwliwli ɔ mawu wɛ
jezu do zogbe ji ɖɔ jehovah wɛ ɖɔ ji sunnu jo tɔn kpodo nɔ tɔn kpo do jɛ xa asi tɔn bɔ mɛ we lɛ huzu ɖokpo gee
ðo mawu zan adajaxu adamu tɔn do blo nyɔnu nukɔntɔn ɔ wutu ɔ enɛ sixu bɔ asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ emi ɖo bu tawun
mawu blo tuto mɛ tɔn alo asu abi asi gege dida tɔn ɖe hwenɛnu a
ðɔ nu taji wu mawu blo tuto alɔwliwli tɔn e ɖokpo
xomɛ adamu tɔn hun ɖesu do asi tɔn ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɔ wu wa nyi ɖɔ ɛvu
nu taji wu mawu blo tuto alɔwliwli tɔn e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e kpe ayikungban ɔ ji
bib sunnu lɛ kpo nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔ yi wan nu yetɔn lɛ co jo do wli alɔ ɖo xwedo lɛ ayi
lɛ ayikungban ɔ ji ɖo ba sɔgbe e mɛ gblo ada nu xwe yetɔn lɛ bɔ ayikungban ɔ bi huzu palaɖisi ɖe
etɛ gbo alɔwliwli nukɔntɔn ɔ
alɔwliwli nukɔntɔn ɔ byɔ mɛ ɖo adamu kpo ɛvu kpo bi jlo zan mɛɖesusininɔ yetɔn nyi do gbɔn totlitli nu jehovah gblamɛ
xoxo ɔ ee e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ sataan awovi e ɛvu ɖi nu ɖɔ atin tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ tuun nu ɖagbe kpodo nu nyanya kpo ɔ ɖuɖu nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ bunɔ ɖe emi bɔ emi kpewu nɔ ɖɔ nu e kpo nu nyla e kpo
e ɖo xo ɔ nu asu tɔn a ɖɔ e kun ɖo sisi ɖebu nu asu tɔn nyi e o
adamu lɔ tonu se nu mawu yi atin ɛvu ɛ e nuɖe bib
etɛ xosin adamu kpo ɛvu kpo jehovah e sixu mi
ee mawu ke xo ɔ e ɔ adamu dohwɛ asi tɔn ɖɔ nyɔnu ɖo akpa ɔ wɛ mi bɔ ɖu
hwɛjijɔ ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ bonu a hanglan kpowun wɛ kun
ðo asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ tlito nu jehovah wutu ɔ huzu e ɖo hwɛ lɛ e ɖo nukɔn tɔn
akpagbanumɛ ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ nu mi a ce
bonu alɔwliwli ɖe yi ɔ sunnu ɔ kpo nyɔnu ɔ kpo ɖo yi gbe nu nyi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn e ɖo setonu nu jehovah
tinmɛ
sataan do nu enɛ sin ɖo edɛni mɛ co jehovah nukunɖiɖo lɛ ɖo biblu tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
xa ɖo du monde nouveau mɛ
kunkan nyɔnu ɔ tɔn su kun do nu nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn nukɔntɔn gu e
mɛ ɔ jehovah lɛ klewun ɖɔ kancica bunɔ ɖe wɛ ɖo e kpodo nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn maxamaxa nɔ ɛ ɖo jixwe lɛ e kpo tɛntin
mawuxowema ɔ wa ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ mawu mɛ ɖokpo do sin tutoblonunu tɔn ci asi ɖɔhun e mɛ bɔ e so awovi tɔn hun ali nu lɛ bɔ ɖu vivi nukunɖiɖo asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ hɛn bu e tɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ sɔyi ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji sɔgbe kpo linlin jehovah ɖo ɖo e kpo jaan
etɛ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo tɔn wa do alɔwliwli wu
etɛ biblu byɔ asu lɛ kpo asi lɛ kpo
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo tɔn wa nu do alɔwliwli yetɔn wu wa do alɔwliwli wa jɛ enɛ gudo lɛ e bi wu
ði ɔ ɛvu kpo kunkan tɔn nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔ se tawun hwenu ɖo xo e nɔ se ɖo ajidonu
biblu byɔ asisunɔ lɛ ɖɔ nɔ zan sin acɛ yetɔn kpodo wanyiyi kpo
ðo asu kpo asi kpo ɖi xɛsi nu mawu lɛ e nɔ ɖo gbe wutu ɔ ninɔmɛ dɔn hwɛgbe wa lɛ e nabi ɖe nɔ ɖo tɛntin yetɔn a alo tlɛ nɔ ɖebu a
kpi alɔwliwli tɔn ɔ sin adamu hwenu jɛ sinvɔgbɛ ɔ hwenu
visunnuɖaxo yetɔn hɛnnumɔ tɔn nyɔnu lɛ ɖokpo
ðo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ adamu hwenu wa sinvɔgbɛ nɔwee hwenu tɔn e sin hwenu ɔ mɛ kwin we ɖe jɛn jehovah ɖo mɛ
abɛli henɔci nu nɔwee kpo xwedo tɔn kpo ɖo mɛ
ðo nɔwee hwenu ɔ nuɖiɖo ɖo jixwe lɛ mɔ ɖɔ vi nyɔnu lɛ ɖɛkpɛ ɖesu wɛ biblu ɖɔ bɔ ee jlo lɛ ɖo nyɔnuvi enɛ lɛ mɛ
nu enɛ nyi jɔwamɔnu a wɛnsagun enɛ lɛ gbaza do nyɔnu lɛ e ji vi lɛ bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ nɛfilimu lɛ
ɔ dakaxixo tɔn ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji bɔ nɔ ɖo nu nyanya kɛɖɛ wɛ hwebinu bib
etɛ jehovah wa nu mɛ nyanya lɛ ɖo nɔwee hwenu
etɛ nu jɛ hwenɛnu e ɖo mi
jehovah sin do vɔ ɔ ɖo nɔwee hwenu do su kun do nu lɛ
jezu ninɔmɛ hwe enɛ tɔn lɛ do nu mi mɔ hwe mitɔn lɛ e wu xa matie
egbe ɔ mɛ gege nɔ ɖɔ emi kun se axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ e ɖe gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji nyi kunnuɖiɖe nu akɔta lɛ bi cobɔ nyanya elɔ wa vivɔnu e o
nu mi hɛn mɛ ɖɔ mi kun ɖo lɔn bonu xwedo sin nu lɛ ɖi alɔwliwli kpo vi lɛ kplɔnkplɔn kpo ayi mitɔn sin azan jehovah tɔn sɛkpɔ bi e ji o
ðo aca gege mɛ ɔ nublibliwiwa sin walɔ tɛ lɛ ma mɛ lɛ
ɖagbe tɛ ablaxamu kpo sala kpo ze ɖo alɔwliwli yetɔn mɛ
asi ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ nɔwee kpo vi tɔn sunnu atɔn lɛ kpo e ɖo co mɛɖe lɛ asi gege ɖo hwexonu
ðo aca gege mɛ ɔ nublibliwiwa wa byɔ walɔ mɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ bɔ tlɛ do sinsɛn sin nuwiwa yetɔn lɛ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ jehovah su kun do nu sodɔmu kpo kpo ɖo kwijikwiji lilɛ sin walɔ ɖo mɛ ɖo toxo enɛ lɛ mɛ lɛ e sin fɛn alo nɔ myɔ nukun do wutu
ablaxamu kpe nukun do xwedo tɔn wu ganji bɔ sala ze ɖagbe ɖe gbɔn eɖee do asu tɔn glɔ gblamɛ
xa
ablaxamu tɛnkpɔn bɔ vi sunnu tɔn izaki nyɔnu nɔ jehovah e ɖe
sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ sin tuto mɔhun wɛ izaki sin vi jakɔbu xwedo bɔ vi sunnu eyɛtɔn lɛ wa huzu akɔta izlayɛli tɔn lɛ sin lɛ
mɔyizi ɔ cyɔn alɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ji gbɔn
nukɔnmɛ ɔ jehovah jɛ akɔ xa kunkan jakɔbu izlayɛli tɔn lɛ
mɔyizi ɔ to alɔwliwli sin walɔ dodo hwexonu tɔn lɛ jɛ asi gege dida tɔn ji
e alɔwliwli xa mɛ nɔ jehovah a lɛ e cyɔn alɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo xa
enyi tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ ɔ tomɛxo lɛ nɔ hwɛhwɛ
e nɔ ɖeɖɛ gbejimanɔ wuhwinhwan kpo nuvɛdomɛ sin xo lɛ kpo e jɛxa gbɔn e
ɔ yi gbe nu mɛ loɔ e to e nyi gbɔn e
ɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo nujɛdo ɔ nyi wɛ e a e sɔgbe bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu klewun klewun lɛ kun o
etɛ sunnu ɖe lɛ nɔ wa nu asi yetɔn lɛ ɖo malacii hwenu
enyi mɛ blo baptɛm e ɖe ɖoxo xa asi alo asu mɛ ɖevo tɔn ɔ etɛ lɛ e ji
ðo gbeyiɖɔ malacii hwenu ɔ jwifu gege nɔ gɔn gbeji nɔ nu asi yetɔn lɛ nɔ hwɛjijɔ tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ bi nɔ
mɛ ɔ sunnu enɛ lɛ nɔ jo asi winnyawinnya hwenu yetɔn lɛ e do vlafo mɔ tɛn do ɖyɔvi lɛ alo nyɔnu pagawun lɛ
jehovah mawu wan nu mɛ mɔhun xa malacii
egbe ɔ e sixu yi gbe nu gbejimanɔ ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ ɖo togun jehovah tɔn tɛntin a
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ sunnu alo nyɔnu blo baptɛm wli alɔ e ɖe ɖoxo xa asi alo asu mɛ ɖevo tɔn do nuglɔ mɔ tɛn do mɛ e e wa mɛ enɛ ɔ
enyi sunnu enɛ alo nyɔnu enɛ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn gudo a ɔ e ɖo ɖe e sin agun ɔ mɛ do sixu hɛn agun ɔ ɖo ji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kɔ
walɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖɔ e lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo nugbo nugbo cobɔ e yi do agun ɔ mɛ luk
e sixu byɔ taan gege xwe ɖokpo alo hu bɔ ɔ do ɖɔ emi lɛkɔ sin hwɛ emitɔn gudo nugbo nugbo
enyi e tlɛ yi mɛ ɔ do agun mɛ ɔ e ɖo ɖo nu eɖesunɔ wa ɔ sin gbe nu mawu hlɔ atɔxwɛ flansegbe zofinkplɔsun tɔn wex
mɔyizi ɔ ɖɔ nu do izlayɛli vi lɛ nu xwe jɛji
e togun mawu tɔn bɔ hɛn nugbododo jlɔjlɔ lɛ ayi mɛ hwenu ɖo tagba xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo ninɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖeɖɛ wɛ e cyɔn alɔ ji jɛ hwenu mɛsiya ɔ wa e
ðo tuto enɛ ɔ mɛ ɔ akpaxwe ɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ a
tuto alɔwliwli tɔn tɛ e ɖo xwedo ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ
etɛ lɛ klisanwun ɖe ɖo gbeje hwenu e ɖo tamɛ do mɛ ji wɛ e
jezu xosin nu nu falizyɛn ɖe lɛ kanbyɔ ɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ gbe mɔyizi ɖɔ e sixu asu alo asi e kun ɖo hwenu mawu ɖo ɔ e o
mɛ ɔ jezu ɖɔ tuto alɔwliwli tɔn mawu ze ɖo edɛni mɛ e wɛ e ɖo xwedo ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ
tim ðo asu kpo asi kpo wli alɔ lɛ e huzu mɛ ɖokpo gee wutu ɔ ɖo nɔ bu blo bɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu mawu kpo yeɖee lɛ kpo e hɛn kancica yetɔn lido
alo ɖo axɔsuxwe nyi ɖo agalilɛ wu a e acɛ mɛ bonu e alɔ wli a
ɖokpo ɔ hwenu akɔta izlayɛli tɔn do afɔ gbe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo wa lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn gudo e ɔ jehovah ku nublawu
oz ɔ enyi mɛɖe tuun ɖɔ mɛ emi e jlo bonu jɛ xo ɖo xa yeɖee ji ɔ e ɖɔ e hwɛ kɛ ɛ nɛ bɔ e sixu ɛ sɔgbe kpo mawuxowema ɔ kpo a
etɛ jezu ɖɔ do tlɛnmɛninɔ wu
ee jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ mɛ tɔn ɖebu kun ɖo klisanwun nugbo lɛ tɛntin zɛ agalilɛ wu o gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ mɛ mawu acɛ tlɛnmɛninɔ tɔn lɛ e xo
mɛ gege jlo ci tlɛnmɛ mɔ tɛn do jehovah kpo ayi ɖokpo kpo
e jɛxa ɖɔ e doku tɔn nu
etɛ sixu klisanwun ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ emi wli alɔ alo gbɔ
nu mɛɖe nɔ tlɛnmɛ alo wli alɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ wɛ ayi eɖee tɔn mɛ ɖɔ emi kpewu ba nɔ tlɛnmɛ alo gbɔ a ji
pɔlu mɛ ɖɔ e nɔ tlɛnmɛ e ɖo co e ɖɔ ðo nublibliwiwa gbakpe e wutu ɔ nu sunnu ɖokpo ɖokpo asi eɖesunɔ tɔn bonu nyɔnu ɖokpo ɖokpo asu eɖesunɔ tɔn
pɔlu ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi sixu ɖu ɖo yeɖee ji a ɔ nu wli alɔ ɖo e ɖɔ wli alɔ hu jlo zogbe ɖu ɖo ji
alɔwliwli sixu mɛɖe bɔ jlo zogbe dɔn ɛ do do ayihun alo agalilɛ mɛ a
ɔ e ɖo xwe nabi e ɖo e ɖo ɔ ɖɔ ji enyi mɛɖe ɖɔ emi ɖo nu sɔgbe a e wa wɛ ɖo emi ɖo tlɛnmɛ wutu ɔ bonu e zɛ winnyawinnya xwe wu ɔ nu e ɖo wa e ɖie nu e blo nu jlo e e e hu hwɛ a
nu wli alɔ
e sixu nɔ zin wa alɔwliwli nɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ si lɛ e
klisanwun ɖe ɖo tuto alɔwliwli tɔn gbɔn
etɛ ji xota bɔ e ɖɔ xo do
klisanwun sunnu ɖokpo nyɔnu ɖokpo ee ze yeɖee jo nu jehovah yi wan kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo e wɛ ɖo tuto alɔwliwli tɔn
ɖo wa yi wan nu yeɖee tawun jlo ba wli alɔ zan yetɔn ɖo
enyi xwedo weɖexamɛ ɖɔ e wli alɔ ɖo aklunɔ mɛ kɛɖɛ e ɔ mɔ nyɔna gege
sunnu ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo yi wan nu asi tɔn eɖesunɔ ɖɔhun nyɔnu ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo si asu tɔn efɛ
tɛ lɛ mawu asu lɛ kpo asi lɛ kpo
etɛwu wanyiyi kpo walɔ wanyiyi tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo taji tawun ɖo alɔwliwli ɖe mɛ
hwenu tagba lɛ ɖo alɔwliwli ɖe mɛ e ɔ alɔdo tɛ biblu sixu mɛ
alɔwliwli nɔ kpo awajijɛ kpo hwɛhwɛ co etɛ mɛ wli alɔ lɛ e sixu ɖo nukun
hwenu yawo ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɖe ɖo tɔn ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɔ nukɔn ɖo alɔwliwlizan yetɔn gbe e ɔ sixu ɖɔ awajijɛ nɔ ɖo e a
hwenu ɖo mɛ e ɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu yeɖee lɛ e jɛji bɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu yeɖee lɛ ɖɔ emi nɔ gbeji nu emiɖee lɛ nyi asu kpo asi kpo
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ ɖo dandan ɖo gbɛzan we wɛ jɛ ɖo xwedo ɖe ayi
xo mawu tɔn ɔ ɖe we nunywɛ kpe lɛ e xa mɛ jlo wli alɔ lɛ e ɖo alɔwliwli tɔn ɔ ɖɔ asu kpo asi kpo ɖokpo ɖokpo sin alɔwliwli kpa awajijɛ nux
e sixu ɖe mɔhun kpo dɔɔ gbɔn
etɛ sixu bɔ klisanwun ɖe sin alɔwliwli yi
wanyiyi alɔkpa tɛ lɛ mɛ wli alɔ lɛ e ɖo ɖo nu yeɖee lɛ
biblu ji ɖɔ wanyiyi ɖo taji
e ɖo hudo wanyiyi e ɖo glɛkigbe mɛ tɔn ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ
wanyiyi xoɖoxamɛ tɔn eʹros nɔ do vivi alɔwliwli mɛ lobɔ wan yi nu xwedo ɖo taji hwenu vi xo byɔ mɛ e
e ɖo co wanyiyi jinjɔn nugbododo ji e wɛ nɔ bɔ alɔwliwli ɖe nɔ yi
pɔlu wlan do wanyiyi enɛ wu ɖɔ sunnu ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo yi wan nu asi tɔn eɖesunɔ ɖɔhun nyɔnu ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo si asu tɔn efɛ
ba tɛ mɛ wɛ wanyiyi ɖo alɔwliwli ɖe mɛ e ɖo syɛn ɖo
bonu ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ wa nu eɖɔhun ɔ ɖo yi wan nu yeɖee lɛ eyɛ yi wan nu gbɔn e ɖɔhun xa jaan
enɛ wu ɔ wanyiyi nɔ tiin ɖo alɔwliwli klisanwun lɛ tɔn mɛ e ɖo syɛn bɔ asu ɔ alo asi ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba ku do mɛ ɖe ɔ tamɛ enyi e byɔ ɖo ɔ nɛ
biblo sixu vɛwu tawun hwenu syɛnsyɛn ɖe tiin ɖo tɛntin yetɔn e
e ɖo co wanyiyi nɔ dɛ ɖo nu bi nɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn kpo nukunɖiɖo mitɔn kpo kpodo hunkuku mitɔn kpan ɖo
nugbo ɔ wanyiyi vɔ gbeɖe a
kɔ enyi asu kpo asi kpo nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu mawu lɛ e nɔ flin akpa do nu yeɖee lɛ ɖɔ emi yi wan nu emiɖee lɛ nɔ gbeji nu emiɖee lɛ e ɔ e bɔ ɖo sɔgbe kpo nugbododo titewungbe jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba ɖebu sixu e
ði xwedo ɖe tɔn ɔ tɛ nyi asu ɖe tɔn
linlin tɛ asi ɖe ɖo nɔ ɖo do asu tɔn nyi e wu
huzuhuzu tɛ lɛ asu kpo asi kpo ɖe blo
pɔlu wlan do nyi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ e wu ɖɔ nyɔnu lɛ nɔ miɖee ɖo asu mitɔn lɛ glɔ nɔ miɖee ɖo aklunɔ glɔ gbɔn e
blo ɖokpo bɔ e jɛxa ɛ
bib ði klisu kpa acɛ nu agun ɔ e ɖe wanyiyi gbɔn e ɔ ɖokpo wɛ asu klisanwun ɖe ɖo wa tɔn kpo wanyiyi kpo gbɔn
enyi e wa ɔ asi tɔn sin ayi bɔ sisi ɖiɖo gudo ninɔ kpo glɔ tɔn do kpo nɔ jɛmɛ
cathy yi gbe ɖɔ alɔwliwli nɔ byɔ huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ si ɖɔ hwenu nyi nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ ɖe e ɔ ɖo nyiɖee si nɔ kpe nukun nyiɖee wu
alɔwliwli byɔ huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ ɖo asi ɖo ɖo nɔ kpɛnzɔn asu
e nɔ bɔwu hwebinu a nu lɛ biblo jehovah jlo gbɔn e bɔ mi
asu tɔn fred ɖɔ gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa bɔwu nu mi a
ðo alɔwliwli mɛ ɔ tamɛ linlin do mɛ we ji cobo wa nu bɔ e vɛwu
ɖɛxixo jehovah tɔn kpo to ɖiɖo nu asi e ganji kpo nɔ ɖo nu lɛ hɛn bɔwu wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
hwenu tagba lɛ ɖo asu kpo asi kpo ɖe tɛntin e ɔ wanyiyi nɔ dɔn ca bonu nɔ bu ganji gbɔn
bonu alɔwliwli ɖe lido ɔ mɛ we lɛ ɖo yi gbe ɖɔ emi mɛ bi wɛ nyi
ɖo nɔ mɔ yeɖee gbɔ nɔ jlo do hwɛ kɛ yeɖee
nugbo ɔ sunnu ɔ kpo nyɔnu ɔ kpo bi wɛ wa nu nyi do
e ɖo co enyi nu nyi ɔ ali wɛ hun nu bɔ nuwanyido enɛ lɛ nu bɔ nɔ hwɛ kɛ yeɖee tɛn wanyiyi dɔn ca bonu nɔ bu ganji
ɔ wanyiyi nɔ ku hun e nɔ xomɛ e nɔ hɛn mɛ do xomɛ a
e ɖo nɔ yawu se nu jɛ mɛɖee gbe mɛ
sin xomɛ o kɛ mi ɖiɖɔ do nujɔnu mɛ nɔ byɔ mɛɖesɔhwe kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo e nɔ asu kpo asi kpo lɛ tawun bɔ nɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ nɔ sɛkpɔ yeɖee
we tɛ biblu ɖe xa mɛ do xoɖoxamɛ ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ wu
etɛwu asu kpo asi kpo lɛ ɖo nɔ ɖe wanyiyi yeɖee lɛ ɖo walɔ yetɔn lɛ mɛ
biblu nu titewungbe asu kpo asi kpo lɛ bɔ ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do xɔ yiyi nu yeɖee wu
enyi e wa nu xa asi ɖe kpo wanyiyi kpo a ɔ e sixu vɛwu bonu e mɔ vivi ɖo akpaxwe alɔwliwli tɔn enɛ ɔ mɛ
sunnu ɔ sixu nɔ yawu yi gbe hu nyɔnu ɔ bi ɖo ɖo jlo tɔn hwe ɔ
klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo lɛ ɖo nɔ ɖe wanyiyi yeɖee lɛ ɖo walɔ yetɔn lɛ mɛ
aniwu jlo xoɖoxamɛ tɔn ɖiɖo nu mɛ ɖevo zɛ asu alo asi mɛtɔn wu nyla
wanyiyi ɖaxo ɖiɖo nu mawu kpo nɔzo kpo bɔ mɛɖebu alo nu ɖebu kancica alɔwliwli ɖe tɔn mɛ a
alɔwliwli ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ tagba byɔ mɛ alo gba ɖo sunnu ɔ abi nyɔnu ɔ huzu kannumɔ nu fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ kpinkpɔn wutu
e ɖo xa jlo mɔhun alo jlo xoɖoxamɛ tɔn ɖebu e ɖo nu mɛ ɖevo zɛ asu alo asi mɛtɔn wu e titewungbe tɔn
alɔlwɛ ɖuɖu xa mɛ e wli alɔ xa a e tlɛ nyi wanyiyi ma ɖo sin nu bɔ e ɖo nyi alɔ
flinflin ɖɔ mawu mɔ nukunnu jɛ linlin kpo walɔ mitɔn lɛ bi kpo wu bɔ jlo mi ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ nɔ ji e syɛn xa matie eblee lɛ
mɛ xo ɔ gbakpe sɔ
etɛ biblu ɖɔ do kinklan wu
etɛ asu ɖe alo asi ɖe zɔn kplakpla ji klan a
tagba syɛnsyɛn kpa zinkpo ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ lɛ e sixu bɔ mɛ ɖokpo alo mɛ we lɛ bi tamɛ do kinklan alo mɛ ji
ðo to ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛ wli alɔ lɛ e vlɔɖowe jɛji nɔ wa yeɖee lɛ
nu enɛ ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ a tagba alɔwliwli tɔn lɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ e nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ
e ɖo nukun kpɛvi do kinklan kpo mɛ e wli alɔ xa e kpo a
e sixu mɔ ɖɔ kinklan wɛ ɖeɖɛ tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ e co biblo nɔ hɛn tagba ɖevo lɛ wa hwɛhwɛ
tinmɛ enɛ tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ asu ɖe alo asi ɖe ɖo klan nu mawu dɔn ca ɔ a
tɛgbɛnu wɛ jehovah nɔ alɔwliwli do mɔ
kɔ hinhɛn mɛ ɖɔ mi mɛ bi wɛ ɖo gbe nu mawu ɖo asu kpo asi kpo lɛ bɔ nɔ tɛnkpɔn yawu ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ bonu wa syɛn o
etɛ sixu bɔ mɛ wli alɔ e ɖe tamɛ do kinklan ji
nukunɖiɖo ɖo ji a lɛ e sixu dɔn tagba wa alɔwliwli ɖe mɛ
hwenu mɛɖe ɖɔ emi ɖo awajijɛ ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ wa nyi a e ɔ mɛ ɔ sixu mɔ mɔ ɖɔ e tafu emi tlɛ sixu sin xomɛ tawun
ðo nu nɔ ci nu mɛ ɖokpo e gbɔn vo do mɛ ɖe ɔ tɔn bɔ yi vovo lɛ wutu ɔ tagba lɛ sixu wa alo lɛ sixu do akwɛ hɛnnumɔ lɛ kpo vi lɛ kplɔnkplɔn kpo wu
e ɖo co awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo gege nɔ mɔ ɖɔgbotinsa nu tagba mɔhun lɛ ɖo nɔ jo mawu do nɔ ali
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ sixu bɔ e klan
hweɖelɛnu ɔ hwɛ mɛtɔn sixu jɔ ɖɔ e klan
jlo do ɖɔ e kun kpe nukun do xwedo mɛtɔn wu o adakaxomɛwu zɛ xwe wu kpo hwenu jehovah sinsɛn wa vɛwu bi e kpo nyi ninɔmɛ bunɔ bɔ mɛɖe lɛ klan e ɖe lɛ
klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo ɖeɖee ɖo tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɔ wɛ ɖo alɔwliwli yetɔn mɛ e ɖo alɔdo ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ
nɔvi sunnu enɛ lɛ mɔ nu gege e sixu asu kpo asi kpo lɛ bɔ zan weɖexamɛ xo mawu tɔn tɔn
etɛ biblu ɖɔ nu klisanwun ɖeɖee wli alɔ xa mɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ a lɛ e
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ e nɔ wa jɛ bɔ klisanwun ɖe nɔ wli alɔ xa mɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ a e ɖe
enyi asu alo asi ɔ tlɛ mɔ nu jɛ wu kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ mɛɖeɖovo mawu tɔn wɛ e nyi ɖo e ɖe wutu
vi ɖebu ji lɛ e nyi mɛ ɖo alɔcyɔnmɛji mawu tɔn glɔ
pɔlu tinmɛ ɖɔ hwi nyɔnu ɖi nu nu klisu ɔ tuun nu hwlɛn asu towe gan a
abi hwi sunnu ɖi nu nu klisu ɔ tuun nu hwlɛn asi towe gan a
agun jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn lɛ bi mɛ wɛ e nɔ ɖibla mɔ asu kpo asi kpo mɛ nyi klisanwun ɖo mɛ e hwlɛn mɛ ɖe ɔ gan e ɖe
etɛ biblu asi klisanwun sin asu nɔ mawu a lɛ e
enyi mɛ ɖi nu nu klisu a ɔ jlo klan ɔ etɛ klisanwun ɖe wa
asi klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ yeɖee do asu yetɔn lɛ glɔ bonu mɛɖe ɖo mɛ ɖi nu nu mawuxo ɔ a ɔ dɔn ɛ gbɔn walɔ tɔn lɛ gblamɛ bɔ e ɖi nu e byɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ xo ɖe a ɖo mɔ zinzan tɔn ɖo sisi gbɔn e
enyi asu alo asi ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ emi klan ɔ lo
ðiɖɔ wɛ wemafɔ enɛ ɖe ɖɔ klisanwun ɔ vo din alɔ wli sɔgbe kpo mawuxowema ɔ kpo a loɔ e ɖo dandan ɖɔ e gbidi kɔ nu ɔ bonu nɔ a
kinklan sixu hɛn fifa kpɛɖe wa
nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya jɛ nukɔn sixu do awajijɛ awajijɛ ji nu alɔwliwli towe akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ gbe klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo lɛ ɖo nya jɛ nukɔn
e ɖo co enyi mi lido ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ mi xoglo nu elɔ nɔ mi do ɖɔ lɛ e
nwt ðiɖɔ wɛ pɔlu ɖe ɖɔ asu kpo asi kpo lɛ nu nyi yetɔn ɖo xwedo mɛ lɛ e a
etɛwu klisanwun lɛ hɛn ɔ blo bɔ alɔwliwli yetɔn ɖo awajijɛ kpa
hwenu vɛwu tawun lɛ e mɛ wɛ mi ɖe bɔ alɔwliwli gege ɖo gbigba wɛ do mi co mi hɛn ɔ mi blo bɔ alɔwliwli mitɔn ɖo awajijɛ kpa mi
nugbo ɔ klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo ɖeɖee zunfan togun jehovah tɔn nɔ zan weɖexamɛ mawuxowema ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ xwedo gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn sin e sixu hɛn nu mawu dɔn ca e ɖo mak
akpaxwe ɔ e ɖyɔ nyikɔ lɛ
akpaxwe ɔ xota linlin biblu tɔn do asigbigbɛ abi asugbigbɛ kpo kinklan kpo wu ɖo wema hɛn miɖee ðo wanyiyi mawu tɔn mɛ
kunnuɖiɖe zanzan ɖo danube ɔ to nɔ vivi
awajijɛnɔ elɔ lɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin wɛn jla ɖe wɛ ɖo vigado ɖo budapest hongrie
gbɛzan tɔn mɔ awajijɛ ðo nunamɛ mɛ gbɔn e
alɔwliwli mɛ e kpo nu wu wɛ e kpo
klisanwun ɖe sixu blo gbɔn bɔ alɔwliwli tɔn kpa ɛ e
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖɔ xo do mɛ alɔwliwli e mɔyizi ɔ blo tuto gbɔn e kpo nu jezu ɖɔ do alɔwliwli klisanwun tɔn wu e kpo ji
xota wegɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do nyi asu lɛ kpo asi lɛ kpo tɔn bɔ mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ e ji
nu hu sika e ðe
mɔ ðɔ emi ðo yi nukɔn ðo gbigbɔ lixo wɛ a
mɔ ðɔ emi ðo mɛ ðevo lɛ wɛ a
nukɔnyiyi ɖo wɛ axɔsuɖuto ɔ jijla sin ɔ ɖe e nɔ hun xomɛ nu mi tawun
mi ali vovo hun nu mi bɔ mi wa nu mawu e wu a
miɖesu sixu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo biblu mitɔn lɛ bɔ lɔ wa gbɔn
etɛwu e ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ
xota elɔ lɛ ɖɔ xo do nu taji enɛ lɛ ji
dɔkun ðo nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn mitɔn lɛ e
jɛ sika kwin ɖe ji a
mɛ kpɛɖe jɛn mɔ
e ɖo co livi mɔkpan mɔ nuɖe hu sika tawun
nunywɛ mawu tɔn sika aku sixu nɔ tɛn tɔn mɛ a e wɛ jɔb
mɔhun lɛ ɖo syɛnsyɛn nɔ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ kije wɛ mɔ nunywɛ akwɛ sixu xɔ a e
ðo ali enɛ ɔ etɛ do biba nu e nɔ mɔ sika gbɔn e atɔn sixu mi
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo zɔnlin ɖi gbɔn tɔsisa ɖe kpa wɛ mɔ nu tɔkin ɖɔhun ɖe ɖo kinkɛn wɛ sunvi ɖɔhun
yi do vivi nu ɖɔ sika kwin ɖe wɛ mɔ
e hwe hu fɔfita mɔ hu diamaa ɖagbe bi ɔ
fi ɔ do ɖɔ to mɔ sika kwin ɖevo lɛ vlafo hun
ɖokpo ɔ ɖo azan manawɔn ɖe gbe wa yi ɔ jehovah ɖe xuxu hɔn towe ɖɔ xo xa do wɛn nukunɖiɖo tɔn e nɔ mɔ ɖo biblu mɛ e ji
sixu kpo ɖo hwenu mɔ sika kwin gbigbɔ tɔn towe nukɔntɔn ɔ e flin wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo fɛɛ
ayi towe mɔ tlolo ɖɔ nu tawun hu sika e ɖe wɛ mɔ
bɔ akpakpa sixu do kwin gbigbɔ tɔn ɖevo lɛ biba wu
hweɖelɛnu ɔ sika kwin nabi ɖe nɔ wa xokple ɖo lɛ kpa
ðo klewun ɖe mɛ ɔ ayidɔkun lɛ sixu mɔ sikagɔnu mɔhun gege xɔ amɛlika tɔn mɔkpan
hwenu jɛ biblu xa jehovah tɔn ɖe ji e ɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi ci ayidɔkun ɖo sikagɔnu ɖe gbeje wɛ e ɖɔhun
tamɛ linlin do wemafɔ biblu tɔn lɛ ji ɖebɔdoɖewu bɔ nutuuntuun towe jɛji lobɔ jɛ dɔkun ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ði ayidɔkun nɔ zan eɖee tawun ba mɔ sika e ɖe ɖɔhun ɔ ɖo gan do wɛ ɖesu ba mɔ nugbo xɔ akwɛ biblu tɔn lɛ a
ði ayidɔkun nɔ ayi tlitli sikagɔnu e ɖe ɖɔhun ɔ sixu do gan ɖesu ɖo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ biba kɔn
ayidɔkun ɖe sixu mɔ sika kpɛvi tiwun ɖe ɖo so aditi sinsin lɛ e ɖe mɛ
akpaxwe so enɛ lɛ tɔn ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo ganmu bɔ e sixu gba ɖe sika sin mɛ
e tlolo ɔ sika ɔ sixu nɔ ɖo wexo ɖo ganmu ɔ mɛ
ðo ganmu ɖagbe bi ɔ sixu ɖo sika glamu kpowun ɖo so ɖokpo mɛ
e ɖo mɔ co ɖo ayidɔkun ɔ nukunmɛ ɔ enɛ ɔ kpe xoxo ɖokan do kunkun tɔn wu
ɖokpo ɔ hwenu e zɛ nukplɔnmɛ nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɖɔ xo do klisu wu lɛ wu e ɔ e nɔ byɔ gandido ɖo mɛ si
enɛ wu ɔ enyi tlɛ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ wɛ sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie ɔ etɛ sixu wa bɔ biblu kplɔnkplɔn towe kpo ɖo le hɛn wa nu wɛ
nukplɔnkplɔn sin akpakpa nɔ
lɛ wu ganji
kpo ɖo kan van wɛ enɛ ɔ mɔ nunywɛ mawu tɔn kpo tɔn kpo sin kwin xɔ akwɛ ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e
ku hun sin hudo ɖo lɛ e kpo nu nɔ kanbyɔ do biblu wu lɛ e sin xosin lɛ kpo
kanbyɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ wemafɔ kpo xota ɖetɛ lɛ kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu hugan e ji
ma nu ɖagbeɖagbe mɔ ɖo biblu kplɔnkplɔn towe hwenu lɛ e xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e kun nyi tuun nu kpowun wɛ bɔ wa mɔ o
enɛ wu ɔ do gan kpo ɖo hwiɖee hwe wɛ lido ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ
sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn kpo biblu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn kpo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ bɔ zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ
ðokan do mawuxo xixa ɖo agun mɛ kpodo mawuxoɖiɖɔ kpo wu ɖokan do nukplɔnmɛ wu tim
etɛ sixu wa yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
sixu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo bɔ kpe a gbɔn
huzuhuzu tɛ lɛ sixu blo bɔ alɔ towe se ɖo ɔ mɛ
ezayii ɖo jijɛnu wɛ ɖo egbe gbɔn
hudo tɛ lɛ ɖe din ɖo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn sin akpaxwe ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ mɛ
enɛ ɔ ɖo jijɛnu wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ
ðo xwe tɔn tɔn mɛ ɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn wɛ ɖɔ mawuxo ɔ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo
akpaxwe gudo tɔn enɛ tɔn kan klisanwun lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ ɖɔ ji nyɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ e jɛ hwetɔnnu ɔ blo nu enɛ blewun
ði mɛ ɖo wezun e ɖe mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ mi nukɔnyiyi ɖaxo nukplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin ɔ ɖo e wu
miɖesunɔ nɔ so nu nukɔnyiyi enɛ gbɔn
mi nɔ wa nu wu mi kpe e bi nɔ jla axɔsuɖuto ɔ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo a
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo gege ɖo nyikɔ wɛ ba nyi gbexosin hwebinu tɔn alo tɔn
e nɔ vivi nu mi ɖesu ɖɔ mɛ gege nɔ yi gbe yi wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e alo ɖo yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin ɖevo lɛ mɛ a ce
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo hudo gege tɔn
agun wɛ e nɔ ɖo ayi xwewu xwewu
hun enyi mɛxo agun tɔn nɔ agun ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ tɔn wɛ ɖo jɛxa ba nyi xwewu xwewu
enɛ ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu mɔkpan ɖo do gan ba nyi tɔn lɛ
nu enɛ ɔ enyi mi nyi nɔvi sunnu alo nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ ɖo bibi do aklunɔ sin ɔ wu wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe kɔ
etɛ nyi e yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo bɔ
xa timɔtee
xogbe glɛkigbe tɔn e lilɛ do jlo nyi e sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi e dlɛn alɔ nuɖe vlafo alɔ mɛtɔn ɖiga do nu ɔ a
pɔlu zan xogbe enɛ do ji ɖɔ nukɔnyiyi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nɔ byɔ gandido
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo tamɛ do nu e nyi sɔ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e ji wɛ
e sixu nɔ nyi tɔn ɖe din e mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ klisanwun tɔn lɛ
jɛ nukɔn ɔ e van kan nyi tɔn ɖe
e wa ya e ɔ e ɖo nukun ɖɔ emi ɖo jijɔ klisanwun tɔn ɖeɖee bɔ emi nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe e
ðo ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ e nɔ van kan tawun ba ɖo nuwukpikpe e ɖo ɖo do sixu kpe nukun do ɖevo lɛ wu ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e
ɖokpo ɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee jlo nyi gbexosin ɖo betɛli alo yeɖee jo ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbigba mɛ lɛ e ɖo dlɛn alɔ do nukɔn ba do sixu kpe nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe lɛ e wu
nu mi do nu xo mawu tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bi ɖɔ mi yi nukɔn ɖo sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ mɛ gbɔn e
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu zan hlɔnhlɔn yetɔn ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ gbɔn
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo e ɖo wa nu gege ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ e xa nunywɛxo
nɔvi nɔ wa ɖo betɛli e ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo biblu kpo wema jinjɔn biblu ji lɛ kpo zinzin mɛ nɔ bla
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo winnyawinnya gege nɔ ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbigba kpo nukunkpikpe do wu kpo mɛ
enyi adla ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ nu lɛ nɔ mɛ nu wa lɛ e
mɛ winnyawinnya nyi gbexosin lɛ e gege nɔ bɔ e nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ayi ɔ ji lɛ kpo mɛ nɔ do gbe ɖevo lɛ e kpo
dɔnkpɛvu ɖe ɖyɔ linlin e nɔ ɖo do mawu tɔn wu e gbɔn le tɛ e hɛn wa
mi sixu mawu mavɔmavɔ e e gbɔn
nu mawu kpo ayi mɛtɔn bi kpo ɖo taji tawun nu
enyi nu ci nu nɔvi sunnu aaron e ci nu hwi lɔ ɔ lo
xwedo klisanwun tɔn ɖe mɛ wɛ e su ɖe co e ɖɔ kple lɛ kpo kunnuɖegbe kpo nɔ nu mi
e jlo mawu kpo awajijɛ kpo e nɔ kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ aniwu emi ɖo awajijɛ a e ji
etɛ e wa
aaron tɛnkpɔn ɖo aca ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo bɔ biblu xixa nusisɔ nu kple lɛ kpo xosin lɛ nina ɖo kple lɛ hwenu kpo
ðo taji ɔ e jɛ ɖɛ xo ji hwɛhwɛ
ee wanyiyi e ɖo nu jehovah e ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɔ e jɛ nukɔn yi ji ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
sin hwenɛnu ɔ aaron ɖu gbexosin xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo adla hwenu kpo mawuxoɖiɖɔ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ kpo sin vivi
egbe ɔ aaron nɔ wa ɖo betɛli nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe
ali e e ci
jehovah mɔ ɖɔ e
ðɛhan ɔ jihan ɖɔ do jehovah wu ɖɔ nuɖe nɔ hwedo mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi lɛ a
xa ðɛhan
lobɔ enyi mi mawu kpo mitɔn bi kpo ɔ awajijɛ e sixu a e wɛ mi nɔ mɔ
aniwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ nɔte mawu mavɔmavɔ
hwenu ɖo kan van wɛ ba kpe nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe lɛ e wu e ɔ nɔte mawu mavɔmavɔ
micee jehovah sixu bɔ tɔn lɛ nɔte cobɔ e ɖe lɛ nu alo nɔte bɔ ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖyɔ e nɔ nɔ gudo nu hwebinu
e do vi sunnu ɖe sin akpa nu ablaxamu loɔ e ɖo ɖo nuɖiɖi kpo suulu kpo
ninɔ nɔ bɔwu a nux
enyi mi nɔ nɔ ɖo tamɛ do nukunɖiɖo mitɔn jɛnu a lɛ e ji wɛ ɔ awakanmɛ sixu wa ku mi bi
loɔ nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi zan hwenu mitɔn blo bonu kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e
ali mi sixu wa ɖe e atɔn ɖie
tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ klisanwun tɔn lɛ
gbɔn xo mawu tɔn xixa kpo tamɛ linlin kpo gblamɛ ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖo nunywɛ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ linlin sɔgbe e nutuuntuun kpo nuwukpikpe tamɛ linlin tɔn kpo
jijɔ mɔhun lɛ ɖo taji nu mɛ nɔ nɔ nukɔn ɖo sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ mɛ lɛ e nux
enyi mi ɖo wema junjɔn biblu ji mitɔn lɛ xa wɛ ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi tuun linlin mawu nɔ ɖo do ninɔmɛ gege wu e
ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ ayiɖeɖayi kpo nusisɔ kpo akwɛzinzan kpo zunzun xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo sin xo nɔ mi
enyi mi nɔ zan nu mi ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ɔ mi sixu wa gbeta jehovah nukunmɛ lɛ e kɔn
agun ɔ tɔn lɛ sixu ɖɔ emi nyi gbɔn
nyi
enyi mi nyi nɔvi sunnu alo nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ wa nu wu mi kpe lɛ e bi nɔ kpe nukun do yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖebu mi mɔ e wu
hwenu nɛɛmii nyi tokpɔngan e ɔ e ɖe ɖe lɛ nu mɛɖe lɛ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ
mɛ ɖetɛ lɛ e ɖe
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu mawu nyi kpo jijɔ ɖagbenɔ kpo lɛ e wɛ
ɖagbe lɛ nɔ nɔ hwlahwla gbeɖe a xa timɔtee
enyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu sɔgbe a e nu ɔ sixu wa nu jozɛfu ɖɔhun gbɔn
nu jehovah
enyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu sɔgbe a e nu ɔ etɛ sixu wa
vlafo sixu yawu ɖeɖɛ xo ɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ enyi jɛhun do hwiɖee ji majomajo ɔ hɛn tagba ɔ nyla
nɔvi jozɛfu tɔn lɛ wa nu agɔ xa ɛ loɔ e hɛn do xomɛ a
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e dohwɛ agɔ jozɛfu ɛ do ganmɛ
e ɖo co e jo jehovah do ali ɖo hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ
etɛ mɛ enɛ kɔ do
xo jehovah tɔn wɛ ɛ ðɛh
nwt hwenu tɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ fo e ɔ jozɛfu kpe nu wu ba wa bunɔ ɖe
bib hwenu ɖo xa tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ wɛ e ɔ nɔ xoɖɛ byɔ nunywɛ nɔ wa nu nɔ ɖɔ xo kpo xomɛfifa kpo nɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo mawu
jehovah xa
aniwu mi ɖo hɛn ayixa do mi nɔ ɖɔ mawuxo gbɔn e wu
sixu sɔgbe do ninɔmɛ nɔ ɖyɔ lɛ e wu gbɔn
fɔtoo ɖo e kpo gbavi jlo wlɛnwin ðevo a
pɔlu byɔ timɔtee ɖɔ cobonu wa hun ɖokan do mawuxo xixa ɖo agun mɛ kpodo mawuxoɖiɖɔ kpo wu ɖokan do nukplɔnmɛ wu
hɛn ayixa do hwiɖee wu hɛn ayixa do nu mɛ wɛ ɖe ɔ wu
tim timɔtee nyi axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɔ nu e ɖe hwenɛnu
enyi e hɛn ayixa do nu mɛ wɛ e ɖe ɔ wu ɔ jɛn tɔn kpa ɛ
e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ xwle wɛn ɔ mɛ lɛ gbɔn e nɔ dɔn hwebinu a
bonu xo tɔn kpo ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ byɔ wɛ ɔ e ɖo nɔ ɖyɔ wlɛnwin e nɔ zan do nu mɛ lɛ e sɔgbe kpo hudo mɛ lɛ tɔn kpo
ðo mi nyi axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ mi lɔ ɖo wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
hwenu mi ɖo mawuxo ɖɔ wɛ sin hɔn ɖe kɔn jɛ hɔn ɖe kɔn e ɔ mi nɔ wu hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ mɛ lɛ kun nɔ nɔ xwegbe o
ðo xa ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu byɔ xwe ɖe lɛ gbe a
enyi wɛ e nyi ɖo xa towe mɛ ɔ etɛwu wlɛnwin ɖevo do jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ a
kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn sixu hɛn le wa gbɔn
kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn nyi wlɛnwin ɖagbe ɖe bɔ e do jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ
gege wɛ ɖo alɔ ɖo wɛ ɖo enɛ mɛ titewungbe tɔn ɖo le hɛn wa nu wɛ tawun
nɔ hwenu nɔ yi jla wɛn ɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo pipan kpo kpo glintɛn lɛ tokpletɛn lɛ kpo gbɔjɛtɛn lɛ kpo kpodo fi ɖo agbawungba e ɖevo lɛ kpan
enyi ɖe ɖo ayi ganji ɔ e kpewu jɛ xa mɛɖe ji gbɔn xo jɛ ɖo to e ɖe kike vi mɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ kpikpa alo nuɖe kinkanbyɔ ɛ do tɔn wu gblamɛ
enyi ɔ ɖo yiyi wɛ ɔ ɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo do wemafɔ ɖe ji nɔ kan nuɖe byɔ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu mɛ ɔ ɖɔ lɛ e nɔ bɔ e nɔ kan do ɔ
etɛ sixu wa do kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn wu
etɛwu mɔ ɖɔ linlin davidi ɖo kpa nu jehovah e ɖo taji hwenu ɖo towe wa wɛ e
enyi kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn nɔ vɛwu nu hun jo gbe o
eddie nyi gbexosin ɖe ɖo toxo tɔn mɛ e nɔ sixu ɖɔ xo xa mɛ lɛ ɖo agbawungba a
e wa kpewu
etɛ ɛ
e ɖɔ ðo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn mitɔn hwenu ɔ nyi kpo asi kpo nɔ do nu xo mi ɖɔ hwenu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ xo ɖe ba do wɛn ɔ alɔ ɖɔ linlin yetɔn lɛ e
mi nɔ kan nu byɔ ɖevo lɛ
din ɔ akpakpa nɔ eddie do kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn wu
enyi wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo ɖo alɔ bi nu wɛ ɔ mɛ bi mɔ nu jɛ nukɔnyiyi towe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo wu xa timɔtee
hu ɔ kpa nu mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ davidi ɖɔhun eyɛ jihan ɖɔ nɔ doku nu mawu mavɔmavɔ hwebinu gɔn mlamla ɛ gbeɖe a
mawu mavɔmavɔ mɛ wɛ nɔ go ɖe mɛ ze yeɖee hwe lɛ ɖoto mi
enyi jehovah ɖe tlɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ ɔ etɛwu xomɛ ɖo hun
davidi jihan ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ
enyi azɔn alo kpikpo bɔ nɔ sixu wa nu gege ɖo ɔ mɛ a ɔ lo
nɔ flin hwebinu ɖɔ hwenu nɔ ma wɛnɖagbe ɔ xa mɛ nɔ kpe nukun do wu lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo e ɔ wa wɛ ɖe nɔ mawu mitɔn su
enyi e wli do ganmɛ ɖo nuɖiɖi towe wu ɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo do nugbo ɔ wu hwenu ali tɔn hun nu lɛ e lobɔ enɛ nɔ hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun tawun
enyi xwedo klan ɖo sinsɛn lixo e mɛ wɛ ɖe zunfan gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ ɔ xomɛ nɔ hun jehovah
e tlɛ nyi ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ ɔ hɛn ɔ kpa nu jehovah yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
enyi e ɖe gege nu ɖo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ ɔ sixu nyi nyɔna ɖe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
enyi ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ jehovah do nu jɛn wɛ
vlafo sixu ɖyɔ nuɖe lɛ ɖo tuto towe lɛ alo gbɛzinzan towe mɛ do sixu nɔ gege ɖo nugbo xɔ akwɛ mawu tɔn mima xa mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hudo nukunɖiɖo tɔn lɛ e mɛ
ɔ nukɔnyiyi towe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kpo gbɛzan mɛɖee zize do tɔn towe kpo sixu hɛn nyɔna ɖaxo lɛ wa nu towe lɛ
lobɔ e sin hwiɖee hwe ɖo gan do wɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e wu bɔ mɛ ɖevo yi wan nu jehovah lɛ e yi wan nu nu wa wɛ ɖe e nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun yetɔn mɛ bɔ nɔ nɔ gudo towe
enyi mi ɖo jehovah wɛ e ɔ e lin alo yɔywɛ ɖe jɛn ɖie ɔ mi bi wɛ hɛn ɔ mi yi nukɔn ɖo mi nɔ ɛ e mɛ
klisanwun zin lɛ e sixu mɛ lɛ bɔ yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn
mi ɖɔ xo do xota enɛ ji ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn mitɔn bɔ e mɛ
venecia nyi nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo venezuela e ɖɔ gbeɖe ɖɔ ɖekunnu gbɔn alokan ji a
e ylɔ mɛtuunmɛ ɖe xwle e wɛn klewun ɖe
ðyɔvi ɔ jlo tawun ɖɔ xo do biblu ji bɔ venecia jɛ biblu xa ɛ ji
gudo mɛ ɔ ɔ blo baptɛm
venecia ɖɔ din ɖɔ kunnuɖiɖe gbɔn alokan ji ɖo le tawun
ðo liberia ɔ ɖo aca nɔ hɛn wema mitɔn lɛ yi wemaxɔmɛ
tɔn ɖe lɛ mɔ tlati jeunes vous faire votre
ɖo asi tɔn byɔ ɛ
ɖɔ xo do tlati ɔ ji xa kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ gbɛzan mitɔn do wa
dɔnkpɛvu ɖokpo ɖɔ jlo zan do mawu
jɛ biblu xa ɛ ji
nya ɖe yi gbe nu wlan ɖɔ xogbe gbɔdonumɛ tɔn mitɔn lɛ su nukun mɛ tawun
nu ɖagbe wɛ ɖe nux
etɛwu mi ɖo biblu lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖo jlo ɖaxo nu mawuxowema ɔ kplɔnkplɔn yeɖesunɔ
mi sixu mɛ lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖɔ mawuxo ɔ gbɔn
aniwu e ɖo do gan mɛ sixu wa nyi nu lɛngbɔhwan mawu tɔn e
etɛwu mi ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu do yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ
wɛnðagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla wɛ nyi nukɔntɔn e ɖe nu jezu e
e ɖo co e hwenu do mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu nyi kpo kpo
kpinkplɔn mɛ mɔhun ɖo taji sɔ egbe
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ mɛ ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ yi wɛ lɛ e sin ɖo jijɛji wɛ
mɛ blo baptɛm a lɛ e ɖo mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ e ɖo dandan ɖɔ nɔ biblu yeɖesunɔ
e ɖo bɔ nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nugbo ɔ
ðo agun mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ e ɖo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi sunnu lɛ bonu syɛnsyɛn jɛxa ba nyi tɔn kpo mɛxo agun tɔn kpo
kancica tɛ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ kplɔnkplɔn kpo kpa mɛ e ɖe kpo tɛntin bɔ pɔlu ɖɔ
cobonu mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mitɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ biblu ɔ yeɖesunɔ ɔ etɛ midɛɛ ɖo ɖo wiwa wɛ
etɛwu mawuxowema ɔ kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ ɖo taji
jlo titewungbe mɔhun tuuntuun klisanwun kolosinu lɛ bɔ kpewu zan tɔn aklunɔ jlo gbɔn e nɔ wa nu nukun tɔn mɛ ɔ hwebinu
enɛ bɔ nɔ wa nu ɖagbe tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ ɖo taji ɔ ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla mɛ
jehovah ɖe ɖo ɖo aca biblu kplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɖe cobɔ tɔn kpa ɛ
mi ɖo biblu lɛ bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖo
enɛ wu ɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ enyi lɛ ɖɔ linlin yetɔn lɛ jɛ agɔ do nukplɔnmɛ mawuxowema ɔ tɔn lɛ alo kan nu vɛwu lɛ e byɔ ɔ sixu xosin jinjɔn biblu ji lɛ e a
enyi xa jezu pɔlu kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo didɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ gbɔn e ɔ nɔ tamɛ do linsyɛnsyɛn yetɔn ɖo kunkpla wa nu jehovah wɛ ɖe e gbɔn e ji a
mi mɛ bi wɛ ɖo hudo nutuuntuun kpo weɖexamɛ gosin xo mawu tɔn mɛ e kpo tɔn
lobɔ enyi mi nɔ ɖɔ le tobutobu mi nɔ mɔ ɖo biblu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn mitɔn mɛ e nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɔ mi sixu kanmɛsyɛn bɔ lɔ ɖokan do mawuxowema ɔ kplɔnkplɔn wu mɔ le mɔhun lɛ
ðɔ e sixu mɛ lɛ bɔ ɖo aca biblu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn ɖe gbɔn e ɖokpo
sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ sixu nɔ biblu ɔ hwɛhwɛ gbɔn
gbɔn e ɖagbe ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɛ e nɔ sɔnu nu nu nɔ xa ɛ e gbɔn e
sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ e xa xota ɖevo lɛ wema etɛ biblu mɛ tawun tɔn sin akpaxwe ɖe lɛ xa wemafɔ e ɖe lɛ e
ɛ bonu e sɔnu nu kple lɛ kpo linlin ɔ kpo xosin
do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɖɔ e nɔ xa atɔxwɛ kpo reveillez vous
alɔdido biblu towe gbɔn bɔ malin malin mɛ ɔ xo mawu tɔn kplɔnkplɔn eɖesunɔ nɔ vivi
sixu towe yi wan nu biblu ɔ kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo gbɔn
enyi biblu ɖe yi wan nu mawuxowema ɔ kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo ɔ etɛ e wa
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi kun ɖo gbidi kɔ nu mɛɖe ɖɔ e nɔ xa biblu nɔ o
loɔ nu mi zan azɔwanu tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mi lɛ e do mitɔn lɛ bonu wanyiyi ɖo nu biblu ɔ e
e wa ya ɔ nu ci nu ɖɛhan jihan elɔ e sixu ci nu ɖo ayi jlɔjlɔ e nyɛ ɔ mawu kpa ninɔ wɛ nyi ɖagbe nu nyɛ
gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo biblu ayijlɔjlɔnɔ kpo mɔhun kpo wu
jezu wɛnɖagbe ɔ lɛ gbɔn
ðo matie wemata ɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ jezu tɔn lɛ e
e ɖɔ nu tawun tawun wa lɛ e nu
lɛ ganji hwenu jezu ɖo ɖɔ mawuxo ɔ kpa gbɔn e wɛ e
enɛ gudo ɔ ɖido gle ɔ ji
mɔ wlɛnwin jezu nɔ zan lɛ e bɔ zaan ɔ lɔ huzu nugbo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn lɛ
mi hɛn ɔ mi biblu mitɔn lɛ bɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla nɔ kpa
nu mi ali mi sixu ɖe e we
jezu xwle wɛn ɔ mɛ gbɔn ɖo tɔn mɛ
mi sixu lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo xa mɛ lɛ jezu ɖɔhun gbɔn
nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo xa mɛ lɛ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ jezu nɔ ɖɔ xo nu mɛ do axɔsuɖuto ɔ ji
ði ɔ e ɖɔ xo ɖo xa nawe ɖe ɖo jakɔbu tɔn kɔn ɖo malin malin do sicaa toxo ɔ hɛn le wa tawun
jaan e ɖɔ xo xa matie levii nyi ɖe e
wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ ɖɔ xo gege do enɛ wu a matie yi gbe nu jezu ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ e wa huzu ahwanvu emitɔn e
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ ɔ jezu ɖɔ xo nu natanayɛli ɖo linlin agɔ do nazalɛtinu lɛ wu e kpo kpo
enɛ natanayɛli bɔ e ɖyɔ linlin tɔn
e wa nu ɖevo lɛ do nu jezu gosin nazalɛti e ɖo kplɔnkplɔn mɛ wɛ e wu
jaan enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe lɛ bonu nɔ vo ɖɔ xo ɖo xa mɛ lɛ kpo kpo
mɛ mi gbɔn lɛ e mɔ bɔ ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ ɖo nu ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ tɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu bɔ zan xogbe tɔn lɛ e wu lobɔ enɛ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu
jezu nu jlo mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo nu wɛnɖagbe ɔ e gbɔn
mi sixu lɛ bɔ nugbo biblu tɔn kpinkplɔn mɛ bi alɔ nu gbɔn
nɔ do afɔ nu jlo mɛ lɛ ɖo e
taan klewun ɖe wɛ jezu ɖo do wa tɔn
e ɖo co e hwenu do do afɔ nu jlo mɛ lɛ ɖo nu wɛnɖagbe ɔ e
ði ɔ jezu nɔ tɔjihun ɖe mɛ ci nu ɖɔ e ɖo ataa ɖe ji ɖɔhun nu ahwan ɖe
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ e blo nujiwu bɔ wli hwevi gege wa ɖɔ ɖɔ din ɔ lɛ wɛ nɔ dɔn wa
etɛ mɛ xogbe jezu tɔn lɛ kpo walɔ tɔn lɛ kpo kɔ do
nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ dɔn nikodɛmu nyi hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo jwifu lɛ tɔn sin ɖokpo e
e jlo tuun nu enyi e ɖɔ xo xa jezu ɖo agbawungba ɔ xɛsi ɖi do nu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ e wu
jezu ɖyɔ alɔ ɖi hwenu tɔn gwe a e ɖɔ xo xa nikodɛmu zanmɛ ɖo fi mɛ lɛ ɖe a e
jaan etɛ enɛ lɛ sixu mi
vi mawu tɔn ɔ hwenu hɛn nuɖiɖi mɛ lɛ tɔn lido
mi lɔ ɖo nɔ do gan yi mɛ lɛ nɔ biblu xa a ce
enyi mi nɔ xa lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ huzu nugbo biblu tɔn alɔ se lɛ e
mi sixu bɔ nɔ hɛn mɛ tlɛ ɖo jlo kpɛɖe lɛ e mɛ
mi sixu nɔ ylɔ lɛ ɖɔ nu mi hwenu mi nɔ yi mɛ lɛ e kpo hwenu mi nɔ yi biblu xa mɛ lɛ e kpo
kpinkplɔn mɛ kpo wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ kpo mɔhun lɛ bɔ yeɖesunɔ jlo nɔ do afɔ nu jlo mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo e nɔ biblu xa mɛ lɛ
nɔ yawu xo nu kpla ɖo ɔ mɛ a loɔ suuluɖiɖo kpo linsyɛnsyɛn kpo gbavi linsyɛnsyɛn ðo taji
etɛ do mɛ ɖaxo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ tamɛ bɔ biblu ɖɔ xo yetɔn lɛ e wu
ali tɛ lɛ sixu lɛ kpo mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kpo bɔ nɔ yi wan nu nɔvi sunnu yetɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖe
biblu tɔn lɛ wu e jɔ mi bɔ mi yi wan titewungbe nu nɔvi ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ lɛ nɔ wa nu miɖee lɛ e ji xa luki
dɔkasi ɔ nyɔnu ɖe wɛ nɔ do alɔ wamamɔnɔ lɛ ɖesu
mɛ nɔvi nyɔnu hlɔma tɔn nɔ nyi e jɛ tagba ɖesu do mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e tamɛ
hlɔ mi sixu mɛ lɛ bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ e nɔ nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo gbɔn
mɛ lɛ bonu yi wan nu yetɔn lɛ akpaxwe kpo kpo
zin lɛ e sixu nɔ ylɔ mɛ lɛ ɖɔ xwedo emi hwenu ɖo azinzɔnnɔ lɛ kpo mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo wɛ e
enyi e blo ɔ lɛ sixu kpla vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo mɔhun lɛ hwenu
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ mɛxomɔ mitɔn lɛ ɖo nuɖuɖu ɖagbe bɔ xwe yetɔn lɛ gbe ɖo ji
mɛ ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kpo mɛ lɛ kpo nɔ nɔ xomɛ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe tiin nɔ nɔ gletoxo ɖe mɛ bɔ hwenu e nɔ ɖo mawuxo ɖɔ wɛ e ɔ e nɔ yi nɔ nɔ xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e klewun
mɛ ɔ nɔvi sunnu winnyawinnya nɔ xwedo e hwɛhwɛ e ɖe ɖɔ mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi wɛ ɖo mɔ ɖɔ e yi wan nu emi hlɔ
aniwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ayi ɖo nukɔnyiyi sunnu lɛ tɔn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ji
ðo jehovah nɔ zan sunnu lɛ bɔ nɔ nu mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ wutu ɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu lɛ tɛnkpɔn ɖo nuwukpikpe xoɖiɖɔ tɔn
enyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe wɛ nu ɔ sixu ɖoto tɔn ɖe hwenu e ɖo xoɖiɖɔ ɖe ji gbɔn wɛ e a
pɔlu ayi ɖo nukɔnyiyi timɔtee tɔn ji gbɔn
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu agun ɔ tɔn sɔgudo tɔn lɛ ganji gbɔn
e ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn tawun ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ bɔ e ɖo ɖo mɛ wa mɔhun ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e wɛ zɔn mi yi
pɔlu ɖɔ e sixu mɛ gbɔn ɖo kpaa mɛ e hwenu e ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ nu timɔtee e hwi vi ɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo mi ɖo ɖo bu mi ɖe xa klisu jezu ɔ mɛ
nu ɖɔ bɔ se ɖo gege nukɔn ɔ do asi nu mɛ wu e ɖeji do bɔ lɔ sixu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e
pɔlu jo timɔtee do ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi mawu blo ɔ e tuun a
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu wa nu pɔlu ɖɔhun nɔ kpla tɔn kpe nu wu lɛ e do yeɖee ji ɖo tɔn lɛ hwenu ɖo hwenu e jɛxa do e
mɛ ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ hun ali nu nɔvi sunnu mɔhun lɛ bɔ yeɖesunɔ nɔ mɔ mɛkplɔnkplɔn nuɖiɖi suuluɖiɖo kpo wanyiyi e byɔ ɖo klisanwun lɛ si e kpo
biblo nɔ bɔ e nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nyi lɛngbɔhwan mawu tɔn sin ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e nwt
aniwu kpinkplɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ ɖo mya nukun nu mi
kpinkplɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo taji tawun ɖo e ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn ɖo wɛ bɔ nu jehovah sin ali ɖo hunhun wɛ
kpinkplɔn mɛ sin jezu kpo pɔlu kpo ze e kpo ɖo nu ɖu wɛ
jehovah jlo ɖɔ e emitɔn egbe tɔn lɛ ganji bonu wa yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin yetɔn lɛ
mawu jɔwu mi bɔ mi mɛ lɛ lobɔ nuwukpikpe ɖo wa sin hudo tiin ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e so
ðo ninɔmɛ ɔ tɔn ɖo gblegble wɛ bɔ mawuxoɖiɖɔ sin ali lɛ ɖo hunhun wɛ wutu ɔ kpinkplɔn mɛ ɖo taji tawun ɖo mya nukun
etɛwu ɖo kudeji ɖɔ gan do wɛ ɖe mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ e hɛn le wa
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kpinkplɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ byɔ hwenu kpo gandido kpo
jehovah kpo vi tɔn kpo nɔ gudo mitɔn nunywɛ mi bɔ mi kpewu mɛ
xomɛ hun mi ɖo mi mɔ bɔ mɛ mi lɛ e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo gan do wɛ
akpaxwe ɔ nu tawun tawun ji jezu ɖɔ xo do e ɖe lɛ ɖie jla wɛn sɔgbe e
nu mawu lɛ e kpe
nɔ dɔn nu xa lɛ o
ɖeji do mawu wu hwenu mɛ lɛ klan gbe xa e
ɖi xɛsi o
akpaxwe ɔ xa mɛ lɛ ɖo kunnuɖegbe sin wlɛnwin ɖagbeɖagbe ɖe lɛ ɖo wema moaleyi son wehome lizonyizon yewheholuduta ton me mɛ wex
akpaxwe ɔ moaleyi son wehome lizonyizon yewheholuduta ton me wex tinmɛ jijɔ sin hudo e ɖo nyi ɖagbe lɛ e
hwenu lɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ jla wɛ e ɔ ɖo mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ linsyɛnsyɛn ɖo dandan hweɖelɛnu
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo ghana bɔ dɔnkpɛvu ɖokpo yi wema mitɔn ɖo asi tɔn wa hɔn hwla do e nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ mɔkpan
nɔvi sunnu ɔ yi ɛ kpo azɔn gege wa xo go e gbe ɖokpo nyavi ɔ bonu kan do ɔ a
nɔvi sunnu ɔ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ emi ɛ e sixu biblu gbɔn e bɔ e yi gbe
sin hwe enɛ ɔ e nɔ hwla do jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖe a
ɖe lɛ gudo ɔ nyavi ɔ blo baptɛm ɖo ɖe ji
rauthe ɖo kunnuɖegbe ɖo xwe lɛ mɛ
kplekple ahwan e wa yi lɛ e bi tɔn nuti a ɖɔhun enyi e sɔ do ahwan ɖaxo wɛ e ɖe ɖo elɔpu din e wu ɔ nɛ
mɔjɛmɛ atɔxwɛ glɛnsigbe zosun tɔn do wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ee wa ɖi bu to ɖo gudo mɛ e wu e nɛ
ðo ahwan ɔ wutu ɔ atɔxwɛ ɖo gbe ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn sin nukɔnyiyi ɖekpo ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɖo taji ɔ ɖo allemagne kpo france kpo
ðo ahwan baɖabaɖa kpe ɔ mɛ bi e wutu ɔ biblu lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbododo ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ nyi ɔ tɔn o e mɛ bi a
e ɖo co kudeji jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ
wilhelm hildebrandt jlo wa axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn xojlawema nɔ sunmɛ sunmɛ bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ bible e nabi ɖe do flansegbe mɛ
e wa france nyi hwebinu tɔn wɛ a loɔ sɔja allemagne tɔn wɛ
mɛ enɛ ɖo sɔja sin awu ɖe mɛ bɔ e ɖɔ ɖe wɛ e jla wɛn fifa tɔn ɖe france tɔn lɛ
wema mɛ e do atɔxwɛ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ biblu allemagne gege ɖevo lɛ ɖo jlo jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn hwenu nyi sɔja e
nɔvi sunnu lemke nyi ji tɔn e ɖo gbe ɖɔ emi mɔ ɖo emitɔn lɛ mɛ
sɔja ɖe wɛ georg kayser nyi yi ahwangbenu e lɛkɔ wa e ɔ e huzu mawu nugbo ɔ ɖe
etɛ jɛ
e xo go biblu lɛ sin wema ɖokpo zunfan nugbo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo ɖo ahwanfunfun
enɛ gudo ɔ e wa byɔ ɖɔ e zan ahwanfunnu a e
ðo ahwan ɔ gudo ɔ e nyi gbexosin ɖe wa enɛ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo nu xwe mɔkpan
biblu lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖiɖo zɔ nu ɔ sin xo wu a co linlin yetɔn kpo walɔ yetɔn kpo gbɔn vo tawun do mɛ ɖeɖee yi gbe nu ahwan lɛ e tɔn lɛ
hans holterhoff zan kɛkɛvi elɔ do jla
ðo allemagne ɔ enyi ayixa mɛɖe tɔn nuɖe ɔ to ɔ tɔn ɖɔ nu mɛ ɔ wa ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ e a e ɖo co biblu jɛji ɖɔ emi kun ɖo ahwan mɛ ɖo ali ɖebu o
hans holterhoff ɖɔ emi kun ahwan o bɔ e ɛ yi ganxo ɖo finɛ ɔ e kunkpla ahwan lɛ e bi
lɛ bla ɛ do awu e nɔ do bla taɖunɔ lɛ e mɛ nɔ mɛ bɔ afɔ tɔn lɛ kpo alɔ tɔn lɛ kpo bi kuyɛ
hwenu lɛ mɔ ɖɔ enɛ kun bonu e lɛkɔ wa gbeta tɔn ji o e ɔ blo nu ɖi jlo hu wɛ ɖɔhun
e ɖo co hans nɔ gbeji bɔ ahwan ɔ fo
nɔvi ɖevo yi ahwan ɔ lɛ e ɖɔ emi kun zan ahwanfunnu o byɔ ɖɔ e ɖe byɔ ahwanfunfun a lɛ e nu emi
rauthe ɖo mɛ ɖɔ lɛ e mɛ bɔ e ɖe pipangan sin
e ɖe nu konrad mortter kpo reinhold kpo
krafzig doku ɖɔ e ɖe nu emi lɛ e kun bonu emi yi fi e nɔ ahwan ɔ ɖe e o
biblu enɛ lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo kudeji jehovah sɔgbe xa nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo do wanyiyi kpo gbejininɔ kpo wu e
biblu lɛ wa nu gbɔn ɖo ahwan ɔ hwenu e bɔ acɛkpikpa ɔ jɛ ji
ðo xwe bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ e dɔn biblu ɖo allemagne lɛ e yi hwɛ nukɔn azɔn mɔkpan ɖo yetɔn wu
do ɔ alaxɔ ɖo allemagne e ɖo azɔxɔsa nɔ kpe nukun do hwɛɖiɖɔ sin xo lɛ wu e ɖe ayi ɖo betɛli magdeburg tɔn
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ jla nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo do zɔ ninɔ nu ɔ wu e ɖo
hwenu wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ e ɔ nɔ zɔ bi gbidigbidi nu ahwanxo
enɛ wu ɔ acɛkpikpa allemagne tɔn do ɖo doya nu syɛnsyɛn
biblu grande bretagne tɔn lɛ sin wɛkɛ hwan ɔ tɔn ɖo xota son onu hoho sedoten miton ye notegli ojle metenpon ton me ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe nuxwasun tɔn mɛ
du millenium vi kpo le janmagbe avivɔsun tɔn kpo ɖɔ ɖɔ e sixu wa
le zosun tɔn jla linlin mitɔn ɖo ɖɔ ɖɔ biblu lɛ kun ɖo wa o
xota enɛ do janmagbe mɛ a
xo mɛ jezu tɔn lɛ mɔ hwɛ nu e kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ kpo ɖe e ɖokpo kpowun wɛ nyi enɛ
gbeɖiɖe ɖe lɛ ɖo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ nyi wuslasla sin tuto ɖe kunkpla ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ ɖi sunnu wu sunnusin wa yi sin e nyɔnu jɛ glegbe e gudu kpo e nɔ wa lɛ kpo kanlin ku lɛ e kpo sin nu gbɔn e kpo
e sixu wa enɛ gbɔn vɔsisa alɔ alo wuslasla gblamɛ wemata wemata
sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ nu enɛ lɛ tɔn lɛ bi
wema ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ nu nɔ bɔ mɛɖe nɔ huzu mɛ blibli alo nuɖe nɔ huzu nublibli e ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ nɔ ɖo nukanbyɔ xwi lɛ do ninɔmɛ mɛ e sixu va do mɛ wu ɖe e e sixu do mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e kpo ba mɛ e sixu do ɖo e kpo gannu kpo nu ɖeɖee sixu huzu nublibli lɛ e kpo kpodo ee sixu huzu nublibli a lɛ e kpan bɔ gudo mɛ ɔ do tuto wuslasla tɔn e xwedo e wu
jezu tɔn lɛ kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ aniwutu wɛ ahwanvu towe lɛ nɔ xwedo mitɔn lɛ sin hwɛndo a nɔ nɔ alɔ nɔ ɖu nu
e nyi ɖiɖɔ wɛ nugbo ɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ ɖe ɖɔ alɔ ɖu nu do azɔn mɛ a
cobonu sinsɛngan enɛ lɛ ɖu nu ɔ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e kɔn sin do alɔ nu emi nɔ nyi yɛsu nu
wema xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ dɔn nu do nu alɔkpa mɛ sin ɔ nɔ bɔ e do nu mɛ e sin alɔkpa jɛxa e mɛ ɖo do sin ɔ e kpo azɔn nabi e ɖo kɔn sin ɔ do alɔ nu mɛ e kpo ji
e ɖɔ nu sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖɔ emi xo ezayii ɖɔ do wu ɔ ɖi wu dodo e wɛ nyi ɖɔ togun elɔ nɔ mi su ɖo loɔ ayi tɔn ɖo wu a
ɖo sinsɛn mi wɛ ɖɔ loɔ nu yaya wa wɛ ɖe ɖo mawuxo mɛ wɛ ɖɔ loɔ lɛ sin mɛ wɛ ɖe
awakanmɛ ku o
kpo ðo xwi ði wɛ ba mɔ nyɔna jehovah tɔn
kɔgbidinumɛ lɛ kpo adohu adohu lɛ kpo sixu ɖi bu linlin mitɔn bɔ alɔ mitɔn lɛ kuyɛ ɖo ali ɖe
hunjijɛ do wɛnɖagbe ɔ ji ðo lɛ nukɔn
nusisɔ towe nɔ mawu su a
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ mawu lɛ nɔ jlo ɖɔ nusisɔ emitɔn kpo emitɔn kpo nɔ paan jɛxa aca xa ɔ mɛ tɔn sɔgbe xa nugbododo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn lɛ
sixu blo gbɔn bɔ nɔ sɔnu gbɔn e nɔ mawu su
ðu le ðo jehovah tɔn mɛ egbe
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ emi hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido
lɛ emi vi mitɔn lɛ bonu nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido
ðo xota we elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu zan nuwukpikpe tɔn yetɔn do hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido jɛhun gbɔn e
mi mɔ klisanwun lɛ sixu blo bɔ nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nu mawu kpo xo tɔn kpo nɔ vivi nu vi yetɔn lɛ hugan gbɔn e
awakanmɛ ku o sof
jehovah kanmɛsyɛn mɔyizi asa kpo nɛɛmii kpo gbɔn
jehovah nɔ kanmɛsyɛn mi ɖo egbe gbɔn
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu kanmɛsyɛn nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖe
tagba alɔkpa tɛ lɛ mɛ gege nɔ mɔ egbe etɛ nu enɛ lɛ nɔ hɛn wa nu mɛ
nukunɖiɖo tɛ ɖo ezayii mɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu nyi gbexosin ɖe mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe e ɖɔ ɖo aca ɖagbe lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo co xa adohu adohu nu xwe gege
e nɔ ɖo nu mi do azɔn mi kunkpla nɔ wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e bɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ xo nu kpla hɔn bu do do ɖe mɛ
nu ci nu nɔvi nyɔnu enɛ e byɔ lanmɛ nu a ce
e blawu ɖɔ nyanya sataan tɔn mɛ ninɔ nɔ hɛn kɔgbidinumɛ syɛnsyɛn gege wa sixu ɖo adohu adohu nu mɛ bɔ mɛɖe mɔ ɖɔ nu bi kwe do emi
enɛ sixu ci gandotɔnu e sin do tɔjihun ɖe wu bɔ tɔjihun ɔ tɛn a e ɖɔhun nux
etɛ sixu bɔ nu ci nu
e sixu nyi ku towe ɖe tɔn azɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe nukunkpikpe do xwedo towe wu ɖo akwɛyozo syɛnsyɛn sin taan elɔ lɛ mɛ alo gbeklanxamɛ
nu mɔhun lɛ nɔ hɛn wa nu mɛ e sixu wa ɖe hlɔnhlɔn towe kpo e tlɛ sixu bɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖebu a
ɖeji ɖɔ mawu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ alɔ nu xa ezayii
biblu zan xokwin alɔ ɔ gbɔn hweɖelɛnu
etɛ lɛ sixu bɔ alɔ mitɔn lɛ kuyɛ
hwɛhwɛ wɛ biblu nɔ zan agbaza tɔn sin wujɔnu lɛ nɔ do nu do nu wu
ði ɔ e ɖɔ alɔ xo azɔn kanweko mɔkpan
tinmɛ tɔn sixu nyi e ɖo linlin kpo nukunɖiɖo kpo sɔgbe e do sɔgudo wu
hwɛhwɛ wɛ e nɔ mɔ bɔ mɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun mɛ lɛ e nɔ xo nu kpla
enyi ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ bɔ nɔ ɖo adohu adohu nu alo nɔ bɔ nɔ kpe bɔ ɖo awajijɛ a abi tlɛ tuntun kpo nu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ fitɛ sixu mɔ akɔnkpinkpan sin hudo ɖo e ɖe
etɛ sixu bɔ akpakpa bɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn dɛ ɖo awajijɛ
xa sofonii
mi sixu hɛn nu mawu ɖɔ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ e do ayi mɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ alɔ emitɔn hlɔnhlɔnnɔ ɔ kun hwegli gɔn emitɔn lɛ hwlɛngan o
eza mi ɖɔ xo do biblu tɔn titewungbe atɔn ji bɔ ɖɔ jehovah ɖo jlo kpewu hlɔnhlɔn togun tɔn bɔ enyi tlɛ ɖo tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ ɔ wa jlo tɔn
enɛ lɛ sixu hlɔnhlɔn gbɔn e wu
nu taji tɛ ɖuɖeji izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo ɖo amalɛki vi lɛ ji e sixu mi
jehovah blo nujiwu ɖe izlayɛli vi lɛ sin kannumɔgbenu ɖo ejipu nɔ zaan e ɔ amalɛki vi lɛ ahwan
jozuwee xwedo mɔyizi e nɔ nukɔn nu izlayɛli vi lɛ yi ahwan ɔ gbe
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mɔyizi kpla kpo huu kpo yi so sɛkpɔ finɛ bɔ sixu nɔ ji mɔ fi ahwan ɔ ɖe wɛ ɖe e e ɖe ji
ahwan ɔ hɔn wɛ sunnu atɔn enɛ lɛ ɖe ɖo xɛsi wutu a
ðebu lɔ a
mɔyizi wa nuɖe bɔ ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji
mɔyizi dlɛn alɔ tɔn lɛ kpo kpo mawu nugbo ɔ tɔn kpo do jinukunsin
hwenu alɔ mɔyizi tɔn lɛ ɖo ji e ɔ jehovah hlɔnhlɔn alɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn lɛ bɔ ɖu ɖo amalɛki vi lɛ ji
ee alɔ mɔyizi tɔn lɛ wa kuyɛ jɛ do yi ji e ɔ amalɛki vi lɛ jɛ ɖuɖeji ɖo ji
nugbo ɔ alɔ hlɔnhlɔnnɔ mawu tɔn bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji tin
asa wa nu gbɔn hwenu etiopiinu lɛ ahwan judaa e
mi sixu wa nu asa ɖeji do mawu wu e ɖɔhun gbɔn
jehovah ɖɔ alɔ emitɔn kun hwegli o ɖo axɔsu asa hwenu
sɔja ahwan ganji e wɛ e ɖo etiopiinu lɛ ɖibla yi ahwangɔnu asa tɔn donu we
e bɔwu nu asa tawun bɔ jɛ huhu ji ɖi xɛsi lobɔ alɔ tɔn lɛ kuyɛ
asa yawu alɔdo jehovah tɔn
ðo ahwanfunfun sin alixo ɔ e ci ɖɔ e kun sixu ɖu ɖo etiopiinu lɛ ji o ɖɔhun mawu kpe nu bi wu
mawu zan hlɔnhlɔn ɖaxo e ɖo e nya etiopiinu lɛ ɖo asa nukɔn
asa sin ayi bi nɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ ji ɖo gbɛzan tɔn bi mɛ axɔ
etɛ su do jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ vivɔgba sin ali do nɛɛmii a
mawu sinkɔn nu nɛɛmii sin ɖɛ gbɔn
do nukun nu ci nu nɛɛmii hwenu e yi jeluzalɛmu e mɛ
toxo ɔ blebu wɛ ɖibla ɖo nuvo bɔ awakanmɛ ku tɔn jwifu lɛ tawun
toɖevomɛnu ɖo nuɖɔ jwifu lɛ e bɔ jwifu lɛ sin alɔ kuyɛ bɔ ɖo do jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ vivɔgba
nɛɛmii lɔn bɔ ninɔmɛ enɛ ɔ tuntun awakanmɛ nu e wɛ a
ði mɔyizi asa kpo jehovah ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖɔhun ɔ nɛɛmii ɖo aca nɔ ɖeji do jehovah wu gbɔn ɖɛxixo gblamɛ
jɛn e wa din
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ jwifu lɛ sixu do mɔ tagba aditi ɖe e mɛ ɔ jehovah sinkɔn nu ɖɛ nɛɛmii xo byɔ alɔdo e
mawu zan hlɔnhlɔn ɖaxo e ɖo e kpo alɔ tɔn hlɔnhlɔnnɔ ɔ kpo do kanmɛsyɛn jwifu lɛ xa nɛɛmii
ɖi nu ɖɔ jehovah nɔ zan hlɔnhlɔn ɖaxo e ɖo e kpo alɔ tɔn hlɔnhlɔnnɔ ɔ kpo do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu tɔn lɛ egbe a
sataan nɔ tɛnkpɔn ba blo bonu alɔ mitɔn lɛ kuyɛ gbɔn
etɛ jehovah nɔ zan do kanmɛsyɛn kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo mi
le tɛ lɛ mɔ ɖo mɛkplɔnkplɔn kpo yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn kpo mɛ
mi ɖo tuun ɖɔ awovi sin alɔ kun kuyɛ gbeɖe do gan do wɛ e ɖe ɖo klisanwun sin mitɔn lɛ e wu o
e nɔ zan acɛkpikpa lɛ sinsɛngan lɛ kpo lɛ kpo bɔ nɔ do kɔ mitɔn nɔ van nukun do mi
etɛ gbe nya wɛ e ɖe
e jlo blo bonu alɔ mitɔn lɛ kuyɛ do wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla sin ɔ wu
e ɖo co jehovah kpewu ɖo jlo hlɔnhlɔn mi gbɔn gbigbɔ tɔn gblamɛ
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo xo mawu tɔn ee gbigbɔ bɔ e wlan e
tamɛ do nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn jinjɔn biblu ji bɔ mi nɔ mɔ sunmɛ sunmɛ lɛ e ji
hwenu e ɖo tɛmpli jeluzalɛmu tɔn gba wɛ e wɛ e ɖɔ xo ɖo zakalii xa mɛ e lobɔ xo enɛ sɔgbe xa mi egbe tawun
mawu tɔn mi nɔ mɔ ɖo kple agun tɔn lɛdo tɔn ɖaxo kpo wemaxɔmɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mitɔn lɛ kpo ji e nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi
nɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo mɛkplɔnkplɔn mɔhun mɛ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo a
etɛ lɛ mi ɖo wa do sixu lido ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
jehovah izlayɛli vi lɛ bɔ ɖu ɖo amalɛki vi lɛ kpo etiopiinu lɛ kpo ji hlɔnhlɔn nɛɛmii kpo tɔn lɛ kpo bɔ fo jeluzalɛmu ɔ
ɖokpo ɔ jehovah mi hlɔnhlɔn bɔ mi gbi dɔn ɖo gbeklanxamɛ yamakenunu mɛ lɛ tɔn kpo adohu adohu lɛ kpo nukɔn bonu mi do sixu wa mitɔn
e wa ɔ mi ɖo wa nyi midɛɛ lɛ tɔn e
nu elɔ lɛ ɖo enɛ mɛ xo mawu tɔn xixa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe nusisɔ nu kple lɛ kpo kple lɛ yiyi ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ kpo nuɖuɖu nina linlin mitɔn kpo ayi mitɔn kpo gbɔn nukplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn kpo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn kpo gblamɛ kpodo jiɖe ɖiɖo do jehovah wu nɔ xoɖɛ e hwebinu kpan
nu mi lɔn gbeɖe bonu nu ɖevo lɛ nyinya kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo do afɔ mɛ nu wlɛnwin ɖeɖee jehovah nɔ zan do hlɔnhlɔn kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo mi lɛ e o
enyi mɔ ɖɔ alɔ emitɔn lɛ kuyɛ ɖo nu enɛ lɛ ɖebu mɛ hun byɔ alɔdo mawu
etɛ lɛ sixu wa hlɔnhlɔn alɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn lɛ
e hlɔnhlɔn nɔvi sunnu ɖe hwenu asi tɔn ku e gbɔn
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu hlɔnhlɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖe
jehovah mi kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn ɖe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bɔ nyi mawu nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ bɔ sixu mi akɔnkpinkpan lɛ e
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mɛ gege wɛ e hlɔnhlɔn mɔhun ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi ɖo egbe
nɔvi sunnu ɖe tiin bɔ asi tɔn ku do e bɔ e gbɔn ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖevo lɛ mɛ e wa ɖɔ mɛ ji ɖɔ mi kun sixu ɖɔ tɛnkpɔn le lɛ wɛ mi ɖe o mi sixu ɖɔ hwenu wa e kpo azɔn nabi wa e kpo a
ðɛxixo kpo nukplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn kpo ci awu nɔ hwlɛn gan e ɖe ɖɔhun bɔ syɔ a
alɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo do mi e do gbɔ nu mi tawun
wa mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖesu ɖɔ mɛɖesunɔ tɛnkpɔn ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe xa jehovah cobonu ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ wa
mi bi sixu nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ akpaxwe ɔ
kpo huu kpo hɛn alɔ mɔyizi tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo ahwan ɖe hwenu
mi lɔ hɛn ɔ mi nɔ tamɛ do ali ɖeɖee mi nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ gudo ɖe lɛ e ji
ɖetɛ lɛ nyi mɛ ɖevo enɛ lɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo mɛxoxwe azɔn gbeklanxamɛ mɛ yetɔn lɛ tɔn mɛɖokponɔ ninɔ alo ku ɖe tɔn sin se wɛ lɛ e wɛ
mi sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee e ɖo kɔ gbidi wɛ bonu wa nu nyanya alo ɖuɖeji enyii ɖo elɔ mɛ ɖo wema kplɔnkplɔn akwɛ abi lixo lɛ e tɛ
nɔ ɖo jlo titewungbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ hwenu ɖo nu ɖu ɖo wɛ e alo hwenu tɛkan miɖee lɛ e
ðagbe tɛ lɛ akɔnkpinkpanxo lɛ sixu wa nu klisanwun mitɔn lɛ
hwenu asa ɖo ɖuɖeji ɖaxo enɛ gudo e ɔ gbeyiɖɔ azalyahu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu e kpo togun tɔn kpo ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ ɔ syɛnlin awakanmɛ ku o ɖo nu wa lɛ bi sin ajɔ ɖe
enɛ asa bɔ e blo huzuhuzu gege do sinsɛn biblo ɔ ze
ɖokpo ɔ akɔnkpinkpanxo towe lɛ sixu wa ɖagbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tawun
sixu bɔ jehovah hu gbɔn e
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu hlɔnhlɔn alɔ mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn nɛɛmii ɖɔhun gbɔn
na lɛ gbɔn e tɔn ɖe lɛ
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ nɛɛmii kpo mɛ ɖo xa ɛ lɛ e kpo akɔnkpinkpan yeɖee lɛ ɖo ɔ kɔn
lobɔ do jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ gba fo ɖo azan kpowun gudo nɛɛ
nɛɛmii nɔ ɔ kpowun bɔ e wa a
eɖesunɔ ɖo do jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ vivɔgba mɛ
nɛɛ ɖokpo ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn yi wan nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e gege kpewu wa nu nɛɛmii ɖɔhun nɔ ɖo yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ alo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn yetɔn hinhɛn ɖo ji kpo jijlaɖo tɔn kpo mɛ
hlɔnhlɔn mɛ awakanmɛ ɖo kuku wɛ lɛ e gbɔn xa yetɔn lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo gblamɛ xa ezayii
hwenu mi mɔ miɖee ɖo tagba lɛ mɛ alo ɖo mi hu wɛ e ɔ ganjɛwu tɛ mi sixu ɖo
jehovah sinsɛn alɔ ɖo alɔ mɛ xa nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo bɔ mi ɖo bu
e bɔ mi nyi tɛgbɛ tɔn lɛ bɔ ganjɛwu mi ɖo do nyɔna ɖeɖee axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn hɛn wa lɛ e wu e jɛji
enyi mi hlɔnhlɔn alɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɔ e nɔ bɔ nɔ ɖu ɖo ninɔmɛ nɔ tuntun awakanmɛ nu mɛ lɛ e ji nɔ ɖo linlin kpo nukunɖiɖo kpo sɔgbe e do sɔgudo wu
ɔ biblo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ayi mitɔn bi ɖo gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ ji nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nu sin akpa mawu do nu mi lɛ e kun gbla o
nugbo ɔ biblo nɔ hlɔnhlɔn alɔ mi tɔn lɛ
jehovah nɔ tɔn lɛ gudo ɖo hwexonu cyɔn alɔ ji gbɔn bɔ mi mɔ e ɖo hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido egbe bɔ mi ɖeji do wu tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mɔ hwiɖee ɖo kɔgbidinumɛ lɛ kpo tagba lɛ kpo mɛ hun awakanmɛ ku o
do alɔ xa mawu do alɔ xa lɛ ɖu bib
jozɛfu
etɛ lɛ jehovah lɛ ɖo ɖi xwi xa
sin nukɔntɔn abɛli ji jɛ hwe mitɔn wɛ mawu lɛ nɔ ɖi xwi
pɔlu wlan klisanwun eblee lɛ ɖɔ hwenu ɖo nyɔna jehovah tɔn wɛ ɖo biba nukun tɔn mɛ wɛ e ɔ jiya hwenɛnu ɖesu cobo syɛnlin
egbe ɔ mi ɖo wezun bɔ mi nɔ ɖi xwi xa ɖeɖee jlo ayi mitɔn zin mi hwin mi do do yi awajijɛ mitɔn kpo ajɔ sɔgudo tɔn mitɔn lɛ kpo sin mi si lɛ e
jɛ nukɔn ɔ mi ɖo ahwan syɛnsyɛn xa sataan kpo tɔn nyanya ɔ kpo
mawu nɔ mi bonu mi ahwan xa mitɔn lɛ gbɔn
e sixu ɖu ɖo hlɔnhlɔnnɔ mɔhun lɛ ji nugbo a
ɛɛn mi sixu bla alɔ do wu kpa mi a
ði ɖe nɔ ɖu ɖo tɔn ɖe ji gbɔn e ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo fɛn nu mitɔn lɛ
jehovah ɖo mi wɛ ɖo alɔ do mi wɛ ɖo ahwan wɛ mi ɖe e kɔn
e mi nɔ hwlɛn gan lɛ e ɖo xo tɔn mɛ
e nɔ mi gbɔn wema jinjɔn biblu ji mitɔn lɛ kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ kpo lɛ kpo gblamɛ
nɔ zan nu wɛ ɖe lɛ e a
enyi gbɔ zan ɔ e ci ɖɔ ɖo akpotokwin nyi do jɔhɔn mɛ wɛ ɖo xwi ɖi xa towe wɛ a ɖɔhun
mi blo gbɔn bɔ nu nyanya ɖu ɖo mi ji a
mitɔn lɛ sixu ahwan mi hwenu mi a e kpo hwenu gan vɔ ɖo mi wu bi e kpo enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo ɖo aceji hwebinu
hlɔ wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ mi jo miɖee do bonu nunyanyawiwa ɖu ɖo ji mitɔn o e ɖɔ mi sixu ɖu ɖo nu nyanya ji
mi sixu wa enyi mi ɖo ahwan xa ɛ wɛ ɔ nɛ
sataan tɔn nyanya ɔ kpo hwɛhuhu gbaza mitɔn kpo sixu ɖu ɖo mi ji enyi mi nɔ aceji a gɔn ahwan ɔ nɛ
lɔn gbeɖe bonu sataan do xɛsi nu jo gbe o
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi kpo ɖo ahwan wɛ ba mɔ nyɔna mawu tɔn
mɛ xo biblu ɖɔ e ɖetɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
bonu e kpa mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ lɛ e ɔ ɖo wɔn hwɛjijɔ wu ɖo wa wɛ e a
bonu nu yetɔn mawu nukunmɛ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do ji ɔ ɖo ayi ɖo ganjɛwuxo mi xa ɖo eblee lɛ mɛ e ji mɛ sɛkpɔ mawu ɔ ɖo ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu tiin nɔ ajɔ mɛ ɖo biba ɛ wɛ lɛ
ɖagbe sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo do gan syɛnsyɛn ba mɔ nyɔna jehovah tɔn lɛ e tɔn gege ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ
mi sixu xwedo jiwu ɛnɛ enɛ lɛ tɔn gbɔn
jakɔbu syɛnlin
ajɔ tɛ e do e
jakɔbu ɖesunɔ wɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn kpo didɛ e byɔ e kpo do sixu do alɔ xa wɛnsagun hlɔnhlɔnnɔ ɖe a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun nyi o
e nyi ku do nu ji tawun e ɖe ɖɔ emi kun hɔn nu ɔ o
nugbo ɔ e mɔ linsyɛnsyɛn tɔn sin ajɔ
e nyikɔ jɛxa ɛ e ɖe e e wɛ nyi izlayɛli tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi alɔ do xa linsyɛnsyɛn xa mawu alo mawu do alɔ
jakɔbu mɔ ajɔ ɖaxo wɛ mi ɖe e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu tɔn jehovah nukunmɛ do
ninɔmɛ nyanya tɛ hlacɛli kpannukɔn
e ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ bɔ e ɛ ɖo gudo mɛ gbɔn
akpakpa ɖo jakɔbu tɔn hlacɛli wɛ bonu e mɔ jehovah ɖe akpa e do nu asu tɔn e gbɔn e
nu ci aditi ji e sixu ɖu ɖe a ɖɔhun e ɖe ɖo finɛ
ðo hwetɔnnu ɔ awexomɛ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nɔ ninɔmɛ enɛ do mɔ
hlacɛli mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo ayi mɛ mɔ ɖo agbaza mɛ do ɖi xwi xa ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee nɔ do awakanmɛ ku nu mɛ hugan ɛ lɛ e hwebinu gbɔn
e gɔn nukunɖiɖo ɖo gbeɖe a
e ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ gbɔn ɖɛ xixo hwebinu gblamɛ
jehovah se vosisa do nujɔnu mɛ hlacɛli tɔn lɛ bɔ e wa ji vi ɖo gudo mɛ
yaya wu wɛ a bɔ e wa jɛ hweɖenu bɔ hlacɛli su ahwanjiɖuɖe sin xo elɔ ɖɔ bɔ e ɖu bib
tagba syɛnsyɛn tɛ jozɛfu mɔ nu hwenu gege
e wa nu gbɔn e nyi ɖagbe nu mi gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gbejininɔ tɔn jakɔbu kpo hlacɛli kpo ze e wa ɖagbe nu vi yetɔn jozɛfu tawun ɛ e ɖu ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn nuɖiɖi eɖesunɔ tɔn mɔ lɛ e ji gbɔn e
hwenu jozɛfu ɖo xwe e ɔ gbɛzan tɔn wlu bi
nɔvi tɔn lɛ sa ɛ do kannumɔgbenu ɖo wuhwinhwan wutu
awakanmɛ ku jozɛfu a ɖokpo ɔ e hɛn mɛ do xomɛ hlɔn a
jozɛfu tɔn ɖo mi lɔ
enyi vlafo mi tlɛ mɔ ɖo vu hwenu mitɔn alo enyi ninɔmɛ mitɔn din tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖe ɖo wɛ a ɔ mi ɖo kpo ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ kpo ɖo didɛ wɛ
mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖeji ɖɔ enyi mi wa ɔ jehovah do nu mi xa
gan tɛ mi ɖo do jakɔbu hlacɛli kpo jozɛfu kpo ɖɔhun ba mɔ nyɔna jehovah tɔn
tamɛ do ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖe sixu nyi mɛtɛnkpɔn nu e ɖe ji
vlafo e sixu nyi hwɛagɔɖiɖɔ linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ wu alo slamɛɖiɖɔ mɛ wu
alo mɛtɛnkpɔn mɛ ɖe e sixu nyi ɖɔ mɛɖe do ji vlafo ɖo wuhwinhwan wutu
jo gbe o e wa ɔ flin nu jakɔbu hlacɛli kpo jozɛfu kpo bɔ kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo e
jehovah do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu kɔn nyɔna tɔn do ji ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ su nukun yetɔn mɛ hwebinu
ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ ɖo nu wa wɛ sɔgbe xa ɖɛ nɔ xo lɛ e
azan gudogudo tɔn nyanya elɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ wɛ mi ɖe enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ tawun zunfan nukunɖiɖo jɔ nukunɖiɖo e ɖo nu mi e
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ do gan alo ɖi xwi ba mɔ jehovah tɔn a
mi sixu ɖi xwi ba mɔ nyɔna mawu tɔn gbɔn
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi wa gbeta sɔgbe lɛ e kɔn ɖu ɖo ahwan xa nu nɔ tuntun awakanmɛ nu mɛ lɛ e kpo nu nɔ ayi mɛtɔn lɛ e kpo wɛ mi ɖe e ji
ninɔmɛ ɖetɛ lɛ mɛ wɛ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖi xwi ɖe ba mɔ nyɔna mawu tɔn
ninɔmɛ mɛ gege ɖi xwi xa e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ganmaɖo agbaza tɔn ɖe ji ɖuɖu ɖe
mɛ ɖevo lɛ do gan tawun do sixu ɖo linlin sɔgbe e ɖe do ɔ wu
alo ɖo ninɔmɛ towe mɛ ɔ e sixu nyi ɖɔ ɖo azɔn jɛ wɛ abi ɖo hwiɖokpo co ɖo kpo ɖo didɛ wɛ
mi ɖo nu xwi mɛɖe lɛ ɖi hwɛ kɛ mɛ jɛ agɔ alo hu hwɛ do e ɖe e a
mi ɖo jehovah wɛ sin xwe nabi ɖebu ɖie ɔ mi bi wɛ ɖo ahwan xa nu ɖeɖee sixu wa nu mawu nɔ lɛ e wɛ mi ɖe e mɛ e
ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ ba mɔ nyɔna mawu tɔn a
akpaxwe kpo kpo
nugbo ɔ e sixu vɛwu tawun bɔ mi wa gbeta sɔgbe lɛ e kɔn wa nu klisanwun ɖɔhun
nu nɔ nyi ɖo taji ɔ hwenu ayi mitɔn nyi nu hizi e dɔn mi yi ali masɔgbe ɔ ji e

nu nɔvi nyɔnu etats unis tɔn ɖe ɖɔ e
e wlan ɖɔ jlo doku nu ɖɔ nɔ nuɖuɖu sin hudo mi ɖo e mi hwebinu do hwetɔnnu
nɔ hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ nyɛ wɛ e wlan xota enɛ lɛ

ee xa xota hie tindo ahun nado jehovah
ɖo atɔxwɛ mars tɔn mɛ gudo e ɔ mɔ tawun ɖɔ jehovah jlo mi
mi sixu ɖi xwi xa ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ ɖu ɖo ji gbɔn
xa hlɔmanu lɛ
pɔlu ɖesunɔ tuun xwi ɖiɖi xa hwɛhuhu gbaza mitɔn sin jlo nyanya lɛ kpo ganmaɖo lɛ kpo sixu vɛwu gbɔn e
e ɖo co e ɖeji ɖɔ emi sixu ɖu ɖo ahwan wɛ emi ɖe ɖo xomɛ e ji gbɔn ɖɛxixo jehovah ɖeji do wu tɔn kpo nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu tɔn kpo gblamɛ
enyi mi ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ bonu ganmaɖo miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpe mi wu o ɔ e sixu kpa mi
gbɔn pɔlu tɔn xwixwedo kpo jiɖe ɖiɖo do jehovah wu ɖo do hlɔnhlɔn miɖesunɔ tɔn wu o kpo gblamɛ nu nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ
etɛwu ɖɛxixo sixu mi bɔ mi kpo ɖo gbeji dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mawu sixu bonu mi ɖe nuɖe ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi e
ði ɔ enyi mi alo mɛ mitɔn ɖe syɛnsyɛn ɖe alo hwɛ agɔ ɖe wɛ e ɖɔ xa mi ɔ lo
mi ɖɔ mi ɖeji do jehovah wu bi gbɔn ɖɛxixo savo ɖɔ e mi hlɔnhlɔn bonu mi kpo ɖo gbeji hɛn awajijɛ mitɔn bu lobonu kancica ɖo mi kpo e kpo tɛntin e gble o gblamɛ fili
mɛ gege tɔn ɖo pɔlu hwenu kpo hwe mitɔn kpo ɖɔ ɖɛxixo sixu mi bɔ mi hlɔnhlɔn mɔ ɖo ganjɛwu ɖo didɛ wɛ zɔn mi yi

axɔsu enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ nyi hlɔma tɔn neron
enyi hwi wɛ ɖo jɛhun do nuɖiɖi towe ji ɖo axɔsu mɔhun nukɔn ɔ nu ci nu
e ɖo co e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ wa nu pɔlu ɖɔhun
mɔyizi ɔ wɛ ɖo acɛ ɖo izlayɛli yikungban ji bɔ e wɛ nyi walɔ ɖagbe tɔn jwifu ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ nɔ xwedo ɖo fi bi e
ðo pantekotu xwe tɔn gudo ɔ e ɖo dandan nu mawu nugbo lɛ ɖɔ xwedo mɔyizi ɔ a mɛ
e ɖo co pɔlu kpo klisanwun ɖevo lɛ kpo gɔn sisi ɖo nu ɔ ɖo xoɖiɖɔ yetɔn lɛ mɛ a kpewu ɖekunnu gbɔn xa jwifu lɛ tɔn gege mɛ dɔn tagba nyi ayi a
jeluzalɛmu wɛ lɛ nyi hɔnkan nukɔn nukɔntɔn fi e nɔ blo tuto nu ɔ ɖe e
nɔ nu mɛ lɛ ɖo tɛmpli mɛ hwɛhwɛ
hwɛɖiɖɔ xo ɖe gbɔn wa kpla ɛ yi hlɔma e nɛ
linlin tɛ hlɔma tɔn lɛ ɖo do nugbododo jla wɛ pɔlu ɖe lɛ e wu
do xosin enɛ ɔ e ɖɔ mi hlɔmanu lɛ nɔ sinsɛn lɛ gbɔn ɖo kpaa mɛ e wu
nɔ hɛn akɔ vovo ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ mɛ lɛ e gannugannu bonu jo sinsɛn yetɔn lɛ do a afi nu e ci ɖɔ sinsɛn ɖe nyi awovinu nu acɛkpikpa ɔ alo nu walɔ ɖagbe lɛ ɖiɖo ɔ nɛ
hlɔma acɛ gege jwifu lɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ mɛ
jwifu lɛ vo blo sinsɛn yetɔn bɔ e nyi dandan wɛ numɛsɛn hlɔma to ɔ tɔn lɛ a
sixu do yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo xa yetɔn lɛ mɛ
backgrounds christianity dandan wɛ ɖo alɔ ɖo ahwan mɛ a
pɔlu zan alɔcyɔnmɛji hlɔmanu lɛ tɔn sinsɛn jwifu lɛ tɔn e do jɛhun do sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn ji ɖo hlɔma tɔn lɛ nukɔn
xo mɔhun lɛ sixu bɔ jwifu huzu klisanwun agaɖanu lɛ e ɖɔ pɔlu kun ɖo sisi nu tuto mawu tɔn lɛ o
ɔ hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo jwifu lɛ tɔn ɔ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ wɛ klisanwun lɛ nyi klan gbe xa sinsɛn jwifu lɛ tɔn
enyi nu enɛ jɛ ɔ e sixu dɔn to nu jwifu wa nu klisanwun lɛ e

pɔlu ɖɔ xo do ɔ kpo gbeyiɖɔ lɛ kpo wu ji ɖɔ emi ɖo acɛ mawu emitɔn lɛ nɔ e
e wa ya e ɔ pɔlu kpewu jɛhun do nuɖiɖi tɔn ji jla ɖo tokpɔngan wa bɔ e pɔsiwusi fɛsitusi kpo axɔsu elodu aglipa kpo nukɔn
yi hlɔma tɔn nukɔn dandan wɛ wɛnsagun ɖe ɖɔ nu pɔlu ɖo nukɔnmɛ
ðo xwe tantɔn nukɔntɔn e blo ɖo zinkpo ji lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e nɔ ɖe ɔ hwɛhwɛ
wema ɖe ɖo gbe ɖɔ enyi neron yi gbe ɖɔhwɛ ɖe eɖesunɔ ɔ hɔn tɔn ɖesu mɛ wɛ e nɔ ɖoto ɖe bɔ mɔ nu nyi mɛ nukunɖeji tawun lɛ e nɔ ɛ ɖo finɛ epistles paul
e to nyi neron ɖesunɔ wɛ ɖoto pɔlu ɖɔhwɛ do e alo e ɖe mɛ ɖevo bɔ e ɖoto pɔlu wa ɖo gbe wɛ ɔ biblu ɖɔ a
wujɔmɛ ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi afɔ jezu tɔn ɖo gbɔn
gan ɖeɖee mi do jɛhun do wɛnɖagbe ɔ ji lɛ e sixu hɛn ɖuɖeji gege wa
nugbo ɔ lɛ wa gbeta ɖebu kɔn ɔ jehovah wɛ acɛ mi ɖo jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ e gosin
axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kɛɖɛ jɛn wa ɖe adakaxixo kpo hwɛagɔɖiɖɔ kpo siin bi gbidigbidi nut jel
e ɖo co egbe ɔ e sixu kpa nu nyikɔ jehovah tɔn hwenu klisanwun lɛ jɛhun do nuɖiɖi yetɔn ji e
jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ kun xo yi ɖɔ ba do hwlɛn yeɖee e o
hwenu klisanwun lɛ jɛhun do nuɖiɖi yetɔn ji ɖo axɔsu lɛ tokpɔngan lɛ alo ɖevo lɛ nukɔn e ɔ sixu ɖekunnu nu mɛ e sixu vɛwu ɖɔ e jla wɛn klisanwun tɔn ɔ ayi gbe lɛ e
ðuɖeji mi ɖo ɖo hwɛɖiɖɔ lixo e ɖe lɛ bɔ e nuɖe lɛ jlaɖo ɖo linu bɔ e sixu vo ɖɔ xo mawu
enyi hwɛɖiɖɔ enɛ lɛ tlɛ kɔ do nu ɖebu mɛ ɔ akɔnkpinkpan mawu lɛ nɔ ɖo hwɛ nukɔn lɛ e nɔ hun xomɛ

sunnuvi lɛ kpo sunnu lɛ kpo nɔ do kpo kɔla kpo bɔ jipu nyɔnuvi lɛ kpo nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔ do e nɔ ɖo ji nɔ ca a

ðo mi nyi togun jehovah tɔn wutu ɔ nusisɔ sɔgbe e ɖo taji nu mi ɖo taji nu mawu mi nɔ e
enɛ wu ɔ nusisɔ kpo mitɔn kpo ɖo jinjɔn nu mi nɔ yi wan lɛ e ji kpowun a
e ɖo jinjɔn nu nɔ aklunɔ jehovah nukunmɛ lɛ e ji
etɛ mawu izlayɛli vi lɛ e sixu mi do nusisɔ wu

xa
sɔgbe kpo mawu do nusisɔ wu e kpo ɔ mi mɔ gannaganna ɖɔ sunnu nɔ e nyɔnu nɔ e alo nɔ ɖe vogbingbɔn ɖo sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo tɛntin a e kun nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ o
etɛ sixu klisanwun lɛ bɔ wa gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn do sɔnu gbɔn e wu
nugbododo ɖeɖee klisanwun lɛ bɔ do nu ɖagbe ji do gbɔn e wu e ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ
wɛ nɔ nyi gbɔn enyi nɔ nɔ fi ɖebu ɖo aca ɖebu alo enyi ayi mɛ nɔ ci ɖebu ɖo fi nɔ nɔ e ɔ nɛ
e byɔ ɖɔ e nusisɔ sɔgbe lɛ e kpo ee sɔgbe a lɛ e kpo nu mi dandan a
e wa ɔ nugbododo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn ɖeɖee yi gbe nu nu jlo mi lɛ e wɛ nɔ ali mi
nu mi gbeje nugbododo biblu tɔn sixu mi bɔ hwenu mi ɖo nu mi do lɛ e wɛ e ɔ mi tuun jlo mawu tɔn nyi nu ɖagbe nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ sɔgbe bɔ nu bi vɔ e e hlɔ
etɛ mi nɔ sɔnu gbɔn e ɖo wa nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
linlin mɛ gege nɔ ɖo do mi wu e nɔ jinjɔn nu ɖo wexo bɔ nukun mɔ e ji
nugbododo mi mɔ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu nusisɔ mɛ ɖe alo xoɖoxamɛ sin jlo do lanmɛ nu mɛ lɛ e
tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi kun ɖo do nuɖe ɖe sunnuxwe mitɔn alo nyɔnuxwe mitɔn jɛ wexo alo ɖe ɖo vo ɖo mi wu o
nusisɔ mitɔn ɖo doya nu mɛɖe alo bɔ mɛɖe gbɔ jɛ fi ɖevo ji a
enyi nu mi do e ɖo paan ɖo ji jɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo aklunɔ jehovah wɛ nugbo ɖo sisi nu mi
enɛ sixu bɔ sɛkpɔ mawu wɛ mi ɖe e
ɔ nusisɔ ɖagbe mitɔn bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖagbe do tutoblonunu sin afɔ mi ɖo e wu
hwetɛnu wɛ e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ nusisɔ mitɔn sɔgbe
ðo mawu mitɔn nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo mitɔn gbigbɔ lixo tɔn lɛ jɛ mɛ ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ lɛ e ji wutu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ do nu wli nu wɛn jla wɛ mi ɖe jehovah su lɛ e hlɔ
enɛ ɖo taji tawun hwenu mi ɖo klisanwun sin lɛ wa wɛ e ɖi hwenu mi xwe kple lɛ alo mi ɖo mawuxo ɖɔ wɛ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nusisɔ sɔgbe ɖo xa ɖe mɛ e sixu nɔ sɔgbe ɖo xa ɖevo mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ togun jehovah tɔn nɔ wa nu sɔgbe kpo xa ɔ mɛ sin aca lɛ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ ji o
nɔ sɔnu gbɔn e sixu bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo sisi nu mawu sin afɔ ɖo e a
xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
hwenu mi xwe lɛdo tɔn lɛ alo ɖaxo lɛ e ɔ nusisɔ mitɔn ɖo sɔgbe ɖo ji e ɖo ɖe ɔ sin nusisɔ nɔ zɛkpa ɖo ɖu wɛ lɛ e a
e tlɛ nyi hwenu mi ɖo otɛli ɖe alo fi mi mɔ ɖo e abi hwenu mi ɖo sa ɖi wɛ jɛ nukɔn nu sin akpaxwe lɛ alo ɖo akpaxwe lɛ gudo e ɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu nusisɔ tɔn lɛ
etɛwu mi ɖo zan nu ɖo filipunu lɛ mɛ e ɖo nusisɔ mitɔn mɛ
xa filipunu lɛ
etɛwu klisanwun lɛ ɖo nu do nusisɔ yetɔn nɔ wa nu do mawu yetɔn lɛ ji gbɔn e wu
mi jlo wa nu bɔ weɖexamɛ enɛ xwixwedo vɛwu nu mitɔn lɛ e a
mi jlo blo bonu ahwan wɛ ɖe e syɛn a kabi
hwenu mi ɖo xa nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn klisanwun lɛ kpo e ɔ mi sɔnu gbɔn e ɖo bɔ agun ɔ nyi bibɛtɛn ɖe ɖo walɔ linu
enyi mi yi kple lɛ alo ɖo ninɔmɛ nyi aca tɔn a e ɖe mɛ ɔ wɛ nu ɖo nyi gbɔn e nɛ
mi vo ɖɔ nu mi do e
wanyiyi adodwe nɔ wa winnyanu ɖebu a e nɔ ɖɔ emiɖokponɔ gee tɔn jɛn a kɔ
nu ɖo ji e tɛ ji mi nu do hwenu mi ɖo tamɛ do nu mi do lɛ e ji wɛ e
hwenu mawu lɛ ɖo tamɛ wɛ do nu do e ji e ɔ nɔ flin ɖɔ nu nɔ jɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo hwenu nu e nɔ wa lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo hwenu
nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖyɔ sɔgbe kpo ayi mɛ nɔ ci e kpo a
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi nyi alɔ nu awu nɔ mɛ din lɛ e dido alo ee e bɔ nɔ ɖe lɛ e dido ɔ e su nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo nukunmɛ jɔb
ɔ hwenu mi ɖo gbɔjɛ yi wɛ ɖo xuta alo tɔlɛdo ɖe e ɔ nu mi do do e ɖo ɖo ji
nux enyi mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e gege nɔ do awu nɔ ɖe lɛ e do ɔ nu mɛ lɛ do jehovah mawu mi yi wan nɔ e wu e wɛ nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
etɛwu mi ɖo xwedo weɖexamɛ ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e ɖo nusisɔ mitɔn mɛ
nugbododo taji ɖevo ɖe mi hwenu mi ɖo nusisɔ sɔgbe lɛ e wɛ e
e wɛ nyi sisi mi nɔ ɖo nu ayixa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn e nu nyi mawu mitɔn lɛ alo nyi a ɔ nɛ xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
nyi mitɔn bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu nusisɔ sixu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ji e ɔ mi ɖo ylɔ ɖɔ nujɔnu
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ ðokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo ɖo nɔzo tɔn si nu ɖagbe nɔzo ɔ tɔn bonu e yi nukɔn ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ e hwɛjijɔ elɔ ðo klisu ɔ wa nu ɖo eɖee si a
hun nuzinzan alo nusisɔ alɔkpa mi yi wan bɔ sixu ayixa mɛ mi nɔ ɖekunnu lɛ e tɔn e ɔ mi nyi alɔ
lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ kpa nu mawu ɖo nɔ sɔnu gbɔn e mɛ gbɔn
klisanwun lɛ ɖo xwedo yetɔn lɛ bɔ nɔ zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ
enɛ byɔ ɖɔ nɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ kpo vi yetɔn lɛ kpo nɔ do gan hɛn xomɛ mawu tɔn hun gbɔn nusisɔ kpo ɖo ji e kpo gblamɛ
enyi lɛ fi vi yetɔn lɛ mɔ awu ɖagbe lɛ ɖe lɛ e kpo mɔ gbɔn e kpo ɔ e e
enɛ ɖɔ e kun nyi nu yi wan lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ o loɔ nu bɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ jehovah mawu sin afɔ ɖo e
etɛ ɖo ali mi hwenu mi ɖo nuzinzan mi do lɛ e wɛ e
sixu mi bɔ mi wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn kpa nu mawu lɛ e ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ
e ɖo co mi nɔ do nu jlo mi e ɖe lɛ
nu nɔ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nukunmɛ e nɔ gbɔn vo jɛn ganɖɔkɛn mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn gbɔn vo e nɛ
nusisɔ mitɔn lɛ ɖo nɔ ɖo paan ji ji hwebinu sɔgbe xa fi mi xwe e sɔgbe xa aca xa ɔ mɛ tɔn
etɛwu gandido sɔnu e jɛxa gbɔn e xɔ akwɛ
e nɔ bɔwu hwebinu bonu e wa gbeta sɔgbe xwedo ninɔmɛ lɛ bi e a
nu ɖeɖee ɖo ji lɛ e wɛ nɔ gege mɛ hun e byɔ hwenu gege kpo gandido gege kpo cobɔ e mɔ jipu awu alo cokoto ɖeɖee mɛ din a lɛ e
e ɖo co enyi mi nɔ do gan tawun nɔ nuzinzan ɖeɖee ɖɛkpɛ ɖo ji lɛ e ɔ mitɔn lɛ wu bɔ e su nukun yetɔn mɛ
bɔ awajijɛ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo mi kpa nu mitɔn wanyiyinɔ jixwe tɔn ɔ e nɔ hugan ɖebu mi sixu mɔ hwenu mi nɔ sɔnu bonu e ɛ su e
etɛ lɛ sixu bɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖe jo atan tɔn do alo
nɔvi sunnu ɖeɖee ɖo atan lɛ e lo
e ɖo co klisanwun lɛ ɖo mɔyizi ɔ glɔ a mɔ jɛn e ɖo dandan ɖɔ nyi enɛ a e nɛ

micee nɔ mi hwenu mi ɖo gan do wɛ mawu nukunmɛ ɖo nusisɔ mitɔn mɛ e gbɔn

afɔ tɛ lɛ sixu ɖe ɖo ɖuɖeji

enyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe wɛ nu bɔ ɖo jehovah wɛ alo nu do wu tɔn wɛ ɖe ɔ e nɔ gbidi kɔ nu bɔ ɖi nu nu nu mɛ gege ɖi nu lɛ e ɖi nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee bɔ ɖe ɖe a wɛ a

wlɛnwin ɖagbe tɛ mi ɖo zan

mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖebu do mawu alo nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee sin xo ɔ wu ɔ nuɖiɖi alɔkpa ɖe jɛn mɛ ɔ ɖo nu nu enɛ

nɔ ɖu le ɖo azɔwanu enɛ lɛ mɛ bi a

gbeɖe

e ɖɔ ɖi nu kpowun ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa wutu a
nutuuntuun enɛ sixu wa huzu dodonu jinjɔn ayi ganji e ɖe nu bɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi jɔ nuɖiɖi
xa hlɔmanu lɛ ɖo du monde nouveau mɛ timɔtee
sixu tuun nu ɖo alɔkpa enɛ mɛ gbɔn e ɖokpo wɛ nyi gbɔn tuto nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn alɔkpa nɔ xwedo lɛ e gblamɛ
