akpakpa mɛ bɔ e sixu do e ɖokpo wɛ nyi
wemafɔ enɛ xwle xota taji biblu tɔn ɔ mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mawu wɛ nyi kpo biblo bonu nyikɔ tɔn nyi nu kpo gbɔn axɔsuɖuto ɔ gblamɛ
wemafɔ ɖokpo enɛ ɔ zan xogbe nujlɛdonuwu tɔn ɖe lɛ tinmɛ jehovah ɖeɖɛ mɔ wɛ lɛ ɖe sin edɛni mɛ e gbɔn e
sixu gbɔn
wlɛnwin ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ blo hwenu nu lɛ jɛ do e sin ɖiɖe ɖe
sixu wemafɔ taji ɖe lɛ bɔ mawu ta weziza do mɛ ɖeɖee xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e kpo tuto xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e kpo ji kpɛɖe kpɛɖe nyi kunnuɖenu ɖɔ ɔ jɛnu gbɔn e
enyi mɔ wemafɔ lɛ xo nu do akpa ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ganji gbɔn e ɔ ɖo ganjɛwu ɖɔ gbigbɔ wɛ ali gbeyiɖɔ xo biblu ɖɔ lɛ e kpo biblu lɛ kpo
bɔ mɛ gege nɔ hwe ɖokpo ɔ a tuun yeɖee lɛ a
xota e ɖo kple ji ɖo atɔxwɛ decembre tɔn mɛ ɖɔ xo do tinmɛ dindinwayixwe tɔn ji e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi nyɔnu australie ɖe tawun
xwe enɛ ɔ ca kan tawun xa kpo wiwa mɛsiya ɔ tɔn kpo
e ɖɔ nukplɔnkplɔn enɛ hun nukun lɛ bɔ mɔ jehovah e
e jiwu nu mi tawun ɖɔ mɛɖe blo tuto enɛ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ bɔ e wa jɛ do jezu wu
wɛ gbɔ wa nɔ do nukun e sixu nu jɛ dindinwayixwe sin nuɖuɖu enɛ xo ɔ ɖɔ e ji a gbɔn e mɛ
aniwu nu ci nu nɔvi nyɔnu enɛ
nu e xa e ɔ e tamɛ ganji mɔ nu jɛ mɛ wɛ
enɛ ɛ hɛn nuɖiɖi tɔn lido sɛkpɔ jehovah
nugboɖiɖɔ biblu lɛ tɔn hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido do nu wlan lɛ e wu gbɔn
nu ɖevo nɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi mɛtɔn lido e wɛ nyi akɔnkpinkpan mɛ wlan biblu ɔ lɛ e tɔn kpo ɖɔ nugbo gbɔn e kpo
wema hwexonu tɔn gege wɛ ɖɔ bɔnyiji nu axɔsu yetɔn lɛ kpa nu acɛkpikpa yetɔn lɛ
gbeyiɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nugbo hwebinu
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖɔ nuwanyido mɛ yetɔn lɛ tɔn tlɛ ɖɔ axɔsu yetɔn lɛ tɔn lɛ
nɔvi dɔnkpɛvu ɖe ɖo grande bretagne ɖɔ nugboɖiɖɔ mɔhun han ɖesu
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu blo gbɔn bɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun yetɔn mɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖyɔvi ɖe ɖo japon wlan ɖɔ hwenu mɛ lɛ zan nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn lɛ e ɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ tawun
mi ɖu vivi fifa buninɔ kpo wanyiyi kpo tɔn
tamɛ nukplɔnmɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu ɖe kun tiin o e nɔ wa nu do lɛ wu a
nukplɔnmɛ mɔhun lɛ ɖi nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee nɔ ayihɔngbɛ ɔ do ɖo numɛsɛn alɔkpa ɖe nɔ kpa nyi jehovah tɔn lɛ e
mɛ nɔ ɖɔ mawu ɖe kun tiin o lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ miɖesunɔ sin alɔ mɛ wɛ nu mi nyi sɔ e ɖe
ali ɖagbe tɛ e sixu ɖɔ xo xa mɛtɔn mɛtɔn alo mɛ ɖevo lɛ do nuɖiɖo alo biblu ji ɖe
sixu xo do xo wu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ nu wɛ do nuɖiɖo lɛ kpo biblu kpo ji wɛ e kpa gbɔn
jɛ nukɔn ɔ yawu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi tuun nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖi nu e o
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖi nu ɖɔ nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee nɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu tiin
nɔ ɖɔ mawu blo bɔ nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee huzu nuɖogbɛ tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖi nu ɖɔ nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee ɖo nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi nu nyi a ɔ e kun nɔ mɛ ɖo wemaxɔmɛ o
mɛɖe lɛ tiin nɔ ɖi nu nu mawu a ɖo sinsɛn flu wutu
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ xa mɛɖe wɛ do fi jɔ sin e wu e ɔ e ɖɔ kan nuɖe lɛ byɔ ɛ
mɔ do nu nu mɛ enɛ ɖi nu e
cobonu nuɖogbɛ nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖevo ɔ e ɖo kpewu blo eɖesunɔ ɖɔhunkɔ ɖevo lɛ
nɔ chimie mɛ e ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ nu elɔ lɛ ɖo nu sin hudo nuɖogbɛ enɛ ɖo lɛ e mɛ nu anyu ɖɔhun ɖe cyɔn alɔ ji tɔn nuwukpikpe mɔ hlɔnhlɔn zan nu do ninɔmɛ eɖesunɔ tɔn kpo e su gbɔn e kpo ji e nuwukpikpe nu enɛ ɖevo lɛ blo
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nuɖogbɛ tlɛ hwe hu bi e e nɔ jiwu tawun nu mɛ
enyi mɔ ɖɔ emi kun sɔnu ganji ɖɔ xo do nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee alo ɖe tiin ji o ɔ etɛ sixu wa
xojlɛdoxowu mɔhun sɔgbe tawun nɔ ɖesu
nugbo ɔ taglomɛ bi ganji e ɖe jɛn to nu e ɖe
sixu zan wema sɔgbe xa xo ɔ e ɖe
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖɔ xo do alɔnuwema we xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e ji xa dɔnkpɛvu ɖe dɔnkpɛvu ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu ɖe tiin o bɔ emi yi gbe ɖɔ nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee
aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo gudo ɔ dɔnkpɛvu ɔ ɖɔ din ɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu tiin
e jɛ biblu ji wa huzu ɖokpo ɖo nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ mɛ
etɛ mi ɖo wa cobo tinmɛ nu mɛɖe ɖɔ biblu ɔ gosin mawu
etɛ gbe mi ɖo nya
sixu zan wlɛnwin ɖokpo ɔ lɛ hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ xa mɛ nɔ xo nu do biblu wu e ɖe wɛ e
mɔ do nu nu e ɖi nu lɛ e kpo xota sixu jɛji lɛ e kpo
ɖeɖee ɖɔ sɔgbe lɛ e kpo sɔgbe lɛ e kpo wɛ ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e sixu jɛji nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
alo sixu ɖɔ xo do nugbododo biblu tɔn ɖeɖee nɔ ali mɛ lɛ e ji ɖi ɖeɖee ɖo mawuxo jezu ɖɔ ɖo so ji e mɛ lɛ e
flin ɖɔ nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ xo towe byɔ ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ bonu yi mi nu dɔn xa gbe a
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ ganji
nɔ kan nujɔnu lɛ byɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo kpo gbe fifa kpo kpodo sisi kpan ɖo taji ɔ hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ nu mɛxomɔ lɛ wɛ e
mɔ ɖɔ tamɛ ganji do nu ɖi nu lɛ e ji
nuɖe wɛ nyi enɛ bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya gege blo a
etɛ sixu bɔ nugbo ɔ do ɖo towe
nukanbyɔ tɛ ji xota bɔ e ɖɔ xo do
nukplɔnmɛ taji biblu tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ tuuntuun nɔ bonu nuɖiɖi mɛtɔn nɔ lido a
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ kije va mɛ nu xo mawu tɔn ɔ ganji ci nu ɖɔ ɖo dɔkun hwla e ɖe wɛ ɖɔhun
nux nɔ zan azɔwanu ɖevo sixu ɖe ɖo gbe towe mɛ lɛ e ɖi dvd ji tɔn wemaxɛxwetɛn ɛntɛnɛti ji tɔn tɔn nu des publications alo anademewe dodinnanu ton kunnudeto jehovah ton le
ɔ blo tuto xa biblu ɔ blebu
sixu ɖo tɛnkpɔn wa
nu nɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido sɔ xo mawu tɔn xixa lɛ e a
lɛdo tɔn ɖe tamɛ do hwenu e ɖo dɔnkpɛvu mɛ e ji ɖɔ biblu ɔ xixa hwebinu ɖo nu ɖeɖee mi bɔ mɔ ɖɔ xo mawu tɔn wɛ e nyi e mɛ
biblu tɔn sin hwenu ɖo vu tawun lɛ e wa nyi nujɔnu ɖo nukun mɛ
lɛ emi nukɔnyiyi vi mitɔn lɛ tɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo sin wu tawun
sixu bɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido gbɔn
xota bɔ e tinmɛ
dɔnkpɛvu kpo ɖyɔvi kpo
bi kpa nu mawu mavɔmavɔ ðɛh
etɛwu e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ tuun vi towe lɛ ganji
sixu zan nujlɛdonuwu lɛ ganji ɖo mɛkplɔnkplɔn mɛ gbɔn
etɛwu ɖo nɔ gbeji ɖo suulu nɔ xoɖɛ
tɛ lɛ nɔ mɔ sixu ɖi xwi xa enɛ gbɔn
nu ɛnɛ tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do din
mi ði nu nu jehovah enɛ wɛ bɔ vi mitɔn lɛ ɖi nu dandan a wɛ asu kpo asi kpo nɔ nɔ france e ɖe ɖɔ
tinmɛ ɖɔ nuɖiɖi nyi nuɖe bɔ e nɔ ɖu gu tɔn a
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe wɛ vi mitɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo
nɔvi sunnu australie ɖe wlan ɖɔ alɔdido vi towe bonu e ɖo nuɖiɖi wɛ nyi ɖaxo hugan bi sixu mɔ ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ e
ɖo zan azɔwanu ɖebu ɖo e
sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi fo kpo nukanbyɔ vi towe tɔn ɖe kpo wa mɔ ɖɔ e nu ɖokpo ɔ kanbyɔ hweɖevonu
xosin jɛmɛ nu ayixa nu do biba tɔn vi towe tɔn ɖo egbe e sixu nɔ jɛmɛ ɖo sɔ
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ xota ɖe lɛ ji gbɔn hwɛhwɛ
enyi ɖe wɛ nu ɔ e nɔ ci nu hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ kun kpewu vi towe lɛ bonu huzu lɛ o wɛ a
enyi mi mawu tɔn ɔ e kpa mi
nu mi gbeje nu sixu bɔ vi towe lɛ bɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi e ɛnɛ tɛnkpɔn tuun ganji
nu kpo ayi towe bi kpo
zan nujlɛdonuwu ɖagbe lɛ
ðo suulu nɔ xoɖɛ
lɛ sixu xwedo jezu tɔn ɖo mɛkplɔnkplɔn mɛ gbɔn
nu ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ ɖi nu lɛ e kinkanbyɔ nɔ do xɛsi a
xwedo tɔn
e tawun ɖɔ ɖo hwenu ɖo vivo mɛ e ɔ byɔ vi towe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu nɔ ci nu e
nɔvi sunnu xwe mɛvi ɖe ɖo australie wlan ɖɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo xa mi hwɛhwɛ do nu ɖi nu e wu nɔ mi bɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo
e kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ biblu ɖɔ
ɖi nu nu nu e ɖɔ e a
etɛwu ɖi nu
e ɖɔ xosin ɔ ɖo xogbe nyi ɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ bonu e nyi nu eyɛ alo mamaa ɖɔ lɛ e wɛ wli ɖɔ kpowun o
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ e nukanbyɔ vi ɖe tɔn ylɔ ɖɔ nujɔnu
enyi vi ɖe ɖeji do nukplɔnmɛ ɖe lɛ wu a ɔ tɛnkpɔn wa adan alo yi gbe ɖo alɔkpa ɖe mɛ ci ɖɔ ɖo hun jɛ do hwiɖee ji wɛ ɖɔhun o
sɔ xo do xo wu xa ɛ kpo sɔxwixwe kpo
ɖe ɖɔ nu nukanbyɔ vi towe tɔn lɛ o
nugbo ɔ enyi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nu vi towe kanbyɔ do nujɔnu mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ e nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mɛ ɔ e
hwenu jezu tlɛ ɖo xwe e ɔ e kan nujɔnu lɛ byɔ
xa luki
dɔnkpɛvu ɖe ɖo xwe nɔ nɔ danemark ɖɔ hwenu ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖɔ kun kanɖeji ɖɔ mi ɖo sinsɛn nugbo ɔ mɛ o e ɔ sixu hu do wutu co wa adan a
zan biblu do xosin nu nukanbyɔ lɛ bi
lɛ sixu ɖɔ emi kun nɔ kpowun ɖɔ vi emitɔn ɖo nuɖiɖi o gbɔn
tɛnkpɔn tuun vi towe lɛ ganji linlin yetɔn lɛ nu nɔ ci nu e kpo nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu lɛ e kpo
ɖɔ gbeɖe ɖɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖo nɔ wa kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ xa kpowun wutu o
nɔ ɖɔ xo do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji xa hwenu nɔ ɖo wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e
nɔ xoɖɛ kpo vi towe lɛ kpo nɔ xo do yetɔn mɛ
tɛnkpɔn mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖebu nuɖiɖi yetɔn mɔ e wu bonu ɖi xwi xa
enyi lɛ do nugbo biblu tɔn do ayi yeɖesu tɔn mɛ ɔ e bɔ nu mɛ ganji gbɔn
nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ nɔ byɔ ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ ɖo e yi wan nu jehovah xo mawu tɔn kpo lɛ kpo wutu
luk jaan wanyiyi mɔhun lɛ bɔ nu vi yetɔn lɛ wɛ ɖe e byɔ ayi mɛ nu xa luki
enɛ wu ɔ lɛ emi nɔ biblu ɔ kpo wema nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn mitɔn lɛ kpo ganji
nɔ yi wan nu nuɖiɖo lɛ kpo xota ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɖɔ xo do wu lɛ e kpo
enyi nugbo biblu tɔn ɖe sin ayi mɛ ɔ le tɛ e hɛn wa
enyi nugbo biblu tɔn ayi towe mɛ ɔ jlo ɖɔ xo xa xwedo towe
hwenu ɖo nu nu kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ wɛ e alo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn sin hwenu kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ wa a loɔ nɔ wa hweɖebunu
ɔ mɔhun lɛ ɖo nɔ nyi kɔgbidinumɛ sin nu a loɔ ɖo nyi nyanɛnyanɛ sin nu bɔ vivo nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo gbɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e ɖɔhun
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖo etats unis nɔ tamɛ do jehovah ji hwenu xwedo ɔ ɖo vivi wɛkɛ ɔ sin nuɖe tɔn ɖu wɛ alo ɖo nuɖe ɖu ɖo wɛ e
lɛ ɖɔ mi nɔ flin wanyiyi jehovah ɖo nu e sɔnu nu mi lɛ e bi mɛ e kpo e tamɛ ganji jɛ nukɔn cobo blo nu enɛ lɛ gbɔn e kpo vi mitɔn lɛ
hwenu asu kpo asi kpo nɔ nɔ afrique du e ɖe nɔ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo jikpa yetɔn mɛ xa vi nyɔnu yetɔn we lɛ e ɔ nɔ ayi vi lɛ tɔn ɖo kun nukun lɛ tɔn kpo yetɔn kpo nɔ jiwu gbɔn e ji
lɛ ɖɔ mi nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ sisi ɖaxo ɖiɖo nu kpo e gbɔn e kpo vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ
ɖe ɖo australie bɔ hwenu vi sunnu tɔn ɖo xwe wo ɖo wɛ bɔ ɖisa yi nu ɖo fi e nɔ nu xoxo lɛ ɖo e ɖe e ɔ e gbɔn yɛkan enɛ mɛ vi tɔn bonu nuɖiɖi e ɖo ɖɔ mawu tiin nyi ɔ e lido
ɔ ɖɔ mi mɔ bɔ e nuɖiɖo hwexonu tɔn nɔ nɔ xu mɛ bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ kpo kpo lɛ e
e jiwu nu mi tawun ɖɔ kanlin enɛ lɛ ɖe a e ɖɛkpɛ ɖo bute ɖibla ci ɖeɖee mi sixu mɔ egbe lɛ e ɖɔhun
nukplɔnmɛ ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ jiwu nu mi tawun bɔ ma xa vi sunnu
etɛwu nujlɛdonuwu lɛ zinzan ɖo le
nɔ ɖe ɖe enɛ gbɔn
jezu nɔ zan nujlɛdonuwu nɔ mɛ nɔ byɔ ayi mɛ nɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ flin nu lɛ e hwɛhwɛ
yɔkpɔvu lɛ nɔ nu tawun
enɛ wu ɔ lɛ emi nɔ vo nɔ zan nujlɛdonuwu lɛ ɖo mɛkplɔnkplɔn mitɔn mɛ
nɔ ɖe ɖo japon wa
hwenu vi tɔn sunnu we lɛ ɖo xwe tantɔn kpo wo kpo ɖo wɛ e ɔ e nu do jɔhɔn kpo jehovah wlibo blo gbɔn e kpo wu
e tinmɛ ɖɔ wlibo ɖesu
ee kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛwu wlibo a ji e ɔ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ emi jlo ɖɔ tii ɔ ci nɔ gbɔn e
tinmɛ nu ɖɔ wɛ mawu wlibo nu jɔhɔn ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ e blo gbɔn e blo ɖo e nɔ nu mi e
nujlɛdonuwu enɛ sɔgbe kpo xwe yetɔn kpo bɔ ɖo mɔjɛmɛ xo kpowun ɖiɖɔ nu a e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kun yawu wɔn nukplɔnmɛ enɛ o
sixu zan nu kpaa lɛ do hɛn nuɖiɖi vi towe lɛ tɔn lido do mawu kpo nuɖiɖo lɛ kpo wu akpaxwe ɔ
nujlɛdonuwu tɛ sixu zan do vi towe ɖi nu nu mawu
fɔtoo ɖo e nujlɛdonuwu tɛ lɛ zan
tlɛ sixu zan wlɛnwin e nɔ do ɖa nuɖe e do vi towe bonu nuɖiɖi e ɖo nu mawu e lido
gbɔn e
enyi ɖa nu ɔ gudo hun tinmɛ nu wu wlɛnwin ɔ ɖo taji e
enɛ gudo ɔ atin ɖe nu vi towe vlafo ɖe kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ wlɛnwin ɖe wɛ e zan bɔ elɔ do wa ci le a
enɛ gudo hun zɛ ɔ ɖo we kwin tɔn ɖokpo
sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ e wlan wlɛnwin ɔ do kwin ɔ mɛ gbe mɛ e wlan do e tawun hu xogbe e wlan do wlɛnwin nuɖiɖa tɔn sin wema ɖe mɛ lɛ e
sixu kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe wɛ do wlɛnwin e do ɖa nu ɔ e wa ɔ nyi wlɛnwin ɔ xwedo cobo wa ci lɛ e tɔn
enyi vi ɔ nyi mɛxo kpɛɖe ɔ sixu tinmɛ ɖɔ wlɛnwin e zan nu ɔ jɛ atin ji e ɖe e ji e ɔ e wlan do wɛn ɖo adn ɔ mɛ e mɛ
tlɛ sixu gbeje nujlɛdonuwu ɖo alɔnwuwema mitɔn cinq questions a mɛ ɖo wexwɛ jɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖo
gege nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo xa vi yetɔn lɛ do xota hasard ou
nɔ ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖo reveillez vous
jɔmɛhun lɛ sixu fle jɔmɛhun kpɛvi kpɛvi lɛ a
xɛ lɛ ɖo hudo fi bunɔ ɖe lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖo jɛ wɛ a
gbe jɔmɛhun ɖe nɔ do e nɔ ci ɖo xɛ ɖe tɔn kpa
xo mɔhun lɛ ɖiɖɔ nu nukanbyɔ ɖagbe lɛ sixu vi ɖe nɔ tamɛ ɖi nu nu mawu nux
nujlɛdonuwu lɛ sixu vi lɛ bɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi nu biblu ɔ gbɔn
nujlɛdonuwu nɔ lɛ e zinzan sixu hɛn nuɖiɖi vi towe tɔn lido ɖɔ biblu ɔ sɔgbe
ði ɔ tamɛ do jɔbu ji
sixu ɖɔ xo do kunnuɖenu lɛ wu kpowun
enyi tamɛ linlin sin akpakpa do lanmɛ nu vi towe ɔ lo
tinmɛ ɖɔ jɔbu nɔ e ɔ e lin tawun cobɔ e wa ɖe macinu nɔ mɔ nu vovolivwe lɛ e kpo jɔmɛhun nɔ yi mɛ lɛ e kpo
byɔ vi ɔ ɖɔ e ɖɔ e vɛwu nu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ nu tawun e ɖe ɖi ayikungban ɔ kun nɔ nuɖe ji o
vi ɔ sixu zan alo awinnya ɖe do ɖɔ nu ɖo zin e ɖo nɔ nuɖe ji dandan
nukplɔnmɛ mɔhun bɔ vi towe mɔ ɖɔ jehovah bɔ e wlan nugbo gege do biblu mɛ xoxo cobɔ lɛ wa ɖe nɛɛ
lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ mɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ xɔ akwɛ e gbɔn
e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ blo bonu vi towe lɛ mɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ xɔ akwɛ e xa ðɛhan
ali gege wɛ e sixu wa ɖe
sixu elɔ vi towe lɛ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi mɛ bi ɖo yi ci tɔtɛntinto ɖo gblolo mɛ e ɖe mɛ ɖo mɛɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ xa mi
enɛ gudo ɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ enyi mɛ bi nɔ ɖo fifa mɛ ɔ jujɔ tɛ lɛ mɛ bi ɖo ɖo
sixu ɖɔ xo xa do ɖagbeɖagbe ɖo galatinu lɛ mɛ lɛ e ji
nu taji we wɛ nu mɔhun wiwa sixu mɛ
wegɔ ɔ jehovah ɖo mi wɛ din bonu mi do sixu nɔ ɔ mɛ
sixu xota ɖebɔdoɖewu biblu nɔ huzu gbɛzan mɛtɔn nɔ ɖo atɔxwɛ mɛ lɛ e mɛ
alo enyi mɛɖe ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo lɛ ba mɔ tɛn do jehovah nukunmɛ ɔ sixu ylɔ ɛ wa kpi tɔn nu
etɛ gbe nya jɛ nukɔn hwenu ɖo vi towe lɛ wɛ e
nu ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e ɖie hwenu nɔ ɖo nu vi towe lɛ wɛ e ɔ nɔ nu ɖokpo ɔ lɛ blo tɛgbɛ tɛgbɛ o
tɛnkpɔn nɔ zan nuwukpikpe nulinkpɔn tɔn towe
tamɛ linlin sin akpakpa do lanmɛ nu nɔ flin xwe yetɔn cobo nɔ wa
blo bonu nukplɔnkplɔn nɔ vivi nu nɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido
nu kpe do wlɛnwin lɛ zinzan do ɖɔ xo do nu xoxo lɛ ji wu gbeɖe o wɛ ɖe ɖɔ
etɛwu suuluɖiɖo ɖo taji hwenu e ɖo nu vi lɛ wɛ e
do nuɖe wu
e ɖo hudo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn cobo ɖo nuɖiɖi lido e
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo ɖo suulu syɛnlin ɖo vi towe lɛ kplɔnkplɔn mɛ
ɖo vi we nɔ nɔ japon e ɖe ɖɔ nyi kpo asi kpo nɔ ayi ɖo vi mitɔn lɛ ji tawun
sin hwenu ɖo vu bi e ɔ nɔ nu xa nu cɛju gbe ɖokpo gbe gbe mi ɖo kple agun tɔn lɛ e jɛn a
cɛju enɛ lɛ vɛwu din nu mi kpo kpo a
lɛdo tɔn ɖe wlan ɖɔ hwenu nyi dɔnkpɛvu e ɔ nɔ kan nu gege byɔ nyiɖee alo nɔ xo nu gege ɖɔ gbeɖe bonu mɛɖe se a
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ wa mɔ xosin nu enɛ lɛ tɔn ɖo kple lɛ sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn alo nukplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn hwenu
enɛ wɛ bɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo nu vi yetɔn lɛ wɛ zɔn mi yi
enyi nyi tewungbeju ɖe ɔ xo mawu tɔn ɖo ɖo ayi towe mɛ akpaxwe ɔ
etɛwu ɖagbe lɛ tɔn ɖo taji
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe mɔhun nu vi nyɔnu yetɔn lɛ gbɔn
nu ɖo taji tawun e wɛ nyi nuɖiɖi tɔn hwiɖesunɔ tɔn
vi towe lɛ nɔ nu nɔ wa lɛ e bɔ e wa ɖagbe nu jɛn wɛ
nu vi mitɔn lɛ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah tiin nugbo ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖo bermudes bɔ enyi ɖo hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ ɔ nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah xa vi yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ e ali emi nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu vi lɛ ɖɔ nɔ xoɖɛ yeɖesunɔ
mi ɖɔ nu vi nyɔnu ɖaxo mitɔn ɖɔ ðeji do jehovah wu hɛn alɔnu towe jan ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ nu hu din o
hwenu e mɔ nu lɛ wa yi gbɔn e ɔ e tuun ɖɔ jehovah ɖo alɔ do mi wɛ
nugbo taji tɛ wu lɛ ɖo mɔ nu jɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖo gudo mɛ ɔ vi lɛ ɖesu wɛ blo bɔ nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido
enyi wɛ nu ɔ sixu do hu sin
mawuxo ɔ ɖo
mi nɔ zan eblee lɛ ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ hwɛhwɛ do ɖɔ biblu ɖo hlɔnhlɔn nɔ huzu gbɛzan mɛ lɛ tɔn bɔ e sɔgbe tawun ɖɔ e ɖɔ
e ɖo co enyi e gbeje nu ɖeɖee do eblee lɛ lɛ e ɔ e mɛ tawun
wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu klisanwun eblee lɛ wɛ pɔlu ɖe ɖɔ wa nu sɔgbe kpo linlin mawu tɔn lɛ kpo
klisanwun eblee lɛ blo gbɔn e ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi xa linlin enɛ ɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa
pɔlu ɖe xo sin kpo ðɛhan kpo mɛ do ɖɔ mawuxowema ɔ mɛ wɛ akpa enɛ ɔ gosin
e ɖo vivi nu mi ɖɔ akpa mawu do nu mi ɖɔ mi byɔ fi emi gbɔjɛ mi ɖe ɔ kpo ɖo
mi ɖeji ɖɔ nukunɖiɖo biblu mi ɖɔ mi byɔ gbɔjɛ mawu tɔn mɛ e jɛnu nugbo bɔ mi ɖe afɔ mi ɖe ba mɔ tɛn do byɔ mɛ lɛ e
mi wa gbɔn gandido ba nyi mɔyizi ɔ alo ba wa ɖevo lɛ do jehovah nukunmɛ gblamɛ a
loɔ gbɔn nuɖiɖi gblamɛ ɔ mi wa nu sɔgbe kpo linlin mawu tɔn e e kpo kpo ɖo wa wɛ
ɔ mi gbɔn ɖo e ɔ livi mɔkpan wɛ jɛ biblu ji jɛ linlin mawu tɔn e lɛ e ji gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
nu enɛ mɛ gege bɔ huzu gbɛzan yetɔn ɖo nuɖiɖi huzu klisanwun blo baptɛm lɛ e
ɖo huzuhuzu lɛ blo gbɔn wɛ e ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ mawuxo ɔ ɖo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn
linlin mawu tɔn e ɖo biblu mɛ e huzu gbɛzan mitɔn ɖo hlɔnhlɔn tɔn zan wɛ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
gbɛzan gandido ba ze ðagbe lɛ
flin ðɔ ðo yi mɛ nɔ wa jonɔ lɛ e ganji
kpe nukun do hwiɖee wu ðo gbigbɔ lixo hwenu ðo wa wɛ ðo to ðevo mɛ e
ðo xwe wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛ gosin akɔ vovo mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e nɔ wa agun mitɔn lɛ mɛ
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ keya nu ayi ɖevo ji nɔ wa kple lɛ ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e nugbo nugbo tɔn
xota wegɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ayi ɖevo ji lɛ e sixu kpe nukun do yeɖee wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn e ji
nɔ hɛn nunywɛ zan e a
hɛn nuɖiɖi towe lido ðo nu ðo nukun wɛ ðe ɔ mɛ
ði nu nu akpa jehovah do lɛ e
xota elɔ lɛ gbeje akpaxwe we nuɖiɖi ɖo bɔ e tinmɛ ɖo eblee lɛ mɛ e
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mi sixu blo bɔ nuɖiɖi mitɔn su lido gbɔn e
xota wegɔ ɔ ɖɔ nuɖiɖi kun nyi nukunnu mimɔ jɛ nyɔna ɖeɖee jehovah ze nu mi lɛ e wu kpowun o
mɛ tɔn wɛ e thomas mclain
tuun xwe a
wɛ kanbyɔ tuun xwe ɖo e wɛ izak marais ɖɔ wɛ ɖe bɔ eyɛ ɖo patterson tɛkan mi
ma tinmɛ nu dɔn enɛ wa e nu
e ji mi ɖo wichita kansas etats unis ɖo decembre nyɛ wɛ nyi mɛxo ɔ ɖo vi ɛnɛ lɛ ji e mɛ
lɛ william kpo kpo yi wan nu jehovah sinsɛn tawun
nɔ wa kplekple mɛxo lɛ tɔn tɔn nɔ wa ɖo egbe din e
wagner wɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ mamaa
mɛ gege wɛ wagner nugbo mɔhun lɛ gertrude steele nyi ɖo rico nu xwe mɔkpan e ɖo mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖagbe gege wɛ ɖo xwedo
samedi gbadanu ɖokpo hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ nyi kpo kpo ɖo xojlawema atɔxwɛ kpo reveillez vous
wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ ɖi bu to ɔ hwenɛnu
dotoo ahannumunɔ ɖe wa adan do ji ɖo wu e ɖo zɔ nu ahwan e wu ɖɔ ɖɔ xɛsinɔ wɛ bɔ e hɔn nu ahwankpa mɛ byɔbyɔ
dotoo ɔ do nukunmɛ ɖɔ etɛwu xo mi a nu xɛsinɔ elɔ wɛ
xɛsi ɖi mi wa nu gbɔn e su nukun mɛ tawun
xojlawema lɛ xwle ahwan kple e wɛ jɛn e ɖe kpowun
enɛ gudo ɔ sɔja ɖokpo wa bɔ dotoo ɔ suxo ɖɔ wa nuɖe nu xɛsinɔ elɔ bo
sɔja ɔ mɔ ɖɔ nya ɔ ahan mu bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ yi xwegbe bonu ahan nu
mɛ we lɛ bi ɖido
nɔ wa flin akɔnkpinkpan jehovah e nɔ su nukun mɛ tawun
e hun fi e nɔ kpa ɖa ɖe e we ɖo wichita bɔ dotoo ɔ ɖo mɛ nɔ kpa ɖa ɖo tɔn lɛ e mɛ
nyi kpo lɛ kpo mi ɖo ɖaxo ɖe yi wɛ ɖo wichita ɖo xwe lɛ mɛ
hwenu ɖo xwe tantɔn e ɔ lɛ sa xwe yetɔn kpo yetɔn lɛ kpo gba xɔ e nɔ tɛn e kpɛvi ɖe tɛn yi wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e
mi jɛ agban ɖo kpa bɔ lɛ nyi gbexosin nɔ wa kpo kpo nu hwenu klewun ɖe
jehovah do nu kan ɖo do ɔ wu e bɔ e ɖo agun ɖe ayi
ðo juin ɔ blo baptɛm nu nyi kpo mɛ ɖevo yi gbe nu nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ e kpo ɖo tɔsisa ɖe mɛ ɖo so ɖe ji billie nichols kpo asi tɔn kpo ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
wa wa ɖo nukɔnmɛ bɔ vi sunnu yetɔn kpo asi tɔn kpo lɔ wa enɛ
wɛ mi kpo mɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin mɛ hwebinu lɛ e kpo nyi ɖo taji ɔ kpo xwedo steele tɔn kpo kpo earlene kpo dave kpo julia kpo nu kpo martha kpo
bɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji wa ɖagbe nu mi tawun
mi axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ nɔ bɔ mɛtɔn nɔ ɖo bɔ e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ gbɔn e
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ mitɔn ɖɔ nyi wa wa gbexosin xa emi ɖo tofɔligbe etats unis tɔn
lɛdo tɔn ɔ byɔ mi ɖɔ mi yi ruston ɖo louisiane fi gege gbɔjɔ ɖe e
e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ blo kple lɛ bi ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ enyi mɛ nabi ɖebu wa ɔ nɛ
mi mɔ fi mi sixu blo kple ɖe e ɖe jlaɖo
mi kple lɛ ɖe a mi mɛ we lɛ jɛn nɔ wa nu taan ɖe
mi nɔ kpe nukun do akpaxwe kple lɛ tɔn wu mɛjijɛmɛjijɛ bɔ mɛ ɖe ɔ nɔ xosin lɛ bi
enyi e jɛ lɛ ji ɔ mi mɛ we lɛ bi nɔ xa ataa ɔ ji nɔ kpo ɖe a
e wa ya e ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ ɖe jɛ kple lɛ wa ji
gbe ɖokpo ɔ nyi kpo kpo xo go sinsɛngan eglise du christ tɔn ɖe bɔ e ɖɔ xo do wemafɔ tuun a e ɖe lɛ ji
nu enɛ nu mi kpɛɖe bɔ tamɛ ɖesu do nu ɖi nu lɛ e ji
nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo ɔ nɔ fyɔ kaloziin jɛ zan xwete ba mɔ xosin nu nu e kanbyɔ lɛ e
hwenu kpɛɖe gudo ɔ lɛdo tɔn byɔ mi ɖɔ ma tɛn yi arkansas agun ɖo finɛ e
hwenu ɖo e ɔ nɔ lɛkɔ wa nɔ yi mɛ do ahwankpa mɛ e nukɔn hwɛhwɛ ɖo
ðo kɔlilɛ ɖokpo hwenu ɔ nyi kpo gbexosin ɖevo lɛ kpo do ɖo bɔ mi blo alitawovi ɖe ɖo texas bɔ gble bi
mi ylɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖe wa kpla mi yi xwe tɔn gbe lobɔ mi xwedo e yi kple
nɔvi mi e sa gblegble ɔ yi amɛlika tɔn egbe tɔn cfa
mi kpewu wa yi wichita fi xwedo sin
azɔn nukɔntɔn mɔ ɖɔ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ wutu ɔ jehovah nu sin hudo ɖo e mi e nɛ
hwenɛnu wa mccartney lɛ e ɔ mi nɔvi nyɔnu ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ yi wan nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu lɛ e ɖe nɔ nyi
nɔ tɔn nɔ nyi nyi ɖe ɖo kansas nyi gbexosin ɖo zɛ xwe wu
ðibla yi xwe ɖokpo gudo ɔ nyi kpo kpo wli alɔ ɖo bɔ mi nyi gbexosin ɖo
ee mi tamɛ do ɖagbe mi mɔ hwenu mi ɖo wɛ lɛ e ji gudo e ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ze miɖee jo wa nu ɖebu tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn byɔ mi e
e ɖe mi bɔ mi nyi gbexosin titewungbe ɖo arkansas
enɛ gudo ɖo ɔ e ylɔ mi nu klasi galadi tɔn
xomɛ hun mi tawun ɖɔ steele wa klasi enɛ
ee nyi kpo kpo yi kunnuɖewema gudo e ɔ e mi do nairobi kenya
avi mi hwenu mi gosin e xomɛ hun mi tawun hwenu nɔvi lɛ wa kpe mi ɖo jɔmɛhunjayitɛn nairobi tɔn e
ðo kunnuɖegbe ɖo nairobi nu kpo chris kanaiya kpo
mi yawu yi wan nu kenya kpo wa wɛ mi ɖe ɖo finɛ e kpo
mɛ nukɔntɔn mi biblu xa bɔ yi nukɔn lɛ e wɛ nyi chris kpo kanaiya kpo
kpo ɖo gbeji ɖo hwebinu tɔn ɔ mɛ ɖo kenya
hwenu awajijɛ tɔn wɛ nyi hwe enɛ lɛ ɖo mɛ gege ɖo jlo tawun nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ bɔ huzu mi ɖɔhun
ee mi blo xwe atɔn adaɖe ɖo aflika gudo e ɔ mi lɛkɔ wa yi etats unis ɖo xwedo ɖe ayi
gbe gbe mi gosin aflika e ɔ avi mi e syɛn hu gigosin tɔn
mi yi wan nu aflikanu lɛ tawun ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi lɛkɔ gbe ɖokpo
mi jɛ agban ɖo gbadahweji tɔn fi lɛ nɔ nɔ e
zaan ɔ mi ji kimberly vi nyɔnu mitɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ bɔ gudo ɔ mi ji stephany
mi mi nyi din e sin ylɔ ɖɔ nujɔnu tawun kanɖeji do nugbo ɔ do ayi mɛ nu vi nyɔnu mitɔn ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ lɛ
mi jlo ze ɖagbe e nu mi lɛ e
e ɖɔ e nɔ flin ɖɔ ɖagbe ɖe nɔ vi tawun co enɛ ɖɔ vi ɔ su ɔ e kun jo jehovah do o a
nɔvi sunnu kpɛvi ɔ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu ɖokpo kpo gosin nugbo ɔ mɛ
mi ɖo nukun gbɔn e ɔ wa xwedo ɖagbe e nu e
ðo mi nɔ nɔ kpa wutu ɔ mi mɛ bi kɛkɛvi kunkun gbɔn glasi ji bonu mi do sixu nɔ kun ɖo hweɖelɛnu
hwenu mi nɔ ɖo lɔnyiji lɔnfɔnkan yihun enɛ wɛ e ɔ mi nɔ mɔ hwenu nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo xa vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ
mi nɔ yi gbɔjɛ nɔ yi ɖisa xa ɖo fi ɖe nɔ ɖu vivi ɖagbe lɛ tɔn do myɔ mi lɛ e
mi tɛnkpɔn do nu xɔ akwɛ gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ do vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ sin linlin kpo ayi kpo mɛ
hwebinu tɔn gbe wɛ mi ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nya mɛ ɖo nu mɔhun gbe nya wɛ e kɛɖɛ
mi tɛnkpɔn bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ alɔwliwli ɖo vu kun o
mi nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ e hwe bi ɔ to ɖo xwe
ði mitɔn lɛ blo gbɔn xa mi e ɔ mi do gan nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo nɔ yi kunnuɖegbe hwɛhwɛ ɖo
mi blo tuto bɔ mɛ ɖo hwebinu tɔn mɛ e ɖe lɛ nɔ xwe mitɔn gbe
ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ hwenu mi zan ɖo ɔ mɛ e sin xo kpo awajijɛ kpo
mi nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mi mɛ ɛnɛ lɛ bi sixu wa yi aflika ɖo gbe ɖokpo
vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ jlo tawun wa
mi nɔ blo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ bɔ hwe enɛ lɛ ɔ mi nɔ blo nu sixu jɛ ɖo wemaxɔmɛ lɛ e tɔn
vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ nɔ blo e kan nu byɔ ɖo xosin wɛ e
nukpinkplɔn gbɔn nɔ vivi nu nɔ jiɖiɖe
ɖo wɛ e ɔ nɔ wa hlun nu ɖɔ do sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn ɔ biblo wu hweɖelɛnu
ɖo mi gbe ɖokpo bɔ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ yi xɔ yetɔn lɛ mɛ le mi kun nu ɔ o
e kpaca bɔ avi ɖɔ ɖɔ emi jlo nu ɔ
mi jɛ mimɔ ji ɖɔ mi ɖo alɔdo wɛ nugbo bonu nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun yetɔn mɛ
wa yi wan nu nukplɔnkplɔn ɔ bɔ mi nɔ jo do bɔ nɔ vo nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ lɛ e
enyi ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ emi kun yi gbe nu nugbo ɔ sin akpaxwe ɖe lɛ o ɔ e nɔ vɛwu nu mi
e ɖo co mi tuun nu ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ tawun lɛ e
enyi mi xo do xo wu xa gudo ɔ linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nu lɛ ji e nɔ jɛji nu
vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpinkplɔn sin ɔ yawu yi nukɔn hu mi gbɔn e
tutoblonunu mawu tɔn sin alɔdo kpo kpo bɔ mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi bɔ yi wan nu jehovah
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun hwenu fo wemaxɔmɛ linsinmɛ tɔn huzu gbexosin e bɔ kpe nukun do yeɖee wu ɖo akwɛzinzan lixo
tɛn yi cleveland tennessee kpo nɔvi nyɔnu we ɖevo kpo wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e
mi jɛ do yetɔn tawun e vivi nu mi ɖɔ ɖo yetɔn zan wɛ ɖo hwebinu tɔn ɔ mɛ
nyi kpo kpo wa huzu gbexosin bɔ enɛ hun wujɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ sin ali nu mi
mi wa lɛdo tɔn tɔn kpo ɖaxo tɔn kpo sin
cobonu vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ tɛn yi tennessee ɔ yi londres angleterre ɖisa yi alaxɔ tɔn mɛ
stephany ɖo xwe hwenɛnu e xo go paul norton nyi dɔnkpɛvu ɖe nɔ wa ɖo betɛli e ɖo finɛ
ðo yiyi ɖevo hwenu ɔ kimberly xo go paul tɔn lɛ ɖokpo bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ brian llewellyn
paul kpo stephany kpo wli alɔ e to ɖo xwe
brian kpo kimberly kpo wli alɔ ɖo xwe bɔ e mɛ hwenu e ɖo xwe e
hun e hwe bi ɔ to ɖo xwe nɛ
mi kɛ alɔ we yi asu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo lɛ e
midɛɛ lɛ paul stephany kimberly kpo brian kpo ɖo alaxɔ malawi tɔn mɛ ɖo
ðo avril ɔ e ylɔ paul kpo stephany kpo nu klasi galadi tɔn bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e do malawi ɖo aflika
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ e ylɔ brian kpo kimberly kpo ɖɔ wa ɖo betɛli londres tɔn bɔ nukɔnmɛ ɔ e do betɛli malawi tɔn
awajijɛ mitɔn tunfla ɖo ali mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu zan yetɔn ɖe e ɖe hu a
janvier wɛ e tɛkan xo ɖɔ ɖo e mi
nɔvi marais nyi lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn sin e tinmɛ nu mi ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ ɖo tuto blo wɛ nukunnu mimɔ jɛ glɛnsigbe mɛ lɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bɔ ɖo linlin wɛ ɖɔ e mi bɔ nyi ɖokpo ɖo lɛ mɛ
xwe wɛ ɖo hwenɛnu
nyi kpo kpo xoɖɛ do xo ɔ tamɛ ɖɔ xo xa nɔ mitɔn lɛ ba se weɖexamɛ yetɔn lɛ
ɖo hudo mitɔn co mɛ we lɛ bi ɖɔ mi yi
wa ylɔ nɔvi marais ɖɔ ɖɔ xomɛ hun mi tawun bɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu wujɔmɛ jiwu enɛ
ɖɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ ayi nu nɔvi nyɔnu linda bɔ mi kpe nukun do wu tɔn
wa nu mɔhun ɖe a wɛ mamaa ɖɔ
enyi yi a ɔ azɔn ɔ nyla
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ linda
gbigbɔ mɛɖee do tɔn yetɔn kpo nɔvi xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ sin alɔdo kpo su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
mi yi nɔtɛn nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn tɔn ɖo patterson jɛ ayihɔngbe tɔn e ɔ linda tɛkan mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mamaa bɔnu
ði e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi gbɔn e ɔ mi ze miɖee bi jo nu mitɔn ɔ
e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ alaxɔ malawi tɔn mɛ fi ɖe wɛ vi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo asu yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖe e wɛ e mi do jɛ nukɔn
mɛɖee mɔ jiwu ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ mi yi wa yi zambie
avi mi ɖo hwenu mi lɛkɔ wa yi xwe ɖo e bɔ nyi kpo kpo kpo ɖo gbexosin nyi wɛ
ðo ɔ brian kpo kimberly kpo tɛn wa akpa mitɔn kpe nukun do vi nyɔnu yetɔn we lɛ mackenzie kpo elizabeth kpo wu
paul kpo stephany kpo kpo ɖo malawi bɔ paul nyi alaxɔ tɔn sin ɖe
din ɖo xwe sɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ xomɛ nɔ hun mi tawun ɖɔ dɔnkpɛ ɖeɖee wa xa nu xwe mɔkpan lɛ e lɔ do nɔ wa lɛ e mɛ
awajijɛ mi mɔ lɛ e ɔ ɖagbe e nu mi bɔ mi lɔ tɛnkpɔn nu vi mitɔn lɛ kpo vivu mitɔn lɛ kpo bɔ ɖu le tɔn e wu wɛ e sin tawun
bonu nu do xwedo steele tɔn sin ɖe lɛ wa e wu hun atɔxwɛ glɛnsigbe tɔn wex kpo flansegbe tɔn wex kpo
ði ɔ gbɛzan tɔn trophim nsomba tɔn ɖo atɔxwɛ avril tɔn mɛ wex
flin ɖɔ ɖo yi mɛ nɔ wa jonɔ lɛ e ganji ebl
bowozi ɖe linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do jonɔ lɛ wu e ɖo e wa nu xa hwliti gbɔn e mɛ gbɔn
mi sixu ɖe jonɔ lɛ gbɔn
tɛ lɛ jonɔ gege nɔ mɔ ɖo egbe
fɔtoo ɖo e etɛ pɔlu flin mi
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ nuflinmɛ enɛ nyi atɛ ji
xwe hu din bɔ osei nyi hwenɛnu a e gosin ghana wa elɔpu
e flin ɖɔ yawu wu ɖɔ gege mɛ lɛ tɔn kun keya nu mi o
jɔhɔn ɔ lɔ fa hu glasi
hwenu gosin jɔmɛhunjayitɛn ɔ bɔ avivɔ ɔ bla mi azɔn nukɔntɔn e ɔ avi
ðo osei se gbe ganji a wutu ɔ e nɔ jɔ ɖe mɔ nu xwe ɖokpo jɛji
tamɛ do jlo ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu xa gbɔn hwenu ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun mɛ e ji
enyi e yi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ keya nu to mɛ gosin e alo sinmɛ agbaza towe ɖo e ɔ e su nukun towe mɛ a ce
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi gbeje nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ linlin tɛ jehovah ɖo do jonɔ lɛ wu
etɛwu e sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖyɔ linlin mi nɔ ɖo do jonɔ lɛ wu e
mi sixu mɛ gosin to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e bɔ vo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ gbɔn
sɔgbe kpo kpo ɔ togun mawu tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ ɖo wa nu xa jonɔ lɛ gbɔn
ðo jonɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo hudo mɛ wutu ɔ jehovah blo tuto nu gege tɔn nu kpo kpo
nukun cyancyan ɖo gle lɛ mɛ nyi ɖokpo ɖo acɛ ɖo lɛ e mɛ
jehovah ɖegbe nu izlayɛli vi lɛ kpowun ɖɔ nɔ ɖo sisi nu jonɔ lɛ a e wa ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ se xa jonɔ lɛ xa
tuun nu nɔ gbo toɖevomɛnu e
etɛ mi bɔ jonɔ lɛ sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi jehovah ɖɔhun
enyi mi tamɛ do nɔ mɔ lɛ e ɖi mɛ kinklan ɖo vo alo gbemase ji ɔ mi ali mi ɖe kpo wanyiyi nɔvi nɔvi tɔn kpo ɖe lɛ e
etɛ ɖɔ klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ tɛnkpɔn ɖu ɖo linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu syɛnsyɛn ji
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ tɛnkpɔn ɖu ɖo linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu kpa zinkpo ɖo jwifu lɛ tɛntin e ji
ðo pantekotu xwe tɔn ɔ mɛ nɔ nɔ jeluzalɛmu lɛ e yi jonɔ mɛ ɖeɖee gosin xa vovo lɛ mɛ huzu klisanwun lɛ e tɔn
mɛ ayi ɖevo ji tɔn lɛ sin nu ɖu ayi mɛ nu klisanwun jwifu lɛ gbɔn e ɖɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ xokwin jonɔyiyi ɔ sin tinmɛ wu e wɛ nyi do jonɔ lɛ wu
e ɖo co ee agun klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ tɔn ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɔ ninɔmɛ mɛ kinklan ɖo vo e ɖe wa
jwifu nɔ do glɛkigbe lɛ e hlun nu ɖɔ ji e kun ɖo nu wa xa asukusi emitɔn lɛ wɛ ganji o
etɛ sixu ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin agɔ ɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu wɛ alo mi ɖo akɔ klan wɛ
etɛ mi ɖo hɔn ɖɔ sin ayi mitɔn mɛ
mi bi wɛ nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa aca fi mi nyi e tɔn enyi mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu kpo mi gbɔ kpo ɔ nɛ
hlɔ ɔ mi se bɔ nɔzo mitɔn lɛ mitɔn lɛ alo mitɔn lɛ ɖɔ xo nyanya lɛ do mɛ nyi fi ɖevo akɔ ɖevo alo ɖo anyu ɖevo lɛ e wu
ba tɛ mɛ linlin agɔ enɛ lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi wu ɖo
enyi mɛɖe ca nu to mɛ mi gosin e vlafo gbɔn sin dido aca mitɔn ɖe lɛ ji gblamɛ ɔ mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn
ɖo linlin agɔ do mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e wu nu taan ɖe kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ e tɛnkpɔn ɖe linlin mɔhun lɛ sin ayi mɛ
ɖokpo ɔ enyi mi wu ɖɔ linlin agɔ ɖiɖo alo akɔ kinklan sin wuntun ɖe va do mi wu ɔ mi ɖo van kan tawun hɔn ɖɔ sin ayi mitɔn mɛ xa
mi ɖo flin ɖɔ mi mɛ ɖe kun jɛxa hwlɛngan o mi bi wɛ nyi enyi mi gosin to ɖebu mɛ ɔ nɛ hlɔ
enɛ wu ɔ aniwu mi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mi hugan mɛ ɖe lɛ
kɔ mi ɖo ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ pɔlu ɖɔhun eyɛ nu nu klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ ɖɔ nyi jonɔ abi mɛ gosin fi ɖevo wa e a loɔ ɖo hɛnnu mawu tɔn mɛ
bowozi ɖo linlin jehovah ɖo do jonɔ lɛ wu e ɖo e wa nu xa hwliti mɔwabunu ɔ gbɔn e mɛ gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ bowozi ɖo linlin jehovah ɖo do jonɔ lɛ wu e ɖo e wa nu xa hwliti mɔwabunu ɔ gbɔn e mɛ
hwenu bowozi wa gle tɔn lɛ gbe ɖo nukun yiya hwenu e ɔ e nyɔnu jonɔ ɖe wu ɖo nukun wɛ ɖo fi nukun tɔn lɛ gbɔn din e
nyɔnu ɔ ɖo acɛ nukun ɔ co ee bowozi se ɖɔ e to byɔ gbe e ɔ e xomɛ do wu tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo nukun sin kɔ e li lɛ e mɛ xa hwliti
bɔ e ɖɔ hwliti kpo ninɔmɛ nuɖemaɖo tɔn mɛ e ɖe ɖo e nyi jonɔ wutu e kpo ɖu ayi mɛ nu bowozi nugbo
hwɛjijɔ ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu hwliti ɖɔ e nɔ kpo nyɔnu lɛ kpo bonu sunnu ɖo wa ɖo gle ɔ mɛ lɛ e do jɛngwinjɛngwin o
e tlɛ blo bɔ hwliti mɔ nuɖuɖu kpo sin kpo kpe e e yi lɛ e ɖɔhun
ðagbe tɛ mitɔn sixu wa nu jonɔ gosin to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e
mi nɔ do gbe jonɔ nɔ wa kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo wanyiyi kpo a
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ do gan do gbe jonɔ lɛ ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ
enyi jonɔ lɛ sisɛkpɔ nɔ vɛwu nu ɔ sixu ɖu gbɔn
mi sixu ɖe mɛ gosin ayi ɖevo ji lɛ e gbɔn gbe dido ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo gblamɛ
mi sixu wu ɖɔ jonɔ lɛ nɔ ku winnya hweɖelɛnu nɔ yeɖee xwe
yi e alo ninɔmɛ yetɔn sixu bɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun nyi nuti ɖo akɔ ɖevo lɛ alo toɖevomɛnu lɛ kpa o
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo ɖe afɔ nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ keya nu nugbo nugbo
enyi jw ɖo gbe towe mɛ ɔ e sixu bɔ do gbe jonɔ lɛ gbɔn do anɔnugbe yetɔn mɛ e xa filipunu lɛ
zaan ɔ sixu wu ɖɔ vogbingbɔn ɖe kun ɖo tɛntin mitɔn o bɔ akɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo walɔ tɔn ɖagbe lɛ kpo nujɛdo tɔn lɛ kpo
etɛ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖo suulu do mɛ ɖo aca to ɔ tɔn wɛ lɛ e wu
bonu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ vo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee do nujɔnu mɛ ɖɔ enyi nyi wɛ nyi jonɔ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ ɔ ɖɔ e wa nu xa mi gbɔn
nɔ ɖo suulu do jonɔ ɖo aca to ɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ e wu
ðo ɔ mi sixu nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nɔ nu gbɔn e kpo nɔ wa nu gbɔn e kpo wu
ɖo nukun ɖɔ ɖo zunfan aca mitɔn lɛ o loɔ etɛwu yi ɖo ɖe e a xa hlɔmanu lɛ
afɔ tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖe mɔ tɛn do sɛkpɔ mɛ nyi ayi ɖevo ji lɛ e
etɛ lɛ mi sixu wa do jonɔ ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e
enyi mi nu do mɛ ɖeɖee gosin to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e sin aca kpo nuwiwa to yetɔn tɔn lɛ kpo wu ɔ e sixu bɔwu nu mi bɔ mi wa nu ɖo xa
mi sixu ɖe hwenu ɖo taan mi nɔ zan nu sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn mitɔn e mɛ do nu nu do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo agun mitɔn alo xa mitɔn mɛ bɔ mi tuun ganji a lɛ e wu
nu ɖevo e sixu wa sɛkpɔ mɛ gosin ayi ɖevo ji lɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ylɔ bɔ wa ɖu nuɖe ɖo xa mi ɖo xwe mitɔn gbe
enyi mi nɔ nɔ xa xwedo jonɔ ɖe ɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ ba mɛ ɖo gan do wɛ ba wa nu sɔgbe xa aca mitɔn lɛ ɖo e wu ganji
mi sixu wu ɖɔ ɖo hudo alɔdo tawun ɖe lɛ tɔn ba gbe ɔ
ɔ mi sixu xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖeɖee sixu bɔ mɔ xɔ ɖagbe alo e nu a
nu mɔhun lɛ wiwa sixu hɛn gbɛzan ɖe tɔn tawun nux
sisi ɖo nu mɛ kpo ɖagbetuunnumɛ kpo sin tɛ jonɔ lɛ sixu xwedo ehɔnmɛ
nugbo ɔ jonɔ lɛ ɖo wa nu wu kpe e bi ba sɔgbe xa aca to mɛ wa e tɔn
hwliti ɖagbe ɖe ɖo ali enɛ
nukɔntɔn ɔ e ɖo sisi nu aca to mɛ e wa e tɔn lɛ byɔ gbe ba nukun ɖo fi nukun lɛ gbɔn din e
enyi jonɔ lɛ ɖe jujɔ mɔhun lɛ ɔ mɛ ɖo xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖibla ɖo sisi nu hugan
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ wu mi nɔ yi jonɔ ɖo tɛntin mitɔn lɛ e ganji
xomɛ mitɔn hun ɖɔ jehovah gbɔn tɔn gblamɛ hun ali nu akɔta lɛ bi bɔ se wɛnɖagbe ɔ
jonɔ ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ ɖo to yetɔn mɛ ɔ sixu nɔ kpewu ba biblu alo vo do xa togun jehovah tɔn
din ali hun nu bɔ nɔ xa mi e ɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ mi bonu nɔ mɔ ɖe ɖɔ emi nyi jonɔ ɖo tɛntin mitɔn o a ce
enyi nu mi sixu e alo alɔ mi sixu do e tlɛ nuɖe a ɔ xomɛ mi nɔ do wu e nɔ nyi wanyiyi jehovah ɖo nu e tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo mi nɔ wa nu mawu ɖɔhun wutu ɔ nu mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi yi jonɔ ɖo tɛntin mitɔn lɛ e ganji efɛ
akpaxwe e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɔ
etɛ daniyɛli kpo mɛ wlan ðɛhan ɔ e kpo bɔ nɔ ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
mɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e sixu kpe nukun do yeɖee wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn
lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo hwenu ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ayi ɖevo ji e gbɔn
ðebu wɛ ninɔmɛ mitɔn ɖe ɔ etɛ ɖo ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ nu mi
ɖo mɛ ɖo gbe ɖevo wɛ lɛ e mɛ wɛ a
nyi alo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ayi ɖevo ji hudo ɖe e vlafo wɛ a alo jɛ kple lɛ yi ji ɖo agun nɔ do gbe ɖevo ɖo to towe mɛ e mɛ ji wɛ a
ðo mi nɔ mawu wutu ɔ mi bi wɛ ɖo ganjininɔ mi kpo xwedo mitɔn kpo tɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɖo tɛn nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wa ɖo ayi ɖevo ji lɛ e ɔ ɖevo lɛ wɛ nɔ mɔ
enyi sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ gbe agun ɔ tɔn mɛ a ɔ sixu wa gbɔn
etɛwu klisanwun lɛ ɖo mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ xo mawu tɔn ɔ nɔ byɔ ayi vi yetɔn lɛ tɔn mɛ
etɛ sixu ganjininɔ mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɖo axɔ
nukunnu mɔ jɛ xo mawu tɔn mɛ ɖo gbe ɖevo mɛ sixu ganjininɔ mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɖo axɔ tawun
ðo xwe kanweko tɔn hwenu nɛɛmii se ɖɔ vi ɖe lɛ ɖo jwifu lɛkɔ sin babilɔnu lɛ e mɛ kun sixu do ebleegbe o e ɔ e ɖu ayi mɛ tawun xa nɛɛmii
mawu tɔn vi enɛ lɛ nyi e wɛ ɖo bubu do wɛ nɛ ɖo sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo mawu tɔn mɛ a wutu nɛɛ
etɛ wu ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ayi ji e nɔ do gbe ɖevo ɖe lɛ e ɖe lɛ
klisanwun ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ayi ji e nɔ do gbe ɖevo ɖe lɛ e ɖe lɛ wa wu ɖɔ jlo vi emitɔn lɛ ɖo nu nugbo ɔ e ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ
ðo vi lɛ nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e nɔ ɖɔ ɖo kple lɛ ji e mɛ a wutu ɔ tuto gbigbɔ tɔn e nɔ xwle mɛ ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ e nɔ byɔ ayi yetɔn mɛ ganji a
gosin tofɔligbe amɛlika tɔn tɛn nu xwedo tɔn yi australie e ɖɔ enyi e ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e zan ayi mɛtɔn kpo nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e kpo luk
enyi mi ɖo nu xa do gbe ɖevo mɛ wɛ ɔ e sixu nɔ byɔ ayi mitɔn mɛ gbe mitɔn ɖesunɔ tɔn byɔ mɛ gbɔn e
ɔ enyi e kpewu ba ɖɔ xo ɖo ganji ɖo gbe ɖevo mɛ a ɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ e gba tamɛ tawun do gan ɖesu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu mi ɖo biblo wɛ bonu jlo mi ɖo ba jehovah ɖo ayi ji e nɔ do gbe ɖevo ɖe e ku a e ɔ mi ɖo nya xɛ ɖo ganjininɔ mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ji
babilɔnunu lɛ tɛnkpɔn xwe daniyɛli do ahwan mɛ xwedo aca yetɔn kpo sinsɛn yetɔn kpo gbɔn
hwenu daniyɛli kpo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo kannumɔgbenu e ɔ babilɔnunu lɛ tɛnkpɔn xwe do ahwan mɛ bonu xwedo aca yetɔn lɛ gbɔn babilɔnunu lɛ sin gbe kplɔnkplɔn gblamɛ
nyikɔ e daniyɛli e do gesi bɛlu ee nyi numɛsɛn taji babilɔnu tɔn e
etɛ daniyɛli nɔ ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo hwenu e ɖo to ɖevo mɛ e
e nuɖuɖu axɔsu ɔ nɔ ɖu e daniyɛli co e tuun do ayi tɔn mɛ ɖɔ emi kun hɛn emiɖee bli o
mɛ ɔ ɖo xwe ɖo babilɔnu wiwa tɔn gudo ɔ e kpo ɖo ebleegbe nyikɔ tɔn ylɔ ɛ wɛ
mɛ wlan ðɛhan ɔ e mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ bɔ gbɛzinzan tɔn do gbɔn vo
e ɖo co e jo nu mawu ɖɔ lɛ e do bɔ byɔ ayi tɔn mɛ ganji xa ðɛhan
hwenu mi ɖo xo mawu tɔn wɛ e ɔ etɛ gbe mi ɖo nya
e sixu kpa mi gbɔn
wexwɛ gege gbigbeje alo nusisɔ nu xosin mi ɖo kple lɛ ji lɛ e kɛɖɛ gbe wɛ mi nɔ nya a
mi nɔ tɛnkpɔn bɔ xo mawu tɔn nɔ byɔ ayi mitɔn mɛ hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido
bonu e kpa mi ɔ mi ɖo nɔ ji ɖo hudo mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn hinhɛn do ayi mɛ hwenu mi ɖo nu wɛ e kpo tamɛ linlin do nu hudo miɖesunɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ji kpo mɛ
nujlɛdonuwu ɖe ɖie ɖe ɖo nɔ nuɖuɖu lɛ cobo ma e sixu kpo nu enɛ kɛɖɛ a
enyi lanmɛ tɔn nɔ ganji ɔ e ɖo nɔ ɖa nuɖuɖu hunsin ɖagbe tɔn eɖesunɔ nɔ ɖu lɛ e
ɖokpo ɔ mi ɖo tɛnkpɔn nɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ayi mitɔn sɔgbe kpo hudo miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
etɛwu mɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ayi ji e nɔ do gbe ɖevo ɖe lɛ e gege mɔ ɖɔ nu kplɔnkplɔn hwɛhwɛ do anɔnugbe yetɔn mɛ ɖo le
lɛ tlɛ mɔ ɖɔ bonu do sixu gbidɔn ɖo gbe ɖevo ji e ɖe nu e ɔ kun sixu kpɛnzɔn mɔjɛmɛ nugbo ɔ tɔn kpɛ nɔ ɖo ɖo kple lɛ hwenu e kɛɖɛ o
alain ɖo gbe nɔ nyi persan e wɛ sin xwe tantɔn ɖie e ɖɔ ji enyi sɔnu nu kple lɛ do persan mɛ ɔ nɔ ayi ɖo gbe ɔ ɖesunɔ ji
ðo nukunnu mimɔ jɛ gbe ɔ mɛ nɔ ɖo hun mɛ nu mi wutu ɔ nukplɔnmɛ gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ byɔ ayi mɛ dandan a
etɛ lɛ ɖo blo etɛwu
klisanwun lɛ ɖo blo bɔ xo mawu tɔn byɔ vi yetɔn lɛ sin ayi mɛ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe
ee kpo asi tɔn muriel kpo wa ɖo ayi ji e nɔ do gbe ɖevo ɖe e nu xwe atɔn jɛji gudo e ɔ wu ɖɔ vi sunnu emitɔn ɖo xwe e kun nɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖo yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ o
nɔ ɖo e do gbe ɖevo dido ɖo ɔ mɛ wu ɔ e yi wan nu anɔnugbe tɔn flansegbe dido do jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ wɛ muriel ɖɔ
blo bonu nugbo ɔ byɔ vi towe lɛ sin ayi mɛ akpaxwe kpo kpo
etɛ lɛ sixu lɛ bɔ lɛkɔ yi agun nɔ do gbe vi yetɔn lɛ se ganji e ɖe mɛ
etɛ byɔ ɖo lɛ si
nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo ɖɔ emi ɖo hwenu kpo nuwukpikpe kpo doo wan yi nu jehovah vi emitɔn lɛ gbe hwe ɖokpo ɔ a ji
wegɔ ɔ sixu wu ɖɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kun nɔ jlo vi emitɔn lɛ o alo ɖɔ ayi ji e nɔ do gbe ɖevo ɖe bɔ ɖo wa ɖe wɛ e kun nɔ jlo o
ðo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɔ klisanwun lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ kɔlilɛ yi agun nɔ do gbe vi yetɔn lɛ se ganji e ɖe mɛ jɛ hwenu vi yetɔn lɛ lido ɖo nugbo ɔ mɛ e wɛ xa
ɖe lɛ blo tuto nɔ vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo hwenu ɖo ayi ɖevo ji e gbɔn
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ ɖe lɛ mɔ wlɛnwin nɔ vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo anɔnugbe yetɔn mɛ hwenu nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo agun alo kanɖo nɔ do gbe ɖevo e mɛ e
charles ɖo nyɔnuvi atɔn bɔ xwe yetɔn jɛ e nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo kanɖo nɔ do lingala gbe e ɖe mɛ
e tinmɛ ɖɔ mi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn nɔ nu vi lɛ nɔ blo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn ɖo anɔnugbe mitɔn mɛ
mi nɔ blo lɛ nɔ ɖo lingala gbe mɛ bonu do sixu gbe enɛ hwenu ɖo ayihun wɛ e
do gan gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖo kple lɛ mɛ akpaxwe kpo kpo
kevin ɖo nyɔnuvi we bɔ ɖo xwe kpo tantɔn kpo e blo tuto ɖe lɛ nɔ su nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo ɖo kple lɛ ji ɖo agun nɔ do gbe ɖevo e ɖe mɛ a e sin do
e tinmɛ ɖɔ nyi kpo asi kpo nɔ nu xa vi lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo anɔnugbe yetɔn flansegbe mɛ
nugbododo tɛ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ sixu bɔ tuun nu nu vi towe lɛ hugan e
we tɛ lɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖe xa mɛ
tinmɛ ɖo vivɔnu e
muriel xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kpo asu emitɔn kpo gbɔ nujlomɛ emitɔn lɛ do ɖo ɖagbe vi sunnu emitɔn tɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo wutu xa hlɔmanu lɛ
gbexosin hwebinu tɔn wɛ e nyi din
e tlɛ ɖo linlin wɛ lɛkɔ yi kanɖo nɔ do jonɔgbe e ɖe mɛ
mi sixu ɖɔ mi yi wan nu xo mawu tɔn gbɔn
nwt e tuun ɖɔ enyi lɛ nɔ xa linlin emitɔn lɛ do gbe nɔ byɔ ayi yetɔn mɛ hugan e mɛ ɔ sixu su hudo gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo e sin do ganji
e ɖo co mi ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ ɔ mi ɖo tɛnkpɔn nɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn syɛnsyɛn lɛ ayi mitɔn
enyi mi nɔ mawuxowema ɔ hwɛhwɛ do gbe nɔ byɔ ayi mitɔn mɛ hugan e mɛ ɔ mi kpo xwedo mitɔn kpo kpo ɖo ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo bɔ mi ɖɔ mi hɛn nu mawu ɖɔ lɛ e do ayi mɛ ðɛh
akpaxwe ɔ bonu mɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn sixu xwedo towe e ɖevo lɛ hun xota ovi le togodo avunnukundiosome alemoyi eton le ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe octobre mɛ
nɔvi sunnu lɛ ɖo kunnu ɖe wɛ ɖo fi e nɔ blo ɖo ɖe e ɖe
hwenuxo zɔn viin jɛ nyavi wamamɔnɔ ɖe ji ɖo gletoxo linlin ɖe mɛ
xa ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ yɛyinɔ wɛ nɔ e
enyi jonɔ lɛ wa ɔ gletoxo ɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ nɔ ca ɖo yetɔn lɛ nukɔn
nɔ dlɛn cɛnji we do e kpɔnwun ɖokpo ɖokpo kpo kpɔnwun we ɖokpo kpo
nɔ ɖɔ ee jlo e
nyavi ɔ nɔ kpɔnwun ɖokpo ɔ nɔ kanwezun ɖido
gbe ɖokpo ɔ jonɔ lɛ ɖokpo kanbyɔ nyavi ɔ ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ kpɔnwun we ɔ xɔ akwɛ hu kpɔnwun ɖokpo ɔ donu we a ce
nyavi ɔ nu do kpa ɖɔ ɛɛn tuun
jonɔ ɔ kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ bɔ etɛwu kpɔnwun ɖokpo ɔ
nyavi ɔ ɖɔ nu kpɔnwun we ɔ ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ ayihun ɔ ɖe xa mi nɛ
tuun kpɔnwun ɖokpo nabi e a
nyavi xo hwenuxo enɛ ɖɔ e ɖe jijɔ mɛxo lɛ sixu ɖu le tɔn e ɖe e wɛ nyi nunywɛ zan e
biblu ɖɔ hɛn nunywɛ zan e kpo nuwukpikpe tɔn kpo
enɛ ɔ nɔ ɖi zɔnlin ɖo ayijayi mɛ ɖo ali towe ji bɔ afɔ gbeɖe a
enɛ nɔ mi bɔ afɔ mitɔn lɛ nɔ lido lobɔ mi nɔ afɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
nunywɛ zan e gbɔn vo nu nutuuntuun kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo
mɛ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ e sixu mɔ nuɖe ca kan xa ɖevo gbɔn e
mɛ ɖo nunywɛ e nɔ kpewu nɔ zan nutuuntuun kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo ɖo ɖo ali ɖagbe ɖe
ði ɔ mɛɖe sixu kpewu xa wema etɛ biblu mɛ tawun
e sixu jɛ kple agun tɔn lɛ wa ji tlɛ nɔ xosin ɖagbe lɛ
enɛ lɛ bi sixu ɖɔ e ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo enɛ ɖɔ e ɖo nunywɛ jɛn nɛ a
e nyi dandan a
e sixu nyi ɖɔ ayi tɔn nɔ yawu wli nu wɛ
e ɖo co enyi e nɔ zan nu e tuun e kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ e ɖo e kpo do wa nu sɔgbe xa nugbo ɔ e jɛxa gbɔn e ɔ e ɖo huzu wɛ nɛ
enyi gbeta kɔn e nɔ wa lɛ e nɔ ɖo nɔ ɖɔ e nɔ nu ganji ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e nɔ ɖe nunywɛ zan e nɛ
matie kpi lo jezu do do nya we ɖe lɛ wu bɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo gba xɔ e sin
e ɖɔ do mɛ lɛ ɖokpo wu ɖɔ e nyi ayiɖotenanɔ
ðo nya enɛ ɔ do nukun nu sixu wa jɛ ɖo sɔgudo e mɛ wutu ɔ e gba xɔ tɔn nyi so ji
e mɔ nu zɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa
e ɖɔ ɖɔ xɔ emitɔn gbigba do kɔgudu mɛ ɖe akwɛ kpo alo ya a
e nu nuwiwa tɔn lɛ ji ɖo nukɔnmɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu jɔhɔn ɖaxo nyi e ɔ xɔ tɔn a
nukanbyɔ ɔ din wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi sixu ɖo jijɔ ɖagbe enɛ nyi nunywɛ zan e hɛn gbɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ micee ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nunywɛ zan lɛ e ɖi xɛsi nu nyikɔ mawu tɔn
du monde nouveau xɛsiɖiɖi nu nyikɔ jehovah tɔn byɔ ɖɔ e si
tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖo sisi sɔgbe e nu nu nyikɔ tɔn nɔte e jɛ nugbododo tɔn lɛ ji
bonu si mɛɖe ɔ ɖo tuun e nɔ nu gbɔn e
enɛ gudo ɔ sixu ɖeji do wu tɔn nu ɖo tɔn gbɔn nuwiwa eɖɔhun gblamɛ
enyi nu nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ wa do kancica mi ɖo kpo jehovah kpo e wu ɖo nukɔnmɛ e nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi bonu mi nɔ gbeta mitɔn lɛ jinjɔn nugbododo tɔn lɛ ji ɔ mi ɖo nunywɛ zan e
wegɔ ɔ nunywɛxo ɖɔ nɔ ɖɔ emiɖokpo tɔn jɛn ɔ wu wɛ e nɔ ɖo zɔ nu mɛ bi e nɔ nunywɛ zan lɛ e bi nwt
enyi mi miɖee a ɔ mi sixu ɖo wu zɔ nu jehovah kpo togun tɔn kpo
bonu nu nyi nu mi a ɔ mi ɖo nɔ zan hwenu kpo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu nyikɔ mawu tɔn nɔ ɖo sisi nu nugbododo tɔn lɛ e kpo
enyi e blo ɔ miɖesunɔ ɖo nɔ yi kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ nɔ do kpo agun klisanwun tɔn kpo hwɛhwɛ
hwenu mi ɖo kple lɛ ji e ɔ mi ɖo hun linlin mitɔn kpo ayi mitɔn kpo bonu nu ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe lɛ e byɔ mɛ
nu enɛ ɔ enyi mi nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ e bi ɔ mi sɛkpɔ ɛ
nux enyi mi hun linlin mitɔn kpo ayi mitɔn kpo hwenu mi ɖo biblu kpo wema tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn sɔnu lɛ e kpo xa wɛ e ɔ mi nɔ nu nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ wa ji ɖo nukɔnmɛ lɛ e wu nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa
enyi nɔvi zin lɛ e ɖe we xa mi ɔ mi ɖo wa nu sɔgbe kpo weɖexamɛ yetɔn kpo
nunywɛ zan e sixu hɛn xwe
asu ɖe sixu mɔ sisi ɖaxo mɔhun gbɔn
enyi e gannugannu alo kpo adan kpo ɔ e mɔ sɔyi a
do tagba ɔ asi sunnu mɔhun tɔn sixu nɔ ɖo sisi kpɛɖe hwenu e ɖo ayi e
nu e ɖo ayi a ɔ asi tɔn si a
e vɛwu tawun
sunnu ɔ ɖo tamɛ do nu bɔ asi tɔn ɖo sisi hwebinu e ji
enyi e nɔ ɖe gbigbɔ tɔn nyi wanyiyinɔ kpo kpo ɔ e ɖu sisi ɖaxo asi tɔn tɔn sin le
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ asu ɖe ɖo yi wan nu asi tɔn
efɛ nyɔnu ɖe sixu ɖɔ enyi emi nu sɔgbe a bɔ asu emitɔn ɖo acɛ tuun lɛ e hwla do e ɔ e kpo ɖo wan yi nu emi wɛ
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ nunywɛ enɛ zan a
enyi asu ɔ wa mɔ nu e hwla e ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ etɛ jɛ
e yi wan a
e sixu vɛwu tawun
enyi e hwenu e tinmɛ nu sɔgbe a lɛ e kpo fifa kpo ɔ nugboɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖibla su asu tɔn nukunmɛ
wanyiyi sunnu ɔ ɖo e jɛji din
nɔ vi towe lɛ gbɔn ɖo egbe e wa nu do xa ɖo sɔgudo wu
vi lɛ ɖo nɔ setonu nu yetɔn lɛ bɔ e ɖo jehovah gbɔn e
lɛ ɖɔ vi lɛ nyi e alo enyi wa nu nyi do ɔ to e dɔn nu e tuuntuun kpowun kpe a
ɖo nunywɛ zan e nɔ vi tɔn nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu e ɖo setonu e wu
ði ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ vi ɖe do mɛmasigbe nu tɔn lɛ ɖokpo
adanwiwa alo bibɔ ɖo vi ɔ wu afɔjiafɔji sixu ɖe e kpo alo ci xwii
xomɛsin sixu ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ sixu hɔn nu tɔn lɛ
ɖeɖee nɔ ɖe nunywɛ zan e lɛ e tamɛ do ali vi yetɔn lɛ ɖe e kpo nu e wa do ji ɖo sɔgudo e kpo ji
lɛ ɖo nɔ yawu wa nu ɖo mɔ hwenɛnu e wutu a
vlafo sixu kpla vi ɔ jɛ vo xo jlɛ do xo wu xa ɛ kpo fifa kpo kpodo wanyiyi kpan tinmɛ ɖɔ jehovah jlo ɖɔ e si tɔn lɛ ba ɖu le tɔn sɔyi
wlɛnwin ɖagbe enɛ sixu byɔ vi ɔ sin ayi mɛ tawun
e mɔ ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ nɔ wlibo nu emi nugbo nugbo bɔ sisi e ɖo nu e jɛji
mɛ ɔ ali hun nu vi ɔ nɔ alɔdo hwenu tagba ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ wa e
ɖe lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi wa do nu vi emitɔn gɔn ɛ
etɛ jɛ hwenu vi ɔ wa su e
e ɖi xɛsi nu jehovah mɔ ɖɔ nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e xwedo nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ a
e hun linlin tɔn lɛ kpo ayi tɔn kpo nu jehovah a alo e ci zɔ nu gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ nux
ɖagbe ɖe nɔ to blo tuto nu kpa wɛ e ɖe e tɔn jɛ nukɔn
e nɔ jɛ atin kpa ji kpowun nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ e nu ɖagbe ɖe a
ɖeɖee ɖo nunywɛ zan lɛ e nɔ zan hwenu gege do nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo sixu zan gbɔn e kpo bɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu nyikɔ tɔn
enyi ɖo wu zɔ nu jehovah kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo a ɔ nɔ ɖo nunywɛ zan e nɔ do hɛn xwedo yetɔn lido
ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ gbeta sixu wa ɖagbe alo nyanya do gbɛzan mitɔn wu nu xwe mɔkpan lɛ e kɔn wiwa nɔ mi
mi ɖo nɔ yawu do zɛn ɖo mi wɛ e ji a loɔ mi ɖo nɔ nɔte nu
tamɛ do nu e ji nɔ ayi sɔyi lɛ e ji
jehovah tɔn lɛ zan nunywɛ tɔn
enɛ ɔ mi hɛn nunywɛ zan e mi nux nwt
nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo wɛ nyi e ɖeji do nu ɖo nukun wɛ e ɖe ɔ wu ebl
jehovah hwexonu tɔn lɛ hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido gbɔn
etɛ lɛ sixu hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido bɔ mi ɖo
le tɛ lɛ ɖo nuɖiɖi lido e ɖe ɖiɖo mɛ
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo xɔ akwɛ klisanwun nugbo lɛ tɔn kpo mɛ ɖo sataan sin mɛ lɛ e tɔn kpo tɛntin
nukanbyɔ taji tɛ lɛ mi gbeje din
nukunðiðo klisanwun nugbo lɛ ɖo e jiwu mɛ nya
nukunɖiɖo ɖagbe hugan ɖeɖee lɛ sixu ɖo e nɛ
mi ɖo mavɔmavɔ sin akpa mawu do e ɖu le jinukunsin ɔ alo ayikungban ɔ tɔn
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi ɖo nukun ɖɔ togun mawu tɔn ɖo vunvun wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo sataan tɔn mɛ lɛ e lɔ ɖo nukunɖiɖo alɔkpa ɖe lɛ nɔ xo nu ɖɔ wa jɛnu gbeɖe a ji
ði ɔ livi mɔkpan wɛ nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ emi ɖu ɖogowungba ɖe e vɛwu ɖɔ kudeji ɖɔ nu nyi
sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ sixu ɖeji do nukunɖiɖo wu gbɔn
le tɛ lɛ nuɖiɖi lido e ɖe ɖiɖo nu nu ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe e hɛn wa nu mi
etɛ ji nuɖiɖi klisanwun nugbo lɛ tɔn jinjɔn
nuɖiɖi nyi jijɔ ɖe bonu e ji lɛ kpo e kpo a jɛn e nɔ ɖo kpowun a e nɛ
gbigbɔ mawu tɔn wɛ nɔ bɔ klisanwun ɖe nɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi
nwt jehovah ɖo nuɖiɖi alo ɖo hudo tɔn bonu biblu ɖɔ a
ðo jehovah nyi hu nu bi wutu ɔ nu ɖebu sixu ɖo linlin tɔn lɛ bɔ gɔn jijɛ a
mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ kudeji tawun ɖɔ nyɔna sin akpa emi do lɛ e jɛnu bɔ e nɔ ci ɖɔ jɛ wɛ ɖɔhun
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ e sɔgbe
xa
nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn ɔ jinjɔn nugbo elɔ ji ɖɔ jehovah nyi mawu nɔ ɖe akpa e do lɛ e hwebinu
nukunɖiɖo tɛ sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo jɛ nukɔn nu klisanwun lɛ e ɖo
wemata wema eblee lɛ tɔn sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo sin nyikɔ
mɛ mawu mɛ wlan wema enɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖekunnu ɖagbe nu ɖo nuɖiɖi yetɔn wu ebl
nwt enɛ lɛ ku cobɔ kunkan sin akpa e do nyi jezu klisu e wa hun ninɔ ɖo jixwe sin ali
etɛ ji ablaxamu kpo xwedo tɔn sin lɛ kpo ayi yetɔn bi ɖo
hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido gbɔn
ablaxamu ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
e hɛn nukunɖiɖo awajijɛnɔ ɖo ninɔ ɖo kunkan sin akpa e do e glɔ e mɛ e mɛ ceɖeceɖe a
jezu xosin zawe e ɖe nu nukanbyɔ enɛ hwenu e ɖɔ xo elɔ nu tɔn lɛ e awajijɛ ɖaxo wɛ nyi nu mitɔn ablaxamu ɖo e ɖo nukun ɖo wiwa wɛ e mɔ nugbo bɔ xomɛ hun
jaan ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu sala izaki jakɔbu kpo mɛ gege ɖevo ayi ɖo axɔsuɖuto sɔgudo tɔn ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe bɔ mawu ɖesu ɖe we tɔn e ji lɛ e kpo ebl
ablaxamu kpo xwedo tɔn kpo hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido gbɔn
nu do mawu wu gbɔn to ɖiɖo mɛxomɔ lɛ mawu tɔn lɛ alo wema hwexonu tɔn lɛ xixa gblamɛ
ðo taji hu ɔ wɔn nu lɛ e a loɔ akpa mawu do lɛ e kpo nu e byɔ ɖo mɛ si lɛ e kpo xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun yetɔn mɛ lobɔ tamɛ do ji
ðo sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo enɛ lɛ ɖeji do nukunɖiɖo yetɔn wu wutu ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ jiya lɛ bi do nɔ gbeji nu mawu
jehovah mi xo tɔn biblu ɔ blebu kpo kpo bonu mi do sixu hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido
enyi mi ɖo awajijɛ bɔ nu mi wa ɔ bi nu mi ɔ mi ɖo nɔ xa xo mawu tɔn hwɛhwɛ bɔ nu e blo ɔ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
ðɛh xa ɔ ɖi jehovah jɛ nukɔn nu klisanwun lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo kpo ɖo tamɛ do akpa e mawu do lɛ e ji wɛ nɔ setonu nu tɔn lɛ
jehovah kɔn nyɔna do mi ji nɔ mi nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn gbɔn devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ gblamɛ nɔ tunfla
enɛ wu ɔ enyi nu mi nɔ ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn jehovah nɔ mi lɛ e mɛ e nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi ci hwexonu tɔn ɖeji do nukunɖiɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn yetɔn wu lɛ e ɖɔhun
ɖɛxixo sixu hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido gbɔn
ðɛxixo bɔ nuɖiɖi jɛ nukɔn nu klisanwun lɛ e tɔn lido
hwenu mawu sinkɔn nu ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ e ɔ nuɖiɖi mitɔn nɔ lido xa jaan
nu ɖɛxixo do miɖesunɔ tamɛ ɔ mɛ ɖevo tɛ lɛ sin tamɛ mi ɖo nɔ xoɖɛ do
alɔdo mawu tɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ mi nɔ byɔ ɖo ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ mɛ a
ɔ ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ ɖo nɔ ɖɔ mi flin mɛ ɖo ganxo lɛ mi ɖesunɔ wɛ ɖo ganxo ɖɔhun
mi ɖo nɔ xoɖɛ do kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e sin takunmɛ ɖo taji ɔ do mi tɔn lɛ tamɛ
hwenu mi mɔ bɔ jehovah sinkɔn nu ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ e ɔ e nɔ byɔ lanmɛ nu mi tawun ebl
ðo eblee lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ ɔ pɔlu tinmɛ tagba mawu e ɖɔ nyikɔ yetɔn a lɛ e gege dɛ ɖe e
ði ɔ ɔ ɖɔ nyɔnu ɖeɖee vi sunnu yetɔn lɛ ku bɔ e nu lɛ e xo
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ xo bɔ ɖɔ emi kun gosin nu ɖɔ wɛ emi ɖe ɔ gudo o sixu wa sin ku mɔ hu elɔ e
mɛtɛnkpɔn tɛ lɛ gbeyiɖɔ ɖe lɛ dɛ ɖe ɖo nuɖiɖi yetɔn wu
gbeyiɖɔ ɖe lɛ tiin ɖi micee kpo jelemii kpo bɔ e ɖɔ slamɛ wu su do gankpa mɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖi elii nɔ ɖo gbetotlo mɛ flu gbɔn wɛ nɔ ɖo sokan mɛ sokan mɛ flu gbɔn wɛ nɔ ɖo so xomɛ so xomɛ do mɛ do mɛ gbɔn wɛ
nukunɖeji bi ɔ do mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ didɛ ɖe wu
etɛ ɛ wa
ee pɔlu ɖɔ xo do sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo vovo lɛ wu gudo e ɔ e wa nukunɖeji bi ɔ ji e wɛ nyi aklunɔ mitɔn jezu klisu
eblee lɛ ɖɔ e yi gbe bɔ e hu ɖo yatin ji e winnya e nɔ mɔ ɖo ku mɔhunkɔtɔn mɛ ɔ a ɖo e ɖo awajijɛ e ɖo ɔ flin wɛ bɔ egbe din ɔ e ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo axɔsuzinkpo mawu tɔn kpa ɖo ɖisixwe
nugbo ɔ mi ɖo flin nuɖiɖi sin jezu ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛn hu bi lɛ e nukɔn e xa eblee lɛ
jezu ɖɔhun ɔ klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖi ahwanvu antipasi ɖɔ emi kun sa gbejininɔ emitɔn o
nuɖe ajɔ mɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e sin ku do jixwe ajɔ enɛ hugan hu hwexonu tɔn lɛ ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ e
mɛtɛnkpɔn tɛ lɛ rudolf graichen mɔ etɛ ɛ dɛ ɖo
mawu hwe mitɔn tɔn livi mɔkpan wɛ ɖo jezu tɔn xwedo wɛ gbɔn nukunɖiɖo yetɔn hinhɛn mɛ ceɖeceɖe gblamɛ nɔ lɔn bonu mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖebu nu nuɖiɖi yetɔn a
tamɛ do rudolf graichen e ji ɖo allemagne ɖo e tɔn ji e flin ɖiɖe nu jɛ bɔ biblu ɖɔ lɛ e tɔn ɖeɖee e gbɔn do wu ɖo xwe tɔn gbe lɛ e
e wlan ɖɔ ðiɖe ɖokpo hla kpo lɛngbɔvi kpo kpo kpɔ kpo nyibuvi kpo kinnikinni kpo bɔ bi ɖo fifa mɛ lobɔ yɔkpɔvu ɖokpo ɖo kpla wɛ
jɛ nukɔn ɔ kponɔ nazi gestapo tɔn lɛ doya nu rudolf syɛnsyɛn bɔ nukɔnmɛ ɔ kponɔ communiste stasi zanzanhweji allemagne tɔn tɔn lɛ lɔ doya syɛnsyɛn nu enɛ lɛ jɛ nu xwe mɔkpan co e jo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo e ɖo nu palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn e do a
mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖevo rudolf mɔ lɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ tɔn ku ɖo yadonumɛkpa ravensbruck tɔn mɛ ɖo adɔtwɛndɔtwɛn sin azɔn typhoide wutu mɔ bɔ tɔn wema ɖe mɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun nyi jehovah tɔn o ɖo nuɖiɖi tɔn wa bi wutu
ee rudolf sin gankpa mɛ gudo e ɔ e ɖu vivi wujɔmɛ ɖe lɛ tɔn e nyi lɛdo tɔn bɔ e ylɔ ɛ yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn
e ɖe nyi ɖo wa lɛdo tɔn sin ɖo finɛ
mɛtɛnkpɔn rudolf tɔn lɛ fo a
ee e wli alɔ xa patsy tɔn ɖe ɖo xwe ɖokpo gudo e ɔ vi yetɔn nyɔnu ku
nukɔnmɛ ɔ tɔn ɖo xwe kpowun e ku
rudolf dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ bi bɔ e wa ɖo mɛxoxwe tlɛ ɖo azɔn jɛ wɛ co e kpo ɖo gbexosin hwebinu tɔn kpo mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe kpo nyi wɛ hwenu gbɛzan tɔn sin ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe tɔn wexwɛ mɛ e
jehovah tɔn din tɔn ɖo didɛ wɛ ɖo yadonumɛ lɛ e tɔn tɛ lɛ mi ɖo
e ɖo do nu jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ syɛnsyɛn magbokɔ co kpo ɖo awa jɛ wɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo yetɔn wu
ði ɔ nɔvi mitɔn sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo gege wɛ e wli do ganxo ɖo erythree singapour kpo coree du kpo bɔ gege yetɔn tiin nɔ nyi ɖɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa xo jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e hwi o e wutu wɛ e nɔ sin
isaac negede kpo paulos kpo ɖo kanweko mɔkpan enɛ lɛ mɛ yedɛɛ lɛ ɖo gankpa erythree tɔn ɖe mɛ sin xwe jɛji ɖie
e ɖe nɔvi sunnu enɛ lɛ nyite bonu kpe nukun do yetɔn kpo lɛ e wu a nɔ ɖo do nu wɛ syɛnsyɛn co kpo ɖo gbeji
nukunmɛ yetɔn zawe gbɔn bɔ mi mɔ ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn jw org ji e ɖɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido
nɔ lɛ e tlɛ wa jɛ sisi ɖo nu ji
nuɖiɖi tɔn hwe mitɔn tɔn ɖo agun towe mɛ lɛ e ɖo le hɛn wa nu wɛ a
nuɖiɖi lido e sixu cyɔn alɔ ji towe gbɔn
jehovah tɔn gege tiin bɔ e doya nu yedɛɛ lɛ syɛnsyɛn a
mɛtɛnkpɔn nuɖiɖi yedɛɛ lɛ tɔn mɔ lɛ e gbɔn vo
mɛ gege dɛ ɖo alo jiya ɖo tohwan abi adla hwenu
mɛ ɖevo lɛ ci mɔyizi kpo lɛ kpo ɖɔhun ɖo jo fɛɛ mɛ ninɔ alo nukunɖeji nyinyi do
ɖi xwi xa kpo cejɛnnabi kpo tɔn zinzan
etɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu bɔ wa
wanyiyi ɖo nu jehovah e kpo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo ɖo ɖɔ e jla nuagɔwiwa lɛ bi ɖo mavɔmavɔ sin ajɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo nujlɔjlɔwiwa sin ɖe mɛ e kpo wɛ xa ðɛhan
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ tamɛ linlin do akpa mawu tɔn lɛ ji kpo ɖɛxixo hwɛhwɛ kpo hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido gbɔn e
enɛ bɔ mi dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn nuɖiɖi mitɔn mɔ lɛ e hwenu mi ayi mitɔn bi ɖo nukunɖiɖo klisanwun tɔn mitɔn ji kpo jiɖiɖe kpo e
ɖi xota bɔ e gbɔn e ɔ nuɖiɖi xo biblu ɖɔ e byɔ nu hu
akpaxwe xota les epreuves pas terni esperance ɖo reveillez vous
avril tɔn mɛ gbɛzan tɔn andrej hanak nɔ nɔ slovaquie e tɔn
nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo wɛ nyi e ganjɛ nu e mɔ a e wu ɖɔ e tiin ebl
nɔwee tɔn mi bɔ mi mɔ nu jɛ nu nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nyi e wu gbɔn
ali tɛ lɛ mi ɖo ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖe
etɛwu nuɖiɖi kpo wanyiyi kpo bi ɖo taji
linlin tɛ mi ɖo ɖo do nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn wu
nu xɔ akwɛ wɛ nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn nyi
nwt mɛ ɖo nuɖiɖi lɛ e bi wɛ e ɖo su nukun mɛ ɖesu
nyɔna tɛ lɛ sin ali wɛ hun nu mɛ ɖo nuɖiɖi e
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi gbeje din
jezu klisu ɖɔ ɖɔ emitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ nɔ dɔn mɛ lɛ wa eɖesunɔ gbɔn vi tɔn ji
jaan nu mɛɖe ɖi nu jezu e bɔ e mɛ enɛ sin hwɛ lɛ kɛ ɛ enɛ ɔ nɔ hun kancica ɖagbe ɖiɖo xa jehovah sin ali nu mɛ sɔyi
jehovah mɔ ɖɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi wa ɖagbe
ðo tɔn mɛ ɔ e hun ayi mitɔn bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wɛnɖagbe ɔ wu
bɔ mi jɛ nu ɖi nu jezu ji jɛ mavɔmavɔ ɖo nukun ji xa jaan
etɛ nyi nuɖiɖi ɔ tawun
nyɔna mawu ɖɔ emi kɔn do mi ji e hinhɛn do ayi mɛ kpowun wɛ e nyi a
hu ɔ ali tɛ lɛ mi ɖo ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖe
tinmɛ nu wu nuɖiɖi nyi tamɛ linlin sin xo ɖe kpowun a e
nukunnu mimɔ jɛ jlo mawu tɔn mɛ kpe bonu e ɖo nuɖiɖi a
nuɖiɖi ɔ hlɔnhlɔn aditi ɖe wɛ e nyi nɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ wa nu sɔgbe kpo jlo mawu tɔn kpo
enyi mɛɖe ɖi nu nu tuto mɛhwlɛngan tɔn mawu e ɔ e nɔ jɛ wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla mɛ ɖevo lɛ ji
pɔlu tinmɛ ɖɔ enyi towe do ɖɔ ɖo mɛ bi nukɔn ɖɔ jezu wɛ nyi aklunɔ ɖi nu ɖo ayi towe mɛ ɖɔ mawu ɛ sin ku ɔ mawu hwlɛn gan
ðo nu mɛɖe ɖi nu ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ ɔ e nɔ sin enɛ wu bɔ mɛ enɛ nɔ huzu hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖo mawu nukɔn
mi sixu hɛn ɛ lido gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enyi mi jlo ɖu mavɔmavɔ sin vivi ɖo ayikungban ji ɔ mi ɖo ɖo nuɖiɖi hɛn ɛ lido
nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo ci atin ɖe nɔ ɖo hudo sin tɔn gbɔn e ɖɔhun
atin ɖe nɔ gɔn su gbeɖe a
atin ɖo e sixu wa ja ɖo sin e mɔ a e wutu alo sixu kpo ɖo wɛ ɖo fifa kpɛɖe kpɛɖe mɔ wɛ e ɖe e wutu
enyi atin ɖo ganji e ɖe wa mɔ sin a ɔ e ku jɛn wɛ
wɛ e nɔ nyi nu nuɖiɖi mitɔn
ebl enyi mi kpe nukun ganji ɔ e kpo ɖo kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ bɔ mi lido ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ tɛ
ali we tɛ lɛ eblee lɛ tinmɛ nu nuɖiɖi nyi e ɖe
eblee lɛ mɛ wɛ biblu nuɖiɖi gbɔn e ɖe
mi nɔ ɖɔ nukunɖiɖo mitɔn ɖo nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖi nu nu nu e nɔ mɔ a bɔ xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ lɛ e gbɔn
mi nɔ wa gbɔn xo mitɔn lɛ kpo nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ kpo gblamɛ mɛvo ɔ mi sixu ɖo nuɖiɖi jɔ nuɖiɖi ɔ a
nɔwee tɔn mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nyi e mɛ gbɔn
eblee lɛ ji ɖɔ nuɖiɖi nɔwee ɖo e wɛ bɔ nu ɖo jɛ wɛ bɔ mawu ɖɔ bɔ mɛɖe ɖo mimɔ wɛ a lɛ ɔ e do ylɔ nujɔnu e setonu nu mawu blo tɔjihun ɖokpo bɔ e kpodo xwedo tɔn kpo byɔ mɛ gan
nɔwee ɖe nuɖiɖi e ɖo e gbɔn tɔjihun jinganjingan ɖe biblo gblamɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛ ɖo xa tɔn mɛ lɛ e kan nu wu e ɖo tɔjihun ɖaxo mɔhun blo wɛ e byɔ ɛ
nɔwee ci xwii alo ɖɔ nu ɖɔ yi kpe nukun do yetɔn wu wɛ a
gbeɖe
nuɖiɖi e ɖo e ɛ bɔ e ɖekunnu kpo adɔgbigbo kpo gbo hwɛɖonumɛ mawu tɔn jawe e sin akpa nu mɛ nɔ ɖo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ kpo e kpo lɛ e
su nu ɖo funfun ɖo ayikungban ji e bi sin kun do
ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nɔwee tinmɛ ali ɖokpo lɛ sixu gan ɖe e nu gbɔn gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn ɖɔ nu gblamɛ byɔ tɔjihun ɔ mɛ
etɛ mawu do ayi mɛ nu ahwanvu jaki tinmɛ do nu nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn nugbo ɔ nyi e wu
e ci ɖɔ pɔlu wlan xo mawu mɛ do nu nuɖiɖi nyi e wu e ɔ e kun lin cobonu jaki wlan wema tɔn o ɖɔhun
pɔlu ɖɔhun ɔ jaki tinmɛ ɖɔ nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn nugbo ɔ kun nyi ɖɔ e ɖo nuɖiɖi kpowun o e byɔ ɖɔ e wa nuɖe
jaki yi nukɔn ɖe vogbingbɔn ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo kpowun kpo nuɖiɖi kpo tɛntin e
awovi lɛ ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu tiin ɖo nuɖiɖi nugbo ɔ a
e wa ɔ nɔ wa nu kpo gbejimanɔ kpo bonu jlo mawu tɔn lɛ jɛnu o
mawu mɔ ɛ do mɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ wu ɖo e vi tɔn izaki xwle mawu ɖo vɔsakpe ji
jaan mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ nuɖiɖi ɖo taji gbɔn
xwe jɛji gudo ɔ jaan wlan wɛnɖagbe wema tɔn kpo wema mɛ atɔn kpo
e mɔ nukunnu jɛ tinmɛ biblu ɖe lɛ do nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn nugbo ɔ wu e mɛ ganji a
jaan zan xogbe glɛkigbe tɔn e lilɛ do ɖi nu e hu biblu ɖe lɛ bi
ði ɔ jaan tinmɛ ɖɔ mɛ ɖi nu nu vi ɔ mɔ mavɔmavɔ mɛ setonu nu vi ɔ a ɔ e mɔ mavɔmavɔ a loɔ xomɛsin mawu tɔn ɖo ji tɔn
jaan nuɖiɖi klisanwun tɔn byɔ ɖɔ e setonu nu gbeɖiɖe jezu tɔn lɛ
jaan zan xogbe jezu tɔn ɖeɖee ɖɔ nuɖiɖi nyi nuwiwa tɛgbɛ tɔn ɖe e hwɛhwɛ jaan
mi sixu ɖɔ nugbo ɔ mi tuun e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
e ɖo su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ jehovah zan gbigbɔ tɔn do ɖe nugbo ɔ mi mi bɔ mi ɖi nu nu wɛnɖagbe ɔ
xa luki
mi ɖo gɔn ku do nu jehovah ɖɔ e dɔn mi sɛkpɔ eɖesunɔ gbɔn vi tɔn jɛ nuɖiɖi mitɔn ji fo e gblamɛ gbeɖe a
mi ɖo hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido gbɔn ɖɛxixo kpo xo mawu tɔn kpinkplɔn kpo gblamɛ do ɖɔ mɔhun su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖesu efɛ
ali tɛ lɛ mi ɖo ɖi nu ɖe
ði ɔ mi ɖo kpo ɖo wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn ɔ jla wɛ kpo ɖo nu mɛ lɛ wɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu
mi nɔ do gan nɔ ɖe xoxo i nyi ɔ kpodo walɔ tɔn lɛ bi kpan nyi ayi nɔ miɖee do nu ɖebu sixu gbɔjɔ awakanmɛ nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e wu
nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nu mawu ɖo taji gbɔn
klisanwun lɛ ɖo tɛnkpɔn ɖo jujɔ taji ɖevo lɛ nu nuɖiɖi yetɔn mɔ tɛn do hɛn ɖee ɖo wanyiyi mawu tɔn mɛ xa ju
enyi e nuɖiɖi do wanyiyi wu ɔ ba tɛ mɛ e ɖo taji ɖo
mɛ wlan akpaxwe biblu tɔn ðo glɛkigbe mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ xo do nuɖiɖi ji azɔn kanweko mɔkpan do ɖe e ɖo taji gbɔn e
e ɖɔ xo do jujɔ klisanwun tɔn ɖevo ji sɔ ɛ a
wɛ enɛ ɖe ɖɔ nuɖiɖi wɛ nyi jujɔ klisanwun tɔn ɖo taji hu bi e a
pɔlu nuɖiɖi do wanyiyi wu wlan ɖɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi sixu tɛn nu so ɔ ɖo wanyiyi a ɔ nyi nuti a
jujɔ klisanwun tɔn gege jɛ nuɖiɖi ji ɖo wanyiyi mɛ
wanyiyi nɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn ɖo wɛ biblu ɖɔ
e nɔ ɖi nu nu nu mawu ɖɔ do xo tɔn nyi nugbo e mɛ lɛ e kɔ
e nuɖiɖi kpo wanyiyi kpo ji ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ gbɔn
ɖetɛ hugan ɖe etɛwu
ðo nuɖiɖi kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖo taji tawun wutu ɔ mɛ wlan akpaxwe biblu tɔn ðo glɛkigbe mɛ lɛ e jujɔ we enɛ lɛ ji ɖo azɔn mɔkpan hwɛhwɛ ɖo nukɛgbe ɖokpo ɔ alo ɖo xo ɖokpo ɔ lɛ mɛ
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi tɔn klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nuɖiɖi kpo wanyiyi kpo nyi ganwu bonu do tɛ
wlan ɖɔ ɖo jezu mɔ wɛ din a co ɖi nu
jaan wlan ɖɔ nu mi wɛ mawu ɖe ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖi nu nu vi tɔn jezu klisu ɔ sin nyikɔ yi wan nu miɖee jaan
nuɖiɖi ɖo taji co hwenu akpa mawu do lɛ e jɛnu bɔ mi mɔ nu ɖo nukun wɛ mi mɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖe e ɔ akpaxwe jujɔ enɛ ɔ tɔn gege wa vivɔnu
wanyiyi mi ɖo ɖo ɖiɖo nu mawu kpo nɔzo mitɔn lɛ kpo wɛ e vɔ gbeɖe a
enɛ wu wɛ pɔlu wlan ɖɔ nu atɔn nɔ ayi sɔyi lɛ ɖie nuɖiɖi nukunɖiɖo kpo wanyiyi kpo wanyiyi wɛ hugan bi kɔ
e ɖo nuɖiɖi wɛ ɖo ali kpligidi ɖe gbɔn ɖo egbe
wu enɛ sin
ðo hwe mitɔn ɔ togun jehovah tɔn ɖo nu ɖi nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn e e wɛ
ɖebu sixu ɖɔ emi wu wɛ nu enɛ sin a
mawu mitɔn wɛ wa nu enɛ
nugbo ɔ nunamɛ mawu tɔn wɛ ɖɔ mi mɔ hwlɛngan gbɔn nu mi ɖi e gblamɛ
efɛ palaɖisi gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn ɔ kpo ɖo ada gblo wɛ kpo ɖo ɖɛkpɛ wɛ jɛ hwenu kpo awajijɛnɔ lɛ kpo ayikungban ɔ bi ji e bɔ enɛ nyikɔ mawu tɔn su sɔyi mavɔmavɔ
nu mi kpo ɖo nu ɖi nu akpa jehovah do lɛ e wɛ
wema tobutobu mɔjɛmɛ do nu jɛ ɖo hwexonu bɔ tuun lɛ e wu e ɖokpo wɛ nyi tokpɔngan justinien tɔn sin wexwɛ elɔ
ðo matie mɛ ɔ jezu ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto jixwe tɔn ci nya do jinukun ɖagbe kɛɖɛ do gle tɔn mɛ ɔ ɖɔhun hwenu mɛ lɛ bi ɖo amlɔ dɔ wɛ zanmɛ ɔ tɔn wa do gbehan nyanya kɔn nyi gle tɔn mɛ yi
hwenu jinukun lɛ su jɛ ji ɔ e wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ gbehan nyanya lɛ wu
gbehan nyanya dido ɖo gle ɖe mɛ do hlɔn nyi ɖo hlɔma
nu jɛ bɔ e ɖe ɖe tɔn do xo ɔ wu e ɖɔ walɔ mɔhun nɔ tiin hwɛhwɛ wɛ xokwintinmɛwegbo biblu tɔn ɖe ɖɔ
akɔwe tɔn alastair kerr tinmɛ ɖɔ ji ɖo tɔn ɔ tokpɔngan hlɔma tɔn justinien sin xwe nu hlɔma ɔ kpo nu akɔwe tɔn hwenu e wlan ɔ e ɖibla yi tɔn lɛ ɖɔ e sin akpaxwe ɖe lɛ kpo do wema eɖesunɔ tɔn nɔ nyi e mɛ
sɔgbe kpo wema enɛ kpo ɔ akɔwe tɔn ulpian do gesi ninɔmɛ ɖe bɔ tokpɔngan hlɔma tɔn xwe kanweko wegɔ ɔ tɔn celsus kpe nukun
e do gbehan nyanya do mɛ ɖevo sin gle mɛ sin enɛ wu bɔ jinukun ɖe gble
ɖɔ xo do nu ɖeɖee sɔgbe xa bɔ glenɔ ɔ wa lobɔ ɔ su nu e hɛn gble do wu tɔn e sin axɔ e ji
nuhɛngbledomɛwu mɔhun jɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto hlɔma tɔn mɛ ɖo hwexonu e ɖɔ ninɔmɛ xo jezu ɖɔ e ɔ nugbo sese wɛ
ðo taan enɛ mɛ ɔ hlɔmanu lɛ wɛ do judee bɔ tokpɔngan ɖe kpo ahwankpa lɛ kpo afɔ yetɔn ɖo
taji nyi tokpɔngan ɔ tɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e takwɛ nu hlɔma to ɔ blo bɔ fifa kpo tuto ji ninɔ kpo tiin
kun susu do nu sɔgbe xa a lɛ e kpo to dindɔn nu mɛ dɔn hunnyahunnya wa lɛ e kpo mya nukun nu hlɔmanu lɛ
nɔ jo ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe sin nu kan tokpɔn ɔ lɛ e ɖiɖɔ do alɔ mɛ nu lɛ hwɛhwɛ
hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo jwifu lɛ tɔn sin kple ɖe
hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo jwifu lɛ tɔn nɔ kpe nukun do nu kan jwifu lɛ sin e wu
hwɛɖɔxɔsa kpɛvi kpɛvi lɛ gbɔn judee gbe ɔ bi ji
hwɛɖɔxɔsa mɔhun lɛ nɔ ɖeɖɛ xo kan tovi kpaa lɛ e kpo nu sɔgbe xa a lɛ e kpo bɔ hlɔma tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo a
e ɖo co fi hwɛɖɔxɔsa jwifu lɛ tɔn sin acɛ nɔte ɖo e ɖokpo wɛ nyi lɛ huhu
ðo kpaa mɛ ɔ hlɔmanu lɛ acɛ enɛ mɛ ɖevo a
mɛ ɔ hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo jwifu lɛ tɔn ɖo acɛ gege ɖo hwɛɖiɖɔ linu
e ɖo co akɔwe emil schurer ɖɔ ɖɔ fi acɛ tɔn fo ɖo bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ hlɔma tɔn lɛ ɖesunɔ sixu ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ ɔ yeɖokponɔ nɔ blo gbɔn hwenu wu ɖɔ nuwanyido ɖe tiin ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu e ɖɔhun
xokwin klewun ɖe ðo tawun
nɔ akɔnkpinkpan miɖee ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
jehovah mawu kpo jezu klisu kpo wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ mɛ akɔnkpinkpan e tɔn ɖagbe hugan lɛ
pɔlu mɔ ɖɔ akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo taji tawun
yetɔn mi mɛ bi bɔ mi blo bɔ xwe mitɔn gbe kpo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mitɔn mɛ kpo nyi nɔtɛn wanyiyi kpo akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ kpo tɔn
e blo tuto nu mi sɔgbe kpo xo mawu tɔn kpo
nɔ ðo sisi ðaxo nu xo jehovah tɔn a
xota elɔ lɛ xosin nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ tɔn etɛwu mi ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ e blo tuto nu jehovah lɛ
mi sixu nɔ tuto ji sɔgbe kpo xo mawu tɔn kpo gbɔn
mi sixu ɖɔ mi nɔ nɔ gudo nu tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn kpo gbejininɔ kpo gbɔn
ðaxo ðokpo wɛ
e ylɔ mi sin ablu mɛ
xoglo sinsɛn nuvu
xota elɔ lɛ tinmɛ hwenu togun mawu tɔn yi kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn e kpo gan ɖeɖee klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ do ɖo xwe lɛ sin vivɔnu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo jehovah tɔn mɛ ganji e kpo
mi do nu nu ji biblu lɛ ku do wa kunkpla babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ e bɔ mi mɔ hwenu kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn ɔ wa vivɔnu do e
nyɔnu
jezu nɔ ylɔ mɛ nyi sunnu a lɛ e ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu e nɛ
ði ɔ hwenu e ɖo azɔn gbɔ nu nɔ nu xwe e ɖe wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nyɔnu azɔn towe gbɔ nu bɔ jɛte
jaan xokwin ɖevo ɖe syɛn hu sisi ɖo nu mɛ
biblu zan xokwin kpo wanyiyi kpo tɔn bunɔ ɖe hwenu e ɖo nyɔnu ɖe lɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ e
jezu zan xokwin enɛ hwenu e ɖɔ xo nu nawe ɖi hun nu xwe e ɖe e
nawe ɔ sɛkpɔ jezu gbɔn e sɔgbe xa mawu ɔ ganji a ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ blibli wɛ nu mɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ tɔn mɛ e
e flu bi
nugbo ɔ e jiya gbɔn mɔkpan xwe zan akwɛ tɔn bi do azɔn tɔn tɛgbɛ ɔ jijɛji wɛ jɛn nɔ ɖe mak
hun ɖi wɛ e ɖe e nɔte tlolo
nawe ɔ ɖɔ emi sixu bu sin finɛ bɔ mɛɖe tuun a jezu kanbyɔ ɖɔ ɖo alɔ wu
xɛsi ɖi nawe ɔ bɔ e jɛ ji wa jɛkpo ɖo jezu nukɔn ɖɔ xo nugbo mak
jezu jiɖiɖe nawe ɔ ɖɔ nuɖiɖi towe bɔ azɔn towe gbɔ
yi do fifa mɛ azɔn towe gbɔ nu bi mak
izlayɛli vi dɔkunnɔ bowozi ylɔ mɔwabunu hwliti ɖɔ e nɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ e byɔ hwliti ɖɔ e nɔ wa nukun ɔ ɖo gle emitɔn lɛ mɛ
hwliti xwe do ɖo bowozi nukɔn kan nu wu e xomɛ do eyɛ mɛ nyi jonɔ ɖe e wu e byɔ ɛ
bowozi yi gbe ɛ ganjɛwu ɖɔ nu wa nu asu towe nɔ asukusi nɔemii ɔ se bi
mawu mavɔmavɔ ajɔ tɔn nu e tunfla hwli
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn we sixu jinjɔn ayi xa klisanwun nyɔnu ɖo hudo alɔdo kpo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ kpo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn e
kple titewungbe ɖokpo sin wɛ xo ɖo jeluzalɛmu
axɔsu davidi ylɔ axɔvi tɔn lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo sunnu hlɔnhlɔnnɔ lɛ kpo bi kple
mawu ɖɔ xɔ ɔ ci e nu axɔsu izlayɛli tɔn ɔ ɖiɖe tɔn nu
davidi ɖɔ wa gbe e ja ɔ ɖaxo ɖokpo wɛ ɖo e nyi sa xwe wɛ e ɖe a mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu tɔn wɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ davidi wa kan nu elɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ jlo nu
enyi ɖo finɛ hwenɛnu wɛ ɔ wa nu gbɔn
akpakpa bɔ nɔ gudo nu ɖaxo enɛ a
izlayɛli vi lɛ yawu wa nu
nugbo ɔ nu yeɖesunɔ ɖo jlo mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ do xomɛhunhun nu ɖo kpo xomɛ kpo xwe kanweko mɔkpan gudo ɔ jehovah nuɖe hugan tɛmpli ɔ tawun
jehovah ɖo alɔdo lɛ wɛ ɖo egbe bonu dohwɛ gbɔ xa ɛ gbɔn
gbɔn nu kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin mitɔn gblamɛ wɛ
nukɔnyiyi mɔhun lɛ bɔ e ɖo nɔ zin wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ hu tɔn e ɖo gba kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ kpe nukun do wu sɔnu nu fi e nɔ blo lɛdo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖaxo lɛ kpo ɖe lɛ e
yi gbe ɖɔ mitɔn ɔ nyi aditi ɖe nɔ hɛn le wa a ce
ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ agun lɛ nɔ nunina enɛ lɛ do alaxɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn nɔ kpe nukun do to yetɔn wu e
hɛn ɔ nunina lɛ do tutoblonunu tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ zan ɖo to towe mɛ e ɖe tlɔlɔ
bonu tuun tutoblonunu tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ zan hugan ɖo to towe mɛ e sin nyikɔ hun kɛnklɛn kanbyɔ alaxɔ
sixu mɔ adlɛsi ɔ ɖo www jw org ji
nunina alɔkpa sixu tlɔlɔ lɛ e ɖie
e hɛn ɔ e zan kati akwɛsɛxwetɛn tɔn e nɔ zan do akwɛ do mɛ ɖevo do su axɔ alo do xɔ nu e abi wlɛnwin akwɛ mɛ gbɔn alokan ji tɔn lɛ do nunina
wema mɛ ɖe ɖo zɔn nunina ɔ ji ɖɔ e kun yi akwɛ ɔ alo nu ɔ o
e hɛn ɔ e akwɛ bɔ enyi e wa ɖo hudo tɔn ɔ e sixu yi
wema mɛ ɖe ɖo zɔn nunina ɔ ji ɖɔ e sixu wa yi nunina ɔ
gbɔn vo nu akwɛ kpo nuɖokan mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo nina ɔ e hɛn ɔ e zan wlɛnwin ɖevo lɛ do nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
ðo nu byɔ lɛ e kpo takwɛ tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ gbɔn vo wutu ɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ e kan nu byɔ kpo takwɛ kpo tɔn lɛ cobo wlɛnwin nu nina tɔn hugan e
e sixu akwɛ e nɔ kple nu nugbomɛzangbe e alo nu gbɔjɛ ɖaxo mɛ byɔbyɔ jijodo hwenu e artjb
akwɛ ðo akwɛsɛxwetɛn lɛ e e sixu ze akwɛ mɛtɔn ɖo akwɛsɛxwetɛn lɛ e akwɛ e ɖo akwɛsɛxwetɛn nu hwenu tawun ɖe e depot a terme abi gbɔjɛ ɖaxo mɛ byɔbyɔ mɛɖesunɔ tɔn sin akwɛ lɛ do alɔ mɛ nu artjb nɔ zan alo mɛɖe sixu blo tuto ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo ku emitɔn gudo hun e nɔ su akwɛ ɔ artjb sɔgbe kpo nu akwɛsɛxwetɛn ɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ si lɛ e kpo
le tɔn lɛ e sixu nunina le tɔn lɛ tɔn tlɔlɔ alo e sixu do artjb
xɔ kpo ayikungban kpo e hɛn ɔ e xɔ kpo ayikungban kpo e sixu sa lɛ e sin nunina artjb vlafo gbɔn nunina tlɔlɔ ɖe gblamɛ abi mɛɖe sixu ayikungban ji xɔ ɖe bɔ e sin nunina mɛ ɔ ɖo ɖɔ emi nɔ nɔ xɔ ɔ mɛ jɛ ku emitɔn
ði xogbe tuto jlo do nunina tɔn ɖo e ɔ nunina enɛ lɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ ɔ blo tuto ɖe lɛ
jehovah ylɔ nu gosin ablu mɛ wa weziza tɔn ɖagbeɖagbe ɔ
togun mawu tɔn ɔ yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu xwe kanweko wegɔ gbɔn
ðo xwe kanweko ɔ tɛntin ɔ etɛ lɛ tuntun kpɛɖe kpo nu acɛ sinsɛn nuvu ɖo do togun mawu tɔn ji e
ðo xwe lɛ sin vivɔnu ɔ gan tɛ lɛ mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ do ba do sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo mawu tɔn mɛ ganji
tinmɛ nu ɖeɖee jɛ ɖo jeluzalɛmu gbigba hwenu e
ðo ɔ axɔsu ii nɔ ahwankpa babilɔnu tɔn wɔbuwɔbu ɖe vunbla toxo jeluzalɛmu tɔn
biblu ɖɔ do do adaka mɛ bɔ e wu ɖɔ hu sɔja lɛ yi mawu mavɔmavɔ xwe ɔ gbe e jo dɔnkpɛvu do a e jo ɖyɔvi do a e jo mɛxo do a e jo degenɔ do a
ahoho ɖo jeluzalɛmu lɛ do hɔnmɛ lɛ bi hɛn nu xɔ akwɛ ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ bi gble
akpa tɛ jehovah gba nu mɛ do jeluzalɛmu sin gbigba wu
etɛ gbo jwifu lɛ
jeluzalɛmu sin gbigba ɖo kpaca toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ a
xwe mɔkpan wɛ gbeyiɖɔ mawu tɔn lɛ do nu jwifu lɛ ɖɔ enyi kpo ɖo mawu tɔn lɛ gba wɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ e jo do alɔ mɛ nu babilɔnunu lɛ
tɛ kannumɔ lɛ zan ɖo
kannumɔgbenu yiyi ɖo babilɔnu ɖɔhunkɔ ɖevo tiin ɖo klisanwun lɛ hwenu wɛ a
enyi wɛ ɔ hwetɛnu wɛ
kannumɔgbenu ninɔ ɖo babilɔnu gbɔn vo nu ee izlayɛli vi lɛ nɔ ɖo ejipu e gbɔn
nu gbeyiɖɔ lɛ ɖɔ e wa jɛ
gbɔn jelemii gblamɛ ɔ jehovah ɖe we xa mɛ wa yi kannumɔgbenu lɛ e ɖɔ yi gbe nu ninɔmɛ yetɔn ɔ ɖo
e ɖɔ sa xwe ɖo babilɔnu nɔ gbe blo jikpa ɖu nu lɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee yeɖee do jlo mawu tɔn glɔ lɛ e zan ɖagbe ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɖo babilɔnu
mɛ wli lɛ e jo do bɔ kpe nukun do yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ wu ɖo ba ɖe mɛ
kannumɔ lɛ tlɛ vo tɛn yi fi ɖebu ɖo to ɔ mɛ
hɔnkan kpo kpo tɔn ɖe wɛ babilɔnu nyi ɖo hwexonu bɔ wema e kun sin do glɔ e ɖe lɛ ɖɔ jwifu gege e nɔ xɔ nu nɔ yi sa gbɔn e sin ganji ɖo finɛ bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ huzu alɔ se lɛ e
jwifu ɖe lɛ tlɛ jɛ dɔkun
kannumɔgbenu ninɔ ɖo babilɔnu ci ee izlayɛli vi lɛ nɔ ɖo ejipu ɖo xwe kanweko mɔkpan jɛ nukɔn e ɖɔhun ɖebu a xa
gbɔn vo nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɔ mɛ ɖetɛ lɛ kannumɔgbenu yiyi ɖo babilɔnu sin awe ɔ xo
e ɖo nukun kpe do hudo agbaza tɔn jwifu ɖo kannumɔgbenu lɛ e tɔn wu wɛ co ɖe gbɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e gba tɛmpli jehovah tɔn kpo vɔsakpe tɔn kpo bɔ ɔ ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɖo yi gbɔn e a
mawu wa nu ɖe bonu e dɔn to nu a lɛ e lɔ ɖo kannumɔ lɛ mɛ ɖo jiya nu akɔta ɔ
e ɖo co wa nu wu kpe e nyi mawu lɛ
ði ɔ ɖo babilɔnu ɔ daniyɛli kpo tɔn atɔn lɛ cadlaki mɛcaki kpo abɛdi nɛgo kpo nyi alɔ nu nuɖuɖu jwifu lɛ e
e ɖo co ɖo acɛkpikpa kosi lɛ tɔn glɔ ɔ jwifu nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu mawu lɛ e sixu wa nu ɔ byɔ lɛ e bi a
nukunɖiɖo tɛ jehovah togun tɔn
etɛwu akpa enɛ jiwu
izlayɛli vi lɛ wa kpewu mawu bi a
ðo hwe ɔ ɔ e ci ɖɔ kun sixu o ɖɔhun
babilɔnu nɔ jo kannumɔ tɔn lɛ do gbeɖe a
enɛ ɔ tuun mɛ jehovah mawu nyi e a
e ɖɔ togun emitɔn jɛte bɔ jɛte nugbo
etɛwu e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do kannumɔgbenu yiyi ɖo babilɔnu ɖo hwe mitɔn wu e gbeje
nu ci kannumɔgbenu yiyi ɖo babilɔnu ɖɔhun e ɖe jɛ do klisanwun lɛ ji a
nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ xojlawema elɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu egbe tɔn lɛ yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu ɖo bɔ e ɖe nyite ɖo
ɖo hwɛjijɔ mi tinmɛ ɖo xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo mɛ lɛ e wutu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e xo ɔ gbeje
do nukun mɛ babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ wɛ nyi kplekple sinsɛn nuvu lɛ tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ enyi togun mawu tɔn yi kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn ɖo jɛn wɛ ɔ e nyi kannumɔ nu sinsɛn nuvu ɖo ali ɖe lɛ ɖo hwenɛnu
nu jɛ lɛ e ɖɔ ɖo xwe ɖeɖee jɛ nukɔn nu wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ sin babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ mɛ wɛ mɛ yi do ɖe mawu tɔn lɛ ɖe enyi kannumɔ wɛ huzu a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e doya nu mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ ɖo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu lɛ wɛ doya nu tawun e nyi babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ a
enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ togun jehovah tɔn yi kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ tɔn ɖo a
ðo pantekotu xwe ɔ jwifu kpo mɛ nyi jwifu a e kpo gege ji wɛ e kɔn gbigbɔ do
klisanwun enɛ lɛ huzu akɔta e ɔ nyi axɔsu ɔ tɔn akɔta ɖeɖovo nyi togun mawu tɔn xa
lɛ nya xɛ ɖo togun mawu tɔn sin agun lɛ ji ganji ɖo gbɛhwenu yetɔn bi
mɛ enɛ lɛ gege ɖo tɛn nukunɖeji lɛ mɛ ɖo agun lɛ mɛ nyi lɛ bɔ nukɔnmɛ ɔ wa nyi yɛhwenɔgan lɛ
yɛhwenɔ lɛ tɔn ɖe wɛ jɛ nu ji nɛ jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔvi nɔvi wɛ bi nyi
sunnu nukunɖeji tamɛ nukplɔnmɛ aristote kpo platon kpo tɔn nɔ jiwu lɛ e jɛ nukplɔnmɛ sinsɛn tɔn sɔgbe a lɛ e mɛ ji bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ yi tɛnmɛ ɖo nukplɔnmɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e si
tinmɛ acɛkpikpa hlɔma tɔn nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn gu do mawu ji e gbɔn e kpo nu e ji lɛ e kpo
ðo ɔ hlɔma tɔn constantin nyi pagawun ɖe e acɛ klisanwun nyinyi tɔn alɔkpa enɛ ɖo lixo
hwenɛnu ɔ sinsɛn kpo acɛkpikpa kpo jɛ wa ɖo ji alɔ ɖo alɔ mɛ
ði ɔ ɖo vaxɔ nicee tɔn gudo ɔ constantin wa vaxɔ ɔ tɛnmɛ e ɖegbe ɖɔ e yɛhwenɔ nɔ nyi arius e yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo e ɖɔ emi kun yi gbe ɖɔ jezu nyi mawu o wutu
nukɔnmɛ ɔ ɖo hlɔma tɔn theodose hwenu ɔ igleja katolika nyi sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn ɖe bli e wa tiin nyi huzu axɔsuɖuto hlɔma tɔn sin sinsɛn tuun e
hwenuxo lɛ ɖɔ do hlɔma pagawun ɔ wu ɖɔ xwe kanweko ɛnɛgɔ ɔ mɛ wɛ e huzu klisanwun
e ɖo co klisanwun yi do ɖe kpɛɖe ci nukun ɖagbe ɖɔhun e kpo ɖo nu wu kpe e bi wa wɛ do mawu e nɔ lɔn bonu gbe yetɔn ɖi a
xa matie
ɖo kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn nugbo
etɛ ji ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ do ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn lɛ mɛ nukplɔnmɛ sinsɛn tɔn lɛ
e ɖo co ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛ gege hɛn ɔ xa biblu do glɛkigbe alo latɛɛngbe mɛ
mɛ ɔ sixu nukplɔnmɛ mawuxo ɔ tɔn lɛ do nu mɛ wɛ sinsɛn ɖe lɛ e wu
yɛhwenɔ lɛ wa do biblu ɔ ji gbɔn
e wa ya e ɔ gbe mɛ biblu ɖe lɛ e nyi gbe ɖeɖee mɛ gege nɔ do e a bɔ sinsɛn ɔ ɖɔ e kun lilɛ mawuxo ɔ do gbe kpaa mɛ lɛ nɔ do e mɛ o
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ yɛhwenɔ lɛ kpo akɔwe ɖe lɛ kpo kɛɖɛ wɛ sixu xa biblu ɔ yeɖoɖo yɛhwenɔ lɛ bi wɛ sixu xa nu wlan nu ganji a
enyi mɛɖebu nu mɛ wɛ sinsɛn ɔ ɖe lɛ e ɔ e nɔ dɔn to tlili
e wa byɔ ɖɔ mawu yi do ɖe lɛ kple ɖo nuglɔ enyi ali tɔn hun nu ɔ nɛ
e nyi gbɔn ɖo kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu e ɔ axɔsu ɔ tɔn yi do ɖe lɛ sixu wa yetɔn e jɛxa gbɔn e a
babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ hɛn togun ɔ syɛnsyɛn
nu taji we tɛ lɛ bɔ hɛn babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ hɛn mɛ lɛ syɛnsyɛn e ɖekpo kpɛɖe
tinmɛ
klisanwun nugbo lɛ wa vo mawu ɖo agbawungba e jɛxa gbɔn e a
nu taji we bɔ weziza gbigbɔ lixo tɔn ɔ jɛ ji ɖo ablu ɔ mɛ
nu nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ nyi mɔ nɔ zin wema bɔ e ɖo xwe kanweko ɔ tɛntin bɔ e nɔ ɖyɔ wekwin e
cobonu wemazinzin wa elɔpu ɔ alɔ wɛ e nɔ do wlan biblu ɔ tɛnwin lɛnwin
biblu ɔ han hwenɛnu tawun
e ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ byɔ wo cobɔ ɖe ɖe biblu e alɔ do wlan e ɖokpo kpowun
ɔ nu ji lɛ nɔ wlan nu do e anyuwema tawun
enyi ɖe zan wema kpo mɔ nɔ zin wema e ɖe kpo ɔ ɔ nɔ bɔwu tawun bɔ e sixu zin wexwɛ gbe ɖokpo
wemazinzin sin mɔ e e kpo lɛ kpo bɔ e tuntun kpo nu hɛn babilɔnu hɛn mɛ lɛ e akpaxwe kpo kpo
nu taji wegɔ ɔ wɛ nyi gbeta kɔn sunnu ɖe lɛ wa ɖo xwe kanweko ɔ sin vivɔnu ɖɔ emi lilɛ xo mawu tɔn do gbe ɖeɖee mɛ kpaa lɛ nɔ do e mɛ e
gege yetɔn ɖo axɔ do enɛ tamɛ
xomɛ sin sinsɛn ɔ tawun sinsɛn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ enyi biblu jɛ mɛ nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu mawu e ɖe lɔ mɛ ɔ e sixu nyi alyannu baɖabaɖa ɖe
ee biblu wa jɛ gbigbakpe ji e ɔ mɛ lɛ jɛ xixa ji
ee jɛ xixa ji e ɔ jɛ nu gege kanbyɔ ji fitɛ e ɖɔ xo ɖe ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ
ɖɔ e su akwɛ do amisa nu mɛkuku lɛ
ɖɔ papa lɛ kpo yɛhwenɔgan lɛ kpo tiin
sinsɛn ɔ mɔ ɖɔ hwɛhuhu syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ nu enɛ nyi
sinsɛn ɔ ɖɔ nu kun nyi o
e ɖo hwɛ nu sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖe lɛ ɖɔ gu ɖo nukplɔnmɛ sinsɛn ɔ tɔn wutu tamɛ nukplɔnmɛ pagawun tɔn aristote kpo platon kpo ee nyi mɛ nɔ cobɔ e ji jezu klisu lɛ e tɔn ji wɛ nukplɔnmɛ enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ junjɔn
sinsɛn ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ku wɛ jɛ xa bɔ acɛkpikpa ɔ hu
nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ awakanmɛ ku mɛ lɛ do biblu xixa wu bonu gɔn nu kanbyɔ sinsɛn ɔ
wlɛnwin ɔ tawun
e ɖo co mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖɔ babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ kun gba hun do nu emi o
mawuxo ɔ bɔ din ɔ ɖo biba wɛ
e jɛ nu ji ba gosin sinsɛn nuvu kannu ɖo nukɔnmɛ
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ bɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo xwe lɛ sin vivɔnu
tinmɛ nɔvi russell nugbo ɔ gbɔn e
gege mɛ ɖeɖee nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ sin kɔ ɖo xuxu wɛ lɛ e tɔn tɛn yi to mɛ sinsɛn ɔ ɖo acɛ ɖe a lɛ e mɛ
jlo vo xa biblu ɖɔ xo ɖo bɔ mɛ ɖevo wɛ ɖɔ nu ɖo e nu a
etats unis nyi to enɛ lɛ ɖokpo e mɛ wɛ charles taze russell kpo tɔn kwinwe lɛ kpo jɛ biblu ji ɖe ɖo
ðo ɔ nu gbe nya wɛ nɔvi russell ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e sinsɛn ɖo ayi lɛ e mɛ ɖɔ ɖetɛ ɖo nugbo ɔ mɛ wɛ a ji
e nukplɔnmɛ sinsɛn vovo lɛ jɛ ɖeɖee nyi klisanwun tɔn a lɛ e tɔn do nu biblu ɖɔ e wu
e wa wu ɖɔ sinsɛn enɛ lɛ ɖe kun jinjɔn mawuxo ɔ ji bi o
hweɖenu ɔ e sɛkpɔ sinsɛngan ɖo xa tɔn mɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖo nukun ɖɔ yi gbe nu nugbo ɖeɖee e kpo tɔn lɛ kpo mɔ ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ lɛ e agun yetɔn tɔn lɛ
nu enɛ jlo sinsɛngan lɛ a
biblu lɛ wa mɔ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ kancica ɖe kun sixu nɔ kpo mɛ ɖeɖee jlo do sinsɛn nuvu wu lɛ e kpo tɛntin o xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
hwetɛnu klisanwun lɛ huzu kannumɔ nu babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ sin xosin ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
jɛ fi ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ klisanwun nugbo lɛ yi kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn ɖo gudogudo tɔn lɛ sin ku gudo zaan
nukanbyɔ ɖe lɛ kpo ɖo atɛ ji kunnuɖenu ɖevo tɛ lɛ wɛ ɖɔ ɖo xwe jɛ nukɔn nu lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ ɖo babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ mɛ sin wɛ kun nyi kannumɔ o
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ jehovah kun hun xomɛ do tɔn lɛ wu o ɖo tuntun kpo nu yetɔn ɖo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu wutu a
ðo hwenɛnu ɔ nɔvi mitɔn ɖe lɛ gɔn wu ɖo zɔ nu ɔ bɔ jehovah sin xomɛ do wɛ a
gudo tɔn ɔ enyi klisanwun lɛ huzu kannumɔ nu sinsɛn nuvu ɖo xwe kanweko wegɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ hwetɛnu jɛte
togun sin tɛntin tɔn nuðe
akɔnkpinkpan sin nu tɛ biblu nukɔntɔn lɛ wa kunkpla babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ
etɛwu jehovah lɛ ɖo hudo todɔnnumɛ kpo mɛkplɔnkplɔn kpo tɔn ɖo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu etɛ enɛ a
hwetɛnu e ɖe mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ sin kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn
etɛ sixu nukunɖiɖo togun mawu tɔn ɖɔ sin babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ sin fɛn mɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi gbeje
ðo xota wa yi e mɛ ɔ mi mɔ klisanwun lɛ mɔ yeɖee ɖo nu kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn ɖɔhun ɖe mɛ gbɔn e
enyi mɛ ɖe sixu xoglo nu kplekple sinsɛn nuvu lɛ tɔn nɔ wa do mɛ wu e gbeɖe a ɔ gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn ɖɔ togun sin tɛntin tɔn e nyi nu yaya nɛ
xa
akpakpa ɖo mi wɛ bonu mi tuun hwenu togun mawu tɔn sin babilɔnu fɛn mɛ bi gbidigbidi e
jɛ nukɔn ɔ mi ɖo xosin nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ tɔn etɛ biblu lɛ wa kunkpla babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ jɛ nukɔn nu
nɔvi lɛ ɖokan do ɔ wu gbɔn ɖo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu
kancica ɖe ɖo todɔnnumɛ nu mɛkplɔnkplɔn sin hudo ɖo hwenɛnu e kpo kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu tɔn yi e kpo tɛntin wɛ a
gbeta tɛ kɔn biblu nukɔntɔn lɛ wa do sinsɛn nuvu wu
ðo xwe ɖeɖee jɛ nukɔn nu wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ charles taze russell kpo tɔn lɛ kpo wu ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ kun ɖo nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ wɛ o
enɛ wu ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi kun ɖo kancica ɖe xa sinsɛn nuvu o emi mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ gbɔn e
ðo novembre tɔn tlolo ɔ le nukɔntɔn e e ɖɔ afɔ ji ɖe sɔgbe xa mawuxowema ɔ e tlɔlɔ ɖɔ sinsɛn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi asixɔntɔn ɖo alɔji e ɖe nu klisu nu e ɖɔ nugbo ɔ kpo kanlin ɔ ee nɔ nɔ gudo nu e kpo bi wɛ mi ɖo dohwɛ ɖɔ sɔgbe kpo xogbe mawuxowema ɔ tɔn kpo ɔ nyi sinsɛn ɖe do gesi babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ xa
nu kpligidi tɛ biblu lɛ wa ɖɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ emi ɖo sin sinsɛn nuvu mɛ
sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu mawu lɛ e tuun nu ɖo wa e
sixu kpo ɖo gudo nɔ nu tutoblonunu sinsɛn nuvu tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mawu kɔn nyɔna do emi ji a
enɛ wu ɔ biblu gege wlan wema sinsɛn yetɔn ɖɔ emi kun nyi mɛ yetɔn o
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ nɔ xa wema ɔ ɖo agbawungba ɖo kple sinsɛn ɔ tɔn lɛ ji
fi e gbe ɖɔ e xa wema ɔ ɖo agbawungba ɖe a e ɔ mɛɖe lɛ wema do sinsɛn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
kpe nu ɖe xa sinsɛn nuvu a
enyi taan mɛ e nyi e wɛ e nyi ɔ sun akɔnkpinkpan mɔhun sin sin tawun
ɖo xwe lɛ sin vivɔnu ɔ acɛkpikpa lɛ nɔ nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn a ɖo to gege mɛ
tovi lɛ nɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ e dɔn to nu emi ɖo to enɛ lɛ mɛ a nɔ vo nɔ ɖɔ xo do nu kan sinsɛn lɛ e wu bɔ enyi yi gbe nu nuwiwa sinsɛn ɖo ayi lɛ e tɔn a ɔ nɔ ɖɔ ɖo agbawungba
ðo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu ɔ nu lɛ ɖe gbɔn ɖo togun mawu tɔn kpo babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ kpo tɛntin
biblu lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ e kun kpe kpowun ɖɔ emi ɖɔ nu hɛnnumɔ lɛ lɛ kpo sinsɛn tɔn lɛ kpo ɖɔ emi sin sinsɛn nuvu mɛ o
ɔ bi ɖo tuun ɖɔ sinsɛn ɖe wɛ babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ nyi
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo decembre kpo tɔn kpo vlamɛ ɔ biblu kpɛ tiin lɛ e ma tlati xota tɔn nyi ayijijɛ babilɔnu tɔn e kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo hwɛdomɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi nu klisanwun lɛ
ði sixu ɖo e ɔ sinsɛngan lɛ jɛma biblu lɛ keya a nukɔn yi wɛ jɛn ɖe ɖo taji enɛ kɔn
etɛ mi sixu ɖɔ
klisanwun sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo enɛ lɛ nyi kannumɔ nu babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ ɖo ahwan ɔ hwenu kpɛɖe a e wa ɔ hlɔnhlɔn tɔn xoglo wɛ ɖe ɖo alɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ bonu lɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
etɛ ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ ɖokan do nu wu tawun ɖo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu
ðo xwe wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ jehovah sin xomɛ do togun tɔn ɖo kun ɖokan do wɛnɖagbejijla wu ɖo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu o wutu
mi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ ɖo enɛ wu ɔ jehovah lɔn bɔ babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ do ɖo kannumɔ nu hwenu kpɛɖe

etɛ ji biblu lɛ ku do wa ɖo nu nyi e wutu

macmillan wlan e wex
e syɛn nugbo
e sa do biblu tantɔn enɛ lɛ bɔ nu xwe mɔkpan ɖo gankpa ɖaxo atlanta tɔn mɛ ɖo georgie
ee ahwan ɔ wa fo e ɔ e ɖe nyite jo hwɛ do wɛ e ɖe lɛ e do

zan mawuxowema ɔ do tinmɛ nu jɛ jɛ e
malacii nu hwenu jɛ tɔn e sla wu nu levii vi yi do ɖe lɛ e
ee togun jehovah tɔn yi sin hudo ɖo e gudo e ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa ɖevo e ɖe nu e
ðo ɔ e ɖe devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɖe nɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn xwedo nuɖiɖi tɔn ɔ
din ɔ togun mawu tɔn nyi kannumɔ nu babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ a

nyɔna jehovah tɔn enɛ lɛ su nukun yetɔn mɛ tawun
etɛ mi ɖo wa ɖo mi sin babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ mɛ e wu

gan sataan do su kun do nu klisanwun nugbo lɛ e bi
