sixu yeɖokponɔ a
mi sixu ali
enɛ wu ɔ ɖi nɔvi mitɔn xwe kanweko wa yi lɛ e tɔn ɖɔhun ɔ nu mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi gbɔn alɔkpa lɛ bi mɛ bonu sin ganmɛ
akpaxwe ɔ nu gege ɖo kannumɔgbenu xwe tɔn jwifu lɛ yi ɖo babilɔnu e mɛ ca kan xa nu jɛ do klisanwun lɛ ji ɖo hwenu ɔ kan e gudo e tawun
e ɖo co kannumɔgbenu yiyi jwifu lɛ tɔn nyi nu jɛ do klisanwun lɛ ji e tɔn a
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo tɛnkpɔn do nu kannumɔgbenu jwifu lɛ tɔn tɔn ɖokpo ɖokpo ci nu ɖɔ e ca kan xa nu jɛ do klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ ji ɖo xwe jɛ nukɔn nu lɛ e mɛ e ɖɔhun a
xota e do wema mi nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mitɔn ɖo egbe e mɛ e ɖi ahwankpɛn ɖɔhun axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn grande bretagne tɔn lɛ emi
decembre tɔn ɖo londres e xotala ɖokpo ɖɔ do nujɔnu mɛ ɖɔ nukɔnyiyi tawun ðe ðe ðo xwe wo vlamɛ a
gbeɖiɖo tɔn xwe wo tɔn sin jɛ ee ɖo akpa ɔ ji e ɖɔ nugbo wɛ
etɛ bɔ e ɖokan do kunnuɖiɖe ɔ wu ɖo grande bretagne a
e ci ɖɔ agun lɛ kpo ɖo wlɛnwin e ɖo xwe mɔkpan ɖie e ɖe xwedo wɛ ɖɔhun
ɔ alaxɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ gbexosin jɛn sixu bɔ mɛ enɛ lɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi ɖo zɔ lɛ e nɔ wa xa agun lɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ alaxɔ ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖo nyikɔ wɛ ba nyi gbexosin lɛ e ɖɔ tɛnmɛ ɖe kun ɖe bonu wa gbexosin ɖo grande bretagne o do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ yi wa ɖo to elɔpu tɔn ɖevo lɛ mɛ
gbexosin gege nyi ahwan sin grande bretagne yi to ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɖi france hwenu tlɛ se gbe ɔ ɖe a alo tlɛ se ɖebu a e
xota tɔn ɔ ɖɔ nu gbe e ɖo nya ɖo e ganxixo livi ɖokpo
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ zan ganxixo ɖo ɔ mɛ bɔ gbexosin lɛ zan ganxixo ɔ e hɛn ɔ e kpe ganmɛ enɛ ɔ wu
ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e hɛn ɔ e blo tuto kunnuɖegbe tɔn lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖɔ mawuxo nu ganxixo ɖo azan ɖe lɛ ji nɔ ayi ɖo mɛ lɛ ji hugan ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ gbadanu lɛ gbexosin lɛ ɖokan do kunnuɖiɖe wu kpo awajijɛ kpo
ɔ ji e e akpakpa mɛ gege
hilda padgett flin ɖɔ gbehwan ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ gosin hɔnkan mitɔn ɔ tɔn bɔ mi mɛ gege ɖo biba wɛ lobɔ zaan ɔ e hɛn le jiwu lɛ wa
nɔvi nyɔnu
wallis ɖɔ ganxixo gbe ɖokpo ɔ tawun

e jlo wa hwenu ali tɔn hun e
e flin ɖɔ gege wɛ nɔ zan keze yetɔn lɛ bi ɖo ɔ mɛ kpo kɛkɛ yetɔn lɛ kpo bɔ ɖo yozo hwenu gbadanu lɛ ɔ nɔ xo xoɖiɖɔ e yi do kan ji lɛ e nu mɛ lɛ

joyce ellis flin ɖɔ gege nɔvi lɛ tɔn sin jlo wɛ e nyite bɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo nyi gbexosin

ðo juin hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɔ e kun kɛkɛ nu kilomɛtlu yi scarborough do gbexosin tɔn ɔ
gbexosin yeɖee do nugbo lɛ e wɛ cyril kpo johnson kpo nyi

e flin ɖɔ hu mi ɖebu do wiwa wu a
mi wa kpo jlo kpo kpodo awajijɛ kpan
ee gbexosin lɛ yawu e ɔ nɔvi agbanɖotananɔ lɛ gbeje ali ɖagbe ɖeɖee e sixu nɔ gudo nu ahwangɔnu enɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɖe e
jim ɖo lɛdo tɔn wa wɛ ɖo e xwedo weɖexamɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ e sɔnu nu gbexosin lɛ sin xwe do toxo lɛ mɛ e
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu gbexosin lɛ ɖɔ nɔ nɔ ɖɔ mawuxo ɖo do sixu ɖe akwɛzinzan kpo
ðo sheffield ɔ xaya xwe ɖaxo ɖokpo bɔ nɔvi sunnu agbanɖotananɔ ɖe kpe nukun

jim flin ɖɔ mɛ bi wɛ do gan bonu e kpa mɛ
e nɔ blo tɛsi ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɖo nuɖuɖu zanzan tɔn hwenu bɔ gbexosin lɛ nɔ ɖido fi e ɖe nu e ɖo toxo ɔ sin akpa vovo lɛ xwe
gbexosin lɛ nyi ahwan byɔ gle ɔ mɛ ɖo grande bretagne
lɛ kpo gbexosin lɛ kpo bi wɛ sɔ ɔ kpe ganxixo livi ɖokpo ɔ wu ɖo
nugbo ɔ gbeɖiɖo lɛ ɖɔ ɔ sin akpaxwe lɛ bi wɛ ɖo nukɔnyiyi
ðo xwe vlamɛ ɔ nabi ɖo grande bretagne e jɛji ɖibla yi nabi ɖe e donu atɔn
axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ji e ayi ɖo e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun mawu tɔn bonu kpannukɔn ahwanfunfun sin xwe syɛnsyɛn ɖo nukɔn lɛ e
ðo egbe ahwan mawu tɔn haamagedɔni ɔ ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ gbexosin nabi ɖo grande bretagne e kpo ɖo jijɛji wɛ
ðo xwe wo wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ gbexosin lɛ jɛji azɔn mɔkpan nyi ɖo octobre

etɛwu akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ nɔ wa ɖagbe
etɛ jehovah jezu kpo pɔlu kpo tɔn mi do akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ wu

nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nyi kun bi o le nyi gu din ɖɔ nyi klo din
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ hwɛhwɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖe nu a

akɔnkpinkpan mɛ sixu hɛn nu gble do mɛ wu e
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ nɔ wa ɖagbe tawun
ɖi xwi xa linlin nuɖewanu nyi tɔn nɔ ɖo do nyiɖee wu e nu xwe mɔkpan wɛ ruben ɖɔ

e ɖoto mi se xa mi hwenu ɖɔ linlin lɛ e
enɛ gudo ɔ e flin nu ɖagbe wa wɛ ɖe lɛ e mi
e flin mi xogbe jezu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo xɔ akwɛ hu gboli gege
nɔ flin wemafɔ enɛ ɔ hwɛhwɛ bɔ e nɔ byɔ ayi mɛ nu mi hwebinu
xogbe mɛxo agun tɔn ɔ zan lɛ e wa ɖagbe nu mi

etɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
e ɖo kpaca mi ɖɔ biblu ji ɖɔ akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ hwɛhwɛ ɖo taji a

enɛ wu ɔ nu mi gbeje nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ etɛwu akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ ɖo taji

etɛwu e han ɖo egbe

xa
mi nɔ ɖɔ nu wu mi yi wan nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ e nu ɖo hwenu e jɛxa do lɛ e a
etɛwu awovi jlo do awakanmɛ ku nu mi
sataan awovi jlo do awakanmɛ ku nu mi ɖo e tuun ɖɔ enɛ gbɔjɔ kanmɛ nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kpo ali ɖevo lɛ kpo
nunywɛxo ɖɔ enyi kanmɛ gbɔjɔ adangbomɛzangbe hun hlɔnhlɔn hwedo tawun nɛ
enɛ bɔ xwe mitɔn kpo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo nyi fi mi nɔ mɔ awajijɛ kpo ayijayi kpo ɖe lɛ e
biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ ɖɔ akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ ɖo taji nu jehovah
lɛ sixu xwedo jehovah tɔn gbɔn
jehovah
hwenu jelemii ɖo xɛsi ji bɔ awakanmɛ tɔn tuntun e ɔ jehovah jiɖe gbeyiɖɔ enɛ ɔ
wɛnsagun enɛ ylɔ daniyɛli ɖɔ wanyinamɔ mawu tɔn
sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu lɛ gbexosin lɛ nu nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo mɛxomɔ ɖeɖee sin hlɔnhlɔn ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ lɛ e a
mawu mɔ ɖɔ ɖo emi kpo vi emitɔn jezu kpo ɖo nu xwe mɔkpan wutu ɔ e kun byɔ ɖɔ emi kpa ɛ ɛ akɔnkpinkpan hwenu e ɖo ayikungban ji e o a
mɛ ɔ mawu kpa jezu ɛ jiɖe ɖɔ e ɖo ɖagbe wa wɛ
xogbe enɛ lɛ jezu se ɖo ninɔmɛ we mɛ e ɛ akɔnkpinkpan tawun ɖo tɔn sin kpo xwe gudogudo tɔn e blo ɖo ayikungban ji e mɛ kpo
jehovah wɛnsagun ɖe do bonu e akɔnkpinkpan jezu hwenu e ɖo adohu adohu ji ɖo zan jɛ nukɔn nu ku tɔn e mɛ e
luk enyi wɛ nu mi ɔ nu mi xwedo jehovah tɔn hwɛhwɛ nɔ akɔnkpinkpan vi mitɔn lɛ nɔ kpa hwenu wa nu ɖagbe e
mi ɖo nɔ gudo nu hu mi nɔ blo gbɔn e ɖo hwenu e ɖo gbejininɔ yetɔn tɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖo wemaxɔmɛ e
etɛ jezu wa nu xa tɔn lɛ gbɔn e sixu mi
jezu
ðo zan mɛ jezu flin ɔ e ɔ goyiyi nyi jijɔ nyanya ɖe e wu wɛ e ɖo tɔn lɛ sin fɛn
e ɖo co jezu kpa tɔn lɛ nu nɔ xa ɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn tɔn lɛ mɛ e
jaan mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nu wa nu jezu ɖɔhun nɔ kpa vi lɛ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo nu ɖagbe nɔ wa lɛ e wu ɔ e hu ɖɔ nɔ ayi ɖo nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ ji a ce
pɔlu ɖɔ akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu emi gbɔn
pɔlu
ðo wema mɛ pɔlu tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ xo ɖagbe do klisanwun tɔn lɛ wu
e yi tomɛ xa mɛ ɖe lɛ tuun nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ co e ɖɔ xo ɖagbe lɛ do wu
ði ɔ pɔlu ɖɔ do timɔtee wu ɖɔ e nyi vi ɖo gbeji nu aklunɔ bɔ klisanwun ɖevo lɛ sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ tawun
se timɔtee kpo titu kpo se nu pɔlu nɔ do wu e akɔnkpinkpan tawun
pɔlu kpo banabasi kpo yetɔn ɖo axɔ lɛkɔ yi fi e xo daka wu ɖe lɛ e
ðo efɛzi ɔ ahwan ɖe huzu kpannukɔn pɔlu kpo xomɛsin kpo
ɖɔ ji ee zingidi ɔ wa xwɛ ɔ pɔlu ylɔ mɛ ɖi nu nu jezu lɛ kple do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ nu ɖɔ emi yi wa ɖido masedwani
e gbɔn fi enɛ lɛ ɖɔ xo gege ɖo finɛ do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖi nu nu jezu lɛ wa yi yikungban ji
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo taji tawun nu pɔlu
kple mitɔn lɛ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ akɔnkpinkpan mɛ nɔ mɔ gbɔn
nu wu mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ xomɛ do mi wu blo tuto bɔ mi nɔ kple hwɛhwɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo kple lɛ ji ɔ mi sixu akɔnkpinkpan mɛ bɔ e sixu mi xa eblee lɛ
ði ahwanvu jezu tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ mi nɔ kple ɖo nu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee lɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ flu tawun hwenu wa kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ e
hwe enɛ ɔ wɛ nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ nɔ sɛkpɔ mi nɔ zunfan mi nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nyi
nɔ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ emi yi wan nu mi ɖɔ nukɔn yi wɛ nyi ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e hun xomɛ nu emi
akɔnkpinkpan nɔ mi e nɔ bɔ nɔ mɔ nyiɖee mɛ tawun
enyi mi mɛ bi nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo akɔnkpinkpan nina miɖee mɛ ɔ e nɔ wa ɖagbe hlɔ
etɛwu mawu tlɛ mɔ nu lɛ e lɔ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn
mawu tlɛ mɔ nu lɛ e lɔ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn
jozuwee tɔn
kpligidi nyi nukɔn ninɔ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ bonu yi akpadido yikungban ɔ e mɛ do wɛ jozuwee ɖe nɛ
nu gege ɖo e bɔ e hwe bi ɔ e ɖu ɖo ahwangɔnu tɔn ji azɔn ɖokpo
joz e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jozuwee ɖo hudo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ akɔnkpinkpan mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ jɛ lɛdo tɔn lɛ ji nu syɛnsyɛn nɔ wa nɔ do kpe nukun do lɛngbɔhwan mawu tɔn wu e xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
lɛdo tɔn ɖe ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔvi lɛ nɔ kudonumɛ wema do mi nɔ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ wa mi wa emi e vivi nu emi tawun
mi nɔ wema enɛ lɛ xwe nɔ xa hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ awakanmɛ mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔjɔ wɛ e
nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖesu
etɛ ɖɔ mɛ kpikpa kpo akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ kpo nɔ tawun hwenu e ɖo we ɖe xa mɛ wɛ e
klisanwun mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo lɛ kpo mɔ ɖɔ mɛ kpikpa kpo akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ kpo nɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ zan weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn lɛ
kpa pɔlu kpa kɔlɛntinu lɛ ɖo zan weɖexamɛ tɔn wutu e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu bɔ kpo ɖo nu sɔgbe e wa wɛ
akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ nɔ bɔ weɖexamɛ ɔ nɔ byɔ ayi mɛ ganji
enyi vi mitɔn lɛ tlɛ tuun nu sɔgbe e ɔ nu sɔgbe e wiwa nɔ huzu aca yetɔn hwenu mi nɔ akɔnkpinkpan hwɛhwɛ e
gan ɖagbeɖagbe do wɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖe e kpo jijɔ ɖagbeɖagbe ɖo lɛ e kpo nɔ su nukun towe mɛ
jɔb nu mi mɛ bi nɔ wa do nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ lɛ e nɔ su jehovah kpo jezu kpo nukunmɛ tawun enyi ɖɔ gan mi nɔ do e kpo nu mi nɔ lɛ e kpo tlɛ nyi nu ɖe a ɖo ninɔmɛ mitɔn wu ɔ nɛ xa luki kɔlɛntinu lɛ
ði ɔ mɛxomɔ mitɔn ɖe lɛ nɔ do gan tawun nɔ yi kple lɛ kpo kunnuɖegbe kpo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
e jɛxa ɖɔ mi kpa akɔnkpinkpan a ce
etɛwu mi gɔn akɔnkpinkpan mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbeɖe a
nu akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ sin ali lɛ yi tɛ o
enyi mi mɔ nuɖe jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa mɛ blo e ɔ etɛwu mi wa a
nu jɛ hwenu pɔlu kpo banabasi kpo ɖo antyɔci ɖo pisidii e
ɖo finɛ lɛ e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ enyi ɖo xo ɖe ɖɔ nu togun ɔ do ɛ akɔnkpinkpan hun ɖɔ
pɔlu xwle xoɖiɖɔ ɖaaɖagbe ɖe do yi gbe nu
mɛ enyi mi sixu ɖɔ xo ɖe akɔnkpinkpan mɛ ɔ etɛwu mi bɔnu do aɖu
mi wa mɔ ɖɔ enyi akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ nyi aca mitɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ akɔnkpinkpan mi lɔ luk
etɛ bɔ mɛ kpikpa mitɔn nyi nujɔnu
nɔ kpa mɛ ɖo nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ wu do nujɔnu mɛ
xogbe mɛ kpikpa kpo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ kpo tɔn kpaa lɛ zinzan nɔ wa ɖagbe wɛn jezu do klisanwun ɖo tiatii lɛ e ɖɔ enyi e ɖɔ nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ ɔ e nɔ hu xa
ði ɔ enyi wɛ mi nyi ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ nu su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ vi mitɔn lɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e mɛ e nu
mi sixu ɖɔ nu nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖo nɔ goɖokponɔ ɖe ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn mɛ cobo nɔ wlibo nu vi tɔn lɛ e mɛ e
mɛ kpikpa kpo akɔnkpinkpan nina mɛ kpo mɔhun nɔ wa ɖagbe tawun
mi sixu akɔnkpinkpan mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hudo tɔn lɛ e gbɔn
jehovah ɖesu wa ɖɔ nu mi tlɔlɔ ɖɔ mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ le e ɖɔ nu mɔyizi ɖɔ e akɔnkpinkpan jozuwee do wusyɛn lanmɛ gbɔn e a
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe wlan jonɔ ɖe ɖɔ nukun xwixwe yɔywɛ ɖe jɛn mi ɖɔ xo co mɔ nu ɖo ji nu mi e do gbɔ nu mi akɔnkpinkpan mi
enyi mi kudeji zan weɖexamɛ pɔlu tɔn elɔ ɔ mi ɖibla mɔ ali nu mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e gege e ɖɔ akɔnkpinkpan miɖee do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee blo gbɔn wɛ ɖe e tɛ
enyi mi nɔ akɔnkpinkpan miɖee ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ mi mɛ bi sin nu jehovah nukunmɛ jɛn wɛ
akpaxwe e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɖe lɛ
etɛwu kudeji ɖɔ jehovah nyi kpe we a e
etɛwu e sɔgbe bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e blo tuto nu jehovah lɛ
weɖexamɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e mi bɔ mi nɔ ji fifa mɛ nɔ bu gbɔn
enyi mɛɖe lɛ se ɖɔ mawu ɖo tutoblonunu ɖe ɔ nɔ ɖɔ
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
mawu ɖo tutoblonunu ɖe a
mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ e byɔ ɖɔ tutoblonunu ɖe ali mɛ a
hwiɖesunɔ kpo mawu kpo kpowun
linlin enɛ ɔ sɔgbe a
etɛ kunnuɖenu lɛ
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do kunnuɖenu ɖɔ jehovah mawu nɔ nɔ tito ji e nyi kpe we a e ɖe lɛ ji
mi do nu mi ɖo nɔ wa nu gbɔn nu tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn nɔ mi e gbɔn e
kɔ ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn kpo egbe kpo ɔ mawuxowema ɔ tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn sin akpaxwe ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ wa ɖaxo nyi wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla e
ðo mi nɔ do biblu ɔ wu nɔ setonu nu tutoblonunu ɔ tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ jɛhun do fifa kpo buninɔ agun ɔ blebu tɔn kpo ji
nunywɛ wɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ do ɖo ayikungban ɔ wɛ biblu ɖɔ
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn do ɖo jinukunsin ɔ
sunvi livi mɔkpan wɛ nɔ ɖo sunvisɛkple lɛ mɛ bɔ bi xwii nɔ ɖo tɛn wɛ ɖo jinukunsin kpo tuto kpo
planɛti do hwe ɔ lɛ e nɔ ɖo yiyi do e wɛ ci nu ɖɔ ɖo lɛ nyi wɛ tɛnwin lɛnwin ɖɔhun
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ tutojininɔ jiwu ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ e mi bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ mi kpa nu jehovah nunywɛ tɔn do blo jixwe e nɔ gbeji ɛ ðɛh
nunywɛ xwitixwiti ɖe nu gege do wɛkɛ ɔ kpo ayikungban ji mi ɖe e kpo wu bɔ enɛ hɛn le wa nu mi ɖo ali vovo lɛ
nukanbyɔ gege tiin bɔ nunywɛ xwitixwiti kpewu sinkɔn yetɔn a
ði ɔ mɛ nɔ yi mɛ lɛ e sixu ɖɔ wɛkɛ ɔ jɔ gbɔn e alo nu wu mi ɖo planɛti ayikungban ji kpo nuɖogbɛ wɔbuwɔbu ɖevo lɛ kpo e nu mi a
etɛwu nukanbyɔ ɖo taji mɔ xosin a lɛ e
nu wu wɛ e akpa bu wɛ nyi ɖɔ nunywɛ gege kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ jɛhun do linlin sɔgbe xa jlo mawu tɔn a lɛ e ji nɔ so nu nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee sin nukplɔnmɛ ɔ
jehovah xosin nukanbyɔ ɖo ayi mɛ ɖu nu mɛ lɛ wɛ gbɔn fi bi e tɔn lɛ ɖo xo tɔn biblu ɔ mɛ
ali tɛ lɛ mi ɖo jɔwamɔ tɔn lɛ kannu ɖe
jɔwamɔ tɔn nɔ huzu a bɔ e sixu ɖeɖee jehovah ze lɛ e kannu wɛ mi ɖe
lɛ mɛ nɔ dɔn sin gbɔn xɔ mɛ lɛ e plombiers lɛ ingenieurs lɛ kpo dotoo nɔ zɛ mɛ lɛ e kpo bi wɛ nɔ zan enɛ lɛ do wa yetɔn lɛ
ði ɔ dotoo nɔ zɛ mɛ lɛ e nɔ ganjɛwu ɖɔ alɔkpa ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e ɖibla blo lɛ bi ɖo
enɛ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ dotoo nɔ zɛ mɛ e ɖe do nu nu do azinzɔnnɔ ɖe sin hun wu a
mi bi wɛ nɔ setonu nu jɔwamɔ tɔn lɛ
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ e ɖo blo tuto nu jehovah lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ jehovah jlo ɖɔ e blo tuto nu emitɔn lɛ ganji
bonu nu do sixu nyi ɔ wɛ bɔ mawu sɔnu nu biblu ɔ ali mi
tutoblonunu mawu tɔn kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo xixo nyi zan kɔ do kpo wubla kpo mɛ
etɛ ɖɔ biblu ɔ nyi wema ɖe bɔ e blo tuto ganji
biblu ɔ nyi wema jwifu lɛ kpo klisanwun lɛ kpo tɔn ca kan a e sin xokple ɖe kpowun a
e wa ɔ wema e blo tuto ganji e ɖe wɛ nyi ɖe bɔ mawu mɛ nu mɛ blo lɛ e
wema ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖokpo ɖokpo ca kan xa yeɖee lɛ
sin yi ɔ xota taji biblu tɔn ɔ tawun e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi bɔ linlin e ɖo nu ayikungban ɔ e jɛ gbɔn axɔsuɖuto tɔn ɖo kunkan sin akpa e do e klisu glɔ e gblamɛ xa ɖo du monde nouveau mɛ matie
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ e blo tuto nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ganji
ði ɔ ɖo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ ɔ e blo tuto nu nyɔnu ɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ wa ɖo goxɔ kple tɔn ɔ sin ali tin
e nɔ tɛn nu ahwansla izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn ɔ kpo goxɔ ɔ kpo kpodo tuto kpan
nukɔnmɛ ɔ axɔsu davidi to levii vi lɛ kpo lɛ kpo ɖo sonu sonu
bɔ enyi izlayɛli vi lɛ setonu nu jehovah ɔ e nɔ do nu bɔ nɔ nɔ tuto ji fifa mɛ nɔ nɔ bu
e blo tuto nu agun klisanwun tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn bɔ mɛ lɛ ɖe ɖo e nɔ ali
mawu mɛ nu mɛ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn mɛ e alo mɛ ɖo kancica xa tawun e ɖe lɛ bɔ ɖe we xa klisanwun lɛ lɛ gbɔn wema mɛ lɛ gblamɛ tim
ee agun nukɔntɔn lɛ xwedo gbeta ɔ lɛ e ɔ etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
xa
nɔvi sunnu ɖeɖee ɔ nɔ tomɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ gbeta lɛ kpodo jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ kpan ɔ nu mɛ lɛ
ee agun lɛ setonu nu gbeta enɛ lɛ e ɔ nɔ ɖo do li wɛ ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ nɔ ɖo jijɛji wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
nukplɔnmɛ ɖe ɖo biblu tɔn enɛ mɛ bɔ e nyi nunywɛ sin nu ɖɔ mi xwedo ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn mɛ egbe a
nɔvi sunnu e ɖe lɛ e ɖo nɔ wa nu gbɔn nu tutoblonunu mawu tɔn lɛ e
etɛ alaxɔ tɔn lɛ alo to tɔn lɛ sin lɛ lɛdo tɔn lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo wa hwenu tutoblonunu mawu tɔn lɛ egbe e
ebl gbigbɔ xomɔɖɔdonuwu tɔn alo tɔn ɖo tɛn ɖebu ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn mɛ a ɖo linlin mɔhun sixu dɔn kinklan wa agun mitɔn mɛ wanyiyi fifa kpo buninɔ kpo ɖe lɛ e mɛ
mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nɔ mɛ do mi lɛ e bonu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
nɔ yawu yi gbe nu nɔvi sunnu ɖo nukunkpenuwu wɛ lɛ e e nɔ nɔ gudo a
mi ɖɔ xo do gbeta kɔn ɔ wa ayisɔnmɔ e ɖe wu
nu lɛ kanbyɔ lɛ e ɖo atɔxwɛ novembre tɔn mɛ e tinmɛ huzuhuzu e blo do e nɔ ɖe mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn e wu e
xota enɛ ɔ ji ɖɔ xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn gbe lɛ ɖɔ nɔ ɖe mɛ mɔhun lɛ ɖo agun lɛ mɛ
sɔgbe kpo enɛ kpo ɔ sin ɔ lɛdo tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖe mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo
lɛdo tɔn ɔ nɔ tɛnkpɔn tuun sunnu ɖeɖee e ɖɔ jɛxa lɛ e nɔ xa ɖo kunnuɖegbe enyi e blo ɔ nɛ
mi sixu ɖɔ mi nɔ nɔ gudo nu nɔ gosin mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ e gbɔn
e jɛxa ɖɔ mi nɔ xwedo junjɔn biblu ji mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ mi e
nukplɔnmɛ mawuxowema ɔ tɔn sɔgbe lɛ e wɛ nɔ ali enɛ lɛ ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn mɛ tim
flin we pɔlu ɖe xa mɛ do nu nɔ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e wu e
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ nɔ fɔnlin mɛ nɔ nuɖe wa zɛ ɖo do mɛ ɖevo xo mɛ wɛ wu a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖe we xa kpo ɖo do nu weɖexamɛ ɔ wɛ
agun ɔ ɖo wa nu xa mɛ mɔhun ɖe gbɔn
pɔlu ɖɔ ɖo ji tɔn do tɔn o
egbe ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu xwle xoɖiɖɔ akpagbanumɛ tɔn ɖe mɛ do mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ wli ali nyanya ɖe kɔ e ɖe wu ɖi jlo wanyiyi tɔn ɖiɖo nu ɖe kɔ
enyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo dandan xwle xoɖiɖɔ mɔhun mɛ ɔ nɔ wa nu gbɔn
enyi mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ xo e ɖɔ ɖo xoɖiɖɔ ɔ mɛ e wu ɔ hwiɖee nyi alɔ nu kpo mɛ mɔhun kpo a
mɛ ɔ sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu bɔ zunfan gbejininɔ gbɔn e sixu ɛ jo hannyahannya zan wɛ e ɖe e do
mi sixu ɖo ji ninɔ agun ɔ tɔn mɛ gbɔn
enyi mi xwedo ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e ɔ mi sixu bɔ agun ɔ nɔ ji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
tamɛ do ninɔmɛ ɖo ayi ɖo kɔlɛnti hwexonu tɔn e ji
pɔlu zan eɖee tawun jla mawuxo ɔ ɖo toxo enɛ mɛ yi wan nu mɛ tɔn ɖo finɛ lɛ e
kɔ nwt e vɛwu tawun ɖɔ e kɛnu do agalilɛ yi gbe wɛ e ɖe ɖo agun enɛ mɛ e wu e
pɔlu ɖɔ nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ jo nya enɛ ɔ nu sataan ɖo xogbe ɖevo mɛ ɔ ɖe e sin agun mɛ
do hɛn agun ɔ ɖo ji ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖe ɔ sin mɛ
kɔ enyi mi nɔ gudo nu gbeta kɔn mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ wa ɖe lɛkɔ a e sin agun mɛ e ɔ mi nɔ bɔ agun ɔ nɔ nɔ ji nɔ mɛ ɔ vlafo nɔ lɛkɔ nɔ nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn
mi sixu jɛhun do fifa ji ɖo agun ɔ mɛ gbɔn
tagba ɖevo ɖo kɔlɛnti bɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e ɖeɖɛ
nɔvi ɖe lɛ nɔ ylɔ hwɛ yetɔn lɛ
pɔlu kanbyɔ do nujɔnu mɛ ɖɔ gbɔn bɔ gbɔ bonu e wa nu agɔ do a
ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ ɖo egbe
hweɖelɛnu ɔ fifa ɖo klisanwun lɛ tɛntin e bu ɖo ɖe gba dɔn axɔ ɖuɖu kpo vlafo ahizi kpo wa wutu
mɛɖe lɛ ylɔ hwɛ nɔvi yetɔn lɛ loɔ mawuxowema ɔ mi bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ enyi nu gu mi ɔ e hu mi hɛn nyikɔ mawu tɔn bli alo fifa agun ɔ tɔn mɛ mi ɖo nɔ zan weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn do ɖeɖɛ tagba kpo adɔn syɛnsyɛn lɛ kpo
xa matie
enyi mi wa ɔ mi nɔ jɛhun do buninɔ ɖo jehovah lɛ sin xwedo mɛ e ji
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ togun mawu tɔn nɔ bu
xo jehovah tɔn nu wu mi ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ bu e
hwenu izlayɛli vi lɛ setonu nu jehovah e ɔ nɔ tuto ji nɔ bu
jehovah ɖɔ ninɔmɛ mɛ togun tɔn ɖe ɖo sɔgudo e ɖɔ kple ɖo e nɔ kple do wuto mɛ e ɖɔhun
micee ɔ jehovah ɖɔ gbɔn gbeyiɖɔ sofonii ji ɖɔ yetɔn we alo huzu gbe lɛ tɔn do gbe ɖe nwt e wɛ nyi nugbo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn xomla nyɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ sin nyikɔ ɖo gbe mi sof
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ mi nɔ jehovah ɖo bu
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ mɛ ɖe afɔ nyi do e ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo akpaxwe ɔ
do hɛn buninɔ kpo ji ninɔ agun ɔ tɔn kpo ɖo ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖeɖɛ nunyanyawiwa lɛ gbɔn
buninɔ kpo ji ninɔ kpo ɖo taji ɖo agun ɔ mɛ co mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖo yawu kpe nukun do hwɛɖiɖɔ xo lɛ wu kpo kpo
pɔlu tuun ɖɔ wanyiyi mawu tɔn kun nyi nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e kpowun o bɔ e nɔ myɔ nukun do nu nyanya wiwa a
nux enɛ wu ɔ pɔlu wlan kɔlɛntinu lɛ nukɔntɔn nyi wema mɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɖe wanyiyi e e
kɔlɛntinu lɛ wegɔ ɔ ee e wlan ɖo ɖe lɛ gudo e ɖɔ nukɔnyiyi tiin ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ zan weɖexamɛ ɔ tɔn wutu
enyi klisanwun ɖe ɖe afɔ nyi do cobo wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɔ sunnu ɖo nuwukpikpe lɛ e ɖo tɛnkpɔn ɖe e do ali ji kpo xomɛfifa kpo
ali tɛ lɛ weɖexamɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e agun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖe
etɛ ji e ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ nɔvi mitɔn sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo hwe enɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ kpewu wa nu gege ɖo ɔ mɛ
egbe ɔ gandido tutoblonunu ɖokpo ɖo bu ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ e sin lɛ tɔn bɔ e ɖo linlin jiwu mawu tɔn lɛ jla gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji wɛ
akpaxwe mi tito basina nado wa ojlo jehovah ton wex
akpaxwe nu ɖo mɔjɛmɛ do ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee mɛ klisanwun ɖe sixu ylɔ hwɛ klisanwun ɖevo e wu hun hɛn miɖee ðo wanyiyi mawu tɔn mɛ wex tinmɛ ɖo do e
hwenu mi jla mawuxo ɔ ɔ se yi do ayi mɛ yi do yi mawuxo mawuxo ɔ wɛ e nyi nugbo tɛ
e sixu ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e ji gbɔn bɔ biblu ɖɔ
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ ahwankɛkɛ jehovah tɔn ɖo yiyi wɛ
sixu ɖɔ emi ɖo gudo nu tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn gbɔn
e sixu nyi alɔ nu tagba mɔhun lɛ gbɔn
jehovah lɛ nɔ ɖo sisi ɖaxo nu xo mawu tɔn biblu ɔ
ðo mi nyi wutu ɔ mi bi wɛ e nɔ zan mawuxowema ɔ do ɖe we xa hweɖelɛnu
mi ɖo nɔ wa nu gbɔn hwe enɛ lɛ
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn evodii kpo sɛntici kpo wa nu gbɔn e
tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɖo nyɔnu yi do ɖe we enɛ lɛ tɛntin
tagba tɛ lɛ wɛ
biblu ɖɔ a
do nujlɛdonuwu ɖe ɔ nu lɛ sixu jɛ gbɔn vlafo e
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ evodii ylɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖe lɛ wa xwe tɔn gbe bonu ɖu nu ɖo
e ylɔ sɛntici ɖe a bɔ e se ɖɔ mɛ bi zan hwenu vivi mɔhun ɖo
sɛntici sixu ɖɔ sixu ɖi ɖɔ evodii kun ylɔ mi o a
wɛ mi nyi bɔ vɛdo
sɛntici mɔ ɖɔ evodii emi jɛ do wu tɔn ji jɛ nu vɛdo e ji
enɛ wu ɔ sɛntici blo tuto eɖesunɔ tɔn ylɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖokpo ɔ lɛ ylɔ evodii a
tagba tiin ɖo evodii kpo sɛntici kpo tɛntin e sixu dɔn kinklan wa agun ɔ bi mɛ bɔ fifa a
biblu ɖɔ nu lɛ wa yi gbɔn e nu mi a nɔvi nyɔnu enɛ lɛ sixu setonu nu we pɔlu ɖe xa kpo wanyiyi kpo e fili
e ɖo co mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖeɖɛ tagba mɔhun lɛ alo tlɛ nyi alɔ nu enyi mi zan weɖexamɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn biblu ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɔ nɛ
we tɛ xo mawu tɔn ɖe xa mi do mi sixu ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci nu mi lɛ e ji gbɔn e wu
hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ e ɖe mi kpo alo tafu mi e ɔ e nɔ bɔwu bonu mi ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci nu mi e ji a
enyi e wa nu agɔ xa mi ɖo akɔ mi nyi e sinmɛ agbaza mitɔn ɖo e alo ɖo vogbingbɔn ɖo nukun ji e ɖevo wu ɔ e sixu nu mi tawun
nu e ɖɔ bonu enyi ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe wɛ wa ɔ ɔ nɔ syɛn ɖesu
weɖexamɛ lɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ mi hwenu nu mɔhun ɖe wa kpannukɔn mi e a
jehovah ɖo lɛ nɔ wa nu xa yeɖee gbɔn e mɔ wɛ sin nukɔntɔn lɛ hwenu
e nɔ nu nɔ ci nu mi lɛ e kpo nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ kpo wu
linlin lɛ jɛ ɖeɖee nɔ sin nu nɔ ci nu mi e wu lɛ e ji sixu bɔ mi ɖɔ xo ɖe lɛ alo wa nuɖe lɛ bɔ sixu wa nu mi ɖo nukɔnmɛ
nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi zan weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ yawu sin xomɛ o e
xa nunywɛxo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi bi wɛ ɖo do gan nɔ yawu sin xomɛ a nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ hu tɔn
jehovah kpo jezu kpo nɔ hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ xo ɔ do ɖebu a
mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ alo ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci nu emi e ji hu tɔn lɛ wɛ a
etɛwu mi ɖo miɖee do akpɔmimɔ wu
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci nu e ji a lɛ e nɔ mɔ hwɛhwɛ
e sixu sin enɛ wu bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ sɛkpɔ a
ɖe sixu hɛn nu gble do agun ɔ wu
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu mɛ mɔhun lɛ bɔ mɔ ɖɔ akpɔmimɔ wangbɛnumɛ kpo mɛhɛndoxomɛ kpo kun ɖo tɛnmɛ ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn mɛ o
jehovah ɖo ali tutoblonunu tɔn sin akpaxwe ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ wɛ gbɔn
tɛ lɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ setonu nu
ði xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn ɖɔhun ɔ devi enɛ nɔ yi gbe nu xo alo wɛn gosin mawu e nɔ ɖo sisi ɖaxo
biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ebl
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ nu klisanwun mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ hɛn tutoblonunu ɔ ɖo ji kɔ
ali ɖokpo tɛ zan wɛ e ɖe do ɖo alɔ do mi wɛ bonu mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo mawu tɔn mɛ
mɛɖe lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi hɛn ɔ emi tinmɛ biblu ɔ e jlo emi gbɔn e
jezu ɖe devi ɔ bɔ eyɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn mi
sin wɛ jezu klisu ɖo axɔsu ɖu wɛ din e ɖo devi enɛ ɔ zan wɛ do ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo mawu tɔn ɔ mɛ xwedo tɔn lɛ
enyi mi xwedo ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ɔ mi nɔ jɛhun do fifa kpo buninɔ kpo ji ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
e tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn sin akpaxwe jixwe tɔn ɔ gbɔn ɖo wema ezekiyɛli tɔn mɛ
xo jehovah tɔn tin nu mɛ nu mi do tutoblonunu tɔn sin akpaxwe jixwe tɔn ɔ wu
jehovah wɛ ɖo ahwankɛkɛ ɔ kun wɛ bɔ e nɔ yi fi ɖebu gbigbɔ tɔn jlo ɖɔ e yi e
tutoblonunu ɔ sin akpaxwe jixwe tɔn ɔ nɔ ali akpaxwe ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ ahwankɛkɛ ɔ ɖo yiyi wɛ
tamɛ do huzuhuzu tobutobu tiin ɖo tutoblonunu ɔ mɛ ɖo xwe wo wa yi lɛ e mɛ e ji hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ ɖo gudo nu nukɔnyiyi mɔhun lɛ
ee klisu kpo wɛnsagun lɛ kpo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ su kun do nu nyanya elɔ e ɔ ahwankɛkɛ jehovah tɔn ɔ ɖo wezun ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi blo bɔ nyikɔ tɔn nyi nu
mi doku nu tobutobu ɖo syɛnsyɛn wa wɛ magbokɔ ɖo lɛ kɔn e tawun
akpaxwe ɔ
ðɔ nu wa wɛ tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn ɖe e ɖe lɛ
tamɛ do nu tutoblonunu mawu tɔn sin akpaxwe ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ ɖo biblo wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ e ji
kanweko mɔkpan wɛ hɛn alɔnu yetɔn jan tawun ɖo hɔnkan jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɔ gba wɛ ɖo warwick etats unis
ðo xɔgbigba tɔn ɔ tɔn sin glɔ ɔ mɔkpan wɛ ɖo syɛnsyɛn wa wɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ gba kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gblo ada nu alaxɔ lɛ
mi doku nu tobutobu enɛ lɛ ɖo syɛnsyɛn mɔhun lɛ wa wɛ magbokɔ e tawun
flin ɖɔ jehovah ɖo nyɔna tɔn kɔn do axɔsuɖuto ɔ gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji nɔ yeɖee hwe nɔ akwɛ wu kpe e do nɔ gudo nu mɔhun lɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo lɛ e ji wɛ luk
tamɛ do wemaxɔmɛ tobutobu nɔ jɛhun do mɛkplɔnkplɔn mawu tɔn ji e ji
jehovah yi wan nu togun tɔn kplɔnkplɔn tawun
tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn jw org lɔ nɔ jɛhun do mɛkplɔnkplɔn junjɔn biblu ji e ji bɔ mi ɖo wema do gbe kanweko mɔkpan mɛ
akpaxwe bunɔ lɛ nu vi lɛ kpo xwedo lɛ kpo nu akpaxwe nu lɛ tɔn ɖe
ɖo jw org zan wɛ ɖo towe kpo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn towe kpo mɛ a
tɛ mi mɛ jehovah lɛ ɖo
wujɔmɛ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ
ðo mi tuun nu mawu byɔ ɖo mi si lɛ e kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo wutu ɔ mitɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi wa nu sɔgbe e nɔ gudo nu e nyi e
mi nɔ nu lɛ nɔ ylɔ nu nyanya ɖɔ nu ɖagbe nɔ ylɔ nu ɖagbe ɖɔ nu nyanya a
ali ɖevo mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu mawu ɖe lɛ e
klisanwun lɛ sixu ɖɔ emi ɖo gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn
vi lɛ kplɔnkplɔn
klisanwun lɛ nɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn vi yetɔn kpinkplɔn sɔgbe kpo xo tɔn kpo gblamɛ
lɛ nɔ xwedo aca e nɔ do vi lɛ ɖo xa yetɔn mɛ lɛ e dingan a
gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn ɔ ɖo tɛn ɖo klisanwun lɛ sin xwegbe a
efɛ klisanwun blo baptɛm e ɖe nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ to midɛɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ ɔ nyɔnu wɛ nɔ vi a
nu biblu ɖɔ do xo enɛ wu e ɖo wɛn lɛ hɛn vi mitɔn lɛ nu nu akpagbanumɛ aklunɔ jlo gbɔn e efɛ
mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo gbeji nu jehovah hwenu mi ɖo gbeta ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ kɔn wa wɛ e gbɔn
gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa
hwenu mi ɖo gbeta ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ kɔn wa wɛ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ e ɔ ali mi ɖɔ mi ɖo gbeji nu mawu ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi alɔdo ɖo xo tɔn kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo mɛ
do nu wu e ɖo taji ɖɔ e wa e ɔ tamɛ do nu nɔ wa nu do gege wu e ɖe wu
walɔ ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖo mɛ nɔ tɛn yi to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e si bɔ nɔ vi yetɔn do hɛnnumɔ lɛ bonu ji enɛ ɔ yedɛɛ lɛ kpo ɖo wa wɛ kpo ɖo akwɛ wɛ ɖo to mɛ ɖe e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ miɖesu wɛ wa gbeta ɖe kɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ ɔ mɛ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e sin gbe nu mawu xa hlɔmanu lɛ
nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi ma gbeje biblu ɔ o wa gbeta taji lɛ kɔn do xwedo mitɔn kpo nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ kpo wu a
gbeɖe
hwenu nɔ ɖe ji vi sunnu tɔn e ɔ gbeta tɛ kɔn e ɖo wa
etɛ ɛ wa gbeta sɔgbe e kɔn
nyɔnu ji vi sunnu ɖe hwenu e ɖo to ɖevo mɛ e ɖe jlo vi ɔ do xwe bonu asu tɔn sin lɛ kpe nukun do vi ɔ wu
ðo taan mɛ nyɔnu ɔ ji vi ɔ e ɔ jehovah tɔn ɖe jɛ biblu xa ɛ ji
e ɖɔ xomɛ nu mɛ nɔ biblu xa ɛ e kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
hɛnnumɔ tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo kɔ gbidi wɛ bonu e vi ɔ do xwe co e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ e kun sɔgbe ɖɔ emi wa o
agun ɔ nɔ gudo nu e kpo vi ɔ kpo gbɔn e jiwu nu asu tɔn bɔ e yi gbe biblu jɛ kple lɛ wa ji xa asi tɔn kpo vi tɔn kpo
ɖɔ nɔ enɛ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah se ɖɛ emitɔn wɛ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e mɔ
tɛ lɛ e mi do biblu lɛ wu
lɛ xwixwedo
ali mi nɔ nɔ gbeji nu mawu ɖe e taji ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ xwedo tutoblonunu tɔn nɔ mi lɛ e
ði ɔ tamɛ do e mi do biblu mitɔn lɛ wu lɛ e ji
mi sixu zan nu lɛ nɔ yi gbɔn ðo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ
kpo alɔnuwema mɛ ðe tɛ lɛ ɖo jlo jehovah tɔn wa wɛ ɖo egbe
kpo do wa
e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ enyi mi wema biblu mɛ xa ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ e ɖe fo ɔ mi wema hɛn miɖee ðo wanyiyi mawu tɔn mɛ xa ɛ enyi e tlɛ blo baptɛm ɔ nɛ
hwɛjijɔ wu mi ɖo doku nu jehovah lɛ e tawun
e mi nunina xɔ akwɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi xo tɔn biblu ɔ
mi kɛ alɔ do yi ɖɔ wɛn mawu tɔn wɛ klisanwun ɖo tɛsaloniki lɛ e lɔ se mawuxo ɔ yi gbɔn e ɖɔhun tɛ
mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ jɔwu mi tawun bɔ mi ɖo tutoblonunu tɔn mɛ
nyɔna mɔhun lɛ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
azɔn wɛ mi mɔ xogbe hanyiyi tɔn ɖo tɔn ɖo sɔyi ɔ ɖo ðɛhan ɔ mɛ
enyi mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ xogbe wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn enɛ lɛ nyi nugbo ɖo mi nɔ sɔyi
gbɛzan tɔn nyɛɖee do blo nu bi nu mɛ bi
e tun kan nu gbɔn gblamɛ
ayi ðo gbigbɔ ɔ ji nɔ kpo fifa kpo mɛ
ðo hlɔmanu lɛ wemata kpo kpo mɛ ɔ mi mɔ nu taji kunkpla klisanwun zinzan mitɔn e ɖe lɛ
nu enɛ lɛ kpinkplɔn mi bɔ mi mɔ mawu tɔn ayi mitɔn bi ɖo nu wa ɖagbe nu mi sɔyi lɛ e ji
towe lɛ bi ðo jehovah ji
jehovah nɔ ajɔ mɛ nɔ ɛ nugbo nugbo lɛ e
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖɔ xo do mi sixu mitɔn lɛ bi sin agban ɖo mawu ji gbɔn e ji
xota wegɔ ɔ tinmɛ mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ mawu nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɛ nugbo nugbo lɛ e do hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido gbɔn e
e nukun ɖiɖo ajɔ ɖe nɔ hɛn le wa nu mi gbɔn e
xomɛfifa ali nunywɛ tɔn
alɔdlɛndonu xota lɛ tɔn nu atɔxwɛ tɔn lɛ
mɛ tɔn wɛ e denton hopkinson
enyi blo baptɛm ɔ jɛn wɛ
wɛ adan enɛ nu nɔ ɖo
e adan enɛ co nu nɔ xwe e jɛn e wa blo baptɛm do ɖɔ emi emiɖee jo nu jehovah mawu
blo nu e ɖɔ e nugbo nɔ
xwe tantɔn ɖo wɛ jɛn ɖe hwenɛnu
sin vu wɛ e do jlo ɖiɖo nu nugbo biblu tɔn do lanmɛ nu mi
nɔ nɔ yi wema jinjɔn biblu ji lɛ bɔ nɔ gbeje nu ɖo mɛ lɛ e ɖo taji ɔ ɖiɖe lɛ
bonu nɔ ɖɔ xo do nu wɛ e ɖe lɛ e ji xa mi a
e ɖo co nɔ nu do nɔ kan nu gege byɔ enɛ wu ɔ e nɔ nu xa mi hwenu ɖo xwegbe a e
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ nyi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nyiɖee jo nu jehovah
blo baptɛm ɖo ɖo blackpool angleterre hwenu ɖo xwe wo e
sin hwe enɛ ɔ nɔ kpo nyi kpo jɛ alɔ ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ ɖo ji ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
mi nɔ zan glamafonu lɛ do xwle wɛn biblu tɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ
glamafonu lɛ nɔ sixu kiloo ɛnɛ adaɖe
ðo nyi yɔkpɔvu ɖe wutu ɔ do nukun ci hwenu nɔ ɖo glamafonu enɛ lɛ dɔn kpe wɛ e mɛ
jlo nyi gbexosin hwenu ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ e
nɔ ɖɔ nyi ɖo to ɖɔ nu mɛ nɔ wa nu nɔvi lɛ e e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ lɛdo tɔn ɖo egbe
nɔvi sunnu ɔ ɖɔ nyi tɛnkpɔn ɖe ba do sixu kpe nukun do nyiɖee wu ɖo gbexosin tɔn ɔ mɛ
nu wa e nɛ
ee nu xwe we gudo e ɔ ɖɔ xo do gbexosin ɔ wu xa lɛdo tɔn ɖevo
e ɖɔ kpowun
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ kpo nyi kpo ɖeɖɛ nu ɖeɖee mi ɖo ɖo xwe mi xa e mɛ lɛ e tɛn yi middleton ɖo manchester kpa ɖo avril finɛ wɛ mi gbexosin ɔ ɖe
ɛnɛ gudo ɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖokpo bɔ nyi kpo e kpo nɔ ɖo
alaxɔ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi tɛn yi agun e ɖo ayi ɖo iriam e mɛ
nɔ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe kpo wa gbexosin ɔ ɖo agun ɖevo mɛ
xwe hu a co e ɖɔ nu nyi kpo kpo ɖɔ mi nɔ kpe nukun do kple lɛ wu ɖo nɔvi sunnu jɛxa lɛ e nabi ɖe ɖo agun ɔ mɛ a
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e ɖɔ nyi tɛn yi agun buxton tɔn mɛ ɖo nabi ɖe ɖo finɛ a ɖo hudo
nɔ mɔ hwebinu ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ mɔ ɖo lɛ e nyi ɖe nu e wa ɖe nu mi ɖo nukɔnmɛ lɛ e
nyi kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo mɛ lɛ ylɔ wɛ nu xoɖiɖɔ agbawungba tɔn ɖe ɖo rochester
ðo ɔ do alɔ wema mɛ yi wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn galadi tɔn
ɖo decembre ɔ e ylɔ mi ɖɔ nyi wa wa
ɖɔ ɖɔ hwebinu tɔn wɛ nɔ wa hwɛɖɔxɔsa ɔ yi gbe nu xo a ɖo hwɛ nu mi ɖɔ nu sunzan
hwenu ɖo gankpa mɛ e ɔ mɔ mɛylɔwema nu klasi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn tɔn
ðo juillet ɔ do batoo nɔ nyi e tunta
ee jɛ e ɔ kpewu yi tɔn sin xota nyi togun ɔ tɔn e
enɛ gudo ɔ do pipan yi tofɔligbe lansing tɔn ɖo finɛ wɛ wemaxɔmɛ ɔ ɖe
ðo gankpa mɛ wɛ gosin tlolo wutu ɔ go mɛ xu kpɛɖe
hwenu jɛte sin pipan mɛ e ɔ ɖo do yi totaligbe lansing tɔn
tlɛ ɖo akwɛ kpɛ do su hunkwɛ ɔ e a bɔ ɖevo si wɛ gbɔ nya ɖe
e mi mɛ atɔn do philippines paul bruun raymond kpo nyɛ kpo
mi nɔte nu gege cobɔ wema acɛ mi bonu mi yi togudo e wa sɔgbe enɛ gudo ɔ mi do batoo ɖido philippines gbɔn rotterdam xu tɔn suez ocean indien malaisie kpo kong kpo azan wɛ mi blo ɖo xu ji
mi wa wa ɖo novembre
raymond kpo nyi kpo xɔ azan ɖo tɔjihun mɛ yi philippines
mi ɖo huzu alɔ sɔgbe xa lɛ ayi ɖe jɛ gbe ɖe ji
e ɖo co mi mɛ atɔn lɛ bi wɛ e agun ɖo quezon e ɖe mɛ ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ finɛ lɛ e gege nɔ do glɛnsigbe
enɛ wu ɔ ee mi blo gudo e ɔ gbe nɔ nyi tagalog e sin xogbe yɔywɛ ɖe jɛn mi tuun
e ɖe nu mi bɔ e gbɔ azɔn enɛ
gbe ɖokpo ɖo mai ee nɔvi kpo nyi kpo gosin kunnuɖegbe wa xwegbe e ɔ mi mɔ wema mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo xɔ mitɔn mɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ mi nyi lɛdo tɔn
xwe ɖo wɛ jɛn ɖe enɛ hun ali nu mi bɔ nyɛɖee do blo nu bi nu mɛ bi ɖo ali ɖevo lɛ
ɖo xoɖiɖɔ ɖe xwle mɛ wɛ do bicol gbe mɛ ɖo lɛdo tɔn ɖe ji
ði ɔ ee nyi lɛdo tɔn e ɔ xwle xoɖiɖɔ nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɖo gletoxo ɖe mɛ awan lele
wa se ɖɔ aca wɛ e nyi ɖo philippines hwe enɛ lɛ bɔ e nɔ xwle xoɖiɖɔ agbawungba tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo agbawungba nugbo
hwenu nɔ ɖo agun vovo lɛ wɛ ɖo lɛdo ɔ mɛ e ɔ nɔ xwle xoɖiɖɔ agbawungba tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo xɔ sa e nɔ yi jɔ ɖe lɛ e sa ɖo axi lɛ mɛ tokpɔnla sin xɔ lɛ nukɔn fi e nɔ xo ɖe lɛ e gbɔjɛtɛn lɛ bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ ɖo aliklan lɛ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ nɔvi sunnu lɛ kanbyɔ ɖɔ e sixu ɖo gbe tɔn do kple agbawungba tɔn tɛnmɛ a ji ɖo e blo ɖo agbawungba a wutu
fi e nɔ e nɔ ɖo nɔvi lɛ xwegbe jɛn wɛ
xwe lɛ nɔ nyi nu ɖaxo ɖe a co nɔ ɖo ji hwebinu
kpo wɛ e nɔ jan hwɛhwɛ nɔ
ðo wulɛkpa lɛ nɔ hwla a wutu ɔ nɔ nɔ nu mɛ nɔ lɛwu ɖo agbawungba
nɔ do yi fi lɛ fi lɛ bɔ nu xwe tɔtɛntinto lɛ mɛ hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ do aklo
ðo xwe ɖeɖee do wa lɛ e bi mɛ ɔ nyiɖesunɔ ɖo ɖesu le a
ɖo ɔ mɛ kpo agun lɛ kpo mi bɔ tagalog
yi gbe kplɔnkplɔn sin wemaxɔmɛ tlɔlɔ le a to ɖiɖo nɔvi sunnu lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ kpo kple lɛ ji kpo wɛ mi bɔ se gbe ɔ
nɔvi lɛ jlo mi bɔ suulu ɖo do wutu e kpo nu wu ɖo ayi e ɖiɖɔ nu mi nyi wɛn kpo su nukun mɛ tawun
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ lɛ bɔ ɖo blo huzuhuzu ɖevo lɛ
hwenu nɔvi nathan knorr wa mi ɖo e ɔ e ɖe nu mi ɖɔ kpe nukun do nu kan lɛ e wu ɖo to tɔn ɔ ji
tuun nuti ɖo ali enɛ a mɛ ɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ mi
e kpe xwe ɖokpo a bɔ e blo tuto nu to tɔn ɖevo bɔ nɔvi frederick franz nɔ ɖo hɔnkan mitɔn ɔ tɔn e wa mi
nyi wɛ nyi ɔ tɔn bɔ mɔ ɖɔ nɔvi franz nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔ huzu alɔ sɔgbe kpo lɛ kpo
hwenu nɔvi franz ɖo xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ lɛ bi ɔ xwle mɛ wɛ e ɔ e do nu philippines lɛ nɔ do hwɛhwɛ bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ tagalog e nu enɛ nɔvi lɛ mɔ e hun xomɛ nu tawun
ɖo blo huzuhuzu ɖevo lɛ hwenu e ɖe mi bɔ nyi agbegbe tɔn e
ðo hwe enɛ ɔ mi nɔ fimu le bonheur societe du monde nouveau mɛ lɛ bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ mi nɔ blo ɖo fi ɖo agbawungba lɛ e
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nuvinuvi lɛ nɔ doya nu mi
nɔ wun yɛ lɛ kɔn nyi do wu e wɛ nɔ dɔn bɔ nɔ jan ci mɛ
vo wɛ ɔ nɔ wa nyi ɖo gudo mɛ
fimu enɛ lɛ nɔ bɔwu ɖebu a e ɖo co enyi mɛ lɛ mɔ wa nu gbɔn wɛ tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn ɖe e ɔ nuwiwa yetɔn nɔ hun xomɛ nu mɛ
yɛhwenɔ katolika tɔn lɛ nɔ gbidi kɔ nu lɛ ɖɔ gbe mi bonu mi blo lɛ o
alo hweɖebunu e ɖo xoɖiɖɔ lɛ xwle mɛ wɛ ɖo fi ɖe lin do amisaxɔ yetɔn lɛ a e ɔ nɔ ɖo gankwekwe yetɔn lɛ xo wɛ ba mɔ tɛn do mɛ
e ɖo co ɔ yi nukɔn bɔ mɛ gege ɖo jehovah wɛ din ɖo xa enɛ lɛ mɛ
ðo ɔ mɔ wema mɛ ɖe ɖɔ nyi wa wa ɖo alaxɔ mɛ
enɛ nu gege ɖevo lɛ mi
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ mi do to ɖevo lɛ mɛ bɔ nɔ yi wa kpɔnla tɔn sin
ðo tomɛyiyi enɛ lɛ ɖokpo hwenu ɔ xo go janet dumond nyi ɖe e ɖo thailande
mi wlan nu miɖee lɛ nu taan ɖe wa wli alɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ
mi ɖu vivi awajijɛnɔ wiwa ɖo tɔn nu xwe ɖi asu kpo asi kpo
nyi kpo janet kpo ɖo tɔtɛntinto philippines tɔn lɛ ɖokpo mɛ
e vivi nu mi ɖɔ yi togun jehovah tɔn ɖo to vovo mɛ
e su nukun mɛ tawun ɖɔ e ɖe nu mi ɖo lɛ e mi bɔ ɖi xwi xa ɖeɖee xa vovo mɔhun lɛ hɛn wa lɛ e
xa nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ ɖo philippines vivi
lɛ sin jɛji yi donu wo din hu e ɖe hwenu jɛ wa ji ɖo finɛ e
janet kpo nyi kpo kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo alaxɔ philippines tɔn mɛ ɖo quezon
ɖo togudo hugan xwe din co ɖo kpo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ huzu sɔgbe kpo nu jehovah byɔ mi lɛ e kpo
huzuhuzu yaɖeyaɖe ɖeɖee wa ɖo tutoblonunu lixo lɛ e byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ ɖyɔ alɔ ɖo mitɔn mɛ nu mawu kpo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo
lɛ tɔn ɖo jijɛji wɛ e nɔ mi awajijɛ hwebinu
mi tɛnkpɔn nɔ yi gbe nu nu ɖebu mi mɔ ɖɔ e sɔgbe kpo jlo jehovah tɔn kpo e bɔ enɛ nɔ hɛn awajijɛ ɖaxo wa nu mi
mi tɛnkpɔn blo huzuhuzu ɖeɖee ɖo dandan lɛ e wa nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ganji
nugbo ɔ mi kudeji miɖee do blo nu bi nu mɛ bi jɛ hwenu jehovah jlo ɖo e
mi kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo alaxɔ mɛ ɖo quezon
nu ɖo nyi nu wɛ lɛ bi sin agban ɖo ji jehovah tɔn ɖo e ɖo nukun kpe do wu wɛ
xo mawu tɔn sixu ɖe mitɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn
sixu mɔ fifa mawu tɔn gbɔn
agun ɔ sixu bɔ ɖe towe lɛ kpo gbɔn
etɛwu e ɖo kpaca mi ɖɔ mi nɔ wa jɛ mɛ hweɖelɛnu a
fɔtoo ɖo e etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e kpaca mɛ ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi mɛ mawu lɛ nɔ wa jɛ mɛ a
nu e ɖɔ ɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ jehovah hwexonu tɔn nɔ ɖi xɛsi lɛ e nɔ wa ɖo nu wɛ ɖi axɔsu davidi
etɛ mi sixu wa hwenu vun bla mi e
mitɔn jixwe tɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo hwexonu bɔ ɖo egbe ɔ e nɔ blo bɔ mi sixu mɔ kɔ do sa fun ɖo alo adohu adohu mitɔn gege si
sixu wa gbɔn
nu mi ali mi sixu wa ɖe e ɛnɛ gbɔn ɖɛ xixo xo mawu tɔn xixa kpo tamɛ linlin kpo gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn byɔbyɔ kpo xomɛ ɖiɖɔ nu ɖe kpo gblamɛ
sixu xoɖɛ nu linlin towe do alɔ mɛ nu mawu mavɔmavɔ gbɔn
afɔ nukɔntɔn mi sixu ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi sɛkpɔ jehovah gbɔn ɖɛ xixo e gblamɛ
hwenu ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ bɔ bɔ vo ɖo hwiɖee mɛ a ɖo huhu wɛ alo jɛ mɛ e ɔ hun ayi towe nu towe jixwe tɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ
ðɛhan davidi savo nu jehovah ɖɔ mawu ɖoto ɖɛ
enɛ gudo ɖo ɖɛhan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ nu linlin towe do alɔ mɛ nu mawu mavɔmavɔ e hɛn ɖo
ɖɛxixo sixu bɔ kpo kpo vun bla a gbɔn ðɛh
hwenu mi ɖo mɛ e ɔ etɛwu ɖɛxixo ɖo taji
e sixu mi vivo ayi mɛ tɔn bɔ e ɖe ɖo linlin kpo ayi mitɔn kpo mɛ lɛ e siin
ðo sin tɛnmɛ ɔ mawu bɔ mɔ fifa kpo vivo ɖaxo ɖe kpo hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi nu sixu nyi nu hwi lɔ
mɛ ɔ fifa mawu tɔn hɛn ɔ e ɖu ɖo tagba ɖebu sixu kpannukɔn e ji
hɛn ɔ ɖeji do akpa tɔn jehovah tɔn elɔ wu ɖo nukun do gbɛmɛ wɛ o ɖo nyi wɛ nyi mawu towe
xo mawu tɔn sixu hɛn fifa ayi mɛ tɔn wa nu mi gbɔn
afɔ wegɔ mi ɖe ba mɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn e wɛ nyi biblu xixa kpodo tamɛ linlin kpo
etɛwu nu enɛ ɖo taji
mawu tɔn zan lɛ e ɖo biblu mɛ sixu bɔ nyi alɔ nu ɖe kpo alo ɖu
wɔn gbeɖe ɖɔ xo mawu tɔn nɔ mɛ nɔ fa kɔ nu mɛ o ɖo nunywɛ ɔ ɖesu tɔn wɛ
enyi nɔ tamɛ do linlin mawu tɔn lɛ ji zan keze nɔ zan ɖagbe biblu tɔn lɛ ganji gbɔn e ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu tawun
jehovah ɖɔ xo emitɔn xixa bɔ mi kpan do gan ɖi xɛsi bɔ awakanmɛ ku mi a joz
ðo xo mawu tɔn mɛ ɔ mi mɔ gbɔdonumɛ sin xo jezu tɔn lɛ
xogbe tɔn lɛ kpo nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ kpo fa kɔ nu lɛ tawun
mɛ gege sɛkpɔ ɛ ɖo e nɔ xo ayi mɛtɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖo gan a e nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ awakanmɛ gbɔjɔ e xa matie
akpa jezu do ɖɔ emi mi e kpo ɖo
e sixu hwi lɔ e blo gbɔn nu zɔn xa ɛ lɛ e gbɔn e
e byɔ ɖɔ ɖo jezu kpa ɖo mimɔ ɛ wɛ cobo ɖu le tɔn a
jezu nyi axɔsu ɖo jixwe co e kpo ɖo se xa mɛ wɛ
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu ɖo mɛ e ɔ e sixu do alɔ ɖo hwetɔnnu
nugbo ɔ jezu sixu bɔ ɖu ɖo adohuhu ji ɖo nukunɖiɖo kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo ebl
enɛ nu titewungbe atɔngɔ ɖe kpo nu e e wɛ nyi gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn
jijɔ ɖagbe enɛ lɛ hlɔnhlɔn mawu tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo lɛ e ɖe mɛ alɔkpa mawu ɔ nyi e xa galatinu lɛ
ee ɖo gbigbɔ enɛ tɔn wɛ e ɔ kancica ɖo hwi kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo tɛntin e
mɛ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ ninɔmɛ sixu dɔn wa lɛ e gege bu
tamɛ do gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn gbɔn e ji klewun
gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn sixu bɔ ɖu ɖo ninɔmɛ hɛn wa nu lɛ e ji alo nyi alɔ nu gbɔn
enyi nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo sisi kpo ɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kpewu ɖu ɖo emiɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ji
nu nɔ nyi gbɔn
hwenu ɖe wanyiyi nɔvi nɔvi tɔn wanyiyi ɖaxo kpo sisi kpo e ɔ nyi alɔ nu ninɔmɛ sixu hɛn wa lɛ e gege hlɔ
wiwa bɔ gbo kpo nyi ali ji nu ninɔmɛ sixu hɛn wa lɛ e
ɔ hɛn ɔ xa ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo mi nyi wutu lɛ e ɖu ɖo ji
sixu nyi alɔ nu gege gbɔn weɖexamɛ mawu mɛ nu pɔlu e xwixwedo gblamɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu ɖo si ɔ kpe
pɔlu ɖɔ ɖɔ ðo mawu ɖɔ jo do gbeɖe a ɖe alɔ sin kan towe mɛ gbeɖe a
enɛ ɔ wu wɛ mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖɔ kpo jiɖiɖe kpo ɖɔ aklunɔ wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ mi e
etɛ mɛɖe sixu wa nu mi ebl
tamɛ do jijɔ enɛ lɛ hɛn le wa gbɔn e ji
enyi tɛnkpɔn ze hwiɖee hwe ɔ mɔ mawu tɔn kpo alɔdo tɔn kpo
micee enyi nɔ nɔ ji do nuwukpikpe agbaza towe tɔn taglomɛ towe tɔn kpo nu nɔ ci nu e tɔn kpo wu ɔ vun bla a ɖo nɔ ɖeji do mawu wu
etɛ ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔ o
e ɖo co weɖexamɛ enɛ xwixwedo sixu ci nu vɛwu e ɖe ɖɔhun
etɛ ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔ o
jezu ɖo alɔdo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ wɛ bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ ee ɖo dandan a alo ee zɛ xwe wu lɛ e kun nɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ o
azan ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo tagba tɔn lɛ enɛ wu ɔ klisanwun lɛ ɖo nɔ wa yi lɛ e alo sɔgudo tɔn lɛ nu tagba ɖo ayi lɛ e a
sixu zan weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn jo syɛnsyɛn lɛ do gbɔn
sixu ɖu ɖo nu wa wa yi lɛ e tɔn ji gbɔn
ɖe lɛ sixu sin nu mɛɖe wa wa yi lɛ e alo afɔ e ɖe nyi do wa yi lɛ e wu
mɛ ɔ sixu nɔ dohwɛ eɖee ɖo nu e wa wa yi bɔ e tlɛ sixu ɖo xwe gege e ɖe wu
hweɖelɛnu ɔ axɔsu davidi mɔ ɖɔ hwɛ emitɔn lɛ kple yi ji hu emi
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ nunywɛnu tɛ davidi ɖo wa
etɛ e wa
e ɖeji do nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn kpo hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ tɔn kpo wu
e ɖɔ kpo adɔgbigbo kpo ɖɔ nu nu mɛ mawu ɖe agɔ e jɛ ɔ sin kɔ e xa ðɛhan
etɛwu tagba ɖo ayi lɛ e ɖo nyi nu a
afɔ tɛ lɛ sixu ɖe ba ɖe kpo
gbavi e sixu ðe kpo gbɔn e ɖe lɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ tagba ɖo ayi lɛ e sixu nɔ nyi nu
e ɖo co e bonu nu jiɖe e ɖo do jehovah wu e a
filipunu lɛ nwt
nɔ ɖe hwenu ɖo vo ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe nɔ do gbɔjɛ
matie
nɔ ɖu vivi nuɖiɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn
ðɛhan
alisa nɔ nɔ zɔ nu o
nunywɛxo
nɔ lanmɛ hwɛhwɛ
timɔtee
tinmɛ nyikɔ mawu tɔn tɔn sixu hɛn nuɖiɖi towe lido gbɔn
ɖo dandan a lɛ e nɔ wa hwɛhwɛ hwenu klisanwun ɖe nɔ ɖo adohu adohu ji do tagba sixu tiin sɔgudo lɛ e wu e
e byɔ ɖɔ nu tuun nuti a lɛ e sin vun bla alo nɔ adohu adohu ji do wu a
ðo hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu lɛ nɔ wa ci mi nɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ sixu wa ci e a
ɔ ninɔmɛ ɖebu sixu glo mawu ji sixu towe lɛ bi sin agban ɖo e a
nyikɔ tɔn ɖesu ɔ sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi e nɔ blo nɔ huzu
hɛn ɔ kudeji ɖɔ mawu kpewu tɔn lɛ bɔ ɖu ɖo wa yi lɛ e egbe tɔn lɛ kpo sɔgudo tɔn lɛ kpo ji
ɖagbe ɖe sixu bɔ ɖu ɖo ji gbɔn
ali ɛnɛgɔ sixu ɖu ɖo ji ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖɔ nu ci nu lɛ e nu ɖe gbɔn ɖagbe ɖe gblamɛ
mɛ wli alɔ xa e ɖe alo mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe sixu kpewu bɔ towe lɛ ɖo tɛn yetɔn mɛ
ɖo ayi mɛ nu mɛ ɔ kanmɛ nɔ gbɔjɔ mɛ e ɖɔ xo ɖagbe nu mɛ ɔ wu nɔ ya mɛ
jehovah nɔ klisanwun lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖu ɖo lɛ ji gbɔn kple agun tɔn e nɔ blo ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ lɛ e gblamɛ
ðo kple lɛ ji ɔ sixu do xa ɖeɖee nu towe nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ bɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ kanmɛsyɛn yeɖee lɛ e
etɛwu sixu ɖeji ɖɔ kancica ɖo xa mawu e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
mɛxo agun tɔn nɔ nɔ e ɖe mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ emi emitɔn lɛ sin agban ɖo jehovah ji gbɔn e
nɔ byɔ nu gege ɖo mɛ si e ɖe wɛ e nɔ wa e wɛ nyi bɔ e ɖo xa ɖe
nɔvi enɛ ɔ ɖu gbɔn
e tinmɛ ɖɔ ðo taji bi ɔ mɔ ɖɔ gandido ba hɛn kancica ɖo nyi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e syɛn mi hlɔnhlɔn ɖaxo bi ɔ bɔ ɖu ɖo ayi mɛ tɔn lɛ ji
alɔdo jɔ lɛ kpo nɔvi klisanwun lɛ kpo tɔn ɖo taji ɖo adangbomɛ lɛ hwenu
nɔ ɖɔ xomɛ nu asi do nu nɔ ci nu mi lɛ e wu
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo lɛdo tɔn mitɔn kpo mi tawun bɔ lɛ ɖo tɛn yetɔn mɛ
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ nu lɛ jɛ kpikpa mi ji
enyi kpe ɖe wu a ɔ nɔ jo do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah
mi sixu mitɔn lɛ sin agban ɖo mawu ji gbɔn
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
do sin xwe ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi mitɔn lɛ sin agban ɖo mawu ji gbɔn ɖɛ xixo kpo xo tɔn xixa tamɛ kpo gblamɛ
mi mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi tɛnkpɔn ɖo gbigbɔ tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo e ɖɔ nu ci nu mi lɛ e nu ɖe mɔ hlɔnhlɔn gbɔn klisanwun tɔn nɔ hɛn mɛ lido lɛ e gblamɛ
xota bɔ e ɖɔ xo do jehovah nɔ mi gbɔn akpa e do ajɔ mi e gblamɛ gbɔn e ebl
etɛwu mi ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah nɔ tɔn lɛ
jehovah do nu tɔn lɛ ɖo hwexonu gbɔn
ajɔ tɛ lɛ jehovah nɔ mi
wanyiyi ca kan xa nuɖiɖi gbɔn
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi do
mi yi wan nu jehovah ɖo e wɛ yi wan nu mi jɛ nukɔn
jaan wanyiyi ɖaxo jehovah ɖo nu mi e sin ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ eɖesunɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi do nu emitɔn lɛ
ba mɛ mi yi wan nu mawu ɖo e wɛ nuɖiɖi mitɔn nɔ lido ɖo mi ɖi nu ɖɔ e tiin kɛɖɛ wɛ a loɔ mi ɖi nu ɖɔ e nɔ mɛ e yi wan lɛ e jɛn wɛ xa eblee lɛ
ajɔ dido mɛ nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo mɛ alɔkpa jehovah nyi e kpo nu e nɔ wa lɛ e kpo mɛ
hwenu mi kudeji bi ɖɔ mawu nɔ mɛ nɔ ɛ nugbo nugbo lɛ e jɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn nɔ ɖo blebu ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo wɛ nyi e ɖeji do nu ɖo nukun wɛ e ɖe ɔ wu ebl
nugbo ɔ nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo nukun nyɔna sin akpa mawu do lɛ e syɛnsyɛn
nukun ɖiɖo ajɔ ɖe nɔ hɛn le wa nu mi gbɔn
jehovah tɔn hwexonu tɔn lɛ kpo egbe tɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn
mi
akpa tɛ ɖo malacii mɛ
jehovah mawu ɖɔ nu eɖee ɖɔ emi ɖo emitɔn lɛ enɛ wu wɛ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi nyɔna emitɔn
mi xa ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ ɖɔ mi ɖɔ hun jixwe hɔn lɛ ɖo nuvo nu a ji kɔn nyɔna do ji bɔ e tunfla a ji
enyi mi yi gbe nu nu enɛ jehovah byɔ mi e ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun bɔ mi doku tɔn
etɛwu mi sixu ɖeji do ganjɛwu jezu mɛ ɖo matie mɛ e wu
jezu jiɖe ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ enyi axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mawu nɔ gudo yetɔn xa matie
mɛ jehovah nyi ɖo nu gege mɛ e wɛ bɔ mi sixu ɖeji do akpa jezu tɔn enɛ ɔ wu
jezu tuun ɖɔ akpa mawu tɔn lɛ kun nɔ gbla gbeɖe o
mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ xo enɛ mawu ɖɔ e kpo xo jezu ɖɔ do axɔsuɖuto ɔ kpo jlo mawu tɔn kpo biba jɛ nukɔn wu e kpan nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ
jezu ɖɔ e ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ nu nu do lɛ e akpaxwe ɔ
aniwu xosin jezu e hɛn nuɖiɖi mɛtɔn lido
kanbyɔ jezu gbe ɖokpo ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ ɖie jo nu bi do xwedo e wɛ e wa ci gbɔn nu mi
jezu nu nu ɖo nu enɛ e kanbyɔ e wu a e wa ɔ e ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ mɔ nu do lɛ e sin ajɔ yi
nɔ gbeji lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖu axɔsu xa ɛ ɖo jixwe
ajɔ ɖe lɛ tlɛ ɖe bɔ e mɔ din
jezu ɖɔ mɛɖebu jo xwe tɔn do jo nɔvi tɔn sunnu lɛ abi nyɔnu lɛ do jo tɔn kpodo nɔ tɔn kpo do abi vi tɔn lɛ do jo ayikungban tɔn lɛ do ɖo nyɛ wutu ɔ mawu ɛ nu hu ɔ donu kanweko ɛ mavɔmavɔ
nɔ nɔvi sunnu nɔvi nyɔnu kpo vi klisanwun kpo mi mɔ lɛ e xɔ akwɛ hugan nu ɖebu mi jo do ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ wu lɛ e a ce
etɛwu jehovah do ajɔ ɖe sin akpa nu tɔn lɛ
gbɔn akpa jehovah do ɖɔ emi emitɔn lɛ e gblamɛ ɔ e nɔ bɔ nɔ dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ
nukunɖiɖo sixu nyi gandotɔnu ɖe gbɔn
enyi nukunɖiɖo mitɔn nyi jixwe tɔn alo ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ e sixu hɛn mitɔn syɛnsyɛn gandotɔnu nɔ hɛn tɔjihun syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɖo gbɔn e
e sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ hlɔnhlɔn syɛnlin ɖo lɛ mɛ
nukunɖiɖo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖe kpo gbɔn
nukunɖiɖo mitɔn jinjɔn biblu ji e ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖe mi nɔ ɖo egbe lɛ e kpo
akpa mawu do lɛ e nɔ xo ayi mitɔn hwenu mi ɖo mɛ e
tuun tuun ɖɔ enyi mi nu linlin mitɔn do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah ɔ e hɛn mi ɖo e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi tawun
ðɛh mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖeji bi ɖɔ mawu kpewu wa nu nu mi hu nu mi byɔ ɛ ɔ abi ee wɛ mi tlɛ ɖe ɔ efɛ
mɔyizi ɖɔ nu akɔta izlayɛli tɔn ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu mitɔn dɔkun bi ɖo to wɛ e ɖe bɔ e nyi mitɔn ɔ mɛ
ɖo tonu se wɛ ɖo tɔn xa nu wɛ ɖe egbe lɛ e nyi wɛ ganji ɔ e do dɔkun nu
mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu mitɔn do dɔkun nu e ɖɔ gbɔn ɔ
ɖeji bi ɖɔ enyi emi ɖo jehovah wɛ zɔn mi yi kpo gbejininɔ kpo ɔ e do nu emi a
hwɛ towe jɔ ɖɔ ɖo jiɖiɖe mɔhun
ajɔ tɛ lɛ jehovah do jozɛfu
jozɛfu nyi nukunɖeji ɖe
ðo nɔvi sunnu tɔn lɛ bla gbe tɔn bɔ gan tɔn sin asi wa zan ayi hizihizi ɖo nukɔnmɛ wutu ɔ e mɔ eɖee ɖo gankpa ejipunu lɛ tɔn ɖe mɛ
e nya ɛ do zɔ nu mawu tɔn ɖo enɛ wu wɛ a
ɖe lɔ a
mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖo xa ɛ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do ji tɔn
mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖo xa jozɛfu nɔ blo bɔ nu e nɔ wa lɛ bi nɔ ɖo yiyi wɛ bib
jozɛfu ɖo suulu nɔte mawu tɔn ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ mɛ
xwe mɔkpan gudo ɔ ɖe jozɛfu nyite kannumɔ enɛ bɔ e nyi gan wegɔ ɔ ɖo ejipu
ðo jozɛfu nɔ gbeji nu mawu wutu ɔ e nyɔna gege do ɛ sin enɛ wu bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ kpo ejipunu lɛ kpo gan
nu taji ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ jozɛfu mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ jehovah wɛ emi xoɖɛ do emi ji bib
jezu klisu nɔ gbeji ɖo nu tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ nuɖiɖi tɔn lɛ e mɛ bɔ e ɛ
etɛ ɛ ɖu ɖeji
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kpe jezu kpewu nyikɔ mawu tɔn e hɛn awajijɛ wa
hu ɔ nu tɔn tɔn nukunmɛ bɔ e mɔ wujɔmɛ gege ɖevo lɛ sin ajɔ
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo axɔsuzinkpo mawu tɔn kpa ɖo ɖisixwe
nu mi wa nu jehovah lɛ e nɔ ci
mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖeji ɖɔ gan ɖeɖee mi nɔ do do jehovah lɛ e bi wɛ nɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ
e mɔ nukunnu jɛ ɖebu mi sixu ɖo e wu
enyi akwɛyozo ɖo mi fyɔn wɛ alo lanmɛ mitɔn bɔ mi nɔ wa e ɖo dogbo ɔ e nɔ se xa mi
mi sixu ɖeji bi ɖɔ jehovah nɔ nu tɔn lɛ nɔ wa nɔ gbeji lɛ e wu xa eblee lɛ
e nɔ byɔ lanmɛ nu jehovah tawun hwenu mi se xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ e
bɔ e ɖɔ emi do enɛ sin ajɔ mi
ajɔ tɛ lɛ ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe
nukunɖiɖo hwɛjijɔ sin ɖuɖejigbakun aklunɔ nɔ ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ ɔ azan enɛ gbe e tɔn wɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn klisanwun gbigbɔ ɖe lɛ e tim
e ɖo co e la ɖɔ mawu nukunɖiɖo ɖevo a
akpakpa ɖo ɖevo jezu tɔn livi mɔkpan lɛ wɛ do ninɔ sɔyi ɖo palaɖisi mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji sin ajɔ sɔgudo tɔn ɔ wu wɛ
gbɔdonumɛ tɛ mi mɔ ɖo jaan mɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu mɔ ɖɔ mi kun ɖo nu nabi ɖe wa wɛ o alo mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ gan mi nɔ do lɛ e nɔ hun xomɛ nu jehovah a ji
mi tlɛ sixu xo nu ɖɔ mi jɛxa ba mɔ ajɔ ɖe yi a ji
nu mi wɔn gbeɖe ɖɔ mawu hugan ayi mitɔn tuun nu bi o xa jaan
e nɔ mɛ nu ɖebu nuɖiɖi kpo wanyiyi kpo mɛ bɔ e wa kpo ayi mɛtɔn bi kpo e enyi ɔ tlɛ nuɖe ɖo mɛ wa e nukunmɛ a ɔ nɛ mak
e tlɛ nyi ɖo sataan tɔn sin azan gudogudo tɔn nyanya elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ jehovah ɖo dido nu togun tɔn wɛ
e nɔ blo bɔ mɛ nɔ ɛ nugbo nugbo lɛ e nɔ yi nukɔn tawun ɖo palaɖisi gbigbɔ tɔn mɛ ɖe e bɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn sin vivi nɔ ɖu lɛ e nɔ nɔ ɖo jijɛji wɛ
hu ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ mawu nugbo nugbo lɛ e nɔ mɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn vivo kpo awajijɛ kpo sin ajɔ yi nyɔna ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ lɛ bɔ e sixu a fili
ajɔ jehovah lɛ nɔ mɔ lɛ e nɔ ci nu
jehovah gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e hɛn ɔ ɖekunnu ajɔ jiwu e nɔ do lɛ e tɔn
ði ɔ bianca nɔ nɔ allemagne e ɖɔ ɖo ku do nu jehovah wɛ kpowun ɖo e nɔ mi ɖo nu nɔ ɖo adohu adohu nu mi lɛ e mɛ nɔ ɖo akpa gbe bi gbe
ɔ hannya kwe bi
ɖo ɖo wa kpo jehovah kpo wɛ wutu ɔ nɔ mɔ nyiɖee ɖo ayijayi mɛ ɖo tɔn lɛ glɔ
tamɛ do paula ɖo xwe nɔ nɔ lobɔ kplibɔzɔn ɖo do wɛ syɛnsyɛn e sin ji
e ɖɔ tɛnsisɛ ɖekpo nu mɛ ɔ wɛ dandan ɖɔ mɛtɔn ɖekpo a
nɔ ɖu vivi ɔ sin akpaxwe vovo tɔn ɖi kunnuɖiɖe gbɔn alokan ji kpo ee nyi aca tɔn a e kpo
do sixu nɔ akɔnkpinkpan nyiɖee ɔ nɔ wlan wemafɔ kpo xo ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ bɔ sixu nyi kɔ sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu lɛ e kpo do wema ɖe mɛ
nɔ ylɔ wema ɔ ɖɔ hwlɛngan wema
enyi mi ayi mitɔn bi ɖo akpa jehovah do lɛ e ji ɔ awakanmɛ mitɔn gbɔjɔ e nɔ yawu bu
jehovah ɖo finɛ hwebinu mi enyi mi ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ ɔ nɛ
ninɔmɛ towe sixu gbɔn vo nu bianca alo paula tɔn
e ɖo co sixu tamɛ do ali ɖeɖee jehovah hwi kpo mɛ do lɛ e kpo ɖe e ji
nu ɖagbe tawun wɛ e nyi ɖɔ do nukun jehovah ɖo ajɔ do wɛ din gbɔn e kpo e wa ɖo sɔgudo gbɔn e kpo mɛ
enyi mi ɖo jehovah wɛ zɔn mi yi kpo ayi bi kpo ɔ etɛ mi sixu ɖo nukun
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi ɖo nuɖiɖi mitɔn hɛn lido wɛ zɔn mi yi wa kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpan jehovah wa wɛ mi ɖe ɖɔhun
mi sixu blo tuun ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ mi ajɔ mi jɛxa e xa kolosinu lɛ
etɛwu gbɛxixɔ ɔ mawu sɔnu e nyi ɖe
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ku ɖo hwɛhuhu sin alixo
etɛwu su mawu tɔn nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nyi alɔ nu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ kɛɖɛ huhu a
etɛwu hlɔmanu lɛ nɔ zan nu jehovah tɔn lɛ
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ jlo wemafɔ biblu tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ tuun ganji nɔ zan hwɛhwɛ lɛ e
hlɔmanu lɛ ɖo nukɔntɔn lɛ mɛ a
e zan wemafɔ enɛ ɖo wema etɛ biblu mɛ tawun
hwenu ɖo wema enɛ xa vi towe lɛ alo mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e ɔ xa hlɔmanu lɛ hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ do linlin mawu ɖo nu ayikungban ɔ e gbɛxixɔ ɔ kpo ninɔmɛ mɛkuku lɛ tɔn kpo ji wɛ e ɖo wemata ɔ ɔ kpo ɔ kpo mɛ
azɔn nabi tamɛ do hlɔmanu lɛ ji kunkpla nu hwiɖesunɔ nyi ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ e nuwiwa towe lɛ kpo nukunɖiɖo towe sɔgudo tɔn lɛ kpo
etɛ mi bi ɖo ɖi xwi xa do hwɛhuhu wu
mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ mawu nɔ flin ɖɔ wɛ emi do blo mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ku nublawu nu mi
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖebu nɔ ɖo hwɛ mawu kɛ mi lɛ e flin wɛ gbɛmɛ kpowun a
e ɖo co tamɛ linlin do e sixu hwɛ kɛ mi nɔ kɛ mi nugbo gbɔn e ji sixu hɛn le wa nu mi
etɛ ta weziza do tinmɛ hlɔmanu lɛ tɔn ji
etɛ nyi xo e ɖɔ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ e
enɛ mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ jehovah sixu hwɛ kɛ mi gbɔn e wu
ðo wemata ɔ mɛ ɔ mi xa ɖɔ lɛ bi wɛ hu hwɛ
etɛ nyi tinmɛ xo pɔlu ɖɔ e tɔn
e zan xokwin glɛkigbe tɔn ɖe bɔ sɔgbe kpo alɔdlɛndonu ɖe kpo ɔ tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi nu e wa nu mɛɖe kpo jlo kpo byɔ nuɖe alo ɖo nukun nuɖe sin mɛ ɔ e
nuɖe wɛ bɔ e sixu mɔ a e jɛxa a
akɔwe john parkhurst ɖɔ enyi e zan xokwin glɛkigbe tɔn enɛ do mawu alo klisu wu ɔ e nɔ do gesi jlo do mi bɔ mi jɛxa a e alo xomɛ xɔ nu hwlɛn ɛ gan e
enɛ wu ɔ linlin biblu tɔn tinmɛ wɛ xogbe enɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi
mawu ɖe enɛ gbɔn
e kunkpla nukunɖiɖo towe kpodo kancica ɖo hwi kpo e kpo tɛntin e kpan gbɔn
ba tɛ mɛ mɛɖe sixu ɖu mawu tɔn sin le ɖo
adamu wɛ nyi ɖokpo gee ji hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo gbɔn wa ɔ mɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ e sin nu ɖokpo gee wa nyi do ɔ wu bɔ ku ɖu axɔsu gbɔn ɖokpo gee enɛ ji
bɔ enɛ ɔ wa ɖagbe nu lɛ bi
tonusise ɖokpo gee jezu tɔn bɔ gege huzu hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖo mawu nukunmɛ
nugbo ɔ mawu tɔn sixu kpla mɛ yi mavɔmavɔ mɛ gbɔn jezu klisu ji hlɔ
e ɖo dandan nu jehovah ɖɔ e vi tɔn do ayikungban ji bonu e xɔ nu lɛ a
hu ɔ lɛ jɛxa nu jehovah kpo jezu kpo wa sɔnu nu gbɛxixɔ ɖe bonu hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ do tiin e a
enɛ wu ɔ hwɛ mitɔn e sixu kɛ mi e kpo nukunɖiɖo e mi bonu mi nɔ sɔyi e kpo nyi ɖe bɔ mi jɛxa a nugbo
nunina mawu tɔn nyi e ɖo nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun bɔ gbɛzinzan mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn ɔ ɖo nɔ
linlin agɔ tɛ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo do hwɛ yetɔn lɛ wu
ðo mi ɖu gu hwɛhuhu tɔn sin adamu wutu ɔ nuwanyido nunyanyawiwa kpo hwɛhuhu kpo jɛn mi kpo
e ɖo co e nyla tawun ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin lehun lɛ do mawu tɔn wu enyi tlɛ wa nu nyla e nu nyi hwɛhuhu ɖo mawu nukunmɛ e ɖe ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ hu mi a
jehovah kɛ mi
e blawu ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe lɛ ɖo linlin mɔhun lɛ hwenu ɖe lɛ tlɛ kpo ɖo e xa judi
mi sixu nɔ ɖɔ nu mɔhun linlin agɔ enɛ sin kwin sixu ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ alo e sixu do ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ jɛ ji
e tun kan nu pɔlu kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo si gbɔn
pɔlu ji ɖɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu linlin elɔ syɛnsyɛn ɔɔ mawu mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ
e myɔ nukun do nu wa nyi do lɛ e
mɛ lɛ nɛ kpo ɖo ɖo ayikungban ji nɛ bɔ etɛwu e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ ku ɖo hwɛhuhu sin alixo
mawu zan gbɛxixɔ ɔ nu pɔlu kpo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo hwetɔnnu lɛ e kpo
mɛ ɔ jehovah hwɛ yetɔn lɛ kɛ gbigbɔ do ɖe ylɔ bonu huzu vi tɔn gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo nukunɖiɖo yi jixwe
enyi nɔ gbeji ɔ nɔ ɖu axɔsu xa klisu ɖo jixwe
hwenu kpo ɖo ɖo mawu wɛ ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ pɔlu hɛn ɔ e ɖɔ do wu ɖɔ ku ɖo hwɛhuhu sin alixo
e zan jezu tɔn eyɛ ku ɖɔhun bɔ e ɛ do jixwe nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn ku gbeɖe a e ɖe ɖɔhun
ku ɖo acɛ do jezu ji a
gbɛzinzan yetɔn ci ee zan wa yi e ɖɔhun a
nɔ setonu nu nu hwɛhuhu sin jlo yetɔn nɔ lɛ e a
ku ɖo enɛ zan wa yi e linu
ali tɛ mi mɛ ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ nɔ sɔyi ɖo palaɖisi mɛ lɛ e ku ɖo hwɛhuhu sin alixo ɖe
midɛɛ lɛ lo
e cobonu mi huzu klisanwun ɔ mi nɔ hu hwɛ hwɛhwɛ vlafo lɔ ɔ mi tlɛ nɔ tuun le do nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ nyla ɖo mawu nukunmɛ e a
mi ci kannumɔ ɖɔhun nu nublibliwiwa kpodo nyanya zinzan kpan
e hɛn ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ mi nyi hwɛ sin kannumɔ
sin hwe enɛ ɔ mi jlo setonu kpodo ayixa mi tɔn bi sese kpo nu nukplɔnmɛ mawu tɔn lɛ kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo
enɛ wu ɔ mi lɔ hɛn ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ku ɖo hwɛhuhu sin alixo
gbeta tɛ kɔn mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo wa
din ɔ tamɛ do hwiɖee wu gbɔn xogbe pɔlu tɔn elɔ lɛ sin yɛkan mɛ hwɛhuhu ɖu axɔsu ɖo agbaza mitɔn ku ɔ o setonu nu jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ o hlɔ
mi sixu lɔn bɔ hwɛhuhu ɖu axɔsu hwenu mi nɔ wa nu ɖebu hwɛhuhu gbaza mitɔn nɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa e
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ jo hwɛhuhu sin agbaza alo sin ayi do bɔ e nɔ mi ali nyanya ɖe bɔ nyi lɔ nɔ wɛ a
alo ku ɖo hwɛhuhu sin alixo a
ɖo nɔ wɛ nu mawu ɖo bu ɖe xa klisu jezu e mɛ a
hwɛ mawu kɛ mi gbɔn gblamɛ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ e wu wɛ xosin mitɔn sin
kunnuɖenu tɛ mi jiɖe ɖɔ e hɛn ɔ e lɛkɔ sin hwɛhuhu gudo nugbo
togun jehovah tɔn lɛkɔ sin nu wa cobo wa tuun mawu yi wan jɛ sinsɛn ɛ ji lɛ e gudo
enɛ wu ɔ huzu gbɛzinzan yetɔn
nu mɛ ɖo kɔlɛnti bɔ pɔlu wlan wema lɛ e gege wa e nɛ
mɛ ɖe lɛ nyi lɛ lɛ sunnu nɔ ɖo xa sunnu yetɔn ɖɔhun lɛ lɛ ahannumunɔ lɛ kpo nu mɔhun lɛ kpo
e ɖo co e we ɖe ɖo vo
mawu do ayi mɛ nu pɔlu bɔ e wlan ɖɔ miɖee do wa nu hwɛhuhu azɔwanu nɔ wa nu agɔ lɛ e ɖɔhun o e wa ɔ miɖee jo nu mawu ɖo mɛ sin ku e wɛ nyi miɖee bi jo nu tɔn azɔwanu nɔ wa nu jlɔjlɔ lɛ e ɖɔhun
etɛ mi ɖo kanbyɔ miɖee do tonusise kpodo ayixa mɛtɔn bi sese kpo wu
lɔ wa huzu
jo nu nyanya nɔ wa lɛ e do bɔ e we
sixu mɔ hwiɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɖebu wɛ e tlɛ nyi ɔ ninɔmɛ towe ɖe ɖo fi mi ɖe din e ɖo mawu nukɔn
din mawu tɔn ɖo nu mɛ bi bɔ hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ sixu tiin e ɔ kudeji nɔ hwiɖee do wa nu hwɛhuhu ɖe a a
hwiɖee jo nu mawu mɛ sin ku e ɖɔhun a
bonu mi do sixu wa ɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn mɛ ɖo kɔlɛnti e ɖe lɛ hu lɛ e huhu
enɛ ɔ ɖo taji enyi mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi yi mawu tɔn nugbo bɔ hwɛhuhu kun nyi gan nu mi o ɔ nɛ
mi kudeji setonu kpodo ayixa mi tɔn bi sese kpo gbɔn nu wu mi kpe e bi wiwa nyi alɔ nu hwɛ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ kun nyla o lɛ e gblamɛ a hlɔ
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ klisanwun nyinyi kun nyi ɖɔ e nyi alɔ nu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ huhu kɛɖɛ o
tamɛ do pɔlu wu
mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ e kun hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn xo e ɖɔ ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e o
e ɖo co e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi
e wlan ɖɔ nyɛ ɔ ɖo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ bɔ e sa mi nu hwɛhuhu
xa hlɔmanu lɛ
nu nyi nu mi hwenu mi ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ setonu kpodo ayixa mi tɔn bi sese kpo e
etɛwu jlo nɔ ɖɔ nugbo
nugboɖiɖɔ ɖo nu dodo e byɔ ɖo klisanwun lɛ si lɛ e mɛ xa nunywɛxo efɛzinu lɛ
mi jlo wa nu mɛ enɛ lɛ ɖɔhun a mi nɔ nyi alɔ nu adingban ɖiɖo jaan mɛ
finɛ jɛn nugboɖiɖɔ mitɔn nɔte ɖo a
nugbo mi nɔ ɖɔ e ɖo ɖe mawu tɔn su nukun mitɔn mɛ e
nugboɖiɖɔ hugan adingban gannaganna ɖo gbɔn
nu nyi nugbo a e ɖiɖɔ wɛ nu adingban ɖiɖo
e ɖo co jehovah jlo ɖɔ togun emitɔn wa nu hugan adingban gannaganna ɖo
e ɖɔ nu izlayɛli vi hwexonu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nyi mɛ ɖo nyɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu mitɔn ɔ wɛ nyi
enɛ gudo ɔ e nyinyi tɔn ɖe lɛ
e blawu ɖɔ mɛ kudeji ɖo adingban gannaganna a e ɖe sixu ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ hizi wɛ nɔ ɖo ɖu wɛ fɛɛ
mi kudeji nyi alɔ nu adingban ɖiɖo kpo mɛ hizihizi kpo bi a
ði ɔ nya ɖe ɖɔ nu gan tɔn alo tɔn lɛ ɖɔ emi kun sixu wa sɔ o alo ɖɔ emi yawu yi xwe ɖo dotoo ɖo ganmɛ nu emi wutu
nugbo ɔ dotoo ɖo ganmɛ enɛ ɔ zɛ teninɔ klewun ɖo ɖe xɔ alo dotoo ɔ gbingbɔn blewun su axɔ ɖe wu a
hwɛjijɔ wu e ɖo ɔ mɛ a e kpowun wɛ nyi ɖɔ e mɔ taan do sɔnu nu tomɛyiyi ɖe alo kpla xwedo tɔn yi xuto
xo jɔ xo kpɛɖe sixu ɖo dotoo ɖo ganmɛ xo e ɖɔ e mɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo nugbo ɖɔ wɛ din a
alo mɛ hizi wɛ e ɖe a
enyi e tlɛ ɖo adingban ɖe gannaganna a ɔ weɖexamɛ mawu tɔn ɖɔ hizi miɖee o e lo
ba tɛ mɛ mawu tɔn ɖo mi ɖo
nu ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi mawu tɔn su nukun mitɔn mɛ nugbo ɔ mi wa nu zɛ alɔ nyinyi nu agalilɛ ahannumu alo hwɛ ɖevo mɛ ɖo kɔlɛnti e ɖe lɛ hu lɛ e wu
enyi mi yi gbe nu mawu tɔn nugbo ɔ alɔ kɛɖɛ wɛ mi nyi nu nublibliwiwa a loɔ mi nɔ xa ayiɖeɖayi kwijikwiji sin jlo ɖebu ɖo lanmɛ nu mi e
enyi mi miɖee bi jo kannumɔ ɖɔhun nu nujlɔjlɔwiwa ɔ mi hɔn nu ahannumu kɛɖɛ a loɔ mi nyi alɔ nu ahan nunu ɖibla mu
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi do gan tawun do sixu ahwan xa walɔ nyanya enɛ lɛ mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖu ɖo ahwan enɛ ji
nu gbe mi ɖo nya e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nyi alɔ nu hwɛ ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ kpo ee ɖo gannaganna a lɛ e kpo huhu
mi kpewu wa bɔ nu bi vɔ a
e ɖo co mi ɖo do gan wa pɔlu ɖɔhun
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi tɔn klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ hwɛhuhu ɖu axɔsu ɖo agbaza mitɔn ku ɔ o setonu nu jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ o
hlɔ hwenu mi ɖo ahwan xa hwɛhuhu alɔkpa lɛ bi wɛ e ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mawu mi gbɔn klisu ji e su nukun mitɔn mɛ nugbo
etɛ ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee ɖɔ mawu tɔn su nukun emitɔn mɛ lɛ e
gbɔn mawu tɔn gblamɛ ɔ e hwɛ mitɔn lɛ kɛ mi sixu kpo ɖo kɛ mi wɛ
nu ɖagbe e wa nu mi e su nukun mitɔn mɛ bonu mi do gan ɖu ɖo nu ɖebu mɛ ɖevo sixu ylɔ ɖɔ hwɛ kpɛvi huhu e ji
enyi mi blo ɔ pɔlu ajɔ ɖo mi e ji ɖɔ din ɔ e ɖe sin hwɛhuhu sin acɛ mɛ bɔ ɖo wa nu mawu wɛ
mɛ nɔ zan gbigbɔ ɔ jlo gbɔn lɛ ɔ gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji wɛ ayixa yetɔn nɔ nɔ hlɔ
enyi mi ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖebu ɔ etɛwu hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ gbigbeje sixu hɛn le wa nu mi
klisanwun ɖe sixu jɛ ayi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin nu lɛ ji ji gbɔn
etɛ lɛ wiwa ayi mitɔn bi ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ ji nɔ byɔ
etɛwu hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ ɖo taji tawun nu klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ
xa hlɔmanu lɛ ɖo ku jezu tɔn sin nuwiwa xwewu xwewu tɔn wutu a wa
wemafɔ taji enɛ lɛ tinmɛ klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ nɔ tuun ɖɔ e yi do ɖe emi gbɔn e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbigbɔ nɔ yi gbe do nu gbigbɔ yetɔn ɖɔ e ji
lobɔ wemata enɛ sin wemafɔ nukɔntɔn ɔ do gesi mɛ ɖo bu xa klisu jezu lɛ e
alo e kan klisanwun ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ba nɔ ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e
klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ wɛ wemata enɛ ɖɔ xo tawun
nugbo ɔ nukunɖiɖo yetɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ nyi mawu sin vi lɛ ɖo jixwe
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ ɖo taji nu mɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn lɛ e
hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ ɖo taji nu mɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn lɛ e ɖo mawu nɔ do mɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖo ali ɖe
mi mɔ kunnuɖenu enɛ tɔn ɖokpo ɖo nu pɔlu wlan ɖo wema mɛ tɔn mɛ jɛ nukɔn lɛ e mɛ
ðo wemata ɔ mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ xo do ablaxamu wu
e ɖo co jehovah nuɖiɖi ɖaxo ablaxamu ɖo e wu mɔ ɛ do mɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ
xa hlɔmanu lɛ
ɖokpo ɔ jehovah sixu klisanwun egbe tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ sɔgbe kpo biblu kpo ba nɔ sɔyi ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e do mɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ
enɛ wu ɔ weɖexamɛ e hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ e sixu hɛn le wa nu
nukanbyɔ tɛ ji hlɔmanu lɛ ɖo mi bɔ mi tamɛ do
hlɔmanu lɛ mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ ɔ wa jɛn wɛ
wemafɔ enɛ ɖɔ nuɖiɖo lɛ ɔ e ɖe sin acɛ hɛn do hɛn ɔ tɔn mɛ gbe ɖokpo bɔ ɖo mima ɖo mɛɖee si jijɛ susunɔ mawu vi lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ
ganjɛwu ɖɔ e kpa emi a
weɖexamɛ bɔ nu nyi lɛ e ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ
ðo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ ɔ nu titewungbe tɛ ji pɔlu ɖɔ xo do
hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ zan hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo ɔ jlo gbɔn lɛ e do mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ zan gbigbɔ ɔ jlo gbɔn lɛ e wu
mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ mɛ ɖo nugbo ɔ mɛ lɛ e wɛ e jlɛ do mɛ a lɛ e wu alo mɛ nyi klisanwun a lɛ e wɛ e jlɛ do mɛ nyi lɛ e wu
mɛ ɖo hlɔma lɛ mɛ mawu yi wan ylɔ ɖeɖovo bɔ nyi togun tɔn e bi wlan wema wɛ pɔlu ɖe
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo tɛntin
etɛ nyi tinmɛ xogbe hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ pɔlu zan ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ e tɔn
mi ɖɔ xo do xogbe hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ pɔlu zan e wu
tinmɛ tɔn sixu nyi agbaza mɛtɔn alo akɔ mɛtɔn hlɔ
nu pɔlu wlan do wemata ɔ mɛ e sin tinmɛ hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ tɔn xo e ɖɔ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ e ji
e ɖɔ ɖɔ hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ ɖiɖo ca kan xa jlo nyanya ɖeɖee nɔ wa ɖo agbaza yetɔn bi mɛ e
mɛ ɖeɖee jlo yetɔn lɛ kpo zɛn nɔ ɖo nyi lɛ wutu e kpo nɔ kpa acɛ alo nɔ ayi yetɔn bi ɖo nu enɛ lɛ ji lɛ e wu ɖɔ xo do wɛ e ɖe
ðo taji ɔ mɛ enɛ lɛ wɛ nɔ xwedo jlo nyanya kpo zɛn nɔ ɖo wɛ ɖo xoɖoxamɛ alo nu ɖevo lɛ linu e kpo
etɛwu e sɔgbe ɖɔ e nu klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ lɔ do gbɛzinzan hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo ɔ jlo gbɔn e wu
sixu kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ etɛwu pɔlu awovinu ɖo gbɛzinzan hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo ɔ jlo gbɔn e mɛ e ji nu klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ
awovinu mɔhun ɖe sixu klisanwun ɖeɖee mawu yi gbe ɖɔ nyi emitɔn nɔ do mɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ e ɖo egbe a
e blawu ɖɔ klisanwun ɖebu hɛn ɔ e jɛ zan ji sɔgbe kpo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo e kpo
nu wu mawu zan pɔlu do nu klisanwun lɛ do ayi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin nu lɛ ji e jɛ wexo hlɔ
etɛ lɛ akpagbanumɛ pɔlu tɔn ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ e kan a
akpagbanumɛ enɛ ɔ kpo ɖo ɖo egbe
klisanwun ɖe sixu mawu nu xwe mɔkpan wa jɛ ayi tɔn ɖo nu agbaza tɔn lɛ ji ji
e nyi klisanwun nɔ wa tamɛ do ayiɖeɖayi alo wanyiyi ji hweɖelɛnu e xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe a
mawu lɛ bi wɛ nɔ ɖibla tamɛ do nu enɛ lɛ ji ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ
jezu ɖu nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
lobɔ pɔlu wlan nu do tɛn mɛ xoɖoxamɛ nɔ ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ e wu
nu ji nɔ ɖɔ xo do lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ ayi towe ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ ji wɛ a alo ɖo ninɔmɛ hwɛhuhu tɔn ɔ ji
ðo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ ɔ etɛ nyi tinmɛ ayi ɖo nu ji tɔn
etɛ ɖɔ wɛ pɔlu ɖe do ayi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin nu lɛ ji wu
xokwin glɛkigbe tɔn pɔlu zan e sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi e ayi alo linlin mɛtɔn ɖo nuɖe ji e gba tamɛ blo tuto bɔ nu e blo e ɖo hun mɛ ɖu nu mɛ wɛ
mɛ nɔ zan yetɔn hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo e jlo gbɔn lɛ e nɔ jo yeɖee lɛ do nu jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ
akɔwe ɖokpo ɖɔ do xogbe enɛ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ e wu ɖɔ nɔ linlin yetɔn lɛ ɖo nu kan agbaza lɛ e ji e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ ɖo jlo ɖaxo nu nu enɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo do nu enɛ lɛ ji hwɛhwɛ nɔ nya nu enɛ lɛ gbe nɔ xɔ ɖo nu enɛ lɛ mɛ
e sɔgbe ɖɔ klisanwun ɖo hlɔma lɛ e gbeje nu nɔ mya nukun nu ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ nugbo nugbo e
ɖo zan wɛ hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo ɔ jlo gbɔn e vlafo a ce
e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi lɔ gbeje nu ɖokpo ɔ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
etɛ gbe mi nɔ nya nugbo nugbo ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
mɛɖe lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ ayi ɖo vɛɛn alɔkpa ɖevo nu xwe yetɔn avɔ lɛ xixɔ tomɛyiyi yi gbɔjɛ sin tito biblo kpo nu mɔhun ɖevo lɛ kpo ji
nu enɛ nyla a sixu nɔ nu e nɔ wa ɖo gbɛzan mɛtɔn mɛ lɛ e mɛ
jaan jezu kpo pɔlu kpo nɔ ɖɔ xo do vɛɛn ji hwɛhwɛ nɔ nya vɛɛn gbe nɔ xɔ wɛ a
nu nɔ jlo bɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo hwɛhwɛ e nɛ a
bɔ midɛɛ lɛ
etɛ nɔ mya nukun nu mi hugan ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
etɛwu nu ji mi nɔ ayi mitɔn ɖo e nyi ayihun nu a
e ɖo taji ɖɔ e gbeje mɛɖee
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ enyi ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo hwɛhuhu sin nu lɛ ji ɔ ku wɛ e nɔ kpla mɛ yi
ɖiɖɔ wɛ pɔlu ɖe ɖɔ mɛ jɛ ayi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo e ji ji e wa ku jɛn wɛ a
mɛ ɔ hɛn ɔ e huzu
tamɛ do nya ɖo kɔlɛnti xwedo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo ɔ bɔ e ɖe e sin agun mɛ e ji
e ɖo co e hɛn ɔ e huzu bɔ e huzu nugbo
e xwedo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo e ɖe a lɛkɔ wa ali jlɔjlɔ ɔ ji kɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ akpa pɔlu gba nu mɛ do nu mɛ ayi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo e ji sixu kɔ do e wu e ɖo klisanwun lɛ bɔ blo huzuhuzu ɖebu ɖo dandan lɛ e
enyi e jlo ayi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ mi ɖo e ji a ɔ etɛ e sixu blo
etɛ ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji nyi a
ee pɔlu nu mɛ do ayi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ ɖo e ji gudo e ɔ e mɛ ganjɛwu elɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ e ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji ɔ e nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ nɔ mɔ fifa
mi sixu mɔ ajɔ enɛ gbɔn
ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ tamɛ do biblu wanyiyi e ɖo nu mawu e alo nukunɖiɖo mɛtɔn sɔgudo tɔn ɔ kɛɖɛ ji nɔ ɖɔ xo do nu enɛ lɛ kɛɖɛ ji a
mi flin ɖɔ pɔlu kpo mɛ ɖevo nɔ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ hɛn xomɛ mawu tɔn hun lɛ e kpo zan mɛ bi nɔ zan e ɖo ali gege
mɛ gege wli alɔ ɖo xwedo ayi wa do kpe nukun do yeɖee wu mak
e ɖo co mawu enɛ lɛ lɔn bonu mɔhun mɛ bi nɔ zan e huzu nu ji ayi yetɔn nɔ nɔ hwebinu ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ e a
ee ɔ ɖɔ goxɔ sin wɛ pɔlu nɔ wa e gudo e ɔ e ɖe nu ɖo taji ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ e hwɛhwɛ wɛ e nɔ ayi tɔn ɖo kpo klisanwun tɔn ɔ kpo ji xa
bɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi tɔn sunnu kpo nɔvi tɔn nyɔnu ɖeɖee ɖo hlɔma lɛ ɖɔ wa e nɛ
nugbo ɔ gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji wɛ gbɛzan pɔlu tɔn jinjɔn
enyi mi ayi ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji ɔ mitɔn sixu ci
enyi mi ayi mitɔn bi ɖo gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ ji ɔ etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
xosin hlɔmanu lɛ e ɖo wɛn ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji ɔ e nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ nɔ mɔ fifa
tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi tɛn gbigbɔ do linlin mitɔn ji ɖo wu tɔn lobɔ e sɔgbe xa jlo mawu tɔn kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo
ali tɛ ayi ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji nɔ hɛn fifa wa ɖe
nu mi tamɛ do ganjɛwu nina mɛ xo elɔ ji ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji ɔ e nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ fifa
mɛ gege nɔ jɛ tagba tawun mɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn
hwenu ɖo kan van wɛ mɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn kpo e ɔ midɛɛ lɛ ɖo vivi tɔn ɖu wɛ
fifa mɔhun ɖiɖo sin akpaxwe ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ do gan nɔ nɔ fifa mɛ xa mɛ ɖo xwedo mitɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo
mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo bi wɛ nyi
enyi mi ayi mitɔn ɖo nu ji mi ɖo ɖo e ɔ fifa bunɔ tɛ sin vivi mi sixu ɖu
fifa ɖevo ɖe xɔ akwɛ ɔ bɔ e
enyi mi ayi ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ ji ɔ mi nɔ nɔ fifa mɛ xa mɛ blo mi e
ezayii wlan xogbe ɖe lɛ bɔ sɔgbe xa hwetɔnnu nɔ jɛ ɖo ali gblo ada hu e ɖe ɖo egbe mawu mɛ ɖeji do wu kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo nɔ huzu a ɔ nɔ ɛ ayi jɛ ayi eza xa hlɔmanu lɛ
etɛwu doku nu mawu nu weɖexamɛ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ e
enyi mɛ yi do ɖe wɛ mi nyi alo mi ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ nɔ sɔyi ɖo palaɖisi mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji wɛ ɔ mi sixu doku nu mawu nu weɖexamɛ tɔn ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ e
wusyɛn e do lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi lɔn bonu ninɔmɛ hwɛhuhu tɔn sin nu lɛ jɛ nukɔn ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ o e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
mi mɔ ɖɔ nunywɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi zan sɔgbe kpo xogbe ganjɛwu nina mɛ tɔn elɔ kpo ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo gbigbɔ ɔ sin nu lɛ ji ɔ e nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ nɔ mɔ fifa
enyi mi wa nu gbɔn ɔ ajɔ mavɔmavɔ wɛ mi mɔ ɖo pɔlu wlan ɖɔ axɔ hwɛhuhu nɔ su mɛ ɔ wɛ nyi ku nu mawu nɔ mɛ ɔ wɛ nyi mavɔmavɔ mi ɖo ɖo bu mi ɖe xa klisu jezu aklunɔ mitɔn mɛ e hlɔ
toni ee nɔ wa nukunkpedomɛwu sin e xuxu hɔn ɔ bɔ nawe ɖe sɔ
nawe ɔ zun toni suxo do ɖɔ e kun yawu wa mamaa emitɔn mɛxomɔ ɔ wu nu emi o
toni gbɔhwenu a
e ɖo co e do kɛnklɛn nu nawe ɔ kpo gbe fifa kpo nu mɔjɛmɛ e ɖo a e
ðevo toni wa e ɔ nawe ɔ dohwɛ ɛ kpo xomɛsin kpo
e wa nu gbɔn
e ɖɔ ninɔmɛ ɔ vɛwu tawun
hwɛ tɔn jɔ ɖebu bonu e nyla gbe nu mi a
e ɖo co toni do kɛnklɛn nu nawe ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi mɔ nukunnu jɛ se wɛ e ɖe e mɛ
enyi hwi wɛ ɖo toni tɛnmɛ ɔ ɖɔ emi wa nu gbɔn
tɛnkpɔn fa xomɛ a
e vɛwu nu tawun ɖɔ ɖu ɖo hwiɖee ji wɛ a
nugbo ɔ e sixu nɔ bɔwu bɔ e ci xwii ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee ci ee xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e ɖɔhun lɛ e mɛ
hwenu ɖo mi ɖo wɛ alo e ɖo nuɖɔ mi wɛ e ɔ e nɔ vɛwu tawun ɖɔ mi fa xomɛ
biblu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nyi
xo mawu tɔn tlɛ ca jijɔ enɛ ɖo kpo nunywɛ kpo
mɛɖe ɖo mɛ tuun nu ɖo nunywɛ a
wɛ jaki kanbyɔ
gbɔn ɖagbe e nɔ zan ɔ gblamɛ gbɔn nu e nɔ wa ɖo mɛɖee hwe kpo nunywɛ kpo mɛ lɛ alo kpo xomɛfifa nɔ sin nunywɛ mɛ e kpo nwt gblamɛ ja
ali tɛ xomɛfifa nyi nunywɛ gosin e tɔn ɖe ɖe
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ mawu tɔn enɛ
xomɛfifa sixu bɔ xomɛsin bu
e gbe fifa do xosin mɛ ɔ xomɛ nɔ fa e kan gbe nu mɛ ɔ xomɛsin ɔ ɖe nɔ jɛ ɖe ji nux
loɔ xosin nina mɛ kpo xomɛfifa kpo nɔ xo mɛ hwɛhwɛ
e tlɛ sixu bɔ mɛ ɖo hunnylanyla ji e ɖe byɔ eɖee mɛ
toni ɖesunɔ mɔ ɖo
ee nawe ɔ toni xosin kpo gbe fifa kpo gbɔn e wu e ɔ e avi
e tinmɛ ɖɔ tagba mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo wɛ ɖo do nu emi wɛ
toni ɖekunnu nu nawe ɔ bɔ biblu kplɔnkplɔn ɖe e eɖee wa nu kpo xomɛfifa kpo e wɛ hɛn le enɛ lɛ bi wa
xomɛfifa sixu bɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ
nu nu alo awajijɛnɔ wɛ nu nwt mɛfifa lɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ nyi yetɔn
etɛwu mɛ nɔ fa xomɛ lɛ e nɔ nyi awajijɛnɔ
mɛ nyi lɛ e gege tiin bɔ e sin xomɛfifa do awu ɖɔhun e wutu bɔ ɖo awajijɛ din
yetɔn bɔ tuun ɖɔ sɔgudo jiwu ɖe ɖo emi
adolfo nyi lɛdo tɔn ɖe ɖo espagne e flin gbɛzan tɔn ɖe cobɔ e wa mɔ nugbo ɔ e
adolfo ɖɔ ɖo ɖebu a
nɔ sin xomɛ hwɛhwɛ syɛn bɔ ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖi xɛsi do nɔ wa nu kpo tasyɛnsyɛn kpo kpodo adakaxixo kpan gbɔn e wu
gudo mɛ ɔ nuɖe wa huzu mi
ðo hunxixo ɖe sin hwenu ɔ e xu jivi mi azɔn bɔ ɖi hun ɖibla ku
mɛ gege nɔ jɛ ji tɔn din ɖo e nɔ wa nu kpo wanyiyi kpo kpodo xomɛfifa kpo
adolfo ɖɔ ɖɔ xomɛ hun emi tawun nu huzuhuzu ɖeɖee emi kpewu blo lɛ e
bɔ e doku nu jehovah nu alɔ e do e tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ xomɛfifa tɔn e
xomɛfifa nɔ hun xomɛ nu jehovah
vi yi nunywɛ bonu xomɛ hun mi enɛ ɔ hɛn ɔ kɛnu nu mɛ nɔ ɖo nu ɖɔ wɛ e nux
jehovah ɖo hwɛjijɔ lɛ bi bɔ mɛzunzun mɔhun lɛ sin xomɛ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun nɔ yawu sin xomɛ o
tin hwenu mi do gan wa nu mawu ɖɔhun nɔ yawu sin xomɛ a nɔ fa xomɛ e ɔ ali nunywɛ tɔn wɛ mi nɛ bɔ e nɔ hun xomɛ nu jehovah tawun efɛ
e ɖo co enɛ bɔ klisanwun ɖe gɔn xomɛ fa a
xo mawu tɔn flin mi ɖɔ nunywɛ gosin e nɔ xo fifa kan nɔ nɔ ji
ja nwt enyi mi nɔ fa xomɛ nɔ nɔ ji ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo nunywɛ mawu tɔn
nunywɛ mɔhun mi bɔ hwenu e do xomɛsin xomɛ nu mi e ɔ mi wa nu kpo xomɛfifa kpo bɔ enɛ tlɛ bɔ mi sɛkpɔ jehovah nyi jɔtɛn nunywɛ mavɔmavɔ tɔn e
enyi mɛɖe do xomɛsin xomɛ nu alo wa nu sɔgbe a e nu ɔ etɛ sixu bɔ ɖu ɖo hwiɖee ji wa nu hun xomɛ nu jehovah e
tamɛ do nugbododo xɔ akwɛ elɔ lɛ ji
mɛ gege nɔ xomɛfifa do mɔ ganmaɖo
nɔ ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe ɖɔ emi ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ ɖo nylahun
gbigbɔ elɔ tɔn sin wɛ nu linlin mɔhun e nyi nunywɛ gosin e a
nɔ xomɛfifa do mɔ hlɔnhlɔn tɔn ɖe a alo ganmaɖo tɔn
nɔ yi ji tamɛ
enyi mi ɖɔ xo hwenu mi kpo ɖo xomɛsin ji e ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ nu wa nu mi ɖo nukɔnmɛ lɛ e
enyi mi tamɛ cobo ɖɔ xo ɔ mi tuun xo mi ɖɔ lɛ e wa nu kpo xomɛfifa kpo bɔ enɛ sixu bɔ mɛ ɖe ɔ wa nu e
xomɛ yiyawu sin wa nu do wu gbɔn
sixu myɔ nukun do agɔ e jɛ do mi e bonu fifa do sixu tiin a nux
nɔ xoðɛ hwɛhwɛ
nɔ xoɖɛ nɔ byɔ gbigbɔ nyi hlɔnhlɔn hugan hlɔnhlɔn lɛ bi ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ e
ðɛxixo jehovah magbokɔ mi tawun ɖo taji ɔ hwenu ninɔmɛ lɛ syɛn e wɛ adolfo flin
nɔ xoɖɛ hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ jehovah gbeje ayi kpo linlin lɛ kpo a
hwɛ alɔkpa tɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖo weɖexamɛ ɖo matie mɛ e mɛ
hwɛgbe ɖeɖee mɛ e kan tlɔlɔ lɛ e sixu ɖeɖɛ ɖo yeɖee tɛntin e xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe
hwɛ ɔ syɛn bɔ enyi e ɖeɖɛ a ɔ e sixu ɖe mɛ sin agun mɛ
ði ɔ hwɛ ɔ sixu nyi jidomɛ alo e sixu nyi mɛtitafu sin xo wex
sixu wa nu elɔ lɛ nɔ xa kpo ayixa ɖokpo kpo nɔ nukplɔnmɛ sixu zan lɛ e nɔ kan nuɖe lɛ byɔ hwiɖee ɖi sixu zan nu elɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
nɔ zan azɔwanu ɖe lɛ e do do nu nu do nu xa tlolo e ji wex
nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo ɖɔ sin ku wa tiin nɔ ɖe ɖaxo klisanwun ɖe sixu mɔ hwenu mɛ ku e siin a
ablaxamu ale hwenu sala ku e
bib nwt e wa ya ɔ aluwɛ ɔ nɔ ɖekpo wex
wɛnsagun ɖeɖee ɖo kun susu do nu jeluzalɛmu mɛ ɖo kun susu do nu nyanya sataan tɔn mɛ ɖo haamagedɔni hwenu e wɛ nɔte
ðo hwe mitɔn ɔ nya nuwlannu go mɛ e nɔte nu jezu klisu e wɛ nɔ ɖo wuntun mɛ gan lɛ e wex
e xo nu elɔ lɛ zlɛ gblegble nu ɖeɖee ji e wlan do lɛ e tɔn ɖi kpo anyu kpo gbeklanxamɛ lɛ kpo sinsɛngan lɛ kpo tɔn su kun tɔn do mɛɖe lɛ tɛnkpɔn ɖyɔ wɛn e wex
ali tɛ lɛ klisanwun ɖe sixu hɛn gbɛzan tɔn bɔkun ɖe
nu hudo nugbo nugbo lɛ e tɔn ɖe akwɛzinzan ɖo dandan a lɛ e sin mɛ
ðeɖɛ nu ɖeɖee nɔ zan a lɛ e ɖeɖɛ axɔ ɖo kɔ towe lɛ e bi

tɛnkpɔn ɖɔ xo xa mɛkuku lɛ nyi kpo lɛ kpo nɔ yi kuxwe lɛ nɔ fimu baɖabaɖa lɛ
