xwe wo jɛn ɖo jɛ nu dosin ji
jɛ azɔ ji bɔ zaan ɔ e yi hun bi
nukɔnmɛ ɔ jɛ gee e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ e ji
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ jɛ ahan syɛnsyɛn ji
e nɔ vivi ɖo mɛ a co enyi e mu ɔ e nɔ wa nu do mɛ wu gbɔn e nɔ nukun mɛ
yi wan nu nuxixo kpo weɖuɖu kpo
hweɖebunu kpewu e ɔ nɔ yi kpacaɖuɖu lɛ tɛnmɛ kpo fi e nɔ ɖuwe ɖe zanmɛ lɛ e kpo
nɔ hɔn sin xwegbe zanmɛ nɔ lɛkɔ wa cobɔ ayi nɔ
nu nɔ cikɔ nu mi bi ayihɔngbe tɔn bɔ nɔ gɔn hwɛhwɛ
enyi wa yi gbeɖe ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ nɔ ahan syɛnsyɛn ɖo gbɔjɛ hwenu lɛ
xwe gudogudo tɔn blo ɖo e ɔ ɖebu a
ðo nɔ tuun ba mɛ nyi gbevun ɖo e a wutu ɔ e tawun ɖo
mi ɖɔ jlɛ bɔ hɔn sin xwegbe
yi ci sunnu nu taan ɖe
axansuxo wɛ nɔ sa gee nyi ɖaxo bɔ e tuun
e lin cobɔ mɔ xo a bɔ ji vi sunnu mitɔn hwenu ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ e
xo go jehovah tɔn lɛ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu ɖo xwe gbe e nɔ yi vinɔ a lɛ e kpo vi yetɔn lɛ kpo do e ɖe gbe e
xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ wɛ mɔ xɔ ɖokpo nu mi do finɛ
nyɔnu we nɔ wa vinɔ ɖe lɛ hwɛhwɛ
gbe ɖokpo ɔ jɛ xa ji
linlin wɛ nyi ɖɔ ma ɖɔ kun ɖo nugbo ɖɔ wɛ o
biblu do sinkɔn nu nukanbyɔ tobutobu lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kpo fifa kpo zawe
xomɛ tawun keya nu mɛ bɔ e dɔn mi tawun
enɛ wu ɔ nyi lɔ yi gbe biblu xa
e lin a bɔ nuɖe ɖo biblu mɛ ɖyɔ gbɛzan
sin hwenu ɖo vu e ɔ nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu ku
jaan ɔ ɖɔ mawu nɔ kpe nukun do nyiɖesu mɛtun ɔ wu
xogbe ɖo jelemii mɛ lɛ e byɔ ayi mɛ tawun e ɖɔ ðo nyɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ tuun tito ɖo nu e fifa wɛ ɖo nu e nyi nu nyanya wɛ ɖo nu a bonu sɔ nu
jɛ nu ɖi ji ɖɔ hɛn ɔ ɖo nukunɖiɖo nɔ ɖo palaɖisi mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji sɔyi ðɛhan
jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖe wanyiyi jɔ wanyiyi mi
azɔn nukɔntɔn yi kple yetɔn lɛ e ɔ mɔ wanyiyi ɖaxo ɖo tɛntin yetɔn dɔn mɛ tawun
jaan enɛ ɔ gbɔn vo tawun nu mɛ lɛ wa nu xa mi gbɔn ɖo amisaxwe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖe mɛ e
lɛ do ninɔmɛ lɛ wu a yi mi tawun
zan hwenu yetɔn do mɛ kpe nukun do wu ye keya nu mi mi ɖo ali gege
mɔ ɖɔ ɖo xwedo wanyiyinɔ ɖaxo ɖe mɛ
biblu jɛ kpinkplɔn ji e bɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo blo huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ ɖo gbɛzan mɛ do sɔgbe xa nugbododo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn mawu tɔn titewungbe lɛ
e bɔwu nu mi nu ɖo azɔ nunu a
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ nuxixo ɖe lɛ nɔ bɔ nunu nɔ jlo mi enɛ wu ɔ ɖyɔ nuxixo nɔ se lɛ e
ðo jlo ɖo ayi wutu ɔ nɔ yi kpacaɖuɖu lɛ tɛnmɛ kpo fi e nɔ ɖuwe ɖe zanmɛ lɛ e kpo a ɖo ahan nunu taa jlo mi wutu
ɖevo ɖeɖee jijɔ yetɔn mi ɖo gbɛzan ɔ mɛ lɛ e do xa nunywɛxo
hwenɛnu ɔ lɔ jɛ biblu xa jehovah tɔn lɛ ji
ee lɛ biblu do xosin nu nukanbyɔ tɔn lɛ e ɔ e lɔ mɔ ɖɔ nugbo wɛ nyi nu wɛ emi ɖe e
e blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo lɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ e jo adakaxixo sin e nɔ do e do jo jaguda sin e nɔ wa e do ɖo nunu
do jehovah nukunmɛ bi ɔ mi mɛ we lɛ mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo jla nublibliwiwa sin zan wɛ mi ɖe e ɖo ɖo ninɔmɛ wa ɖagbe nu vi sunnu mitɔn e ɖe
mi wli alɔ ɖo
flin ɖɔ nɔ xota atɔxwɛ kpo reveillez vous
kpo tɔn ɖɔ xo do mɛ ɖeɖee kpewu blo huzuhuzu blo lɛ e tɔn ji lɛ e
yetɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi tawun
mɔ hlɔnhlɔn kpo ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ jo gbe gbeɖe a
nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah ɖɔ nu cikɔ do wu ye o
nyɛ kpo kpo blo baptɛm huzu jehovah tɔn ɖo juillet
zunzun xa jehovah mawu hwlɛn gan
jehovah nɔ gudo nu nyi kpo kpo ɖo hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ
alɔdido vi sunnu mitɔn kpo vi nyɔnu mitɔn kpo bonu tuun jehovah nyi ɖɔhun mi awajijɛ
din ɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖokpo ɔ hwenu mɔ ɖɔ vi yetɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo wɛ ɖo mawu tuun wɛ e
nɔ nɔ zanwunzɛn nɔ ɖo adohu adohu ji do sɔgudo alo ku wu ɖe a
kpo nyi kpo nɔ hɛn alɔnu mitɔn jan bi ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ nɔ yi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu agun jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn vovo lɛ
mi nɔ nu nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ enyi ɖi nu nu jezu ɔ lɔ sixu ɖu vivi mavɔmavɔ tɔn
jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖe e
nu dɔhun henɔci
henɔci tawun
e sixu vɛwu bɔ mi ɖi nu nya enɛ nɔ nu xwe xwe nabi e nɔ ɖo egbe e donu ɛnɛ jɛji wɛ nyi enɛ
ɖo hwetɔnnu ɔ e do mɛxo ɖe a
ðo hwe enɛ ɖo xwe kanweko donu jɛji ɖie ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ tawun hu egbe
adamu nukɔntɔn ɔ nɔ nu xwe jɛji cobɔ e wa ji henɔci blo xwe ɖevo
kunkan adamu tɔn ɖe lɛ tlɛ hu lɔ
enɛ wu ɔ henɔci ɖo xwe co e sixu ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ganji ci mɛ kpo ɖo anyu mɛ e ɖɔhun
henɔci tɔn ɖo axɔ
do nukun mɛ e ɖo hinhɔn wɛ ɖo mɛ e do wɛn mawu tɔn zaanɖe din lɛ e wa nu gbɔn e wutu
xomɛ sin tawun
mɛ enɛ lɛ wan
wan nu wɛn tɔn wan nu mawu ɛ do e
sixu wa nuɖe nu jehovah mawu henɔci tɔn a e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hɛn ɔ nu xa eyɛ
boya henɔci nɔ kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ emi wa mɔ xwedo emitɔn gbeɖe a ji
e flin asi tɔn kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn lɛ kpo vi sunnu tɔn mɛtucɛlaxi alo vivu tɔn lamɛki wɛ a
vɔ jɛn e vɔ nɛ a
biblu tinmɛ mɛ alɔkpa henɔci nyi e a
akpaxwe biblu tɔn klewun klewun atɔn jɛn ɖɔ xo kpɛɖe do wu tɔn
eblee lɛ judi e ɖo co wemafɔ atɔn enɛ lɛ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ nya ɖaxo ɖe wɛ
nɔ kpe nukun do xwedo ɖe wu wɛ a
nu tuun ɖɔ e sɔgbe e wiwa hɛn tagba wa nu a
enyi mɔ hun nuɖiɖi henɔci tɔn sixu nu tawun
lɛ ɖo nu nyanya wa wɛ hwenu e ji henɔci e
jijimɛ tɛnwegɔ ɔ wɛ ɖo kunkan adamu tɔn mɛ
ɔ agbaza adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖo hɛn e lin do jijimɛ enɛ a
nu wu lɛ nɔ hwe ɔ e nɛ
ninɔmɛ yetɔn nyla tawun ɖo walɔ kpo gbigbɔ kpo lixo
adakaxixo kpe fi bi
nu enɛ jijimɛ wegɔ ɔ ji hwenu hu nɔvi tɔn abɛli e
e ci ɖɔ vivu tɔn ɖe tlɛ go ɖɔ emi nyi kpo kpo hu
ðo jijimɛ atɔngɔ ɔ hwenu ɔ nunyanyawiwa ɖe lɛ jɛ nyikɔ jehovah tɔn ylɔ ji nɔ blo do ɛ wɛ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nɔ zan nyikɔ mawu tɔn kpo mɛmasi kpo nɔ nyla do wu tɔn
e ci ɖɔ sinsɛn blibli alɔkpa enɛ gbakpe ɖo henɔci sin hwenu
enɛ wu ɔ ee henɔci ɖo wɛ e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e wa gbeta ɖe kɔn
e wa nu mɛ lɛ nɔ wa gbɔn ɖo hwetɔnnu e wɛ a
alo e jehovah mawu nugbo ɔ ee blo jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo e mɔ wɛ a
akpakpa ɛ do nu kpinkplɔn do abɛli wu wu eyɛ jehovah e jɛxa gbɔn e ku do tɔn mɛ
henɔci ɖɔ ɖɔ emi wa nu eɖɔhun
ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ e nɔ yi xa mawu
xogbe nukunɖeji enɛ ɖɔ henɔci nyi nya ɖe ɖo nɔ si mawu a e ɖe mɛ
e wɛ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn wu biblu ɖɔ nu mɔhun do e
wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖokpo ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ henɔci kpo ɖo yiyi xa jehovah wɛ hwenu e ji vi sunnu tɔn mɛtucɛlaxi gudo e
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu henɔci ɖo xwe e ɔ e nyi ɖe
e ɖo asi ɖokpo mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ nyikɔ tɔn a ji vi sunnu ji vi nyɔnu
enyi ɖe nɔ yi xa mawu nɔ kpe nukun do xwedo ɖe wu ɔ e ɖo tɛnkpɔn xwedo ɔ ɖo ali mawu tɔn ji
henɔci mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ jehovah ɖo nukun ɖɔ emi nɔ gbeji nu asi emitɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e wa nu wu e kpe e bi nu vi tɔn lɛ do jehovah mawu wu
etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
biblu ɖɔ nu ɖe a
e ɖɔ nu ɖebu do nuɖiɖi henɔci sin vi mɛtucɛlaxi tɔn wu a e wɛ hu mɛ bi bɔ biblu ɖɔ nɔ jɛ xwe mɛ sinvɔgbɛ ɔ wa e
lamɛki wa su ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo ɖe
jehovah do ayi mɛ ɖɔ ɖe do vi tɔn nɔwee wu bɔ enɛ wa jɛnu ɖo sinvɔgbɛ ɔ gudo
e ɖɔ do nɔwee lɔ wu ɖɔ e nɔ yi xa mawu daagbo daagbo tɔn henɔci ɖɔhun
nɔwee mɔ henɔci a
henɔci jo gu ɖaxo ɖe do
nɔwee sin lamɛki alo tɔn mɛtucɛlaxi alo boya henɔci sin yɛlɛdi ku hwenu nɔwee ɖo xwe e wɛ sixu nu nɔwee do gu enɛ wu
tamɛ do vogbingbɔn ɖo henɔci kpo adamu kpo tɛntin e wu
adamu nyi mɛ co e hu hwɛ do jehovah jo kpo yajiji kpo sin gu do nu kunkan tɔn
henɔci nyi co e yi xa mawu jo nuɖiɖi sin gu do nu kunkan tɔn
adamu ku hwenu henɔci ɖo xwe e
hwenu adamu ku e ɔ xwedo tɔn nɔ aluwɛ mɛ nu enɛ nyi cejɛnnabinɔ tawun e wɛ a
mi tuun a
e nyi gbɔn ɖebu ɔ henɔci nɔ yi xa mawu
enyi ɖo nukun kpe do xwedo ɖe wu wɛ hun ɖo ayi nu nuɖiɖi henɔci tɔn sixu e wu
e ɖo taji ɖɔ kpe nukun do xwedo towe wu ɖo agbaza lixo co e ɖo taji hugan ɖɔ kpe nukun do wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
timɔtee nu nɔ ɖɔ e kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ su do enɛ a loɔ nu nɔ wa lɛ e lɔ nɔ su do enɛ
enyi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn yi xa mawu henɔci ɖɔhun jo nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ do bɔ ali ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ ɔ hwi lɔ jo gu xɔ akwɛ ɖe do nu xwedo towe enɛ wɛ nyi xɔ akwɛ xwedo e
henɔci sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖo enɛ mɛ
mawu tɔn jehovah wu tɔn a
hwenu wa su bɔ jehovah ɖɔ xo xa tɔn enɛ
mawu do wɛn ɖe henɔci ɖɔ e yi do hwenɛnu tɔn lɛ
mɛ ɔ e henɔci gbeyiɖɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi gbeyiɖɔ nukɔntɔn sin wɛn e ɖo biblu mɛ e
etɛ nyi henɔci tɔn ɔ
e ɖɔ gbɔn e ɖie
aklunɔ kpo wɛnsagun tɔn wɔbuwɔbu lɛ kpo ja ɖɔhwɛ xa mɛ bi ɖo hwɛ nu mɛdida lɛ bi blo ɖo nu nyanya mɛdida lɛ wa hwenu gu do mawu ji lɛ bi kpodo xo baɖabaɖa enɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu mawu a lɛ ɖɔ do mawu wu ɔ bi kpo wutu
wɛn enɛ dido mɛ jlo se lɛ e bi ci nu henɔci
ðo ayi ɖo akpagbanumɛ ɔ wu e wu
henɔci zan xogbe nu nyanya gu do mawu ji kpo xo baɖabaɖa kpo do ɖe nuwiwa mɛ lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ do nu enɛ lɛ sin gbɔn e kpo
mɛ ɔ ɔ lɛ bi ɖɔ mɛ ɖe sin hwenu e nya mɛ nukɔntɔn lɛ sin edɛni mɛ e gble bi
adla ɖaxo ɖe jɛ enɛ ji hwenu jehovah wa kpo wɛnsagun tɔn wɔbuwɔbu lɛ kpo su kun do e
henɔci ɖi xɛsi ɖebu cobo jla akpagbanumɛ mawu tɔn enɛ a bɔ eɖokponɔ gee wɛ wa
vlafo dɔnkpɛvu lamɛki mɔ akɔnkpinkpan daagbo tɔn ɖo e jiwu
e nyi hun nu wu wɛ e ɖo wɛn
nuɖiɖi henɔci tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ xa mawu do elɔ wu a ji
hwɛɖonumɛ henɔci jla kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo e kpo ɖo e nyi gbɔn nu henɔci hwenu tɔn e ɔ ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu egbe tɔn
sɔgbe kpo akpagbanumɛ henɔci tɔn kpo ɔ jehovah sinvɔgbɛ ɔ do su kun do nu nyanya nɔwee hwenu tɔn
gbɛvivɔ enɛ ɔ nyi ɖe nu gbɛvivɔ ɖaxo jawe e
matie egbe ɖesu ɔ mawu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ e kpo wɛnsagun tɔn wɔbuwɔbu lɛ kpo hwɛjijɔ do su kun do nu nyanya elɔ
ðokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo hɛn akpagbanumɛ henɔci tɔn do ayi mɛ ma xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
hɛnnumɔ mitɔn kpo mitɔn lɛ kpo sixu klan gbe xa mi
mi sixu mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo miɖokpo hweɖelɛnu
jehovah jo henɔci do gbeɖe a egbe ɖesu ɔ e jo tɔn lɛ do gbeɖe a
gbɛzan henɔci tɔn wa fo gbɔn
ðo ali ɖe ɔ ku tɔn bu do kpaca mɛ hu gbɛzan tɔn
wema tɔn ɖɔ kpowun ɖɔ henɔci nɔ yi xa mawu
mɛɖe mɔ ɛ a ɖo mawu ɛ yi
ali tɛ mawu henɔci yi ɖe
lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖo eblee lɛ mɛ ɖɔ mawu henɔci yi jixwe
nu sixu nyi a
ðo eblee lɛ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖyɔ tɛnmɛ nu henɔci bonu e mɔ ku o
etɛ nyi tinmɛ enɛ tɔn
jehovah sixu blo bɔ henɔci ku mɔ ku sin ɖebu
jɛ nukɔn ɔ henɔci sin nu mawu nukunmɛ alo mɔ kunnuɖenu ɔ ɖɔ nu emitɔn mawu nukunmɛ nwt
cobonu henɔci ku ɔ mawu sixu ɛ ayikungban ɔ ɖo numimɔ ɖe mɛ nyi palaɖisi ɖe
henɔci sin nu jehovah nukunmɛ e sin kunnuɖenu gbɛɖe enɛ wɛ ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ bɔ e bɔnu
pɔlu wlan do henɔci kpo sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖevo lɛ kpan wu ɖɔ nuɖiɖi mɛ wɛ bi ku do
eblee lɛ ðo nukɔnmɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ sixu cyɔ tɔn mɔ ɛ a vlafo ɖo jehovah blo bɔ e bu bonu xo daka cyɔ ɔ wu alo do nɔ gudo nu vodunsinsɛn o
nu mi hɛn mɔjɛmɛ enɛ lɛ jinjɔn mawuxowema ɔ ji e mɛ tɛnkpɔn do nukun gbɛzan henɔci tɔn sixu fo gbɔn e mɛ
flin ɖɔ ali ɖokpo jɛn nu sixu nyi ɖe henɔci ɖo wezun ji bɔ nu ɖibla cikɔ bi
tɔn lɛ ɖo nyinya ɛ wɛ jɛma bi ɖo wɛn hwɛɖonumɛ tɔn e do e wu
henɔci mɔ fi ɖe hwla do gbɔjɛ kpɛɖe e tuun ɖɔ emi kun sixu nɔ finɛ nu hwenu gege o
ku baɖabaɖa ɖe ɖo wan do e wɛ
ee e ɖo gbigbɔjɛ wɛ e ɔ e xoɖɛ mawu tɔn
enɛ gudo ɔ e mɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn ɖaxo ɖe
henɔci mɔ numimɔ jiwu ɖe ci ɖɔ tɛn tɔn mɛ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔhun
e ci ɖɔ ku baɖabaɖa ɖe wɛ ɖo wan do henɔci wɛ hwenu jehovah ɛ yi e
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo numimɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ e mɔ ɖe gbɔn vo bi nu ee e tuun e
e ci ɖɔ enɛ ɔ ɖɛkpɛ jikpa edɛni tɔn ɖɔhun bɔ ɖebu ɖo wɛ bonu byɔ mɛ o a
sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee lanmɛ ɖo ganji bɔ ɖo anyu mɛ lɛ e wɛ mɛ
bi ɖo fifa mɛ
wangbɛnumɛ kpo yadonumɛ sinsɛn tɔn kpo henɔci tuun ganji e ɖebu ɖo finɛ a
henɔci mɔ ganjɛwu jehovah tɔn wanyiyi tɔn mɔ ɖɔ nu emitɔn nukun tɔn mɛ
e mɔ ɖɔ fi enɛ wɛ jɛxa emi
ee fifa ayi mɛ tɔn henɔci ɖo e ɖo jijɛji wɛ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe e ɔ e myɔ nukun tɔn lɛ wli amlɔ
finɛ wɛ e ku jɛ jɛ egbe ɖo flin jehovah mawu tɔn ɖo dogbo a e mɛ
jezu tɔn gbɔn ɖo nukɔnmɛ e ɔ hwe ɔ wa su bɔ mɛ ɖo flin mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e se klisu sin gbe sin yɔdo yetɔn lɛ mɛ hun nukun yetɔn lɛ do ɖagbeɖagbe mɛ fifa e ɖe mɛ jaan
jlo nɔ finɛ a
nu ci nu hwenu xo go henɔci e
do nukun nu ɖagbeɖagbe ɖeɖee e sixu mi lɛ e mɛ
enyi nu ɖeɖee mɛ mi do nukun ɖɔ do gbɛzan tɔn sin vivɔnu wu lɛ e nyi nugbo ɔ e sixu ɖɔ nu mi
nuɖe tiin bɔ gbɛzan tɔn ɖo yawu mi din
ee pɔlu ɖɔ xo do henɔci wu gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu mɛɖe ɖo nuɖiɖi a ɔ nu tɔn sixu mawu nukunmɛ a
eblee lɛ hwɛjijɔ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi nu mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo bɔ mi ɖi nu henɔci ɖɔhun a ce
akɔwe biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ wema gosin mawu a bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ wema henɔci tɔn e mɛ wɛ judi ɖe xogbe tɔn lɛ sin wema wu e sixu ɖeji do a e ɖe wɛ wema enɛ nyi bɔ e kpla kɔ nu henɔci kpowun
henɔci tɔn sɔgbe e wɛ ɖo wema ɔ mɛ fi mi tuun egbe a e ɖe wɛ e ɖe sin e sixu nyi wema e wlan e ɖe alo e nɔ kpi nu mɛ e ɖe
fi ɖokpo ɔ wɛ judi sixu ɖe xo sin alo jezu wɛ nu do henɔci wu ɖo hwenu jezu ɖo jixwe e ɔ e mɔ henɔci zan gbɔn e
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ mawu blo nu cyɔ mɔyizi kpo jezu kpo tɔn bonu e do wa nu masɔgbe mɔhun lɛ o luki judi
nyɔnuvi ɖe mɔ bɔ azizɔ ɖo sin azɔgo ɖaxo ɖe tɔn lɛ mɛ wɛ nɔ blo nu ɖɔhun
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ klewun mɔhun yɔkpɔvu ɖe ɖo e sixu bɔ e
e ɖo co nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ ɖaxo ɖe ɖiɖo sixu wa nu do gbɛzan mitɔn wu
ði ɔ enyi e xa wema tinmɛ e zan ɖe gbɔn e ganji cobo zan a ɔ e sixu se xɔxɔ tɔn
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ ɖiɖo do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji tlɛ sixu nyla hu
ði ɔ mɛɖe lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo agɔ
jaan mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu a e wa ɔ nu jezu mɛ lɛ e bi
nɔ xa biblu ɔ nɔ tɔn a
nu mi ɖo nɔ wa e nɛ
e sixu wa jɛ bɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ do nu xa e ɖe wu a
e nɔ xa mɛ gege
mi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo e atɔn
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ xogbe jezu tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɖo agɔ ɖi xɛsi nu mawu ɖo acɛ sixu dɔn kpodo agbaza kpo bi do zojimaci mɛ e
matie nɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu nɔ dɔn to nu mɛ nyanya lɛ ɖo hɛhɛ ɖe mɛ
biblu tinmɛ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ mɛkuku lɛ ɔ tuun nuti a bɔ mɛ ɔ sixu se ɖe a
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo ɖi xɛsi tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi ɖo sisi nu mawu ɖo nu mi mɔ mavɔmavɔ sin ajɔ yi kpo mi gbɔ kpo ɔ e wɛ nɔ ɖɔ
e myɔ do fyɔ ayikungban ɔ wɛ a
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ xogbe biblu tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɖo agɔ nu bi wɛ ɖo hwenu
hwenu e jɔ do ɔ ɖe bɔ hwenu e ku do e ɖe
nɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ mawu wlan hwenu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ku do e do ji tɔn
mɛ ɖe nɔ ɖo kuku wɛ bɔ mɛ ɖe nɔ ɖo wa wɛ e xo ɖɔ wɛ wemafɔ enɛ ɖe kpowun ɖɔ ku ɖo mɛ bi
sisi ɖo nu xo mawu tɔn mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu walɔ nyanya lɛ ɖi ahannumu kpo nublibliwiwa kpo kɔlɛntinu lɛ
loɔ mawu do akpa ɖɔ emi kun yi gbe gbeɖe bɔ e su kun do nu ayikungban elɔ o
mawu ɖo ayikungban ɔ ɖo dodo tɔn ji bɔ e danwu alo e tɛn gbeɖe a
ðɛhan ezayii nyanya lɛ kpo nu nyanya lɛ kpo wɛ wa vivɔnu sɔyi ci nu ɖɔ myɔ wɛ e ze do su kun yetɔn do ɖɔhun e nyi ayikungban ɔ wɛ a
enyi e ɖɔ jinukunsin ɔ e sixu nɔte nu wɛkɛ ɔ fi sunvi lɛ ɖe e alo fi mawu nɔ nɔ e
e su kun do nu nu enɛ lɛ ɖe a
wa yi lɛ e gbɔn e ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ do nu xa ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e wu
etɛwu mawu lɔn bɔ nu nɔ nyi
mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi mawu jɛn ɖo nunywɛ hu mɛ bi tuun nu bi ɔ e sixu mi wema ɖo wɛn bɔ mɛ lɛ bi mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ faa e ɖe
aniwu e wa a
mi hwɛjijɔ wu e nɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ do biblu wu hwɛhwɛ e atɔn
e wlan biblu ɔ bonu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yeɖee hwe nɔ jlo nu lɛ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ
luki e wlan biblu ɔ ɖo ali ɖe bɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo linlin sɔgbe lɛ e jɛn mɔ nukunnu jɛ wɛn e mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yigo lɛ e nɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ do biblu ɔ wu bɔ jijɔ enɛ wɛ lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nɔ yawu ɖo
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo jijɔ vi ɖo tɔn lɛ hwenu ɖo biblu ɔ xa wɛ e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ yeɖee hwe bɔ akpakpa nɔ do nu kpinkplɔn wu lɛ e ɔ nɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖagbe hugan ɔ do wɛn mawu tɔn wu
mawu sɔnu nu biblu ɔ kpo tuuntuun kpo tawun
mɛ ɖeɖee jlo nugbo nugbo ɖɔ mawu emi bonu emi mɔ nukunnu jɛ biblu ɔ mɛ lɛ e wɛ e wlan
jezu ɖɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo hudo alɔdo tɔn do sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mɛ wɛ e ɖe e mɛ
mɔ alɔdo ɔ gbɔn
jezu tinmɛ ɖɔ ɔ gbigbɔ ɔ ɖo nyikɔ mɛ e wɛ e nu bi
jaan enɛ wu ɔ mawu nɔ gbigbɔ tɔn e wɛ nyi hlɔnhlɔn tɔn aditi e nɔ do e do mɛ lɛ bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu nɔ xa ɖo biblu mɛ e mɛ
e ɖo co mawu nɔ tɛ gbigbɔ tɔn mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖeji do wu tɔn bonu e a lɛ e enɛ wu ɔ biblu ɔ nɔ do hwɛhwɛ
gbigbɔ ɔ nɔ klisanwun mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu ganji lɛ e bɔ nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo biba wɛ ba mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mɛ lɛ e
akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ hwenu e jɛxa do e jɛn lɛ sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ
ði ɔ e ɖɔ nu gbeyiɖɔ daniyɛli ɖɔ e wlan wɛn ɖe do sɔgudo wu
mɛ gege xa wema biblu tɔn nɔ nyi daniyɛli e ɖo xwe kanweko mɔkpan sin avlamɛ cobo mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ganji a
nugbo ɔ daniyɛli tlɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu eɖesu wlan e ɖe lɛ mɛ a
e eɖee hwe yi gbe ɖɔ nyɛ daniyɛli se xo enɛ lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ a
gudo mɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ mawu tɔn daniyɛli wlan e wu ganji hwenu mawu ɖɔ nu nyi do e jɛn nu sixu nyi
e mɔ nukunnu jɛ wɛn mawu tɔn lɛ mɛ
mɛdida sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mɛ a lɛ kpo ɖo nu nyanya yetɔn lɛ dosin wɛ
daniyɛli enɛ wu ɔ akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ mawu nɔ sin tinmɛ yetɔn ji cobonu hwenu e jɛxa do e nɔ su a
hwenu ɔ ee su a e bɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ do biblu wu a
enyi hwenu mawu ɖo do e wa su bɔ nu lɛ zawe ɔ lɛ nɔ jla mɔjɛmɛ yetɔn lɛ ɖo tlolo
mɛ ɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ emi nɔ wa nu klisu tɔn lɛ ɖɔhun yedɛɛ lɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe nɔ jla linlin yetɔn lɛ ɖo hweɖebunu jezu nu nu e
linlin nyɔnuvi ɖe ɖo do fi lɛ nɔ gosin e wu bɔ e e sixu nyi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ klewun ɖe kpowun
e ɖo co nu biblu nɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖo taji nu tawun
wɛn ɖo biblu mɛ e ɖo taji bɔ mɛɖe sixu ɖɔ emi tɛnkpɔn mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ emiɖokponɔ a
enɛ wu ɔ alɔdo ba mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu xa wɛ a ɖe e mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yeɖee hwe nɔ biblu lɛ e mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖeji do gbigbɔ mawu tɔn wu do sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ biblu ɔ mɛ lɛ e mɛ ɖeɖee kudeji ɖɔ taan mɛ mawu jlo ɖɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ biblu ɔ mɛ hu tɔn e mɛ wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e
ðɔ xo xa jehovah tɔn lɛ alo xa nu do ganji lɛ e ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn jw org ji
biblu ɖɔ nutuuntuun ɖɔ e wa alɔ nu emi enɛ ɔ mɔ nu jɛ e nɔ tuun mawu gbɔn e wu nunywɛxo
ɔ bi ɖo mɔ wɛ mawu wɛ a
nu biblu ɖɔ e
nu ɖevo tɛ biblu sixu mi
sataan awovi axɔsu elɔ tɔn ɔ wɛ nyi mɛ taji nɔ mimɔ lɛ e jaan
mimɔ lɛ kpo nu nyanya lɛ kpo nɔ sin gbeta nyanya kɔn lɛ nɔ wa e wu hwɛhwɛ jaki
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ enyi lɛ ɖo gbe ɔ sixu su kun do nu mimɔ e ɖo co mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nukunɖiɖo ɖe kun ɖe ɖɔ ninɔmɛ ɔ tɔn ɖyɔ do ɖagbe ji bi o
mawu ɖe mimɔ siin
ku tiin a aluwɛ tiin a alenina tiin a mimɔ tiin a
mawu zan jezu do jla mimɔ ɖeɖee awovi lɛ e ɖo jaan
mɛ ɖagbe lɛ nɔ ayikungban ji ɖo fifa mɛ sɔyi ðɛhan
il des contradictions dans bible
nuwlanwlan ɖeɖee nya lɛ e ɔ miɖesu wɛ ɖo
nunina kpe we a e ðe
nunina mawu tɔn hugan bi e etɛwu e xɔ akwɛ
yi gbe nu nunina ðaxo hugan bi mawu mi e gbɔn
dandan wɛ klisanwun lɛ nɔ tlɛnmɛ a
kannumɔgbenu gigosin ðo hwexonu kpo egbe kpo
ðu vivi le nunamɛ nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e tɔn
nunina ɖaxo hugan tɛ mawu mi
biblu ɖɔ mawu yi wan nu viɖokponɔ tɔn jo jaan
atɔxwɛ elɔ ɖɔ xo do nu wu mawu jezu do ayikungban ji ku do mitɔn mɛ e kpo mi ɖɔ nunina enɛ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo ji
xota ðo akpa ɔ ji e yi gbe nu nunina ðaxo hugan mawu tɔn a
ɖo sin alɔ mɛ ci batoo ɖɔhun e nuti a
e ɖo co e nyi ɖokpo ɖo nu xɔ akwɛ hugan tɔn lɛ mɛ
tinmɛ ɖɔ hwenu kpo ɖo vu tawun e wɛ russell xwedo mitɔn sin mɛxomɔ ɖe mi
ee russell ku gudo e ɔ se ɖɔ e wa nu taji ɖe ɖo nɔ tɔn kpo tɔn lɛ kpo sin gbɛzan mɛ nɔ do gbɔ nu ɖo hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ
sin gbɔn e ɔ nunina ɖe sixu nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛɖe lɛ sin nukunmɛ
e sixu xɔ akwɛ tawun nu mɛ e nu ɔ e nɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ e
biblu tinmɛ nunina akwɛ sixu xɔ a e ɖe ɖo xogbe elɔ lɛ mɛ mawu yi wan nu viɖokponɔ tɔn jo bonu mɛ ɖi nu lɛ ɖebu dɔn o loɔ bi mɔ mavɔmavɔ jaan
nunina sixu bɔ e nɔ sɔyi e ɖe
nunina ɖe sixu xɔ akwɛ hu a
nunina enɛ sixu nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛɖe lɛ nukunmɛ ɖo klisanwun nugbo lɛ nukunmɛ ɔ akwɛ nunina enɛ xɔ e din
pɔlu tinmɛ nu wu wɛ e ɖo xogbe elɔ lɛ mɛ hwɛhuhu ɔ ɖokpo gee ji wɛ e gbɔn wa ɔ mɛ mɛ enɛ wɛ nyi adamu hwɛhuhu ɔ dɔn ku wa
enɛ ɔ lɛ bi nɔ ku
hlɔmanu lɛ adamu nukɔntɔn ɔ tuun gaan hu hwɛ gbɔn to tlitli nu mawu gblamɛ mɛ ɔ e ɖo ku hwɛ
ku gbɔn adamu ji wa kunkan tɔn lɛ bi ji enɛ wɛ nyi ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi
hlɔmanu lɛ do tun kan nu lɛ sin ku si ɔ mawu vi tɔn jezu klisu do ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ do do lɛ tamɛ
gbɔn vɔsisa enɛ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ e gblamɛ ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖi nu nu jezu lɛ e bi mɔ mavɔmavɔ hlɔmanu lɛ
pɔlu nyɔna tobutobu mawu ɖo nukɔn nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɛ gbɔn jezu klisu ji lɛ e ɖɔ nu mi doku nu mawu ɖo nunina tɔn bɔ e sixu a e wu
kɔlɛntinu lɛ ɛɛn gbɛxixɔ ɔ jiwu bɔ e sixu ɛ bi yi fo a
ɖo nunina tobutobu mawu lɛ kpo kpo e mɛ ɔ etɛwu gbɛxixɔ ɔ ɖo taji
ali tɛ e ci nunina mawu tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖɔhun a ɖe
nunina enɛ ɖo ci nu mi
mi byɔ ɖɔ hwi xa xosin biblu nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ e ɖo xota we bɔ lɛ e mɛ
jezu sɔ jlo do tɔn jo do mitɔn mɛ
jaan ɖo vɔsisa enɛ nyi akpaxwe linlin mawu tɔn tɔn ɖe wutu ɔ xota ɖebɔdoɖewu elɔ lɛ ayi ɖo mawu mɛ sɔnu nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ e wa e ji
etɛ bɔ nu e e ɖe xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun towe mɛ nugbo
nu ɛnɛ sixu ɖo nu nɔ lɛ e mɛ mɛ nu ɔ e nu wu e nu ɔ e nu e do cobo nu ɔ e kpo nunina ɔ su nuɖe sin do nugbo alo gbɔ a ji kpo
tamɛ linlin do nu enɛ lɛ ji mi bɔ gbɛxixɔ nyi nunina mawu tɔn hugan bi e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e jɛji
nunina ɖe lɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛ e nyi gan ɖe alo nyi mɛ mi nɔ ɖo sisi ɖaxo e ɖe wutu
nunina ɖevo lɛ xɔ akwɛ a co e nɔ wlibo tawun ɖo xwedo tɔn ɖe alo ɖeji ɖe wɛ mɛ wutu
nu nunina russell bɔ mi mɔ ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ e e nɛ
e sixu enɛ do gbɛxixɔ ɔ sin nunina wu gbɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ biblu ɖɔ ji mawu viɖokponɔ tɔn do ɔ mɛ bonu mi nɔ gbɔn ji tɔn
jaan nu enɛ bɔ nunina elɔ xɔ akwɛ nugbo
gan ɖebu hugan mawu a
ðɛhan eblee ɖe wlan do wu tɔn ɖɔ hwɛ mɛ sin nyikɔ nɔ nyi jehovah e hwiɖokponɔ wɛ nyi ajalɔnlɔn ɖo ayikungban ɔ bi ji
ðɛhan nwt mɛ hugan e ɖe ɖe nunina ɖe mi a
wegɔ ɔ mawu wɛ nyi mitɔn
ezayii gbɔn e
e wɛ mi
ɔ e nɔ kpe nukun do mi wu kpo gbejininɔ kpo wanyiyinɔ ɖe nɔ kpe nukun do vi tɔn lɛ wu gbɔn e ɖɔhun
e ylɔ togun tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ ɖɔ eflayimu ɖɔ do wu tɔn ɖɔ eflayimu ɔ vi wɛ yi wan tawun
yi wan ɖesu
nu tɔn nɔ blawu nu mi titewungbe
jelemii nu nɔ ci nu mawu do tɔn lɛ wu ɖo egbe e nɛ
e nyi hlɔnhlɔnnɔ mitɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ e nyi a loɔ e nyi mitɔn kpo mitɔn kpo
enɛ bɔ nunina ɖebu gosin tɔn e xɔ akwɛ tawun a ce
nunina ɖe lɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo wanyiyi jɔ wanyiyi wɛ mɛ ɔ bɔ e mi wutu e nyi ɖɔ e ɖo nu mi dandan wutu wɛ a
nyi cejɛnnabinɔ a e nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ e su xomɛ emi nu mɛ e sin axɔ emi a
mawu vi tɔn jo do mitɔn mɛ ɖo e yi wan nu mi wutu
biblu ɖɔ mawu ɖe wanyiyi e ɖo nu mi ɔ mi gbɔn ɔ ɖie e viɖokponɔ tɔn do
linlin tɛ wu e wa
bonu mi nɔ gbɔn ji tɔn
jaan dandan wɛ mawu wa a
ðebu a
mawu tɔn sin wɛ nyi gbɛxixɔ sin axɔ klisu jezu su e hlɔmanu lɛ nwt
etɛwu nunina mawu tɔn nyi ɖe
biblu tinmɛ ɖɔ mawu ɖe e yi wan nu mi ɔ mi ɖo hwenu mi kpo ɖo nyi wɛ ɔ wɛ klisu ku do mitɔn mɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ wanyiyi nyi cejɛnnabi tɔn a e mawu ɖo gan ɖe a ɖo ɖe a lɛ e
mi jɛxa wanyiyi enɛ a mi sixu su axɔ tɔn ɛ gbeɖe a
nunina tɔn wɛ nyi wanyiyi sin ɖaxo hugan bi e sixu mɔ ɖo hwenuxo mɛ e
nunina ɖe lɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo e nɔ byɔ vɔsisa ɖaxo ɖo ɔ si wutu
enyi mɛɖe jlo do nu xɔ akwɛ tawun e ɖe mi ɔ nunina enɛ nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun ɖo vɔsisa mɛ ɔ blo e wu
mawu viɖokponɔ tɔn jo
jaan e sixu nu hugan e ɖe mi a
ðo xwe liva mɔkpan jehovah wɛkɛ ɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ jezu wa xa ɛ nyi mɛ e yi wan tawun e
nunywɛxo nwt jezu nyi vi mawu tɔn nyi akpajlɛ mawu e nɔ mɔ a e tɔn
kolosinu lɛ mi sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ kancica ɖo mawu kpo jezu kpo tɛntin e mɛ yi fo gbeɖe a
e ɖo co mawu hwlɛn vi eɖesunɔ tɔn a
hlɔmanu lɛ jehovah nu ɖo asi tɔn hugan e mi
nunina ɖe hu a
nunina ɖe lɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nɔ su do taji ɖe jɛ ee e ɖo yawu su lɛ e ji wutu
ði ɔ enyi mɛɖe jlo do su dotooxwe sin axɔ hwlɛn towe gan bɔ hwiɖesunɔ sixu kpewu su a e ɖe ɔ e su nukun towe mɛ e
nunina enɛ xɔ akwɛ tawun wɛ a ce
bi nɔ ku ɖo bu ɖe xa adamu ɔ wutu ɔ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɖo bu xa klisu lɛ bi ɔ mawu sin ku
ðo mi kpe nuɖe wu a wutu ɔ mi sixu mɛɖebu sin ku a
ðɛhan mi ɖo alɔdo sin hudo tawun ɖo mi sixu su gbɛxixɔ ɔ sin axɔ miɖesunɔ a
mi ɖoɖo ɔ mi kpe nuti wu a
ðo wanyiyi tɔn ɖaxo ɔ mɛ ɔ jehovah ɖo gbesisɔmɛ su nu sin hudo mi ɖo e sin axɔ bɔ mɔ mɛ ɔ gbɔn jezu ji ɔ e mɛ bi sin ku
gbɛxixɔ ɔ wa enɛ gbɔn
vi tɔn jezu sin hun nɔ mi we sin hwɛ mitɔn lɛ bi mɛ
nugbo ɔ nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo ɖo hun jezu kɔn nyi ayi e mɛ hun hwɛsɔkɛ kpo mavɔmavɔ kpo sin hɔn nu mɛ
jaan etɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ wa nu mitɔn ku lɛ e
nunina ɖe tiin gosin ɖaxo ɖe alo wanyiyi ɖaxo ɖe mɛɖe bɔ e nu mɛ hugan vɔsisa jezu blo e a
mɛɖebu nu ɖaxo ɖe do do mitɔn mɛ sɔ ee jehovah mawu blo e a
bɔ nunina ɖe su do ɖaxo ɖe hu vɔsisa tun kan nu mi sin hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo si e a
nugbo ɔ e sixu nunina ɖebu do akwɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ xɔ e wu a
nu jlo mɔ nu ɖevo lɛ do linlin mawu ɖo do sin ku mɛkuku lɛ tɔn ji e hun wemata ɔ wema etɛ biblu mɛ tawun tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖo www jw org ji
nunina jiwu e ɖe ɖo mi bɔ mi ɖe e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e
jezu nukplɔnmɛ enɛ ji hwenu e gbɔ azɔn nu sunnu wo ɖo azɔn baɖabaɖa ɖo amasin ɖo hwenɛnu a e ɖe jɛ wɛ lɛ e gudo e
mɛ ɖokpo ɖo mɛ wo lɛ mɛ lɛkɔ jɛ kpa nu mawu ji kpodo xosusu kpo
jezu ɖɔ mɛ wo lɛ bi wɛ azɔn gbɔ a ce
mɛ tɛnnɛ ɖe lɛ
mi sixu yawu wɔn nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu mi kpo kpo lɛ e
e sixu gbɛxixɔ ɔ do nunina ɖevo ɖebu wu a
e ɖo nukɔn nu nunina ɖaxo hugan bi e sixu e flafla tɔn
e nyi hun ɖo yi gbe nu nu mawu wa do towe mɛ e gbɔn
wa tuun ɔ
gbɛxixɔ ɔ nɔ hɛn mavɔmavɔ wa nu lɛ bi kpowun a
e wa ɔ jezu xoɖɛ mawu ɖɔ mavɔmavɔ ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ tuun tuun ɖɔ hwi wɛ nyi mawu nugbo ɖokpo tiin e tuun jezu klisu ɔ mɛ e
jaan enyi mɛɖe ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nya ɖe hwlɛn gan ɖo hwenu kpo ɖo vu e ɔ enɛ bɔ nu do nya enɛ wu tuun nu wu e wa e a ce
jehovah mawu nunina gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn ɔ e jlo ɖɔ hwi tuun mɛ alɔkpa e nyi e kɛɖɛ a e ɖɔ wa ɖo kancica syɛnsyɛn ɖe kpo emi kpo
biblu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ sɛkpɔ mawu enɛ ɔ e sɛkpɔ jaki
ði nu nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ
mɛ ɖi nu nu vi ɔ mɔ mavɔmavɔ
jaan etɛ nyi tinmɛ e ɖo nuɖiɖi tɔn
tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ e wa nu nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ byɔ ɖɔ e wa nu
jaki nuwiwa alɔkpa ɖetɛ
hwenu kɛ alɔ yi nunina ɖe e kɛɖɛ jɛn e huzu towe
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo kɛ alɔ yi gbɛxixɔ ɔ
mawu ɖɔ zan gbɔn e wa nu sɔgbe kpo nu e kpo
xoɖɛ mawu byɔ hwɛsɔkɛ kpo ayixa ɖe kpo
enyi ɖi nu nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ ɔ ɖo nukun nɔ fifa ayijayi kpo vivo kpo mɛ sɔyi ɖo sɔgudo eblee lɛ
yi flin ku jezu tɔn tɔn tɛnmɛ
jezu nuwiwa xwewu xwewu tɔn ɖe bonu mi do flin gbɛxixɔ ɔ e sɔnu e
e ɖɔ do nuwiwa enɛ wu ɖɔ nɔ blo le do flin mi
luki jehovah tɔn lɛ flin ku jezu tɔn ɖo mardi avril hwenu hwe yi xɔ gudo e
ganxixo ɖokpo wɛ tuto ɔ blo xoɖiɖɔ ɖe nu tinmɛ ku jezu tɔn ɖo e le ku tɔn hɛn wa nu mi din lɛ e kpo ee e hɛn wa nu mi ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e kpo
ðo xwe wa yi e mɛ ɔ livi wɛ wa flin tɛnmɛ
mi ɖo ylɔylɔ wɛ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo ɖɔ hwi wa nɔ xa mi ba yi gbe nu nunina ɖaxo hugan bi mawu mi e
ali ɖagbe tuun mawu sɛkpɔ ɛ hugan ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ xo tɔn biblu ɔ
kan nu byɔ jehovah tɔn ɖe ba do tuun sixu wa gbɔn e alo yi tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn www jw org ji
aflika kpo amɛlika kpo wa e nyi dɔn le wa tawun e ɖe
e ɖo adingban nu ɖɔ enyi e wa elɔpu ɔ e mɔ
ðiɖe kannumɔ e wli ɖo hwexonu ɖo ejipu lɛ e tɔn
do kpe axɔ ɔ wu su ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo nɔ mɔ caki jɛ ɖo zan ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
tinmɛ ɖɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ tamɛ do hɔn yi gbɔn e wu nɔ hu mi do nu xa mɛ lɛ e wu
jɛ mɔ mɛ
tɔn nu ɖeɖee nɔ gbo livi ɛnɛ nyi kannumɔ nu tonyinya gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e
e ɖibla yi xwe din bɔ dɔnkpɛvu nɔ nyi jozɛfu e ɔ nɔvi tɔn lɛ ɛ sa
e wa huzu kannumɔ ɖo ejipunu nukunɖeji ɖe sin xwegbe
jozɛfu sin gan jɛ daka xo wutu tɔn ji tlolo sin gan ɖɔhun a
hwenu e ɖɔ emi kun ɖoxo xa gan emitɔn sin asi o e ɔ e dohwɛ ɛ do acɛ ji ɖɔ e hwlɛn kan xa gan tɔn sin asi
e wli do gankpa mɛ do gɛdɛ ɛ ðɛhan
jozɛfu nyi kannumɔ hwexonu tɔn ɖe nyi kannumɔ egbe tɔn ɖe
mɛ we lɛ bi wɛ sisa sin aca xoxo ɔ sin awe xo ɖo enɛ mɛ ɔ nɔ nyi nu sisa ɖe kpowun bɔ e nɔ do akwɛ
ahwanfunfun nyi ali bɔkun e ɖe nu akɔta lɛ bɔ nɔ gbɔn do ɖo kannumɔ lɛ
e ɖɔ do axɔsu ejipu tɔn thoutmosis iii wu ɖɔ ɖo ahwan e ɖo kanaa e gudo ɔ e ahwankannumɔ wa yi xwe
ejipunu lɛ hɛn kannumɔ yetɔn do ayidɔkun lɛ gba sinsɛnxɔ lɛ kun ayisundo ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ
hwenu hlɔma ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ e ɔ ahwanfunfun nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo kannumɔ gege bɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ kannumɔ sin hudo nɔ bɔ e nɔ ahwan
e ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ ɖibla yi wevlɔɖo mɛ ɖo hlɔma lɛ e tɔn wɛ nyi kannumɔ lɛ
kannumɔ ejipu tɔn lɛ kpo hlɔma tɔn lɛ kpo gege wɛ e nɔ zan do daka mɛ
ði ɔ kannumɔ hlɔma tɔn e nɔ zan do ayidɔkun lɛ e din ɔ wɛ nyi xwe
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ nu lɛ nyla
sin xwe kanweko ɔ jɛ xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ ɔ aflika kpo amɛlika kpo wa e nyi ɖokpo ɖo dɔn le wa hugan ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e mɛ
gbeɖiɖo unesco tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ sunnu nyɔnu kpo yɔkpɔvu kpo livi jɛ wɛ e wli gannugannu sa
e ɖɔ ɖɔ afatɔn donu kanweko mɔkpan wɛ ku ɖo xu atlantique ji
e blawu ɖɔ kannumɔ xo ɔ nyi hwenuxo ɖe kpowun wa yi a
sɔgbe kpo oit organisation internationale du kpo ɔ sunnu nyɔnu kpo yɔkpɔvu kpo livi wɛ kpo ɖo kannumɔ nyi wɛ sixu hɔn a bɔ e nɔ su akwɛ kpɛɖe alo e nɔ nɔ akwɛ ɖebu ma su lɔ
kannumɔ egbe tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo fi e nɔ ayidɔkun ɖe lɛ e nɔ blo avɔ lɛ e nɔ sun bliki lɛ e lɛ nɔ nyi ɖo mɛ lɛ xwe
livi mɔkpan kpo ɖo wa wɛ kannumɔ ɖɔhun
daka xo mɛ wu bɔ kannumɔ gege ahwan ba do jɛ yeɖee si
ðo xwe tɔn ɔ spartacus kpo kannumɔ kpo gu do acɛkpikpa hlɔma tɔn ji co e kpa a
ðo xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ ɔ kannumɔ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ tɔtɛntinto hispaniola tɔn mɛ lɛ e gu do gan yetɔn lɛ ji
daka xo kannumɔ lɛ wu wɛ e ɖe ɖo lekegbo lɛ mɛ e bɔ e tohwan ɖe nu xwe bɔ gudo mɛ ɔ e wa ɖo to haiti tɔn jɛ eɖesu si e ayi ɖo
kannumɔgbenu izlayɛli vi lɛ gosin ɖo ejipu e wɛ nyi mɛɖesusijijɛ nukunɖeji hugan ɔ ɖo hwenuxo tɔn mɛ
livi akɔta ɖokpo blebu wɛ e tun kan sin kannumɔgbenu ɖo ejipu
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e tun kan nu
biblu tinmɛ yetɔn ci ɖo ejipu e ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ ɖo syɛnsyɛn alɔkpa alɔkpa lɛ kɔ ji nu
ɖokpo tlɛ ɖe gbeta ɖɔ e hu yetɔn lɛ do ɖe kan kpo nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ gbɔn e
izlayɛli vi lɛ sin daka xo mɛ wu glɔ gbɔn ɖo ejipu e nyi nu bunɔ ɖe ɖo mawu ɖesu wɛ xo ɔ mɛ
mawu ɖɔ nu mɔyizi ɖɔ tuun mɔ wɛ e togun izlayɛli tɔn ɖe ɔ ganji
enɛ wu ɔ jɛte hwlɛn ɛ
jɛ egbe ɔ jwifu lɛ nɔ ɖu dindinwayixwe ɔ xwewu xwewu ɖo fi ɖebu ɖe e nɔ do flin nu enɛ jɛ e
mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu mitɔn nɔ yi gbe nu hwɛagɔdido a wɛ biblu ɖɔ mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ e kun huzu o
malacii mawu jezu do bonu e yi ɖɔ nu kannumɔ lɛ ɖɔ e jo yi hwlɛn mɛ tafu wɛ e ɖe lɛ gan
luki enɛ ɖɔ e tun kan nu kannumɔ lɛ bi tlɔlɔ le wɛ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun nyi o
e jezu do bonu e tun kan nu lɛ sin hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo si
e ɖɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ nugbo ɔ ɖe sin kannumɔgbenu
jaan e tlɛ nyi ɖo egbe ɔ nugbo jezu mɛ e nɔ ɖe lɛ sin kannumɔgbenu ɖo ali gege gbavi kannumɔgbenu alɔkpa ðevo gigosin
gudo mɛ ɔ mawu jozɛfu kpo kpo bɔ gosin kannumɔgbenu ɖo ali vovo lɛ
sixu mɔ jozɛfu tɔn jiwu tawun e ɖo wema biblu tɔn nyi e wemata jɛ mɛ
mɛɖesusijijɛ gbe nya e nyi nu a
ee e nya sin to elɔpu tɔn ɖe mɛ e ɔ e yi espagne
ðo ɔ e xo go jehovah tɔn lɛ jɛ biblu xa ji
ðo e kanɖeji jla gbɛzan tɔn ɖo wutu ɔ e mɔ ɖagbe ɖe jiɖe gan tɔn xoxo ɔ bonu e ɖe axɔ e nɔ su sunmɛ sunmɛ e kpo
gbe ɖokpo ɔ sin gan ylɔ ɛ
e jlo jo axɔ ɖu e do byɔ ɛ hwɛsɔkɛ
etɛ jɛ bɔ nu nyi
e jɛ biblu xa jehovah tɔn lɛ ji
nugbo ɔ nɔ tun kan nu mɛ ɖo ali jiwu lɛ wɛ ɖɔ
ɖeɖee izlayɛli vi nyi kannumɔ lɛ e mɔ ɖo ejipu e blawu nu jehovah tawun e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖokpo ɔ wɛ nu nɔ ci do nuagɔwiwa mɔhun lɛ wu ɖo egbe
nugbo ɔ do su kannumɔgbenu alɔkpa lɛ bi sin kun do ɔ e byɔ huzuhuzu ɖaxo ɖe ɖo lɛ tɛntin
mawu ɖɔ emi dɔn huzuhuzu mɔhun ɖe wa
mawu do jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo sin akpa finɛ wɛ e nɔ wa nu kpodo hwɛjijɔ kpan ɖe nu mi ɖo ɔ nɛ
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɔ
alonso nyi kannumɔ alɔkpa ɖevo
hwenu e ɖo dɔnkpɛvu mɛ e ɔ e huzu kannumɔ nu gee e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ cocaine e kpo ee nɔ nyi heroine e kpo
e yi gbe ɖɔ do sixu kpewu nɔ xɔ gee ɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ wa huzu jɛ gee sa ji
gbɔn dotooxwe nɔ kpe nukun do lɛ wu bɔ nɔ jo nunu tɔn do e vovo ɛnɛ co kpewu jo gee do a
gudo mɛ ɔ kponɔ lɛ wli mi bɔ blo xwe ɛnɛ ɖo gankpa mɛ
ee alonso nyi kannumɔ nu gee nunu nu xwe gudo e ɔ e wa jɛ biblu xa jehovah tɔn lɛ ji
xo ɖo biblu mɛ e byɔ ayi tɔn mɛ tawun bɔ e kanɖeji ba ɖu ɖo gee nunu ji
e flin ɖɔ kpo xwe tobutobu nyi kannumɔ e kpo ɔ e vɛwu nu mi tawun
jehovah mawu mi bɔ ɖu ðɛhan
huzu gbɔn e vivi nu asi tawun wɛ alonso ɖɔ
alɔ jehovah do mi bɔ gosin ali hɛn gble e ji e ɔ sixu do gbe tɔn ɛ a
alɔdo tɔn mɛvo ɔ kpo ɖo kannumɔ nyi wɛ
jezu yi sin asinɔ gbɔ azɔn matie
sinsɛn ɖeɖee gbɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖi sinsɛn katolika hlɔma tɔn sinsɛn orthodoxe tɔn vovo lɛ sinsɛn bouddha tɔn kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ sinsɛngan yetɔn lɛ kpo yɛhwenɔgan yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖo nɔ tlɛnmɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ mɛ gege nɔ ɖɔ nu enɛ wɛ dɔn nublibliwiwa xyɔwu mɛ sinsɛn gege sin sinsɛngan lɛ ɖe ɖo azanvi elɔ lɛ mɛ e wa
enɛ wu ɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ e kanbyɔ ɖɔ mawuxowema ɔ jɛn byɔ ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ tlɛnmɛ a
do mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ ɔ nu mi gbeje fi walɔ enɛ gosin e e gbakpe gbɔn e kpo linlin mawu ɖo e kpo
ðo xoɖiɖɔ papa benoit xvi xwle sinsɛngan katolika hlɔma tɔn tɔn lɛ ɖo e mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ tlɛnmɛninɔ dandan ɔ nyi aca ɖe bɔ e ɖo xwixwedo wɛ sin hwenu lɛ ku gudo tlolo e ɖokpoo
e ɖo co tlɛnmɛninɔ nyi sinsɛn sin aca ɖe bonu klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ xwedo a
xwe kanweko wegɔ ɔ mɛ wɛ tlɛnmɛninɔ sin aca ɔ jɛ ji ɖe ɖo sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn ɖeɖee wa huzu sinsɛn katolika hlɔma tɔn ɖo nukɔnmɛ lɛ e mɛ
sɔgbe kpo wema nukunɖeji ɖe kpo ɔ nu enɛ sɔgbe kpo alɔ nyinyi nu xoɖoxamɛ sin gbakpe axɔsuɖuto hlɔma tɔn mɛ e kpo
traditions
ðo xwe kanweko bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ sinsɛn sin vaxɔ lɛ kpo sinsɛn tɔn enyii lɛ kpo jɛhun do tlɛnmɛninɔ sinsɛngan lɛ tɔn ji
ɖi ɖɔ xoɖoxamɛ nɔ hɛn mɛ bli kun sɔgbe kpo kpo o
e ɖo co encyclopædia britannica ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ jɛ xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ ɔ yɛhwenɔ gege jɛ yɛhwenɔgan ɖe lɛ ji
ðo vaxɔ latran tɔn e blo ɖo rome ɖo kpo kpo e hwenu ɔ e do zogbe tlɛnmɛninɔ yɛhwenɔ lɛ tɔn ji bɔ gbeta enɛ ji wɛ sinsɛn katolika hlɔma tɔn ɔ kpo ɖe wa jɛ egbe
kpo tito enɛ kpo ɔ sinsɛn ɔ gbo kpo nyi ali ji nu acɛ kpo akwɛ e su hwenu yɛhwenɔ lɛ e jlo yi sinsɛn ɔ sin nu lɛ nu vi yetɔn lɛ e bonu ɖe jɛ o
linlin mawu ɖo do tlɛnmɛninɔ wu e ɖo wɛn ɖo xo tɔn biblu ɔ mɛ
ðo biblu ɔ mɛ ɔ mi xa xo jezu ɖɔ do mɛ jlo ɖo tlɛnmɛ eɖɔhun ɖo axɔsuɖuto jixwe tɔn wu lɛ e wu e
matie ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ pɔlu ɖɔ xo do klisanwun ɖeɖee jlo xwedo tlɛnmɛninɔ sin eyɛtɔn ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ wu lɛ e wu kɔlɛntinu lɛ
e ɖo co jezu kpo pɔlu kpo ɖe ɖo gbe ɖe wɛ ɖɔ lɛ ɖo nɔ tlɛnmɛ a
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun nyi mɛ bi wɛ nɔ yi gbe nu tlɛnmɛninɔ xo ɔ o
enɛ wu ɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bi wɛ nɔ tlɛnmɛ a hwenu pɔlu ɖo nu wlan do mɛ asi a abi asu a lɛ e wu wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nyi wɛn tlɔlɔ ɖɔ aklunɔ ɖɔ xo ɖe nu mi a loɔ nyɛ ɖɔ nu ɔ nu matie kɔlɛntinu lɛ
ɔ biblu ɖɔ sunnu klisanwun wa ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e gege jɛ ji wɛ
matie kɔlɛntinu lɛ nugbo ɔ ɖo nublibliwiwa gbakpe ɖo hlɔma yikungban ji hwenɛnu e wutu ɔ pɔlu wlan ɖɔ enyi klisanwun ɖe hun asi ɖokpo wɛ e ɖo ɖo ɖo gbe ɖo vi tɔn lɛ ji timɔtee
alɔwliwli enɛ lɛ nyi alɔwliwli mɛ e nɔ ɖoxo xa mɛ ɖe a lɛ e a ɖo biblu ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ sunnu ɔ ɖo wa tɔn nu asi tɔn bɔ asu kpo asi kpo lɛ ɖo xɔ nu ɖee lɛ a
kɔlɛntinu lɛ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mawu kun byɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe nɔ tlɛnmɛ o jɛn e ɖo dandan nu klisanwun lɛ a e nɛ
enyi tlɛnmɛninɔ nyi dandan sin nu a ɔ aniwu jezu kpo pɔlu kpo ɖɔ ɖagbe tɔn
ðo tlɛnmɛninɔ sixu hun ali gege nu mɛ e ɖe bɔ e jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
tlɛnnɔ lɛ sixu yeɖee jo hugan ɖo nɔ mɔ tagba mɛ ɖeɖee wli alɔ lɛ e nɔ mɔ lɛ e a wutu kɔlɛntinu lɛ
david ɖɔ tlɛnmɛninɔ emi a
kpɛɖe tɔn wɛ lɔ a wɛ e ɖɔ
e nɔ vɛwu bɔ e ɖyɔ sɔgbe kpo aca ɖe kpo kpodo ninɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ kpan ɖo nyɛɖokponɔ wu jɛn kpe nukun do wutu ɔ ada huzu huzu ɔ bɔwu nu mi
hun ɔ sixu yi nya ɔ nɔte
nu alexandra se vliwun hwenu e ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo hun ɖe mɛ jlo dogbo ɖo tofɔligbe amɛlika tɔn sin to we tɛntin e nɛ
e jɛte yi nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ e mɔ bɔ nya ɖe tɛnkpɔn ɖo espagne gbe do wɛ bacabaca do ɖɔ nu wu e ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn enɛ mɛ e nu lɛ ɖokpo
ðo alexandra nɔ yi jehovah tɔn lɛ sin kple ɖo gbe mɛ wutu ɔ e yi gbe se gbe nu nya ɔ
nya ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ gbe emi bɔ emi nɔ to ɔ mɛ le e wema emitɔn lɛ kpo akwɛ emitɔn kpo do emi
ðo ɔ kponɔ ɔ yi gbe nu xo e ɖɔ e a tlɛ ɖɔ gbe wɛ alexandra ja
ðo e ɖo akwɛ ɖe a wutu ɔ alexandra nya amɛlika tɔn caki
nya ɔ tuun e do gbe tɔn ɛ gbɔn e a ɖɔ emi su axɔ ɛ hu amɛlika tɔn ɔ
alexandra tinmɛ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo ajɔ ɖe ɖo asi tɔn wɛ o le e vivi nu emi ɖɔ emi ɛ ɖo nu sɔgbe bɔ emi ɖo blo e nɛ
e wema junjɔn biblu ji ɖe lɛ nu nya ɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɖɔ e biblu xa lɛ

nunywɛxo mɛ nɔ xomɛ lɛ e nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ze yeɖee jo gbɔn hwenu yetɔn zinzan hlɔnhlɔn yetɔn zinzan nukun kpikpe do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo gblamɛ

nunamɛ wa ɖagbe nu

e wa ja mitɔn ɔ gbe ɔ e ganji hunhun zin bɔ e tunfla bɔ e do asi nu ɖo nu do nu nu mɛ ɔ wɛ mawu do nu

mi mɔ ɖe nu ɖagbe enɛ e ɖokpo ɖo floride etats unis

acɛ jezu ɖu

biblu ɖɔ e nɔte bɔ taan ɖe wa yi
eblee lɛ jezu ɖɔ nu bɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ tuun vivɔnu taan enɛ tɔn kpo axɔsuɖuɖu tɔn tɔn ɖo jixwe kpo e nu
e ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu emi jɛ acɛ kpa ji e ɔ ninɔmɛ ɔ tɔn huzu asa bi
ahwan adɔ bɔ jɛmɛji lɛ gba nu
matie luki tlolo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo e ɔ e jɛ we ɖɔ ɔ bi byɔ hwenu tɔn biblu ylɔ ɖɔ azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ e mɛ timɔtee
etɛwu e jezu axɔsu ɖo bɔ nu lɛ a bɔ ninɔmɛ lɛ asa
ðo hwe enɛ ɔ jixwe wɛ jezu jɛ acɛ kpa ji ɖe e nyi ɖo ayikungban ji a
enɛ wu ɔ ahwan ɖo jixwe bɔ jezu e axɔsu bɔ e ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ micɛli e nya sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo ayikungban ji
ðo e sataan do fi wutu ɔ e jɛma ɖo e tuun ɖɔ hwenu kpɛɖe jɛn kpo nu emi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun lin cobonu mawu gbo xo sataan tɔn ɖo ayikungban ji fi o
matie din ɔ nu mi atɔn ɖe lɛ nugbo ɖɔ mi ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ sin hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ gbɔn e
nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖe mɛ taji ɖe ceɖeceɖe gbɔn vo nu atɔn xwedo e lɛ e yedɛɛ lɛ nɔte nu ninɔmɛ vunbla lɛ e
bɔ ɖevo nyi vɔvɔ e acɛ mɛ ɖo ɔ ji ɔ ɖɔ e blo bonu ahwanfunfun gbakpe ayikungban ɔ ji bonu lɛ ɖe nɔ hu ɖe e hwi ɖaxo ɖokpo do asi
enɛ nɔte nu ahwanfunfun
wu ɖɔ e kun nyi akɔta ɖe lɛ kpowun tɛntin wɛ e ɖe fifa sin o loɔ ayikungban ɔ bi ji wɛ e blo bɔ ahwanfunfun gbakpe
ðo ɔ azɔn nukɔntɔn e ahwan ɖe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɖo hwenuxo mɛ e nɛ
wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ tlɛ nu hu e jɛ tunu tɔn
gbeɖiɖo ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ ahwanfunfun hu gbɔn ɔ mɛ sin e hu livi
ɔ mɛ wɔbuwɔbu ɖevo lɛ tiin bɔ ahwan bɔ nyi
ba tɛ mɛ e ahwan ɖo ɖo hwe mitɔn
ðo hwenuxo mɛ ɔ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɖo nuwukpikpe su kun do nu lɛ bi e nɛ
tutoblonunu ɖeɖee nɔ jɛhun do fifa ji enyii lɛ e ɖi onu organisation des nations unies ɖɔhun tlɛ kpewu ɖo mɛ ɖo vɔvɔ ɔ kun wɛ e a
kpo vɛɛn kpo wu o
enɛ nɔte nu adɔ
ðo fi ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ adɔ bɔ e nɔ gbe ɖokpo tɔn ɔ bi do xɔ blee kiloo ɖokpo
matie ɖokpo enɛ sixu xɔ ɔji xɔ akwɛ sɔ blee ɖebu a e kiloo atɔn gee
fitɛ enɛ sixu jɛ nu xwedo ɖaxo ɖe
enɛ wu ɔ e nu lɛ ɖɔ zan nuɖuɖu ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn lɛ hannyahannya o nuɖuɖu ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn hwenɛnu tɔn mɛ lɛ nɔ yawu zan e wɛ ɔ kpo vɛɛn ɔ kpo nɔte
sin ɔ mi mɔ kunnuɖenu ɖɔ mɛ ɖo wiwi ɔ kun wɛ e ɖo wezun a
ðo xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ ɔ livi wɛ ku adɔ ku
gan ɖokpo ɖɔ ɖɔ livi nabi ɖo ɔ mɛ e ɖokpo ɖo tɛnnɛ ji wɛ mɔ nu ɖu ganji a ɖo
gbeɖiɖo ɖevo ɖɔ ɖɔ xwewu xwewu ɔ mɛ adɔ nɔ hu lɛ e hugan kplekple mɛ ɖeɖee sida zansukpɛzɔn kpo kpo nɔ hu lɛ e tɔn
mɔ amamu ɖokpo mɛ ɖo ɔ ji ɔ nɔ nyi ku bɔ kutomɛ yɔdo nwt xwedo e
e acɛ bonu hu lɛ ɖo hwi wu ɖo adɔ nu bɔ ku ɖo azɔn nu bɔ ku bɔ gbekanlin ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ hu lɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ sin ɛnɛvlɔɖo ji
ɛnɛgɔ ɔ nɔte nu ku azɔn kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ dɔn wa e
ðo gudo tlolo ɔ azɔn nɔ nyi espagnole e hu livi mɔkpan
ðibla yi livi wɛ azɔn ɔ e blo ɖibla yi mɛ ɖo hwenɛnu lɛ e ɖo ji
azɔn lɛ tɔn kpowun wɛ espagnole ɔ nyi
lɛ ɖɔ livi kanweko wɛ azɔn nyi sakpata e hu ɖo xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ
jɛ egbe ɔ e ɖo do nu nu wɛ tawun ɖo lanmɛ nɔ ganji linu co livi mɔkpan wɛ sida kpo zansukpɛzɔn kpo gble do
nu ɖokpo ɔ mɛ jɛn e nɔ kɔ do e wɛ nyi ku ahwan ɖo etɔn wu adɔ bɔ azɔn lɔ ɖo etɔn ɖɔ wɛ
yɔdo ɖo mɛ lɛ kple wɛ magbokɔ bɔ nukunɖiɖo ɖe ɖe a
hwenu tɔn mɛ mi ɖe din lɛ e wa vivɔnu zaanɖe
flin nu elɔ jezu ɖido mɛ ɖu ɖɔhun ɖo sataan ɖo ayikungban ji e ɖu bi a
zaanɖe din ɖo haamagedɔni hwenu ɔ jezu ɖe nuwiwa sataan tɔn lɛ siin su kun do nu mɛ ɖo gudo lɛ e bi
e nyi wezun ji atɔn ɖe lɛ ɖe e kɛɖɛ wɛ jezu ɖo a loɔ e tlɛ nu hɛn gble do wu nu mɛ lɛ e bi bloɖo
mi akpa biblu do lɛ e
fifa kpacɛ ɖo ahwan sin tɛnmɛ
jehovah su ahwan kun do gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
e wɛn ga lɛ e hwan lɛ
adɔ ɖe a ɖo nuɖuɖu tunfla
ji jɛ ɖo to ɔ mɛ tunfla
atin bla nu so lɛ ðɛhan
zaanɖe din ɔ jezu nu wezun atɔn ɖe lɛ tɔn hɛn gble lɛ e bloɖo
azɔn kpo ku kpo ɖe a ɖo mɛ bi ɖu vivi lanmɛ syɛn hunsin ɖagbe kpo mavɔmavɔ kpo tɔn
mawu sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku tiin a aluwɛ tiin a alenina tiin a mimɔ tiin a
hwenu jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e ɖe ninɔmɛ lɛ ci ɖo acɛkpikpa tɔn glɔ e akpakpa mɛ tawun
e jɛhun do fifa ji blo nujiwu do nuɖuɖu afatɔn mɔkpan gbɔ azɔn nu mɛ lɛ tlɛ mɛ sin ku matie jaan
jehovah tɔn lɛ hun xomɛ do sixu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwenu lɛ sin wezun fo do e ɖo biblu towe mɛ
yi gbe nu a
mɛ ɖo kunkun wɛ e nɔte nu jezu klisu
e jɛ axɔsu ɖu ji ɖo bɔ zaanɖe din ɔ e ɖu bi ɖe mimɔ bi siin
mɛ ɖo kunkun wɛ e nɔte nu ahwan
wɛkɛ hwan lɛ kpo ahwan kpɛvi kpɛvi lɛ kpo hu maxamaxa lɛ sin
mɛ ɖo kunkun wɛ e nɔte nu adɔ
adɔ gble do nu livi mɔkpan
ɔ nɔ blo bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ ku vawun ɖo azɔn kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo wu
yɔdo ɖo lɛ kple wɛ
e wlan nyikɔ tattannu ɔ ɖo elɔ sin to lɛ ɖokpo
dobanunu dokunkun tɔn sin kunnuɖenu ɖe nɔ gudo nu nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e a
ðo ɔ xojlawema biblical sin xota ɖe kan nu elɔ byɔ mɛ ɖeɖee xo e ɖɔ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e nabi dobanunu dokunkun tɔn ɖekunnu
xosin e e ɖie e hwe bi ɔ
mɛ sin nyikɔ ma ɖo nyikɔ ɖeɖee xota ɔ lɛ e mɛ a e ɖokpo wɛ nyi tatunayi
wɛ e nyi
nu mi nu e wa bɔ biblu ɖɔ e klewun
jeluzalɛmu nɔ acɛkpikpa pɛsinu lɛ tɔn glɔ
toxo ɔ ɖo fi pɛsinu lɛ nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ ɔ gudo e e wɛ nyi eflati ɔ sin gbadahweji
ee pɛsinu lɛ ɖu ɖo babilɔnu ji gudo e ɔ ɖe jwifu nyi kannumɔ lɛ e nyite gbe ɖɔ yi tɛmpli jehovah tɔn gba ɖo jeluzalɛmu
ɛsidlasi jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ klan gbe xa ɖo enɛ wu gbɔn yɛkan enɛ mɛ dohwɛ ɖɔ gu do acɛkpikpa pɛsi tɔn ji
ɛsidlasi ðo axɔsuɖuɖu daliwusi tɔn hwenu ɔ pɛsinu nɔ nyi tatunayi e do nu xo ɔ
biblu ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ tokpɔngan tatunayi ɖo eflati ɔ sin gbadahweji e ɛsidlasi
e kun ji nyikɔ tatunayi ɖe e gege sin do glɔ bɔ e ci ɖɔ xwedo ɖe wɛ xwe ɖɔhun
ɖe ɖo lɛ mɛ ɖɔ kancica ɖe nɔ xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖe kpo mɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ mi ɖe e kpo tɛntin
nuwlanwlan akpadido tɔn ɖe wɛ ɖo ɔ ji bɔ e wlan ɖo ɖo axɔsuɖuɖu daliwusi tɔn sin xwe ɔ mɛ
e ɖɔ mɛ nɔ akpadido ɔ tɛnmɛ e ɖe nyi nu tattannu tokpɔngan ɔ gudo tɔn tatunayi ɖokpo ɔ xo e ɖɔ ɖo wema ɛsidlasi tɔn mɛ ɖo biblu mɛ e wɛ
etɛ nya enɛ wa
ðo ɔ silusi daxo ɔ fi e gbɔn lɛ e to ma bɔ tokpɔn enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ e ylɔ ɖɔ babilɔnu kpo ɔ gudo kpo
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e wa ma tokpɔn ɔ ɖo we bɔ e ylɔ ɖokpo ɖɔ ɔ gudo kpowun
libaan tɔdo mɛ fenisii samalii kpo judaa kpo ɖo tokpɔn enɛ mɛ bɔ e ci ɖɔ damasi wɛ tokpɔngan ɔ nɔ nɔ ɖɔhun
tatunayi do tokpɔn enɛ ji ɖo jɛ
ee tatunayi yi jeluzalɛmu yi do nu sin hwɛ e do jwifu lɛ e gudo e ɔ e ɖo gbe nu daliwusi ɖɔ jwifu lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ silusi wɛ gbe emi ɖɔ emi tɛmpli jehovah tɔn gba
do e nu nu ɖo nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn hɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ e nɔ gudo nu xo enɛ
ɛsidlasi enɛ wu ɔ e ɖegbe nu tatunayi ɖɔ e ma ɖo o bɔ e setonu ɛsidlasi
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ tokpɔngan tatunayi ɖo eflati ɔ sin gbadahweji e wa nu ɖe ɖo hwenuxo mɛ a
e ɖo co wu ɖɔ mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ xo do wu tɔn zan tɛnmɛ nyikɔ sɔgbe xa ɛ e
xa mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ nɔ hun xomɛ nu mi
mɛ tɔn wɛ e samuel hamilton
to rica
bi jo nu lɔnyiji lɔnfɔnkan sin kpo akɔnyinyi kpo
puerto limon kpo xa do e lɛ e kpo mɛ wɛ su ɖe toxo mɛ tɔjihunglintɛn ɖe ɖe ɖo zanzanhweji rica tɔn e wɛ
lɛ ɖo vi tantɔn bɔ nyɛ wɛ nyi tɛnwegɔ ɔ
ku hwenu ɖo xwe tantɔn e
enɛ gudo ɔ nɔ ɖokpo wɛ hɛn mi bɔ mi su
xixo nyi akpaxwe ɖe ɖo gbɛzan mɛ hwebinu
sin vu wɛ yi wan nu lɔnyiji lɔnfɔnkan
ee ɖo wɛ e ɔ byɔ yi wan nu xixo do e ɖe mɛ
hwenu ɖo xo wɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ ɖo xwe e ɔ gan mitɔn lɛ ɖokpo byɔ mi ɖɔ ma xo ɖo nicaragua tɔn ɖe mɛ
ɖo nɔ ɖo azɔn jɛ wɛ bɔ ɖo nukun kpe do wu tɔn wɛ wutu ɔ jlo yi nɔ nicaragua a
enɛ wu ɔ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ gan ɖevo byɔ mi ɖɔ nyi xo ɖo rica to ɔ sin mɛ nyi kpo mɛ ɖeɖee e ɖo ayihundida tɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo
din tɔn ɔ yi gbe
nɔ to ɔ tɔn mɛ sin jɛ xo agbahwlɛnhwlɛn tɔn ɖebɔdoɖewu lɛ ɖo cuba mexique kpo nicaragua kpo
titewungbe ɖe wɛ nu mi bɔ tlɛ nɔ xo akpaxwe agbahwlɛnhwlɛn tɔn ɖebɔdoɖewu xo ɖokpo nyi do
enyi lɛ ɖo nyikɔ ke wɛ le ɔ xomɛ nɔ hun mi
e blawu ɖɔ nɔ zan blibli
ɖo nyɔnu ɖokpo co nɔ nyɔnu ɖevo lɛ hwɛhwɛ
nɔ ahan mɔhunkɔtɔn
gbe ɖokpo ɔ ahan bɔ ee wa ayihɔngbe tɔn e ɔ flin wa yi xwe gbɔn e a
nɔ do aji nɔ nyi e nɔ nyi akɔ
enɛ zan wɛ ɖe bɔ nɔ huzu jehovah tɔn ɖe
e blo bonu ma xwedo e e kpewu a ɖo lɔnyiji lɔnfɔnkan gba tamɛ nu mi tawun
ee ɖo xwe e ɔ gblewu ɖaxo ɖe hwenu ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba wli ɖo xixo ɖe hwenu e
ee e nu mi gudo e ɔ jo ɔ do
e ɖo co kpo ɖo mɛ lɛ wɛ ɖo ayihundida tɔn sɛkpɔ xwe e ɖe mɛ
ðo ɔ yi gbe yi ɖaxo jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖe
e blo ɖo anyumlimli safɔtɛn xo ɖe e ɖe hwenu ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo lɛ mɛ e ɔ vogbingbɔn ɖo lɛ nɔ wa nu kpo sisi kpo gbɔn e kpodo zingidi lɛ nɔ ɖu e kpo tɛntin e jiwu nu mi tawun
nu mɔ ɖo ɖaxo enɛ ji e mi bɔ jɛ biblu xa lɛ ji jɛ kple nɔ blo ɖo agun yetɔn mɛ lɛ e yi ji
nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e gege jiwu nu mi
ði ɔ jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ jla axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
matie ɖɔ klisanwun nugbo lɛ kun nɔ yetɔn do ɖo o
jezu ɖɔ acɛ ɔ wa nu lɛ bi matie
ee ɖo biblu wɛ e ɔ nu e ɖɔ lɛ e do nu mɔ ɖo lɛ tɛntin e wu
kan nɔ ɖo do nu wu nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e nɔ jiwu nu mi
mɔ ɖɔ ɖo jijɔ mɛɖee zize jo tɔn jezu byɔ klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ e
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu xa mɔ xo jezu tɔn ɖɔ wa xwedo mi e ɔ jlo huzu ɖe
e byɔ hwenu cobɔ wa kpewu
ði nu xwe gege ɔ nɔ nyi akɔ do animɛloo nɔ do taɖagbe e ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ ɖo ɖogowungbaxwe to ɔ tɔn
ɖo biblu mɛ ɖɔ mawu ɖo hwɛ nu mɛ nɔ taɖagbevodun lɛ e jɛ mɛ nɔ do lɛ e ji
ezayii kolosinu lɛ enɛ wu ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ba jo akɔnyinyi do
aklunɔzangbe nukɔntɔn bɔ do gbe gbe jo akɔnyinyi do e wu e ɔ animɛloo nɔ do nyi akɔ e ɖu nu
mɛ lɛ ca mi ɖo nyi akɔ aklunɔzan gbla enɛ mɛ a wutu gbidi kɔ nu mi syɛnsyɛn ɖɔ ma jɛ akɔ nyi ji wa a
nyi akɔ ɖe gbeɖe a
ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ huzu e tawun gbe gbe blo baptɛm ɖo ɖaxo jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖe ji e
efɛzinu lɛ gbadanu enɛ ɔ lɛkɔ yi otɛli nɔ e mɔ nyɔnu xoxo ɔ ɖo ɖo hɔn
e ɖɔ nu mi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo ɖɔ e ya wa mi ɖu
flin ɖɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ xwedo ɖo gbɛzan mɛ din
enɛ gudo ɔ e hu nu nu biblu mɛ do nublibliwiwa wu e do zogbe ji ɖɔ mi kan do kancica mitɔn
byɔ xɔ mɛ su hɔn do
egbe ɔ xomɛ hun mi ɖɔ sin hwenu huzu ɖe ɖo e ɔ do huzuhuzu ɖeɖee blo ɖo gbɛzan mɛ lɛ e wu kpo gbejininɔ kpo
biblu tɔn xwixwedo hɛn le wa nu mi bɔ nu kpewu wɛ ɔ wlan do wema ɖokpo mɛ
le enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo jɔ gege gbɛzan ɖo e ɖe kpo awajijɛ nujɔnu tɔn kpo
kpo ɖo sin vivi ɖu wɛ nu nɔ mya nukun nu mi lɛ e gbeje
hɛn akwɛ kpo kpo wa nu mi nu enɛ lɛ nɔ ayi ɖe a
loɔ kancica ɖo nyi kpo mawu kpo kpodo kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mɛ ɖe e kpo tɛntin e nɔ ayi sɔyi
biblu ɖɔ elɔ ɔ wiwa yi wɛ e ɖe bɔ mɛ nɔ blo jlo elɔ tɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo wiwa yi wɛ mɛ nɔ blo jlo mawu tɔn ɔ nɔ nɔ sɔyi
sala ci ɖo xɔ ɔ tɛntin nɔ nyi nukun nu do e lɛ e
do nukun mɛ nyɔnu gbadahweji azii tɔn tɔn ɖe ɖo nukun cɔɔn
aluwɛ ɖe wɛ ɖo nukun tɔn a
e nyi hun nu wu wɛ e ɖo wɛn
nu gege wɛ jɛ ɖo xwe enɛ gbe
e kpo asu tɔn ablaxamu kpo nɔ awajijɛ mɛ ɖo finɛ nu xwe mɔkpan
wa nu ɖo finɛ do ɖo xwe yetɔn
nɔ wuu toxo nukunɖeji ɖe wɛ bɔ lɛ kpo lɛ kpo mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo nuɖokan gege
xwe sala tɔn xɔ akwɛ hu fi e nuɖokan tɔn lɛ ɖo kpowun e
finɛ wɛ e kpo asu tɔn kpo mɔ awajijɛ gege kpo gege kpo ɖe
finɛ wɛ xoɖɛ azɔn mɔkpan jehovah mawu yi wan e ɖe
sala ɖo hwɛjijɔ bɔ e yi wan nu fi enɛ e gege
e ɖo co sala ɖo gbesisɔmɛ jo nu ma do e lɛ e bi do
e ɖo xwe co e tɛn yi fi e tuun a lɛ e zan awovinu kpodo mimɔ kpo e ɖe nukunɖiɖo ɖe ɖe ɖɔ e lɛkɔ gbe ɖokpo a
etɛ ɛ bɔ e blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo enɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
etɛ nuɖiɖi tɔn sixu mi ɖo egbe
wuu wɛ sala su ɖe
egbe ɔ aglingbigba kɛɖɛ wɛ kpo ɖo toxo enɛ mɛ
ɖo sala sin hwenu ɔ tɔjihun lɛ tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ gbɔn eflati ɔ ji nɔ hɛn xɔ akwɛ lɛ sin fi linlin lɛ wa toxo hun nukun enɛ mɛ
mɛ lɛ nɔ ali wuu tɔn lɛ ji tɔjihun lɛ nɔ yeɖee ɖo tɔjihunglintɛn lɛ bɔ hɛn wa lɛ e nɔ axi lɛ mɛ
do nukun mɛ hwenu sala ɖo wɛ ɖo toxo ɖaxo enɛ mɛ wa tuun mɛ lɛ e gege sin nyikɔ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ lɔ flin ɖo nyɔnu ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɛkpɛ bɔ e
e ɖo hɛnnumɔ gege ɖo finɛ
jehovah mawu nugbo ɔ wɛ sala nɔ
biblu ɖɔ e ɖo nuɖiɖi gbɔn e a
ðo tɔn vodun nu taan ɖe
ðebu wɛ e nyi ɔ e ablaxamu nya ɖe wɛ nyi mɛxo nu xwe wo
nya enɛ wa huzu nu mɛ ɖi nu nu mawu lɛ e bi
hlɔmanu lɛ hɛn alɔwliwli yetɔn lido gbɔn sisi ɖagbe kpo jlo do ɖeɖɛ tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɖo kpo gblamɛ
ɖo taji hu bi ɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu mawu yetɔn e wɛ dɔn ɖo bu
zaan ɔ nuɖe jɛ ji nu
biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ sala ɔ wɛnsinɔ wɛ e ji vi ɖe a
ðo aca yetɔn mɛ hwe enɛ ɔ ninɔmɛ sala tɔn vɛwu tawun
e nɔ gbeji nu mawu tɔn kpo asu tɔn kpo
atavi ylɔ vi ablaxamu tɔn lɔti wa ci vi ɖɔhun nu
ɖo vivo mɛ ganji jɛ hwenu nu lɛ bi huzu e
ablaxamu wa sala kpo akpakpa mɛ ɖaxo kpo
e sixu ɖi nu e se tlolo e a
mawu nɔ e wɛ ɖɔ xo tlolo tlɛ do ji tɔn gbɔn wɛnsagun ɖe gblamɛ
do nukun mɛ sala ɖo asu tɔn wɛ kpo nukun tɔn ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ kpo ɖo wɛ kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ etɛ e ɖɔ nu
kɛnklɛn ɖɔ nu mi
bɔya ablaxamu jinjɔn ayi ba do mɔ eɖee mɛ enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu jehovah ɖɔ e sin to towe mɛ sin hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ mɛ yi to ɔ mɛ
ee akpakpa ɖo wɛ e gudo e ɔ tamɛ do wɛ jehovah ɖe gbɔn e ji
ɖo jo vivo tɔn zan wɛ ɖe e do jɛ gbejagbeja gbɔn ji
sala wa nu gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ablaxamu ɛ tlitli
e nɔ gudo tɔn ɖo huzuhuzu ɖaxo enɛ byɔ gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ e mɛ a
nu kpannukɔn sala e sixu nyi nu nu mi
mi sixu ɖɔ mawu nu mɔhun ɖe mi alo mɛ e a
e ɖo co ninɔmɛ mɔhun ɖe nɔ kpannukɔn mi mɛ bi a ce
mɛ mi ɖe e yi wan nu nu agbaza tɔn lɛ sixu byɔ mi ɖɔ vivomɛninɔ miɖesunɔ tɔn nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ alo nu bɔ ayi mitɔn lɛ e mya nukun nu mi hu nu bi
nu vo wɛ biblu byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ mya nukun nu mi jɛ nukɔn bonu xomɛ mawu tɔn hinhɛn hun mya nukun nu mi hu miɖesunɔ tɔn hinhɛn hun
hwenu sala ɖo agban do wɛ e ɔ e nɔ kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ etɛ emi etɛ emi jo do a ji
e sixu hɛn agban toci lɛ kpo lakunmi lɛ kpo sixu hɛn a e a jɛn e sixu hɛn nu ɖebu zan nu hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e a e nɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖo sa nuɖokan yetɔn lɛ gege alo mɛ
yiyi ɔ bɔ sala ji nu ɖevo lɛ sin e wɛ nyi ɖɔ axi alo ɖeɖee mɛ e nɔ yawu yi blewun nɔ xɔ jinukun atin avɔ kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo e bi glo
nuɖiɖi sala tɔn ɛ jo fɛɛ mɛ ninɔ tɔn do
vlafo e vɛwu nu sala bɔ e jo xwe tɔn do
enyi e ci xwe ɖo wuu lɛ e gege ɖe bɔ lɛ e ɖɔhun hun nu gege wɛ sala jo do nɛ
ðe lɛ ɖo xwe enɛ lɛ mɛ nɔ ɖo xɔnɔnɔ mɔkpan nu sin e dɔn gbɔn do glɔ lɛ e kpo lɛ kpo
e tlɛ nɔ gba xɔ kpaa lɛ syɛnsyɛn do lɛ nɔ syɛn ganji bɔ e sixu su hɔn lɛ kpo cavi kpo
goxɔ ɖe sixu cyɔn alɔ mɛ ji ɖo lɛ si a
alo sixu bɔ kinnikinni lɔnmɔ kpo hla kpo tiin tawun ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ hwenɛnu e kpe mɛ wu a a
bɔ hɛnnumɔ sala tɔn jo do wɛ e ɖe lɛ e lo
gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn ɖɔ sin to towe mɛ sin hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ mɛ e xwixwedo vɛwu nu sala tawun
nyɔnu ɖe wɛ xomɛ tawun e sixu ɖo nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔvi tɔn lɛ sin vi lɛ nafi tɔn lɛ nagan tɔn lɛ atavi tɔn lɛ kpo atagan tɔn lɛ kpo lɔ sixu ɖo finɛ yi wan nu tawun bɔ vlafo e mɔ gbeɖe a
e ɖo co ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ sala nɔ nukɔn kpo adɔgbigbo kpo ɖo nu wɛ ba yi
lɛ ɖo finɛ co sala ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi ɖo gbe ɔ gbe
tɛlaxi nyi xwedo ɔ sin e sin xwe yi afɔɖe co e xwedo ablaxamu kpo sala kpo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ sala ɖo wa nu gege ba do kpe nukun do tɔn mɛxomɔ enɛ wu
lɔti lɔ xwedo hwenu ɖo tonu se nu jehovah wɛ gosin kaludeenu lɛ tomɛ e
eflati ɔ to yi jɛ agban ɖo halaani e ɖo kilomɛtlu ɖo totaligbe gbadahweji
xwedo ɔ nɔ halaani nu taan ɖe
tɛlaxi wli azɔn ɖo finɛ sixu yi nukɔn hu a
xwedo ɔ nɔ finɛ jɛ hwenu e ɖo xwe ku e
ðo hweɖenu cobɔ ɖido ɔ jehovah ɖɔ nu ablaxamu ɖɔ e gosin to enɛ mɛ yi to emi ɛ e mɛ
ðo din tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mawu do akpakpa mɛ sin akpa elɔ ze do blo akɔta ɖaxo ɖokpo
hwenu gosin halaani e ɔ ablaxamu ɖo xwe bɔ sala ɖo xwe ɖo vi ɖe a
ablaxamu sixu do akɔta ɖe sin kun gbɔn
asi ɖevo wɛ e a
asi gege dida nyi aca ɖe gbakpe hwenɛnu enɛ wu ɔ sala sixu nɔ nu do nu enɛ ji hwɛhwɛ
ðebu wɛ e nyi gbɔn ɔ gosin halaani ɖido nukɔn
ɖo ayi mɛ kpo kpo zɔn din lɛ e wu
ɔ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ ablaxamu sin xwedo dɔkun yetɔn lɛ kpo xɔ ɖo halaani lɛ e kpo yi
jwifu hwexonu tɔn ɖe lɛ tinmɛ ɖɔ mɛ xo wemafɔ enɛ ɖɔ lɛ e sixu nyi kosi ɖeɖee wa nu ablaxamu kpo sala kpo ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ lɛ e
enyi hun e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nuɖiɖi ɖaxo sala ɖo e mɛ ɖevo lɛ tawun hwenu e ɖo xo ɖɔ nu do mawu tɔn kpo nukunɖiɖo tɔn kpo wu wɛ e
tamɛ linlin do nu enɛ ji mi tawun ɖo taan mɛ nuɖiɖi kpo nukunɖiɖo kpo han tawun e wɛ mi ɖe
enyi nu ɖagbe ɖe ɖo biblu mɛ ɔ sixu ma xa mɛ ɖevo a
ee eflati ɔ ɖo nisaan gudo e ɔ tunta tofɔligbe fi jehovah tɔn nu e
do nukun mɛ hwenu sala nɔ nu do eɖee nɔ ɖɛkpɛ ayi ɔ ji tɔn e ɖo sinmɛ vovo gbɔn e kpo finɛ nɔ e kpo
jehovah eɖee ablaxamu ɖo malin malin do atin ɖaxo mɔlee tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo sikɛmu kpa lɛ e ɖɔ to elɔ kunkan towe
xokwin kunkan ɔ ɖo tinmɛ nu ablaxamu tawun
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e flin jikpa edɛni tɔn finɛ wɛ jehovah ɖe ɖɔ kunkan ɖe su kun do nu sataan
jehovah ɖɔ nu ablaxamu ɖɔ akɔta gosin kun tɔn mɛ e hun nyɔna lɛ sin ali nu lɛ bi ɖo ayikungban ji
e ɖo co xwedo ɔ gɔn gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ mɔ a
adɔ ɖo kanaa bɔ ablaxamu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn kpla xwedo tɔn yi ejipu ɖo tofɔligbe
e mɔ awovinu jɛ ɖo xa enɛ mɛ e ɖe
enyi ɖɔ hun kɛnklɛn ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nɔvi wɛ nyi bonu kpe nukun do wu ganji ɖo hwɛ wu enɛ ɔ e sin hwɛ wu bɔ gan
etɛwu ablaxamu byɔ nu bunɔ mɔhun
ablaxamu nyi adingbannɔ alo xɛsinɔ akɔwe ɖe lɛ ɖɔ gbɔn e a
nugbo ɔ tɔn wɛ sala nyi
nu ablaxamu byɔ e sɔgbe tawun
ablaxamu kpo sala kpo tuun ɖɔ nuɖe kun ɖo taji hu linlin mawu tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ kunkan bunɔ ɖe kpo akɔta ɖe kpo gbɔn ablaxamu ji e o enɛ wu ɔ ganjininɔ ablaxamu tɔn wa huzu nu taji hu nu bi nu
hu ɔ dobanunu dokunkun tɔn sin kunnuɖenu lɛ ɖɔ mɛ ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ ɖo ejipu lɛ e nɔ yawu yi sunnu ɖe sin asi nɔ hu asu tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ ablaxamu wa nu kpo nunywɛ kpo bɔ sala eɖee ɖo gbe xa ɛ
yi ɖo gbe nu ɖegbe ɖɔ e kpla nyɔnu ɔ wa nu emi
e vɛwu bɔ e mɔ nu jɛ adohu adohu ablaxamu tɔn alo xɛsi ɖo ɖi sala e wu
e ci ɖɔ e kun wa nu xa ɛ kannumɔ ɖe ɖɔhun o loɔ e yi jonɔ nukunɖeji ɖe ɖɔhun
boya kan ayixa do ɖɔ xo dɔkun tɔn lɛ do gba nukunmɛ bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ kpo ablaxamu kpo huzu asi tɔn
do nukun mɛ ɖɔ sala ɖo hɔnmɛ ɔ sin flɛtɛli ɖe alo sin agba ɖe ji ɖo ejipu to ɔ sin tanu wɛ
din e wa ɖo xɔ e gba kpodo bliki kpo e mɛ bɔ nuɖuɖu ɖagbe lɛ ɖo nukɔn tɔn e ɔ e ci
fɛɛ mɛ ninɔ tɔn vlafo ee tlɛ tawun hu wuu tɔn e tuun e gba tamɛ wɛ a
enyi e jo ablaxamu do huzu enɛ sin asi wɛ ɔ e vivi nu sataan e
sala wa nu mɔhun ɖe a
e nɔ gbeji nu asu tɔn nu alɔwliwli tɔn nɔ nu mawu tɔn
enyi mɛ wli alɔ ɖo nublibliwiwa tɔn egbe tɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ ɖe gbejininɔ mɔhun ɔ e e
sixu xwedo gbejininɔ tɔn sala tɔn hwenu ɖo nu wa xa mɛ towe lɛ kpo towe lɛ kpo wɛ e a
jehovah byɔ xo ɔ mɛ azɔn baɖabaɖa ɖe lɛ do kpo xwedo tɔn kpo do cyɔn alɔ nyɔnu enɛ ji
hwenu se ɖɔ ablaxamu si wɛ nu sala e ɔ e lɛkɔ asu tɔn ɖɔ nu xwedo ɔ bi ɖɔ gosin ejipu
hwenu ablaxamu mɔ asi tɔn e ɔ e vivi e
flin ɖɔ e ɖɔ kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ ɖɛkpɛ
ɖɛkpɛ sala tɔn alɔkpa ɖevo dɔn ɛ tawun ɖɛkpɛ ɖe wɛ hugan ee e ɖo nukunta e
sala ɖɛkpɛ xomɛ tɔn nugbo ɔ ɖɛkpɛ enɛ wɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ
ðɛkpɛ mɔhun wɛ mi bi sixu tɛnkpɔn
enyi mi nɔ gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ ma nu mi tuun do mawu wu lɛ e xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ jɛhun do nugbododo mawu tɔn kunkpla walɔ ɖagbe lɛ e ji ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ nukɔn kpo gbejininɔ kpo ɔ mi ɖi nu sala ɖɔhun
tɛlaxi wɛ ji mɛ we lɛ bi ɖo nɔ vovo xomɛ
alɔwliwli mɔhun sɔgbe ɖo egbe a e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi hɛn mɛ ɖɔ nu lɛ gbɔn vo tawun hwenɛnu
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo hɛn mɛ nyi e bu e ɔ e lin din hwenɛnu a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖo hwɛhuhu hɛn nu gble do mɛ enɛ lɛ wu din a wutu ɔ alɔwliwli ɖo hɛnnumɔ lɛ tɛntin nɔ dɔn azɔn baɖabaɖa lɛ wa kunkan lɛ mɛ a
ɖo xwe gudo ɔ hwɛhuhu do lɛ ji bi nɛ
hwe enɛ ɔ mɔyizi ɔ ɖɔ hɛnnumɔ ɖe ɔ ma ɖoxo xa ɖe ɔ o levii vi lɛ
tuun ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ nɔ gbo hwɛ nu lelenɔ e nɔ jɛhun do wamamɔnɔ ji
ðɛhan axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn dɔn nujlɔjlɔwiwa wa ayikungban ɔ ji
mawu nɔ mɔ nuagɔwiwa ɔ mɛ lɛ e jla ɖo
nujlɔjlɔwiwa gosin mawu gɔn e dɔn fifa kpo ayijayi kpo wa ayikungban ɔ ji ezayii
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ mawu kɔn nyɔna do taji ɖe lɛ ji donu ɖevo lɛ bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ mawu nɔ wa nu xa mɛ bi ɖo ali ɖokpo ɔ
mawu nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ a loɔ ɖo akɔta ɖebu mɛ ɔ mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nɔ xwedo hwɛjijɔ ɔ mɛ enɛ sin nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ
ðo mawu nukunmɛ ɔ lɛ bi wɛ ɖo
biblu ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɖe nu to bi akɔta bi gbe bi kpodo togun bi kpo
nu jlo tuun nu ɖevo lɛ do hwenu nujlɔjlɔwiwa ayikungban ɔ ji e wu hun wemata wema elɔ tɔn etɛ biblu mɛ tawun jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
le revelation quelle est
bible et vous questions biblique glɔ
nukanbyɔ ðe
nu biblu ðɔ do kpo ku kpo wu e
hwenu ðe ðo kuzɔn jɛ wɛ e
elias hutter kpo biblu tɔn ebleegbe tɔn nukunðeji lɛ kpo
wekwin ebleegbe tɔn kpɛvi bi ɔ ganjɛwu ðaxo ðe mɛ
palaðisi ðo ayikungban ji alo nujɔnu
mawu jlo ɖɔ mi ku wɛ a
biblu ɖɔ mawu sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku tiin a
atɔxwɛ elɔ ɖɔ xo do nu biblu ɖɔ do kpo ku kpo wu e ji
ðibla yi sinsɛn ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ bi sin sinsɛnvi lɛ wɛ ɖi nu ɖɔ tɔn kun nɔ ku o
xota ðo akpa ɔ ji e etɛ biblu ðɔ do kpo ku kpo wu
nu vovo wɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ do kpo ku kpo wu
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖo ku yetɔn gudo ɔ kpo ɖo bɔya ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ alo ɖo fi ɖevo
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ emi jɔ wa nɔ gbɛmɛ fi
sixu ɖo linlin hwiɖesunɔ tɔn do xo ɔ wu bɔ linlin enɛ sin yi e alo aca fi jɔ ɖe e tɔn wu
ðo linlin mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo do nu nɔ jɛ ɖo ku gudo e wu e gbɔn vo tawun wutu ɔ mi sixu mɔ xosin sɔgbe lɛ e nu nukanbyɔ enɛ ɖo mɛɖe alo ɖo fi ɖe a
nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɔ sinsɛngan lɛ sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ jɔmaku tɔn ɔ mɛ
sinsɛn ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ ɖi sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn lɛ hindou tɔn lɛ jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ malɛnu lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo sin sinsɛnvi lɛ bi wɛ ɖibla ɖi nu ɖɔ kun nɔ ku o le e nɔ kpo ɖo hwenu agbaza ɔ ku e nɔ ɖo yɛswimɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ bouddhiste lɛ nɔ ɖɔ enyi e jɔ azɔn nabi ɖe gudo ɔ nuwukpikpe taglomɛ tɔn e ɖo e nɔ mɛ yi ninɔmɛ ɖagbeɖagbe e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ e mɛ
nukplɔnmɛ mɔhun lɛ bɔ mɛ gege ɖo ɔ mɛ wa ɖi nu ɖɔ ku nɔ hun sin hɔn nu mɛ ɖo fi ɖevo
nu mɛ gege ɔ sin akpaxwe taji ɖe wɛ ku nyi bɔ jlo mawu tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ ku
etɛ biblu ɖɔ do xo ɔ wu
kɛnklɛn xa xota bɔ e
xosin ɔ sixu kpaca
ee mi xa nuɖiɖo lɛ sin ɖo wema biblu tɔn nyi e mɛ e ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ mawu ɖɔ nu sunnu nukɔntɔn adamu ɖɔ sixu ɖu atin ɖo jikpa ɔ mɛ ɔ bi sin
atin sin e nɔ ɖu nɔ tuun nu ɖagbe kpodo nu nyanya kpo ɔ kɛɖɛ jɛn ɖu a ɖo gbe gbe ɖu ɔ ku
xo enɛ zawe a e ɖɔ nu adamu setonu nu gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn wɛ ɔ e ku a loɔ e ɖo tɛgbɛ ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn mɛ
e blawu ɖɔ adamu kun setonu ba nɔ sɔyi o e wa ɔ e jlo do xo gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn nyi ɖu atin sin e do e hwenu asi tɔn ɛvu ɛ e
nu mɛ to tlitli enɛ kɔ do e kpo ɖo nu wa do mi wu wɛ jɛ egbe
pɔlu tinmɛ xo ɔ gbɔn le hwɛhuhu ɔ ɖokpo gee ji wɛ e gbɔn wa ɔ mɛ mɛ enɛ wɛ nyi adamu hwɛhuhu ɔ dɔn ku wa
enɛ ɔ lɛ bi nɔ ku ɖo mɛ bi wɛ hu hwɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ etɛ nyi hwɛhuhu ɔ etɛwu e dɔn ku wa
nu adamu wa jlo do tlito alo gba mawu tɔn e wɛ nyi hwɛhuhu
jaan nu mɛ hwɛhuhu ɔ kɔ do e wɛ nyi ku mawu ɖɔ gbɔn nu adamu e
nu adamu kpo kunkan tɔn wa jɔ lɛ e kpo kpo ɖo tonu se nu gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn wɛ ɔ ɖo hwɛ ɖe kɔ a ku gbeɖe a
mawu blo nu e ku a loɔ e nɔ wu wɛ tlɛ nɔ sɔyi
nuɖe ɖo mɛ nɔ kpo ɖo ɖo ku gudo wɛ a
mɛ gege ɖɔ ɛɛn ɖɔ nuɖe ɖo mɛ nɔ nyi kun nɔ ku o
enyi hun adingban wɛ mawu ɖo nu adamu nɛ
gbɔn e
ðo enyi nuɖe nɔ sin mɛ nɔ yi nɔ ɖo fi ɖevo ɖo ku gudo hun ku nyi ba hwɛhuhu dɔn wa mawu ɖɔ gbɔn e a nɛ
biblu ɖɔ mawu sixu ɖo adingban a
eblee lɛ e ɖɔ xo nugbo ɔ sataan wɛ hwenu e ɖɔ xo elɔ nu ɛvu e ku ɖe a
enɛ wɛ dɔn nukanbyɔ elɔ wa enyi adingban ji wɛ nukplɔnmɛ jɔmaku tɔn ɔ jinjɔn ɔ etɛ nɔ jɛ ɖo ku gudo tawun
nuɖiɖo lɛ sin ɖo mɛ e ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ kan do mɛ fun funfun nɔ mɛ ɔ do awɔntin tɔn mɛ bɔ ɔ huzu mɛ gbɛɖe
xokwin ebleegbe tɔn wɛ e lilɛ do mɛ gbɛɖe
enɛ wu ɔ biblu ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e kun da bɔ e ɖo jɔmaku ɖe o
e wa ɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ nyi mɛ gbɛɖe
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ lɛ ɖo nu mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ jɔmaku e a co etɛwu sinsɛn gege nɔ enɛ mɛ
xosin ɔ kpla mi yi ejipu hwexonu tɔn mɛ
herodote nyi hwenuxo grece tɔn ɖe ɖo xwe kanweko e ɖɔ ɖɔ ejipunu lɛ wɛ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn ɖeɖee jɛhun do jɔmaku xo ɔ ji e
e mɔ linlin jɔmaku tɔn ɔ ɖo aca babilɔnunu hwexonu tɔn lɛ tɔn mɛ
taan mɛ alexandre ðaxo ɔ ɖu ɖo gbadahweji azii tɔn ji ɖo e ɔ grece tɔn lɛ funfun nukplɔnmɛ ɔ bɔ tlolo jɛn e gbakpe axɔsuɖuto grece tɔn ɔ bi mɛ
mɔ xogbe jɔmaku ɔ ɖo wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖebu mɛ a
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn ɔ jwifu lɛ tɔn nukunɖeji we essenien lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo mɛ ɖɔ nɔ kpo ɖo hwenu agbaza ku e
jewish ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ jɔmaku tɔn ɔ nukplɔnmɛ grece lɛ tɔn mɛ wɛ jwifu lɛ sin ɖo taji ɔ gbɔn tamɛnukplɔnmɛ platon tɔn lɛ gblamɛ
ɖokpo ɔ hwenuxo jwifu josephe nɔ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ ɔ kun gosin mawuxowema ɔ mɛ o loɔ grece lɛ wɛ ɖi nu e mɔ ɖɔ xɛxo yetɔn lɛ xokple lɛ e mɛ wɛ e ɖe
ee aca grece tɔn ɖo gbigbakpe wɛ e ɔ klisanwun lɛ lɔ wa nukplɔnmɛ pagawun lɛ tɔn enɛ
sɔgbe kpo xo hwenuxo jona lendering ɖɔ e kpo ɔ nukplɔnmɛ platon tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ mitɔn nɔ fi ɖagbe ɖe cobo wa ɖo gblegble ɖe mɛ din e bɔ tamɛnukplɔnmɛ platon tɔn yawu byɔ sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn lɛ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ pagawun tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ kun nɔ ku o e byɔ sinsɛn klisanwun lɛ tɔn mɛ wa huzu ɖokpo ɖo nu taji ɖi nu lɛ e mɛ
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ pɔlu elɔ nu mɛ gbigbɔ ɔ ɖesu ɖɔ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛɖe lɛ jo nuɖiɖi do ɖoto gbigbɔ nɔ flu mɛ lɛ kpodo yɛ nyanya lɛ sin nukplɔnmɛ kpo
timɔtee xo enɛ lɛ nyi nugbo e
yɛ nyanya lɛ sin nukplɔnmɛ tɔn ɖe wɛ jɔmaku xo ɔ nyi
biblu yi gbe a bɔ azinkan tɔn gosin sinsɛn pagawun hwexonu tɔn lɛ kpo tamɛnukplɔnmɛ lɛ kpo mɛ
e vivi nu mi bɔ jezu ɖɔ tuun nugbo ɔ bɔ nugbo ɔ ɖe sin kannumɔgbenu
jaan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɖiɖo do nugbo biblu tɔn wu nɔ ɖe mi sin kannumɔgbenu nukplɔnmɛ kpo nuwalɔ ɖeɖee wli nu mawu a bɔ sinsɛn gege nɔ mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo tɔn
mitɔn do lɛ ji bonu nɔ nu xwe alo kpowun ɖo ayikungban ji wa yi nɔ fi ɖevo sɔyi a
linlin e ɖo nu lɛ ɖo e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ ɖo ayikungban ji fi sɔyi nyi vi tɔn lɛ
wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu lɛ e sin ɖokpo wɛ linlin ɖaxo enɛ nyi bɔ nu ɖe sixu mɛ a
malacii mawu mɛ nu ðɛhan ɔ jiɖe mi ɖɔ ayikungban ɔ nyi hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ tɔn bɔ nɔ ji sɔyi ðɛhan
nu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu biblu ɖɔ do kpo ku kpo wu e mɛ hun wemata wema etɛ biblu mɛ tawun
tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
e ɖo www jw org ji
posidonia oceanica wɛ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ gbehan xu mɛ tɔn alɔkpa ɖe wɛ cyɔn xu ɔ sin azan ji bi ɖo espagne kpo kpo tɛntin
enyi gbehan lɛ sixu ɔ lɛ
ɖeɖee nɔ do nu nu nɔ bɔ e nɔ kpo lɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ɖɔ sixu hu e nɔ gbɔn din e
ði ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ wema ɖɔ xo do nu enɛ wu e ɖe gbeje nu taji tobutobu nunywɛ xwitixwiti do ɖo ali enɛ lɛ e bi
nukɔnyiyi tiin ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti linu e to bonu tɔn jɛji alo gbɔ ɔ ayi jɛn mi ɖe wa
nukunɖiɖo ninɔ sɔyi tɔn nugbo ɔ sin nunywɛ xwitixwiti egbe tɔn wu a
biblu do gesi mitɔn jehovah mawu ɖɔ hwi wɛ ɔ jɔ sin
ðɛhan jezu klisu xoɖɛ e ɖɔ mavɔmavɔ ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ tuun tuun ɖɔ hwi wɛ nyi mawu nugbo ɖokpo tiin e tuun jezu klisu ɔ mɛ e
jaan nugbo ɔ gan ɖeɖee mi do tuun jehovah mawu kpo vi tɔn jezu klisu kpo hɛn xomɛ yetɔn hun lɛ e ɔ e nyɔna mavɔmavɔ lɛ do tɔn mi
lɛ ɖɔ gbehan xu mɛ tɔn alɔkpa elɔ ɖe lɛ nu xwe mɔkpan
ðo klewun mɛ ɔ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛkuku lɛ ɖo yɔdo mɛ ɖo sin ku
jaan ɖo ji wɛ alo ɖo ɖebu mɛ a ɖo mɛ ku lɛ tuun nuɖe a
ðo nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ e ku jlɛ do amlɔ wu
jaan enɛ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖi xɛsi nu mɛ ɖeɖee ku lɛ e alo fa xomɛ nu gbɔn vɔsisa nu gblamɛ a
sixu mi alo hɛn nu gble do mi wu a ɖo tamɛ linlin nutuuntuun kpo nunywɛ kpo ɖe ɖo yɔdo mɛ a
gbɔn sin ku gblamɛ ɔ mawu su kun do nu ku sɔyi kɔlɛntinu lɛ
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ mi ganjɛ nu biblu ɖɔ e wu
ðokpo gee wema wɛ ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ bɔ mɛ wlan ɖo xwe kanweko donu jɛji vlamɛ sin wa
e ɖe xo lɛ mɛ ɖeɖee wlan lɛ e
gbesisɔ ðo hwenuxo linu nu ɖeɖee e wlan do biblu mɛ lɛ e sɔgbe bi xa kunnuɖenu nu jɛ ɖo hwenuxo mɛ lɛ e tɔn
wema ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu lɛ xɛxo lɛ kpo kunnuɖiɖe agɔ sin wema lɛ kpo nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ jɛ ɖo fi linlin ɖe alo ɖo hwenu linlin ɖe ɖie e ɔ biblu tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖɔ fi nu lɛ jɛ ɖe e kpo azan gbe jɛ e kpo
ði ɔ ɖo wema levii vi lɛ tɔn sin wemata kpo kpo mɛ ɔ e izlayɛli vi lɛ do wufifɛ kpo jɛmɛji kpo wu lin tawun cobɔ e wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ azɔnkwin lɛ kpo nɔ mɛ gbɔn e kpo wu
biblu ɖɔ xo do ayikungban ɔ ɖo toboo gbɔn e kpo e ɖo gblolo mɛ gbɔn e kpo wu xwe kanweko mɔkpan gudo wɛ nunywɛ xwitixwiti wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu enɛ lɛ wu ganji jɔbu ezayii
do nujɔnu mɛ do mɛhwenu ɖo taji tawun
hwenu e mɔ nutitɛ taglomɛ tɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe nu doreen sin asu wesley ee ɖo xwe kpowun e ɔ doreen flu bi
dotoo lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ yɔywɛ ɖe jɛn kpo bɔ e nɔ
sixu ɖi nu se e a wɛ e flin
nu aklunɔzan gbla mɔkpan ɔ flu bi
e ci nu mi ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo wu wɛ nu enɛ ɖo jijɛ do wɛ ɖɔhun kun nyi midɛɛ lɛ wu o
sɔnu tɔn ɖebu a
kuzɔn ɖe sixu do mɛɖebu lele mɛ ɖo hweɖebunu
e jɛ tawun ɖɔ mɛ gege nɔ jlo do kpe nukun do yetɔn e mɔ kuzɔn ɖe e wu
nukunkpikpe do azinzɔnnɔ wu vɛwu tawun
etɛ xwedo ɖe tɔn lɛ sixu wa do do gbɔ nu yetɔn ɖo kuzɔn ɖe jɛ wɛ e kpe nukun wu tɔn
lɛ sixu ɖi xwi xa tobutobu sixu mɔ ɖo azɔn ɔ hwenu lɛ e gbɔn
ee ku mɛ ɔ tɔn ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ etɛ e sixu ɖo nukun
jɛ nukɔn ɔ nu mi nu wu nukunkpikpe do mɛ ɖo kuzɔn ɖe jɛ wɛ e wu e nyi taji ɖe ɖo egbe e
xwe kanweko ɖie ɔ nu e ma xwe nabi mɛ lɛ nɔ e ɖo ɔ e hwe tawun hu egbe tɔn tlɛ nyi ɖo to hun nukun lɛ mɛ
jɛmɛji lɛ kpo alitawovi lɛ kpo nɔ yawu hu mɛ lɛ
dotooxwe lɛ tiin a bɔ xwedo tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ kpe nukun do mɛ gege wu bɔ nɔ ku jɛ xwegbe
egbe ɔ nukɔnyiyi nunywɛ xwitixwiti tɔn ɖo lanmɛ nɔ ganji linu bɔ dotoo lɛ kpewu nɔ liza xa azɔn syɛnsyɛn lɛ bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ kpɛɖe
mɛɖe sixu ɖo azɔn nɔ yawu hu mɛ e jɛ wɛ bɔ din ɔ e sixu nɔ nu xwe gege
enɛ sixu nɔ bɔ azɔn ɔ gbɔ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ azinzɔnnɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo tawun nɔ bɔ nɔ sixu kpe nukun do yeɖee wu a
nukunkpikpe do mɛ mɔhun lɛ wu nɔ wa vɛwu tawun nɔ byɔ gandido
mɛ ɔ dotooxwe wɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ ku ɖe hwɛhwɛ e nyi xwegbe a
egbe ɔ mɛ gege tuun nu nɔ nyi gbɔn bɔ gbɔjɛ mɛɖe tɔn nɔ xwɛ e a bɔ mɛ kpɛɖe jɛn mɔ bɔ mɛɖe ɖo kuku wɛ
enɛ wu ɔ xɛsi nɔ ɖi mɛ do nu ja jijɛ gbe e wu e sixu nu gan ɖeɖee mɛɖe do ba kpe nukun do xwedo tɔn sin ɖo azɔn jɛ wɛ e wu e tlɛ sixu gbɔjɔ kan mɛ
etɛ sixu mɛ
ninɔmɛ doreen tɔn gbɔn e ɔ mɛ gege nɔ flu bi hwenu e mɔ kuzɔn ɖe nu yetɔn ɖe e
hwenu adohu adohu ɖaxo xɛsi kpo aluwɛ kpo ɖo mɛɖe ji e ɔ etɛ sixu ɛ sɔnu nu nu ja jijɛ gbe e
mawu tɔn ɖe xoɖɛ ɖɔ mi mi sixu xa azan mitɔn lɛ gbɔn e bonu mi do sixu ɖo ayi nunywɛ tɔn
ðɛhan nwt xoɖɛ jehovah mawu byɔ ɖɔ e emi xa azan emitɔn lɛ kpo nunywɛ kpo gbɔn e emi enɛ ɔ sixu zan azan kpo bɔ towe nɔ e xa ɛ ɖo ali hugan e
enɛ byɔ ɖɔ e sɔnu ganji
enyi towe kpo ɖo kɛ wɛ ɖo jlo ba ɖɔ xo do xo ɔ wu ɔ e sixu nyi nunywɛnu ɖɔ kan mɛ ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ hwenu wiwa wa glo e e byɔ ɛ
ɖɔ xo ɖo do nujɔnu mɛ do nu elɔ lɛ wu e ɛ ɖo dotooxwe alo e yi gbe nu nukunkpikpe do mɛ wu bunɔ ɖe lɛ ɖi reanimation
biblo sixu ɖe lɛ kpo hwɛ xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖeɖee wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ lɛ e do yeɖee e kpo kpo
do nujɔnu mɛ do mɛhwenu bɔ xwedo ɔ ayi ɖo kpe nukun do wu tɔn ɖo azɔn ɔ hwenu gbɔn e ji
e nuɖe wa ɖo nu mɛɖe a ɔ e nɔ yi a wɛ biblu ɖɔ nunywɛxo
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nukɔntɔn ɖe ɖo wa e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e do gbɔ nu mɛ
e ɖo ganjɛwu mɛ ɖo kudonu e ɖɔ e yi wan bɔ e kun ɖo eɖokponɔ o
e sixu wa enɛ gbɔn
xa nu nu azinzɔnnɔ ɔ alo jihan wema kpo ɖeɖee do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɛ awajijɛ lɛ e kpo
mɛ gege tiin bɔ hwenu xwedo yetɔn sin ɖe hɛn alɔ yetɔn ɖɔ xo nu kpo kpo e ɔ e do gbɔ nu
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu azinzɔnnɔ ɔ nɔ tuun mɛ wa ɛ lɛ e bi ɔ e nɔ
gbeɖiɖo ɖe ɖɔ ðo nuwukpikpe taji wujɔnu tɔn lɛ ɖo e mɛ ɔ les cinq sens to tɔn wɛ nyi ee nɔ nɔte gbɔn gudo hwenu mɛɖe ɖo kuku wɛ e
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe mɛ ɔ e doya nu pɔlu kpo tɔn lɛ kpo syɛnsyɛn bɔ tlɛ tuun ɖɔ emi gan lɔ a
alɔdo tɛ
pɔlu savo nu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ miɖesunɔ ɔ do alɔ mi ɖo ɖɛ nɔ xo nu mi lɛ gblamɛ
kɔlɛntinu lɛ ðɛ xixo ɖo ɖaxo kpo azɔn syɛnsyɛn kpo hwenu xɔ akwɛ tawun
hwɛhwɛ ɔ tuuntuun ɖɔ mɛtɔn ɖe ɖo kudonu nɔ bɔ e nɔ flu tawun
e kpaca mɛ a ɖo ku ɔ nyi nuɖe sɔgbe a
e da mi bonu mi yi gbe ɖɔ ku nyi akpaxwe ɖe ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ a
hlɔmanu lɛ enɛ wu wɛ xo mawu tɔn ylɔ ku ɖɔ
kɔlɛntinu lɛ enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo gaan ɖɔ mi kun nɔ tamɛ ɖɔ mitɔn ɖe ɖo kudonu o sɔgbe lɔ
e ɖo co tamɛ linlin do nu sixu wa jɛ e ji sixu xwedo ɔ tɔn lɛ bɔ xɛsi yetɔn ɖekpo lobɔ ayi ɖo nu ɖeɖee wa do do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali hugan e e ji
e nu ɖeɖee sixu jɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ do gbavi aklunɔzan gbla gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ kun nɔ nyi nu azinzɔnnɔ lɛ bi o jɛn nɔ wa ɖo alɔkpa ɖokpo ɔ mɛ a e nɛ
e hwe byɔ huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ nɔ tiin ɖo ninɔmɛ azinzɔnnɔ gege tɔn mɛ
ðo ku ɖe tɔn gudo ɔ e sixu nyi nunywɛnu ɖɔ e ylɔ mɛtɔn yi gbe ba mɛ e ɖe
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ e ganjɛwu lɛ kpo xwedo ɔ kpo ɖɔ nu gbo yetɔn e vɔ bɔ e kun ɖo ɖe mɔ wɛ o
mitɔn jiɖe mi kpo kpo ɖɔ mɛ ku lɛ tuun nuɖe a
mi sixu nu alɔdo mɛɖebu tɔn a
e ɖo taji ɖɔ e ganjɛ mawu wu e nyi hwenu xwedo tɔn ɖe ɖo kuzɔn jɛ wɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ e wa a loɔ e ɖo wa hwenu nɔ jɛ ku tɔn gudo lɛ e nɔ wa e
e sixu nɔ gudo nu gbɔn xo kpo nuwiwa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn lɛ e kpo gblamɛ
nɔ nu alɔdo mɛɖebu tɔn a wɛ doreen ɖɔ
nugbo ɔ alɔ mɛ lɛ do mi lɛ e tunfla
nyɛ kpo asu kpo mɔ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ jehovah ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ ɖo xa ɖo ninɔmɛ elɔ mɛ
wɔn gbeɖe a
ðo e wɛ da mi wutu ɔ e tuun mitɔn lɛ kpo aluwɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo
e kpewu mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ mi sixu dɛ bɔ akpakpa nɔ ɛ
hu ɔ e ɖɔ zaanɖe din ɔ emi ɖe ku siin bi wa liva mɔkpan ɖo flin tɔn mɛ lɛ e sin ku
jaan hwenɛnu ɔ mɛ bi sixu suxo ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ pɔlu ɖɔ e ku fitɛ ɖuɖeji towe ɖe
ku fitɛ acɛ towe nɔ do wa nu nyanya ɔ ɖe kɔlɛntinu lɛ
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ lɛ
nuɖuɖu kpo sin kpo nɔ jlo e a
enyi e sa nɔ nyi glycerine e do tɔn avɔxwɛ fifa ɖe nyi tɔn ji ɔ azinzɔnnɔ ɔ sixu vo
jlo ɖiɖo ba nɔ eɖokponɔ alo nɔ xa mɛ klewun ɖe
blo bonu xa ɔ mɛ nɔ xwii
amlɔ magbokɔ
ɖo sugbaja xo wɛ e ɖe e o e wa ɔ ɖɔ xo kpo gbe fifa kpo ɛ ganjɛwu
ayi tɔn nɔ wlu
ðɔ nyikɔ towe ɖoto e kpo sisi kpo e tlɛ ci ɖɔ ayi tɔn wlu ɔ nɛ
blo bonu azinzɔnnɔ ɔ kpo zan tɔn kpo nɔ ji e byɔ gbɔn e
gbɔjɛ tɔn ɖo nu ɖɔ wɛ e sixu nyi jɔhɔn kpowun ɖo tɔn tuntun e mɛ gbɔn wɛ
gbɔjɛ ɔ nɔ yi do a
enyi e tɔn do ji kpo kɔɖonu ɖe kpo ɔ e sixu bɔ gbɔjɛ tɔn din ganji
sinmɛ agbaza ɔ tɔn nɔ huzu
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu nɔ nyi ɖo agbaza ɔ nɔ kanjɔ do hun ɔ mɛ ba do wujɔnu agbaza ɔ tɔn taji lɛ
sixu xa biblu do ebleegbe mɛ a
vlafonu wɛ e nyi
boya tlɛ mɔ ebleegbe sin biblu ɖe gbeɖe lɔ a
e ɖo co biblu towe ɖo asi towe e sixu su nukun towe mɛ hwenu nu do akɔwe xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn nɔ nyi elias hutter e kpo biblu ebleegbe tɔn we e lɛ e kpo wu e
e ji elias hutter ɖo ɖo gorlitz toxo kpɛvi ɖe wɛ sɛkpɔ dogbo allemagne ɖo xa pologne kpo republique tcheque kpo ɖo egbe e
hutter zanzanhweji azii tɔn sin gbe lɛ ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔ ɖe lutheran ɖo iena
xwe kpowun jɛn e ɖo bɔ e ɛ kplɔnyiji alavɔ tɔn bɔ e ebleegbe mɛ ɖo leipzig
ðo e hɛn huzuhuzu lɛ wa ɖo nukplɔnmɛ linu wutu ɔ e wa hun wemaxɔmɛ ɖe ɖo nuremberg bɔ wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ sixu ebleegbe glɛkigbe kpo allemagne gbe kpo ɖo xwe ɛnɛ vlamɛ
e sixu wa nu mɔhun ɖe ɖo wemaxɔmɛ alo kplɔnyiji alavɔ ɖe ɖo hwenɛnu a
biblu ebleegbe tɔn hutter ɖo e sin akpa
ðo ɔ hutter ɖe akpaxwe biblu tɔn e nɔ ylɔ ɖo kpaa mɛ ɖɔ alɛnuwema xoxo ɔ e do ebleegbe mɛ
xota ɖo wema enɛ ji e wɛ nyi derekh kodesh bɔ e ɖe sin ezayii mɛ bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi ali ɔ
nuwlanwlan lɛ ɖɛkpɛ bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ bi wɛ ɖe ɖɛkpɛ wema elɔ tɔn
nu bɔ biblu enɛ xɔ akwɛ hugan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nyi azɔwanu ɖagbe ɖe bɔ wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ sixu zan do ebleegbe
do mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu biblu ebleegbe tɔn hutter tɔn zan e mɛ ɔ nu mi ɖɔ xo do ɖe nɔ mɔ hwenu e ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba xa biblu do ebleegbe mɛ e we ji
nukɔntɔn ɔ wekwin lɛ nɔ gbɔn vo ma do mɛ a bɔ wegɔ ɔ wekwin kpɛvi ɖo kpo fifonu xokwin lɛ tɔn kpo e nɔ bɔ e nɔ vɛwu bonu e xokwin dodo lɛ wu
ði ɔ mi tamɛ do xokwin ebleegbe tɔn e nɔ xa ɖɔ nephesh bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi mɛ alo e ji
ðo ezekiyɛli mɛ ɔ e wekwin ה ɖo bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi ɔ bɔ xokwin hukple ɔ blo hannephesh alo ɔ
nu mɛ ebleegbe xixa ma do a e ɖe ɔ xokwin hannephesh sixu ci nu gbɔn vo tawun nu nephesh e ɖɔhun
do wemaxɔmɛvi tɔn lɛ ɔ hutter zan wlɛnwin wemazinzin tɔn bunɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi wekwin ebleegbe tɔn tlitli lɛ kpo ee tli a lɛ e kpo zinzan
e nɔ zin xokwin dodo lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo bɔ wekwin yetɔn lɛ nɔ tli
wlɛnwin enɛ bɔ e bɔwu nu wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ bonu xokwin dodo ebleegbe tɔn lɛ wu bɔ enɛ ɖo gbe ɔ kplɔnkplɔn mɛ
les saintes ecritures du monde nouveau avec notes et references zan wlɛnwin mɔhun ɖo tinmɛ ɖo do lɛ e mɛ
xokwin dodo lɛ nɔ tli bɔ wekwin ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo kpo fifonu kpo lɛ e nɔ tli a
fɔtoo ɖo lɛ e wlɛnwin e zan ɖo biblu ebleegbe tɔn hutter tɔn mɛ ɖo ezekiyɛli mɛ e kpo ee bible avec notes et references zan ɖo wemafɔ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ e kpo
hutter zin wema e nɔ ylɔ ɖo kpaa mɛ ɖɔ alɛnuwema ɔ e do gbe mɛ
e ɖe wema enɛ ɖo nuremberg ɖo bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ polyglotte nuremberg
hutter jlo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e sin lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ebleegbe tɔn do polyglotte nuremberg ɔ mɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi emi tlɛ jlo zan akwɛ wɔbuwɔbu do lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ebleegbe tɔn enɛ mɛ ɔ dobanunu emitɔn nyi
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi lilɛ alɛnuwema ɔ sin glɛkigbe mɛ do ebleegbe mɛ emiɖesunɔ
hutter jo ɖevo bi do fo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ sin ɔ ɖo xwe ɖokpo kpowun vlamɛ
do akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ bɔ hutter do ebleegbe mɛ e
nu akɔwe eblee xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn franz delitzsch wlan e wu lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ebleegbe tɔn e e ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ gbe ɔ mɛ ganji nu nɔ yawu nyi a
hutter jɛ dɔkun ɖo tɔn wu a ɖo wema tɔn lɛ ɖisa ganji a wutu
e ɖo co e wa e wa ɖagbe taji sixu bu gbeɖe a e ɖe
ði ɔ william robertson alɔnuwema ebleegbe tɔn e e jlaɖo zin ɖo bɔ ɖo ɔ richard caddick lɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
ðo hutter zan glɛkigbe dodo ɔ do blo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn wutu ɔ e lilɛ tɛnmɛ nyikɔ kurios aklunɔ kpo theos mawu kpo do jehovah יהוה jhvh ɖo fi e ɖe wemafɔ lɛ sin akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ lɛ e alo fi e mɔ ɖɔ jehovah do gesi wɛ e ɖe lɛ e e
nu taji ɖe wɛ nu enɛ nyi ɖo enyi lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ alɔnuwema ɔ tɔn gege tlɛ zan nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖesu ɔ a ɔ lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ hutter tɔn blo ɖɔ e ɖo nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɔ ɖo tɛn tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ
hweɖebunu mɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn jehovah ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ alo ɖo tinmɛ ɖo do ɖo bible avec notes et references mɛ e ɔ nɔ flin elias hutter wa e kpo biblu tɔn ebleegbe tɔn nukunɖeji lɛ kpo
tinmɛ wegɔ ɖo do ɖo ezekiyɛli mɛ e kpo kpo ɖo bible avec notes et references mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ akɔwe ɖevo lɛ ɖe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ alɛnuwema ɔ tɔn do ebleegbe mɛ jɛ nukɔn
mɛ enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ nyi simon atoumanos nyi yɛhwenɔ byzantin ɖe ɖo e
mɛ ɖevo nɔ nyi oswald schreckenfuchs akɔwe allemagne tɔn ɖe wɛ ɖo
wekwin ɛnɛ nɔte nu nyikɔ mawu tɔn jehovah ɖo ebleegbe mɛ e xa sin ɖisixwe wa yi amyɔxwe
mi sixu ganjɛwu nugbo ɖɔ akpa mawu do lɛ e bi wa jɛnu a
jezu ganjɛ enɛ wu bɔ nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ hɛn lɛ sin nuɖiɖi lido
mi tamɛ do e ɖo mawuxoɖiɖɔ so ji tɔn tɔn ɖo matie mɛ e ji e ɖɔ ðo ma ɖɔ nugbo nu enyi jinukunsin kpodo ayikungban kpo vɔ a ɔ wekwin kpɛvi titi ɖokpo gee ɖo lɛ mɛ hwe sin wɛ cobonu nu lɛ bi sɔgbe a
wekwin kpɛvi bi ɖo wekwin ebleegbe tɔn lɛ mɛ e wɛ nyi י yod nyi wekwin nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo wekwin ɛnɛ ɖeɖee nɔte nu nyikɔ mawu tɔn jehovah e mɛ
nu xokwin kpo wekwin ɖeɖee ɖo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo ɔ lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo mɔ ɖɔ wekwin kpɛvi titi ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo taji tawun
ðiɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔ jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo ɖibla wa yi hu ɖɔ ɔ tɔn kpɛvi titi ɖe gɔn jijɛnu
mawuxowema ɔ jiɖe mi ɖɔ jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo mɔ wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e kpo ɖo sɔyi
ðɛhan enɛ wu ɔ xogbe nukunɖeji enɛ lɛ ɖɔ ɔ tɔn kpɛvi bi ɔ kun gɔn jijɛnu o
jehovah mawu nɔ keya nu kpɛvi lɛ a
ganji
mi tamɛ do nu elɔ ji e ɖɔ nu izlayɛli vi hwexonu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ kun ɖo gba lɛngbɔvi dindinwayixwe tɔn ɔ sin xu lɛ ɖebu o
vlafo kpɛvi ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi
mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wu ɖo gba xu lɛ ɖebu a e mɛ a
sixu nɔ tuun
jehovah mawu tuun ɖɔ enɛ nyi ɖe jɛnu hwenu e doya nu mɛsiya ɔ ɖo yatin ji hu e e gba xu tɔn lɛ ɖebu a ðɛhan jaan
etɛ xo jezu tɔn lɛ mi
mi lɔ sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah sin akpa lɛ bi jɛnu jɛ gudogudo tɔn lɛ bi ji
ganjɛwu wu ɖe e ɖe wɛ xokwin ebleegbe tɔn kpɛvi bi ɔ mɛ
wekwin kpɛvi bi ɖo wekwin glɛkigbe tɔn lɛ mɛ e wɛ nyi nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ kpo ebleegbe tɔn י yod ɔ kpo
ðo ebleegbe mɛ wɛ e wlan mɔyizi ɔ do ɖo wutu ɔ e ci ɖɔ wekwin ebleegbe tɔn ɔ xo ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe
praslin ɖo seychelles fi ahwangan sunvinɔ gordon mɔ jikpa edɛni tɔn eyɛtɔn ɖe ɖo e
palaɖisi
alɔnuwema tomɛyiyi tɔn nɔ ɖo sinmɛ gege lɛ e sin nuxwlemɛ lɛ sixu dɔn mi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi do jɔmɛhun yi palaɖisi enyii ee ɖo fi linlin ɖe e mɛ yi gbɔjɛ wɔn nu kpo mitɔn lɛ kpo bi
mi bi tuun gbɔn e ɔ hwenu mi lɛkɔ wa xwe e ɔ nu lɛ ɖe gbɔn bɔ mi yi e jɛn kpo ɖe
e ɖo co akpakpa nɔ mɛ gbɔn do palaɖisi wu e jiwu tawun
mi sixu gɔn nu elɔ lɛ kanbyɔ miɖee a palaɖisi enyii ɔ nyi nu ɖevo hu ɖe kpowun wɛ a
enyi wɛ ɔ etɛwu akpakpa nɔ mɛ
nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɔ palaɖisi xo ɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ
mɛ gege tiin bɔ xo biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ jikpa ɖokpo ɖo edɛni ɖo zanzanhweji wa ji e wɛ jlo yetɔn nyite
etɛwu jikpa enɛ dɔn mɛ
ɔ ɖɔ nu mi do jehovah mawu wu ɖɔ e blo bɔ atin alɔkpa alɔkpa bɔ yetɔn ɖu lɛ wu ɖo jikpa ɔ mɛ
fi ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ nɔ e ɖe wɛ jikpa enɛ nyi
nu dɔn mɛ hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ atin tɔn nɔ mɛ ɔ wu ɖo jikpa ɔ tɛntin
ɔ tɔn ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɛnɛ nɔ sa sin jikpa ɔ mɛ
tɔsisa enɛ lɛ we tiin bɔ e tuun egbe wɛ nyi tigli kpo eflati kpo
we enɛ lɛ nɔ gbɔn fi e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ irak egbe ɖo pɛsi hwexonu tɔn mɛ e nɔ sa do golfe persique mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ ɖo aca pɛsinu lɛ tɔn mɛ
avɔ pɛsinu lɛ tɔn xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn ɖe ɖo nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn e sin nu lɛ ɖo ɖo philadelphie ɖo pennsylvanie etats unis e jikpa e mɛ do do e ɖe bɔ e ɖe atin lɛ kpo folowa lɛ kpo do
xogbe pɛsinu lɛ nɔ zan nu jikpa e mɛ do do e sin tinmɛ nyi palaɖisi bɔ nu e ɖe do avɔ ɔ mɛ lɛ e nyi mɔjɛmɛ biblu do jikpa edɛni tɔn ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɔ wu lɛ e tɔn
nugbo ɔ gbe gege kpo aca gege kpo mɛ wɛ e palaɖisi tɔn ɔ kpi ɖe gbɔn ɔ mɛ
hwenu xwedo lɛ tɛn yi ayikungban ɔ sin akpa ɖevo lɛ xwe e ɔ nɔ hɛn dodo ɔ e vɔ kpi e ɖe lɛ yi bɔ xwe ɖo xwe ji jɛ wɛ ɔ nuɖiɖi kpo xɛxo ɖeɖee gbakpe xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo nɔ caka ɖo xa
jɛ egbe ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ yawu ylɔ fi ɖeɖee ɖɛkpɛ tawun lɛ e ɖɔ palaɖisi
ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi mɔ fi palaɖisi bu e nɔ e
ði ɔ hwenu ahwangan sunvinɔ grande bretagne tɔn charles gordon yi seychelles ɖo e ɔ tɔdo e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ vallee mai nyi gu ɔ tɔn patrimoine mondial sin nɔtɛn ɖe din e sin ɖɛkpɛ jiwu ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ e wɛ nyi jikpa edɛni tɔn ɔ
ðo xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ ɔ hwenu italie christophe colomb yi tɔtɛntinto hispaniola tɔn ee nyi republique dominicaine kpo haiti kpo din e mɛ e ɔ e kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ jikpa edɛni tɔn ɔ mɔ wɛ emi ɖe a ji
ðokpo nyi liebana xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn tɔn tiin a
ðo ɖiɖe to tɔn enɛ sin ɔ e xa fi ɖe ɖe palaɖisi ɖo tɛntin tɔn
ɛnɛ nɔ sa sin zwe tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ji wɛ nyi tigli eflati pison kpo geon kpo bɔ e ɖɔ nɔte nu sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn gbakpe wɛkɛzo ɛnɛ lɛ bi mɛ e
ðiɖe mɔhun lɛ ɖɔ enyi e tlɛ tuun fi palaɖisi dodo ɔ nɔ e a ɔ e ci e kpo ɖo mɛ dɔn wɛ jɛ egbe
e tuun xo lomilomi angleterre xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn john milton ɖo xo lomilomi le paradis e wlan e wu e jinjɔn tɔn ɖɔ xo do hwɛ adamu hu bɔ e nya ɛ sin edɛni mɛ e ji
e ɖɔ xo do mavɔmavɔ ɖo ayikungban ji sin akpa e do nu lɛ e wu ɖɔ enɛ gudo ɔ ayikungban ɔ bi huzu palaɖisi
enɛ wu ɔ milton wlan kpedenu tɔn xota tɔn nyi le paradis reconquis e

bɔ etɛwu mɛ lɛ wɔn din
nu taji wu wɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mapping ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ sinsɛn lɛ tuun gaan wɔn nu fi palaɖisi nɔ e sin xo ɔ
e gege ɖɔ jixwe wɛ nyi fi gudo tɔn yi nɔ ɖe e le e kun nyi ɖo palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖe mɛ o
e ɖo co biblu ɖɔ ɖo ðɛhan mɛ ɖɔ ayikungban ɔ nyi hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ tɔn bɔ nɔ ji sɔyi
jehovah mawu ɖo palaɖisi tɔn ee bu e ɖɔ emi dɔn wa
daniyɛli ðo axɔsuɖuto enɛ sin acɛkpikpa glɔ ɔ jlo mawu tɔn kunkpla palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn nyi wiwa
mawu mɛ nu gbeyiɖɔ ezayii ɖɔ nu lɛ ci gbɔn ɖo palaɖisi sin akpa e do e mɛ e xoxo bɔ hannyihannyi kpo hwɛgbe kpo ɖeɖee ɖo nu wa do lɛ wu wɛ egbe e ɖe ɖe a
ezayii mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ hwi ze cɛju klewun ɖe do xa wemafɔ enɛ lɛ ɖo biblu towe ɖesu mɛ
wiwa jiɖe do nu mawu nu lɛ e wu
mɛ nɔ hwenɛnu lɛ e ɖu palaɖisi adamu hɛn bu e sin vivi nu yetɔn mawu nukunmɛ
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn sin nukunɖiɖo ɔ nyi nujɔnu kun nyi o
ðo biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ jixwe ɔ jixwe mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖokponɔ gee tɔn wɛ loɔ e ayikungban ɔ lɛ
palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn sin nukunɖiɖo gbla a ɖo mawu do mavɔmavɔ ɔ sin akpa cobɔ ɔ wa tiin e nɔ ɖo adingban a
ðo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn glɔ ɔ fifa ɖo dogbo lɛ nɔ mɔ ɔ wɛ nyi nu nɔ vivi nu e ðɛhan
nu ɖo nyi nu wɛ lɛ bi sin agban ɖo mawu ji ɖo e ɖo nukun kpe do wu wɛ

enyi mi nɔ xoɖɛ ɔ mi sixu mɔ fifa mawu tɔn nɔ ɖe adohu adohu lɛ kpo nu mɛ e filipunu lɛ

mawu ɖe nu nɔ adohu adohu lɛ e siin
