pourquoi meurt
e nɔ do gbɔ nu lɛ gbɔn wɛnɖagbe elɔ gblamɛ zaanɖe din ɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖo ɖe nunyanyawiwa lɛ bi siin blo bɔ ayikungban ɔ huzu palaɖisi ɖe
wɛnsagun lɛ sixu ðo gbɛzan towe mɛ a
nu biblu ðɔ do wɛnsagun lɛ wu e
ðo wɛnsagun ɖe wɛ a
wɛnsagun nyanya lɛ ðe a
wɛnsagun lɛ sixu gbɔn e
nu nyɛ ɔ mawu tiin a
wɛnsagun lɛ tiin doo a
biblu ɖɔ
mɛ nɔ ze hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn do blo nu e lɛ nɔ do ɖɔ emi setonu lɛ kpa ðɛhan
xota ðo akpa ɔ ji e wɛnsagun lɛ etɛ biblu ðɔ do wu
aklunɔzangbe hwelɛkɔ gbe ɖokpo ɔ kenneth kpo filomena kpo nɔ nɔ curacao e yi asu kpo asi kpo nɔ biblu xa e ɖe
kenneth ɖɔ hwenu mi wa e ɔ hɔn ɔ ɖo susu bɔ ɔ ɖo finɛ a
nuɖe ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ ma ylɔ nyɔnu ɔ sin alokan
ee e wu tlolo ɖɔ kenneth kpo filomena kpo ɖo kɔxo e ɔ e wa hɔn ɔ kɔn ylɔ do xɔmɛ
wu tlolo ɖɔ avi wɛ e ɖe
ee kenneth jɛ ɖɛ xo ji do biblu kplɔnkplɔn ɔ e ɔ nyɔnu ɔ avi
enɛ wu ɔ kenneth kpo filomena kpo kan nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ e byɔ ɛ kpo kpo
nyɔnu ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ emi ɖo nu wɛ ba hu emiɖee hwelɛkɔ enɛ ɖo wlan nu asu emitɔn wɛ hwenu alokan emitɔn ɖɔ nu e bɔ emi gbɔ nɔte
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ emi ɖo jɛ wɛ enɛ wu ɔ linlin biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ do do gbɔ
wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ enɛ hwlɛn tɔn gan
kenneth ɖɔ mi doku nu jehovah nu jo e jo mi do bɔ mi nyɔnu enɛ flu e doku tawun nu wɛnsagun alo gbigbɔ tɔn e zan vlafo do mi bɔ mi tɛkan enɛ e
kenneth kpo filomena kpo sin hwɛ jɔ bɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu gbɔn wɛnsagun ɖe ji alo zan gbigbɔ alo hlɔnhlɔn tɔn do ɖo ninɔmɛ ɔ mɛ a
alo kan kenneth tɛ e ɔ nu kpe do nu nu kpowun wɛ a
mi sixu kanɖeji a
nu mi tuun e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mawu nɔ zan wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ do lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ði ɔ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu zan wɛnsagun ɖe do ali klisanwun filipu bonu e etiopiinu ɖo wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɖe
mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ ɖi nu ɖebu nu wɛnsagun lɛ a
enyi hun fitɛ gosin
etɛ biblu ɖɔ do wɛnsagun lɛ wu
sixu wa nu do gbɛzan towe wu a
nu mi do nu kunnuɖenu lɛ
mawu sin nyikɔ wɛ nɔ nyi jehovah ɖo biblu mɛ ðɛhan nwt
jlo tuun nugbo ɔ do wɛnsagun lɛ mɛ alɔkpa nyi e jɔ gbɔn e kpo nu nɔ wa e kpo wu a
fi ɖebu ɖe hugan bɔ e mɔ xosin lɛ ɖe zɛ xo mawu tɔn biblu ɔ mɛ wu a
timɔtee etɛ biblu ɖɔ nu mi
mawu nyi gbigbɔ gbɔn e ɔ jɛn wɛnsagun lɛ nyi gbigbɔ gbɔn bɔ e nɔ mɔ a e nɛ ɖo agbaza a ɖo xu a
wɛnsagun lɛ nɔ nɔ jixwe nɔ yi mawu tlɔlɔ luki matie jaan
hweɖelɛnu wa yi ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ninɔmɛ tɔn wa wa mawu lɛ e ɖo ayikungban ji bɔ hwenu fo gudo e ɔ huzu wɛnsagun lɛ
nɔ nɔ ji vi a
biblu ɖɔ xo do lɛ kpodo wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ kpo sin gbe wu bɔ e ɖɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo gbe yetɔn nɔ ɖɔ xo
mawu zan wɛnsagun lɛ do ɖɔ xo xa lɛ co e gbe mi bonu mi alo xoɖɛ a kɔlɛntinu lɛ
wɛnsagun bɔya liva mɔkpan wɛ tiin
daniyɛli nwt
wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn tawun hu lɛ ɖo nunywɛ hu flafla tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wezun nɔ do tɛn e jiwu tawun zɛ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn wu ðɛhan daniyɛli
wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo nunywɛ kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo tawun co ɖo dogbo bɔ nuɖe lɛ tiin bɔ tuun a matie
e blo wɛnsagun lɛ bɔ gbɔn vo nu yeɖee ɖo jijɔ mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo mɛɖesusininɔ
enɛ wu ɔ lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ sixu jlo wa nu ɖagbe alo nu nyanya
e blawu ɖɔ wɛnsagun ɖe lɛ jlo gu do mawu ji judi
ɖokpo sixu blo
donu ɖokpo blo livi
ɖɔ wɛnsagun xo
enɛ wɛ nyi nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn livi kanweko mɔkpan vlafo liva mɔkpan
wɛnsagun ɖaxo ɔ micɛli wɛ kpa acɛ nu wɛnsagun lɛ bi ɖo hlɔnhlɔn hu bi
mawuxowema ɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ jezu klisu sin nyikɔ ɖevo wɛ nɔ nyi micɛli tɛsalonikinu lɛ judi
nu jlo ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖevo lɛ do wɛnsagun lɛ wu hun wemata wema etɛ biblu sixu mi
tɔn kpo tinmɛ ɖo vivɔnu lɛ e ɔ kpo jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
biblu mɛ ɖɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo wɛnsagun ɖe a
matie ɖiɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo wɛnsagun ɖe a loɔ ɖiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe kpowun ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu wɛnsagun lɛ titewungbe tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ mawu nugbo lɛ nɔ yetɔn ɖo nɔ ɖɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ nya xɛ ɖo emi ji a
enɛ ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ kun nɔ lɛ o wɛ a
ðɛhan mɛɖe lɛ tawun ɖɔ mawu gbɔn wɛnsagun lɛ ji cyɔn alɔ ji ali
kenneth xo e ɖɔ ɖo xota tɔn mɛ e nyi ɖokpo ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
mi sixu ji ɖɔ jɛn e nyi a e sixu nyi xo jɔ xo wɛ e ɖɔ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ mɔ kunnuɖenu ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ nɔ nɔ gudo nu hwenu ɖo yetɔn wa wɛ e
ɖo e nɔ mɔ wɛnsagun lɛ a wutu ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ ba mɛ mawu nɔ zan do mɛ lɛ ɖo ɖo ninɔmɛ vovo lɛ mɛ e a
e ɖo co e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi nɔ doku nu ɔ ɖo nu e sixu wa do nɔ gudo nu mi lɛ e bi wutu kolosinu lɛ jaki
ganji wɛnsagun nyanya lɛ ɖe
fitɛ gosin
flin ɖɔ mawu da wɛnsagun lɛ mɛɖesusininɔ
e da sunnu nukɔntɔn ɔ adamu kpo nyɔnu nukɔntɔn ɔ ɛvu kpo nɔ zaan e ɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo a e ɖe zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn nyi do dɔn wa ayikungban ji
e kpewu adamu kpo ɛvu kpo bɔ gu do mawu ji
biblu ɖɔ nyikɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ tɔn alo tɛn mɛ e ɖe ɖo jixwe cobo wa gu e tawun a
ɖo tɔn gudo ɔ biblu ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ sataan bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ awovi bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nyi sɔgbe matie
e blawu ɖɔ do mawu ji ɔ kun vɔ ɖo finɛ o
ðo nɔwee hwenu ɔ wɛnsagun ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e ɖɔ mɛ nabi wɛ e a lobɔ jo nɔtɛn yeɖesunɔ tɔn do ɖo xwedo jixwe tɔn mawu tɔn mɛ
wa ayikungban ɔ ji gbaza zan blibli zɛ sin linlin wu e da e ji judi
etɛ jɛ do wɛnsagun nyanya enɛ lɛ wu
hwenu mawu sin do vɔ ɔ do ɖe nu kwiji sin ayikungban ɔ ji e ɔ ɖyɔ agbaza huzu nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ
mawu lɔn nu wɛnsagun enɛ lɛ wa winnyanu e lɛkɔ yi nɔtɛn yeɖesunɔ tɔn a
loɔ e do zinflu gbigbɔ tɔn nyi ninɔmɛ winnya tɔn e ɖe mɛ
judi awovi enɛ lɛ jlo byɔ sataan awovi sin acɛ mɛ eyɛ wɛ nyi yɛ nyanya lɛ xɔsu nɔ wɛnsagun weziza tɔn sin ninɔmɛ matie kɔlɛntinu lɛ
biblu mɛ ɖɔ e ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn nyi acɛkpikpa jixwe tɔn ɖe bɔ mɛsiya ɔ e ayi ɖo
bɔ do nu nukunɖeji enɛ jɛ e wu ɔ e nya sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo sin jixwe do ayikungban ɔ ji
nunyanyawiwa vun kan e kpo nublibliwiwa asa vunbla ayikungban ɔ bi e kpo nyi kunnuɖenu ɖe ɖɔ ɖo hlɔn wɛ ɖo mɛ lɛ dɔn xwe ku wɛ
nublibliwiwa kpo dakaxixo gannaganna kpo ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɖɔ acɛkpikpa dakaxixo tɔn yetɔn sin vivɔnu ɖo kɛnnɛkɛnnɛ
zaanɖe din ɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn nyanya enɛ lɛ sin xo fo
enyi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kpacɛ do palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn nu xwe gudo ɔ e jo yɛ nyanya enɛ lɛ do nu hwenu klewun ɖe bɔ lɛ azɔn gudogudo tɔn
nu jlo ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖevo lɛ do axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wu hun wemata wema etɛ biblu sixu mi
tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
nu lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu wɛnsagun lɛ tawun bɔ nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo jlo jehovah tɔn wiwa mɛ titewungbe tɔn
hwenu mawu ɖo ayikungban ɔ e ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo ɖo ji wɛ ɖo xo su wɛ kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
jɔbu sin ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ jlo mɔ nu jɛ wɛn tɔn kunkpla nu ɖeɖee jɛ ɖo ayikungban ji ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e wu
biblu ɖɔ do wa jlo mawu tɔn ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ cyɔn alɔ mawu nugbo lɛ ji ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɖo hweɖelɛnu
hwenu jehovah ɖo kun su do nu toxo nyanya sodɔmu kpo kpo wɛ e ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ lɔti kpo xwedo tɔn kpo bɔ hɔn
hwenu e ɖo nu dɔnkpɛvu eblee atɔn kɔn nyi myɔ ɖaxo ɖe mɛ ɖo babilɔnu hwexonu tɔn mɛ e ɔ mawu wɛnsagun tɔn do bɔ e wa hwlɛn tɔn lɛ gan daniyɛli
ee nya daniyɛli nɔ kinnikinni domɛ bɔ ayi e ɔ e tinmɛ ɖɔ emi gan ɖo mawu wɛnsagun tɔn do bɔ e wa su kinnikinni lɛ sin daniyɛli
hweɖelɛnu ɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn tɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ hwenu wiwa ɖo dandan bonu linlin jehovah tɔn jɛnu e
wɛnsagun ɖe hun gankpa ɖe sin hɔn lɛ nu lɛ ɖegbe nu ɖɔ gbɛkan do wɛnɖagbejijla ɔ ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ
wɛnsagun ɖe ɖɔ nu filipu ɖɔ e yi gbetotlo gosin jeluzalɛmu yi gaza e ji ɖɔ mawuxo nu etiopiinu wa yi mawu ɖo jeluzalɛmu lɛkɔ e ɖe
hwenu ɔ xo nu mawu bɔ mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e huzu klisanwun e ɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn ɖe do ahwangan hlɔmanu kɔnɛyi ji ɖo numimɔ ɖe mɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ e ylɔ wa xwe tɔn gbe
hwenu ɖo gankpa mɛ e ɔ wɛnsagun ɖe do ji tɔn kpla ɛ sin gankpa ɔ mɛ
mawu nɔ zan wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo nujiwu linu do mɛ lɛ biblu gbɔn e ɖo egbe bonu kunnuɖenu ɖe a
matie tuun ɖɔ ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ ɖo enɛ wa wɛ ɖo wɛnsagun lɛ tɔn glɔ a
wɛnsagun lɛ nɔ bɔ e nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
wema tɔn ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo alɔ do lɛ wɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ bi ji bonu nu do jehovah mawu kpo linlin e ɖo nu lɛ e kpo wu
nu nɔ jɛ egbe lɛ e gege nyi kunnuɖenu ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ jijla gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ sin ɔ
nugbo ɔ enyi ɖe jo hwɛ tɔn lɛ do lɛkɔ wa jehovah ɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ luki
etɛ jɛ hwenu ɔ fo e
enɛ gudo ɔ ahwangɔnu jixwe tɔn lɛ nɔ gudo nu jezu klisu axɔsu axɔsu lɛ tɔn ɔ ahwan ɖo mawu ɔ sin azan ɖaxo ɔ gbe bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ haamagedɔni e
wɛnsagun hlɔnhlɔnnɔ lɛ nu aklunɔ jezu dɔn to nu mɛ nɔ setonu nu wɛnɖagbe ɖɔ xo do aklunɔ mitɔn jezu wu a lɛ tɛsalonikinu lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ kudeji ɖɔ nu towe nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu wɛnsagun lɛ
nɔ ganjininɔ mɛ jlo mawu lɛ e tɔn tawun bɔ jehovah zan azɔn gege do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu tɔn ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e cyɔn alɔ ji eblee lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo wa gbeta taji ɖe kɔn
mi ɖoto wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ e ɖe do ɔ bi e setonu a
jehovah tɔn ɖo xa towe mɛ lɛ e hun xomɛ nu xa bɔ ɖu alɔdo wanyiyinɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn hlɔnhlɔnnɔ lɛ tɔn sin le
do ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖevo lɛ do nu biblu ɖɔ do wɛnsagun lɛ kpo ee nɔ gbeji a lɛ e kpo ji hun wemata wema etɛ biblu sixu mi
e ɖo jw org ji
yɔkpɔvu ɖe kpo cukuvi ɖe kpo bocyɔ glɛkinu alo hlɔmanu lɛ tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn jɛ xwe kanweko wegɔ tɔn
hwenu jezu dogbo izlayɛli tɔn lɛ gbe ɖokpo yi tokpɔn hlɔma tɔn nɔ nyi silii e mɛ e ɔ nyɔnu glɛkinu ɖe sɛkpɔ ɛ ɖɔ e do alɔ emi
ðo xosin jezu e mɛ ɔ e mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e do cuku lɛ wu
ðo mɔyizi ɔ glɔ ɔ e nɔ cuku lɛ do mɔ kanlin blibli lɛ
levii vi lɛ zunzun nyɔnu glɛkinu ɔ kpo mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e kpo wɛ jezu ɖe a
ɖe lɔ a
jezu tinmɛ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ gbɔn e ɔ nu gbe nya wɛ e ɖe jɛ nukɔn ɖo hwe enɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e jwifu lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e zan nujlɛdonuwu ɖe do tinmɛ nu ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e ɖɔ nu nyɔnu glɛkinu ɔ ɖɔ e jɛxa bonu e ze nuɖuɖu yɔkpɔvu lɛ tɔn jo nu cuku lɛ a
matie e yi wan nu cuku lɛ tawun ɖo glɛkinu lɛ kpo hlɔmanu lɛ kpo tɛntin bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ nɔ mɛ ɖo lɛ e xwegbe bɔ yɔkpɔvu lɛ nɔ xa
enɛ wu ɔ xogbe cuku lɛ ɔ flin nujlɛdonuwu kpo wanyiyi tɔn ɖe kpo mɛ
nu jezu ɖɔ e bɔ nyɔnu glɛkinu ɔ yi gbe ɖɔ nugbo wɛ aklunɔ e ɖo co cuku lɛ nɔ mɛ ɖo lɛ sin nuɖuɖu nɔ kɔn nyi ayi hwenu e ɖo nu ɖu wɛ ɔ ɖu
jezu kpa nyɔnu ɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi tɔn wu gbɔ azɔn nu vi nyɔnu tɔn matie
batoo ɖaxo ɖe sin ɖiɖe ɖo awinnya wu xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn
tɔjihun pɔlu xwe italii e ɖo xwi ɖi xa jɔhɔn ɖaxo lɛ wɛ
ðo ninɔ ɖe hwenu ɔ ɔ ɖe we xa mɛ ɖɔ e to ɖo mɛ kpo lɛ e sin yiyi
e sɔgbe ɖɔ e ɖe we mɔhun xa mɛ a
hwexonu tɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ tɔjihun kunkun gbɔn xu ɔ ji ɖo mɛ avivɔ nɔ ɖe lɛ e nyi awovinu ɖaxo ɖe
ðo vlɔɖowe novembre tɔn kpo mars tɔn kpo vlamɛ ɔ ji yiyi nɔ glo
septembre alo octobre mɛ wɛ tomɛyiyi xo pɔlu ɖɔ e ɖe
hlɔmanu vegetius xwe kanweko ɛnɛgɔ tɔn tinmɛ do ji yiyi ɖo xu enɛ ji wu ɖɔ ɖe lɛ nɔ tawun ɖevo lɛ nɔ byɔ bɔ ee kpo lɛ e nɔ glo bi
vegetius ɖɔ ɖɔ ji yiyi sin mai jɛ septembre kun ɖo awovinu ɖebu o hwenu ɖo awovinu ɖaxo tawun lɛ e we wɛ nyi sin septembre jɛ novembre kpo ee mars jɛ mai e kpo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ pɔlu nɔ yi tomɛ hwɛhwɛ e tuun nu enɛ lɛ ganji
ɔ kpo tɔjihunnɔ ɔ kpo lɔ tuun nu enɛ lɛ co nu weɖexamɛ pɔlu tɔn
nyi kpo asi tabitha kpo ɖo kunnuɖegbe
nyikɔ andreas golec
to republique democratique
ði ðɔ mawu ðe tiin a
e ji mi ɖo gletoxo ɖe mɛ ɖo saxe ɖo republique democratique rda tɔn mɛ
wanyiyi nɔ ɖo xwegbe bɔ lɛ mi walɔ ɖagbe lɛ
communiste sin to ɖe wɛ rda nyi hwenɛnu enɛ wu ɔ nu mɛ ɖo saxe lɛ e gege ɔ sinsɛn nyi nujɔnu ɖe a
nu nyɛ ɔ mawu tiin a
tamɛ nukplɔnmɛ we wɛ wa nu do gbɛzan sin xwe nukɔntɔn lɛ wu tawun numaɖi ɖɔ mawu tiin atheisme kpo communisme kpo
etɛwu communisme dɔn mi
ðo yi wan nu linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ lɛ bi ɖo e wutu
ɔ ɖɔ e ɖo ma nuɖokan lɛ bi ɖo enɛ bɔ dɔkunnɔ heelu kpo heelu kpo ɖe ɖe a
enɛ wu ɔ hɛn alɔnu jan ɖo mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ tɔn communiste tɔn ɖe mɛ
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ nɔ zan hwenu gege do ɖo tuto wema vunvun cyancyan tɔn ɖe mɛ
gan do lɛ e vivi nu toxo aue tɔn sin gan lɛ tawun bɔ mi
kpo ɖo kpɛvi co tuun nukunɖeji rda tɔn ɖe lɛ
mɔ ɖɔ nu ɖagbe lɛ gbe nya wɛ ɖe bɔ sɔgudo
ajijimɛ kpowun ɔ huzu
ðo ɔ e do tɔn lɛ sin enɛ wu bɔ kplekple communiste tɔn zanzanhweji elɔpu tɔn ɔ
awe ɖe dɔn ɖevo wa
zaan ɔ wu ɖɔ nuagɔwiwa wɛ rda
ði ɔ e wa nu xa mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ gudo nu communisme a lɛ e ci nu ɖɔ kun nyi tovi jɔ tovi o ɖɔhun
nu sixu nyi gbɛn
mi mɛ communiste lɛ ɖi nu ɖɔ mɛ lɛ bi ɖo a ce
kuku kpowun wɛ communisme ɔ nyi a
jɛ huhu mi ji tawun
enɛ wu ɔ ɖyɔ nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe lɛ e ayi ɖo nuxixo kpo ɖiɖe kpo ji
ðo sixu nuxixo ɖo wemaxɔmɛ e nɔ nuxixo ɖe e ɖe tlɛ sixu yi kplɔnyiji alavɔ tɔn wutu ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nyi hansinɔ ɖe
ɔ jo walɔ ɖagbe ɖo vu lɛ e bi do
nu nyi nujɔnu nu mi din e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ma ɖu tlɛ nɔ xa ɖyɔvi gege ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ
nuxixo ɖiɖe kpo jlokoko zinzan kpo ɖe adohuhu kpo a
nɔ ɖe lɛ e tlɛ nɔ xɛsiɖiɖi ɖaxo e ji ɖe e
etɛ sɔgudo hɛn
bɔ etɛwu mi ɖo ɔ mɛ
hwenu wa mɔ xosin ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe lɛ e ɔ kpaca mi
gbadanu ɖokpo ɖo wemaxɔmɛ ɔ jinjɔn ayi xa wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ tɔn ɖe bɔ ɖo xo ɖɔ do sɔgudo wu wɛ
mandy nyi wemaxɔmɛvi ɖe nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ
kudeji bi a co wa gbeta ɔ kɔn xosin lɛ ɖo biblu mɛ
mandy ɖɔ nyi daniyɛli wemata bɔ nu xa ɖo finɛ e kpaca mi tawun
enɛ ɖɔ acɛkpikpa ɖaxo ɔ tɔn ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖe lɛ xo bɔ nuwiwa yetɔn gba ayi jɛ azan mitɔn gbe
mandy biblu tɔn kunkpla sɔgudo e ɖevo lɛ mi
ɖo xosin mɔ nu nukanbyɔ lɛ wɛ din
wlan enɛ lɛ bɔ sixu ɖɔ xo do sɔgudo wu sɔgbe gbɔn
mawu tiin vlafo wɛ a
mandy mi asu kpo asi kpo kpo angelika kpo bɔ mi bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo mawu tɔn mɛ
tlolo jɛn wu ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi sinsɛn ɖo tuto ji nɔ zan nyikɔ mawu ɖesunɔ tɔn jehovah ɔ nɔ dɔn mɛ lɛ sin ayi wa ji e
ðɛhan nwt matie ɖɔ jehovah mawu hun ali nu lɛ bɔ nɔ sɔyi ɖo palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖe mɛ
ðɛhan ɖɔ to ayikungban ɔ nyi mɛ ɖeji do mawu mavɔmavɔ wu lɛ tɔn
nukunɖiɖo enɛ sin ali e hun nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo gan do wɛ zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn mawu tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e bi e dɔn mi tawun
nɔ zan gbɔn e huzuhuzu sɔgbe xa biblu vɛwu nu mi
nukɔnyiyi ɖo ɖo nuxixo mɛ e bɔ nɔ go enɛ wu ɔ ɖo to mɛɖesɔhwe
ɔ nublibliwiwa zan e jijodo bɔwu nu mi a
suulu nublawukunumɛ kpo kpo jehovah nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ zan nu biblu mɛ lɛ e su nukun mɛ
communisme kpo numaɖi ɖɔ mawu tiin kpo mi ɖo xwe nukɔntɔn lɛ mɛ bɔ sin hwe enɛ ɖido ɔ biblu jɛ gbɛzan huzu ji
nu e bɔ adohu adohu nɔ ɖo do sɔgudo wu e ɖo bɔ gbɛzan ɖo
ðo ɔ blo baptɛm huzu jehovah tɔn bɔ ɖo ɔ wli alɔ xa tabitha tewungbeju ɖe wɛ
mi nɔ zan hwenu mi kpewu gbɔn e nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ biblu ɔ mɛ
communisme kpo numaɖi ɖɔ mawu tiin kpo wa nu do mɛ mi nɔ xo go lɛ e gege wu nyɛ ɖɔhun
enyi tuun jehovah gbɔn e ɔ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ tawun
hwenu jɛ do kpo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ji e ɔ lɛ sin xomɛ
e vivi nu mi ɖɔ din ɔ nɔ xa biblu nɔ yi kple jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn lɛ
ðo tabitha kpo nyi kpo nɔ xwedo we biblu ɖe xa asu kpo asi kpo lɛ e ganji wutu ɔ alɔwliwli mitɔn ɖo awajijɛ
xɛsi nɔ ɖi mi do wu a bɔ nɔ hu mi do sɔgudo wu a
nɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo kplekple gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e tɔn sin xwedo nɔ ɖu fifa jɔ fifa kpo buninɔ kpo sin vivi e ɖe mɛ
mi nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ ɖo xwedo enɛ mɛ a
nuɖe wɛ bɔ ɖi nu jlo zan ɖo gbɛzan bi mɛ
sala kɔ sin wa wɛ e ɖe e kɔn jɛ nukun do gbɛmɛ ji
e ali lɛ kpo nunywɛ kpo bɔ ɖo wa wɛ mɔhunkɔtɔn kpo awajijɛ kpo
sala ɔ lɔ nɔ wa etɔn
do nukun mɛ e ɖo tamɛ wɛ ɖo alɔ tɔn lɛ ɖe gbɔn ɖe mɛ wɛ ɖo fi se ɖe wɛ e ɖe lɛ e gbidi wɛ
boya goxɔ nyi xwe yetɔn e wɛ ɖo fi ɖe bɔ e syɛnsyɛn
sin anyu tlitli e do gba e gbi bi ɖo hwesivɔ kpo ji kpo wa nu tɔn nu xwe mɔkpan wutu nɔ flin sala ɖɔ ɖo fi ɖokpo ma nɔ sin zan wɛ din e ɔ e kun hwe o
gbadanu wɛ ja gbe bɔ din ɔ hwe gba
zanzan ɔ e ɖo ablaxamu wɛ sin xwegbe bɔ din ɔ e lilɛ kpannukɔn fi ɖokpo ɔ kpo nukunɖiɖo kpo
hwenu asu tɔn sin sin so sɛkpɔ ɛ e ɖe sin yɛ mɛ e ɔ e jɛ nu do kpa ji
e hu xwe wo din bɔ ablaxamu kpla xwedo tɔn bi bɔ eflati ɔ jɛ kanaa
sala jlo do nɔ gudo nu asu tɔn ɖo tomɛyiyi ɖaxo enɛ hwenu wa yi fi e tuun a e ɖo e tuun ɖɔ asu emitɔn wa taji ɖe ɖo linlin jehovah ɖo ba sɔnu nu kunkan ɖe kpo akɔta ɖe kpo bɔ e jɔwu tawun e mɛ
etɛ sala sixu wa
wɛnsinɔ wɛ ɖo xwe din e sixu kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ enyi nyi jɛn kpo ɖo ablaxamu sin asi nyi wɛ ɔ akpa jehovah do e jɛnu gbɔn
enyi mɔhun wa hun hwɛ tɔn jɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ hwetɛnu akpa mawu do lɛ e jɛnu a ji
suuluɖiɖo nɔ bɔwu nu mi a ɖo taji ɔ hwenu mi ɖo nu taji ɖe sin jijɛ e
etɛ nuɖiɖi nyɔnu nukunɖeji enɛ tɔn sixu mi
ayisɔnmɔ jɛn xwedo ɔ lɛkɔ sin ejipu
wa jɛ agban ɖo ayikungban ɖo kpo ji ɖo zanzanhweji betɛli tɔn lɛ e ji xa enɛ mɛ wɛ kanaanu lɛ nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ luzi
nu sala ɖo fi enɛ yi ji kpɛɖe e ɔ e hɛn ɔ e mɔ akpadido yikungban ɔ ganji
gletoxo kanaanu lɛ tɔn ɖo finɛ kpo ali lɛ nɔ gbɔn yi fi ya fi lɛ e kpo
nu ɖe ɖo finɛ ci ee ɖo sala sin xwe lɛ e ɖɔhun a
wuu wɛ e su ɖe mɛzopotamii sin toxo ɖe wɛ ɖo kilomɛtlu do fi enɛ ɖe din e
hɛnnumɔ tɔn lɛ gege wɛ e jo do toxo hun nukun mɛ axi lɛ kpo lɛ kpo e kpo xɔ tɔn ɖagbeɖagbe tɔn kpo do tɔn lɛ kpo syɛn ganji bɔ vlafo lɔ ɖo finɛ e kpo
e ɖo co enyi mi ɖɔ sala ɖo zanzanhweji wɛ wublawubla bɔ fi ɖagbeɖagbe e nɔ ɖo vu e ɖo jijlo e wɛ hun mi tuun nyɔnu enɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu mawu e gbɔ
nu mawu mɛ nu pɔlu wlan ɖo xwe gudo e wu
e ɖɔ do nuɖiɖi sala kpo ablaxamu kpo tɔn wu ɖɔ enyi to mɛ gosin ɔ nu wɛ ɔ mɔ ali tɔn lɛkɔ yi
eblee lɛ kɔlilɛ yi gudo jlo sala kpo ablaxamu kpo ɖe a
enyi jo yeɖee do nu mɔhun wɛ ɔ sixu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn lɛkɔ yi xwe
ɖo wuu ɔ xo wu titewungbe jɔ wɛ jehovah ɖe e kpo
lobɔ nyi nuɖiɖi tɔn tewungbeju ɖe nu livi mɔkpan egbe a e wa ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛɖe kun nɔ flin lɔ o
sala gudo a loɔ e nukɔn
enɛ wu ɔ e kpo ɖo gudo nɔ nu asu tɔn wɛ ɖo fi wa jɛ e nɔ ɛ bɔ nɔ tun goxɔ lɛ tɛn kpo kanlin yetɔn lɛ kpo nɔ wa to nu bi ɖo fi ɖevo
e dɛ ɖo kpo huzuhuzu ɖevo lɛ kpo
jehovah akpa e do nu ablaxamu e ɖɔ e ɖɔ sala sin xo ɖe jɛ fi a
gudo mɛ ɔ sala wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ hwenu su bɔ emi ɖɔ tuto ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ wa wɛ e nu ablaxamu
tamɛ nukunmɛ tɔn blawu gbɔn hwenu e ɖɔ xo elɔ e mawu mavɔmavɔ nu ma ɖo vi a
enɛ gudo ɔ e byɔ asu tɔn ɖɔ e gbɔ ji vi ɖo emitɔn hagaa xomɛ
nubyɔbyɔ enɛ sixu kpaca mi ɖo egbe aca wɛ e nyi ɖo taan enɛ lɛ mɛ bɔ sunnu ɖe nɔ asi ɖevo alo ɖo xɔnnɔ ɖevo bonu donu tɔn bu o
mɔ wɛ sala mɔ ɖɔ wɛ nu nyi gbɔn bɔ linlin jehovah ɖo do akɔta ɖe sin kun gbɔn ablaxamu ji e do jɛnu a
ðebu wɛ e nyi ɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ vɛwu e ɖe
ablaxamu wa nu gbɔn
mi xa ɖɔ e yi gbe nu xo sala ɖɔ e
ðiɖɔ wɛ ɔ ɖe ɖɔ jehovah wɛ sala do byɔ nu mɔhun asu tɔn a
e wa ɔ nubyɔbyɔ tɔn ɖe linlin nɔ ɖo e
e ɖɔ mawu wɛ hɛn lɛ wa nu emi bɔ ɖewagbɛn kun ɖe o
tuto sala blo e hɛn kpo kpo wa
e ɖo co e ɖɔ e kun nyi cejɛnnabinɔ ɖebu o
ðo mɛ hwɛhwɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ jlo yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo nukɔn nu nu ɖevo bi e ɖe mɛ ɔ gbigbɔ cejɛnnabi ɖo tɔn sala tɔn jiwu tawun a ce
enyi mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ linlin mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo nukɔn nu jlo cejɛnnabi tɔn lɛ ɔ mi ɖi nu sala ɖɔhun
e lin cobonu hagaa mɔ xo nu ablaxamu a
hagaa jɛ gan tɔn sala ɖedo ji ɖo vlafo e sixu mɔ ɖɔ xo emi ɖe e bɔ emi xɔ akwɛ hu
nu enɛ nu wɛnsinɔ sala sɔ e
hagaa ji vi sunnu ɖe nɔ nyi isimayɛli enɛ gudo ɔ xwe gege wa yi
hwe ɖevo ɔ wa ɖɔ wɛn ɖe gosin jehovah e ɔ sala ɖo xwe bɔ asu tɔn ɖo xwe
wɛn jiwu ɖe wɛ jehovah do
jehovah nu tɔn ablaxamu ɖɔ emi blo bɔ kunkan tɔn
mawu ɖyɔ nyikɔ
jɛ hwe enɛ ɔ ablamu wɛ e nɔ ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ
jehovah nyi ɖevo e ɖɔ ablaxamu tinmɛ tɔn wɛ nyi mɛ wɔbuwɔbu ɖe tɔn
bɔ din ɔ jehovah ɖe fi sala ɖe ɖo nu lɛ mɛ e azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ tɔn salayii ee sin tinmɛ sixu nyi e do sala nyikɔ enɛ wɛ mi bi tuun ɖo egbe
etɛ nyi tinmɛ sala tɔn
jehovah tinmɛ nu wu e nyikɔ mɔhun nyɔnu ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ e xoɖɛ do ji tɔn vi sunnu ɖokpo gbɔn ji tɔn xoɖɛ do ji tɔn bɔ e do akɔta gege sin kun
nyikɔ mawu vi sunnu ɔ izaki e sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi nukiko
hwenu ablaxamu se tlolo ɖɔ jehovah vi sala ɖesunɔ e ɔ e xwe do nu
e kpaca ɛ hun xomɛ tawun
hlɔmanu lɛ bɔ sala
e lin vo ɖe a bɔ sunnu atɔn wa ablaxamu sin goxɔ kɔn
hwemɛ ciɖiɖi wɛ asu kpo asi kpo mɛxomɔ enɛ hwlɛndo yi jonɔ yetɔn ganji
ablaxamu ɖɔ nu sala ɖɔ yawu linfin gannu atɔn nya do ɖa acɔnmɔ
jonɔyiyi nɔ byɔ gege ɖo hwenɛnu
ablaxamu jo ɔ bi do nyi kɔ ji nu sala a e kanwezun yi hu nyibuvi su ɖuɖu e ɖokpo sɔnu nu kpo nu e kpo
wɛnsagun jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ nu sunnu enɛ lɛ
e ci ɖɔ nu enɛ wɛ ɖo ayi mɛ nu pɔlu hwenu e wlan xo elɔ e flin ɖɔ ɖo yi mɛ nɔ wa jonɔ lɛ e ganji ɖo mɛɖe lɛ tiin ɖo nu wa gbɔn wɛ yi wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ do xwegbe cobo ɛ
eblee lɛ sixu xwedo jonɔyiyi tɔn ɖagbeɖagbe ablaxamu kpo sala kpo ze e a
sala yi wan nu jonɔyiyi tawun
hwenu wɛnsagun lɛ akpa jehovah do ɖɔ sala ji vi sunnu ɖe e ɖɔ nu ablaxamu e ɔ e ɖo goxɔ tɔn mɛ ɖo to ɖo wɛ
kpo xwe ɖo tɔn e kpo ɔ e wa ji vi sin xo ɔ kpaca ɛ ci ɖe bɔ e sixu hwla a e nu do ayi mɛ ɖɔ nyɛ kpo sɔ le din bɔ sunnu jlo mi a
wɛnsagun ɔ jla linlin sala tɔn ɖo gbɔn nukanbyɔ tlɔlɔ elɔ gblamɛ nuɖe glo mawu mavɔmavɔ wɛ a
e ɖɔ emi kun nu o
nukiko sala tɔn ɖɔ e kun ɖi nu o wɛ a
biblu ɖɔ nuɖiɖi sala ɖesu ɖo ɔ wɛ bɔ e ɛ hlɔnhlɔn bɔ e mɔ xo co e kpo bi ɖo e ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖɔ mawu do akpa ɔ ɖo gbeji
eblee lɛ sala jehovah a e tuun ganji ɖɔ e sixu ɖe akpa ɖebu e do e
mi mɛ ɖetɛ wɛ ɖo hudo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo mɔhun tɔn a
e ɖɔ mi tuun mawu ɖo biblu ɔ e ganji
hwenu mi ɖo wa wɛ e ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ sala sin hwɛ jɔ bɔ e ɖo nuɖiɖi mɔhun
nugbo ɔ jehovah ɖo gbeji nɔ ɖe akpa e do lɛ e bi hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu blo ɖo ali ɖe lɛ kpaca mi jiwu ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ alo tlɛ sixu nu mi bɔ mi
jehovah sala ɖo nuɖiɖi xɔ akwɛ e ɖo e wutu
hwenu sala ɖo xwe e ɔ e ɖu vivi nu e ɖo mɛxohwenu tɔn e tɔn
e ji vi sunnu ɖe nu asu tɔn ee ɖo xwe din e
ablaxamu nyi yɛyɛvi ɔ ɖɔ izaki alo nukiko mawu ɖɔ gbɔn e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nunina jiwu enɛ gosin mawu e hɛn awajijɛ wa jɛ ku
e ɖo co gege wɛ e byɔ ɖo asi tɔn
hwenu izaki ɖo xwe e ɔ xwedo ɔ ɖu ɖe do ɖe nu vi ɔ
nu lɛ bi wɛ yi ganji a
ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ sala ɖo ayi ɖo nuwalɔ ɖo nu mɛ e ɖe wu wɛ
isimayɛli hagaa sin vi sunnu xwe mɛvi ɔ ɖo izaki ca wɛ
nu enɛ nyi alisanu ɖe a
nukɔnmɛ ɔ mawu mɛ nu pɔlu ylɔ walɔ isimayɛli tɔn enɛ ɖɔ yadonumɛ
sala mɔ ɖɔ nuɖɔbamɛ enɛ wa nu do ganjininɔ vi sunnu emitɔn tɔn wu bɔ wɛ nugbo
sala tuun ganji ɖɔ e kun nyi vi sunnu emitɔn kpowun wɛ nu izaki o e ɖo taji ɖe bonu linlin jehovah tɔn do jɛnu
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo nu ablaxamu
e byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e nya hagaa kpo isimayɛli kpo galatinu lɛ
ablaxamu wa nu gbɔn
mi xa ɖɔ xo enɛ ɔ sala ɖɔ ɔ nyla ablaxamu nukunmɛ ɖesu ɖo vi tɔn wɛ isimayɛli nyi
e yi wan nu isimayɛli tawun bɔ e sixu lɔn bonu nɔ se do vi tamɛ e cifo a
mi xa ɖɔ loɔ mawu ɖɔ nu ablaxamu ɖɔ nu xo enɛ ɔ e ɖɔ do vi ɔ kpo towe nyɔnu ɔ kpo wu ɔ nyla nukun towe mɛ o
yi gbe nu nu sala byɔ lɛ bi ɖo kun sin akpa do nu ɔ izaki ji wɛ gba kun ɔ gbɔn
jehovah ganjɛwu ablaxamu ɖɔ e kpe nukun do hagaa kpo vi ɔ kpo wu
ablaxamu ɔ setonu
asi jɔ asi ɖe adodwe ɖe wɛ sala nyi nu ablaxamu
nu se nu asu tɔn e kɛɖɛ wɛ e nɔ ɖɔ kpowun a
hwenu e mɔ ɖɔ tagba ɖe wa nu do xwedo ɔ kpo sɔgudo yetɔn kpo wu e ɔ e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo nu asu tɔn
xo e ɖɔ tlɔlɔ e nyi mɛmasi bɔ e a
nugbo ɔ e wa ɖɔ do wu tɔn ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ e nyi tewungbeju asi ɖo sisi ɖaxo nu asu tɔn e ɖe tɔn
kɔlɛntinu lɛ nu e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ enyi sala bɔnu do aɖu wɛ ɔ sisi ma ɖo nu ablaxamu wɛ e nyi ɖo ninɔmɛ ɔ hɛn nu gble do ablaxamu kpo xwedo ɔ blebu kpo wu tawun
sala ɖɔ nu e ɖo ɖɔ e kpo wanyiyi kpo
sala tɔn nɔ xɔ akwɛ nu asi gege
tɔn bɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo jɔ xo nu asu yetɔn lɛ kpo sisi kpo
nyɔnu ɖe lɛ sixu jlo hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ jehovah do afɔ xo ɖe lɛ mɛ e blo gbɔn nu sala e
e ɖo co nɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi wanyiyi kpo suulu kpo sala ɖɔhun
jehovah ylɔ sala ɖɔ axɔvi e ɖo nukun ɖɔ e wa nu xa emi hɔnmɛ wɛ emi ɖe ɖɔhun a
jehovah ɖesunɔ ylɔ nyɔnu ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ ɖɔ axɔvi co e ɖo nukun ɖɔ e wa nu xa emi hɔnmɛ wɛ emi ɖe ɖɔhun a
hwenu e ɖo xwe ku e ɔ hwɛ ablaxamu tɔn jɔ ɖɔ e jɛ ale ji jɛ sala vi ji
nwt e jɛ axɔvi tɔn e yi wan e sin do tawun
sɔgudo mavɔmavɔ jiwu ɖe ɖo sala kpodo mɛ ɖi nu eɖɔhun lɛ e bi kpan jaan
ablamu kpo salayii kpo wɛ e nɔ ylɔ asu kpo asi kpo enɛ ɖɔ jɛ hwenu mawu wa ɖyɔ nyikɔ yetɔn ɖo nukɔnmɛ e do hɛn nu lɛ bɔkun ɔ mi zan nyikɔ e do tuun hugan lɛ e
jehovah yi gbe nu asi gege dida kpo xɔnnɔ ɖiɖo kpo nu hwenu ɖe e gbe jezu klisu ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ e tuto alɔwliwli tɔn dohwenu tɔn ɖo edɛni mɛ e ɖo ayi e wɛ nyi asi ɖokpo dida matie
sala ɖokponɔ wɛ nyi nyɔnu biblu ɖɔ xwe nabi e ɖo ku e
e su ahwanlyannu lɛ bi sin kun do
ðo acɛkpikpa jezu klisu tɔn glɔ ɔ nu nɔ ɔ vivo tiin ɖo to ɔ mɛ enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ sɔyi ðɛhan
mawu ɖo nu ahwan lɛ bi ðɛhan
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ nu mimɔ kpo nuagɔwiwa kpo kpo ɖo ɔ mɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ e vɛwu bɔ e ɖo fifa jɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn
e tlɛ nyi din ɔ mɛ sɛkpɔ mawu lɛ e sixu ɖo fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi e filipunu lɛ
mawu ɖe mimɔ kpo nuagɔwiwa kpo siin nu lɛ bi do huzu nu
mi sixu ɖo fifa ayi mɛ tɔn enyi mi nɔ su hudo gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn sin do ɔ nɛ matie nwt
nu jlo tuun nu ɖevo lɛ hun wemata wema etɛ biblu sixu mi
est il necessaire a une organisee
nunina hugan bɔ e mi ðo mɛ e nɛ
nunina hugan e biba
nunina tɛ hugan bi
jezu ci tawun
linlin sɔgbe e ðiðo do nuwanyido lɛ wu
biblu etɛwu e
mitɔn lɛ kanbyɔ
klisanwun lɛ ðo ðu nataaxwe wɛ a
nyi ɖaxo hugan ɔ ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ
nunina ɖagbeɖagbe bi kpo nunamɛ nu vɔ ɔ bi kpo ɔ jixwe wɛ nɔ gosin nɔ jɛte sin mawu blo nu ɖo jixwe nɔ weziza lɛ e jaki
atɔxwɛ elɔ tinmɛ mi blo gbɔn bɔ nunina ɖagbe hugan mawu mi e su nukun mitɔn mɛ e
xota ðo akpa ɔ ji e nunina tɛ hugan bi
nu ɖyɔvivu xwe mɛvi ɖe ɖɔ hwenu e ɛ cukuvi ɖe e nɛ
nyɔnu ɖe ɖɔ do tɔn ɛ hwenu e kpo ɖo wemaxɔmɛ linsinmɛ tɔn e wu ɖɔ e nyi nunina ɖe huzu gbɛzan emitɔn
asu wli alɔ e ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ kati asi emitɔn blo kpo alɔ tɔn kpo ɖo xwekpexwenu alɔwliwli yetɔn tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu e wɛ nyi nunina xɔ akwɛ hugan e emi e
xwewu xwewu ɔ mɛ gege nɔ zan hwenu nɔ jɛ tagba tawun do mɔ nunina hugan e ba ɖe alo hɛnnumɔ ɖe ɖo nuwiwa bunɔ ɖe hwenu
bɔ gege yetɔn nɔ ɖɔ nu ci nu mɛ xo e ɖɔ ɖo lɛ e ɔ e ci nu mɛ emi nu lɛ e
hwɛ
jlo alo yi nunina xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛ nukunmɛ nugbo nugbo lɛ e a
linlin enɛ sixu dɔn mɛ tawun e nyi ɖo nu nunina ɖe sixu wa nu mɛ e e kɛɖɛ wutu wɛ a nu sixu ci nu ɔ e
nugbo ɔ biblu ɖɔ nunamɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mɛ hu nuyiɖomɛsi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ awajijɛ ɖo nunamɛ mɛ e sixu jɛji enyi nunina ɔ su mɛ e nu ɔ e nukunmɛ ɔ nɛ
enɛ wu ɔ sixu blo gbɔn bɔ nunina towe hɛn awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ wa nu hwi kpo mɛ nu e kpo
bɔ enyi sixu nunina hwɛ mɔ ɖɔ e wɛ hugan e mɛ a ɔ etɛ sixu wa tawun bɔ nunina towe su mɛ nukunmɛ
nunina sɔgbe xa mɛ e jlo nu e mimɔ nyi nuɖe fa a nugbo ɔ mɛ e nu e wɛ ɖe nunina ɔ xɔ akwɛ e
ɔ nu xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛɖe nukunmɛ e sixu nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛ ɖevo nukunmɛ
ði ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe sixu ɖɔ alokan yaɖeyaɖe alo nu mɔhun ɖevo lɛ wɛ nyi nunina hugan e
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ mɛxo ɖe sixu mɔ ɖɔ gu ɖe wɛ nyi nunina xɔ akwɛ hugan e
ðo aca ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ akwɛ wɛ nyi nu hugan ɖo mɛ winnyawinnya kpo mɛxo bi kpo nukunmɛ e ɖo e nɔ mɛ e e bɔ e nɔ zan do nu ɖebu jlo e e mɛ
lɛ ɖo finɛ co awakanmɛ ku mɛ gege do nunina jɛxa mɛ nukunɖeji yetɔn lɛ e biba wu a
nunina mɔhun mimɔ sixu nɔ blo hwebinu nuɖe lɛ hinhɛn mɛ cobo yi biba gbe sixu kpa mɛ
nu nɔ jlo mɛ e jlo nu e lɛ e
nya ɖe ɖo belfast ɖo irlande du nord ɖɔ ɖɔ kɛkɛvi e emi hwenu emi ɖo xwe alo e wɛ nyi nunina hu bi bɔ e emi e
e tinmɛ ɖɔ e jlo mi ɖesu
nu enɛ ɖɔ nu nɔ jlo mɛɖe e nɔ tawun bɔ nu e ɛ e su nukunmɛ tɔn mɛ alo gbɔ
enɛ wu ɔ tamɛ do mɛ nu e ji
tuun nu sixu xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ e ɖo hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɛɖe nukunmɛ e nɔ ca kan xa nu nɔ jlo e lɛ e
ði ɔ hwenu zinzan ɖo xa hɛnnumɔ lɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nukunmɛ hwɛhwɛ
sixu nɔ jlo mɔ vi yetɔn lɛ kpo vivu yetɔn lɛ kpo hwɛhwɛ
xa kpo mɛtɔn lɛ kpo ɖo gbɔjɛhwenu ɖibla su nukun yetɔn mɛ hu nunina ɖebu e e
nu nɔ bɔ e nɔ tuun nu nɔ jlo mɛɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖoto mɛ ɔ ganji
biblu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔ se xo
jaki ðo xo nɔ ɖɔ xa towe lɛ alo hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe lɛ e mɛ ɔ to ɖiɖo ganji bɔ tuun nu yi wan lɛ e kpo nu wan lɛ e kpo
mɛ ɔ sixu tuun nunina hun xomɛ nu hugan e
mɛ e jlo nu e sin hudo lɛ
enyi nunina ɖe tlɛ hwe su hudo taji ɖe sin do ɔ e sixu su mɛ e e nukunmɛ tawun
sixu tuun nu hudo mɛɖe e gbɔn
e sixu bɔwu ɖɔ e kanbyɔ mɛ e jlo nu e ɖɔ etɛ hudo e alo etɛ wɛ e ɖe a ji
e ɖo co nu gege ɔ enɛ nɔ ɖe kan kpo nu awajijɛ nunamɛ nɔ hɛn wa e enɛ wu ɔ nɔ jlo nunina jɛxa mɛ ɔ e do fyan ɛ
ɔ mɛɖe lɛ sixu nɔ ɖɔ xo do nu yi wan lɛ e kpo nu wan lɛ e kpo wu faa hwɛhwɛ ɔ sixu nɔ hwla hudo yetɔn lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo ayi mɔ nu jɛ ninɔmɛ mɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ wu ganji
mɛ winnyawinnya wɛ a mɛxomɔ wɛ a tlɛnnɔ wɛ a e asu alo asi wɛ a asu alo asi ku do e wɛ a asu alo asi ɛ wɛ a wɛ a alo e ɖo gbɔjɛ tɔn ɖaxo ɔ mɛ wɛ a
do mɔ nu jɛ mɛ jlo nunina ɖe e sin hudo lɛ wu ɔ kan nu byɔ mɛ ɖeɖee gbɔn ninɔmɛ mɔhun mɛ lɛ e
sixu ɖɔ xo nu do hudo bunɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tuun ɖo kpaa mɛ a lɛ e wu
nu enɛ tuun din e bɔ sixu kpewu nunina su hudo mɛ ɖevo lɛ tamɛ a e ɖe sin do e
hwenu e jɛxa do e

sunnu ɖe sin asi ɖo xo ja vi ji gbe

e ɖo mɛɖee tawun

wa yi e gbɔn e ɔ e ɖɔ e gbeje ɖɔ mɛ e nu e ɖo linlin agɔ do nu ɔ e wu wɛ a ji

kɔlɛntinu lɛ enyi wanyiyi jɔ wanyiyi kpo mɛ ɔ sin nu ɖu ayi mɛ nu e kpo wɛ bɔ nu mɛ ɔ nunina towe hun xomɛ bɔ hwi lɔ mɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo ɖo nunamɛ mɛ e
enyi nu mɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo ɔ hɛn mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ sin xomɛ hun
pɔlu kpa klisanwun kɔlɛnti hwexonu tɔn tɔn lɛ hwenu hɛn sɔ klisanwun yetɔn ɖo judee lɛ e kpo xomɛhunhun kpo e
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ mawu yi wan nu mɛ nɔ nu mɛ kpodo xomɛhunhun kpo e kɔlɛntinu lɛ
ayi ɖo nu ɖeɖee ji mi ɖɔ xo do lɛ e ji sixu tawun bɔ nu nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ e nɔ hun xomɛ nu
nu enɛ lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo wa nu taji ɖe ɖo tuto mawu blo nunina ɖaxo hugan ɔ lɛ e mɛ
mi byɔ ɖɔ gbeje nunina ɖaxo enɛ gbɔn xota bɔ e xixa gblamɛ
mɛ gege nɔ nunina lɛ ɖo jijizanxwe kpo xwe ɖevo lɛ kpo hwenu
ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ zan walɔ sɔgbe xa nu biblu mɛ a lɛ e
xota mitɔn lɛ kanbyɔ klisanwun lɛ ðo ðu nataaxwe wɛ a
ɖo xojlawema elɔ mɛ
nunina ɖagbeɖagbe bi kpo nunamɛ nu vɔ ɔ bi kpo ɔ jixwe wɛ nɔ gosin nɔ jɛte sin mawu blo nu ɖo jixwe nɔ weziza lɛ e
jaki e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mitɔn jixwe tɔn jehovah mawu nyi e do gesi wɛ wemafɔ enɛ ɖe
ɖo nunina tobutobu mawu lɛ e mɛ ɔ ɖokpo hugan ee kpo lɛ e bi
ðetɛ wɛ
jezu sin xo e tuun ganji ɖo jaan mɛ e ɖɔ nu mi ðo mawu yi wan nu viɖokponɔ tɔn jo bonu mɛ ɖi nu lɛ ɖebu dɔn o loɔ bi mɔ mavɔmavɔ
ðɛhan jaan enyi mi tlɛ gbɔn ɖebu ɔ nu ɖebu ɖe bɔ mi sixu blo gosin kannumɔgbenu enɛ miɖesunɔ a
e ɖo co wanyiyi ɖaxo mawu ɖo e ɛ sɔnu nu nu sixu ɖe mɛ sin kannumɔgbenu enɛ e
jehovah mawu viɖokponɔ tɔn jezu klisu do xɔ nu mi bɔ enɛ hun mavɔmavɔ sin ali nu lɛ
etɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ nyi tawun
etɛwu e ɖo taji
mi sixu ɖu le tɔn gbɔn
gbɛxixɔ ɔ e su do nu bu e ɖe xɔ alo do tun kan mɛɖe sin kannumɔgbenu e wɛ
biblu tinmɛ ɖɔ ee e da mitɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo e ɔ kun ɖo hwɛ ɖe ɖo kɔ o ɖo nukunɖiɖo ba ɖu vivi mavɔmavɔ tɔn ɖo palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖe mɛ kpo kunkan yetɔn wa jɔ lɛ e kpo
e blawu ɖɔ huzu hɛn nu enɛ lɛ bi bu gbɔn jlo do tlito nu mawu gblamɛ
etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
biblu xosin ɔ ɖɔ hwɛhuhu ɔ ɖokpo gee ji wɛ e gbɔn wa ɔ mɛ mɛ enɛ wɛ nyi adamu hwɛhuhu ɔ dɔn ku wa
enɛ ɔ lɛ bi nɔ ku ɖo mɛ bi wɛ hu hwɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ adamu ɖu sin gu kpo nu kunkan tɔn a loɔ hwɛhuhu wɛ e ɖu kpo nu bɔ enɛ dɔn ku wa
ðo gbɛxixɔ xo ɔ mɛ ɔ e su e ɖo ɖo xa nu e hɛn bu e
hwenu adamu jlo do tlito nu mawu e ɔ e hu hwɛ bɔ nu mɛ e kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e hɛn e ɛ e bu
sɔgbe xa nu biblu ɖɔ e ɔ enɛ bɔ kunkan adamu tɔn wa huzu kannumɔ nu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo
enɛ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo ɖo e ɖe eyɛtɔn do do ɖe mɛ sin kannumɔgbenu mɛ enɛ wɛ nyi jezu
nu e nu tobutobu gbɛxixɔ ɔ wa lɛ e ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e wɛ nyi nunina mawu tɔn hugan bi e ɖo e wɛ bɔ mi sixu nɔ sɔyi
e sɔgbe xa jlo mitɔn
mawu da mi mɛ lɛ bɔ mi nɔ jlo tawun ba nɔ sɔyi
miɖesunɔ sixu wa nu ɖebu bonu jlo enɛ jɛnu a gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ mi sixu kpewu
biblu ɖɔ ðo hwɛhuhu nɔ su mɛ ɔ wɛ nyi ku nu mawu nɔ mɛ ɔ wɛ nyi mavɔmavɔ mi ɖo ɖo bu mi ɖe xa klisu jezu aklunɔ mitɔn mɛ e hlɔmanu lɛ
e su hudo mitɔn lɛ sin do
lɛ sixu su gbɛxixɔ ɔ sin a
biblu tinmɛ ɖɔ akwɛ xɔ nu ɖokpo ɔ din mɛɖe sixu kpewu su a kpowun bɔ xo fo
ðɛhan enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo hudo alɔdo mawu tɔn tɔn tawun do gosin kannumɔgbenu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo tɔn
gbɔn klisu jezu nɔ ɖe mi sin hwɛ mɛ ɔ ji ɔ mawu mi nu sin hudo mi ɖo e hlɔmanu lɛ
e wa do hwetɔnnu
biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ hwenu mi kpo ɖo nyi wɛ ɔ wɛ klisu ku do mitɔn mɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ ðo hwenu mi kpo ɖo nyi wɛ e wɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ wa wutu ɔ e mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ enyi mi nyi ɔ mawu yi wan nu mi
nu mi tlɛ ɖo didɛ wɛ ɖo nu hwɛhuhu ji lɛ e ɔ enɛ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo nukun nu gege
e ɖe linlin ɖagbe kpo linlin cejɛnnabi ɖo tɔn kpo
biblu nu mawu bɔ e vi tɔn do xɔ nu mi e ji ɖɔ mawu ɖe wanyiyi e ɖo nu mi ɔ mi gbɔn ɔ ɖie e viɖokponɔ tɔn do ɔ mɛ bonu mi nɔ gbɔn ji tɔn
wanyiyi enɛ ɔ nu e ɖie enyi midɛɛ lɛ wɛ yi wan nu mawu jɛ nukɔn a eyɛ wɛ yi wan nu mi jɛ nukɔn jaan
sixu ɖɔ nunina hugan nunina lɛ bi e su nukun towe mɛ gbɔn
flin ɖɔ xo jezu tɔn ɖo jaan mɛ e ji ɖɔ mɛ ɖi nu lɛ e jɛn e hwlɛngan
sɔgbe xa biblu ɔ nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo wɛ nyi e ɖeji do nu ɖo nukun wɛ e ɖe ɔ wu
eblee lɛ do ɖo jiɖe enɛ ɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɖiɖo ɖo dandan
enɛ wu ɔ mi byɔ ɖɔ hwenu do nu do jehovah mawu nunina nu vɔ e wu do nu nu ɖo wa ba ɖu vivi mavɔmavɔ sin ali vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu tɔn hun nu mi e tɔn wu
sixu nu enɛ lɛ e jinjɔn biblu ji e bi ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn www jw org ji
jehovah tɔn lɛ hun xomɛ do
mɛ ɖe ɖo fɔtoo jezu tɔn a
e yi jinjɔn ayi bɔ mɛɖe ɛ ɖe tɔn alo kpa bocyɔ tɔn ɖe a
e ɖo co nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ e mɔ ɖiɖe tɔn ɖo maxamaxa lɛ wa lɛ e mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enɛ lɛ kun tuun jezu ci tawun e o
aca hwenɛnu tɔn lɛ nu mɛ lɛ ɖi nu hwenɛnu ɖo sinsɛn linu lɛ e kpo mɛ nɔ lɛ e kpo wɛ nɔ zyan va hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ le wɛ e ɖe jezu tɔn gbɔn
e ɖo co ɖiɖe jezu tɔn ɖe lɛ e sixu huzu linlin mɛ lɛ tɔn alo tlɛ flu do mɛ jezu nyi e kpo nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ kpo wu
ɖe lɛ ɖe jezu nyi mɛ ɖo gan a ɖo ɖa gaga bɔ atan tɔn lɛ ci e ɖe alo ci mɛ blawu tawun e ɖe ɖɔhun
ðo ɖiɖe ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɔ jezu nɔ ci nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun bɔ nu tobotobo hwesivɔ ɖɔhun ɖe nɔ do tɔn alo nɔ ci mɛ nɔ gbawu do mɛ mɛ a e ɖe ɖɔhun
mɔhun lɛ jezu ci nugbo nugbo e a
mi sixu tuun gbɔn
ali mi sixu tuun ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi gbeje nu biblu ɖɔ lɛ e sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ jezu ci e mɛ
sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo linlin sɔgbe e do wu tɔn
e ci ɖɔ ɖɛ mɛ wɛ jezu ɖɔ xo enɛ lɛ ɖe hwenu e blo baptɛm e ɖɔhun
eblee lɛ matie agbaza enɛ ci
xwe jɛ nukɔn ɔ wɛnsagun gabliyɛli ɖɔ nu ɖɔ mɔ xo ji vi sunnu ɖokpo mawu vi
luki enɛ wu ɔ jezu nyi nya ɖe adamu nyi gbɔn hwenu e da ɛ e
luki kɔlɛntinu lɛ jezu ɖo ɖo anyu mɛ ɖi nɔ tɔn nyi jwifu ɖe e
jezu jo atan do jwifu lɛ ɖɔhun yedɛɛ lɛ gbɔn vo nu hlɔmanu lɛ ɖo ali enɛ
atan enɛ nɔ ɖe kpo sisi kpo e nɔ ɖiga a e nɔ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu nɔ wlibo nu atan tɔn nɔ kpa ɖa tɔn nɔ
mɛ e ɖe ɖo vo bɔ nyi nazilinu ɖɔhun lɛ e jɛn nɔ kpa ɖa yetɔn lɛ a lɛ
jezu wa nu xwe e zan hwe mitɔn tɔn lɛ a
jaan e ɖo do hlɔnhlɔn tawun cobo sixu wa nu mɔhun
jezu zan agbaza mawu ɛ e do wa mawu do asi lɛ e e ɖɔ axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn ɔ ɖo yi jla wɛnɖagbe tɔn to ɖe lɛ ɖo nu wu wɛ e mi do ɔ nɛ
luki e byɔ hlɔnhlɔn jiwu e ɖe cobɔ e ɖi zɔnlin gbɔn palestine sin gbe ɔ bi ji jla wɛn enɛ
awajijɛ ɖo jezu nukunmɛ e kpo sin walɔ tɔn lɛ kpo bɔ xo tɔn dɔn mɛ gege ɖo taji ɔ mɛ agban kpinkpɛn hinhɛn cikɔ lɛ e
matie awajijɛ tɔn kpo tɔn kpo akpa e do ɖɔ emi fa kɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee jlo nu ɖo tɔn lɛ e ji
yɔkpɔvu lɛ lɔ tlɛ nɔ nɔ xa jezu ɖo biblu ɖɔ e dɔn vi lɛ do wu
enyi jezu se cobo ku ɔ e nyi mɛ nɔ blawu e ɖe a
ði ɔ e so nu awajijɛ ɖo alɔwliwli ɖe tɛnmɛ e ɖo sin do huzu vɛɛn ɖagbe
jaan ðo kplekple ɖevo lɛ tɛnmɛ ɔ e nu e sixu wɔn gbeɖe a lɛ e mɛ matie jaan
hu bi ɔ mawuxo jezu ɖɔ e hun nukunɖiɖo ɖagbeɖagbe mavɔmavɔ tɔn sin ali nu lɛ
jaan hwenu ahwanvu tɔn wa ɖo wɛnɖagbejijla yetɔn sin gbe e ɔ xomɛ hun ɖɔ xomɛ hun ɖo nyikɔ mitɔn e wlan ɖo jixwe e wu luki
sinsɛngan jezu hwenu tɔn lɛ nɔ wlɛnwin do dɔn ayi mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wa yeɖee ji ɖe acɛ yetɔn
matie ðo jezu gbɔn vo nu wutu ɔ e nu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ kpa acɛ gannaganna nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ o
luki nugbo ɔ jezu nu ɖɔ miɖee do lɛ wu ɖo nu nɔ vivi nu lɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ ɖo awu gaga mɛ nɔ ɖo sa ɖi wɛ e nɔ do gbe ɖo tokpletɛn lɛ
jezu gbɔn vo nu ɖo e nɔ ɖe eɖee ɖo vo nu togun ɔ a bɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ e tlɛ nɔ tuun ɖo mɛ mɛ a
jaan e tlɛ ɖo tɔn lɛ tɛntin ɔ e nɔ tuun ɖo vo a

nu ɖo taji hugan e ci tawun e wɛ nyi linlin mi nɔ ɖo do wu tɔn din e

magidalanu mɔ ɛ do mɔ ɖe bɔ ahwanvu we xwe emawusi lɛ e ɛ do mɔ jonɔ ɖe luki jaan
linlin tɛ mi ɖo nɔ ɖo do jezu wu ɖo egbe
xwe jɛji ɖo ku jezu tɔn gudo ɔ jaan e yi wan e mɔ numimɔ lɛ do wu tɔn

e byɔ mɛɖesɔhwe cobɔ e wa

nu mɛ gbɛzinzan gbɔn nɔ kɔ do hwɛhwɛ e nɔ nyla

mawu nɔ ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do nuwanyido lɛ wu

ðɛhan weɖexamɛ kpo kpo ɖeɖee mi bɔ mi ɖeɖɛ nuwanyido mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn kpo e ɖo gege ɖo xo tɔn mɛ

bible

e huzu nu ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ wɛ a
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ livi mɔkpan nɔ ɖɔ jijizan jezu klisu tɔn sin xwe wɛ nataaxwe ɔ nyi
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ sɛkpɔ jezu hugan lɛ e ɖu nataaxwe ɔ a ji a
tuun nu biblu ɖɔ do jijizan sin xwe lɛ wu e a
nu klisanwun lɛ ɖu nataaxwe kpo gbɔ kpo ɔ xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ tɔn mimɔ sixu mi bɔ mi tuun
jɛ nukɔn ɔ biblu ɖɔ jijizan jezu tɔn alo mawu ɖevo ɖebu tɔn sin xwe xo a
mɛ we jɛn ɖu jijizan yetɔn sin xwe bɔ mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ
mɛ we lɛ ɖe nyi jehovah mawu biblu tɔn ɔ a bɔ nu nyanya wɛ jɛ ɖo jijizan yetɔn lɛ sin xwe hwenu

biblu ɖɔ gbe gbe e ji jezu a
alɛnuwema ɔ ɖɔ gbe gbe e ji klisu le a wema ɖevo ɖebu ɖɔ lɔ a wɛ mcclintock kpo kpo tɔn ɖɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enyi jezu jlo ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ ɖu jijizan emitɔn sin xwe wɛ ɔ e blo bɔ tuun azan gbe e ji e
wegɔ ɔ e wlan do biblu mɛ ɖɔ jezu alo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖe ɖu nataaxwe a
sɔgbe kpo kpo ɔ azɔn nukɔntɔn e ɖɔ nataaxwe ɖuɖu xo e ɔ sunzanwema philocalus tɔn mɛ wɛ e mɔ ɖe sunzanwema hlɔmanu lɛ tɔn xwe tɔn ɖe wɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e fo biblu wlanwlan xoxo bɔ jezu gosin ayikungban ji e ɔ e blo xwe kanweko mɔkpan cobɔ nu enɛ wa tiin
enɛ wu ɔ mcclintock kpo kpo wlan ɖɔ nataaxwe ɖuɖu ɔ kun gosin mawu o jɛn e gosin alɛnuwema ɔ mɛ a e nɛ
ðo jezu nyi ðaxo ɔ wutu ɔ e zawe lɛ e do nu e jlo ɖɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ blo e wu bɔ e wlan do biblu mɛ
nataaxwe ɖuɖu ɖo mɛ a
ɖe nɔ jlo ɖɔ wemaxɔmɛvi emitɔn lɛ wa nu zɛ e e wu a gbɔn e ɔ ɖokpo ɔ wɛ jezu jlo ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ wa nu zɛ nu e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ e wu a gbɔn e nɛ kɔlɛntinu lɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ nuwiwa taji ɖe tiin bɔ klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ tuun ganji e wɛ nyi flin ku jezu tɔn tɔn
jezu ɖesunɔ ɖɔ hwenu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ blo nuwiwa enɛ e kpo blo gbɔn e kpo nu
e wlan tawun tawun enɛ lɛ kpo gbe gbe e ku e kpo do biblu mɛ luki kɔlɛntinu lɛ
mi mɔ gbɔn e ɔ jijizan sin xwe wɛ nataaxwe nyi bɔ klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ xwedo aca pagawun tɔn enɛ lɛ a
ɔ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ jezu alo mɛ ɖevo ɖebu ɖu nataaxwe a
kpodo kunnuɖenu enɛ lɛ bi kpo ɔ klisanwun livi mɔkpan gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nataaxwe kun nyi xwe bɔ emi ɖu o
do mɔ nu ɖevo lɛ do fi aca nataaxwe tɔn lɛ gege gosin wu ɔ xota questions des lecteurs noel que faut il savoir
ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe tɔn mɛ e ɖo www jw org ji
mɛ wɔbuwɔbu gosin akɔta lɛ bi mɛ bɔ e sixu xa a e ɖe gan ɖo haamagedɔni hwenu
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ
ahwan e ɖo mawu ɔ sin azan ɖaxo ɔ gbe do su kun do nu lɛ e wɛ haamagedɔni nyi fi nujlɛdonuwu tɔn ɖe e nɔte
enyi mawu hɛn ayikungban ɔ gble wu wɛ e ja haamagedɔni sin ahwan ɔ fun gbe a loɔ e cyɔn alɔ ayikungban ɔ ji ɖo lɛ si wu wɛ
ahwan haamagedɔni tɔn ɔ ɖo nu ahwan lɛ bi ðɛhan
mɛ wɔbuwɔbu gosin akɔta lɛ bi mɛ e ɖe gan ɖo ɖaxo ɔ fo kpo ahwan haamagedɔni tɔn kpo e mɛ
mawu jlo ɖɔ gege gan ɖo haamagedɔni hwenu
biblu tinmɛ e sixu gan ɖo haamagedɔni hwenu gbɔn e sofonii
nu jlo tuun nu ɖevo lɛ hun wemata ɔ wema elɔ tɔn etɛ biblu sixu mi jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
les temoins jehovah croient ils jesus
qui sommes questions frequentes glɔ
ze yeɖee jo kpo jlo kpo
ðeji do jehovah wu nɔ wa ðagbe
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do xwe tɔn sin xota mitɔn ɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ mi alɔdo jehovah tɔn ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn e ji
mi zan gbejininɔ sin hwexonu tɔn lɛ do gbeje mi sixu ɖeji do jehovah wu ɖɔ e nɔ gudo nu mi hwenu mi ɖo nu wu mi kpe e bi wa wɛ ba do ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ e gbɔn e
mɛɖesusininɔ e e xɔ akwɛ ðo nukun towe mɛ
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi mi zan mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn do hɛn xomɛ mawu tɔn hun do ɖɔ nunina tɔn enɛ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e
mi mɔ mi sixu ɖo sisi nu ali mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ yetɔn ɖe e gbɔn e
nu wu jlɛjininɔ kpo ðo taji e
sixu kpo ðo ji ðo mɛtɛnkpɔn hwenu
xota elɔ lɛ mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ jijɔ ɖagbeɖagbe jlɛjininɔ nyi e mɛ
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ tinmɛ nu jlɛjininɔ nyi e kpo nu e nyi a e kpo
xota wegɔ ɔ mi sixu kpo ɖo ji hwenu mi tlɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn mɛ e gbɔn e mi
nu enɛ lɛ do asi nu mɛ wu e ðeji do lɛ e
ðo jijimɛ ɖe nɔ ɖyɔ ɖe wutu ɔ dɔnkpɛvu lɛ nɔ wa mɛxomɔ lɛ nɔ wa e
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do dɔnkpɛvu kpo mɛxomɔ kpo bi blo bɔ mɛ huzuhuzu mɔhun lɛ yi gbɔn e
nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ gege ɖo ɖeɖee ɖo kan ɖo do ɔ wu wɛ ɖo fi e ɖo hudo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn hugan ɖe lɛ e mɛ
gege yetɔn ɖo wa wɛ ɖo togudo sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie
etɛ bɔ tɛn yi togudo ɖo xwe nabi ɖe ɖie
etɛ ɖo togudo
etɛ mɛ gbɛzinzan yetɔn kɔ do
mi kan nu byɔ nɔvi nyɔnu enɛ lɛ mɔ nu e gege
enyi nyi nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ nugbo nugbo ba gblo ada nu nɔ awajijɛ mɛ e ɖe hun mi kanɖeji ɖɔ nu ɖɔ lɛ e hɛn le wa nu
nugbo ɔ yetɔn gbigbeje sixu hɛn le wa nu togun mawu tɔn bi
anita
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ emi ɖo nu sin hudo gbexosin tlɛnnɔ ɖe ɖo bɔ ɖo togudo kpa ɛ e a
anita ɖo xwe din e xo nu tawun do nuwukpikpe tɔn wu
angleterre wɛ e su ɖe gbexosin ɖo finɛ hwenu e ɖo xwe e
e ɖɔ yi wan nu nukplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ do jehovah wu gbeɖe ɖɔ sixu wa ɖo togudo a
jonɔgbe ɖe a bɔ kudeji ɖɔ kun sixu se ɖe lɔ o
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu e ylɔ mi ɖɔ wa wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn e ɔ hun zɛ
e kpaca mi ɖɔ e ylɔ mɛ sɔ a nyɛ ɖɔhun e ɖe
ɖɔ nu nyiɖee ɖɔ enyi jehovah ɖɔ kpewu blo ɔ tɛnkpɔn
xwe jɛji ɖie xo ɖɔ wɛ ɖe
sin hwenɛnu wɛ ɖo tɔn wa wɛ ɖo japon
anita ɖɔ ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ ɖɔ nu nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ ɖɔ fɔ mitɔn lɛ kpla wa nu mi ɖo tomɛyiyi hugan bi e mɛ
xomɛ hun mi ɖɔ mɛ gege wɛ wa
nɔvi nyɔnu wa ɖo togudo lɛ e gege xo nu do tɛn sisɛ yi to ɖevo mɛ wu ɖo
etɛ akɔnkpinkpan sin hudo ɖo e
maureen
ee ɖo wɛ e ɔ hɛn alɔnu jan wa ɖagbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e zinzan wɛ nɔ jlo mi wɛ maureen ɖo xwe din e ɖɔ
hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɔ e tɛn yi quebec ɖo fi e ɖo hudo gbexosin gege tɔn ɖe e
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e ylɔ mi ɖɔ wa wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn fi tuun a e yiyi lɛ mɛvo do xɛsi mi
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ ɖokpo jo do kpe nukun do ɖo azɔn jɛ wɛ e wu e lɔ hu nu mi
nɔ zanwunzɛn azɔn mɔkpan do savo nu jehovah do nu enɛ lɛ tamɛ kpo avi kpo
hwenu ɖɔ xo xa lɛ do nu ɖo nu mi wɛ lɛ e wu e ɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ ma yi gbe nu mɛylɔylɔ ɔ
mɔ agun mitɔn ɖo gudo nu lɛ gbɔn e
alɔdo jehovah tɔn mɔ e mi bɔ ɖeji ɖɔ e kpe nukun do wu ye
hwe enɛ ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi
ɔ maureen wa nu xwe jɛji ɖo gbadahweji aflika tɔn
egbe ɔ maureen ɖo nukun kpe do nɔ tɔn wu wɛ ɖo co e kpo ɖo gbexosin sin wa wɛ
e ɖɔ do xwe ɖeɖee e wa ɖo togudo e wu ɖɔ jehovah nɔ mi nu hudo mi e hwenu ɖo hudo tɔn e hwɛhwɛ
wendy
wendy ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ din e jɛ gbexosin wa ji ɖo australie hwenu e ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e
e flin ɖɔ winnya nɔ hu mi tawun bɔ xo ɖiɖɔ nu jonɔ lɛ nɔ vɛwu nu mi
gbexosin jɛ wiwa ji e mi bɔ tuun nɔ ɖɔ xo nu alɔkpa lɛ bi gbɔn e enɛ wu ɔ akɔnkpinkpan ɖo e jɛji
nukɔnmɛ ɔ wa mɔ ɖɔ akɔnkpinkpan ɖiɖo kun nyi tagba ɖe nu mi o
gbexosin wa wɛ ɖe e mi bɔ nɔ ɖeji do jehovah wu bɔ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ nɔ do xɛsi mi a
ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ wa ɖo japon nu xwe jɛji e ɖe ylɔ mi ɖɔ wa ɖekunnu xa emi ɖo japon nu atɔn
wa xa ɛ e tɛn sisɛ yi togudo sin do lanmɛ nu mi
wendy tɛn yi vanuatu ɖo tɔtɛntinto ɖe wɛ ɖo kilomɛtlu do zanzanhweji australie tɔn
wendy kpo ɖo vanuatu din ɖo wa wɛ ɖo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn ɖo betɛli a e ɖe
e ɖɔ e ɖo kanɖo lɛ kpo agun lɛ kpo gbɔn wɛ ɖo fi linlin lɛ e nɔ awajijɛ mi tawun
alɔ kpɛɖe ɖo ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ ɖo tɔtɛntinto elɔ lɛ mɛ e nyi wujɔmɛ ɖaxo ɖe bɔ sixu ɖɔ a
kumiko tɛntin
kumiko ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ din e ɖo gbexosin hwebinu tɔn sin wa wɛ ɖo japon hwenu wegɔ tɔn kpo e kpo nyi gbexosin e byɔ ɛ ɖɔ tɛn yi nepal e
kumiko ɖɔ e tɛgbɛ ɔ nu ɖokpo ɔ jɛn e nɔ ɖo byɔbyɔ mi wɛ bɔ eo jɛn nyi lɔ nɔ nɔ ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ
gbe ɖe kpinkplɔn kpo aca lɛ kpinkplɔn kpo nɔ hu nu mi
nu nyi ɖevo e wɛ nyi akwɛ sin hudo mi ɖo do tɛn e
hwenu ɖo gbeta kɔn wa e wɛ e ɔ blo alitawovi ɖe kpodo zokɛkɛ kpo yi ɖo dotooxwe
finɛ ɔ ɖɔ nu nyiɖee ɖɔ tuun nu wa gbo mi e
sixu azɔn nyanya ɖe din bɔ gbexosin wiwa ɖo togudo glo mi
sixu wa ɖo togudo nu xwe ɖokpo a ce
xoɖɛ jehovah ɖɔ e mi bonu wa nuɖe
kumiko ɖɔ do xwe wo e wa ɖo nepal e wu ɖɔ tagba ɖo nyi nu mi wɛ lɛ e bu sin nukɔn xu vɔvɔ ɔ ɖɔhun
xomɛ hun mi tawun ɖɔ jɛ wa ji ɖo fi hudo ɖe hugan e
hwɛhwɛ ɔ enyi ɖo wɛn biblu tɔn do xwedo ɖe wɛ ɔ mɛ ɖo xwe ɔ kpa lɛ e alo nɔ sɛya nɔ wa ɖoto
yɔkpɔvu lɛ lɔ nɔ byɔ mi kpo sisi kpo ɖɔ nyɛ emi tlati ɖɔ xo do biblu wu e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ ɖeɖee mi kan xo byɔ lɛ e mɔ tagba gege
xa gbɔn
diane
jɛ nukɔn ɔ e vɛwu nu mi tawun ɖɔ ma lin do mɛ lɛ wɛ diane gosin e ɖɔ
e ɖo xwe din ɖo wa wɛ ɖo cote sin xwe ɖie ɖokpoo
byɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi nu yi wan nu mɛ lɛ ɖo fi e ɖe nu mi do e
nɔvi redford nyi ɖokpo ɖo lɛ mɛ ɖo galadi e tinmɛ nu mi ɖɔ ninɔmɛ mɛ lɛ tɔn sixu doya nu mi tlɛ sixu gba hun do nu mi ɖo taji ɔ hwenu mi mɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo kloklo mɛ e
e ɖɔ nɔ mɛ lɛ tɔn o
nɔ mɛ lɛ ɖesu nukun yetɔn mɛ kpo nukun yetɔn lɛ kpo
nɔ nɔ wa nu gbɔn hwenu se nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ e
nu wa e nɛ bɔ e hɛn nyɔna gege wa nu mi
enyi ɖo gbɔdonumɛ sin wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla mɛ lɛ wɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ bɔ nukun yetɔn mɛ nɔ zawe kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
nu ɖevo tɛ diane bɔ ɖo togudo ma ɛ

fi e ɖe nu mi do e huzu xwe gbe

anne ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ din e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo asie ɖo to mɛ e ɖo dogbo nu mitɔn ɖe e ɖe mɛ
e ɖɔ nu xwe mɔkpan wa ɖo fi vovo lɛ ɖo togudo e ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ xa lɛ e yi e kpo jijɔ yetɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn vo nu nyɛtɔn tawun
hweɖelɛnu ɔ enɛ nɔ hɛn nukunnu mɔ jɛ nu mɛ kpo tagba lɛ kpo wa
