ute
ðo ɔ e ɖe ute gosin allemagne ɖo xwe din e nyi ɖo madagascar
e ɖɔ jɛ nukɔn ɔ tɛnkpɔn gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ayi fa e ji ninɔ nu xwi ɖiɖi xa zansukpɛzɔn kpo azɔn wanvu lɛ nɔ do mɛ lɛ e kpo
e mi tawun
nɔvi nyɔnu xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ vi yetɔn lɛ kpo biblu lɛ kpo xwe sɔ mi bɔ gbe ɔ ma mi
nɔvi nyɔnu kpo nyi kpo nyi e kpe nukun do wu kpo wanyiyi kpo hwenu e
hu enɛ lɛ bi ɔ jehovah mi
nɔ xoɖɛ e hwɛhwɛ nɔ ɖɔ lɛ bi
enɛ gudo ɔ nɔ xwe sɔ nɔ nɔte sinkɔn ɖɛ lɛ tɔn hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu xɔ azan gege alo gege
jehovah ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ bi
sin xwe ɖie wɛ ute ɖo wa wɛ ɖo madagascar
ði mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo fi hudo ɖe e ɖevo lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ ɖo togudo hɛn nyɔna gege wa nu emi
nyɔna ɖetɛ lɛ mɔ
heidi
heidi gosin allemagne ɖo xwe din e nyi ɖe ɖo wa wɛ ɖo cote sin
e ɖɔ nu mi awajijɛ hugan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɔ bɔ vi gbigbɔ lixo tɔn lɛ ɖo zan wɛ ɖo nugbo mɛ
mɛ biblu xa e ɖe lɛ nyi gbexosin lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo din
mɛ gege nɔ ylɔ mi ɖɔ mamaa alo
mɛxo agun tɔn enɛ lɛ ɖokpo kpo asi tɔn kpo nu vi yetɔn lɛ kpo mi do ɖo hɛnnumɔ yetɔn
enɛ wu ɔ jehovah mi vi visi kpo vivu atɔn kpo jaan
karen tɛntin
karen gosin ɖo xwe din e wa nu xwe jɛji ɖo gbadahweji aflika tɔn
e ɖɔ zinzan mi bɔ nɔ nyiɖee do hu tɔn yi wan nu mɛ hu tɔn ɖo suulu hu tɔn
ɔ xa to vovo mɛ lɛ bɔ linlin nɔ ɖo e gblo ada
mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ ali vovo wɛ e sixu gbɔn blo nu lɛ
nyɔna ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi din ɖɔ ɖo lɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
gbɛzan mitɔn lɛ kpo e ɖe nu mi lɛ e kpo ɖyɔ co mi kpo ɖo nyi wɛ
margaret gosin angleterre ɖo xwe din e wa ɖo laos
e ɖɔ ɖo togudo mi bɔ mɔ jehovah nɔ dɔn lɛ sin akɔ lɛ bi kpo ninɔmɛ vovo lɛ bi kpo mɛ wa tutoblonunu tɔn mɛ gbɔn e
nu enɛ hɛn nuɖiɖi lido tawun
e mi jiɖe bi ɖɔ jehovah ɖo ali tutoblonunu tɔn wɛ bɔ linlin tɔn lɛ jɛ
nugbo ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɖo wa wɛ ɖo togudo lɛ e wa nu nukunɖeji gege ɖo ɔ mɛ
e jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa tawun
hwɛ hu ɔ mɛ nabi wɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖo jijɛji wɛ
enyi wa ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ e e ðɛh
enyi e sixu blo din a hun jɛ kple lɛ blo xa ɖeɖee nɔ do jonɔgbe ɖo to towe mɛ lɛ e ji
gbe yetɔn gbeje aca yetɔn lɛ
ðo taji hu bi ɔ ganjɛ jehovah wu
nu gege tiin bɔ ɖɔ kun sixu blo gbeɖe o kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ kpa mi karen
margaret
ðɔ xo xa kpo gbexosin kpo ɖeɖee mɔ nu lɛ e
nu e byɔ ɖo asi towe lɛ e
xoɖɛ byɔ mawu tɔn
flin ɖɔ nugbododo mawuxoɖiɖɔ tɔn taji ɖokpo ɔ lɛ wɛ e sixu xwedo gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
kudeji ɖɔ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ nɔ awajijɛ mɛ ɖo gbɛmɛ margaret
jehovah ɖevo lɛ
nuwukpikpe jiwu tɛ lɛ jehovah lɛ
jehovah da lɛ nuwukpikpe jiwu lɛ
e mi nuwukpikpe bɔ mi nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa tuto mitɔn nɔ ba kpe nu sɔgbe bɔ mi ɖo gbe yetɔn nya wɛ lɛ e wu
jehovah jlo ɖɔ mi nɔ zan nuwukpikpe mitɔn lɛ gbɔn
jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi zan nuwukpikpe mitɔn lɛ do wa nu ɖagbe lɛ
ðo e yi wan nu mi tuun ɖɔ enyi mi zan nunina enɛ lɛ ganji ɔ e nɔ awajijɛ mi
gbɔn xo tɔn gblamɛ ɔ jehovah ɖegbe nu mi azɔn mɔkpan ɖɔ mi nɔ zan nuwukpikpe mitɔn lɛ do wa nu ɖagbe
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah jlo ɖɔ mi wa nu wu mi kpe e wa ɖagbe nu miɖesunɔ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo
etɛ lɛ wu kpe a
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ jehovah tuun ɖɔ lɛ kun kpe nu bi wu o
hwenu ɖo xwi ɖi xa tagba lɛ wɛ ɔ ɖeji do jehovah wu nɔ wa ɖagbe
etɛ mi ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ lɛ bi mɛ ɔ mi ɖo nɔ ganjɛ jehovah wu bonu e ali mi ɖeji do wu tɔn ɖɔ e nɔ gudo nu mi wa nu mi sixu wa nu miɖee a e nu mi
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi ɖo wa nu wu mi kpe e ɖe afɔ jɛxa lɛ e do ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ xa ðɛhan
ðo klewun mɛ ɔ mi ɖo ɖeji do jehovah wu nɔ wa ɖagbe
ðo ali enɛ ɔ nu mi nu nɔwee davidi kpo mawu ɖevo ɖeji do jehovah wu wa nu sɔgbe lɛ e kpo tɔn sixu mi e
mi mɔ gbɔn e ɔ nu do vogbingbɔn ɖo nu sixu wa a e kpo nu sixu wa e kpo tɛntin e wu bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ mi mi wa nu sɔgbe xa vogbingbɔn enɛ gbɔn e
tinmɛ ninɔmɛ nɔwee kpannukɔn e
e tuun ɖɔ jehovah su kun do nu nyanya enɛ ɔ jɛn wɛ
e ɖo co enɛ mɛ sisi ɖo nu mawu ɖe a e nɔ doya nu nɔwee
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔwee mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ nuɖe lɛ tiin bɔ emi kun sixu blo o bɔ ɖevo lɛ tiin bɔ emi sixu blo
e mitɔn akpaxwe
etɛ nɔwee sixu wa a
ninɔmɛ mitɔn ci nɔwee tɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn
nu nɔwee sixu wa a e nɔwee jla akpagbanumɛ sin wɛn jehovah tɔn mɛ lɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo co e sixu gbidi kɔ nu mɛ nyanya do e lɛ e bonu yi wɛn ɔ a e sixu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ sin wiwa do asa mɛ a
mi lɔ ɖo mɛ nunyanyawiwa e ɖe mɛ bɔ mi tuun ɖɔ jehovah ɖɔ emi su kun tɔn do
jaan hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi sixu gbidi kɔ nu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ yi axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe ɔ a
mi sixu wa nu ɖe bonu ɖaxo ɔ yawu a
nwt nɔwee ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo hudo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo tɔn ɖeji ɖɔ mawu blo nuɖe ɖo malin malin mɛ
ðɛh mi kudeji ɖɔ jehovah kun lɔn bonu nyanya elɔ nɔ ayi nu keze ɖokpo do azan e ɖo e ji o xab
nɔwee ayi tɔn bi ɖo nu e sixu wa e ji gbɔn
nu nɔwee sixu wa e nɔwee xo nu kpla ɖo nu e sixu wa e a wu a e wa ɔ e ayi tɔn ɖo nu e sixu wa e ji
ðo nɔwee nyi nujlɔjlɔwiwa tɔn ɖe wutu ɔ e jla akpagbanumɛ sin wɛn e e kpo gbejininɔ kpo
nwt e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu enɛ nɔwee blo e hɛn nuɖiɖi tɔn lido
nu ɔ e zan nuwukpikpe agbaza tɔn kpo taglomɛ tɔn kpo e ɖo lɛ e do wa tɔjihun biblo sin mawu ɛ e xa eblee lɛ
mi sixu wa nu nɔwee ɖɔhun gbɔn
nɔwee ɖɔhun ɔ mi nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ ɖo bibi do aklunɔ sin ɔ wu wɛ
ðo taji hu bi ɔ mi nɔ hɛn alɔnu mitɔn jan ɖo ɔ mɛ tuun ɖɔ enɛ ɔ nɔ hɛn nukunɖiɖo mitɔn lido do sɔgudo wu
nu nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖɔ e ɖie enyi ɖɔ nyɔna axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn hɛn wa lɛ e sin xo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɔ wu ɖɔ lɛ kun ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖebu do sɔgudo wu o ɖɔ nɔ tagba yetɔn lɛ do mɔ nu nɔ ayi sɔyi lɛ e
nugbo ɔ alɔɖiɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ nɔ hɛn nukunɖiɖo ɖagbe mi ɖo do sɔgudo wu e lido nɔ bɔ mi nɔ xo nu kpla ɖo wezun kan wɛ mi ɖe e mɛ a kɔ
tinmɛ ninɔmɛ davidi kpannukɔn e
jehovah ɖɔ do davidi wu ɖɔ mɛɖe wɛ e nyi bɔ jijɔ tɔn nukun emitɔn mɛ mɛ
ðo gbɛzan davidi tɔn bi mɛ ɔ gbejininɔ sin wɛ e zan
e ɖo co ɖo hweɖenu ɔ e hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe
e do afɔ gbe nu bɛtisabe
e hɛn nu ɔ nyla ɖe we bonu e hu ulii ɔ ɖo ahwangbenu bonu hwɛ e hu e jɛ wexo o
bɔ e hu ulii gbɔn e ɔ ulii ɖesu ji wɛ davidi wlan nu mɔhunkɔtɔn gbɔn
ðewagbɛn ɖe a hwɛ davidi tɔn lɛ wa jɛ wexo mak
ee nu ci e ɔ davidi wa nu gbɔn
hwɛ e hu wa yi lɛ e akpaxwe
davidi hu hwɛ gudo e ɔ etɛ e sixu wa a
enyi mi hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ bonu nu mi bɔ mi lɛkɔ sin gudo ɔ etɛ mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah wa nu mi
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo hudo nuɖiɖi tɔn
e ɖo ɖeji ɖɔ ɖo hwɛ emitɔn lɛ nu emi bɔ emi lɛkɔ sin gudo wutu ɔ jehovah kɛ emi emi bɔ emi dɛ ɖo nu walɔ emitɔn lɛ dɔn kɔn nyi ayi lɛ e
ðo mi lɔ ɖu gu hwɛhuhu tɔn wutu ɔ mi bi wɛ nɔ wa nu nyi do
nuwanyido ɖe nɔ nyla hu ɖe
loɔ mi nɔ ɖeji do nu mawu ɖɔ e wu nɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ enyi hwɛ mitɔn lɛ nu mi nugbo bɔ mi lɛkɔ sin gudo jɛn wɛ ɔ jehovah nɔ gudo nu mi ɖo hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ wa enyi miɖesu wɛ tlɛ dɔn enɛ lɛ wa ɔ nɛ xa ezayii
davidi mɔ eɖee mɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn
nu davidi sixu wa e davidi yi gbe bɔ jehovah ɛ bɔ e mɔ eɖee mɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ali e wa ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi hwɛgbe e yi hwenu gbeyiɖɔ nataan jehovah tɔn ɔ nu e
davidi lɔn bonu ayixa tɔn ɖo hwɛ do e wɛ e tuntun awakanmɛ a e wa ɔ nuwanyido tɔn lɛ nu
nugbo ɔ e do nu mɔhun lɛ sin gbeɖe a
etɛ davidi tɔn sixu mi
enyi mi jɛ hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ ɔ e ɖo nu mi bɔ mi lɛkɔ sin gudo hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ jehovah tɔn
mi ɖo ɖɔ hwɛ mitɔn lɛ
jaan mi ɖo sɛkpɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ bɔ mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo xa jaki
enyi mi xwedo tuto jehovah tɔn lɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖeji do akpa e do ɖɔ emi gbɔ azɔn nu mi hwɛ kɛ mi e wu
enɛ wu ɔ nu nuwanyido mitɔn lɛ nɔ nu mi bonu mi kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ ɖo sɔgudo ɖo nukun wɛ kpo jiɖiɖe kpo ebl
lanmɛ nɔ ganji sin tagba lɛ akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ tɔn mi
sixu flin jehovah hwexonu tɔn ɖeji do wu tɔn wa nu sɔgbe e ɖe lɛ
ði ɔ sixu ɖu ɖo vimaji sin tagba mɔ wɛ e ɖe e ji eɖokponɔ a
ɖagbe ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ nu mi a ce
hwenu mi ɖo xwi ɖi xa tagba lanmɛ nɔ ganji tɔn lɛ alo tagba ɖevo hugan mi lɛ e wɛ e ɔ mi nɔ mitɔn lɛ do jehovah ji nɔ ɖeji ɖɔ e ɖo nukun kpe do mi wu wɛ
vi jɛ gbe lɛ e akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ mɛxomɔ samuwɛli tɔn sixu lɛ
ɖeɖee vi yetɔn lɛ jɛ gbe lɛ e
e ɖo jo xo ɔ do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah
nu nyi co samuwɛli hɛn gbejininɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn wu hɛn tɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ jehovah sin xomɛ hun
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mɔhun lɛ nɔ do gan tawun nɔ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ emitɔn vi emitɔn bɔ e lɛkɔ wa wuto ɔ mɛ
akwɛyozo akpaxwe ɔ
etɛwu asukusi wamamɔnɔ ɔ tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ
tamɛ do asukusi wamamɔnɔ nɔ ɖo jezu hwenu e ji
bɔ e ci ɖɔ e kun sixu wa nu ɖebu bonu ninɔmɛ tɔn ɖo akwɛ linu o ɖɔhun
e ɖo co e gankwɛ kpɛvi kpɛvi we enɛ lɛ nyi nu ɖo asi tɔn bɔ e ɖu nɔ ɔ bi e
nyɔnu enɛ ɖeji do jehovah wu bi tuun ɖɔ enyi emi nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ e nu sin hudo emi ɖo ɖo agbaza lixo lɛ e emi
jiɖe asukusi enɛ ɖo e bɔ e nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ sin tuto ɖo ayi hwenɛnu e
ɖokpo ɔ mi ɖeji ɖɔ enyi mi axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ jehovah kpe nukun do nu hudo mi lɛ e wu
na mawu egbe tɔn ɖo linlin sɔgbe e ɖe tɔn
mitɔn egbe tɔn lɛ gege ɖo jiɖe mɔhun do jehovah wu wa nu sɔgbe e
nɔvi nɔ nyi malcolm nɔ gbeji jɛ ku ɖo e tɔn
ðo xwe mɔkpan e kpo asi tɔn kpo jehovah lɛ e mɛ ɔ awe gege wɛ xo
e ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ ɔ nɔ wa bu vo do mɛ tlɛ sixu vɛwu tawun
jehovah nɔ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖeji do wu tɔn lɛ e ji
etɛ malcolm mɛ
nɔ xoɖɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ emi kpo ɖo wa wɛ kpo ɖo kan ɖo do nu wu wɛ ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ emi kpewu gbɔn e nɔ ayi towe bi ɖo nu sixu wa e ji nyi ɖo ee sixu wa a e ji o
etɛwu xwe tɔn sin xota mitɔn ɔ sɔgbe
hwɛ zan xwe tɔn sin xota ɔ ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ gbɔn
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ mi lɔn gbeɖe bonu tagba mɔhun lɛ tuntun awakanmɛ nu mi o
e wa ɔ mi ɖo ɖeji do jehovah wu bi wa nu sɔgbe bɔ mi sixu wa lɛ e bi
enɛ wu ɔ xwe tɔn sin xota mitɔn ɔ sɔgbe tawun e ɖɔ ðeji do jehovah wu nɔ wa ɖagbe ðɛh
xwe tɔn sin xota ðeji do jehovah wu nɔ wa ðagbe ðɛhan
atɔxwɛ octobre wex
fi gbigbɔ aklunɔ tɔn ɖe ɔ mɛɖee si jijɛ ɖo finɛ kɔ
nunina xɔ akwɛ tɛ jehovah mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
mi nɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn gbɔn e sixu ba mɛ mi yi wan nu jehovah ɖo e gbɔn
mi sixu ɖo sisi nu gbeta kɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa lɛ e gbɔn
linlin vovo tɛ lɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo do mɛɖesusininɔ xo ɔ wu
etɛ biblu mi do mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn wu
hwenu nawe ɖe ja gbeta mɛɖesunɔ tɔn ɖe kɔn wa gbe e ɔ e ɖɔ nu tɔn ɖe ɖɔ mi o ɖɔ nu wa e nu mi kpowun
nawe ɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ nyi nunina ɖe bɔ tɔn ɛ e a loɔ e ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu e wa e
hwɛ
nɔ wa gbeta hwiɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn a alo nɔ jlo ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ nu wa e nu
linlin tɛ nɔ ɖo do nu kan mɛɖesusininɔ lɛ e wu
sin xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɖie wɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo do xo enɛ wu
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nuɖe kun ɖe bɔ mɛɖesunɔ wɛ nɔ jlo nɔ wa o le mawu wɛ to nu nɔ jɛ lɛ e bi
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ dɔn nu ɖɔ cobonu e ɖɔ mɛɖesusininɔ nugbo ɔ xo ɔ miɖesu si jɛn mi nɔ bi
xo mawu tɔn biblu ɔ jɛn nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e mi do xo enɛ wu
ðo e ɖɔ jehovah da mi mi mɛɖesusininɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo nuwukpikpe wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn e vo ba wa xa jozuwee
biblu nukanbyɔ lehun lɛ sin xosin mi ɖo zan mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn do wa gbeta lɛ kɔn gbɔn
mi zan gbɔn e ɖo dogbo wɛ a
mi nɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn gbɔn e sixu ba mɛ mi yi wan nu jehovah ɖo e gbɔn
tɛ jehovah ze do mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn zinzan wu
jehovah ɖokponɔ gee wɛ ɖo eɖesunɔ si bi e nɔ zan gbɔn e nyi ɖe nu mi
jehovah jɔmɛ kpowun wa a
hu ɔ jijɔ taji jehovah tɔn nyi wanyiyi kpo hwɛjijɔ kpo e wɛ e nɔ xwedo hwebinu do zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn
izlayɛli vi lɛ jo sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ do azɔn gege co e dɔn to nu gbɔn e ɖe enɛ
hwenu lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn lɛ gudo nugbo nugbo e ɔ jehovah jlo do ɖe wanyiyi kpo nublawukunumɛ kpo ɖɔ afɔ izlayɛlinu lɛ do gbe ɔ kɛ
yi wan nu titewungbe alo kpo jlo kpo nwt
jehovah nɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn nu ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn gbɔn e sin ɖagbe ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ
nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn mɔ nunina mawu tɔn nyi mɛɖesusininɔ e yi e e zan gbɔn
etɛ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo kanbyɔ
hwenu jehovah jɛ nu lɛ da ji e ɔ e mɛɖesusininɔ nuɖiɖo tɔn gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo lɛ kpo
nukɔngbevi tɔn nyi akpajlɛ mawu e nɔ mɔ a e tɔn e wɛ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn mɔ nunina enɛ yi e
nukɔnmɛ hwenu jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn nu ɔ xwle e do ɛ lɛ e
nu mi wa nu jezu ɖɔhun zan mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn do kpa nu jehovah wa jlo tɔn
nu sixu nyi doo a
e ɖo co mi ɖo mɛɖesusininɔ jehovah ɖo e a
xo mawu tɔn tinmɛ ɖɔ mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn ɖo dogbo lobɔ mi ɖo zɛ dogbo sɔgbe bɔ jehovah ɖo nu mi lɛ e wu a
dogbo enɛ lɛ kunkpla mi nɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn gbɔn e gbɔn
xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ tɔn sixu ɖe nu ɖo mi sɔyi e
nu wu e sɔgbe ɖɔ e ɖo dogbo nu mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn e do nuɖe wu
mɛɖesusininɔ ɖo dogbo e nyi mɛɖesusininɔ doo a
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ
dogbo ɖeɖee e ɖo nu mɛɖesusininɔ lɛ tɔn e sixu nya xɛ ɖo ji
ði ɔ mi sixu jlo ɖɔ ɖɔ mi kun yi to linlin ɖe mɛ
enyi e byɔ ɖɔ mi gbɔn ali ji ɖebu ɖe a bɔ mɛ bi sixu kanwezun e jlo mɛ gbɔn e alo kun gbɔn alɔ xwe jlo mɛ e ɔ ayi mitɔn a
lɛ ɖo dandan bonu mɛ bi mɔ tɛn do ɖu vivi nyɔna ɖo mɛɖesusininɔ nugbo ɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn
nu mi gbeje biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ ba mɔ nu ɖevo wu e nyi nunywɛ sin nu ɖɔ mi zɛ dogbo jehovah ɖo nu mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn lɛ e wu o e
nunina mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn ɔ bɔ adamu gbɔn vo nu nuɖogbɛ ɖevo ɖo edɛni mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
tinmɛ ali adamu zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn ɖe e ɖokpo
hwenu mawu da nukɔntɔn ɔ adamu e ɔ e ɛ nunina e nuɖiɖo tɔn ɖo jixwe lɛ e e wɛ nyi mɛɖesusininɔ
adamu zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn ɖo alixo sɔgbe e mɛ gbɔn e ɖe ɖie
e da kanlin lɛ cobo wa da
e ɖo co jehovah awajijɛ ɖo nyikɔ nina nuɖiɖo enɛ lɛ mɛ e nu nukɔntɔn e da e
mawu kpla wa ɔ nyikɔ e ɔ
enyi adamu kanlin ɖe ɖo nyikɔ jɛxa ɛ e ɔ jehovah nɔ fli xwe a
e wa ɔ nyikɔ e ɔ wɛ nɔ nyi bib
adamu zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn nyi do gbɔn
e blawu ɖɔ mawu ɖe nu adamu nɔ kpe nukun do palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ wu e kun kpe e o
e wa ɔ e jlo zɛ dogbo mawu ɖo lɛ e wu gbɔn atin sin e do e ɖuɖu gblamɛ
mɛɖesusininɔ zinzan nyi do ɖaxo enɛ kɔ do kpo kpo mɛ nu kunkan adamu tɔn lɛ nu xwe mɔkpan
hlɔ nu ɖeɖee gbeta kɔn adamu wa e ji lɛ e tuuntuun ɖo mi bɔ mi zan mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn ganji zɛ dogbo jehovah ɖo nu mi lɛ e wu a
etɛ jehovah ɖɔ nu togun tɔn izlayɛli xosin tɛ akɔta ɔ
kunkan adamu kpo ɛvu kpo tɔn lɛ ɖu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo sin gu ɖo yetɔn enɛ lɛ
e ɖo co mɛɖesusininɔ yetɔn sin acɛ ɔ kpo ɖo si
mawu wa nu xa akɔta izlayɛli tɔn gbɔn e ɖe enɛ
xosin tɛ
e blawu ɖɔ nukɔnmɛ ɔ akɔta ɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn nyi do ɖe akpa enɛ a
tɛ lɛ ɖɔ lɛ hɛn ɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ yetɔn do kpa nu mawu
ðo eblee lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ mawu tɔn ɖeɖee jlo zan mɛɖesusininɔ yetɔn zɛ dogbo mawu ze lɛ e wu a e sin nyikɔ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ mɔ nyɔna gege ɖo nukunɖiɖo jɔ nukunɖiɖo do sɔgudo wu
ði ɔ nɔwee ɖe nuɖiɖi ɖaxo jlo do xwedo ɖeɖee mawu ɖɔ e blo tɔjihun ɖe ba hwlɛn xwedo tɔn kpo mɛ ɖevo wa nɔ lɛ e kpo gan e ebl
ablaxamu kpo sala kpo jlo do xwedo mawu tɔn lɛ yi to sin akpa mawu do nu ɔ mɛ
hwenu wli tomɛyiyi gaga enɛ sin ali gudo e ɔ mɔ ali lɛkɔ yi dɔkuntoxo wuu tɔn mɛ
e ɖo co nukun nuɖiɖi tɔn yetɔn lɛ ɖo nu sin akpa mawu do bɔ mɔ sɔgudo lɛ e ji to hu to mɛ gosin ɔ wɛ ɖe
nu mi ɖi nu mɛ hwexonu tɔn enɛ lɛ ɖɔhun bonu mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ lobonu mi nɔ zan do wa jlo mawu tɔn
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ enyi mi ɖo mɛɖe bonu e nɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu mi ɔ e sixu bɔwu nu mi biblo bɔ nyɔna ɖaxo ɖo mɛɖesusininɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖokpo yi tɛ mi
tinmɛ nyɔna wɛ e xa
wemafɔ ɔ ɖɔ nu mawu ɖo nu izlayɛli vi lɛ e
ðo wemafɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ jehovah hun ali xɔ akwɛ ɖe nu bɔ ɛ nu ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ lɛ e
mi hɛn ɔ mi jlo jehovah
nu ɖe sixu mi hu mi zan mɛɖesusininɔ mawu mi e do ɖɔ mi yi wan nɔ kpa nɔ wli a
etɛ mi ɖo wa gbeɖe nu mɛɖesusininɔ e mi e a
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe towe ɖe
enyi se ɖɔ e nu ɛ e nyi alo nylahu bi ɔ e zan do gblewu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɔ e nu tawun a ce
din ɔ tamɛ do nu nɔ ci nu jehovah hwenu e nɔ mɔ bɔ mɛ gege nɔ zan mɛɖesusininɔ yetɔn nyi do nɔ wa nu nɔ hɛn nu gble do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e ji
nu mi lɔn zan nunina xɔ akwɛ enɛ jehovah mi e nyi do gbeɖe alo ɖɔ ɖɔ acɛ tɔn wɛ mi ɖo o
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu mɛɖesusininɔ e mi e zinzan nyi do gbɔn
ðɔ ali mi sixu nyi alɔ nu mɛɖesusininɔ klisanwun tɔn mitɔn zinzan nyi do ɖe e ɖokpo
mi bi wɛ vo ɖɔ mɛ mi do xa lɛ e mi sɔnu gbɔn e kpo ayiɖeɖayi mi lɛ e kpo
kancica tɛ ɖo jiɖe ɖiɖo do jehovah wu kpo mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn zinzan kpo mɛ
ali ɖevo mi nya xɛ ɖo mɛɖesusininɔ e mi e ji ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖeji do jehovah wu yi gbe nu e ali mi ɖo dogbo alɔcyɔnmɛji tɔn e ɖo nu mi lɛ e tɛntin
mi ɖo miɖee hwe yi gbe ɖɔ xo nugbo wɛ nu xo elɔ gosin mawu e ali ji nɔ gbɔn ɖo gbɛmɛ fi ɔ eɖesu wɛ nɔ ɖe a
ɖesu sixu ali e gbɔn e eɖee a jel
nu mi lɔn gbeɖe jɛ jiɖe ɖiɖo do nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mɛɖesunɔ tɔn wu mɛ adamu kpo izlayɛli vi lɛ kpo ɖɔhun o
etɛ nugbododo ɖo galatinu lɛ mɛ e mi
dogbo e ɖo nu mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo ɖo sisi nu acɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo wa gbeta yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ e
ðo mi bi wɛ e mɛɖesusininɔ wutu ɔ klisanwun we wa gbeta ɖokpo ɔ kɔn hwebinu a
xo enɛ tlɛ nyi nugbo ɖo nu ɖeɖee kunkpla walɔ mitɔn kpo sinsɛn biblo mitɔn kpo lɛ e mɛ
flin nugbododo ɖo galatinu lɛ mɛ e
mi sixu wa gbeta miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn ɖɔ nu ayixa midɛɛ lɛ tɔn ɖɔ nu mi e jɛn mɛ ɖevo lɛ lɔ wa dandan a akpaxwe ɔ
mɛɖesusininɔ xo ɔ huzu tagba ɖo kɔlɛnti gbɔn
pɔlu ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ gbɔn etɛ enɛ mi do acɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo e wu
tamɛ do biblu tɔn elɔ nu wu mi ɖo nɔ ɖo sisi nu acɛ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɖo wa gbeta yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn ɖo nu ɖeɖee kunkpla ayixa e mɛ lɛ e ji
klisanwun ɖo kɔlɛnti lɛ e jɛ gbe vovo do ji ɖo e sixu xwle vodun lɛ wa ɖo sisa wɛ ɖo axi mɛ lɛ e ɖuɖu wutu
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ ðo vodun nyi nuti a wutu ɔ e hɛn ɔ e ɖu ɔ ɖo ayixa ɖe
e ɖo co mɛ vodun lɛ e mɔ ɖɔ ɔ ɖuɖu nyi sinsɛn biblo sin nuɖe kɔ
xo titewungbe ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ ɖibla dɔn kinklan wa agun ɔ mɛ
pɔlu klisanwun ɖo kɔlɛnti lɛ e bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ linlin mawu ɖo do xo ɔ wu e mɛ gbɔn
jɛ nukɔn ɔ pɔlu flin akpaxwe we lɛ bi ɖɔ e kun nyi nuɖuɖu wɛ dɔn sɛkpɔ mawu o
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e nu mɛ ɖeɖee ayixa yetɔn nɔ yawu dohwɛ lɛ e ɖɔ nɔ ɖɔhwɛ do mɛ nɔ ɖu mɔhun lɛ e o
enɛ wu ɔ mi lɔ ɖo nɔ ɖo sisi nu acɛ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɖo wa gbeta yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖo taji a lɛ e mɛ e a ce kɔ
ɖɔ mɛɖesusininɔ e we e xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun towe mɛ gbɔn
nunina enɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖo e nɔ bɔ mi nɔ wa gbeta nɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi yi wan tawun lɛ e kɔn
nu mi nɔ zan nunina enɛ do kpa nu mawu nɔ ɖo sisi nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ jlo nɔ zan yetɔn gbɔn e do ɖɔ nunina xɔ akwɛ enɛ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
biblu tɔn mi mɔ ɖo mɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ do sixu sɔnu yi ɖe ɖo fi linlin ɖe ɔ ablaxamu ɖiɖa naki e do do ɔ vi tɔn izaki hɛn myɔ kpodo jivi kpo alɔ mɛ bɔ mɛ we lɛ zɔn ɖido
akpaxwe ɖebu ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ tinmɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ bɔ myɔ gbɔn ɖo hwexonu e a
e hwe bi ɔ ɖokpo ɖɔ do xo ɖɔ wɛ mi ɖe din e wu ɖɔ e vɛwu ɖɔ e hɛn myɔ ɖe do mɛɖe ji zɔn ali gaga mɔhun ablaxamu kpo izaki kpo zɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ e sixu nyi nu sin hudo ablaxamu ɖo bɔ myɔ ɔ e xo ɖɔ wɛ ɔ ɖe
e ɖo co mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ myɔ bibɔ kun nɔ bɔwu ɖebu ɖo hwexonu o
ðo fi e blo ɖe lɛ e ɔ mɛ lɛ mɔ ɖɔ enyi emi wun akan zozo ɖo nɔzo emitɔn lɛ ɔ e hu emiɖesunɔ myɔ ɖe
e hɛn ɔ e zan akan ɖo zozo bɔ e hɛn do nu mɛ ɖo yiyi wɛ lɛ e kpo naki xuxu yɔywɛ ɖe lɛ kpo do bɔ myɔ ɖo hweɖebunu ɖo tomɛyiyi ɔ hwenu
ɖo tofɔligbe tɔn lɛ e ɖo nɔ sa gbɔn zungbo ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ lɛ kpo so andes tɔn ji singo cyɔn lɛ e kpo tɛntin e kpa gbɔn wɛ
ɖo alɔ ɖo ɖo wɛnɖagbejijla sin tuto ɖe mɛ wɛ gbɔn xwe ɖo fi linlin lɛ e gbe hwenu ayi mɛ e
ɔ lɛ si wɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖe nux
etɛwu jlɛjininɔ ɖo taji
kancica tɛ ɖo jlɛjininɔ kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo mɛ
mi sixu yi nukɔn ɖo tɛn mɛ e mi ɖo e gbɔn
etɛwu mawu wa nya nɔ ji e ɖe
taan kpɛɖe gudo ɔ e wa goyiyi sin nuɖe lɛ
ee gbeyiɖɔ mawu tɔn samuwɛli yawu wa gilugalu a e ɔ sawulu jɛ mɔ ji
lɛ ɖo nu wɛ ahwan bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo hinhɔn jo sawulu do wɛ
e ɖɔ ɖo wa nuɖe din tlolo
enɛ wu ɔ e xwle vɔsanu ɖe mawu e ɖo acɛ tɔn a
nu enɛ hun xomɛ nu jehovah a
sawulu yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ ɔ a e wa ɔ e hwɛjijɔ lɛ tɛnkpɔn ba kpla kɔ nu mɛ ɖevo hu nu nu nyanya e wa e
gbɛzinzan sawulu tɔn ɖo co e wa fo gbɔn e nyla tawun
etɛ mɛ gege nɔ do jlɛjininɔ wu
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ sin xosin e ɖo do
ðo agbahwlɛnhwlɛn sin egbe tɔn mɛ ɔ mɛ gege nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo ɖe emiɖee do sixu yi nukɔn
wiwa nɔ bɔ nɔ nɔ ji ɖebu a
ði ɔ nukunɖeji wa huzu e ɖe ɖɔ gbe ɖokpo ɖɔ jlɛjininɔ sin xo ɖe kan nyɛ a ɖi ɖɔ e kun kan mi o
etɛwu jlɛjininɔ kpo ɖo taji
etɛ nyi jlɛjininɔ etɛ e nyi a
mi sixu kpo ɖo ji enyi ninɔmɛ lɛ vɛwu alo mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo kɔ gbidi nu mi wɛ ɔ gbɔn
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ xosin nukanbyɔ we nukɔntɔn lɛ tɔn
xota bɔ e sinkɔn nu nukanbyɔ atɔngɔ ɔ
etɛ sixu ylɔ ɖɔ goyiyi sin nu
biblu ɖe vogbingbɔn ɖo jlɛjininɔ kpo goyiyi kpo tɛntin e
etɛ nyi goyiyi
nu e tinmɛ ɔ enyi mɛɖe yi ji a alo syɛn wa nu sin acɛ e ɛ a e ɖe hun goyiyi sin nu wɛ e wa nɛ
ðo hwɛhuhu sin gu mi ɖu e wutu ɔ mi bi wɛ nɔ wa goyiyi sin nu hweɖelɛnu
axɔsu sawulu tɔn gbɔn e ɔ enyi mi nɔ jɛ nukɔn ɖo nu bi mɛ ɔ e lin oo e ya oo mi kpo mawu kpo gble jɛn wɛ
ðɛhan ɖɔ do jehovah wu ɖɔ nɔ adan alo nu nwt nu
etɛwu e nyi
etɛwu goyiyi nyla tawun
nuwiwa goyiyi tɔn lɛ nyla hu nu e tuun a wa nyi do lɛ e
nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu mi wa nu kpo goyiyi kpo e ɔ mi kpa nu jehovah ɖɔ e wɛ nyi mitɔn a nɛ
wegɔ ɔ enyi mi wa nu zɛ acɛ mi ɖo e wu ɔ mi ɖibla dɔn tagba wa mi kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo tɛntin
nuwiwa kpo goyiyi kpo nɔ kpla mɛ yi fi ɖagbe ɖe a
ði mawuxowema ɔ gbɔn e ɔ jlɛjininɔ wɛ nyi nu sɔgbe bɔ e wa hwebinu e
etɛ nɔ nyi mɛɖesɔhwe
e ca kan xa jlɛjininɔ gbɔn
jlɛjininɔ nyi jijɔ ɖe ca kan xa mɛɖesɔhwe tawun
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ mɛɖee hwe wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ yigo alo nɔ mɔ mɛɖee o
mɛɖesɔhwe nɔ hun xomɛ nu jehovah tawun
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ jlɛjininɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi mɔ do nu nuwukpikpe miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ tuun dogbo mitɔn lɛ
ðo glɛkigbe dodo ɔ mɛ ɔ e ci ɖɔ nutuuntuun enɛ ɖo mi bɔ mi wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e ji wɛ e
linlin alo zinzan tɛ lɛ sixu nu mɛ ɖɔ e kun ɖo ji o
hwetɛnu mi sixu jɛ nu ji alo nu wa ji kpo jlɛjimanɔ kpo
kɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ hwenu mi wa nu gbɔn e ɔ mi tlɛ sixu nɔ wu ɖɔ mi jo jlɛjininɔ do ɖo go yi wɛ
etɛ mɛɖe lɛ bɔ huzu
na biblu tɔn ɖe
mi mɛ bi wɛ sixu gɔn ji nɔ hwenu mi jo jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ do bɔ ɖu ɖo mi ji e
cejɛnnabi kpo xomɛsin syɛnsyɛn kpo mɛ gege bɔ wa nu kpo goyiyi kpo
etɛwu mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu hwɛ ɖiɖɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ
hwɛjijɔ sixu bɔ mɛɖe gɔn ji nɔ e ɖevo lɛ tiin
ði ɔ tamɛ do biblu tɔn ɖo kpo matie kpo mɛ lɛ e ji
jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn lɛ wɛ abimɛlɛki kpo kpo bɔ wa nu ci goyiyi sin nu ɖɔhun lɛ e a
abi mɔ do nu nu lɛ bi a alo nɔ aceji a wutu wɛ a
ðo mi sixu tuun nu ɖo ayi mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn mɛ e a wutu ɔ nunywɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi nyi alɔ nu gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa do nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ wa nuɖe e wu xa jaki
kancica tɛ ɖo jlɛjininɔ kpo gbeyiyi nu tɛn mɛ mi ɖe ɖo tuto jehovah tɔn mɛ e kpo tɛntin
nu e ɖɔ nugbo ɔ gbeyiyi nu tɛn mɛ mi ɖe ɖo tuto jehovah tɔn mɛ e ji wɛ jlɛjininɔ nɔ
ðo jehovah nyi mawu ɖe nɔ nɔ tuto ji wutu ɔ e mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo tɛn ɖe mɛ alo fi ɖe ɖo xwedo tɔn mɛ
mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ ɖo tɔn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ mi bi sin hudo wɛ e ɖo
jehovah gbɔn tɔn gblamɛ nunina alo nuwukpikpe ɖe lɛ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
mi sixu zan do kpa do wa ɖagbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
hlɔ jehovah ɖe sin nu mi ɖɔ e wli nu mi e ɖeji do mi wu byɔ nu ɖo mi si xa
enyi e ɖe ɖevo nu mi ɔ etɛ jezu tɔn sixu mi
akpaxwe jɛ
enyi tɛn mɛ mi ɖe ɖo tuto mawu tɔn mɛ e nɔ ɖyɔ sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu ɔ etɛwu e ɖo kpaca mi a
e ɖo co tɛn mɛ mi ɖe ɖo tuto mawu tɔn mɛ e nyi tɛgbɛnu a
e sixu wa ɖyɔ
tamɛ do jezu tɔn ji
enɛ gudo ɔ e bɔ e da nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ wɛkɛ ɔ bɔ lɛ wa su
ðo vɔsisa sin ku jezu tɔn gudo ɔ e lɛkɔ yi jixwe nyi nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe wa huzu axɔsu nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖo ebl
azɔn gudo tɔn tɔn ɖyɔ e nɛ a
ðo axɔsuɖuɖu xwe tɔn jezu tɔn gudo ɔ e axɔsuɖuto tɔn jo nu jehovah bonu mawu nyi nu bi nu mɛ bi kɔ
ði ɔ nyi tlɛnnɔ wa wli alɔ wɛ a
jɛ vi ji ji wɛ a
ðo hwenu su e ɔ hɛn gbɛzan towe bɔkun do hwebinu tɔn ɔ mɛ wɛ a
gbeta enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kɔn wiwa ɖo wujɔmɛ tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo
ninɔmɛ mitɔn nɔ ɖo ɖyɔɖyɔ wɛ lɛ e sixu gblo ada nu fi mi ɖo e alo ɖekpo
mɛ winnyawinnya wɛ nu a alo nyi mɛxo
lanmɛ towe ɖo ganji wɛ a alo e nɔ yawu kpɛɖe
jehovah nɔ gbeje e sixu zan mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo tɔn mɛ hugan e hwebinu
nu ɖo ji e jɛn e nɔ byɔ ɖo mi si bɔ nu ɖebu mi wa e nɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ tawun ebl
jezu mɔ awajijɛ ɖo e ɖe lɛ e bi mɛ bɔ mi lɔ hɛn ɔ mi mɔ awajijɛ ɖo mi tɔn lɛ mɛ
nɔ hu do wujɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ mimɔ ɖo sɔgudo alo do nukɔnyiyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wu a
e wa ɔ e nɔ zan hlɔnhlɔn tɔn bi do mɔ nu wu wa wɛ e ɖe din e ɖo taji e nɔ mɔ awajijɛ ɖo e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ e gosin
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ e nɔ ɖo sisi nu jehovah ɖe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e alo tɛn mɛ e ɖo e tawun
etɛ jlɛjininɔ tɔn sixu mi
tɔn ɖe nu jlɛjininɔ nyi e ganji tɔn
hwenu wɛnsagun jehovah tɔn wa tɔn azɔn nukɔntɔn e ɔ e yi gbe ɖɔ emi kun nyi mɛ nukunɖeji ɖe o emi kun ɖo nuwukpikpe jɛxa lɛ e o
e gbɔn e e sin yɛkan mɛ nyi mɛ nukunɖeji a
e wa ɔ hwenu e kpewu e ɔ e lɛkɔ yi tɔn xoxo ɔ kɔn kpo xomɛhunhun kpo hwɛ
enyi mɛ ɖo ji e ɖe ɖo tamɛ do nukɔnyiyi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ji wɛ ɔ etɛ lɛ e nɔ hɛn do ayi mɛ
jlɛjininɔ sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi kun ɖo wujɔmɛ tɔn ɖevo lɛ alo yi gbe nu o a
enɛ ɔ nɔ byɔ hwebinu ɖɔ e ɖyɔ mitɔn wɛ a
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ mi sixu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɖo ɖebu wa wɛ mi ɖe din e mɛ
mi sixu kpo ɖo nuwukpikpe mawu mi lɛ e hɛn wɛ kpo ɖo ɖagbe lɛ wa wɛ
cobonu mɛ nɔ nɔ ji e ɖe yi gbe nu ɖe ɔ e nɔ gbeje nu ɔ byɔ ɖo asi tɔn lɛ e
enɛ gudo ɔ e nɔ ɖɔ ninɔmɛ emitɔn sixu lɔn nu nu emi a ji
ði ɔ e kpewu kpe nukun do ɖevo lɛ wu nu nu taji ɖevo lɛ a a
e sixu wa wɛ e ɖe din lɛ e ɖe lɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɔ tɛn do kpe nukun do ɔ wu a
enyi xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ ɖokpo tɔn abi we lɛ bi tɔn nyi eo hun vlafo e sixu mɔ mɛ ɖevo kpe nukun do ɔ wu hugan e
ðɛxixo gbeje ninɔmɛ mitɔn mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu nuwukpikpe mitɔn lɛ kpo dogbo mitɔn lɛ kpo wu zizɛ
jlɛjininɔ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖɔ xeo
etɛ jlɛjininɔ mi bɔ mi wa hwenu e ɖe ɖe nu mi bɔ mi yi gbe e
hlɔmanu lɛ sɔgbe xa mɛ nɔ nɔ ji e ɖe gbɔn
enyi e ɖe ɖe nu mi bonu mi yi gbe ɔ tɔn flin mi ɖɔ e kun sixu kpa mi jehovah tɔn kpo nyɔna tɔn kpo mɛvo o
e ɖɔ lɔ ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi nɔ zan ɖo mɛɖesɔhwe alo jlɛjininɔ nwt mɛ ɖo mawu mitɔn nukɔn
micee enɛ wu ɔ hweɖebunu e ɖe lɛ nu mi bɔ mi yi gbe nu e ɔ mi ɖo xoɖɛ tamɛ do nu ɖebu jehovah ɖɔ nu mi gbɔn xo tɔn kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo gblamɛ e ji
mi ɖo nɔ huzu sɔgbe xa jehovah tɔn lɛ
nu mi nɔ flin ɖɔ mɛɖesɔhwe jehovah tɔn wɛ nɔ mi e nyi nuwukpikpe miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ a
ðɛh nwt enɛ wu ɔ gbɛzinzan ɖo jlɛjininɔ mɛ ɖo mawu nukɔn mi bɔ mi nɔ mɔ miɖee alo ɖe miɖee kpo zɛ xwe wu a xa hlɔmanu
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ wutu mi ɖo tɛnkpɔn nɔ nɔ ji
mɛ nɔ nɔ ji e nɔ kpa jɛxa jehovah e ɖo e wɛ nyi mitɔn kpo wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn kpo
nuɖe jlɛjininɔ nɔ mi bɔ tɛn mɛ e mi ɖo ɖo tuto mawu tɔn mɛ e nɔ jɛmɛ nu mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖe
jlɛjininɔ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ wa winnyanu a nɔ jɛhun do buninɔ ji ɖo togun jehovah tɔn mɛ
jlɛjininɔ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ hugan mi bɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖo ayi lobɔ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ nyi alɔ nu nuwanyido syɛnsyɛn lɛ
hwɛjijɔ enɛ lɛ wutu wɛ jlɛjininɔ kpo ɖo taji nu togun mawu tɔn bi bɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ ɖo jijɔ enɛ e nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ
enyi e ɖo kɔ gbidi nu mi wɛ ɔ lo
xota bɔ e mi sixu kpo ɖo ji ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ e mɛ gbɔn e
nɔ zan ɖo mɛɖesɔhwe alo jlɛjininɔ nwt mɛ ɖo mawu towe nukɔn micee
e ɖe nu mi e kpa mi
mi ɖi xwi xa xomɔɖɔdomɛwu alo mɛ kpikpa
mi do nu ji hwenu mi ɖo nu xo wɛ e
axɔsu jelobowamu ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ bɔ e jɛ hweɖenu e ɔ jehovah gbeyiɖɔ ɖe do sin judaa bɔ e do hwɛɖonumɛ sin wɛn ɖe izlayɛli xɔsu enɛ
gbeyiɖɔ enɛ do wɛn ɔ kpo gbejininɔ kpo bɔ jehovah cyɔn alɔ ji tɔn hwenu jelobowamu jɛma do ji tɔn e axɔ
nya ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ gbeyiɖɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ nu emi e ɖo adingban bɔ e gba jehovah do ɖɔ e ɖu nu ɖo izlayɛli o sin o lɛkɔ gbɔn ali e gbɔn yi e o e
nu enɛ jehovah nukunmɛ a
hwenu gbeyiɖɔ jehovah tɔn ɔ ɖo xwe ji e ɔ kinnikinni ɖe wli ɖo ali ɔ xo hu axɔ
e sixu nyi ɖɔ wɔn wɛ e wɔn bi ɖɔ emi ɖo nɔ zan kpo jlɛjininɔ kpo ɖo mawu nukɔn
mɛ nɔ nɔ ji e ɖe nɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ emi hɛn ɔ emi nɔ ɖɔ xo xa wanyiyinɔ kpo kpo emitɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo wa
gbeyiɖɔ ɔ hɛn ɔ e byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e nu tɔn lɛ nu emi e wa bonu mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ a
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mi do nuvɛwu ɖe lɛ ji bɔ nu sɔgbe bɔ mi wa e sixu nɔ ɖo wɛn nu mi
jlɛjininɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu afɔ syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɖiɖe nyi do
etɛ mi ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
ðo xota wa yi e mɛ ɔ mi nu wu jlɛjininɔ kpo ɖo taji nu klisanwun lɛ e kpo nu e nɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ si lɛ e kpo
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ sixu jlɛjininɔ mitɔn
mi sixu tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ tlɛ nɔ ji ɖo kɔgbidinumɛ lɛ glɔ gbɔn
baazilayi nɔ ji gbɔn
huzuhuzu ninɔmɛ miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ tɔn alo e ɖe nu mi lɛ e tɔn sixu jlɛjininɔ mitɔn
hwenu davidi byɔ baazilayi ɖo xwe e ɖɔ e yi gbe wa nɔ hɔnmɛ e ɔ ɖaxo wɛ e nyi nu baazilayi
gbeyiyi nu nu davidi byɔ ɛ e bɔ e kpo ɖo nɔ xa axɔsu ɔ wɛ
e ɖo co baazilayi
ðo xwe tɔn sɛyi wutu ɔ e ɖɔ nu davidi ɖɔ emi kun nyi agban nu axɔsu ɔ o
enɛ wu ɔ baazilayi ɖɔ ɖɔ vi sunnu emitɔn kimuxamu nɔ tɛn emitɔn mɛ
jlɛjininɔ baazilayi wa gbeta sɔgbe e ɖe kɔn
mɔ wɛ e mɔ ɖɔ emi kun jɛxa ba kpe nukun do nu wu o alo e nɔ vivo mɛ fɛɛ wutu wɛ e nu davidi byɔ ɛ e a
e ɖiɖa nu hugan ɛ e a xa galatinu lɛ
jlɛjininɔ sixu mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu jiɖe ɖiɖo do mɛɖee wu gbɔn
hwɛhwɛ ɔ tɛn nukunkpenuwu tɔn ɖaxo lɛ nɔ acɛ ɖaxo mɛ bɔ enɛ sixu jlɛjininɔ mitɔn
jehovah do nu nɛɛmii hwenu axɔsu aatazɛɛzɛsi ɛ tokpɔngan xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e
nɛɛmii ɖo tɛn nukunɖeji mɛ jɛ dɔkun ɖo acɛ tawun co e ganjɛ nu eɖesunɔ mɔ lɛ e alo nuwukpikpe eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ wu a
e ɖo zan wɛ ɖo mawu nukɔn
e nɔ kije mawu ɔ hwebinu do jehovah tɔn
nɛɛ nɛɛmii blo gan nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ a e wa ɔ e akpo eɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ do kpe nukun do wu nɛɛ
nɛɛmii tɔn jlɛjininɔ sixu mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu jiɖe ɖiɖo do mɛɖee wu hwenu e ɖe nu mi e huzu alo e ɖe ɖevo lɛ nu mi e gbɔn e
enyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖeji do nu eɖesu mɔ lɛ e kɛɖɛ wu ɔ e nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah cobo nɔ jɛ nukun kpe do nu kan agun ɔ lɛ e wu ji a
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu nɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn cobo nɔ wa xoɖɛ byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e ji
jlɛjininɔ jɛn nyi enɛ a
mɛ ɖo ji e ɖe nɔ flin tɛn mɛ e ɖe ɖo mawu nukɔn e kpo tɛn mɛ e ɖe ɖo tuto mawu tɔn mɛ e kpo hwebinu
nuwukpikpe mitɔn lɛ wɛ nyi nu ɖo taji e a
ðo taji ɔ hwenu ninɔmɛ alo tagba mi mɔ e ɖe kpannukɔn mi e ɔ mi ɖo miɖee ɖeji do miɖee wu a xa nunywɛxo
ðo mi nyi xwedo mawu tɔn sin lɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ wa nu lɛ ba yi tɛn ɖaxo mɛ alo nyi gan ɖaxo a e wa ɔ mi nɔ wa nu lɛ ɖo xwedo ɖe ɖɔhun alo ɖi agun ɔ tɔn ɖe tim
jlɛjininɔ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa xomɔɖɔdomɛwu masɔgbe lɛ gbɔn
hwenu e mɔ xo ɖɔ do mi wu ɖo alixo agɔ mɛ e ɔ e sixu vɛwu bɔ mi ɖu ɖo nu ci nu mi lɛ e ji
nɔ hwɛhwɛ ɖo penina tɔn ɔ nɔ ɖo nuɖɔ ɛ wɛ magbokɔ wutu
e ɖo co ɖu ɖo eɖee ji xosin eli kpo sisi kpo
e wlan ɖɛ e xo byɔ lanmɛ nu mɛ tawun e do biblu mɛ
xogbe nuɖiɖi tɔn kpikpa tɔn kpo nusumɛnukunmɛ tɔn kpo lɛ wɛ mɛ
hwenu tagba lɛ ɖo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo gbigbɔ lixo tɔn lɛ tɛntin e ɔ ɔ sixu syɛn tawun
mɛ nɔ nɔ ji e ɖe wa nu jezu ɖɔhun
biblu ɖɔ ee e zun ɔ e zun mɛ a loɔ e eɖee do alɔ mɛ nu mawu nɔ ɖɔhwɛ kpo hwɛjijɔ kpo e
ɖokpo ɔ e byɔ klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ yeɖee hwe nɔ ze nyanya do su nyanya xɔ o
jlɛjininɔ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa xo vivi e ɖɔ nu mi alo kpa e kpa mi zɛ xwe wu e gbɔn
mi ɖo nɔ ji ɖo nusisɔ kpo mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ jɛ walɔ mitɔn lɛ ji gbɔn
xo vivi ɖiɖɔ nu mɛ alo mɛ kpikpa zɛ xwe wu sixu jlɛjininɔ mitɔn
tamɛ do wa nu gbɔn hwenu ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖyɔ ɖo alɔkpa ɖe kpaca mɛ gbɔn e ji
e ɖɛkpɛ tawun bɔ e blo tuto akwɛnu e nɔ do blo mɛɖee ɖo lɛ e tɔn zan nu xwe ɖokpo
gbebigbe wɛ e kpo ɖyɔvi e gbɔn axɔsuɖuto pɛsi tɔn ɔ bi mɛ bɔ ɖo agba hwlɛn wɛ ba nyi axɔsu ɔ tɔn lɛ e kpo ɖo
e ɖo co e wa nu kpo sisi kpo eɖee
nusisɔ mitɔn kpo mitɔn kpo nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo sisi nu jehovah a alo e nɔ ɖɔ mi kun ɖo ji o wɛ a
jlɛjininɔ nɔ mi hwebinu bɔ mi nɔ sɔnu nɔ wa nu e jɛxa gbɔn e kpo sisi kpo
mi nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ e kun nyi jijla nu miɖee wɛ bɔ mɛ lɛ mi wu o loɔ fifa kpo vivo ɖo ayi mɛ kpo wɛ
enyi linlin goyiyi tɔn lɛ ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ ɔ wa ɖo nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ mɛ jɛn wɛ
ði ɔ mi sixu nɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖu vivi wujɔmɛ bunɔ ɖe lɛ tɔn mi mɔ do nu kpaxo ɖe lɛ alo mi ɖo kancica bunɔ ɖe lɛ kpo nɔvi sunnu nɔ kpe nukun do nu wu lɛ e kpo
abi mi sixu tinmɛ linlin ɖe lɛ gbɔn alɔkpa ɖe bɔ e mɔ ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ xo kan yetɔn alo midɛɛ lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ blo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo mi kpo wɛ blo lɛ e
jezu ze ɖagbe ɖe ɖo ali enɛ
xo sin tɔn mɛ lɛ e gege tiin bɔ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ wɛ e ɖe sin
e nɔ ji ɖɔ xo gbɔn bonu lɛ do sixu tuun ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nu ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe lɛ e gosin e kun nyi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ alo nunywɛ eɖesunɔ tɔn wɛ o jaan
jlɛjininɔ sixu mi bɔ mi do nu ɖagbe lɛ ji gbɔn
nuɖe lɛ sixu jlɛjininɔ mitɔn hwenu mi wa gbeta ɖe lɛ kɔn e
hwenu pɔlu ɖo sezalee e ɔ gbeyiɖɔ agabusi ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi e yi jeluzalɛmu ɔ e wli jɛn wɛ
e tlɛ sixu hu
nɔvi lɛ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ e hu pɔlu savo ɖɔ e yi o
enɛ ɖɔ nuɖe nu gbeta kɔn pɔlu wa e a
e ɖeji do eɖee wu zɛ xwe wu a xɛsi ɖi bu a
e ganjɛ jehovah wu bi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa e ɖe e fo enyi jehovah bonu ɔ dɔn ɛ gbɔn fi ɖebu ɔ nɛ
ee nɔvi lɛ se e ɔ nɔ ji nu pɔlu ɖe ɖɔ e wa nu ji e do ɖɔ emi yi jeluzalɛmu e o a mɛ
jlɛjininɔ sixu mi bɔ mi wa gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn hwenu mi sixu tuun nu lɛ wa yi ɖo e alo do ji a e
ði ɔ enyi mi do hwebinu tɔn sin akpaxwe ɖe mɛ ɔ etɛ wa mi hwenu mi jɛ azɔn e
enyi mitɔn lɛ wa nyi mɛxo ɖo hudo alɔdo tɔn ɔ lo
mi kpe nukun do miɖesunɔ wu gbɔn ɖo kpikpo hwenu
ðɛxixo kpo dobanunu kpo ɖebu sixu sinkɔn nu nukanbyɔ mɔhun lɛ a
nut jiɖiɖe mi ɖo do jehovah wu e mi bɔ mi tuun dogbo mitɔn lɛ yi gbe
enyi mi do nu nu kan nu byɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ xoɖɛ byɔ mawu tɔn gudo ɔ mi ɖo ali gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo mi kpla gbɔn wɛ e
xa
tamɛ linlin do jehovah ji nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ miɖee hwe gbɔn
ðo jlɛjininɔ nɔ hɛn le tobutobu enɛ lɛ wa wutu ɔ mi sixu tɛnkpɔn ɖo jijɔ enɛ ganji gbɔn
mi ɖɔ xo do wlɛnwin ɛnɛ ji
nukɔntɔn ɔ tamɛ linlin do nuwukpikpe ɖaxo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo tɛn ɖaxo mɛ e ɖe e kpo ji mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔ ji tawun nɔ ɖo sisi eza
flin ɖɔ mawu ɔ sin nukɔn zan ɖe wɛ mi ɖe e nyi wɛnsagun ɖe alo a
tamɛ linlin do wanyiyi jehovah tɔn ji nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔ ji gbɔn
wegɔ ɔ tamɛ linlin do wanyiyi jehovah tɔn ji mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔ ji
ɖokpo ɔ jehovah nɔ kpe nukun do mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wu enyi mi ɖo dogbo ɖebu ɔ nɛ
e nɔ mi do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu a e nɔ gɔn wan yi nu mi hwenu mi wa nu nyi do e a
wanyiyi jehovah tɔn bɔ mi sixu mɔ miɖee ɖo ayijayi mɛ enyi mi ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi ɖebu ɖo xwedo tɔn mɛ ɔ nɛ
ðagbe tɛ lɛ ayi ɖo nu ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ wa e ji nɔ wa nu mi
atɔngɔ ɔ enyi mi nɔ wa nu mawu ɖɔhun nɔ ayi ɖo nu ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ wa e ji ɔ wa wɛ mi ɖe ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
mi nɔ dɔn ayi mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wa mi ji alo nɔ ɖɔ nu wa e nu hwebinu a e wa ɔ mi nɔ nɔ ji nɔ weɖexamɛ yetɔn lɛ hwɛhwɛ nɔ blo nu ɖɔ lɛ e nux
lobɔ enyi mi mɔ jehovah ɖo nyɔna kɔn do nɔvi mitɔn gbakpe ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e ji wɛ gbɔn e ɔ mi kpa
ɛnɛgɔ ɔ enyi mi nɔ ayixa mitɔn sɔgbe kpo nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ kpo ɔ mi nɔ nɔ ji hugan
nugbododo enɛ lɛ nɔ mi nu nɔ ci nu jehovah e kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo
enyi mi nɔ ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nu lɛ wu e ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi wa gbeta ɖeɖee hun xomɛ lɛ e kɔn
mi nɔ nɔ ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn jɛ nukɔn
enyi mi blo akpaxwe midɛɛ lɛ tɔn ɔ jehovah ɖɔ emi wa ɖo mi wu bɔ mi yi fo bɔ enɛ mi bɔ mi nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ ji ɖo jijɔ mawu tɔn ɖe lɛ
goyiyi sin nuwiwa kwin ɖokpo gee bɔ gbeyiɖɔ gosin judaa bɔ e tuun nyikɔ tɔn a e ku lobɔ e kpo mawu kpo tɔn gble
mi hɛn ɔ mi nɔ ji ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ
nɔ jɛ nukɔn nu mi lɛ e kpo egbe tɔn lɛ kpo sin ɖɔ nu sixu nyi
ba mɛ mi ɖi zɔnlin ɖo jehovah nukɔn yi ɖo e ɔ ba ɖokpo ɔ mɛ wɛ mi nɔ nɔ ji ɖo
xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun towe mɛ bonu kpo ɖo nu wu kpe e bi wa wɛ nɔ zan kpo jlɛjininɔ kpo ɖo jehovah nukɔn sɔyi
nu enɛ lɛ do asi nu mɛ wu e ɖeji do bɔ lɔ sixu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e tim
axɔsu davidi wa nu gbɔn hwenu e ɖɔ ɖɔ vi tɔn wɛ gba tɛmpli mawu tɔn ɔ e
aniwu mɛxomɔ lɛ ɖo nɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bonu nɔ do ji
dɔnkpɛvu lɛ sixu ɖo linlin sɔgbe e hwenu ɖo sunnu mɛxomɔ lɛ tɔn wa wɛ e gbɔn
linlin tɛ mɛ gege nɔ ɖo do yetɔn lɛ wu
hwɛhwɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ wa e wɛ nɔ ɖɔ mɛ nyi e
mɛ gege nɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe nɔ wa e alo tɛn mɛ e ɖe e wɛ nɔ ɖe tɔn
mi xa nu do axɔsu davidi gbeyiɖɔ elii kpo pɔlu kpo wu
mawu ɖe nu mɛ enɛ lɛ e su nukun yetɔn mɛ tawun
ɖokpo ɔ enyi e jɔwu ɖe lɛ mi lɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ ɖo xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ
aniwu e byɔ ɖɔ mɛxomɔ lɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ
e blawu ɖɔ sin adamu hwenu ɔ jijimɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ kpo bɔ ɖevo nɔ wa ɖyɔ ɛ
huzuhuzu mɔhun lɛ hɛn bunɔ ɖe lɛ wa nu klisanwun nugbo lɛ ɖo taan wa yi lɛ e mɛ
togun jehovah tɔn nɔ wa e jɛji tawun ɖo syɛnsyɛn wɛ
hwenu mi do lɛ wu e ɔ e nɔ blo tuto wlɛnwin e zan do blo nu lɛ e tɔn lɛ bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ wlɛnwin enɛ lɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e zan nu ɖeɖee nunywɛ xwitixwiti tɔn ɖo wɛ lɛ e
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu vɛwu nu mɛxomɔ ɖe lɛ bɔ wa nu sɔgbe kpo nukɔnyiyi enɛ lɛ kpo
nux enɛ wu ɔ wanyiyi sin nu wɛ e nyi sɔgbe ɖɔ mɛxomɔ lɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bonu wa xa ðɛhan
aniwu e nɔ vɛwu nu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ ɖe nu mɛ ɖevo
gbavi nu wu mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ðe nu mɛ ðevo lɛ a e
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo tɛn acɛkpikpa tɔn mɛ lɛ e sixu nɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖiɖe nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ vɛwu
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ tɛn mɛ emi ɖe yi wan e ɔ mɛ ɖevo yi
nɔ hu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ emi kun kpe nukun do nu lɛ wu o bɔ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kun sixu blo nu lɛ ganji o
mɛ ɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo taan mɛ ɖevo o
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo nɔ ɖo suulu hwenu e ɖe nu a e
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi do
mi ɖɔ xo do ɖiɖe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ xo ɔ wu ɖo ali we
wegɔ ɔ etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo linlin sɔgbe e hwenu ɖo alɔ do nɔvi sunnu mɔ nu hu nu ɖo lɛ e wɛ e
do ɔ nu mi axɔsu davidi sɔnu nu vi sunnu tɔn bonu e wa gbɔn e
etɛ axɔsu davidi jlo blo
jehovah ɖɔ
ee e ɖo do nu davidi wɛ bɔ e hɔn gbɔn gbejagbeja nu xwe mɔkpan gudo e ɔ e wa ɖu axɔsu nɔ xwe ɖagbeɖagbe ɖe gbe
ɖo e ku wu ɖɔ xɔ alo tɛmpli ɖe kun ɖe bonu e ɖeɖovo nu jehovah o wutu ɔ ɖokpo gbigba jlo e enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ nu gbeyiɖɔ nataan ɖɔ
nataan yi gbe ɖɔ yi blo nu wɛ ɖe ɔ ɖo mawu ɖo xa
vo wɛ jehovah
e ɖɔ nu nataan ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu davidi ɖɔ ji e kun nyi e wɛ gba xɔ mɛ emi nɔ ɔ o
jehovah ganjɛwu davidi ɖɔ emi kpo ɖo dido wɛ co e ɖɔ ɖɔ davidi vi wɛ gba tɛmpli ɔ
davidi wa nu gbɔn
davidi wa nu gbɔn nu jehovah tɔn
davidi gɔn gudo nɔ nu ɔ hlun nu ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun ɖɔ emi wɛ gba tɛmpli ɔ o a
nugbo ɔ e wa ylɔ xɔ ɔ ɖɔ tɛmpli tɔn e nyi davidi tɔn a
awakanmɛ sixu ku davidi ɖo e wa nu e wa e a co e nɔ gudo nu ɔ bi
e to ɔ lɛ e kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo kple ganvɔ kpatagan sika kpo sɛdlutin kpo
ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ din ɔ vi mawu mavɔmavɔ nɔ xa nu nu bonu sa xwe nu mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu towe e ɖɔ gbɔn ɖɔ hwi wɛ blo e
etɛwu davidi hɛn ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ kun kpe nu wu o etɛ e wa
xa
davidi hɛn ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ kun kpe nu wu nɔ titewungbe enɛ o
e ɖɔ lɔ ɔ tɛmpli ɔ ɖo ɖɛkpɛ lobɔ hwe ɔ ɔ kpo ɖo vu e ɖo nunywɛ ɖe a
e ɖo co davidi tuun ɖɔ jehovah nuwukpikpe wa e e
enɛ wu ɔ davidi ayi tɔn bi ɖo nu e sixu wa ɛ e ji kple azɔwanu gege
e mɔ bonu dɔnkpɛvu lɛ ɖo yi do ji wɛ ɔ e nɔ vivi nu mɛ tawun akpaxwe ɔ
mɛxomɔ lɛ sixu mɔ awajijɛ ɖo ɖiɖe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛ gbɔn
awakanmɛ ɖo ku nɔvi sunnu mɛxomɔ lɛ hwenu e wa byɔ ɖɔ jo nɔ wa lɛ e do nu dɔnkpɛvu lɛ e a
e wa ɔ ɔ yi nukɔn tawun hwenu e dɔnkpɛvu lɛ bonu kpe nukun do nu wu e
enyi dɔnkpɛvu nɔvi sunnu agbanɖotananɔ lɛ lɛ e wa jɛxa ba wa ɔ e ɖo nɔ vivi nu tawun
ði ɔ tamɛ do kunkun vi sunnu tɔn e ɖe ji
hwenu vi ɔ kpo ɖo vu e ɔ e nɔ nu wa wɛ tɔn ɖe e kpowun wɛ
hwenu e su e ɔ ɔ nɔ tinmɛ nu wa wɛ e ɖe e
lobɔ hwenu e wa ɖo xwe sɔgbe xa e ɔ tɔn nɔ ɖo nu ɛ wɛ bɔ e jɛ kun ji

e jlo mi ɖɔ mawu gba gbigbɔ tɔn kɔn nyi togun tɔn bi ji bɔ bi huzu gbeyiɖɔ tɔn

etɛ nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖɔ do tɔn jijo do nu mɛ ɖevo wu

din ɔ paul ɖo xwe sɔ a xa ɛ nu xwe mɔkpan e wɛ nɔ wa enɛ

etɛ enɛ mi

dɔnkpɛvu lɛ sixu wa nu alɔ ɖo alɔ mɛ xa mɛxomɔ lɛ gbɔn

paul xo mi ɖɔ wa yi ɖyɔ nyi nu betɛli tɔn ɖe e ɖɔ ji nɔ yi ji nɔ weɖexamɛ tɔn bɔ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo ɔ ɖɔ lɔ nɔ wa
etɛ ɖo timɔtee kpo pɔlu kpo tɛntin e sixu mi

we pɔlu ɖe xa klisanwun hlɔma tɔn lɛ e ɖo mi hwenu huzuhuzu lɛ kunkpla mi e gbɔn

enyi huzuhuzu lɛ kan mi hun nu mi nɔ miɖee hwe nɔ ayi ɖo nu nyi ɖagbe nu jehovah lɛ e ji nyi ɖo miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ji o
wiwa nɔ bɔ buninɔ nɔ tiin
pɔlu wlan klisanwun ɖo hlɔma lɛ e ɖɔ ɖo ɖiɖɔ nu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ ɖɔ mɛɖe nɔ mɔ eɖee zɛ nu e nyi ɔ wu ɖo linlin eɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ o loɔ linlin e nɔ ɖo do eɖesunɔ wu ɔ nɔ nɔ mɛ mawu nuɖiɖi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo gbɔn e
etɛ mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo dɔnkpɛvu lɛ kpo jɛ asi yetɔn lɛ ji sixu wa do jɛhun do fifa kpo buninɔ kpo ji ɖo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ
enyi hun nu mi mɛ bi do gan jɛhun do nukɔnyiyi nu kan axɔsuɖuto jehovah tɔn lɛ e tɔn ji enyi mi ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ ɔ nɛ

jiɖe tɛ jezu ɖo do ahwanvu tɔn lɛ wu
tɛ e
jezu wɛ nyi ɖagbe hugan kpinkplɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu yi do ji tɔn
e tuun ɖɔ emitɔn ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ wa wa vivɔnu bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɛkan do emitɔn
ahwanvu tɔn lɛ nyi co e ɖeji do wu ɖɔ nu ɖɔ wa hugan ee emi wa e
etɛ lɛ ɖo mi ɖo sɔgudo
etɛ mi sixu wa din
ðo ku vɔsisa tɔn jezu tɔn gudo ɔ e ɛ yi jixwe bɔ e ɖe do ji bɔ e ɖo acɛ hugan gan lɛ bi e hugan hlɔnhlɔn lɛ bi e hugan acɛkpikpa lɛ bi e hugan lɛ bi efɛ
enyi mi ɖo gbeji ku cobonu haamagedɔni wa ɔ e mi do mɛ hwɛjijɔ ɖe e ɖe mɛ bɔ finɛ ɔ jɛmɛ nu mi e gege wɛ mi wa
din ɔ gbɛhwlɛngan tɔn taji ɖe ɖe bɔ mi bi sixu e wɛ nyi wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla kpo nu kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu kpo
mɛ winnyawinnya wɛ mi nyi a alo mɛxo wɛ mi nyi ɔ nu mi bi kpo ɖo bibi do aklunɔ sin ɔ wu wɛ kɔ
nu wu mɛðe lɛ nɔ ðe nu mɛ ðevo lɛ a e
nɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ emi kun xɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ o
jlo jo yi wan e do a
nɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ e kun wa ɔ ganji o
nɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ emi kun ɖo acɛ do ɔ ji o

nɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo taan mɛ ɖevo lɛ o
linlin jehovah tɔn jɛ
gbɛxixɔ ɔ nunamɛ nu vɔ e ɖe sin mawu
vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn klisu tɔn ɖo taji nu nuɖiɖi mitɔn ɖo taji cobɔ linlin jehovah ɖo ɖo nu lɛ e jɛ
xota we elɔ lɛ gbeje nu wu gbɛxɔnumɛ ɔ wa ɖo dandan e e ɖɔ nu e wa e kpo mi sixu ɖɔ nunina wanyiyi tɔn ɖaxo hugan enɛ gosin mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun gbɔn e kpo
gbɛzan tɔn mi ðu le mawu tɔn tɔn ðo ali gege

ðo ali togun mawu tɔn wɛ ðo egbe

mɛ tɔn wɛ e douglas
ðo arthur nyi dɔnkpɛvu ee nɔ ɖo sisi nu mawu e ɖe wutu ɔ e jlo huzu agun methodiste tɔn sin ɖe
