e blo baptɛm ɖo hwenu e ɖo xwe e
wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo nu gba wɛ hwe ɔ bɔ e ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ e wa wa
ðo e ɖɔ emi kun ahwan o wutu ɔ e ɖo hwɛ nɔ gankpa yadonumɛ tɔn kingston ontario tɔn mɛ ɖo nu wo
ee gudo e ɔ e byɔ hwebinu tɔn mɛ nyi gbexosin ɖe
ðo ɔ arthur wli alɔ xa wilkinson sin nɔ nugbo ɔ ɖo e
e ji mi ɖo avril bɔ nyi vi wegɔ ɔ ɖo vi ɛnɛ lɛ ji e mɛ
xwedo mitɔn nɔ nɔ bu nɔ ɖekunnu sin xwe ɖe gbe jɛ xwe ɖe gbe ɖo gbesisɔmɛ mɛ
wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ ɖo bɔ xwe bɔ e mɛ ɔ e jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖo
e nɔ nya nyi kpo dorothy kpo sin wemaxɔmɛ ɖo nuwiwa enɛ lɛ hwenu
e kpaca mi ɖɔ e wa su gbe ɖokpo bɔ do winnya mi ɖɔ ɖɔ nyi nuvɔnɔ
ee mi e ɔ gege bɔ nu ɖo nu mi zin mi
yadonumɛ enɛ wa blo bɔ kan kanɖeji setonu nu mawu hu e lido mɛ
ðo juillet hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ blo baptɛm ɖo sindo ɖe mɛ ɖo gle ɖe
nɔ ɖu vivi gbexosin tɔn sin tɔn ɖo wemaxɔmɛ sin gbɔjɛ hwenu lɛ
ðo xwe ɖokpo mɛ ɔ xwedo nɔvi sunnu atɔn ɖevo bɔ mi yi ɖekunnu nu ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ ayikungban e ɖe nu mɛɖebu a e ɖe ji ɖo totaligbe ontario tɔn
ðo mai ɔ huzu gbexosin hwebinu tɔn
e ɖe nu mi do wemazinxɔsa bɔ e nɔ zan wemazinmɔ gbɔn e
nɔ nɔ wa e mɛ nu aklunɔzan gbla gege bɔ mi zin tlati ɖɔ xo do do nu togun jehovah tɔn wɛ e ɖe ɖo e wu e
ðo nukɔnmɛ hwenu ɖo wa wɛ ɖo tɔn e ɔ kan xo byɔ gbexosin ɖeɖee xwe wa gbe ɖo quebec fi yadonumɛ syɛn ɖe e ɖi sa gbɔn alaxɔ mɛ lɛ e
mɛ ɖokpo ɖo mɛ nɔ nyi zazula gosin edmonton alberta
ðo e kpo fofo tɔn kpo ɖɔ emi kun jo biblu kplɔnkplɔn do o wutu ɔ yetɔn nɔ ɖokan do sinsɛn orthodoxe tɔn wu lɛ e nya sin xwegbe
ðo juin ɔ mɛ we lɛ blo baptɛm bɔ ɖo gudo ɔ gbexosin
ðo nukanbyɔmɛ ɔ hwenu ɔ aca gbigbɔ tɔn tɔn lɛ jɛ ji nu mi
ɖɔ nu nyiɖee ɖɔ enyi nu nyanya ɖe wa jɛ a jɛn wɛ ɔ e ci ɖɔ mɛ wli alɔ xa e ɖie ɖɔhun
mi wli alɔ ɖo tɛnnɛ gudo ɖo janvier
ðo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo gudo ɔ e ylɔ mi bonu mi lɛdo tɔn sin bɔ ɖo xwe we bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi kpe nukun do lɛdo ɖe wu ɖo totaligbe ontario tɔn
ee wɛnɖagbejijla gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ sin ɔ ɖo gbigbakpe wɛ e ɔ e jɛ mɛ sixu nyi lɛ e ji
mi ɖɔ enyi mi kpewu dɛ ɖo gbɛmɛ e nɔ fa tawun ɖo avivɔ hwenu ɖo e kpodo ee nɔ doya nu mɛ ɖo ɖo aluun mɛ e kpo ɔ mi sixu dɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ bi ɖo ɖebu e mi e kɔn
mi yi kunnuɖewema wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn sin klasi ɔ tɔn ɖo juillet bɔ ɖo novembre mɛ ɔ mi yi bresil fi e mi do e
hwenu mi wa alaxɔ bresil tɔn mɛ e ɔ e mi do fi e nɔ do portugal gbe ɖe e
hwenu mi e nɔ do gbe mɛ gbɔn e xojlawema ɖe sin nuxwlemɛ cɛju ɖokpo tɔn do tamɛ gudo e ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi jɛ wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla ji
enyi ɖe ɖo jlo ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi xa wemafɔ lɛ do tin nɔ gbɔn ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn glɔ e mɛ
ðo azan nukɔntɔn e mi zan ɖo ɔ mɛ e gbe ɔ nawe ɖe to ganji bɔ xa bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ nu
agbasa sɔgbe xa yozo kpo gbɛmɛ fifa ee ɖo ayi ɔ ji e kpo a bɔ enɛ wa huzu nubahunmɛ ɖe nu mi
fi e ɖe nu mi bɔ mi wa mitɔn ɖe e wɛ nyi toxo campos tɔn fi agun ɖe din e
hwenu mi wa e ɔ kanɖo ɖokpo jɛn ɖo gblolo mɛ ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ nu lɛ sin xwe ɖokpo bɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɛnɛ ɖo finɛ esther tracy ramona bauer luiza kpo lorraine brookes ee e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ wallen din e kpo
e ɖe nu mi bɔ nɔ alɔ ɖo avɔnyaxɔsa nɔ yi naki e do ɖa nu e
mi fo atɔxwɛ kplɔnkplɔn lundi gbadanu ɖokpo bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ jonɔ ɖo nukun ɖe wa mi
asi ayi ɖo zinkpo ɖe mɛ ɖo gbigbɔ jɛ wɛ bɔ mi ɖo xo ɖɔ do nu lɛ yi gbɔn ɖo keze ɔ mɛ e ji wɛ
ee portugal gbe nu xwe ɖokpo gudo e ɔ e ɖe mi bɔ nyi lɛdo tɔn
mi zan gbɛzan bɔkun e ɖe ɖo gletoxo ɖe mɛ kulaan ɖe a mi nɔ nu ɖɔhun ɖe ji nɔ kun kɛkɛvinɔ yi agun lɛ mɛ
ðo kunnuɖiɖe ɖe hwenu ɖo ayikungban e ɖe nu mɛ ɖe a e ɖe ji ɔ mi do piipaan yi toxo ɖe mɛ ɖo sokan lɛ mɛ xaya xɔ ɖe ɖo xwe nɔ sɔnu nu nuɖuɖu e ɖe gbe
alaxɔ xojlawema do mi bɔ mi zan ɖo ɔ mɛ
mi nɔ yi posu azɔn gege nɔ xojlawemagba lɛ wa fi mi nɔ nɔ e
ðo ɔ e jɛ wemaxɔmɛ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn blo ji gbɔn bresil to ɔ mɛ bɔ nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔ
e ɖe nu mi ɖɔ nyi gbɔn wemaxɔ ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ nu mɛvo nu mɛ ɖo klasi ɖeɖee e blo ɖo manaus belem fortaleza recife kpo salvador kpo e mɛ
kpe nukun do ɖaxo ɖe wu ɖo nukunɖeji tɔn ɖo manaus
ji ɖaxo ɖe ja hɛn sin nunu mitɔn gege bli bɔ kafeteliya mɛ ɖokpo kpo ɖo nɔtɛn ɔ tɔn a
ðo hwe enɛ lɛ ɔ e nɔ nuɖuɖu mɛ ɖo ɖaxo lɛ ji
ylɔ kponɔ lɛ bɔ kponɔ jɔ e ɖe sɔnu nu sin nunu kpe ɔ bi e kpo xomɛhunhun kpo sɔja lɛ do bɔ blo azava ɖaxo we bɔ nyi nuɖatɛn kpo kafetaliya kpo
ðo ɖo zɔ wutu ɔ nɔ ɖekunnu ɖo ɖaxo portugal tɔn ɖe fi akwɛ biba kɛɖɛ gba tamɛ nu mɛ lɛ ɖe e
nukpacamɛ sin nuɖe jɛ hwenu klewun ɖe gudo ɔ e wema do mi ɖɔ mi wa wa ɖo portugal
ðo hwe enɛ ɔ e mitɔn ɖo
mi wa lisbonne portugal ɖo aout
kponɔ nuglɔ tɔn portugal tɔn lɛ nya gbe nɔvi mitɔn lɛ tɔn tawun
enɛ wu ɔ e hugan ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ ɖe tuun ɖɔ mi wa wa do doo nu mi o ɖɔ mi mɔ xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ ɖe o
mi nɔ xɔ mɛ e nɔ sɔnu nu nuɖuɖu ɖe e ɖe mɛ ɖo fi e gbe mi ɖɔ mi nɔ e
ee mi yi kunnuɖewema togudoyiyi tɔn mitɔn gudo e ɔ mi xaya xɔ ɖe
ðo janvier ɔ mi wa kpewu ɖɔ xo xa alaxɔ
awajijɛ sin nu ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi hwenu mi yi kple azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo vlamɛ e
mi se ɖɔ kponɔ lɛ ɖo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ sin xwe kije wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
ðo e su kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ blo kple agun tɔn lɛ ɖo xwe nɔvi ɖe tɔn gbe
e wli kanweko mɔkpan yi kponɔkpamɛ do nu mɛ nyi e kan xo byɔ
xo daka nɔvi lɛ wu tawun tɛnkpɔn blo bɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ kpe nukun do kple lɛ wu lɛ e sin nyikɔ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ nɔvi lɛ wa aca ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ nyikɔ yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ɖi jose alo paulo do ylɔ yeɖee e nyi daagbo nyikɔ lɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ mi lɔ blo nu ɖokpo ɔ
nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn nina nɔvi mitɔn lɛ wɛ nyi nu ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi hugan e
e do asi nu e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ wlan xota atɔxwɛ e nɔ ɖo kple ji e tɔn lɛ kpo wema jinjɔn biblu ji ɖevo lɛ kpo do wema ji bɔ e nɔ ɖe gege tɔn
ðo juin ɔ e ɖɔ hwɛ nukunɖeji ɖe ɖo lisbonne
e kpla mɛ ɖo agun feijo tɔn mɛ lɛ e bi yi hwɛ nukɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ blo kple sɔgbe xa a e ɖo xwe mɛɖe tɔn gbe wutu
wa nu ɖɔhun sɔnu nu nu hwɛɖiɖɔ ɔ kpo nukanbyɔmɛ lɛ kpo
mi tuun ɖɔ hwɛ ɔ kun kpa mi o mi mɔ ɖɔ e kɔ do kunnuɖiɖe ɖaxo ɖe mɛ
e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ mitɔn yi gbe bɔ e jɛ biblu xa ɛ ji ɖo kple lɛ wa wɛ cobo ku
ðo decembre ɔ e mi bɔ nyi alaxɔ tɔn bɔ zan hwenu gege do kpe nukun do nu ɖeɖee kunkpla lɛ e wu
wa tuun mi ɖo decembre
nɔvi nathan knorr kpo frederick franz kpo gosin hɔnkan mitɔn wa portugal xa mi ɖo kple manawɔn e blo ɖo kpo lisbonne kpo bɔ mɛ wa lɛ e bi nyi e ji
jehovah hun ali bɔ wɛn ɔ gbakpe tɔtɛntinto mɛ e nɔ do portugal gbe ɖe e gege mɛ ɖi acores madere kpo tome et principe kpo
e su alaxɔ ɖaxo sin hudo mi ɖo e sin do ɖo
ðo avril xwe enɛ tɔn ɔ nɔvi milton henschel wa hun xɔ e gba lɛ e ɖo akpakpa tawun e nukɔn
hwenu e mɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee nyi ɖo portugal wa yi lɛ e bɔ wa nuwiwa manawɔn enɛ tɛnmɛ e ɔ e do wusyɛn nu mɛ tawun
xwe lɛ gblamɛ ɔ xa nɔvi lɛ bɔ gbɛzan mitɔn tawun
alɔdido nɔvi theodore jaracz hwenu e yi alaxɔ ɖe e nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe mi
alaxɔ mi yi e ɖo xwi ɖi xa ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ bɔ alaxɔ ɔ tɔn sin lɛ blo nu wu kpe e bi
nɔvi jaracz ɖe ayi yetɔn ɖɔ ɔ xo din bɔ mi tɛn gbigbɔ ɔ
hwenu asi kpo nyi kpo ɖi sa yi brooklyn ɖo xwe nabi ɖe ɖie e ɔ mi nɔ xa nɔvi franz kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo gbadanu ɖokpo
ee e byɔ nɔvi franz ɖɔ e ɖɔ xo ɖe nu mi do xwe tobutobu e zan ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ e wu bonu mi gbado e ɔ e ɖɔ nu byɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbɔn ɖebu hun nɔ tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn nukun nɔ mɔ e mɛ
ɖokpo jezu ɖegbe nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ wa e wɛ nyi jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn
nu ɖeɖee sin vivi mi ɖu ɖo alaxɔ lɛ hwenu lɛ e flinflin nɔ xɔ akwɛ nu mi tawun
enɛ lɛ hun ali nu mi bɔ mi wa wɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kpo mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo ɖe kpo gbejininɔ kpo e su nukun mitɔn mɛ e
xwe mɔkpan wa yi din bɔ mi mɛ we lɛ bi ɖo xwe jɛji
mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ bɔ nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido bɔ kan mi kanɖeji nɔ gbeji e syɛn tawun
nu mi tamɛ do gbɛzan mitɔn ji ɔ mi nɔ mɔ tawun ɖɔ mi ɖu le jehovah tɔn tɔn ɖo ali gege
douglas ku ɖo octobre hwenu e ɖo nu nu xota elɔ wɛ e e nɔ gbeji nu jehovah jɛ hwenɛnu
mawu mavɔmavɔ nɔ ali hwebinu eza
togun mawu tɔn hwexonu tɔn sin lɛ kpo jezu klisu kpo ɖɔ
gbigbɔ hlɔnhlɔn gbɔn
wɛnsagun lɛ gbɔn
xo mawu tɔn ali gbɔn
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ali jehovah tɔn lɛ e gbɔn vo nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wa ɖo sinsɛn ɖevo lɛ mɛ e gbɔn
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo mɛ
nuɖe nɛ bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ kanbyɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ hwɛhwɛ
kplekple sunnu lɛ tɔn nukun nɔ mɔ bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ devi ayiɖotenanɔ e ɖe tiin nɔ nɔ nukɔn nu togun mawu tɔn egbe
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ jehovah ɖo ali mi wɛ nugbo nugbo gbɔn vi tɔn nukun nɔ mɔ a e ji
ðo xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo mɛ ɔ mi gbeje jehovah ali ɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ nukɔn nu mɛtɔn lɛ gbɔn e
etɛ hlɔnhlɔn mɔyizi bɔ e ali izlayɛli
gbigbɔ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mawu tɔn lɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do mɔyizi e nɔ nukɔn nu izlayɛli vi lɛ e ji
etɛ ɛ wa syɛnsyɛn enɛ
jehovah gbigbɔ tɔn do eyɛ mɛ xa ezayii
gbɔn gbigbɔ zinzan do hlɔnhlɔn mɔyizi gblamɛ ɔ jehovah nɔ ɖo ali togun tɔn wɛ
izlayɛli vi lɛ sixu wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ɖo mɔyizi ji
ðo gbigbɔ nyi hlɔnhlɔn nukun nɔ mɔ a e ɖe wutu ɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ sixu wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo mɔyizi mɛ
gbigbɔ mɔyizi bɔ e blo nujiwu lɛ ɖɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn nu tin
gbigbɔ bɔ mɔyizi kpewu ɖo jijɔ ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ ɖi wanyiyi xomɛfifa kpo suulu kpo enɛ bɔ e kpewu ali izlayɛli vi lɛ
e ɖo wɛn jehovah ɖesunɔ wɛ mɔyizi nyi nu togun tɔn
tinmɛ jehovah hlɔnhlɔn izlayɛli vi ɖevo lɛ bɔ nɔ nukɔn nu togun tɔn gbɔn e
nukɔnmɛ ɔ gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn hlɔnhlɔn sunnu ɖevo ɖeɖee e bɔ nɔ nukɔn nu togun tɔn lɛ e
gbigbɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn wa nu hwɛ
bɔ gbigbɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn wa davidi ji
nu mɛ e kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nujiwu enɛ lɛ kpa nu jehovah
etɛwu mawu ɖɔ togun emitɔn ɖo sisi nu izlayɛli tɔn lɛ
izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo wa nu gbɔn hwenu e wa ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gbigbɔ wɛ hlɔnhlɔn sunnu enɛ lɛ e
hwenu togun ɔ hlun nu ɖɔ do mɔyizi nyi nu e wu e ɔ jehovah kanbyɔ ɖɔ hwetɛnu wɛ togun elɔ wan nu mi yi jɛ
nugbo ɔ jehovah mɔyizi jozuwee kpo davidi kpo bonu nyi tɔn
enyi togun ɔ setonu nu sunnu enɛ lɛ ɔ e ɖɔ jehovah do ɖo gan yetɔn nɛ
wɛnsagun lɛ mɔyizi gbɔn
wɛnsagun lɛ mawu tɔn lɛ xa eblee lɛ
jehovah zan wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ do ɖe nu mɔyizi sɔnu ali
mawu mɔyizi do gbɔn wɛnsagun do ji tɔn ɖo zungodwe mɛ ɔ ji nu e ɖu gan ɖo hwlɛn gan
bɔ jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ kpla togun ɔ yi fi ɖɔ nu ɔ wɛnsagun nɔ nukɔn towe
loɔ ali mɔyizi nɔ nu togun ɔ nɔ ali ɖe e nyi wɛn ɖɔ hlɔnhlɔn hugan tɔn e ɖe ɖo alɔ do e wɛ
alɔ tɛ wɛnsagun lɛ do jozuwee kpo ezekiyasi kpo
ahwangan mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu jozuwee wa jɛ mɔyizi tɛnmɛ e ɖɔ e kpla togun mawu tɔn bonu ahwan kanaanu lɛ bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji nugbo joz
nukɔnmɛ ɔ axɔsu ezekiyasi wa mɔ eɖee ɖo ahwangɔnu hlɔnhlɔnnɔ asilii tɔn do xɛsi e nukɔn bɔ adan ɖɔ emi ahwan jeluzalɛmu
hwɛhuhu mawu tɔn lɛ tɔn bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ gɔn tonu se nu wɛ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ nyi mɛ bɔ sunnu lɛ e nyi
gbe ɖokpo ɔ mɔyizi ɖe jehovah nyi e a
nu taan klewun ɖe ɔ ezekiyasi tɛ afɔ ayi
sunnu enɛ lɛ nyi co jehovah ɖo nukun ɖo izlayɛli vi lɛ si ɖɔ xwedo yetɔn lɛ
jehovah nɔ gudo nu sunnu enɛ lɛ gbɔn wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ ji
jehovah wɛ ali togun tɔn nugbo
mawu tɔn ali mɔyizi gbɔn
xo mawu tɔn ali tɔn lɛ
biblu ylɔ mawu izlayɛli vi lɛ e ɖɔ mɔyizi ɔ
ee jehovah ɖɔ mɔyizi blo goxɔ ɔ gbɔn e gudo e ɔ e blo nu mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖɔ lɛ bi tɛnwin lɛnwin tin
etɛ e byɔ ɖo jozuwee kpo axɔsu ɖeɖee kpa acɛ do togun mawu tɔn lɛ e kpo si
etɛ xo mawu tɔn wa nu mɛ ɖeɖee nyi gan ɖo togun mawu tɔn lɛ e
sin hwenu jozuwee tɔn e ɔ e ɖo xo mawu tɔn e wlan e
nukɔnmɛ ɔ axɔsu kpa acɛ do togun mawu tɔn lɛ e lɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
ɖo xa ɔ gbe bi gbe wlan hɛn kpe nukun do lɛ kpo lɛ kpo wu nyi bi xa
etɛ xo mawu tɔn wa nu sunnu ɖeɖee ɖo nukɔn lɛ e
mi gbeje axɔsu joziyasi tɔn
ee e mɔ wema mɛ mɔyizi ɔ ɖe e ɖe gudo e ɔ joziyasi tɔn jɛ xixa ji
axɔsu ɔ wa nu gbɔn
ee axɔsu ɔ se xo ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ e vun awu do kɔ nu eɖee
e wa nu hu
xo mawu tɔn ali joziyasi bɔ e ahwan vodunsinsɛn syɛnsyɛn sɔnu nu dindinwayixwe ɖe ɖuɖu bɔ e mɔ mɔhun ɖe a
huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ wa togun mawu tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ mɛ e bɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa jlo tɔn
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo gan togun mawu tɔn tɔn lɛ kpo akɔta ɖevo lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo tɛntin
gan enɛ lɛ gbɔn vo nu gan akɔta ɖevo lɛ tɔn nɔ nunywɛ tɔn kpo linlin maɖotaɖe lɛ kpo do e e
ðo vogbingbɔn mɛ ɔ togun mawu tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ mɔ gan yetɔn lɛ xo ji ninɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo walɔ lixo kpo agbaza lixo kpo sin kan gbɔn e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah ɖo ali wɛ
etɛwu jehovah nɔ dɔn to nu togun tɔn sin gan ɖe lɛ
axɔsu nɔ togun mawu tɔn hwexonu tɔn lɛ e bi xwedo tɔn lɛ a
mɛ ɖeɖee setonu nu jehovah a lɛ e nɔ gbigbɔ tɔn tɔn wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ tɔn kpo xo tɔn tɔn kpo
hweɖelɛnu ɔ jehovah nɔ dɔn to nu gan enɛ lɛ alo nɔ ɖyɔ
gbeyiɖɔ lɛ ɖɔ gan bunɔ ɖe ja gbɔn
nyi gan sin akpa e do e
nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɔ jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ emi gan bunɔ jɛxa e ɖe ɖo togun emitɔn
ezayii ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ enɛ nyi gan kpa acɛ
gudo mɛ ɔ jezu klisu wa ɖe eɖee ɖi gan togun mawu tɔn tɔn
xa matie
ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ jlo do xwedo e ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ ɛ
jaan etɛ bɔ kudeji ɖɔ jezu klisu wɛ nyi mɛ jehovah nɔ togun tɔn e
etɛ ɖɔ gbigbɔ hlɔnhlɔn jezu
gbigbɔ hlɔnhlɔn jezu
ðo baptɛm jezu tɔn hwenu ɔ jaan ɔ mɔ bɔ jinukunsin hun bɔ gbigbɔ ci ɖɔhun wa jɛte do ji tɔn
enɛ gudo ɔ gbigbɔ ɔ nyi jezu gbetotlo mɛ
gan ɖevo ɖebu ɖu ɖo mɛ ji e a jehovah wɛ jezu nugbo
wɛnsagun lɛ jezu ɖo baptɛm tɔn gudo tlolo gbɔn
etɛ wɛnsagun lɛ blo do jezu
wɛnsagun lɛ jezu
jezu blo baptɛm nɔ zaan e ɔ wɛnsagun mawu tɔn lɛ wa wa alɔ
xo mawu tɔn ali gbɛzan jezu tɔn kpo nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn
xo mawu tɔn ali jezu
sin hwenu jezu tɔn e ɔ e tɛn xo mawu tɔn ali
sinsɛngan hwe ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ xo mawu tɔn hweɖebunu e sɔgbe xa hwɛndo yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ a e
jezu ɖe xo sin nu gbeyiɖɔ ezayi ɖɔ ɖo biblu mɛ e mɛ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ togun elɔ nɔ mi su ɖo ayi tɔn ɖo wu a
jehovah sixu sunnu enɛ lɛ nugbo bɔ nɔ togun tɔn a
enyi nuwiwa jezu tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ e jo xo mawu tɔn do bɔ e ali a e ali nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ
hwenu sinsɛngan lɛ dɔn adɔn ɖe nyi ayi e ɔ jezu zan nunywɛ ɖaxo e ɖo e alo nu e mɔ bɔ e sixu do mɛɖebu tɔn wu a lɛ e a
loɔ e do biblu wu ɖɔ e wɛ gudogudo tɔn ɔ
jezu yi wan nu xo mawu tɔn bɔ akpakpa nɔ ɛ bonu e ma xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
jezu ɖɔ emi nɔ emiɖee do mawu glɔ gbɔn
etɛ vogbingbɔn ɖo elodu aglipa kpo jezu kpo tɛntin e mi do jehovah nɔ gan ɖe gbɔn e wu
wujɔmɛ xo nɔ sin jezu mɛ lɛ e nɔ kpaca tɔn lɛ co e nɔ ɔ jo nu tɔn jehovah
mɛɖebu nyi mɛ ɖagbe zɛ mawu wu a mak
e gbɔn vo nu elodu aglipa wa huzu axɔsu alo gan judee tɔn ɖo xwe tantɔn gudo e e
ðo elodu ɖo tɛn acɛkpikpa tɔn mɛ wutu ɔ e do axɔsuwu tɔn
togun nu tɔn jɛ ji e suxo ɖɔ wɛ ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ a numɛsɛn ɖe wɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kpa wɛ ɖe e vivi tawun
etɛ jɛ bɔ
tlolo tɛn tɔn mɛ ɔ wɛnsagun aklunɔ tɔn sin alɔ jɛ wu tɔn ɖo e mawu su a wutu ɔ we ɖu bɔ e ku mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jlo nɔ mɛɖe ji a e ɖe kun sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ elodu gan o
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ jezu ɖu ɖo mɛ ji ɖɔ mawu wɛ emi e bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ kpa nu jehovah ɖɔ wɛ nyi gan acɛbinɔ nu togun tɔn
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
jezu kpa acɛ nu xwe yɔywɛ ɖe kpowun a
e ɖɔ ɖo sin ku tɔn gudo ɖɔ mawu acɛ ɖo jinukunsin kpodo ee ɖo ayikungban ji ɔ kpo bi mi
tuun ɖɔ ɖo xa tɛgbɛ din yi jɛ gbe gbe ɔ vɔ do e
jehovah bɔ ɖo acɛkpikpa klisu tɔn glɔ nɔ togun tɔn
klisanwun lɛ wa gbɔn tuun tɔn lɛ
xota bɔ e xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ
e sixu nyi wema dodo mɔyizi ɖesu wlan e
flin mitɔn lɛ ebl
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ kpo egbe kpo ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ togun mawu tɔn lɛ e ɔ
ee jezu yi jixwe gudo e ɔ etɛ tɔn lɛ sixu kanbyɔ yeɖee
ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ ɖo olivutinso ɔ ji ɖo jinukunsin wɛ
nu xwe we ɔ jezu nu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ali
din ɔ e yi
etɛ wa
sixu kpewu fo enɛ gbɔn
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ jezu ɖɔ nu ɖɔ mɔ gbigbɔ yi ɖo malin malin mɛ
mɛ wɛnɖagbejijla gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ byɔ kpo tuto biblo nu nu kpo
bonu jehovah do ali togun tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ blo tuto nu ɔ e zan ɖeɖee e nɔ mɔ lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ lɛ sixu kanbyɔ yeɖee ɖɔ jehovah gan ɖevo din wɛ a
ee jezu yi jixwe gudo e ɔ gbeta taji tɛ kɔn lɛ wa
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
aklunɔzan gblamɛ we gudo ɔ ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ gbeje biblu ɔ xoɖɛ byɔ mawu tɔn matyasi bɔ e jɛ judasi isikaliɔti sin tɛnmɛ huzu ɔ
matyasi su do taji ɖe ɖo tuto biblo nu nu linu
jezu tɔn lɛ bonu nɔ xa ɛ ɖo tɔn mɛ kpowun a loɔ ɖo taji ɖe wa ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ
tɛ nyi ɔ jehovah gbɔn jezu ji sɔnu nu bonu wa enɛ gbɔn
tuto mɔhun tɛ ɖo togun mawu tɔn tɛntin egbe
tɛ lɛ kpo mɛxo ɖevo lɛ kpo wa ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɖo jeluzalɛmu
lɛ jɛ nukɔn nɔ nu agun klisanwun tɔn ɔ ji pantekotu tɔn
ðo hwenɛnu ɔ e kpodo tɔn wo ɖokpo lɛ kpan jla nugbo nɔ hwlɛn gan e jwifu kpo mɛ wa huzu jwifu lɛ e kpo wɔbuwɔbu ɖe
gege yetɔn wa huzu lɛ
lɛ nɔ kpe nukun do e zan akwɛ agun ɔ tɔn lɛ gbɔn e wu
e ya e ɔ mɛxo yi do ɖe ɖevo lɛ nu lɛ bɔ nɔ kpe nukun do xo agun ɔ tɔn lɛ wu
gbigbɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɔ gbɔn
ɖiɖe ɖo e wɛnsagun lɛ ɔ gbɔn
xo mawu tɔn ali ɔ gbɔn
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ jehovah mawu wɛ ɖo ali ɔ wɛ gbɔn gan yetɔn jezu ji
etɛ sixu ganjɛwu enɛ
nukɔntɔn ɔ gbigbɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɔ
jaan klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ bi ji wɛ e kɔn gbigbɔ do ɖo taji ɔ lɛ kpo mɛxo ɖo jeluzalɛmu lɛ e kpo wɛ e nuwukpikpe ɔ bɔ wa yetɔn lɛ
ði ɔ ɖo xwe tɔn ɔ gbigbɔ ɔ bɔ e wa gbeta ɖe kɔn do adagbigbo xo ɔ wu
agun ɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa yetɔn nɔ ɖo do li wɛ ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ nɔ ɖo jijɛji wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
wegɔ ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɔ
cobonu kɔnɛyi blo baptɛm ba nyi klisanwun nukɔntɔn gbo ada a e ɔ wɛnsagun ɖe ali ɖɔ e mɛ do
ee ɖɔ mawuxo nu kɔnɛyi kpo hɛnnumɔ tɔn lɛ kpo gudo e ɔ sunnu enɛ lɛ gbo ada a cobɔ e kɔn gbigbɔ do ji
atɔngɔ ɔ xo mawu tɔn ali ɔ
enyi mɛxo yi do ɖe enɛ lɛ ɖo gbeta lɛ kɔn wa do sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ lɛ wu wɛ alo ɖo lɛ wɛ ɖo tuto biblo nu nu linu ɔ nɔ jo xo mawu tɔn do nɔ ali mɛ
hwexonu tɔn ɔ ɖo acɛ do agun ɖo ayikungban ji e ji co e tuun ɖɔ jezu wɛ nyi gan emitɔn
e klisu bɔ mɛɖe lɛ nyi wɛ pɔlu wlan
mi ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo nu bi mɛ ɖo sisɛkpɔ klisu nyi ɔ wɛ
mɛ nwt nugbo wɛ ɖɔ pɔlu yi gbe ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ e nɔ xwedo nu emi mɛ lɛ alo aca junjɔn biblu ji bɔ lɛ alo sunnu ɖevo ɖo nukɔn nu lɛ e ɖɔ nu lɛ e
e ɖo co e ɖɔ ɖɔ jlo ɖɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu elɔ wu klisu nyi gan nu sunnu bi jɛ ɔ sin lɛ bi ji bɔ mawu nyi gan nu klisu kɔ
nugbo ɔ klisu jezu susunɔ nukun sixu mɔ a e ɖo ali agun ɔ wɛ ɖo gan tɔn jehovah mawu tɔn glɔ
taji tɛ nɔvi russell jɛ wiwa ji sin ɖibla yi vivɔnu xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn
ðo ɖibla yi vivɔnu xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn ɔ charles taze russell kpo tɔn ɖe lɛ kpo tɛnkpɔn ɖo sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ayi
bonu nugbo biblu tɔn ɔ do gbakpe do gbe gege mɛ ɔ do wema mɛ ɖo linu ɖo bɔ nɔvi russell nyi zinkponɔ
e nyi biblu nukunɖeji ɖe nɔ ɖe sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ lehun lɛ ɖi xɛsi atɔnɖobu kpo jɔmaku kpo
e mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ klisu lɛkɔ wa bɔ nukun kun mɔ ɛ o bɔ mɛ nɔ mawu a lɛ e sin ganmɛ vɔ ɖo luk
nɔvi russell zan hwenu tɔn hlɔnhlɔn tɔn kpo akwɛ tɔn kpo do jla nugbo enɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ bi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah zan nɔvi russell bɔ e nɔ nukɔn nu agun ɔ ɖo taan taji enɛ mɛ
nɔvi russell lɛ tɔn a
ðo ɔ e wlan ɖɔ mi ɖɔ mɛɖebu wli alo ɖo sisi nu mi kpo wema mitɔn lɛ kpo a mi ɖɔ e ylɔ mi ɖɔ susunɔ alo a
jɛn mi ɖɔ e ylɔ nyikɔ mitɔn do mɛɖebu alo ɖebu wu a e nɛ
e wa ɖɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ tɔn wɛ a
hwetɛnu jezu devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ
ðɔ e wa tuun ɔ ɖo vo kpɛɖe kpɛɖe nu gbɔn e
nɔvi russell ku bɔ e blo xwe atɔn gudo e ɔ jezu devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ ɖo
ðo linlin tɛ wu
bonu e nuɖuɖu mɛ ɖo xwe tɔn gbe lɛ e do hwetɔnnu
xogbe ɔ jɛ ji ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo jɛ sin avla mɛ hwenu e wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ e ɖo kancica tawun xa bible e
loɔ ɖo ɔ e wa ɖe ɔ ɖo vo nu ee nyi tutoblonunu tuun nyi nuɖe junjɔn biblu ji a e kpo mɛ ɖo nukun kpe wɛ lɛ e kpo
finɛ ɖido ɔ nɔvi sunnu yi do ɖe ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ nyi tɔn a
atɔxwɛ juillet tɔn tinmɛ ɖɔ devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ nyi nɔvi sunnu yi do ɖe lɛ sin klewun ɖe ee nɔte nu ɔ e
ɔ ɖo kpo kpo sin avla mɛ
nu lɛ nɔ yi gbɔn ɖo ɔ tɛntin
ɔ nɔ nɔ bu nɔ wa gbeta taji lɛ kɔn
nɔ kple ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ enɛ nɔ bɔ nujɔnu tɔn kpo buninɔ kpo nɔ tiin
ɖokpo ɔ jɛn ɔ tɔn sin zinkponɔ lɛ lɔ nɔ nyi mɛjijɛ mɛjijɛ ɖo xwe ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ e nɛ
enɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ mɔ yeɖee do mɔ gan ɖo nɔvi yetɔn ɖevo lɛ a loɔ nɔ yeɖee do mɔ mɛ ɖo xwe ɔ gbe bɔ devi ɔ nɔ nuɖuɖu nɔ kpe nukun do wu e
sin hwenu e devi ɔ ɖo e ɔ e nɔ sɔnu nu nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn nu togun mawu tɔn akpaxwe
ðo mawu nɔ xo do ayi mɛ nu ɔ a bɔ e nɔ wa nu nyi do wutu ɔ nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ ɖo
mawu nɔ xo do ayi mɛ nu ɔ a ɔ nɔ wa wa nu nyi do
hun e sixu wa gbeta sɔgbe a lɛ e kɔn nu nu ɖu sinsɛn nukplɔnmɛ lɛ alo kunkpla tutoblonunu ɔ lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo xota comprehensions affinees ɖo des publications des temoins jehovah mɛ e glɔ ɔ e huzuhuzu kunkpla nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do biblu ji sin lɛ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu kun ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ devi emitɔn ɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo a e mɛ o
nu nyi hun mi sixu tuun mɛ devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ nyi e gbɔn
etɛ ɖɔ ɔ ɖo enɛ ɔ wa wɛ
nu mi gbeje nu vovo atɔn ali ɔ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e
gbigbɔ ɔ gbɔn
gbigbɔ ɔ ɔ bɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo biblu tɔn ɖeɖee e tuun a lɛ e mɛ
ði ɔ tamɛ do nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mitɔn ɖeɖee e jlaɖo bɔ mi ɖɔ xo ɖo akpaxwe wa yi e mɛ e ji
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun jɛxa bonu e xɔ nu ɖebu ɖo nu hwlahwla mawu tɔn ɖo gɔngɔn mɛ bɔ e wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu tinmɛ lɛ e wu o
ee gufɔndomawuji kpo ablu gbigbɔ tɔn kpo nɔ ayi nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan gudo e ɔ nu ɖevo tɛ sixu bɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo nukɔnyiyi ɖaxo sin zɛ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn wu
sɔgbe xa nu ɖɔ e ɔ wɛnsagun lɛ nɔ togun mawu tɔn gbɔn ɖo egbe
ðo egbe ɔ ɔ ɖo kpligidi ɖe wa enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e kpe nukun do livi tantɔn jɛji ɖo wiwa wɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e wu
etɛwu enɛ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ gege mɛ ɔ lɛ yi mɛ ɖeɖee xoɖɛ tlolo byɔ alɔdo lɛ e
alɔdo hlɔnhlɔn hugan tɔn e tɔn jɛn sixu bɔ ɔ kpo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin ɔ kpo nɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ gbeklanxamɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɖo to ɖe lɛ mɛ co nu nyi
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo ɔ kpo sinsɛngan klisanwun lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo tɛntin
xo mawu tɔn wu ginganjɛ xa jaan
mi nu jɛ ɖo e
atɔxwɛ flansegbe septembre tɔn kan nu elɔ byɔ mɛ ɖeɖee jo azɔnunu do a lɛ e jɛxa blo baptɛm a
xosin ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ biblu ɖɔ kun jɛxa o
mawu ɖe linlin tɔn bɔ e wlan do xo tɔn mɛ e ɖesu wɛ enɛ gosin tlɔlɔ
sinsɛn ɖevo ɖetɛ nɔ jlo do ganjɛ xo mawu tɔn wu bi e tlɛ nyi ɖo hwenu wiwa vɛwu tawun nu ɖe lɛ ɖo agunvi tɔn lɛ mɛ e
wema agaɖanu tɔn ɖɔ xo do sinsɛn wu ɖo etats unis e ɖe ɖɔ agun klisanwun tɔn tɔn lɛ nɔ nukplɔnmɛ yetɔn jlaɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ bonu e sɔgbe xa nuɖiɖi kpo linlin agunvi yetɔn lɛ kpo mɛ kpaa gege kpo nɔ ɖo e
enyi mɛ ɖeɖee kple nyi ɔ e nɔ tɛn xo mawu tɔn nɔ ali gbeta ɖeɖee kɔn nɔ wa lɛ e nyi linlin lɛ tɔn ɖo kpaa e wɛ nɔ ali a hun ɖo togun mawu tɔn nugbo nugbo ɖo egbe
ali tɛ mi sixu flin ɔ ɖe
xa eblee lɛ
xokwin e lilɛ do flin e ɔ e sixu lilɛ do ylɔ
enɛ wu ɔ ali sixu flin lɛ ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ ylɔ ɔ ɖo ɖɛ towe lɛ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖo hudo ɖɛ mi xo do takun yetɔn mɛ magbokɔ lɛ e tɔn
mi nɔ wa nu ɖo xa ɔ gbɔn
mitɔn nɔ nɔ gudo nu devi ɔ kpo jezu kpo gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun nyi xo kɛɖɛ mɛ wɛ mi flin ɔ ɖe o mi ɖo wa nu sɔgbe kpo tɔn lɛ kpo
ɔ nɔ jɛxa lɛ e ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖaxo mitɔn lɛ kpo ji
ɔ e nɔ ɖe lɛdo tɔn lɛ bɔ yedɛɛ lɛ nɔ wa ɖe mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ
lɛdo tɔn lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ flin ɔ gbɔn nuwiwa sɔgbe xa ɖeɖee e nɔ lɛ e gblamɛ
ali ɖevo mi nɔ flin ɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi gbɔn ɔ wiwa gblamɛ
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ ɖi nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nukɔn nu lɛ e ɖɔhun
devi ɔ ɖe nuɖiɖi tewungbeju gbɔn kan ɖiɖo do wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla wu kpo bloblo bonu e gbakpe kpo mɛ
ɖo ɖevo nɔ nɔ gudo nu mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ ɖo taji enɛ kɔn lɛ e mɛ a
ɖo awajijɛ sɔ hwenu gan towe jezu ɖɔ xo elɔ e hweɖebunu blo nu enɛ lɛ nu nɔvi elɔ lɛ ɔ e nyi mɛ nyi mɛɖe ɖo lɛ nukunmɛ a wɛ ɔ nyɛ wɛ blo
hwenu jezu lɛkɔ yi jixwe e ɔ e jo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ do a
e tuun tlɔlɔ ɖɔ gbigbɔ wɛnsagun lɛ kpo xo mawu tɔn kpo ɛ nɔ nukɔn nu hwenu e ɖo ayikungban ji e tawun
enɛ wu ɔ jezu nɔ zan nu ɖokpo ɔ lɛ do devi ɔ ɖo egbe
nu mi ɖo yetɔn xwedo wɛ hun gan mitɔn jezu xwedo wɛ jɛn mi ɖe nɛ
zaanɖe din ɔ e kpla mi byɔ mavɔmavɔ ɔ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ linlin jehovah tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖo bɔ nɔte nu awinnya wewe ji e do jeluzalɛmu sɔgudo tɔn ɔ do ɖo lɛ e nuɖe
enɛ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e ɖyɔ ee wa fo gbɛzan tɔn ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ e ɖe a
sin ɔ e ylɔ tutoblonunu enɛ ɖɔ bible pennsylvania
dekunnu mlenmlen gando aholuduta jiwheyewhe ton wex
mi gbeje nu ɖeɖee kunkpla linlin mɔhun e
nɔvi sunnu vi tɔn hu eɖee e ɖe kanbyɔ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ jɛ nukɔn mɔ ɖɔ enyi vi sunnu mitɔn hu eɖee ɔ nyi kpo asi kpo kpewu dɛ a
nu nyi ɖo mawu mɔ ɖɔ mi kpewu dɛ wu wɛ a
hwɛjijɔ ɖe tiin bɔ mi ɖi ɖɔ jehovah nɔ to nu nɔ jɛ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo ali tawun tawun mɔhun ɖe wɛ a
nu pɔlu wlan ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e gbigbeje yi nukɔn bɔ mi wa gbeta elɔ kɔn hwɛjijɔ junjɔn biblu ji ɖe tiin bɔ mi ɖi ɖɔ jehovah nɔ tɛnkpɔn mi sixu dɛ ɖe lɛ e jɛ nukɔn nɔ wa do enɛ ji nɔ ɖɔ ee wa nu mi lɛ e a
nu mi ɖɔ xo do hwɛjijɔ wu mi sixu wa gbeta enɛ kɔn e ɛnɛ ji
nukɔntɔn ɔ jehovah nunina mɛɖesusininɔ tɔn lɛ
e ɖɔ mi ɖɔ mi zan mitɔn gbɔn e
enyi mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi zan gbɛzan sɔgbe a e ɔ mi ɖi xwi xa nu ɖeɖee e ji lɛ e
wegɔ ɔ jehovah nɔ ɖe mi sin hwenu kpo numaɖonukun lɛ kpo mɛ a
nut nwt awe nɔ hɛn nu gble do mɛ wu tawun e ɖe sixu xo mi ɖo bɔya mi yi fi a e ɖo hwenu a e wutu
jezu ɖɔ xo do ɖeɖee ji ahoho ɖe jɛ bɔ ku lɛ e wu ɖɔ adla enɛ lɛ kun nyi jlo mawu tɔn o luk
nu sɔgbe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e ɖɔ mawu ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee gan lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖeɖee ku ɖo awexomɛ lɛ hwenu e kpo a ce
atɔngɔ ɔ mi mɛ bi wɛ gbejininɔ xo ɖo atɛ ji e kan
flin ɖɔ sataan mɔ xo ɖɔ do mɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ lɛ e sin gbejininɔ wu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi kun nɔ gbeji nu jehovah hwenu tɛnkpɔn lɛ wa e o
enyi jehovah nɔ xo tɛnkpɔn ɖe lɛ nyi nu mi ɖo e mɔ ɖɔ mi kun sixu dɛ ɖo o wutu ɔ enɛ vlafo ɖɔ e so nu hwɛdomɛ sataan tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ cejɛnnabi wu wɛ mi ɖo mawu wɛ e a ce
ɛnɛgɔ ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ jehovah tuun nu nɔ jɛ do mi wu lɛ e bi jɛ nukɔn a
linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu nɔ ɖɔ tɛnkpɔn mi mɔ lɛ e jɛ nukɔn e ɖɔ e ɖo tuun nu lɛ bi do sɔgudo mitɔn wu
linlin mɔhun junjɔn biblu ji a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mawu kpewu tuun sɔgudo eza
mɛ ɔ e nɔ nɔ ji do zan nuwukpikpe e ɖo tuun sɔgudo e nɔ ɖo sisi nu mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn
mi sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo pɔlu tɔn ɖɔ mawu lɔn bɔ tɛnkpɔn ɖe wa nu hugan hlɔnhlɔn ɖo e a e mɛ gbɔn
ðo fi ɔ nu jehovah nɔ wa ɖo tɛnkpɔn ɔ hwenu e wɛ pɔlu ɖe e nyi e nɔ wa nuɖe jɛ nukɔn ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe a
nugbo taji we ji wɛ xogbe gbɔdonumɛ tɔn pɔlu tɔn lɛ junjɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ wa nu mi lɛ e nɔ zɛ ee nɔ mɔ e wu a
enɛ wu ɔ tɛnkpɔn mɛ bi nɔ mɔ e jɛn mi nɔ mɔ
tɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ ɖebu hugan nuwukpikpe tɔn alo hugan nuwukpikpe izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn a
azɔn ɛnɛ wɛ pɔlu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe lɛ tlito ɖo mɛ
e blawu ɖɔ izlayɛli vi ɖe lɛ jo yeɖee do nu jlo nyanya lɛ ɖo ganjɛ mawu wu a wutu
wegɔ ɔ mawu nɔ gɔn akpa e do lɛ ɖe a
enɛ ɖɔ mawu nɔ ɖe akpa tɔn lɛ hwebinu
jehovah nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ
jehovah nɔ ɖe ali nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ganjɛ wutu tɔn lɛ e bɔ nɔ ɖi xwi xa tɛnkpɔn lɛ gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e hɛn ɔ e ɖe tɛnkpɔn ɖe siin kpowun enyi e sɔgbe xa jlo tɔn ɔ nɛ
mi flin xogbe pɔlu tɔn lɛ e jehovah ɖe ali nu bɔ sin mɛ alo kpewu dɛ nwt
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ gege mɛ ɔ e nɔ ɖe ali ɔ gbɔn nu hudo mi e nina mi gblamɛ bonu mi do sixu dɛ ɖo tɛnkpɔn lɛ ɖu
mi jehovah sixu ɖe ali nu mi gbɔn e ɖe lɛ
e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ
e sixu ali mi gbɔn gbigbɔ ɔ gblamɛ
jaan nu tɛnkpɔn lɛ wa ɔ gbigbɔ sixu mi bɔ mi flin biblu tɔn kpo nugbododo ɖeɖee bɔ mi tuun afɔ mi ɖe kpo nunywɛ kpo e
e sixu zan wɛnsagun tɔn lɛ bɔ mi ebl
gbeta tɛ kɔn mi sixu wa do tinmɛ xo ɖeɖee pɔlu ɖɔ ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e ɖo e wu
jehovah nɔ ɖɔ tɛnkpɔn wa nu mi lɛ e a
loɔ enyi tɛnkpɔn lɛ wa nu mi ɔ mi sixu ku do nu elɔ ji enyi mi ɖeji do jehovah wu bi ɔ e lɔn gbeɖe bonu tɛnkpɔn mitɔn lɛ syɛn zɛ ee sixu dɛ ɖe e wu a e ɖe ali nu mi hwebinu bɔ mi dɛ ɖo
linlin enɛ do gbɔ nu mɛ tawun
ɖɔ xo le tlolo ɔ tlolo jɛn nu ɖɔ ɔ nɔ nyi wiwa
nuɖe wa ɔ nɔ wa eza
etɛ nyi linlin jehovah tɔn nu lɛ
nuwiwa tɛ lɛ ali nu linlin jehovah tɔn a
linlin jehovah tɔn wa jɛ gbɔn
etɛ jehovah hun mi
jiɖe tɛ ezayii kpo kpo mi
nukɛgbe nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɖo biblu mɛ e ɖo klewun tawun e wɛ nyi ðo ɔ mawu da jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo
bib nwt nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpɛɖe jɛn mi ɖo do nu tobutobu mawu da lɛ e wu ɖi jɔhɔnmɛ weziza kpo hlɔnhlɔn nudɔnwado tɔn kpo nu ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpɛvi titi ɖe jɛn mi nɔ mɔ nut
e ɖo co jehovah ɖe linlin e ɖo nu ayikungban ɔ kpo lɛ kpo e mi
nyi vi jehovah tɔn lɛ bɔ eyɛ nyi yetɔn
e tinmɛ ɖo wemata atɔngɔ ɔ mɛ gbɔn e ɔ nuɖe jɛ linlin jehovah tɔn mɛ
bib nu jɛmɛ sixu ɖo linlin tɔn a
mɛɖebu sixu gbo kpo nyi ali ji nu jehovah a
nugbo tɛ lɛ ɖo taji cobɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wɛn biblu tɔn mɛ
etɛwu mi nukplɔnmɛ enɛ lɛ ji gbɔn din
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nugbo biblu tɔn ɖeɖee kunkpla linlin mawu tɔn nu ayikungban ɔ kpo lɛ kpo e nu ɖeɖee kunkpla taji jezu klisu wa bonu linlin mawu tɔn do jɛ e ma mi
ɖo taji tawun bɔ e ci ɖɔ ɖo nugbo nukɔntɔn ɖeɖee mi hwenu mi jɛ xo mawu tɔn ji e mɛ ɖɔhun
mi lɔ ɖesu wa ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ bonu nukplɔnmɛ taji enɛ lɛ ma
mɛ wa tɛn tɔn mɛ lɛ e nu gege do linlin mawu tɔn wu
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo azan klewun elɔ lɛ jɛ nukɔn nu flin ɔ e mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ mi tamɛ do nukanbyɔ taji ɖeɖee mi sixu zan do biblu mitɔn lɛ kpo ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ kpo sin jlo nyite do nuwiwa taji enɛ wu e ji
mi gbeje nukanbyɔ atɔn elɔ lɛ etɛ nyi linlin mawu ɖo ɖo nu ayikungban ɔ kpo lɛ kpo e
nu nyanya tɛ jɛ
etɛwu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu tɔn nyi cavi hun ali bɔ linlin mawu tɔn jɛ e
nuɖiɖo lɛ nɔ kpa nu jehovah gbɔn
jehovah nyi jiwu ɖe
nu e da lɛ e bi sɔgbe xa nugbododo tɔn ɖo taji hugan lɛ e bib
enyi mi ɖo nuɖiɖo lɛ wɛ ɔ ali nuɖiɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ bi kpɛvi tɔn kpo ɖaxo tɔn kpo nɔ ɖɔ e blo ɖo linlin ɖe wu ɖe e nɔ jiwu nu mi
nuvikun tɔn tɔn vi ɖe nyi sin nu gbɔn e alo hwe gba nɔ jiwu a
nuɖiɖo enɛ lɛ nɔ jiwu nu mi ɖo mi ɖo nuwukpikpe nɔ tuun nu ɖɛkpɛ tawun e wutu xa ðɛhan
jehovah blo gbɔn bonu nu lɛ bi do yi
nuɖiɖo lɛ gbɔn e ɔ jehovah wanyiyinɔ ɔ dogbo lɛ
e jɔwamɔ tɔn lɛ kpo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn lɛ kpo bonu nu lɛ bi do yi
ðɛh enɛ wu ɔ nu ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi ɖo tɛn yetɔn yetɔn nɔ sɔgbe kpo ɖo ɖo linlin mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo
jehovah nugbododo do nuɖiɖo tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo gbɔn e wu
enɛ wu ɔ hlɔnhlɔn nudɔnwado tɔn tɔn nɔ blo bɔ jɔhɔn do ayikungban ɔ e nɔ sɛkpɔ ayikungban ɔ nɔ ɖɔ tɔsisa lɛ kpo xu kpo wa nu gbɔn e nɔ so nu titojininɔ ɖo tiin ɖo nu do mi lɛ e tɛntin cobɔ mi nɔ ɖo ayikungban ji e
nuɖiɖo lɛ bi jɛ lɛ ji nɔ tɛn nɔ sɔgbe kpo dogbo enɛ lɛ kpo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ tito ɖo nuɖiɖo lɛ mɛ e ɖɔ mawu ɖo linlin ɖe nu ayikungban ɔ kpo lɛ kpo
ðo mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi sixu dɔn ayi lɛ tɔn wa mɛ blo tito jiwu enɛ e ji a nuɖe
etɛ nyi ɖe lɛ ɖo nunina ɖeɖee jehovah adamu kpo ɛvu kpo lɛ e mɛ
jehovah mɛɖesusininɔ nuwukpikpe tamɛ linlin tɔn nu nuwukpikpe wan yi nu mɛ kpo zunzun tɔn kpo
ɔ ɖɔ xo nu adamu ɛ e sixu ɖe tonusise gbɔn e
jehovah da adamu kpo ɛvu kpo bɔ ɖo nuwukpikpe nu nu wu mɔ nu se nu se wan
enɛ bɔ ɖu vivi nu ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ kpo nu tobutobu ɖeɖee ɖo palaɖisi ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi kpo tɔn
ali hun nu asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn enɛ bɔ ɖu vivi jɛmɛ nu e tɔn wa nu vovo lɛ nu do sɔyi
nu ɖevo ɖetɛ ɖo linlin mawu tɔn mɛ
jehovah da adamu kpo ɛvu kpo bɔ ɖo nuwukpikpe ji vi lɛ
linlin mawu ɖo nu vi yetɔn lɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ji vi lɛ bɔ ayikungban ɔ bi ji
jehovah ɖɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo nu wa jɛ gudo yetɔn lɛ e bi yi wan nu vi yetɔn lɛ e lɔ yi wan nu nukɔntɔn e da lɛ e gbɔn e
linlin tɛ wu e do ɖo mɛ e
nu lɛ yi ɖo mawu gbɔn e tlolo a
etɛwu nu nyi
jehovah klewun ɖe adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖɔ tuun dogbo mɛɖesusininɔ yetɔn tɔn a ji
e ɖɔ sixu ɖu atin ɖo jikpa ɔ mɛ ɔ bi sin
atin sin e nɔ ɖu nɔ tuun nu ɖagbe kpodo nu nyanya kpo ɔ kɛɖɛ jɛn ɖu a ɖo gbe gbe ɖu ɔ ku bib
e vɛwu nu adamu kpo ɛvu kpo bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ enɛ mɛ a jɛn e vɛwu bonu setonu a e nɛ
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ nuɖuɖu ɖo do nu ɖe wa a
hwɛ tɛ sataan do jehovah
gbeta tɛ kɔn adamu kpo ɛvu kpo wa
sataan awovi zan ɖe flu ɛvu bɔ e tlito nu tɔn jehovah xa nuɖe
e ci ɖɔ e ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ ðiɖɔ wɛ ɖe ɖɔ emi kun sixu wa nu jlo emi e o a
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖo adingban ɖo gannaganna e ɖe gbeɖe ku ɖe a
e blo bɔ nyɔnu ɔ kudeji ɖɔ e kun ɖo dandan ɖɔ emi ɖoto mawu o ɖɔ mawu tuun ɖɔ gbe gbe ɖu ɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu lɛ ɖe gbɔn ɔ wu
ðiɖɔ wɛ sataan ɖe ɖɔ jehovah kun ɖɔ ɖu atin ɔ o ɖo biblo bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mɛ wutu
ɔ sataan do adingban sin akpa ɖe nu ci eɖesunɔ mawu ɔ ɖɔhun tuun nu ɖagbe kpodo nu nyanya kpo
ðin ɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖo ɖɔ nu wa e
wa gbeta ɔ kɔn tlito nu mawu
ee blo e ɔ nu sataan ɖo tɔn mɛ
ɖɔ jehovah kun nyi emitɔn o ɖe yeɖee sin xɛnyaɖomɛji ɖo acɛkpikpa tɔn glɔ e glɔ bib
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo hɛn ɖo e bu hwenu gu do jehovah ji e
enɛ wu ɔ nuwanyido nɔ a xab
nu e yi gbe nu enɛ ɔ ganjininɔ nuɖiɖo ɖeɖee ɖo jixwe kpo ayikungban ji kpo lɛ e bi tɔn xo akpa
taji bi ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi e ci xwii do hwɛhuhu edɛni mɛ tɔn ɔ wu ɔ e mɔ xo ɖɔ do e nyi e wu
loɔ jehovah nɔ nɔ gbeji nu nugbododo eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ e nɔ tɛ afɔ ji gbeɖe a
ðɛh enɛ wu ɔ mɛɖesusininɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖo e acɛ bonu mawu tɔn ji a
nu mɛ yetɔn kɔ do lɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ ku lɛkɔ yi kɔgudu mɛ fi e ɖe sin e bib
etɛ jɛ do adamu vi lɛ wu
hwenu adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖu atin enɛ sin e ɔ yeɖee ɖo tɛn mɛ sixu ɖe bonu mawu kpo ɖo gbe yi wɛ bonu nyi xwedo tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e tɔn a e
mawu nya sin jikpa ɔ mɛ bɔ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖebu lɛkɔ yi mɛ a
bib mɛ ɔ jehovah wa nu ɖo xwi ji blo bɔ mɔ nu yeɖesunɔ wa e sin xɔxɔ xa
ðo mɛ bi wɛ nyi wutu ɔ mɛɖebu sixu ɖe jijɔ mawu tɔn lɛ bɔ xo fo a
e tɛ nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn ɔ kunkan tɔn
ɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo sixu ɖo vi a vi yetɔn lɛ lɔ ɖe sixu ɖo a
ee sataan awovi lɛkɔ nu adamu kpo ɛvu kpo sin mawu gudo e ɔ e kpo ɖo lɛ wɛ jɛ egbe jaan
etɛ jehovah nu lɛ
wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu lɛ e kpo ɖo
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo gu co jehovah ɖɔ lɛ ɖu vivi kancica ɖagbe ɖe tɔn xa emi
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo ɔ gudo tlolo ɔ mawu blo tito lɛ bonu lɛ kancica ɖo kpo e kpo tɛntin e bloɖo ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ e nɔ gbeji nu nugbododo jlɔjlɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ
jehovah blo gbɔn
sɔgbe kpo jaan kpo ɔ nu tɛ mawu sɔnu do hwlɛn lɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ ji mi sixu ɖɔ xo do xa mɛ ɖo jlo lɛ e
gege mɛ mi nɔ ylɔ wa flin ɔ tɛnmɛ lɛ e tɔn tuun wemafɔ enɛ do ayi mɛ
nukanbyɔ ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ vɔsisa jezu tɔn bɔ mavɔmavɔ ɔ blo gbɔn
mɛylɔwema flin tɔn ɔ mima flin ɔ ɖesu kpo mi nɔ yi mɛ ɖeɖee wa flin ɔ tɛnmɛ lɛ e e kpo sixu hun ali nu mi bɔ mi ayijlɔjlɔnɔ ɖeɖee ɖo nugbo ɔ wɛ lɛ e bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ xosin nukanbyɔ taji enɛ tɔn mɛ
enyi mɛ mɔhun lɛ jɛ nukunnu mɔ jɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ wanyiyi jehovah tɔn kpo nunywɛ tɔn kpo gbɔn e mɛ ji ɔ e sixu jiwu nu tawun
nu kunkpla gbɛxixɔ ɔ e tɛ lɛ ji mi sixu
jezu gbɔn vo nu adamu gbɔn
jehovah sɔnu nu nya wa huzu ɔ e
jehovah nuɖiɖo tɔn nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ do ayikungban ji sin jixwe
jaan mɛ ɔ jezu wa huzu adamu nyi gbɔn e
jezu gbɔn vo nu adamu ɖo eyɛ zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ jehovah ɖo nukun ɖo ɖe si gbɔn e
e tlɛ nyi ɖo yadonumɛ syɛn hu bi lɛ e mɛ ɔ jezu hu hwɛ alo tɛ afɔ mawu tɔn ɖebu ji a
etɛwu gbɛxixɔ ɔ nyi nunina xɔ akwɛ ɖe
ðo jezu nyi mɛ ɖe wutu ɔ e ku do lɛ tamɛ hwlɛn sin hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo si
nugbo ɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ wɛ nyi cavi hun ali bɔ linlin mawu ɖo ɖo e jɛ e kɔ
gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ lɛ bi ɖo nukun ɖo mavɔmavɔ wɛ
ali tɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ hun
nusisɔ nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ wa nu do eɖesunɔ jehovah wu tawun co e sɔnu
jaan ðo ali ɖe ɔ jezu yi mitɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ adamu sin tɛnmɛ
kɔ ee jezu blo e ɔ e nyi kɛɖɛ wɛ e xɔ nu mi a loɔ e hun ali nu mi bɔ mi lɛkɔ wa mawu sin xwedo mɛ
nugbo ɔ vɔsisa jezu tɔn bɔ jehovah sixu yi gbe nu lɛ bɔ lɛkɔ wa xwedo tɔn mɛ cobɔ e tɛ afɔ hwɛjijɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn ji a
tamɛ linlin do hwenu lɛ bi huzu mɛ e ji nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu a ce
buninɔ tiin ɖo xwedo jehovah tɔn sin akpaxwe ɖo jixwe e kpo ee ɖo ayikungban ji e kpo tɛntin bi
mi mɛ bi nyi vi mawu tɔn lɛ bɔ nu bi vɔ hlɔ
sataan tɔn su ali do jehovah bonu e gɔn wanyiyi lɛ a e su ali do lɛ bonu gɔn gbeji nɔ a
gbɔn gbɛxixɔ ɔ gblamɛ ɔ jehovah vi tɔn lɛ bi bɔ huzu hwɛjijɔnɔ bi
do nukun mɛ ci hwenu mɛ mɔ vi ɔ ɖi nu lɛ e mɔ mavɔmavɔ e
jaan gbɔn wanyiyi ɖaxo kpo nunywɛ ɖaxo kpo gblamɛ ɔ jehovah blo bɔ lɛ ɖo ɖebu a e gbɔn ɖo e
hwe enɛ ɔ mitɔn jehovah nyi nu bi nu mɛ bi kɔ
etɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e ɖo mi bɔ mi wa
gbavi nu mi kpo ðo mɛ jɛxa lɛ e wɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ sin akpaxwe tɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e ɖo mi bɔ mi blo nu wu mi kpe lɛ e bi ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ sixu ɖu nunina xɔ akwɛ enɛ sin le
lɛ ɖo tuun ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ wɛ nyi wlɛnwin jehovah zan gbɔn wanyiyi gblamɛ nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn lɛ bi e
gbɛxixɔ ɔ tlɛ wa nu hu
xota bɔ e ɖɔ xo do vɔsisa jezu tɔn xosin nu nukanbyɔ walɔ ɖagbe tɔn ɖeɖee sataan nyite ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn mɛ gbɔn e wu
mɛylɔwema flin ku jezu tɔn tɔn wɛ nyi wema e nɔ ma hugan bɔ mi nɔ zin e
ðo xwe wa yi e mɛ ɔ mi zin mɛylɔwema ɔ do gbe jɛji mɛ
mɛylɔwema ɔ ɖe kpo ɖo asi towe bɔ ma jɛ nukɔn nu flin ɔ a
e nɔ nywɛ a mɛylɔwema enɛ lɛ kpo ɖo asi towe e ɖokpo sixu mɛ jɛxa e ɖe bɔ e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi wa flin ɔ tɛn mɛ
nunina ɖagbeɖagbe bi kpo nunamɛ nu vɔ ɔ bi kpo nɔ jɛte sin mawu ja
nyikɔ jehovah tɔn nyi nu mɛ
acɛkpikpa axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn mɛ
linlin mawu tɔn sin jijɛ mɛ
nyɔna tɛ lɛ tuto gbɛxixɔ tɔn ɔ hɛn wa
nyɔna gege wɛ vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu klisu tɔn bɔ e sixu mɔ
tuto gbɛxixɔ ɔ tɔn hun ali nu vi adamu tɔn ɖeɖee yi wan nu hwɛjijɔ lɛ e bi bɔ wa huzu xwedo mawu tɔn sin
gbɛxixɔ ɔ hun ali nu mi bɔ mi nɔ sɔyi ɖo awajijɛ mɛ
gbɛxixɔ klisu tɔn ɔ wa nu zɛ nyɔna sɔgudo tɔn ɔ hinhɛn wa nu lɛ wu
gbesisɔmɛ jezu ɖe ku hwenu e jɛhun do hwɛjijɔ jehovah tɔn ji e xosin nu nu taji ɖeɖee kan ɔ bi lɛ e ebl
nu taji kan ɔ bi e tɛ lɛ ɖo ɖɛ jezu tɔn mɛ
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
xwe we jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn ee sɔnu nu vɔsisa gbɛxixɔ tɔn ɔ e ɔ e ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ xoɖɛ ɖɔ mitɔn ɖo jixwe ɔ nyikɔ towe nyi nu sisi alo nu
bonu gbɛxixɔ ɔ do su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɔ nu mi gbeje e kunkpla nu nyikɔ mawu tɔn nyi e gbɔn e acɛkpikpa axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn gbɔn e kpo linlin mawu tɔn sin jijɛnu gbɔn e kpo
nu ɖetɛ lɛ ɖo nyikɔ jehovah tɔn mɛ
sataan kɔn ci do nyikɔ enɛ wu gbɔn
nyikɔ mawu tɔn nyi nu wɛ nyi nu nukɔntɔn jezu byɔ ɖo ɖɛ sin tɔn mɛ e
nyikɔ jehovah tɔn ɔ nu elɔ lɛ bi sin wɛ ganhunu tɔn agbadido tɔn kpo tɔn kpo
ðo ɖɛ ɖevo mɛ ɔ jezu ylɔ jehovah ɖɔ
jaan ðo jehovah nyi wutu ɔ nugbododo kpo ɖeɖee gosin tɔn lɛ e bi kpo nyi nu
nu ɖo co ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn mɛ ɔ sataan hɛn ayi mɔ xo ɖɔ do acɛ mawu ɖo lɛ e wu
ee sataan ɖo adingban do jehovah kɔ e ɔ e kɔn ci do nyikɔ tɔn wu bib
jezu ɖo nyikɔ mawu tɔn nyi nu mɛ gbɔn
gbɔn jezu zan ɖo ayikungban ji e gblamɛ ɔ e ɖɔ e sɔgbe ɖo xwi ji ɖɔ jehovah nugbododo lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nuɖiɖo tɔn nunywɛ kpe lɛ e
hwenu sataan tlɛ blo bɔ jezu ku ku yadonumɛ tɔn ɖe e ɔ jezu nɔ gbeji bi nu tɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ
gbejininɔ jezu tɔn ɖɔ ɖe sixu setonu nu nugbododo jlɔjlɔ mawu tɔn lɛ bɔ nu bi vɔ
mi sixu ɖo nyikɔ mawu tɔn nyi nu mɛ gbɔn
mi sixu ɖɔ mi yi wan nu nyikɔ jehovah tɔn gbɔn
gbɔn nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ gblamɛ
enɛ sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi jehovah kɛɖɛ setonu kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo
e tlɛ nyi hwenu e klan gbe xa mi e ɔ mi nɔ wa nu wu mi kpe e bi nɔ zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo jlɔjlɔ tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo
gbɔn nu jlɔjlɔ lɛ wiwa gblamɛ ɔ mi nɔ blo bɔ weziza mitɔn nɔ bɔ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ kpa nu nyikɔ jehovah tɔn
enyi mi wa nu nyi do e nɔ nyi gbɔn nu mi bi e ɔ nuwanyido mitɔn lɛ nɔ nu mi nugbo nugbo tɔn bɔ mi nɔ lɛkɔ sin nuwalɔ ɖeɖee nɔ kɔn ci do jehovah wu lɛ e gudo ðɛh
jehovah nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖe nuɖiɖi lɛ e gbɔn vɔsisa klisu tɔn gblamɛ
e nɔ yi mɛ ɖeɖee ze yeɖee jo lɛ e bɔ nɔ nyi tɔn lɛ
e tlɛ nyi ɖo din ɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ mi nyi hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖo mitɔn nukɔn ɖo bloblo bonu nyikɔ tɔn nyi nu mɛ
axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nyɔna tɛ lɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ mi mɔ
ðo ɖɛ sin ɔ mɛ ɔ nu wegɔ jezu byɔ mawu e wɛ nyi axɔsuɖuɖu towe wa
tɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ wa ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn mɛ
gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ e ɖo lɛ xokple wɛ bonu ɖu axɔsu wa xa klisu ɖo jixwe
nuɖe jezu kpo mɛ ɖeɖee ɖu axɔsu xa ɛ bɔ nɔ nyi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn lɛ e kpo kɔn nyɔna gbɛxixɔ ɔ tɔn lɛ do lɛ ji ɖo xwe vlamɛ
ayikungban ɔ huzu palaɖisi ɖe bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ lɛ bi wa huzu mɛ bɔ xwedo mawu tɔn sin akpaxwe ɖo jixwe e kpo ee ɖo ayikungban ji e kpo nɔ bu bi nuɖe
jezu ɔ sin sunsun sataan tɔn sin wuntun lɛ bi sin wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ bib nwt
jezu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bɔ mɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn nyi nu taji e gbɔn
mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ gbɔn egbe
hwenu jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bɔ mɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn nyi nu taji e
mɛ gbɔn axɔsuɖuto ɔ gblamɛ ɔ ali hun nu ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji lɛ e bi bɔ nu do gbɛxixɔ ɔ wu wa huzu mɛ ji axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn do lɛ e
ðo egbe ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ gbɔn alɔ mi nɔ do nɔvi klisu tɔn ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e gblamɛ bonu jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
etɛ ɖɔ gbe jezu ja hwenu e ɖɔ ɖɔ jlo towe nyi wiwa e
eza e bonu sataan tɔn lilɛ jɔ nu linlin tɔn a
nu jehovah nu ayikungban ɔ sin e wɛ nyi ɖɔ vi adamu kpo ɛvu kpo tɔn lɛ ji
enɛ wu ɔ ee adamu kpo ɛvu kpo hu hwɛ gudo e ɔ jehovah jo do bɔ ji vi lɛ
gbɔn gbɛxixɔ ɔ gblamɛ ɔ mawu hun ali nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖe nuɖiɖi lɛ e bɔ wa nyi mɛ nɔ sɔyi
jehovah yi wan nu lɛ bɔ jlo tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee setonu lɛ e nɔ e gbɔn e
mɛ ku lɛ e ɖu le gbɛxixɔ ɔ tɔn gbɔn
bɔ liva mɔkpan ku bɔ ali hun nu bonu tuun jehovah ɛ a lɛ e lo
gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ sin ku tiin
mitɔn jixwe tɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ hun ali nu bɔ nu do linlin tɔn wu mɔ mavɔmavɔ mɛ
jehovah jlo ɖɔ lɛ nɔ e jlo ɖɔ ku a
ðo e wɛ nyi jɔtɛn tɔn wutu ɔ e huzu nu mɛ ɖeɖee sin ku lɛ e bi
jehovah jɔwu jezu bɔ e taji ɖe ɖo mɛ sin ku xo ɔ mɛ
jaan ðo palaɖisi mɛ ɔ jezu wa wu e nyi sin ku nyi e jaan
etɛ nyi jlo mawu tɔn nu mɛ wɔbuwɔbu ɔ
jlo mawu tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ wɔbuwɔbu e sixu xa a gosin to lɛ bi akɔta lɛ bi kpo gbe lɛ bi kpo mɛ e wa huzu tɔn lɛ
linlin jehovah tɔn nu lɛ ɖo ɖɛ sin ɔ mɛ gbɔn
linlin jehovah tɔn nu lɛ ɖo nu jezu byɔ ɖo ɖɛ sin ɔ mɛ lɛ e mɛ
e zan axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn do kɔn nyɔna gbɛxixɔ ɔ tɔn do lɛ ji
nugbo ɔ ɖɛ sin ɔ ganjɛwu mi ɖɔ nu ɖebu kun sixu ɖo jlo mawu tɔn wiwa o ðɛh
etɛ mi nɔ gbɔn baptɛm mitɔn gblamɛ
ali taji mi sixu ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ze miɖee jo nu jehovah ɖo nuɖiɖi mi ɖo nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ blo baptɛm e wu
baptɛm mitɔn ɖɔ aklunɔ tɔn wɛ mi nyi
jehovah sinkɔn nu nu enɛ mi byɔ e blo bɔ mi ɖu le hun vɔsisa klisu tɔn tɔn nɔ nu nɔ e tɔn
ali tɛ lɛ mi nɔ ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖe
akpaxwe kpo ɔ kpo
etɛwu e ɖegbe nu mi ɖɔ mi yi wan nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ
ali ɖevo tɛ mi nɔ ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖe
ðo wanyiyi wɛ nɔ jehovah nɔ wa nu lɛ bi wutu ɔ jlo tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ tɔn lɛ bi ɖe wanyiyi bonu e nyi jijɔ yetɔn taji bi ɔ
ɖɔ ɖɔ mi yi wan nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ e jɛn bɔ do ee ɖɔ ɖɔ mi yi wan nu jehovah e wu
ali taji mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo wanyiyi mɔhun nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi tonusise nu gbeɖiɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ e jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn e
enyi mi ɖe wanyiyi mitɔn lɛ hun mi ɖe mawu tɔn nɛ
nugbo ɔ wan yiyi nu mawu nɔ sɔgbe ɖo mi mɛ bɔ nu bi nɔ vɔ hwenu mi nɔ setonu nu ɖɔ ɖɔ e yi wan nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e ɖo taji ɔ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ e jaan
nyɔna tɛ lɛ mi nɔ mɔ sin jehovah si din
nyɔna tɛ lɛ ɖo mi
xo mawu tɔn mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ e sixu sunsun hwɛ mitɔn lɛ
xa
nu nu kan mi mɛ nyi ɖevo lɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ ɔ jehovah nɔ blo kunnuɖewema mɛ do ɖo vi tɔn ɖe bɔ nyikɔ mitɔn nɔ
enyi mi huzu mɛ xo mɛtɛnkpɔn gudogudo tɔn ɔ zlɛ gudo ɔ jehovah kunnuɖewema ɔ mɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo nu e ɖɔ ɔ nɛ mi do ɖo vi tɔn ayikungban ji tɔn lɛ
nyɔna gbɛxixɔ ɔ hɛn wa lɛ e ɖo ayi sɔyi ebl
akwɛ nunina enɛ xɔ e bu gbeɖe a
ɖebu alo hlɔnhlɔn ɖebu sixu yi sin mi si a
gbɛxixɔ ɔ ɖe mi sin kannumɔgbenu nugbo nugbo gbɔn
awovi sixu blo nu ɖebu su ali do mɛ ɖeɖee lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn lɛ gudo nugbo nugbo lɛ e bi bonu gɔn xwedo jehovah tɔn tɔn huzu a
jezu wa ayikungban ji ku azɔn ɖokpo gee bɔ xo fo
enɛ wu ɔ e su gbɛxixɔ kwɛ ɔ azɔn ɖokpo bɔ xo fo
gbɔn vɔsisa klisu tɔn gblamɛ ɔ mi nyi kannumɔ nu elɔ ɖo sataan sin acɛ glɔ e a mi nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu ku a ebl
etɛ wanyiyi jehovah tɔn hɛn wa nu
mi sixu ɖeji do akpa jehovah tɔn lɛ wu bi
nuɖiɖo tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ huzu a gbɔn e ɔ jɛn jehovah flu mi gbeɖe a e nɛ
e nɔ huzu a
e yi wan nu mi
mi tuun wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu mi ɔ ɖi nu
mawu ɔ wanyiyi wɛ e nyi
jaan ayikungban ɔ bi huzu palaɖisi ɖagbeɖagbe ɖe bɔ lɛ bi nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mawu tɔn
gbexosin george rollston kpo arthur willis kpo nɔte ɖo sin kɔn do yetɔn sin mɛ wɛ ayikungban totaligbe tɔn lɛ
ðo mars ɔ nu cikɔ e we kun yetɔn afuntuntun vunbla e byɔ sydney ɖo australie
ee gosin toxo ɔ mɛ ɖo xwe ɖokpo ɖie e ɔ blo kilomɛtlu jɛji gbɔn fi ɖeɖee lin tawun lɛ e kpo xa ɖeɖee nyi kpo ɖe do ɖe ɖo oceanie gbeji lɛ e kpo mɛ
nya enɛ lɛ nyi nɔ yi tomɛ lɛ e a
gbexosin ɖeɖee kanɖeji jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn ɖo gletoxo ɖaxo australie tɔn lɛ mɛ e we kpowun wɛ arthur willis kpo newlands kpo nyi
wa jɛ vivɔnu jɛ tɔn ɔ biblu klewun ɖo australie lɛ e jla mawuxo ɔ hwɛhwɛ gbɔn toxo ɖeɖee ɖo xuto lɛ e kpo ɖeɖee ya do finɛ lɛ e kpo mɛ
mɛ nabi ɖe ɖo gletoxo ɖo to ɔ mɛ e mɛ a xa ɖe mɛ wɛ ɖo axeko ji hu wevlɔɖo etats unis tɔn
sixu wa kpligidi mɔhun gbɔn
ðo ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah do nu gandido yetɔn lɛ wu ɔ kanɖeji blo nu wu kpe lɛ e bi
ðo ɔ agun ɖeɖee ɖo queensland kpo gbadahweji australie tɔn kpo lɛ e blo ɖeɖee e sɔnu ganji e ɖe lɛ do gbɔn toxo ɖo to ɔ tɛntin lɛ e bi mɛ
gbexosin ɖeɖee do hlɔnhlɔn sixu kun gbɔn fi ɖeɖee gbingbɔn tɔn nɔ vɛwu lɛ e sixu blo ɖo hwenu gble e wɛ nɔ kun lɛ
gbexosin enɛ lɛ gbɔn fi ɖeɖee e ɖekunnu ɖe gbeɖe a lɛ e gege
gbexosin ɖeɖee sixu xɔ a lɛ e nɔ kun kɛkɛ hɛn yi gletoxo lɛ mɛ
ði ɔ ɖo ɔ bennett brickell ɖo xwe e tɛn sin rockhampton ɖo queensland yi jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ nu ɖo fi lin tawun ɖo totaligbe to enɛ tɔn e
e wucyɔn nuzinzan nuɖuɖu kpo wema gege kpo do kɛkɛ tɔn sin agbanhɛnnu ji
enyi ɔ gba ɔ e nɔ bli kɛkɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo jiɖe ɖɔ jehovah alɔ nu emi
e bli kɛkɛ ɔ nu kilomɛtlu gbɔn fi kɔ xu mɛ lɛ bɔ ku ɖe e
ðo xwe bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ nɔvi brickell zan kɛkɛ zokɛkɛ kpo kpo do blo kilomɛtlu donu kanweko mɔkpan gbɔn australie to ɔ mɛ
e hun nu sin ɔ ɖo aborigene lɛ sin xa mɛ alɔ bɔ e ɖo agun lɛ ayi lobɔ e wa tuun tawun nɔ ɖo sisi ɖo gletoxo lɛ mɛ
australie nyi ɖokpo ɖo fi ɖeɖee ɖe a ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e mɛ bɔ ɖo taji ɔ nɔ ɖo gletoxo lɛ mɛ a
e ɖo co mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ kanɖeji mɔ lɛ ɖo fi ɖeɖee lin tawun ɖo gbe ɔ ji lɛ e
stuart keltie kpo william torrington kpo nyi gbexosin lɛ e kanɖeji wa
ðo ɔ gbɔn gbetotlo simpson tɔn nyi gbetotlo ɖe bɔ kɔgudu tawun e mɛ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo toxo alice springs tɔn ɖo to ɔ tɛntin e mɛ
hwenu kpɛvi hɛn e gble bɔ ɖo jo do e ɔ nɔvi keltie nyi e kan do wɛnɖagbejijla ɔ lakunmi wɛ e wa zan
gandido gbexosin enɛ lɛ tɔn hwenu xo go gan otɛli ɖe tɔn ɖo william nyi pipaangaa ɖe jɛ gblolo e
charles bernhardt wɛ nyi gan otɛli ɔ tɔn e wa yi nugbo ɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ sa otɛli tɔn wa gbexosin eɖokpo nu xwe ɖo fi ɖeɖee nyi axeko ji tawun jɛ zɔ tawun ɖo australie e ɖe lɛ
arthur willis ɖo nu wɛ yi wɛnɖagbe jla gbe ɖo gletoxo ɖaxo australie tɔn mɛ perth gbadahweji australie tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gbexosin nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan kpo didɛ kpo tɔn do ɖu ɖo tobutobu ɖi xwi xa lɛ e ji
hwenu arthur willis kpo newlands kpo sin xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e ɖo wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ ɖo gletoxo australie tɔn lɛ mɛ e ɔ e wa ya ɖokpo bɔ xo kan tawun nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ we cobo blo kilomɛtlu ɖo ji ɖaxo ɖe ja bɔ gbetotlo ɔ bi nyi adu ɖaxo wutu
ðo hweɖelɛnu ɔ yozo nɔ hɛn tawun bɔ nɔ ɖo jɛ wɛ nɔ ɖo yetɔn kun gbɔn kɔgudu ɖaxo lɛ mɛ wɛ nɔ gbɔn tɔdo mɛ sokan ɖe lɛ e kpo tɔzan ji kɔgudu ɖe lɛ e kpo
enyi yetɔn gble e nɔ nyi gbɔn hwɛhwɛ e ɔ nɔ ɖi zɔnlin alo kun kɛkɛ nu azan mɔkpan yi toxo sɛkpɔ finɛ e ɖe mɛ nɔ nɔte nu aklunɔzan gbla mɔkpan do xɔ nu ɖeɖee gble lɛ e
mɔ enɛ lɛ bi cobo ɖo linlin ɖagbe
ðo nukɔnmɛ ɔ arthur willis wa ɖe xo sin xo xojlawema ɖɔ e ɖe mɛ ɖɔ ali ɖebu nɔ gble din alo lin din nu tɔn lɛ a
charles harris nyi gbexosin nu hwenu gege e tinmɛ ɖɔ gblolo mɛ ninɔ kpo emi mɔ ɖo gletoxo lɛ mɛ lɛ e kpo bɔ emi sɛkpɔ jehovah tawun
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nuɖokan kpɛɖe ɖiɖo nɔ bɔ gbɛzan mɛtɔn nɔ tawun
enyi jezu jlo do jɔhɔn hwenu e byɔ ɖo e ɔ kpo awajijɛ kpo wɛ mi lɔ ɖo wa nu ɖokpo ɔ enyi mitɔn byɔ ɖo ɔ nɛ
nu gbexosin gege wa e nɛ
gan do bɔ nu cikɔ nu a e bɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbakpe fi lɛ bi ɖo gbe ɔ ji wɔbuwɔbu lɛ bɔ yi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn
biblu lɛ nyikɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo eza
gbɛzan tɔn zɔnlin ði xa lɛ e ðo le nu mi
wli nu mɛ e jɛxa ðɔ e wli e
klisanwun lɛ ɖo ɖo linlin sɔgbe e do e sixu ɖo sisi nu mɛ wli nu mɛ gbɔn e wu
e ɖo wli
ði nu wa nu kpo nunywɛ kpo
sɔgbe kpo biblu kpo ɔ mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn
etɛ mi bɔ mi wa
e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi ɖyɔ gbeta kɔn mi wa e ɖe wɛ a
xota elɔ mi bɔ mi mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ
jehovah kpo ayi towe bi kpo
hɛn nu e wlan lɛ e do ayi mɛ a
ðo mi nyi wutu ɔ mi bi wɛ nɔ wa nu nyi do
e ɖo co enɛ ɖɔ mi kun sixu jehovah nukunmɛ o wɛ a
jehovah mɔ ɖɔ axɔsu enɛ lɛ emi kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo
ðo mi lɔ nɔ wa nu nyi do wutu ɔ mawu mɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ emi kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo a
nyi ɖe hwenu nyinyi ɖe jlo gble e
nyikɔ biblu tɔn ɖe ðo hwexonu tɔn ɖe ji
mɛ tɔn wɛ e william samuelson
ayi mɛ fa tawun ɖo zanzan gbe ɖokpo ɖo brookings tɔfɔligbe dakota tɔn ɖo etats unis
enɛ ɖɔ laglasi ja ɖo malin malin mɛ
e sixu kpaca ɖɔ ɖo azan enɛ gbe ɔ mi mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo avivɔ wɛ ɖo kanlinkpo xla yozo a e ɖe mɛ
mi ɖo ɖo nu mɛ kanlin lɛ nɔ sin ɖe bɔ sin fifa ɖo we e ɖe nukɔn
bonu tuun nu wu wɛ e ɔ nu kpi kpɛɖe nu
atagan alfred kpo kpo
e ji mi ɖo mars vi ɛnɛ wɛ lɛ ji bɔ nyɛ wɛ nyi mɛ kpɛvi bi ɔ
mi sa xwe ɖo gle kpɛvi ɖe mɛ ɖo hwetɔnhweji tɔfɔligbe dakota tɔn
gle lilɛ kpo kanlin nyinyi kpo nyi nu taji ɖe ɖo xwedo mitɔn mɛ wɛ nyi nu taji hugan ɔ a
lɛ blo baptɛm huzu jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo
yeɖee jo nu jehovah mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ enɛ wu ɔ jlo mawu tɔn wiwa wɛ nyi nu nɔ mya nukun nu jɛ nukɔn e
clarence wa kplekple mɛxo lɛ tɔn tɔn sin bɔ e wa ya e ɔ atagan alfred lɔ wa ɖokpo ɔ ɖo agun mitɔn kpɛvi ɖo conde ɖo tofɔligbe dakota tɔn e mɛ
nu mɛ xwedo mitɔn nɔ ɖe hwɛhwɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ yiyi kpo nukunɖiɖo jiwu sɔgudo tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ e sin xo ɖiɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ sin xwe ɖe gbe jɛ xwe ɖe gbe kpo
lɛ tɔn kpo mi e kpo wa ɖagbe nu mi vi lɛ tawun
dorothy kpo nyɛ kpo huzu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ hwenu mi ɖo xwe e
ee wemaxɔmɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn huzu akpaxwe ɖe ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo e ɔ tlolo jɛn nyikɔ
ðo gbexosin wa wɛ ɖo
lɛ nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
nɔvi suiter wɛ nyi jonɔ wa ɖaxo tɔn ɖo sioux falls tɔfɔligbe dakota tɔn e kpo ɖo xoɖiɖɔ tɔn xota tɔn nyi il est tard que vous le pensez
enɛ mi bɔ nyiɖee jo nu jehovah
ðo lɛdo tɔn bɔ e hwenu ɖo brookings e ɔ wa ɖo kanlinkpo xla yozo a bɔ ɖɔ xo tɔn nu ɖo e mɛ ɖo blo baptɛm
nu mɛ kanlin lɛ nɔ sin ɖe bɔ e do blo e wɛ nyi nu mɛ mi mɛ ɛnɛ blo baptɛm ɖe ɖo novembre e
enɛ gudo ɔ gbexosin tɔn do ɖo nu gbe ɖo nya jɛ nukɔn e
gbexosin ɖo janvier hwenu ɖo xwe e
atagan julius ɖo xwe e wa huzu mɛ kpo nyi kpo nɔ wa ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ e
e wa ɖaxo mi tawun co mi ɖu hwenu ɖagbe lɛ sin vivi ɖo ɔ mɛ ɖo
nu e mɔ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ e mi nunywɛ gege
e lin a bɔ dorothy huzu gbexosin
ðo winnyawinnya hwenu ɔ lɛ yi jonɔ lɛdo tɔn gege kpo asi yetɔn lɛ kpo tɔn bɔ nɔ nɔ mi gɔn
asu kpo asi kpo mi tawun e ɖokpo wɛ nyi jesse kpo lynn cantwell kpo
wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mi e bɔ gbexosin ɔ
ayi ɖo ji e bɔ jɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu lɛ gbe nyinya jlo ji
enyi ɖo agun lɛ wɛ ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ ɔ nɔ ylɔ mi ɖɔ wa nu emi ɖo ɔ mɛ
nu enɛ vivi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
kpo asi tɔn joan kpo wɛ nyi mɛ bɔ wa mi ɖo lɛdo ɔ mɛ lɛ e
hwenɛnu ɔ xwe ɖo wɛ ɖe bɔ ahwan mɛ byɔbyɔ sin xo ɔ ba mi
nɔ yi mɛ do ahwan mɛ ɖo xa mɛ e wlan nuɖe do nyikɔ ji bɔ mɔ ɖɔ e kun sɔgbe xa gbeɖiɖe jezu tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ nɔ zɔ nu toxoɖiɖɔ e o
bɔ jlo jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn
jaan yi mɔ nɔ yi mɛ do ahwan mɛ e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ lɛ sin ahwan mɛ wɛ e ɖo xwe mi do
ee nɔvi ɖɔ ɖɔ emi xwedo mi yi ɔ nukɔn e ɔ e byɔ lanmɛ nu mi tawun
e tawun bɔ nu ɖe nɔ do xɛsi a
eɖɔhun ɖo akpa e mi jiɖe tawun
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ ɖo zosun tɔn sin vivɔnu ɔ ɔ yi gbe xwe mi do lɛ sin ahwan mɛ
enɛ hun ali nu mi nu nya yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu ɖevo gbe
wa betɛli tlolo ɖo gle mɛ tɔn ɖe kpa
ðo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ e ylɔ mi ɖɔ wa wa ɖo betɛli ɖo fi e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ gle tɔn ɖo staten ɖo e
e jɔwu mi bɔ wa ɖo finɛ nu xwe atɔn

e wa nu kpo mi kpo ɖe ɖɔhun gbɔn e bɔ mi lido ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
peterson ɖokan do ɔ wu tawun
wujɔmɛ bunɔ ɖe wɛ mi ɖo bɔ nɔvi frederick franz lɔ wa nɔ xa mi
nunywɛ e ɖo e kpo mawuxowema ɔ e tuun ganji e kpo wa ɖagbe nu mi mɛ bi bɔ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ
mɛ nɔ ɖa nuɖuɖu nu mi e wɛ nyi peterson nyikɔ enɛ ylɔylɔ bɔwu nu mi hu nyikɔ tɔn tawun ɔ ylɔylɔ e wɛ nyi papargyropoulos
mɛ yi do ɖe wɛ e nyi nɔ ɖo kan do ɔ wu tawun
nɔvi peterson wa tɔn ɖo betɛli ganji e gɔn ke nu wɛnɖagbe jijla ɔ gbeɖe a
e nɔ jo xojlawema mitɔn kanweko mɔkpan do ɖo kunnuɖegbe ɖo ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
e tuun mawuxowema ɔ ganji nɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ mitɔn gege
mɛ e nɔ su nu tɔn sin gle ɔ mɛ lɛ e do go alo gannu mɛ ɖe bonu e zan hweɖevonu e ɖokpo ɖo gle ɔ ji
atin alo ma litli wɛ e nɔ do go nu xwedo betɛli tɔn ɔ bi ɖo xwe ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
ðo ali enɛ ɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ wa xa etta huth nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe wɛ
e wɛ nɔ kpe nukun do e do nu lɛ go ɔ mɛ gbɔn e wu
nu nu do go mɛ hwenu su ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɖo xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ wa mi bɔ etta nɔ to wa ɔ gbɔn e

angela kpo nyɛ kpo kpodo etta huth kpan
angela romano nyi ɖokpo ɖo nɔvi nyɔnu winnyawinnya nɔ wa mi lɛ e mɛ
etta ɛ hwenu e mɔ nugbo ɔ e
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli e ɔ xo go ɖevo bɔ nyɛ kpo e kpo ɖo zinzɔn wɛ sin xwe ɖie
angie kpo nyi kpo wli alɔ ɖo avril bɔ mi ɖu vivi wujɔmɛ ɔ tɔn gege tɔn ɖo
ðo xwe enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ gbejininɔ angie tɔn nu jehovah kan to a e nyi nu hɛn alɔwliwli mitɔn lido lɛ e ɖokpo
sixu ɖeji do wu tɔn bi nu mi ɖo ɖebu mɛ ɔ nɛ
hwenu e sa hladio xwe wbbr ɖo staten ɖo gudo e ɔ wa ɖo betɛli brooklyn tɔn nu taan klewun ɖe
enɛ gudo ɔ angie kpo nyi kpo wli alɔ enɛ wu ɔ gosin betɛli bɔ nu xwe atɔn ɔ mi wa gbexosin ɖo staten
tlɛ wa nu mɛ ɖo hladio xwe ɔ din lɛ e nu taan ɖe bɔ hladio xwe ɔ sin nyikɔ nɔ nyi wpow
angie kpo nyi kpo kudeji hɛn gbɛzan mitɔn bɔkun do sixu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi wa ɖo fi ɖebu e ɖo hudo mitɔn ɖe e
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo sin ɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi gbe nu gbexosin titewungbe sin e ɖe nu mi ɖo falls ɖo nebraska e
mi blo huzuhuzu enɛ nɔ zaan e ɔ e ylɔ mi nu wemaxɔmɛ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖokpo wɛ nukplɔnkplɔn ɔ nɔ xɔ hwenɛnu ɖo lansing ɖo
mi ɖu vivi wemaxɔmɛ ɔ tɔn tawun ɖɔ hwenu mi lɛkɔ wa nebraska e ɔ mi zan nu mi lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ e kpaca mi ɖɔ e ɖe ɖe nu mi mi nyi lɛ ɖo cambodge
to ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ ɖo tofɔligbe zanzanhweji nu asie e ɖo ayi ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ mɛɖe hɛn gble a lɛ e nuxixo kpo wan ɖagbeɖagbe gbɔn vo nu nu ɖebu mi tuun lɛ e kpo
mi jlo kpo akpakpa sɔ mɛ kpo jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo finɛ
ninɔmɛ toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖo to ɔ mɛ wa huzu bɔ mi ɖo sɛtɛn yi viet du
e blawu ɖɔ ɖo xwe we vlamɛ ɔ lanmɛ wa gble bi enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi lɛkɔ yi xwe
nyi kpo angela kpo ɖo jɛ nukɔn nu nukanbyɔmɛ televiziɔn ji tɔn ɖe
ðo mars ɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ mi jɛ agun lɛ ji ɖo mɛ
nu xwe ɔ angie kpo nyi kpo ɖu vivi lɛdo lɛ kpo agbegbe lɛ kpo biba sin tɔn jɛ tuto lɛ biblo jɛ nukɔn nu lɛ kpo ɖaxo lɛ ɖesu kpo ji
ɖaxo lɛ nɔ akpakpa mi enɛ wu ɔ awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nɔ nyi nu mi ɖɔ ma ɖo tuto biblo nu nuwiwa enɛ lɛ mɛ
mi nɔ xa ɖeɖee do toxo tɔn mɛ lɛ e mɛ nu xwe ɖe lɛ bɔ e blo ɖaxo lɛ gege ɖo yankee
e nɔ nyi nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe mɛ gbɔn e ɔ ɖe nu mɛ akpakpa mɛ vɛwu lɛ e wɛ ɖo angie kpo nyi kpo
ði ɔ ɖo ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ ma nu mɛ ɖo wemaxɔmɛ kplɔnkplɔn tɔn
xwe atɔn gudo ɔ e ylɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa betɛli
e hun xomɛ nu mi tawun ɖɔ ma lɛkɔ wa fi hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe ɖo xwe jɛji ɖie e
nu hwenu ɖe ɔ wa ɖo tɔn nyi ɖe ɖo wemaxɔmɛ gege mɛ
ðo ɔ ɔ nukplɔnmɛ wemaxɔmɛ lɛ tɔn do wemaxɔmɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ tɔn ɔ glɔ ɖo betɛli bɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ nyi nu xwe nabi ɖe
mi mɔ huzuhuzu yaɖeyaɖe gege ɖo mɛkplɔnkplɔn wemaxɔmɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ
e hun nu sin wemaxɔmɛ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖo
ðo xwe we bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn jɛji wɛ e nu ɖo patterson kpo betɛli brooklyn tɔn kpo
wemaxɔmɛ enɛ ɔ kpo ɖo yiyi wɛ ɖo to vovo mɛ kpo ɖeɖee e ɖo to ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo
ðo ɔ wemaxɔmɛ kplɔnkplɔn tɔn wa huzu wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn tɔn nu nɔvi sunnu tlɛnnɔ lɛ bɔ e ɖo wemaxɔmɛ ɖe ayi wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn tɔn nu asu kpo asi kpo lɛ
xwe tɔn tɔn ɔ e xo wemaxɔmɛ we enɛ lɛ kple bɔ e huzu wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ
mɛ e nɔ nu lɛ e sixu nyi asu kpo asi kpo lɛ alo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ lɛ kpo
e hun xomɛ nu mɛ gege gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji hwenu se ɖɔ alaxɔ gege ɖo wemaxɔmɛ enɛ e
enyi gudo sin hwenu blo baptɛm ɖo nu mɛ kanlin lɛ nɔ sin ɖe e wa jɛ din ɔ nɔ doku nu jehovah nu ɖeɖee mi ɖo nugbo ɔ ji lɛ e
bi wɛ ɖo xwe alo yi ɖokpo ɔ xa mi a
lɛ wɛ nu ɖo ayi mɛ
wan yi nu jehovah e ɖo wɛn ɖo walɔ yetɔn kpo zinzan yetɔn lɛ kpo mɛ
ðo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ ɔ mi ɖo mi sixu yi xa e gege
nu wa e nɛ bɔ e wa ɖagbe nu mi tawun

etɛwu jɛxa jehovah tawun
ɖiɖe ɖo e ðo mɛ ɔ mɛ nyi lɛngbɔvi ɔ etɛwu jɛxa ɛ
gbɔn e ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e ɖo wli nu mɛ ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo axɔsuzinkpo ɔ ji e kpodo lɛngbɔvi ɔ kpo
ðo wemata wema biblu tɔn ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ hwɛjijɔ wu e jɛxa ɖɔ e wli nu jehovah e ɖokpo
nuɖogbɛ ɖo jixwe lɛ e nɔ gbe do ji do kpa nu jehovah mɛ ɖo sɔyi e
jezu klisu wɛ nyi lɛngbɔvi ɔ lɛngbɔvi mawu tɔn nɔ hwɛ kɛ lɛ ɔ
jaan biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ e ɖo acɛ hu ɖo axɔsu ɖu wɛ din kpo ee nyi axɔsu lɛ e kpo bi flafla
e tinmɛ ɖɔ e wɛ nyi axɔsu nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo axɔsu ɖu wɛ lɛ e nyi aklunɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee nyi aklunɔ lɛ e eɖokponɔ wɛ nɔ ku a ɖo weziza mɛɖe sixu sɛkpɔ a e mɛ mɛɖebu mɔ ɛ a mɛɖe sixu mɔ ɛ lɔ a
tim nwt nugbo ɔ axɔsu ɖevo jlo do ku do mitɔn mɛ do xɔ nu mi
etɛwu wliwli nu jehovah kpo klisu kpo nyi e jlo mɛ sin nu a
e ɖo wli nu jehovah kpo klisu kpo dandan
wiwa wɛ bɔ mi mɔ mavɔmavɔ
xogbe jezu tɔn ɖeɖee mi xa ɖo jaan mɛ e mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ceɖeceɖe ɔ nɔ ɖɔhwɛ xa mɛɖe a e hwɛɖiɖɔ bi do asi nu vi ɔ bonu lɛ bi vi ɔ su nɔ ɔ su gbɔn e ɖɔhun
mɛ vi ɔ su a ɔ e ɛ do ɔ lɔ su a xa ðɛhan
etɛwu mi ɖo wli nu mɛ lɛ ɖo sisi nu ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɖo kpaa mɛ
akpajlɛ mawu tɔn mɛ wɛ e da lɛ ɖe
lɛ ɖo nuwukpikpe ɖe wanyiyi yeɖee lɛ se xa yeɖee lɛ
ðo e da mɛ bi kpo ayixa kpo wutu ɔ lɛ ɖo nu nɔ nu do nu e kpo nu nyla e kpo wu nugbo kpo adingban kpo wu nu sɔgbe e kpo ee sɔgbe a e kpo wu
nu lɛ e kpo nu ɖɛkpɛ lɛ e kpo nɔ dɔn mɛ gege
ðo wliwli nu lɛ mɛ ɔ klisanwun nugbo lɛ gbɔn vo nu mɛ gege gbɔn
e ɖo jlɛjininɔ sin hudo do sixu tuun alɔkpa e wli nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e kpo ba mɛ e ɖo wli nu yi jɛ e kpo
gbigbɔ sataan tɔn nɔ wa nu do lɛ wu tawun
nu wu mɛ lɛ nɔ sunnu ɖe lɛ alo nyɔnu ɖe lɛ ɖo mawu ha ji e nɛ ganji wɛ ɔ kpo sisi kpo sɔgbe e wɛ e kpowun
nɔ sinsɛngan lɛ lɛ lɔnyiji lɔnfɔnkan nukunɖeji lɛ nukunɖeji lɛ kpo nukunɖeji ɖevo lɛ kpo do ajo tlɛ nɔ hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ hugan
mɛ ɔ yɔkpɔvu kpo mɛxo kpo bi nɔ do mɔ lɛ vlafo nɔ jlo walɔ yetɔn lɛ nɔ nu gbɔn e alo zinzan yetɔn lɛ
klisanwun nugbo lɛ nɔ nyi alɔ nu wliwli nu mɛ agɔ mɔhun
enyi mi wli nu lɛ zɛ ee sin acɛ ɖo e wu ɔ e hun xomɛ nu mawu a
nugbo ɔ ɖe jɛxa ɖɔ e wli ci ɖi sinsɛn ɛ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔhun a
etɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ do acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ wu
ba tɛ mɛ mi sixu nɔ gudo nu yi jɛ
ðo to ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo gan tɛnmɛ
e nɔ ɖo nukun ɖo acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ si ɖɔ blo bonu e nyi lɛ bɔ ayijayi tiin bɔ nu nyi hudo tovi yetɔn lɛ tɔn e ɔ kpe nukun
enɛ nɔ wa ɖagbe nu mɛ bi
enɛ wu ɔ pɔlu ɖe we xa klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn mɔhun lɛ do mɔ acɛkpikpa ɖo to ɔ lɛ bɔ ɖo yeɖee do glɔ yetɔn lɛ e
su kuzu mɛ ɖu kuzu sin axɔ do lɛ su tokwɛ mɛ ɖu tokwɛ sin axɔ do lɛ wli nu mɛ ɖo wli e hlɔ
mi nɔ wa nu ɖo xa hwenu ɖo yetɔn lɛ wa wɛ e
mi nɔ wli nu e kpo gudo mi nɔ nɔ nu e kpo nɔ zɛ dogbo mawuxowema ɔ ɖo ji lɛ e wu a
mi sixu wa nu wa tlito nu mawu alo wu mi nɔ ɖo zɔ nu toxoɖiɖɔ alo ahwanfunfun e ji a xa
jehovah hwexonu tɔn lɛ ze nu mi ɖo wa nu xa acɛkpikpa lɛ kpo acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn e mɛ gbɔn
jehovah hwexonu tɔn lɛ ze nu mi ɖo wa nu xa acɛkpikpa lɛ kpo acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn e mɛ
hwenu acɛkpikpa hlɔma tɔn ɔ byɔ mɛ lɛ ɖɔ yi do nyikɔ wema mɛ e ɔ jozɛfu kpo kpo wa
etɛwu mi nɔ wli nu acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ gbɔn vo nu ee mi nɔ sinsɛngan lɛ e
hwenu autriche tɔn ɖe wli nu ɖe e ɔ ɖagbe tɛ mɛ e kɔ do
jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ sinsɛngan lɛ do mɔ mɛ e jɛxa ɖɔ e wli bunɔ ɖe e a enyi sinsɛngan enɛ lɛ tlɛ nɔ ɖo nukun nu mɔhun ɔ nɛ
sinsɛn nuvu nɔ ɖɔ nu sɔgbe a e do mawu wu nɔ slo kɔ nu nukplɔnmɛ ɖo xo tɔn mɛ lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ ɖo sisi nu sinsɛngan lɛ mɛ bi ɖɔhun mi nɔ wli bunɔ ɖe nu a
mi flin ɖɔ jezu ɖe mɛ mɔhun lɛ gba ɖo hwetɔnnu ɖɔ nyi kpo lɛ kpo
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ sisi mi nɔ ɖo nu acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ wli nu e sixu kɔ do ɖagbe mi tlɛ ɖo nukun tɔn a e mɛ hweɖelɛnu
leopold engleitner nyi ɖe gosin autriche bɔ kponɔ nazi tɔn lɛ wli ɛ do pinpan mɛ yadonumɛkpa buchenwald tɔn mɛ
dr heinrich gleissner lɔ nyi ɖe ɖo pinpan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ
autriche tɔn ɖe wɛ
e ɖo co kponɔ nazi tɔn lɛ wli ɖebu a
ðo wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ gudo ɔ gleissner zan tɛn mɛ e ɖe e do lɛ ɖo autriche hwɛhwɛ
sixu flin mɛ lɛ ɖo sisi jɛxa e nu lɛ sɔgbe kpo biblu ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ ɖo ɖo nu e kpo bɔ e kɔ do ɖagbe mɛ e ɖevo lɛ
jɛxa tawun ɖɔ mi ɖo sisi wli
ðo taji ɔ e ɖo wa nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo nukun kpe do nu wu wɛ wutu xa timɔtee
mi nɔ wli nu nɔvi sunnu enɛ lɛ enyi tlɛ gosin to ɖebu mɛ wema gbɔn ɖebu nyi dɔkunnɔ alo wamamɔnɔ ɔ nɛ
biblu ylɔ ɖɔ nunina ɖo lɛ mɛ bɔ nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo tuto mawu blo do kpe nukun do togun tɔn wu e mɛ
efɛ nwt tamɛ do mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ lɛdo tɔn lɛ alaxɔ tɔn sin lɛ kpo mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo ji
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo sisi tawun nu mɛ enɛ lɛ e ɖe bonu kpe nukun do nu wu lɛ e bɔ mi lɔ nɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ ɖo egbe
mi nɔ agun klisanwun tɔn tɔn lɛ alo wa nu ci ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ do wɛ ɖɔhun a
e ɖo co mi nɔ ɖo sisi nu nɔvi sunnu enɛ lɛ nɔ wli nu ɖo syɛnsyɛn wa wɛ ɖe e kpo mɛɖesɔhwe yetɔn kpo wu xa kɔlɛntinu nwt
klisanwun adodwe lɛ do mɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi kpowun lɛ e wu
ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ wɛ mɛxo mɔhun lɛ nyi
nu ɖe mɛɖesɔhwe yetɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ lɔn bonu mɛɖe nɔ ɖo ajo a
ðo ali enɛ ɔ gbɔn vo nu sinsɛngan egbe tɔn gege kpo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo jezu ɖɔ do wu ɖɔ nɔ jinjɔn tɛn nukɔntɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo jonɔgbe nɔ jlo jinjɔn zinkpo nukunɖeji lɛ mɛ ɖo jwifu lɛ tɔn
klisanwun adodwe lɛ nɔ setonu nu xo elɔ lɛ jezu ɖɔ e midɛɛ lɛ ɔ lɔn nu mɛɖe ylɔ ɖɔ o ɖo nɔvi nɔvi wɛ bi nyi ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ ɖo ɖokpo gee
ylɔ mɛɖebu ɖo ayikungban ji fi ɖɔ o ɖo mawu ɖo jixwe ɔ ɖokponɔ gee wɛ nyi mitɔn
lɔn nu mɛɖe ylɔ ɖɔ gan o ɖo klisu ɖokponɔ gee wɛ nyi gan mitɔn
mɛ nyi gan mitɔn ɔ ɖo nyi mitɔn
mɛ nɔ eɖee su ɔ mawu ɛ hwe mɛ nɔ eɖee hwe ɔ mawu ɛ su
ðo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo wutu ɔ e nɔ yi wan nu nɔ si nɔ wli nu akpaxwe
etɛwu ɖo kpo ɖo gan do wɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu biblu ɖɔ do wliwli nu mɛ e wu blo
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e byɔ hwenu cobɔ mi jlɛjininɔ ɖo mi wli nu mɛ gbɔn e kpo mɛ mi wli e kpo mɛ
wɛ e nyi nu klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ lɔ nɛ
jlɛjininɔ ɖo ali enɛ nɔ hɛn le gege wa
le tɛ lɛ ɖo wliwli nu mɛ ɖo gan tɛnmɛ lɛ e mɛ
enyi mi ɖo sisi nu mɛ ɖo gan tɛnmɛ lɛ e wli nu ɔ sixu jɛhun do acɛ mi ɖo vo ɖɔ mawuxo e ji
e blo xwe nabi ɖe din bɔ birgit nyi gbexosin ɖo allemagne e yi vi nyɔnu tɔn sin kunnuɖewema nina tɛnmɛ
birgit tinmɛ ɖɔ mi vi mitɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ xwedo nugbododo mawu tɔn kunkpla walɔ lɛ e bɔ sisi ɖiɖo nu lɛ kpo wliwli nu kpo lɔ
ɖokpo ɖɔ ji enyi vi lɛ bi ci mitɔn lɛ ɖɔhun wɛ ɔ wemaxɔmɛ ci palaɖisi ɖɔhun
ðo aklunɔzan gbla mɔkpan gudo ɔ lɛ ɖokpo wa ɖaxo ɖe ɖo leipzig
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jɛxa e wliwli nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖo sɔgbe xa nugbododo xo mawu tɔn tɔn nunywɛ kpe bɔ nu bi vɔ lɛ e
xa eblee lɛ
mi sixu kpa nu syɛnsyɛn wa wɛ ɖe e ɖo wa tɛnkpɔn xwedo nɔ lɛ e
enyi mi nɔ wa ɔ e sixu bɔ kpo ɖo yetɔn wa wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo
biblo sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi tɛnkpɔn mɛxo agun tɔn nukunɖeji ɖe ɖo e nɔ sɔnu gbɔn nɔ gbɔn e mɛ e nɔ kpe nukun do xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi wu gbɔn e alo e tlɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo gbɔn ɖo kpaa mɛ e a
enyi mi wa ɔ nu ɖevo wɛ mɛ lɛ do mi wu
mi ɖo wɔn gbeɖe ɖɔ wɛ nu e a
wliwli nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mi gbɔn
wliwli nu mɛ e ɖo wli lɛ e nɔ wa ɖagbe nu miɖesunɔ e nɔ bɔ mi nɔ nyi alɔ nu cejɛnnabi
e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ gɔn miɖee mɔ zɛ xwe wu hwenu e wli nu mi ɖo ali ɖe e
e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn eyɛ nɔ nyi alɔ nu wu e alo ee jɛxa a e wliwli nu lɛ ɖi nu kpo gbɔ kpo ɔ nɛ
hu ɔ nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖo nu mɛ mi nɔ wli e ɖe wa wa nu nyi do ɔ e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ afɔ a
le taji hugan tɛ wliwli nu mɛ e jɛxa ɖɔ e wli lɛ e nɔ hɛn wa
le taji wliwli nu mɛ e jɛxa ɖɔ e wli lɛ e nɔ hɛn wa hugan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu mitɔn nɔ jehovah nukunmɛ
mi nɔ wa nu e jlo ɖɔ mi blo gbɔn e bɔ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ kpo ɖo gbeji
ɖeɖee tuun nɔ wli nu mɛ gbɔn a lɛ e wɛ ɔ mɛ
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun ɖɔ mi tuun jehovah jlo ɖɔ mi nɔ wli nu mɛ gbɔn e
etɛwu mi ɖo yi gbe ɖɔ mi ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɖo mɛ
etɛwu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo nɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu mi a
etɛwu mi sixu ɖyɔ gbeta kɔn mi wa e hweɖelɛnu
ɖo wa gbeta ɖe kɔn e ɖo do nuɖe ji ðu ɖo nu baɖabaɖa sin zɛn ɖo ɛ wɛ e ji alo jo nu ci gbɔn e do ɖo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ mɛ
gbeta ɖebu kɔn e wa e wa nu do gbɛzan tɔn kpo e bi wu
tuun gbeta kɔn wa e ɖɔ e kun nyi ɖagbe ɔ wɛ o
etɛwu nuwukpikpe mi ɖo wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn e ɖo taji tawun
mi ɖo wa gbeta ɖe lɛ kɔn do nuɖe lɛ ji
gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e bi wɛ nɔ ɖo axɔ a
e ɖo co gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e nu ji mi nɔ do lɛ e sixu wa nu do mi wu tawun
do wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn ɔ etɛ mi ɖo ɖi nu
etɛ mi bɔ mi wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn
mi ɖo ɖi nu nu mawu xo nu do jlo kpo nuwukpikpe kpo e ɖo mi bɔ mi huzu e wu a
mi ɖo ɖi nu nu xo jehovah tɔn kpo e nɔ wa nu gbɔn e kpo wu gbɔn jiɖiɖe do weɖexamɛ gosin gɔn tɔn lɛ e gblamɛ xa jaki
ee mi ɖo sisɛ ɛ wɛ ɖo wan yi nu xo tɔn wɛ e ɔ mi nɔ wa ɖeji do linlin tɔn lɛ wu
mɛ ɔ mi nɔ wa ɖo aca nɔ do nu xo mawu tɔn cobo nɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn
mi sixu hɛn nuwukpikpe mi ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn e gbɔn
gbeta tɛ kɔn adamu ɖo wa
etɛ lɛ mɛ gbeta kɔn e wa e tɔn kɔ do
sin hwenu ɔ jɔ do e wɛ mɛ bi sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖo wa gbeta taji lɛ kɔn
adamu ɖo wa gbeta ɖe kɔn e setonu nu tɔn alo setonu nu ɛvu tɔn
e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa gbeta ɖe kɔn etɛ do gbeta kɔn e wa e wu
asi tɔn e flu e sisɛ ɛ bɔ e wa gbeta e nyla tawun e ɖe kɔn bɔ palaɖisi mɛ e nɔ nɔ e kpo eɖesunɔ tɔn kpo bu do e
lɛ tɔn kpowun jɛn nɛ
jɛ egbe ɔ mi kpo ɖo gbeta baɖabaɖa kɔn adamu wa e sin xɔxɔ se wɛ
nukun tɛ mi ɖo nɔ do dandannu gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa nyi e
mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ enyi mi ɖo gbeta lɛ kɔn wa a ɔ ninɔ vivi hugan
wɛ hwi lɔ nɔ a
flin ɖɔ jehovah kun blo lɛ bonu ci macinu sixu tamɛ do nuɖe ji yeɖesunɔ a lɛ e ɖɔhun o
nugbo ɔ biblu mi mi nɔ wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn gbɔn e
jehovah jlo ɖɔ mi wa gbeta lɛ kɔn miɖesunɔ co e jlo ɖɔ gbeta enɛ kɔn wiwa hɛn nu gble do mi wu a
tamɛ do kunnuɖenu ɖe enɛ e ɖe lɛ ji
gbeta tɛ kɔn izlayɛli vi hwexonu tɔn lɛ ɖo wa
ee izlayɛli vi hwexonu tɔn lɛ wa jɛ akpadido yikungban ɔ ji e ɔ ɖo wa gbeta vlɛkɛsɛ ɖo taji e ɖe kɔn jehovah alo mawu ɖevo alo mawu ɖevo lɛ xa jozuwee
gbeta enɛ kɔn wiwa sixu ci nu bɔkun e ɖe ɖɔhun
ee kɔn wa e sixu yetɔn ɖo axɔ
ðo lɛ sin taan mɛ ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ izlayɛli vi lɛ wa gbeta nyanya lɛ kɔn
lɛkɔ sin jehovah gudo vodun lɛ
elii nu nu togun ɔ ɖo yetɔn wu
sixu ɖɔ gbeta enɛ kɔn wiwa kun vɛwu o ɖo nunywɛnu wɛ jehovah sinsɛn nyi hwebinu ɖo le
nugbo ɔ mɛ ɖo ganji e ɖe sixu yi wan nu baalu a
e ɖo co izlayɛli vi enɛ lɛ xo nu do mɛ e wu
elii do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu kpo nunywɛ kpo ɖɔ sinsɛn biblo hugan bi e e wɛ nyi sinsɛn biblo jehovah
etɛwu e sixu vɛwu nu izlayɛli vi enɛ lɛ ɖɔ wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe e ɖe kɔn
e ɖɔ kpowun ɔ ɖi nu nu jehovah a ɖɔ emi kun setonu o
ɖo nutuuntuun sɔgbe alo nunywɛ gosin mawu gɔn e a jɛn ɖeji do jehovah wu a e nɛ
ɔ jo mɛ ɖevo lɛ do bɔ wa nu do wu alo tlɛ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn do tɛn yetɔn mɛ
to ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ jehovah a lɛ e linlin izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn wu bɔ xwedo ahwan pagawun enɛ ɔ
jehovah nu sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie ɖɔ nu mɔhun sixu jɛ tin
xo mi ɖɔ wa yi lɛ e nu zawe e ɖe mi
mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn bɔ ee nunywɛ kpe sɔgbe lɛ e nɔ jinjɔn nutuuntuun zawe ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ e ji
galatinu lɛ flin mi ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo wa nyi e tɔn e
mi ɖo gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa sin nyi mitɔn e jo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ a
e wa ɔ mi ɖo tuun nu sɔgbe ɖo mawu nukunmɛ e miɖesunɔ jlo wa
enyi mi jo mɛ ɖevo lɛ do bonu wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu mi ɔ etɛwu e sixu nyi awovinu
mi sixu jɛ mɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ jijodo bonu wa gbeta lɛ kɔn do tɛn mitɔn mɛ e tɔn mɛ gbɔn
kɔgbidinumɛ lɛ tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi wa gbeta sɔgbe a e ɖe kɔn
ðo ali gege ɔ enyi mi nɔ jo mɛ ɖevo lɛ do bɔ nɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu mi ɔ mi nɔ jlo nɔ xwedo mɛ mɔhun lɛ nɛ
gbeta ɖe wɛ nugbo e sixu ji nu nyanya nu mi
etɛ wu pɔlu mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo nu galatinu lɛ do
pɔlu nu galatinu lɛ do awovinu ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ jijodo bonu wa gbeta mɛɖesunɔ tɔn kɔn nu lɛ e ji ceɖeceɖe xa galatinu lɛ
mɛɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ jlo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ do klan sin lɛ wu
tɛn ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ mɛ ninɔ wɛ cejɛnnabinɔ enɛ lɛ ɖe
nɔ zɛ dogbo sɔgbe lɛ e wu nɔ ɖo sisi ɖebu nu acɛ klisanwun yetɔn lɛ ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu yeɖesunɔ lɛ e a
mi sixu mɛ ɖevo lɛ hwenu ɖo gbeta yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn wa wɛ e gbɔn
pɔlu ɖagbe ɖe ɖo sisi ɖo nu acɛ nɔvi lɛ ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu yeɖee e mɛ xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ nwt
egbe ɔ enyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ jlo ɖe we xa mɛ do nu kunkpla gbeta mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn wiwa ji ɔ ɖo xwedo enɛ
e ɖo co mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ yeɖee nɔ jo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu ɖokpo ɖokpo do bɔ nɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn yeɖesunɔ
wiwa sɔgbe ɖo mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ kpan nu gbeta kɔn e wa e ji lɛ e
nukplɔnmɛ taji ɖokpo ɖie mi sixu keya nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ dɔn ayi yetɔn wa nugbododo alo weɖexamɛ mawuxowema ɔ tɔn lɛ ji
ɖo acɛ wa gbeta yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn bɔ wɛ ɖo blo
enyi wa kpo nunywɛ kpo ɔ nɔ ɖu le tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi kun ɖo gbeɖe ɖɔ mi ɖo acɛ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo o
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖo wanyiyi lɛ e nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ nɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu yeɖee gbɔn e akpaxwe ɔ
etɛwu e nyi awovinu ɖɔ mi xwedo nu ayi mitɔn ɖɔ nu mi e kpowun hwenu mi ɖo xomɛsin ji alo hwenu awakanmɛ ku mi e
nuwiwa gbɔn sixu nyi awovinu bɔ ɖo ali ɖe ɔ e sɔgbe kpo mawuxowema ɔ kpo a
biblu tɔn lɛ nu nyanya nɔ jɛ hwenu e xwedo nu ayi mɛtɔn ɖɔ nu mɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi nɔ xwedo nu ayi mitɔn ɖɔ nu mi e kpowun do wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɔ etɛ e sixu ji
nu titewungbe ɖe wɛ ayi klisanwun tɔn nyi ɖo e ɖe gbe nu mi ɖɔ mi yi wan nu jehovah kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo yi wan nu nɔzo mitɔn miɖesunɔ ɖɔhun
mawuxowema ɔ sin akpaxwe ji mi ɖɔ xo do wa yi lɛ e ji ɖɔ awovinu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi jo nu nɔ ci nu mi lɛ e do bonu mi nu gbɔn wa nu gbɔn e mi
ði ɔ enyi mi wa gbeta lɛ kɔn hwenu mi ɖo xomɛsin ji ɔ etɛ sixu jɛ
enyi mi wa wa yi ɔ xosin ɔ ɖo wɛn
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ e sixu sɔgbe ɖɔ mi huzu gbeta kɔn mi wa e ɖe
mi ɖo wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn
enɛ ɖɔ mi kun sixu ɖyɔ linlin mitɔn hwenu mi wa gbeta ɖe kɔn e o a
e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mi gbeta ɖe gbeje hweɖelɛnu bɔ tlɛ sixu huzu ðo ayi jehovah wa nu xa ninivunu lɛ gbɔn ɖo jonasi hwenu e wu
mawu mɔ wa nu gbɔn wɛ ɖe ɔ mɔ ɖɔ jo jijɔ nyanya yetɔn lɛ do
hwenu jehovah mɔ ɖɔ ninivunu lɛ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn lɛ gudo huzu jijɔ e ɔ e ɖyɔ gbeta tɔn
mɛ ɔ e ɖe jlɛjininɔ mɛɖesɔhwe kpo kpo
hu ɔ mawu nɔ e wa nu gbɔn e jinjɔn xomɛsin syɛnsyɛn taan klewun ɖe tɔn ji mɛ gege nɔ blo gbɔn e a
etɛ sixu bɔ mi huzu gbeta kɔn mi wa e ɖe
ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ sixu wa byɔ ɖɔ mi gbeta kɔn mi wa wa yi ɖe gbeje
nu sixu nyi hwenu ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖyɔ e
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖe sixu mi hwɛjijɔ jɔ hwɛjijɔ wu mi ɖo huzu gbeta ɖe e
e hɛn mɛfibaalu sawulu vivu ɔ gble ɖo axɔsu davidi gɔn
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu nyi nunywɛnu ɖɔ mi lɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
cobonu xwedo tɔn ɖe wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɔ e ɖo zan hwenu do do nu nu ɖo mawuxowema ɔ kpo wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ kpo mɛ e ɖo gbeje nu xwedo ɔ tɔn lɛ do nu ɔ wu e
mi flin ɖɔ mawu byɔ ɖo ablaxamu si ɖɔ e ɖoto nu asi tɔn ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ e
bib mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo zan hwenu do do nu nu
enyi nɔ nɔ ji nɔ yeɖee hwe ɔ hwenu nuɖɔnumɛ sɔgbe ɖevo lɛ jɛ tomɛ nu byɔ ɖɔ ɖo gbeta kɔn wa e ɖe gbeje ɔ xɛsi ɖi do sisi biba kpo wu a
ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖyɔ linlin kpo gbeta kɔn wa lɛ e kpo hwenu e sɔgbe do e bɔ e ɖɔ mi mɛ bi xwedo enɛ
wiwa sixu bɔ fifa kpo tuto kpo nɔ agun ɔ mɛ mɛ
gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa sixu kpa mi hugan gbɔn
gbeta ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo taji hu ɖevo lɛ
ðeɖee ɖo taji hugan lɛ e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e tamɛ ganji xoɖɛ gbeje ganji bɔ wiwa nɔ byɔ hwenu gege
klisanwun ɖe lɛ ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn do alɔwliwli kpo mɛ wli alɔ xa e kpo wu
gbeta taji ɖevo nɔ hɛn nyɔna gege wa nu mɛ e wɛ nyi e sixu byɔ hwebinu tɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo hwenu e sixu wa gbɔn e kpo
ðo ali enɛ lɛ ɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ e ɖeji bi do jehovah wu ɖɔ e sixu nunywɛ mɛ nɔ wa nugbo
nux enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ e do nu jɔtɛn weɖexamɛ hugan lɛ biblu nyi e tɔn xoɖɛ do jehovah tɔn
flin ɖɔ jehovah sixu nuwukpikpe sin hudo mi ɖo bonu gbeta kɔn mi wa sɔgbe kpo jlo tɔn kpo e do kpa mi e mi
enyi kpannukɔn gbeta taji hugan lɛ hun nɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ gbeta elɔ ɖɔ yi wan nu jehovah a
e hɛn awajijɛ kpo fifa kpo wa nu xwedo a
etɛwu jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi wa gbeta lɛ kɔn nu miɖee
jehovah nɔ gbidi kɔ nu mi bonu mi yi wan ɛ a
miɖesunɔ wɛ nɔ wa gbeta enɛ kɔn
e nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi ayi ɖo gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa sɔgbe kpo tɔn lɛ kpo e ji
asa jozafati ezekiyasi joziyasi
etɛ nyi tinmɛ e jehovah kpo ayi bi kpo tɔn
etɛ jiwu nu ɖo nukun ɖagbe mawu do axɔsu judaa tɔn ɛnɛ lɛ e mɛ
etɛ jehovah sinsɛn kpo ayixa ɛ tɔn bi kpo byɔ
ɖe
ðo mi nyi wutu ɔ mi nɔ yawu wa nu nyi do
mi do ku ɖɔ jehovah kun nɔ do hwɛ mi hu e wu nɔ wa nu tɔn xa mi o nu mi lɛkɔ sin hwɛ mitɔn lɛ gudo sɛkpɔ ɛ kpo nuɖiɖi kpo kpodo mɛɖesɔhwe kpan sɔgbe kpo vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu blo e kpo ɔ nɛ ðɛh
e ɖo co davidi ɖɔ nu gbɔn e ɔ enyi mi jlo ɖɔ jehovah yi gbe nu sinsɛn mi nɔ blo e ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e ɔ mi ɖo eɖokponɔ gee kpodo ayixa mitɔn bi kpo
mi mɛ lɛ sixu wa gbɔn
bonu mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu gbɛzan axɔsu asa tɔn do axɔsu amasiyasi tɔn wu
mɛ we lɛ bi wɛ nyi wa nu nyi do
e ɖo co asa gosin ali mawu tɔn ji a ɖo e ayi tɔn bi jo nu mawu wutu
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ amasiyasi ayi tɔn bi jo nu jehovah a
ee e ɖu ɖo mawu tɔn lɛ ji gudo e ɔ e vodun yetɔn lɛ wa xwe jɛ ji
mawu kpo ayi ɛ tɔn bi kpo byɔ ɖɔ e sɔ mɛɖee bi jo kpatakpata
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ e nɔ zan xokwin ayixa alo ayi nɔ do do gesi nu mɛɖe nyi ɖo xomɛ e hwɛhwɛ
nu nɔ jlo e lɛ e linlin tɔn lɛ jujɔ tɔn lɛ nuwiwa tɔn lɛ nuwukpikpe tɔn lɛ nu nɔ ɛ lɛ e kpo nu gbe e nɔ nya lɛ e kpo wɛ
midɛɛ lɛ
mi nyi lɛ co mi ɖo mawu kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo wɛ enyi mi miɖee jo bi nɔ wa yɛ mɛ nu a ɔ nɛ
etɛ mi do din
bonu mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mawu sinsɛn kpo ayi mɛtɔn bi kpo nyi e mɛ ganji ɔ mi tamɛ do gbɛzan asa tɔn kpo axɔsu judaa tɔn mawu kpo ayi bi kpo tɔn ɖe lɛ ji wɛ nyi jozafati ezekiyasi kpo joziyasi kpo
mɛ ɛnɛ lɛ bi wɛ wa nu nyi do mɛ bi sin nu wɛ jehovah nukunmɛ
etɛwu mawu mɔ ɖɔ emi kpo ayi bi kpo mi sixu wa nu ɖɔhun gbɔn
nu kpligidi tɛ lɛ asa wa
asa wɛ nyi axɔsu judaa tɔn atɔngɔ ɔ ɖo hwenu axɔsuɖuto izlayɛli tɔn akɔta wo totaligbe tɔn lɛ klan gudo e
e ɖe vodun sinsɛn sin axɔsuɖuto tɔn bi mɛ nya sunnu nɔ lɛ ɖo hunkpa mɛ lɛ e
e tlɛ yi nyɔnu ɖaxo sin acɛ tɔn nɔ maaka ɖo ɔ sin asi tɔn ɖo maaka kpa vodun acela sin bocyɔ nɔ wutu
axɔ hu ɔ asa do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun tɔn ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ
nyi tɔn wa nu e lɛ e
hwenu etiopiinu lɛ tɔn ahwan to ɔ e ɔ asa wa nu gbɔn
jehovah kɔn fifa sin nyɔna do judaa ji ɖo xwe wo nukɔntɔn axɔsuɖuɖu asa tɔn tɔn mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ zelaxi etiopiinu ɔ hɛn kpo ahwankɛkɛ kpo wa ahwan judaa
asa wa nu gbɔn ɖo adangbomɛ enɛ nukɔn
mawu se ɖɛ asa xo e e ɛ ɖuɖeji bi bɔ e su kun do nu ahwangɔnu etiopiinu lɛ tɔn
enyi axɔsu lɛ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah a ɔ e sixu blo bɔ ɖu ɖo yetɔn lɛ ji ɖo nyikɔ tɔn wutu axɔ
asa ɖeji do jehovah wu bɔ e se ɖɛ tɔn
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ asa wa xlonɔnu ɖo hweɖelɛnu
ði ɔ e jo alɔdo jehovah tɔn biba do yi alɔdo axɔsu silii tɔn tɔn
axɔ e ɖo co linlin jehovah ɖo do asa wu e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ayi tɔn bi nɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ ji ɖo gbɛzan tɔn bi mɛ
mi sixu wa nu ɖagbe asa ɖɔhun gbɔn axɔ
sixu jehovah asa ɖɔhun gbɔn
mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo gbeje ayi mitɔn ɖɔ mi miɖee jo nu mawu bi a ji
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ ku hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun jɛhun do sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ji cyɔn alɔ togun tɔn ji do nu baɖabaɖa ɖebu wa nu do wutu tɔn e wu a
akɔnkpinkpan e byɔ asa ɖɔ e ɖo cobo sixu kpannukɔn maaka nyi nyɔnu ɖaxo ɖo to ɔ mɛ e
sixu nɔ tuun mɛɖe bɔ e wa nu maaka ɖɔhun ninɔmɛ ɖe sixu wa byɔ ɖɔ wa nu asa ɖɔhun ɖokan do nu wu
ði ɔ enyi xwedo towe tɔn ɖe alo towe ɖe hu hwɛ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo a bɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e ɖe e sin agun mɛ ɔ
wa nu kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo ɖo alɔ nu xa mɛ enɛ ɔ a
etɛ ayi towe bɔ wa
asa ɖɔhun ɔ sixu ɖɔ emi ayi emitɔn bi jo nu mawu gbɔn jiɖiɖe do wutu tɔn hwenu gbeklanxamɛ kpannukɔn e gblamɛ bɔ ɖe lɛ tlɛ sixu ci nu ji sixu ɖu ɖe a e ɖɔhun
ðo nyi jehovah tɔn ɖe wutu ɔ e sixu do tagba nu alo ca ɖo wemaxɔmɛ
alo towe lɛ sixu ɖɔ slamɛ wu ɖo nɔ yi azan ɖe lɛ ɖo towe mɛ do ɖo gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ mɛ alo ɖɔ hwi kun nɔ wa gan gudo do mɔ akwɛ gege o wutu
ðo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɔ xoɖɛ mawu asa blo gbɔn e ɖɔhun
ðeji do jehovah wu kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo zunfan nu tuun ɖɔ e nyi nu jlɔjlɔ nyi nunywɛnu e gbanwun gbanwun
flin ɖɔ mawu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu asa ɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu hwi
mi sixu jla mawuxo ɔ kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo gbɔn
mawu lɛ nɔ yeɖokponɔ kɛɖɛ tɔn kpowun a
asa jɛhun do sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ji
mi lɔ nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ nɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ
enyi mi nɔ ɖɔ xo do jehovah wu nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ nɔ wa ɖo mi yi wan nugbo nugbo ɖo jlo wa ɖagbe mavɔmavɔ nu mɛ lɛ wutu ɔ e nɔ hun xomɛ nu jehovah
sixu wa nu jozafati ɖɔhun gbɔn
jozafati asa vi ɔ zan jlɔjlɔ tɔn asa ɖɔhun
tɔn ɖɔhun ɔ jozafati do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun ɔ ɖɔ e jehovah ɛ
e blo gbɔn tuto biblo nu nuwiwa nukplɔnmɛ tɔn ɖe gblamɛ bɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn ɔ wɛ zan do nu mɛ
e tlɛ yi axɔsuɖuto izlayɛli tɔn totaligbe tɔn yikungban ji ɖo eflayimu sokan mɛ nɔ ɖɔ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ lɛkɔ wa mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu yetɔn lɛ tɔn ɔ gɔn
jozafati nyi axɔsu mawu mavɔmavɔ kpo ayixa tɔn bi kpo ɔ ɖe
mi bi sixu ɖo mɛkplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɖaxo jehovah ɖo wiwa wɛ ɖo egbe e mɛ
nɔ tɛnkpɔn xo mawu tɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ sunmɛ sunmɛ bonu e nu mawu a
gbɔn ada gbigblo nu towe kpo nyɔna mawu tɔn kpo gblamɛ ɔ kpewu jɛ biblu xa mɛɖe ji
nɔ xoɖɛ do nu enɛ gbe nyinya wu a
jlo yi gbe nu enɛ tlɛ hwenu mɛ gege nɔ do mɔ gbɔjɛ hwenu lɛ e do a
jozafati yi eflayimu yikungban ji mɛ lɛ bonu lɛkɔ wa sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ kɔn gbɔn e ɖɔhun ɔ mi lɔ sixu yi mɛ ɖeɖee awakanmɛ gbɔjɔ lɛ e mɔ
ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ yi mɛ ɖeɖee e ɖe sin agun mɛ bɔ ɖo fi agun ɔ nɔ wa gbɔn lɛ e sixu lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn gudo lɛ e mɔ nɔ
hwenu ninɔmɛ gba hun do nu mɛ e ɖe wa kpannukɔn jozafati e ɔ e wa nu gbɔn
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ yi gbe nu ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ jozafati ɖɔhun
hu jozafati
e ɖɔ emi kan nu byɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ
ðo ɖɛ e xo e mɛ ɔ e eɖee hwe yi gbe ɖɔ togun emitɔn kun kpe nu ɖebu wu ɖo ahwan wɔbuwɔbu enɛ nukɔn o ɖɔ emi kpo togun emitɔn kpo kun tuun nu emi wa e o
e ɖeji do jehovah wu bi ɖɔ mi ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ɖɔ hwlɛn mi gan
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nu mi wa e sixu bu vo do mi bɔ tlɛ sixu hu mi jozafati ɖɔhun
xwedo tɔn lɛ sixu xwedo jozafati tɔn nɔ jehovah tɔn kpodo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo ba do ɖi xwi xa tagba mɛ ɖe lɛ e kpan
winnya hu ɖɔ xwedo towe se ɖɔ ɖo vo mɔhun lɛ sa wɛ o
mɔ ɖɔ ɖeji do jehovah wu
mawu jozafati e hwi
ezekiyasi ɖeji bi do mawu wu gbɔn
e eɖee jo nu jehovah bi ɖo e nɔ nyi mawu mavɔmavɔ do nu mɔyizi lɛ e bi axɔ
e tlɛ nyi hwenu asilii nyi acɛkpikpa ɖaxo bi ɖo ɔ mɛ hwenɛnu e wa ahwan judaa su kun do nu jeluzalɛmu e ɔ ezekiyasi ɖeji do jehovah wu kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo
e ɖo co ezekiyasi ɖɔ ji e ɖe do hlɔnhlɔn mɛhwlɛngan tɔn jehovah tɔn wu e ɖo ɖɛ mɛ
xa ezayii
mawu se ɖɛ tɔn wɛnsagun ɖokpo do hu asiliinu eza
sixu mawu ezekiyasi ɖɔhun gbɔn
nukɔnmɛ ɔ ezekiyasi wa jɛ azɔn ɖibla ku
e savo nu jehovah ɖɔ e flin emi wa nu gbɔn ɖo nukɔn tɔn e
xa axɔsu lɛ
mawuxowema ɔ mi ɖɔ mi kun ɖo hwenu mi sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ mawu blo nujiwu do gbɔ azɔn nu mi alo do azan azan ji nu mi e o
e ɖo co ezekiyasi ɖɔhun ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ nu jehovah ɖo ɖɛ mɛ ɖɔ nɔ gbeji ɖo nukɔn towe wa kpo ayi bi kpo
ɖi nu ɖɔ jehovah ɖo nuwukpikpe kpo jlo kpo kpe nukun do wu hwenu tlɛ ɖo azɔnzanji e a ðɛh
enyi mi tamɛ do ezekiyasi tɔn ji ɔ mi sixu mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo jo nu ɖo kancica ɖo mi kpo mawu kpo tɛntin hɛn gble wɛ e ɖe do alo jo nu ɖo ayi mitɔn sin sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ji wɛ e ɖe do
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi kun jlo wa nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ zan zunzun ɖo ɛntɛnɛti ji sin azɔwanu lɛ do lɛ do tɛn ɖe mɛ ci ɖɔ numɛsɛn wɛ nyi ɖɔhun e o
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe lɛ sixu ɖu vivi xa xwedo yetɔn alo yetɔn lɛ tɔn gbɔn nu mɔhun lɛ gblamɛ
mɛ gege ɖo ɔ mɛ nɔ zan nu e nɔ do zun ɖo ɛntɛnɛti ji lɛ e nyi do nɔ ɖo sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo tlɛ tuun a lɛ e xwedo wɛ
nɔ zan hwenu gege do fɔtoo mɛ mɔhun lɛ tɔn alo nɔ ɖo nu e wlan do mɛ mɔhun lɛ wu e xa wɛ
awovinu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ numaɖinu lɛ gbɛzinzan mɛtɔn mɛ
klisanwun ɖe tlɛ sixu yi go ɖo mɛ nabi yi wan nu nu e ɖo ɛntɛnɛti ji e wu tlɛ sixu sin xomɛ hwenu xwixwedo e e
mi sixu ɖɔ pɔlu alo akilasi kpo plisilu kpo hɛn alɔnu yetɔn jan ɖo fɔtoo lɛ do ɛntɛnɛti ji mɛ alo ɖo mɛ ɖo kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mɛ a e ɖe xwedo wɛ a
mi xa ɖɔ pɔlu jo eɖee do nu mawuxo ɖiɖɔ kɛɖɛ
bɔ akilasi kpo plisilu kpo zan hwenu yetɔn do tin mawu sin ali ɔ mɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nɔ nyi alɔ nu lɛ zize do mawu tɛnmɛ alo hwenu xɔ akwɛ gege zinzan do numaɖinu lɛ tamɛ a xa efɛzinu lɛ
ali tɛ lɛ jlo wa nu joziyasi ɖɔhun ɖe
axɔsu joziyasi vivuvivu ezekiyasi tɔn nyi jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo
hwenu e kpo ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ e jɛ mawu tɔn davidi ɔ sin jlo tuun ji bɔ hwenu e ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ e ɔ e jɛ vodun ɖo judaa lɛ e ɖe siin ji
xa
joziyasi ɖo kan do nu mawu nukunmɛ e wiwa wu hugan axɔsu judaa tɔn gege
e ɖo co hwenu e mɔ nu sixu nyi mɔyizi tɔn sin wema dodo ɔ xa nu joziyasi e ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo wa jlo mawu tɔn bi
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ jehovah
