wagbɔ tɔn ɔ togun ɔ lɛkɔ sin mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu yetɔn lɛ nɔ ɔ gudo co nu joziyasi zan wa ku a
joziyasi ɖɔhun ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo jɛ tonu se nu jehovah ji sin vu
axɔsu manasee lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo e nu joziyasi do nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn wu
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ emi sɛkpɔ mɛxomɔ ɖo xwedo mitɔn kpo agun ɔ kpo mɛ lɛ e do jehovah xomɛ do wu gbɔn e
ɔ flin ɖɔ mawuxowema ɔ xixa byɔ ayi mɛ nu joziyasi bɔ e ɛ wa nu sɔgbe e
xo mawu tɔn xixa sixu bɔ wa nu awajijɛ hɛn kpo mawu kpo tɔn syɛn e e bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ mawu
xa
biblu kpinkplɔn sixu bɔ ali sixu hɛn blo nu mawu wɛ ɖe e ɖe lɛ e wu
enyi wu hun wa nu joziyasi ɖɔhun
nu ɖokpo ɔ tɛ axɔsu ɛnɛ xo mi ɖɔ lɛ e wa
axɔsu judaa tɔn ɛnɛ jehovah kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo sin mi gbeje e hɛn le wa nu a
tlɛ wa hwenu aditi lɛ kpannukɔn e
ðo taji hu bi ɔ linlin bɔ jehovah e
mi mɔ gbɔn ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ e ɔ axɔsu ɛnɛ xo mi ɖɔ lɛ e bi wɛ wa nu nyi do
e ɖo co hwenu mɛ nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ ayi mɛ e gbeje e ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ emi kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo
wɛ mi lɔ nyi
ee jehovah ɖo mi gbeje wɛ e ɔ e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ mi ɖo emi wɛ kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo a
mi ɖɔ xo do xo enɛ wu ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
e wlan nu enɛ lɛ do nu mi ɖo hwenu mi ɖe din ɔ hwenu lɛ sin vivɔ sɛya kɔ
asa kpo jozafati kpo
etɛwu mi gbeje axɔsu judaa tɔn ɛnɛ sin
enyi mɔ bɔ mɛɖe ɖiɖi nu ɖo ali ɖe ji ɔ hwiɖee hwenu ɖo ali ɖokpo ɔ ji gbɔn wɛ e a ce
tamɛ linlin do nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ji sixu mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu nuwanyido ɖokpo ɔ lɛ
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nɔ nyi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
mi sixu nu gege do nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wu jɛ ɖeɖee e wlan do biblu mɛ lɛ e ji
axɔsu judaa tɔn ɛnɛ wu e ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ lɛ e jehovah kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo
e ɖo co wa nu syɛnsyɛn ɖe lɛ nyi do
etɛ nu gbo lɛ e sixu mi mi sixu nyi alɔ nu nuwanyido mɔhun ɖe gbɔn
tamɛ linlin do enɛ lɛ ji mi bɔ mi ɖu nu ɖeɖee e wlan xoxo nu mitɔn lɛ e sin le xa hlɔmanu lɛ
asa jehovah kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo co tagba tɛ e mɔ
etɛ sixu bɔ asa ɖeji do lɛ wu hwenu baeca huzu kpannukɔn judaa e
mi nu mi gbeje asa tɔn xo mawu tɔn sixu ali mi gbɔn e
asa ɖeji do jehovah wu hwenu etiopiinu livi ɖokpo wa tɔn ahwan judaa e hwenu baeca izlayɛli xɔsu ɔ jɛ ahoho do hlama sɛkpɔ ayikungban asa tɔn lɛ e ji e ɔ e ɖeji do jehovah wu a
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ ɔ asa ɖeji do nunywɛ eɖesunɔ tɔn wu do akwɛ nu axɔsu silii tɔn bɛni hadadi bonu e ahwan baeca
asa sin wlɛnwin kpa ɛ a
biblu ɖɔ ee baeca se ɔ e ɖo ahoho do hlama wɛ e ɖe ɔ ɖo wa wɛ e ɖe lɛ bi
e ci ɖɔ wlɛnwin asa tɔn ɖɔhun
nu enɛ asa wa e ɔ jehovah mɔ gbɔn
hanani ɖɔ enɛ wu ɔ ahwan wɛ jɛn nɔ ɖe
baeca lɛkɔ nugbo ahwanfunfun nɔ zɔ nu asa kpo togun tɔn kpo cobonu gan ɖuɖu tɔn fo a
mi mɔ gbɔn ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ e ɔ mawu gbeje ayi asa tɔn wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ e emi kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo axɔ
ðo mawu nukunmɛ ɔ asa eɖee jo e sɔgbe kpo nu wɛ e ɖe ɖo si e kpo
e ɖo co e ɖo sun xlonɔnu e wa e sin sin
hwenu asa kpe nu xa baeca e ɔ etɛ ɛ bɔ e ɖeji do lɛ wu e wɛ nyi bɛni hadadi kpo eɖesunɔ kpo nyi do jehovah wu a
e ɖɔ nuwiwa do gbe mɛ alo we ɖiɖe ahwanfunfun tɔn hu alɔdo biba ɖo jehovah gɔn wɛ a
mɛɖe wɛ ɛ nu nyanya wɛ bɔ e nu gbɔn a
etɛ nuwanyido asa tɔn sixu mi
asa tɔn mi bɔ mi gbeje mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn e a
hwenu tagba sixu ci nu hugan mi lɛ e ɖɔhun kpannukɔn mi e ɔ e sixu bɔwu bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo ɖeji do jehovah wu
hwenu mi ɖo ɖi xwi xa tagba hwe hu lɛ e ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e ɔ etɛ mi nɔ wa
linlin lɛ tɔn wɛ mi nɔ xwedo nɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ miɖesunɔ gbɔn e a
alo mi nɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ xwedo do gbɔn ɖɔ mi ɖeji do jehovah nɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ gbɔn e wu wɛ a
ði ɔ xwedo towe sixu klan gbe xa do kple lɛ yiyi alo ɖe yiyi wu hweɖelɛnu
byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e ali emi emi bonu emi mɔ nukunnu jɛ emi sixu ɖeɖɛ tagba ɔ ɖo alixo hugan e mɛ gbɔn e
enyi gble do bɔ ɖevo mimɔ vɛwu nu ɔ
hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ xa mɛ sixu yi do e ɖe wɛ e ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kpo ɖo kple lɛ yi wɛ ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ a
etɛ lɛ jozafati wa nyi do etɛ mɛ kɔ do
jozafati vi sunnu asa tɔn ɔ
e ɖo jujɔ ɖagbe gege
ðo jozafati ɖeji do jehovah wu wutu ɔ e wa ɖagbe gege
e ɖo co e wa gbeta xlonɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn
ði ɔ e jɛ akɔ xa akabu axɔsu nyanya axɔsuɖuto totaligbe tɔn ɔ tɔn gbɔn alɔwliwli gblamɛ
gbeyiɖɔ micee nu jozafati co e yi nu akabu bɔ yi ahwan xa siliinu lɛ
ðo ahwangbenu ɔ kpɛɖe wɛ kpo bɔ e hu jozafati
enɛ gudo ɔ e lɛkɔ wa jeluzalɛmu
enɛ wu ɔ gbeyiɖɔ kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ etɛwu wɛ yi alɔ nu
e yi wan nu mɛ wan nu mawu mavɔmavɔ lɛ wɛ a xa
nu enɛ nu jozafati a
e kpo ɖo biba wɛ mawu nukunmɛ co e ci ɖɔ nu gbo e ɖo xa akabu mɛ e kpo akpagbanumɛ tɔn kpo kun nu o ɖɔhun
jozafati jɛ akɔ xlonɔ tɔn ɖevo
din tɔn ɔ e kpo akabu sin vi akaziasi nyi mawu tɔn e kpo wɛ
jozafati kpo akaziasi kpo ɖo gbe blo tɔjihun ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ tɔjihun lɛ gba sixu yi tomɛ jlo gbɔn e a
nyanya dido sixu wa nu do gbɛzan mitɔn bi wu gbɔn
jozafati tɔn lɛ xixa ɖo mi bɔ mi gbeje gbɛzan miɖesunɔ tɔn
axɔsu ɖagbe wɛ jozafati nyi
e wa nu e mawu mavɔmavɔ kpo ayixa tɔn bi kpo
e ɖo co nyanya lɛ dido gɔn nu wa do wu tɔn a
ðo ali ɖe ɔ mi sixu ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ lɛ bonu wa nugbo ɔ mɛ
ɖo dandan a e bɔ jozafati do xa akabu e ɖibla dɔn ku wa
ɖokpo ɔ awovinu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi do ɖo dandan e xa mɛ nɔ jehovah a lɛ e
etɛ jozafati tɔn sixu mi do alɔwliwli wu
hwenu nyanya lɛ dido sin tagba wa kpannukɔn mi e ɔ etɛ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ
nunywɛ e tɛ mi sixu ɖo nu gbo jozafati e mɛ
klisanwun ɖe sixu jɛ wan yi nu mɛ nɔ jehovah a e ɖe ji ɖɔ e kun sixu mɔ asu alo asi jɛxa mɛ e ɖo klisanwun nugbo lɛ mɛ o
alo hɛnnumɔ klisanwun ɖe tɔn lɛ sixu ɖo cɔcɔ do wɛ ɖɔ e wli alɔ cobonu hwenu din
hu ɔ mɛɖe lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo wanyiyi kpo zunzun kpo tɔn nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖɔ gbɔn e ɖɔhun
etɛ klisanwun ɖe ɖo wa
tamɛ linlin do nu gbo jozafati e ji sixu mɛ
e nɔ mawu tɔn hwɛhwɛ
etɛ jɛ hwenu jozafati do xa akabu yi wan nu jehovah a e
jozafati hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ mɛ ayi yetɔn bi jo nu jehovah e wɛ e ɖe
ðo egbe ɖesu ɔ nukun mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ bi ji bɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
e mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ mitɔn mɛ yi wan nu mi
ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu su wanyiyi kpo zunzun kpo sin hudo ɖo e sin do ɖo ali jɛmɛ nu e a
kanɖeji ɖɔ e wa ɖo hwetɔnnu
hwiɖee do awovinu ɖe dida nyi e wu akpaxwe ɔ
ezekiyasi ɖe nu ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ e gbɔn
etɛ ɖe xomɛsin mawu tɔn sin ezekiyasi ji
nu ezekiyasi tɔn sixu mi e kunkpla ayi
hwenu ezekiyasi jɛ azɔn syɛnsyɛn e ɔ mawu ɛ kunnuɖenu ɖe ɖɔ azɔn tɔn xwɛ e wɛ nyi yɛtɛn wa yi gudo e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nujiwu enɛ wu kan nu byɔ do gbe wɛ mɛ babilɔnu tɔn lɛ e
xlonɔnu enɛ ezekiyasi wa e ɖe nu ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ e bi
biblu ɖɔ nu bɔ ezekiyasi sin ayi wa huzu sin ayi e le tawun a
ðu e ɖu ɖo asiliinu lɛ ji e alo azɔn tɔn gbɔ gbɔn nujiwu gblamɛ e wu wɛ a
ðo e jɛ dɔkun ɖesu xɔ tawun e wu wɛ a
ðebu wɛ e nyi ɔ ɖo e huzu wutu ɔ ɖagbe mawu mavɔmavɔ wa nu ezekiyasi e ɔ e tuun a
e blawu ɖesu
ezekiyasi sixu savo nu mawu ɖɔ emi ɛ kpo ayi emitɔn bi kpo co nu hwenu ɖe ɔ e wa nu mawu nukunmɛ a e
hwetɛnu jehovah sixu ɖo mi jo do wɛ do do mi
nu mi wa nuɖe bɔ e kpa mi ɔ mi yi gbe nu kpa e kpa mi e gbɔn
mi sixu ɖu ezekiyasi tɔn xixa kpo tamɛ linlin kpo tɔn sin le gbɔn
egbe ɔ enyi mi wa nu kpligidi ɖe ɔ e sixu nyi ɖɔ jo wɛ jehovah ɖo mi jo do wɛ do do mi bonu nu ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ e do jɛ we a
e yi gbe nu kpa e kpa ɛ e gbɔn
fi elɔ ɔ ezekiyasi tɔn sixu nu mi
fi goyiyi tɔn ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖagbe mawu mavɔmavɔ wa nu ezekiyasi e ɔ e tuun a
tamɛ linlin do nu tobutobu mawu wa nu mi lɛ e ji mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu jijɔ jehovah wan lɛ e
mi sixu ɖɔ ɖagbe jehovah wa nu mi e sin xo
etɛwu joziyasi alɔcyɔnmɛji jehovah tɔn kpo tɔn kpo kpo
din ɔ akpagbanumɛ tɛ mi sixu mɔ ɖo nu jɛ do axɔsu ɖagbe joziyasi wu e mɛ
tamɛ do nu wu e ci ahwan ku e ji xa
ejipu xɔsu nɛko ɖɔ nu joziyasi ɖɔ emi kun kpe nuɖe xa ɛ o co joziyasi yi gbo ali
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ xo nɛko ɖɔ lɛ e ɔ mawu gɔn wɛ gosin
aniwu joziyasi tɔn yi ahwan
biblu ɖɔ a
joziyasi sixu blo gbɔn tuun ɖɔ nu nɛko ɖɔ e gosin jehovah nugbo
e wlan do fi ɖe ɖɔ e wa a
ɔ kaakemici wɛ nɛko tunta
alo xwe ɖevo nwt yi ahwan xa wɛ e ɖe e nyi jeluzalɛmu a
hu ɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn wɛ ɖo atɛ ji a ɖo nu ɖe ɖɔ nɛko ɖo jehovah alo togun tɔn zun wɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ gbeta nyanya kɔn wɛ joziyasi wa ɖɔ emi ahwan xa nɛko
nukplɔnmɛ ɖe ɖo fi nu mi a
hwenu tagba ɖe kpannukɔn mi e ɔ e ɖɔ mi do nu linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ do ninɔmɛ ɔ wu
hwenu tagba ɖe wa e ɔ mi sixu nyi alɔ nu nu joziyasi wa nyi do e ɖɔhun wiwa gbɔn
enyi tagba ɖe wa ɔ mi ɖo tamɛ do nugbododo biblu tɔn kunkpla ninɔmɛ ɔ e wu xwedo kpo jlɛjininɔ kpo
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu alɔdo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ tɔn
mi sixu tamɛ do nu mi tuun do xo ɔ wu e ji tlɛ sixu do nu nuɖe lɛ ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ
e ɖo co nugbododo ɖevo lɛ sixu ɖe bɔ mi ɖo zan bɔ mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe sixu mi bɔ mi gbeje
mɛ
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ e blo tuto yi kunnuɖegbe gbe ɖokpo bɔ asu tɔn nyi klisanwun a e ɖɔ e nɔ xwegbe
e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun zan hwenu gege do ɖo azanvi elɔ lɛ mɛ o ɖɔ emi jlo ɖɔ emi mɛ we lɛ wa nuɖe do asu kpo asi kpo ɖɔhun
nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ sixu tamɛ do wemafɔ biblu tɔn taji ɖe lɛ ji ɖi ee ɖɔ xo do tonusise nu mawu wu kpo ee ɖɔ xo do nu kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu wu e kpo ji
alo e ɖo byɔbyɔ ɛ wɛ ɖɔ e wa nuɖe gbe enɛ gbe kpowun
mi ɖo nɔ ji hwenu mi ɖo biba wɛ wa jlo mawu tɔn ɖo ayixa e
sixu ɖu axɔsu ɛnɛ ɖeɖee wu mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn sin le gbɔn
ðo mi nyi wutu ɔ e sixu wa jɛ bɔ mi hu hwɛ ɖeɖee axɔsu ɛnɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do wa yi lɛ e hu e
mi sixu jɛ ji ɖe do wu ji ɖo manywɛ mɛ jɛ nyanya do ji jɛ goyi ji jɛ gbeta lɛ kɔn wa ji to do nu nu mawu e
jehovah xomɛ tawun nɔ mɔ ɖagbe ɖo mi mɛ e mɔ gbɔn ɖo axɔsu ɛnɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ gbɔn e ɖɔhun
jehovah nɔ mɔ mi yi wan e kpo akpakpa nɔ mi bonu mi ɛ e kpo
enɛ wu ɔ e mi akpagbanumɛ tɔn ɖeɖee mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ huhu e
mi nu mi tamɛ do biblu tɔn enɛ lɛ ji doku nu jehovah ɖɔ e mi
sin xwe ɖie wɛ gianni kpo maurizio kpo nyi
ɖo hweɖenu ɔ yetɔn ɖibla gble
maurizio tinmɛ ɖɔ ðo hwenu vɛwu ɖe mɛ ɔ wa nu syɛnsyɛn ɖe nyi do bɔ mi jɛ zɔzɔ gbɔn nu miɖee lɛ ji
gianni ɖɔ ɖɔ maurizio wɛ biblu xa mi hwenu jɛ nu ji e
e huzu sosyɛn ɖe nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
enɛ wu ɔ sixu ɖi ɖɔ e wa nu e wa e a
flu bi ɖo tuun ɖɔ mi kun sixu nyi o
mɔ ɖɔ kun ɖo mɛɖe o
nu xɔ akwɛ wɛ ɖagbe lɛ ɖiɖo nyi bɔ zunzun nɔ nɔ ayi yi e nɔ nyi nu kpe do nu nu kpowun a
enyi nuɖe jlo klan lɛ ɔ etɛ e sixu wa bɔ e jɛ a
mɛ xo biblu ɖɔ bɔ nyi jɔ bɔ yetɔn ɖibla gble lɛ e sin sixu nu gege mi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ davidi nyi nyi axɔsu e ɖo ɖagbe gege
davidi ɖo ɖevo lɛ ɖi gbeyiɖɔ nataan
biblu ɖɔ hwenu yetɔn e le a
e ɖo co hweɖenu ɔ davidi ɖɔ xomɛ nu nataan sixu ɖɔ nu ɖe gbɔn e ɖɔhun
davidi jlo gba xɔ ɖe nu jehovah
nu nataan e xɔ akwɛ ɖo davidi nukunmɛ ɖo e nyi tɔn nyi nya ji gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn ɖe e ɖe wutu
nuɖe jɛ nyi e ɖo axɔ
axɔsu davidi gbe nu bɛtisabe bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e bɔ e hu asu tɔn ulii
din ɔ e do nu baɖabaɖa enɛ sin
etɛwu axɔsu ɖagbe enɛ wa
e sixu mɔ nu jɛ nu e wa e syɛn sɔ e wu a wɛ a
e vɛdo ɖɔ emi hwla nu emi wa e do mawu wɛ sin a
nataan wa nu gbɔn
e gbɔ bɔ mɛ ɖevo yi ɖɔ xo ɔ nu axɔsu ɔ wɛ a
mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɔ nu jɛ davidi blo tuto bɔ e hu ulii gbɔn e wu
bɔ etɛwu nataan kɛnu hɛn nyi sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie e gble
nataan tlɛ sixu tɔn ɖo axɔ enyi e kɛnu ɔ nɛ
e ɖɔ lɔ ɔ davidi bɔ e hu ulii nyi xomɛvɔnɔ e
mawu tɔn ɖe wɛ nataan nyi
gbeyiɖɔ ɔ tuun ɖɔ enyi emi ci xwii ɔ kancica emi kpo davidi kpo tɔn kun ci e ci gbɔn e o bɔ ayixa emitɔn ɖesu xo hun xa emi
tɔn davidi wli ali jehovah nukun mɛ a e ɖe
axɔsu ɔ ɖo alɔdo sin hudo tawun do jla kancica ɖo e kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e ɖo
davidi ɖo jɔ ɖe sin hudo nugbo
nataan wɛ nyi mɔhun
e zan nujlɛdonuwu ɖe do ɖɔ xo ɔ sixu byɔ ayi mɛ nu xoxo ɔ
nataan do wɛn mawu tɔn ɔ ɖo ali ɖe bɔ e davidi mɔ nuwanyido tɔn lɛ syɛn sɔ e bɔ enɛ ɛ wa nuɖe
enyi towe ɖe wa nuɖe nyi do alo hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɔ etɛ wa
sixu ɖɔ enyi emi ɖɔ xo do nu e wa e wu ɔ mitɔn gble
alo sixu mɔ ɖɔ enyi emi yi ɖɔ nu nyanya e wa e nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖo wɛ sixu ɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo wutu ɔ emi kun nɔ gbeji nu kancica ɖo hwi kpo e kpo tɛntin e o
etɛ wa
gianni xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e flin ɖɔ wu ɖɔ nuɖe jɛ
maurizio nɔ ɖɔ xomɛ nu mi e nɔ ɖɔ gbɔn e a
e vɛwu nu mi tawun co wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ xo do nu jɛ e wu
nɔ kanbyɔ nyiɖee ɖɔ etɛ sixu ɖɔ din bɔ e tuun a
xomɛ sin tawun mɛ
flin flin nu ɖeɖee mi ɖo lɛ e mi hlɔnhlɔn bɔ yi ɖɔ xo
maurizio wa nu ɖokpo ɔ xa mi hwenu ɖo hudo alɔdo tɔn e
ɖɔ mitɔn gble a loɔ jlo ɛ ɖo nu tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
maurizio ɖɔ xojɔxo wɛ gianni ɖɔ bɔ nu e ɖɔ e sɔgbe
enɛ wu ɔ yi gbe nu we mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖe xa mi e bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ wa mɔ nyiɖee mɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
davidi ɖo ɖevo lɛ bɔ nɔ gudo kpo gbejininɔ kpo hwenu e ɖo mɛ e
hucayi biblu do gesi ɖɔ e nyi davidi e nyi ɖokpo ɖo mɔhun lɛ mɛ
hwenu davidi vi abusalɔmu xo axɔsuzinkpo ɔ yi e ɔ izlayɛli vi gege jɛ abusalɔmu ji hucayi wa a
hwenu davidi ɖo hinhɔn wɛ e ɔ hucayi xwedo e
e nu davidi tawun ɖo vi eɖesunɔ tɔn kpo tɔn wu e ɖeji do tawun lɛ e ɖe lɛ kpo ɖu kpa wutu
hucayi nɔ gbeji ɖo gbesisɔmɛ tɔn ɖo axɔ wa ɖe gbe bibla ɔ gba e ɖe
e nyi ɖɔ hucayi nɔ wa ɖo hɔn ɔ mɛ wu kpowun wutu wɛ e wa ɔ a e wa ɔ e ɖɔ emi nyi ɖe
vovo wɛ nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔ wa ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɖo egbe co bu ɖe ɖo wanyiyi mɛ e nɔ hun xomɛ nu mɛ
gbɔn nuwiwa yetɔn gblamɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ nyi towe ɖo ɖo nyi wutu wɛ a nyi towe ɖo xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mɛ wutu wɛ
nɔvi sunnu federico mɔ nugbo nu xo enɛ
tɔn antonio ɛ ɖu ɖo ɖe lɛ ji wa yi ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
federico ɖɔ hwenu antonio sɛtɛn wa agun mitɔn mɛ e ɔ e cobɔ mi huzu a
mi mɛ we lɛ bi wɛ nyi tɔn lɛ bɔ wiwa ɖo nɔ vivi nu mi
e nɔ zaan e ɔ e nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe
e nyi kɛɖɛ wɛ e nyi a e nyi ɖe nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
enɛ gudo ɔ federico ɖe afɔ nyi do
e alɔdo tlolo ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e jɛxa nyi gbexosin alo tɔn a
antonio wa nu gbɔn
hwenu federico ɖo mɛ e ɔ tɔn antonio ɖoto e do wusyɛn lanmɛ
federico flin ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ antonio se xa mi
e wa nu wu e kpe e bi do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
jɛ ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn e ɖu ayi mɛ tawun e jo mi do a
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ ma vɔ hlɔnhlɔn mɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo jo gbe o
antonio tinmɛ ɖɔ zan hwenu gege xa federico
jlo ɖɔ e vo ɖɔ xo xa mi do nu ɖebu wu jɛ se wɛ e ɖe e ji
awajijɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ federico mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo wa nyi gbexosin kpo tɔn kpo ɖo nukɔnmɛ
antonio su ɖɔ mi mɛ we lɛ bi ɖo agun vovo mɛ din co mi hu tɔn
nu nɔ nu mɛ hu mɔ e kpiti a
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ kɛ ɛ a
kancica mɛ we lɛ tɔn sixu syɛn e ɖe gbɔn e ɖɔhun a
e kpo tɔn lɛ kpo zan hwenu gege ɖo bɔ ɖesu
nu wu jezu nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ tɔn lɛ e nɛ
jaan e ɖo co etɛ jɛ hwenu e wli e
lɛ hɔn
ɖɔ gannaganna ɖɔ emi kun jo emitɔn do gbeɖe o zan enɛ mɛ ɔ ɖɔ emi kun tuun jezu gbeɖe o
jezu tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo kpannukɔn mɛtɛnkpɔn emitɔn gudogudo tɔn ɔ emiɖokponɔ gee
e ɖo co hwɛjijɔ wu e mɔ ɖɔ e flu emi e ɖe
xo e ɖɔ ɖo xa ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖo azan yɔywɛ ɖe ɖo sin ku tɔn gudo e ɖebu ɖɔ e flu e mɔ alo ɖɔ e ɖe a
jezu ɖɔ emi jɛ nu ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ wa nyi do lɛ e jɛ ee wa nyi do ɖo zan mɛ e wli lɛ e ji xa ji a
e wa ɔ jezu do gbɔ nu kpo ɖe lɛ kpo
e lɛ do mɛkplɔnkplɔn tɔn hugan bi ɖo hwenuxo lɛ tɔn mɛ e ji do ɖɔ emi ɖeji do wu
wɛ lɛ kpo ɖo nyinyi wɛ nu jezu
nugbo ɔ wa e nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ e kpo ɖuɖeji kpo mɛ
hwɛ tɔn jɔ bonu e sin xomɛ
nu kpaca mi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu jijɔ lɛ ji lɛ e kpo nu nyɛɖesunɔ tɔn kpo wɛ ɖu ayi mɛ hugan
ayi e ɖo nu nyanya wa e ji a ɖo nu nu enɛ hɛn gble do ji e nɔ su nukun mɛ tɛgbɛ
doku nu jehovah ɖɔ ɖo nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ hugan nu nɔ e e
e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖɔ xo kpo kpo do nujɔnu mɛ hwenu e byɔ ɖo e
enɛ ci nataan kpo hucayi kpo ɖɔhun tlɛ nɔ gbeji ɖo hwenu nyanya lɛ mɛ ci jezu ɖɔhun e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwɛ kɛ mɛ
hwexonu tɔn sin xwɛ ɖo xwe bɔ e kun sin do mɛ ɖo e ɖe dɔn lɛ sin ayi ɖo azanvi elɔ lɛ mɛ
etɛ jiwu ɖo nu enɛ e mɔ e mɛ
e nyi xwɛ lɛ ɖesu wɛ a nu e wlan do ji e wɛ jiwu
azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ dokunkun tɔn lɛ mɔ nyikɔ enɛ ɖo nuwlanwlan hwexonu tɔn lɛ mɛ nɛ
e ɖɔ ɛcibaalu ɖevo xo ɖo biblu mɛ e nyi ɖokpo ɖo axɔsu sawulu sin vi lɛ mɛ
akɔwe yosef garfinkel ɖo dokunkun ɔ mɛ e ɖɔ akpakpa mɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e mɔ nyikɔ ɛcibaalu ɔ ɖo biblu mɛ mɔ ɖo dobanunu dokunkun tɔn sin hwenuxo mɛ din ɖo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɖo axɔsu davidi hwenu
mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖɔ hwenu bunɔ enɛ mɛ jɛn e zan nyikɔ enɛ ɖe
azɔn ɖevo ɔ nu dobanunu lɛ e so nu nu ɖo biblu mɛ e ɖe
ðo aniwutu
akpa do ɔ ðe
akpa nabi do nu jehovah
ɖɔ emi ɖo nu wu emi kpe e bi wa wɛ ba zan sɔgbe xa a
mɛɖee zize jo nu jehovah sin akpa towe alo alɔwliwli sin akpa towe lo
xota elɔ flin mi ɖagbe jɛfutee kpo kpo nu mi e hwenu mi ɖo gan do wɛ ba ɖe akpa mi do nu jehovah lɛ e kpo gbejininɔ kpo e
etɛ lɛ wa yi hwenu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wa e
hwɛhwɛ ɔ mi nɔ nu do nu jehovah mi ɖo palaɖisi mɛ lɛ e ji ɖo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ayi do nu e ɖe siin lɛ e ji
tamɛ linlin do xosin ɔ ji hlɔnhlɔn nuɖiɖi mitɔn kpo kan mi kanɖeji ba dɛ e kpo
gbɛzan tɔn kudeji nyi klisu tɔn ðe
ɔ bi tɔn nɔ wa nu jlɔjlɔ hwebinu
ðo linlin jehovah nɔ ðo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e a
hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ e wa nu agɔ xa mi alo mɔ bɔ e jɛ do mɛ ɖevo wu e ɔ nuɖiɖi mitɔn mɛɖesɔhwe mitɔn kpo gbejininɔ mitɔn kpo sixu gbɔn tɛnkpɔn mɛ
xota elɔ lɛ gbeje biblu tɔn mi bɔ mi ɖo linlin jehovah tɔn do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e atɔn
nu linlin mɛɖee zize jo tɔn towe kpa nu jehovah
jehovah ɖo hudo nu ɖebu tɔn a xomɛ nɔ hun nɔ ɖo ayi jlo ɖaxo mi ɖo ba nɔ gudo nu e nyi e wu
lɛ wemata kpo kpo e nɔ su nukun jehovah tɔn mɛ gbɔn hwenu mi jlo do xwedo tɔn zawe e e
elɔ ɔ wiwa yi wɛ e ɖe bɔ mɛ nɔ blo jlo elɔ tɔn lɛ lɔ ɖo wiwa yi wɛ mɛ nɔ blo jlo mawu tɔn ɔ nɔ sɔyi jaan
etɛ jehovah wa nu mɛ nyanya lɛ kpo tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e kpo
jehovah ɖe nyanya lɛ kpo ninɔmɛ blawu lɛ kpo sin ayikungban ɔ ji gbɔn
sixu wa gbɔn kpo ɖo hwenu nyanya elɔ wa yi e
ali tɛ e sixu elɔ do e ɖo hwɛ e wu ɖe
ɖiɖe ɖo e nu ci nu mɛ lɛ hwenu e vɔ elɔ gudo e
mɛkuku ðo zɔnlin ði wɛ
e se xosusu enɛ hwenu e kpla baɖabaɖa ɖe sin gankpa mɛ e ɖe su ganhɔn ɔ gudo e
etɛwu mɛ ɖo ɛ wɛ e ɖɔ
lanmɛ nya ɔ tɔn ɖo ganji e ɖo azɔn ɖe jɛ wɛ bonu e xo tɔn yi a
fi e hu ɖe e wɛ mɛ ɖo ɛ wɛ e kpla ɛ xwe
enɛ e ɖo hwɛ e nyi mɛkuku do
ðo ali ɖe ɔ elɔ ci dawe enɛ e xwe huhu gbe e ɖɔhun
e lin din bɔ e ɖo hwɛ nu nyanya elɔ bɔ hwenu e wa nu tɔn do e sɛkpɔ
biblu ɖɔ elɔ ɔ wiwa yi wɛ e ɖe
jaan elɔ ɖo vɔ dandan
vogbingbɔn taji ɖe ɖo elɔ sin vivɔ kpo ɔ sin ku kpo tɛntin
nu e ja ɔ hu gbe ɔ mɛɖe lɛ sixu gu mɛɖe lɛ sixu mɔ xo ɖɔ do hwɛ e ɖo e wu alo ɖo nukun ɖɔ e nɔte nu hwenu ɖe cobo hu
e nɔte ɖebu cobo vɔ elɔ alo xo nu ɖɔ e ɖɔ hwɛ ɔ ɖo jlɔjlɔ ji a ji a
hwenu e vɔ elɔ gudo e ɔ nuɖiɖo nɔ tamɛ ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi yi gbe kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo ɖɔ hwɛ enɛ e ɖɔ e sɔgbe
mɛ bi tɔn jɛ do
nu ɛnɛ wa yi hwenu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wa e tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
etɛ lɛ ɖo elɔ ɖo wiwa yi wɛ e mɛ
wɛn nyanya ɖe wɛ wɛn enɛ nyi a
ðebu lɔ a
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi ɖɔ xo do nu wa yi hwenu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wa lɛ e ji
mi gbeje nu taji ɛnɛ nyanya lɛ tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e nu nyanya lɛ kpo ninɔmɛ blawu lɛ kpo
ðo hwenu mi jɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ji e ɔ mi gbeje nu atɔn elɔ lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi wu gbɔn ɖo egbe e nu jehovah blo nu e kpo e nu tawun lɛ e do ɖyɔ gbɔn e kpo
ali tɛ lɛ mɛ nyanya lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi wu ɖe
mɛ nyanya lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi wu gbɔn din
xo enɛ lɛ e ɖɔ e ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo egbe a
nyanya lɛ ɖi lɛ makpoto lɛ kpo dove lɛ e kpo wa nu do gege mitɔn wu
nu miɖesunɔ tlɛ jɛ alɔ mɛ nyanya enɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ a ɔ nɔ wa nu do mi wu
enyi mi se nu nyanya dosin lɛ e ɔ e nɔ ayixa mitɔn
ali mɛ nyanya lɛ nɔ doya nu yɔkpɔvu lɛ mɛxo lɛ kpo mɛmaɖomɛɖe lɛ kpo ɖe e nɔ bɔ xɛsi nɔ ɖi mi tawun
awajijɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ xo jehovah tɔn nukunɖiɖo ɖe ɖo nukɔn nu mi
ali tɛ kpo ɖo hunhun nu mɛ nyanya lɛ
etɛ jɛ do mɛ nyanya ɖyɔ a lɛ e wu gbɔn gudo
etɛ jehovah wa
din ɔ jehovah ɖo ali hun nu mɛ nyanya lɛ wɛ bonu huzu
elɔ wɛ e ɖo hwɛ
bɔ mɛ ɖeɖee huzu a kpo ɖo gudo nu elɔ jɛ hwenu ɖaxo ɔ lɛ e lo
jehovah ɖɔ emi ɖe mɛ nyanya lɛ sin ayikungban ɔ ji sɔyi xa ðɛhan
mɛ nyanya lɛ sixu ɖɔ emi xo glo hwɛɖonumɛ enɛ
loɔ biblu flin mi ɖɔ mawu nɔ mɔ zan gbɔn wɛ mɛ bi ɖe ɔ nukun tɔn ɖo afɔ ɖe wɛ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖe ɔ wu
nu ɖebu nɔ nɔ hwlahwla do jehovah mawu a
ɖebu sixu ɛ a zinflu ɖebu sixu do bɔ nuwukpikpe nu mimɔ tɔn mawu tɔn ɖo dogbo a e gɔn nu lɛ tɔn mɔ a
haamagedɔni gudo ɔ mi sixu fi mɛ nyanya lɛ nɔ nɔ e loɔ mi mɔ a
tiin a sɔyi ðɛh
mɛ ɖetɛ lɛ nɔ mɛ nyanya lɛ sin tɛnmɛ
etɛwu enɛ nyi wɛnɖagbe ɖe
jehovah wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn elɔ ayikungban ɔ nyi mɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe lɛ tɔn bɔ fifa ɖo dogbo mɔ ɔ wɛ nyi nu nɔ vivi nu e
ðo ɖɛhan ɖokpo enɛ mɛ ɔ mi xa ɖɔ ayikungban ɔ nyi hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ tɔn bɔ nɔ ji sɔyi ðɛh
nyi mɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe lɛ e kpo hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ kpo
ðo egbe tɔn mɛ ɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ ɖebu ɖo mɛ nyanya lɛ kpa a
ɖo ja e mɛ ɔ mɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe lɛ e kpo hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ kpo hwe alo hu mɛ nyanya lɛ a kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi mɛ ɖo lɛ e
nugbo ɔ mɛ mɔhun lɛ blo bɔ ayikungban ɔ nyi palaɖisi ɖe
tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e nɔ wa nu do mi wu gbɔn ɖo egbe
tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e nɔ wa nu do mi wu gbɔn din
gege nu nyanya ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo elɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn nɔ sin lɛ wu a tutoblonunu lɛ wu wɛ nɔ sin
ði ɔ tamɛ do tutoblonunu sinsɛn tɔn ɖeɖee flu livi mɔkpan do mɛ alɔkpa mawu nyi e biblu nyi wema ɖe gbɔn e sɔgudo ɖo ayikungban ɔ kpo lɛ kpo e nu xota gege ɖevo lɛ wu e ji
bɔ acɛkpikpa ɖeɖee nɔ ahwan kpo adakaxixo akɔ ɖevo lɛ wu kpo su nɔ doya nu lɛ kpo mɛmaɖomɛɖe lɛ kpo nɔ ɖo dɔkun jɛ wɛ ɖo nuɖuɖonumɛ kpo e ɖe mɛ ɖe ɖo vo nu mɛ ɖe wu lɛ e kpo lo
bɔ nɔ hɛn ayi ji mi ɖe e bli nɔ ɖu ayidɔkun lɛ nɔ do nukunnumamɔjɛnumɛ axisinɔ lɛ tɔn wu bɔ mɛ kpɛɖe nɔ jɛ dɔkun hwenu livi mɔkpan ɖo mɛ lɛ e lo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ tutoblonunu ɖeɖee nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e wɛ tawun bɔ kpe ɔ mɛ egbe
sɔgbe kpo nu biblu ɖɔ e kpo ɔ etɛ jɛ do tutoblonunu ɖeɖee lido ɖo lɛ sin nukunmɛ egbe e wu
e su kun do nu tutoblonunu sinsɛn tɔn enɛ lɛ bi
bɔ tutoblonunu ɖevo ɖeɖee nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e bi lo
biblu nɔ zan so lɛ kpo tɔtɛntinto lɛ kpo do do gesi tutoblonunu lido ɖo lɛ sin nukunmɛ egbe e gege xa
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ acɛkpikpa lɛ kpo tutoblonunu ɖo acɛ yetɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo bi wɛ e hɔn ɖɔ
enɛ gudo ɔ tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e ɖebu ɖe a
etɛwu mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ e to nu lɛ ganji ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji
etɛ jɛ tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e sin tɛnmɛ
tutoblonunu ɖe kpo ɖo ayikungban ji ɖo haamagedɔni gudo a
jinukunsin xoxo ɔ kpo ayikungban xoxo ɔ kpo ee nyi acɛkpikpa ɖeɖee nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e kpo ɖo acɛ yetɔn glɔ lɛ e kpo wa yi
etɛ jɛ tɛn yetɔn mɛ
jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ acɛkpikpa ɖe tiin kpa acɛ do kplekple lɛ tɔn nɔ ayikungban ji e
enɛ wu ɔ e to nu lɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji
klisu kpo mɛ xa ɛ lɛ e kpo ali
do nukun mɛ hwenu tutoblonunu ɖokpo ɖo bu nɔ ɖu ahizi a e jɛ tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e sin tɛnmɛ e
nyanya lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi wu gbɔn din
mi ɖo ayikungban ji nunyanyawiwa e ɖe
nublibliwiwa nugbomaɖɔ kpo adakaxixo kpo elɔ mɛ
ðo taji ɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo gan do wɛ hwɛhwɛ cyɔn alɔ vi yetɔn lɛ ji sin nunyanyawiwa enɛ lɛ si
klisanwun nugbo lɛ nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa linlin mɔhun a
nɔ nɔ nya xɛ ɖo gbejininɔ yetɔn ji ɖo nɔ sisimaɖo nu nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ su e mɛ
etɛ hwɛ jehovah ɖo nu sodɔmu kpo kpo e mi
etɛ jehovah wa nu nyanya lɛ
nunyanyawiwa do nya lɔti kpo xwedo tɔn kpo e bɔ e mɔ tawun
hwenu jehovah su kun do nu toxo ɔ blebu e ɔ e nyi nunyanyawiwa kɛɖɛ wɛ e ɖo nu a
e nu ɖo jɛ do mɛdida wa lɛ ji wɛ ɔ sin ɖokpo
jehovah ɖo nu nublibliwiwa lɛ bi gbɔn ɖo hwenɛnu e ɔ jɛn e ɖo nu nunyanyawiwa lɛ gbɔn ɖo egbe hwenu e ɖo hwɛ nu nyanya elɔ e nɛ
tɛ lɛ ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ hwenu xoxo elɔ wa yi e
etɛ jɛ nyanya lɛ tɛnmɛ
nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mɛ lɛ e palaɖisi ɔ mɛ
tamɛ do akpakpa mɛ tɔn ɖeɖee mi wa blo bɔ ayikungban ɔ huzu palaɖisi e alo xɔ miɖesunɔ tɔn kpo mitɔn lɛ tɔn mi gba lɛ e kpo ji
bɔ awajijɛ mitɔn jɛji bɔ e kpa nu jehovah e gbɛzan mitɔn
ninɔmɛ blawu tɛ mɛ sataan adamu kpo ɛvu kpo tɔn kɔ do ɖo egbe
ninɔmɛ wubla tɔn lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi wu gbɔn din
mɛ nyanya lɛ tutoblonunu nɔ ɖu ahizi lɛ e kpo nyanya lɛ kpo bi nɔ bɔ ninɔmɛ wubla tɔn lɛ nɔ tiin ɖo ayikungban elɔ ji
ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi bi wu
nu gu mɛ nyanya atɔn sataan adamu kpo ɛvu kpo do jehovah ji e dɔn wa tlɔlɔ e wɛ nyi enɛ lɛ
mi mɛɖebu sixu xo glo nu mɛ yetɔn kɔ do lɛ e a
etɛ jehovah wa nu ninɔmɛ blawu lɛ
etɛ jehovah wa nu ninɔmɛ blawu lɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do ahwan ji
bɔ azɔn ɔ
e ɖe siin
bɔ ku ɔ
e wa nu ɖokpo ɔ nu ninɔmɛ blawu ɖevo ɖeɖee nɔ bɔ nɔ vɛwu ɖo egbe lɛ e bi
e tlɛ ɖe jɔhɔn nyanya elɔ tɔn siin ɖo gbigbɔ nyanya sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ tɔn kpo wa yi efɛ nwt
do nukun mɛ ahwan azɔn alo ku tiin ɖe a e ɖe mɛ
nu ɖetɛ lɛ wa yi ɖo haamagedɔni gudo sɔyi
sixu do nukun mɛ ahwan azɔn alo ku tiin ɖe a e ɖe mɛ a
tamɛ kpɛɖe lɛ batoo ahwanfunfun tɔn lɛ alo jɔhɔn mɛ tɔn lɛ ɖe tiin a
ahwan lyannu alo nu bɔ e flin ahwanfunfun e ɖe tiin a
dotooxwe lɛ dotoo lɛ alo ganjɛwuwema lanmɛ nɔ ganji tɔn lɛ cyɔnɔtɛn lɛ kɔbiya lɛ lɛ alo kuxwe lɛ ɖe tiin a
ðo dakaxixo wa yi wutu ɔ nɔ kpe nukun do ayijayi wu lɛ e kpɛn nɔ do gesi ɖɔ nu nyanya ɖe ɖo jijɛ wɛ lɛ e kpo kponɔ lɛ kpo tiin a bɔya agasago lɛ alo cavi lɛ ɖe a
tamɛ do doya nu ayi mitɔn a lɛ e ji
mɛ xo haamagedɔni zlɛ lɛ e sin jɛ do sɔ
do nuɖe wu mi sixu wa gbɔn kpo ɖo hwenu nyanya elɔ wa yi e
ci hwenu ninɔmɛ blawu lɛ wa yi e
e vɛwu bɔ e do nukunmɛ
mi nɔ xoxo elɔ mɛ tlɛ sixu nɔ nɔ ɖo ayi ninɔmɛ lɛ blawu e wu
ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ pipaan gaa kpa lɛ e sixu nɔ nɔ ɖo ayi xosusu pipaan lɛ tɔn wu bɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ kpa lɛ e sixu nɔ nɔ ɖo ayi wan ɖe wɛ lɛ nɔ ɖe e wu
enyi e ɖe nu mɔhunkɔtɔn lɛ bi siin ɔ jɛ do sɔ e
etɛ ɖyɔ ninɔmɛ blawu mi nɔ mɔ egbe lɛ e
ðɛhan xosin ɔ fifa ɖo dogbo mɔ ɔ wɛ nyi nu nɔ vivi nu e
xo enɛ lɛ byɔ ayi mɛ nu a ce
nu jehovah ɖo biba nu wɛ e nɛ
enɛ wu ɔ wa nu wu kpe e bi do jehovah mawu kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo wu ɖo azan nyanya gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ
mɛ ɔ sixu kudeji ɖɔ emi kun wa yi kpo nyanya elɔ e ɖo hwɛ e kpo o
loɔ nɔ ayi nɔ ɖo awajijɛ sɔyi
akpaxwe elɔ aca e nɔ yawu mɔ ɖo gankpa ɖe mɛ ɖo xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie ɖo etats unis sin ɖe lɛ xwe e
e wɛ nyi so ɔ nuwiwa tɔn lɛ bɔ nu vɔ
micee
ablaxamu ɖɔ emi ɖeji do hwɛjlɔjlɔɖiɖɔ jehovah tɔn wu gbɔn
ɔ bi tɔn ɔ gɔn hwɛjijɔ xwedo do wa nu wɛ a
kpo nukanbyɔ enɛ kpo ɔ ablaxamu ɖɔ emi ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah ɖɔhwɛ jlɔjlɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ sodɔmu kpo kpo tɔn mɛ
ablaxamu kudeji ɖɔ jehovah kun ɖɔhwɛ agɔ gbeɖe hu mɛ ɖagbe kpo mɛ nyanya kpo bi ɖo o
nu ablaxamu ɔ e sixu nu mɔhun do wu tɔn a
xwe gudo ɔ jehovah ɖɔ do eɖee wu ɖɔ e wɛ nyi so ɔ nuwiwa tɔn lɛ bɔ nu vɔ
ðo ali tɔn lɛ bi e nɔ wa nublibli a
etɛwu e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah kun sixu ɖɔhwɛ agɔ gbeɖe o
etɛwu ablaxamu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah nɔ ɖɔhwɛ jlɔjlɔ hwebinu
jehovah wɛ nyi jɔtɛn hwɛjijɔ kpo nujlɔjlɔwiwa kpo tɔn
ðo jehovah wɛ nyi ɖaxo hugan nujlɔjlɔwiwa tɔn wutu ɔ e nɔ ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ lɛ gbɔn e nɔ sɔgbe hwebinu
na nuagɔwiwa ɖo ɔ mɛ egbe lɛ e tɔn ɖe
tuuntuun ɖɔ jehovah nɔ wa nu jlɔjlɔ hwebinu nɔ do gbɔ nu ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ ɖo nuagɔwiwa wɛ ɔ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ nuagɔwiwa syɛnsyɛn lɛ nɔ wa nu do mɛ gege wu hweɖelɛnu
ði ɔ e ɖo hwɛ agɔ nu mɛ ɖe lɛ su do gankpa mɛ
nukɔnyiyi nunywɛ xwitixwiti tɔn wɛ bɔ e wa mɔ kunnuɖenu lɛ ɖe xomɛvɔnɔ nu xwe mɔkpan lɛ e ɖe lɛ nyite
etɛ sixu nuɖiɖi klisanwun ɖe tɔn
klisanwun lɛ nɔ ɖɔ nuagɔwiwa ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ agun ɔ gudo jɛn sixu wa nu do emi wu ɖe
nu ci nuagɔwiwa ɖɔhun bɔ mi mɔ alo se tɔn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e ɖe sixu nuɖiɖi mitɔn
nu mɔ ɖɔ e wa nu agɔ ɖe lɛ xa ɖo agun ɔ mɛ alo nu mɔ ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe wa nu agɔ xa ɔ wa nu gbɔn
lɔn bɔ nu enɛ nyi nu wɛ a
nu klisanwun ɖe nuagɔwiwa ɖe wu alo se tɔn eɖesunɔ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɔ etɛwu e ɖo kpaca mɛ a
ðo mi mɛ bi wɛ nyi nɔ wa nu nyi do hwɛhwɛ wutu ɔ e sixu wa jɛ bɔ e wa nu agɔ xa mi alo miɖesu wa nu agɔ xa mɛ ɖevo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
jaan ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ nɔ yawu jɛ a enyi wa jɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ e nɔ kpaca klisanwun lɛ alo nyi nu a
nuagɔwiwa tɛ nɔvi ɖe ɖi xwi xa ɖo agun ɔ mɛ jijɔ tɛ lɛ ɛ bɔ e ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖo ali sɔgbe e
ðo ayi willi diehl tɔn wu
ðo tɔn ɔ nɔvi diehl wa kpo gbejininɔ kpo ɖo betɛli tɔn ɖo suisse
ðo ɔ e yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn sin klasi tantɔngɔ ɔ ɖo ɖo etats unis
ee e yi kunnuɖewema gudo e ɔ e ɖe nyi lɛdo tɔn ɖo suisse
ðo gbɛzan tɔn tɔn mɛ ɔ nɔvi diehl tinmɛ ɖɔ ðo mai ɔ ɖɔ alaxɔ mitɔn ɖo e ɖɔ ɖo tuto blo wɛ ba wli alɔ
xosin tɛ alaxɔ ɛ
sixu wa ɖevo ɖebu zɛ gbexosin hwebinu tɔn sin wu a
nɔvi diehl tinmɛ ɖɔ e gbe mi nu ma nɔ xwle xoɖiɖɔ lɛ mɛ a
mɛ gege tlɛ nɔ do gbe mi a nɔ wa nu xa mi ci nu ɖɔ e ɖe mi sin agun mɛ wɛ ɖɔhun
e ɖɔ mi tuun ɖɔ biblu kun do alɔwliwli o enɛ wu ɔ mi do ɖɛxixo wu ɖeji do jehovah wu
gudo mɛ ɔ e linlin masɔgbe e ɖo do alɔwliwli wu nuagɔwiwa enɛ e jla ɖo bɔ nɔvi diehl mɔ wujɔmɛ tɔn tɔn lɛ bi
gbeji e nɔ nu jehovah e hɛn le wa
e ɖɔ mi kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ enyi e wa nu agɔ mɔhun xa mi ɔ sixu ɖe nuɖiɖi mɔhun a
etɛwu sixu wa gbeta sɔgbe a e kɔn ɖɔ e wa nu agɔ xa emi alo xa mɛ ɖevo
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ sixu ɖɔ e wa nu agɔ xa emi alo xa agun ɔ tɔn ɖevo loɔ nuɖe nyi a
enɛ sixu jɛ ɖo linlin hwɛhuhu tɔn mi nɔ ɖo do ninɔmɛ lɛ wu e wutu alo ɖo mi tuun xo ɔ tɔn a wutu
ðo ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖebu mɛ ɔ enyi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do xo lɛ wu e sɔgbe alo gbɔ ɔ jiɖiɖe do jehovah wu kpo ɖɛxixo e kpo nu gbejininɔ mitɔn mi bɔ mi jɛ wunvo mawu mavɔmavɔ ji a xa nunywɛxo
tɛ lɛ mi do ɖo xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo mɛ
nu mi tamɛ do nuagɔwiwa xa mɛ tɔn ɖo togun jehovah tɔn tɛntin ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ e atɔn ji
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi do nu vivuvivu ablaxamu tɔn nɔ nyi jozɛfu e tɔn mɔ nu nɔvi tɔn lɛ ɛ do wa e
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi do nu jehovah wa nu xa izlayɛli xɔsu akabu gbɔn e kpo nu jɛ do wu ɖo antyɔci silii tɔn e kpo
ee mi ɖo xo ɖɔ do enɛ lɛ ji wɛ e ɔ mɔ nukplɔnmɛ ɖeɖee bɔ ayi towe kpo ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji bɔ kpo ɖo wɛ kpo jehovah kpo e ɖo taji ɔ hwenu ɖɔ mɛɖe wa nu agɔ xa emi e
nu agɔ tɛ lɛ e wa xa jozɛfu
ali tɛ hun nu jozɛfu hwenu e ɖo ganxo e
e wa nu agɔ xa jozɛfu nyi jehovah ɖe e e nyi toɖevomɛnu lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ wa xa ɛ a loɔ nɔvi tɔn lɛ lɔmɛ wɛ e jiya ɖe hugan tawun
hwenu jozɛfu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ nɔvi tɔn lɛ wli gannugannu sa kannumɔ tɔn
kannumɔ e nyi e kpo ganxo e nɔ e kpo xɔ xwe
etɛ lɛ nu ɖeɖee gbo jozɛfu e sixu mi hwenu ɖe wa nu agɔ xa mi e
enɛ ɔ wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ hɛn sinnuka nu axɔsu ɔ lɛ e sin gan
hwenu jozɛfu kpo e kpo ɖo gankpa mɛ e ɔ e ku ɖe bɔ jozɛfu tinmɛ
jozɛfu tinmɛ nu nya ɔ ɖɔ e ɛ ɖo tɛn tɔn xoxo ɔ mɛ ɖo sin hɔnmɛ
hwenu jozɛfu xwle tinmɛ ɔ tɔn mawu mɛ e nya ɔ gudo e ɔ e gbɔn yɛkan enɛ mɛ ɖɔ xo do ninɔmɛ eɖesunɔ tɔn wu
nu jozɛfu ɖɔ lɛ e kpo ee e ɖɔ a lɛ e kpo sixu nu taji gege mi bib
xo jozɛfu ɖɔ nu ɔ lɛ e ɖɔ e kun yi gbe nu ninɔmɛ mɛ e ɖe e kpowun o gbɔn
tinmɛ ɖevo tɛ lɛ jozɛfu ɔ ɖo yetɔn hwenu a
xa
wu ɖɔ jozɛfu ɖɔ do eɖee wu ɖɔ gannugannu wɛ e kpla emi sin to emitɔn mɛ
xokwin dodo ɔ sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu agɔ wɛ e wa xa ɛ
jozɛfu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun wa nu wutu e wli emi su e o
enɛ wu wɛ e ɖɔ nu ɔ ɖɔ e ɖɔ xo emitɔn nu
etɛwu
e tinmɛ nu wu wɛ e ɖɔ bonu ma sin gankpa mɛ fi
wɛ xo jozɛfu ɖɔ lɛ e ɖe ɖɔ e yi gbe nu ninɔmɛ tɔn a
gbeɖe
e tuun ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ nu agɔ gege wɛ e wa xa emi
e tinmɛ nu jɛ lɛ e nyi wɛn nu ɔ ɖo tɛn mɛ e ɖe e sixu bɔ e ɛ
e ɖo co wu ɖɔ nu ɖebu kun ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ jozɛfu ɖɔ nu mɛɖe jɛ ji ɖɔ nɔvi emitɔn lɛ wɛ wli emi gannugannu o
enyi e tlɛ wa nu agɔ do mi wu ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɔ etɛ xɔ mi sin mɛnuɖiɖɔ mɛ
hwenu klisanwun ɖe ɖɔ e wa nu agɔ xa emi e ɔ e ɖo eɖee tawun ma wa jɛ mɛ nu ɖɔ ji o
e ɖo co ɖo ninɔmɛ gege ɖevo mɛ hwɛhuhu syɛnsyɛn xo ɖe ɖe a lɛ e mɛ ɔ e sixu ɖeɖɛ tagba ɖe mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛvo jɛ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ji xa matie
nu mi nɔ xwedo nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ do ɖeɖɛ tagba mɔhun lɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu wa mɔ ɖɔ e kun wa nu agɔ ɖe do mi wu lɔ o
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ sɔ ɖɔ mi kun do ji klisanwun mitɔn ɖe do hɛn ninɔmɛ ɖe nyla o e
flin ɖɔ nu hwɛ mitɔn jɔ kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ mɛnuɖiɖɔ kun ninɔmɛ ɔ bloɖo gbeɖe o
gbejininɔ nu jehovah kpo nɔvi lɛ kpo cyɔn alɔ mi ji bɔ mi wa nu agɔ mɔhun ɖe a
ðɛhan ɔ ɖɔ do mɛ e nɔ mɔ nuɖe ɖɔ do wu tɔn a e wu ɖɔ e nɔ ɖɔ mɛ nu a
jehovah do nu jozɛfu ɖo gbejininɔ tɔn wu gbɔn
mi mɔ nukplɔnmɛ taji ɖevo ɖo kancica ɖo jozɛfu kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e mɛ
ðo tɛnkpɔn jozɛfu mɔ ɖo xwe lɛ mɛ e hwenu ɔ e ɖɔ emi ɖo linlin jehovah tɔn ɖɔhun do ninɔmɛ lɛ wu bib
e dohwɛ jehovah gbeɖe ɖɔ e wu wɛ ninɔmɛ ɔ sin a
e wɔn nuagɔwiwa sin e ji lɛ e a co e mɔ ɖo wu a
ðo taji hu bi ɔ e lɔn bonu nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn kpo walɔ nyanya yetɔn lɛ kpo lɛkɔ sin jehovah gudo a
gbejininɔ jozɛfu tɔn hun ali bɔ e mɔ bɔ jehovah jla nu agɔ e wa xa ɛ lɛ e ɖo do nu e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo
enyi e wa nu agɔ xa mi ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɔ etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi ɖo wlibo nu kancica mi kpo jehovah kpo tɔn nya xɛ
mi ɖo lɔn gbeɖe bonu nuwanyido nɔvi lɛ tɔn lɛkɔ nu mi sin mawu mi yi wan nɔ e gudo a
hlɔ e wa ɔ enyi ɖe wa nu agɔ xa mi ɔ nu mi wa nu jozɛfu ɖɔhun nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah nɔ nɔ ɖo linlin etɔn ɖɔhun ɖo ninɔmɛ lɛ mɛ
hwenu mi wa nu mi sixu wa do ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ ɔ sɔgbe kpo biblu kpo e bi gudo e ɔ mi ɖo jo xo ɔ do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah ɖeji ɖɔ e ɖeɖɛ ɖo hwetɔnnu sɔgbe xa jlo tɔn
mi sixu ɖɔ mi ɖeji do ɔ bi tɔn ɔ wu gbɔn
enyi elɔ mɛ jɛn mi kpo ɖe ɔ mi sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ e wa nu agɔ xa mi
e sixu wa jɛ bɔ e wa nu ci nu agɔ ɖɔhun e ɖe xa ɖo agun ɔ mɛ alo mɔ nu mɔhun ɖe abi nu sixu nyi nu mɛ ɖevo tuun e ɖe
lɔn bonu enɛ nyi nu o
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi nɔ nɔ ji nɔ yi gbe ɖɔ mi kun tuun nu lɛ bi tɔn o
mi nɔ tuun ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e sixu nyi midɛɛ lɛ wɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu lɛ mɛ nyi do
jozɛfu tɔn mi gbɔn e ɔ mi jlo nyi alɔ nu mɛnuɖiɖɔ ɖo mi tuun ɖɔ nu mɔhun nɔ hɛn ninɔmɛ nyla e asa kpowun wɛ
gudo tɔn ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ lɛ miɖesunɔ o loɔ nu mi kudeji nɔ gbeji nɔte jehovah bonu eɖesunɔ ɖeɖɛ
enyi mi wa nu gbɔn ɔ mi ɖeji ɖɔ e jehovah nukunmɛ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do mi ji e nyi gbɔn nu jozɛfu e ɖɔhun
nugbo ɔ mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ ɔ bi tɔn ɔ wa nu sɔgbe e hwebinu ɖo ali tɔn lɛ bi wɛ bib
etɛ mi do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi gbeje ninɔmɛ mɛ e wa nu agɔ ɖe ɖo togun jehovah tɔn mɛ ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ e we ɖevo
enɛ lɛ gbigbeje mɛɖesɔhwe kpo jlo do hwɛ kɛ mɛ kpo ca kan xa linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e gbɔn e ji
gbɛzan tɔn willi diehl tɔn ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe tɔn mɛ wex
fɔtoo ðo akpa ɔ ji e
kunnuɖiɖe tɔn akpakpa ɖo wɛ e ɖe xwe kunnuɖegbe ɖo lusaka zambie
etɛwu ɖo zan sɔgbe xa akpa do hwiɖee jo nu mawu e
etɛwu ɖo zan sɔgbe xa alɔwliwli sin akpa do e
enyi ɖo hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe mɛ ɔ etɛwu ɖo zan sɔgbe xa akpa do ɖo ali enɛ e
etɛ jɛfutee kpo kpo ɖo ɖo bu
ɖiɖe tɔn lɛ nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ sin xosin mi mɔ ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
e nyi ɖe e nyi xwesi ɖe
gbɔn vo nu mawu ɖokpo ɔ jɛfutee kpo ɛlukana sin asi kpo nɔ e ɔ nu ɖevo tɛ mɛ we enɛ lɛ ɖo ɖo bu
ðokpo ɖokpo yetɔn do akpa ɖe nu mawu ɖe akpa yetɔn lɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo
nyi ɖagbe ɖe nu sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee wa gbeta ɔ kɔn do akpa nu jehovah e
nukanbyɔ taji ɖe lɛ ɖo akpa ɖe dido nu mawu nyi nu syɛnsyɛn ɖe sɔ
etɛ jɛfutee kpo kpo tɔn sixu mi
etɛ biblu ɖɔ do akpa dido nu mawu wu
sɔgbe xa biblu ɔ mɛɖe sixu ɖɔ emi wa nuɖe nunina ɖe wa alɔkpa ɖe alo nyi alɔ nu nuɖe lɛ
mɛɖesunɔ sin jlo wu wɛ e nɔ zɔn do nɔ do akpa lɛ
etɛ mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ do akpa dido nu mawu nyi nu syɛnsyɛn e wu
mɔyizi ɔ ɖɔ sunnu ɖe do akpa ɖɔ emi xwle nunina ɖe mawu mavɔmavɔ abi e xwle nu ɔ e blo nu e ɖɔ e ɖe hwe a
nukɔnmɛ ɔ mawu mɛ nu bɔ e wlan ɖɔ nu do akpa nu mawu hun ɖe nu e nɔ linlin mɛ o ɖo mawu nɔ yi wan nu xlonɔ lɛ a
akpa ɖe dido nu mawu nyi nu syɛnsyɛn sɔ
etɛ mi jlo do jɛfutee kpo kpo wu
e ɖo wɛn din ɖɔ akpa dido nu mawu ɔ nu syɛnsyɛn tawun ɖe wɛ
mi nɔ wa akpa mi do nu jehovah lɛ e sin nu gbɔn e nɔ wa nu do kancica ɖo mi kpo e kpo tɛntin e wu
davidi wlan ɖɔ wɛ sixu yi mawu mavɔmavɔ so ɔ ji
akpa tɛ jɛfutee kpo kpo do
ðiɖe tɔn bɔkun nu a
jɛfutee ɖe akpa e do nu jehovah hwenu e xwe ahwan xa vi nɔ doya nu togun mawu tɔn lɛ e gbe e kpo gbejininɔ kpo
etɛ wa jɛ
jɛfutee ɖu ɖo vi lɛ ji bɔ hwenu e lɛkɔ ja xwe e ɔ vi nyɔnu tɔn wɛ wa kpe e
etɛ enɛ byɔ tɔn
e bɔwu nu jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo bɔ ɖe akpa jɛfutee do nu mawu e a
etɛ kpo ðɛhan kpo mi do akpa ɖe dido nu mawu wu
bonu vi nyɔnu jɛfutee tɔn ɖe tɔn sin akpa ɔ e ɖo jehovah ɖo tɛmpli mɛ nu gbɛhwenu tɔn bi
eo ɖo e tuun ganji ɖɔ vi nyɔnu emitɔn sixu nyi mɛ sin xwe emitɔn gbe wa kpe emi e
nu ɖo co ninɔmɛ vɛwu ɖe wɛ e nyi nu vi kpo kpo enɛ bi ɖo ɖe
hwenu jɛfutee mɔ vi tɔn e ɔ e vun awu do kɔ nu eɖee ɖɔ ɖɔ ayi emitɔn gbado
vi nyɔnu tɔn ɖo asu e a e wutu
jɛfutee ɖo vi sunnu ɖebu a lobɔ vi nyɔnu ɖokpo e ɖo e lɔ asu gbeɖe bonu e ɖo vivu a
ali ɖe hun bonu mɛɖe ɖo nyikɔ tɔn ɖu nuɖokan tɔn lɛ sin gu a
nu ɖo taji bɔ e e nɛ a
jɛfutee ɖɔ do akpa nu mawu mavɔmavɔ hun sixu gɔn ɖiɖe nɛ
bɔ vi nyɔnu tɔn yi gbe ɖɔ wa nu xa mi hwiɖesunɔ ɖɔ gbɔn sin towe mɛ e
akpa tɛ do etɛwu
etɛ akpa do e byɔ ɖo samuwɛli si
tinmɛ ɖo do e
nyi mɛ ɖevo ɖe akpa e do nu jehovah e kpo gbejininɔ kpo e
e do akpa tɔn hwenu e ɖo ɖaxo se wɛ ɖo aluwɛ mɛ ɖo vimaji tɔn kpo zun zun wɛ asisi tɔn nɔ ɖe hwebinu ɖo enɛ wu e kpo wu
jehovah se ɖɛ tɔn bɔ e ji nukɔnvi tɔn nyi vi sunnu ɖe
e wɔn akpa e do nu mawu e a
hwenu e ji vi sunnu tɔn e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ wɛ emi byɔ
e bɔwu nu ɖe akpa e do e a
xo davidi tɔn ɖo ðɛhan mɛ lɛ e flin mi ɖagbe tɔn gbɔn
ee samuwɛli ɖo xwe atɔn bɔ ɖe gudo e ɔ e wa nu sɔgbe xa akpa e do nu mawu e
e tlɛ wa nu ɖevo lɔ a
din ɔ nyɛ lɔ jlo vi ɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ bɔ e nyi etɔn sɔyi
ðo finɛ ɔ samuwɛli ɖo wɛ ɖo mawu mavɔmavɔ nukɔn
etɛ enɛ byɔ ɖo si
e yi wan nu vi sunnu tɔn tawun din ɔ e kpewu mɔ ɛ gbe bi gbe ɖo vuhwenu tɔn a
do nukun mɛ e tawun nɔ kpla asi kɔ xa ɛ nuɖuɖu bɔ sɔ ɔ e lɔ wa flin nu ɖagbeɖagbe nɔ wanyiyinɔ ɖo nukun kpe do vi tɔn wu wɛ mɔ ɖo wɛ e ɖe nɔ flin lɛ e gbɔn e
nu nyi co e nu ɖɔ e ɖe akpa e do nu mawu e a
xomɛ tɔn hun ɖo jehovah mɛ xa ðɛhan
ɖo akpa do nu jehovah lɛ e ɖe wɛ a
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ kpo bɔ mi mɔ xosin
din mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ akpa ɖe dido nu mawu nyi nu syɛnsyɛn ɖe e wu e ɔ nu mi gbeje nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ akpa alɔkpa tɛ lɛ mi mɛ klisanwun lɛ sixu do
mi ɖo kanɖeji sɔ ɖe akpa mitɔn lɛ
akpa mɛɖee zize jo nu jehovah tɔn akpaxwe ɔ
akpa taji hugan tɛ klisanwun ɖe sixu do etɛ akpa enɛ byɔ ɖo asi tɔn
akpa taji hugan klisanwun ɖe sixu do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ze gbɛzan tɔn jo nu jehovah
etɛwu e nyi
ðo ɖo ɖɛ mɛɖesunɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ ɔ e nu jehovah kpo ayi tɔn bi kpo ɖɔ nu ɖebu ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɔ emi gbɛzan emitɔn bi do ɛ sɔyi
sin gbe nɛ gbe ɖido ɔ aklunɔ tɔn wɛ e nyi
etɛ ɖo gbe gbe blo baptɛm e
ze gbɛzan towe jo nu jehovah mɛ lɛ bi gbɔn baptɛm sin tɔn gblamɛ a
nu blo hun e tawun
flin ɖɔ ɖo baptɛm towe sin azan gbe ɔ e kanbyɔ ɖo lɛ nukɔn ɖɔ hwi ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ hwiɖee zize jo nu jehovah kpo baptɛm towe kpo ɖɔ nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo mɛ kpo tutoblonunu gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ɖo ali wɛ e kpo a ji
xosin ɛɛn e ɖo agbawungba ɖɔ ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah bi jɛxa blo baptɛm ɖi jehovah tɔn e gbe e ɖe
hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun tawun gbe nɛ gbe
nu tɛ lɛ e ɖɔ mi kanbyɔ miɖee
jijɔ tɛ lɛ gbe ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo nya
jehovah sinsɛn tɔn kpowun wɛ baptɛm nyi
enɛ gudo ɔ mi jlo kpo ɖo zan wɛ sɔgbe xa ze mi ze miɖee jo nu mawu e ɖo tɔn mɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo
enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ sin hwenu blo baptɛm e jɛ egbe ɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn
kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo ayi bi kpo a
nɔ xoɖɛ xa xo mawu tɔn yi kple agun tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ hwɛhwɛ e blo gbɔn e a
alo ɖo do nu ɖe lɛ ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ mɛ wɛ wɛ a
tinmɛ ɖɔ mi sixu nyi alɔ nu fɔnlin ɖo mitɔn mɛ enyi mi nutuuntuun didɛ kpo mɛɖeezejo nu mawu kpo nu nuɖiɖi mitɔn ɔ nɛ xa
etɛ mɛ klisanwun ze eɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm e ɖe ɖo mɔ nukunnu jɛ
mi sixu dɔn nu gbɔn akpa mi do ze miɖee jo nu mawu e ji alo sunsun akpa enɛ ɖo ali ɖebu a
enyi nu cikɔ nu mɛɖe ɖo jehovah sinsɛn kɔn alo ɖo klisanwun gbɛzinzan mɛ ɔ e sixu ɖɔ gbeɖe ɖɔ emi kun ze emiɖee jo nu jehovah o le emi dɔn nu gbɔn baptɛm emitɔn ji a
e ɖo linlin enɛ lɛ ɖebu ɔ e ɖɔ emi ze emiɖee bi jo nu mawu
nu e ɖɔ do mi wu gbeɖe ɖɔ mi ɖo wanyiyi mi ɖo gbɔn ɖo e a o
nu mi kpo ɖo zan wɛ sɔgbe xa akpa mi do ze miɖee jo nu jehovah e kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo hɛn jehovah sin xomɛ hun
alɔwliwli sin akpa akpaxwe ɔ
akpa taji wegɔ mɛɖe sixu do e wɛ nyi alɔwliwli sin akpa
etɛwu e nyi
ðo alɔwliwli nyi nu wutu
ðo mawu kpo lɛ kpo sin nukɔn ɔ nyɔnu ɔ kpo sunnu ɔ kpo nɔ do akpa alɔwliwli tɔn yetɔn lɛ
ðo alɔwliwli lɛ sin hwenu ɔ nɔ hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ emi yi wan nu emiɖee wlibo nu emiɖee ɖo sisi nu emiɖee ɖo wa wɛ nu taan nabi mɛ we lɛ nɔ ɖo xɔ ɖo ayikungban ji sɔgbe xa tuto alɔwliwli tɔn mawu e e
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu nɔ zan xogbe ɖokpo ɔ lɛ lɔ do akpa ɖe ɖo mawu nukɔn
kɔ enyi mi zan xogbe jezu tɔn enyi hun klan nu mawu dɔn ca e o ɔ enɛ ɖɔ asu ɔ asi ɔ alo mɛ ɖevo ɖebu kun ɖo acɛ tɔn klan alɔwliwli ɔ o
mɛ ɖo alɔ wli wɛ lɛ e ɖo tuun ɖɔ mɛɖee kun nyi wlɛnwin ɖe o mak
etɛwu klisanwun lɛ ɖo nyi alɔ nu sin linlin ɔ nɔ ɖo do alɔwliwli wu e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ alɔwliwli ɖe kun ɖe gbeɖe o
we wɛ nɔ kple nɔ wli alɔ
e blawu ɖɔ ɖo egbe ɔ mɛ gege ɖo ɔ mɛ ɖo linlin tɔn do alɔwliwli wu
tagba lɛ jɛ alɔwliwli yetɔn mɛ wa ji ɔ nɔ xo nu kpla nɔ jo mɛ e do
klisanwun lɛ ɖo zan gbɔn a
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ asi wɛ ɖo hun klan xa ɛ o
etɛ biblu ɖɔ do mɛɖee kpo kinklan kpo wu
nu e ɖɔ ɖo ali enɛ e lɔ ɖo wɛn
xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
biblu hwɛjijɔ ɖe zɔn do enɛ wu klan a
klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo lɛ sixu blo gbɔn bɔ alɔwliwli yetɔn nɔ ayi sɔyi
enyi mɛ wli alɔ lɛ e sɛkpɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖo biba wɛ ɖɔ ɖe we xa emi do alɔwliwli sin tagba lɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ mɛxo lɛ kanbyɔ ɖɔ etewe owanyi nugbo
alo alɔnuwema xwedo towe sixu nɔ awajijɛ mɛ ɖo agaɖanu din a ji
ðo azɔwanu enɛ lɛ nugbododo mawu tɔn ɖeɖee mɛ gege bɔ alɔwliwli yetɔn lido lɛ e ji
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖɔ sin hwenu mi jɛ alɔnuwema enɛ ji e ɔ alɔwliwli mitɔn ɖo awajijɛ hugan e ɖe e
nyɔnu alɔwliwli tɔn ɖo xwe ɖibla ja gbigba gbe e ɖe ɖɔ mi mɛ we lɛ bi wɛ blo baptɛm nu nɔ ci nu mi mɛ we lɛ e gbɔn vo tawun
ɔ wa do ganmɛ
mi ɖo ganji din ɖi asu kpo asi kpo
wli alɔ wɛ a
wa nu bi xwedo nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo alɔwliwli towe mɛ
biblo bɔ zan sɔgbe xa alɔwliwli sin akpa do e kpo awajijɛ kpo
etɛ klisanwun gege blo
etɛ e sixu ɖɔ do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe mɛ lɛ e wu
nu ɖevo wu bɔ jɛfutee kpo kpo ɖo ɖo bu a
nu mɛ akpa mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e jɛfutee sin vi nyɔnu kpo sin vi sunnu kpo jo bɔ wa bunɔ ɖe ɖo goxɔ ɔ mɛ
egbe ɔ klisanwun gege nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu vi yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ hwebinu tɔn gbɛzan yetɔn bi jo nu mawu tɔn
e jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo blo wɛ lɛ e tawun hwɛ
hwebinu tɔn bunɔ sin akpa akpaxwe ɔ
egbe din ɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ ɖo hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
mɛɖe lɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo xɔgbigba alo lɛdo tɔn sin wa wɛ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ nu mɛ ɖo wemaxɔ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ alo nyi gbexosin titewungbe tɔn abi kabi nɔ kpe nukun do sin xɔ lɛ alo wemaxɔmɛ biblu kplɔnkplɔn tɔn sin xɔ lɛ wu
mɛ bi wɛ do tonusise kpo kpo sin akpa yi gbe ɖɔ emi wa nu ɖebu e emi do nukɔnyiyi axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn takunmɛ e zan bɔkun e nyi alɔ nu ɖevo wiwa afi nu e gbe tɔn ɔ nɛ
mɛ ɖo enɛ lɛ wa wɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi bunɔ a loɔ e nu lɛ e wɛ nyi bunɔ
mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ e nyi nu taji ɖɔ yeɖee hwe zan sɔgbe xa akpa do kpo ayi bi kpo e nu taan nabi wa hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe xɔ e
etɛ mi ɖo blo ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
etɛwu
mɔ nu jɛ wu din ɖɔ kun ɖo nukun kpɛvi do akpa towe lɛ o nux
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi awajijɛ do ɖo ji mla jehovah wɛ hwebinu do ɖe akpa mi do lɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ðɛh
nu mi gbeje afɔ vovo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖe do kanɖeji ɖɔ mɛɖe jɛxa blo baptɛm a ji e ɔ e vɛwu tawun ɖɔ mɛɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ emi dɔn nu gbɔn baptɛm emitɔn ji
xota linlin biblu tɔn do asigbigbɛ abi asugbigbɛ kpo kinklan kpo wu ɖo xota ðevo lɛ mɛ ɖo wema hɛn miɖee ðo wanyiyi mawu tɔn mɛ mɛ e
mɛ tɔn wɛ e demetrius psarras
ee lɛ ɖo nu ɖɔ do mi wɛ e ɔ avɔxwɛ wewe ɖe do ji
sɔja ɖo tu wɛ lɛ e suxo mi ɖɔ ma sin fi hwla ci e
wa sɛkpɔ tuun nu hu mi alo gbɔ a
wa mɔ nyiɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn enɛ mɛ gbɔn
ðo xwe jɛ nukɔn nu xwe enɛ e mɛ ɔ lɛ xo go john papparizos biblu nɔ ɖɔ xo e ɖe wɛ
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ zawe john ɖo do mawuxowema ɔ wu e jiwu nu bɔ jɛ kple biblu lɛ tɔn lɛ yi ji ɖo gletoxo mitɔn mɛ
nɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi tewungbeju nu jehovah mawu bɔ e tlɛ se wema a co hweɖebunu ali tɔn hun e ɔ e nɔ ma nu e tuun lɛ e xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
e blawu ɖɔ ayi ɖo nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ji bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ e jo kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ yiyi do
nyi kpo nɔvi lɛ kpo nɔ ɖo sisi nu biblu ayihun wɛ gba tamɛ nu mi hwenu mi ɖo wɛ e
loɔ hwenu wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ vunbla elɔpu ɖo e ɔ nuɖe jɛ ɖo gletoxo mitɔn mɛ bɔ mi sin amlɔ mɛ
e ylɔ nicolas psarras nyi hɛnnumɔ mitɔn blo baptɛm lin a e ɖɔ e wa byɔ ahwankpa grece tɔn mɛ
xwe jɛn nicolas ɖo ɖɔ nu ahwangan lɛ kpo adɔgbigbo kpo ɖɔ sixu ahwan a ɖo klisu tɔn wɛ nu mi
hwɛɖɔxɔsa sɔja lɛ tɔn ɖe ɖo hwɛ ɖɔ e nu xwe
ahwi xo mi bi
awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ ɖo tɔn ɔ e ɖe nicolas nyite hwenu ahwankpa ɖe lɛ xo yeɖee kple ahwan grece e
e lɛkɔ wa karitsa bɔ fofo ilias kan nu gege byɔ ɛ do biblu ji
ɖoto e kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
enɛ gudo ɔ nyi kpo ilias kpo kpodo efmorfia nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn kpɛvi ɔ kpo jɛ biblu ji nɔ yi kple lɛ tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
ðo xwe bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi mɛ atɔn lɛ bi ze miɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm
nukɔnmɛ ɔ nɔvi mitɔn ɛnɛ ɖevo huzu lɛ
ðo ɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖo xwe jɛ lɛ e tɛnnɛ wɛ ɖo agun karitsa tɔn mɛ
mi bi wɛ tuun ɖɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɖo mi ɖo nukɔnmɛ
enɛ wu ɔ do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee lɛ ɔ mi nɔ kple ɖo hweɖebunu mi kpewu e nɔ biblu jihan axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ xoɖɛ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido
demetrius kpo nɔvi lɛ kpo ɖo karitsa
ee wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ ɖo wɛ e ɔ communiste grece tɔn gu do acɛkpikpa grece tɔn ji bɔ enɛ bɔ tohwan syɛnsyɛn ɖe
communiste lɛ tɔn gbɔn gletoxo lɛ mɛ nɔ gbidi kɔ nu mɛ lɛ bonu nu
hwenu byɔ gletoxo mitɔn mɛ e ɔ wli dɔnkpɛvu atɔn antonio tsoukaris ilias kpo nyɛ kpo
mi savo nu ɖɔ klisanwun ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ahwan lɛ e wɛ nu mi e ɖo co hɛn mi gannugannu bɔ mi ɖi zɔnlin yi olympe so ɔ kɔn e nɔ blo ganxixo sin gletoxo mitɔn mɛ cobo nɔ yi finɛ
enɛ gudo zaan ɔ ahwangan communiste tɔn ɖe ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi yi nu yetɔn xweyigbe fi ɖe gba gbe e ɖe
ee mi tinmɛ ɖɔ klisanwun nugbo lɛ kun nɔ tu do yetɔn lɛ ji o e ɔ ahwangan ɔ jɛma dɔn mi lɛlɛlɛ yi ahwangan sunvinɔ ɖe nukɔn
bɔ enyi ahwangan ɖe mɔ mi kpo sɔkɛtɛkɛtɛ ɔ kpo ɖegbe nu mi ɖɔ mi ahwanfunnu lɛ yi ahwangbenu ɔ lo
wɛ mi kanbyɔ
ðo tohwan ɖo nu gba do mi wɛ wutu ɔ ayixa mi mɛ atɔn lɛ tɔn yi gbe nu mi bɔ mi kpe nukun do lɛ wu
xwe ɖokpo gudo ɔ e gbe ilias nyi visunnuɖaxo ɔ e ɖɔ e lɛkɔ yi xwe kpe nukun do nɔ mitɔn nyi asukusi e wu
antonio azɔn bɔ e ɖe e nyite
e jo nyɛ do a
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ ahwankpa grece tɔn ɖo communiste lɛ ji ɖu ɖe wɛ mɔhunkɔtɔn
hɛn e hɔn gbɔn sokan lɛ mɛ tunta to sɛkpɔ finɛ nɔ nyi albanie e mɛ
ee mi ɖo dogbo ɔ sɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ sɔja grece tɔn lɛ do mi ajijimɛ
hu lɛ bɔ hɔn
hwla ci atin e ɖe gudo enɛ wɛ hɛn ninɔmɛ xo ɖɔ ɖo e wa
ee tinmɛ nu sɔja grece tɔn lɛ ɖɔ wɛ communiste lɛ hɛn e ɔ kpla mi yi ahwansla sɛkpɔ toxo veria tɔn bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ belee ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ e ɖe mɛ ɖɔ nugbo ɖɔ wɛ jɛn ɖe a ji
ðo ɔ e ɖegbe nu mi ɖɔ ma kun ahwando nu sɔja lɛ
ee e ɔ ahwangan ɔ mi do kannumɔgbenu ɖo tɔtɛntinto makronisos tɔn do xɛsi tawun e mɛ
tɔtɛntinto ɖe wɛ nu makronisos ɔ bɔ aku nɔ ɖo tawun ɖo attique sin xa mɛ ɖo kilomɛtlu do athenes
kilomɛtlu jɛn tɔtɛntinto ɔ ɖiga ɖo kilomɛtlu vlɔɖowe ɖo fi e gblo ɖe ganji e
e ɖo co sin jɛ ɔ jɛji wɛ nɔ finɛ bɔ communiste lɛ kpo mɛ communiste do lɛ e kpo xoxo klan gbe xa acɛkpikpa ɔ lɛ e nu jehovah tɔn gege wɛ
hwenu wa ɖo tɔn e ɔ e ma lɛ do vovo lɛ mɛ
e mi ɖo e nɔ din a e ɖe mɛ kpo sunnu kanweko mɔkpan ɖevo lɛ kpo
mi mɛ wɛ nɔ ɖo goxɔ e blo nu e ɖe mɛ
mi nɔ sin kwijikwiji nɔ ɖu abɔbɔ kpo agbisan aubergines kpo
afuntuntun kpo jɔhɔn nɔ nyi e kpo bɔ vɛwu nu mi tawun
midɛɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo awinnya fɔ wɛ magbokɔ a yadonumɛ enɛ hɛn nu gble do agbaza kpo linlin gege kpo tɔn wu
nyi kpo ɖevo e kpla yi kannumɔgbenu lɛ e kpo ɖo tɔtɛntinto makronisos tɔn mɛ
ee ɖo sa ɖi wɛ gbɔn xuto gbe ɖokpo e ɔ xo go gosin ɖevo lɛ mɛ lɛ e gege
mɔ mi mɔ miɖee e vivi nu mi
mi nɔ kple ɖo fi ɖebu e sixu blo ɖe e nɔ miɖee tawun bonu e mi wu o
mi nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖevo lɛ ɖo nuglɔ bɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ wa huzu jehovah tɔn lɛ
enɛ lɛ wiwa kpo ɖɛ xixo kpo hlɔnhlɔn mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ee e doya enɛ lɛ nu mi nu wo gudo e ɔ mɛ wli mi lɛ e mɔ ɖɔ hwe ɔ su bonu ma do ahwanwu
ee e ɔ dɔn mi yi ahwangan ɔ tɔn nukɔn
dlɛn wema ɖe do nya ɔ bɔ xo elɔ lɛ klisu tɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ jlo nyi
ee ahwangan ɔ adan nu mi gudo e ɔ e mi nu azaglɔgan tɔn sinsɛn orthodoxe grece tɔn sin yɛhwenɔgan ɖe wɛ bɔ sinsɛn sin nu lɛ ɖo wu tɔn kplɛlɛ
hwenu zan biblu do xosin nu nukanbyɔ tɔn lɛ kpo adɔgbigbo kpo e ɔ e suxo kpo xomɛsin kpo ɖɔ kpla ɛ sin nukɔn
ayihɔngbe tɔn zanzan ɔ sɔja lɛ ɖegbe nu mi ɖɔ ma ahwanwu ɔ do
ee e ɔ bɔ akpotokwin kpo kpo kpo ɖo nu mi
enɛ gudo ɔ kpla mi yi dotooxwe mɔ ɖɔ xu lɛ kun o dɔn mi wa goxɔ mɛ
fɔ yɛsu ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn enɛ nu mi nu we
ðo jo nuɖiɖi do a wutu ɔ sɔja enɛ lɛ ɖo mɔ wɛ e wlɛnwin ɖe
bla alɔ lɛ do gudo lanba do xo afɔkpakpa lɛ mɛ do adaka mɛ
ðo ɖaxo enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ flin xogbe jezu tɔn elɔ lɛ nu nu hwenu e wa ɖo zun wɛ ɖo ɖedo wɛ e
enɛ lɛ ci nu vɔ gbeɖe a e ɖɔhun bɔ wa nyiɖee kpo
wa yi ɖo gankpa fifa ɖe mɛ bɔ nuɖuɖu sin kpo wucyɔn kpo han
e ɖo co ɖo fifa ɖo ayi mɛ
biblu ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ fifa mawu tɔn ɖo ayixa kpo linlin kpo bloɖo wɛ
fili ayihɔngbe tɔn ɔ sɔja xomɛ e ɖe mi sin kpo jɔhɔnmɛwu ɖokpo kpo
enɛ gudo ɔ sɔja ɖevo nuɖuɖu tɔn lɛ nu mi
ðo ali enɛ lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo ɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah kpe nukun do wutu kpo kpo
lɛ mi do mɔ e sixu huzu a e ɖe kpla mi yi athenes ɖɔhwɛ xa mi ɖo hwɛɖɔxɔsa sɔja lɛ tɔn ɖe
ðo ɔ mi do giaros tɔtɛntinto ɖe wɛ ɖo kilomɛtlu do makronisos ɖo zanzanhweji bonu ma yi nu xwe atɔn
ahoho e bliki vɔvɔ do mɛ e ɖe wɛ gankpa giaros tɔn nyi bɔ ɖeɖee e wli lɛ e jɛji wɛ
jehovah tɔn tɛnwe lɔ bɔ bi wɛ e wli ɖo wu ɖo zɔ nu toxoɖiɖɔ e wu
e syɛnsyɛn ɖɔ e kple o co mi mɛ tɛnwe lɛ bi wɛ nɔ wa ɖo nuglɔ nɔ biblu
hwɛhwɛ ɔ mi tlɛ nɔ yi atɔxwɛ gbɔn nuglɔ nɔ wlan kpo alɔ kpo ba do sixu zan ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn mitɔn lɛ hwenu
mi ɖo nu wɛ ɖo nuglɔ gbe ɖokpo bɔ ɔ wa gbo mi do ɖo fi mi kple ɖe e wema mitɔn lɛ bi
ganbɔdoganwu ɔ ɖɔ mi tuun mɛ nyi e nɔ ɖo sisi nu nu ɖi nu lɛ e
mi tuun ɖɔ mi sixu ɖeji do wu
lɛkɔ ɖido wa gbe
e tlɛ ɖe vɛwu a lɛ e nu mi mɛ ɖe lɛ
nu enɛ su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
e tlɛ nyi ɖo gankpa mɛ ɔ gbejininɔ klisanwun tɔn mitɔn kpa nu jehovah
gbejininɔ mitɔn hɛn le gege ɖevo lɛ wa
nyi e ɖe walɔ ɖagbe mi ɖo lɛ e wu ceɖeceɖe bɔ enɛ ɛ do nu nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e
hwenu e ɖe mi mɛ lɛ nyite ɖo tɔn e ɔ e ɖe e lɔ nyite
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e blo baptɛm huzu hwebinu tɔn
nyi kpo asi janette kpo
ee e ɖe mi nyite gudo e ɔ lɛkɔ yi mɛ lɛ ɖo karitsa
nukɔnmɛ ɔ nyi kpo to mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ kpo tɛn yi melbourne ɖo australie
ðo ɔ xo go nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nyi janette mi miɖee ji vi sunnu ɖokpo kpo nyɔnu atɔn kpo ɖo klisanwun sin ali ji
egbe din ɖo hugan xwe e ɔ kpo ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn nyi wɛ bɔ hlɔnhlɔn kpo ɖo
ðo wu gble wa yi lɛ e wutu ɔ wutu kpo afɔ lɛ kpo nɔ tawun hweɖelɛnu ɖo taji ɔ nu lɛkɔ sin kunnuɖegbe ɔ nɛ
ɖɔ jehovah sin xomɛ kun nɔ hun ɖebu do mɛ nɔ nu tɔn e wu o
ɖɔ gbejininɔ tɔn wa wɛ yaya lɛ ɖe e xɔ akwɛ nu jehovah nɔ
ɖɔ linlin mɛɖee zize jo tɔn towe xɔ akwɛ nu jehovah
etɛ elifazi kpo biludadi kpo ɖɔ do mi nɔ wa nu mawu e wu
jehovah ɖe linlin tɔn gbɔn
sixu jɛ alɔ nu mawu a
nu do xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ tɔn ji a
hwenu elifazi temaninu ɔ kan nu enɛ lɛ byɔ jɔbu tlolo e ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ elifazi ɖi ɖɔ eo wɛ nyi xosin ɔ
tɔn biludadi cuwaxinu ɔ tlɛ dɔn nu ɖɔ e glo lɛ bɔ nyi hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖo mawu nukɔn xa jɔbu
adingbannɔ enɛ lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ gan do wɛ mi ɖe jehovah kpo gbejininɔ kpo lɛ e kun nɔ hɛn le ɖebu wa o ɖɔ mi kun xɔ akwɛ hu wanvu alo wevu ɖo mawu sin nukunmɛ o jɔb
enyi mi tlolo ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ elifazi kpo biludadi kpo ɖe linlin mɛɖesɔhwe tɔn
jɔb nu e ɖɔ ɔ enyi e nɔ so ɖaxo ɖe alo e nɔ jɔmɛhun ɖe mɛ wa wɛ lɛ ɖe e ɔ e sixu ci numaɖinu ɖɔhun
nu jehovah nɔ vovolivwe mɛ ayikungban mitɔn ji ɔ nukun enɛ wɛ e nɔ do fun jɔ do axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ wɛ mi ɖe e a
hun sixu jɛ alɔ nu mawu nɛ
etɛ elihu ɖɔ do gan ɖeɖee do wɛ mi ɖe jehovah e wu etɛ nyi tinmɛ tɔn
jehovah nu nu elihu hwenu e kan nu elɔ byɔ e a enyi nɔ wa ɖagbe ɔ nu tɛ mawu wɛ ɖe nu tɛ yi ɖo asi towe wɛ e ɖe
ðiɖɔ wɛ elihu ɖe ɖɔ gan do wɛ mi ɖe ɖo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e nyi nu yaya a
mi sixu blo bɔ e jɛ dɔkun alo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn a
loɔ jijɔ ɖagbe ɖebu nuwukpikpe ɖebu alo hlɔnhlɔn ɖebu mi ɖo e nyi nunina ɖe gosin mawu bɔ e nɔ ɖo ayi mi nɔ zan gbɔn e wu
etɛ wu jehovah nɔ ɖagbe mi nɔ wa nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e do
jehovah nɔ e tɔn lɛ e ci ɖɔ eɖesu wɛ e tlɔlɔ ɖɔhun
mɛ nɔ nu wamamɔnɔ ɔ nu wɛ e nya nu mawu mavɔmavɔ mawu ajɔ tɔn ɛ wɛ nunywɛxo ɖɔ
ðiɖɔ wɛ wemafɔ enɛ ɖe ɖɔ jehovah nɔ ɖo ayi nuwiwa ɖeɖee e wa do wamamɔnɔ lɛ tamɛ e wu a
mi sixu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖu axɔ do yaya ɖeɖee nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖagbewiwa mɔhun lɛ do mɔ nu e nya bɔ e wa nyɔna lɛ do su axɔ tɔn e a
ganji xo vi mawu tɔn ɖesunɔ ɖɔ e tlɛ xa luki
ezayii jlo do sɔ enɛ
nu ɖo co mɛɖe sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ gan do wɛ ɖe e nɔ su nukun mawu tɔn mɛ doo a
ðo e jehovah nukunmɛ yi gbe bɔ ze nyiɖee jo ɖo wa wɛ wutu ɔ e nu ɖebu ɖo dandan e mi do wa nu sɔgbe xa xo e ɖɔ e enyi tlɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ do gan ɖo ba le mɛ ɖo tɔn mɛ ɔ a ce
mi nu jɛ ɖo debola kpo balaaki kpo hwenu xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ gbɔn e
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo izlayɛli vi lɛ kpo ahwankpa yavini tɔn kpo tɛntin
axɔsu kanaa tɔn yavini kpa acɛ gannaganna nu izlayɛli vi lɛ nu xwe
xɛsi nɔ ɖi mɛ ɖo gletoxo ɔ mɛ lɛ e bɔ tlɛ nɔ ɖɔ e mɔ emi ɖo agbawungba a
ðo ahwan kɔli ɔ ɖe ɖo ɖe nu a ɖo hwan nabi ɖe a ɖo gaglonu nabi ɖe a loɔ yetɔn lɛ ɖo ahwankɛkɛvi gannɔ hwɛ
tɛ lɛ jehovah balaaki do nukɔn
izlayɛli ɖu ɖo ahwankpa yavini tɔn ji gbɔn
nu ɖo co jehovah gbɔn nyɔnu gbeyiɖɔ debola ji ɖegbe elɔ ɖo wɛn e nu balaaki sunnu degba we afɔwo ɖo nɛfutali kpo kpo sin akɔta lɛ mɛ kpla yi so
blo bɔ sisela ahwangan yavini tɔn ɔ ahwankɛkɛvi tɔn lɛ kpla tɔn lɛ bɔ wa tɔsisa kicɔni tɔn ɔ to ahwan
jo e nu hwɛ
balaaki gu hwenu ɖebu cobo xwedo jehovah ɛ lɛ e a xa lɛ
ðo ahwan taji ɖo tanaki e hwenu ɔ ji ɖaxo ɖe ajijimɛ blo bɔ fi do lɛ e bi nyi
balaaki nya ahwankpa sisela tɔn gbɔn ali yi halocɛti goyimu e ji nu kilomɛtlu
e jɛ hweɖenu ɖo ali ɔ ji bɔ sisela jo ahwankɛkɛvi tɔn do xɛsi nyi nuɖewanu din a e do kanwezun yi saananimu vlafo ɖo kedɛci kpa
e bibɛtɛn ɖo goxɔ yaɛli nyi keni vi ɔ sin asi e tɔn mɛ bɔ yaɛli yi
ahwan ɔ bɔ nu cikɔ nu sisela tawun bɔ e bi gbidigbidi
din ɔ e sixu xo glo akɔnkpinkpannu yaɛli wa hu e a hwɛ
e ɖu ɖo izlayɛli vi lɛ sin ji
tinmɛ tɛ lɛ lɛ do ahwan e xa sisela e ji
e ɖo lɛ wemata kpo kpo ɖo ɖo tinmɛ ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e mɔ ɖo ɖe mɛ mɔ ɖo ɖe ɔ mɛ a
ði ɔ lɛ ɖɔ sunvi lɛ ahwan ɔ sin jixwe nɔ fi nɔ gbɔn lɛ ahwan xa sisela
ɔ tinmɛ a
nu ɖevo tɛ sixu bɔ ji ɖaxo enɛ ja ɖo tɛn enɛ mɛ ɖo hwe enɛ ɖi bu ahwankɛkɛ zɛ alɔdo mawu tɔn wu
azɔn atɔn wɛ lɛ do gesi jehovah ɖi mɛ bɔ ɖu e
izlayɛli vi ze yeɖee jo lɛ e ɖebu sixu yi ɖɔ emi wɛ bɔ e ɖo ɖuɖeji a
etɛwu e donu mɛlɔzu
nukpacamɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ ɖo ɖuɖeji tɔn debola kpo balaaki kpo ji do kpa nu jehovah ɖo ɖuɖeji jiwu enɛ wu e sin tɛntin ɔ ɖɔ wɛnsagun mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn ɔ ɖɔ donu mɛlɔzu toxo ɔ donu donu toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo wa do alɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ a wa nu syɛnsyɛn lɛ ahwan a hwɛ
e sixu nyi ɖɔ toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ yeɖee jo nu balaaki ɖo ahwanfunfun ɔ mɛ a
ðo ze yeɖee jo ahwan xa kanaanu lɛ wutu ɔ mɛlɔzunu lɛ se ɖɔ e ɖo mɛ ɖo jlo lɛ e wɛ
alo mɛlɔzu sixu nyi toxo mɛ sisela hɔn gbɔn hwenu e ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba hɔn sin balaaki lɔmɛ e
bɔya ali hun nu mɛlɔzunu lɛ bɔ wli sisela loɔ wa a
do nukunmɛ ɖɔ ɖo nukunɖeji enɛ wɛ bɔ e ɖo do tɔn ji wɛ gbɔn ali yetɔn lɛ ji
loɔ hwenu ali hun nu bɔ wa nuɖe nu jehovah e ɔ blo nuti a
vogbingbɔn tɛ ɖo linlin mɛ lɛ ɖo ɖo lɛ mɛ e tɛntin
enɛ kan mi lɔ ɖo egbe gbɔn
ðo lɛ du monde nouveau mɛ ɔ mi mɔ vogbingbɔn ɖevo ɖo linlin mɛ ɖeɖee xwedo balaaki lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖeɖee xwedo e a lɛ e kpo ɖo e tɛntin
debola kpo balaaki kpo kpa ahwangan izlayɛli tɔn ɖeɖee ze yeɖee jo xwedo togun ɔ lɛ e
gbɔn vo nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo toci vɔvɔ koklojonɔ kun wɛ nɔ mɔ yeɖee zɛ xwe wu ze yeɖee jo a lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖeɖee jinjɔn akwɛnuvɔ kpinkpɛn e nɔ do lɛ e ji yi wan nu gbɛɖuɖu lɛ e e
mɛ ɖeɖee xwedo balaaki lɛ e ci mɛ ɖi zɔnlin ɖo ali ji yi wan nu fɛɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun a ɖo yedɛɛ lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ahwan ɖo sokan tɔn kpo tɔdo kicɔni tɔn kpo mɛ
e byɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo gbɛɖuɖu wɛ lɛ e ɖɔ yi tamɛ
ɛɛn ɖo tamɛ do ali hun nu bɔ bɔ linlin jehovah tɔn jɛnu bɔ jo do e ji
mɛ ɖeɖee do gudo fɔ ɖo wiwa nu mawu mɛ ɖo egbe lɛ e lɔ ɖo yi tamɛ
linlin akɔta hwlibɛni kpo kpo tɔn tɔn gbɔn vo nu linlin akɔta kpo nɛfutali kpo tɔn tɔn gbɔn
mɛ ɖeɖee ze yeɖee jo lɛ e mɔ jehovah e nyi e su gbɔn e tlɔlɔ
ɖo nu wu ɖɔ xo do e ɖi ɔ ɖo ɖagbe mawu mavɔmavɔ wa lɛ kpa wɛ
hwɛ ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ xo do akɔta hwlibɛni tɔn tɔn kpo tɔn kpo wu ɖo lɛ mɛ ɖo ayi ɖo nuɖokan yetɔn lɛ ɖi tɔjihun kpo tɔjihunglintɛn yetɔn lɛ kpo ji hu jehovah ɖo wiwa wɛ e
linlin vovo mɛ lɛ ɖo do mɛɖee zize jo wu e sixu nu taji ɖe mi
mi sixu nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e gbɔn ɖo egbe
egbe ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa ɖo ahwan tawun ɖe mɛ le a e jɔwu mi bɔ mi ɖe akɔnkpinkpan mitɔn gbɔn wɛnɖagbe jijla kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo gblamɛ
tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn hugan tɔn
nɔvi sunnu nɔvi nyɔnu kpo mɛ winnyawinnya kpo livi mɔkpan ɖo yeɖee ze jo wɛ ɖo hwebinu tɔn vovo lɛ mɛ nɔ nyi gbexosin lɛ nɔ ɖo betɛli nɔ gba kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ ze yeɖee jo ɖo lɛ kpo ɖaxo lɛ kpo hwenu
tamɛ do syɛnsyɛn wa wɛ mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖe ɖo nɔ kpe nukun do dotooxwe xo wu lɛ e mɛ e kpo ee nɔ wa do sɔnu nu ɖaxo lɛ e kpo e ji
ðeji ɖɔ linlin mɛɖee zize jo tɔn towe nɔ su nukun jehovah tɔn mɛ tawun bɔ e wɔn a ebl
mi sixu kudeji gbɔn ɖɔ linlin masɔgbe ɖiɖo do jehovah tɔn wu kun ɖo ɖiɖi bu mi wɛ o gbɔn
e ɖɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nɔ jo ɔ sin akpaxwe ɖaxo ɔ nyi kɔ ji nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ a
ɖo tɛn agbaza sin nu lɛ wɛ zɛ xwe wu bɔ nɔ jɛ linlin mɛɖee zize jo tɔn mɛ wɛ a
balaaki debola yaɛli kpo lɛ kpo ɖɔhun ɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo nɔ zan nu ɖebu ɖo e nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa gbe jehovah ɖe nu mi zawe e a
nu ɖo linlin wɛ tɛn yi toxo alo to ɖevo mɛ mɔ tɛn do mɔ akwɛ ɔ xoɖɛ tamɛ do nu e wa do xwedo kpo agun ɔ kpo wu e ji a
etɛ jehovah ɖo a bɔ mi sixu ɛ
jehovah wli nu mi yi gbe bɔ mi ɖo gudo nɔ nu e nyi e wɛ
jehovah nɔ zan gudo mi ɖe e do kɛnu nu sataan ɖo nu tɔn ɖɔ wɛ e
etɛ lɛ do sɔgudo wu
zaanɖe din ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e hu nu bi lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ ayikungban ɔ ji
mi ɖo nukun ɖo azan enɛ wɛ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
mi nɔ nu debola kpo balaaki kpo nɔ jihan ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ towe lɛ bi ku sisela ku gbɔn e loɔ towe lɛ ci hwe ɖɔhun
hwenu ahwan haamagedɔni tɔn e ɔ e ɖo hudo ɖebu tɔn cobo wa ɔ sin nu a
hwe enɛ ɔ mi ci finɛ kpowun mi tɛn a jehovah hwlɛn mi gan gbɔn e
din ɔ ali gege hun nu mi bɔ mi akɔnkpinkpan kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo do nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e
etɛ hwiɖee nɔ ze jo e sixu wa nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖu le tɔn lɛ e
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ doku nu mawu mavɔmavɔ
debola kpo balaaki kpo ɖuɖeji tɔn yetɔn gbɔn kpa nu ajalɔnnɔ ɔ e nɛ kpa nu nuɖiɖo lɛ a

sɛkpɔ ahwankɛkɛvi mɔhun do xɛsi e
nu jlo mɔ tinmɛ ɖevo lɛ do akpakpa mɛ tɔn elɔ ji hun atɔxwɛ flansegbe tɔn mɛ wexwɛ
xota ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe tɔn mɛ
jla mawu mavɔmavɔ sin nyikɔ
e nɔ wa nublibli alo nu agɔ nwt a
nu agɔ tɛ e wa xa nabɔti kpo vi sunnu tɔn lɛ kpo
e dohwɛ agɔ nya ɖe ɖɔ e hu hwɛ wu e nɔ ɖo nu mɛ e ɖe
