avivɔfun bla mɛ yi wan nu nujlɔjlɔwiwa lɛ e hwenu mɔ bɔ e hu nya xomɛvɔnɔ enɛ kpo vi sunnu tɔn lɛ kpo e
enɛ nyi xɛxo ɖe kpowun a
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi tamɛ do nu gbo nabɔti e kpo afɔ mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖe nyi do ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn mɛ e kpo ji
do biba nu biblu tɔn enɛ lɛ mi ɖɔ enyi mi ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e ɔ mɛɖesɔhwe ɖo taji
mi ɖɔ hwenu mi nuagɔwiwa wu ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e ɔ jlo do hwɛ kɛ mɛ sixu ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e
mɛ alɔkpa tɛ nabɔti nyi
etɛwu e ɖɔ emi kun sa viwungle emitɔn nu axɔsu akabu o
nabɔti nɔ gbeji nu jehovah hwenu izlayɛli vi gege ɖo nyanya axɔsu akabu tɔn kpo asi tɔn axɔsi jezabɛli nubaɖabaɖa ɔ kpo tɔn xwedo wɛ e
baalu enɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo sisi ɖebu nu jehovah a nɔ keya nu nugbododo tɔn lɛ a
kancica nabɔti ɖo kpo jehovah kpo e xɔ akwɛ hu eɖesunɔ tɔn
xa axɔsu lɛ
hwenu akabu byɔ nabɔti ɖɔ emi xɔ viwungle tɔn alo ɛ ee hu e ɖevo ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ e ɔ nabɔti
e tinmɛ kpo sisi kpo ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ lɔn nu ma jo gu ɖu ɖo lɛ si ɔ nu o
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nabɔti ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nu lɛ wu e
jezabɛli ɖo nabɔti sin ku mɛ gbɔn
e blawu ɖɔ nabɔti e bɔ axɔsu akabu kpo asi tɔn kpo wa dakaxomɛwu ɖebɔdoɖewu sin nu ɖe lɛ
bonu jezabɛli mɔ tɛn do yi viwungle ɔ nu asu tɔn ɔ e blo tuto hwɛ agɔ e do nabɔti e tɔn sin enɛ wu bɔ e hu nabɔti kpo vi sunnu tɔn lɛ kpo bi
jehovah ɖeɖɛ nuagɔwiwa ɖaxo enɛ gbɔn
jehovah ɖɔ emi yi wan nu hwɛjlɔjlɔɖiɖɔ gbɔn
jehovah yawu elii do akabu
elii ɖɔhwɛ do akabu ɖɔ e nyi nyi nugbo wɛ
gbeta tɛ kɔn jehovah wa do ninɔmɛ ɔ wu
e wa nu e wa xa nabɔti e xa akabu asi tɔn kpo vi sunnu tɔn lɛ kpo axɔ
e ɖo co numaɖonukun ɖe jɛ yeɖee hwe ɖeji do jehovah wu e
akabu wa nu gbɔn hwenu e se hwɛɖonumɛ jehovah tɔn e etɛ mɛ e tɔn kɔ do
ee akabu se hwɛ jehovah ɖo e ɔ e vun awu do kɔ nu eɖee ati kpla bla ati ɔ mɛ wɛ e nɔ keze ɔ e nɔ ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wɛ wuɖewuɖe
akabu eɖee hwe
jehovah ɖɔ nu elii ɖɔ ee e eɖee hwe ɔ kɔn nu nyanya do xwedo tɔn ji hwenu e ɖo axɔsu ɖu wɛ ɔ a loɔ vi tɔn hwenu wɛ nu nyanya ɔ kɔn do xwedo tɔn ji
etɛwu mɛɖesɔhwe cyɔn alɔ hɛnnumɔ nabɔti tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo ji
gbeta enɛ ci nu mɛ ɖeɖee tuun adaka akabu xo e
huzuhuzu enɛ sixu hɛnnumɔ nabɔti tɔn kpo tɔn lɛ kpo sin nuɖiɖi
enyi hun mɛɖesɔhwe cyɔn alɔ ji bɔ kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo ɖeji ɖɔ nuagɔwiwa glo mawu emitɔn xa
nabɔti vi sunnu tɔn lɛ kpo hɛnnumɔ yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖu hwɛ jlɔjlɔ nu bi vɔ e sin vivi hwenu jehovah lɛ sin ku e
nugbo ɔ nu jehovah ɖɔhwɛ ɔ e nɔ ɖo ayi nuɖe lɛ wu bɔ midɛɛ lɛ nɔ tuun a
enɛ wu ɔ mɛɖesɔhwe nɔ cyɔn alɔ xomɛvɔnɔ lɛ ji bɔ nɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ sixu nuɖiɖi mitɔn
ali tɛ lɛ mɛɖesɔhwe cyɔn alɔ mi ji ɖe
enyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ wa gbeta mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ a e ɖe kɔn alo vlafo yi gbe a ɔ wa nu gbɔn
ði ɔ enyi e yi ɖe sin asi alo e yi sin mɛ yi wan e ɖe si ɔ etɛ wa
enyi asi towe asu towe vi towe alo towe ɖe wɛ e ɖe sin agun mɛ bɔ yi gbe a ɔ etɛ wa
enyi ɖɔ e ku nublawu nu e ɖo ku a e ɖe ɔ etɛ wa
ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ sixu nuɖiɖi mi ɖo nu jehovah kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo e
mɛɖesɔhwe cyɔn alɔ ji hwenu ɖo tɛnkpɔn mɔhun ɖe mɛ e gbɔn
mi ɖo ali we
enyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ wa gbeta ɖe kɔn bɔ yi gbe a ɔ wa nu gbɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛɖesɔhwe mi bɔ mi tuun ɖɔ mi kun mɔ nu jɛ ninɔmɛ ɔ mɛ bi o
enyi mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ ɖe mɛ gbɔn ɖebu ɔ jehovah kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ ayi tɔn mɛ
wegɔ ɔ mɛɖesɔhwe mi bɔ mi miɖee ɖo suulu nɔte jehovah bonu e jla nu agɔ ɖebu e wa e ɖo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nuwiwa kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo wa ɖagbe nu mɛ ɖeɖee ninɔmɛ ɖe kan lɛ e bi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo xa
nu mi do nu enɛ e mi bɔ mi gbeje linlin mi nɔ ɖo do hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ wu e gbɔn e
e bɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ ca kan xa linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e gbɔn e
wujɔmɛ tɛ lɛ sin vivi ɖu e ɖe adɔgbigbo gbɔn
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe wɛ nu bɔ e tuun ganji ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ
jezu tɔn wɛ lobɔ e ze titewungbe ɖe lɛ mɛ
nu nukunɖeji ɖe wɛ nyi nu enɛ ɖo kosi gbo ada a e ɖe wɛ nu kɔnɛyi
hwenu gbigbɔ jɛte do kɔnɛyi kpo mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ji e ɔ yi gbe ɖɔ mɛ elɔ lɛ e mawu gbigbɔ e mi gbɔn ɔ e sixu ɖɔ e blo baptɛm nu kpo sin kpo o a mɛ
ðo xwe tɔn ɔ lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn ɖo jeluzalɛmu lɛ e kpo kple ɖɔ kosi wa huzu klisanwun lɛ e ɖo gbo ada alo gbɔ wɛ a ji
ðo kple enɛ ji ɔ ɖɔ xo kpo adɔgbigbo kpo flin nɔvi lɛ ɖɔ gbigbɔ jɛte do kosi gbo ada a lɛ e ji ɖo xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie
xwle nu jɛ lɛ e kpo adɔgbigbo kpo gbɔn e su jwifu lɛ kpo kosi wa huzu klisanwun lɛ e kpo nukunmɛ
jiɖe ɖiɖo do nya enɛ zin ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e wu bɔwu e ebl
taan klewun ɖe gudo ɖo kple blo ɖo xwe tɔn e gudo ɔ yi antyɔci silii tɔn
hwenu e ɖo finɛ e ɔ e vo nɔ xa nɔvi tɔn nyi kosi lɛ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu tuun lɛ e kpo nu e mɔ lɛ e kpo hɛn le wa nu tawun
nu enɛ wa e wa nu do jwifu ɖevo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e wu jɛ baanabasi ji bɔ lɔ wa
etɛ bɔ klisanwun mɛxo agun tɔn zin e ɖe wa nu enɛ sixu klan agun ɔ e
ðo taji ɔ etɛ ninɔmɛ enɛ sixu mi hwenu mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖɔ xo ɖe alo wa nuɖe nu mi e
xa galatinu lɛ
jɛ xɛsiɖiɖi nu tɔn mɛ
pɔlu nɔ kple e blo ɖo jeluzalɛmu ɖo xwe tɔn e tɛnmɛ e nu nu ɖo antyɔci ɖe yɛmɛnuwiwa tɔn gba mɛ
kosi wa huzu klisanwun bɔ nuwanyido tɔn wa nu do wu lɛ e wa nu gbɔn do nuagɔwiwa enɛ wu
lɔn bɔ nu enɛ nyi nu wɛ a
wujɔmɛ xɔ akwɛ lɛ kpo ɖo nuwanyido tɔn wu wɛ a
ɖu hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ jehovah tɔn sin le gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ eɖee hwe yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ pɔlu tɔn
nuti ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ e wujɔmɛ tɔn lɛ kpo a
nugbo ɔ mawu wa mɛ bɔ e wlan wema mɛ we bɔ ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ
e jɛ ɖɔ e wu ɖɔ ɖo wema mɛ wegɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ ylɔ pɔlu ɖɔ nɔvi mitɔn
mɛ ɔ ali hun nu agun ɔ tɔn lɛ bɔ xwedo jezu kpo tɔn kpo tɔn nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ hu tɔn
e ɖɔ mɛɖe lɔn bonu nuwanyido ɖe tɔn nyi o
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖe linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e
mi sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo enɛ mɛ fɛɛ fi ɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi hwenu nuwanyido nɔvi ɖe tɔn lɛ wa nu do mi wu tlɔlɔ e
ðo ninɔmɛ mɔhun ɖe mɛ ɔ mi ɖe linlin jehovah ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e a
ði ɔ enyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖɔ nuɖe linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ wu ɔ wa nu gbɔn
lɔn bɔ nu mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖo manywɛ mɛ bɔ e nu e nyi nu wɛ a
yawu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ e kun jɛxa mɛxo o wɛ a alo ɖo suulu nɔte jezu nyi gan agun ɔ tɔn e
do gan mɔ nu zɛ nuwanyido enɛ wu vlafo tamɛ do xwe nabi nɔvi enɛ wa kpo gbejininɔ kpo e ji a
enyi nɔvi hu hwɛ do e ɖe kpo ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn sin wa wɛ alo tlɛ mɔ ɖevo lɛ ɔ xa ɛ a
jlo do hwɛ kɛ mɛ ganji ɖɔ ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e xa matie
etɛ ji mi ɖo ku do
akpakpa nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu nujlɔjlɔwiwa lɛ e do gbe gbe jehovah ɖe nuagɔwiwa sataan kpo tɔn nyanya ɔ kpo wa do lɛ wu e siin bi e wu
eza jɛ hwe enɛ ɔ nu mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kudeji ba ɖe linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu e gbɔn dogbo mitɔn lɛ tuuntuun ɖo mɛɖesɔhwe mɛ kpo jlo do hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖeɖee hu hwɛ do mi lɛ e kpo gblamɛ
alɔdido jonɔ lɛ nu jehovah kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
alɔdido vi jonɔ lɛ tɔn
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖɔ xo do ninɔmɛ vɛwu nɔvi sunnu mitɔn kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn kpo ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e nɔ mɔ lɛ e ji e tawun tawun ɖe lɛ do mi sixu gbɔn ganji e ji
xota wegɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan sixu ɖeɖee gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn wa ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e bɔ wa gbeta ɖeɖee wa ɖagbe nu vi yetɔn lɛ e kɔn gbɔn e ji
gbɛzan tɔn tokunɔ nyi e bonu gɔn nu mɛ ðevo lɛ a
nu wanyiyi towe ðekpo o
yi wan nu mi hu elɔ lɛ a
xota elɔ lɛ mi sixu ahwan xa linlin cejɛnnabi tɔn elɔ tɔn gbɔn nya xɛ ɖo wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah nugbo biblu tɔn kpo ee mi ɖo nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ e kpo ji gbɔn e
xota elɔ lɛ ɖɔ xo do mi sixu ɖo wanyiyi nu klisu nyi nu nu elɔ tɔn lɛ a gbɔn e ji
gayiwusi nɔvi tɔn lɛ gbɔn e
awajijɛ e nɔ mɔ ðo gbɛzan bɔkun e ɖe zinzan mɛ e
jehovah nɔ hɛn jonɔ lɛ ðɛh
mɛtɛnkpɔn tɛ lɛ mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gege nɔ mɔ
mi sixu bɔ e su hudo ɖaxo ɖe nu nu kan mɛ ahwan nya sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e sin do gbɔn
etɛ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ hwenu mi ɖo mawuxo ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ahwan nya sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e wɛ e
mɛtɛnkpɔn tɛ lɛ nɔ kpannukɔn ɖe lɛ ɖo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ nyite
hwenu tohwan ɔ ɖo burundi e ɔ xwedo mitɔn ɖo ɖe ji wɛ nɔvi sunnu nɔ nyi lije e ɖɔ
mi mɔ bɔ lɛ ɖo wezun kan wɛ ɖo tu da wɛ
lɛ kpo nɔvi mitɔn kpo hɔn do yetɔn ji nu kwinwe ɖe jɛn hɛn
xwedo sin mɛɖe lɛ blo kilomɛtlu jɛji gudo e ɔ wa wa bibɛtɛn tɔn ɖe mɛ ɖo malawi
mi mɛ kpo lɛ e gbado
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ahwan alo yadonumɛ nya sin to yetɔn lɛ mɛ e yi jɛji e mɔ mɔhun a
jehovah tɔn donu mɔkpan wɛ ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
mɛ lɛ ku do gege yetɔn bɔ hɛn ɖibla nyi nuɖokan yetɔn lɛ bi bu
ɖevo tɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ nɔ mɔ
mi sixu jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ tuun jehovah a lɛ e gbɔn
jezu kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ gege kpo huzu mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
ee wɛnsagun jehovah tɔn nu jozɛfu ɖɔ axɔsu elɔdu ɖo linlin hu jezu wɛ e ɔ jezu kpo ɖo vu e kpo tɔn lɛ kpo huzu mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ e ɖo ejipu
xwe nabi ɖe gudo ɔ ahwanvu jezu tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ gbakpe judee kpodo samalii kpan gbeji ɖo yadonumɛ wu
e ɖɔ nu e doya nu ɖo toxo ɖe mɛ hun hɔn yi toxo ɖevo mɛ
awovinu tɛ lɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ mɔ hwenu ɖo wɛ e
hwenu ɖo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɖe mɛ e
hwenu mɛ lɛ ɖo sin to yetɔn mɛ wɛ e ɔ awovinu lɛ sixu alo sixu mɔ awovinu lɛ hwenu ɖo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ mɛ e
nyi nɔvi sunnu kpɛvi lije tɔn e flin ɖɔ mi ɖi zɔnlin nu aklunɔzan gbla gege gbɔn cyɔ kanweko mɔkpan kpa
xwe wɛ ɖo hwe ɔ
afɔ lɛ ji bɔ gbɔ ɖɔ nu xwedo ɖɔ jo mi do yi
jlo jo mi do nu kponɔ lɛ a gbɔ mi
xwedo lije tɔn tɔn lɛ gege zan xwe mɔkpan ɖo bibɛtɛn tɔn nations unies tɔn lɛ mɛ
e ɖo co nɔ ayijayi mɛ ɖo finɛ a
lije ee nyi lɛdo tɔn din e ɖɔ mɛ gege ɖo a
nɔ ɖɔ mɛ nu nɔ ahan nɔ akɔ nɔ nɔ wa nublibli
enyi ɖo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖi xwi xa ninɔmɛ nyanya enɛ lɛ ɔ ɖo ɖo alɔ ɖo agun tɔn lɛ mɛ bi
wanyiyi mawu tɔn klisanwun lɛ bɔ wa nu xa nɔvi yetɔn ɖo hudo mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
wanyiyi mawu tɔn ɖo mi bɔ mi ɖe wanyiyi miɖee lɛ ɖo taji ɔ mɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ mɛ lɛ e xa jaan
hwenu adɔ doya nu klisanwun judee tɔn lɛ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e ɔ agun ɔ blo tuto mɛ
pɔlu kpo kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ yi yeɖee
agaɖanu din ɔ jehovah tɔn sunnu nyɔnu kpo yɔkpɔvu kpo donu mɔkpan wɛ ɖo ahwan kpo yadonumɛ kpo wu sin zanzanhweji ukraine tɔn
nɔvi gbigbɔ tɔn yetɔn lɛ kpla gege yetɔn yi vo ji ɖo ukraine bɔ lɛ xɔ mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ ɖo russie
ðo to we lɛ bi mɛ ɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu toxoɖiɖɔ nyi ɔ tɔn a kpo ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ gbɔn fi lɛ fi lɛ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo jaan mɛ
tɛ lɛ sixu kpannukɔn mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo to ɖevo mɛ
etɛwu mi ɖo kpo suulu kpo
hwenu mɛɖe lɛ tɛn to yetɔn sin dogbo lɛ a e ɔ mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ nɔ wa mɔ yeɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ ma do ɖebu a lɛ e mɛ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ
acɛkpikpa lɛ sixu nuɖuɖu nuzinzan kpo xɔ kpo loɔ sixu gbɔ nuɖuɖu ma do lɛ e mɔ
e sixu vɛwu nu mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to mɛ yozo nɔ ɖe wa to mɛ ayi mɛ nɔ fa ɖe e azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ bɔ tuun sɔnu glo jɔhɔn gbɔn e
nu gletoxo ɖe mɛ wɛ gosin ɔ e nɔ zan nuzinzan xɔsa tɔn ɖeɖee e nɔ zan ɖo to hun nukun mɛ lɛ e gbɔn e sixu bu vo do
acɛkpikpa ɖe lɛ tutomɛ ɖe lɛ do mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e bonu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖe e
hwɛhwɛ ɔ acɛkpikpa lɛ nɔ ɖo nukɔn ɖo si ɖɔ ɖe lɛ gudo ɔ kpe nukun do yeɖee wu
tintɛnkpɔn sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ ɔ sixu vɛwu tawun
do nukun mɛ ɖɔ ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ gbe ɖevo sɔgbe xa ɖevo lɛ sɔgbe xa aca ɖevo nɔ nɔ ganmɛ ji nɔ su nu vovo nɔ zan lɛ e factures sin akwɛ ɖɔ wemaxɔmɛ yiyi vi towe lɛ tɔn xo lobɔ taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ jɛn wa nu enɛ lɛ bi
sixu ɖo suulu nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee enɛ lɛ kpannukɔn e kpo sisi kpo a fili
mi sixu hɛn nuɖiɖi mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ wa to mitɔn mɛ lɛ e tɔn lido gbɔn
acɛkpikpa lɛ nɔ blo bɔ e nɔ vɛwu nu nɔvi mitɔn ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e bɔ mɔ agun ɖo xa yetɔn mɛ e
tutomɛ ɖe lɛ nɔ van nukun do nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɖɔ nu ɖeɖee byɔ ɖɔ gɔn kple lɛ e ɔ e kun o
xɛsi kpo ganmaɖo kpo bɔ nɔvi mitɔn ɖe lɛ jo gbe
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi yawu yi nɔvi mitɔn ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e tlolo wa to mitɔn mɛ e
ɖo mɔ ɖɔ nu yetɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
nu nukɔntɔn tɛ lɛ sin hudo mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo
mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e sixu ɖɔ nu su nukun emitɔn mɛ gbɔn
jɛ nukɔn ɔ mi sixu bɔ mɔ nuɖuɖu nuzinzan kpo nu ɖevo ɖo dandan lɛ e kpo
nu klewun klewun ɖe lɛ wiwa ɖi klavati ɖe nina nɔvi sunnu ɖe sixu su nukun tɔn mɛ tawun
hwenu mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ nu su emi nukunmɛ nɔ ɖo nu ɖebu byɔ wɛ kpowun a e ɔ e nɔ bɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ e nɔ mɔ awajijɛ ɖo nunamɛ mɛ e
e ɖo ɖo ali tawun tawun ɖe lɛ
mi sixu nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
mi sixu tawun tawun lɛ mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
na ɖokpo
alɔ tawun tawun lɛ dido mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e byɔ ɖɔ e zan akwɛ gege a loɔ nu taji ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi zan hwenu mitɔn ɖɔ nu yetɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
mi sixu e nɔ do sin hun gbɔn e e nɔ akwɛ kpɛɖe do xɔ nuɖuɖu hunsin ɖagbe tɔn gbɔn e alo e sixu mɔ azɔwanu e sixu zan do gbɔn e alo e sixu nuɖe mɔ tɛn do mɔ akwɛ kpɛɖe gbɔn e
ee ɖo taji hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi sixu bɔ ɖo lɛ mɛ ganji ɖo agun yetɔn ɔ mɛ
e blo hun byɔ ɖɔ emi yi kple lɛ
ɔ tinmɛ sixu sɛkpɔ mɛ lɛ jla wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbɔn ɖo fi mi nɔ jla wɛn ɖe e
hwenu mɛ winnyawinnya hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɛnɛ wa agun ɖokpo mɛ e ɔ mɛxo vovo lɛ e nɔ kun nɔ wlan nu ɖo ji gbɔn e nɔ sin xwe nu nu e wa lɛ e do wema ji gbɔn e vitae kpo blo tuto yetɔn gbɔn wa nu jehovah bi gbɔn e kpo
e lin a bɔ bi gbexosin
enɛ kpo gan ɖeɖee yeɖesunɔ do ba kpe nu nya wɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e wu e kpo bɔ yi nukɔn bɔ nyanya sataan tɔn kpe wu a
mɛtɛnkpɔn tɛ mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo ɖi xwi xa
klisanwun lɛ bi ɖɔhun ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo ɖi xwi xa mɛtɛnkpɔn kpo kɔgbidinumɛ kpo ɖeɖee bɔ jo kancica ɖo kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e do ɖo nu agbaza tɔn lɛ wu e
lije xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e kpo nɔvi tɔn lɛ kpo flin nuɖiɖi sin nu yetɔn hwenu tlɛ ɖo wɛ e e
ðe jɛ ɖe gudo ɔ e nuɖokan mitɔn mi hɛn bɔ ɖo dandan a lɛ e nyi gbe
gudo mɛ ɔ e saki ɔ ɖɔ kpo nukiko kpo ɖɔ mɔ a
nu sin hudo ɖo e bi ɖie xa timɔtee
mi sixu nɔ gudo nu mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gbɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e linu
e byɔ ɖɔ e mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo gbigbɔ kpo nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e kpo linu hu ɖɔ e ɖo agbaza lixo
gannugannu ɔ mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e jo xwedo yetɔn nu tawun e to yetɔn kpo agun yetɔn lɛ kpo do
e ɖo taji ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah yi wan nu mɔ ɖɔ klisanwun yetɔn lɛ ɖo se xa wɛ
e nyi a ɔ hɛnnumɔ alo yetɔn kpo kpo sixu ɖo aca ɖokpo ɔ alo nɔ ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ lɛ e sixu dɔn bu
kɔ nu mi blo bonu mɔ ɖɔ agun ɔ yi emi ganji ɔ e ɖɔ mi ɖo wujɔmɛ ɔ ɖo wa xa jehovah wɛ bonu e hɛn jonɔ lɛ wɛ nɛ ðɛh
ɔ lije ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ mɔ bɔ e hwlɛn kan xa xwedo yetɔn tɔn lɛ alo hu lɛ e sixu ɖɔ vi emitɔn lɛ kun lɛkɔ yi fi awe mɔhunkɔtɔn lɛ xo ɖe e o
do mɛ ɖeɖee ji nu mɔhun jɛ do lɛ e ɔ nɔvi ɖo fi mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e wa e ɖo ɖo ayixa ɖokpo ɔ yi wan nu yeɖee nɔvi nɔvi ɖɔhun xomɛ do yeɖee wu nɔ yeɖee hwe
yadonumɛ bɔ mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ nɔ yeɖee xwe bɔ winnya sixu hu do mɔ wɛ ɖe lɛ e ɖiɖɔ wu ɖo taji ɔ hwenu vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo finɛ e
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ nu ɖo tɛn yetɔn mɛ ɔ ɖɔ e wa nu xa mi gbɔn
wɛn jijla mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e nɔ do gbɔ nu gbɔn
mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gege gosin to mɛ e mitɔn ɖe lɛ e mɛ
kanɖodonuwu ɖeɖee ɖo to yi mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e tɔn bɔ mɛ mɔkpan ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin xo se wɛ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ
mi sixu ɖe nunywɛ ɖo hwenu mi ɖo wɛn jla nu mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e wɛ e gbɔn
xwedo alaxɔ kpo acɛkpikpa xa ɔ mɛ tɔn tɔn kpo hwiɖesunɔ alo mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɖo axɔ gbeɖe o
tuun sinsɛn mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e tɔn kpo aca yetɔn kpo tuun nu nɔ nu e ɖo sisi
ði ɔ to ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ mɛ yetɔn lɛ nɔ tawun ɖɔ nyɔnu lɛ sɔnu ganji
enɛ wu ɔ enyi ɖo wɛn jla nu mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e wɛ hun sɔnu ganji do xomɛsin nu o
samaliinu ɖɔ emi nyi nɔzo ɖagbe ɖo lo jezu tɔn mɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ mi jlo mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo se wɛ lɛ e mɛ nyi a lɛ e lɔ luk
ali ɖagbe hugan mi sixu wa ɖe e wɛ nyi gbɔn wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla nu gblamɛ
mɛxo agun tɔn mɛ hɔn sin to tɔn mɛ lɛ e gege e ɖe ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi nyi wɛn azɔn ɖokpo ɖɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ mi nyi bɔ mitɔn taji ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e nyi ɖo agbaza lixo a
e nyi a ɔ do xa mi ɖo ɖagbe yeɖesunɔ tɔn kɛɖɛ wu kpowun
nu e wanyiyi klisanwun tɔn mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɔ ɖagbe tɛ nɔ sin mɛ
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
wanyiyi klisanwun tɔn jonɔ lɛ nɔ hɛn le ɖagbe lɛ wa
hwenu nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ nyi alganesh e sin asu ku e ɔ e hɔn sin erythree e kpo vi tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo yadonumɛ wu
ee zɔn ali gbɔn gbetotlo mɛ kpo nu cikɔ kpo nu azan tantɔn gudo e ɔ wa wa soudan
e ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ wa nu xa mi ci ɖɔ hɛnnumɔ yetɔn wɛ mi nyi ɖɔhun nuɖuɖu nuzinzan kpo fi mi e kpo kpo mi
mɛ ɖevo tɛ sixu yi jonɔ lɛ do xwe tɔn gbe ɖo nɔ mawu ɖokpo ɔ kpowun wutu
jehovah tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu wa xa jaan
bɔ vi mɔkpan nɔ xwedo yetɔn lɛ bɔ bi nɔ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ kpo mɛ ɖevo tɛn lɛ e kpo
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi gbeje mi bi sixu bɔ jehovah kpo xomɛhunhun kpo gbɔn e
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi zan xogbe mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e do do gesi mɛ ɖeɖee tɛn ɖo ahwan yadonumɛ alo adla lɛ wu lɛ e sixu dogbo to yetɔn tɔn lɛ alo gbɔ
sɔgbe kpo xo haut des nations unies les refugies ɖɔ e kpo ɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ ɖo ji nɔ tɛn gannugannu
xota flin ðɔ ðo yi mɛ nɔ wa jonɔ lɛ e ganji ee ɖo atɔxwɛ octobre tɔn mɛ e wex
nu mɛ ɖeɖee hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e wa to mitɔn mɛ gudo tlolo ɔ mɛxo lɛ ɖo xwedo ɖo mi tito basina nado wa ojlo jehovah ton mɛ e wemata akpaxwe
mɛxo lɛ sixu nɔ ɖɔ xo xa agun ɖeɖee ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e gbɔn wema winwlan alaxɔ yeɖesunɔ tɔn gbɔn jw org ji gblamɛ
ðo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ sixu kan nu byɔ do agun mɛ mɛ hɔn sin to tɔn mɛ e ɖe gosin e kpo tɔn kpo wu tuun e ɖe gbɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ayi yetɔn ɖo ɖo do wiwa wu
xota medepope sogan afanume ogan kpo gboado jehovah we alogoto towe
kpo ɖeɖee ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe avril tɔn mɛ e wexwɛ
se ɖɔ vi lɛ ɖo zan wɛ ɖo nugbo mɛ ɔ nuɖe nɔ hun xomɛ nu mi hu a jaan
lɛ sixu ɖagbe nu vi yetɔn lɛ gbɔn
xwedo tɔn lɛ sixu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ gbe le mɛ wɛ xwedo ɔ nɔ yi kple do gbɔn
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e kpo vi yetɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn
tɛ gege vi gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e tɔn nɔ mɔ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ xota elɔ gbeje
sin vu wɛ nɔ do gbe tɛn ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e tɔn ɖo xwegbe kpo agun ɔ kpo mɛ wɛ joshua ɖɔ
ee wemaxɔmɛ e ɔ jɛ wan yi nu gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ji
ðo xwe klewun ɖe gudo ɔ nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn kɛɖɛ
nɔ sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ kple lɛ mɛ a aca lɛ tɔn ma mi a
enyi joshua kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ ninɔmɛ mɔhun mɛ a
ðo egbe ɔ jɛji wɛ gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn ɖo fi ɖevo
nu ɖe wɛ nyi ɖo to ɖevo mɛ ɔ sixu hun ali ɖagbe hugan ɔ nu vi towe lɛ bɔ yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɖo zan wɛ ɖo nugbo mɛ gbɔn
jaan mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu gbɔn
etɛ lɛ ɖo ɖo nukun sin vi yetɔn lɛ si a
lɛ emi ɖagbe mitɔn ɖo dandan cobɔ vi mitɔn lɛ jɛ zɔnlin ɖi gbɔn ɔ ji ji
enɛ wu ɔ zan ɖo ji e
nu agbaza tɔn lɛ do do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ takunmɛ gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ do o
do gan nɔ ɖu axɔ o
dɔkun ɖo mawu enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ bonu nu towe jehovah nukunmɛ dɔkun fi tɔn alo xɔ ɖo lɛ o xa jaan
nu alɔnu towe jan bonu taan kpo nu vi towe lɛ gbeɖe o
nu vi towe lɛ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn jehovah ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ xixɔ alo dɔkun nu yeɖee alo nu a hun nu tuun ɖɔ nɔ go ɖo wu
nyi alɔ nu linlin nyi klisanwun tɔn a ɖɔ ɖɔ vi lɛ ɖo blo bɔ lɛ zan vivo mɛ ninɔ sin e
etɛwu lɛ ɖo nɔ ɖɔ xo do jehovah wu xa vi yetɔn lɛ
e ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ lɛ ɖo ahwan nyi wa tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ wɛ bɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ do gbe vovo
vi towe lɛ wɛ nyi biblu taji hugan sixu ɖo e bɔ enyi tuun jehovah ɔ e bɔ mɔ mavɔmavɔ
jaan bonu vi towe lɛ do tuun nukplɔnmɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɔ ɖo nɔ ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ ɖo hweɖebunu ali tɔn hun e xa
le tɛ gbe towe kpinkplɔn sixu hɛn wa nu vi towe lɛ
vlafo vi towe lɛ jlo gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖo wemaxɔmɛ kpo fi ɖe e kpo gbe towe wɛ do nukɔn gbɔn nu wiwa ɖo xa hwɛhwɛ ɖo gbe towe mɛ gblamɛ
hu ɔ na tɛn vi towe lɛ nu nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo xa kpo ayi bi kpo ɖo gbe towe hɛn le gege ɖevo lɛ wa nu
enyi vi towe lɛ nɔ do gbe we ɔ e bɔ nuwukpikpe nu linlin tɔn yetɔn kpo nɔ wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e kpo
e sixu hun ali nu bɔ gblo ada nu yetɔn
carolina ee sin lɛ gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn ɖo to ɖevo mɛ e ɖɔ agun jonɔgbe tɔn ɖe mɛ ninɔ vivi
e nɔ tawun ɖɔ e ɖo fi hudo ɖe e
enyi dogbo gbe tɔn ɖo tagba do nu wɛ ɖo xwedo towe mɛ ɔ etɛ sixu wa
e ɖo co ɖo aca kpo gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn kpo jɛ vi gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e ma ji wutu ɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ bɔ jlo nɔ ɖo do yetɔn ɖekpo nuwukpikpe ɖo nɔ ɖɔ xo e lɔ tlɛ sixu ɖekpo
lɛ emi enyi nu enɛ wɛ ɖo vi mitɔn wa wɛ ɔ sixu e hwe bi ɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ mɛ a
nu mɔ nukunnu jɛ vi towe lɛ tɔn mɛ ayiɖeɖayi yetɔn lɛ mɛ nɔ wa ɖo wemaxɔmɛ lɛ e mɛ nɔ kpewu nɔ ɖɔ xo xa yetɔn lɛ tlɔlɔ ɔ e bɔkun nu bɔ do klisanwun ji
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ gbe ɖevo kpinkplɔn nɔ byɔ hwenu gandido kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo
nu e sin nuɖe wu vlafo bɔ vi towe huzu tokunɔ ɔ tokunɔgbe do ɖɔ xo xa ɛ a ce
enyi gbemase nɔ do tagba nu ɔ sixu vi towe lɛ gbɔn
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ e sixu nɔ blo bɔ gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn wa to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e se gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn vi yetɔn lɛ nɔ do e ganji
enyi ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ wɛ ɖe ɔ sixu kpo ɖo alɔ do vi towe lɛ wɛ nu wa tuun jehovah yi wan
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nɔ goɖokponɔ mitɔn ɖo do gbe kpo nyɛ kpo nɔ do ganji e wu e ɖo dogbo midɛɛ lɛ lɔ nɔ do gbe eyɛ tɔn ganji a wɛ mɛxo e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ e flin
hwenu mi nɔ mɔ nɔ ɖo nu wɛ ɖo ɖɛ xo wɛ nɔ ɖo nu wu e kpe e bi wa wɛ ba blo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ e ɔ mi mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ jehovah tuuntuun nyi nu taji tawun
lɛ sixu vi sixu nu do gbe we mɛ e gbɔn
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ vi ɖe lɛ nu do jehovah wu do gbe nɔ do ɖo wemaxɔmɛ e kpo ee nɔ do ɖo xwegbe e kpo mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖe lɛ nɔ zan wema e zin lɛ e xoyidokanji lɛ kpo lɛ kpo do gbe we lɛ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e ɖo zan hwenu gege do gan tawun do vi yetɔn lɛ nu ɖo kancica syɛnsyɛn ɖe kpo jehovah kpo
wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ gbe le mɛ wɛ xwedo ɔ nɔ yi kple do
etɛ e ɖo wa cobo wa gbeta ɖe kɔn
nu agun nɔ do towe e ɖe sɛkpɔ finɛ ɔ nukanbyɔ ɖe ɖo gbe tɛ mɛ e hugan ɖɔ xwedo ɔ nɔ yi kple do
nu tɛ lɛ ji xwedo tɔn ɔ ɖo nu do
nugbododo tɛ lɛ e zan
nu mi gbeje ɖe lɛ
etɛ gbe sixu wa nu vi lɛ nu gbɔn ɖo kple lɛ ji e
etɛwu vi ɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ emi kun emitɔn lɛ tɔn o
lɛ ɖo do nu nu hudo vi yetɔn lɛ tawun e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enyi vi ɖe nɔ do gbe ɖebu ɔ cobonu e mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo ɔ mɛ ganji ɔ e nyi taan klewun e nɔ zan ɖo kple lɛ ji ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e sin hudo kɛɖɛ wɛ e ɖo a
ɖo ayi nu elɔ wu nu e nɔ blo kple lɛ do gbe mɛ vi lɛ mɔ nu jɛ ganji e ɔ kple enɛ lɛ yiyi kpowun sixu bɔ nu gege zɛ nu yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ e wu
enyi vi lɛ mɔ nu jɛ gbe mɛ e nɔ blo kple ɔ do e mɛ ganji a ɔ nu sixu gbɔ nyi xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
vi ɖe tɔn sixu nɔ nyi gbe mɛ e nɔ tamɛ do e
nugbo ɔ vi ɖe lɛ sixu xosin nina biblo kpo xo xwixwlemɛ kpo do tɔn mɛ fɛɛ co xo e nɔ ɖɔ ɖo vovo enɛ lɛ hwenu sixu nɔ nɔ gosin ayi tɔn mɛ
hu ɔ e nyi gbe kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ wa nu do ayi vi ɖe tɔn ji a
nu jɛ do joshua xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e wu e nɛ
tɔn esther wu ɖɔ vi lɛ ɔ yetɔn lɛ tɔn aca yetɔn kpo sinsɛn yetɔn kpo bi wɛ ɖo ma vi lɛ
enyi aca lɛ tɔn ma do vi lɛ a ɔ yetɔn lɛ tɔn a nu do sinsɛn yetɔn wu a
etɛ jo jɔtɛn yetɔn lɛ do ɖo to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e sixu wa
etɛwu asu kpo asi kpo gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn ɖo to ɖevo mɛ e ɖe wa gbeta ɔ kɔn bɔ xwedo yetɔn jɛ kple lɛ yi ji ɖo agun nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e ɖe mɛ
lɛ wa gbɔn kpo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
samuel nyi joshua kpo esther kpo tɔn e ɖɔ nyi kpo asi kpo gbe mɛ vi mitɔn lɛ yi nukɔn ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e xoɖɛ byɔ nunywɛ
xosin ɔ wɛ nyi nu miɖesunɔ mɔ ɖɔ e sɔgbe e a
hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ vi mitɔn lɛ kun nɔ ɖu kple e nɔ blo do gbe mitɔn mɛ lɛ e sin le ɖe o e ɔ mi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn nɔ yi kple ɖo agun nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e mɛ
mi mɛ bi nɔ nɔ nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ
mi nɔ ylɔ xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ bɔ mi nɔ ɖu nu ɖo nɔ ɖi
nuwiwa enɛ lɛ bi vi mitɔn lɛ bɔ wa tuun nɔvi lɛ tuun ɖɔ jehovah kun nyi mawu emitɔn kɛɖɛ kpowun o loɔ e nyi emitɔn kpo emitɔn kpo
mi mɔ ɖɔ nu enɛ nyi nu taji tawun hu vi mitɔn lɛ mitɔn
samuel ɖɔ ɖɔ bonu nyi kpo asi kpo kpo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ mi nɔ yi kple lɛ do mitɔn mɛ
taan nɔ jan mi tawun bɔ nu nɔ cikɔ nu mi
mi doku nu jehovah ɖɔ e do nu gandido mitɔn lɛ kpo vɔsisa mitɔn lɛ kpo
etɛwu nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ nyi kristina e mɔ ɖɔ emi sixu wa nu gege hugan ɖo agun nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e ɖe mɛ
vi mɛxo lɛ sixu wa mɔ ɖɔ emi sixu jehovah hugan ɖo agun nɔ do gbe mɛ mɔ nu jɛ ganji e ɖe mɛ
mɔ nu jɛ nu taji ɖe lɛ mɛ do lɛ tɔn mɛ gbe enɛ e nɔ do ɖo kple lɛ ji e hugan mi wɛ kristina flin
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ yi ɖaxo ɖe do gbe mi nɔ do ɖo wemaxɔmɛ e mɛ
azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ bɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ nugbo ɔ wɛ nyi nu se wɛ ɖe lɛ e
huzuhuzu ɖevo wa hwenu jɛ ɖɛ xo ji do gbe mi nɔ do ɖo wemaxɔmɛ e mɛ ji e
sixu ɖɔ xo nu jehovah sin ayi mɛ din
hwenu kristina wa nyi mɛxo e ɔ e ɖɔ xo ɖo xa tɔn lɛ do ninɔmɛ ɔ wu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn din ba tɛn jɛ agun nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e ɖe mɛ
e flin ɖɔ nu kplɔnkplɔn do jehovah wu do gbe mi nɔ do ɖo wemaxɔmɛ e mɛ mi bɔ wa nu
e lin a bɔ kristina huzu gbexosin hwebinu tɔn awajijɛnɔ ɖe
etɛwu nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ nyi nadia e hun xomɛ ɖɔ emi nɔ agun nɔ do emitɔn lɛ sin gbe e mɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ emi ɖɔ kple lɛ yiyi do agun nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e ɖe mɛ wɛ nu hugan a
enyi wɛ hun kan nu wu wɛ e byɔ miɖee
tɛnsisɛ yi agun mɔhun mɛ mi bɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah wɛ a
ja alo tɛn yi bonu nukun nɔ ji o alo lɛ ɖekpo nu wutu wɛ a
hwenu nyi kpo nɔvi lɛ kpo jɛ winnyawinnya ji e ɔ mi jlo tɛn jɛ agun nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e mɛ wɛ nadia ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli din e ɖɔ
yetɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ wiwa kun wa ɖagbe nu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo o
din ɔ e vivi nu mi ɖesu ɖɔ mitɔn lɛ syɛnsyɛn gbe yetɔn mi bɔ mi nɔ agun nɔ do jonɔgbe e mɛ
e hɛn le wa nu gbɛzan mitɔn hun ali gege nu mi bonu mi mɛ ɖevo nu tuun jehovah
jehovah ɖe vi lɛ kplɔnkplɔn tɔn
lɛ sixu alɔdo vi yetɔn lɛ do nugbo ɔ mɛ gbɔn
lɛ wɛ jehovah jɔwu bɔ vi yetɔn lɛ do nugbo ɔ mɛ enyi alo mɛ ɖevo ɖebu a xa nunywɛxo
e ɖo co ɖeɖee se gbe e nɔ do ɖo xa ɔ mɛ e a lɛ e sixu ɖo hudo alɔdo tɔn bɔ xo ɔ byɔ ayi vi yetɔn lɛ tɔn mɛ
ði ɔ lɛ sixu byɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ ali emi do emi kpe nukun do sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn wu gbɔn e wu byɔ alɔdo do vi yetɔn lɛ mɔ ɖagbe lɛ gbɔn e wu
vi lɛ kpo yetɔn lɛ kpo bi nɔ ɖu le xa agun ɔ tɔn akpaxwe
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee ɖo linlin ɖagbe lɛ e sixu blo gbɔn bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖu le yetɔn
etɛ lɛ ɖo kpo ɖo wiwa wɛ
ði ɔ lɛ sixu ylɔ xwedo ɖevo lɛ nu nɔ xa ɖo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn yetɔn hwenu hwɛhwɛ
flin nɔvi ɖeɖee dɔn mi do yetɔn lɛ mɛ lɛ e wɛ xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e flin
hwenu nɔ mi bɔ nɔ sɔnu nu xoɖiɖɔ xwle mɛ ɖo kple ji lɛ e ɔ hwebinu wɛ nɔ nu gege
nɔ ɖu vivi ayihun ɖeɖee mi nɔ ɖo ɖi ɖe e tɔn

ɖo kplekple tokunɔ lɛ tɔn ɖe mɛ ɖo ɖaxo ɖe ji ɖo cleveland ohio ɖo

nu ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ e nɔ wa jɛ hweɖelɛnu bɔ nɔ ɖo mi bɔ nɔ xo nu kpla ɖo nɔ sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e mɛ a alo e nɔ ci ɖɔ e kun mɔ nukunnu jɛ hudo tokunɔ lɛ tɔn mɛ o ɖɔhun
ɖo hwe enɛ lɛ bi ɔ nɔ nu do xo ɖɔ nu jezu e ji aklunɔ
e nyi towe mɛ wɛ e nɔ se xo nɔ mavɔmavɔ mɛ ɔ ɖe a ce
jaan nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo tokunɔ hwe tɔn lɛ gege ɖɔhun ɔ nɔ ɖo suulu
nugbo ɔ ɖo gbɛzan awajijɛ tɔn ɖe kpo gbɛzan ji jehovah kɔn nyɔna do e ɖe kpo ɖo mawu ɖaxo mitɔn tɔn mɛ

adanuwiwa kpe fi bi bɔ gege sin wanyiyi ɖekpo
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah e kpo ɖo syɛnsyɛn wɛ
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nugbo biblu tɔn
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi ɖo wanyiyi nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ
xo jezu ɖɔ ɖo matie mɛ lɛ e kan jɛ nukɔn
wema tɔn ɖɔ klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ gege nɔ ɖo wanyiyi wɛ gbɔn
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ jwifu ɖeɖee ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi mɛ mawu tɔn lɛ e bɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu mawu e ɖekpo
e ɖo co ahwanvu jezu tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ bɔ wanyiyi yetɔn ɖekpo
etɛ sixu bɔ wanyiyi klisanwun ɖe lɛ tɔn ɖekpo
hwenu jezu klisu e sin ku e ɖo xo ɖɔ nu klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn nɔ nɔ efɛzi lɛ e wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nu towe wu ɔ ɖie ɖo wanyiyi ɖo gbɔn ɖo e a
toxo egbe tɔn lɛ gege ɖɔhun ɔ nu nyanya gege wɛ toxo efɛzi tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn mɛ
toxo ɖe wɛ jɛ dɔkun tawun bɔ mɛ nɔ nɔ finɛ lɛ e nɔ ayi yetɔn ɖo gbɛɖuɖu ayiɖeɖayi kpo fɛɛ zinzan kpo ji hugan
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jlo cejɛnnabi tɔn enɛ lɛ cyɔn yɛ wanyiyi ɖo cejɛnnabi a e ji
ɔ winnyanu lɛ kpo nublibliwiwa xyɔwu lɛ e kpo gbakpe tawun
ali tɛ lɛ wanyiyi nɔ ɖekpo ɖe ɖo azan mitɔn gbe
ali atɔn tɛ lɛ wanyiyi mitɔn sixu gbɔn tɛnkpɔn ɖe
jezu tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ wanyiyi ɖekpo e kan azan mitɔn gbe
wanyiyi mɛ lɛ ɖo nu mawu e ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ tawun
livi mɔkpan do gudo mawu nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ tutoblonunu ze lɛ e ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ tɔn lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ wanyiyi ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ jehovah mawu a lɛ e tɛntin
loɔ agun efɛzi tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn sin ninɔmɛ lɛ gbɔn e ɔ klisanwun nugbo lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖe e nu emi bɔ wanyiyi yetɔn ɖekpo
din ɔ mi gbeje wanyiyi mitɔn sixu gbɔn tɛnkpɔn gbɔn e ɖo ali atɔn wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah e wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nugbo biblu tɔn e kpo wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ e kpo
etɛwu mi ɖo yi wan nu mawu
ðo azan ɖokpo ji jezu nu mɛ ɖɔ wanyiyi wa ɖekpo e ɔ e to wanyiyi ɖo taji hu bi e ji jɛ nukɔn e ɖɔ yi wan nu aklunɔ mawu towe kpodo ayi towe bi kpo kpodo towe bi kpo kpodo linlin towe bi kpo
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ enyi wan mi yi nu mawu e ɔ e mi bɔ mi setonu nu gbeɖiɖe tɔn lɛ dɛ wan nu nu nyanya xa ðɛhan
nu mi hɛn wan mi yi nu mawu e bu ɔ etɛ mɛ e nɔ kɔ do
mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖo linlin sɔgbe a e do wanyiyi ji
nɔ yi wan nu ɔ a e wa ɔ yeɖesunɔ wɛ nɔ yi wan
tim nwt elɔ ɖo sataan sin acɛ glɔ e nɔ do glɔ nu sin jlo nyanya lɛ nukun ɖo mɛ gban mɛ kpo goyiyi dɔkun jijɛ nɔ mɛ e kpan
jaan pɔlu nu klisanwun tɔn lɛ do wan yiyi nu sin jlo lɛ wu ɖɔ enyi ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo hwɛhuhu sin nu lɛ ji ɔ ku wɛ e nɔ kpla mɛ yi
ðo to ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ enyi linlin ɖeɖee nu wanyiyi mi ɖo nu mawu e kɛɖɛ wɛ mɛ nɔ ɖɔ tawun ɖɔ mawu kun tiin o lɛ e mɛ nɔ ɖɔ e lɛ e kpo mɛ nɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee lɛ e kpo nɔ su a loɔ nɔ linlin bɔ e ɖi nu nu mawu e lɔ su
blo bɔ mɛ gege wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ xlonɔ lɛ alo mɛ bi a lɛ e jɛn sixu ɖi nu ɖɔ ɖe tiin
ðo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ e nɔ ɖo sisi ɖaxo nu nunywɛ lɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ ɖe ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn sin mitɔn wu
ninɔmɛ nɔ ku awakanmɛ nu mɛ e tɛ lɛ nɔ kpannukɔn mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ gege
jiɖe tɛ mi mɔ ɖo ðɛhan ɔ mɛ
ðo nyanya elɔ sataan kpacɛ e mɛ ɔ ninɔmɛ nɔ ku awakanmɛ nu mɛ lɛ e sixu wa kpannukɔn mi mɛ bi
jaan bɔya ɖo alɔnu din ɔ mi ɖo xwi ɖi xa mɛxoxwe azɔn alo akwɛyozo nɔ dɔn wa lɛ e wɛ
alo e sixu nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo xwi ɖi xa linlin nuwumakpe tɔn lɛ nu ɖo nukun wɛ mi ɖe bɔ jɛnu a lɛ e alo nuwanyido miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ
mi ɖo jo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ alo linlin mɔhun lɛ do gbeɖe bɔ bɔ mi ɖɔ jehovah jo mi do a
loɔ mi ɖo tamɛ do xo jiɖe mɛ tɔn kunkpla wanyiyi jehovah ɖo nu mi ɖo sɔyi e ji
mi mɔ xo mɔhun lɛ ɖo ðɛhan mɛ e ɖɔ e wɛ flin mi hwenu adan ɖo mi gbo wɛ e ɖo tɔn ɖo sɔyi
nugbo ɔ xomɛ jehovah do tɔn lɛ wu e nɔ ɖyɔ a
hun mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ nu mi suxo ylɔ ɛ ɔ e se sinkɔn tɔn mi ðɛh
etɛ hlɔnhlɔn pɔlu bɔ e hɛn wanyiyi e ɖo nu mawu e wu
ɔ ɖɔhun ɔ pɔlu nɔ tamɛ do gudo jehovah nɔ nɔ nu mɛ hwebinu e ji nɔ ɛ hlɔnhlɔn
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ aklunɔ wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ mi e
jiɖe syɛnsyɛn enɛ pɔlu ɖo do nukunkpemɛwu wanyiyinɔ jehovah tɔn wu e ɛ ɖi xwi xa gbɛmɛ tagba lɛ
e jo ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ do bɔ ɖu ɖo ji tɔn a
e tlɛ nyi hwenu nu cikɔ nu pɔlu tawun e ɔ e hɛn wanyiyi e ɖo nu mawu e wu
etɛ ɛ hlɔnhlɔn bɔ e wa
e kpo ɖo jiɖe do mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ e wu wɛ
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ wan mi yi nu jehovah e ɖo syɛnsyɛn wɛ
e wlan tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ xoɖɛ hwebinu
xoɖiɖɔ gbɔn ɖɛxixo gblamɛ wɛ bɔ kancica ɖo mi kpo mawu kpo tɛntin e syɛn
ɔ enyi mi ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ jehovah nɔ se ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ ɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo e jɛji
mi wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ganji ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖo xa mɛ nɔ suxo ylɔ ɛ lɛ bi
ðɛh jiɖe enɛ mi ɖo ɖɔ jehovah nɔ nɔ gudo nu mi kpo wanyiyi kpo e mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa mɛtɛnkpɔn nuɖiɖi tɔn ɖevo lɛ
mi sixu ɖo wanyiyi e nu nugbo biblu tɔn gbɔn
nugbo ɔ xɔ akwɛ nu mi mɛ klisanwun lɛ bɔ mi nɔ wlibo
xo mawu tɔn wɛ nyi jɔtɛn nugbo ɔ tɔn
ðo ɖɛ jezu xo tɔn e mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ xo towe nyi nugbo
nwt nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɖiɖo kpowun kpe a
ðo ayi mɛ wlan ðɛhan ɔ e mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu wan yi nu nugbo biblu tɔn nyi e wu gbɔn e
xa ðɛhan
nɔ zan hwenu do tamɛ do wemafɔ biblu tɔn lɛ ji alo ze hwiɖee ɖo azan ɖokpo ɖokpo ji a
enyi mi nɔ tamɛ do ali ɖeɖee nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ nɔ hɛn le wa nu mi ɖe lɛ e ji ɔ nugbo enɛ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e jɛji
ɔ ɖɔ xo towe vivi ɖo mɛ mɛ nya e vivi ɖo mɛ hu wiin
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi sixu nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn jinjɔn biblu ji bɔ mi nɔ mɔ sin tutoblonunu mawu tɔn si lɛ e
nu e ɖɔ ɔ mi sixu jo do nyi mɔ tɛn do sixu flin nugbo ɔ sin xo ɖagbe lɛ vivi e sixu zan do mɛ ɖevo lɛ nut
etɛ jelemii bɔ e yi wan nu nugbo biblu tɔn
nugbo enɛ ci
gbeyiɖɔ jelemii yi wan nu nugbo biblu tɔn
nu e ɖɔ ɔ jelemii nɔ ɖu xo xɔ akwɛ mawu tɔn lɛ bɔ adɔkan tɔn lɛ nɔ hwenu e nɔ tamɛ do ji e
ðo ali enɛ ɔ e bɔ wujɔmɛ e ɖo bɔ e ylɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn do wu tɔn e su nukun tɔn mɛ tawun
wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nugbo biblu tɔn e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ tuun ɖɔ wujɔmɛ bunɔ ɖe wɛ mi ɖo bɔ nyikɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo nu mi bɔ mi nɔ jla axɔsuɖuto tɔn ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ a
ðe wanyiyi nugbo biblu tɔn akpaxwe ɔ
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ wanyiyi mitɔn nu nugbo biblu tɔn
gbɔn vo nu biblu xixa kpo wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ kpo xixa ɔ mi sixu ɖo wanyiyi e nu nugbo biblu tɔn gbɔn
mi sixu blo bɔ wan mi yi nu nugbo biblu tɔn e jɛji gbɔn kple agun tɔn lɛ yiyi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ gblamɛ
biblu mi nɔ zan atɔxwɛ do ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ e nyi ali taji e nɔ nu mi ɖe e
nu mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ xota wɛ e ɖe ɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖo sɔnu ganji nu xota nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn atɔxwɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
ali mi sixu wa ɖe lɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi do nu wemafɔ e ɖe do xota ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖokpo ɖokpo
ðo egbe ɔ e sixu yi atɔxwɛ ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn jw org ji alo mɔ ɖo jw ji do gbe gege mɛ
e blo ɖo alɔ ɖe lɛ ji bɔ mi sixu yawu mɔ wemafɔ ɖeɖee e ɖe lɛ e ɖo xota nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
mi zan wlɛnwin ɖebu ɔ wemafɔ enɛ lɛ xixa kpo sɔxwixwe kpo nu tamɛ linlin do ji kpo bɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nugbo biblu tɔn e xa ðɛhan
sɔgbe xa jaan ɔ etɛ mi ɖo blo
wan mi yi nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ e ca kan xa wanyiyi mi ɖo nu mawu kpo biblu kpo e gbɔn
wanyiyi ɖo nu miɖee ɔ wɛ mɛ lɛ bi ɖɔ nyi ahwanvu nugbo jaan
wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo e ca kan xa wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah e
nugbo ɔ mi sixu yi wan nu jehovah gɔn wan yi nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ a
jaan wlan ɖɔ mɛ yi wan nu nɔvi tɔn mɔ wɛ e ɖe ɔ a ɔ e sixu yi wan nu mawu mɔ wɛ e ɖe a e gbɔn
jaan ɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah kpo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo e ca kan xa wanyiyi mi ɖo nu biblu e
ðo wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nugbo biblu tɔn e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ setonu nu gbeɖiɖe biblu tɔn ɖeɖee ɖɔ ɖɔ mi yi wan nu mawu yi wan nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo ayi bi kpo e jaan
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖe wanyiyi ɖe
xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
ali tawun tawun tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖe wanyiyi ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ ɖe
nɔvi sunnu mɛxomɔ alo nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ ɖe sixu ɖo hudo ɖɔ mɛɖe ze e yi kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ ji
asukusi ɖe sixu ɖo hudo mɛɖe tɔn bɔ e ɛ bɔ e jla nuɖe lɛ ɖo ɖo xɔ tɔn wu
etɛ mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo kpɛvi kpɛvi ɖeɖee sixu wa mi kpo klisanwun mitɔn lɛ kpo tɛntin e ji
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ gbigbɔ cejɛnnabi tɔn kpo tɔn kpo ɖɔ mi ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn nyanya elɔ tɔn mɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ kpɛvi kpɛvi lɛ sixu wa mi kpo mitɔn lɛ kpo tɛntin hweɖelɛnu
enɛ wu ɔ bonu mi lɔn gbeɖe bonu wanyiyi mitɔn ɖekpo o
loɔ nu mi tɛgbɛ ɖo wanyiyi e ɖo nu jehovah xo tɔn kpo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo wɛ
jaan vi yi wan nu mi hu elɔ lɛ a jaan nwt
mi sixu ɖo tɛn jɛxa ɛ e mɛ gbɔn
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo linlin sɔgbe e do ayiɖeɖayi wu
mi sixu ahwan xa jlo agbazanu lɛ gbe nyinya tɔn ɖu gbɔn
ee nyi ɖɔ nu zan ɖokpo blebu gudo e ɔ nu tɛ e
ahwanvu jezu tɔn tɛnwe nyi ɖɔ zan ɖokpo blebu mɛ ɖo galilee xu ɔ ji wli nuti a
jezu klisu e sin ku e ɖo xu ɔ to mɔ
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nyi ɖɔ ɔ do ɖisixwe nu tɔjihun ɔ enɛ ɔ mɔ hwevi wli
nyi ɖɔ ɔ do ɖisixwe nugbo bɔ ɖɔ ɔ wli hwevi gege bɔ sixu dɔn a jaan
ee jezu nuɖuɖu gudo e ɔ e lilɛ kpannukɔn ɖɔ jaan vi yi wan nu mi hu elɔ lɛ a
etɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe
yi wan nu hwehuhu kpɛɖe
enɛ wu ɔ e ci ɖɔ jezu ɖo kinkanbyɔ wɛ ɖɔ etɛ e ɖo wanyiyi jɔ wanyiyi e ji ɖɔhun
e yi wan nu hwehuhu kpo tɔn kpo hu jezu kpo nu e lɛ e kpo wɛ a
xosin ɖɔ ɛɛn aklunɔ tuun ɖɔ yi wan nu
sin finɛ ɖido ɔ e ɖɔ emi yi wan nu klisu hɛn alɔnu tɔn jan ɖo bloblo bonu mɛ lɛ huzu ahwanvu sin ɔ mɛ huzu dotin ɖokpo nu agun klisanwun tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn
awovinu tɛ lɛ wu klisanwun lɛ ɖo ɖo aceji do
etɛ xo ɖeɖee jezu ɖɔ nu lɛ e sixu mi
mi ɖo nɔ aceji tɛn nu ɖebu bonu e nu wan mi yi nu klisu e ayi mitɔn sin axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu lɛ ji a
jezu tuun elɔ nɔ gbidi kɔ nu mi nɔ ɖo adohu adohu nu mi gbɔn e
nugbo ɔ nu mi ɖo aceji a ɔ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn lɛ flu ayixa mitɔn bɔ mi yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
etɛ mi bɔ mi gbeje wanyiyi mi ɖo nu klisu e gbɔn e
blo gbɔn hwenu jezu e sin ku e nu gudo e ɔ mi nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mi ɖo nu klisu e gbɔn e gbɔn e nu mi e ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ gblamɛ
mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ mi kpo ɖo blo wɛ gbɔn
sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ etɛ yi wan hugan
wɛ nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu mi hugan a alo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ
ðo linlin enɛ mɛ ɔ nu mi gbeje nu mi ze ɖo tɛn jɛxa lɛ e mɛ a ɔ sixu nu wanyiyi mi ɖo nu klisu kpo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo e atɔn nu enɛ lɛ wɛ nyi ayiɖeɖayi kpo nuɖokan lɛ kpo
tɛ biblu nu xwedo tɔn lɛ
nɔ hu hwe do ɖe ayi a loɔ tɔn wɛ
ɖo syɛnsyɛn su hudo enɛ sin do
ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ nyi nuɖe nɔ ɖo adohu adohu nu mɛ hwɛhwɛ
etɛwu wiwa nɔ ɖo adohu adohu nu mɛ tawun ɖo egbe
ðo tiin a bɔ agba wɛ e nɔ hwlɛn cobo nɔ wa mɔ wutu ɔ e nɔ wa ɖo dandan mɛ ɖɔ mɛ e yi do lɛ e gege nu taan gege bɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ akwɛ kpɛɖe wɛ nɔ yi
ɔ ɖo lɛ ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ zan kpɛɖe do ɖe nu gege wutu ɔ enɛ nɔ bɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo bɔ nu nɔ cikɔ nu lobɔ tlɛ nɔ jɛ azɔn
nu mɛ yi do lɛ e ɖe jlo mɔhun lɛ do ɔ tamɛ a ɔ sixu gble do e
mi ɖu gbejininɔ mitɔn sin axɔ do jɛ nukɔn
nu xɔ akwɛ tɛ nɔvi sunnu thailande tɔn ɖe do tɔn wu
ðo mi nyi klisanwun wutu ɔ mɛ mi ɖu gbejininɔ sin axɔ do jɛ nukɔn e wɛ nyi jehovah e nyi mɛ yi mi do mɛ e a
mi nɔ do mɔ agbaza sin nu ɖo taji lɛ e ba do kpe mitɔn wu
ði ɔ nɔvi sunnu nɔ nɔ thailande e ɖe ɖɔ wɛ nɔ bloɖo yi wan tawun e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ ma nu ganxixo gege
enɛ bɔ nɔ ɖibla hwenu kpo nu nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ
wa mɔ ɖɔ do nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ ɖo huzu nɔ wa e
etɛ nɔvi sunnu enɛ wa
e tinmɛ ɖɔ ee blo tuto nu xwe ɖokpo gudo e ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nɔ sa nu ɖo ali ji jɛ glasi sa ji
ðo ɔ mɔ ɖo akwɛ linu tawun bɔ awakanmɛ ku mi
enyi mɔ xoxo lɛ ɔ nɔ mi nɔ kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ etɛwu ɖɔ glasi sisa hu bibloɖo ɖo xɔ fifa ɖe mɛ a ji
xoɖɛ jehovah byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e mi bonu ma ɖu lobonu nu nya wɛ ɖe mɔ taan gege nu nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e kpa mi
e lin a bɔ nu lɛ jɛ ji
wa tuun nu nɔ vivi nu axisinɔ lɛ e glasi ɔ ɖa hugan
zaan ɔ jɛ glasi nɔ blo lɛ e bi sa ji ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
nugbo ɔ vo ɖo akwɛ linu hu hwenu ɖo wa wɛ e
e bɔ ɖo awajijɛ hugan ɖo nɔ nɔ adohu adohu ji alo ɖo nɔ ɖo ɖo xoxo ɔ kɔn e a
nu ɖo taji hugan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ din ɔ mɔ ɖɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah hugan xa matie nwt
mi sixu ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do mitɔn wu gbɔn
syɛnsyɛn wiwa ɔ jijɔ mawu tɔn ɖe wɛ bɔ enyi e gbɔn ɔ e nɔ mɔ ajɔ tɔn
nux e ɖo co nɔvi sunnu wu mi ɖɔ xo do wa yi e gbɔn e ɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e ze ɖo tɛn jɛxa ɛ ɔ mɛ
jezu ɖɔ axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn kpodo jlo tɔn wiwa kpo nɔ mya nukun nu jɛ nukɔn enɛ ɔ e nu enɛ lɛ bi agbaza sin nu ɖo dandan lɛ e
bonu mi ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do nu agbaza tɔn lɛ kpo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo wu a ji ɔ e ɖɔ mi kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nɔ mɔ do mɔ nu nɔ dɔn mi nɔ awajijɛ mi e nɔ gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ do mɔ nu yaya ɖe alo nu e blo e ɖe wɛ a
tamɛ linlin do nu nɔ ci nu mi do kpo gbigbɔ sin lɛ kpo wu e ji mi bɔ mi tuun nu mi yi wan tawun e
nu xɔ akwɛ tɛ jezu mɛ do nu e ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e wu
jezu e ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do nu agbaza tɔn lɛ kpo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo wu gbɔn e tɔn
jezu yi kpo nɔvi nyɔnu tɔn mata kpo gbe ɖokpo ɖo xwe yetɔn gbe
hwenu mata ɖo xo wɛ ɖo nuɖuɖu ɖa wɛ e ɔ junjɔn afɔ jezu tɔn lɛ kpa ɖo to ɖo e wɛ
nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe mata wɛ jezu ɖe
bonu mi lɔn nu nu agbaza tɔn lɛ ayi mitɔn a wanyiyi mi ɖo nu klisu e ɔ mi ɖo kpo ɖo akpa ɖagbe ɔ wɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
etɛ mawuxowema ɔ mɛ do gbɔjɛ wu
mi ɖo hudo hwenu ɖe lɛ tɔn gbɔjɛ mɔ sin syɛnsyɛn mitɔn kpo tito mitɔn jan e kpo si
jezu tuun ɖɔ e ɖo dandan ɖɔ e gbɔjɛ ɖo hweɖelɛnu
gbe ɖokpo ɔ ee jɛ tagba tawun ɖekunnu gbɔn fi gege gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ wa mi jɛ vo fi mɛɖe ɖe a e bonu gbɔjɛ kpɛɖe mak
nu nu kan gbɔjɛyiyi kpo ayiɖeɖayi kpo e ɔ etɛ wu mi ɖo nɔ aceji do
nugbo ɔ gbɔjɛyiyi kpo ayiɖeɖayi kpo nɔ su do taji ɖe
e ɖo co awovinu ɖokpo ɖo finɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ayiɖeɖayi sixu wa huzu nu taji hugan ɔ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mɛ gege wa ɖo linlin elɔ mi ɖu nu ahan ɖo sɔ ɔ mi ku
ði ɔ ɖo xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie ɔ dɔnkpɛvu nɔ nɔ gbadahweji elɔpu tɔn ɖe jɛ kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ yi ji
wan e yi nu ayiɖeɖayi e wa syɛn tawun bɔ e ɖo xa togun jehovah tɔn
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ e wa mɔ ɖɔ tagba kpo awakanmɛ ku mɛ kpo kɛɖɛ jɛn ayiɖeɖayi wa huzu nu taji nu emi e nɔ hɛn wa
enɛ wu ɔ e jɛ biblu ji wa jɛxa nyi ɖe
ðo baptɛm tɔn gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu ɖokpo gee nu mi e wɛ nyi taan tobutobu gu cobo wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ jehovah sinsɛn nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu mɛ hu ayiɖeɖayi elɔ nɔ xwle mɛ lɛ e gbe nyinya flafla tɔn
awovinu ɖo gbɔjɛyiyi kpo ayiɖeɖayi kpo mɛ e do nuɖe wu etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do gbɔjɛyiyi kpo ayiɖeɖayi kpo wu
linlin wu gbɔjɛyiyi kpo ayiɖeɖayi kpo do tiin e wɛ nyi ɖɔ fa kɔ nu mi bɔ mi mɔ hlɔnhlɔn
bonu nu do nyi ɔ taan nabi mi zan
tamɛ do nujlɛdonuwu elɔ ji mi mɛ gege nɔ ɖu nu vivi lɛ e ɖo hweɖelɛnu loɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ nu vivi ɖuɖu dingan do azɔn agbaza mitɔn
enɛ wu ɔ nuɖuɖu hunsin ɖagbe tɔn lɛ wɛ mi nɔ ɖu hugan
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ gbɔjɛyiyi kpo ayiɖeɖayi zɛ xwe wu kpo nu ganjininɔ mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
nu mi nyi alɔ nu enɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
mi sixu wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ linlin mi ɖo do ayiɖeɖayi wu e ɖo ji
ðo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo mɛ ɔ mi sixu ganxixo nabi mi zan do gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ɖi kple lɛ yiyi kunnuɖiɖe kpo biblu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn alo xwedo tɔn kpo tamɛ e
etɛ nujlɛdonuwu ɔ
e byɔ ɖɔ blo huzuhuzu ɖe wɛ a xa efɛzinu lɛ
etɛ ɖo ali mi bɔ mi ayiɖeɖayi lɛ
mi bi kpo xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo vo ayiɖeɖayi jlo mi e ayiɖeɖayi ɔ sɔgbe kpo nugbododo biblu tɔn jehovah lɛ e kpo
mawu wɛ ayiɖeɖayi ɖagbe lɛ
jezu ɖɔ fi ɖee dɔkun towe ɖe ɔ finɛ wɛ ayi towe nɔ
ali tɛ agbaza sin nu lɛ gbe nyinya sixu huzu mɔ ɖe nu klisanwun ɖe ɖe
we nunywɛ kpe e tɛ jezu ɖe xa mɛ do nu agbaza tɔn lɛ wu
nu nɔ gba tamɛ nu mɛ gege egbe e wɛ nyi wa gbɔn ɖo nu ɖo ji lɛ e ɖi nuzinzan alokan kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo
enɛ wu ɔ klisanwun ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo nɔ gbeje jlo tɔn lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ gbɔn nu elɔ lɛ kinkanbyɔ eɖee gblamɛ agbaza sin nu lɛ wa ɖo taji nu mi bɔ nɔ zan hwenu gege do nu do do ɖo ji e alo avɔ ɖo ji e ji nɔ tamɛ do ji hu taan nɔ zan do sɔnu nu kple lɛ e wɛ a
nɔ wa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe lɛ e nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi bɔ nɔ zan hwenu kpɛɖe do xoɖɛ alo xa biblu wɛ a
nu mi ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu agbaza sin nu lɛ e jɛ yi sin wanyiyi mi ɖo nu klisu e si ji ɔ mi ɖo nu do xo jezu ɖɔ e ji miɖee do wu
jezu ɖɔ mɛɖe sixu gan we a
e ɖɔ ɖɔ sixu mawu dɔkun a
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi wan nu mɛ ɖe yi wan nu mɛ ɖe alo mi setonu nu mɛ ɖe vɛtoli nu mɛ ɖe
etɛwu e nɔ vɛwu nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ e bɔ ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do agbaza sin nu lɛ wu
etɛ mi bɔ mi ahwan xa jlo agbazanu lɛ gbe nyinya tɔn
e nɔ vɛwu nu mɛ ɖo jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ e bonu ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do agbaza sin nu lɛ wu
ðo jlo yetɔn lɛ cyɔn yɛ linlin gbigbɔ tɔn yetɔn lɛ ji xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
e sin enɛ wu ɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ sɔnu nu jlo zɛ gbe e do nu agbaza tɔn lɛ wu jlo enɛ ɔ e sixu su do tɔn bɔ e jɛmɛ nu mɛ gbeɖe a
nu mi blo ɔ mi nɔ jezu ɖɔ mi yi wan hu nu agbaza tɔn ɖebu
nu tɛ lɛ ɖo taji ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ
etɛ kanɖeji wa
hwenu jezu kanbyɔ ɖɔ yi wan nu mi hu elɔ lɛ a
ɔ flinflin wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ e ɖo ze nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
nugbo ɔ zan sɔgbe xa nyikɔ tɔn sin tinmɛ nyi awinnya e ɖo e ɖe jijɔ ci awinnya ɖɔhun lɛ e
mɛ mi lɔ kanɖeji egbe ɖɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu klisu e kun do o nɔ ze ayiɖeɖayi kpo agbaza sin nu lɛ kpo ɖo tɛn jɛxa lɛ e mɛ
nu gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin ɖo ɖɔ nu jezu ɖɔ aklunɔ tuun ɖɔ yi wan nu e
xota ayidedai towe le no hen wa
ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe octobre mɛ wex akpa
gayiwusi kpo klisanwun ɖevo ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo fifonu xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ e kpo ɖi xwi xa tagba lɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nukplɔnmɛ adingban tɔn lɛ funfun kpe wɛ e nu agun lɛ lɛ klan
jaan jaan nya nɔ nyi diotlefɛsi e ɖo xo nyanya funfun kpe do jaan kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo wu wɛ ɖo wɛ ɖɔ emi kun yi klisanwun ɖeɖee nɔ gosin tomɛ wa yetɔn lɛ e o ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ bonu mɛ ɖevo lɛ xwedo tɔn
jaan ninɔmɛ ɖo ayi hwenu jaan wlan wema gayiwusi e nɛ
wema mɛ ɔ wlan ɖo tɔn e ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ nyi wema atɔngɔ jaan wlan e
tagba ɖe lɛ kpannukɔn gayiwusi co e kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo
e ɖe gbejininɔ tɔn gbɔn
etɛwu mi jlo xwedo gayiwusi tɔn ɖo egbe
wema mɛ jaan tɔn mi bɔ mi wa gbɔn
mɛ wlan jaan atɔngɔ ɔ e ylɔ eɖee ɖɔ agunmɛxo
xokwin glɛkigbe tɔn dodo ɔ sixu nyi sunnu mɛxomɔ ɔ
enɛ kpe bɔ vi tɔn gbigbɔ tɔn gayiwusi e yi wan e tuun ɖɔ jaan wɛ
jaan ylɔ gayiwusi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo ɖɔ mɛ ɖo wanyiyi nugbo nugbo e
enɛ gudo ɔ jaan ɖɔ jlo emitɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖo ganji ɖo agbaza lixo e ɖe gbɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e
linlin ɖagbe tawun wɛ nyi enɛ nyi mɛ kpikpa ɖagbe jaan
gayiwusi sixu nyi ɖe ɖo agun mɛ wema wlan mɛ ɔ ɖɔ tawun a
jaan kpa gayiwusi ɖo e nɔ yi nɔvi lɛ gbɔn e wu nu tlɛ nyi jonɔ ɔ nɛ
jaan xogbe nusumɛnukunmɛ tɔn jaan do do gayiwusi nɔ yi nɔvi lɛ gbɔn e wu e ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ gosin fi jaan nɔ nɔ e nɔ yi agun lɛ mɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ bɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo nu mɔ lɛ e sin gbe nu jaan
vlafo e sixu nyi jaan se nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo agun enɛ lɛ mɛ e gbɔn e nɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ jlo nɔ lɛ xwe
numasɔgbe lɛ nɔ jɛ ɖo otɛli lɛ mɛ e nɔ yi mɛ lɛ ganji a bɔ lɛ nyi avatɛn nublibliwiwa tɔn
vlafo enɛ wu wɛ lɛ nɔ nɔ lɛ xwegbe bɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ nɔ klisanwun lɛ xwegbe
jaan do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu gayiwusi ɖɔ e ɖe jijɔ jonɔyiyi tɔn ɖo ɔ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e alɔ nu lɛ mawu jlo gbɔn e nu yi to mɛ xwe ɔ
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ nu jonɔ lɛ nu yi to mɛ xwe ɔ byɔ ɖɔ e su hudo yetɔn lɛ sin do nu ɖebu e byɔ lɛ e jɛ hwenu yi fi xwe e e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gayiwusi nɔ wa nu jonɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo gbe wanyiyi tɔn kpo nuɖiɖi tɔn tɔn kpo nu jaan jaan
jonɔ enɛ lɛ sixu nyi lɛ mɛ jaan lɛ e alo lɛ
e nyi gbɔn ɖebu ɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ wutu wɛ yi tomɛ
jaan ɖɔ jezu klisu wu wɛ jɛ ali
jaan hun nɔvi enɛ lɛ ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ bɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e yi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
enɛ wu wɛ jaan wlan ɖɔ mi ɖo mɔhun lɛ sixu wa xa nu nugbo ɔ yi nukɔn jaan
e nyi gbe kɛɖɛ do nu gayiwusi wɛ jaan ɖe wu wɛ e wlan wema ɔ a
jaan jlo ɛ bonu e ɖi xwi xa tagba syɛnsyɛn ɖe
ðo hwɛjijɔ ɖe lɛ wutu ɔ agun klisanwun tɔn tɔn nɔ nyi diotlefɛsi e jlo yi klisanwun lɛ a
e tlɛ ali nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu wa jaan
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ kun jlo nɔ diotlefɛsi xwe o enyi enɛ tlɛ blo ɔ nɛ
e nɔ nɔ tɛn ɖaxo mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi ɖebu nu xo gosin jaan e a nɔ funfun xo nyanya kpe do ɔ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo wu
jaan ylɔ diotlefɛsi ɖɔ adingbannɔ gbeɖe a co e nɔ gu do acɛkpikpa enɛ tɔn ji
diotlefɛsi nɔ tɛnmɛ ɖaxo bɔ linlin tɔn enɛ nyi linlin klisanwun tɔn a e bɔ e nɔ xo nu do gbejininɔ tɔn wu
nu diotlefɛsi wa e ɖɔ mɛɖe lɛ sixu dɔn linlin nu jlo dingan kpo goyiyi kpo tɔn nɔ klan mɛ e do agun ɖe mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ jaan ɖɔ xo ɖe nu gayiwusi bɔ e kan ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn nɔ wa nu mɛ nɔ wa nu nyanya e ɖɔhun o jaan
klisanwun nyi demɛtliwusi e gbɔn vo nu diotlefɛsi ɖo jaan do gesi ɖi mɛ ɖagbe e
jaan wlan ɖɔ mɛ bi wɛ nɔ ɖɔ demɛtliwusi xo ɖagbe mi lɔ ɔ mi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖagbe tuun ɖɔ xo nugbo wɛ mi nɔ ɖɔ
jaan e sixu nyi ɖɔ e byɔ ɖɔ gayiwusi do alɔ demɛtliwusi lobɔ jaan sixu wlan jaan atɔngɔ ɔ do ɖe demɛtliwusi ɛ kpa ɛ
e sixu nyi ɖɔ demɛtliwusi ɖesu wɛ wema ɔ jo nu gayiwusi
ðo jaan wɛ demɛtliwusi do alo vlafo e nyi ɖe wutu ɔ enɛ sixu hlɔnhlɔn nu jaan wlan e
eɖie gayiwusi nɔ yi jonɔ e bɔ etɛwu jaan byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e kpo ɖo jijɔ enɛ wɛ
mɔ wɛ jaan mɔ ɖɔ e do wusyɛn tɔn lanmɛ a
wɛ ɔ ɖɔ gayiwusi sixu xo nu ɖo diotlefɛsi ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ blo bɔ e jo jijɔ klisanwun tɔn enɛ do ɖo agun ɔ mɛ wutu a
ðebu wɛ e nyi gbɔn ɔ jaan jiɖe gayiwusi ɖɔ mɛ nɔ wa nu ɖagbe ɔ mawu tɔn wɛ e nyi
jaan hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ wa nu ɖagbe kpo ɖo wa wɛ
wema mɛ jaan tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu gayiwusi yi nukɔn ɖo mɛ yiyi mɛ a
ðo e yi gbe bɔ jaan atɔngɔ ɔ ɖo wema biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ bɔ e nɔ zan do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ nɔ wa nu ɖagbe wutu ɔ enɛ ɖɔ wema ɔ wa
mi tuun nu ɖevo do nɔvi mitɔn hwexonu tɔn gayiwusi wu zɛ elɔ lɛ wu a
e ɖo co nu kpɛ elɔ mi tuun do gbɛzan tɔn wu e sixu nuɖe lɛ mi
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu yi mɛ nɔ wa i tɔn lɛ e ɖe ganji
nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɔ nɔvi ɖeɖee ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi tomɛ nu mi lɛ e nyi tɔn bɔ gege mitɔn ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nugbo ɔ tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun nyi klisanwun egbe tɔn lɛ bi wɛ nɔ yi zɔga ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ takunmɛ o
e ɖo co gayiwusi ɖɔhun ɔ mi sixu nɔ gudo nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yi tomɛ lɛ e ɖi lɛdo tɔn lɛ kpo asi yetɔn kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
alo mi sixu nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo nɔ tɛn yi toxo ɖe lɛ mɛ ɖo to mitɔn mɛ lɛ e alo ee tlɛ nɔ yi togudo wa ɖo fi hudo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ e ɖo ali tawun tawun ɖe lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi nɔ yi mɛ nɔ wa mitɔn lɛ e ganji hlɔ tim
e gu do acɛkpikpa jaan tɔn ji do pɔlu tɔn lɔ ji
e nyi hwenu e tlɛ nuɖɔ mi e ɔ mi nɔ wa nu kpo fifa kpo ɔ enɛ sixu mɛ ɖo xo mɔ ɖɔ do mi wu wɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ bɔ jla ninɔmɛ yetɔn ɖo
gudo mɛ ɔ jehovah blo bɔ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn lɛ gudo mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo ɔ wu tim
atɔngɔ ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ klisanwun ɖeɖee gbeklanxamɛ lɛ ɖo finɛ co ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo lɛ e ɔ e tuun nu kpa kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo ɖo gbejininɔ sin zan wɛ ɖe e wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jaan do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu gayiwusi ɛ jiɖe ɖɔ e ɖo nu ɖagbe wa wɛ
ðo nuwlanwlan glɛkigbe tɔn dodo ɔ mɛ ɔ xokwin wɛ wema jaan wlan gayiwusi e ɖo bɔ e sin enɛ wu bɔ e nyi wema hwe hugan ɖo biblu mɛ e
e ɖo co e xɔ akwɛ tawun nu klisanwun egbe tɔn lɛ
daniel kpo miriam kpo wli alɔ ɖo septembre tɛn yi toxo barcelone tɔn mɛ ɖo espagne
daniel ɖɔ gbɛzan e nɔ ɖɔ e sɔgbe e zan wɛ mi ɖe
mitɔn lɛ bɔ mi nɔ ɖu nu ɖo nubaɖutɛn ɖagbe lɛ nɔ yi tomɛ nɔ do akwɛnuvɔ lɛ
mi nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ hwɛhwɛ
huzuhuzu ɖe wa wa
ðo ɖaxo ɖe ji ɖo ɔ xoɖiɖɔ nukanbyɔ elɔ nyi atɛ ji e byɔ ayi mɛ nu daniel tawun mi ɖo nu wu mi kpe e bi wa wɛ mɛ ɖeɖee e dɔn xwe huhu gbe lɛ bonu wa mavɔmavɔ ɔ ji a
daniel flin ɖɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ jehovah ɖo xo ɖɔ nu mi wɛ tlɔlɔ ɖɔhun
xoɖiɖɔ ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ada gbigblo nu mɛtɔn nɔ hɛn awajijɛ gege wa
daniel tuun ɖɔ nugbo wɛ enɛ nyi
miriam gbexosin ɔ ɖo awajijɛ gege sin le ɖu wɛ
daniel ɖɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ hwe ɔ su bɔ blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo ɖe
nu e wa nugbo e nɛ
e ɖe ganxixo e nɔ e kpo gbexosin tamɛ do awajijɛ e kpo miriam kpo sixu mɔ e ji nu wa ɖo fi hudo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ e ɔ nɛ
ðo mai ɔ daniel kpo miriam kpo jo yetɔn lɛ do tɛn yi to mɛ ɖi sa yi e ɖe mɛ
ðo fi enɛ ɖe e ɔ tɔtɛntinto gege wɛ ɖo bocas del ɖo caraibes xu tɛntin bɔ guaymi ee nyi ayi ɔ ji lɛ e wɛ nɔ nɔ finɛ hugan
daniel kpo miriam kpo ɖɔ nu zan akwɛ xwe lɛ e ɔ sixu nɔ nu tantɔn
e sin nu cikɔ nu mɛ wu bɔ daniel ɖibla eɖee kpo
ɖo xwe ɖo ali enɛ kpa lɛ e gbe ɔ xwedo guaymi tɔn ɖe yi ganji ɖo taji ɔ hwenu gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn sin xogbe ɖe lɛ gudo e
e lin a bɔ ɖo biblu kplɔnkplɔn
hwenu zan akwɛ yetɔn lɛ bi vɔ e ɔ awajijɛ asu kpo asi kpo ɔ ɖo e huzu aluwɛ
daniel flin ɖɔ kpo avi kpo wɛ mi jɛ tamɛ do mi blo gbɔn lɛkɔ yi espagne e ji ji
e nu mi tawun ɖɔ mi jo mɛ mi nɔ biblu xa lɛ e do
ɖokpo gudo ɔ se wɛn akpakpa mɛ tɔn ɖe
miriam ɖɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi nyi gbexosin titewungbe lɛ
ðo ɔ huzuhuzu wa tutoblonunu ɔ mɛ e bɔ e byɔ daniel kpo miriam kpo ɖɔ huzu gbexosin hwebinu tɔn
etɛ blo
ɖeji do akpa ɖo ðɛhan mɛ e wu towe jo nu mawu mavɔmavɔ ganjɛ wu tɔn e wa tɔn
mɔ bɔ wa gbexosin yetɔn e bɔ egbe ɔ ɖo agun ɖe mɛ ɖo tokpɔn veraguas tɔn mɛ ɖo
daniel ɖɔ cobonu mi gosin espagne ɔ mi tuun ɖɔ mi kpewu zan gbɛzan bɔkun e a
egbe din ɔ mi kpewu bɔ nu ɖo taji lɛ e ɖe han mi a
awajijɛ ɖaxo bi tɛ ɖo
ðo vendredi ɖokpo ɖo septembre ɔ yozo ɔ jɛ syɛnsyɛn ji zanzan enɛ ɖo fi kple ɖe ɖo ɔ e
zinkponɔ ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo akpaxwe taji elɔ hwenu ɔ mɛ jlo lɛ e sixu sin xɔ ɔ mɛ e gbe mɛɖebu bonu e byɔ xɔ ɔ sa a
e jihan lɛ ɖo tuto ɔ tɔn enɛ gudo ɔ joseph
yi tavo ɔ tɔn kɔn
gege lɛ tɔn junjɔn ayi ɖo nu ja jijɛ gbe e wɛ
ɔ byɔ kpo ayi bi kpo ɖɔ wa junjɔn ayi ɖoto
ee xoɖiɖɔ ɔ e ɔ mɛɖe ɖo ayi avɔ ɖaxo e mla ganji kpla ataa ɔ sin e wu a
nɔvi ɖɔ xo do xota axɔsuɖuto jixwe tɔn ɔ sɛkpɔ ji
nu ganxixo ɖokpo adaɖe ɔ gbe tɔn ɖo hlɔnhlɔn e kpe xɔ ɔ bi mɛ hwenu e ɖo xo ɖɔ do gbeyiɖɔ hwexonu tɔn lɛ jla axɔsuɖuto jawe e kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo gbɔn e wu wɛ e
lɛ yi gbe kpo xosusu kpo ɖɔ ɛɛn
nɔvi suxo ɖɔ hun lɛkɔ yi gle ɔ mɛ vi mawu ajalɔnnɔ ɔ tɔn lɛ
axɔsu ɔ ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ
midɛɛ lɛ wɛ nyi mɛ ɖeɖee jla lɛ e
hwenɛnu ɔ e tun avɔ e mla ɖo e kpo kpo bɔ nukɛgbe elɔ jla axɔsu ɔ kpo axɔsuɖuto tɔn kpo
bopp flin ɖɔ akpakpa lɛ
gardner tinmɛ atin e do gba xɔ ɔ lɛ e hunhun ɖo lɛ wu gbɔn e
fred twarosh ɖɔ lɛ bi zɛɛn
mɛ wa enɛ ji lɛ e gege nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn
din ɔ akpakpa vo wɛ do enɛ wu
bennecoff ɖɔ ɖɔ biblu lɛ ɔ kanɖodonuwu kpo wanyiyi kpo ayi yetɔn mɛ hu tɔn
odessa ee ɖo xwe hwenɛnu e gosin ɔ kanɖeji ɖɔ emi sɔ ɖɔ e
e ɖɔ tuun fi ɔ yi gbɔn e alo nu ɖɔ e a
leffler ɖɔ azan manawɔn enɛ wɛ nyi wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ jijla tɔn kpe ayikungban ɔ bi ji e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖaxo enɛ e blo ɖo ohio ɖo e byɔ hwenuxo mɛ nyi nu manawɔn ɖe ɖo yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ linu
george gangas ɖɔ ɖaxo enɛ jlo ɔ mɛ nu mi ɖɔ nyi nɔ gɔn lɛ ɖe gbeɖe o
e flin ɖɔ emi kun gɔn ɖe gbeɖe nugbo o
julia wilcox wlan ɖɔ sixu tinmɛ akpakpa nɔ mi gbɔn hweɖebunu e ɖɔ xo ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ e a kpowun bɔ xo fo
ɖokpo ɔ gege mitɔn wɛ nɔ flin nu xɔ akwɛ mɔhun lɛ do ɖaxo ɖe wu ɖo taji ɔ akpakpa mi ɖo ayi mɛ bɔ mi nɔ ɖokan do nu wu nɔ ɖo wanyiyi nu mawu ɖaxo mitɔn kpo axɔsu mitɔn kpo e ɖo egbe
nu mi ɖo tamɛ do nu xɔ akwɛ enɛ lɛ ji wɛ ɔ e nɔ mi lɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ e nu jehovah nu ali hun nu mi bɔ wa tɛn enɛ mɛ e
wekwin adv wekwin atɔn nukɔntɔn ɖeɖee nɔte nu xokwin glɛnsigbe tɔn sin tinmɛ nyi jla e ɖo fi bi atin lɛ wu xɔ lɛ wu jɛ tuto ɖaxo ɔ tɔn ɖesu ji
wuntun enɛ lɛ nu do lɛ
mi kan tinmɛ wekwin enɛ lɛ tɔn byɔ e ci ɖɔ mɛɖebu kun tuun o ɖɔhun alo nu tlɛ tuun ɔ ɖɔ nu mi a edith brenisen
wuntun lɛ kpo ɖo nubudo ɖe nyi wɛ
jɛ egbe ɔ mi ɖo fɔtoo wuntun enɛ lɛ tɔn ɖe ɖo nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn mitɔn lɛ a
arthur claus kpo nellie claus kpo yawu wa fi ɖagbe jinjɔn
arthur ɖɔ ɖo xogbe lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖoto wɛ
ajijimɛ ɔ e jɛ se ji ɖo adɔgo mɛ
e jlo e a co e gbɔ sin xɔ ɔ mɛ e tuun ɖɔ emi kun sixu byɔ mɛ o
lɛ ɖokpo kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ sin xɔ ɔ mɛ hwe elɔ gbɔn
arthur tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo wɛ
hwenu arthur lɛkɔ e ɔ e se asikpɛ xixo ɖaxo ɖe sin gbe sin xɔ ɔ mɛ
hwenu e ɖo fi e ci ɖo kɔxo ɖoto nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo xɔ ɔ mɛ e wɛ e ɔ e mɔ fi e hɛn ɔ e fan nu gbɔn yi aza yi mɛtlu e e
enɛ gudo ɔ e yi flɛtɛli ɖaxo ɖo nuvo e ɖe kɔn
finɛ ɔ arthur mɔ nɔvi gege bɔ ɖo ɖe mɛ ɖo ɔ wɛ
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ kan hɛn avɔ ɖaxo ji nuwlanwlan ɔ ɖe e ɖo lɛ e zɛɛn bonu e wa do
cobonu kan lɛ bi ɖo zɛɛn ɔ ɖo hudo jivi ɖokpo tɔn
arthur ɖo akpomɛ jivi ɖe a
yetɔn jɛ do ɖɔ e hɛn jivi ɖokpo
arthur kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo hwenu e ɖɔ e sɔgbe do e
hwenu nɔvi ɖɔ jla
azɔn wegɔ ɔ e ɔ kan lɛ
mɛ mɔ lɛ e tinmɛ avɔ ɖaxo sinmɛ atɔnnɔ ji e wlan nu do e wa do gbɔn nu e
ðo avɔ ɔ sin tɛntin ɔ e mɔ ɖiɖe jezu tɔn
enɛ gudo ɔ nɔvi lɛ tinmɛ nu arthur ɖɔ alya ɖe wɛ emi fan wa aza ɔ bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖe alya ɔ siin
sɔ sixu alɔdo ɖe a enɛ wu ɔ xoɖɛ jehovah ɖɔ e nɔvi hɛn jivi e ɖe do
nɔvi enɛ lɛ kudeji ɖɔ jehovah se ɖɛ emitɔn ɖo ali ɖagbe hugan ɖe
jehovah nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ðo mɛtɛnkpɔn mitɔn lɛ bi mɛ
mi bi wɛ nɔ mɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ kpo lɛ kpo jehovah nɔ do gbɔ nu mi
xota elɔ nu taji ɖeɖee mi sixu zan mɔ gbɔdonumɛ jɔ gbɔdonumɛ din kpo sɔ ja e kpo ji gbɔn
ayi towe ðo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji
xota elɔ mi bɔ mi zan nu jezu mɛ ɖo nujlɛdonuwu tɔn kunkpla ee ɖo ɖagbeɖagbe wɛ e mɛ e
e mi bɔ mi gbeje linlin mi nɔ ɖo do gbɛhwlɛngan tɔn e nu klisanwun lɛ e wu e kpo ee mi nɔ ɖo do nugbo ɖeɖee mi ɖo xwe lɛ gblamɛ e wu e kpo
sixu nu zɛ mɛ lɛ ci ðo wexo e wu a
ðeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ xo fifa kan a
mawu do nu ayi ðo e
ayi towe ðo xo ðaxo ðo atɛ ji e ji
nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e
ðo gbɛwezun lɛ wutu ɔ blewun jɛn e sixu ɖe ayi sin nu nyi nu taji e ji
xota elɔ lɛ mi bɔ jehovah nyi e ɖo taji e su nukun mitɔn mɛ mi bɔ mi tuun mi sixu nɔ gudo gbɔn e
mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ kɔ
etɛwu mi sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ ɖe lɛ tiin ɖo alɔwliwli kpo gbɛzan xwedo tɔn kpo mɛ
ɖɛxixo do gbɔ nu mɛ xo e ɖɔ ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ gbɔn
etɛ sixu blo do do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
jehovah nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mitɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn
ganjɛwu tɛ xo tɔn mi
e ɖo nu do nu elɔ mi xa ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e ji wɛ mɛ asi abi mɛ asu lɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖo nɔ zan ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ mɛ
e kanbyɔ ɖɔ tɛ nyi enɛ
nu wa asi ɔ ɖi xwi xa gbɔn
cobonu stephen kɛnu do nukanbyɔ enɛ wu ɔ e to ɖɔ ɖɔ e gbeje nu ɖevo pɔlu wlan e nu ɔ wɛ nyi mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ kɔ
jehovah nyi wanyiyinɔ ɖe nɔ do gbɔ nu mi hwenu lɛ kpannukɔn mi e nugbo
hwiɖesu sixu gbɔn ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ mɔ ɖɔ mawu ali bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ nyi gbɔn xo tɔn gblamɛ
mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ e nɔ nu hugan e nu mi e blo gbɔn nu tɔn hwexonu tɔn lɛ e xa jelemii
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enyi mi sixu tuun nu nɔ tagba mitɔn lɛ alo mitɔn lɛ e ɔ mi kpewu ɖi xwi xa
wɛ e nɔ nyi gbɔn ɖo mi nɔ mɔ ɖo alɔwliwli alo gbɛzan xwedo tɔn mɛ lɛ e lɔ kɔn
enɛ wu ɔ etɛ nyi ɖe lɛ ɖo nu nɔ dɔn wa bɔ pɔlu ɖɔ lɛ e mɛ
tɛ lɛ mi mɔ ɖo biblu mɛ mɔ ɖo hwe mitɔn bɔ sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ gbɔdonumɛ sin hudo mi ɖo e
enɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa mitɔn lɛ
nu tɛ lɛ nɔ bɔ e mɔ ɖo e nɔ zan ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e mɛ
mi nu mawu ɖɔ ɖo ɖibla yi tɔn tɔn e sunnu jo tɔn kpo nɔ tɔn kpo do jɛ xa asi tɔn bɔ mɛ we lɛ huzu ɖokpo gee bib
jehovah ɖɔ xo enɛ hwenu e ɖo alɔwliwli nukɔntɔn ɔ ayi e
loɔ ninɔmɛ hwɛhuhu tɔn lɛ nɔ bɔ alɔwliwli kpo xwedo ɖe ɖiɖo ayi kpo sixu dɔn adohu adohu wa kancica xwedo tɔn mɛ hlɔ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nu nyɔnu lɛ ɔ nɔ gosin acɛ yetɔn lɛ tɔn glɔ nɔ jɛ acɛ asu yetɔn tɔn glɔ
mawu acɛ asu lɛ bɔ nyi gan nu asi yetɔn
sɔgbe xa xo mawu tɔn ɔ asi ɖe ɖo yi gbe nɔ asu tɔn tɔn glɔ e nyi tɔn lɛ tɔn a
kancica mɛ wli alɔ lɛ e ɖo xa hɛnnumɔ yetɔn lɛ e sixu dɔn alo lɛ wa
adohu adohu ɖevo nɔ wa hwenu asi ɖe ɖɔ nu asu tɔn ɖɔ emi ɖo xo e
e ɖo tamɛ do enɛ wa nu do akwɛzinzan xwedo ɔ tɔn ji gbɔn ɖo din kpo sɔ ja e kpo e ji
huzuhuzu gege ɖo dandan hwenu e ji vi ɔ e
nɔ ɔ sixu nɔ zan hwenu gege do vi tɔn wu nɔ ayi ɖo nukunkpikpe do wutu tɔn wu hugan
asu gege nɔ mɔ ɖɔ asi emitɔn nu emi ɖo kan vi ɔ lɛ e wiwa nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ hugan wutu
ðo akpa ɖevo xwe ɔ ɔ ɖo do kɔ ɖevo lɛ mɛ
nɔ jɛ ji ɖo e ɖo kpe nukun do xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖe wu su hudo tɔn lɛ sin do
enyi e ɖo vi wɛ mɔ ji a ɔ enɛ sixu hɛn wa gbɔn
alɔkpa ɖevo tiin bɔ asu kpo asi kpo ɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ nɔ vi nɔ kpo
nu nyɔnu ɔ mɔ xo a ɔ e sixu flu bi mɛ
alɔwliwli ɔ wɛ a vijiji ɔ wɛ a nu we lɛ ɖebu ɖɔ e gan sin mimɔ si a e ɖo vi wɛ mɔ ji a ɔ enɛ lɔ nyi ɖe nux
ðo biblu sin taan mɛ ɔ e nɔ yawu vimaji do mɔ winnyanu ɖe
ɖeɖee ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi mɛ lɛ ɖo aca nɔ ɖo xwedo ɖaxo ɖe lɛ e ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ kan nu wu ji vi a e byɔ hwɛhwɛ
tinmɛ nu wu wɛ e nu mɛ lɛ e jɛxa gbɔn e kpo kpo ɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ co mi xoɖɛ nu
alo ɖo ayi ninɔmɛ nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ nɔ angleterre ɖo vi wɛ tawun mɔ ji a e ɖe tɔn wu
e kpo asu tɔn kpo wa gbeta ɔ kɔn vi ɖe do ɖo vi yetɔn
e ɖo mɔ co e ɖɔ byɔ alɔkpa ɖevo mɛ
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ vijiji nɔ cyɔn alɔ klisanwun nyɔnu ɖe ji
tim nwt enɛ ɖɔ vijiji alo e ɖo vi lɛ bɔ e mɔ mavɔmavɔ a
e wa ɔ e ɖɔ enyi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo vi nɔ kpe nukun nɔ wa ɖevo lɛ ɔ enɛ bɔ e nɔ ɖo mɛ nu ɖɔ wɛ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ sin xo mɛ a tim
e ɖo co e mɔ ɖeɖee e nɔ mɔ ɖo alɔwliwli kpo gbɛzan xwedo tɔn kpo mɛ lɛ e
e sixu ɖi xwi xa e nɔ mɔ hwenu ɖe ku do mɛ e gbɔn
akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
nu mɛ e wli alɔ xa e ku ɔ e nɔ nyi mɛtɛnkpɔn bunɔ ɖe gbɔn
enyi e ɖo e nɔ mɔ ɖo alɔwliwli wu lɛ e xo ɖɔ wɛ ɔ ɖokpo tiin bɔ e nɔ yawu flin a
enɛ nyi mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖe bɔ mɛ mɛ ku do e sixu nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ emi mɔ ɖo elɔ mɛ
klisanwun lɛ ɖi nu tawun ɖɔ jezu sin ku tɔn
jaan etɛ nukunɖiɖo enɛ nɔ wa nu mɛ mɛ ku do e
e nɔ do gbɔ tawun
ali wanyiyinɔ mitɔn nɔ gbɔn xo tɔn gblamɛ nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo mɛ gbɔn din wɛ ɖe lɛ e ɖevo nɛ
din ɔ nu mi gbeje jehovah tɔn ɖe lɛ mɔ gbɔdonumɛ tɔn ɖu le tɔn gbɔn e
mɔ gbɔdonumɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ blawu mɛ e ɖe e gbɔn
e nyi wɛnsinɔ hwenu ɛlukana sin asi ɖevo nyi penina e ji vi lɛ e
xa samuwɛli
penina nɔ ca nu xwewu xwewu tɛgbɛ
enɛ bɔ nɔ mɔ nɔ mɔ tawun
e mɔ gbɔdonumɛ hwenu e ɖɔ nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ e nu jehovah ɖo ɖɛ mɛ e
nugbo ɔ e xoɖɛ nu hwenu linlin
e ɖo nukun ɖɔ jehovah yi gbe nu ɖɛ emitɔn a
nu nyi
ðebu wɛ e nyi gbɔn ɔ nukun tɔn mɛ jɛ ayi
ɖɛxixo sixu do gbɔ nu mi gbɔn
enyi mi kpo ɖo nyi wɛ kpo ɖo elɔ sataan do e mɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn kpo lɛ kpo ɖo jijɛji wɛ
jaan e ɖo co e tawun ɖɔ mi tuun ɖɔ jehovah nyi mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e
ali mi sixu mɔ alɔdo ɖi xwi xa mɛtɛnkpɔn alo miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɛxixo
ɖɔ nu ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ e bi nu jehovah
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ enyi lɛ kpannukɔn mi ɔ mi ɖo wa nu hu nu ci nu mi e ɖiɖɔ nu jehovah kpowun
etɛ nyi asukusi e ɖo awajijɛ
enyi mi tlɛ nɔ mɔ tawun ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ vlafo ɖo vimamɔji alo ku mɛ ɖe tɔn wutu ɔ mi sixu mɔ gbɔdonumɛ
ðo jezu hwenu ɔ nyɔnu gbeyiɖɔ sin asu ku hwenu wli alɔ blo xwe tɛnwe kpowun gudo e
ɖo vi ɖe bonu biblu ɖɔ a
etɛ kpo ɖo wiwa wɛ hwenu e ɖo xwe e
luki ɖɔ e nɔ ci sinsɛnxɔ mɛ bɔ zan kpodo keze kpo ɔ e nɔ ɖo mawu wɛ ɖo nublabla kpo ɖɛxixo kpo mɛ
mɔ gbɔdonumɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ
enyi hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ tlɛ do gbɔ nu mi a ɔ jɔ lɛ sixu wa
paula flin wu ku gbɔn hwenu nɔ tɔn jo nugbo ɔ do hwenu e ɖo xwe e
mɛtɛnkpɔn enɛ ji ɖuɖu ɖe fa a
e mɔ wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tawun hwenu nyi nɔvi nyɔnu gbexosin ɖe ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e ɖɔ ganjininɔ tɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu emi tawun e
paula tinmɛ ɖɔ nyi hɛnnumɔ a co mɔ ɖɔ nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ gbɔn e mi tawun
e mi bɔ kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ
paula kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo
e vivi tawun ɖɔ e wa ɖo jehovah ɖo xa nɔ tɔn wɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
e vivi nu lɔ tawun ɖo e ci nɔ gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun nu paula
nyɔna tɛ lɛ sin le mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖu
nu tawun e wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi mi kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi ɔ e sixu wa mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo linlin masɔgbe miɖesunɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ ji
nɔvi nyɔnu wli alɔ lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖeɖee wli alɔ a lɛ e kpo tuun ɖɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla ɖi mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖaxo
nu nya wɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mawu su gbɔn jlo tɔn wiwa gblamɛ
pɔlu nyi ɖagbe ɖe ɖo ali enɛ
e wa ci vinɔ ɖe ɖɔhun nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo agun tɛsaloniki tɔn mɛ lɛ e ci gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun nu xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn ɖo nugbo ɔ vi lɛ e
fi e jɛxa ɖɔ mi do gbɔ nu mɛ mɛ ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi xwedo mɛ
mɛ lɛ sixu wa byɔ zin lɛ e ɖɔ emi bonu emi nugbo ɔ vi emitɔn lɛ tlɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ biblu xa mɛ winnyawinnya emitɔn lɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ e nɔ ɖo hudo alɔdo mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn tɔn bɔ e nɔ wa ɖagbe tawun
loɔ enɛ ɖe sin kɔ ji nu lɛ a
xo ɖiɖɔ ɖo xa xwedo yetɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo taji
etɛ e ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ hwenu e ɖo alɔ do vi lɛ wɛ e
enyi ɖe wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo nu xa vi emitɔn lɛ ɔ mɛ enɛ ɖo xo ɔ yi sin lɛ si a
e nɔ wa jɛ bɔ e nɔ byɔ ɖe ɖɔ e nu xa vi ɖeɖee nugbo ɔ jlo yetɔn lɛ a e
ɔ ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ emi ɖo alɔ do vi lɛ wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nugbo emi kun huzu vi lɛ sin o
nu ja nu gbe ɔ e ɖɔ ɖo vi lɛ sin xwegbe kpo yetɔn lɛ kpo alo ɖevo zin e ɖe ɖo ɖo fi ɔ alo e nyi fi jɛ agbawungba jɛxa e ɖe
enɛ bɔ mɛɖebu ɖo linlin vo do nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ e wu a
e ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ e sixu wa jɛ hweɖenu bɔ lɛ wa mawu mɛ nu e kpe nukun do vi yetɔn lɛ wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
vi lɛ sixu nyi jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn ɖe gbɔn
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee yi wan nu mawu nugbo ɔ nɔ xwedo weɖexamɛ tɔn e sixu huzu jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn ɖe ɖo xwedo ɖe mɛ
nɔ gbeji nu jehovah ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu xwedo ɔ bi
lamɛki ɖɔ do vi sunnu tɔn nɔwee wu ɖɔ vi elɔ ɖe mi sin mɔ wɛ mi ɖe ɖo syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ lɛ e mɛ mɔ wɛ mi ɖe ɖo ayikungban jehovah do ɔ ji e vivo mi
vi ɖeɖee nɔ nya sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ gbe lɛ e sixu ɖɔ emi nyi jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn nu xwedo yetɔn lɛ bi bɔ dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn din tɔn lɛ xo nu hugan sinvɔgbɛ ɔ e zlɛ
enyi mi ɖo alo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖebu mɔ wɛ ɔ etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi dɛ kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo
ðɛ tamɛ linlin do ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ji kpo xa mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo alɔdo livi mɔkpan wɛ din bɔ ɖo gbɔdonumɛ mɔ wɛ ɖo nɔ mɔ lɛ e bi mɛ xa ðɛhan
fi dɔkun mitɔn ɖe ɔ fi ayi mitɔn lɔ nɔ e nɛ luk
enyi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn xɔ akwɛ ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ ɔ etɛ enɛ mi bɔ mi wa
etɛ kanɖeji wa ɖɔ yi wan nu gbɛhwlɛngan tɔn mitɔn
ðɔ dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn e jehovah mi lɛ e atɔn etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
jehovah wɛ nyi mɛ jɛ dɔkun hugan ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ e
ðo e nyi ɖe wutu ɔ e nɔ hun alɔ do ma dɔkun tɔn gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ xa mɛ tuun ɖɔ xɔ akwɛ tawun lɛ e bi
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun ɖɔ jehovah dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ mi bɔ nu elɔ lɛ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn gbɛhwlɛngan tɔn mitɔn kpo nugbo xɔ akwɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖo xo tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo
enyi mi ɖo aceji a ɔ dɔkun enɛ lɛ sixu nɔ wa xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ bɔ mi wa fɔ nyi gbe
do wlibo nu ganji ɔ mi ɖo zan ganji ɖo nɔ do glɔ nu wanyiyi mi ɖo nu e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
jezu ɖɔ fi dɔkun mitɔn ɖe ɔ fi ayi mitɔn lɔ nɔ e nɛ luk
nu mi mi sixu ɖo wanyiyi nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɔ kpo nugbo ɔ kpo bɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo mi sixu hɛn wanyiyi enɛ kpo nusumɛnukunmɛ enɛ kpo gbɔn e kpo
ee mi ɖo wa wɛ e ɔ tamɛ do hwiɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ sixu blo bɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ e gbɔn e ji
etɛ xo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa mɔ tɛn do ɖo ɖagbeɖagbe ɔ
jezu nujlɛdonuwu ɖe kunkpla ɖo ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ wɛ e ɖe
din ɔ e mɔ xɔ akwɛ tawun hu ee e mɔ lɛ e bi e ɖe bɔ xomɛ hun tawun
loɔ cobonu e xɔ ɔ e ɖo sa nu ɖevo e ɖo lɛ e bi
do nukun enɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ e
enyi mi yi wan nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɔ yi wan nu ɔ gbɔn e ɔ etɛ mi wa
nukplɔnmɛ tɛ nu mi
nugbo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn ci ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ ɖɔhun
enyi mi yi wan ɔ yi wan nu enɛ gbɔn e ɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ jo nu mi ɖo lɛ e bi do mɔ tɛn do huzu tovi axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ nyi sɔyi xa
mi mɛ wa lɛ e we
zacee ɖɔ emi kanɖeji byɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn mɛ gbɔn
hwenu nya enɛ se wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla wɛ jezu ɖe e ɔ e tuun xo se wɛ e ɖe e xɔ akwɛ e yawu huzu jijɔ
kpo xomɛhunhun kpo ɔ e jo dɔkun e jɛ do acɛ ji lɛ e kpo e nɔ do do nu agbaza tɔn lɛ wu e kpo do
huzuhuzu tɛ lɛ blo huzu tovi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn ɖe
etɛwu e wa xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie ɔ nyɔnu ɖe tiin nɔ nyi se wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn e nɔ ɖo nyɔnu ɖoxo xa nyɔnu mɛ
e nyi gan nu nɔ jɛhun do acɛ sunnu nɔ ɖoxo xa yeɖee alo nyɔnu nɔ ɖoxo xa yeɖee lɛ e ɖo e ji e ɖe
ee ɖo biblu wɛ e ɔ e mɔ nu jɛ nugbo kunkpla axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn e xɔ akwɛ e wu
ayixa tɔn ɛ bɔ e tɛn mɛ e ɖe e jo nyɔnu ɖoxo xa nyɔnu do
blo baptɛm ɖo bɔ ɖo xwe bɔ e mɛ ɔ e gbexosin hwebinu tɔn sin
mi sixu kpo ɖo wan yi nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wɛ kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gege mitɔn blo huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ cobo huzu tovi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn
mi ɖo ɖo aceji do nu ɖeɖee nɔ xo wanyiyi mi ɖo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ e yi lɛ e wu ɖi jlo mi ɖo ɖo agbaza sin nu lɛ e kpo jlo nublibliwiwa tɔn alɔkpa lɛ bi kpo
do mi bonu mi yi wan nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo ɔ jehovah dɔkun xɔ akwɛ ɖevo mi
etɛwu pɔlu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɔ ci dɔkun ɖo mɛ e ɖɔhun
pɔlu ɖɔ ɔ xɔ akwɛ nu emi gbɔn
flin ɖɔ jezu mi ɖɔ mi jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn nu mɛ
pɔlu tuun ɔ xɔ akwɛ e
mi nyi nuzinzan e alo kpowun do blo e co wɛn mi nɔ jla sixu mavɔmavɔ miɖesunɔ kpo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖoto mi lɛ e kpo
pɔlu tuun enɛ ɖɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ wu wɛ ɖo nu enɛ lɛ bi wa wɛ sixu ɖo mima ɖo ɖagbe ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ e mɛ
xa hlɔmanu lɛ timɔtee
mi sixu ɖo wanyiyi mɔhun nu ɔ gbɔn
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖe
pɔlu ɖɔ ɔ su nukun emitɔn mɛ gbɔn e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ ɖo aceji do ali hun bɔ e ɖɔ xo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e bi wu
lɛ kpo klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ kpo ɖɔhun ɔ mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ ɖo ali nyi aca tɔn a e ɖo agbawungba nɔ jla sin xwe ɖe gbe jɛ xwe ɖe gbe
jehovah do nu kan kanɖeji jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ e gbɔn
mi nyi nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ ɖe ɖo etats unis e tɔn
hwenu e jɛ wa ji ɖo e ɔ jɛn ɖo kanɖo nɔ do russie gbe ɖo e mɛ
xwe gudo ɔ wa syɛnsyɛn ɖo fi e nɔ do gbe enɛ ɖe e
ɖɔ russie gbe do bonu nu bi vɔ a
egbe ɔ agun nɔ do russie gbe ɔ wɛ ɖo
mɛ nu xa e blo baptɛm
mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli nyi gbexosin lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo
ɖɔ enyi nu do nu ɖevo ɖeɖee gbe sixu nya lɛ e ji ɔ mɔ ee awajijɛ mi hu enɛ e a
nɔ towe do mɔ dɔkun ɖe nɔ ɖe enɛ ɖo tito aklunɔzan gblamɛ tɔn towe lɛ mɛ a
akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
enyi yadonumɛ lɛ ɖo finɛ co mi kpo ɖo wɛn ɔ jla wɛ ɔ le tɛ lɛ e nɔ hɛn wa
enyi ɔ xɔ akwɛ nu mi ɔ mi ci pɔlu ɖɔhun bɔ yadonumɛ lɛ ɖo finɛ co mi kpo ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ mɛ
ðo kpo kpo vlamɛ ɔ yadonumɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe kpannukɔn nɔvi mitɔn ɖo etats unis lɛ e
pɔlu ɖɔhun ɔ gbi dɔn kpo ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ
do cyɔn alɔ acɛ mi ɖo wa e ji ɔ nɔvi lɛ ahwan sɔgbe ɖo linu e gege
ðo ɔ nɔvi nathan
knorr ɖɔ xo elɔ hwenu e ɖo xo ɖɔ do ɖuɖeji mi ɖo ɖo hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo etats unis tɔn e ɖokpo ji wɛ e ahwanfunfun mitɔn wɛ bɔ mi ɖo ɖuɖeji lɛ
enyi lɛ kpo ɖo wɛn ɔ jla wɛ a ɔ e xo ɖebu yi hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo ɔ a lɛ nɔvi gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e kpo ɖo wɛn jla wɛ jo do a wu wɛ bɔ yadonumɛ lɛ cifo
togun aklunɔ tɔn ɔ gbi dɔn wɛ bɔ hwɛɖɔxɔsa ɔ wa wa gbeta enɛ kɔn
ðo nɔvi ɖo to ɖevo lɛ mɛ lɛ e lɔ gbi dɔn gbɔn wutu ɔ e ɖo ɖuɖeji mɔhun lɛ
nugbo ɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu ɔ e sixu ɖu ɖo yadonumɛ lɛ ji
etɛ kanɖeji wa ɖo towe
enyi mi ɔ do mɔ dɔkun xɔ akwɛ gosin jehovah e ɖe ɔ mi ayi ɖo ganmɛ nabi mi ɖo e ji kpowun a
etɛ mi mɛ ɖevo lɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do dɔkun ɖevo gosin mawu e ji
dɔkunsɛxwetɛn tɛ xo jezu ɖɔ ɖo matie mɛ mi blo gbɔn
dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn atɔngɔ ɔ wɛ nyi nugbo e lɛ e sin dɔkunsɛxwetɛn mitɔn
jehovah nyi jɔtɛn nugbo ɔ tɔn
jaan ðo enyi ɖe wutu ɔ e nɔ ma nugbo gosin tɔn lɛ e xa mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo sisi lɛ e
sin hwenu mi se nugbo ɔ sin xo azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e ɔ ali hun nu mi bɔ mi xo nugbo mi nɔ mɔ ɖo xo tɔn biblu ɔ mɛ lɛ e wema klisanwun tɔn lɛ mɛ lɛ e kpo ee mi nɔ mɔ ɖo ɖaxo lɛ lɛ kpo kple aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo ji lɛ e kple
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ mi sɔnu nu nu jezu ylɔ ɖɔ dɔkunsɛxwetɛn mɛ nugbo xoxo lɛ kpo nugbo lɛ kpo ɖe e xa matie
jehovah mi bɔ mi xo nugbo xɔ akwɛ lɛ kple do dɔkunsɛxwetɛn mitɔn enyi mi dɔkun hwla lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ nɛ
xa nunywɛxo
enɛ mi bɔ mi mɔ nugbo lɛ nyi nu mi ɖo mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ a joz
ðɛh xojlawema elɔ nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɖo juillet e ɖɔ nugbo ɔ ci folowa kpɛvi ɖo ji e ɖe ɖɔhun ɖo ci gbetotlo ɖɔhun e mɛ bɔ nuwanyido ci gbehan mu ɖo vunvun wɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun e do ɖibla fyɔn hu
enyi jlo ɖo ɔ ɖo fɛ yi do
ðo xixokple wɛ ɖevo lɛ
nugbo ɔ akpakpa ɖo mi bɔ mi dɔkun ɖevo lɛ do nugbo mawu tɔn lɛ sin dɔkunsɛxwetɛn miɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ nugbo ɖe lɛ nyi nugbo xoxo
ðetɛ lɛ xɔ akwɛ nu tawun
mi nɔ mɔ nugbo xɔ akwɛ ɖe lɛ hwenu mi jɛ do xa togun mawu tɔn ji azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e
e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ nyi xoxo enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi mɔ nugbo enɛ lɛ hwenu mi klisanwun zinzan tlolo e bɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
etɛ lɛ ɖo nugbo xɔ akwɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ
mi ɖɔ jehovah nyi kpo mitɔn kpo ɖɔ e ɖo linlin ɖe nu lɛ
mi ɖɔ wanyiyi mawu sɔnu nu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn vi tɔn tɔn bonu mi do sixu gan sin hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo si
etɛ mi ɖo wa hwenu mi mɔ bɔ e huzu nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do nugbo ɖe ji e
sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu ɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do biblu tɔn lɛ alo akpaxwe mawuxowema ɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ ji e sixu huzu
enyi e nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ enɛ lɛ ɔ mi ɖo zan hwenu do ganji tamɛ mɛ
tim e nyi huzuhuzu ɖaxo lɛ kɛɖɛ mɛ wɛ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ ganji a loɔ mi ɖo mɔ nukunnu jɛ vogbingbɔn klewun klewun ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ xoxo ɔ kpo ɔ kpo tɛntin lɛ e mɛ
mɛ ɔ mi vo nugbo ɔ do dɔkunsɛxwetɛn mitɔn
etɛwu gandido mɔhun xɔ akwɛ
gbigbɔ sixu mi gbɔn
jezu mɛ ɖɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn sixu flin nu ɖeɖee mi lɛ e mi
jaan enɛ sixu mi hwenu mi ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ ɖo agbawungba e gbɔn
mi nɔvi sunnu nɔ nyi e tɔn
ðo ɔ e ɖo xwe ɖo betɛli grande bretagne tɔn
hwenu e ɖo wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ sin hɔn ɖe kɔn jɛ hɔn ɖe kɔn e ɔ e mɔ nya atannɔ ɖo xwe e ɖe
kanbyɔ nya ɔ ɖɔ e jlo mɔ nukunnu jɛ biblu mɛ a ji
e ci kliwun nu nya ɔ kpɛɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ le xwe elɔ ɔ jwifu lɛ xwe wɛ
do ɔ ɔ kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ vi gbe tɛ mɛ e wlan wema daniyɛli tɔn do
ɖɔ e wlan akpaxwe tɔn ɖe do alamugbe mɛ
flin ɖɔ e kpaca ɔ ɖɔ tuun xosin ɔ e kpaca nyɛ a
tuun xosin ɔ gbɔn
hwenu yi xwegbe atɔxwɛ kpo reveillez vous
kpo wa yi lɛ e tɔn gbeje e ɔ mɔ xota ɖe bɔ e tinmɛ ɖɔ e wlan wema daniyɛli tɔn do alamugbe mɛ
enyi nunywɛ gosin jehovah xɔ akwɛ nu mi ɔ ayi mitɔn mi bɔ mi nugbo lɛ kpo xoxo lɛ kpo dɔkunsɛxwetɛn mitɔn
ee wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nunywɛ jehovah tɔn e ɖo jijɛji wɛ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ su wɛ e ɔ mi kpewu tawun nyi agbawungba tɔn lɛ
etɛwu mi ɖo nya xɛ ɖo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn lɛ ji
sataan kpo tɔn kpo ɖo biba wɛ hwebinu nu dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ lɛ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e alo blo bɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ a
mi gan sin wlɛnwin tɔn lɛ si a
akwɛ tɔn kpe lɛ e xwixwle mɛ kuku do fɛɛ mɛ ninɔ tɔn ji alo jlo ɖiɖo ɖo nuɖokan mɛtɔn lɛ agban sixu dɔn mi ya
pɔlu flin nu mi ɖɔ elɔ kpo jlo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo wiwa yi wɛ
jaan enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo do gan tawun nya xɛ ɖo wanyiyi mi ɖo nu dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e kpo su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo ji
etɛ kanɖeji wa do cyɔn alɔ dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn towe lɛ ji
ðo gbesisɔmɛ jo nu ɖeɖee sixu xo wanyiyi ɖo nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kpo ayi bi kpo e yi lɛ e bi do
kpo ɖo wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo nu gbɛhwlɛngan tɔn mitɔn su nukun towe mɛ gbɔn e bli bu gbeɖe o
kpo ɖo nugbo mawu tɔn lɛ wɛ kpo ayi bi kpo
enyi ɖo wa wɛ ɔ kple dɔkun ɖo mawu fi nuɖe wa ɛ ɖe a e ɖo nɔ yi finɛ a nuvinuvi nɔ ɖu nu ɖo finɛ a
ðo fi dɔkun towe ɖe ɔ fi ayi towe lɔ nɔ e nɛ luk
enyi mi nyi fifa ɔ enɛ nɔ bɔ mawu nugbo lɛ nɔ ɖu vivi fifa gege tɔn
enɛ nɔ bɔ agun klisanwun tɔn ɔ nɔ dɔn mɛ ɖevo ɖeɖee vo sin hwɛgbe si lɛ e
ði ɔ ɖe ɖo madagascar ɖo ayi sin vivi jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖu e wu
e ɖɔ nu eɖee ɖɔ nu jlo byɔ sinsɛn ɖe mɛ gbeɖe ɔ enɛ mɛ jɛn byɔ
e wa ya e ɔ e jo awovinuwiwa lɛ do zan mɔkpan do jla ninɔmɛ xwedo tɔn tɔn sɔgbe xa biblu a e ɖo huzu jehovah mawu fifanɔ ɔ tɔn ɖe
nya enɛ ɖɔhun ɔ mɔkpan nɔ mɔ fifa wɛ ɖe nukun myamya e ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ xwewu xwewu
biblu ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ wuhwinhwan baɖabaɖa kpo agbahwlɛnxamɛ sin ayixa kpo sixu hɛn kancica ɖo mi tɛntin ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e gble dɔn hunnyahunnya wa ja
awajijɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ biblu ɖe we ɖagbe lɛ xa mi do mi sixu nyi alɔ nu tagba enɛ lɛ blo bɔ fifa ɖo tɛntin mitɔn e jɛji gbɔn e wu
do kpe nu wu wa ɔ nu mi ɖɔ xo do ninɔmɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖo gbɛmɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ ji
e nɔ vɛwu nu mi nu ma wa nu ɖo xa nɔvi sunnu kpo nyi kpo nɔ ɖo e ɖe
e su gbe ɖokpo bɔ mi ɖo xo su do nu miɖee wɛ bɔ mɛ we wa jɛ do tɛn tɔn mɛ chris
nɔvi nyɔnu kpo nyi kpo nɔ ɖo hwɛhwɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ e nɔ kpowun do gudo fɔ
enɛ gudo ɔ e nɔ ɖɔ xo xa mi a
tuun nu wu wɛ e a janet
mi mɛ atɔn ɖo kan zɛɛn ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ
mɛ ɖokpo ɖɔ e ɖabɔ bɔ vɛdo ɖɔ e sun kan wɛ sin
enɛ gudo ɔ jɛ nu sɔgbe a lɛ e ɖɔ do wu tɔn ji nu mɛ wegɔ ɔ e kpo ɖo kan ɔ fɛɛ michael
ðo agun mitɔn mɛ ɔ gbexosin we jɛ tagba jɛ ji
mɛ ɖokpo jɛ xo su do nu mɛ wegɔ ɔ ji
hwɛgbe ɖo tɛntin yetɔn e bɔ awakanmɛ jɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ku ji gary
nu enɛ lɛ sixu ci nu nuɖe a e ɖɔhun ɖo nukun towe mɛ
hwɛgbe enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo sixu mɛ xo ɔ kan lɛ e sin ayi sɔyi hɛn nu gble do wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ fifa wa tiin ɖo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo enɛ lɛ tɛntin ɖo bi xwedo biblu tɔn lɛ wutu
biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ wɛ dɔ zan bɔ e kpa
ɖɔ jlɛ alo mɔ do miɖee wu ɖo alixo o
bib jozɛfu ɖe we enɛ ɔ xa nɔvi sunnu tɔn ɖeɖee lɛkɔ xwe yetɔn lɛ e
nunywɛxo tawun wɛ nyi xo tɔn
nu mɛɖe nɔ ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci e ji a nɔ yawu sin xomɛ ɔ e sixu do xomɛsin nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
chris wa mɔ ɖɔ ganmaɖo emitɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ emi nɔ yigo kun nɔ yawu yi gbe nu o
ðo e jlo huzu wutu ɔ e do kɛnklɛn nu nɔvi sunnu kpo e kpo dɔn nu e enɛ gudo ɔ e syɛnsyɛn do ɖu ɖo xomɛsin tɔn ji
ee chris tɔn mɔ gan do wɛ e ɖe ɖyɔ e ɔ elɔ jɛ huzuhuzu lɛ blo ji
din ɔ bi ɖo jehovah sinsɛn ɖo sin vivi ɖu wɛ
janet wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi ɖo hɛn nugbo enɛ do ayi mɛ ganji
e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi yi ɖɔ xo xa nɔvi nyɔnu wegɔ ɔ
ðo yetɔn hwenu ɔ janet byɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ kpo kpo ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu lɛ e bi
nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ wa mɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo tagba nyi wɛ din e ɔ emi mɔ nu jɛ mɛ nyi do le nu ɖe kun tlɛ nyi janet tɔn lɔ o
e do kɛnklɛn bɔ bi jɛ jehovah ɖo ji
sixu flin we elɔ jezu ɖe xa mɛ ɖo mawuxoɖiɖɔ so ji tɔn ɔ hwenu e
e wa nu michael tawun hwenu e mɔ e keya nu mɛ a xomɛ a gbɔn e e
michael ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu hwɛ kɛ mi bi
wa huzu
nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ enyi mɛɖe wa nu nyi do nu mɛɖe ɖo mɛ hweɖebunu hun nɔ kɛ miɖee
mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ sɔgbe ɖe gɔn hwɛ kɛ miɖee kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ ɖo fifa mɛ a
yi gbe nu we mɛxo agun tɔn ɔ ɖe xa e zan
din ɔ nɔ ɖo ganji ɖo ɔ mɛ
biblu tɔn ɖo kolosinu lɛ mɛ e zinzan sixu nyi nu nukɔntɔn sixu mi hwenu mɛɖe wa nu nyi do nu mi e
mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ mɛɖesɔhwe sixu bɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ wɔn nu jɛ e
nu e do gan ɖe lɛ bɔ enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ e wa ci ɖɔ e ɖo hudo nu ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɔ e sixu zan nugbododo ɖo matie mɛ e a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ afɔ e ɖe hwenu mɛɖe hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe do mɛ ɖevo e wɛ weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn elɔ do gesi
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ xwedo nugbododo enɛ
biblu ɖe we ɖagbe ɖevo lɛ xa mɛ
nɔ zɔn bɔ macinu ɖe nɔ wa gbɔn e ɔ wɛ jujɔ mawu tɔn enɛ lɛ lɔ nɔ bɔ e nɔ wa nu do xo fifa kan gbɔn e nɛ
e sixu dɔn tagba lɛ wa
mɛxo mɔ nu e ɖe elɔ e sixu vɛwu nu mɛ nɔ ku winnya e ɖe ɖɔ e nɔ xa mɛ jɔ e ɖe
vogbingbɔn enɛ sixu ci nu syɛn a e ɖɔhun loɔ e sixu dɔn tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ wa
nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo jijɔ ɖokpo a lɛ e nɔ jɛ tagba dandan wɛ a
e mi ɖɔ xo do we ji
alɔkpa tɛ nyi
sixu ɖɔ e nyi mɛɖe kun nɔ tamɛ cobo nɔ yawu ɖɔ xo o
jaan
mi sixu ɖɔ eyɛ nɔ yi wan nu mɛ nɔ nɔ ji ɖo xoɖiɖɔ kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo mɛ
hwɛjijɔ ɖe lɛ wɛ bɔ e ɖo linlin mɔhun do we lɛ wu
vlafo nɔvi ɖe ɖo agun towe mɛ bɔ xoɖiɖɔ tɔn alo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo nu
ɖo tuun ɖɔ klisu ku nu mɛ enɛ ɔ wutu ɔ ɖo ɖe wanyiyi ɛ
jaan hlɔ ɖo zunzun xa mɛ mɔhun alo nyi alɔ o e wa hun kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ nɔvi nɔ wa nu sɔgbe kpo mawuxowema ɔ kpo a e ɖe wɛ a
ayi hɛn do wɛ e ɖe bonu mɔ vivo o a
alo jijɔ mitɔn lɛ gbɔn vo kpowun wɛ a
ɔ nukanbyɔ elɔ ɖo taji jijɔ ɖagbe tɔn tɛ lɛ sin le sixu ɖu
nukanbyɔ gudo tɔn enɛ ɔ ɖo taji
enyi mɛ ɔ yi wan nu xo bɔ hwɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo a hun tamɛ do e nɔ bɔwu bɔ e nɔ xoɖiɖɔ xa mɛ lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ gbɔn e ji
sixu blo tuto xa ɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ nu sixu ɖo tɔn lɛ e
nu eyɛ ɖo aca nunamɛ tɔn bɔ hwɛ nɔ tɛ fɛn akwɛ ji kpɛɖe hun ɖo ayi awajijɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖo nunina mɛxomɔ lɛ azinzɔnnɔ lɛ alo mɛ ɖo hudo mɛ lɛ e mɛ e wu
wiwa bɔ nyi dandan wɛ a loɔ e sixu bɔ sɛkpɔ miɖee bɔ fifa jɛji ɖo tɛntin mitɔn kpo agun ɔ bi kpo mɛ
evodii kpo sɛntici kpo sixu nɔ ɖo linlin vovo alo ɖo jijɔ vovo lɛ
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ ɖo gbe nɔvi ɖo aklunɔ mɛ ɖɔhun
fili do gan nya nu enɛ gbe nya jijɔ ca kan xa ɛ nyi fifa e gbe a
ði gbehan nyanya ɖo wɛ ɖo jikpa mɛ e do folowa lɛ ɖo e ɖɔhun ɔ jɛn nu mi ɖo linlin nyanya lɛ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu hɔn ɖɔ a ɔ ɖo wɛ gbɔn e nɛ
nu xomɛsin ayi mɛ nu mɛɖe ɔ e sixu wa nu do agun ɔ bi wu
nu mi yi wan nu jehovah kpo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo ɔ mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi bɔ vogbingbɔn ɖo mi tɛntin lɛ e doya nu fifa togun mawu tɔn tɔn alo ɖekpo a
enyi nɔ hwiɖee hwe nɔ do gan nɔ xo fifa kan ɔ sixu mɔ le ɖagbe nɔ sin mɛ lɛ e
enyi mi ɖɔ xo do tagba lɛ alo vogbingbɔn lɛ ji xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo linlin fifa biba tɔn kpo ɔ nu mɛ e kɔ do e sixu jiwu tawun
e nɔ nu mi tawun
ee xomɛsin ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɔ jɛ hun nyla do e ji
ɖɔ ðo e nɔ ɖo sisi jɛxa mi e nu mi a wutu ɔ nyi lɔ si a
enɛ wa jɛ nu ji do nuwalɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn ji
jɛ nuwanyido ceɖesunɔ lɛ mɔ ji bɔ wa ɖo mi do nyiɖee wu tawun
wa mɔ ɖɔ ɖo linlin jlaɖo ee xoɖɛ jehovah do tagba ɔ ji gudo e ɔ xɔ nu kpɛvi ɖe wlan wema klewun ɖe ze yi jo nu nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ ɖɔ do wema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ e hwɛ kɛ mi ɖo wa nu xa ɛ gbɔn e wu
mi zunfan miɖee yi gbe wɔn tagba ɔ
mi wa jɛ tagba ɖevo a
lɛ ɖo fifa wɛ nukun myamya
nu e xo tɛn mɛ mɛ lɛ ɖe e kpo sisi jɛxa e kpo nyi ɔ gege yetɔn nɔ jɛ nu wa ji ɖo ali ɖe nɔ sɔgbe kpo fifa kpo a
mɛ nɔ jehovah a lɛ e gege nɔ wa fifa kpo buninɔ kpo ɖo nɔ mɛ ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ lɛ e tɛntin
e mɛ nu pɔlu wlan ɖɔ ɖo byɔbyɔ wɛ ɖɔ zan mitɔn sɔgbe xa mawu jlo gbɔn hwenu e ylɔ e
fifa enɛ dɔn mi ca e xɔ akwɛ tawun
nu mi blo bonu e syɛn kanɖeji ɖeɖɛ tagba ɖebu wa mi tɛntin e
pɔlu nyi mɛɖe nyla hun tawun
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e tinmɛ nu nɔ ci do ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ wu e ɖɔ xomɛ yetɔn nɔ sin mi ɖaxo mɛ
pɔlu blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo ɖe lɛ ɖo baptɛm tɔn gudo e kpo ɖo nuewanu e nyi e flin do wutu tɔn wɛ
ee e huzu klisanwun bɔ e blo taan ɖe gudo e ɔ nɔvi ɖeɖee ɖo jeluzalɛmu lɛ e bi nɔ ɖi xɛsi do wu tɔn ɖo ɖeji ɖɔ elɔ huzu ahwanvu klisu tɔn a wutu mɛ
nu e nyi jozɛfu nyi klisanwun ɖe gosin ciplu e tɔn wu wɛ a ɔ agun ɔ sixu kpo ɖo eɖee do pɔlu wu wɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nukun kpe do nu wu wɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖo sisi lobɔ e pɔlu
mɛ ee se kunnu baanabasi ɖe do pɔlu wu e ɔ agun jeluzalɛmu tɔn ɔ yi
zaanɖe kpowun ɔ nya we enɛ lɛ jɛ wa ɖo ji mɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ xomɛ baanabasi nɔ e kpo e nɔ se xa mɛ gbɔn e kpo nɔ su nukun pɔlu tɔn mɛ
biblu tinmɛ ɖɔ nu dindɔn syɛn e ɖe wa ɖo tɛntin yetɔn ɖo hweɖenu
ɔ ɖɔ gbɔn vo nu yeɖee gbɔn e wɛ bɔ nu do nyi a
pɔlu kpo baanabasi kpo gbɔn vo nu yeɖee co kpe nu wu wa ɖo cobɔ nu dindɔn ɔ wa
mi xa ɖɔ pɔlu kpo kpo wa ɖo ɖo gudo mɛ
