enɛ wu ɔ vogbingbɔn ɖo mi tɛntin e bonu tagba a e jɛ wa yi a e jɛ ɖo egbe a
xwedo grece lɛ tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ji wɛ ɖo ayiɖeɖayi ɖe hwenu ɖo athenes sin xa mɛ
etɛ davidi bɔ e kpa ɛ mi sixu ɖu tɔn sin le gbɔn
davidi kpe nyɔnu xwesi enɛ hwenu e ɖo hinhɔn nu axɔsu sawulu wɛ e
abigayilu nyi nabalu jɛ dɔkun nɔ nyi tɔn tobutobu lɛ ɖo sokan ɖo tofɔligbe judaa tɔn e mɛ e sin asi
davidi kpo mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ci ahoho ɖɔhun nu nabalu tɔn lɛ kpo lɛngbɔkpo tɔn lɛ kpo
nu e ali davidi nya xɛ ɖo nuɖokan nabalu tɔn lɛ ji ɖe e ɔ e byɔ nu nyi do a
nabalu nyikɔ tɔn sin tinmɛ nyi xlonɔ alo gɔgɔnɔ e wa nu sɔgbe kpo nyikɔ tɔn kpo
e do gbe nu davidi zun nu e byɔ lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ davidi sɔnu yi dɔn to nu nabalu ɖo xosin nyanya xosin masɔgbe e e e wu
ee abigayilu ɖo ayi nu mɛ tamɛ nuwiwa asu tɔn tɔn kɔ do e wu e ɔ e yawu xo ɔ mɛ
e byɔ davidi kpo sisi kpo ɖɔ e do kancica ɖo e kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e wu jo xo do
e hɛn nuɖuɖu yi jo nu davidi wa nyi axɔsu bɔ e kpo sunnu tɔn lɛ kpo nyi
davidi wa doku nu jehovah ɖɔ e zan nyɔnu enɛ bɔ emi kun wa nu bɔ emi nyi ɖo nukɔntɔn e o
davidi ɖɔ nu abigayilu ɖɔ emi doku nu mawu ɖo ayi eyɛ abigayilu ɔ ɖo hɛn emi ɖo bɔ emi kɔn hun kɔn nyi ayi a e wu
ɔ enyi mi mɔ ninɔmɛ nyanya ɖe ɖo kan vun wɛ ɔ e ɖɔ mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi ɖeɖɛ
nugbo ɔ nu ci nu ɖɔ xo elɔ nu mawu e sixu ci nu mi lɔ ayi ɖo kpo nutuuntuun kpo mi ðɛh nwt
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu ɖo ayi nunywɛ alo ayi mitɔn nɔ ɖo ɖo nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ mɛ e wu
etɛwu ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi ɔ nyi xo taji ɖe kan lɛ bi
gbeji jɔbu nɔ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn mɛ e nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e gbɔn
e ɖo co ali tɛ jɔbu ɖe klewun
xo ɖaxo tɛ kan lɛ bi
xo enɛ ɖo su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e nyi nu taji sɔ
nu gege lɛ tɔn ɖo egbe ɔ akwɛ wɛ nyi nu taji hugan
nɔ ayi yetɔn bi do blo gbɔn jɛ dɔkun e alo blo gbɔn wlibo nu nu ɖo e ji
nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɔ xwedo yetɔn lanmɛ nɔ ganji yetɔn alo nu jlo wa ɖo yetɔn mɛ lɛ e wɛ ɖo taji hugan
xo ɖaxo kan mi bi e wɛ nyi mi ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi ɔ gbɔn e
mi sixu ayi mitɔn ɖo adohu adohu azan ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn ji wɔn e nyi nu taji sɔ ɖɔ mi ɖɔ mawu wɛ nyi ɔ e
alo mi sixu jo mɛtɛnkpɔn miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ do bɔ cyɔn yɛ xo ɖaxo enɛ ji
bɔ nu enɛ nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ e bɔ mi sɛkpɔ jehovah
etɛ sataan ɖɔ do acɛkpikpa mawu tɔn wu
nuwiwa sataan awovi tɔn nukanbyɔ ɖe nyi atɛ ji jehovah nyi a
e ɖɔ ɖɔ acɛkpikpa jehovah tɔn kun sɔgbe o le e nɔ tɛ nu ɖagbe hugan lɛ nuɖiɖo tɔn lɛ
sɔgbe kpo nu awovi ɖɔ e kpo ɔ lɛ ɖo awajijɛ hugan vo hugan enyi do yeɖee ji ɔ nɛ
do xosin nu adɔn enɛ awovi nyite e ɔ jehovah jo lɛ do nu taan ɖe nu e nɔ acɛkpikpa tɔn hwɛjijɔnɔ ɔ glɔ a ɔ e nyla e
etɛwu e ɖo ɖeɖɛ mawu nyi e sin xo ɔ
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ jehovah tuun ɖɔ hwɛdomɛ awovi tɔn lɛ nyi adingban
bɔ etɛwu e jo xo enɛ sataan nyite e do jɛ egbe hun ali bonu e kunnuɖenu xo e ɖɔ lɛ e tɔn
xosin ɔ kan nuɖiɖo ɖo nunywɛ lɛ e bi xa ðɛhan nwt
asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ acɛkpikpa jehovah tɔn lobɔ sin hwenɛnu jɛ egbe ɔ mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ lɔ wa
enɛ sixu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ ɖɔ awovi sin hwɛ jɔ
enyi xo enɛ ɔ gbo ɖo lɛ alo wɛnsagun lɛ sin ayi mɛ a jɛn wɛ ɔ tagba tiin ɖo to lɛ akɔta lɛ hɛnnu lɛ xwedo lɛ kpo lɛ kpo tɛntin
enyi jehovah nyi e wa jɛ we bi gudo ɔ mɛ lɛ bi yeɖee do acɛkpikpa tɔn hwɛjijɔnɔ ɔ glɔ sɔyi
fifa wa kpe wɛkɛ ɔ bi mɛ efɛ
acɛ mawu ɖo nyi e jɛ we lobɔ acɛkpikpa sataan kpo lɛ kpo tɔn bi bɔ tiin a
acɛ mawu kpa gbɔn axɔsuɖuto mɛsiya ɔ tɔn ji e yi lobɔ lɛ ɖɔ lɛ sixu zunfan acɛkpikpa mawu tɔn
eza jlo nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖe yeɖee ɖi nɔ nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e mɛ a
jehovah nyi ɖo taji sɔ
mi mɔ gbɔn wa yi e ɔ jehovah nyi e nyi xo taji ɖe ɖu lɛ
e ɖo taji tawun hu awajijɛ ɖebu sixu ɖo e
nu enɛ nu hwlɛngan mitɔn xɔ akwɛ e alo ɖɔ jehovah kun nɔ kpe nukun mi wu ganji o wɛ a
etɛwu mawu nyi e ɖo byɔ ɖɔ e ɖe akpa tɔn lɛ
jehovah ɖo wanyiyi e nu lɛ lobɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ
e jlo do hun vi tɔn tɔn do hun hwlɛngan mavɔmavɔ sin ali nu mi
jaan jaan nu jehovah kpewu ɖe akpa tɔn lɛ a ɔ awovi mɔ hwɛjijɔ ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ adingbannɔ nɔ tɛ nu ɖagbe lɛ mɛ nɔ ɖo ali sɔgbe a e e
e mɔ hwɛjijɔ nu ɖeɖee nɔ ca akpa mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ kan nu elɔ byɔ lɛ e e do akpa ɖɔ emi wa wɛ a ce
hun jehovah mɔ ɖɔ emi nyi e byɔ ɖɔ emi hwlɛn lɛ gan
xa ezayii
ɔ jehovah nyi e junjɔn wanyiyi ji
enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ e yi wan nu tɔn lɛ tɛgbɛ bɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ lobɔ nu yetɔn su nukun tɔn mɛ tin
jehovah nyi e tuuntuun nyi nu taji e nu hwlɛngan mitɔn alo mi xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ e a
linlin sɔgbe e ɖo wɛ mi ɖe kpowun do jehovah nyi e kpo hwlɛngan mitɔn kpo wu
linlin enɛ sɔgbe e ɖo taji nu mi jlo ayi mitɔn ɖo xo taji enɛ ɖo e ji zunfan acɛkpikpa jehovah tɔn hwɛjijɔnɔ ɔ nɛ
etɛ sataan ɖɔ do jɔbu wu
e tinmɛ nu wu mi ɖo ɖo linlin sɔgbe e nyi wɛn ɖo wema jɔbu tɔn ee nyi ɖokpo ɖo wema biblu tɔn e wlan do nukɔn lɛ e mɛ e
ðo finɛ ɔ mi mɔ adɔn sataan nyite ɖɔ ɖɔ nu jɔbu mɔ syɛnsyɛn ɔ e mawu e
sataan byɔ mawu ɖɔ eɖesunɔ doya nu jɔbu
jehovah blo a e jo sataan do bɔ e jɔbu ɖɔ hɛn ɔ yi nu e ɖo lɛ bi
xa jɔbu
ðo taan klewun ɖe mɛ ɔ jɔbu tɔn lɛ ku nu e ɖo ɖo gbɛmɛ lɛ e bi gble lobɔ vi tɔn wo lɛ lɔ ku
sataan wa ɖo ali ɖe bɔ e vɛdo ɖɔ mawu ɖesu wɛ nu ɖo jɔbu gbo wɛ lɛ e sin jɔb
bɔ do enɛ wu ɔ sataan do wutuzɔn baɖabaɖa ɖe jɔbu
etɛ jɔbu blo ɖe gbejininɔ tɔn mawu
ali tɛ e klewun ɖe
etɛ mɛ e wa kɔ do
e wa mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ nu sataan ɖɔ e ɔ adingban sese wɛ
jɔbu ɖɔ emi kun do gudo mawu o
jɔb nwt jɔbu ɖo linlin sɔgbe e a nu hwenu ɖe
e wa ayi tɔn bi ɖo hwɛ tɔn jɔ gbɔn e ji tlɛ kan hwɛjijɔ wu e ɖo se wɛ e byɔ
e ɖo co mawu mɔ ɖɔ emi jla linlin jɔbu ɖo e ɖo
etɛ jehovah ɖɔ
mɔjɛmɛ tɛ jehovah jɔbu bɔ e ɖo
loɔ mi xa ɖo fi ɖebu bonu mawu ɖɔ nu jɔbu ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ le wu wɛ e ɖo mɔ wɛ a
loɔ jehovah jɔbu bonu e mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ nu e ɛ do emi sɔ e wu ɔ e kun o
e jɔbu bɔ e mɔ ɖɔ xo ɖaxo ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ e ɖo atɛ ji xa jɔbu
enɛ jɔbu bɔ e wa ɖo linlin sɔgbe e
jehovah nyla hun do jɔbu hwenu e ɖo we enɛ ɖo tlɔlɔ ɖe xa ɛ wɛ ɖo hwenu e dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛnsyɛn enɛ gudo e wɛ a
mawu wa a jɔbu lɔ ɖɔ e wa a
jɔbu mɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ co gudo mɛ ɔ e wa jɛ xo ɖɔ ji do ɖɔ weɖexamɛ lɛ su nukun tɔn mɛ
e tlɛ ɖɔ jo xo ɖɔ wɛ ɖe ɔ do jinjɔn kɔgudu kpo afin kpo mɛ do ɖɔ wa nu nyi do
nu we jehovah ɖe xa ɛ bɔ e ɖo tlɔlɔ fa kɔ nu mɛ e wa e nɛ
jɔbu kpo ɖo we jehovah ɖe xa ɛ e sin le ɖu wɛ e tlɛ nyi ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn tɔn lɛ gudo ɔ nɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ ɖagbe jehovah wa nu jɔbu xwe wa wa lɛ mɛ lɛ hu ee e wa lɛ taan gege wa yi cobɔ nu enɛ lɛ jɛ tɛn yetɔn mɛ alo e mɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu nɔ wa flin syɛnsyɛn e se lɛ e
enyi e tlɛ wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ hwɛjijɔ wu e mɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ e mɛ ganji gudo ɔ e sixu nɔ wa kan nu wu e ɖo dandan bɔ e se yi jɛ ba enɛ mɛ e byɔ eɖee hweɖelɛnu
nu linlin enɛ lɛ tlɛ wa ayi tɔn mɛ ɔ e sixu nɔ nu do we mawu ɖe xa ɛ e ji
wiwa ɛ ɖo linlin sɔgbe e lobɔ enɛ wa do gbɔ ðɛh
akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ jɔbu tɔn sixu mi jɔbu sin sixu bɔ mi lɔ ɖo linlin sɔgbe e mɔ gbɔdonumɛ
do nu mi bonu mi ɖo nukun nu gbɔn sɔxwixwe kpo akɔnkpinkpan mawuxowema ɔ nɔ mi ɔ kpo gblamɛ wu wɛ jehovah tlɛ blo bɔ e wlan enɛ
nukɔntɔn ɔ nu mi ayi mitɔn bi ɖo tagba mitɔn lɛ ji ɖe ayi sin xo ɖaxo enɛ ɖo atɛ ji nyi e ɖɔ jehovah nyi ɔ e ji o
nu e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo ɖo xo taji enɛ ɖo atɛ ji e mɛ e byɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ gbeji ɖo ninɔmɛ tlɛ vɛwu tawun lɛ e mɛ jɔbu blo gbɔn e
etɛ gbejininɔ mitɔn ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ nɔ wa
ðo enɛ nɔ ɖɔ linlin ɖe wu wɛ mi nɔ mɔ tɛnkpɔn lɛ
nɔ ɖɔ nu mitɔn kun jehovah nukunmɛ o wɛ a loɔ nɔ hun ali nu mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo gudo nu mawu nyi e nux
didɛ mitɔn nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ mɛ mi ɖe bɔ mawu kɛ alɔ yi mi e mɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn nukunɖiɖo mitɔn xa hlɔmanu lɛ nwt
jɔbu tɔn mi ɖɔ jehovah xomɛ ɖesu bɔ mɛ nu nɔ blawu titewungbe
ja enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ e mi kpo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ gudo nu e nyi lɛ e bi kpo
enɛ tuuntuun mi bɔ mi ku hun ɖo nu lɛ bi kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
mi ɖo hɛn ɖɔ jehovah nyi ɔ e ɖo taji e mɛ
etɛwu e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ayi mitɔn ɖo ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi ɔ ji sixu vɛwu
mitɔn sixu ci nu hu mi e ɖɔhun hweɖelɛnu
tagba tlɛ sɔ nuɖe a lɛ e sixu wa ci nu tawun e ɖɔhun ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ nu mi ayi ɖo ji din ɔ nɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ mi nɔ flin gudo ninɔ nu mawu nyi e ɖo taji e hwɛhwɛ hwenu ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ kpannukɔn mi e
alɔɖiɖo ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ayi mitɔn ɖo xo taji ɖo atɛ ji e ji gbɔn
nu mi nɔ nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ wɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɔ enɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ayi mitɔn ɖo xo taji ɖo atɛ ji e ji
ði ɔ nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nyi renee ɖo taglomɛzɔn ɖe jɛ wɛ ɖo xwi ɖi xa magbokɔ ɖe kpo kpo wɛ
hwenu e ɖo dotooxwe bɔ e ɖo nukun kpe do wutu tɔn wɛ e ɔ e nɔ ɖekunnu nu lɛ azinzɔnnɔ lɛ kpo mɛ nɔ wa ɛ lɛ e kpo
e jɛ hweɖenu bɔ e blo aklunɔzan gblamɛ we adaɖe ɖo dotooxwe ɖe ɖekunnu nu ganxixo
e tlɛ nyi hwenu renee sin ku sɛkpɔ e ɔ e ɖe ayi sin jehovah nyi e ji gbeɖe a
enɛ tuntun kpo nu tɔn lɛ kpɛɖe
ninɔmɛ mɛ nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe gbɔn din e le e nɔ mɔ ɖo gudo ninɔ nu e jehovah nyi e mɛ e gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi jlo ayi ɖo jehovah nyi e ji ɖo kɔgbidinumɛ kpo tagba ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ kpannukɔn mi lɛ e lɔ mɛ
jennifer nɔ jɔmɛhunjayitɛn ɖe nu azan atɔn ɖo jɔmɛhun e do lɛkɔ yi xwe e
jɔmɛhun xweyigbe lɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖe kun yi o
ðo e wa ɖo eɖokpo bɔ kpe e wutu ɔ e bɔwu tawun bɔ e jɛ lele sa ji
e xoɖɛ e sixu mɛ ɖo ɖo mɛ sin ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ lɛ e gbɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e
e ɖekunnu nu gege ma wema gege nu
e ɖɔ gbɔn ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn enɛ mɛ nugbo mɔ ɖɔ jehovah mi mi hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo ɖo jla nyikɔ tɔn ɖo ali sɔgbe e e
nugbo ɔ e ayi tɔn ɖo jehovah sin linlin ji
akpa tɛ xwe togun jehovah tɔn ɖe ɖo e nyi e sin xo ɔ mɛ
jehovah nyi e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e ɖe sinsɛn nugbo ɔ ɖo vo nu nuvu ɔ
nu hwenu linlin ɔ togun mawu tɔn nɔ gudo nu e nyi e
ðo mi nɔ nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ wutu ɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo do gan ɖo linlin enɛ ɖokpo ɔ junjɔn biblu ji e
gan do wɛ ɖe nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e nɔ ci
xota bɔ e gbeje nu wu e jɛxa ɖɔ mi ayi mitɔn bi do nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e kpo mi sixu wa gbɔn e kpo
etɛwu jehovah ba nyi wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn
etɛwu acɛkpikpa jehovah tɔn nyi ee hu bi e
mi sixu nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e ɖo egbe gbɔn
etɛ ji ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo ku do
mi ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ gbɔn e ɔ awovi ɖɔ jehovah nɔ zan e nyi e ɖo ali jɛxa a e le lɛ vo hugan ɖo acɛkpikpa yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ glɔ
nugbo jɛn sataan ɖɔ a
sixu nɔ ganji acɛkpikpa mawu tɔn mɛvo a
enyi hɛn ɔ nɔ sɔyi nɔ mawu sin acɛ glɔ ɖebu lala a ɔ ɖo awajijɛ hugan a
biblo bɔ e wa ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mawu nyi e sɔgbe
bɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ mi nɔ gudo kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo
biblu hwɛjijɔ ɖeɖee wu e ɖo jiɖe mɔhun e
etɛwu jehovah nyi mɛ ɖokpo nyi e
jehovah wɛ nyi wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn ɖo e wɛ nyi mawu ɔ nyi
mɛ
nugbo ɔ ɖo jehovah wɛ blo nu bi wutu ɔ e bi do lɛ kpo nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo ji
etɛwu do mawu nyi e ji nyi mɛɖesusininɔ mitɔn zinzan nyi do
enɛ wutu ɔ e ɖebu do wɛkɛ ɔ ji a
e kpo asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ kpo wa nu kpo goyiyi kpo hwenu gu do jehovah nyi e ji e
enɛ acɛ ɔ bɔ blo a
mɛɖesusininɔ nɔ lɛ bɔ nɔ do nu sɔgbe lɛ e gege ji ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
e ɖo co enɛ acɛ bonu gu do yetɔn kpo yetɔn kpo ji a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu gu do jehovah ji e ɖe wiwa nyi mɛɖesusininɔ mɛtɔn zinzan nyi do
ðo mi nyi wutu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ acɛkpikpa hwɛjijɔnɔ jehovah tɔn glɔ
etɛwu mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ gbeta mawu tɔn lɛ sɔgbe
e nɔ do lɛ lɛ e ji do ɖɔ ɖɔ nu le sɔgbe a
nu wa ɖo ji tɔn nu bi vɔ e gosin eɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ lobɔ e nɔ do enɛ ji do lɛ
hwɛjijɔ kpo nujlɔjlɔwiwa kpo ji wɛ axɔsuzinkpo tɔn jinjɔn enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ tɔn lɛ nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo gbeta tɔn lɛ kpo bi sɔgbe
ðɔ hwɛjijɔ wu jehovah do ɔ ji e ɖokpo
ɔ jehovah nyi e ɖo e ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo nunywɛ kpo sin hudo e ɖo do kpe nukun do wɛkɛ ɔ wu e
e tuun agbaza tɔn nɔ gbɔn e ɖo nuwukpikpe ɔ gbɔ azɔn ɖebu jɛ wɛ e ɖe e
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu nuwukpikpe e ɖo mɛkuku lɛ su ali do adla lɛ e
nunywɛ jehovah tɔn hugan nunywɛ ji do wɛ sataan ɖe e tɔn flafla gbɔn
ɖo sataan sin acɛ glɔ e kpo ɖo e ɖeɖɛ tohwan kpo nu dindɔn ɖo akɔta lɛ tɛntin e kpo gbɔn e wɛ
jehovah ɖokpo jɛn ɖo nunywɛ sɔnu nu mɛ fifa tiin ɖe e ɖe
sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ tito tɔn lɛ wu hlɔ
jehovah nɔ gbɔn e ci nu
enyi kɛɖɛ wɛ biblu ɖɔ jehovah a
e nu wu e nyi e hugan mɛ ɖevo lɛ bi tɔn e
mawu nɔ wa nu xa tɔn lɛ kpo kpo kpodo sisi kpo
e nɔ kpe nukun mi wu tawun hu miɖesu sixu blo gbɔn e
awovi ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah nɔ tɛ nu ɖagbe lɛ tɔn lɛ adingban wɛ
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mawu
e nyi kplekple togun jehovah tɔn tɔn kɛɖɛ sin ganjininɔ wɛ nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ a
e nɔ ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu emi tawun
ði ɔ mi tamɛ do xwe kanweko donu atɔn ɖeɖee vlamɛ jehovah lɛ hlɔnhlɔn bonu hwlɛn akɔta izlayɛli tɔn sin mɛ ɖo do nu wɛ lɛ e si e ji
ðo hwenu vɛwu enɛ mɛ ɔ e gbɔ ayi ɖo hwliti nyi izlayɛli vi ɖe a e wu a
e nu gege do mɔ tɛn do jɛ sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ji
jehovah do nu hwliti ɛ asu kpo vi sunnu ɖe kpo
bi xwii nɛ a
hwenu hwliti sin ku e ɔ e wa se ɖɔ vi sunnu emitɔn sin kunkan mɛ wɛ mɛsiya ɔ gosin
e vivi sɔ hwenu e wa mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ e wlan gbɛzan emitɔn sin do wema biblu tɔn ɖe mɛ bɔ e ɖo nyikɔ emitɔn e e hwliti
ali jehovah nɔ ɖe e nyi adaka tɔn a jɛn e nɔ hɛn nu gangangan a e nɛ
e nɔ gbɔn e nɔ hun mɛɖee si jijɛ sin ali nɔ xo awajijɛ sin kan
hlɔnhlɔn kpo awajijɛ kpo wɛ ɖo nɔtɛn tɔn
ɖokpo ɔ etani wlan ɖɔ nu nu togun nɔ xomla e jehovah togun enɛ ɔ nɔ zun zɔnlin ɖo weziza towe
togun enɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ mɛ tɛgbɛ ɖo nyikɔ towe wu e nɔ ɖo ɖo hwɛjijɔ towe wu ðɛh
tamɛ linlin hwɛhwɛ do ɖagbewiwa jehovah tɔn ji sixu hlɔnhlɔn ku mi kudeji ɖɔ acɛkpikpa tɔn hugan e
mi nɔ wa ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ ɔ ɖo e e nɔ kɔxo towe lɛ xɔ azan ɖokpo ɔ e hu e blo azan ɖo fi ɖevo
ðo jehovah wɛ nyi wanyiyinɔ mitɔn wu ɔ e tuun nu sin hudo mi ɖo ɖo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ e nɔ su do enɛ nɔ tunfla
nu nɔ nyi enyi e tlɛ byɔ vɔsisa ɖe lɛ ɖo mi si ɔ nɛ xa ezayii
nu taji tɛ mi bɔ mi nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e
biblu ɖɔ ɖo axɔsuɖuɖu xwe tɔn klisu tɔn gudo ɔ mɛɖe lɛ gu do jehovah nyi e ji
awovi e ɖe sin ganmɛ e kanɖeji flu lɛ do glɔ nu cejɛnnabi e nɔ blo gbɔn tɛgbɛ e
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ enɛ kun sixu nyi nugbo o
mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ adingban xo mɔhun ɖe dɔn mi wɛ a
nu mi yi wan nu jehovah nɔ ɛ ɖo ɖagbewiwa tɔn kpo wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn e ɖo acɛ tɔn nyi e kpo wutu ɔ mi adingban baɖabaɖa mɔhun do mɔ nu xyɔwu e
mi jlo ɖe zɛ ninɔ ɖo wanyiyinɔ jehovah tɔn nyi e glɔ wu a
nu wiwa mawu ɖɔhun nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo gudo gbɔn
e jɛxa ɖɔ mi ayi mitɔn bi do nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e
nu ɖevo tɛ lɛ mɛ mi sixu ɖe ɖɔ mi ɖo gudo ɖe
enyi mi nɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ jehovah ɖeɖɛ gbɔn e ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi yi wan nu e nɔ gbɔn e nɔ nɔ gudo xa efɛzinu lɛ
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo sixu wa nu jehovah ɖɔhun gbɔn
sɔgbe kpo enɛ kpo ɔ xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo ɖeɖee yi wan nu jehovah nyi e nɔ byɔ nu gege ɖo mɛ si ci nu ɖɔ lɔ ɖo sin acɛ kpɛɖe ɖo zinzan wɛ ɖɔhun a
ðo ali enɛ ɔ pɔlu nɔ wa nu mawu kpo vi tɔn kpo ɖɔhun
jehovah nɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ gbɔn e nɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ yi wan nu e nɔ gbɔn nɔ nɔ gudo lɛ e bi ɖo wa nu gbɔn
sisi ɖiɖo nu tuto acɛkpikpa tɔn yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn nɔ wanyiyi mitɔn nu jehovah ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ gbɔn e gbɛn
mi nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa tuto acɛkpikpa tɔn jehovah ze e gbɔn
mi nɔ gudo mi ɖe nu jehovah nyi e gbɔn nu wiwa ɖo xa mɛ e lɛ e kpo sisi kpo gblamɛ
nu mi mɔ nu jɛ gbeta e e ɖe mɛ bi alo yi gbe a ɔ mi nɔ jlo kpo ɖo gudo nɔ nu tuto yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn wɛ
mi nɔ mɔ le ɖo wiwa mɛ ɖo ɖagbe mitɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mawu
mɛ nɔ nɔ gudo nu mawu nyi e lɛ e nɔ wa gbeta yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn gbɔn
mi sixu gudo mi ɖe nu mawu nyi e ɖo gbeta kɔn miɖesunɔ nɔ wa lɛ e mɛ
jehovah tawun tawun lɛ do ninɔmɛ gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ bi ji a
e wa ɔ e nɔ ɖe linlin tɔn lɛ mi hwenu e nɔ ɖo ali mi wɛ e
ði ɔ e ɖeɖee tinmɛ klisanwun lɛ sɔnu gbɔn e tɔn a
nu ɖevo nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbeta kɔn mi wa lɛ e nyi nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ alo do tagba nu o
kɔ enyi mi nɔ jo linlin jehovah tɔn kpo nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ lɛ e kpo do jɛ nukɔn bɔ nɔ ali afɔ mitɔn nɔ nyi nu jlo midɛɛ lɛ e kɛɖɛ a ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi yi wan nu e nɔ gbɔn e nɔ nɔ gudo
nɔ gudo nu mawu nyi e ɖo gbeta kɔn nɔ wa lɛ e kpo nuwiwa xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo mɛ akpaxwe
ali tɛ lɛ asu kpo asi kpo lɛ sixu ɖɔ emi ɖo gudo nu jehovah nyi e ɖe
mi tamɛ do ali klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo lɛ sixu nɔ gudo nu ali jehovah tɔn lɛ gbɔn enɛ do nɔ gudo nu e nyi e ɖe e ɖokpo ji
nu tagba wa tiin ɖo alɔwliwli mitɔn mɛ hu mi ɖo nukun gbɔn e ɔ lo
etɛwu mi yi ji nu do jehovah wa nu gbɔn xa izlayɛli vi lɛ e ji a
alɔwliwli enɛ ɖo tawun
jehovah zɔn kplakpla ji jo gbe ɖo enɛ wu a
hwɛhwɛ wɛ e ku nublawu nu akɔta ɔ nɔ gbeji nu akɔ e jɛ xa e xa ðɛhan
jehovah tɔn enɛ dɔn mi a ce
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ asu kpo asi kpo ɖeɖee yi wan nu ali jehovah tɔn lɛ e nɔ wa nu eɖɔhun
nɔ wlɛnwin sɔgbe xa biblu a e ɖe mɔ tɛn do mɛ e a
tuun ɖɔ jehovah dɔn emi ca ɖɔ emi nɔ
nu ɖokpo biblu ɖɔ bɔ e sixu do enɛ wu mɛɖee mɛ ɖevo e wɛ nyi afɔdogbe alo nyɔnu ɖevo biba
enyi mi gba afɔ ɖo gudo mi ɖe nu mawu nyi e mɛ ɔ etɛ mi ɖo wa
e tuun do wanyiyi e ɖo nu mi e wu sɔnu nu gbɛxixɔ klisu tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi wa nu nyi do klewun ɖo ali ɖe lɛ ɔ mi ɖo byɔ hwɛsɔkɛ jehovah
jaan mi ɖo hwɛ do miɖee wɛ magbokɔ a e wa ɔ mi ɖo bɔ nuwanyido mitɔn nu mi
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e din
mi ɖo nu gege do ali enɛ wu wɛ din
ba mɛ e ɖeɖɛ mɛ nyi ɔ e sin xo ɔ yi jɛ e hwe a
hwe ɔ ɖie din bɔ mi nɔ gudo nu mawu nyi e gbɔn gbejininɔ mitɔn mitɔn kpo mi nɔ do gan wu mi kpe e bi do wa nu eɖɔhun ɖo nu lɛ bi mɛ gbɔn e kpo gblamɛ
ɖo wɛnɖagbe wema matie tɔn mɛ e ɖɔ ee jezu yi jeluzalɛmu ɔ e byɔ sinsɛnxɔ mɛ nya mɛ ɖo nu sa wɛ ɖo xɔ ɔ mɛ lɛ kpodo mɛ ɖo nu xɔ wɛ lɛ kpo bi e fli ɖo xɔ ɔ mɛ lɛ sin tavo xwe fli lɛ sin azinkpo nyi ayi
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ xwe ɔ ɖɛxwe wɛ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ
jwifu lɛ sin hwenuxowema ɖɔ ɖeɖee ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖu le ɖo axisinɔ yetɔn lɛ ji ɖo nɔ nu nu sa wɛ ɖe lɛ e
ði ɔ tanwema jwifu lɛ tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ e wa jɛ hweɖenu ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ bɔ e ɖo nu azan cobo xɔ xwele e do e we
nu enɛ ɖo jijɛ wɛ e do xomɛsin nu simeon gamaliel bɔ e ɖe vɔsisa ɖo dandan lɛ e kpo enɛ ɔ bɔ akwɛ e nɔ do xɔ xwele we e ɖekpo bɔ e ganxixo atɔn kpowun ɖo ɔ e do xɔ
kpo xo mi ɖɔ wa yi din e kpo ɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ jezu ylɔ ɖeɖee ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ ɖo nɔ ɖu le hu le ɖo axisinɔ yetɔn lɛ ji nɔ do wutu
enyi tutoblonunu mawu tɔn lɛ ɔ nɔvi sunnu ee nyi lɛdo tɔn lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo e ɖo nɔ wa nu gbɔn
ɖo nɔ yawu setonu
sixu kanbyɔ yeɖee ɖɔ nɔ mɛ do mi lɛ e bonu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
nɔ yawu yi gbe nu mi mɔ lɛ e nɔ nɔ gudo nu a wex
hwetɛnu klisanwun nugbo lɛ huzu kannumɔ nu babilɔnu
enɛ jɛ ɖo ku lɛ tɔn gudo zaan
ðo hwenɛnu ɔ yɛhwenɔ lɛ tɔn ɖe jɛ nu ji ba
sinsɛn kpo acɛkpikpa kpo ɖo gbe gufɔndomawuji klisanwun tɔn su bonu klisanwun ci jinukun ɖagbe ɔ ɖɔhun lɛ e sin gbe ɖi o
xwe ɖeɖee jɛ nukɔn nu lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ jɛ yeɖesu si jɛ ji wex
etɛwu lefevre wa e nyi nu taji
ðo kpo kpo vlamɛ ɔ lefevre lilɛ biblu do flansegbe mɛ bonu kpaa lɛ mɔ xa
akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖeɖee e tinmɛ lɛ e luther william tyndale kpo john calvin kpo wex
hlɔ
mɛ ayi tɔn ɖo nukɔntɔn ɔ ji enɛ wɛ nyi ɖo jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn lɛ ji yi wan nu hwɛhuhu sin nu lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ xo do nu agbaza tɔn lɛ ji hwebinu nɔ nu enɛ lɛ su
mɛ ayi tɔn ɖo wegɔ ɔ ji e nɔ blo bɔ gbɛzan tɔn nɔ junjɔn nu kan mawu kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo e ji bɔ gbigbɔ nɔ do klisanwun enɛ ji
nu tawun tawun tɛ lɛ e sixu wa do ɖe mɛtɔn kpo
to nu nyi nujɔnu hugan lɛ e nɔ nɔ ji ɖo nu nɔ ɖo nukun lɛ e mɛ nɔ ɖe hwenu ɖo vo ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe nɔ do gbɔjɛ nɔ ɖu vivi nuɖiɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn alisa nɔ nɔ zɔ nu o nɔ lanmɛ hwɛhwɛ nɔ ganji wex
ebl nwt gbɔn nɛ e
etɛwu jlɛjininɔ kpo ɖo nu taji nyi wɛ
jlɛjininɔ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo linlin zɛ gbe a e do mɛɖee wu tuun dogbo mɛtɔn lɛ
mi ɖo tuun nuwalɔ mitɔn lɛ sixu kunkpla mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e nɔ ɖɔ mi nyi mɛjɔmɛ zɛ xwe wu a wex
gbigbɔ bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ
wɛnsagun lɛ bɔ kpe nukun do ɔ wu nɔ ganjɛ xo mawu tɔn wu hwenu ɖo ali mɛ wɛ e
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ nɔ jɛ ɖo egbe ɖesu wex
nu ɛnɛ wɛ mɛ sɔnu e nu wu e sɔnu e vɔsisa e byɔ tɔn e kpo hudo taji sin do e su e kpo
mi ɖo tamɛ do nu nu enɛ lɛ byɔ e ji wex
mi ɖo wa nu mi ɖɔ e
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mi wa gbeta ɖe lɛ ji
ee togun ninivu tɔn lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo e ɔ mawu huzu gbeta kɔn e wa e
hweɖelɛnu ɔ ninɔmɛ lɛ alo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi lɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ wex
e sixu bɔ tagba ɖe asa wa syɛn bi
nyi jehovah tɔn ɖe ɖo e nɔ do gan titewungbe ɖɔ xo nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ alito lɛ e
ɖɔ xo do mɛ enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wu ɖɔ nya ɖe tiin ɖo xɔ a nyi
e nyi ɖokpo ɖo sunnu kwiji hugan bɔ mɔ ɖo ali lɛ kpa e mɛ
hwɛhwɛ wɛ e sin nu tobutobu lɛ wa lɛ e
nu xwe jɛji ɔ ɖo suulu wa nu wu e kpe e bi xomɛ do nya enɛ ɖo xɔ a e wu
e su gbe ɖokpo bɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛwu nɔ jɛ tagba do mɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ bi wɛ nɔ wɔn nu mi
etɛwu hwɛ nɔ wlibo nu mi
zan wemafɔ atɔn kpo kpo bonu xo ɔ byɔ sin ayi mɛ
jɛ nukɔn ɔ e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ e tuun ɖɔ mawu ɖo nyikɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn a ji byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e xa tlɔlɔ sin biblu mɛ ɖo ðɛhan du monde nouveau mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ nu wu sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ e xa hlɔmanu lɛ finɛ tinmɛ ɖɔ mɛɖebu ylɔ jehovah sin nyikɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ gan
gudo mɛ ɔ xa matie wa byɔ ɖɔ eɖesu xa finɛ
wemafɔ enɛ ɖɔ ee jezu mɔ mɛ enɛ lɛ ɔ nu yetɔn blawu ɖo e mɔ ɖɔ nu do bɔ wu ku bɔ ci ɖo a lɛ e ɖɔhun
jɛ huzuhuzu ji
e nɔ wu nɔ wlibo nu atan tɔn ganji nɔ do avɔ ɛ e
kpo ɖo gan do wɛ nɔ ji
ɖo wema ɖokpo bɔ akpaxwe wema ɔ tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ a nu e wlan gbɔn gudo lɛ e ci a
nuwlanwlan lɛ ɖokpo ɖɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn egbe
nu ɖo ɖɛ xo wɛ din ɔ sixu xoɖɛ jehovah
e jiwu tawun ɖɔ e tuun nyikɔ tɔn
ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah sixu nyi nyi mɛɖe ɖoto mi hwebinu enyi ɖɔ xo ɖo hweɖebunu alo ɖɔ nu ɖebu ɔ nɛ
egbe ɔ mɔ nyiɖee mɛ ganji a
nyi mɛxo
nu e tlɛ nyi azan gudo tɔn ɔ ɖie ɔ tuun ɖɔ wa mɔ ɖo palaɖisi mɛ
enyi ɖo nu elɔ xa wɛ hun tuun ɖɔ kun tiin o
wema ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ wa mɔ ɖo palaɖisi mɛ
ɖi nu kpo ayi bi kpo
nɔvi mitɔn wɛ
ðo cyɔɖiɖi ɔ gudo ɔ ummi nyi sin nɔvi nyɔnu e tinmɛ ɖɔ xwe we ɖie ɔ ɖɔ xo xa mi
azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ ɖo xwe lɛ gblamɛ bɔ e ci ɖɔ e ɖo awajijɛ nɛ
e tlɛ nu lɔ
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ xa wema ɔ ɖo nu bunɔ ɖe jɛn nyi nu sixu byɔ ayi mɛ nu nɔvi sunnu e
mi lɔ sixu nu zɛ mɛ lɛ ci ɖo wexo e wu ɖe wanyiyi adodwe nɔ ɖo suulu do alɔkpa lɛ bi
tim nu mi ɖo blo wɛ ɔ mi sixu kpe nu wu mɛ ɖeɖee ci ɖɔhun kwiji ɖo lɛ sin nukunmɛ ɖo ayi ɖagbe lɛ e
mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ mawu nɔ ayixa mɛ e blo bɔ nugbo ɔ su ɖo ayi mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ jɛxa lɛ e tɔn mɛ
ze yeɖee jo kpo jlo kpo ðo turquie
dɔkun jɔ dɔkun lɛ
xota elɔ gbeje mi sixu zan nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ do zun xa jehovah kpo jezu kpo gbɔn e
nɔ avi xa mɛ ðo avi wɛ lɛ
klisanwun ɖe sixu ɖi xwi xa ku ɖe tɔn nɔ dɔn wa e gbɔn
jehovah nɔ do gbɔ sin hudo mi ɖo e gege nu mi gbɔn jezu klisu mawuxowema ɔ kpo agun klisanwun tɔn kpo gblamɛ
xota elɔ miɖesunɔ kpo mɛ ɖevo ɖeɖee ɖo mɛ lɛ e kpo mɔ gbɔdonumɛ gbɔn e mi
kpa jah etɛwu
ðɛhan ɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun mawu tɔn azɔn gege ɖɔ e kpa jehovah
nu kunkpla jehovah e tɛ ɔ bɔ e jlo ɖɔ e kpa mawu
xota elɔ tinmɛ nu ɔ nu wu mi ɖo ɖo jlo ɖokpo ɔ kpa mawu mitɔn e
e blo bonu nu wa lɛ bi nyi wiwa
nɔvi sunnu winnyawinnya kpo nɔvi nyɔnu winnyawinnya kpo gege ɖo hwebinu tɔn mɛ byɔ wɛ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo
jlo hwi lɔ tɔn nɛ a
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ e zan biblu do ɖe we ɖagbeɖagbe ɖeɖee bɔ blo tuto sɔgudo awajijɛnɔ yi e ɖe tɔn xa
ðu ðo hun xo do ayi towe tamɛ wɛ ðe e ji
alisa
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ do gan tawun jla axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe gege e blo gbɔn e
ði ɔ pɔlu yi fi turquie ɖe ɖo egbe din e jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo finɛ titewungbe ɖo tomɛyiyi tɔn tɔn lɛ hwenu
xwe gudo enɛ wɛ nyi ɖo ɔ e wa jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo ali bunɔ ɖe ɖo turquie
etɛwu e sɔnu nu tuto nujlajla tɔn mɔhun
jɛji wɛ ɖo turquie livi wɛ ɖo to ɔ mɛ
enɛ ɖɔ jla wɛn ɔ
nu do nukun mɛ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛ kpɛɖe kpowun jɛn lɛ nɔ kpewu nɔ jla wɛn ɔ ɖo to enɛ mɛ
linlin wu e sɔnu nu tuto nujlajla tɔn enɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖekunnu nu mɛ gege e blo gbɔn e ɖo taan kpɛɖe vlamɛ
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee nɔ do turquie gbe gosin to ɖevo lɛ mɛ lɛ e wɛ tɛn wa turquie jla wɛn ɔ kpo nɔvi ɖo xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo ɖo nujlajla ɔ hwenu
etɛ kpewu wa
e ɖekunnu gbɔn fi gege
agun ɖe ɖo istanbul wlan ɖɔ hwenu lɛ mɔ mi e ɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ bunɔ ɖe blo wɛ e ɖe ɖo fi a
mi nɔ mɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo fi bi
agun ɖe ɖo toxo izmir tɔn mɛ wlan ɖɔ nya nɔ ɖo fi e nɔ do tasii ɖe e ɖe sɛkpɔ mɛxo xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖe kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ etɛ ɖo jijɛ wɛ
ada gblo nu mitɔn wɛ ɖe a
mɛ lɛ ɖo ayi nujlajla ɔ wu
steffen
toɖevomɛnu ɖo nujlajla ɔ mɛ lɛ e lɔ ɖu vivi ɔ tɔn
steffen gosin danemark e ɖɔ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ nɔ kpewu nɔ jla wɛn ɔ se xo do jehovah wu a lɛ e
mɔ ɖɔ ɖo biblo wɛ nugbo bonu mɛ lɛ tuun jehovah sin nyikɔ
david gosin france e ɖɔ mi nɔ nɔ ali ɖokpo ji kpowun nɔ ɖekunnu nu ganxixo mɔkpan
gege tiin tuun jehovah tɔn lɛ a
david ɖo tɛntin
mɛ ɖo alɔ ɖo nujlajla ɔ mɛ lɛ e ma wema ɖo aklunɔzan gbla we kpowun vlamɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nujlajla ɔ bɔ e ɖekunnu gbɔn fi gege
kan mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo do ɔ wu e jɛji
bunɔ enɛ bɔ akpakpa nɔvi xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ
mɛ gege jɛ tamɛ do hwebinu tɔn ji ji
nugbo ɔ ɖo bɔ do nujlajla ɔ wu lɛ e mɛ ɔ gbexosin ɖo turquie lɛ e tɔn jɛji ɖo kanweko ji
sirin
mɛ gosin to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ nujlajla ɔ wa ɖagbe nu yetɔn gbɔn e e tlɛ nyi hwenu lɛkɔ yi to yetɔn mɛ gudo e ɔ nɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe gosin allemagne nɔ nyi sirin wlan ɖɔ nɔvi ɖo turquie lɛ e nɔ vo tawun nɔ ɖekunnu ɖo ali nyi aca tɔn a e
nujlajla bunɔ ɔ nɔvi xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ tɔn kpo ɖɛ gege xixo kpo bɔ kpewu nɔ wa nu sixu wa a e
tlɛ nɔ ɖekunnu din nɔ ma tlati lɛ ɖo pipaangan gbɔn do glɔ lɛ e kpa
din ɔ winnya nɔ hu mi tɔn ɖɔhun a
ee gosin allemagne e ɖɔ nuɖe lɛ bɔ mi ɖo mɛ
nɔvi ɖo turquie lɛ e tawun jla nugbo ɔ gege kpewu gbɔn e
nɔ zan ali hun nu e bi nɔ do ɖekunnu
wa gbeta ɔ kɔn blo nu ɖokpo ɔ hwenu lɛkɔ yi allemagne e
bɔ din ɔ nɔ jla wɛn ɔ gege hu nɔ blo gbɔn e nugbo
zeynep
zeynep ee gosin france e ɖɔ nujlajla enɛ wa ɖagbe nu tawun
e mi bɔ ɖo akɔnkpinkpan ɖeji do jehovah wu
lɛ sɛkpɔ yeɖee
wanyiyi kpo buninɔ kpo ee ɖo nɔvi gosin to vovo lɛ mɛ e tɛntin e ci ayi mɛ nu mɛ tawun
david xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e ɖɔ mi mɛ yiyi nɔvi lɛ tɔn
e ɖɔ ɖɔ yi mi ɖi yetɔn lɛ kpo xwedo yetɔn tɔn kpo ɖɔhun
hun xwe yetɔn lɛ sin hɔn nu mi
tuun ɖɔ mi nyi kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e ɖe xa azɔn mɔkpan ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ
din tɔn ɔ nyiɖesunɔ wɛ ɖu vivi tɔn tlɔlɔ
tlɛ nɔ go tawun din ɖɔ nyi ɖokpo ɖo mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ nɔ doku nu wujɔmɛ jiwu enɛ
claire ɖo tɛntin
claire ee gosin france e ɖɔ mɛ gosin danemark e wɛ a france e wɛ a allemagne e wɛ a alo turquie lɛ e bi nyi xwedo ɖokpo
e ci ɖɔ mawu nu nɔ sunsun nu e ɖaxo ɖe do ɖe dogbo to tɔn lɛ bi siin ɖɔhun
stephanie ɖo tɛntin
stephanie ee gosin france e ɖɔ ɖɔ nujlajla bunɔ ɔ mi ɖɔ e kun nyi aca alo gbe wɛ dɔn mi ɖo bu o loɔ wanyiyi ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo nu jehovah e wɛ
toɖevomɛnu ɖo nujlajla ɔ mɛ lɛ e gege jɛ linlin ji ɖɔ emi tɛn wa turquie bɔ e ɖaxo kpo bɔ e wa ɖo finɛ e
mɛ ɖe lɛ tɛn
ði ɔ kanɖo jɛ gblolo mɛ bɔ e ɖe ɖo xa ɖe mɛ
do nukun mɛ awajijɛ enɛ lɛ ɖo hwenu gosin allemagne kpo pays kpo ɖo wa e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu nɔ wa vɛwu tawun mɛɖee zize jo ɖo le gege
mi gbeje nu mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ e
federico
federico nɔvi sunnu wli alɔ ɖo xwe jɛji tɛn sin espagne e ɖɔ ðo ɖo nuɖokan wu do e gege a wutu ɔ enɛ mi bɔ vo ayi ɖo nu nyi taji hugan lɛ e ji
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu alɔkpa enɛ a
e ɖɔ ɛɛn ganji
nu tɛn wa to ɖevo mɛ kpo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ emi mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu tuun jehovah ɔ hwiɖee do alɔ mɛ wɛ ɖe gbɔn nɛ
rudy
rudy nɔvi sunnu wli alɔ ɖo xwe tɛn sin pays e ɖɔ wiwa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e nɔ mi awajijɛ e sixu a e ɖo e nɔ jla nugbo ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee se gbeɖe a lɛ e gege
sascha
sascha nɔvi sunnu wli alɔ ɖo xwe jɛji tɛn sin allemagne e ɖɔ hwebinu ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ xo go mɛ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ ɖo xo nugbo ɔ tɔn se wɛ lɛ e
ali hunhun nu mɛ mɔhun lɛ bonu tuun jehovah nɔ mi awajijɛ ɖaxo
atsuko
atsuko nɔvi nyɔnu wli alɔ ɖo xwe jɛji tɛn sin japon e ɖɔ ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ nɔ jlo ɖɔ haamagedɔni yawu wa
ee tɛn wa turquie gudo e ɔ doku nu jehovah ɖɔ e kpo ɖo suulu ɖo wɛ
mɔ bɔ jehovah ɖo nukun kpe do nu kunkpla wɛnɖagbejijla gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ sin wu wɛ e ɔ wɛ nɔ jlo sɛkpɔ ɛ e nɛ
alisa nɔvi nyɔnu ɖo xwe jɛji tɛn sin russie e tinmɛ ɖɔ jehovah sinsɛn ɖo lehun mɛ mi bɔ ɖagbewiwa tɔn lɛ bi ðɛh
e ɖɔ ɖɔ wa mɔ ɖɔ jehovah kun nyi kɛɖɛ kpowun o e nyi bɔ wa tuun ganji ɖo ninɔmɛ vovo lɛ mɛ
hwenu awajijɛ tɔn lɛ nu nɔ akpakpa mɛ lɛ e kpo nyɔna ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ kpo wɛ gbɛzan mɛ
gbɔn yɛkan nujlajla bunɔ ɔ tɔn mɛ ɖo turquie ɔ mɛ gege se wɛnɖagbe ɔ
e kpo fi ɖaxo ɖe lɛ bɔ e ɖe a
ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ tɛn yi turquie lɛ e nɔ mɔ mɛ se xo jehovah tɔn gbeɖe a lɛ e
jlo wa ɖo fi mɔhun ɖe a
enyi hun mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ hwi gle lɛ ganji jinukun lɛ mya su yiya
jaan sixu yi ɖo fi jinukun lɛ mya su yiya ɖe ɖo ɔ sin akpa ɖe lɛ xwe e a
nu e jlo hun jɛ afɔ tawun tawun ɖe lɛ ɖe ji din mɔ tɛn do sixu kpe nu enɛ gbe nya wɛ ɖe e wu
xo nugbo ɖokpo ɖie alɔɖiɖo ɖo bloblo bonu wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbakpe yi jɛ fi ɔ kponu ɖo e mɛ nyɔna ɖagbeɖagbe ɖeɖee e sixu a lɛ e mɛ
alɔnuwema voyez le pays wex
zan dɔkun nuagɔwiwa tɔn lɛ do zun lɛ luk nwt
mi sixu zan nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ do blo bɔ mi kpo mawu kpo zun e syɛn gbɔn
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu kannumɔ huzuhuzu nu ɔ tɔn egbe tɔn ɔ gbɔn
etɛwu kanɖeji dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ
ðo elɔ mɛ ɔ etɛwu mɛɖe lɛ nyi wamamɔnɔ tɛgbɛ
tuto akwɛ mimɔ tɔn egbe tɔn ɔ syɛn bɔ mɛ klewun ɖe wɛ e nɔ do dɔkun
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ nɔ kpo
mɛ gege nɔ yetɔn ɖo axɔ nɔ tɛn yi to jɛ dɔkun lɛ e mɛ
yajiji gbakpe tlɛ gbakpe to jɛ dɔkun lɛ e mɛ
dɔkunnɔ ɖo dɔkun jɛ wɛ bɔ wamamɔnɔ ɖo wamamɔnɔ nyi wɛ
sɔgbe kpo nulinlɛn agaɖanu tɔn lɛ kpo ɔ ɖokpo ɖo kanweko ji mɛ nyi dɔkunnɔ hugan ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn ɖo nu hu nu kplekple kpo lɛ e tɔn bi ɖo e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e vɛwu bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nulinlɛn enɛ sɔgbe mɛɖebu sixu dɔn nu ɖɔ liva mɔkpan nyi bi hwenu mɛ ɖevo lɛ jɛ dɔkun do kpe nukun do kunkan yetɔn lɛ wu jɛ jijimɛ gege ji e a
etɛwu mɛ lɛ bi ɖo a
jezu tuun ɖɔ tito akwɛ mimɔ tɔn din tɔn ɔ kun huzu cobonu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wa o
nu tuto toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn kpo sinsɛn tɔn lɛ kpo ɔ tuto tɔn mɛ ɖe bɔ xo ɖɔ e afɔ tɔn ɖo lɛ e bi nyi akpaxwe sataan tɔn tɔn
togun mawu tɔn kpewu ɖo wu zɔ nu toxoɖiɖɔ kpo sinsɛn nuvu lɛ kpo gege mitɔn sixu ɖo wu zɔ bi nu tuto tɔn ɖo sataan tɔn mɛ e a
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
ðo mi nyi klisanwun lɛ wutu ɔ e ɖɔ mi gbeje linlin mi nɔ ɖo do tito tɔn egbe tɔn wu e gbɔn nu lehun lɛ kinkanbyɔ miɖee gblamɛ sixu zan nuɖokan lɛ do ɖɔ ɖo gbeji nu mawu gbɔn
sixu ɖe kan kpo nu alɔ nɔ ɖo ɖo ɔ tɔn mɛ e gbɔn
togun mawu tɔn nɔ ɖɔ emi ɖeji do jehovah wu bi ɖo tuto tɔn elɔ vɛwu e mɛ gbɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ mɛ xo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖɔ e wa mɔ eɖee ɖe
nu tɛ jezu byɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ
nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn kunkpla ɔ e dɔn mɛ tawun
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu kun ɖo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ wɛ bonu wa nu ɖo ali sɔgbe a e mɔ tɛn do nɔ ɖo elɔ mɛ o
e ɖɔ ɖɔ gbɛmɛ fi vi lɛ wɛ nɔ wa nu gbɔn e zan nujlɛdonuwu ɔ do ɖe nukplɔnmɛ ɖevo
jezu tuun ɖɔ wa mɔ eɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn mɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ gege ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖo elɔ mɛ masɔgbe lɛ ɖe e mɛ
enɛ ɔ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ dɔkun nɔ wa jlo mawu tɔn a zan do zun alo zan dɔkun nuagɔwiwa tɔn lɛ do zun lɛ nwt lobonu gbe gbe e wa vɔ do ɔ e jehovah kpo jezu kpo yi do xwe ɖo tɛgbɛ e gbe
etɛ weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn sixu mi
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ tuto tɔn elɔ tɔn kun ɖo linlin mawu tɔn mɛ o
jezu tinmɛ nu wu e ylɔ dɔkun lɛ ɖɔ dɔkun nuagɔwiwa tɔn e a biblu nyi wɛn ɖɔ kun ɖo linlin mawu tɔn mɛ o
gbeyiɖɔ ezayii ɖɔ xo do hwenu lɛ bi vo ɖu vivi ayikungban ɔ sin nu lɛ tɔn e wu
weɖexamɛ tɛ mi mɔ ɖo luki mɛ
xo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖɔ e zun lɛ ɖo ɖagbe eɖesu tɔn wu
jezu byɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ zun xa jehovah kpo emi kpo ɖo linlin nyi cejɛnnabi tɔn a lɛ e wu
nu mi wɛ jezu ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi sixu nɔ gbeji ɖo mi nɔ zan dɔkun enɛ lɛ gbɔn e mɛ hwenu mi mɔ gudo e
gbɔn e
na mɛɖe lɛ ɖo gbejininɔ wɛ ɖo nɔ zan dɔkun nuagɔwiwa tɔn yetɔn lɛ gbɔn e tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ali mi ɖɔ mi ɖo gbeji ɖo mi nɔ zan nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ gbɔn e mɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi akwɛ do nɔ gudo nu wa wɛ e ɖe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bɔ jezu ɖɔ e
ðyɔvivu ɖe nɔ nɔ ɖo akwɛgba kpɛvi ɖokpo nɔ jɔ akwɛ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe enɛ byɔ ɖɔ e wɔn nu ayihundanu lɛ co e wa
ee akwɛgba ɔ e ɔ e akwɛ ɔ jo ɖɔ e zan nu ɔ
nɔvi sunnu ɖe nɔ nɔ ɖo gege lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn malayalam tɔn
ðo e ɖɔ ɔ nɔ xɔ wutu ɔ nina tlɔlɔ hu ɖɔ e akwɛ
nunywɛ zinzan nɛ
ɖokpo ɔ nɔvi nɔ nɔ grece lɛ e nɔ olivumi kpo nuɖuɖu ɖevo lɛ kpo xwedo betɛli tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
nɔvi sunnu ɖe nɔ nɔ lanka ɖo gbe ɖevo ji din e xwe tɔn jo bonu e nɔ blo kple lɛ kpo lɛ kpo ɖo finɛ lobonu hwebinu tɔn lɛ nɔ gbe
e byɔ vɔsisa ɖo nɔvi ɔ si ɖo akwɛ linu e ayi ɔ ji tɔn ɖo nu ɖe a lɛ e tawun
enɛ lɛ togun mawu tɔn nɔ nɔ gbeji ɖo nu kpɛvi kɔn gbɔn e enɛ wɛ nyi ɖo nɔ zan nuɖokan yetɔn sɔ nuɖe ɖo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpa a e mɛ gbɔn e
mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ alɔ hunhun do nu nyi ali e sixu mɔ dɔkun jɔ dɔkun lɛ ɖe e ɖokpo
luk nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ nu do nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ e ɖokpo ɖɔ nyɔna e mɔ lɛ e ðo nɔ hun alɔ do agbaza sin nu lɛ wutu ɔ mɔ nujiwu e nɔ yawu mɔ a e ɖe ɖo gbɛzan mɛ ɖo xwe lɛ gblamɛ
mɔ ɖɔ nɔ agbaza sin nu lɛ mɛ sɔ e ɔ wɛ ninɔmɛ nɔ ɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e wa ci nunamɛ lɔ ji sɔ
nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ hugan nɔ ɖo suulu do wu nɔ kpewu bɔ enyi wa nu nu mi e nu mi ɔ nɔ dɛ nɔ yi gbe nu weɖexamɛ lɛ hugan
nu mi nɔ jlo do e nɔ ɖɔ mi zan nunywɛ gbɔn
mɛ bi nɔ ɖo akwɛ linu tɛ sin nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ
nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ zinzan do nɔ gudo nu nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo ali ɖevo ɖɔ mi zan nunywɛ
nunina e jlo do lɛ e nɔ bɔ e nɔ ma xojlawema lɛ nɔ nɔ gudo nu ɔ ɖo to mɛ ɖo nu gba ɖe wɛ bɔ nukɔnyiyi tiin tawun ɖo gbigbɔ sin akpaxwe e
nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ nɔvi ɖo to mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɖi congo madagascar kpo rwanda kpo lɛ e ɖo wa gbeta ɖe kɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nuɖuɖu xwedo yetɔn ɖu e do mɔ tɛn do xɔ biblu alo gbɔ wa hweɖelɛnu ɔ akwɛ tɔn nɔ yi akwɛ nɔ mɔ ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo alo ɖokpo mɛ e
din ɔ gbɔn nunina mɛ gege nɔ e kpo gan do wɛ e ɖe bonu mɛ bi nɔ ɖo akwɛ linu e kpo gblamɛ ɔ tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn kpo biblu mima nu xwedo ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn ɔ kpo ɖo nɔ su hudo gbigbɔ tɔn biblu lɛ ɖo e sin do xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
mɛ ɔ kpo mɛ e nu e kpo bi vo zun xa jehovah
ablaxamu ɖɔ emi ɖeji do mawu wu gbɔn
e nɔ mawu do mɔ jɔtɛn dɔkun jɔ dɔkun tɔn e nɔ nu bɔ e jɛ dɔkun lɛ e bonu enɛ ɖɔ e kun ɖeji do wu tɔn o gbeɖe a
nuɖiɖi ablaxamu ɖo e ɖɔhun hwedo nya enɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ emi ɖeji do mawu wu
etɛ pɔlu byɔ timɔtee
mi sixu zan weɖexamɛ pɔlu tɔn gbɔn ɖo egbe
timɔtee nyi dawe ɖe
ee pɔlu ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ ɖagbe klisu jezu tɔn ɖe gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ mɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖi sɔja ɖe e ɖebu sixu do ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ a bonu nu tɔn do sixu mɛ yi nyi ɖe e nukunmɛ
tim nwt ahwanvu jezu tɔn egbe tɔn lɛ mɛ ee nyi hwebinu tɔn livi ɖokpo jɛji ɖe e nɔ xwedo weɖexamɛ pɔlu tɔn ɖo ba mɛ ninɔmɛ yetɔn yi gbe nu ɖo e
sataan ɖo nuɖe wɛ hu e blo bɔ mi zan hwenu mitɔn bi kpo hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn bi kpo do nyi kannumɔ nu elɔ tɔn wu a
gbeta ɖe lɛ kɔn wiwa sixu bɔ mi nyi kannumɔ ɖo akwɛ linu nu xwe mɔkpan
akwɛ nyinya do gba xwe ɖaxo lɛ do yi wemaxɔmɛ nu xwe gege xixɔ jɛ akwɛ ɖaxo zinzan do wli alɔ ji sixu bɔ fyɔn mitɔn
bɔkun zinzan nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mi nya nuɖe lɛ gbe
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖo nɔ hɛn akwɛ wa e ɖe
e ɖo co ɖo jlo byɔ hwebinu tɔn mɛ wutu ɔ ɖo dandan mɛ sa ɔ batoo nɔ do ɖo ji e kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo
yeɖee jo ɖo hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn e gba ɖo warwick e hwenu
nyɔna bunɔ mɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ kpo vi nyɔnu yetɔn kpo kpodo visu yetɔn kpo nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo betɛli nu visu yetɔn sin ɖeɖee lɔ ɖo warwick sin xɔgbigba hwenu e
nɔvi nyɔnu gbexosin ɖe ɖo etats unis mɔ hwenu klewun tɔn ɖe ɖo akwɛsɛxwetɛn ɖe
tɔn gan ɔ nukunmɛ bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ hwebinu bɔ sunzanfokwɛ e nɔ su e ɔ e nɔ su mɔhunkɔtɔn donu atɔn
ɖo ɔ ali bɔ e ayi tɔn ɖo ɔ ji a wutu ɔ e tɛn enɛ e xwle e
maxamaxa jehovah tɔn lɛ sa lɛ e sin klewun ɖe kpowun wɛ nyi enɛ
kan enɛ mi kanɖeji nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e ɖɔ zunzun xa mawu kpo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo xɔ akwɛ nu mi tawun hu nu egbe tɔn ɔ tɔn sixu xwle mi lɛ e flafla tɔn
dɔkun tɛ nɔ hɛn awajijɛ ɖaxo hugan ɔ wa
dɔkun agbaza tɔn lɛ nɔ dandan ɖɔ mawu wɛ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do mi ji a
jehovah nɔ do nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wa nu ɖagbe gege lɛ e xa timɔtee
ði ɔ hwenu lucia se ɖɔ e ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn ɖo albanie e ɔ e tɛn sin italie yi ɖo e ɖo nu e do kpe nukun do eɖee wu e ɖe a ɖeji do jehovah wu bi
e albanie gbe jɛji bɔ ze yeɖee jo nu mawu
etɛ ɖo tito tɔn egbe tɔn
etɛ nu mi tuun do sɔgudo wu e ɖo wa nu linlin mi nɔ ɖo do dɔkun agbaza tɔn lɛ wu e
jezu ɖɔ gbe gbe dɔkun nuagɔwiwa tɔn wa vɔ do ɔ e ɖɔ enyi wa vɔ do ɔ a
e ɖo hwɛ nu sataan tɔn blebu e wɛ nyi tuto toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn sinsɛn tɔn kpo tɔn kpo bɔ wa yi
nu ci nu nya elɔ wa nu gbɛhwenu tɔn bi xo akwɛ kple kɔn nyi wa mɔ ɖɔ akwɛ gblegble kɛɖɛ wɛ e ɖɔhun jɛn e ci nu mi nux
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ dɔkun mɔhun lɛ wa gble enɛ wu ɔ jo ali hun nu bɔ zan do zun xa jehovah kpo jezu kpo e do o
etɛ ɖo sɛxwetɛn nu mawu tɔn lɛ
hwenu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wa e ɔ akwɛ nyinya kpo kpo vɔ e xɔ nuɖuɖu ɖe a bɔ e tunfla e zan akwɛ do lanmɛ nɔ ganji wu ɖe a
xwedo jehovah tɔn ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ ɖu vivi nu ɖagbe hugan ayikungban ɔ lɛ e tɔn
lɛ wɛ sika kpatagan kpo xɔ akwɛ lɛ kpo nyi nyi nu do dɔkun nu mɛ lɛ e a
atin awinnya kpo kpo nyi ɖagbe hugan lɛ e tiin bɔ e do gba xwe ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ
lɛ mi ɖo awajijɛ mɔ e wu e nyi ɖo akwɛ wu a
nu xɔ akwɛ ɖo nu sin gu mɛ zun xa mawu kpo jezu kpo lɛ e ɖu e mɛ e klewun ɖe nɛ
awajijɛ jehovah tɔn ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e tɔn tunfla hwenu se xo jezu tɔn elɔ lɛ e wa mɛ ji xoɖɛ ɖagbe do lɛ
wa yi axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin nu ɖagbe e nu sin hwenu mawu ɖo ɔ ɖokpoo e
loɔ ɔ wa nu gbɔn e ji wɛ e ayi tɔn ɖo e nyi hwɛjijɔ ɖeɖee wu gble do e e ji wɛ e ayi ɖo a
lucia moussanett sin gbɛzan tɔn ɖo reveillez vous
juin tɔn mɛ wexwɛ
nunina jlo ɖagbenɔ lɛ tɔn wɛ nɔ nɔ gudo nu biblu kpinkplɔn mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ tɔn mitɔn kpo nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ kpo
bonu nu gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji hun yi jw org ji zin na nunina ɖe nu mi nɔ wa gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e ee nɔ ɖo ɖibla yi vivɔnu ɖo akpaxwe lɛ ɖebu ji e
akɔnkpinkpan miɖee do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee tɛ
jehovah nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ gbɔn
wemafɔ biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ sixu mɛ ɖo mɛ lɛ e
agun ɔ sixu do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo se wɛ lɛ e gbɔn
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖɔ xo do mi do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo mɔ wɛ lɛ e gbɔn e wu
ɖɔ ee vi sunnu mitɔn ku gudo e ɔ mi se syɛnsyɛn nu xwe ɖokpo
klisanwun ɖevo ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu asi emitɔn ku ajijimɛ e ɔ emi se e sixu a e
e blawu ɖɔ mɛ maxamaxa ɖevo lɛ se syɛnsyɛn mɔhun
mɛ ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ lɛ e gege sixu nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ ku jɛ nukɔn nu haamagedɔni
enyi hwiɖesunɔ tɔn ɖe ku alo tuun mɛɖe bonu e ɖo mɛ ɔ sixu kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ e sixu mɛ ɖo mɛ lɛ e bɔ ɖi xwi xa aluwɛ yetɔn gbɔn
taan ɔ ɖesunɔ jɛn nɔ ɖe mɛ flu bi ɖo ayi mɛ e ɖe tɔn kpo a
asukusi ɖe ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ e sɔgbe hugan ɖɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu mɛɖe nɔ taan tɔn do wa lɛ e wɛ nɔ bɔ lɛ nɔ ɖekpo
nugbo ɔ akpa e nɔ jɛ do wutu e ɖe ɖɔhun ɔ enyi hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ ɔ e nɔ se ɖo nu ci nu mɛ e wutu e sixu ɖekpo kpɛɖe kpɛɖe enyi e kpe nukun ganji ɔ nɛ
nu tawun tawun tɛ lɛ sixu mɛ ɖo mɛ lɛ e bɔ se wɛ ɖe ɖo lanmɛ lɛ e ɖekpo
etɛwu mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah mɔ nu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ mɛ ɖo mɛ e ɖe ɖo hudo gbɔdonumɛ tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ nyi mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ jehovah xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
jehovah nyi tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e ganjɛwu togun tɔn ɖɔ nyi wɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nyi wɛ nɔ blo eza
xo mawu tɔn mi jiɖe ɖɔ akpakpa ɖo jehovah wɛ bɔ e ɖo nukun ɖo hwenu e wa e wɛ
wu ɖɔ vi mawu tɔn mɛ e yi wan tawun e lɔ ku ku
nux nwt e sixu tinmɛ jehovah se e a jaan
jehovah sixu do gbɔ nu mi gbɔn
mi sixu ɖeji bi ɖɔ jehovah wa nuɖe do mi
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ xo nu cobo ɖɔ se wɛ miɖesunɔ ɖe ɖo ayi mɛ lɛ e bi ɖo ɖɛ mɛ a
e do gbɔ nu mɛ sɔ ɖɔ e tuun ɖɔ jehovah mɔ nukunnu jɛ mitɔn lɛ mɛ nɔ do gbɔ sin hudo mi ɖo e nu mi e
e nɔ blo gbɔn
ali mawu nɔ mi ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi gbɔn gbɔdonumɛ gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn gblamɛ
mɛ nwt hlɔnhlɔn mawu nɔ do e nyi jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn titewungbe ɖe
jezu ɖɔ jixwe tɔn ɔ gbigbɔ tɔn mɛ byɔ ɛ lɛ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
mi wa hweɖebunu ɔ fifa mawu tɔn nɔ blo ayixa mitɔn kpo linlin mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖo xa filipunu lɛ
etɛwu mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ jezu do gbɔ nu mi
hwenu vi jehovah tɔn jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e ɖe tɔn tɔn bi ɖo xo kpo walɔ kpo mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hwenu jezu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ e ɖi xwi xa ku xwedo tɔn tɔn ɖe lɛ kpo mɛtuunmɛ tɔn ɖe lɛ tɔn kpo
e ci ɖɔ jozɛfu nyi ɖo domɛ jezu tɔn e ku hwenu jezu kpo ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e
do nukunmɛ jezu xwe tɔn ɖo jɛ vlamɛ e ɖi xwi xa eɖesunɔ tɔn nu nɔ tɔn tɔn kpo nɔvi tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn gbɔn e
jezu ɖɔ emi nɔ se xa mɛ gbɔn hwenu lazaa ku e
hwenu jezu tɔn e ɔ nu mɛ lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ tawun bɔ e nɔ se xa
tɔn syɛn bɔ e ɖe nu ci ɖo ayi mɛ e jaan
etɛwu mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ jezu se xa mi ɖo egbe
kpo gbɔdonumɛ jezu tɔn kpo sixu mi ɖo egbe gbɔn
biblu mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ jezu klisu ɔ nu e nyi sɔ ɔ jɛn e nyi egbe nyi sɔyi
ebl enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ mimɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn kpo ɖo klisu wɛ bɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ yetɔn lɛ mɛ do gbɔ nu ɖo hwetɔnnu xa eblee lɛ
wemafɔ biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ mɔ ɖɔ nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ tawun
enyi nu gege ɖo hun mɛ nu mi ɔ gbɔ jehovah nɔ do nu mi e wɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mi ðɛh
mawu wɛ akɔnkpinkpan mavɔmavɔ kpo nukunɖiɖo ɖagbe kpo mi gbɔn tɔn ji tɛ
jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn ɖevo nu mɛ ɖo se wɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi agun klisanwun tɔn
xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
mi sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ wu ku e ɖe do gbɔ gbɔn
enɛ wu ɔ nu titewungbe hugan sixu wa nu mɛ ɖo se wɛ e ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖoto e gbo xo do o
junia sin fofo hu eɖee e ɖɔ nu tlɛ sixu kpewu mɔ nukunnu jɛ se wɛ ɖe e mɛ bi a ɔ nu ɖo taji e wɛ nyi ɖɔ jlo mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu nɔ ci nu e wu
etɛ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ do wu
flin ɖɔ mi mɛ bi kun nɔ se nɔ ɖe nu ci nu mi e ɖo ali ɖokpo ɔ o
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mɛ ɖo ɔ se wɛ e kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu tuun ɔ syɛn e bɔ e sixu vɛwu bɔ e hun ɖɔ nu ci tawun e
e tlɛ nyi hwenu mɛɖe ɖɔ nu ci e ɔ e nɔ bɔwu hwebinu nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e ɖɔ e mɛ a
mi sixu mɔ xogbe gbɔdonumɛ tɔn lɛ zan nu mɛ ɖo se wɛ lɛ e gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e sixu vɛwu bɔ mi tuun nu mi ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖo se wɛ e ɖe
biblu ɖɔ mɛ ɖo nunywɛ ɔ xo tɔn nɔ gbɔ azɔn
sin asu ku e yi gbe ɖɔ avi wa huzu nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo ayi mɛ lɛ e gbɔn e
enɛ wɛ bɔ e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi hwenu lɛ xa mi e
nu e nɔ vɛwu nu mi bonu mi kpannukɔn mɛ ɖɔ xo do do gbɔ nu mɛ ɔ mi sixu blo gbɔn
gbavi xo nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ lɛ e
nu e nɔ vɛwu nu bonu kpannukɔn mɛ ɖɔ xo do do gbɔ nu mɛ ɔ e sixu bɔwu nu bɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ gbɔn kati klewun ɖe wema mɛ ɛntɛnɛti ji tɔn ɖe alokan ji tɔn ɖe kpo wema mɛ tlɔlɔ ɖe kpo gblamɛ
sixu wlan wemafɔ gbɔdonumɛ tɔn ɖe alo flin jijɔ ɖagbe mɛ ku e ɖo e ɖe lɛ alo wlan nu awajijɛ tɔn flin do wu tɔn yi wan e ɖe
junia ɖɔ enyi klisanwun ɖe wlan xo gbɔdonumɛ tɔn klewun ɖe mi alo ylɔ mi bonu ma wa nɔ xa ɛ ɔ e nɔ mi bɔ sixu ɖɔ a
ali nɔ tawun e tɛ mi sixu do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖe
e vɛwu nu bonu ɖɔ linlin towe lɛ do ɖɛ mɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɔ vo sa nu mawu kpo ayi towe bi kpo do mɛ ɖo se wɛ e tɔn mɛ e sixu wa ɖagbe tawun enyi tlɛ wa gbɔn ɖasin kpo gbe ɖo wɛ e ɖe kpo gblamɛ ɔ nɛ
dalene flin ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ nu nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ wa gbɔ do nu mi gbe ɔ nɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ jlo xoɖɛ do mɛ a ji
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ ɖo gbɔ do nu mɛ wɛ
ba mɛ mɛɖe tɔn nɔ ayi yi jɛ e sixu gbɔn vo tawun nu mɛ ɖevo tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ zan hwenu xa mɛ mɔhunkɔtɔn e nyi hwenu gege kpo hɛnnumɔ gege kpo ɖo tɛn ɔ mɛ e kɛɖɛ o wa ɖo bɔ lɛ e mɛ hwenu mɛ ɖevo lɛ lɛkɔ yi nu nɔ wa lɛ e kɔn e
nugbo nɔ yi wan nu mɛ hwebinu nyi nɔvi sunnu wu e sixu ɖeji do ɖo lɛ hwenu e
nux nwt klisanwun lɛ sixu nyi jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn titewungbe ɖe nu mɛɖe jɛ hwenu mɛ ɔ xo ɔ zlɛ e xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
flin ɖɔ xwe kpe xwe lɛ ɖe lɛ fɔtoo ɖe lɛ nuwiwa ɖe lɛ wan tawun tawun ɖe abi taan xwe ɔ tɔn ɖe sixu blo bɔ se tawun
nu gege tiin bɔ mɛ asu alo asi ku do e ja biblo gbe azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e vɛwu tawun ɖi ɖe alo flin ku jezu tɔn yiyi
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ xwe kpe xwe nukɔntɔn alɔwliwli mitɔn tɔn bɔ do ku tɔn wu e vɛwu nu mi tawun e bɔwu nugbo a
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖe lɛ blo tuto bɔ nyi kpo lɛ kpo kple ɖe ayi klewun bonu nɔ nyiɖokpo o
junia tinmɛ ɖɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ alɔdo kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ xa mɛ hwenu e tlɛ jlo ɖu xwe kpe xwe bunɔ ɖebu a e sixu wa ɖagbe tawun
taan enɛ lɛ nɔ wa hweɖelɛnu e xɔ akwɛ tawun nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ titewungbe tɔn
jaan flin ɖɔ doku nu jehovah tawun ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn wanyiyinɔ mi bɔ din gbɔn ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ bi mɛ e wu
blo bɔ mɔ nyiɖee ɖo alɔ wanyiyinɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ nugbo nugbo
e do gbɔ nu mɛ tawun ɖɔ e tuun ɖɔ jehovah mawu nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e ɖe lɛ bi siin do gbɔ tɛgbɛ tɔn ɖe nu mɛ hwenu mɛkuku lɛ se gbe klisu tɔn e
jaan mawu ɖɔ emi su ku sin kun do sɔyi aklunɔ mavɔmavɔ sunsun ɖasin sin nukunmɛ nu mɛ bi
azɔn gudo tɔn e ɖɔ xo do jozɛfu wu e wɛ nyi hwenu jezu ɖo xwe e
hwenu jezu ɖo yatin ji e ɔ e nu jaan ɖɔ e kpe nukun do wu
nu jozɛfu kpo ɖo wɛ ɔ jezu ɖɔ a jaan
wemafɔ biblu tɔn mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi ðɛhan ezayii filipunu lɛ kpo kpo
xota ɔ comme jesus consolez les endeuilles ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe tɔn tɔn mɛ
nu mɛɖe lɛ wlan do do gbɔ nu ɖo mɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖie
mi tuun nu mi ɖɔ nu tawun zɛ mi yi wan nu ɖiɖɔ wu e a
mi sixu mɔ nu jɛ nu ci nu e mɛ a jehovah mɔ nu jɛ mɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn wɛ
mi ɖo nukun ɖɔ ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ kpɛɖe
tuuntuun ɖɔ mɛ towe ɖo ganji ɖo flin mawu tɔn mɛ do gbɔ nu e flin nu bi do wu tɔn ɛ
din ɔ nuɖiɖi sin e zan e kpo ɖo jɛ hwenu e do palaɖisi mɛ e
weɖexamɛ enɛ lɛ adanwanu lɛ ɖi yovotu cakaviwun alo nu mɔhun ɖevo zinzan do jɛhun do mɛɖee ji bonu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu do mɛ wu o
ðo ayi nu elɔ lɛ bɔ lɛ e wu ðo jehovah sin nukunmɛ ɔ ɖo taji ɔ tɔn nyi nu
e zan nu ɖebu do jɛhun do mɛɖee ji ɔ e sixu kɔn hun kɔn nyi ayi tu zinzan nɔ bɔ mɛhuhu nɔ bɔkun e sixu nyi ɖo manywɛ mɛ alo kpo jlo kpo
ɔ enyi axansunxo ɖo sijasija ji e ɖe mɔ ɖɔ mɛ xwe emi wa e ɖo adanwanu ɖe ɔ ninɔmɛ ɔ nɔ syɛn sixu dɔn ku wa
ee hwi lɛ ɖokpo do kpa to ɖaxo ɔ tɔn e ɔ jezu ɖegbe ɖɔ hwi towe ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ jezu ɖe nugbo taji ɖokpo nugbododo ɖe wɛ nɔ ali ahwanvu tɔn lɛ jɛ egbe
sɔgbe xa micee ɔ togun mawu tɔn hwi yetɔn do alin hwan yetɔn do gyankpa
enyi kpewu hun tɛnkpɔn gbɔn alɔkpa bi mɛ kpewu gbɔn e nɔ fifa mɛ xa lɛ bi
klisanwun lɛ nɔ do mɔ nu xɔ akwɛ tawun hu nuɖokan lɛ e
ɖo nu gbɔn ɖebu ɔ jɔ ɔ ɖo dɔkun tɔn lɛ mɛ a
klisanwun lɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu ayixa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ e jɛxa ɖo lɛ alo bunɔ lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ a
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu klisanwun tɔn nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e hɛn tu e
klisanwun ɖe ɖesu wɛ wa gbeta ɖe kɔn do e jɛhun do eɖee xwedo tɔn alo nuɖokan tɔn lɛ ji gbɔn e wu eɖesu wɛ wa gbeta ɖe kɔn do e wa e wu
flin ɖɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖe nunywɛ mawu tɔn kpo wan e yi nu mi e kpo
enɛ wu ɔ klisanwun zin ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e nɔ do nugbododo enɛ lɛ ji nɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi kun hɛn adanwanu ɖe do jɛhun do emiɖee ji o
klisanwun ɖe sixu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi ɖo adanwanu ɖe ɖi yovotu alo cakaviwun do nya gbe mɔ ɖu alo nya xɛ ɖo eɖee ji ɖo gbekanlin si
enyi e ɖo tu lɛ ɖe zan wɛ a ɔ e ɖɔ e ɖe ɔ sin mɛ bɔ vlafo ɔ e tun nu lɛ ɖo vovo ɖo fi jɛxa e
nu nu ɖu hunjijɛ do mɛɖee ji bonu e hwlɛn kan xa mɛ o e ɔ xota eviter le ɖo reveillez vous
mars tɔn mɛ
e tinmɛ ɖevo lɛ do wiwa tɔn byɔ ɖɔ e hɛn tu e ji ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe tɔn mɛ wex kpo atɔxwɛ flansegbe tɔn octobre tɔn kpo mɛ wex
nu towe nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu jehovah gbɔn e su nukun towe mɛ gbɛn
ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah hwlɛn gbɔn
mɔ jehovah nɔ zan xo tɔn do nɔ gudo nu togun tɔn gbɔn e gbɛn
hwetɛnu e wlan ðɛhan ɔ
etɛ mi sixu mɔ ɖo ðɛhan ɔ mɛ
enyi mɛɖe wa e ɖe e ganji alo ɖe jijɔ klisanwun tɔn taji ɖe ɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa ɛ
nu e jɛxa ɖɔ e wa nu ɔ mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ sɔ kpa jehovah mawu e
mi sixu kpa ɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn aditi e ɖo bɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo nuɖiɖo tɔn lɛ jiwu e mɛ e wu alo ɖo ali e nɔ wa nu xa mi mɛ lɛ ɖe kpo wanyiyi kpo bɔ vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn vi tɔn tɔn e sɔnu e e wu
enɛ mɛ wlan ðɛhan ɔ e bɔ e kpa jehovah
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ wa nu emi nu kpa mawu xa ðɛhan
mi tuun mɛ wlan ɖɛhan enɛ e a e ci ɖɔ enɛ ɔ nɔ hwenu jehovah lɛkɔ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ sin kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu wa yi jeluzalɛmu e
e hwɛjijɔ ɖevo wu e wa lɛ e
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ wɛ
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ ɖo ɖɔ kpa jah
hwenu axɔsu silusi ɖe izlayɛli vi ɖo kannumɔgbenu lɛ e nyite e ɔ nu ɖo ci nu etɛwu
do nukun mɛ nu ci nu izlayɛli vi ɖo kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu lɛ e
mɛ wli lɛ e nɔ nɔ ɖɔ do sin ɖokpo ji nu mi
ðo hwe ɔ ɔ jeluzalɛmu nyi hwɛjijɔ ɖaxo bi wu nɔ ɖo jehovah mɛ e ɖo ðɛh
nu ɖo jwifu lɛ wa wɛ e nyi hanjiji xo a
ayi yetɔn gbado bɔ ɖo hudo gbɔdonumɛ kpo alɔɖakɔnjinumɛ kpo tɔn
e ɖo co mawu tɔn ɖɔ hwlɛngan wa gbɔn silusi pɛsi xɔsu ɔ ji
e gba babilɔnu jla ɖɔ jehovah mi ɖɔ nyɛ sa xwe ɖokpo nu emi ɖo jeluzalɛmu
mɛ sixu ɖo togun tɔn mɛ lɛ bi lɛkɔ yi jeluzalɛmu
jehovah mawu mitɔn nɔ xa
xogbe enɛ lɛ do gbɔ nu izlayɛli vi ɖo babilɔnu lɛ e e
etɛ ɔ ɖɔ do hlɔnhlɔn jehovah ɖo nɔ gbɔ azɔn nu mɛ ayi yetɔn xo akpa lɛ e wu
enyi akɔta izlayɛli tɔn ɔ blebu wɛ jehovah do gbɔ kpowun a loɔ e do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nɔ blo egbe ɖesu
nugbo ɔ jehovah nɔ kpe nukun do mɛ ɖo tagba mɔ wɛ ɖo agbaza lixo alo nu nɔ ci nu mɛ sin alixo lɛ e
e nɔ mi nunywɛ kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo bonu mi do ɖi xwi xa tagba ɖebu mi nɔ mɔ lɛ e ja
ɔ ayi tɔn ɖo nu ɖo jinukunsin lɛ e ji ɖɔ nu mi do jehovah wu ɖɔ e xa sunvi nabi ɖo ji e nyikɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo ðɛh
ðo ayi nu elɔ wu ɔ sixu nukun do mɔ sunvi lɛ e tuun nabi nyi tawun e a
ðo xwe lɛ gblamɛ ɔ sunvi mi sixu mɔ lɛ e jɛji tawun
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ sunvi liva mɔkpan wɛ ɖo mitɔn voie lactee ɔ mɛ
bɔ vlafo lɛ livi donu livi mɔkpan wɛ ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ sunvi nabi ɖe e do maxamaxa
ɔ nyikɔ ɖe mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
enɛ ɖɔ nu jehovah ɔ sunvi ɖokpo ɖokpo gbɔn vo
mawu tuun fi sunvi ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖe ɖo ganxixo ɖe mɛ e tuun hwiɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ e tuun fi ɖe e nu nɔ ci nu tawun e tuun nu sin hudo ɖo tawun ɖo ganxixo ɖebu mɛ e
enyi jehovah hwlɛn togun tɔn sin tɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ etɛ e nɔ hɛn ayi mɛ
na jehovah nɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ se xa mɛ gbɔn hwenu e nɔ ɖo alɔdo lɛ wɛ e tɔn
sixu ɖɔ ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖe e vɛwu tawun bɔ agban ɖo kɔ ji nu e kpɛn
ðo mi nyi wutu ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ mi nɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ nyi do
sixu mɔ alɔ hlɔnhlɔnnɔ jehovah tɔn bɔ gan sin mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖe lɛ mɛ gbɔn e
eza ðo ayi kyoko nyi nɔvi nyɔnu gbexosin ɖe bɔ awakanmɛ tɔn ku tawun hwenu e tɛn yi fi ɖevo wa ɖo gudo e wu
jehovah ɖɔ emi mɔ nu jɛ tagba tɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ kyoko mɔ eɖee ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee sixu tuun nu ci e tɛntin
e ci ɖɔ jehovah ɖo xo elɔ ɖɔ wɛ tlɔlɔ ɖɔhun yi wan nu enyi ɖo nyi gbexosin wutu kpowun a ɖo nyi vi nyɔnu ze hwiɖee jo nu mi wutu wɛ
jlo ɖɔ ɖu sin vivi ɖi ɖokpo ɖo lɛ mɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ towe mɛ ɔ ɔ ɖɔ nunywɛ emitɔn kun ɖo dogbo o gbɔn
ali tɛ jehovah nɔ mi ɖe jɛ nukɔn
na ɖe
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu ɖo hudo nu agbaza tɔn lɛ tɔn
ði ɔ sixu ɖo nu wɛ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo nuɖuɖu kpe emi e o
e ɖo co jehovah wɛ blo tuto nu bɔ jinukun lɛ su e tɔn tlɛ nɔ nuɖuɖu avunsakɔwo nɔ ɖo xovɛ vi wɛ lɛ e
xa ðɛhan
nu jehovah kpo ɖo nukun kpe do avunsakɔwo lɛ wu wɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ sixu ɖeji ɖɔ e dandannu sin hudo ɖo lɛ e ðɛh
mi mutsuo kpo asi tɔn kpo tɔn
mɔ ɖɔ jehovah hlɔnhlɔn emi ɖo jɔhɔn ɖaxo nyi gba nu ɖo japon ɖo e gudo
ðo fan nu xa xwe yetɔn sin xɔta wutu ɔ xo jɔhɔn ɔ zlɛ
nu nyi co ɖo azan enɛ ji ɔ hɛn ɖibla nyi nu ɖo lɛ e bi bu
ðo zan ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ ablu mɛ nɔ fifa ɖo xɔ ɖe mɛ ɖo xwe yetɔn gble e sin singbo wegɔ ɔ ji
ðo zanzan ɔ wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ
wema ɖokpo mɔ e wɛ nyi annuaire des temoins jehovah
xotala le le meurtrier jamais recense ji wɛ nukun mutsuo tɔn jɛ tlolo
e ɖɔ xo do ayikungban danwu ɖo ɖo dɔn hu mɛ hugan ɖo hwenuxo mɛ e wa e wu
mutsuo kpo asi tɔn kpo hwenu ɖo nu enɛ jɛ e xa wɛ e
mɔ ɖɔ jehovah kpe nukun do emi wu kpo wanyiyi kpo kanmɛsyɛn gbigbɔ tɔn sin hudo emi ɖo e emi do hwetɔnnu
jehovah sɔnu nu nu sin hudo ɖo ɖo agbaza lixo e kpo wanyiyi kpo
nɔvi gbigbɔ tɔn yetɔn lɛ hɛn sɔ
nu kanmɛsyɛn tawun e wɛ nyi tutoblonunu mawu tɔn tɔn lɛ agun ɔ e
mutsuo ɖɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ jehovah ɖo akpa mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn ɖo nukun kpe do mi wu wɛ
e do gbɔ nu mɛ e
ali taji hugan mawu nɔ mi ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn mi e nɔ su hudo agbaza tɔn mitɔn lɛ sin do
etɛ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo nukun ɖu le hlɔnhlɔn mawu nɔ zan do hwlɛn mɛ e tɔn e ɖo wa
jehovah ɖo gbesisɔmɛ tɛgbɛ mɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe lɛ bɔ nɔ
ðɛh mi sixu ɖu le gbesisɔmɛ e ɖe wa nu do mitɔn mɛ e tɔn gbɔn
mi ɖo ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe xa ɛ
nu enɛ blo ɔ mi ɖo sɔnu nu mɛɖesɔhwe
jehovah nɔ mɛ mɔhun lɛ bɔ nu yetɔn nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ
do ɖu le alɔdo mawu tɔn tɔn ɔ etɛ mi ɖo nyi alɔ
mɛ alɔkpa tɛ lɛ sin nu wɛ nɔ jehovah nukunmɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ mawu mɛdida lɛ hwe bɔ nɔ
ðɛh xo enɛ lɛ syɛn tawun
ði ɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu nublibliwiwa
enɛ sixu byɔ gandido tawun e jɛxa ɖɔ mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi ba do mɔ nyɔna jehovah tɔn
ðo ahwan enɛ funfun hwenu ɔ mi ɖo ganjɛ jehovah wu e nyi do miɖesunɔ wu a
enyi miɖesunɔ do gan hwlɛn miɖee kpo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo ahwan wu e kpo enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi yi alɔdo mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɔ e nukun tɔn mɛ a
e wa ɔ mi ɖo sɛkpɔ jehovah savo byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e mi
e gbɔn vo nu nɔ ɖe we xa mɛ lɛ e nɔ kpe e gbeɖe bonu e gbɔ to ɖo nubyɔbyɔ mitɔn lɛ a enyi mi tlɛ ɖo byɔbyɔ ɛ wɛ hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɛ
mɛ sin nu nɔ jehovah sin nukunmɛ e wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ si lɛ mɛ ganjɛ wu tɔn lɛ
ganjɛwu tɛ hlɔnhlɔn ɔ
jehovah mi ganjɛwu bɔ mi kudeji ɖɔ e togun tɔn hwenu e ɖo hudo mɛ e
hwenu ɔ ɖo tamɛ do jeluzalɛmu ɖo ayi wu wɛ e ɔ e jihan ɖɔ do jehovah wu ɖɔ e syɛnsyɛn nu nɔ do su hɔntogbo towe lɛ e xoɖɛ do vi towe lɛ ji ɖo toxo towe mɛ
e fifa ɖo ayikungban towe ji
ðɛh tuun ɔ tuun ɖɔ mawu syɛnsyɛn nu e nɔ do su hɔntogbo toxo ɔ tɔn lɛ do cyɔn alɔ sinsɛn tɔn lɛ ji e jiɖe e e
xo mawu tɔn sixu mi gbɔn hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ tɛnkpɔn lɛ wa ɖi bu mi e
akpaxwe
nu sixu ci nu mi hweɖelɛnu do tɛnkpɔn mitɔn lɛ wu jehovah nɔ zan xo tɔn do mi gbɔn
na nu mawu lɛ nɔ nyi wiwa blewun gbɔn e tɔn
sixu mɔ tagba ɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖo nu
jehovah sixu nunywɛ bɔ ɖi xwi xa
ɔ ɖɔ do mawu tɔn wu ɖɔ e nɔ ɖɔ xo nu ayikungban ɔ bɔ nu e wiwa lɛ bi nɔ nyi wiwa blewun
ee ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ laglasi do bɔ e nɔ gba fo ji ɖɔhun lobɔ nɔ ja gudo e ɔ e kanbyɔ ɖɔ sixu nɔte avuvɔ tɔn nukɔn
e ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah nɔ ɖɔ xo kpowun bɔ bi nɔ sinsin
egbe ɔ jehovah nɔ ali mi kpo xo tɔn biblu kpo
bɔ nu e wiwa lɛ bi nɔ nyi wiwa blewun enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔ mi gbigbɔ tɔn hwenu mi ɖo hudo tɔn do e
tamɛ do le nɔ mɔ ɖo biblu xixa wema ɖeɖee devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ lɛ e biba do televiziɔn jw tɔn kpinkpɔn jw org ji yiyi xo ɖiɖɔ xa mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo xa klisanwun lɛ kpo mɛ e ji
simone mɔ hlɔnhlɔn xo mawu tɔn tɔn
e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun nuti o tlɛ nɔ xo nu ɖɔ emi nyi mɛ bɔ nu emitɔn mawu nukunmɛ a ji
e ɖo co hwe ɖeɖee awakanmɛ ku e ɔ e do ɖɛxixo wu alɔdo jehovah tɔn
e hɛn alɔnu tɔn jan ɖo biblu kpinkplɔn mɛ
e ɖɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe mɛ gɔn hlɔnhlɔn kpo jehovah tɔn kpo mɔ gbeɖe a
aniwu nɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah jɔwu
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ ɖo ɖɔ kpa jah
ɔ tuun e jɔwu togun mawu tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ gbɔn e
egbe ɔ nyɔna ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ wɛ nyi mɛ ɖokpo ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji bɔ e nɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn do ylɔ e
ðo mi tuun jehovah jo xo tɔn do bɔ e ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ ɖu vivi kancica bunɔ ɖe tɔn xa ɛ
ði mɛ wlan ðɛhan ɔ e ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe gege ɖɔ kpa jah
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu wa nu ɖokpo ɔ a ce
tuto alɔkpa tɛ lɛ biblo wɛ bɔ ɖo sɔgudo awajijɛnɔ ɖe
etɛ alɔɖiɖo ɖo hwebinu tɔn mɛ nɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ
ali tɛ lɛ gbexosin tɔn nɔ hun nu mɛ
etɛwu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo wa gbeta ɖe kɔn do sɔgudo wu
etɛwu ɖo ɖo mɛ zɛ xwe wu a
mɛ mi ɖe e ci tomɛyiyi ɖɔhun bɔ hwenu e ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e wɛ e nɔ blo tuto fi e jlo yi e tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ tuto biblo sixu vɛwu tawun
ɖo wa gbeta ɖe kɔn do nu zan gbɛhwenu towe kpo e do wa e wu
jehovah ɖɔ nu togun tɔn ɖɔ ɖo nukun do gbɛmɛ wɛ o ɖo nyi wɛ nyi mawu towe
akɔnkpinkpan alɔ nu eza
wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ jehovah jlo ɖɔ blo tuto sɔgudo awajijɛnɔ ɖe tɔn
jehovah byɔ ɖɔ blo tuto nunywɛ kpe e do sɔgudo towe wu
e jlo ɖɔ nɔ awajijɛ mɛ
nu ɖagbeɖagbe e da bɔ nɔ se gbe yetɔn alo lɛ e enɛ
jehovah ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee weɖexamɛ tɔn lɛ e ɖɔ nu nɔ jlo mi a e wiwa nɔ vivi nu
etɛ jehovah ɖɔ wa
tuto alɔkpa tɛ lɛ jehovah byɔ ɖɔ blo
e da lɛ bonu awajijɛ gbɔn tuuntuun ɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo gblamɛ
mawu ɖɔ blo tuto nu nu ɖevo lɛ e nyi nu nu sin do kanlin lɛ nɔ su e kpowun o mɔ tɛn do ɖo awajijɛ
nugbo taji ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ jehovah jlo ɖɔ ayi do wanyiyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo eɖesunɔ kpo ji ɖo tuto towe lɛ mɛ xa matie
etɛ nɔ awajijɛ jezu
jezu klisu ze nu bi vɔ e nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ
hwenu e ɖo vu e ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e nɔ ayihun
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ hwenu e nu do e ɖe bɔ hwenu e ɖu do e ɖe
hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɔ nunywɛ tɔn kpodo xosin wɛ e ɖe do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ wu ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ lɛ kpan kpaca lɛ luk
jezu su wa huzu mɛxo awajijɛnɔ ɖe
etɛ bɔ e nyi awajijɛnɔ
e tuun ɖɔ mawu ɖɔ emi jla wɛnɖagbe tɔn wamamɔnɔ lɛ ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖɔ nukun yetɔn hun luk
nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ do tɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ wu nɔ vivi xa luki
gbe ɖokpo ɔ ee jezu nu nawe ɖe do sinsɛn nugbo ɔ wu gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nuɖuɖu wɛ nyi ɖɔ blo jlo mɛ mi do ɔ tɔn wa e mi ɔ yi kpe
jaan wanyiyi mawu kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ awajijɛ jezu
etɛwu e jɛxa ɖɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo xa klisanwun mɔ nu lɛ e do tuto blo do sɔgudo wu lɛ e ji
klisanwun gege ɖu vivi awajijɛ tɔn hwenu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e gbɔn gbexosin sin wiwa gblamɛ
etɛwu ɖɔ xo do tuto towe ji xa mɛ ɖe lɛ a
e nuɖe wa ɖo nu mɛɖe a ɔ e nɔ yi a mɛ gege ɖe we xa mɛ ɔ e nɔ mɔ tɔn
ee jixwe tɔn jezu tɔn ɛ gudo e ɔ jezu kpo ɖo nu wɛ ɖo tɔn ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ mɛ
ði ɔ e mɔ awajijɛ e nɔ mɔ hwenu e blo bɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ byɔ ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ e kpo awajijɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖo gbejininɔ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo xa ezayii ebl
mi ɖɔ xo do hwebinu tɔn sin akpaxwe sixu awajijɛ tawun e ɖe lɛ ji
etɛwu nu kplɔnkplɔn xa mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu nɔ vivi nu mɛ winnyawinnya gege
agaɖanu din ɔ nɔvi sunnu winnyawinnya ɖe nɔ nyi gbexosin tɔn e ɖɔ yi wan nu hwebinu tɔn wiwa nu jehovah ɖo nɔ ɛ ɖɔ yi wan gbɔn e nɛ
ðo ɔ kpewu biblu kpinkplɔn xa mɛ ɖebu a ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ tɛn yi fi ɖevo bɔ ɖo ɖokpo vlamɛ ɔ biblu kpinkplɔn xa mɛ gege
biblu lɛ ɖokpo jɛ kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ wa ji
ee yi wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn tɔn nu nɔvi sunnu tlɛnnɔ lɛ ee e nɔ blo xɔ we e gudo e ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ nyi yi ɖo fi biblu kpinkplɔn xa mɛ ɛnɛ ɖe e
gbigbɔ ɔ ɖo mɛ lɛ huzu wɛ gbɔn e ɔ wɛ nu kpinkplɔn xa lɔ nɔ vivi nu mi e nɛ tɛ
klisanwun winnyawinnya ɖe lɛ ɖo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu mɛ bi gbɔn
klisanwun winnyawinnya ɖe lɛ gbe ɖevo
ði ɔ jacob nɔ nɔ totaligbe amɛlika tɔn e wlan ɖɔ hwenu ɖo xwe tɛnwe e ɔ lɛ gege nyi vietnam
jlo ɖɔ xo nu do jehovah wu enɛ wu ɔ ɖo taan ɖe gudo ɔ blo tuto gbe yetɔn
gbɔn hugan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ atɔxwɛ glɛnsigbe tɔn ɔ do vietnam gbe tɔn ɔ wu
zun xa mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo agun nɔ do vietnam gbe sɛkpɔ finɛ e mɛ e
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ gbexosin
nukɔnmɛ ɔ yi wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn tɔn nu nɔvi sunnu tlɛnnɔ lɛ
enɛ mi bɔ kpe gbexosin wu ɖo fi nyɛɖokponɔ nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖo kanɖo nɔ do vietnam gbe e ɖe mɛ e
e kpaca mɛ nɔ do vietnam gbe lɛ e gege ɖɔ gbe yetɔn
ylɔ mi bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ biblu xa
mɛ ɖe lɛ yi nukɔn blo baptɛm do wu
nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu tɔn nyi nu nɔ ɖagbe mɛ e gbɔn
nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu ɖo awajijɛ tawun ɖo e nɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ tuun nuɖiɖi mɛtɔn jinjɔn biblu ji gbɔn e hugan
e nɔ e sixu wa ɖo xa jehovah gbɔn e kɔ
enyi mɛ lɛ tlɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ ɖo fi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe e a ɔ sixu ɖo awajijɛ nɔ sin nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu mɛ e mɛ gbɔn
enyi mɛ nabi ɖe tlɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ ɖo fi ɖe e a ɔ sixu ɖu vivi nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu tɔn
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nɔvi ɖe sixu mɔ mɛ sixu wa nyi ahwanvu ɖe e mɛ lɛ bi wɛ nɔ ɖo mɛ mɔhun lɛ biba mɛ bɔ mɛ bi sixu ɖo awajijɛ nɔ sin mɛ lɛ e mɛ
ði ɔ brandon wa gbexosin nu xwe tɛnnɛ ɖo fi mɛ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ ɖe a e
e ɖɔ yi wan nu wɛnɖagbejijla ɖo nu jehovah byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa e nɛ
gbexosin tlolo fo wemaxɔmɛ e
wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu nɔvi sunnu winnyawinnya ɖeɖee ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo nukɔnyiyi yetɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kpo mimɔ nɔ vivi nu mi
hwenu yi wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn tɔn nu nɔvi sunnu tlɛnnɔ lɛ gudo e ɔ e ɖe gbexosin tɔn ɖevo nu mi
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mɔ mɛɖebu ɖo fi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe e bonu e yi nukɔn blo baptɛm a e kpa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ blo tuto ɖo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu tɔn mɛ bi nut
alɔkpa tɛ sin vivi mɛ winnyawinnya gege ɖu
ði ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya gege nɔ ze yeɖee jo nɔ ɖo xɔgbigba tɔn ɔ mɛ
e ɖo hudo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn kanweko mɔkpan tɔn
xɔ enɛ lɛ gbigba nyi ɖe nɔ kpa nu mawu sixu bɔ ɖo awajijɛ
alɔkpa ɖevo lɛ bi ɖɔhun ɔ xa lɛ nɔ awajijɛ mɛ
xɔ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbigba nɔ mɛ tawun e nɔ mɛ e nɔ ɖagbe ɖo ayijayi mɛ gbɔn e e nɔ nyi gbɔn e kpo e nɔ wa nu ɖo xa mɛ ɖo nukun kpe do nu wu wɛ lɛ e gbɔn e kpo
nyɔna gege ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee byɔ hwebinu tɔn mɛ lɛ e akpaxwe
gbexosin tɔn sixu hun ali ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
nɔvi sunnu nɔ nyi kevin e ɖɔ sin hwenu kpo ɖo vu e wɛ e nɔ jlo mi ɖɔ wa wa hwebinu tɔn nu jehovah gbe ɖokpo
wa gbexosin hwenu ɖo xwe e
nɔ wa xa nɔvi ɖe nu taan klewun klewun ɖe nɔ do kpe nukun nyiɖee wu
nɔ su aza nu xɔ nɔ do flɛtɛli lɛ kpo lɛ kpo
nukɔnmɛ ɔ wa xa sɔhɛnmɛ tɔn ɖe nu xwe we ɖo tɔgbamɛ ɖe hwenu ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo xwe nɔvi lɛ tɔn kpo gba mɛ
hwenu se ɖɔ hudo xɔgbigba tɔn tiin ɖo afrique du e ɔ nyikɔ bɔ e ylɔ mi ɖɔ nyi wa
ðo afrique fi ɔ nɔ tɛn sin fi gba kplexɔ ɖe ɖo wɛ e ɖe e yi fi ɖevo ɖo aklunɔzan gbla yɔywɛ ɖe lɛ gudo tɛgbɛ
mi nɔ nɔ nɔ biblu ɖo nɔ ɖo
nɔ ɖu vivi wɛn jijla xa nɔvi ɖo ayi ɔ ji lɛ e tɔn ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
tuto blo hwenu ɖo vu e bɔ ɖo awajijɛ tlɛ ɖo nukun tɔn gbɔn a e
betɛli tɔn nɔ bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ gbɔn
mɛ ɖeɖee wa nu sɔgbe kpo tuto blo jehovah hwebinu lɛ e kpo e ɖe lɛ ɖo betɛli din
betɛli tɔn nyi gbɛzinzan awajijɛ tɔn ɖe ɖo nu e nɔ wa ɖo finɛ lɛ e bi ɔ jehovah wɛ e nɔ wa
xwedo betɛli tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ sɔnu nu nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ
betɛli tɔn ɖe nɔ nyi dustin ɖɔ hwenu ɖo xwe tɛnnɛ e wɛ jɛ hwebinu tɔn gbe nya ji gbexosin hwenu fo wemaxɔmɛ e
xwe ɖokpo adaɖe gudo ɔ e ylɔ mi do betɛli bɔ e nɔ zan wemazinmɔ lɛ gbɔn e bɔ nukɔn mɛ ɔ e nɔ blo tuto ji tɔn lɛ gbɔn e
ðo betɛli ɔ nɔ se nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu tɔn ɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ gbɔn e tlɔlɔ bɔ e nɔ vivi nu mi
yi wan nu wiwa ɖo fi ɖo nu mi nɔ wa lɛ e nɔ mɛ lɛ bɔ nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah
sixu blo tuto mɔ tɛn do byɔ hwebinu tɔn ɔ mɛ gbɔn
sixu blo tuto nyi klisanwun hwebinu tɔn gbɔn
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ ɖokan do xo mawu tɔn kpinkplɔn wu nɔ tamɛ do tinmɛ tɔn lɛ ji ganji ali sixu ɖe nuɖiɖi towe ɖo kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ ji ɖe e
ðo wemaxɔmɛ yiyi towe hwenu ɔ sixu ɖo nuwukpikpe ɖe lɛ nyi bi alɔ e ɖe
bonu nu mɛ lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu gbɔn ayi hinhɛn do kan linlin yetɔn lɛ byɔ kpo to ɖiɖo kpo gblamɛ
ɔ sixu ze hwiɖee jo ba wa nuɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɖi alɔɖiɖo ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn tɔn kpo nukun kpikpe kpo mɛ
pɔlu byɔ timɔtee bɔ e ɔ ɖo nɔvi lɛ nɔ ɖekunnu ɖagbe wutu mɛ
sixu sɔnu kpe nukun do hwiɖee wu gbɔn
gege hwebinu tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖo wa nuɖe do kpe nukun do yeɖee wu
hwenu ɖo tuto blo wɛ e ɔ ɖɔ xo xa lɛdo tɔn towe kpo gbexosin ɖo lɛdo ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo
kan sɔgbe xa gbexosin ɖe e byɔ
bɔ biblu ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ towe do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah enɛ ɔ nu wa wɛ ɖe lɛ jɛnu nux
sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah jlo ɖɔ zunfan sɔgudo awajijɛnɔ ɖe xa timɔtee
hwebinu tɔn bɔ ma do hwebinu tɔn lɛ bɔ enɛ bɔ nyi klisanwun zin e
mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ jehovah sinsɛn ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ bɔ alɔwliwli yetɔn yi hugan
tuto biblo byɔ ɖɔ zan ayi towe gbɔn
tuto biblo nɔ byɔ ɖɔ zan ayi towe
ðɛhan ɖɔ do jehovah wu ɖɔ e nu jlo lɛ blo bonu nu wa lɛ bi nyi wiwa
enɛ wu ɔ tamɛ do nu jlo towe do wa e wu
ðo ayi nu wa wɛ jehovah ɖe din lɛ e kpo sixu ɖo tɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo wu
blo tuto nu wa bɔ e vivi lɛ e tɔn
jehovah sinsɛn awajijɛ e sixu a e ɖo gbɛzinzan nɔ kpa mawu e wɛ
ɛɛn jehovah do ɖo nu vivi nu hu nu bi e enɛ ɔ e nu ɖo hun mɛ nu lɛ ðɛh
e ɖyɔ kpo wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ e ahwan
bɔ towe sataan ɖo ahwanfunnu nɔ xo daka tawun e ɖe zan do wu wɛ
ahwanfunnu tɛ wɛ
nujlajla tɔn
e sɔnu nu ahwanfunnu enɛ do wa nu do agbaza towe wu a do wa nu do ayi towe wu wɛ
pɔlu ɖo aceji do nujlajla tɔn sataan tɔn lɛ nyi awovinu e wu klisanwun tɔn lɛ bi ɖo aceji a
nu yetɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu pɔlu sɔ e ɖɔ kun ɖo ɖeji do yeɖee wu zɛ xwe wu o
nu ɖu ɖo hun xo do ayi towe tamɛ wɛ ɖe e ji ɔ ɖo tuun nujlajla tɔn lɛ nɔ hɛn nu gble gbɔn e hwiɖee
etɛ nyi nujlajla tɔn
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ nujlajla tɔn ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e xo masɔgbe alo xo tɔn do lilɛ jɔ nu mɛ lɛ nɔ nu alo wa nu gbɔn e
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ nujlajla tɔn nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ kpo adingban xo huzuhuzu nu hizihizi linlin huzu nu mɛ kpo ayimɛhwan funfun kpo ɛ ca xa nugbomaɖɔ nuwadomɛwu kpo wlɛnwin masɔgbe lɛ kpo
do nujlajla tɔn nyla sɔ
ðo mi sixu mɔ ba mɛ nujlajla tɔn lɛ nɔ gba nu yi jɛ e a wutu ɔ vance packard tuun ganji ɖo nuwalɔ lɛ tɔn biba do linu e ɖɔ gege mitɔn wɛ e ɖo bubu wɛ ɖo ayi huzu wɛ hu mi nɔ gbɔn e
akɔwe ɖe ɖɔ enyi nujlajla tɔn ɔ ɖo nu wa do mɛ wu wɛ ɔ e nɔ dɔn mɛ byɔ tamɛ nuwiwa nyla hu bi lɛ e mɛ ɖi kun susu do nu akɔta ahwan akɔhwan wan nu sinsɛn kpo nuwalɔ sɔgbe a lɛ e gege ɖevo lɛ kpo mɛ
nu yaya lɛ sixu kpewu zan nujlajla tɔn lɛ do mi ɔ do nukun nu sataan sixu kpewu wa e mɛ
e ɖo nuwalɔ tɔn wɛ sin hwenu e da e
din ɔ ɔ bi ɖo acɛ tɔn mɛ
e sixu zan nu ɖebu ɖo ɔ mɛ do funfun adingban tɔn lɛ kpe
sixu ɖu ɖo nujlajla tɔn sataan tɔn lɛ ji gbɔn
jezu ɖɔ xo klewun elɔ bɔ mi ɖu ɖo nujlajla tɔn lɛ ji e tuun nugbo ɔ bɔ nugbo ɔ ɖe sin kannumɔgbenu
jehovah mi nu enɛ
enɛ wu wɛ e nɔ zan elɔ nɔ tuntun awakanmɛ nu mɛ bonu e xa biblu alo o
do gan mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo ɔ mɛ bi
flin nu taji noam chomsky ɖɔ e e ɖɔ mɛɖebu nugbo do taglo towe mɛ a
nuɖe wɛ bɔ hwiɖesunɔ
hun hwiɖesunɔ enɛ byɔ ɖɔ nɔ kije mawuxowema ɔ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe mɛ
hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ sataan kun ɖɔ tamɛ do nu lɛ ji alo ganji o
enɛ wu ɔ jo hwiɖee do alo wa nu ɖɔhun nɔ yi gbe nu nu se lɛ e bi o nux
zan nuwukpikpe nu linlin tɔn kpo hlɔnhlɔn nu lɛ dida tɔn kpo mawu e nugbo ɔ do ɖo towe nux
wlɛnwin nujlajla tɔn lɛ tɔn zinzan sixu nu lɛ kpo jlo ɖo ahwan e kpo
sixu yetɔn ja ahwan xa gbe lɛ e bɔ ahwan ɖo yeɖee tɛntin alo bu bɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu yetɔn lɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ ahwangan allemagne tɔn ɖe yi gbe ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ wu ci ahwan ɖo wɛkɛ hwan nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu lɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ nujlajla lɛ tɔn lɛ lilɛ jɔ nu ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn ɖe nɔ wa gbɔn nu azwi ɖe e ɖɔhun
sataan nɔ zan ayixa mɔhun lɛ do ahwan mi ɖu ɖo mi ji ɖi ɔ e nɔ tɛn nɔ do glɔ nu hunnyahunnya ɖo nɔvi lɛ tɛntin alo bonu ɖo wu zɔ nu tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn ɖo ɖo ayi ɖe wu wutu
nu e o
nu xo mawu tɔn ali
e nu mi syɛnsyɛn ɖɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu agun ɔ o
nu gbeji sɔja ɖe ɖe nu gan tɔn e ɔ sɔja enɛ ahwan ganji a
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ nɔ zan wlɛnwin nujlajla tɔn lɛ e nɔ blo bɔ sɔja ɖe ɖeji do gan tɔn wu a
sixu ɖɔ xo lehun ɖe ɖeji do gan towe lɛ wu o
alo lɔn nu dɔn do hɔzɔ mɛ o
do blo bonu wlɛnwin yetɔn syɛn ɔ sixu zan ayixa winniwinni gbɔn nu ɖebu gan enɛ lɛ sixu wa nyi do e sin yɛkan mɛ xo
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ sataan nɔ wa
e jo gbe gbeɖe do gan do wɛ e ɖe nu jiɖe ɖo do mɛ jehovah ɖo mi lɛ e wu e a
ahwanlyannu tɛ zan
nu gege wɛ ɖɔ sixu ɖeji do mɛ ji jehovah gbɔn nu xwe kanweko din ali mi ɖo nugbo ɔ ji e wu
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ zan wlɛnwin do xɛsi lɛ nujlajla tɔn doxo hugan bɔ e zan lɛ e ɖokpo nɛ
ði ɔ alavɔ tɔn grande bretagne tɔn philip
taylor ɖɔ ɖɔ asiliinu lɛ nɔ zan do xɛsi ɖe kpo nujlajla ɖe kpo do nu yetɔn lɛ
jezu ɖɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖebu nu mɛ nɔ hu agbaza bɔ enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ sixu wa nuɖe hu a lɛ o
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nudoxɛsi lɛ alo nu bɔ lɛ e sixu wa
hɛn xo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn elɔ lɛ jehovah ɖɔ nu jozuwee e ayixa mɛ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ hwi kpan do gan wɔn o
adohu adohu lɛ jonɔ hun xoɖɛ jehovah tlolo ɖɔ towe lɛ bi
sixu ɖeji ɖɔ fifa mawu tɔn blo ayixa towe kpodo linlin towe lɛ kpo ɖo bɔ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ba ɖi xwi xa nujlajla sataan tɔn lɛ bi fili
e ɖɔ nu ɖebu sixu hwlɛn sin asilii lɔ mɛ a
mawu towe jehovah lɔ sixu wa nu ɖebu do hwlɛn a
e ɖɔ kpo adɔgbigbo kpo ɖɔ jehovah ɖesu wɛ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi wa ahwan to elɔ gba
e ɖɔ xo enɛ lɛ se ɔ ma do xɛsi nu o
e wɛnsagun ɖokpo do bɔ e su kun do nu asiliinu ɖo zan ɖokpo mɛ axɔ
sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖi xo enɛ o
do nukun mɛ din ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo xo ɖokpo ɔ ɖɔ nu wɛ ɖɔ nu adingban ɖo wɛ sataan ɖe lɛ e o
enɛ ɔ ɖu ɖo hun xo do ayi towe tamɛ wɛ ɖe e ji
ðo gbesisɔmɛ ðo suulu nɔte a
fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ tinmɛ nu wu mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔte jehovah e
xota wegɔ ɔ jehovah sixu wa numaɖonukun lɛ do blo nu mi sixu gbeɖe a lɛ e gbɔn e
enɛ hlɔnhlɔn jiɖe mi ɖo do wu tɔn ɖo suulu ɖo bonu e wa nu do takun mitɔn mɛ e
gbɛzan tɔn didɛ ðo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ nɔ kɔ do nyɔna lɛ mɛ
mi ðe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi ɛ do zɔ nu miɖee gbɔn e
mi ɔ do ðe nyi ayi a gbɔn e
xota wegɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do jijɔ nyi akpaxwe ɔ tɔn lɛ e gege ji tinmɛ mi sixu ɖe gbɔn ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn kpo mitɔn kpo mɛ gbɔn e
wanyiyi jijɔ xɔ akwɛ ðe
ɔ ɖo suulu ja

jehovah kpo jezu kpo ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔte gbɔn
etɛ sixu bɔ mi kanbyɔ ɖɔ jɛ hwetɛnu
etɛwu jehovah hwexonu tɔn lɛ tɔn sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
hwetɛnu e fo do
hwenu axɔsu davidi ɖo ðɛhan ɔ kpa wɛ e ɔ e lɔ kanbyɔ azɔn ɛnɛ ɖɔ hwetɛnu
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi wa ɖo nu enɛ ɔ ɖokpo ɔ kanbyɔ miɖee wɛ hweɖelɛnu ɔ e ɖo kpaca mi a
etɛ sixu bɔ mi nɔ kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ jɛ hwetɛnu
vlafo e sixu nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo xwi ɖi xa nuagɔwaxamɛ alɔkpa ɖe lɛ wɛ
e sixu nyi nuagɔwiwa mɛ ɖeɖee do mi lɛ e tɔn wɛ ɖo nu wa do mi wu wɛ
e nyi nu ɖebu wɛ ɔ tuun mi tuun ɖɔ jehovah hwexonu tɔn lɛ vo kan nu ɖokpo ɔ byɔ bɔ e dohwɛ a e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ tawun
etɛ sixu mi hwenu ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ kpannukɔn mi e
etɛ sixu mi hwenu ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn mɔhun lɛ wa kpannukɔn mi e
ahwanvu jaki nyi nɔvi jezu tɔn e ɔ mawu mɛ bɔ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ hun ɖo suulu nu aklunɔ wa ja
nugbo ɔ mi bi ɖo hudo suulu tɔn
etɛ lɛ jijɔ mawu tɔn enɛ ɖiɖo byɔ
etɛ lɛ suuluɖiɖo byɔ
ahwanvu jaki suuluɖiɖo sin akpaxwe lɛ ɖokpo gbɔn
ɖiɖe ɖo e
sɔgbe kpo biblu kpo ɔ gbigbɔ nɔ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi suulu alɔdo mawu tɔn mɛvo ɔ lɛ sixu ɖo suulu ɖo ba mɛ e jɛxa do e a
suuluɖiɖo nɔ ɖɔ mi yi wan nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
suuluɖiɖo nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo jijɔ klisanwun tɔn taji ɖevo lɛ
suuluɖiɖo sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi mɔ cobo su do tɛnmɛ a do a gbi dɔn enyi nu ɖebu wa kpannukɔn mi ɔ nɛ
ɔ biblu byɔ mi ɖɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi gbe ba nɔte
jaki enɛ ji xa
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi gbe ba nɔte jehovah bonu e wa nu
glesi ɖe nɔ syɛnsyɛn nɔ do jinukun tɔn e ɖo acɛ do ji kpo hwesivɔ kpo alo do jinukun lɛ su gbɔn e ji a
e sixu hwenu lɛ a
e nɔ yi gbe ɖɔ emi ɖo ɖo suulu nɔte bɔ ayikungban jinukun ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ
glesi ɔ ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo ɖo suulu nɔte
etɛ gbeyiɖɔ micee tɔn sixu mi

xa micee
