enɛ wu ɔ etɛ e sixu wa
mawu se ɖɛ
micee micee ɖɔhun ɔ mi lɔ ɖo nɔte
etɛwu e byɔ nu ɖo mi si hugan ninɔ jehovah bonu e ɖe akpa tɔn lɛ
enyi mi ɖi nu gbeyiɖɔ micee ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔte jehovah
ninɔmɛ mitɔn ci ɖo ganxo ɖo hwenu e hu do e tɔn ɖɔhun a
e hɛn ɛ gannugannu bɔ e ɖo e ɖo nukun ɖo jijɛ wɛ a
ninɔmɛ midɛɛ lɛ tɔn gbɔn vo tawun
mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba nɔte jehovah ɖo mi tuun ɖɔ e ɖe akpa e do ɖɔ emi mavɔmavɔ mi do hwetɔnnu e
etɛ mi ɖo flin hwenu mi ɖo tamɛ do sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo hwexonu tɔn lɛ tɔn ji wɛ e
enyi mi flin sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo hwexonu tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo suulu nɔte jehovah bonu e ɖe akpa tɔn lɛ e ɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hugan nɔte
ablaxamu nɔte nu xwe gege cobɔ e ji vivu tɔn esawu kpo jakɔbu kpo akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
taan nabi ablaxamu kpo sala kpo ɖo nɔte jehovah xɔ
ɖo mɛ ɖi nu ɖo sɔxwixwe alo suulu nɔ mɔ nu sin akpa mawu do ɔ yi ɖo enɛ wu lɛ e mɛ
etɛwu ablaxamu ɖo ɖɔ emi ɖo suulu
e ɖɔ kpowun ɔ akpa e do e ɖiɖe byɔ hwenu
akɔ jehovah jɛ xa ablaxamu e ɖo azan nisaan tɔn gbe
hwenɛnu wɛ sala kpo e kpo nu xwedo yetɔn eflati ɔ yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji
ablaxamu ɖo nɔte nu xwe cobɔ e ji vi sunnu tɔn izaki ɖo ɖo nɔte nu xwe ɖevo cobɔ e ji vivu tɔn esawu kpo jakɔbu kpo ɖo ebl
ee ablaxamu eflati ɔ ɖo xwe gudo e wɛ e wa blo tuto nu kunkan tɔn bɔ e nyi akɔta ɖe ɖu gu ayikungban ɔ tɔn tin
ablaxamu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔte ɖo suulu tɔn jinjɔn nuɖiɖi e ɖo nu jehovah e ji xa eblee lɛ
ablaxamu hun xomɛ do nɔte e mɔ nu mawu ɖe akpa e do lɛ e bi ɖo gbɛhwenu tɔn a cobo wa
do nukun mɛ awajijɛ e ɖo hwenu e ɛ sin ku wa ɖo palaɖisi mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji e e
e kpaca ɛ hwenu e mɔ azɔn nabi biblu ɖɔ e kpo kunkan tɔn tɔn kpo sin xo e
hwenu e mɔ nu jɛ taji e wa bɔ linlin jehovah tɔn kunkpla kunkan sin akpa e do e do jɛnu e wu azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e ɔ do nukun e vivi e mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e mɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ e xɔ akwɛ
etɛwu jozɛfu ɖo ɖo suulu
ablaxamu sin vivuvivu nɔ nyi jozɛfu e lɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo suulu
e wa nu agɔ baɖabaɖa ɖe lɛ xa ɛ
nukɔntɔn ɔ nɔvi tɔn lɛ sa ɛ do kannumɔgbenu hwenu e ɖo xwe e
ðo nujlɔjlɔwiwa tɔn wutu ɔ do wɛ e ɖo do loɔ to wɛ e dɔn
xwe gudo ɔ nu lɛ bi ɖyɔ ajijimɛ
nuagɔwaxamɛ ɔ ɖo nu jozɛfu wɛ a
nu e ɖi nu jehovah e wɛ e mɔ alɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo nu jɛ lɛ e mɛ
ðo ayi enɛ ɖo nu e ɖɔ nu nɔvi tɔn lɛ e mɛ gbɔn e wu ɖi xɛsi o ɖo sixu nyɛɖee ɖo mawu tɛn mɛ a
nu nyanya wɛ wa do wutu mawu ze do huzu nu ɖagbe bonu nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ egbe ɔ do sixu jɛ bonu mɛ gege gan
bib gudo mɛ ɔ jozɛfu wa mɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ e xɔ akwɛ
etɛ nyi nu nukunɖeji ɖo suuluɖiɖo davidi tɔn mɛ
etɛ davidi bɔ e ɖo suulu nɔte
axɔsu davidi lɔ ɔ e wa nu agɔ gege xa ɛ
hwenu davidi kpo ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ jehovah do ɖe e bonu e nyi axɔsu sɔgudo tɔn izlayɛli tɔn e wa nɔte nu xwe cobo wa nyi axɔsu nu akɔta mɛ eɖesunɔ jɔ ɖe e
ðo xwe enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ vlamɛ ɔ axɔsu sawulu nya gbe davidi tɔn hu
davidi gbɔ hɔn jɛ gbe e nɔ to ɖevo mɛ ɖo hweɖenu bɔ hwe ɖevo lɛ ɔ e nɔ so xo lɛ mɛ ɖo gbetotlo mɛ
etɛwu davidi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo suulu nɔte
e xosin ɔ mi ɖo ɖɛhan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ e kanbyɔ azɔn ɛnɛ ɖe ɖɔ hwetɛnu
davidi ɖeji do jehovah tɔn wu
e ɖo nukun hwlɛngan kpo awajijɛ kpo tamɛ do jehovah ɛ gbɔn lɛ e ji
nugbo ɔ davidi mɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ jehovah e xɔ akwɛ
nu nu kan suuluɖiɖo e ɔ jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi wa nu eɖesunɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa a e a
jehovah mawu kpo jezu klisu kpo ze ɖagbe ɔ nu nu ɖu e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba nɔte e gbɔn
e ze ɖagbe hugan ɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba nɔte
xa
jehovah xwe sɔ ɖo sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie bonu xo taji wa atɛ ji ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn mɛ e ɔ e sixu ɖeɖɛ bonu xo bi fo
e ɖo jlo alo ɖo suulu ɖo nwt ɖo nukun ɖo hwenu e blo bɔ nyikɔ tɔn nyi nu bi e wɛ
enɛ kɔ do nyɔna ɖeɖee e sixu do nukun mɛ a lɛ e mɛ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nukun ɖo e wɛ lɛ bi eza
ɖokpo ɔ jezu lɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔte
e din gbɔn mɛtɛnkpɔn gbejininɔ tɔn ɖo ayikungban ji fi e mɛ xwle vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn tɔn xɔ akwɛ gbɔn e mawu ɖo tɔn co e ɖo nɔte jɛ cobo jɛ axɔsu ɖu ji
e byɔ ɖo asi tɔn ɖɔ e nɔte tawun mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ ninɔ enɛ xɔ akwɛ
etɛ mi bɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo suulu ba nɔte
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba ɖo ɖo suulu
etɛ mi bɔ mi wa
byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e bonu ɖo suulu dɛ
ayi ɖo yeɖesunɔ kpo vivo mimɔ yeɖesunɔ tɔn kpo ji kpowun a
enyi mi ɖo tamɛ do nu lɛ wa yi gbɔn nu e ji wɛ ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi lɔ bɔ mi nɔ nɔte
etɛ ji mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo ku do
mi tlɛ mɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ ɔ mi nɔ kanɖeji ba nɔte
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu suxo ɖɔ aklunɔ hwetɛnu e fo do
kpo hlɔnhlɔn gbigbɔ mawu tɔn nɔ mɛ ɔ kpo ɔ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kanɖeji xo jelemii ɖɔ e ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi mima enɛ wɛ bɔ fa xomɛ do nɔte ɛ gbɛ nwt
wemata tɔn mɛ wɛ e wlan ablaxamu tɔn do
ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee wlan akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e ɖɔ xo do ablaxamu wu azɔn jɛji
ee sawulu ɖu axɔsu nu xwe we gudo e ɔ jehovah ɛ cobo bɔ e ɖu axɔsu nu xwe jɛji jɛ ku tɔn hwenu mɛ
fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi ɔ blo ayixa mitɔn ɖo fili
nu tɛ lɛ nu jɛ do pɔlu ji ɖo filipu e sixu mi
tɛ lɛ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ jehovah sixu wa nu e ɖo nukun a e
mi sixu ɖeji bi ɖɔ fifa mawu tɔn kun bu o gbɔn
etɛ lɛ wɛ jɛ ɖo filipu bɔ pɔlu kpo silasi kpo do yi ganmɛ
zan xwete wɛ
e do fi sɛyi do tawun ɖo gankpa ɔ mɛ e
nu lɛ jɛ bleble gbɔn e
e ɖebu nu a bɔ ahwan ɖe wa dɔn yi tokpletɛn ɖo e yawu kple lɛ e nukɔn
nuagɔwaxamɛ tɛ nɛ
e nu do mɛ ɖo filipu lɛ e ji
tlɛ ɖo jwifu lɛ tɔn ɖokpo ɖo toxo yetɔn mɛ a toxo ɖevo mɛ pɔlu yi lɛ e gege ɖo
enɛ wu ɔ mawu jwifu ɖo finɛ lɛ e gbɔ nɔ kple ɖo toxo ɔ gudo ɖo ɖe to
mɛ jwifu sunnu wo sin hudo wɛ e ɖo cobo ɖo ɖokpo ayi e mɔ jwifu sunnu wo ɖo finɛ a wɛ bɔ nu do nyi a
enɛ wɛ vlafo bɔ ɖɔ jwifu enɛ lɛ pɔlu kpo silasi kpo kun sixu nyi tovi hlɔma tɔn lɛ o a
e nyi ɖebu wɛ e nyi gbɔn ɔ e do ganmɛ ji
etɛwu ganmɛ e pɔlu do e kpaca ɛ
e wa nu gbɔn
hwenu pɔlu ɖo e ɔ gbigbɔ nu ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖɔ e jla wɛn ɔ ɖo xa ɖe lɛ mɛ o
fitɛ
ðo pɔlu mɔ nu jɛ jlo jehovah tɔn mɛ ceɖeceɖe wutu ɔ e yi gbe nu e ylɔ ɛ e yawu yi
ee e wa masedwani nɔ zaan e ɔ ganmɛ wɛ e wa mɔ eɖee ɖe
etɛwu jehovah lɔn bɔ nu mɔhun xa pɔlu
taan nabi e nɔ ganmɛ xɔ
nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ ɖo nu pɔlu tawun co e jo do nu nu nuɖiɖi tɔn kpo awajijɛ tɔn kpo a
e kpo silasi kpo ɖo ɖɛ xo wɛ ɖo ji mla mawu wɛ
ninɔmɛ mitɔn sixu ci pɔlu tɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn
ninɔmɛ pɔlu tɔn huzu ɖo e ɖo nukun tɔn gbɔn e a gbɛn
hweɖenu ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ ɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ɖo ali wɛ e pɔlu gbɔn e bɔ ɖo xwixwedo wɛ nu lɛ wa yi ɖo gbɔn e a
sixu wa mɔ tɛnkpɔn lɛ le tlɔlɔ alo mɔ hwiɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe mɛ bɔ e byɔ ɖɔ blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo lɛ ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ
nut nwt ee nyi kɔ gudo e ɔ vlafo jɛ kinkanbyɔ hwiɖee ji ɖɔ etɛwu jehovah lɔn bɔ nu mɔhun lɛ jɛ e ji
enyi ɔ etɛ sixu bɔ ɖo jiɖiɖe bi do jehovah wu kpo ɖo didɛ wɛ
do mɔ xosin ɔ ɔ nu mi lɛkɔ yi pɔlu kpo silasi kpo tɔn ji
ee pɔlu kpo silasi kpo ɖo ji wɛ e ɔ numaɖonukun ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖe lɛ jɛ
ayikungban danwu syɛnsyɛn ajijimɛ
gankpa ɔ sin hɔn lɛ hun nu yeɖee gbaa
gɛdɛ e do lɛ e bi nyi ayi
pɔlu ɖo ɔ bonu e hu eɖee o
ɔ kpo xwedo tɔn bi kpo blo baptɛm
ee lɛ wu ɖɔ pɔlu kpo silasi kpo nyi tovi hlɔma tɔn bɔ emi wa nu agɔ xa e ɔ yeɖesunɔ kpla mɛ we lɛ
pɔlu kpo silasi kpo ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo to do e nu lidii blo baptɛm e
nu lɛ bi huzu gbɔn hazawun e
etɛ ji wɛ mi ɖɔ xo do do ɖo
etɛ nu jɛ lɛ e sixu mi
jehovah sixu wa numaɖonukun lɛ enɛ wɛ bɔ mi ɖo ɖo adohu adohu ji hwenu mi ɖo tɛnkpɔn mɛ e a
nukplɔnmɛ enɛ jiwu nu pɔlu tawun e ɖe enɛ ɖo nukɔnmɛ hwenu e wlan wema nɔvi ɖo filipu lɛ e do adohu adohu kpo fifa mawu tɔn kpo wu e
nu mi ɖɔ xo do xogbe pɔlu tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo filipunu lɛ mɛ e ji
xa enɛ gudo ɔ mi gbɔn ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ jehovah nɔ wa numaɖonukun lɛ gbɔn e ɖevo lɛ ji
gbɔn gudo bi ɔ mi gbeje fifa mawu tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo jiɖiɖe bi ɖo jehovah mɛ dɛ gbɔn e
nukplɔnmɛ tɛ ji pɔlu ɖo nukɔnmɛ hwenu e wlan wema nɔvi ɖo filipu lɛ e
etɛ xo tɔn lɛ sixu mi
etɛ wɛ pɔlu ɖe
ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi
etɛ nyi tinmɛ enɛ tɔn
ɖe lɛ lilɛ xogbe enɛ lɛ do hugan mitɔn lɛ bi alo fɔn tuto tɔn lɛ bi
enɛ wu ɔ pɔlu ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ fifa mawu tɔn jiwu tawun hu e sixu gbɔn e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ ɖo linlin tɔn mɛ ɔ mi sixu mɔ ali ɖe sin tagba mitɔn lɛ mɛ a jehovah nɔ ɖe ali nu mi sixu wa nu mi ɖo nukun tɔn a e xa
pɔlu se nuagɔwaxamɛ tɔn ɖo filipu co nu ɖagbe tɛ lɛ mɛ nu jɛ lɛ e kɔ do
etɛwu nɔvi ɖo filipu lɛ e sixu xo pɔlu ɖɔ lɛ e do ylɔ ɖɔ nu
ee nɔvi ɖo filipu lɛ e ɖo tamɛ do nu jehovah wa nu ɖo xwe wo wa yi lɛ e sin avla mɛ e ji wɛ e ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu tawun
toxo ɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ nɔ nu azɔn we din cobo nɔ wa nu ɖebu do agun klisanwun tɔn e ɖo ayi ɖo toxo yetɔn mɛ e wu
e sixu sin pɔlu wa nu gbɔn e wu bɔ tɔn luki nyi dotoo ɖe e kpewu ci filipu hwenu pɔlu kpo silasi kpo ɖido gudo e
mɛ ɔ luki kpewu gege klisanwun ɖo toxo enɛ mɛ lɛ e tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hwenu nɔvi ɖo filipu lɛ e xa wema mɛ pɔlu tɔn e ɔ tuun ɖɔ xo enɛ lɛ kun nyi akɔwe junjɔn ayi ɖo fi ɖe ɖo ɖe wlan nu kpowun e ɖe sin xo o
pɔlu se syɛnsyɛn e ɖɔ emi ɖo fifa mawu tɔn
nugbo ɔ hwenu e wlan wema nɔvi enɛ lɛ e ɔ ganmɛ wɛ e ɖe ɖo hlɔma
e kpo ɖo wɛ ɖɔ fifa mawu tɔn ɖo emi ji fili
etɛ sixu mi bɔ hu mi do nu ɖebu wu a bɔ mi mɔ fifa mawu tɔn
xo pɔlu ɖɔ filipunu lɛ e mi ɖɔ nu sixu gbɔ adohu adohu mitɔn lɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɛ
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu mi ɖo adohu adohu ji e ɔ mi ɖo ɖɔ mitɔn lɛ do ɖɛ mɛ xa
xoɖɛ jehovah ɖi nu bi ɖɔ e kpe nukun do wu
xoɖɛ e kpo kudonumɛ sin ayixa kpo flin nyɔna e kɔn do ji lɛ e
jiɖe mi ɖo do wu tɔn e syɛn hwenu mi hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ e sixu wa nu nu mi hu nu mi byɔ ɛ ɔ abi ee wɛ mi tlɛ ɖe ɔ efɛ
e nyi gbɔn nu pɔlu kpo silasi kpo ɖo filipu e ɔ nu jehovah nɔ wa nu miɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ e sixu kpaca mi
e sixu nɔ nyi nu jiwu e e nyi nu sin hudo mi ɖo e tɛgbɛ kɔ
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ e kun nyi ɖiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ mi junjɔn ayi gɔn nuɖe wa ɖo jehovah kpowun bonu e jla ninɔmɛ ɔ ɖo alo ɖeɖɛ tagba ɔ o
mi ɖo wa nu sɔgbe kpo ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo
ɖo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖo mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ jehovah kun nɔ nɔte ɖo nubyɔbyɔ mitɔn lɛ tuto mitɔn lɛ kpo nu ɖo nukun wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e kpo ji o
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ wa numaɖonukun lɛ nɔ kpaca mi
nu mi gbeje biblu tɔn ɖeɖee mi bɔ jiɖe mi ɖo ɖɔ jehovah kpe nu wu wa numaɖonukun lɛ nu mi e syɛn e ɖe lɛ
etɛ axɔsu ezekiyasi wa hwenu asilii xɔsu senakelibu van nukun e
etɛ jehovah ɖeɖɛ tagba ɔ gbɔn e mi
enɛ gudo ɔ senakelibu ayi tɔn ɖo jeluzalɛmu ji
etɛ axɔsu ezekiyasi wa hwenu nukunvandomɛ enɛ sɛkpɔ bi e
e xoɖɛ jehovah weɖexamɛ ɖo gbeyiɖɔ mawu tɔn ezayii
jehovah ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ ɔ gbɔn
e wɛnsagun ɖokpo do bɔ e su kun do nu senakelibu tɔn ɖo zan ɖokpo mɛ
nugbo ɔ ezekiyasi tlɛ ɖo nukun ɖɔ nu mɔhun jɛ a axɔ
etɛ nu jɛ do jozɛfu wu e sixu mi bib akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ nu jɛ do jozɛfu wu e sixu mi
numaɖonukun ɖe jɛ ɖo ablaxamu sin asi sala sin gbɛzan mɛ gbɔn
mi ɖɔ xo do nya dɔnkpɛvu nɔ nyi jozɛfu nyi jakɔbu vi e wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu jehovah wa lɛ e zɛ nu jozɛfu ɖo nukun lɛ e bi wu
mi nu do nɔgbo jozɛfu tɔn sala wu
sala kpo e ɖo nukun ɖɔ jehovah blo bɔ emi ji vi emiɖesunɔ tɔn bɔ e nyi vi tɔn ji e wɛ e do ɖo vi a a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ izaki sala ji e zɛ nu e sixu ɖo nukun lɛ e wu flafla tɔn bib
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ mi kun nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ jehovah wa nujiwu ɖe tagba mitɔn lɛ bi siin jɛ nukɔn nu sin akpa e do e o jɛn mi nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e wa nujiwu ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ a e nɛ
mi tuun ɖɔ mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo ali jiwu lɛ e e wɛ nyi mawu mitɔn jehovah
xa ezayii
jiɖe enɛ mi ɖo e nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi
mi tuun ɖɔ e sixu wa nu ɖebu e byɔ e do hlɔnhlɔn mi bonu mi wa jlo tɔn bi
ezekiyasi jozɛfu kpo sala kpo tɔn gbɔn e ɔ jehovah sixu mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛn hugan bi lɛ e ji nu mi nɔ gbeji ɔ nɛ
jehovah sixu mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛn hugan bi lɛ e ji nu mi nɔ gbeji ɔ nɛ
etɛ sixu mi bɔ fifa mawu tɔn bu a
mi sixu ɖo tagba lɛ mɔ wɛ cobɔ fifa mawu tɔn bu a gbɔn
kancica ɖagbe ɖe ɖiɖo xa jehovah mawu mitɔn wɛ bɔ nu nyi
klisu jezu tɔn jo do xɔ nu mi e kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu nyi tɔn bɔ kancica mɔhun blo
gbɛxixɔ ɔ ɖesu nyi ɖokpo ɖo nujiwu mitɔn blo nu mi lɛ e mɛ
enyi mi ɖo fifa mawu tɔn ɔ etɛ mɛ e nɔ kɔ do
enyi mi ɖo fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi e ɔ etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
xogbe e zan ɖo gbe dodo ɔ mɛ nu e ɔ xogbe ahwan tɔn ɖe wɛ
e nɔ do gesi ɖeɖee e ɖe bɔ nɔ toxo syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɖo hwexonu lɛ e
filipu nyi toxo mɔhun ɖe
filipunu lɛ nɔ yi kan mɛ ɖo zanmɛ ɖo tuun ɖɔ sɔja lɛ ɖo hɔntogbo toxo emitɔn lɛ tɔn wɛ wutu
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ enyi mi ɖo fifa mawu tɔn ɔ ayi mitɔn kpo linlin mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔ vo
enɛ tuuntuun nɔ mi bɔ adohu adohu alo awakanmɛ ku mɛ nɔ gba hun do nu mi a
etɛ mi bɔ mi kpannukɔn sɔgudo kpo jiɖiɖe kpo
mi tuun e nyi gbɔn nu mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo e a
e byɔ ɖɔ adohu adohu gba hun do nu mi a
mi tuun nu jehovah wa e bi a mi tuun mawu mitɔn
nu e wa wa yi ɖo hwexonu lɛ e ɖɔ nu ɖebu ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɔ e blo bɔ linlin tɔn jɛnu hwebinu bɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ wa gbɔn numaɖonukun ɖe wiwa gblamɛ
taan ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ jehovah nɔ wa nu mi mi sixu mɔ fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi ɔ ɖo ali ɖe
mɛ tɔn wɛ e pavel sivulsky
kgb sin gan lɛ ɖokpo suxo ɖɔ ɖe wɛ nu
jo asi towe ɖo xo e kpo nyɔnuvi towe kpo do
nuɖuɖu kpe nukun do wu
towe lɛ ba yi xwe ɖɔ eo jo xwedo do a
gan ɔ ɖɔ nu baɖabaɖa dosin ɖe hugan ɖɔ e nyi ɖe a
gankpa toxo irkutsk tɔn ɖe mɛ wɛ mi ɖɔ xo enɛ ɖe ɖo ɖo russie
e ji mi ɖo gletoxo zolotniki tɔn mɛ ɖo ukraine ɖo
ðo ɔ nafi kpo asu tɔn kpo wɛ nu gosin france wa mi wema gouvernement kpo delivrance kpo ee lɛ e mi
ee xa wema enɛ lɛ e ɔ nuɖiɖi e ɖo nu mawu e wa
e blawu ɖɔ ɖo ɔ e azɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe cobonu e ku ɔ e ɖɔ nu nɔ ɖɔ nugbo ɔ ɖie
vi lɛ
ðo avril ɔ gan lɛ jɛ lɛ sin gbadahweji sovietique tɔn ji yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo siberie
e nyi kpo nɔ kpo nu nɔvi sunnu kpɛvi grigory yi gbadahweji ukraine tɔn
ee mi zɔn pipaan mɛ blo kilomɛtlu gudo e ɔ mi wa toxo touloun tɔn mɛ ɖo siberie
aklunɔzan gblamɛ we gudo ɔ fofo bogdan wa yadonumɛkpa sɛkpɔ toxo angarsk tɔn e mɛ
e ɖo hwɛ syɛnsyɛn nu xwe
nyi kpo nɔ kpo nu grigory nɔ ɖɔ mawuxo ɖo xa do touloun lɛ e mɛ nɔ ɖo ayi tawun
ði ɔ mi nɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe ɖo fi jlo sa nyibu a
enyi mi mɔ mɛɖe bonu e jlo sa nyibu ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ xo nu mɛ enɛ do e da nyibu bɔ e jiwu gbɔn e ji
bɔ zaanɖe kpowun ɔ mi nɔ jɛ xo ɖɔ do ɔ wu ji
ðo hwe ɔ ɔ xojlawema ɖe wlan nu do lɛ wu ɖɔ nɔ kan nyibu byɔ loɔ lɛ wɛ ɖe
bɔ mi nɔ mɔ mɛ ci ɖɔhun lɛ e nugbo
e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ mi biblu xa nɔ yeɖee hwe nɔ yi mɛ lɛ e ɖo fi enɛ e ɖe nu mɛɖe a e e
egbe ɔ agun ɖokpo ɖo touloun ɖo jɛji
asi nugbo ɔ ɖo ukraine ɖo wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ tɛntin
hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɔ gan kgb tɔn ɖokpo jɛ jɔngwin jɔngwin do ji do gan ɖoxo xa ɛ e bi
gbe ɖokpo ɔ e lɛkɔ yi xwegbe mɔ dawe ɔ ɖo ayimimlɔ ɖo zan tɔn ji
hɔn
xomɛsin gan ɔ bɔ e adan ɖɔ e su do ganmɛ ɖo e nyi wutu bɔ nugbo ɔ ɖo ɔ e ɖo hwɛ ɖɔ e nu xwe wo
nu ci e ci nu jozɛfu e su do ganmɛ ɖo gbejininɔ tɔn wutu e ɖɔhun
mɛ gege nɔ yi gankpa mɛ nɔ bɔ nuɖe nɔ fɛn sisi mɛɖesunɔ tɔn yetɔn a
xo enɛ lɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ
sin jɛ ɔ e do yadonumɛkpa ɖe mɛ sɛkpɔ toxo gorkiy tɔn ee nɔ nyi nijni novgorod din e ɖo russie bonu e syɛnsyɛn
e ɖegbe ɖɔ e nɔ ɖɔ nu atin lɛ enyi gbɛmɛ tlɛ fa tawun ɔ nɛ
e se ɖo lanmɛ tawun ɖo ɔ e ɖe e nyite bɔ e touloun
hwenu nɔvi ɖo touloun lɛ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe jawe e ɔ kɛkɛ afɔdokwin kun hɛn yi hundotɛn ɔ yi kpe nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ ba ɛ nu e agban tɔn lɛ
tlolo mɔ e jɛn jɛ wan yi ji
do gan nu nu jɛ etɔn ji bɔ e kpa mi nugbo
ðo ɔ e wli mi ɖo zin wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ wu
nɔ gankpa ɖe mɛ nyiɖokpo nu
do ɖo fifa ayi mɛ tɔn ɖo taan enɛ mɛ ɔ nɔ xoɖɛ hwɛhwɛ nɔ jihan axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ do nukun jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn hwenu e ɖe mi nyite e mɛ
hwenu ɖo yadonumɛkpa mɛ ɖo e
ðo nukanbyɔmɛ ɖe hwenu ɖo gankpa ɔ mɛ ɔ ɔ ɖɔ zaanɖe din ɔ mi gbidi e nɔ ajaka xo do e ɖɔhun
ɖɔ ɖɔ jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ e jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn nu akɔta lɛ bi mɛɖebu sixu ɖo a
hwenu lɛ kpo ayi gɛdɛ lɛ kpo a e ɔ e ɖo hwɛ nu mi ɖɔ syɛnsyɛn nu xwe tɛnwe ɖo yadonumɛkpa ɖo toxo saransk tɔn kpa e ɖe mɛ
ee ɖo ali ji xwe yadonumɛkpa ɔ mɛ e ɔ se ɖɔ e ji olga vi nyɔnu mitɔn wegɔ ɔ
asi kpo vi nyɔnu we lɛ kpo ɖo zɔ nu mi co tuun tuun ɖɔ kpo nyi kpo ɖo gbeji nu jehovah e do gbɔ nu mi
nu vi nyɔnu mitɔn olga kpo irina kpo ɖo
ðokpo ɖo xwe ɖokpo mɛ ɔ nɔ do hun nɔ wa mi ɖo saransk nu e do pipaan ɔ touloun gigosin kpo kɔlilɛ yi kpo nɔ ɖu azan co e nɔ wa
xwe ɖokpo mɛ tɛgbɛ ɔ e nɔ hɛn afɔkpa nɔ nyi botte e ɖokpo wa nu mi
e nɔ fɔ atɔxwɛ yaɖeyaɖe hwla do afɔkpa lɛ mɛ
e wa su xwe ɖokpo mɛ bɔ tɔn gbɔn vo nu ɖe lɛ ɖo e kpla vi nyɔnu mitɔn we lɛ wa
do nukun mɛ nu ci nu mi hwenu mɔ ɖo xa e
ðo ɔ e ɖe mi sin yadonumɛkpa ɔ mɛ bɔ mi mɛ ɛnɛ lɛ yi toxo armavir tɔn sɛkpɔ xu wiwi ɔ e mɛ
ðo finɛ wɛ e ji vi sunnu mitɔn yaroslav kpo pavel kpo ɖe
e lin a bɔ kgb tɔn lɛ jɛ xwe mitɔn kije ji ɖɔ emi mɔ wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ ɖe a ji
nɔ gbɔn fi bi tlɛ nɔ nyibu lɛ sin nuɖuɖu mɛ lɔ
ðo hwe enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɔ lɛ ɖo jɛ wɛ ɖo yozo wutu bɔ afuntuntun kpe awu yetɔn lɛ wu bi
e nu ɖɔ nu ci nu ɖo ɖo tonu se nu nu e byɔ e wɛ kpowun wutu
e atin sin sin kpɛɖe hɛn nu afuntuntun e sin kpo wusunsunnu kpo wa nu
nukɔnmɛ hwenu gan kgb tɔn ɔ wa e ɔ lɛ ɖɔ e xomɛ do wu gbɔn e
hwenu xweyigbe e ɔ gan ɔ nu blo alɔ nu mi
e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ mi mɔ ɖagbe nɔ sin gandido wa nu ɖagbe do ɖu ɖo nyanya ji mɛ e hlɔ
yadonumɛ lɛ ɖo ayi co mi kpo ɖo wɛn ɔ jla wɛ ɖo armavir
mi bɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu kpɛvi lɛ tɔn sɛkpɔ toxo kurganinsk tɔn e
tuun tuun ɖɔ agun ɖo armavir egbe din bɔ ɛnɛ ɖo kurganinsk e mi awajijɛ tawun
ðo xwe lɛ gblamɛ ɔ e nɔ wa jɛ hweɖelɛnu bɔ awakanmɛ nɔ ku mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ jehovah nɔ zan nɔvi lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖe mi ɖo ali ji nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ðɛh mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ e nyi hwenu mi jehovah ɖo xa kgb tɔn ɖeɖee byɔ agun ɔ mɛ bɔ mi ɖo ayi wu a lɛ e e
ci mɛ nɔ ɖokan do nu wu nɔ tawun ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun
mɛɖe lɛ tlɛ ɖo mɛ wa nyi agbanɖotananɔ ɖo tutoblonunu ɔ mɛ
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ mi wa mɔ nu jɛ mɛ alɔkpa nyi tawun e wu
ðo hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ e mɔ xo ɖevo
ðo e ɖo hunzɔn gbigbɔ e ɖe jɛ wɛ wutu ɔ dotoo ɔ ɖɔ e ku a blo bonu e ɖe xo ɔ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ dotoo gege xwedo e gbɔn dotooxwe ɔ kpo ɖe kpo ɖo alɔnu do gan do ɔ bonu e ji vi ɔ cobɔ tɔn kpe
bonu do cyɔn alɔ xo ɔ ji ɔ e hɔn sin dotooxwe ɔ
mɛ ɖo kgb mɛ lɛ e ɖegbe ɖɔ mi sin toxo ɔ mɛ mi tɛn yi gletoxo sɛkpɔ toxo tallinn tɔn e ɖe mɛ ɖo estonie akpaxwe sovietique tɔn ɖe wɛ finɛ nyi
ðo tallinn ɔ nu dotoo ɔ ɖɔ e wa jɛ a bɔ ji vi sunnu ɖokpo bɔ lanmɛ tɔn ɖo ganji nɔ nyi vitaly
nukɔnmɛ ɔ mi tɛn sin estonie yi nezlobnaya sin xa ɔ mɛ ɖo tofɔligbe russie tɔn
ayi mitɔn nɔ ɖo bɔ mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ ɖo toxo do mi lɛ e mɛ ɖo mɛ lɛ nɔ gosin to ɔ bi mɛ nɔ wa xa enɛ lɛ mɛ
azɔn wɛ nɔ hɛn wa finɛ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ lɛkɔ yi kpo nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn kpo
hwɛhwɛ wɛ mi nɔ ylɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖeɖee sin sixu vi mitɔn lɛ e wa xwegbe
nɔvi sunnu grigory ee wa sin sin yi e nɔ wa mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
xwedo ɔ bi nɔ ɖu vivi jonɔ e nɔ mi e tɔn ɖo e nɔ do awajijɛ nu mɛ nɔ ɖɔ fanfun
enyi jonɔ mi ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ mi nɔ ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e do enɛ bɔ wan vi mitɔn lɛ yi nu biblu tɔn lɛ e jɛji
vi sunnu lɛ kpo asi yetɔn lɛ kpo
sin amyɔxwe wa yi aɖisixwe sin gudo yaroslav pavel jr vitaly
sin nukɔn alyona svetlana
ðo ɔ vi sunnu mitɔn yaroslav tɛn yi toxo riga tɔn mɛ ɖo latvia finɛ ɔ e kpe nu wu ɖɔ mawuxo
hwenu e ɖɔ emi kun wa o e ɔ e ɖo hwɛ ɖɔ e nu xwe ɖokpo adaɖe bɔ e ɖo gankpa vovo tɛnnɛ mɛ
xo ɖɔ do nu jɛ do wutu ɖo gankpa mɛ e wu e ɛ bɔ e dɛ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e gbexosin
ðo ɔ vi sunnu mitɔn pavel ɖo xwe e jlo wa gbexosin sin ɖo sakhalin tɔtɛntinto ɖo totaligbe japon tɔn e mɛ
tlolo ɔ mi ɖɔ e yi a
kpowun wɛ ɖo tɔtɛntinto enɛ ɔ bi mɛ bɔ fi mi nɔ nɔ e ɖo kilomɛtlu do tɔtɛntinto ɔ
gudo mɛ ɔ mi yi gbe wa mɔ ɖɔ gbeta ɖagbe ɖe kɔn wɛ e wa
mɛ ɖo finɛ lɛ e nɔ yi wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn
ðo xwe yɔywɛ ɖe vlamɛ ɔ e ɖo agun tantɔn ayi ɖo finɛ
pavel wa ɖo sakhalin jɛ
hwe ɔ ɔ vi sunnu mitɔn kpɛvi bi vitaly kɛɖɛ wɛ kpo ɖo mitɔn
sin hwenu e ɖo vu e wɛ e yi wan nu biblu xixa
hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɔ e jɛ gbexosin wa ji bɔ nyi lɔ wa enɛ xa ɛ nu xwe we
hwenu vitaly ɖo xwe e ɔ e lɔ yi gbexosin titewungbe tɔn sin
ðo ɔ kgb tɔn ɖe ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nuɖiɖi towe alo nu xwe wo
enyi wa ɔ do mɛxo nɔ hwiɖokpo
nu wa gbɔn vo bi
mi mɔ wanyiyi mawu mitɔn jehovah tɔn vi mitɔn lɛ tɔn kpo mɛ gege ɖeɖee mi bɔ wa mɔ nugbo ɔ lɛ e tɔn kpo
ðo ɔ e tuun jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖo lixo
gbeta enɛ kɔn e wa e hlɔnhlɔn ɔ
agun mitɔn tlɛ xɔ ɖe bɔ mi nɔ do yi toxo do mi lɛ e kpo gletoxo lɛ kpo mɛ ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
nyi kpo asi kpo ɖo
e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ yaroslav kpo asi tɔn alyona kpo nu pavel kpo asi tɔn kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli bɔ vitaly kpo asi tɔn svetlana kpo ɖo wa wɛ
vi nyɔnu ɖaxo mitɔn irina kpo xwedo tɔn kpo ɖo allemagne
asu tɔn vladimir kpo vi sunnu yetɔn atɔn lɛ bi kpo wɛ nyi mɛxo agun tɔn
vi nyɔnu mitɔn olga nɔ nɔ estonie nɔ ylɔ mi hwɛhwɛ
e blawu ɖɔ asi ku ɖo
akpakpa ɖo mi wɛ bonu ma mɔ ɛ ɖo sin ku hwenu
din ɔ nɔ nɔ toxo belgorod tɔn mɛ bɔ nɔvi ɖo fi lɛ e nɔ mi tawun
xwe ɖeɖee zan ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ lɛ e mi ɖɔ gbejininɔ nɔ byɔ gandido tawun fifa ayi mɛ tɔn jehovah nɔ wa mɛ e xɔ akwɛ
nyɔna nyi kpo kpo mɔ ɖo gbejininɔ mɛ lɛ e zɛ nu mi sixu mɔ gbeɖe a lɛ e wu
cobonu sovietique ɖo ɔ jɛji kpowun wɛ tiin ɖo finɛ
ɖo egbe ɔ jɛji wɛ ɖo to ɖo sovietique mɛ lɛ e mɛ
xwe wɛ ɖo din kpo ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn nyi wɛ
alɔdo jehovah tɔn bɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn hwebinu dɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah mi bɔ e ðɛh
kgb ɔ nɔ cyɔn alɔ to sovietique tɔn ji e sin wɛ
ɖe xoxo nyi ɔ kpodo walɔ tɔn lɛ bi kpan nyi ayi
etɛ bɔ kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e kpe we a
mi sixu ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi do zɔ nu miɖee gbɔn
etɛ wu e ɖo ayi do jehovah tɔn lɛ wu
lɛ ɖɔ xo do jijɔ jiwu mɔ ɖo togun jehovah tɔn tɛntin e wu
ðo ɔ mɛ wɛ e do yadonumɛkpa ɔ mɛ
ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo co dɛ ɖo yadonumɛ syɛnsyɛn ɔ bɔ e tuun ɖi mɛ nɔ ci xwii ɖo lɛ e kpo mɛ nɔ gbeji nu mawu yetɔn nɔ bu e kpo
agaɖanu din ɔ afrique du tɔn lɛ mɔ jijɔ enɛ lɛ dɔn mɛ e ɖɔhun ɖo togun mawu tɔn tɛntin hweɖenu ɔ ɖo to enɛ mɛ ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn vovo lɛ e sixu kple ɖo ɖo ayijayi mɛ a
ɖo dimanche decembre ɔ e jiwu tawun ɖɔ e mɔ nɔvi ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn vovo ɖo afrique du lɛ e jɛji kpo nɔvi gosin to do e lɛ e kpo mɛ e bɔ kple ɖo anyumlimlisafɔtɛn klo hugan ɖo toxo johannesburg tɔn mɛ e ɖu vivi tuto gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe tɔn
bi sɔnu ganji
bɔ jla anyumlimlisafɔtɛn ɔ ɖo ganji
etɛ bɔ kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn kpe we a
etɛ bɔ mi gbɔn vo nu tutoblonunu ɖevo ɖebu
xo mawu tɔn kpo gbigbɔ tɔn kpo wɛ mi bɔ mi syɛnsyɛn ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi
bɔ mi ɔ do ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
etɛwu nu ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi nu ɖevo sese wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɛ do zɔ nu miɖee
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi gbeje mi sixu ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi gbɔn e kpo nu wu mi ɖo yawu wa e kpo ɔ mi mɔ nu wu mi sixu kpewu blo huzuhuzu lɛ e enyi mi tlɛ dove ɖo walɔ nyanya lɛ mɛ tawun ɔ nɛ
mi gbeje nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nugbo ɔ mɛ sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie lɛ e sixu blo xoxo ɔ do zɔ nu yeɖee e
etɛwu nuflinmɛ enɛ lɛ ɖo taji
enɛ wu ɔ mi mɛ bi ɖo xwedo akpagbanumɛ elɔ mɛ ɖɔ emi ɖo ɔ ɖo eɖee wa jɛ ayi o kɔ
ɖiɖe ɖo e sɔgbe kpo kolosinu lɛ kpo ɔ nuwalɔ tɛ lɛ nyi xoxo ɔ tɔn
nu awu do e kwiji tlɛ jɛ wan baɖabaɖa ɖe ji vlafo ɔ etɛ blo
yawu ɖe awu kwijikwiji enɛ
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi yawu setonu nu gbeɖiɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖe jijɔ sɔgbe xa mɛ mawu nyi e a lɛ e e
nu mi gbeje hwɛhuhu nuwiwa pɔlu lɛ e we wɛ nyi agalilɛ kpo nublibliwiwa kpo xa kolosinu lɛ
xogbe pɔlu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo do gan tawun cobo ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi gbɔn
alɔkpa tɛ sakura nɔ zan etɛ ɛ hlɔnhlɔn bɔ e jo gbɛzan enɛ do
xokwin dodo biblu zan bɔ e lilɛ do agalilɛ e ɔ alɔ wli ɖo lixo ɖoxo xa mɛɖee kpo sunnu ɖoxo xa sunnu alo nyɔnu ɖoxo xa nyɔnu kpo
pɔlu ɖɔ nu klisanwun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ su nu nyi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ lɛ sin kun do enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖe jlo nyanya alɔkpa lɛ bi siin ɖi agalilɛ
xogbe nutinmɛ tɔn pɔlu zan e ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e do gan tawun sunsun jlo nyanya mɔhun lɛ siin
e sixu ɖu ɖo ahwan xa jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn lɛ wɛ e ɖe e ji
mi gbeje nu jɛ do sakura nɔ nɔ japon e ji e
hwenu e ɖo wɛ e ɔ e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo emiɖokpo nyi nuvɔnɔ
sin hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɔ e yi gbe bɔ sunnu vovo lɛ jɛ xo ɖo xa ɛ ji bonu e mɔ tɛn do vo ɖo mɛɖokponɔ ninɔ si
e ɖɔ kpo winnya kpo ɖɔ nu mɛ e wa kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖe xo azɔn atɔn
e tinmɛ ɖɔ ðo ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo ayijayi mɛ hwenu nɔ ɖo wɛ e nɔ ɖɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo hudo yi wan nu mi
ɖo wɛ e ɔ wɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ kun ɖo ayijayi mɛ o sɔ
sakura zan gbɔn jɛ hwenu e ɖo xwe e
enɛ gudo ɔ e jɛ biblu xa lɛ ji
sakura yi wan nu nu wɛ e ɖe e bɔ jehovah ɛ bɔ e ɖu ɖo hwɛ do eɖee wɛ e nɔ ɖe e kpo winnya nɔ hu e kpo ji jo agalilɛ do
e wa ɔ e ɖɔ e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ ɖo vivi wanyiyi jehovah tɔn tɔn ɖu wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
xokwin dodo e lilɛ do nublibliwiwa e gblo ada nyi agalilɛ kɛɖɛ xo a
mɛ ɖo aca nɔ fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ e nɔ do glɔ nu jlo agbaza tɔn ee sixu bɔ huzu kannumɔ nu agalilɛ e
dobanunu ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee yi gbe ɖɔ emi nɔ ɖo jlo syɛnsyɛn fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ emi nyi kannumɔ mɛ yi wan nu ahan syɛnsyɛn kpo gee kpo lɛ e nɔ ɖɔ emi nyi kannumɔ nu nu enɛ lɛ gbɔn e ɖɔhun
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ kpinkpɔn nɔ kɔ do nu baɖabaɖa lehun lɛ mɛ winnya ɖaxo ganji ɖo mɛtɔn ji gbɛzan xwedo tɔn ɖo awajijɛ a e mɛɖee kpo mɛɖee huhu kpo
nya ɖokpo tiin bɔ ee e nyi kannumɔ nu fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ a bɔ e kpe xwe ɖokpo bɔ e ɖo awa tɔn jɛ wɛ e ɔ e wlan ɖɔ blo bɔ sisi mɛɖesunɔ tɔn bu e jɛ tɛn tɔn mɛ
nu mɛ gege ɔ kannumɔ nyi nu fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ nyi hun magbokɔ ɖe bɔ ɖo xixo wɛ
ribeiro ee nɔ nɔ bresil e tɔn gbɔn e ɔ sixu ɖu ɖo hun enɛ xo wɛ ɖe e ji
e ɖɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ huzu kannumɔ
e syɛn bɔ nɔ ɖɔ nyɔnu kpo nyi kpo ɖo e yawu gosin xwegbe bonu ma mɔ tɛn do nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ
ðo gbe ɖokpo ɔ ribeiro mɔ wema ɖe ɖo wema e xokple bloɖo lɛ e mɛ bɔ xota tɔn nɔ nyi asli ayaje whendo ton
e ze wema ɔ sin wema lɛ mɛ xa
nu e xa e ɛ bɔ e jɛ biblu xa jehovah tɔn lɛ ji e byɔ hwenu gege ɖo asi tɔn cobɔ e jo walɔ nyanya tɔn do
etɛ wa ɛ
e tinmɛ ɖɔ ðɛxixo biblu kplɔnkplɔn kpo tamɛ linlin do nu lɛ e ji kpo bɔ jijɔ mawu tɔn lɛ su nukun mɛ gbɔn e jɛji bɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu jehovah e wa syɛn hu jlo ɖo nu fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ e
hlɔnhlɔn xo mawu tɔn ɖo e kpo gbigbɔ tɔn kpo ribeiro bɔ e ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi blo baptɛm bɔ din ɔ e nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe
etɛ mɛɖe bɔ e jo fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn kpinkpɔn do
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ ribeiro wa nu hu biblu kpinkplɔn cobo kpewu ɖu ɖo hun xo wɛ e ɖe e ji
e zan hwenu tɛn wɛn biblu tɔn bɔ e byɔ ayi tɔn mɛ
gbɔn ɖɛxixo kpo tamɛ linlin kpo gblamɛ ɔ wanyiyi e ɖo nu mawu e wa hugan jlo e ɖo nu fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn e
ali ɖagbe hugan e sixu jo fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn kpinkpɔn do ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e sɔnu nu wanyiyi jɔ wanyiyi nu jehovah wan nu nu nyla e xa ðɛhan
etɛ stephen bɔ e jo xomɛsin kpo xo gblegble ɖiɖɔ kpo do
hwɛhwɛ ɔ mɛ nɔ yawu sin xomɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖe xomɛsin yetɔn gbɔn xo gblegble lɛ ɖiɖɔ gblamɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nuwalɔ mɔhun kun sixu bonu xwedo ɖe ɖo awajijɛ o
stephen nyi xwedo tɔn ɖe nɔ nɔ australie e ɖɔ ɖo aca nɔ zan xogbe syɛnsyɛn lɛ tawun bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ numaɖinu ɖe lɛ nɔ do xomɛsin nu mi
azɔn atɔn wɛ nyi kpo asi kpo klan bɔ mi ɖo nu wɛ ba miɖee
lɛ wa jɛ biblu xa asu kpo asi kpo enɛ ji
nu lɛ wa yi gbɔn hwenu stephen jɛ weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn xwedo ji e
e ɖɔ gbɛzan xwedo mitɔn tɔn huzu bi sese
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ nyi fifa din nɔ jɛ adan a ɔ ci bɔnbu mɛ kpo xomɛsin kpo ɖe e ɖɔhun bɔ nu kpɛvi titi ɖe wu kpowun ɔ nɔ wu
mɛxo agun tɔn ee ɖo agun mɛ stephen ɖe lɛ e ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ stephen nyi nɔvi sunnu fifa ɖe nɔ syɛnsyɛn ɖo jijɔ mɛɖesɔhwe tɔn
flin nu mɔ ɛ ɖo xomɛsin ji a
stephen xɔ nu eɖee ɖo xo enɛ ɖɔ e wu wɛ a
etɛ bɔ xomɛsin nyla
hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe ɖe wu wɛ biblu nu mi ɖɔ mi jo xomɛsin xo gblegble kpo jlɛɖiɖɔ kpo do efɛ
e blawu ɖɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ jijɔ mɔhun lɛ nɔ wa kɔ do adakaxixo mɛ
ɔ sixu xomɛsin do mɔ nu sɔgbe e e nɔ kɔn ci do mitɔn wu
mɛ gege ɖo jo walɔ nyanya mɔhun lɛ do cobo sixu kpewu ɔ do xa ðɛhan
sixu wa huzu mɛfifa a
mi ɖɔ xo do hans ee nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖo agun autriche tɔn ɖe mɛ e wu
kplekple mɛxo lɛ tɔn tɔn agun mɛ hans ɖe e tɔn ɖɔ e nyi ɖokpo ɖo nɔvi sunnu ee nyi mɛfifa hugan bɔ jlo mɔ lɛ e mɛ
hans nɔ fa xomɛ a
hwenu e ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ e jɛ ahan syɛnsyɛn zan nyi do ji bɔ wagbɔ tɔn ɔ e huzu
e ɖo xomɛsin ji tawun gbe ɖokpo ɖo ahan syɛnsyɛn e e wu hu nyɔnu tɔn bɔ enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo hwɛ ɖɔ e nɔ ganmɛ nu xwe
ganmɛ hans yi e nu e jo hunnylanyla do a
nɔ tɔn wa blo tuto xa mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖɔ e yi vi emitɔn ɖo gankpa mɛ hans jɛ biblu ji
hans tinmɛ ɖɔ e vɛwu nu mi tawun nu ma ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi
wemafɔ biblu tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi lɛ e wɛ nyi ezayii finɛ ɖɔ mɛdida lɛ jo walɔ nyanya do kpo kɔlɛntinu lɛ ee ɖɔ xo do mɛ ɖeɖee jo hwɛhuhu sin ali ji ɖe e do lɛ e wu e kpo finɛ ɖɔ nu mɛɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ nyi ɔ nɛ
nu xwe gege ɔ jehovah mi kpo suulu kpo gbɔn gbigbɔ tɔn gblamɛ bɔ ɔ do
ee hans nɔ ganmɛ nu xwe adaɖe gudo e ɔ e ɖe e e blo baptɛm cobo sin gankpa ɔ mɛ
walɔ tɛ gbakpe egbe etɛ biblu ɖɔ
gbɔn vo nu xo gblegble lɛ ɔ adingban ɖiɖo ɖesu nyi jijɔ xoxo ɔ tɔn ɖe
ði ɔ e nyi aca nu lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖo adingban nɔ hɔn nu takwɛ susu alo nɔ ɖo adingban do glo nu mɛ hwɛ hu lɛ e kɔ do lɛ e
jehovah nɔ ɖo adingban a
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ ɖɔ nugbo e tlɛ vɛwu alo dɔn tagba wa nu mi ɔ nɛ nux
e sixu ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi kpa mɛ gbɔn
mi sixu ɖe xoxo ɔ sin jijɔ lɛ nyi ayi kpo hlɔnhlɔn miɖesunɔ tɔn kpo a
mɛ ɖeɖee xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ mɛ lɛ e sakura ribeiro stephen kpo hans kpo ahwan syɛnsyɛn cobo kpewu jo jijɔ nyanya yetɔn lɛ do
ɖu ɖo jo hlɔnhlɔn xo mawu tɔn tɔn kpo gbigbɔ tɔn tɔn kpo do bɔ e do linlin yetɔn kpo ayi yetɔn kpo ji luk
mi nɔ ɖu xo mawu tɔn kpo gbigbɔ tɔn kpo sin le hwenu mi sɔnu nu kple agun tɔn lɛ yi e
mi sixu ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi kpa mi gbɔn
akpaxwe ɔ
mi gbeje nuwalɔ nyanya ɖeɖee klisanwun lɛ ɖo ɖe nyi ayi do zɔ nu yeɖee e ɖe lɛ
nu mi blo bɔ nu mitɔn ɖo mawu nukunmɛ e bi jɛn nɛ a
mi ɖo ɔ do
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi gbeje akpaxwe ɔ tɔn ɖeɖee mi ɖo nɔ do hwebinu e tɔn gege
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
ɔ do
akpaxwe ɔ tɔn tɛ lɛ nɔ so nu buninɔ mitɔn
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖe kpo kpo ɖe
mi sixu ɖe mɛɖesɔhwe kpo xomɛfifa kpo gbɔn
etɛwu ɔ do hugan mi a
akpaxwe ɔ tɔn tɛ lɛ xo e ɖɔ ɖo kolosinu lɛ mɛ
ɔ
azɔn we wɛ xogbe enɛ ɖo les saintes ecritures
du monde nouveau mɛ
xogbe ɔ do gesi e da sɔgbe kpo jlo mawu tɔn kpo e
ðo mi ɖu hwɛhuhu gu sin mitɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ wutu ɔ jlo nyanya lɛ nɔ wa nu do mi wu
mɛ ɖeɖee do mi lɛ e lɔ sixu do jɔ nu mi tawun
e ɖo co kpo alɔdo nublawukunumɛ tɔn jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ mi sixu kpewu huzu alɔkpa jehovah ɖɔ mi nyi e
do hlɔnhlɔn jlo mi ɖo kpe enɛ wu e ɔ mi gbeje akpaxwe ɔ tɔn ɖeɖee mawu mɛ nu pɔlu bɔ e wlan nu e gege xa kolosinu lɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do mi ɖe akpaxwe enɛ lɛ ɖo mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e ji
ðɔ akpaxwe ɔ tɔn ɖokpo
ee pɔlu byɔ mi ɖɔ mi ɔ do gudo e ɔ e yi nukɔn ɖɔ mɛmaɖeɖovo nyi akpaxwe ɔ tɔn taji ɖe
e ɖɔ mɛ nyi jwifu a ɖe ɖo vo a mɛ nyi jwifu ɔ ɖe ɖo vo a mɛ gbo ada e ɖe ɖo vo a atɔtɔnɔ ɖe ɖo vo a mɛ hun nukun a ɖe ɖo vo a hwexonu ɖe ɖo vo a kannumɔ ɖe ɖo vo a mɛ ɖo eɖee si ɔ lɔ ɖo vo a
ðo agun ɔ mɛ ɔ etɛwu mi ɖe mɛ ɖe ɖo vo ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn to alo ninɔmɛ mɛ ɔ tɔn wu a ðo ahwanvu klisu tɔn nugbo lɛ bi wɛ nyi ɖokpo ɔ
jehovah lɛ ɖo wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ sixu bɔ buninɔ klisanwun tɔn vɛwu
mɛ ɖeɖee ɔ do lɛ e nɔ wa nu xa yetɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ a lɛ e kpo kpodo kpan nɔ ayi do ninɔmɛ alo jɔtɛn yetɔn ji a
ði ɔ ɖo afrique du ɔ gege lɛ tɔn kpo ɖo xa e ɖo vo nu akɔ yetɔn lɛ e mɛ vlafo ɖo toxo hun nukun lɛ mɛ alo fi mɛwi lɛ nɔ nɔ e kabi ɖo xa ɖeɖee mɛ e xo mɛwi kpo yovo kpo bi kple do lɛ e mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ nu ɖo wanyiyi ɖaxo ɔ ɔ yi gbe nu tuto bunɔ ɖe ɖo octobre do nɔvi mitɔn lɛ bonu tuun yeɖee hu tɔn kɔ
etɛ tuto enɛ byɔ
tuto tɛ lɛ e blo do hlɔnhlɔn buninɔ ɖo togun mawu tɔn tɛntin e ɖo to ɖe mɛ
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
e blo tuto bɔ agun nɔ do gbe vovo alo ee mɛ mɛ lɛ ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn vovo ɖe e we nɔ kple ɖo ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖe lɛ
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖo agun we lɛ mɛ lɛ e nɔ jla wɛn ɖo nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo nɔ yi jonɔ yeɖee tɔn ɖo xwe yetɔn lɛ gbe
agun kanweko mɔkpan ɖo tuto enɛ mɛ bɔ alaxɔ ɔ mɔ gbeɖiɖo ɖagbe sin wema gege ɖo tuto enɛ ɔ wu bɔ ɖe lɛ tlɛ gosin mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ a lɛ e
ði ɔ tuto ɔ agungan ɖe bɔ e ɖɔ nyi ɖe a ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo tuto tɔn nukunɖeji ɖe bɔ buninɔ tiin ɖo akɔ lɛ tɛntin
tuto ɔ wa ɖagbe nu lɛ gbɔn
ɔ ee nyi nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ do gbe nɔ nyi xhosa e nɔ xo nu nɔ ylɔ yovo ee nɔ nɔ agun glɛnsigbe tɔn mɛ lɛ e wa xwe tɔn nu ɖe a e gbe a
ee e ɖo ɔ mɛ xa yovo lɛ ɖu vivi yi jonɔ tɔn ɖo xwe yetɔn gbe gbɔn e tɔn gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ mi ɖɔhun wɛ lɔ nyi
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu e jɛ agun nɔ do xhosa e ji bɔ e yi jonɔ agun nɔ do glɛnsigbe e tɔn e ɔ e ɖa nuɖuɖu ylɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ
mɛxo agun tɔn yovo ɖe ɖo jonɔ lɛ mɛ
ɖɔ e kpaca mi ɖɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ junjɔn ala ee yi do tawun e ɖe ji
tuto enɛ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ e bɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo gege zun lɛ kanɖeji kpo ɖo ada gblo nu yetɔn wɛ
etɛwu mi nɔ ɖo se xa mɛ wɛ sɔyi
do nɔ gudo nu miɖee ɖo kpo tagba mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɔ mi ɖo nɔ se xa miɖee tawun
mi bɔ mi xomɛ
nu ɖagbe tɛ mɛ kpo kpo mɛ lɛ bi ɖo agun ɔ mɛ sixu kɔ do
mi sixu ɖɔ mi keya ɖaxo nu toɖevomɛnu lɛ alo mɛ ɖo nuɖe a ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
mi nu jɛ do dannykarl tɛn sin philippines yi japon e ji e
ðo tɔn ji ɔ e nɔ wa nu xa ɛ e nɔ wa xa tɔn ayi ɔ ji lɛ gbɔn e a
e yi kple jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖokpo
dannykarl ɖɔ japon wɛ nyi gege mɛ wa kple ɔ lɛ e tɔn e ɖo co yi mi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo ci nu ɖɔ tuun mi lin ɖɔhun
e mɔ ɖɔ e kpo ɖo lɛ wa xa emi wɛ bɔ enɛ ɛ bɔ e yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e blo baptɛm bɔ egbe ɔ e nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ do wu ɖɔ nɔ zan gbɛzan bɔkun tawun e nyi gbexosin lɛ nɔ ze ɖagbe ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ mya nukun nu mɛ jɛ nukɔn linu luk
enyi mi ɖo wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ ɔ ali ɖagbe ɖe nɔ hun nu mi bɔ mi nɔ wa ɖagbe nu mɛ lɛ bi
enɛ kɔ do nyɔna gege mɛ
ði ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu gbexosin ɖe nɔ nɔ australie nɔ nyi swahili gbe mɔ tɛn do agun nɔ do swahili gbe ɖo toxo brisbane tɔn mɛ e ɖe
e ɖɔ enyi ɖɔ towe akpakpa hun yi ɖo agun nɔ do jonɔgbe e mɛ
e nɔ ci ɖɔ e yi to ɖe mɛ ɖɔhun cobɔ e tɛn sin toxo mɛtɔn mɛ a
e nɔ ɖu vivi kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e tɔn nɔ mɔ e ɖo bu gbɔn e tlɔlɔ
etɛ nɔ klisanwun lɛ bɔ nɔ mɛ tɛn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e
mi xwedo ɖe tɔn ɖo japon
sakiko vi nyɔnu yetɔn ɔ ɖɔ ðo kpo kpo vlamɛ ɔ mi nɔ mɔ bresil tɛn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e hwenu mi nɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ e hwɛhwɛ
enyi mi wemafɔ biblu tɔn lɛ ɖi alo ðɛhan sin biblu yetɔn portugal gbe tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo to tawun bɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ ɖasin tlɛ nɔ wa yi do
xwedo ɔ tɔn nɔte ɖo finɛ a
sakiko ɖɔ hwenu mi mɔ ɖo xovɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn e ɔ mi jɛ portugal gbe ji
nukɔnmɛ ɔ xwedo ɔ bɔ e ɖo agun nɔ do portugal gbe e ɖokpo ayi
ðo xwe lɛ vlamɛ ɔ xwedo ɔ mɛ gosin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gege bɔ wa huzu jehovah
mi doku nu jehovah tawun xa
etɛwu e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ linlin wu mi ɔ do e sɔgbe
etɛ mi bɔ mi miɖee hwe
nu ɖo mi bɔ mi ɔ do e wɛ nyi kpikpa nu jehovah e nyi do xɔ ɖo lɛ nukɔn a
e vɛwu nu mi mɛ lɛ bonu mi nyi alɔ nu goyiyi kpo mɛɖee mimɔ kpo e
e ɖo co mi hɛn ɔ mi mɛɖesɔhwe do
etɛ mi bɔ mi wa
bonu mi miɖee hwe ɔ mi ɖo nɔ hwenu nɔ tamɛ do nu mi xa ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e ji ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
le tɛ lɛ mɛɖee hwe nɔ hɛn wa
xa nunywɛxo
mɛɖee hwe mi bɔ mi xo fifa kpo buninɔ agun ɔ tɔn kpo sin kan
gandido sɔnu nu mɛɖesɔhwe bɔ mawu tɔn mi
ɖɔ bi nɔ miɖee hwe nɔ wa nu miɖee ɖo mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ mawu nɔ ɖe kɔ do lɛ loɔ e nɔ xomɛ do mɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe lɛ wu
nyi ɖagbe hugan xomɛfifa kpo suuluɖiɖo kpo tɔn
ðo egbe tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ yawu mɛ nɔ fa xomɛ nɔ ɖo suulu lɛ e do mɔ xɛsinɔ
mɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn hu mɛ bi ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ e wɛ jijɔ ɖagbe enɛ lɛ gosin
jehovah mawu wɛ nyi ɖagbe hugan xomɛfifa kpo suuluɖiɖo kpo tɔn
ɔ nu xwe jɛji ɔ jehovah dɛ ɖo izlayɛli akɔta ɔ ezek
tɛ jezu ze ɖo xomɛfifa kpo suulu kpo linu
e ɖɔ emi ɖo suulu ɖaxo dɛ ɖo ganmaɖo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ tɔn
ðo jezu tɔn ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ hwenu ɔ e dɛ ɖo xomɔɖɔdomɛwu agɔ sinsɛngan klan gbe xa ɛ lɛ e tɔn
e fa xomɛ ɖo suulu jɛ hwenu e hu ji e
luk
ali ɖagbe tɛ mi sixu ɖe xomɛfifa kpo suulu kpo ɖe
mi sixu ɖe xomɛfifa kpo suulu kpo gbɔn
pɔlu ɖɔ ali mi wa ɖe e ɖokpo hwenu e wlan nu lɛ e nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ enyi mɛɖe wa nu nyi do nu mɛɖe ɖo mɛ hweɖebunu hun nɔ kɛ miɖee
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e byɔ xomɛfifa kpo suulu kpo ɖo mi si cobɔ mi setonu nu gbeɖiɖe enɛ
enyi mi nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɔ mi xo buninɔ agun ɔ tɔn sin kan jɛhun
etɛwu xomɛfifa kpo suulu kpo ɖo dandan
xomɛfifa kpo suulu kpo do nyi e jlo mi sin nu nu klisanwun lɛ a
jijɔ xo mi ɖɔ wa yi lɛ e bi ca kan tawun xa wanyiyi
ði ɔ jaki ɖo ɖe we xa nɔvi lɛ ɖo nɔ keya nu dɔkunnɔ lɛ hu wamamɔnɔ lɛ wutu
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ wanyiyi nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nyi alɔ nu mɛ ɖe ɖiɖe ɖo vo nu mɛ ɖe ɖo wema sise sinmɛ agbaza tɔn alo ninɔmɛ mɛɖe tɔn wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi kun ɖɔ kpowun ɖɔ mi ɖe mɛ ɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛ ɖe mɛ a o
mɛmaɖeɖovo ɖo nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ mi wanyiyi gba
e nɔ byɔ suulu kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo tawun cobɔ mi kpo ɖo alɔ ɖo ɖo wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla nɔzo mitɔn lɛ mɛ wɛ
jijɔ enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɔ nɔ bɔ nu wiwa ɖo xa nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi nɔ bɔwu nu mi
ajɔ tɛ mi mɔ ɖo wanyiyi mɔhun wu
e nɔ bɔ agun ɔ nɔ ɖo bu nɔ kpa nu jehovah nɔ dɔn mɛ ɖo jlo lɛ e
e sɔgbe ɖɔ tinmɛ biblu do ɔ wu e fo kpo nugbo elɔ wu ɖe e kpo wanyiyi gba do nu enɛ lɛ bi ji ɖo wanyiyi ɔ wɛ nɔ dɔn nu enɛ lɛ bi ca bɔ nɔ nɔ bu ganji
nu tɛ lɛ mi ɖo kanbyɔ miɖee
etɛwu hwetɛnu mi ɖo
mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nu ɖevo tɛ sixu wa ɖe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi do zɔ nu nyiɖee
mi ɖo nɔ xoɖɛ byɔ alɔdo mawu tɔn syɛnsyɛn ba ɖu ɖo linlin alo nuwalɔ ɖebu ali nu mi bɔ mi ɖu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin gu a e ji
mi ɖo kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ kpo ɖo bloblo wɛ bonu nu nɔ linlin lɛ e huzu a
ɔ do ɖe nyi ayi a nyi nuɖe bɔ klisanwun lɛ bi blo azɔn ɖokpo kpowun bɔ xo fo a loɔ mi ɖo jɛ hwenu mi kpe wiwa wu bi e
do nukun mɛ ɔ jiwu sɔ hwenu mɛ mi tuun lɛ e bi ɔ do bɔ xo bi fo e
e ɖɔ jijɔ enɛ lɛ bi sin kplekple nyi nu gbigbɔ nɔ mɛ ɔ
jijɔ gbigbɔ ɔ nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo bɔ pɔlu do gesi jɛ nukɔn e wɛ nyi wanyiyi
e xɔ akwɛ sɔ
pɔlu ɖɔ wanyiyi mɛvo ɔ emi kun nyi nuti o
kɔ etɛ nyi wanyiyi
ði ɔ mi xa ɖɔ wanyiyi nɔ ku hun nɔ xomɛ
nugbo wɛ nɔ hun xomɛ e nɔ bɔ e nɔ dɛ ɖo nu bi enyi mi ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ ɔ wanyiyi ɔ nɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn kpo nukunɖiɖo mitɔn kpo kpodo hunkuku mitɔn kpan ɖo
jijɔ enɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo wanyiyi e nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu nu yetɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ tawun ɔ e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e do wu kpo ayi bi kpo
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ nu mɛɖe ɖo wanyiyi a ɔ e nɔ hwanwu nɔ yigo nɔ wa winnyanu nɔ nyi cejɛnnabinɔ nɔ hɛn mɛ do xomɛ nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ a
wanyiyi mi jlo sɔnu e nɔ ɖɔ emiɖokponɔ gee tɔn jɛn a e ci jijɔ nublawumakunumɛ tɔn ɖeɖee xɔ akwɛ ɖebu a lɛ e ɖɔhun a kɔ
mawu ɔ wanyiyi wɛ e nyi
jehovah wɛ nyi jɔtɛn wanyiyi tɔn
jaan tɔn lɛ kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo bi ɖekunnu
wanyiyi enɛ ɔ nu e ɖie enyi midɛɛ lɛ wɛ yi wan nu mawu jɛ nukɔn a eyɛ wɛ yi wan nu mi jɛ nukɔn vi tɔn do bɔ e eɖee do bonu mawu hwɛ mitɔn lɛ kɛ mi
jaan wanyiyi mawu tɔn bɔ mi sixu mɔ hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ nukunɖiɖo kpo kpo
jezu ɖe wanyiyi e ɖo nu lɛ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa jlo mawu tɔn
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ jezu ɖɔ mawu e nyɛ ɖie ja wa jlo towe
jezu ɖɔ wanyiyi nu mɛ ɖe hu e mɛɖee tɔn do do mɛtɔn lɛ tamɛ a
jaan mi mɛ lɛ sixu xwedo wanyiyi tɔn jehovah kpo jezu kpo mi e a
ganji mi gbeje mi sixu wa gbɔn e
pɔlu byɔ mi ɖɔ vi wɛ nyi nu mawu enɛ ɔ wutu ɔ ɖo do gan wa nu eɖɔhun
mi nɔ wa kpodo wanyiyi kpo hwenu mi nɔ ɖe jijɔ enɛ ɖo akpaxwe gbɛzan mitɔn tɔn bi mɛ e
wɛ mi nɔ wanyiyi mɔhun ɖe a loɔ nuwiwa lɛ mɛ wɛ mi nɔ ɖe
jaan wlan ɖɔ vi lɛ nu mi nɔ yi wan nu mɛ ɖo kpo xo vivi kpo kpowun o loɔ wanyiyi titewungbe nɔ ɖe eɖee gbɔn nuwiwa lɛ mɛ ɔ wɛ mi ɖo ɖo
mi nɔ kpo wanyiyi kpo hwenu mi nɔ ɖo suulu nɔ xomɛ nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ biblu ɖe we xa mi ɖɔ ɖo nɔ hwɛ kɛ miɖee aklunɔ kɛ e ɖɔhun
mi ɖo dɔn wanyiyi adodwe mɔhun wlu xa wanyiyi masɔgbe a
ði ɔ nu vi ɖo avi wɛ e ɖe do xwɛ ɔ ɖo wanyiyi masɔgbe e ɖe sixu ɛ nu wɛ e ɖe e bi
ɖo wanyiyi nugbo nugbo tɔn nu vi tɔn ɔ nu syɛnsyɛn nu e byɔ ɖo ɔ nɛ
ɖokpo ɔ mawu nyi wanyiyi mɛ aklunɔ yi wan ɔ wɛ e nɔ
enɛ wu ɔ mi bi wɛ ɖo fi mi ɖo blo huzuhuzu ɖe bɔ wanyiyi mitɔn e
nukɔntɔn ɔ byɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ee nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo wanyiyi e
enyi mi nɔ xoɖɛ byɔ gbigbɔ jo miɖee do nu gbigbɔ ɔ ali mi ɔ nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ nɔ wanyiyi hugan
alo nu ɖe wɛ nyi ɔ sixu byɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn bɔ vi towe lɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo nyi kpo xomɛsin kpo a
tamɛ linlin do jezu tɔn ji ɖo taji hwenu e jɛ do do mi alo do hwɛ agɔ nu mi e
ðo enɛ mɛ ɔ nu ɖagbe mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee e wɛ nyi etɛ jezu wa
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nyi leigh mɔ ɖɔ tamɛ linlin do nukanbyɔ enɛ ji emi bɔ emi yi ji cobo wa nu
e ɖɔ e su gbe ɖokpo bɔ ɖe wlan nu ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ xo nyanya lɛ do nyi kpo wa wɛ ɖe e kpo wu
e nu mi tawun
enɛ gudo ɔ kanbyɔ nyiɖee ɖɔ xwedo jezu tɔn do wa nu xa mɛ mɔhun gbɔn
ee tamɛ do nu jezu wa e ji gudo e ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn jo xo do
nukɔnmɛ ɔ wa se ɖɔ enɛ ɖo xwi ɖi xa azɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ ɖo gege mɛ
wa mɔ ɖɔ e kun nyi nu ɖɔ gbe e ja e nɛ o
tamɛ linlin do wanyiyi jezu hwenu e tlɛ nuɖɔ ɛ e tɔn ji mi bɔ ɖe wanyiyi mɔhunkɔ
nugbo ɔ nu mi xwedo jezu tɔn ɔ mi nɔ wa nu kpo wanyiyi kpo hwebinu
atɔngɔ ɔ sɔnu nu wanyiyi mɛɖee do tɔn ee nɔ ɖe klisanwun nugbo lɛ e
le ɖevo tɛ lɛ nɔ sin nusisɔ nu wanyiyi mɛ
nu mi ɖe wanyiyi ɔ le gege nɔ sin mɛ
mi nɔ ɖu wanyiyi sin le gbɔn
kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e ðo mi yi wan nu miɖee wutu ɔ mi tuun ɖɔ enyi mi yi agun ɖebu mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔvi lɛ yi mi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
fi ɖevo tɛ e sixu mɔ wanyiyi mɔhun ɖe zɛ togun mawu tɔn mɛ wu
fifa nu mi nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ ɖo wanyiyi mɛ ɔ e bɔ mi nyi ɖokpo ɔ nɔ bu
efɛ mi nɔ ɖu vivi fifa enɛ tɔn tlɔlɔ ɖo kple agun tɔn mitɔn lɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖaxo lɛ kpo hwenu
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ wanyiyi nɔ hɛn mɛ lido
kɔ nwt wanyiyi nɔ blo gbɔn
nu mi kanɖeji ɖe jijɔ xɔ akwɛ enɛ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo e gbe bi gbe
ðo ðibla yi vivɔnu novembre tɔn wɛ ɖo mexico
nukun atɔnnɔ lɛ ɖo to enɛ mɛ livi ɖokpo jɛji ɖe nɔ jan tawun e mɛ e ɔ aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo ɖo wɛ jɛn e ɖe
din ɔ nu ɖevo wɛ ɖo akpakpa mɛ lɛ wɛ
lɛ wa aklunɔzan gblamɛ sin nuwiwa enɛ domɛ
fɔtooyinu yetɔn lɛ ɖo alɔ ji bɔ ɖo wiwa jonɔ bunɔ ɖe tɔn wɛ ɖo pipaan gaa ɔ joseph
nyi zinkponɔ nu hwe ɔ e wɛ nyi jonɔ ɔ
ayi ɔ ji tɔn wa ɖaxo azan atɔn tɔn yetɔn lɛ e lɔ ɖo do doo nu nɔvi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
ɖɔ a ɖaxo enɛ byɔ hwenuxo mɛ nyi nuwiwa nukunɖeji tawun ɖe ɖo nukɔnyiyi nugbo ɔ tɔn mɛ ɖo to mexique tɔn mɛ
etɛ bɔ ɖaxo enɛ yi kpowun jɛn wa e nyi nu nukunɖeji
jɛ nukɔn nu nuwiwa enɛ ɔ nukɔnyiyi kpɛɖe jɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖo ɖo mexique
sin ɔ e nɔ blo kpɛvi kpɛvi lɛ ɖo finɛ agun lɛ ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ ɖo xwe bɔ lɛ e mɛ
e mɔ ɖɔ alaxɔ e hun ɖo mexico ɖo e bɔ nu lɛ yi nukɔn
ðo taan ɔ mɛ ɔ alaxɔ ɔ tɔn do nuwalɔ sɔgbe xa biblu a e mɛ bɔ e ɖo ɖyɔ ɛ
ɖo mexique lɛ e ɖo hudo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ gbigbɔ tɔn tɔn
ðo nɔvi tɔn hwenu ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu lɛ xwle xoɖiɖɔ wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn we kpo xoɖiɖɔ hladio ji tɔn wu ɖe e we kpo
azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ bɔ hladioxwe mexique tɔn lɛ vunvun wɛnɖagbe ɔ kpe to ɔ mɛ
ɖaxo ɖe ɖo mexico
e nyi ɖaxo ɖokpo kpowun wɛ e blo ɖo xwe bɔ e mɛ ɖo to ɔ mɛ a loɔ we wɛ e blo e blo ɖokpo ɖo batooglintɛn veracruz tɔn blo wegɔ ɔ ɖo mexico
ɖo ɔ mɛ jɛ le ɖagbe lɛ hɛn wa ji
ðo ɔ wɛ ɖo finɛ
xwe wo gudo ɔ yi mɔhunkɔtɔn donu wo
wɛ wa mexico nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn tɔn
ðo ɔ lɛ zan wema nujlajla tɔn gblogblo akpaxwe wenɔ ɖe do jla yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn libre ee e blo ɖo toxo mexique tɔn mɛ e
e nɔ kpla wema gblogblo ɖe do kɔ bɔ akpaxwe ɖokpo nɔ ɖo nukɔn bɔ wegɔ ɔ nɔ ɖo gudo wlɛnwin nujlajla tɔn ɖe wɛ bɔ lɛ nɔ zan sin
xojlawema tɔn ɖe sin zɔnlin nujlajla tɔn nɔvi lɛ ɖi ɖo mexico kpla atɛ akpaxwe wenɔ ɖe e
azan wegɔ ɔ gbe ɔ kpe fi ɔ bi
nukɔnyiyi nujlajla enɛ ɖo e sinsɛn katolika tɔn nukunmɛ a enɛ wu ɔ nujlajla ɖe do huzu kpannukɔn lɛ
gbeklanxamɛ lɛ ɖo finɛ co nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo kpo ɖo mɛ lɛ ylɔ wɛ ɖi xɛsi
nacion ɖo gbe ɖɔ toxo ɔ bi mɔ
sunnu enɛ lɛ kpo nyɔnu enɛ lɛ kpo ci atɛ nujlajla tɔn akpaxwe wenɔ lɛ ɖɔhun nu
bɔ nuwlanwlan elɔ ɖo fɔtoo ɔ glɔ vunbla ali lɛ bi
ðo xwe enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ gege lɛ tɔn ɖo ɖaxo lɛ cobo yi ɖaxo e nɔ blo ɖo mexique lɛ e
lɛ gege nɔ gosin gletoxo jɛ gblolo bɔ pipaan alo ali ɖe tlɛ yi mɛ a lɛ e mɛ
agun ɖokpo wlan ɖɔ ali ɖokpo sɛkpɔ fi jɛn nyi fi e dɔn alokan sin dotin lɛ gbɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ lɛ ɖo kun alo ɖi zɔnlin nu azan mɔkpan cobo wa pipaan gaa ɖe wa do pipaan sin finɛ yi fi blo ɔ ɖe wɛ ɖe e
gege lɛ tɔn wɛ nyi wamamɔnɔ bɔ e nɔ fa cobonu nɔ mɔ akwɛ su yiyi ɔ kɛɖɛ sin hunkwɛ e a
enyi wa ɔ gege yetɔn nɔ nɔ ayi ɔ ji tɔn lɛ xwe bɔ yedɛɛ lɛ nɔ yi nɔvi lɛ do xwe yetɔn lɛ gbe kpo wanyiyi kpo
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ
e wa jɛ ɖokpo bɔ nɔ alaxɔ ɔ mɛ bɔ ɖo finɛ ɔ e to wemagba bɔ mɛ ɖokpo nɔ ji
ɖo annuaire mɛ e tinmɛ ɖɔ jonɔ enɛ lɛ e nu ɔ su nukun yetɔn mɛ lɛ e mɔ gba enɛ lɛ do mɔ zan ɖeɖee bɔ yozo hu sinmaa ji lɛ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enɛ lɛ nu nɔ su nukun yetɔn mɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e lɛ bi xwii yi awajijɛ tɔn klisanwun tɔn enɛ lɛ tɛnmɛ
egbe ɔ ee ɖo mexique lɛ e ɖo jijɛji wɛ ɖibla yi livi ɖokpo e ɔ nusumɛnukunmɛ enɛ ɔ lɔ ɖo jijɛji wɛ
gbeɖiɖo ɖe gosin alaxɔ mexique tɔn mɛ ɖo ɖɔ do nɔvi lɛ wu ɖɔ hwenu vɛwu mɛ nɔ gbɔn din lɛ e nu kan nɔ ɖo do nugbo ɔ wu e a ɖo mi nɔ blo lɛ e ɖokpo ɖokpo nyi ɖokpo ɖo nu ji nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo do hugan nu hwenu gege ɖo lɛ gudo e mɛ bɔ nu nɔvi lɛ nɔ ɖo kinkanbyɔ wɛ magbokɔ e wɛ nyi hwetɛnu mi blo ɖevo
sɔgbe kpo annuaire glɛnsigbe tɔn kpo ɔ enɛ bɔ mɛ gege tuun jehovah tɔn lɛ
ðo mexique ɔ mɛ wɛ wa flin ɖo
matie ayi ɖo nu ɖeɖee jɛ kunkpla jozɛfu lɛ e ji ɖo e kpi e mɛ
e ɖɔ xo do jozɛfu wa nu gbɔn tlolo e se ɖɔ ɖo xo e mɛ wɛnsagun ɔ tin nu jɛ lɛ e mɛ ɖe e kpo e yi gbe nu tinmɛ lɛ gbɔn e kpo wu
ðo wemata nukɔntɔn ɖo wɛnɖagbe wema matie tɔn mɛ lɛ e mɛ ɔ e ylɔ nyikɔ jozɛfu tɔn azɔn wo azɔn jɛn e ylɔ tɔn
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ luki kpi e ayi do ji hugan
luki ɖɔ xo ɖɔ nu bɔ e kunkpla jezu mɔ ɖo sɔgudo e e
e tlɛ nyi ɖo mɛ jezu ɖo xwe bɔ e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo yi jeluzalɛmu e ɔ luki ɖɔ xo ɖɔ e e ɖɔ jozɛfu tɔn a
luki ɖɔ ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ jɛ lɛ e bi ci ayi mɛ nu
enɛ ɔ ɖɔ matie tin nu kunkpla jozɛfu kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo e mɛ hugan loɔ luki tinmɛ gege do wa e kpo nu e ɖi xwi xa lɛ e kpo wu
ɔ kunkan wɛnɖagbe wema we lɛ do gesi e gbɔn vo
luki tɔn lɛ ganji ɖɔ jezu wɛ ɖo ɖu gu axɔsuzinkpo davidi tɔn tɔn ɖo jɔwamɔ lixo
hlɔ nwt etɛwu
ðo jɔ sin kunkan axɔsu davidi tɔn mɛ gbɔn davidi vi nataan ji
ðo ɖo kpaa mɛ ɔ sunnu lɛ wɛ e nɔ do gesi nu e ja kunkan lɛ gbe ɔ nɛ
kunkan matie kpo luki kpo do gesi e ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ jezu wɛ nyi mɛsiya sin akpa e do e
nugbo ɔ e tuun kunkan mɛ jezu wa sin e ganji bɔ falizyɛn lɛ kpo saduseɛn lɛ kpo tlɛ sixu ɖɔ nu kun nyi o a
sɔnu nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe
jehovah wɛ nyi mɛɖeejiɖuɖe tɔn ɖaxo hugan ɔ
lɛ sixu wa nu eɖɔhun ɖe jijɔ enɛ gbɔn
afɔ tawun tawun tɛ lɛ sixu ɖe hlɔnhlɔn mɛɖeejiɖuɖe towe
se xa mɛ jehovah ðɔhun
etɛ nyi e se xa mɛ
jehovah kpo jezu kpo ze nu bi vɔ e ɖo jijɔ enɛ mɛ
ali tawun tawun tɛ lɛ mi sixu xwedo yetɔn ɖe
nu ɖagbe tɛ lɛ mɛ wiwa sixu kɔ do nu mi
gbɛzan tɔn mɔ nyɔna ðo xa sunnu zin ðo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e wutu
xo mawu mitɔn ðɔ ɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi
mawuxo ɔ ðo hlɔnhlɔn
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ biblu ɔ kpo ɖo tintiin wɛ ɖo gbe gege mɛ
mi sixu ɖɔ xo mawu tɔn mi ɖo ɖo gbe mɛ mi sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
kpan jɛ ji
klisanwun lɛ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn
mi sixu ɖu le mɛ ɖeɖee ɖe jijɔ enɛ ɖo hwexonu lɛ e tɔn gbɔn
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ lɛ nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo nɔvi sunnu blo baptɛm lɛ e kpo sixu ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ mɛ ba ɖagbe lɛ gbɔn
nu gbigbɔ nɔ mɛ ɔ wɛ nyi mɛɖeejiɖuɖe
etɛ mawu wa nu gbɔn ɖo ɔ hwenu e ɖo mi
na mɛɖeejiɖuɖe kpo mɛɖeejimaɖuɖe kpo tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ e ɖe lɛ
biblu kpinkplɔn sixu mi bɔ mi sɔnu nu jijɔ mawu tɔn nyi mɛɖeejiɖuɖe e gbɔn
etɛ mɛ mɛɖeejimaɖuɖe sixu kɔ do
etɛwu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe xo ɔ nyi xo taji ɖe egbe
mɛðeejiðuðe ɔ jijɔ mawu tɔn ɖe wɛ
jehovah nɔ ɖu ɖo eɖee ji bɔ nu bi vɔ
lɛ nyi bɔ enɛ wu ɔ e nɔ vɛwu bɔ ɖu ɖo yeɖee ji nugbo ɔ tagba nɔ kpe lɛ egbe e gege sin mɛɖeejimaɖuɖe wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖu ɖo yeɖee ji a lɛ e nɔ dɔn tagba wa nu yeɖee kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo
mɛɖeejimaɖuɖe ɔ ɖo syɛnsyɛn wɛ
e do nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe ɖo kpo kpo sin avla mɛ mɔ ɖɔ e han kpɛɖe ee e do ɖo agaɖanu din e ɔ e wu ɖɔ e wa han tawun
enɛ kpaca mɛ nɔ xo mawu tɔn lɛ e a ɖo biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ mi ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ lɛ kun nɔ ɖu ɖo yeɖee ji o tim
etɛwu klisanwun lɛ ɖo sɔnu nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe
etɛwu tintɛnkpɔn sɔnu nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe ɖo ɖu ayi mɛ nu
mi hwɛjijɔ taji we
nukɔntɔn ɔ e wu ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee kpewu nɔ ɖu ɖo yeɖee ji lɛ e kun nɔ mɔ tagba o
nɔ dan jajaja a nɔ kpewu nɔ zun ɖagbe hugan nɔ sin xomɛ nɔ adohu adohu ji alo flu ɖo ayi mɛ mɛ nɔ nɔ jajaja ji lɛ e nɔ wa gbɔn e a
wegɔ ɔ nuwukpikpe nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖi xwi xa mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ nɔ ɖu ɖo jlo masɔgbe lɛ ji e ɖo dandan cobɔ e mɔ mawu tɔn
etɛ ɖo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo xwi ɖi wɛ ɖe mɛɖeejiɖuɖe lɛ e
ɖebu sixu ɖu ɖo eɖee ji bonu nu bi vɔ a
jehovah tuun ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ nɔ ɖi xwi ɖo ali enɛ jlo bonu ɖu ɖo nu nɔ dɔn do hwɛhuhu mɛ lɛ e ji
mi jehovah tɔn
enɛ gudo ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do ɖagbe kpo nyanya kpo ɖeɖee ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ji
mi gbɔn ɖagbeɖagbe ɖeɖee sixu mi bɔ mi hlɔnhlɔn mɛɖeejiɖuɖe mitɔn e ji
tɛ jehovah ɖo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe linu
jehovah nɔ ɖe mɛɖeejiɖuɖe bɔ nu bi nɔ vɔ ɖo nɔ nɔ nu e nɔ wa lɛ e ɖe wu a
wɛ midɛɛ lɛ nyi
e ɖo co enyi mi mɔ nu jɛ mɛɖeejiɖuɖe ɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖo gbeje jehovah tɔn cobo sixu wa nu eɖɔhun ganji
ninɔmɛ taji tɛ lɛ mɛ jehovah ɖe mɛɖeejiɖuɖe ɖe
tamɛ do jehovah ɖe mɛɖeejiɖuɖe gbɔn hwenu sataan syɛn gu e ji
e ɖo ɖeɖɛ enɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ awovi tɔn dɔn akpɔɖomɛ xomɛsin kpo wangbɛnumɛ kpo wa nuɖiɖo jixwe tɔn ɖo gbeji nu mawu lɛ e tɛntin
enyi tamɛ do sataan dɔn wa lɛ e bi ji ɔ vlafo nu nɔ ci nu hwi lɔ
jehovah zɔn kplakpla ji do wa nu a
e e wa nu gbɔn e ganji bɔ nuwiwa tɔn sɔgbe tawun
e yawu sin xomɛ a wa nu ɖo ji hwenu e ɖo sataan tɔn ɖeɖɛ wɛ e
etɛ jehovah tɔn sixu mi
jehovah nɔ ɖe mɛɖeejiɖuɖe gbɔn e ɖɔ mi lɔ ɖo xo mitɔn lɛ gbeje afɔ mi nɔ ɖe lɛ e ganji mi ɖo zɔn kplakpla ji do nu lɛ mɛ a
enyi xo taji lɛ kpannukɔn hun zan hwenu kpe e wa nu kpo nunywɛ kpo
ðo lɛ mɛ ɔ blewun jɛn e nu ɖe nu mɛ e do wa nu
fitɛ mi sixu mɔ mɛ ɖe jijɔ mawu tɔn lɛ e sin ɖe
etɛ jozɛfu bɔ e wa nu e wa hwenu potifaa sin asi ba hu ji e
ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e tɛ lɛ ɖɔ mɛɖeejiɖuɖe xɔ akwɛ
e ɖɔ emi ɖu ɖo emiɖee ji hwenu e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo potifaa nyi gan nu mɛ nɔ lɛ e xwegbe e
potifaa sin asi ayi tɔn ɖo jozɛfu nyi mɛɖe ɖɛkpɛ e ji do gan hu ji
etɛ su ali do jozɛfu bɔ e jɛ mɔ ɖebɔdoɖewu e ɖo lɛ e mɛ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e zan hwenu do tamɛ do nu mɛɖeejimaɖuɖe tɔn ji lɛ e ji
bɔ hwenu ninɔmɛ ɔ wa syɛn e ɔ e hɔn
sixu sɔnu nu hwiɖee ba ɖi xwi xa mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ gbɔn
etɛ jozɛfu tɔn mi
nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi hɔn nu mɛtɛnkpɔn bɔ mi gba mawu tɔn lɛ ɖe e
ɔ mɛ nyi din lɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖi xwi xa nu ɖu dingan ahan dingan azɔ nunu amasin ɖo aɖi lɛ e zinzan nyi do agalilɛ kpo nu mɔhun ɖevo lɛ kpo
e tlɛ nyi ɖo baptɛm yetɔn gudo ɔ nu ɔ sixu dɔn hweɖelɛnu bɔ lɛkɔ yi nuwalɔ enɛ lɛ kɔn
e ɖo co enyi nuɖe bonu gba jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖe gbeɖe hun zan hwenu do tamɛ do nu baɖabaɖa e ji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ji enyi kpewu ɖu ɖo jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn lɛ ji a ɔ nɛ enɛ hlɔnhlɔn
sixu do nukun ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee dɔn mɛtɛnkpɔn wa lɛ e mɛ sixu nyi alɔ nu gbɔn e ðɛh
nux enyi mɛtɛnkpɔn mɔhun ɖe wa hweɖebunu hun byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e nunywɛ kpo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe kpo bonu ɖi xwi xa
ninɔmɛ tɛ nɔ kpannukɔn mɛ winnyawinnya gege ɖo wemaxɔmɛ
etɛ sixu klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ bɔ ɖi xwi xa kɔ e nɔ gbidi nu bɔ wa numasɔgbe lɛ e e
klisanwun winnyawinnya gege wɛ nɔ mɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn jozɛfu mɔ e
mi ɖɔ xo do ji
tɔn lɛ gege wɛ nɔ bɔ ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ bunɔ ɖe gudo ɔ ɖo gbɛn gbɔn gudo e sin nugo yi wɛ
ɖo mɔhun ɖe kpi a
ɖo nunywɛ kpe e tuun ɖɔ e nɔ mɛ winnyawinnya gege tawun bonu jɛ ji gbɔn
biblu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖu ɖo yeɖee ji ɖo agalilɛ sin akpaxwe a e tɔn bɔ enɛ lɛ nu mi
e nublanɔwu mɛɖeejimaɖuɖe mɔhun sixu ji lɛ e
mɛɖebu mɔ eɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ tɔn ɖɔhun mɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ e tamɛ do dɔnkpɛvu xlonɔ xo nunywɛxo wemata ɔ ɖɔ e ji
jozɛfu ɖu ɖo nu ci e ji hwenu e ɖo xo ɖɔ xa nɔvi tɔn lɛ wɛ e gbɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ mɛ mi ɖo ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci nu mi e ji ɖe
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ ɔ jozɛfu ze ɖagbe ɖo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe linu
bonu jozɛfu do tuun nu ɖo nɔvi tɔn lɛ sin ayi mɛ e ɔ e hwla mɛ e nyi e do hwenu nuɖuɖu xɔ gbe wa tɔn ɖo ejipu e
enyi e ɖe hɛnnumɔ towe ɖe sin agun mɛ ɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ ɖu ɖo nu nɔ ci nu e ji mɔ tɛn do nyi alɔ nu ɖo dandan a lɛ e
mɛɖee ji ɖuɖu ɖe ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ nɔ wa kpowun a enyi mi mɔ ɖɔ nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ sɔgbe xa mawu tɔn kpo weɖexamɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ɔ e yawu kpa mi
etɛ lɛ kunkpla axɔsu davidi e sixu mi
biblu nukunɖeji axɔsu davidi tɔn tɔn
e ɖo acɛ tawun e ɖu ɖo eɖee ji zan acɛ enɛ do sin xomɛ hwenu sawulu kpo cimɛyi kpo nuɖɔ ɛ e a
e ɖo co davidi tɔn sixu nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe lɛ mi
nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nyi ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo ɖe mɛɖeejiɖuɖe ganji mɔ tɛn do zan acɛ yetɔn nyi do a
wegɔ ɔ mɛ ɖe sixu ganjɛ eɖee wu bi ɖɔ emi kun sixu jɛ tɛnkpɔn mɛ o a kɔ
ɖe kun tɔn wa gba do luigi tɔn wu
ɔ sin hwɛ wɛ ku co e jɛ luigi zun ji jlo xo hun xa ɛ
luigi xoɖɛ jehovah byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e emi bonu emi jɛ adan o xo ɔ e kpa ɛ a
luigi wlan plaki ɖe ɔ tɔn sin animɛloo jo e do hwenu eyɛ kpo ɖo xo su wɛ ɖo finɛ e
winnya hu nya ɔ do kɛnklɛn ɖo adanjijɛ tɔn wu
e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi mɔ blo ganjɛwuwema luigi tɔn e bɔ e yawu kpe nukun do nu lɛ wu
nya ɔ ɖo xo ɖɔ ɖo do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji e mɛ bɔ xo e se lɛ e su nukun tɔn mɛ
luigi sixu mɔ e nyi nu taji sɔ ɖɔ e ci xwii ɖo alitawovi ɔ gudo e kpo e nyla sɔ e kpo enyi e sin xomɛ wɛ ɔ nɛ xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
xwii cici alo xomɛ sinsin sixu kunkpla klisanwun tɔn mitɔn tlɔlɔ alo ɖo ali nyi tlɔlɔ a e akpaxwe ɔ
biblu kpinkplɔn ganji sixu klisanwun lɛ bɔ ɖo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe
flin nu mawu ɖɔ nu jozuwee e nɔ gɔn elɔ xa gbeɖe o
joz biblu kpinkplɔn sixu bɔ ɖo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe gbɔn
mi mɔ gbɔn wa yi e ɔ ɖeɖee ɖo le nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e kpo nu nɔ ji lɛ e kpo ɖo biblu mɛ
linlin ɖe wu wɛ jehovah yi gbe bɔ e wlan enɛ lɛ
mɔ sɔgbe xa hwi kpo xwedo towe kpo gbɔn e
byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e bonu zan xo tɔn
enyi mɔ ɖɔ emi hwedo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe wu ɖo akpa ɖe lɛ xwe hun yi gbe tɔn
enɛ gudo hun xoɖɛ do gan sixu blo bɔ e gbɔn e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nudobiba ɖo wema klisanwun tɔn mitɔn lɛ mɛ sixu bɔ mɔ nu ɖeɖee sɔgbe hugan lɛ e
ali tɛ lɛ lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ sɔnu nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe ɖe
sixu vi towe lɛ bɔ sɔnu nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe gbɔn
lɛ tuun ɖɔ gan jɛn mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ do cobo ɖo jijɔ enɛ
e nɔ nyi gbɔn nu jijɔ vi lɛ ɖo ɖo lɛ e bi e ɔ lɛ ɖo ze tɔn
efɛ enɛ wu ɔ enyi mɔ nu vi towe lɛ ɖo gan do wɛ ɖu ɖo jlo yetɔn lɛ ji hun nɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ emi ɖo ɖagbe ze nu wɛ a ji
nukun kpɛvi do ɖagbe kunnuɖegbe yiyi kple lɛ yiyi kpo nukun kpikpe do sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn kpo wu hwɛhwɛ wa nu e o
enyi vi towe lɛ byɔ nuɖe bonu e byɔ ɖɔ hun ɖi xɛsi gɔn wa o
ɖokpo ɔ nu lɛ nɔ nu vi lɛ e kpo yetɔn kpo ɖo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe vi lɛ
wan yiyi nu acɛkpikpa mawu tɔn kpo sisi ɖiɖo nu nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo nu xɔ akwɛ hugan sixu vi towe lɛ e mɛ xa nunywɛxo
etɛwu sixu ɖeji ɖɔ ɖagbe lɛ dido nyi nyɔna ɖe
xa mɛ ɖo linlin ɖagbe lɛ e wa ɖagbe nu bɔ zan mɛɖeejiɖuɖe sin gbɛzan ɖɔhun
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ walɔ ɖagbe towe do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu towe lɛ
mɛɖeejiɖuɖe mɛ e kɔ do e ɖo dandan cobɔ ɖu vivi mawu tɔn tɔn gbe bi gbe ɖu vivi kancica ɖagbe ɖe tɔn xa towe lɛ
nyi jehovah nyi mawu mawu tin
etɛwu e sixu vɛwu hweɖelɛnu bɔ e se xa mɛ
jehovah togun tɔn bonu e se xa mɛ gbɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ mɛ sixu ɖe jijɔ mawu tɔn nyi e ɖe
jehovah ɖe eɖee mɔyizi gbe ɖokpo gbɔn nyikɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn kpo jijɔ tɔn lɛ ɖiɖɔ kpo gblamɛ
xa
jehovah hɛn ɔ e hlɔnhlɔn tɔn alo nunywɛ tɔn ji
mɔ ɖɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖɔ mawu do gesi jijɔ enɛ lɛ dɔn mɛ e jɛ nukɔn nu ɖevo ɖebu a ce
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do jijɔ nyi e ji enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ se wɛ mɛ ɖevo ɖe e mɛ alo nu tɔn blawu nu mɛ bɔ e ɖe tɔn kpo
etɛ ɖɔ nyi akpaxwe jijɔ tɔn tɔn
etɛwu nu biblu ɖɔ do wu e ɖo ɖu ayi mɛ nu
e da lɛ ɖo akpajlɛ mawu tɔn mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo jehovah nɔ se xa mɛ wutu ɔ ganjininɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn biba nyi akpaxwe jijɔ lɛ tɔn tɔn ɖe
hwɛhwɛ ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee tuun mawu nugbo ɔ a lɛ e lɔ tlɛ nɔ se xa mɛ
flin we ɖeɖee dɔn nu ɖo nukɔn do mɛ nyi vi ɔ sin nɔ tawun e ji e tɔn
enɛ ɛ bɔ e wa nuɖe e a yi gbe ɖɔ e vi ɔ jo nu mɛ wegɔ ɔ axɔ
flin vi nyɔnu tɔn hwlɛn mɔyizi kpo ɖo vu e tɔn gan e
e tuun ganji ɖɔ vi enɛ emi mɔ e ɔ eblee lɛ sin vi wɛ bɔ e kun ɖo nɔ o nu tɔn blawu bɔ e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn hɛn vi ɔ vi eɖesunɔ tɔn ɖɔhun tin
etɛwu xo ɔ ɖo ɖu ayi mɛ nu
ðo biblu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi xwedo jehovah tɔn
efɛ nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e da lɛ bɔ nɔ se xa mɛ hwɛhuhu gu mi ɖu sin adamu nɔ dɔn mi do cejɛnnabi mɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu bɔ mi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ alɔ wɛ mi do mɛ ɖevo lɛ a alo miɖesunɔ ji wɛ mi ayi ɖo a
nu mɛɖe lɛ ɔ ahwan ɖe wɛ bɔ nɔ ɖo funfun wɛ magbokɔ alo tlɛ nɔ tuun wa nu gbɔn tawun e a
etɛ sixu bɔ bɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu hwebinu
nukɔntɔn ɔ zan hwenu gbeje jehovah ɖe gbɔn e kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ lɔ wa gbɔn e kpo
wegɔ ɔ do nu sixu xwedo mawu tɔn gbɔn e kpo le wiwa hɛn wa lɛ e kpo
etɛwu jehovah wɛnsagun lɛ do sodɔmu
etɛ kunkpla lɔti kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn lɛ kpo e mi
mi mɔ jehovah nɔ se xa mɛ gbɔn e tɔn gege
tamɛ do nu mawu wa nu lɔti e ji
kwijikwiji mɛ ɖo sodɔmu kpo kpo lɛ e nɔ zan e nu nya enɛ
nugbo ɔ mawu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ enɛ lɛ jɛxa ku
byɔ e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo ɖɔ hɔn sin toxo enɛ lɛ e ja kun su do gbe e mɛ
xo mawu tɔn ɖo jaan mɛ e ɖɔhun sixu mi bɔ mi e nɔ se xa mɛ gbɔn e gbɔn
e nyi jehovah nɔ se xa mɛ kpowun wɛ a e togun tɔn ɖɔ e ɖo ɖe jijɔ enɛ
mi mawu izlayɛli vi lɛ do awu ɖaxo mɛɖe tɔn yiyi ɖo gbanu bɔ e nyi ganjɛwu ɖɔ e su e ɖu e wu e
syɛn nukun e ɖe sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi yi mɛ emi nya akwɛ e sin awu ɖaxo ɔ bɔ e mɔ nu e cyɔn ayi e a
jehovah togun tɔn ɖɔ e nyi alɔ nu nublawumakunumɛ nuwiwa mɔhun
togun tɔn ɖo nɔ se xa mɛ
nugbododo ɖo bunɔ enɛ mɛ e ɖo mi bɔ mi wa nu a ce
mi jo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ do nyi jɔhɔn alo ɖo xogbe ɖevo mɛ ɔ mi gɔn nu mi sixu wa do ɖe yetɔn lɛ kpo e wa wɛ a ja xa jaan
etɛ gan jehovah do azɔn mɔkpan dɔn izlayɛli vi lɛ wa ali ɖagbe ɔ ji e sixu mi
jehovah se xa togun tɔn izlayɛli hwenu e tlɛ hu hwɛ e
mi xa ɖɔ jehovah mawu yetɔn lɛ tɔn mɛ do do hwetɔnnu bɔ wa ɖɔ xo nu ɖo e jlo hwlɛn togun tɔn kpo nɔtɛn eɖesunɔ tɔn kpo
mi ɖo se xa mɛ ɖo ali mɔhun hwenu mɛɖe lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo mɔ mawu tɔn e a e
enɛ wu ɔ jɛ hwenu mawu su kun do nu nunyanyawiwa e ɔ nu mi kpo ɖo wɛn akpagbanumɛ tɔn ɖe mawu tɔn e jla wɛ
etɛwu xwedo ɖe mɔ ɖɔ jehovah se xa emi
nu jɛ lɛ e gege wɛ e sixu zan do mawu nɔ se xa mɛ gbɔn e
mi ɖɔ xo do nu jɛ do xwedo mɛ sunnuvi xwe mɛvi nɔ nyi milan e ɖe e ji
hwenu akɔhwan ɖo nu gba wɛ ɖo kpo kpo tɔn e wɛ nu ɔ jɛ
milan nɔvi sunnu tɔn tɔn lɛ kpo ɖe lɛ kpo do sin bosnie xwe serbie
ɖaxo ɖe wɛ xwe bɔ ɖo enɛ ji ɔ milan tɔn lɛ blo baptɛm
ee wa dogbo to ɔ tɔn ji e ɔ e ɖe xwedo ɔ sin ɔ mɛ ɖo akɔ yetɔn wutu jo nɔvi kpo lɛ e do nyi ɔ mɛ
ee gan ɔ ci ji nu azan we gudo e ɔ e kanbyɔ mɛ hugan eyɛ e gbɔn hladio ji ɖɔ etɛ emi ɖo wa nu e ji
e ɖo ɖo xwedo ɔ kpa bɔ bi se xosin elɔ gan ɖaxo ɔ e ðe kpowun tu
se nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ e sin mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ
ðo e nɔ gbeje yɔkpɔvu lɛ sin wema ɖe a wutu ɔ mɛ we lɛ ɖɔ nu milan kpo nɔvi sunnu tɔn kpo ɖɔ byɔ emitɔn mɛ ba dogbo ɔ
enɛ gudo ɔ ɖɔ nu vi lɛ tɔn ɖɔ ɖi zɔnlin gbɔn dogbo ɔ gudo wa kpe emi ɖo wegɔ ɔ xwe

e nu bɔ e kpe nukun do tuto xɔgbigba tɔn taji hugan lɛ ɖokpo wu e wɛ nyi tɛmpli jeluzalɛmu tɔn gbigba
xwe ɖe wɛ ɖɛkpɛ bɔ e mɔ mɔhunkɔtɔn ɖo to ɖebu mɛ a
taji hugan ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ tɛmpli ɔ nyi xwe jehovah tɔn
jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ wɛ kpe nukun do tuto xɔgbigba tɔn enɛ wu
axɔsu davidi ɖeji ɖɔ mawu nɔ gudo kpo ɖo vu ɖo nunywɛ ɖe a
e ɖo akɔnkpinkpan wa tɛmpli ɔ a
vu e kpo ɖe e kpo nunywɛ e ɖo a e kpo do afɔ mɛ wɛ a
bonu e kpa ɔ e ɖo jɛ ji
etɛ sixu do akɔnkpinkpan wu ɖo tɔn
e ci ɖɔ nu gege do akɔnkpinkpan wu ɖo eɖesunɔ tɔn ɖɔhun
e ɖe akɔnkpinkpan ɖaxo hwenu e kpe hun xa akowunka ɖe e
davidi jɛxa wa byɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ e gba tɛmpli ɔ
enyi a ɔ xɛsi sixu wa nu do wu tɔn bɔ enɛ nyla hu ɔ wa
etɛwu mi ɖo akɔnkpinkpan sin hudo
ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo hudo alɔdo jehovah tɔn tɔn fo ɔ
enɛ wu ɔ mi tamɛ do akɔnkpinkpan tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɖe lɛ ji
mi tamɛ do mi sixu ɖe akɔnkpinkpan wa mitɔn fo gbɔn e ji
etɛ jiwu nu ɖo akɔnkpinkpan jozɛfu e mɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do akɔnkpinkpan jozɛfu hwenu asi potifaa tɔn dɔn ɛ xa ɛ e ji
e tuun ɖɔ enyi emi nu byɔ wɛ e ɖe e ɔ nu e ji nu emi e kun fa o
e ɖo co e jo gbe a e wa ɔ e ɖe akɔnkpinkpan hɔn bib
hlaxabu nyi akɔnkpinkpan sin ɖevo
ee izlayɛlinu lɛ yi xwe tɔn gbe ɖo jeliko e ɔ e sixu xɛsi lɛkɔ nu
e ɖeji do jehovah wu sunnu we lɛ hwla bɔ lɛkɔ yi xwe joz
hlaxabu yi gbe ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi mawu nugbo ɔ ɖeji ɖɔ e wa gbɔn ɖe to ɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ
e lɔn nu xɛsiɖiɖi nu jɛ xɛsiɖiɖi nu axɔsu jeliko tɔn kpo mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ji wa nu do wu tɔn a
akɔnkpinkpan jezu e wa ɖagbe nu tɔn lɛ gbɔn
jezu tɔn lɛ ze akɔnkpinkpan tɔn ɖagbe ɖe
mɔ akɔnkpinkpan jezu e
timɔtee mi bɔ mi tuun jɔtɛn akɔnkpinkpan tɔn taji ɔ gbɔn
jozɛfu hlaxabu jezu kpo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖe akɔnkpinkpan bɔ enɛ bɔ wa ɖagbe lɛ
mi ɖo ganjɛ miɖee wu a e wa ɔ mi ganjɛ jehovah wu
xa timɔtee
mi ɖɔ xo do akpaxwe gbɛzinzan tɔn byɔ akɔnkpinkpan ɖo mi si e we ji xwedo mɛ kpo agun mɛ kpo
etɛwu klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn
ninɔmɛ gege nɔ kpannukɔn klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ ɖe akɔnkpinkpan ba do jehovah
ze ɖe akɔnkpinkpan wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn fo tɛmpli ɔ e sixu nu bɔ xwedo
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ mɔ lɛ sin yetɔn lɛ yeɖesunɔ ɖo wa gbeta taji lɛ kɔn
nux gbeta nunywɛ kpe bɔ wa kɔn do ɖagbe dido ayiɖeɖayi ɖagbe ji ninɔ ɖo walɔ linu kpo baptɛm biblo kpo wu e bi wɛ nɔ byɔ akɔnkpinkpan
mɛ winnyawinnya enɛ lɛ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn ɖo jlo wa jlo sataan ɖo nu mawu tɔn ɖɔ wɛ e tɔn a wutu
mɔyizi akɔnkpinkpan tɔn ɖagbe ɖe gbɔn
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu xwedo mɔyizi tɔn gbɔn
gbeta taji kɔn mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ wa e kunkpla nu gbe ɖo nya lɛ e
ðo to ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ e nɔ gbidi kɔ nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bonu yi kplɔnyiji alavɔ nya kpe kwɛ e gbe
ðo to ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɔ ninɔmɛ akwɛzinzan tɔn sixu bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo ayi ɖo alɔdido xwedo emitɔn bonu e mɔ nu hudo e ɖo agbaza lixo lɛ e ji
enyi mɔ hwiɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhunkɔtɔn lɛ ɖe mɛ hun tamɛ do mɔyizi tɔn ji
ðo vi nyɔnu tɔn wɛ hɛn mɔyizi bɔ e su wutu ɔ e hɛn ɔ e nya mɛjɔmɛ nyinyi alo dɔkun jijɛ gbe
xwedo tɔn ejipu tɔn lɛ kpo lɛ kpo gbidi kɔ sɔ bonu e wa e
mɔyizi wa a loɔ e nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn biblo ɔ
enɛ bɔ mɔyizi mɔ nyɔna jehovah tɔn ɖo hwetɔnnu bɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nyɔna gege lɛ ɖo ɛ ɖo sɔgudo
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ jehovah do nu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee ɖo wa wɛ kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo nɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nɔ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ jɛ nukɔn ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ lɛ e
e bɔ su nu hudo xwedo yetɔn lɛ e sin do
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ dɔnkpɛvu nɔ nyi timɔtee e nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe hwi lɔ sixu wa
xa filipunu lɛ
kanɖeji ɖo akpaxwe gbɛzan towe tɔn lɛ bi mɛ a
akɔnkpinkpan nɔvi nyɔnu winnyawinnya ɖe bɔ e kpe nu nya wɛ e ɖe lɛ e wu gbɔn
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo alabama etats unis ɖo sɔnu nu akɔnkpinkpan ba nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe
e wlan ɖɔ ee ɖo wɛ e ɔ nɔ ku winnya tawun
e nɔ vɛwu nu mi tawun ɖɔ ma ɖɔ xo nu mɛ lɛ ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ hɔn xuxu nu mɛ tuun ɖebu a lɛ e nyla hu bi
alɔdo tɔn lɛ tɔn kpo mɛ ɖevo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn kpo bɔ klisanwun winnyawinnya enɛ kpe nu gbe nya wɛ e ɖe e wu huzu gbexosin hwebinu tɔn
e ɖɔ sataan tɔn nɔ kplɔnyiji alavɔ mɛjɔmɛ nyinyi akwɛ kpo nuɖokan gege ɖiɖo kpo do ɖo nu ɖagbe e nya e
hwɛhwɛ ɔ e nɔ kpe nu enɛ lɛ wu nɔ wli a bɔ nɔ dɔn adohu adohu kpo wubla kpo wa
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ mɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn ɖe
klisanwun lɛ lɔ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn
e byɔ akɔnkpinkpan ɖo asi towe cobɔ nu enɛ lɛ byɔ ɖo asi towe wɛ e nɔ ɖe hwɛhwɛ lɛ e ɖagbe ɖe nu vi towe lɛ
alo vlafo ɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ nɔ jo vi yetɔn lɛ do bɔ nɔ wa nu ɖeɖee jlo ɖɔ vi towe wa a lɛ e
enɛ lɛ sixu kan nu wu vi towe nɔ wa nu mɔhunkɔtɔn lɛ a e byɔ
tinmɛ hwɛjijɔ wu wa gbeta enɛ kɔn e do mɛ a
ðɛhan kpo eblee lɛ kpo sixu lɛ gbɔn
mi nɔ ɖe akɔnkpinkpan hwenu mi vi mitɔn lɛ bɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe kpewu e
ði ɔ ɖe lɛ sixu xo nu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu vi yetɔn bonu e nya gbexosin tɔn ɖo fi hudo ɖe e ɖo betɛli alo ɖo tuto xɔgbigba tɔn yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ gbe a
lɛ sixu ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ vi emitɔn kun sixu kpe nukun do emi wu hwenu emi kpo e o
e ɖo co lɛ nɔ ɖe akɔnkpinkpan nɔ ɖeji do akpa jehovah tɔn lɛ wu xa ðɛhan eblee lɛ
ɖe lɛ vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe gbɔn
enɛ hɛn le wa gbɔn
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖo etats unis vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe
asu ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ cobonu vi mitɔn lɛ zɔnlin ɖi xo ɖɔ ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ awajijɛ gbexosin tɔn kpo nu agun ɔ kpo nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e nu
nu nya wɛ ɖe din e nɛ
ðo vi mitɔn lɛ ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ nya wɛ wutu ɔ enɛ bɔ huzu kpannukɔn kɔgbidinumɛ sataan tɔn tɔn lɛ ayi ɖo nujɔnu ɔ ji e wɛ nyi jehovah
nɔvi sunnu ɖo vi we e ɖe wlan ɖɔ gege nɔ zan hlɔnhlɔn kpo akwɛ gege kpo do nɔ vi yetɔn lɛ bonu nya nu ɖe lɛ gbe ɖo lɔnyiji fɔnkan ayiɖeɖayi kpo wemaxɔmɛ yiyi kpo linu
nu mi zan hlɔnhlɔn kpo akwɛ kpo do vi mitɔn lɛ bonu nya nu ɖeɖee bɔ nu yetɔn jehovah nukunmɛ lɛ e gbe ɔ e ɖo hugan
hwenu mi mɔ vi mitɔn lɛ bɔ kpewu wli nu nya wɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e mɔ ɖɔ mi e ɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo wɛ enɛ mi
sixu kudeji ɖɔ mawu do nu ɖeɖee nɔ vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ nɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nɔ kpewu e
e ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
ði ɔ mɛxo lɛ ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn hwenu kpe nukun do hwɛɖiɖɔxo lɛ wu e alo hwenu ɖo alɔ do mɛ sin ɖo ɖo azɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe wu wɛ e
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe lɛ nɔ yi mɛ ɖo gankpa mɛ lɛ e nɔ kpe nukun do hudo gbigbɔ tɔn yetɔn lɛ wu
bɔ nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ lɛ lo
ali gege hun nu din bɔ kan nu yetɔn gbɔn gbexosin wiwa tɛn sisɛ yi fi hudo ɖe e xa nɔ blo tuto xɔgbigba tɔn ðo alaxɔ mɛ e e kpo wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ yiyi kpo gblamɛ
mɛɖe lɛ tlɛ nɔ kpewu nɔ yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn
nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ lɛ sixu ɖe akɔnkpinkpan gbɔn
nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ lɛ nyi nyɔna ɖe nu agun ɔ
mi yi wan nu nɔvi nyɔnu enɛ lɛ tawun
mɛ ɖe lɛ sixu nɔ kpewu nɔ wa nu gege ɖo mawu tɔn mɛ nɔ blo gbɔn e sixu kpo ɖo akɔnkpinkpan wɛ van kan xa titu
ði ɔ nu e byɔ ɖo nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ ɖe si ɖɔ e ɖɔ xo nu nɔvi nyɔnu winnyawinnya ɖe do nusisɔ ɖo ji e wu ɔ e byɔ akɔnkpinkpan ɖo asi tɔn
ðe e kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖɔ nu tɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu emi e sixu kɔ do nu ɖagbe mɛ
nɔvi sunnu blo baptɛm lɛ e sixu ɖe akɔnkpinkpan gbɔn
filipunu lɛ kpo kpo sixu nɔvi sunnu lɛ bɔ sɔnu nu akɔnkpinkpan gbɔn
mɛ ɖevo ɖo jɛ ji lɛ e wɛ nyi nɔvi sunnu blo baptɛm lɛ e
e ɖo co mɛɖe lɛ sixu xo nu gɔn yeɖee ze jo
boya nɔvi sunnu ɖe sixu wa nuɖe lɛ nyi do wa yi bɔ din ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ emi kun jɛxa nyi ɖe alo mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe o
nɔvi sunnu ɖevo sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi kun kpe nu wu wa e nu emi e o
nu nu nɔ ci nu hun tuun ɖɔ jehovah sixu bɔ sɔnu nu akɔnkpinkpan xa filipunu lɛ
jehovah mɔyizi bɔ ɖo hwetɔnnu ɔ e sɔnu nu akɔnkpinkpan ɔ
tamɛ linlin do mɛ ɖe akɔnkpinkpan lɛ e tɔn ji lɔ sixu
e sixu eɖee hwe byɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo fi ɖebu hudo tiin ɖe e
mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi sunnu blo baptɛm lɛ e bi ɖɔ syɛnsyɛn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
ganjɛwu tɛ davidi
jiɖe tɛ mi sixu ɖo
axɔsu davidi flin ɖɔ jehovah nɔ xa ɛ jɛ hwenu tɛmpli ɔ fo do e
ðo xo sin ɖɔ e ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ wu ɔ e tɛn vu e kpo ɖe e kpo nunywɛ e ɖo a e kpo nu do afɔ mɛ a
e ɖe akɔnkpinkpan ɖaxo jɛ ji bɔ kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ e fo tɛmpli jiwu ɔ ɖo xwe tɛnwe adaɖe gblamɛ
jehovah gbɔn e ɔ e sixu mi lɔ bɔ mi mitɔn fo ɖo xwedo mitɔn kpo agun ɔ kpo mɛ eza
nu mi ɖe akɔnkpinkpan ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ e do nu mi ɖo din kpo sɔgudo kpo
enɛ wu ɔ kpan jɛ ji
mɔ afɔ tawun tawun e ɖe nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe e ɖe lɛ ɖo xota yi yanwle gbigbome ton le pagigona medato towe ee ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe juillet tɔn mɛ e
nugbo ɔ gbehan nɔ xu folowa nɔ mlu ɖa xo mawu mitɔn ɖɔ ɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi eza
hwenu gbe lɛ ɖo ɖyɔɖyɔ wɛ e gbɔn
hwenu toxoɖiɖɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ e gbɔn
hwenu e klan gbe xa lilɛ lilɛ tɔn do gbe ɖevo mɛ e gbɔn
ci biblu mɛvo
etɛ sixu bɔ mi ɖu le xo mawu tɔn tɔn tawun
sixu do nukun mɛ towe ci biblu mɛvo e a
mɔ weɖexamɛ ɖe nu gbɛzinzan towe ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn a
mɔ xosin ɖagbe ɖe nu nukanbyɔ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo do mawu kpo sɔgudo kpo wu e a
jɛn tuun nuɖe do jehovah wa nu xa lɛ gbɔn ɖo hwexonu e wu a e nɛ
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ kun ɖo ninɔmɛ blawu enɛ mɛ o
jehovah mi xo tɔn nyi biblu ɔ e
bɔ e ganjɛwu mi ɖɔ wɛn e nɔ ayi sɔyi
ɖe xo sin ezayii mɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ wemafɔ enɛ kun ɖo biblu do gesi wɛ tlɔlɔ o xo enɛ mawu do ayi mɛ nu mɛ e ɔ e gblo ada ɔ e sɔgbe xa wɛn biblu tɔn xa
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi sixu ɖu le nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e tɔn tawun nu ɖo gbe mi se ɔ ɖe mɛ ɔ nɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu xo mawu tɔn lɛ e mɔ nu jɛ enɛ mɛ
e nɔ bɔkun hwebinu a co ɖo xwe lɛ vlamɛ ɔ ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ ɖokan do mawuxowema ɔ lilɛ lilɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ kpo mima tɔn kpo wu
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi gbeje xo mawu tɔn nɔ ayi gbɔn hwenu gbe lɛ ɖo ɖyɔɖyɔ wɛ e hwenu toxoɖiɖɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ wa nu do gbe lɛ nɔ do kpaa lɛ e wu e kpo hwenu e klan gbe xa lilɛ lilɛ tɔn do gbe ɖevo mɛ e kpo
mi sixu ɖu le nu enɛ mi gbeje e tɔn gbɔn
bɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu biblu tɔn mi xo tɔn nu le mitɔn e micee hlɔ
xwe lɛ ɖo yiyi wɛ ɔ gbe lɛ nɔ ɖo ɖyɔɖyɔ wɛ gbɔn
etɛ nɔ ɖɔ mawu kun nɔ ɖe gbe ɖe ɖo vo nu ɖevo o enɛ ci nu
vlafo sixu tamɛ do gbe nɔ do e ɖyɔ gbɔn lɛ e ji
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu ebleegbe kpo glɛkigbe kpo ɖeɖee mɛ e wlan ɖibla nyi biblu ɔ bi xwii do e
ebleegbe kpo glɛkigbe kpo e nɔ do ɖo egbe e gbɔn vo sese nu ee e nɔ do ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ ɖibla nyi mɛ ɖo mɔjɛmɛ xo mawu tɔn tɔn lɛ e bi ɖo xa lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn ɖe e tlɛ nyi mɛ ɖeɖee se ebleegbe alo glɛkigbe azan mitɔn gbe tɔn lɛ e ɔ nɛ
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ emi ɖo ebleegbe kpo glɛkigbe kpo hwexonu tɔn mɔ tɛn do sixu xa biblu do gbe dodo lɛ mɛ
nu enɛ wa e sixu nɔ hɛn le wa nu gbɔn e
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ e lilɛ biblu ɔ blebu alo akpaxwe tɔn ɖe do gbe jɛji mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah ɖɔ ali ɔ hun nu akɔta bi gbe bi bonu ɖu le xo tɔn tɔn xa
nu enɛ blo bɔ sɛkpɔ mawu wanyiyinɔ mitɔn nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ a e hu tɔn a ce mɛ
etɛ wɛ bɔ bible du jacques nyi lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn taji ɖe
lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn ee mɛ e mɔ nu jɛ ganji ɖo hwenu e e ɖe sixu wa huzu nu zan a e ɖe ɖo nukɔnmɛ
ðo ayi kunkpla lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu glɛnsigbe tɔn ɖe e wu
e ɖe bible du jacques azɔn nukɔntɔn ɖo
e wa huzu ɖokpo ɖo biblu glɛnsigbe tɔn gbakpe lɛ e mɛ wa wa nu do glɛnsigbe ji tawun
bible du jacques dɔn ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn wa nyikɔ mawu tɔn ji a
e zan nyikɔ jehovah ɖo wemafɔ kpɛɖe kpowun mɛ zan wekwin ɖaxo lɛ do wlan tɛnmɛ nyikɔ aklunɔ do wemafɔ ɖevo ɖeɖee mɛ nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖe ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ wemazinxɔsa lɛ lɔ zan wekwin ɖaxo lɛ do wlan tɛnmɛ nyikɔ aklunɔ do wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ mɛ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ
ðo ali enɛ ɔ bible du jacques tuun tɛn mɛ nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖo nɔ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ alɛnuwema e mɛ e ganji
etɛwu du monde nouveau tiin e su nukun mitɔn mɛ
e ɖo co xwe lɛ ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ gege xogbe ɖo bible du jacques mɛ lɛ e tɔn wa jɛ xo do ji
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu biblu nukɔn nukɔntɔn e lilɛ do gbe ɖevo lɛ lɔ mɛ e lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ les saintes ecritures
du monde nouveau mi ɖo egbe bɔ e lilɛ do e nɔ do gbe lɛ gbɔn ɖo egbe e lɔ ji e su nukun towe mɛ a ce
lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ enɛ blebu tɔn alo akpaxwe tɔn ɖe ɖo gbe jɛji mɛ enɛ ɖɔ e tiin nu mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ egbe lɛ e habu
xogbe tɔn ɖo wɛn lɛ e nɔ bɔ wɛn ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e nɔ byɔ ayi mitɔn mɛ
ðɛh nu tawun e wɛ nyi ɖɔ du monde nouveau nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖo tɛn mɛ e ɖo nɔ lɛ e
etɛwu nukunnu mimɔ jɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ vɛwu nu gege jwifu xwe kanweko atɔngɔ tɔn lɛ
mawu lɔn bonu nukɔnyiyi enɛ hɛn xo tɔn nu togun tɔn a gbɔn
hwexonu tɔn ɖe mi bɔ mi mɔ xosin ɔ
wema biblu tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ ɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ alo jwifu lɛ wɛ wlan
e ɖo co xwe kanweko atɔngɔ ɔ ɔ gege jwifu lɛ tɔn nɔ mɔ nu jɛ ebleegbe mɛ a
aniwu
ðo alexandre le kan nu axɔsuɖuto glɛki tɔn gbɔn ahwanfunfun tɔn lɛ gblamɛ
ee jwifu gege jɛ glɛkigbe do ji e ɔ nukunnu mimɔ jɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ wa jɛ nu mɛ gege ji
e ɖeɖɛ xo enɛ gbɔn
ðo xwe kanweko atɔngɔ sin tɛntin ɔ e lilɛ wema nukɔntɔn biblu tɔn lɛ sin ebleegbe mɛ do glɛkigbe mɛ
e wa lilɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e kpe ɖo xwe kanweko wegɔ
e wa ylɔ xokple wema biblu tɔn enɛ lɛ tɔn ɖɔ septante glɛkigbe tɔn
akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e blebu tɔn sin lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ wa nyi septante ɔ
septante kpo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ nukɔntɔn ɖevo lɛ kpo xo mawu tɔn lɛ gbɔn
wemafɔ biblu tɔn tɛ yi wan tawun ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ
septante jwifu nɔ do glɛkigbe lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo bɔ nɔ xa akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e
do nukunmɛ e akpakpa ɖɔ se alo xa xo mawu tɔn ɖo gbe wa huzu anɔnugbe yetɔn e mɛ gbɔn e
e wa ya e ɔ e lilɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn lɛ do gbe kpaa e nɔ do lɛ e ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɖi syriaque gotique kpo kpo
ðo lɛ nɔ gbeje nuwlanwlan lɛ do gbe mɛ sixu mɔ nu jɛ e wutu ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gege yetɔn ɖo wemafɔ biblu tɔn yi wan lɛ e e nyi gbɔn nu mi lɔ ɖo egbe e xa ðɛhan
nugbo ɔ gbe mɛ lɛ nɔ do kpaa lɛ e nɔ ɖo ɖyɔɖyɔ wɛ xo mawu tɔn nɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi
etɛwu gege lɛ tɔn ɖo biblu ɖo hwenu john wycliffe nɔ e a
e wa ya e ɔ ɖeɖee ɖo tawun lɛ e do gan bonu mɛ kpaa lɛ mɔ biblu xa o
e ɖo co ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ gbi dɔn ɖo gbeklanxamɛ enɛ nukɔn
ði ɔ ɖo ayi sinsɛn xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ john wycliffe e wu
e ɖi nu syɛnsyɛn ɖɔ lɛ bi ɖo kpe nu wu ɖu le xo mawu tɔn tɔn
ɖo hwetɔnnu ɔ kpaa ɖo angleterre lɛ e nɔ mɔ biblu xa a
hwɛjijɔ ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ gege mɛ lɛ tɔn sixu kpewu xɔ biblu a ɖo wlan wɛ e nɔ wlan ɖo alɔ wu bɔ tɔn nɔ tawun
ɔ gege mɛ lɛ tɔn se wema a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ amisa jɛn yi cobo se bɔ e xa akpaxwe biblu tɔn lɛ
e ɖo co e ci ɖɔ kun nɔ mɔ nu jɛ nu nɔ se lɛ e mɛ o ɖɔhun etɛwu
ðo mɛ wɛ biblu yi gbe bɔ e nɔ zan ɖo amisa ɔ e ɖe
ɖo hwenɛnu ɔ kpaa lɛ mɔ nu jɛ ɔ mɛ a
dɔkun xɔ akwɛ ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ɔ mɔ gbɔn nux
john wycliffe kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo jlo blo bɔ xo mawu tɔn tiin nu mɛ bi
hwɛ ɖo jlo mɔhun a
biblu wycliffe tɔn mɛ lɛ gbɔn
ðo ɔ e ɖe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ glɛnsigbe tɔn e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ biblu wycliffe tɔn e
biblu enɛ gbakpe ahwanvu wycliffe tɔn lɛ si
hwɛhwɛ ɔ lollard lɛ nɔ xa wemafɔ ɖe lɛ sin biblu wycliffe tɔn mɛ nu mɛ ɖeɖee xo go lɛ e nɔ wema e wlan kpo alɔ kpo e ɖe nu
gan do lɛ e bɔ huzuhuzu ɖaxo ɖe tiin jlo mɛ lɛ ɖo nu xo mawu tɔn e wa
sinsɛngan lɛ wa nu gbɔn xa wycliffe kpo e wa e kpo
sinsɛngan lɛ wa nu gbɔn
wan nu wycliffe biblu tɔn kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ kpo
sinsɛngan lɛ doya nu lollard lɛ su kun do nu biblu wycliffe tɔn mɔ lɛ e bi e tlɛ nyi ɖo ku wycliffe tɔn gudo ɔ e kpo ɖo nyi wɛ ɖo nukunmɛ
amisa ɔ kpe nu wu ali nu hlɔnhlɔn xo mawu tɔn tɔn bonu mɛ ɖo jlo xa ba mɔ nu jɛ mɛ lɛ e tɔn kpo a
ðo xwe kanweko bɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ mɛ gege ɖo elɔpu kpo akpaxwe ɔ tɔn ɖevo lɛ kpo jɛ biblu lilɛ lilɛ do gbe ɖevo mɛ kpo mima tɔn kpo sin kan xo ji nu le kpaa lɛ tɔn
etɛ ji mi ku do
enɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn nuɖiɖi mitɔn gbɔn
egbe ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ mawu wɛ xo lɛ do ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ bɔ wa septante tɔn tɔn biblu wycliffe tɔn tɔn bible du jacques tɔn tɔn alo biblu ɖevo ɖebu tɔn a
enyi mi lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ enɛ lɛ kpo gege ɖevo e lɛ e kpo tɔn ji gbɔn ɔ mi mɔ nugbo xo elɔ tɔn jehovah tɔn gbɔn e ɔ xo tɔn nɔ ayi sɔyi
nu enɛ hlɔnhlɔn nuɖiɖi towe ɖɔ akpa jehovah tɔn ɖevo lɛ bi jɛnu gbɔn a ce joz
xo mawu tɔn hlɔnhlɔn wanyiyi mi ɖo e gbɔn
e nyi nuɖiɖi mitɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ biblu nɔ ayi sɔyi ɖo xwe lɛ gblamɛ gbɔn bɔ mi ɖɔ xo e hlɔnhlɔn a loɔ e hlɔnhlɔn wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah e
etɛwu e xo tɔn mi jɛ nukɔn
etɛwu e mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ e nɔ xo nu lɛ bi zlɛ
ðo e yi wan nu mi jlo mi mi wa gbɔn bɔ nu nɔ nu mi e xa ezayii
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi yi gbe nu wanyiyi jehovah tɔn gbɔn wan yiyi kpo tonusise nu tɔn lɛ kpo gblamɛ jaan
e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi su ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo xo mawu tɔn su nukun mitɔn mɛ wutu ɔ mi jlo ɖu le tɔn bi
mi sixu ɖu le biblu xixa mɛɖesunɔ tɔn tɔn hugan gbɔn
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi dɔn ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn wa biblu ji ɖo ɔ mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ mɛ sin ataa ji lɛ e sixu blo gbɔn bɔ nukplɔnmɛ yetɔn jinjɔn biblu ji
mi mɔ xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ tɔn ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
xota faut il apprendre et le grec
ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe mɛ
gbavi nɔ do mɔ towe
ðo avril ɔ e hun biblu xoxo sɛxwetɛn ɖe ɖo hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn ɖo warwick ɖo etats unis
nyikɔ e nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn enɛ e wɛ nyi biblu kpo nyikɔ mawu tɔn kpo
mi ylɔ ɖɔ ɖi sa wa hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn wa fi e nu xoxo biblu tɔn lɛ kpo fi ɖevo e nu xoxo ɖevo do lɛ e kpo
kɛnklɛn yi www jw org ji do flansegbe mɛ yi tɛnmɛ nu saɖiɖi enɛ
zin qui sommes
sieges infos visites
mawuxo ɔ ɖo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ebl
ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ gbɔn
ɖo ɔ mɛ gbɔn
hwenu ɖo nu mɛ wɛ sin ataa ji e gbɔn
etɛwu e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ xo mawu tɔn ɖo hlɔnhlɔn
ðo mi nyi togun jehovah tɔn wutu ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi tuun ɖɔ xo tɔn nyi wɛn ɖe nu lɛ e ɖo ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ebl
gege mitɔn nyi kunnuɖenu ɖo e ɖɔ biblu ɖo hlɔnhlɔn nɔ huzu gbɛzan mɛtɔn
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn ɖe lɛ kpo nyi kannumɔ nu gee alo
mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo gbɛmɛ fi sin nu lɛ ɖo ba ɖe mɛ mɔ ɖɔ nuɖe hwe do gbɛzan emitɔn
vlafo sixu xa xota ɖebɔdoɖewu nɔ nyi biblu nɔ huzu gbɛzan mɛtɔn e ɖe lɛ ɖo atɔxwɛ mɛ ɖu le huzuhuzu mɛ lɛ blo e tɔn
sixu mɔ ɖɔ klisanwun enɛ lɛ yi nugbo ɔ co kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kpo alɔdo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn kpo
xo mawu tɔn ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ gbɔn
e ɖo kpaca mi ɖɔ mɛ ɖo egbe lɛ e gege blo huzuhuzu nukunɖeji lɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn kplɔnkplɔn wu wɛ a
eo
nu enɛ flin mi nɔvi mitɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo nukunɖiɖo jixwe tɔn lɛ e xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
ee pɔlu ɖeɖee ɖu gu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn a lɛ e gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu mɛɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ nyi ɔ nɛ
mawuxowema ɔ kpo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn kpo bɔ huzu
yi nugbo ɔ co mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo blo huzuhuzu ɖevo lɛ
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi se tagba vovo mitɔn lɛ ɖi xwi xa ɖu gbɔn xo mawu tɔn gblamɛ e a ce
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
ðo xo mawu tɔn nyi azɔwanu hlɔnhlɔnnɔ ɖe ɖo asi mitɔn wutu ɔ mi jlo tawun zan ɖo ali ɖagbe hugan ɔ
tim ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do mi sixu jo xo mawu tɔn do bɔ e ɖe hlɔnhlɔn tɔn bi gbɔn ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ e hwenu mi ɖo alɔ ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ wɛ e kpo hwenu mi ɖo nu mɛ wɛ sin ataa ji e kpo wu
nuflinmɛ enɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi ɖe wanyiyi kpo nusumɛnukunmɛ kpo wanyiyinɔ mitɔn jixwe tɔn nɔ mi nu le mitɔn e eza
enyi xo mawu tɔn ɖo mi wu ɔ etɛ mi ɖo wa
nɔ mɔ hwenu nu biblu xixa gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ alɔnu gege mitɔn tɔn nɔ jan
mi sixu lɔn nu nu ɖebu jɛ taji lɛ ji bonu jɛ aca biblu xixa tɔn mitɔn mɛ a xa efɛzinu lɛ
mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ gege hwenu nɔ xa biblu ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e sixu nyi ɖo ayitehɔnnu alo ɖo zanmɛ kabi ɖo hweɖenu ɖo avla we enɛ lɛ mɛ
nu ci nu ɔ e wɛ e nɔ ci nu e wlan ɖɔ yi wan nu towe looo
e wu wɛ nɔ tamɛ do hwebinu ðɛh
etɛwu tamɛ linlin ɖo taji
mi sixu tamɛ ganji gbɔn
hwiɖesunɔ ɖu le xo mawu tɔn xixa kpo tamɛ linlin tɔn kpo gbɔn
enɛ kɛɖɛ jɛn mi bɔ mi kpewu zan nunywɛ ɖo dogbo lɛ e ganji
wema mɛ xa xo mawu tɔn ɖe wɛ mi ɖe a alo tablɛti kabi nu mɔhun lɛ ji wɛ a nu gbe mi ɖo nya e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖe xo e sin xo tɔn mɛ do ayi mitɔn mɛ
mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ e ɖɔ e yi ji kpɛɖe ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe xixa gudo kan nu lehun lɛ byɔ etɛ nu elɔ mi do jehovah wu
ali tɛ lɛ ɖo nugbododo ɖo akpaxwe mawuxo ɔ tɔn elɔ mɛ lɛ e zan ɖe wɛ
fitɛ lɛ wɛ sixu jla nyiɖee ɖo ɖe
enyi mi nɔ xoɖɛ nɔ tamɛ do xo mawu tɔn ji ɔ enɛ mi bɔ mi zan weɖexamɛ tɔn lɛ hugan
mɛ ɔ mi jo e do bɔ e ɖe hlɔnhlɔn tɔn hugan ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ kɔ
mi ɖo zan xo mawu tɔn ganji gbɔn ɖo mitɔn mɛ
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi zan xo mawu tɔn ganji ɖo mitɔn mɛ
nu nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi zan faa hwenu mi ɖo mawuxo ɖɔ wɛ ɖo nu mɛ wɛ e
nɔvi sunnu ɖokpo ɖɔ xo do enɛ wu gbɔn le enyi ɖo wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ xa jehovah ɖesu sin xwe ɖe gbe jɛ xwe ɖe gbe ɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo lɛ bi kpowun wɛ a alo nɔ jo e do bɔ e nɔ ɖɔ xo
xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi mi xa nu sin xo mawu tɔn mɛ tlɔlɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ hun mi ɖo jehovah jo do wɛ bɔ e ɖo xo ɖɔ nu ɔ wɛ nɛ
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ nɔ zan ali hun nu mi lɛ e bi do ma akpaxwe xo mawu tɔn tɔn ɖe xa mɛ nɔ hɛn wɛn ɔ yi jo lɛ e a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wemafɔ biblu tɔn lɛ xixa nu mɛ mi ɖo xo ɖɔ ɖo xa wɛ lɛ e kpowun kun kpe o
ðo mɛ gege tiin ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖe alo ɖebu do biblu ji a
e nyi ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ nyi ɖo egbe
mi ɖo zan hwenu do ɖe akpaxwe ɖe lɛ sin wemafɔ ɔ mɛ vlafo gbɔn xokwin taji lɛ xa kpo mɔjɛmɛ yetɔn nina kpo gblamɛ
wiwa hugan bɔ wɛn ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ ɔ byɔ linlin kpo ayi lɛ tɔn kpo mɛ xa luki
mi sixu xwle wemafɔ lɛ mɛ ɖo ali bɔ e ɖo sisi nu biblu e gbɔn
e ɖɔ mi xwle wemafɔ lɛ mɛ ɖo ali bɔ e ɖo sisi nu biblu e
ði ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ mi nu ɔ ɖɔ do xo enɛ wu e
enyi mi ɖo xo ɖɔ xa mɛ nyi klisanwun a e ɖe wɛ ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ ðo ayi nu nuwlanwlan lɛ ɖɔ nu mi e wu
alo enyi mi ɖo wɛnɖagbe jla mɛ nyi e ɖe wɛ ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ se lo hwexonu tɔn elɔ a
ðɔ nu nɔvi sunnu ɖe mɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ e mɔ hlɔnhlɔn xo mawu tɔn ɖo e ɖo towe mɛ gbɔn
nɔvi sunnu ɖe yi mɛxomɔ nɔ xa xojlawema mitɔn lɛ sin xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie e ɖe
e hɛn ɔ e xwle e atɔxwɛ yaɖeyaɖe ɔ kpowun nɔvi ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn xa wemafɔ e mɔ ɖo xojlawema ɔ mɛ e ɖokpo nu dawe ɔ
e xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ finɛ ɖɔ nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖo ali bi e nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ
xogbe enɛ lɛ akpakpa ɔ bɔ e byɔ nɔvi sunnu ɔ ɖɔ e xa wemafɔ ɔ azɔn wegɔ ɔ
dawe ɔ ɖɔ e kpo asi tɔn kpo ɖo hudo gbɔdonumɛ tɔn gbɔn e bɔ din ɔ e ɖɔ emi ɖo jlo ɖo wɛn biblu tɔn mɛ
yi gbe ɖɔ xo mawu tɔn nɔ ɖe hlɔnhlɔn tɔn ɖo mitɔn mɛ a ce mɛ
tɛ nɔvi sunnu nɔ nu mɛ sin ataa ji lɛ e ɖo
