jehovah sinsɛn wɛ nyi hwɛjijɔ nukɔntɔn wu mi nɔ yi kple lɛ e
mi nɔ ɖu vivi nukplɔnmɛ gbigbɔ tɔn mi nɔ mɔ ɖo finɛ lɛ e tɔn tawun
nɔvi ɖeɖee nɔ ɖɔ xo sin ataa ji ɖo hwe enɛ lɛ lɛ e ɔ wujɔmɛ ɖaxo wɛ ɖo
ɖo bɔ hwebinu ɔ nukplɔnmɛ yetɔn lɛ nɔ jinjɔn xo mawu tɔn ji ganji
enyi e ɖe nu bonu nu mɛ sin ataa ji ɔ sixu jo biblu do bɔ e ɖe hlɔnhlɔn tɔn ɖo towe hwenu gbɔn
ɖe bɔ xoɖiɖɔ tɔn jinjɔn biblu ji gbɔn
bonu xoɖiɖɔ towe junjɔn mawuxowema ɔ ji
nukɔntɔn ɔ lɔn bonu xo ɖɔ lɛ e nujlɛdonuwu lɛ e alo ɖo xo ɔ xwle mɛ wɛ gbɔn e cyɔn yɛ wemafɔ biblu tɔn zan lɛ e ji alo ɖe ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn sin ji o
wegɔ ɔ flin ɖɔ wemafɔ biblu tɔn gege xixa kpowun kun ɖɔ e nu mɛ sin biblu mɛ o
nugbo ɔ sixu zan wemafɔ biblu tɔn gege bɔ ɖe ci ayi lɛ tɔn mɛ a
enyi xoɖiɖɔ sin wema tutoblonunu ɔ sɔnu e ɖe ji wɛ xoɖiɖɔ towe junjɔn hun xoɖiɖɔ sin wema ɔ kpo wemafɔ lɛ e kpo
mɔ nu jɛ kancica ɖo xo ɖo xoɖiɖɔ sin wema ɔ ji lɛ e kpo ee ɖo wemafɔ lɛ tɛntin e kpo mɛ
enɛ gudo hun wemafɔ lɛ do nu taji ɖo xoɖiɖɔ sin wema ɔ ji lɛ e mɛ
sixu mɔ ɖagbe lɛ ɖo moaleyi son wehome lizonyizon yewheholuduta ton me nukplɔnkplɔn jɛ
taji bi ɔ xoɖɛ byɔ ɖɔ jehovah bonu ɖe linlin xɔ akwɛ ɖo xo tɔn mɛ lɛ e xa ɛsidlasi nwt nunywɛxo
e zan wemafɔ biblu tɔn lɛ ɖo kple klisanwun tɔn ɖe ji bɔ e wa ɖagbe nu nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe gbɔn
ɖu le nukplɔnmɛ junjɔn biblu ji e nɔ xwle mi ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ ji e tɔn gbɔn
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nɔ australie bɔ e zan wemafɔ lɛ gbɔn ɖo kple klisanwun tɔn ɖe ji e wa ɖagbe tawun
ninɔmɛ mɛ e ɛ bɔ e su ɖe e nyla tawun co e yi wɛn biblu tɔn ze gbɛzan tɔn jo nu jehovah
e ɖo co e vɛwu bɔ e yi gbe ɖɔ jehovah yi wan nu emi
e wa ya e ɔ e kudeji ɖɔ mawu yi wan nu emi
etɛ ɛ bɔ e mɔ
e zan xo mawu tɔn ɖo kple lɛ lɛ kpo ɖaxo lɛ kpo ji bɔ wa ɖagbe nu gbɔn vlafo a nɛɛ
mi sixu ɖɔ xo jehovah tɔn su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
mi ɖo doku nu jehovah ɖo xo tɔn biblu ɔ wu a ce
e nyi na kɛɖɛ wɛ e lɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo a loɔ e ɖe akpa tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ ayi sɔyi e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi xa xo mawu tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ zan ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ zan do mɛ ɖevo lɛ
mɛ ɔ mi wanyiyi mi ɖo nu dɔkun mawu tɔn enɛ e kpo e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo bɔ ɖo taji bi ɔ enɛ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu tɔn jehovah mawu e kpo e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo
gbavi huzuhuzu ðe
nɔ tamɛ
ðe akpaxwe taji lɛ sin wemafɔ ɖe mɛ tin mɛ
xwle wemafɔ lɛ mɛ ɖo ali ɖe bonu mɛ lɛ ɖo sisi nu xo mawu tɔn hugan
bonu xoɖiɖɔ towe junjɔn mawuxowema ɔ ji
lɔn bonu xo ɖɔ lɛ e nujlɛdonuwu lɛ e alo ɖo xo ɔ xwle mɛ wɛ gbɔn e cyɔn yɛ biblu ɔ ji o
zan hwenu do tin wemafɔ xa lɛ e mɛ na nujlɛdonuwu e zan gbɔn e
victoria mɔ nugbo ɔ bɔ e ɖo xwe mɔkpan co e vɛwu bɔ e yi gbe ɖɔ mawu yi wan nu emi
mawu ɛ bɔ e wa mɔ ɖɔ e yi wan nugbo nugbo gbɔn
huzuhuzu ɖe wa tiin ee blo baptɛm blo xwe gudo e
ðo xoɖiɖɔ ɖe hwenu ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ ɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do jaki wu
wemafɔ enɛ lɛ xo mawu tɔn do ɖe wu bɔ mi sixu mɔ miɖee jehovah nɔ mɔ mi gbɔn e ɖo enɛ ɔ mɛ
jɛ kinkanbyɔ nyiɖee ji ɖɔ nu nɔ mɔ ɖo nyiɖee wu e gbɔn vo nu ee jehovah nɔ mɔ e wɛ a ji
azan yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ xa wemafɔ ɖe bɔ gbɛzan huzu
enyi hwɛ mitɔn lɛ mya ɔ we tete avɔkanfun ɖɔhun
e ci nu mi ɖɔ jehovah ɖo ɖiɖɔ nu mi wɛ ɖɔ vicky wa nu mi se nu jɛ miɖee gbe mɛ
tuun tuun hwɛ hu lɛ e tuun ayi towe yi wan nu
sixu zan enɛ mɛ a
ajijimɛ ɔ jɛ mimɔ ji ɖɔ jehovah ɖo suulu do wutu nu hwenu linlin mi ɖɔ emi yi wan nu mi ɖo ali gege
e ci ɖɔ ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ wanyiyi towe dagba cyɔn ji a
vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn vi towe tɔn kpewu sunsun hwɛ lɛ a
e ci ɖɔ ɖo gbɛxixɔ ɔ do asi nu jehovah wɛ ɖɔhun
din ɔ tamɛ linlin do nunina gbɛxixɔ ɔ tɔn ji bɔ wa jɛ mimɔ ji ɖɔ jehovah yi wan nu mi
gbɛzan tɔn nu jehovah byɔ e wiwa nɔ hɛn nyɔna lɛ wa
yi wan titewungbe nu mɛ ðo nuwiwa lɛ mɛ
wanyiyi adodwe wɛ nɔ ɖe klisanwun nugbo lɛ
nugbo ɔ hɛn fifa wa a loɔ hwi wɛ e hɛn wa
kɔ hɛnnumɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo nugbo ɔ wu a e sixu bɔ vɛwu nu togun jehovah tɔn
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ mi sixu ɖi xwi xa gbeklanxamɛ xwedo tɔn nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e kpa mi gbɔn e
jozɛfu alimateenu ɔ ðɔ emi nyi ahwanvu jezu tɔn
numimɔ zakalii tɔn lɛ kan gbɔn
ahwankɛkɛvi lɛ kpo axɔsugbakun ɖe kpo nɔ nya xɛ ðo ji towe
xota elɔ lɛ ɖɔ xo do numimɔ zakalii tɔn ayizɛngɔ ɔ tɛnwegɔ ɔ kpo tantɔngɔ ɔ kpo ji
numimɔ ayizɛngɔ ɔ kpo tɛnwegɔ ɔ kpo mi bɔ wujɔmɛ mi ɖo wa ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn mɛ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ
numimɔ tantɔngɔ ɔ mi jehovah nɔ nya xɛ ɖo tɔn lɛ ji bonu mɔ tɛn do blo sinsɛn nugbo ɔ gbɔn e
klisanwun tɔn sin nuwiwa ðokpo
mɛ tɔn wɛ e matthews
mi wa
nyi kpo asu kpo nu fofo kpo asi tɔn kpo yi gbe nu byɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa ɖe e gbɔn e nɛ
mi nu ma ɖɔ xo kpɛɖe nu do nyiɖee wu
e ji mi ɖo ɖo hemsworth toxo yorkshire tɔn ɖe wɛ ɖo angleterre
ɖo fofo ɖokpo nɔ nyi
hwenu ɖo xwe tɛnnɛ e ɔ mitɔn nyi mɛɖe wan nu yɛmɛnuwiwa sinsɛn tɔn e mɔ wema ɖe lɛ bɔ ɖe sinsɛn nuvu lɛ
nu e xa lɛ e kpaca ɛ tawun
xwe yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ atkinson wa xwe mitɔn gbe xo xoɖiɖɔ nɔvi tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖo glamafonu ji
mi wu ɖɔ ɖe wema lɛ tɔn e ɖokpo ɔ wɛ ɖe xoɖiɖɔ ɔ lɔ
lɛ byɔ nɔvi atkinson ɖɔ e nɔ ɖu gbadanu nuɖuɖu ɖo mi gbadanu lɛ bi nɔ xosin nu nu tobutobu mi nɔ kanbyɔ do biblu ji lɛ e
e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi nɔ wa kple lɛ ɖo nɔvi ɖe sin xwegbe bɔ fi ɔ ɖo kilomɛtlu yɔywɛ ɖe do xwe mitɔn gbe
mi yawu yi gbe bɔ e ɖo agun kpɛvi ɖe ayi ɖo hemsworth
e lin a bɔ mi nɔ yi kpɔnla tɔn lɛ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ lɛdo tɔn lɛ ɖo egbe do xwe mitɔn gbe nɔ ylɔ gbexosin ya do mi lɛ e ɖɔ wa ɖu nu
mi jɛ ɖe wa ji bɔ ɖɔ nu fofo ɖɔ enyi jlo gosin xwegbe nyi gbexosin ɖe ɔ mi jo ɔ do
yi gbe gosin xwegbe nyi gbexosin hwenu e ɖo xwe e
xwe we gudo hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ nyi gbexosin ɖe
jehovah do nu mi bɔ mɔ biblu yi nukɔn tawun e ɖe
xwedo tɔn sin lɛ gege wa yi nugbo ɔ
xwe bɔ e mɛ ɔ nyi gbexosin titewungbe nyi kpo henshall kpo
e mi do fi e ɖe nu mɛɖe a e ɖe ɖo xa cheshire tɔn mɛ
wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ tɛntin wɛ mi ɖe din bɔ e ɖegbe nu nyɔnu lɛ ɖɔ nɔ gudo nu ahwan
ðo mi nyi hwebinu tɔn wutu ɔ mi mɛ gbexosin titewungbe lɛ ɖo nukun ɖɔ e jo mi do e jo sinsɛn ɖevo lɛ tɔn do gbɔn e ɖɔhun
hwɛɖɔxɔsa lɛ yi gbe a enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo hwɛ nu mi bɔ nu azan
ðo xwe bɔ e mɛ hwenu ɖo xwe gudo e ɔ nyikɔ bonu e mi do mɛ ayixa yetɔn lɛ e mɛ
e kpla mi yi hwɛɖɔxɔsa vovo we yi gbe nu xo a
hwenu nu enɛ lɛ bi ɖo jijɛ wɛ e ɔ tuun ɖɔ gbigbɔ ɖo alɔ do mi wɛ bɔ jehovah hɛn alɔ hɛn mi lido hlɔnhlɔn mi eza
arthur matthews kpo nyi kpo kpe ɖo
wɛ e nu atɔn ɖo ayi tɔn wutu kɛɖɛ wa nu nɔvi sunnu tɔn dennis nyi gbexosin titewungbe ɖe ɖo hemsworth e
yetɔn nu do jehovah wu sin hwenu kpo ɖo vu e bɔ blo baptɛm hwenu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e
e lin ɖebu a bɔ e dennis do irlande bɔ e kpo arthur kɛɖɛ
enyi wa mɛ lɛ ɔ arthur kpo nyi kpo ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖu nu kpe ɔ mi nɔ gannu lɛ
mi wa jɛ nu wlan miɖee ji
ðo ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ arthur nu atɔn ɖevo
mi wli alɔ ɖo janvier ɖo linlin ɔ kpo ɖo hwebinu tɔn wa wɛ nu hwenu gege e blo gbɔn e
ðo hemsworth ɖo hwenu mi wli alɔ ɖo taan klewun ɖe gudo e
xwe ɖokpo jɛji gudo kpowun ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi yi gbadahweji irlande tɔn mi to yi armagh bɔ enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ mi yi newry sinsɛn katolika tɔn wɛ toxo enɛ lɛ bi mɛ
kɔgbidinumɛ syɛn ɖo xa ɔ mɛ tawun bɔ mi ɖo miɖee ɖesu tuun hwenu mi ɖɔ xo nu mɛ lɛ do e
nɔvi asu kpo asi kpo ɖe sin xwegbe wɛ mi nɔ blo kple lɛ ɖe bɔ fi ɔ ɖo kilomɛtlu do fi mi nɔ nɔ e
mɛ tantɔn wɛ nɔ wa
awajijɛ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ ɖɔ gege ɖo xa enɛ ɔ mɛ din
nɔvi kpo asi tɔn lottie kpo nyi gbexosin titewungbe ɖo totaligbe irlande tɔn bɔ ɖo ɔ mi mɛ ɛnɛ lɛ bi yi agbegbe tɔn ɖe ɖo belfast
nɔvi sunnu ɖe yi mi mɛ bi nu pryce hughes ee wa nyi alaxɔ tɔn ɖo grande bretagne e do xwe tɔn gbe kpo kpo
zanmɛ gbe ɖokpo ɔ mi ɖo xo ɖɔ do akpomɛwema voie dieu est une voie e ɖo taji ɔ ɖo irlande lɛ wu e ji wɛ
nɔvi hughes ɖɔ xo do e vɛwu bɔ e ɖɔ xo nu mɛ nɔ yi katolika ɖo republique lɛ e gbɔn e ji
e ɖe nɔvi lɛ sin xwe yetɔn lɛ gbe bɔ ahwan yɛhwenɔ lɛ do ji e huzu kpannukɔn
pryce ɖɔ mi ɖo hudo asu kpo asi kpo lɛ kpodo lɛ kpan tɔn nujlajla bunɔ ɖe ba ma akpomɛwema ɔ gbɔn to ɔ mɛ
mi yawu yi gbe ɖɔ mi wa
nyi kpo gbexosin lɛ kpo ɖo kloboto ɖe mɛ
fi ɖokpo gbexosin lɛ sixu nɔ hwebinu ɖo dublin e wɛ nyi xwe mamaa rutland tɔn gbe nɔvi nyɔnu hwenu linlin tɔn ɖe wɛ
ee mi nɔte finɛ sa nu mitɔn ɖe lɛ gudo e ɔ mi mɛ ɛnɛ lɛ byɔ kloboto tɔn mɛ
mi mɔ zan kpo sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ ɔ e ɖe byɔ mɛ sa nu mi e ɖɔ e kun wa ɖo xwegbe nu mi ɖo mi mɛ ɖe kun a wutu
arthur nɔ ayijinjɔn ɖo zan ji zan ɔ mɛ mɔ eɖee ɖo ɔ kun wɛ
ayihɔngbe tɔn zanzan hwenu e ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖe ɔ e ɔ mildred willett ee wa john barr e gbɔn finɛ
eyɛ kun
ee mi ɖo ali ji bɔ e kunkun tɔn kpɛɖe mi e ɔ mi lɔ kun
mitɔn kpo mɛ mi nɔ e kpo
mi ɖo hudo fi mi nɔ e tɔn
mi nyi alɔ nu ɖe mɛ ɖo lɛ sixu wa do enɛ wu ɔ mi xɔ mɔ ɖe a
zan enɛ mɛ ɔ mi mɛ ɛnɛ lɛ ɔ mɛ
enɛ wɛ wa nyi xwe mitɔn
nukpacamɛ wɛ e nyi ɖɔ glesi ɖeɖee jɔ lɛ e yi gbe bɔ mi nɔ ɔ do ayikungban yetɔn ji
mi gbɔn fi ɖo zɔ ɖo kilomɛtlu yi jɛ e ji bi
enyi mi tɛn yi fi ɖevo ɔ mi nɔ lɛkɔ wa mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo fi mi jɛ agban ɖo e
mi gbɔn xwe ɖo tofɔligbe zanzanhweji to ɔ tɔn lɛ e bi gbe cobɔ mɛ lɛ doya nu mi ɖe a ma akpomɛwema jɛji nyikɔ mɛ ɖo jlo lɛ e tɔn jo nu alaxɔ grande bretagne tɔn
nyɔna ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ kanweko mɔkpan ɖo finɛ din
e wa ya e ɔ e mi do tofɔligbe londres tɔn
aklunɔzan gblamɛ yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ e ylɔ arthur sin alaxɔ grande bretagne tɔn mɛ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e wa ayihɔngbe tɔn
ee e mi nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo gudo e ɔ mi yi lɛdo mitɔn mɛ ɖo ecosse
arthur mɔ hwenu ɖe do sɔnu nu xoɖiɖɔ tɔn lɛ a gbesisɔmɛ e ɖe ɖu ɖo lɛ ji ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi tawun
mi ɖo fi e ɖe nu mɛɖe a e nu xwe ɖe lɛ din ɔ nyɔna jiwu ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo gege tɛntin
hwenu e ylɔ arthur ɖɔ e yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn xɔ wo ɖo ɔ mi ɖo wa gbeta taji ɖe kɔn
mi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ e byɔ ɖɔ arthur jo mi do yi co e sɔgbe ɖɔ e yi gbe nu wujɔmɛ enɛ
ðo wegɔ ɖo akpa a wutu ɔ e lɛkɔ nu mi hemsworth bɔ nyi gbexosin titewungbe ɖo
ee arthur lɛkɔ ɖo xwe ɖokpo gudo e ɔ e mi do bɔ mi wa agbegbe tɔn sin nɔ gbɔn ecosse totaligbe angleterre tɔn kpo totaligbe irlande tɔn kpo
ðo ɔ arthur mɔ ɖe nyi alaxɔ tɔn ɖo to irlande tɔn mɛ
mi ɖu vivi ɔ tɔn tawun ɖo ɔ nɔ hu mi tawun do huzuhuzu enɛ wu
nu gudo din ɔ e nɔ su nukun mɛ tawun ɖɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli
mɔ ɖɔ enyi e yi gbe nu ɖe tlɛ tuun e wa gbɔn tawun e a ɔ jehovah do nu mɛ hwebinu
ðo betɛli ɔ wa biloo mɛ sin wema lɛ do gba mɛ ɖa nu nɔ jla xɔ mɛ ɖo
nu taan ɖe ɔ mi wa agbegbe tɔn sin kpewu mɔ nɔvi ɖo to ɔ mɛ lɛ e
nu enɛ ɔ mɔ mi mɔ bɔ biblu mitɔn lɛ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ e bɔ kancica syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɖo mi kpo xwedo gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn kpo tɛntin ɖo irlande
nyɔna ɖaxo tɛ ɖie
akɔjɔkple tɔn nukɔntɔn e blo ɖo irlande e ɔ dublin wɛ e blo ɖe ɖo
gbeklanxamɛ ɔ syɛn tawun co ɔ yi ganji
wɛ wa bɔ mɛ blo baptɛm
mɛ yi gosin to ɖevo mɛ lɛ e do xwegbe lɛ e ɖokpo ɖokpo mɔ wema mɛ kudonumɛ tɔn ɖe
lɛ wa kpa lɛ ɖo zinzan ɖagbe yetɔn wu
huzuhuzu ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi nu irlande nugbo
arthur ɖo gbe do nu nathan knorr wɛ hwenu nathan knorr wa ɖaxo tɔn e
arthur ɖo biblu tɔn lɛ sin wema wɛ ɖo do gaelique ecosse tɔn mɛ
ðo ɔ totaligbe irlande tɔn kpo tofɔligbe tɔn kpo bi wa kple ɖo alaxɔ dublin tɔn sin acɛ mɛ vogbingbɔn ɖaxo ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi ɖo tɔtɛntinto ɔ mɛ ɖo kinklan tiin ɖo mɛ lɛ tɛntin ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ kpo sinsɛn kpo wu e wutu
xomɛ hun mi tawun ɖo mɔ mi mɔ bɔ mɛ gege gosin katolika mɛ wa nugbo ɔ mɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ ɖo xa mɛ e nyi lɛ e wutu
ðo ɔ gbɛzan mitɔn huzu bi hwenu e dɔn alaxɔ grande bretagne tɔn kpo irlande tɔn kpo ɖo mi do betɛli londres tɔn e
ðo mai ɔ asu kpo nyi kpo nɔ nu xwe e ku
ðo xwe gudogudo tɔn wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ nɔ nɔ aluwɛ mɛ nɔ jɛ nɔ se
ɔ arthur wɛ nyi nu bi nu mi
jɛ do tɔn tawun
enyi e ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ gbɔn wɛ ɔ e nɔ bɔ e nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah
enyi se mɛ lɛ yi wan nu arthur gbɔn e ɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi tawun lɛ wema do mi sin irlande grande bretagne bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tlɛ mi sin etats unis
wema enɛ lɛ kpo wusyɛn nɔvi arthur tɔn dennis kpo asi tɔn kpo nu fofo sin vi nyɔnu kpo judy kpo nɔ do lanmɛ nu mi e kpo mi tawun bɔ sixu ɖɔ a
wemafɔ biblu tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi tawun e wɛ nyi ezayii e ɖɔ jehovah ɖo jlo wa ɖagbe nu mi
nu nu mɛ ɖo nukun ɖo e wɛ lɛ bi
tuun tuun ɖɔ jehovah ɖo suulu ɖo nu lɛ jlaɖo akpakpa mɛ tɔn lɛ mi ɖo ɔ mɛ e do gbɔ nu mi tawun
enyi gbɛzan mitɔn ɔ nɔ mɔ jehovah nɔ gudo nu ɔ ɖo irlande kɔn nyɔna gbɔn e
nɔ alɔ kpɛ ɖo ɖo nukɔnyiyi gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ mɛ e do mɔ wujɔmɛ ɖaxo ɖe
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu jehovah byɔ mi e wiwa hwebinu nɔ hɛn nyɔna lɛ wa
annuaire des temoins jehovah mɛ wexwɛ
annuaire mɛ wexwɛ
nu mi nɔ yi wan nu mɛ ɖo kpo xo vivi kpo kpowun o loɔ wanyiyi titewungbe nɔ ɖe eɖee gbɔn nuwiwa lɛ mɛ ɔ wɛ mi ɖo ɖo jaan
wanyiyi tɛ nyi ɖaxo hu bi ɔ
etɛ nyi wanyiyi nujɔnu tɔn
mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ wanyiyi adodwe ɔ wɛ mi ɖo gbɔn
wanyiyi tɛ nyi ɖaxo hu bi ɔ etɛwu e nyi
wanyiyi junjɔn nugbododo sɔgbe lɛ e ji nyi e nyi nunina ɖe gosin jehovah
e wɛ nyi jɔtɛn wanyiyi enɛ tɔn
jaan wanyiyi alɔkpa enɛ wɛ nyi ɖaxo hu bi ɔ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ e keya nu mɛ alo ya wu do mɛ cejɛnnabi ɖo nuwiwa nu ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wɛ e nɔ do tuun jɛ nukɔn
sɔgbe kpo wema nukunɖeji ɖe kpo ɔ ɔ nu ɖeɖee e nɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ wa lɛ e kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu ɖe e
hwenu mi ɖe wanyiyi mɛ cejɛnnabi ɖe a e alo e mi e ɔ gbɛzan mitɔn nɔ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ nɔ ɖo
jehovah ɖe wanyiyi tɔn ɖo cejɛnnabi a e lɛ gbɔn
jehovah ɖo wanyiyi lɛ wɛ cobo da adamu kpo ɛvu kpo
e blo ayikungban bonu e nyi fi nɔ ɖe kpowun e a loɔ e nyi xwe tɔn tɛgbɛ fi e ɖu vivi tɔn ɖe bi e
e nyi le jehovah ɖesunɔ tɔn wu wɛ e blo a ɖagbe mitɔn wu wɛ
e ɖe wanyiyi ɖo cejɛnnabi a e ɖo e kɔn nyɔna do vi tɔn ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e ji kpo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ nɔ ɖo palaɖisi e sɔnu tɔn nu e mɛ
hwenu adamu kpo ɛvu kpo gu gudo e ɔ jehovah ɖe wanyiyi ɖo cejɛnnabi a e ɖo ali ɖaxo ɖe
e sɔnu xɔ nu kunkan we lɛ tɔn ɖo e ɖeji ɖɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ mɛ yi gbe nu wanyiyi tɔn
bib nwt jaan sin hwenu jehovah sɔgudo tɔn ɖe tɔn e jɛn e mɔ ɖɔ e ɔ
jaan wanyiyi jehovah tɔn ɖo cejɛnnabi a e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
etɛ ɖɔ lɛ kpe nu wu ɖe wanyiyi ɖo cejɛnnabi a e
mi kpe nu wu ɖe wanyiyi ɖo cejɛnnabi a e ɖo mawu da mi ɖo akpajlɛ tɔn mɛ
hwɛhuhu sin gu mi ɖu e nɔ bɔ wanyiyi nɔ vɛwu nu mi nuwukpikpe mi ɖo wa e bu a
abɛli ɖe wanyiyi mawu bɔ cejɛnnabi ɖo ɛ xwle nu ɖagbe hugan e ɖo e e
sunnu enɛ lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ mi jlo ɖe wanyiyi nu mi tlɛ ɖo lɛ mɔ wɛ ɔ nɛ
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖe wanyiyi adodwe ɔ ɖe
biblu tinmɛ ɖɔ e kun nɔ ɖe wanyiyi adodwe ɔ ɖo kpo xo vivi kpo kpowun o loɔ wanyiyi titewungbe nɔ ɖe eɖee gbɔn nuwiwa lɛ mɛ ɔ wɛ
jaan ðiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ mi kun sixu ɖɔ xo do ɖe wanyiyi mɛ o a
e wa ɔ xo kɛɖɛ ɖiɖɔ mɛ wɛ mi nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mitɔn ɖe a loɔ hwenu e byɔ ɖɔ e wa nu e ɔ mi ɖo wa nu
ði ɔ hwenu klisanwun mitɔn ɖe ɖo hudo dandannu gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ tɔn e ɔ nyɔna mi byɔ lɛ e kɛɖɛ sin hudo wɛ e ɖo a
etɛ wanyiyi nujɔnu tɔn nyi
na wanyiyi yɛmɛnuwiwa tɔn ɖe lɛ tɔn
pɔlu lɔ wlan ɖɔ wanyiyi mitɔn ɖo yi xomɛ ganji kabi ɖo nyi wanyiyi nujɔnu tɔn
mi sixu nyi nu vo ɖo vo wɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo wanyiyi adodwe wɛ a wiwa ci kaletanukun xwixwe ɖɔhun
mi sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖo wanyiyi yɛmɛnuwiwa tɔn wɛ e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo wanyiyi nujɔnu tɔn doo a
eo
enɛ nyi wanyiyi ɖe a nuvlɛnu nuɖe a e wɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do wanyiyi yɛmɛnuwiwa tɔn tɔn ɖe lɛ ji
ðo davidi hwenu ɔ axitofɛli ɖɔ emi zun xa axɔsu ɔ e nyi tɔn
axitofɛli wa ɖu kpa hwenu e mɔ ɖɔ nu ɖagbe jlo nu emi e
wanyiyi yɛmɛnuwiwa tɔn nɔ hu winnya tawun ɖo e nyi jijɔ mawu tɔn nyi wanyiyi mɛɖee do tɔn ɔ sin yɛblɛnu
yɛmɛnuwiwa mɔhun sixu bu lɛ jehovah tɔn a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah lɛ kun jlo gbeɖe ba ɖe wanyiyi yɛmɛnuwiwa tɔn o
e ɖo co mi ɖo kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ wanyiyi adodwe cejɛnnabi alo va a e jɛn nɔ tɛgbɛ a
nu mi do nu ali mi sixu do gan ɖe wanyiyi nujɔnu tɔn ɖe e tɛnnɛ
etɛ wanyiyi adodwe nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ wa
nɔ do wa towe mɛ ɖe ɖo mimɔ wɛ a ɔ nɛ
mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa wanyiyi sin nu nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɖo mɛ alo ɖo fi ɖo nukun ji a e hwenu e blo do e
xa matie ananiyasi kpo safila kpo wa a
nu bonu mɛ bi tuun nu e ɖɔ nu gbe ja e gannaganna do togun mɛ enɛ bɔ awe xo ɖo yɛmɛnuwiwa yetɔn wu
mɛ wanyiyi adodwe nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ do wa nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ enyi kpo gankwekwe kpo alo ɖɔ doku nu mi dandan nɛ wu wɛ a
ði ɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖeɖee nɔ ɔ nɔ sɔnu nu nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e ɔ nɔ wa do ɖe nyikɔ yetɔn alo dɔn ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn wa yeɖee ji alo ɖɔ nu le ji wɛ emi do a
mi sixu jɛ nukɔn ɖo sisi mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛ gbɔn
nɔ jɛ nukɔn ɖo sisi mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛ xa hlɔmanu lɛ nwt
jezu ze sisi mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɖo hwenu e ɖe mɛ kpo hu bi e e
jaan mi ɖo syɛnsyɛn sɔnu nu mɛɖesɔhwe sin hudo mi ɖo ba ɖe sisi mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e
lɛ ɖesu tlɛ mɔ nu jɛ nu jezu wa lɛ e mɛ bi a hwenu wa mɔ gbigbɔ yi e jɛn wa kpewu
jaan mi sixu ɖe sisi mɛ ɖevo lɛ hwenu mi nɔ mɔ miɖee dingan ɖo wema sise mitɔn nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ alo wujɔmɛ ɖeɖee mi ɖo ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ lɛ e wu a e hlɔ
mi nɔ jlo mɛ ɖeɖee e kpa lɛ e sin a e wa ɔ mi nɔ xa nu mi tlɛ mɔ ɖɔ mi jɛxa sisi ɖokpo ɔ ɖɔhun alo ɖo nu wu e do kpa e mɛ ɔ nɛ
etɛwu mi ɖo kpa mɛ kpo ayi bi kpo
nɔ kpa nɔvi lɛ kpo ayi bi kpo
mi ɖo ali hun nu mi lɛ e bi kpa miɖee ɖo xo ɖagbe lɛ nɔ do alɔ mɛ
enyi e kpa mɛɖe jɛ nu mɛ ɔ tɔn ɖɔ do gudo tɔn ji ɔ yɛmɛnuwiwa alɔkpa ɖe wɛ
pɔlu nyi alɔ nu nu mɔhun ɖagbe ɖe wanyiyi adodwe ɖo e kpa mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e mɛ
ði ɔ e kpa klisanwun ɖo kɔlɛnti lɛ e kpo ayi bi kpo ɖo nɔ wa nu gbɔn e ɖe lɛ wu
nu nina nɔvi mitɔn ɖo hudo mɛ lɛ e nyi ali mi nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mi ɖo e yi mɛ ɖe e ɖokpo akpaxwe ɔ
mi sixu ɖe wanyiyi adodwe hwenu mi ɖo mɛ yi wɛ e gbɔn
nɔ yi mɛ
mi ɖo wa kpo ayi bi kpo nyi alɔ nu cejɛnnabi nuwiwa alɔkpa ɖebu
mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ lɛ mɛ nukunɖeji lɛ alo mɛ ɖeɖee kpe nu wu su mi ɖo ali ɖe lɛ e wɛ nɔ yi jɛ nukɔn a
alo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee tuun ganji a abi ee ɖo nu ɖebu do su mi a lɛ e wɛ nɔ ali ɖeɖee sixu nu ɖe lɛ e a
alo mi ɖɔ ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe ɖo hudo mɛ ɖo e blo tuto tɔn ganji a abi e doku nu mi nu yi mi yi e a wutu
hwetɛnu wɛ e sixu vɛwu tawun ɖɔ e mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo gan a lɛ e
nu tawun tawun tɛ lɛ mi sixu wa do nɔ gudo nu mɛ ɖo gan a lɛ e
nɔ gudo nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo gan a lɛ e
enɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi ma linlin mawuxowema ɔ tɔn hɛn mɛ lido lɛ e xa ylɔ bonu zɔn xa mi yi kunnuɖegbe alo ɖɔ mi hwenu ɖoto
ɔ mi ɖo kpowun ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu alo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn ɖe ɖo gan alo gɔn gan ɖo a mi ɖo tuun ɖɔ mi mɛ bi ɖo fi mi ɖo gan ɖe lɛ e kpo ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ kpo
pɔlu lɔ tlɛ tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo ganmaɖo emitɔn lɛ
kɔ enɛ wu ɔ mi mɛ bi wɛ sixu ɖu le gudo klisanwun lɛ nɔ nɔ nu mɛ e tɔn
do mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ xo fifa kan xa nɔvi mitɔn lɛ gbɔn
nɔ xo fifa kan
mi nɔ wa nu wu mi kpe e bi ba do nɔ fifa mɛ xa nɔvi mitɔn lɛ e tlɛ nyi hwenu e ci nu mi ɖɔ e kun mɔ nu jɛ nu ɖɔ wɛ mi ɖe e wu ganji o alo wa nu xa mi ɖo ali agɔ e ɔ nɛ xa hlɔmanu lɛ
kɛnklɛn dido sixu jla ɖo mɛ ɔ e ɖo e ɖo nyi kpo ayi bi kpo
ði ɔ e ɖɔ yi gbe nu wa nyi do e tɔn ɖɔ e nu mi ɖɔ nu ɖɔ e nu hu ɖɔ e nu mi ɖɔ nu ci nu
ðo alɔwliwli mɛ ɔ fifa biba ɖo taji tawun
asu ɖe kpo asi ɖe kpo ɖo nɔ wa yɛ ɖo mɛ ɖɔ emi yi wan nu emiɖee wa jɛ yeɖokpo ɔ jɛ zali xa yeɖee ji gbe do nu yeɖee ji alo jɛ daka xo yeɖee wu ji a
mi sixu ɖɔ hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ mitɔn nyi nujɔnu tɔn gbɔn
nɔ jlo do hwɛ kɛ mɛ
enyi mi hwɛ kɛ mɛɖe ɔ mi nɔ jo nu e wa nyi do do mi e do nɔ hɛn ɛ do xomɛ a
mi sixu jlo do hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖeɖee tuun ɖɔ emi wa nu nyi do do mi a lɛ e enyi mi nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ ɖo wanyiyi mɛ nɔ do gan fifa dɔn mi ca bɔ mi nyi ɖokpo ɔ e do hɛn buteninɔ gbigbɔ mi ɔ ɖo ɔ nɛ
nu hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ mitɔn nyi nujɔnu tɔn ɔ mi ɖo ɖu ɖo linlin mitɔn ji mɔ tɛn do hɛn mɛ do xomɛ a
enyi mi nɔ hɛn mɛ do xomɛ ɔ kancica ee ɖo mi kpo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo tɛntin e kɛɖɛ mɛ wɛ mi a loɔ mi wa nu ee ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e
nukun tɛ mi ɖo nɔ do lɛ ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ
nɔ nu nyi ɖagbe nu lɛ e do
enyi mi mɔ lɛ ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ ɔ mi ɖo mɔ ɖɔ ali wɛ hun nu mi bɔ mi ɖe wanyiyi mi ɖo ɔ nyi adodwe e nɔ ɖagbe miɖesunɔ tɔn a loɔ mi nɔ ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn
ɖo ɖɔ e ɖe nu emi e nyi ali ɖe hun nu emi bɔ emi gbɔn do yi tɛnmɛ ɖagbe lɛ nu emi kpo xwedo emitɔn kpo a loɔ nɔvi enɛ lɛ gege nɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn nɔ jinjɔn tɛn nuɖe a lɛ e mɛ
ðo nɔ ɖagbe yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ do ɖo ali enɛ wutu ɔ nɔ wanyiyi ee mɛ cejɛnnabi nuwiwa ɖebu ɖe a e
sixu xwedo ɖagbe yetɔn gbɔn
etɛ wanyiyi adodwe nɔ mɛ hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn e ɖe bɔ e nɔ wa
ðɔ hwɛ hu ɖo nuglɔ lɛ e lɛkɔ sin gudo
klisanwun hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ e ɖe lɛ nɔ nɔ cyɔn nu do nu wa nyi do e ɖo ɖu winnya alo hɛn awakanmɛ ku mɛ ɖevo lɛ a wutu nux
nu mɔhun biblo nyi wanyiyi nuwiwa a ɖo e nyi ɔ kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ se xɔxɔ tɔn a loɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ lɔ nɔ se
e sixu su ali do gbigbɔ mawu tɔn wa nu do fifa agun ɔ bi tɔn wu efɛ
wanyiyi adodwe nɔ klisanwun ɖeɖee hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ e bɔ nɔ yi ɖɔ nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ bonu do alɔ jɛxa ɔ ja
do wanyiyi adodwe ɔ ɖo taji sɔ
wanyiyi wɛ nyi jijɔ klo hu ee kpo lɛ e bi e
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ enyi ɖo wanyiyi a ɔ nyi nuti a
lɛ hwi tɛ jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi hɛn wa
enyi hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ klan gbe xa sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ɔ sixu nɔ gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn
enyi xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖe jo jehovah do ɔ etɛ sixu bɔ ɖi xwi xa
fifa tɛ sin vivi mi sixu ɖu din
etɛ lɛ sixu gbo kpo nyi ali ji nu mi bɔ mi gɔn fifa jɔ fifa ɔ mɔ ɖo din
mi mɛ bi wɛ nɔ zan fifa mɛ adohu adohu ɖebu ɖe a e
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun ɖɔ jehovah mi fifa mawu tɔn fifa ayi mɛ tɔn ɖe wɛ sixu cyɔn alɔ mi ji ɖo nu doya nu linlin mitɔn kpo nu nɔ ci nu mi e kpo si fili
ðo mi ze miɖee jo nu jehovah wutu ɔ fifa ɖo mi kpo mawu kpo tɛntin e wɛ nyi kancica ɖagbe mi ɖo xa ɛ e hlɔ
tagba kpe fi bi ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ vɛwu e mɛ bɔ maxamaxa lɛ ɖo jijɔ nɔ dɔn hwɛgbe wa lɛ e
nu ɖaxo hugan nɔ huzu kpannukɔn fifa mitɔn e sixu wa sin hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ
ðe lɛ ɖo mɛ sixu ca nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e dohwɛ mi ɖɔ mi ɖo xwedo ɔ klan wɛ alo adan ɖɔ nu mi jo nuɖiɖi mitɔn do a ɔ emi mi
nukun tɛ mi ɖo do gbeklanxamɛ xwedo tɔn
mi sixu ɖi xwi xa e nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e kpa mi gbɔn
etɛ nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ sixu ji
hwetɛnu wɛ ahwanvu jezu tɔn nyinyi nɔ kan gan byɔ
gbeklanxamɛ enɛ sixu wa nu do kancica fifa tɔn ɖo xwedo ɖe tɔn tɛntin lɛ e wu
jezu ɖɔ vɛdo ɖɔ fifa wɛ hɛn wa ayikungban ji sin o fifa wɛ hɛn wa a hwi wɛ hɛn wa
ðo wa bɔ nyɛ wutu ɔ vi sunnu mɔ tɔn gbɔ a vi nyɔnu mɔ nɔ tɔn gbɔ a visi mɔ asu tɔn nɔ gbɔ a
ee jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ vɛdo ɖɔ fifa wɛ hɛn wa sin o e ɔ tintinmɛ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo lɛ mɛ ɖo tamɛ do nu ahwanvu tɔn nyinyi ji lɛ e ji
wɛn tɔn sixu klan lɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun nyi avaja do kancica lɛ mɛ gbe wɛ jezu o e jlo jla wɛn nugbo mawu tɔn tɔn wɛ
jaan enyi ɖe alo xwedo ɔ tɔn ɖe nugbo ɔ ɔ nukplɔnmɛ klisu tɔn lɛ wu kpo gbejininɔ kpo nɔ vɛwu
tɛ ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ mɔ
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ gbeklanxamɛ xwedo tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo nu mɛ e ɖo ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba dɛ e mɛ
bonu ahwanvu lɛ ɖɔ emi jɛxa nyi klisu tɔn ɔ ɖo dɛ ɖo mɛcako lɛ alo tlɛ yi gbe ba klan jo xwedo yetɔn do
le nɔ ɖu e nɔ hugan nu hɛn bu lɛ e flafla tɔn xa
enyi hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ klan gbe xa gan do wɛ mi ɖe jehovah e ɔ etɛ mi ɖo flin
e nyi hwenu hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ klan gbe xa gan do wɛ mi ɖe ba jehovah e ɔ mi nɔ kpo ɖo wan yi nu wɛ mi ɖo flin ɖɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu mawu kpo klisu kpo e wɛ jɛ nukɔn
mi ɖo tuun ɖɔ sataan nɔ zan wanyiyi mi ɖo nu xwedo mitɔn e do xo gbejininɔ mitɔn yi
nu mi gbeje ninɔmɛ mɛ xwedo mitɔn klan gbe xa mi ɖe e ɖe lɛ mi sixu ɖi xwi xa e ɖo nu mi lɛ e kpa mi gbɔn e
nukun tɛ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo asu alo asi ɖe e ɖo do ninɔmɛ yetɔn
biblu nu mi ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee alo asi e mɔ ɖo nɔ zan ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ mɛ
e ɖo co nu taji ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do ninɔmɛ towe wu e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ asu ɖe sixu nɔ nukɔn nu nuwiwa gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ a ɖo si ɖo e wɛ nyi xwedo ɔ tɔn
enyi asu alo asi towe ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖo dogbo nu sinsɛn biblo towe ɔ etɛ lɛ sixu kanbyɔ hwiɖee
nu asu alo asi towe ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖo dogbo nu sinsɛn biblo towe ɔ lo
ði ɔ asu nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ azan ɖe lɛ jɛn e ɖo nɔ yi kunnuɖegbe ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɔ mɛ
enyi wa ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun mɛ hun kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ ðiɖɔ wɛ asu alo asi ɖe ɖɔ ma ɖo mawu sinsɛn a
nu e nyi a ɔ sixu jo xo do kpowun a
klisanwun lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ bonu nɔ si ɖe gbɔn
enyi ɖo asu alo asi ɖe ɔ vi lɛ kpinkplɔn sixu vɛwu tawun
nu asu alo asi towe nɔ xwedo nugbododo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn biblu tɔn lɛ a ɔ
ze ɖagbe ɔ nɔ si asu alo asi towe
ayi ɖo jijɔ tɔn ɖagbe lɛ ji ɖɔ nu tɔn su nukun emitɔn mɛ
nyi alɔ nu numasɔgbe lɛ ɖiɖɔ do asu alo asi towe wu ɖo vi lɛ nukunmɛ
e wa hun tinmɛ nu vi lɛ ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ ɖo wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ba jehovah alo gbɔ
walɔ ɖagbe vi lɛ tɔn sixu dɔn ɖe wa sinsɛn nugbo ɔ mɛ
nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ vi towe lɛ hweɖebunu ali tɔn hun nu e akpaxwe ɔ
klisanwun lɛ sixu nugbo biblu tɔn vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo xwedo klan ɖo sinsɛn lixo e ɖe mɛ gbɔn
hweɖelɛnu ɔ asu alo asi lɛ byɔ ɖɔ vi lɛ ɖo alɔ ɖo xwe pagawun tɔn lɛ ɖuɖu mɛ alo ɖɔ e sinsɛn nuvu sin nuɖiɖi lɛ
asu ɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ asi emitɔn nyi klisanwun ɖe e biblu vi emitɔn lɛ o
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ vi tɔn lɛ ɖesu wa wa gbeta mɛ e tɔn kɔn
etɛ sixu dɔn tagba wa hwi kpo hɛnnumɔ towe nyi a lɛ e kpo tɛntin
tlolo ɔ e sixu vɛwu nu mi ɖɔ mi ɖɔ nu xwedo mitɔn ɖɔ mi ɖo do kpo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo wɛ
ee nuɖiɖi mi ɖo e ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo dandan ɖɔ mi ɖe nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e
mak enyi ɖɔ gbeta kɔn wa e kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo bonu e dɔn tagba wa hwi kpo hɛnnumɔ towe nyi a lɛ e kpo tɛntin ɔ afɔ tawun tawun ɖe ɖe tagba kpo kpo ɖo gbeji lɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖie
etɛwu hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ sixu klan gbe xa mi
mi sixu se xa gbɔn
nɔ se xa hɛnnumɔ lɛ
ee nugbo biblu tɔn mi lɛ e ɖo xomɛ hun nu mi wɛ tawun e ɔ hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ sixu ɖo manywɛ mɛ ɖɔ e bu mi alo mi byɔ nyanya ɖe mɛ
sixu ɖɔ mi kun yi wan nu o ɖo mi nɔ ɖu xwe lɛ xa a wutu
tlɛ sixu ɖi xɛsi ɖo ganjininɔ tɛgbɛ tɔn mitɔn wu
mi ɖo se xa do gan miɖee ɖo tɛn yetɔn mɛ ɖoto ganji mɔ tɛn tuun nu ɖo adohu adohu ɖo nu wɛ tawun e nux
pɔlu do gan mɔ nu jɛ ninɔmɛ mɛ bi tɔn wu mɔ tɛn do jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ nu e wa e sixu mi lɔ kɔ
mi ɖo ɖɔ xo nu hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ gbɔn
nɔ ɖɔ xo kpo xomɛfifa kpo
mi sixu byɔ gbigbɔ jehovah do sixu ɖe jijɔ gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn lɛ hwenu mi ɖo xo ɖɔ xa hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ wɛ e
mi ɖo dɔn nu xa do linlin sinsɛn nuvu tɔn yetɔn lɛ wu a
enyi xo alo nuwalɔ yetɔn lɛ nu mi ɔ mi sixu wa nu lɛ ɖɔhun
le tɛ lɛ nɔ sin walɔ ɖagbe mɛ
nɔ ɖo walɔ ɖagbe
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ xo fifa ɖiɖɔ nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖi xwi xa gbeklanxamɛ hɛnnumɔ lɛ tɔn walɔ ɖagbe mitɔn nɔ ɖɔ xo ceɖeceɖe xa
hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ gbɔn towe gblamɛ ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖu vivi alɔwliwli awajijɛnɔ ɖe tɔn nɔ kpe nukun do vi yetɔn lɛ wu nɔ zan ɖe ɖo walɔ ɖagbe lobɔ yetɔn ɖo
hɛnnumɔ mitɔn lɛ tlɛ yi nugbo ɔ gbeɖe a ɔ mi sixu ɖo awajijɛ ɖo tuun mi tuun ɖɔ gbɛzan gbejininɔ tɔn mitɔn hun xomɛ nu jehovah wutu e
mi sixu sɔnu nu ninɔmɛ dɔn tagba wa lɛ e gbɔn
sɔnu
tamɛ do ninɔmɛ dɔn tagba wa lɛ e ji blo tuto ɖeɖɛ gbɔn e tɔn nux
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo australie ɖɔ asu klan gbe xa nugbo ɔ syɛnsyɛn
cobonu mi ylɔ ɛ tuun e ɖe gbɔn e ɔ nyi kpo asu kpo nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah ɖɔ e mi bonu mi xosin dɔn mɛ lɛ e nu xomɛsin xo tɔn lɛ
mi nɔ sɔnu nu xota ji mi ɖɔ xo do lɛ e bonu ɔ do nyi nyanɛnyanɛ sin nu
do nyi alɔ nu xo gaga ɖiɖɔ nɔ yawu dɔn xoɖiɖɔ do sinsɛn ji kpo adan kpo wa lɛ e ɔ mi ɖo dogbo nu taan mi zan ɖo lɛ hwenu e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kun sixu nyi alɔ nu ɖo hwi kpo hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ kpo tɛntin e bi o
tagba mɔhun lɛ sixu bɔ nɔ dohwɛ hwiɖee ɖo yi wan nu hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ tawun ɖo gan do wɛ hwebinu ɖo si wutu
enyi nu nɔ ci nu hun do gan bonu gbeji ɖe nu jehovah e jɛ nukɔn nu wan yi nu xwedo towe e
wiwa hɛnnumɔ towe lɛ bɔ mɔ ɖɔ nugbo biblu tɔn zinzan nyi ku kpo kpo sin xo
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ hun flin ɖɔ kun sixu hɛn mɛ ɖevo lɛ gannugannu bonu yi nugbo ɔ o
e wa hun jo do bonu mɔ le nɔ sin ali jehovah tɔn lɛ ji gbingbɔn mɛ e
mawu wanyiyinɔ mitɔn hun ali nu e hun nu mi lɔ gbɔn e bonu wa gbeta zan e tɔn kɔn eza
nu xwedo towe tɔn ɖe jo jehovah do ɔ etɛ bɔ ɖi xwi xa
hwenu e ɖe xwedo towe tɔn ɖe sin agun mɛ alo eɖesunɔ ɖe eɖee sin agun ɔ mɛ e ɔ e sixu ci e nɔ hwi mɛ e ɖɔhun
sixu ɖi xwi xa enɛ nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e gbɔn
ðokan do aca gbigbɔ tɔn towe lɛ wu
nu e ci nu ɖɔ ayi towe kun ɖo nu wa wɛ ɖe e wu o bɔ ɖo wiwa wɛ tɔn tɔn kpowun ɔ lo
jo gbe
aca gbigbɔ tɔn ɖagbe ɖe sixu bɔ ɖu ɖo linlin towe lɛ kpo nu nɔ ci nu e kpo ji
ðo ayi nu mɛ mɛ wlan ðɛhan ɔ e gbɔn din e wu
gbeji nɔ nɔ do jehovah e sixu bɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
mi sixu ɖo sisi nu tuto mɛ ɖiɖe sin agun mɛ tɔn jehovah e gbɔn
ðo sisi nu nugbɛnumɛ jehovah tɔn
tuto mɛ ɖiɖe sin agun mɛ tɔn ɔ sixu hɛn le nɔ ayi sɔyi e wa nu mi bi jɛ ɔ ji e tlɛ nyi ɖɔ mi se tɔn tlolo ɔ nɛ xa eblee lɛ
ði ɔ jehovah mi ɖɔ mi kpe nu ɖebu xa lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo a e o
kɔ nu mi tlɛ ɖo se wɛ ɖo ayi mɛ ɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu xa xwedo mitɔn tɔn e ɖe sin agun mɛ lɛ e nɔ ylɔ wlan nu gbɔn alokan ji wema do tlɔlɔ wema do gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji alo ɖɔ xo xa gbɔn tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ji e nɔ zun ɖe lɛ e ji a
etɛ mi sixu kpo ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ
kpo ɖo nukunɖiɖo mɛ
wanyiyi nɔ hɛn nukunɖiɖo mitɔn ɖo jɛ nukunɖiɖo mi ɖo ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee jo jehovah do lɛ e lɛkɔ wa tɔn e ji
enyi xwedo towe ɖe ɖo vo ɖo ɖo jezu xwedo wɛ wutu ɔ etɛ ɖo wa
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi mi ɖevo ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ bɔ e nyi emilɛ a ɔ mi kun jɛxa nyi emitɔn o
e ɖeji ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ kpo ɖo gbeji nu xwedo yetɔn tlɛ ɖo gbe klan xa wɛ ɔ nɛ
enyi jezu xwixwedo hɛn hwi wa xwedo towe mɛ hun ɖeji do jehovah wu ɖɔ e bɔ ɖi xwi xa tagba lɛ bɔ e kpa
eza tuun tuun ɖɔ nu emitɔn nɔ jehovah kpo jezu kpo nukunmɛ bɔ su gbɛzan gbejininɔ tɔn towe sin e nɔ vivi nu
nu mɔ ɖevo lɛ do vi kpinkplɔn ɖo xwedo klan ɖo sinsɛn lixo e ɖe mɛ wu hun kanbio le son wehiato le de ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe aout tɔn mɛ
fi e nɔ ɖekunnu agbawungba tɔn ɖe ɖo lagos lɛ e ɖokpo nɛ toxo enɛ mɛ wɛ ɖe hugan ɖo aflika
jozɛfu alimateenu ɔ e vɛwu bɔ e tuun e mɔ akɔnkpinkpan gbɔn sɛkpɔ tokpɔngan hlɔma tɔn e
e tuun pɔnsu pilatu ɖɔ e nyi mɛɖe bɔ nu e xwe e jɛn e nɔ wa
cobonu e ɖi jezu e jɛxa gbɔn e ɔ mɛɖe ɖo byɔ cyɔ tɔn pilatu yi sin atin ɔ ji
nu lɛ wa huzu bɔ jozɛfu ɖɔ nukɔn kpinkpan ɛ vɛwu e ɔ e wa nyi a
ee sɔja ɖokpo ɛ ganjɛwu gudo ɖɔ jezu ku e ɔ pilatu yi gbe nu nu e byɔ e
enɛ wu ɔ jozɛfu ɖo se wɛ ɖo lanmɛ cobo kanwezun yi fi e hu jezu ɖe e mak
nyi jozɛfu alimateenu ɔ
etɛ dɔn e kpo jezu kpo ca
etɛwu tɔn ɖo xɔ akwɛ nu
wɛnɖagbe wema tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ jozɛfu nyi mɛ nukunɖeji ɖokpo ɖo jwifu lɛ tɔn mɛ
dɔkunnɔ jozɛfu nyi e lɔ nyi nukpacamɛ ɖe a
ɖo akɔnkpinkpan bɔ yi gbe ɖɔ jezu nyi axɔsu towe e a
kplekple hwɛɖɔxɔsa ðaxo jwifu lɛ tɔn tɔn wan nu jezu
mɛ lɛ e blase hu
e ylɔ jozɛfu ɖɔ ayijlɔjlɔnɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ
e ɖo axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn enɛ nu wu e wa nyi ɖokpo ɖo ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ mɛ e
jaan ɖɔ ɖɔ jozɛfu nɔ jlo ɖɔ emi ɖo jezu sin ahwanvu lɛ mɛ a ɖo e nɔ ɖo xɛsi ɖi nu jwifugan lɛ wɛ
etɛ ɖi xɛsi wɛ jozɛfu ɖe
e tuun ɖɔ jwifu lɛ wan nu jezu kanɖeji nya mɛɖebu yi gbe ɖɔ emi ɖi nu e sin ɔ
jaan nu e nya mɛɖe sin ɔ ɔ e ɖɔ jwifu tɔn lɛ ɛ ɖo kɔ ɖe wu tɔn a wa nu xa ɛ ɖi mɛ e ɖe ɖo vo e
enɛ wu ɔ jozɛfu xo nu ɖɔ ɖo agbawungba ɖɔ emi ɖi nu nu jezu
wiwa bɔ tɛn mɛ e ɖe e kpo sisi e nɔ ɖo e kpo bu
jozɛfu wɛ nyi mɛ ɖokpo gee ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu enɛ mɛ e a
sɔgbe xa jaan ɔ jwifugan lɛ gege ɖi nu nu jezu ɖe nuɖiɖi yetɔn a falizyɛn lɛ taa wa nya sin lɛ
jozɛfu nyi ahwanvu ɖe e sixu gla ɖɔ a
e ɖɔ mɛ ɖɔ ɖo mɛ bi nukɔn ɖɔ emi nyi ahwanvu ɔ nyɛ ɖekunnu ɖo ɖo jixwe ɔ nukɔn
jozɛfu ɖɔ emi kun tuun jezu o tawun a jɛn e yi gbe ɖɔ emi ɖo nuɖiɖi a e nɛ
wɛ nɔ blo a
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ jozɛfu ɖo tɛn ɔ mɛ hwenu e ɖo hwɛ nu jezu e a
ðebu wɛ e nyi ɔ hwɛagɔɖiɖɔ enɛ nu jozɛfu tawun e sixu wa nu ɖebu do ɖo a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hwenu jezu ku e ɔ jozɛfu ɖu ɖo xɛsi tɔn lɛ ji wa gbeta ɔ kɔn nɔ gudo nu ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ
gbeta enɛ kɔn e wa e ɖo xo ɖo mɛ e mɛ e ɖo akɔnkpinkpan yi mɔ pilatu byɔ ɛ jezu sin cyɔ
nugbo ɔ e tuun ɖɔ jezu ku cobɔ pilatu tlɛ wa se lɔ
enɛ ɔ wu ɔ hwenu jozɛfu byɔ cyɔ jezu tɔn e ɔ jezu yawu ku gbɔn ɔ kpaca tokpɔngan ɔ
e sixu nyi
gbɔn gudo bi ɔ nuɖe jozɛfu bɔ e wa nu
hlɔmanu lɛ ɔ yedɛɛ lɛ nɔ jo hu lɛ e sin cyɔ do nyi kpo ɔ wu bɔ e nɔ gble alo nɔ nyi do yɔdo kpaa ɖe mɛ
jozɛfu ɖɔ e nyi nu jezu a
jozɛfu ɖo yɔdo e kun do so xomɛ e ɖokpo bɔ e ɖo fi e hu jezu ɖe e kpa
jaan jezu jozɛfu ɖi do yɔdo eɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ e nyi ɖe bɔ e wa enɛ bɔ kunkpla mɛsiya ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖi ɖo dɔkunnɔ lɛ tɛntin e jɛnu eza
nuɖe tiin vlafo bɔ ylɔ ɖɔ nujɔnu hu kancica ɖo hwi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e wɛ a
jaan mɛ ɖokpo gee e ɖɔ le tawun ɖɔ e jozɛfu e wɛ nyi nikodɛmu hɛn nusawu wan ɖagbenɔ e nɔ sa nu cyɔ e wa e
ðo mɛ we enɛ lɛ nyi nukunɖeji lɛ wutu ɔ e ci ɖɔ yeɖesunɔ kun cyɔ ɔ o ɖɔhun
e ɖibla nyi ɖɔ lɛ wɛ bɔ cyɔ ɔ ɖi
nu e tlɛ nyi lɛ wɛ zan ɔ mɛ nya we enɛ lɛ do kɔ e nyi nu a
tuto cyɔɖiɖi jezu tɔn tɔn sin nu jozɛfu e sixu bɔ tɔn lɛ ca ɛ
fi e jɛ din e ɔ e jlo do yi gbe nu nu jezu ɖiɖi e jɛxa gbɔn e ji lɛ e yi gbe ɖo agbawungba ɖɔ emi nyi ahwanvu klisu tɔn
nugbo ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi tuun a
nu mi nu ji mi ɖɔ xo do wa yi e ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e ɖe eɖee ɖi klisanwun ɖe ɖo agbawungba
ðo ninɔmɛ mɛtɛnkpɔn tɔn enɛ mɛ ɔ nuɖiɖi kpo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn kpo ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɖekpo a
nu ɖagbe wɛ enɛ nyi
elɔ nukanbyɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo tamɛ e ɖe nyite tɛn mɛ mi ɖe e mitɔn nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu xwedo mitɔn e jɛ miɖee kannu mi ɖe e ji ɖo nyi nujɔnu nu mi hu kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e wɛ a
e ci ɖɔ alimatee wɛ nyi hlama e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ rentis rantis egbe e
lɛkɔ wa bonu ma lɛkɔ wa
linlin tɛ jehovah nɔ ɖo do ajo alɔkpa lɛ bi wu
mi sixu zan sɔgbe xa ze mi ze miɖee jo nu mawu e ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe gbɔn
mi sixu wa nyi mitɔn e ɖe nunyanyawiwa sin tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ gbɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ mɛ togun jehovah tɔn ɖe hwenu zakalii e
etɛwu jehovah byɔ togun tɔn ɖɔ e lɛkɔ wa emitɔn
etɛwu jehovah numimɔ nukunɖeji enɛ lɛ gbeyiɖɔ tɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ mɛ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖe ɖo hwenɛnu
numimɔ zakalii tɔn enɛ lɛ kan mi gbɔn ɖo egbe
xwe tɔn nyi xwe awajijɛ tɔn ɖe nu togun jehovah tɔn eɖee jo e
ee nɔ kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu nu xwe kpiɖikpiɖi e ɔ kan wa jo
akpakpa ɖaxo ɖe jɛ nukɔn bɔ jɛ wa ji sinsɛn nugbo ɔ ɖo ayi ɖo jeluzalɛmu
ðo ɔ do tɛmpli ɔ do ðo hwe ɔ ɔ togun ɔ ɖo xo su wɛ wooo bɔ e nɔ se ɖo zɔ ɛsd
e nɔ zaan kpowun e ɔ gbeklanxamɛ ɖe do ɔ ji
tagba kpo kpo tobutobu lɛ tuntun awakanmɛ nu togun ɔ bɔ jo tɛmpli ɔ do bɔ ayi ɖo xwe yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo gle yetɔn lɛ kpo ji
xwe gudo ɔ tɛmpli jehovah tɔn gbigba sin ɔ ci kpowun
e byɔ ɖɔ e flin togun jehovah tɔn ɖɔ e lɛkɔ wa tɔn bonu nu eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ gbɔ nukun mya jɛ nukɔn
jehovah ɖɔ lɛkɔ wa emitɔn jɛ sinsɛn emi kpo ayi bi kpo ji ɖi xɛsi
bonu mawu do togun tɔn nu e flin nu nukɔntɔn wu e ɖe e sin babilɔnu e ɔ e gbeyiɖɔ tɔn zakalii do ɖo
nyikɔ zakalii tɔn ɖesu sin tinmɛ nyi jehovah flin e sixu flin nugbo taji ɖe
togun ɔ wɔn hwlɛngan sin nuwiwa jehovah tɔn lɛ co e kpo ɖo flinflin wɛ xa zakalii
e jiɖe kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖɔ emi bɔ sinsɛn nugbo ɔ ɖo ayi nu syɛnsyɛn ɖɔ emi kun yi gbe ɖɔ emi kpo ayixa ma e ɖe kpo o
mi jehovah gbɔn numimɔ zakalii tɔn ayizɛngɔ ɔ kpo tɛnwegɔ ɔ kpo sin yɛkan mɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu bonu jɛ ji gbɔn e
etɛ zakalii mɔ ɖo numimɔ tɔn ayizɛngɔ ɔ mɛ
etɛwu nuwlanwlan ɖo wema mlamla ɔ sin akpa we lɛ xwe e ɖo taji
zakalii sin wemata ɔ kpo numimɔ budo ɖe kpo xa zakalii
zakalii mɔ wema mlamla ɖe ɖo zinzɔn wɛ ɖo jɔhɔn mɛ bɔ tɔn nyi mɛtlu bɔ gblo tɔn nyi mɛtlu
e ɖo hunhun bɔ e jɛ tagba cobo xa a
wɛn hwɛɖonumɛ tɔn ɖe wɛ kpe wema mlamla ɔ sin akpa we lɛ bi xwe
hwɛhwɛ ɔ akpa ɖokpo xwe wɛ nuwlanwlan nɔ ɖe nu wema mlamla ɖe enɛ ɔ wu ɔ wɛn taji kpo wɛn syɛnsyɛn ɖe kpo wɛ ɖo wema mlamla enɛ mɛ
ajo alɔkpa ɖebu ɖo tɛn tɔn ɖo klisanwun lɛ tɛntin a akpaxwe jɛ
linlin tɛ jehovah nɔ ɖo do ajo alɔkpa ɖebu wu
xa zakalii
mɛ lɛ bi wɛ ɖo gbe nu jehovah loɔ togun tɔn tɔn zun kwinkwin kwin
mɛ yi wan nu mawu lɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ ajojija alɔkpa ɖebu do
e nyi nu ɖebu wɛ ɖe alo e byɔ ɖɔ e myɔ nukun do ajo e ja e ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ wu ɔ e tuun ɖɔ e jlo tɔn ɖo hu mawu lobɔ nuɖokan lɛ xɔ akwɛ hugan
e nukun kpɛvi do mawu tɔn kɔn ci do jehovah kpo nyikɔ tɔn kpo wu ɖɔ e kun nyi nu taji o
ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ ɖo zakalii mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah nudomɛ do bɔ nudomɛ enɛ ɔ gba nu ɖo lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo xwe a
hɔn lɛ kpo sɛxlo lɛ kpo sixu su ali do hwɛɖonumɛ jehovah tɔn a
e sixu yi fi hwla lɛ e ɖebu ɖe nunyanyawiwa ɖo togun tɔn mɛ lɛ e jɛ we
e do gbɔ nu mi tawun ɖɔ mi ɖo do xa togun tuun tawun ɖɔ e ɖɔ nugbo ɖo nu bi mɛ e wɛ ebl
mi sixu kpewu glo nudomɛ wema mlamla ɖo zinzɔn wɛ e tɔn gbɔn
hwɛ huhu do jehovah wɛ ajo alɔkpa lɛ bi nyi
mi nɔ mɔ gbɛzinzan sɔgbe xa nugbododo ɖaxo jehovah tɔn lɛ do mɔ wujɔmɛ ɖe nɔ nɔ ɖo walɔ kɔn ci do nyikɔ tɔn wu ɖo ali ɖebu a lɛ e
mɛ ɔ mi sixu kpewu glo hwɛ jehovah ɖo nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ jlo do gba tɔn lɛ e e
akpa tɛ axɔsu sedesiyasi ɖe a
wɛn e wlan do wema mlamla ɖo zinzɔn wɛ e ji bɔ e nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ do adingban sin akpa nɔ xwle nyikɔ mawu tɔn lɛ e
akpa ɖe ɔ xo e ɖɔ xwle nu do do zogbe ji ɖɔ nuɖe nyi nugbo alo akpa syɛnsyɛn mɛɖe do ɖɔ emi wa nuɖe alo emi kun wa nuɖe o e wɛ
nu xwlexwle do akpa ɖe ji ɖo nyikɔ jehovah tɔn mɛ nyi nu ɖe a
nu axɔsu gudo tɔn ɔ wa cobo xa axɔsuzinkpo ji ɖo jeluzalɛmu e nɛ
sedesiyasi xwle jehovah sin nyikɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ gbeji nu axɔsu babilɔnu tɔn
sedesiyasi wa nu sɔgbe kpo nu e xwle e kpo a
axɔsu sedesiyasi xwle nu jehovah ɖɔ emi zan sɔgbe xa akpa emi do ɖo nyikɔ tɔn mɛ e
akpa taji hugan tɛ mi do
ali tɛ lɛ ze mi ze miɖee jo nu jehovah e kunkpla gbɛzinzan mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn ɖe
jehovah nɔ ɖoto akpa ɖeɖee mi nɔ do lɛ e
ðo akpa mi do lɛ e bi mɛ ɔ taji bi ɔ wɛ nyi ee mi do hwenu mi ze miɖee jo nu jehovah e
mɛɖee zize jo nu jehovah ɔ akpa ɖe wɛ bɔ mi do kpo ayi bi kpo ɖɔ nu ɖebu ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɔ mi ɛ
mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu mɛɖee zize jo sin akpa mitɔn gbɔn
dɔn mi nɔ gbi ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖaxo lɛ kpo kpɛvi lɛ kpo e ɖo ɖɔ mi akpa mi do ɖɔ mi mla jehovah ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ ylɔ ɖɔ nujɔnu
mi nɔ xoɖɛ do sɛkpɔ wanyiyinɔ mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ gbe bi gbe nɔ doku ɖɔ e dɔn mi wa acɛkpikpa tɔn glɔ yi wan nu mi a
mi nɔ hwenu nɔ xa biblu gbe bi gbe a
mi ɖɔ mi wa nu mɔhun lɛ a ce tonusise sin xo wɛ
alɔɖiɖo ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ bi nɔ ɖɔ mi yi wan ze miɖee jo nugbo nugbo
sinsɛn biblo mitɔn ɔ mi ɖo zan gbɔn e nɛ e nyi nuɖe bɔ mi blo tɔn tɔn kpowun a
etɛ numimɔ zakalii tɔn ayizɛngɔ ɔ sixu mi
zakalii sin numimɔ ayizɛngɔ ɔ mi bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ mɛ yi wan nu jehovah lɛ e kun ɖo do ajojija alɔkpa ɖebu mɛ alo adingban tɔn ɖebu o
mi mɔ ɖɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ kun setonu o co jehovah kun jo gbe o
e tuun ɖɔ do lɛ e ɖo kɔ gbidi nu wɛ tawun
e ze ɖagbe ɔ nu mi wa nu sɔgbe kpo akpa tɔn lɛ kpo e mi bɔ mi lɔ wa
ali e nɔ mi ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nukunɖiɖo ɖe ɖo nu mi ɖɔ emi ɖe nu nyanya gbɔn ayikungban ɔ ji lɛ e bi siin zaanɖe
zakalii sin numimɔ bɔ e nukunɖiɖo ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ sin ganjɛwu mi
ðo numimɔ tɛnwegɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ etɛ zakalii mɔ
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛ tɔn nyɔnu ɖo xasun ɔ mɛ e nyi
etɛwu e su do xasun ɔ mɛ
ee zakalii mɔ wema mlamla ɖo zinzɔn wɛ e gudo e ɔ wɛnsagun ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ ze
etɛ numimɔ tɔn tɛnwegɔ ɔ
e mɔ xasun ɖe bɔ e sin ja xa zakalii
xasun enɛ ɔ nusu ɖe
ee nusu ɔ hun e ɔ zakalii mɔ nyɔnu ɖe ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo xasun ɔ mɛ
wɛnsagun ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ nyɔnu ɖo xasun ɔ mɛ e nyi dakaxixo sin
do nukun mɛ e xyɔwu nu zakalii gbɔn hwenu e mɔ ɛ bɔ e ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ sin xasun ɔ mɛ e
wɛnsagun ɔ yawu wa nuɖe e kpikpe e do xasun ɔ mɛ su nusu ɔ ganji
etɛ nyi tinmɛ enɛ tɔn
akpaxwe numimɔ ɔ tɔn enɛ ɖɔ jehovah kun lɔn nu nunyanyawiwa alɔkpa ɖebu nɔ togun tɔn tɛntin o
e bɔ e wli do nu mɛ yawu ɖe siin
jehovah nɔ wa nu wu e kpe e bi bonu nublibli va do sinsɛn biblo ɔ wu o akpaxwe jɛ
etɛ zakalii mɔ bɔ e wa nu xasun ɔ
ɖiɖe ɖo e fitɛ nyɔnu ɖo lɛ e xasun ɔ yi
nyɔnu we ɖe lɛ wa ɖo ɖaxo ɖe lɛ aɖɔwe ɖɔhun
xa zakalii nwt
le do nyɔnu enɛ lɛ gbɔn vo nu nyɔnu ɖo xasun ɔ mɛ e e
nyɔnu enɛ lɛ zan yetɔn ɖaxo lɛ zɔn wa do xasun mɛ dakaxixo sin ɔ ɖe e yi
fitɛ yi
dakaxixo sin ɔ yi ɖo cineyaa yikungban ji alo ɖo babilɔnu
etɛwu xasun ɔ yi ɖo babilɔnu
etɛwu cineyaa nyi tɛn jɛxa dakaxixo sin ɔ e
etɛ ji mi ku do wa nu nunyanyawiwa
nu izlayɛli vi nɔ ɖo zakalii sin azan gbe lɛ e ɔ cineyaa wɛ nyi fi jɛxa bɔ e dakaxixo sin ɔ ɖo e
zakalii kpo jwifu tɔn lɛ kpo sixu yi gbe ɖɔ babilɔnu nyi nɔtɛn dakaxixo tɔn ɖe ɖo azan yetɔn gbe
ðo su ɖo toxo enɛ mɛ nublibli kpo vodunsinsɛn kpo ɖe e wutu ɔ ɖo xo hun ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ba ɖi xwi xa pagawun enɛ sin gbigbɔ
numimɔ ɔ flin jwifu lɛ ɖo ba wa bɔ sinsɛn biblo yetɔn nɔ ji e
e sixu yi gbe nu dakaxixo alo nunyanyawiwa sa byɔ togun jehovah tɔn mɛ nɔ mɛ a
ee e dɔn mi wa tutoblonunu mawu tɔn nɔ cyɔn alɔ mɛ ji nɔ kpe nukun mɛ wu kpo wanyiyi kpo e mɛ gudo e ɔ mi ɖo nɔ ji
nunyanyawiwa alɔkpa ɖebu ɖo nɔ palaɖisi gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn mɛ a
etɛ numimɔ jiwu zakalii tɔn mi
zakalii sin numimɔ ayizɛngɔ ɔ kpo tɛnwegɔ ɔ kpo nyi akpagbanumɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe nu mɛ ɖeɖee jlo jo adingban nuwiwa lɛ do a lɛ e nyi nuflinmɛ ɖe ɖɔ jehovah kun yi gbe nu nunyanyawiwa o
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɛ kpo ayi bi kpo lɛ e ɖo wan nu nunyanyawiwa bi
enɛ lɛ nyi ganjɛwu wanyiyi tɔn ɖe bɔ mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ mi
enyi mi kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo nyi alɔkpa mawu yi wan nɔ cyɔn alɔ ji lɛ e ɔ e do mi ɖɔ mi ku a
e wa ɔ jehovah hun xomɛ do do nu mi
gan do wɛ mi ɖe nɔ ji ɖo mɛ nunyanyawiwa e xɔ akwɛ tawun
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ e kpa mi
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ sinsɛn nugbo ɔ gbakpe ɖo jijɔ nyi mawu tɔn a lɛ e e ɖe mɛ gbɔn
ganjɛwu tɛ mi ɖo ɖɔ jehovah cyɔn alɔ tutoblonunu tɔn ji din ɖaxo ɔ ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e
mi ɖɔ xo do nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ ji ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
nu setonu nu jehovah mawu mitɔn ɔ nu nyi
jiɖe etɛ tɔn zakalii sin numimɔ gudo tɔn ɔ togun mawu tɔn
ganvɔso we lɛ kpo ahwankɛkɛvi lɛ kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi gbɔn
nu ci nu do ɖaxo wa wɛ e ɖe ɖo egbe e wu
ninɔmɛ tɛ mɛ wɛ jwifu lɛ ɖe ɖo jeluzalɛmu hwenu e numimɔ tɛnwegɔ ɔ zakalii gudo e
nu ɖe ɖyɔ a
nugbomaɖɔ kpo nuwalɔ nyanya ɖevo lɛ kpo kpo ɖo ayi bɔ e flin fo tɛmpli jehovah tɔn ɖo jeluzalɛmu e gba a
jwifu lɛ sixu jo mawu nu e do tlolo gbɔn
jɛ yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ wu kpowun wutu wɛ lɛkɔ wa jɔtɛn yetɔn a
zakalii tuun ɖɔ jwifu ɖeɖee tɛn wa jeluzalɛmu lɛ e nyi sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo lɛ
nyi mɛ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn bɔ jo ayijayi ɖo xwe yetɔn gbe lɛ e kpo yetɔn lɛ kpo do e
nu tɛmpli jehovah tɔn gba nyi nu taji a ɔ zɔn ali nu kilomɛtlu gbɔn ayikungban vɛwu tawun lɛ e ji a
tɛ lɛ kpannukɔn jwifu lɛkɔ wa jeluzalɛmu lɛ e
tomɛyiyi enɛ ci
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hwenu jwifu lɛ ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ zan ganxixo gege do tamɛ do fi nyi xwe yetɔn ɔ e ji
e ɖɔ xo nu do toxo jeluzalɛmu tɔn ɖɛkpɛ tawun gbɔn e ji
nu zɔn ali ɔ xa wɛ ɔ nu ci nu hwenu mɔ jeluzalɛmu nyi xwe towe ɔ e e
do ɖaxo ɖaxo weɖobu babilɔnu tɔn lɛ do jeluzalɛmu sin do ɖo hɔntogbo lɛ kpo atɔxwɛ lɛ kpo huzu doglin zizɛ din lɛ e wu wɛ a
nu ɖo co togun ɔ
mɔ jehovah hwlɛn gbɔn hwenu ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wɛ ɖo ali gaga enɛ ji e
ɖo co gbe e klan xa nu xwe e bɔ awakanmɛ ku
e ci ɖɔ sɔgudo toxo enɛ tɔn ɖɔhun ɛsd
jehovah tuun nu sin hudo togun tɔn ɖo e
mawu numimɔ gudo tɔn ɖe zakalii do ganjɛwu jwifu lɛ ɖɔ emi yi wan nu ɖɔ nu wa wɛ ɖe sin hwenu linlin ɖie lɛ e bi su nukun emitɔn mɛ nu ɖɔ emi nya xɛ ɖo ji nu lɛkɔ yi emitɔn kɔn ɔ nɛ
nu nu kan tɛmpli ɔ gba e ɔ jehovah ɖɔ nu setonu nu jehovah mawu mitɔn ɔ nu nyi
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛwu lɛ ɖo sinmɛ vovo
numimɔ tantɔngɔ gudo tɔn e zakalii e sixu nyi ee do hlɔnhlɔn hlɔnhlɔn ji nu nuɖiɖi tawun e
xa zakalii
enɛ bɔ e tuun ɖe ɖo vo nu ee bɔ e
zakalii kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ nyi wɛ ɖe
ðo numimɔ enɛ kan mi tlɔlɔ wutu ɔ mi lɔ jlo tuun nu nyi wɛ e ɖe e
etɛ so we lɛ nɔte
etɛwu so lɛ nyi ganvɔso
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ so lɛ sixu nɔte nu axɔsuɖuto lɛ alo acɛkpikpa lɛ
so ɖeɖee xo e ɖɔ ɖo zakalii sin mɛ lɛ e ɖi so we daniyɛli tɔn lɛ e
ðo e jezu ɖo axɔsuzinkpo ji ɖo wutu ɔ so we lɛ tiin ɖo bunɔ ɖe wa wɛ bonu jlo mawu tɔn nyi wiwa ɖo ayikungban ji
etɛwu so lɛ nyi ganvɔso
ði sika ɖɔhun ɔ ganvɔ nyi ɖe xɔ akwɛ tawun
jehovah ɖegbe ɖɔ e zan enɛ nɔ e do gba goxɔ ɔ bɔ nukɔnmɛ ɔ e zan do gba tɛmpli ɔ ɖo jeluzalɛmu tin
ɖo ahwankɛkɛvi lɛ kun wɛ
wɛnsagun lɛ wɛ ɖo ahwankɛkɛvi lɛ kun wɛ e sixu nyi yetɔn vovo lɛ xa zakalii nwt
ɖo sin aklunɔ ayikungban ɔ bi tɔn sin nukɔn wɛ ɖo bunɔ ɖe wa
e ahwankɛkɛvi lɛ kpo lɛ kpo do bonu nya xɛ ɖo ayikungban tawun tawun ɖe lɛ ji
jehovah blo bɔ babilɔnu wli togun tɔn yi kannumɔgbenu ɖe a
enɛ do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo tɛmpli ɔ gba wɛ ɖo zakalii hwenu lɛ e e
ɖi xɛsi nu yetɔn ɖo nu mɛ jɛ nu wɛ lɛ e a
ganjɛwu tɛ zakalii tɔn kunkpla ahwankɛkɛvi lɛ kpo lɛ kpo e sixu togun mawu tɔn egbe
ðo wɛnsagun lɛ ɖo xɛ nya ɖo mi ji wɛ wutu ɔ mi ɖo ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn sixu wa nyi kannumɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo azɔn ɖevo a
nu mi ɖo tamɛ do numimɔ zakalii tɔn ji wɛ ɔ mi ɖeji ɖɔ mi ɖo ayijayi mɛ ɖo yɛtɛn so we lɛ tɔn
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖi xɛsi nu ahwan e togun mawu tɔn zaanɖe din e a
ðo malin malin mɛ din ɔ acɛkpikpa toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn sataan tɔn tɔn lɛ so kpo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ emi su kun do nu togun mawu tɔn
ezek
ahwankpa ɖe ɖo akpa mitɔn
azan taji ɖe wɛ azan enɛ nyi
ɖo ahwankpa jehovah tɔn jixwe tɔn
etɛ e ɖɔ nu zakalii din ɖɔ e blo
tinmɛ mɛ e ylɔ ɖɔ kun e nyi jezu klisu gbɔn e
din ɔ e ɖo nuwiwa tɔn ɖe mɛ do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo tɛmpli mawu tɔn ɖo ayi wɛ lɛ e xa zakalii
tokpɔngan zolobabɛli ee gosin akɔta judaa tɔn mɛ nyi kunkan davidi tɔn e wɛ e ɖɔ nu zakalii ɖɔ e axɔsugbakun ɔ ɖo a
e sixu kpaca lɛ hwenu zakalii axɔsugbakun ɔ ɖo nu ðaxo jozuwee e
axɔsugbakun e ɖo nu ðaxo jozuwee e bɔ e huzu axɔsu wɛ a
eo jozuwee gosin kunkan axɔsu davidi tɔn mɛ a enɛ wu ɔ e jɛxa nyi axɔsu a
ɖaxo e axɔsu e sin nyikɔ nyi kun
tɛ jezu nyi axɔsu kpo ðaxo kpo e wa
enɛ wu ɔ e nɔ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo bonu togun mawu tɔn blebu do sixu nɔ ayijayi mɛ ɖo elɔ mɛ hunnyahunnya ɖe e
kun ɔ ɖo taji ɖe wa cobo ɖo hwɛ nu akɔta lɛ
nuvɔjlaɖo kpo nu kwijikwiji ɖiɖe sin mɛ wu kpo sin tɛ wa wɛ e ɖe ɖo azan mitɔn gbe
ðo axɔsuɖuɖu xwe tɔn klisu tɔn sin fifonu ɔ nu lɛ ci
nu axɔsu kpo ðaxo jezu nyi e kpo ɔ e bɔ e gba tɛmpli jehovah tɔn xa zakalii nwt
ðo azan mitɔn gbe ɔ jezu tɔn ɔ bɔ e ɖe mawu nugbo lɛ sin kannumɔgbenu babilɔnu ðaxo ɔ tɔn agun klisanwun tɔn ɖo ayi ɖo
jezu sin alɔnu jan ɖo nu kwiji ɖiɖe sin togun mawu tɔn wu kpo alɔdido e bonu e jehovah e yi gbe gbɔn e kpo mɛ
gudo mɛ ɔ e sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ ɖo ayi bi
jehovah ɖɔ emi nya xɛ ɖo ji ɖo yetɔn kɔn
ganjɛwu e ɖɔ gba tɛmpli ɔ e sixu nukunɖiɖo ayixa yetɔn nu cikɔ lɛ e
mɛ kpɛɖe kpowun sixu wa ɖaxo enɛ gbɔn
gbɔn vo nu gudo sunnu heludayi toviya kpo yedaya kpo nɔ nu e ɔ mawu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ gosin zɔ wa do alɔ mɛ ɖo tɛmpli jehovah tɔn gba wɛ lɛ
xa zakalii
e ɔ co ɖo jwifu lɛ ɖeji ɖɔ mawu ɖo gudo nu emi wutu ɔ ɔ
e lin a bɔ jehovah ɖe ci so ɖɔhun e siin bɔ e fo tɛmpli ɔ ɖo ɛsd
jehovah wɔn wanyiyi mi e gbeɖe a
zakalii ɖo jijɛnu wɛ ɖo azan mitɔn gbe gbɔn
mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ gudo nɔ nu sinsɛn nugbo ɔ wɛ mi ɖe kpo gbejininɔ kpo e xɔ akwɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ gbɔn
axɔsugbakun ɔ nyi nuɖe bɔ e nɔ do flin nu do nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ e e
ðagbe tɛ numimɔ zakalii tɔn ɖo wa nu mi ɖo egbe
nu wa wɛ e ɖe ɖo sinsɛn nugbo ɔ mɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ e nyi nyɔna jehovah tɔn tɔn kpo klisu nyi e tɔn kpo
mi ɖo tutoblonunu lido ɖo ayijayi mɛ nɔ ayi sɔyi e mɛ
linlin jehovah ɖo do sinsɛn biblo ɔ wu e nyi
wlibo nu tɛn mɛ ɖe ɖo togun jehovah tɔn mɛ e setonu nu jehovah mawu towe
enɛ ɔ sixu ci axɔsu mitɔn nyi ðaxo e sin xɛnyaɖomɛji kpo mɛ ɖo ahwankɛkɛvi jixwe tɔn lɛ kun wɛ lɛ e kpo tɔn glɔ
nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn biblo ɔ kpewu gbɔn e bi
nu jlo mɔ tinmɛ ɖevo lɛ hun kanbio le son wehiato le de ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe mai tɔn mɛ wexwɛ
ðo toxo kpɛvi gujarat tɔn mɛ ɖo ɔ john sin blo baptɛm ɖo xwe ɖie nyi jehovah tɔn ɖe
john nɔvi tɔn sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo lɛ nu nɔ yetɔn bi wɛ nyi katolika hlɔma tɔn yi tewungbeju klan gbe xa nu yetɔn ɖi nu lɛ e
gbe ɖokpo ɔ john sin byɔ john ɖɔ e wemakpo ɖe yi jo nu agun ɔ tɔn ɖe
zanzan enɛ hwenu e jlo hun balii ɖaxo ɖe sin nusu e ɔ nusu ɔ gbo alɔvi tɔn kan tawun
e ɖo co ɖo e jlo setonu nu tɔn wutu ɔ e bla avɔvi do alɔvi ɔ afɔ ɖido ba ze wemakpo ɔ yi jo
ee john wa fi ɔ e ɔ mɛ e wema ɔ do e sin asi nyi jehovah tɔn ɖe e wɛ yi wemakpo ɔ
e wu ɖɔ john gblewu do alɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɛ
e ɖe gbavi tɔn mɛ akpablanu lɛ ɖe e akpa ɔ bla
klisanwun lɛ ɖo xoɖɛ a
ðo ɔ anɔnugbe john tɔn gujarati wutu ɔ e xosin sin biblu mɛ akpomɛwema cette bonne nouvelle du royaume
nukɔnmɛ hwenu john ɖo akpomɛwema ɔ xa wɛ e ɔ e ci ɖɔ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ e ɖo nugbo biblu tɔn ɔ se wɛ nɛ
e yi yɛhwenɔ tɔn nu we enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɔ kanbyɔ ɛ
mi fi biblu ɖɔ ɖe ɖɔ jezu kun nyi mawu o e
mi fi e ɖɔ ɖe ɖɔ e kun o e
mi la
nu yɛhwenɔ ɔ wa e ci kliwun nu john bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ afɔ ɖokpo le tɛ sinsɛn katolika tɔn mɛ gbeɖe a
wɛ e blo nugbo
john jɛ biblu xa lɛ ji zunfan sinsɛn nugbo ɔ jɛ jehovah ji
e wa ya e ɔ xwedo tɔn sin ɖevo lɛ gege wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
sɔgbe kpo mɔyizi ɔ kpo ɔ nu xwixwle lɛ ɖo tɛn jɛxa e
e ɖo co nu xwixwle wa huzu nuwiwa gbe bi gbe tɔn ɖe ɖo gbɛzan mɛ nɔ ɖo jezu hwenu lɛ e tɔn mɛ bɔ nɔ xwle nu do xo yetɔn lɛ bi ji bonu mɛ lɛ mɔ tɛn do ku do nu ɖɔ wɛ ɖe e ji ganji
e wa ɔ e ɖɔ enyi xo mitɔn nyi ɛɛn hun nyi ɛɛn e nyi eeo hun nyi eeo
jezu ɖokponɔ wɛ nuwiwa mɔhun lɛ a
silaki vi ee nyi ɖokpo ɖo nuwlanwlan jwifu lɛ tɔn mawu do ayi mɛ nu mɛ a lɛ e mɛ e ɖɔ xo mɔhun mɛ nɔ ɖo nu xwle wɛ hwebinu e nɔ do asa hwɛhwɛ
enɛ wu ɔ jezu ɖɔ mɛɖe nu xwixwle do mɔ nu ɖe o
nu mi nɔ ɖɔ nugbo hwebinu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ xwle nu cobonu e ɖi xo mitɔn lɛ a
jihan kpo awajijɛ kpo
nu togun jehovah tɔn ɔ hwebinu wɛ hanjiji nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo sinsɛn biblo mɛ
e ɖo co e vo jihan ɖo agbawungba sixu vɛwu nu mɛɖe lɛ
mi sixu ɖu ɖo xɛsi mi nɔ ɖi zan gbe mitɔn do jihan do kpa nu jehovah e ji gbɔn
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe ɖeɖee wu mi jihan kpo awajijɛ kpo lɛ e ji ɖe we ɖe lɛ xa mi do mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ hangbe mitɔn gbɔn e wu
nɔ hɔn yi su jehovah a
nɔ ðɔhwɛ jlɔjlɔ nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ jehovah ðɔhun
ðo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ ali ɖeɖee lɛ sixu hɔn yi su jehovah ɖe ɖo egbe lɛ e
ðo xota wegɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ jehovah tɔn mi bɔ mi hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo sisi nu wa nu jlɔjlɔ gbɔn e
mɛ nɔ nu mɛ ɔ e nu bɔ e
linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ
lɔn nu nu ðebu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin asi towe o
xota we elɔ lɛ junjɔn we pɔlu ɖe xa klisanwun kolosi tɔn lɛ e ji
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ tinmɛ nu mi wa hwenu mi se linlin ɔ tɔn sixu dɔn mɛ alo ɖu ɖo mɛ ji lɛ e e
xota wegɔ ɔ flin mi mi sixu nyi alɔ nu linlin ɖeɖee sixu xo nyɔna sin akpa jehovah do nu mi lɛ e yi gbɔn e
sixu huzu sɔgbe xa agun towe ɔ gbɔn
etɛ hanjiji nɔ wa ɖo sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ mɛ
sixu ɖu ɖo lɛ ji jihan do kpa nu jehovah do ɖe nu ci nu e gbɔn
huzuhuzu tɛ lɛ e blo ɖo hanwema ɔ mɛ sixu zan ganji hugan gbɔn
etɛ hanjiji nɔ bɔ mi nɔ wa
mɛ gege tuun e ɖe ɖɔ nu e ɖo xo ɖoto wɛ ɔ e nɔ bɔ e nɔ tamɛ
nu e ɖo ji wɛ ɔ xogbe ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ byɔ ayi mɛ nu mɛ
linlin ɖagbe hugan tɛ lɛ sixu byɔ ayi mɛ nu mɛ hu ɖeɖee kpa nu mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ jehovah ɖe wanyiyi ɛ e
linlin tɛ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo do gbe zize do ji do jihan ɖo agun mɛ wu
linlin tɛ nɔ ɖo do gbe zize do ji jihan xa agun ɔ wu
winnya nɔ hu wɛ a
ðo aca ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ sunnu lɛ nɔ sixu vo nɔ jihan ɖo agbawungba a
enyi mi mɔ tawun ɖɔ hanjiji nyi akpaxwe sinsɛn biblo mitɔn tɔn ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi kun gbɔ ji alo gɔn akpaxwe kple mitɔn lɛ tɔn enɛ sin tɛnmɛ o
enɛ wu ɔ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ linlin tɛ nɔ ɖo do hanjiji ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ ji wu
sixu ɖu ɖo ɖebu sixu do afɔ mɛ nu mi bɔ gɔn ji kpo awajijɛ kpo e ji gbɔn
etɛ sixu wa ɖe nu ji ɖɔ xo do wɛ ɔ ɖe e bi
tuto ɖeɖee e blo nu hanjiji nu sinsɛn biblo ɖo izlayɛli hwexonu tɔn e gblo ada sɔ
sin hwexonu wɛ jehovah lɛ nɔ zan nuxixo do kpa nu jehovah
e jɛxa ɖɔ e tuun ɖɔ hwenu izlayɛli vi hwexonu tɔn lɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo e ɔ hanjiji nyi nu taji ɖe ɖo sinsɛn biblo yetɔn mɛ
ði ɔ hwenu axɔsu davidi ɖo tuto blo wɛ bonu e wa ɖo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ e ɔ e ɖe levii vi bonu xo nu do kpa mawu
ji ganji do kpa jehovah ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
ðo tɛmpli ɔ hunhun sin hwenu ɔ nuxixo kpo hanjiji kpo wa nu taji ɖe
ɔ ɖɔ lɛ kpo nuxoto lɛ kpo bi ɖo ɖo ji do kpa nu jehovah wɛ ɖo nyikɔ tɔn su wɛ
ɖo kpɛn kun wɛ ɖo hun kpo nuxonu ɖevo lɛ kpo xo wɛ ɖo kpa nu jehovah wɛ
hwenɛnu ɔ jehovah tɔn xwe ɔ
nu jɛ hwenɛnu e hɛn nuɖiɖi mɛ lɛ tɔn lido e
tinmɛ tuto hanjiji tɔn bunɔ e blo hwenu nɛɛmii tokpɔngan ɔ ɖo jeluzalɛmu e
hwenu nɛɛmii ɖo nu izlayɛli vi lɛ bɔ ɖo do jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ gba wɛ e ɔ e lɔ blo tuto nu levii vi lɛ bɔ ɖo nuxonu kɔn nyi
hwenu do lɛ mɛ nu mawu e ɔ tuto nuxixo tɔn bunɔ blo e so nu awajijɛ nuwiwa ɔ tɔn tawun
jezu ɖɔ hanjiji nyi nu taji ɖo sinsɛn biblo klisanwun tɔn mɛ gbɔn
hwenu e ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn ayi e ɔ nuxixo kpo ɖo nu taji ɖe nyi wɛ ɖo sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ mɛ
ðo zan nyi taji hugan ɖo hwenuxo tɔn mɛ e mɛ ɔ jezu kpo tɔn lɛ kpo jihan hwenu e ɖo aklunɔ sin nuɖuɖu ɔ ayi gudo e xa matie
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ ze ɖe ɖo hanjiji ɖo sinsɛn biblo lixo gbɔn
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ ze kpa nu mawu do mɛ sin ɖe
hwɛhwɛ ɔ xwe mɛɖesunɔ tɔn nu ɖe a lɛ e gbe wɛ nɔ kple ɖe mawu co lɔn nu enɛ nu akpakpa nɔ do hanjiji nu jehovah wu e a
mawu mɛ nu pɔlu bɔ e ɖɔ nu nɔvi tɔn klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ ɖo nu miɖee wɛ nɔ ɖo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu miɖee wɛ gbɔn ɖɛhan lɛ kpikpa nu mawu nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ jiji kpo nusumɛnukunmɛ kpo gblamɛ nɔ ɖo ji wɛ ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ nu jehovah
nwt ɖeɖee ɖo hanwema mitɔn mɛ lɛ e nyi gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ bɔ e ji kpo nusumɛnukunmɛ kpo
ɖo nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖeɖee devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ nɔ mi lɛ e mɛ
etɛ nɔ ali nu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ jihan kpo awajijɛ kpo ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ kpo lɛ kpo ji a
mi ɖo jihan nu jehovah gbɔn ɖo nɔ nukɔn
enyi jɔ ɖo hankunmɛ a alo e nɔ jihan gbɔn ɖo xa towe mɛ a ɔ lo
enyi gbe towe do hangbe mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ jihan do ɖe ayi nu ɔ lɛ e tɔn wu ɔ winnya sixu nɔ hu alo sixu nɔ ɖo
loɔ enɛ ɖo do afɔ mɛ nu ɖo ɖo jihan do kpa nu jehovah e kɔn a
e wa hun hanwema towe ze do ji jihan kpo ayi towe bi kpo ɛsid xa ðɛhan
ðo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gege mɛ ɖo egbe ɔ e nɔ lɛ sin xogbe lɛ ɖo televiziɔn ji bɔ enɛ sixu mi bɔ mi jihan
enɛ ɖɔ e ɖo dandan ɖɔ mɛxo lɛ nɔ nukɔn nu hanjiji ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
enyi xɛsi nɔ afɔ mɛ nu mi ɖo hanjiji kɔn ɔ etɛ mi ɖo nɔ flin
nu ɖevo nɔ bɔ mɛ gege nɔ ze gbe jihan a e wɛ nyi xɛsi
e sixu nyi xɛsiɖiɖi ɖɔ mɛ lɛ mɛ wu alo vlafo e nɔ ɖɔ hangbe mɛtɔn ci ɖe nu
enɛ wu ɔ etɛwu mi ɖo lɔn bɔ hangbe mitɔn a e bɔ mi gɔn ji do kpa nu jehovah
ðɔ bɔ hanjiji mitɔn e ɖe lɛ
mi sixu nɔ xo nu vlafo ɖo mi ganjɛ e nɔ ji ɔ gbɔn e wu a wutu
mi hɛn ɔ mi blo bɔ hanjiji mitɔn gbɔn taji elɔ lɛ xwixwedo gblamɛ
sixu nɔ jihan kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo nɔ gbe do ji gbɔn yiyi ganji gblamɛ
kulaan nɔ hlɔnhlɔn anpulu bɔ e nɔ ta gbɔn e ɔ wɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn gbe mitɔn hwenu mi ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ alo ɖo ji wɛ e gbɔn
ɖo ze gbe towe do ji tawun jihan nɔ ze gbe do ji ɖɔ xo gbɔn e ɖɔhun alo tlɛ ze do ji hugan
ɖeɖee ɖo moaleyi son wehome lizonyizon yewheholuduta ton me mɛ e wexwɛ ɖo xotala deanana yiyi towe ganji glɔ
ðo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn alo nukpinkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn hwenu hun nu elɔ yi wan ɖo hanwema mitɔn mɛ e ɖokpo
ze gbe do ji xa nukɛgbe lɛ ɖokpo kpo gbe wu ɖe jinjɔn ayi e ɖe kpo
enɛ gudo hun gbe do ji gbɔn xa nukɛgbe ɔ tɔn enɛ bi bu
gudo mɛ ɔ ɖo gbe towe wu bɔ ji nukɛgbe enɛ ɔ
lɔn nu alo winnya hu do enɛ wu o
mitɔn hunhun ganji mi ɖo hanjiji kɔn gbɔn
gbavi blo bonu hanjiji towe enyi e ɖu ɖo ɖeɖee kunkpla hangbe lɛ e ji ɔ tɛ lɛ mɔ ɖɔ zan
enyi blo bonu tɛn nɔ towe mɛ a ɔ gbe towe sixu a
enɛ wu ɔ ɖevo wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ hun towe ganji hu nɔ blo gbɔn hwenu nɔ ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ e
enyi mɔ ɖɔ gbe towe kun nɔ yi ji o alo gbe towe xwiɖi din ɔ etɛ ɖo wa
tawun tawun ɖeɖee ɖo moaleyi wexwɛ gbavi dudu nuhahun tangan dele ji mɛ e ɖo ali enɛ lɛ
hun towe kɛ towe ganji
jihan
nu tɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo kple xwewu xwewu tɔn tɔn hwenu
ðɔ linlin wu e ɖe hanwema ɔ e ɖe lɛ
akpakpa mɛ bi ɖo kple xwewu xwewu tɔn bible pennsylvania tɔn tɔn hwenu hwenu nɔvi stephen lett ɖo ɔ mɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖe hanwema xota tɔn nyi jihan nu jehovah kpo awajijɛ kpo e ɖo malin malin mɛ bɔ e nɔ zan ɖo kple lɛ ji e e
nɔvi lett tinmɛ ɖɔ nu wu e hanwema ɔ jlaɖo e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e blo bɔ lɛ sɔgbe xa les saintes ecritures
enɛ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖe xokwin e nɔ mɔ ɖo du monde nouveau ɔ mɛ a ɖo e jlaɖo ɖo wutu lɛ e sin mɛ alo jlaɖo
ɔ e ɖɔ xo do ɔ wu lɛ e kpo ɖeɖee ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo
hu ɔ ɖo hanjiji nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo sinsɛn biblo mitɔn mɛ wutu ɔ ɔ jlo blo hanwema nu hugan bɔ akpa tɔn sɔgbe xa du monde nouveau e jlaɖo e sin akpa e ɖe
huzuhuzu tɛ lɛ e blo ɖo hanwema ɔ mɛ
bonu jihan nu jehovah kpo awajijɛ kpo ɔ do zan hugan ɔ e to lɛ sɔgbe xa xota lɛ
ði ɔ nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖɔ xo do jehovah wu bɔ bɔ lɛ e ɖɔ xo do jezu kpo gbɛxixɔ ɔ kpo wu wɛ e to ɖevo lɛ lɔ gbɔn
alɔdlɛndonu xota lɛ tɔn ɖe tiin zan tawun ɖi ɔ ɖo hwenu e ɖo xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ lɛ bi sin ɖe wɛ e
do mɛ lɛ bi bonu jihan sin ayixa mɛ ɔ e xokwin ɖe lɛ jlaɖo bonu e do sixu mɔ nu jɛ nu lɛ mɛ ganji
nɔ hanjiji ɖo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn hwenu akpaxwe
etɛwu mi ɖo bɔ ɖo hanwema mitɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e ma mi
tinmɛ ɖo do e
enɛ lɛ ɔ sixu ji do ɖe nu ci nu hwiɖesu e jehovah
ɖevo lɛ bɔ e nɔ wanyiyi kpo ɖagbe wiwa kpo sin do lanmɛ nu mi
sixu wa gbɔn to ɖiɖo ɖeɖee e ji kpo kpo bɔ ɖo jw org ji lɛ e gblamɛ
enyi nɔ lɛ ɖo xwegbe hun nɔ ji kpo gbe jinjɔn ayi e ɖe kpo kpodo ayi bi kpan
flin ɖɔ hanjiji nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo sinsɛn biblo mitɔn mɛ
ali taji ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi bɔ mi gbɔn do jehovah ɖɔ mi yi wan bɔ nu tɔn su nukun mitɔn mɛ xa ezayii
enyi mi nɔ jihan kpo awajijɛ kpo ɔ mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ jihan kpo jiɖiɖe kpo
nugbo ɔ mɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi mɛ winnyawinnya mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo lɛ kpo sixu ɖo jehovah sinsɛn tlɔlɔ enɛ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ gɔn alɔ ɖo ɖo nu ci nu e ɖiɖɔ do mɛ mɛ o
e wa hun setonu nu elɔ zawe bɔ mawu mɛ nu ɔ e jihan nu jehovah
hun jihan kpo awajijɛ kpo ðɛh
nu mɔ ɖevo lɛ do hangbe towe gbɔn e wu hun yi televiziɔn jw tɔn ji do flansegbe mɛ zin video a demande zin depuis notre xota david splane preparons a les nouveaux cantiques ɖo discours glɔ
do mi bonu mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ linlin hanjiji tɔn wu ɔ e blo bɔ nuxixo cɛju wonɔ ɖe nɔ hun nu sin akpaxwe ɖaxo lɛ kpo lɛ kpo tɔn ɖokpo ɖokpo
e sɔnu nu tuto nuxixo tɔn enɛ lɛ ɖo alɔkpa ɖe bonu ayi mitɔn ɖo nu din lɛ e ji
jehovah nɔ hwlɛn tɔn lɛ gan e nɔ ɖo hwɛ nu mɛ nɔ hɔn wa su lɛ ɖe a ðɛh
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nɔ wa do mɛ hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe e bonu e mɔ eɖee mɛ e wu
nu titewungbe e ɖo wa ɖu le nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn tɔn e wu
jehovah nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ bi gbɔn e wu
ðo hwɛhuhu wutu ɔ nu nɔ ci nu gege mawu tɔn lɛ tɔn
blawu
mi mɛ bi wɛ nɔ se hwɛhuhu gu mi ɖu e sin bɔ hwenu nuwiwa mitɔn lɛ ɖe jlo nujɔnu tɔn mi ɖo ɖɔ nu mitɔn jehovah nukunmɛ e a e ɔ mitɔn sixu blawu nu mi
klisanwun hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe e ɖe tlɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ mawu kun sixu hwɛ kɛ emi o
ðɛhan ɖɔ mawu tɔn lɛ kun ɖo ɖɔ nuwanyido emitɔn lɛ ɖi bu emi o gbɔn
gbavi nukplɔnmɛ lɛ wɛ a alo nuɖe wɛ e nɔte
etɛ jehovah hinhɔn yi su byɔ
afɔ tɛ lɛ mi ɖo ɖe cobɔ jehovah ku nublawu nu mi hwɛ kɛ mi
mi mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ hwenu mi ɖo do nu toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn sin tuto e blo ɖo izlayɛli hwexonu tɔn wɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e ɖyɔ ɖo pantekotu tɔn e glɔ wɛ e blo tuto enɛ ɖe flin ɖɔ jehovah wɛ ɔ gosin
enɛ wu ɔ toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn sin tuto e blo e mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ nukun jehovah nɔ do hwɛhuhu lɛ kpo kpo e mɛ
jɛ nukɔn ɔ nu mi linlin wu e ɖo toxo enɛ lɛ ayi e kpo nɔ wa lɛ e kpo
izlayɛli vi lɛ nɔ wa nu gbɔn hwenu mɛɖe jlo do hu mɛ e
jehovah nɔ nukun kpɛvi do mɛhuhu xo lɛ ɖebu ɖo izlayɛli hwexonu tɔn a
mɛ e jlo do hu e sin hɛnnumɔ sunnu sɛkpɔ ɛ hugan bɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ e mɔ ɔ hweɖebunu ɔ e hu
e nɔ wa nu gbɔn ɖo izlayɛli hwenu mɛɖe ɖo manywɛ mɛ hu mɛ e
izlayɛli vi lɛ nɔ wa nu gbɔn hwenu mɛɖe tuun a hu mɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ manywɛ mɛ wɛ e ɖe wa loɔ jɛn e lɔ nyi ɖo mɛ ɖevo sin hun kɔn nyi ayi do alɔ tɔn kɔ
bib nublawukunumɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e ɛ gbe bɔ e hɔn nu ɔ yi toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ ɖokpo mɛ
e nya xɛ ɖo ji tɔn ɖo finɛ
mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ hu mɛ e ɖo nɔ toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ jɛ hwenu ɖaxo ɔ ku do e
toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn sin tito e blo e mi bɔ mi tuun jehovah hugan gbɔn
lɛ wɛ sɔnu nu toxo ɖeɖee nyi toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ e a
jehovah ɖesu wɛ ɖegbe nu jozuwee ɖɔ ðɔ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ toxo mɛ hɛn ɔ nɔ hɔn hwla ci lɛ ɔ
ðo jehovah ɖesu wɛ toxo enɛ lɛ ɖo vo nu nu bunɔ ɖe wutu ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ tuto enɛ mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn wu hugan gbɔn
etɛ e mi do mi sixu hɔn yi su jehovah gbɔn ɖo egbe e wu
tɛ nyi tomɛxo lɛ tɔn ɖo hwɛ mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ hu mɛ e tɔn ɖiɖɔ mɛ
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛwu e nyi nunywɛnu ɖɔ mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ hu mɛ e yi mɛxo lɛ
enyi mɛɖe ɖo manywɛ mɛ hu mɛ gudo tlolo ɔ e ɖo jɛ nukɔn tin nu e wa ɔ mɛ nu tomɛxo lɛ ɖo hɔntogbo toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn tɔn mɛ e hɔn yi e ji
taan ɖe gudo ɔ e ɛ do tomɛxo ɖeɖee ɖo toxo mɛ e hu mɛ ɖe e bɔ ɖɔ hwɛ ɔ xa
hwenu e yi gbe ɖɔ manywɛ mɛ wɛ mɛ ɔ ɖe hu mɛ e jɛn e lɛkɔ yi toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ
etɛwu tomɛxo lɛ nɔ ɖo ɖo xo ɔ mɛ
ɖo hɛn togun izlayɛli tɔn ɔ ɖo ji mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e bɔ e ɖu le nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn tɔn wutu
akɔwe biblu tɔn ɖe wlan ɖɔ nu mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e nu tomɛxo lɛ yiyi ɔ e ji nuɖe ɔ e kpan
e ɖɔ ɖɔ e kan hun tɔn byɔ mɛɖebu a ɖo e wa nu sɔgbe xa tito xɛnyaɖomɛji tɔn jehovah sɔnu e a wutu
alɔdo lɛ tiin nu mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e e ɖo alɔdo mɔhunkɔtɔn yi gbe
enyi e hɔn yi toxo ɖeɖee jehovah ɖe ɖo vo lɛ e ɖokpo mɛ a ɔ ɔ hu bɔ nuɖe jɛ a
etɛwu klisanwun ɖo hwɛ do eɖee wɛ ɖo hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wu e ɖe ɖo sɛkpɔ mɛxo lɛ alɔdo
egbe ɔ klisanwun hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe e ɖo alɔdo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ tɔn ba do mɔ eɖee mɛ
etɛwu e ɖo taji
nukɔntɔn ɔ biblu ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ jehovah wɛ blo tuto bɔ mɛxo lɛ nɔ kpe nukun do hwɛhuhu syɛnsyɛn lɛ wu
yi gbe ɖɔ tuto enɛ ɖe nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn a
mawu tɔn gege mɔ ɖɔ alɔdo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ tɔn biba yi gbe nɔ do gbɔ nu mɛ
e yi gbe ɖɔ ee taan gege wa yi gudo e ɔ ɖɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kun sixu wa nu ɖe do mi o
kpo ɖo nukun ɖo nu wa e sin xɔxɔ wɛ hwebinu
bɔ enyi ja ɖɛ xo jehovah gbe ɔ ɖɔ ɖo nɔ byɔ hwɛsɔkɛ nu wa e tɔn jɛ nukɔn nu nu bi
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ daniel alɔdo mɛxo lɛ tɔn
e gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ nugbo wɛ ɖɔ hu mi ɖɔ ma sɛkpɔ
ee wa gudo e ɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ mɛɖe ɖe agban kpinkpɛn ɖe sin lɛ ɖɔhun
din ɔ mɔ ɖɔ sixu sɛkpɔ jehovah bɔ nuti kun su ali do mi o
egbe ɔ daniel ɖo ayixa ɖe bɔ agaɖanu din ɔ e nyi tɔn
afɔ taji tɛ mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e ɖe ɖo ɖe cobɔ e ku nublawu
e ɖo hɔn yi toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn sɛkpɔ e mɛ xa jozuwee
e ɖo ɖe lɛ
ɖagbe tɔn wɛ vɔsisa enɛ lɛ nyi
enyi e sin toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ mɛ sin hun e kɔn nyi ayi e kun ɖi nuti o bɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn jɛ
afɔ tɛ lɛ klisanwun hwɛ tɔn e ɖe nɔ ɖe do ɖɔ emi kun mɔ nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn do mɔ nu emi e o
egbe ɔ hwɛ yetɔn nu lɛ e lɔ ɖo wa nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ cobo ɖu nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn sin le
mi ɖo jo gbɛzan hwɛhuhu tɔn ɔ do bi enyi hwɛhuhu syɛnsyɛn lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ mi hɔn a loɔ mi hɔn nu hwɛhuhu kpɛvi kpɛvi nɔ kpla mɛ yi hwɛ ɖaxo huhu kɔn lɛ e
afɔ nujɔnu tɔn lɛ ɖiɖe do jo gbɛzan hwɛhuhu tɔn do nɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi kun nyi o nɔ ɛ ɖɔ mi kun nɔ ɖɔ mi nu nublawukunumɛ tɔn o
nu klisanwun ɖe jlo kpo ɖo nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn sin le ɖu wɛ ɔ etɛ lɛ e ɖo jo do
enyi klisanwun ɖe kpo ɖo le nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn tɔn ɖu wɛ ɔ etɛ lɛ e ɖo jo do
e ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ jo nu ɖebu e tlɛ yi wan bɔ sixu dɔn ɛ do mɔ hwɛhuhu tɔn mɛ e do
enyi towe ɖe lɛ nɔ dɔn bonu wa nu jehovah nukunmɛ a lɛ e ɔ ɖo nu kancica ɖo tɛntin e a
enyi ɖo gan do wɛ nɔ ji ɖo ahan syɛnsyɛn nunu linu ɔ jlo do nyi alɔ nu ninɔmɛ sixu dɔn bɔ ahan zɛ xwe wu lɛ e a
enyi jlo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ xo hun xa wɛ ɖe ɔ ɖo alɔ nyi nu tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn alo nuwiwa ɖevo ɖeɖee sixu dɔn yi linlin blibli lɛ kɔn e wɛ a
flin ɖɔ ɖebu mi sa do kpo ɖo gbeji nu jehovah e kun gu mi o
nu ɖebu nyla hu ɖɔ e mɔ ɖɔ e jo mɛ do a
tinmɛ nu wu mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e ɖe sixu nɔ ayijayi mɛ zan gbɛzan awajijɛ tɔn ɖe ɖo toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ e
hwenu mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e ɖo toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn mɛ e jɛn e ɖo ayijayi mɛ
jehovah ɖɔ do toxo enɛ lɛ wu ɖɔ nyi bibɛtɛn ɖe nu
joz nwt jehovah byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo hwɛ nu mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e hweɖevonu ɖo xo ɖokpo ɔ wutu a jɛn e gbe ɔ bonu e byɔ toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ hu a e nɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e ɖo ɖi xɛsi nu todɔnnumɛ gbeɖe a
hwenu e ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ e ɔ e ɖo ayijayi mɛ ɖo alɔcyɔnmɛji jehovah tɔn glɔ
enyi gankpa bibɛtɛn tɔn ɖe a
ðo toxo ɔ mɛ ɔ ali hun bɔ e mɛ ɖevo lɛ jehovah ɖo fifa mɛ
ðeji do hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ jehovah tɔn wu akpaxwe
jiɖiɖe tɛ klisanwun hwɛ tɔn lɛ e ɖe sixu ɖo
daniel xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e mɔ ɖɔ nugbo wɛ nyi xo enɛ
hwenu mɛxo lɛ ɖe e ji ɛ bɔ e wa ɖo ayixa ɖe gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ sixu jɛ do din
ee e ɖeɖɛ xo ɔ ganji gudo e ɔ nɔ dohwɛ nyiɖee ɖe a
nu jehovah hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɔ xo bi nɔ fo
e ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ e nɔ hwɛhuhu mɛtɔn lɛ do zɔ vwee nu mɛ
e mɔ gbeɖe a
hwenu mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e ɖo toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo xɛsi ɖi nu ɔ wɛ a
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ hwenu jehovah hwɛ kɛ mi e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo xɛsi ɖi wɛ ɖɔ e ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖe wɛ ze hwɛhuhu enɛ nyi atɛ ji alo ɖo hwɛ nu mi a xa ðɛhan
kpo ðaxo kpo jezu nyi e do hlɔnhlɔn hlɔnhlɔn ji nu jiɖe e mi ɖo do nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn wu e gbɔn
nugbo ɔ mi tlɛ ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖaxo hugan ee izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo e ɖeji do nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn wu
ee pɔlu e blawu sɔ ɖɔ e nɔ kpewu nɔ setonu nu jehovah a e gudo e ɔ e tinmɛ ɖɔ kpa nu mawu gbɔn jezu klisu aklunɔ mitɔn ji
enyi ɖaxo ɔ nɔ wa e bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖeji ɖɔ e hwɛ yetɔn lɛ kɛ ɔ ðaxo mitɔn jezu wa e ɖo bɔ mi kudeji ɖɔ mi mɔ ɖo finɛ bonu e mi ɖo nu hudo mi lɛ e mɛ ɖo hwetɔnnu sɔ e ebl
yi gbe kpowun ɖɔ vɔsisa ɔ xɔ akwɛ gege o
loɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ kan hwiɖesunɔ
ðo nuɖiɖi ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ wu wɛ e hwɛ towe lɛ kɛ
ðo nuɖiɖi ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn
vɔsisa jezu tɔn ɔ nunina ɖe wɛ bɔ jehovah
etɛwu jlo hɔn yi su jehovah
toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ nyi nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn tɔn
fi ɖe ɖo ayijayi hu a
sɔgbe xa wema alɔdlɛndonu tɔn jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ ɔ e sixu nyi ɖɔ mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ hu mɛ e sin xwedo yi ɖo toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ
ðibla yi fifonu xwe kanweko ɔ tɔn ɔ atɔxwɛ dɔn ayi mɛtɔn wa tinmɛ tɔn toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ ɖo e ji
atɔxwɛ glɛnsigbe tɔn ɖɔ akpaxwe mɔyizi ɔ tɔn enɛ nɔte nu bibɛtɛn ɔ sixu mɔ ɖo klisu e tawun
nu e bibɛtɛn ɖo klisu gbɔn nuɖiɖi gblamɛ ɔ e cyɔn alɔ mɛ ji
xwe kanweko gudo ɔ atɔxwɛ ɖɔ nu toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ nɔte e wɛ nyi tuto mawu blo cyɔn alɔ mi ji sin ku si hwenu mi tɔn kunkpla nu hun nyi e ji e
atɔxwɛ mars tɔn tinmɛ nu wu wema mitɔn agaɖanu tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖe nɔte nu nu le gbɔn a e fi biblu ɖe ɖɔ ɖe nu jɛ e ɖe alo nuɖe nɔte nu ɖevo ɖe e ɔ mi nɔ yi gbe ɖo
enyi hwɛjijɔ jinjɔn biblu ji ɖe tiin tawun a ɔ mi nɔ lɔn nɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe alo ɖe nɔte nu nu le tawun a
ðo biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ nɔte nu nu ɖevo a wutu ɔ xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo nukplɔnmɛ ɖeɖee ɖo tuto enɛ mɛ nu klisanwun lɛ e ji
mi sixu ku nublawu nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ jehovah ɖɔhun gbɔn hwenu e byɔ ɖɔ mi hwɛ kɛ e
mi nɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do wu e gbɔn
mɛxo lɛ ɖo ɖe hwɛjijɔ mawu tɔn gbɔn hwenu ɖo ɖe sin hwɛ ɖɔ wɛ e
nu nɔ ci nu jezu do mawu tɔn wu
lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo nɔ slo kɔ nu ɔ gbɔn
jezu yi wan nu mɔyizi ɔ
ɖebu a
wanyiyi ɖaxo jezu ɖo nu mawu tɔn e ɖo elɔ ɖo ðɛhan mɛ e mɛ mawu jlo towe wiwa nɔ vivi nu mi towe ɖo ayi mɛ ganji
e blawu nu jezu sɔ hwenu e mɔ bɔ lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo nɔ slo kɔ nu tɔn tɔn e
nɔ do nu kpɛvi kpɛvi ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e wu ɖo jezu ɖɔ do wu ɖɔ nɔ maɖowo mitɔn lɛ tɔn mawu
etɛ nyla
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ jo nu ɖo taji ɖo mɛ lɛ do
jezu gbɔn vo nu falizyɛn ɖeɖee nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi nyi mɛ ɖagbe hu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e ɖo e tuun linlin ɔ tɔn kpo jijɔ mawu tɔn ɖo gbeɖiɖe ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ e kpo
etɛ mi do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
jehovah enɛ lɛ nu mi ɖo biblu mɛ
e ɖɔ mi do nu kpɛvi kpɛvi ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e wu a loɔ e ɖɔ mi ɖo ayi nu ɖo taji lɛ e wu zan enɛ wɛ nyi nugbododo ɖeɖee ji gbeɖiɖe lɛ jinjɔn lɛ e
ði ɔ nugbododo tɛ lɛ wu mi sixu ɖo ayi ɖo tuto kunkpla toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ e mɛ
xota wa yi e ɖɔ xo do nu ɖeɖee mi sixu do afɔ tawun tawun mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e sixu ɖe lɛ e wu
toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ nu mi do jehovah kpo mi sixu ɖe jijɔ tɔn lɛ gbɔn e kpo wu
enɛ wu ɔ xota elɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ atɔn toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ ɖe nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn gbɔn
etɛ mi do linlin e nɔ ɖo do wu e wu
ɖe hwɛjijɔ tɔn gbɔn
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ ali sixu wa nu towe jixwe tɔn ɔ ɖɔhun ɖe lɛ e xa efɛzinu lɛ
toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ mɛ yiyi bɔkun sɔ etɛwu
etɛ enɛ mi do jehovah wu
jehovah ɖegbe nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ ma toxo lɛ aɖuzɛji ɖo ɔ sin akpa we lɛ xwe
ðo toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ tiin wutu ɔ e ɖo dandan ɖɔ mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e ɖe hɔn yi to ɖevo mɛ fi e sixu jɛ nu ɖevo ji ɖe e a
biblu ɖe wlan ɖɔ nu lɛ bi ɖo wɛn bɔkun e bɔkun bɔ e sixu lɔ a
sin nu wɛ nyi nu enɛ mawu blo e
jehovah ci ɖe ɖɔhun bonu akpakpa nɔ ɖo ɛ wɛ nu e dɔn to nu tɔn lɛ a
e wa ɔ nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn efɛ
falizyɛn lɛ nɔ wa nu gbɔn e gbɔn vo nu nublawu mawu nɔ ku nu mɛ e gbɔn
jezu nɔ wa nu xa mɛ wa nu nyi do do lɛ e gbɔn e ji nujlɛdonuwu falizyɛn ɖo ɖɛ xo wɛ e tɔn doku nu ɖo ci ɖe lɛ nyi mɛ nyanya lɛ ɖɔhun a
doku nu ɖo ci elɔ ɖɔhun a ɔ eɖee hwe ɖo ɖɛ xo do byɔ nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn wɛ
ali yi toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ nɔ blo bonu mɛ lɛ nɔ vo nɔ byɔ hwɛsɔkɛ a
liya akpaxwe
nu mɛɖe wa nu nyi do do ɔ sixu wa nu jehovah ɖɔhun gbɔn
etɛwu hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ nɔ mɛɖesɔhwe
wa nu jehovah ɖɔhun e nyi falizyɛn lɛ ɖɔhun o
ali sixu wa ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ blo bonu e nɔ bɔkun nu mɛ lɛ nu byɔ hwɛsɔkɛ
akpakpa nɔ mi bonu ma blo nu fifa nɔ mɛ wa nu nyi do do mi alo nu mi e ɖe kpo nyi kpo tɛntin a
falizyɛn lɛ nu tɛnkpɔn enɛ ɖo nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ do mɔ mɛ sɔ a lɛ e
mi mɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖo nɔ miɖee hwe mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ hugan mi bɔ mi hwɛ kɛ
ali yi toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ nu mɛ lɛ nɔ vo nɔ byɔ hwɛsɔkɛ
jehovah blo bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ mɔ nu jɛ nu tɔn nyi e wu gbɔn
linlin taji wu toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn lɛ do tiin e ɖokpo wɛ nyi do cyɔn alɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ji sin si
jehovah yi wan nu wan nu xomɛvɔnɔ huhu
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ hu mɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ e
enɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ e zan tɔn kpo e bi ɖo
tuto enɛ izlayɛli vi lɛ bi bɔ mɔ nu jɛ le do tɔn nyi nu e wu
do kpa nu yetɔn ɔ ɖo nyi alɔ nu nu ɖebu wa alo gbɔ wiwa ɔ e nɔzo yetɔn tɔn ɖo e
lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo nɔ keya nu a bɔ jezu ɖɔ gbɔn
lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo ci jehovah ɖɔhun a ɖo yedɛɛ lɛ nɔ keya ɖe nu a
luk
wɛ ɖo hun ali nu mɛ lɛ bɔ ɖo mɔjɛmɛ xo mawu tɔn tɔn bonu ɖi zɔnlin gbɔn ali nɔ kpla mɛ yi mavɔmavɔ mɛ e ji
lilɛ jɔ nu mɛ lɛ sin nyi jezu e gudo dɔn do gbɛzinzan sixu bɔ dɔn bi e mɛ
ðo lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo nyi nyi cejɛnnabinɔ wutu ɔ nɔ keya nu nɔzo yetɔn lɛ tɔn kpo ganjininɔ yetɔn kpo a
nylahun nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ a e
pɔlu ɖɔ emi ɖo linlin mawu tɔn ɖɔhun do wu gbɔn
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ do ɔ wu pɔlu ɖɔhun
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu nu wiwa lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo ɖɔhun wa nu jehovah ɖɔhun gbɔn
mi ɖo ɖo sisi nu bɔ e xɔ akwɛ nu mi
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ e ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe dɔn ɖo mɛ ɔ e kan mi a alo sin hun lɛ bi tɔn mɛ
xa enyi pɔlu taa wa dohwɛ eɖee alo e ɖo jla wɛn mɛ lɛ wu wɛ e nɔ jla a
e wa ɔ e yi wan nu mɛ lɛ bɔ yetɔn nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ wɛ
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi lɔ ɖo do gan sɔnu nu linlin mawu nɔ ɖo do wu e
jehovah jlo ɖɔ mɛ bi mɔ ali lɛkɔ sin nunyanyawiwa gudo
kpo nublawukunumɛ kpo bɔ ɖokan do ɔ wu hugan ɖo awajijɛ hwenu ɖo wa wɛ e
etɛwu ayijayi xo ɔ ɖo taji nu togun mawu tɔn
mi nɔ ɖo linlin jehovah tɔn ɖɔhun do wu gbɔn nusisɔ nu ayijayi nuwiwa lɛ gblamɛ
mi ɖo wa hwenu mi ɖo kɛkɛ alo kun wɛ e hɔn nu nu dɔn awovinu wa lɛ e hwenu mi ɖo wa wɛ xɔ gba wɛ nu jlaɖo wɛ alo hwenu mi xwe fi mi nɔ mawu ɖe e e
akwɛ alo tuto mɛtɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo taji hu ganjininɔ kpo mɛtɔn kpo gbeɖe a
mawu hwɛjijɔnɔ mitɔn nɔ wa nu sɔgbe e hwebinu
ðo linlin jehovah tɔn do wu bonu ku mɛɖe tɔn nɔ kɔ towe o
tomɛxo izlayɛli tɔn lɛ sixu ɖe hwɛ jlɔjlɔ ɖiɖɔ jehovah tɔn gbɔn
jehovah ɖegbe nu tomɛxo izlayɛli tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ xwedo nugbododo tɔn hwɛɖiɖɔ tɔn lɛ
jɛ nukɔn ɔ tomɛxo lɛ ɖo ɖɔ kunnuɖenu lɛ sɔgbe a ji
ɔ ɖo gbeje nu ɔ hu mɛ e linlin tɔn kpo e nɔ zan gbɔn e kpo ceɖeceɖe cobo wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ e ku nublawu alo gbɔ
do ɖe hwɛ jlɔjlɔ ɖiɖɔ mawu tɔn ɔ ɖo ɖɔ wangbɛnumɛnu kpo ayixa nyanya kpo sin nu wɛ e wa xa mɛ ɔ a ji xa
din kunnuɖenu lɛ wa jɛ we bi e ɔ tomɛxo lɛ ɖo gbeje mɛ ɔ ɖesu enyi nu e wa e kɛɖɛ wɛ a
ɖo mɔ nu zɛ nu ɖo wenu e wu xo ɔ sin gɔngɔn mɛ
falizyɛn lɛ nɔ ayi yetɔn ɖo nu ɖe wa e kɛɖɛ ji e nyi do nu ɔ nyi ɖo ayi mɛ e ji a
hwenu falizyɛn lɛ mɔ jezu yi ɖe tɛnmɛ ɖo matie xwe e ɔ kanbyɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ aniwutu wɛ mitɔn nɔ ɖu nu xa lɛ kpodo ɖevo lɛ kpo
yi do nu nu ɖɔ wɛ mawuxo elɔ ɖe ɔ nublawukunnumɛ wɛ ɖe vɔsisa wɛ ɖe a
ðo hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ ylɔ gbe wɛ wa a loɔ lɛ ylɔ gbe wɛ wa
e ɖo co jezu mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ e hwe bi ɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo lɛ kpo lɛ kpo mɛ jlo huzu
ɖu nu kpowun wɛ bɔ wa matie xwe a
e wa ɔ xwedo jezu
e blawu ɖɔ falizyɛn lɛ gege kun nɔ mɛ lɛ jezu nɔ wa gbɔn e o
falizyɛn lɛ gbɔn vo nu mawu nyi mɛ jlɔjlɔ nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ bɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ e ɖo nɔ mɔ nɔzo yetɔn lɛ do mɔ nɔ ɖo hwɛ nu ɖɔ kun ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖe o
etɛ lɛ wɛ hwɛɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖe ɖo do gan do
ðo egbe ɔ mɛxo lɛ ɖo kudeji ɖɔ emi wa nu jehovah yi wan nu nu wa ɖo ji e ɖɔhun
nu ɖo hwɛɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ ɔ ɖo do nu nu tawun ɖɔ mɛ ɔ sin hwɛ nugbo a ji
e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e tuun linlin mɛ ɔ tɔn mɛ alɔkpa e nyi e kpo nu ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo nuɖe
ɔ ɖo ɖɔ hwɛ tɔn lɛ cobɔ e ku nublawu
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ hwɛ mɛɖe tɔn nugbo nugbo
mɛxo lɛ sixu mɔ nu jɛ ayi mɛ jehovah kpo jezu kpo nɔ wa gbɔn e a
enyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe wɛ nu ɔ sixu do gan tuun ɖɔ hwɛ mɛɖe tɔn nugbo gbɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ xoɖɛ byɔ nunywɛ kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo
biblu tin nu mɛ do mɛ hwɛ yetɔn nu nugbo lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖeɖee e a lɛ e kpo wu gbɔn e
biblu tinmɛ nu nɔ ci nu e linlin yetɔn kpo nuwalɔ yetɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn
gudo mɛ ɔ do gan gbeje mɛ ɔ ɖesu blebu
biblu ɖɔ do gan agun ɔ tɔn jezu wu ɖɔ e nɔ e ɖe ɔ do ɖɔhwɛ xa mɛ a e se xo ɖe kpowun ɔ e nɔ ze do ɖɔhwɛ a
mɛ mɛxo lɛ nyi jezu sin kpɛvi lɛ bɔ e bɔ ɖɔhwɛ eɖɔhun
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo mɛxo ɖeɖee nɔ wlibo nu mɛ nɔ jlo do wa lɛ e
gan nɔ do nɔ xo nublawukunumɛ kpo hwɛ jlɔjlɔ ɖiɖɔ kpo sin kan ɖo agun mitɔn lɛ mɛ e nɔ vivi nu mi
nukplɔnmɛ kunkpla toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ lɛ e tɛ ɖo tito blo wɛ zan
ði ɔ toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ e nɔ ɖɔhwɛ jlɔjlɔ gbɔn e mɛxo lɛ bɔ nɔ mi yi wan nu miɖee ku nublawu nu miɖee gbɔn e mi
jehovah ɖyɔ a bɔ hwɛjijɔ kpo nublawukunumɛ kpo kpo ɖo taji
wujɔmɛ ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi mawu ee sin akpajlɛ mɛ e blo mi ɖo bɔ mi sixu wa nu eɖɔhun bibɛtɛn ɖo glɔ tɔn e
nɔvi nyɔnu klisanwun we ɖo wɛn biblu tɔn jla ɖe wɛ ɖo toxo tipitapa tɔn mɛ
sin hwexonu wɛ vɔsisa lɛ nyi nu taji ɖe ɖo sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ mɛ
izlayɛli vi lɛ nɔ kanlin tɔn lɛ bɔ e tuun klisanwun lɛ ganji ɖɔ nɔ kpa nu mawu do hwebinu
vɔsisa ɖevo lɛ tiin nɔ mawu nukunmɛ
vɔsisa enɛ lɛ nɔ mɛ awajijɛ kpo nyɔna lɛ kpo elɔ lɛ gbɔn e
nyi mawu hwexonu tɔn ɖe e ɖo vi sunnu ɖe wɛ nukun myamya e nyi wɛnsinɔ
ee samuwɛli ɖe gudo e ɔ kpla ɛ yi goxɔ ɔ mɛ e tɔn gbɔn e
jehovah do nu ɖo gbigbɔ mɛɖee do tɔn tɔn wu
kpo samuwɛli kpo ɖɔhun ɔ e jɔwu klisanwun lɛ ɖo egbe bonu zan gbɛzan yetɔn nu yetɔn tɔn
jezu ɖɔ ɖebu mi sa do jehovah e ɔ e su tɔn mi tunfla mak
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ e tuun klisanwun nyɔnu e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ dɔkasi e ganji ɖo e nyi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ wamamɔnɔ lɛ wutu
e blawu ɖɔ e azɔn ku bɔ agun ɔ bi byɔ aluwɛ mɛ
hwenu ahwanvu lɛ se ɖɔ ɖo xa ɔ mɛ e ɔ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e kɛnklɛn wa tlolo
mɛ mawu wɔn dɔkasi sa lɛ e a
ee pɔlu ɖo nu wlan nɔvi kɔlɛnti tɔn lɛ wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nyɛ ɔ e hun xomɛ nu mi ɖɔ ma zan nu ɖo ɔ bi zan nyɛɖesunɔ do do alɔ
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ enyi mi zan hwenu mitɔn kpo hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn kpo do xo nukɔnyiyi nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ tɔn sin kan nɔ gudo nu mitɔn lɛ ɔ e nɔ vivi nu jehovah
ali ɖevo lɛ ɖe bɔ mi sixu gbɔn do nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ a
ɛɛn
e nɔ zan do nɔ gudo nu nukɔnyiyi wa wɛ e ɖe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e lɛ kpo mɛ ɖevo ɖeɖee ɖo hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe mɛ lɛ e kpo e
ɔ e nɔ zan do sɔnu nu wema lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nɔ zan do lilɛ do gbe ɖevo lɛ mɛ e nɔ zan do mɛ ɖo fi adla ɖe lɛ e bɔ e nɔ bɔ e nɔ gba kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ mɛ nɔ nu mɛ ɔ e nu bɔ e
ɔ nu mi nu xɔ akwɛ mitɔn lɛ jehovah ɔ kpa wɛ mi ɖe nɛ nux
hɛn ɔ nunina lɛ do tutoblonunu tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ zan ɖo to towe mɛ e ɖe tlɔlɔ
bonu tuun tutoblonunu tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ zan hugan ɖo to towe mɛ e sin nyikɔ hun kɛnklɛn kanbyɔ alaxɔ
sixu mɔ adlɛsi ɔ ɖo www jw org ji
sɔgbe kpo nu lɛ nɔ yi gbɔn ɖo to towe mɛ e kpo ɔ nunina alɔkpa sixu tlɔlɔ lɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖie
e hɛn ɔ e zan kati akwɛsɛxwetɛn tɔn e nɔ zan do akwɛ do mɛ ɖevo do su alo do xɔ nu e do nunina
ðo alaxɔ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ e hɛn ɔ e zan jw org alo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ɖevo alaxɔ ɔ e do nunina
e hɛn ɔ e akwɛ lɛ e alo nuɖokan mɛɖesunɔ tɔn ɖevo xɔ akwɛ lɛ e
wema mɛ ɖe ɖo zɔn nunina ɔ ji ɖɔ e kun yi akwɛ ɔ alo nu ɔ o
e hɛn ɔ e akwɛ bɔ enyi e wa ɖo hudo tɔn ɔ e sixu yi
wema mɛ ɖe ɖo zɔn nunina ɔ ji ɖɔ e sixu wa yi nunina ɔ
gbɔn vo nu akwɛ kpo nuɖokan mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo nina ɔ e hɛn ɔ e zan wlɛnwin ɖevo lɛ do nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
e wlɛnwin enɛ lɛ ɖo do
enyi wlɛnwin lɛ ɖebu wɛ jlo bonu zan hun kɛnklɛn to kan nu byɔ alaxɔ nɔ kpe nukun do to towe wu e mɔ tɛn do tuun wlɛnwin e sixu zan lɛ e
ðo nu byɔ lɛ e kpo takwɛ tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ gbɔn vo wutu ɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ e kan nu byɔ kpo takwɛ kpo tɔn lɛ cobo wlɛnwin nu nina tɔn hugan e
akwɛ ðo akwɛsɛxwetɛn lɛ e mɛɖe sixu blo tuto ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo ku emitɔn gudo hun e nɔ su akwɛ emitɔn ɖo akwɛsɛxwetɛn e artjb sɔgbe kpo nu akwɛsɛxwetɛn ɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ si lɛ e kpo
le tɔn lɛ e sixu nunina le tɔn lɛ tɔn tlɔlɔ alo e sixu do artjb
xɔ kpo ayikungban kpo e hɛn ɔ e xɔ kpo ayikungban kpo e sixu sa lɛ e sin nunina artjb vlafo gbɔn nunina tlɔlɔ ɖe gblamɛ abi mɛɖe sixu ayikungban ji xɔ ɖe bɔ e sin nunina mɛ ɔ ɖo ɖɔ emi nɔ nɔ xɔ ɔ mɛ jɛ ku emitɔn
ði xogbe tuto jlo do nunina tɔn ɖo e ɔ nunina enɛ lɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ ɔ blo tuto ɖe lɛ
nu jlo mɔ tinmɛ ɖevo lɛ hun yi jw org ji zin na nunina ɖe nu mi nɔ wa gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e e nɔ ɖo ɖibla yi vivɔnu ɖo akpaxwe lɛ ɖebu ji
miɖee bonu mɛɖe ze xomaɖixo nunywɛ tɔn do do gɛdɛ o
we wanyiyi kpe e tɛ pɔlu ɖe xa mɛ do linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ wu
mi sixu gbɔn
nukplɔnmɛ ɖo xota elɔ mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
e ðo wɛn ɖɔ hwenu pɔlu sin gankpa mɛ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo hlɔma e alo ɖo tɔn wɛ e wlan wema elɔ klisanwun kolosi tɔn lɛ
pɔlu ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ xo nu gbɔn bonu mɛɖe ɖɔ xo vivi do mi o
pɔlu yi nukɔn tinmɛ nu wu linlin gbakpe lɛ e ɖe lɛ sɔgbe a e kpo nu wu linlin ɔ tɔn sixu dɔn lɛ e kpo
ði ɔ e sixu bɔ mɛɖe ɖɔ emi ɖo nunywɛ hu mɛ ɖevo lɛ hugan
etɛwu mi ɖɔ xo do linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ sin ɖe lɛ ji
linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ xo jehovah tɔn lɛ nyi bɔ e nɔ wa nu do mɛ wu gbɔn e sixu nu nuɖiɖi mitɔn kpɛɖe kpɛɖe
egbe ɔ mi bi wu wɛ linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ sixu wa nu do
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi gbeje nu mi sixu wa su ali do linlin mɔhun lɛ bonu wa nu do linlin mitɔn wu o e
mi ɖɔ xo do linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ sin kpo mi sixu gbɔn e kpo ji
linlin tɛ nɔ dɔn mɛ gege aniwu
ɖi nu nu mawu a ɔ nyi mɛ ɖagbe
ðo to gege mɛ ɔ e nɔ yawu se bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖi nu nu mawu o nɔ yeɖee do ɖo mɛ nyi sinsɛnnɔ a e
sixu nɔ do ganji ɖɔ mawu tiin a ji yi wan nu linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ e vo wa nu jlo mɛ e e
xa ðɛhan
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi nyi nɔ ɖɔ ɖi nu nu mawu a ɔ ɖo nugbododo nyiɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ
mi sixu tamɛ mɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖe kun tiin o e ɖe gbɔn
ðɔ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖe kun tiin o e junjɔn linlin sɔgbe e ɖe ji a
nuvikun enɛ lɛ ɖo nuwukpikpe nɔ nu ɖeɖee sin hudo ɖo jɔ ɖevo lɛ jo nuwukpikpe enɛ do nu e xwe
etɛ mi sixu ɖɔ do linlin mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo ɖɔ e ɖi nu nu mawu a ɔ e sixu tuun nu nyi ɖagbe e wu
mi sixu ɖɔ xo do linlin mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo ɖɔ e ɖi nu nu mawu a ɔ e tuun nu nyi ɖagbe e wu gbɔn
xo mawu tɔn yi gbe ɖɔ lɛ sixu ɖo jijɔ ɖagbe ɖe lɛ
ði ɔ sixu nɔ ɖo sisi nu yetɔn lɛ yi wan nu
egbe ɔ nɔ tamɛ lɛ e gege yi gbe ɖɔ ninɔmɛ blawu mɛ ɔ ɖe e ɖɔ ɖo hudo alɔdo mawu tɔn tɔn
xa jelemii
linlin tɛ mɛ gege nɔ ɖo do sinsɛn wu
sinsɛn mɛvo ɔ e sixu ɖo awajijɛ
linlin ɔ tɔn tɔn enɛ nɔ dɔn mɛ gege ɖo nɔ mɔ ɖɔ sinsɛn nɔ mɛ kun sɔgbe o
ɔ sinsɛn gege nɔ lɛkɔ nu lɛ sin mawu gudo ɖo nukplɔnmɛ tɔn maɖowo cyancyan alo toxoɖiɖɔ wu
nu enɛ lɛ wɛ bɔ mɛ gege nɔ mɔ ɖɔ sinsɛn mɛvo ɔ emi sixu ɖo awajijɛ
sinsɛn nugbo ɔ nɔ xo awajijɛ kan gbɔn
nugbo jɛn wɛ doo ɖɔ sixu ɖo awajijɛ sinsɛn mɛvo a
tim nwt nu mawu nɔ wa lɛ e bi wɛ nɔ nyi le nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖo nɔ ayi ɖo alɔdido mɛ ɖevo lɛ ji
e nɔ mɛ ɖɔ e wli nu mɛ e e ɖo sisi e alɔwliwli sin akpadido do ylɔ ɖɔ nu e nyi alɔ nu afɔdogbe alo xo ɖiɖo xa nyɔnu ɖevo e vi mɛtɔn lɛ ganji ɖe wanyiyi adodwe
enɛ nɔ bɔ sinsɛn biblo mɔhun nɔ dɔn lɛ ɖo bu ɖo agun awajijɛnɔ lɛ kpo kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn awajijɛnɔ ɖe kpo mɛ xa ezayii
mi sixu zan luki do tamɛ mɛ lɛ do nukanbyɔ elɔ ji gbɔn etɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ
mi sixu gbeje linlin ɔ tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu sinsɛn mɛvo ɔ awajijɛ tiin e gbɔn
tamɛ do nukanbyɔ elɔ ji etɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ awajijɛ ɖo ɖe lɔnyiji fɔnkan yihundida ɖe alo ayiɖeɖayi ɖe mɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ awajijɛ ɖo nukunkpikpe do xwedo alo lɛ wu mɛ
nu enɛ lɛ bi sixu hɛn awajijɛ wa linlin taji hɛn awajijɛ mavɔmavɔ wa e ɖe wu wɛ e da mi
ði ɔ kplekple ɖo jehovah nɔ vivi nu mawu nugbo lɛ bɔ nɔ mɔ wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ gege
linlin tɛ mɛ gege nɔ ɖo do xoɖoxamɛ wu ɖo ɔ mɛ
etɛwu mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ e ɖoxo xa mɛ e wli alɔ xa a e o
etɛwu e ɖɔ e ɖoxo xa mɛ e wli alɔ xa a e o
mɛ lɛ sixu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ e ɖo ɖu
etɛwu e ɖɔ e ɖoxo xa mɛ e wli alɔ xa a e o
linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe ɖo yi gbe nu nublibliwiwa e sɔgbe a
ðo mawuxowema ɔ nublibliwiwa xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
jehovah do lɛ nu mi ɖo e wɛ da mi
mawu tɔn yi gbe nu xoɖoxamɛ ɖo sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo wli alɔ xa yeɖee e kɛɖɛ tɛntin e nyi akpaxwe tuto alɔwliwli tɔn tɔn
mawu lɛ mi ɖo e yi wan nu mi wutu
xwedo ɖeɖee nɔ setonu nu lɛ e nɔ ɖu vivi wanyiyi sisi kpo ayijayi kpo tɔn
klisanwun ɖe sixu ɖo wu zɔ bi sese nu nublibliwiwa gbɔn
xo mawu tɔn mi ɖo wu zɔ bi sese nu nublibliwiwa gbɔn e mi
ali taji mi sixu wa ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nu ɖeɖee mi nɔ lɛ e
jezu ɖɔ mɛɖe nyɔnu ɖe ɖo linlin wɛ ɖoxo xa ɛ ɔ e xa nyɔnu enɛ ɖo ayi mɛ xoxo
