enyi nukun towe ɖisixwe tɔn ɔ dɔn do nu nyanya mɛ hun ɖe siin nyi gbe
kpe kwɛ e ɖe gbe nyinya wɛ bɔ e ɖo awajijɛ
ðo mɛ gege nɔ nya kpe kwɛ e sin gbe ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ wutu ɔ klisanwun ɖe sixu wa ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ
kpe kwɛ e ɖe wɛ nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ a
nugbo jɛn wɛ ɖɔ kpe kwɛ bɔ e ɖo acɛ alo nyi mɛ nukunɖeji ɖe e ɖe gbe nyinya bɔ e ɖo awajijɛ sɔyi a
ɔ agbahwlɛnhwlɛn wɛ gbigbɔ elɔ tɔn nɔ kan
linlin tɛ mi ɖo ɖo do kpe kwɛ e gbe nyinya wu
sɔgbe xa wema pɔlu wlan tɛsalonikinu lɛ e ɔ etɛ ɛ awajijɛ ɖaxo
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mi dandan sin nu lɛ nu ɖe nyla ɖo e yi wan e biba mɛ a
mitɔn ɖo nyi nu taji hugan nu mi ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ a
jezu ɖɔ mɛɖe sixu gan we a ɖo e wan nu mɛ ɖe yi wan nu mɛ ɖe abi e setonu nu mɛ ɖe vɛtoli nu mɛ ɖe
enyi mi ayi ɖo jehovah sinsɛn kpo xo tɔn kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ kpo ji jɛ nukɔn ɔ mi nɔ mɔ awajijɛ e sixu a e
pɔlu ɖo awajijɛ mɔhun
xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
ɖevo ɖebu sixu awajijɛ mɔhun mɛ a
awajijɛ nɔ ayi sɔyi e nɔ sin alɔdido mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu ɖu vivi nunywɛ mawu tɔn tɔn mɛ akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
etɛwu linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ hɛn ɔ e ɖeɖɛ tagba eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ e sixu dɔn mɛ
lɛ hɛn ɔ ɖeɖɛ tagba yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ
linlin ɔ tɔn enɛ sixu dɔn mɛ gege
jɛn e nyi nugbo hun e ɖɔ kun ɖo hudo mawu tɔn tɔn o bɔ nuɖe jlo mɛɖe ɔ mɛ ɔ wa
ɔ linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ hɛn ɔ e ɖeɖɛ tagba eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ e sixu ɖu ɖo mɛ ji blewun ɖo sɔgbe xa nulinlɛn ɖe lɛ ɔ ahwan dakaxixo azɔn kpo kpo ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ
gbeɖiɖo ɖe ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ wu ɔ ɖo wɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ lɛ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn blo bɔ ɔ nyi fi ɖagbe ɖe
xo mɔhun lɛ ɖɔ wa mɔ nukunnu jɛ tagba ɖeɖee ɖo nu wa do mɛ wu wɛ sin hwenu linlin ɖie mɛ wɛ a
nu tɛ lɛ ɖɔ tagba lɛ tɔn lɛ nyla bi
ahwan sɔgbe xa nulinlɛn ɖe ɔ wɛkɛ hwan we lɛ hu livi alo hu
ðo ɔ tɛn sin xwe yetɔn lɛ gbe ɖo ahwan alo yadonumɛ wu lɛ e yi livi
nulinlɛn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ livi wɛ tɛn ɖo
adakaxixo adakaxixo alɔkpa ɖe lɛ ɖekpo ɖo fi ɖe lɛ co ɖevo lɛ ɖi dakaxixo gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji dakaxixo ɖo xwedo mɛ kpo xixo wu kpo wa jɛji bi
ɔ mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ nuɖuɖonumɛ syɛn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
gbeɖiɖo tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ xwewu xwewu ɔ ɖo xwe a e livi tɛnnɛ nɔ ku ɖo hunzɔn taglomɛzɔn kpo kpo wu
sɔgbe kpo akwɛsɛxwetɛn ɔ tɔn kpo ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo mɛ tawun ɖo aflika e gosin livi ɖo yi livi ɖo
etɛwu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu kpewu ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ tɔn lɛ
nyɔna tɛ lɛ xo ezayii kpo ɖe kpo ɖɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛ enɛ lɛ kun sixu ɖe ahwan adakaxixo azɔn kpo kpo siin o axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kɛɖɛ jɛn kpewu
mi nu jehovah wa nu lɛ e
adakaxixo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖo livi mɔkpan wɛ bonu yi wan nu yeɖee ɖeji do yeɖee wu acɛkpikpa ɖebu sixu blo gbɔn a e
azɔn jehovah do nu togun tɔn ɛ lanmɛ syɛn hunsin ɖagbe
sixu linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ gbɔn
tamɛ do nu wu linlin ɔ sixu dɔn mɛ e kpo sixu gbɔn e kpo ji
mɛ gege nɔ tuun ɖɔ jaan e nɔ mɔ ɖo biblu ɖe lɛ mɛ e ɔ e kun ɖo nuwlanwlan dodo mawu do ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ e mɛ o a
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ do akpaxwe enɛ ji nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ nyi a e jɛn sixu mɔ hwɛ nu mɛ do afɔ gbe alo ɖoxo xa nyɔnu nyi asi tɔn a e
lɔn nu mɛɖebu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin asi towe o nwt
mi sixu miɖee bɔ jlo nublibliwiwa tɔn wa nu do mi wu a gbɔn
wanyiyi kpo kpo sixu cyɔn alɔ mi ji bɔ mi ajɔ ɔ kpo a gbɔn
xwedo mitɔn blebu sixu mɔ ajɔ ɔ yi gbɔn
ajɔ tɛ ɖo nukun wɛ mawu tɔn lɛ ɖe
etɛ mi bɔ mi ayi mitɔn ɖo ajɔ ɔ ji
pɔlu ɖɔhun ɔ klisanwun yi do ɖe egbe tɔn lɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo xɔ akwɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɔ ajɔ mawu ylɔ sin jixwe ɖɔ yi e
ɖevo lɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖevo
ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ mɔ ajɔ mavɔmavɔ tɔn yi ɖo ayikungban ji nukunɖiɖo awajijɛ tɔn ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi
ɖo ayi ɖo nukunɖiɖo xɔ akwɛ ɖo mɔ ajɔ jixwe tɔn yetɔn yi e ji
awovinu tɛ lɛ wu pɔlu nu klisanwun tɔn lɛ do
pɔlu nu klisanwun lɛ do awovinu sixu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin si lɛ e wu
pɔlu ɖɔ xo do awovinu ɖeɖee ɖo ayi jɛ azan mitɔn gbe din sixu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin mi si lɛ e wu
ði ɔ e tinmɛ e sixu hɔn nu jlo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ ɖeɖɛ tagba ɖo mi kpo lɛ kpo tɛntin e ɖi xwi xa tagba xwedo tɔn lɛ gbɔn e
we e ɖe xa mɛ do xo enɛ lɛ wu e xɔ akwɛ nu mi ɖo egbe
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi gbeje ɖe lɛ ɖo akpa pɔlu gbo nu mɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo ɖo wema e wlan kolosinu lɛ e mɛ e
etɛwu jlo nublibliwiwa tɔn sixu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin mi si
ee pɔlu flin nukunɖiɖo jiwu nɔvi tɔn lɛ ɖo e gudo e ɔ e wlan ɖɔ hun su nu nyi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ lɛ sin kun do nu enɛ lɛ wɛ nyi agalilɛ nublibliwiwa jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ linlin nyanya lɛ kpo kpo
mi sixu cyɔn alɔ miɖee ji ɖo ninɔmɛ nyanya lɛ mɛ gbɔn
e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ mi ɖo aceji hwenu ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee sixu mi bɔ mi nugbododo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ ji e kpannukɔn mi e
ninɔmɛ dɔn awovinu wa ɖo walɔ lixo lɛ e sixu wa hwenu klisanwun ɖe yi tomɛ ɖo tɔn wu alo hwenu klisanwun ɖe ɖo wa xa mɛ kpo e kpo ɖo ɖokpo ɔ a e ɖe wɛ e
nux
nu mɔ hwiɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun ɖe mɛ hun ɖe hwiɖee ɖi jehovah tɔn ɖe wa nu ɖo ali sɔgbe e flin ɖɔ alɔlwɛ ɖuɖu sixu dɔn do mɛ
mi miɖee hwenu wu ku mi alo mi ɖo miɖokponɔ e
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu ɖo mɛ ɖɔ nu mitɔn ɖu ayi mɛ e wɛ
mi tlɛ sixu ɖo mɛ tuun nu ci nu mi e wɛ yi gbe nu mɛɖebu kpowun
nu nu mɔhunkɔtɔn ja xixa gbe gbeɖe hun hɔn yi su jehovah kpo togun tɔn kpo nu lɔn nu nu ɖebu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin asi towe o xa ðɛhan nunywɛxo
nu mi ɖo ayiɖeɖayi mitɔn lɛ wɛ ɔ etɛ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ
nu mi su kun do nu jlo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ ɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu ayiɖeɖayi blibli lɛ
nɔ sɔnu nu ayiɖeɖayi ɖo egbe lɛ e gege ci sodɔmu kpo kpo hwexonu tɔn ɖɔhun
mi ɖo nɔ gɔn aceji nɔ yi gbe nu ayiɖeɖayi ɖebu xwle mi lɛ e kpowun a
mi ɖo ayiɖeɖayi bonu mi gɔn ayi ɖo ajɔ tɔn ɔ ji a lɛ e nux
tagba tɛ lɛ sixu kpannukɔn mi ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ
mi bi wɛ yi gbe ɖɔ agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ mi ɖe e nyi nyɔna ɖe
xo mawu tɔn kplɔnkplɔn ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ ji kpo gudo mi nɔ kpo wanyiyi kpo do nɔ nu miɖee e kpo nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ayi mitɔn ɖo ajɔ ɔ ji
e ɖo co ɖo hweɖelɛnu ɔ nukunnu mɔ jɛ mɛɖee mɛ sixu dɔn hwɛgbe ɖe lɛ wa agun ɔ tɔn lɛ tɛntin
nu mi kpewu ɖu ɖo tagba mɔhun lɛ ji a ɔ e bɔwu bɔ mi hɛn mɛ do xomɛ xa
jijɔ tɛ lɛ ɖiɖo mi bɔ mi mɔ ajɔ ɔ
etɛ sixu mi bɔ hwenu klisanwun ɖe do xomɛsin xomɛ nu mi e ɔ fifa ɖo mi tɛntin e bu a
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu mɛhɛndoxomɛ bɔ e xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin mi si a gbɔn
nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ enyi mɛɖe wa nu nyi do nu mɛɖe ɖo mɛ hweɖebunu hun nɔ kɛ miɖee
wanyiyi gba do nu enɛ lɛ bi ji ɖo wanyiyi ɔ wɛ nɔ dɔn nu enɛ lɛ bi ca bɔ nɔ nɔ bu ganji
wanyiyi kpo kpo sixu mi bɔ mi hwɛ kɛ miɖee
ði ɔ enyi xo klisanwun ɖe ɖɔ alo nu e wa nu mi e nu mi ɔ mi sixu flin ninɔmɛ mɛ mi lɔ ɖɔ xo kpo kpo alo wa nu kpo kpo ɖe a lɛ e
wanyiyi kpo kpo nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔ nɔ mɔ nu zɛ nuwanyido mitɔn lɛ wu e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ a ce
xa
mi bi yi wan nu mawu ɖokpo ɔ nɔ jla wɛn ɖokpo ɔ bɔ mi nɔ mɔ lɛ e gege nɔ ɖibla nyi ɖokpo ɔ
ɖo mi nɔ kpo wanyiyi kpo do hwɛ kɛ miɖee wutu ɔ mi nɔ so nu buninɔ klisanwun tɔn mitɔn nɔ ayi mitɔn ɖo ajɔ tɔn ɔ ji
etɛwu wuhwinhwan nyla
mi jo wuhwinhwan do bɔ e xo ajɔ mitɔn yi a gbɔn
akpagbanumɛ tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e flin mi ɖɔ wuhwinhwan sixu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin mi si
ði ɔ hwanwu nɔvi tɔn abɛli hu
kolee datani kpo abilamu kpo hwanwu mɔyizi klan gbe xa ɛ
axɔsu sawulu lɔ hwanwu davidi ɖo nukɔnyiyi tɔn wu hu
xo elɔ xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ e kpaca mɛ a fi wuhwinhwan ɖe bɔ sin ayixa ɖe ɔ nu hannyahannya wiwa kpo nunyanyawiwa tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ bi kpo lɔ ɖo finɛ ja
nu mi sɔnu nu wanyiyi kpo kpo ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi yawu hwanwu a
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ wanyiyi nɔ ku hun e nɔ xomɛ e nɔ jlo mɛ nu a
enɛ mi bɔ mi ɖe wanyiyi sɔgbe xa weɖexamɛ elɔ enyi e wli nu ɖokpo ɔ ɖe lɛ bi wɛ nɔ xa ɛ
mi jonataan nyi axɔsu sawulu sin vi e tɔn
e hwanwu hwenu e davidi jɛ sawulu tɛnmɛ e a
e wa ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu davidi
mi xomɛ yi wan nu mɛ jonataan ɖɔhun a
weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn tɛ xwixwedo xwedo ɖe blebu bɔ e mɔ ajɔ ɔ yi
nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan sixu hɛn fifa kpo awajijɛ kpo wa xwedo ɖe mɛ xwedo ɔ mɔ ajɔ ɔ yi
we jinjɔn biblu ji kunkpla xwedo lɛ e tɛ pɔlu ɖe xa klisanwun ɖo kolosi lɛ e
e ɖɔ nyɔnu lɛ miɖee ɖo asu mitɔn lɛ glɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e blo gbɔn ɖo bu ɖe xa aklunɔ ɔ mɛ e
sunnu lɛ yi wan nu asi mitɔn lɛ nyla hun do o
vi lɛ setonu nu mitɔn lɛ ɖo nu bi mɛ ɖo nu nɔ aklunɔ nukunmɛ e nɛ
lɛ nɔ do xomɛsin nu vi mitɔn lɛ o e nyi a ɔ awakanmɛ ku
asi klisanwun ɖe sixu dɔn asu tɔn nyi e wa nugbo ɔ mɛ gbɔn
nu nyi asi ɖe mɔ ɖɔ asu towe nyi e kun nɔ wa nu xa e jɛxa gbɔn e o ɔ lo
ɖɔ jlɛ ɖiɖɔ do walɔ tɔn wu wɛ jla ninɔmɛ ɔ ɖo a
enyi e tlɛ nyi ɖɔ linlin towe wɛ nɔ wa yi bɔ e nɔ blo nu wɛ ɖe e ɔ ɖɔ enɛ dɔn ɛ wa nugbo ɔ mɛ a
e vɛwu
enyi asu klisanwun ɖe ɖo asi ɖe bɔ e nɔ si a ɔ etɛ e ɖo blo
nu nyi asu ɖe mɔ ɖɔ asi towe nyi e kun nɔ si o ɔ lo
ɖɔ xosusu do ji tɔn do ɖɔ emi wɛ nyi gan ɔ bɔ e si wɛ a
ðebu lɔ a
jezu zan e nyi nu agun tɔn e kpo wanyiyi kpo kpodo suulu kpan
luk gbɔn jezu tɔn xwixwedo gblamɛ ɔ asu ɖe sixu dɔn asi tɔn wa nugbo ɔ mɛ
asu klisanwun ɖe ɖe wanyiyi e ɖo nu asi tɔn e gbɔn
asu yi wan nu asi tɔn e nɔ wli nɔ ɖoto linlin tɔn lɛ nɔ blo bɔ e nɔ ɖeji ɖɔ nu e ɖɔ e xɔ akwɛ ɖo nukun emitɔn mɛ
asu yi wan nu asi tɔn e ɖe nɔ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e si emi a loɔ nuwiwa tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ bɔ asi tɔn nɔ si
e blo tawun ɖɔ asu yi wan nu asi tɔn kpo vi tɔn lɛ kpo e ɖe ɖo xwedo mɛ e nɔ jehovah kpo awajijɛ kpo ɖe e ɖe mɔ ajɔ ɔ yi
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ tagba xwedo tɔn lɛ xo ajɔ ɔ yi a gbɔn
nu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe wɛ nu ɔ sixu blo gbɔn bɔ towe lɛ sin ɖo zɛ xwe wu a
nu nyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe nɔ mɔ ɖɔ towe nyi klisanwun lɛ e kun nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ xo towe lɛ mɛ o nɔ do nu din ɔ lo
ɖo ɖiɖo wɛ e tlɛ sixu bɔ xo nu ɖɔ jehovah sinsɛn jɛn nyi gbɛzan hugan e a ji
nu tɛn ɖo ɖiɖo wɛ e bonu e nu jo gbe ɖo jehovah sinsɛn kɔn ɔ blewun jɛn wa mɔ ɖɔ mɛɖebu kun nɔ kpe nukun do wutu towe ganji hu towe nɔ si mawu lɛ e kpo agun ɔ kpo o
alo bɔya towe lɛ nɔ gbɔn e wɛ nɔ ɖo nu
ma nu ɖo do nɔ gbɔn e wu o loɔ tuun hwɛjijɔ wu nɔ wa nu xa gbɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ ci xwii wa nu wu kpe e bi jɛ xo mɔ ɖɔ do wu ji o
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ mɛ tuun nu ɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo din a mɛ sin ayi ɖo ɔ nɔ yi ji nux
yi wan nu jehovah nugbo lɛ e ɖiɖo ɔ nyɔna ɖe wɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jlo bonu mɔ ajɔ tɔn ɔ yi
etɛwu kanɖeji ayi towe ɖo ajɔ ɔ ji
e jiwu ɖɔ mi do nukun ajɔ ɖo nukɔn nu mi e mɛ bɔya mi mɔ jɔmaku ɖo jixwe alo nɔ sɔyi ɖo palaɖisi mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji
nukunɖiɖo jinjɔn akpa mitɔn ɖesu do e ji e wɛ
mawu ɖɔ do palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ wu ɖɔ jehovah tuuntuun ayikungban ɔ eza
mawu nu mɛ nɔ ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji hwenɛnu lɛ e bi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e ɖo do gan mɔ ajɔ enɛ yi
enɛ wu ɔ ayi towe ɖo akpa jehovah do e ji jo nu ɖebu do bonu e xo yi sin asi towe o
allen ɖɔ nɔ hu mi hwenu ja fi e
tuun nu zun lɛ alo mɛ lɛ yi mi a
e ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ huzu sɔgbe xa agun mɛ e ɖe ɖo kilomɛtlu do jɔtɛn tɔn e
enyi tɛn yi agun ɖevo mɛ ɔ sixu hu hwi lɔ
etɛ sixu bɔ huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ ɔ
enyi huzuhuzu lɛ syɛn hugan nu ɖo nukun e ɔ etɛ sixu wa
enyi hwɛ tɛn ɖe a bonu xa towe mɛ wɛ e wa ɔ sixu blo gbɔn bɔ huzuhuzu lɛ biblo bɔkun nu mɛ wa e
tamɛ do elɔ ji enyi e hɔn atin lɛ yi fi ɖevo ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖe lɛ
cobonu e hɔn atin ɖe ɔ ɖɔ tɔn lɛ gege wɛ e nɔ bonu tɛnsisɛ tɔn do bɔkun
ɖokpo ɔ tɛnsisɛ yi agun ɖevo mɛ sixu bɔ mɔ ɖe lɛ
ðo agun towe xoxo ɔ mɛ ɔ enyi mi ɖɔ ɔ do ɖɔ ɖe lɛ do hwenu zun lɛ ɖo aca jehovah sinsɛn tɔn ɖagbe ɖe e
din ɔ ɖo do ɖɔ ɖevo lɛ do mɔ tɛn do yi nukɔn ɖo fi yi e
etɛ bɔ wa
nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan wɛ
mi ɖe lɛ
mɛ nɔ xa xo mawu tɔn gbe bi gbe e ci atin e nyi to ɔ ɖɔhun hwetɔnnu su ɔ e nɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo ji tɛgbɛ
enɛ wu ɔ kpo ɖo biblu xa wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe nɔ yi kple agun tɔn lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
jo aca ɖagbe sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn kpo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn tɔn kpo do o
ɖo hudo nu ɖeɖee wa do ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe xa jehovah lɛ e tɔn ɖo fi yi e
kevin nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe e ɖɔ nu nyi kpo asi kpo tawun e wɛ nyi gbexosin tɔn sin mi tlolo mi wa agun ɔ mɛ e
mi yawu tuun nɔvi lɛ gbexosin lɛ kpo fi ɖo acɛ agun ɔ tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo
tɛn yi fi ɖo kilomɛtlu jɛji do fi e nɔ nɔ e ɖɔ ali ɖagbe hugan e ma do agun ɖe ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ hwɛhwɛ e blo gbɔn e
ɔ nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖo ali ɖebu vlafo gbɔn kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn hinhɛn ɖo ji tɛnmɛ kpinkpɔn nu mɛ ɖo akpaxwe kple ɔ tɔn ɖe hwenu alo gbeyiyi nɔ ze mɛɖe wa kple lɛ gblamɛ
enyi nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo mɔ bɔ mɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ mɛɖee do tɔn ɔ e bɔkun bɔ zun xa ɛ
ee melissa kpo xwedo tɔn kpo tɛn yi agun ɖe mɛ gudo e ɔ ayi do lɛ zunzun ji
e ɖɔ mi nɔ gbɔn kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ jɛ nukɔn nu kple lɛ kpo kple lɛ sin kpo
enɛ xwedo ɔ bɔ yawu tuun mɛ gege sin nyikɔ
ɔ gblo ada nu wanyiyi yetɔn gbɔn jonɔ mɛ lɛ tɔn yiyi gblamɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ bɔ kancica ɖo tɛntin yetɔn e nɔ syɛn
enyi xoɖiɖɔ xa mɛ lɛ nɔ vɛwu nu ɔ sixu
ði ɔ nɔ nu ɖo kpa nu e tlɛ vɛwu nu ɖo ɔ nɛ
nugbo ɔ e nu do mɛ ɔ xomɛ nɔ hun mɛ
nux rachel tɛn yi zɔ tawun nu fi e su ɖe e ɖɔ nyi mɛɖe nɔ ku winnya
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ do gan tawun ba do ɖɔ xo xa nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
nɔ mɛ jinjɔn kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ xwii ɖo xo ɖɔ nu mɛɖe wɛ a e
mɛ enɛ sixu nɔ ku winnya nyi ɖɔhun
etɛwu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ ɖɔ xo xa mɛ ɖe jɛ nukɔn nu kple lɛ alo ɖo kple lɛ gudo a
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ akpakpa sixu bonu mɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo aklunɔzan gbla nukɔntɔn lɛ mɛ hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ ɔ akpakpa mɛ enɛ sixu wa bu
hwenɛnu ɔ ɖo kpo ɖo gan do wɛ zun lɛ
enyi e hɔn atin lɛ yi fi ɖevo ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖe lɛ e gudo ɔ nɔ do ɖɔ ɖevo lɛ do
e nɔ byɔ hwenu ɖo atin ɖe lɛ si hu atin ɖevo lɛ cobɔ do ɖɔ do ganji ɖo fi ɖevo
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mɛ bi wɛ nɔ huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ agun mɛ wa e tɔn gbɔn alɔkpa ɖokpo ɔ a
nu tɛn nɔ zaan bɔ kpo ɖo gan do wɛ huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ towe ɔ ɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn elɔ lɛ zinzan sixu
yi gbe ɖɔ hwenu gege wa yi hu gbɔn e cobɔ huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ ɔ
ði ɔ yi kunnuɖewema galadi tɔn lɛ e gege nɔ nɔ fi e ɖe e nu xwe gege cobo nɔ lɛkɔ wa yi to yetɔn ɖesu mɛ
wiwa nɔ bɔ kancica ɖo kpo nɔvi ɖo xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo tɛntin e nɔ syɛn bɔ nɔ huzu sɔgbe xa aca ɔ
alejandro tɛn azɔn mɔkpan e tuun ɖɔ huzuhuzu ɔ kun nyi kplakpla sin nu o
e ɖɔ ee mi tɛn gudo tɔn din e ɔ asi ɖɔ lɛ bi wɛ ɖo agun mitɔn xoxo ɔ mɛ
e flin ɖɔ nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e ɖɔ ɖo xwe we ɖie ee tɛn e
nyi alɔ nu agun towe ɔ do agun towe xoxo ɔ wu
ði ɔ nɔvi ɖeɖee ɖo agun towe ɔ mɛ lɛ e sixu nɔ ku winnya alo nɔ gba wu do mɛ mɛ hu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo agun xoxo ɔ mɛ e
ayi ɖo jijɔ yetɔn ɖagbe lɛ ji ɖɔ ɖo towe lɛ ji gbɔn e
mɛ tɛn jɛ fi ɖe lɛ e ɔ e nɔ kpaca mɛ ɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ kanbyɔ yeɖee ɖɔ yi wan nu nɔvi ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ lɛ bi doo a
nɔ byɔ nu mawu e luk
david nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe e ɖɔ ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖɔ emiɖesu kpewu dɛ o
alɔdo jehovah tɔn mɛvo ɔ nu gege tiin bɔ mi sixu wa a
nɔ xoɖɛ do takun tɔn mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ mi nɔ do gan nɔ zan hwenu xa nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo
lɛ emi nu e ɖo nu vi mitɔn lɛ wɛ bonu huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ ɔ hun nɔ zan hwenu do xoɖɛ xa do enɛ tamɛ
bonu zun lɛ gbɔn ayiɖeɖayi hɛn mɛ lido lɛ e sin tuto biblo gblamɛ
etɛ sixu wa do mɛ tɛn wa agun towe mɛ lɛ e
do gan nyi nujɔnu tɔn nu tlolo mɔ e
mɛ lɛ sixu wa sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn towe domɛ alo televiziɔn jw tɔn sin tuto sunmɛ sunmɛ tɔn ɔ xa a
sixu ɖɔ nu bonu ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ a
nu nɔ ylɔ bonu nɔ ɖu nu klewun ɖe ɖo ɔ flin nɔ yi mɛ gbɔn e tɛgbɛ
alɔ tawun tawun ɖevo tɛ lɛ sixu do mɛ lɛ
carlos ɖɔ hwenu mi wa agun mitɔn ɔ mɛ e ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe mi wema fi e nɔ xwle axi ɖe bɔ akwɛ tɔn nɔ lɛ e tɔn
mɛ ɖeɖee gosin fi ninɔmɛ ayi mɛ tɔn gbɔn vo ɖe lɛ e ɔ enyi e e nɔ sɔnu gbɔn ɖo yozo hwenu jɔhɔn hwenu alo ɖo ji hwenu e ɔ e sixu su nukun yetɔn mɛ tawun
sixu bɔ yetɔn bi alɔ nu gbɔn xa ɔ mɛ tɔn kpikpi nu alo nu mɛ lɛ ɖi nu ɖo sinsɛn linu e tintinmɛ nu gblamɛ
allen xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e ɖo agun tɔn ɔ mɛ sin xwe ɖokpo jɛji ɖie
e ɖɔ nyiɖesu wɛ nɔ do gan nɔ tuun nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo jɛ nukɔn
din ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ci xwedo ɖe ɖɔhun hugan bɔ e nɔ vivi nu mi
allen wa mɔ ɖɔ tɛnsisɛ kun bonu emi emitɔn ɖe kpo o
e wa ɔ e mɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nyi tɔn sɔyi lɛ e
e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɖe lɛ
mɛxo lɛ jlo ɖɔ ɖu vivi agun towe ɔ tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
tɔn agun ɔ tɔn ɖo yawu ɖɔ kunnuɖegbe tɔn mɛ nɔ e nu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɔ kan nuɖe lɛ byɔ do agun towe xoxo ɔ wu do sixu yi kati agun tɔn tɔn towe alo mitɔn
kunnuɖegbe tɔn mɛ ɖe e sin ɖo zɔn xa ɖo ɔ mɛ tlolo wa e
enyi e sixu blo tɔn nu xwedo towe ɔ e
mɛxo lɛ ɖo tuun animɛloo ji ylɔ ɖe hwenu ajijimɛ sin nu ɖe jɛ e bɔ enyi adla ɖe wa vlafo ɔ mɔ tɛn do tuun fi ɖe e
enyi mɛxo lɛ gbeje ɖɔ kati dpa towe sɔgbe a ji ɔ e
tuun ðɔ e
ðo nukun ðo mawu wɛ
nu jɛ ɖo hwexonu lɛ e tɛ ganjɛwu klisanwun lɛ bɔ kudeji ɖɔ sin ku tiin
nu enɛ lɛ jɛ e kpo nu ji hwexonu tɔn ɖevo lɛ ku do e kpo sixu blo bɔ nukunɖiɖo towe syɛn gbɔn
xota elɔ lɛ blo bɔ nu ɖi nu sin ku e syɛn
lɛ vi mitɔn lɛ nu ðo nunywɛ nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ hwlɛngan e
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ emi wa nu hwlɛngan mitɔn
baptɛm nɔ hun ali nu nyɔna gege e byɔ
lɛ emi sixu vi mitɔn lɛ bonu sɔgbe nu baptɛm gbɔn
mɛ mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee blo baptɛm lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo linlin wa wɛ lɛ e kpo sixu blo gbɔn bɔ kancica ɖo kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e syɛn
gbɛzan tɔn jo nu lɛ do nyi gudo xwedo aklunɔ ɔ
alɔdlɛndonu xota lɛ tɔn nu atɔxwɛ tɔn
mitɔn lazaa ɖo amlɔ wɛ yi ɛ jaan
biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ ganjɛwu mata do sin ku wu
etɛ sixu mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ sin ku tiin ɖo sɔgudo
mata ɖɔhun ɔ hwenu awajijɛ tɔn tɛ ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe
etɛ mata ɖo jiɖe ɖɔ e wa wa nu nɔvi sunnu tɔn
mata nyi jezu tɔn nyi ahwanvu tɔn e ɖo aluwɛ mɛ
lazaa nyi nɔvi sunnu tɔn e ku
nuɖe sixu ɖe aluwɛ mɛ e ɖe e kpo a
enɛ sixu ɖe mɛ mata ɖe e bi siin a e ɖo co e yi gbe nu ganjɛwu enɛ jezu ɛ e
e ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ e ɖo sin ku mɛkuku lɛ tɔn hwenu ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn ɔ gbe
enɛ gudo ɔ jezu blo nujiwu ɖe
ðo azan enɛ ɖokpo ɔ gbe ɔ e lazaa sin ku
etɛwu jlo ɖo ganjɛwu mata ɖo e
mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖe ɖo nukun ɖɔ jezu alo tɔn blo nujiwu mɔhun nu mi egbe din a
ɖeji mata ɖɔhun ɖɔ e towe lɛ sin ku ɖo sɔgudo a
vlafo e sixu nyi asu towe alo asi towe nɔ towe towe alo towe
alo ɖo aluwɛ mɛ ɖo vi ku nu wutu
akpakpa ɖo wɛ bɔ zunfan towe enɛ ɖɔ xo xa ɛ nu do e
awajijɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mata ɖɔhun ɔ ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe lɛ ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ ɖo sin ku mɛkuku lɛ tɔn hwenu
nujiwu ɖeɖee jezu blo hwenu kpɛɖe jɛ nukɔn nu ku lazaa tɔn e do hlɔnhlɔn hlɔnhlɔn ji nu ganjɛwu mata ɖo e gbɔn
ðo mata nɔ nɔ jeluzalɛmu kpa wutu ɔ hwenu jezu vi sunnu asukusi ɖe tɔn ɖo ɖibla yi nayinu ɖo galilee e ɔ e sixu nɔ mɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e se nu jɛ e
jɛn e sixu se vi nyɔnu jayilɔsi tɔn jezu sin ku e sin xo
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nyɔnuvi ɔ sin xwegbe lɛ e tuun ɖɔ vi ɔ ku
jezu hɛn vi kuku ɔ sin alɔ ɖɔ
mata kpo nɔvi nyɔnu tɔn kpo tuun ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ jezu hɛn ɔ e gbɔ azɔn
enɛ wɛ bɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu jezu wɛ ɖo finɛ ɔ lazaa kun ku o
din jezu sin ku e ɔ etɔn wa nyi gbɔn
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ mata ɖɔ do lazaa wu ɖɔ e wa ɖo sɔgudo ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn ɔ gbe
etɛwu e ganjɛ xo enɛ wu
etɛwu mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ sin ku tiin ɖo sɔgudo bɔ mitɔn lɛ sixu nɔ mɛ lɛ e mɛ
hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe lɛ tiin nu ganjɛwu enɛ ɖo e
hwenu mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ ji gbɔn wɛ e ɔ mi sixu mɔ nuɖe lɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ bɔ e nɔ yawu ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ ɖo kancica xa nukunɖiɖo nujɔnu tɔn ɖo ɖɔ emi wa mɔ emitɔn lɛ e a
etɛ so nu ganjɛwu mata ɖo ɖɔ lazaa sin ku e
wu ɖɔ mata kun ɖɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ nɔvi o
loɔ e ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ e
enɛ sixu flin mi ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ lɛ e atɔn
nujiwu tɛ xo e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mata se
hwenu mawu hlɔnhlɔn gbeyiɖɔ elii bɔ e blo nujiwu lɛ e wɛ e mɛ sin ku azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ
ðo salɛputa ɔ asukusi wamamɔnɔ ɖe yi jonɔ gbeyiɖɔ ɔ tɔn ɖo toxo fenisii tɔn ɖo xuto e mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ mawu blo nujiwu bɔ linfinka nawe ɔ tɔn kpo amigo tɔn kpo jɛ a bɔ enɛ bɔ e kpo vi tɔn kpo nɔ
elii vi ɔ ji xoɖɛ ɖɔ mawu kɛnklɛn vi elɔ wa
bɔ nu nyi nugbo
mawu se ɖɛ elii tɔn bɔ vi ɔ wa
sin ku nukɔntɔn xo e ɖɔ ɖo biblu mɛ e nɛ xa axɔsu lɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mata se nujiwu nukunɖeji enɛ jɛ e
ðɔ nu elizee wa do ɖe nawe ɖe tɔn kpo e etɛ nujiwu elizee tɔn do jehovah wu
gbeyiɖɔ elizee jɛ elii sin tɛnmɛ e wɛ blo nujiwu mɛ sin ku tɔn wegɔ xo mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ e
izlayɛli vi nyɔnu nukunɖeji cunɛmunu ɖe yi jonɔ elizee tɔn bɔ nu bi vɔ
mawu gbɔn gbeyiɖɔ ɔ ji nyɔnu enɛ ji vi ɖe a e kpo asu tɔn nyi mɛxo e kpo bɔ ji vi sunnu ɖokpo
xwe ɖe lɛ gudo ɔ vi ɔ ku
e byɔ gbe asu tɔn blo kilomɛtlu yi elizee ɖo kaamɛli so ɔ kɔn
gbeyiɖɔ ɔ gehazii nɔ ɛ e do bɔ e jɛ nukɔn nu yi cunɛmu
gehazii kpewu vi ɔ wa a
enɛ gudo ɔ vi ɔ sin nɔ ɖo aluwɛ mɛ e kpo elizee kpo wa axɔ
nujiwu ɖe jɛ vi ɔ wa bɔ awajijɛ nɔ tɔn tɔn tunfla
e sixu flin ɖɛ mɔ vi ji ɖo a wa ji ɖo gudo mɛ e xo hwenu e kpla samuwɛli bɔ e yi wa ɖo goxɔ ɔ mɛ e e jehovah ɖo acɛ mɛ do do gɔngɔn mɛ ɖo kuxwe e wɛ ɖo acɛ mɛ sin ku
tinmɛ elizee ɖo sin ku tɔn atɔngɔ xo biblu ɖɔ e mɛ gbɔn e
nujiwu gudo tɔn jɛ gbɔn elizee gblamɛ e nɛ a
e wa tɔn nu xwe jɛji bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e jɛ azɔn kpla ɛ yi ku ɔ
nukɔnmɛ hwenu cyɔ elizee tɔn huzu xu kɛɖɛ e ɔ lɛ sin ɖe wa to ɔ mɛ
izlayɛli vi ɖe lɛ dawe ɖe sin cyɔ xwe ɖiɖi gbe hwe ɔ
ee ɖo hinhɔn nu yetɔn lɛ wɛ e ɔ dawe ɔ sin cyɔ nyi do yɔdo mɛ xu elizee tɔn lɛ ɖe e
tamɛ do ɖagbe sin ku tɔn enɛ lɛ wa nu mata e ji
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ blo bɔ kudeji ɖɔ hlɔnhlɔn mawu tɔn kun ɖo dogbo o
klisanwun nyɔnu ku e gbɔn
ðo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ ɔ mi xa ɖɔ mawu tɔn ɖe lɛ mɛ sin ku
mi mɔ ɖɔ jezu mɛ sin ku hwenu e sin nayinu e kpo hwenu e ɖo jayilɔsi xwe e kpo
e wa tlolo bɔ gbɛɖe tɔn klisanwun lɛ
nu enɛ jɛ e bɔ mɛ gege ɖi nu nu aklunɔ
etɛ dotoo luki ɖɔ ɖɔ e jɛ do nyavi ɖe wu
etɛ e nyavi ɔ sin ku e wa nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɔ bɔ e nyavi ɖe sin ku
gbe ɖokpo ɔ pɔlu ɖo kple ɖe blo wɛ ɖo singbo ɖe ji ɖo tolowasi finɛ wɛ nyi totaligbe gbadahweji turquie tɔn ɖo egbe
pɔlu ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ bɔ zan ɖo we
amlɔ wa nyi sin singbo atɔngɔ ɔ ji wa jɛ
vlafo dotoo luki wɛ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn wa etiki e gbeje e bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ etiki ɔ wu kɛɖɛ wɛ e gble eɖee kpo kpowun a e ku
pɔlu jɛte sin singbo ɔ ji ze cyɔ ɔ do mɛ ɖɔ xo elɔ kpaca mɛ e e ɖo
nu enɛ wa ɖagbe nu mɛ mɔ lɛ e e
kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do sin ku wu din e kpo ɔ nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
xo mi ɖɔ wa yi lɛ e ɖo wa nu wa nu mata e nu hwi lɔ
e wɛ nyi ɖɔ jiɖe ɖɔ mawu mitɔn kpo mitɔn kpo ɖo nuwukpikpe mɛ ku e wa
nu tawun e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mawu tɔn ɖe ɖi elii jezu alo ɖo finɛ hwenu jehovah blo nujiwu enɛ lɛ e
etɛ mi sixu ɖɔ do mɛ ɖeɖee ku ɖo hwe ɖevo lɛ ɖo hwenuxo mɛ e wu
ee mawu nɔ mɛ sin ku ɖo hwe mitɔn a e ɔ sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo lɛ sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ e mɛ sin ku ɖo sɔgudo a wɛ a
nu ci nu mata bɔ e ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ nɔvi ɖo sin ku mɛkuku lɛ tɔn hwenu ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn ɔ gbe e ɔ e ci nu lɔ a
hwi lɔ sixu ɖo nuɖiɖi mɔhun gbɔn
etɛ mi sixu do sin ku wu ɖo ablaxamu tɔn mɛ
mi tamɛ do nu mawu ɖɔ ɖɔ ablaxamu wa nu izaki e ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ sin hwenu linlin ɖie ɖɔ e wa ɖu gu ɔ e ji
jehovah ɖɔ ze viɖokponɔ towe izaki vi enɛ ɔ yi wan ɔ ze e do nu mi bib
gbeɖiɖe enɛ ci nu ablaxamu e
ɔ jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ izaki ji wɛ kunkan ɔ wa gbɔn
bib enyi ablaxamu hu izaki do ɔ nu enɛ jɛ gbɔn
mawu mɛ nu pɔlu wlan ɖɔ ablaxamu ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu kpewu izaki wa
xa eblee lɛ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ ablaxamu ɖɔ enyi emi setonu ɔ ganxixo yɔywɛ ɖe gudo azan ɖokpo gudo alo aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo gudo kpowun ɔ izaki wa a
ablaxamu tuun hwenu vi tɔn wa e a
e ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah izaki
nukunɖiɖo tɛ jɔbu ɖo
enyi ku ɔ eɖesu sixu sin yɔdo mɛ wa nɔ a
nugbo ɔ jɔbu ɖi nu ɖɔ jehovah ɖo azan ɖe flin emi
xa jɔbu
jɔbu tuun hwenu nu nyi do ɖo sɔgudo e a
e ɖo co e ɖeji ɖɔ mɛ da tɔn ɖo e kpewu flin ɛ wa
wusyɛn tɛ wɛnsagun ɖe do lanmɛ nu gbeyiɖɔ daniyɛli
daniyɛli lɔ nyi dawe ɖevo bɔ mi se xo do wu tɔn ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ
nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ e mawu kpo gbejininɔ kpo bɔ e nɔ gudo
e wa jɛ hweɖenu bɔ wɛnsagun ɖe do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu daniyɛli wanyinamɔ mawu tɔn ɖɔ nu bonu e kpan
akpa tɛ e do nu daniyɛli do sɔgudo tɔn wu
daniyɛli ɖibla ɖo xwe bɔ ku tɔn sɛya
e sixu ɖo tamɛ do nu sɔgudo hɛn ja e ji wɛ
enɛ ɖo wɛn
ðo vivɔnu wema daniyɛli tɔn tɔn ɔ mi xa ganjɛwu xo elɔ mawu ɖɔ e hwɛ daniyɛli ɔ nɔ gbeji yi fo ɖo vivo
daniyɛli yi zaanɖe nut
e do sɔgudo ɖe sin akpa
wɛn e do gbeyiɖɔ daniyɛli e vɔ ɖo finɛ a wa yi ajɔ towe ɖo vivɔnu
daniyɛli ku bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e gbɔjɛ
ɖɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e wa yi ajɔ tɔn ɖo sɔgudo e nyi wɛn ɖɔ e ɖɔ e ku bonu e lin gudo ɔ e wa sin ku
nu nyi ɖo vivɔnu
mata ɖɔhun ɔ sixu ɖeji do sin ku wu akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
nu ji mi ɖɔ xo do lɛ e ɖo kancica tawun xa xo mata ɖɔ nu jezu e gbɔn
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do din
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mata sin hwɛ jɔ bɔ e ɖeji ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu emitɔn lazaa ɖo sin ku mɛkuku lɛ tɔn hwenu ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn ɔ gbe
akpa e do nu daniyɛli e kpo ganjɛwu mata ɖo ɖo xosin e jezu e mɛ e kpo ɖo jiɖe klisanwun lɛ ɖo egbe
bɔ sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee mawu lɛ e ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ɖɔ sin ku tiin ɖo hweɖenu ɖo sɔgudo
eɖie e ɖɔ sin ku tiin e ɔ e lin e nuɖe vlafo ɖɔ nu nyi a
enyi ɔ enɛ hwɛjijɔ ɖevo wu mi ɖo nukun sin ku sin hwenu e mi mata ɖo nukun gbɔn e
hwetɛnu nu nyi
mi ɖɔ xo do nu enɛ lɛ ji ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
adamu gudo tɔn ɔ gbigbɔ nɔ mɛ e wɛ kɔ
ðɛhan ɔ ɖɔ e sixu do sin ku sin akpa ɖe lin cobo jɛnu gbɔn
ðɛhan jɛnu gbɔn
etɛ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ e jɛ ɖo sin ku linu ɖo fi ɖiɖe klisu tɔn hwenu
etɛ mi ɖo do nu taji mi ɖi nu lɛ e mɛ
etɛwu sin ku ɔ ɖo taji
nu e kanbyɔ ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ taji tɛ lɛ ji nuɖiɖi towe junjɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ji ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nyi ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo nuɖiɖi nu jezu klisu ku xɔ nu mi e
bɔ kpo awajijɛ kpo wɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖe ɖo nukɔn ja bɔ finɛ wɛ togun mawu tɔn nɔ ɖe sɔyi
ɖɔ ɖɔ sin ku nyi ɖokpo ɖo nu ɖi nu xɔ akwɛ nu hugan lɛ e mɛ a
mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe gege sin ku ɔ do ɖo nukplɔnmɛ taji ɖe nu mi tlɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo xo ɖaxo ɔ zlɛ nɔ sɔyi ɖo ayikungban ji ɔ nɛ
pɔlu nu wu sin ku ɔ ɖo taji nu nuɖiɖi mitɔn e enyi mɛkuku lɛ nɔ nugbo a hun klisu sin ku a nɛ
enyi klisu sin ku a ɔ e nyi axɔsu mitɔn a lobɔ nu mɛ wɛ mi ɖe do acɛkpikpa klisu tɔn wu e nyi nu yaya xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
mi tuun ɖɔ jezu sin ku
ðo mi do ganjɛwu enɛ wu wutu ɔ mi gbɔn vo nu jwifu ɖeɖee nyi saduseɛn nɔ do nujɔnu mɛ ɖɔ mɛkuku lɛ kun sixu o lɛ e
nu e tlɛ ɖo cica nu mi wɛ ɔ mi nɔ do nuɖiɖi mi ɖo ɖɔ sin ku tiin e wu mak
hwenu pɔlu ɖo xo ɖɔ do nukplɔnmɛ nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɖɔ xo do klisu wu lɛ e wu wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ kunkpla mɛkuku sin ku e lɔ xo
mɛ
nu tɛ lɛ e sixu kanbyɔ do sin ku wu
nu mɛ lɛ jɛ biblu ji ɔ gege yetɔn nɔ xa sin ku wa yi lɛ e sin ɖi lazaa tɔn
bɔ nɔ se ɖɔ ablaxamu jɔbu kpo daniyɛli kpo ɖeji ɖɔ mɛkuku lɛ wa ɖo sɔgudo
nu e kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ ganjɛwu ɖɔ sin ku sin akpa e do ɖo xwe mɔkpan ɖie alo ɖo xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɖie e jɛnu a ji ɔ xosin tɛ
biblu ɖɔ hwenu e mɛ sin ku e doo a
nu enɛ lɛ tuuntuun nɔ do nuɖiɖi nuɖiɖi mitɔn ji enɛ wu ɔ nu mi nu biblu ɖɔ do wu e
sin ku sin akpaxwe tɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do jɛ nukɔn
e bɔwu bɔ e ɖɔ e mɛ ku lin a e jaan mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee ku ɖo xwe mɔkpan ɖie alo ɖo xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɖie lɛ e ɔ nukunɖiɖo tiin ɖɔ e sin ku ɖo sɔgudo a
mi sixu ɖo ganjɛwu do akpa enɛ e do lin e wu ɖɔ mɛ ku lin a e kpo mɛ ku lin e kpo sin ku a
nugbo ɔ sin ku sin akpa e do ɖo xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɖie e ɖe jɛnu bɔ ɖi nu
sin ku tɛ wɛ
enɛ kunkpla nu ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe do sin ku sɔgudo tɔn wu e gbɔn
jezu ɖo ðɛhan ɔ sin jijɛnu mɛ gbɔn
ðɛhan mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ davidi wɛ wlan e ɖɔ xo do sin ku sin akpa e do lin e ɖe wu bɔ mi do
vosisa elɔ jehovah kɛnklɛn hwlɛn mi gan
ðɛhan ɔ sin ku wa jɛnu ɖo xwe gege gudo ɖo sɔgudo e ji gbɔn
lɛ mɛsiya ɔ akpaxwe ɔ
ba tɛ mɛ jwifu lɛ jezu yi jɛ
lɛ ee nyi sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ e mɛsiya ɔ
gudo wɛ do jezu kpowun alo wɛ ɖɔ e kun nyi klisu ɔ o kpowun a loɔ nu wa e nyla hu
jwifu gege jezu zyan va ɖɔ e ɖo hu luk
ɛɛn ɖo ku jezu tɔn mɛ
e jezu sin ku bɔ e huzu awinnya taji ɖo zwe ji e akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
jezu sixu huzu awinnya taji ɖo zwe ji e gbɔn
nu mɛ lɛ jezu hu ɔ e sixu huzu awinnya taji ɖo zwe ji e gbɔn
nu e ɛ sin ku wa ɔ jɛn nu sixu nyi
jezu ɖesu do lo ɖe do ɖe enɛ
ðebu lɔ a
jezu ɖe xo sin xo tɔn ɖo ðɛhan mɛ e mɛ do su nu lo ɔ luk
nu taji tɛ xo ðɛhan ɖɔ
xwe kanweko mɔkpan jɛ nukɔn ɔ ɖo ðɛhan mɛ e ɖɔ sin ku ɖe tiin
e mɛsiya ɔ hu e wa nyi awinnya taji ɖo zwe ji e
etɛ ðɛhan ɖɔ
etɛwu mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ ðɛhan sin jijɛnu kun kan davidi o
mi wemafɔ ɖevo sin ku ji e ɖe
davidi ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ emi kun ku gbeɖe o alo ɖɔ e kun emi do yɔdo kpaa tɔn mɛ o a
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ davidi kpo
bɔ etɛ ɖɔ wɛ ðɛhan ɖe
hwetɛnu ɖɔ xo do ðɛhan wu
e jo mi do nyi vi mɛ a e wlan ɖɛhan enɛ bɔ e blo xwe jɛji gudo bɔ jezu ku ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖe lɛ gudo e ɔ ɖɔ xo nu jwifu kpo mɛ wa huzu jwifu lɛ e kpo mɔkpan do ðɛhan wu
xa
ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛɖebu dɔn nu xa do xo e ɖɔ ɖɔ sin ku klisu tɔn ɔ wɛ davidi mɔ ɖɔ e wu a
ali tɛ ðɛhan tɔn jɛnu ɖe ganjɛwu tɛ e mi do sin ku sin akpa ɔ wu
xo do xo wu sɔgbe xa biblu do ahwan ɔ bɔ kudeji ɖɔ jezu wɛ mawu aklunɔ klisu
ɔ mɛ gege yi gbe ɖɔ ðɛhan jɛnu hwenu jezu sin ku e
nukɔnmɛ ɔ pɔlu dɔn ayi jwifu lɛ tɔn wa hwɛjijɔ titewungbe enɛ ɖokpo ɔ ji hwenu e ɖo xo ɖɔ nu wɛ ɖo toxo antyɔci tɔn mɛ ɖo pisidii e
xo e ɖɔ e jiwu nu bɔ ɖo mɔjɛmɛ hu xa
e ɖo jiwu nu mi lɔ ɖɔ biblu tɔn kunkpla sin ku jawe e nyi nu ɖe e tlɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖɔ din e ɔ e ɖo xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɔ nɛ
etɛ e sixu kanbyɔ do sin ku wu
ðo e do sin ku sin akpa ɔ bonu e blo xwe kanweko mɔkpan ɔ e nɔ wa jɛnu wutu ɔ e ɖo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
e ɖo co mɛɖe sixu kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ ðiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ ɖo nɔte nu xwe mɔkpan cobo mɔ ku e a
hwetɛnu sin ku ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe e jɛnu
jezu ɖɔ nu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nuɖe lɛ tiin bɔ kun tuun o kun sixu tuun o
tinmɛ ɖe lɛ tiin kunkpla hwenu kpo ganmɛ ɔ kpo bɔ ɔ to kpodo acɛ tɔn kpan
sin ku jezu tɔn gbɔn vo nu mɛ jɛ nukɔn lɛ e tɔn gbɔn
do mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu enɛ wu ɔ flin sin ku ɖeɖee xo biblu ɖɔ lɛ e
ee ɖo taji hugan e wɛ nyi jezu tɔn
nu e sin ku wɛ a ɔ mi mɛ ɖebu ɖo nukunɖiɖo mɔ mitɔn ku lɛ e a
wa ku bɔ cyɔ yetɔn gble ɖo yɔdo mɛ
jezu tɔn nyi a ɖo mawu klisu sin ku bɔ klisu ku a ɖo ku ɖo acɛ ɖo ji tɔn a
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ jezu nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn ɔ
e wɛ nyi mɛ ɖokpo gee e ɖɔ e sin ku do jixwe nyi nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe e a
jezu ganjɛwu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ xa emi ɖo jixwe
enɛ gudo ɔ sin ku do agbaza gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ klisu ɖɔhun
pɔlu ɖɔ mɛ ku lɛ e ɖe lɛ lɔ nɔ ɖo jixwe ɖɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ tɛn eɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ klisu wɛ jɛ nukɔn nu mɛ bi bɔ mɛ nyi etɔn lɛ bɔ do wu tɔn ɖo fi ɖiɖe tɔn hwenu nwt kɔ
etɛ hwenu e jɛ mɛ sin ku do jixwe ji e mi
e nɔ zaan din bɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ bɔ e sɔgbe xa biblu mɔ ɖɔ sin wɛ mi ɖo nɔ wɛ ɖo fi ɖiɖe jezu tɔn sin akpa e do e hwenu
fi ɖiɖe enɛ wa vivɔnu a bɔ nyanya elɔ sin vivɔ sɛya bi
mɛ yi do ɖe ɖe lɛ tɔn nyi gbɔn ɖo fi ɖiɖe klisu tɔn hwenu
biblu ɖɔ nu ɖevo lɛ nu mi do sin ku do jixwe ji mɛ ku lɛ xo wa nyi gbɔn ɔ mi jlo ɖɔ mɔ nu jɛ mɛ ceɖeceɖe
hwe ɔ su ɔ aklunɔ ɖesu jɛte sin jixwe bɔ e se mɛɖe ɖegbe kpo xosusu kpo bɔ mɛ ɖi nu nu klisu cobo ku lɛ jɛ nukɔn
enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ mi mɛ kpo ɖo hwenɛnu lɛ ɔ mawu ze mi kpo kpo zɛɛn yi ji ɖo mɛ bɔ mi yi kpe aklunɔ ɔ ɖo jɔhɔn mɛ bɔ enɛ ɔ mi nɔ xa aklunɔ ɔ hwebinu tɛ
sin ku do jixwe ɔ ɖo hweɖenu ɖo hwenu fi ɖiɖe klisu tɔn gudo e
mawu ze mɛ yi do ɖe ɖeɖee ɖo ɖo ɖaxo ɔ hwenu lɛ e yi ji ɖo mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee yi ji lɛ e ɖo ku a enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ dɔmanyi a
e huzu bi ɖo cɛju mɛ ɖo nukun xwixwe ɖokpo mɛ hwenu kpɛn gudogudo tɔn ɔ ɖɔ nu e kɔ
sin ku hugan e tɛ ɖo nukɔn ja
egbe ɔ klisanwun gege tiin nyi mɛ yi do ɖe a enɛ wu ɔ e ylɔ bonu xa klisu ɖo jixwe a
loɔ ɖo vivɔnu nyanya elɔ tɔn ɖo aklunɔ sin azan gbe
mɛɖebu sixu tuun vivɔnu ɔ sin hwenu tawun le a kunnuɖenu lɛ nyi wɛn ɖɔ e sɛkpɔ
tɛ enɛ gudo ɔ sin ku alɔkpa ɖevo tiin enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e mɛ lɛ wa do palaɖisi ayikungban ji tɔn ɖe mɛ
mɛ e sin ku lɛ e ɖo nukunɖiɖo huzu mɛ ku ɖe a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enɛ nyi sin ku hu ɖeɖee jɛ wa yi ɖo hwexonu bɔ e nyɔnu ɖe lɛ sin mɛ ku lɛ e nu bɔ mɛ enɛ lɛ wa ku ɖo nukɔnmɛ e ebl
hwenu biblu ɖo xo ɖɔ do sin ku do jixwe wu wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee gbɔn lɛ e ɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ tɛn eɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ
sunnu hwexonu tɔn ɖo nuwukpikpe nɔ nu lɛ e jɛ nukɔn bɔ e blo tuto nu togun mawu tɔn ɖo ɔ mɛ wɛ a
bɔ mɛ ɖeɖee jehovah a lɛ e
hwetɛnu
e hugan ɖɔ e nɔte nu lɛ nyi gbɔn e a ce
nukunɖiɖo tɛ ɖo do sin ku wu
din ɔ mi ɖo blo bɔ nuɖiɖi mi ɖo nu jehovah gbɔn jezu ji mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ mɛkuku lɛ ɖo flin emitɔn mɛ e syɛn
jaan jezu ɖɔ jehovah kpewu mɛkuku lɛ ɖɔ do ablaxamu izaki kpo jakɔbu kpo wu gbe ɖokpo ɖɔ mawu nukɔn ɔ bi wɛ ɖo
mɛ tɔn wɛ e felix fajardo
enyi yi mawuxo ɖɔ gbe hun lɛkɔ wa fi o
nu lɛkɔ wa ɔ afɔ towe lɛ
adan nu mi bɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn sin xwegbe e nɛ
azɔn nukɔntɔn jo nu lɛ do nyi gudo xwedo aklunɔ ɔ e nɛ
xwe kpowun wɛ ɖo hwenɛnu
nu enɛ jɛ gbɔn
nu ma tinmɛ nu
e ji mi ɖo juillet bɔ su ɖo gletoxo ɖe mɛ ɖo tokpɔn bulacan tɔn mɛ ɖo philippines
mi zan bɔkun e ɖe ɖo finɛ ɖo akwɛyozo ɖo nu gba wɛ hwe ɔ
winnyawinnya mɛ wɛ ɖe bɔ ahwan
ahwankpa japon tɔn ahwan philippines
ɖo gletoxo mitɔn jɛ gblolo tawun wutu ɔ ahwan ɔ wa nu do mi wu tlɔlɔ a
mi ɖo hladio televiziɔn kpo xojlawema ɖe kpo a enɛ wu ɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ sin wɛ mi nɔ se xo do ahwan ɖo yiyi wɛ e wu ɖe
nyi wɛ nyi vi wegɔ ɔ ɖo vi tantɔn lɛ ji e mɛ bɔ kpo kpo kpla mi hwenu ɖo xwe tantɔn e bɔ nɔ
katolika wɛ mi nɔ yi nɔ hwɛ nu sinsɛn ɖe a nɔ yi wema sinsɛn ɖevo tɔn tɔn nɔ ɛ lɛ e
flin ɖɔ e mi alɔnuwema securite kpo devoilees kpo ɖo tagalog gbe mɛ mi biblu ɖe
nɔ ɖu vivi biblu xixa tɔn ɖo taji ɔ wɛnɖagbe wema ɛnɛ lɛ
wiwa bɔ jlo xwedo jezu jaan
japon lɛ jo to ɔ do ɖo
hwenɛnu wɛ lɛ byɔ mi ɖɔ nyi lɛkɔ wa xwe
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ nyi yi enɛ wu ɔ yi
taan kpɛɖe ɖo enɛ gudo ɖo decembre ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn ɖe gosin angat wa ɖɔ mawuxo ɖo gletoxo mitɔn mɛ
lɛ yi a nyɛ yi
mɛ wɛ wa bɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ kan nu byɔ do biblu ji
ðo mɔ nu jɛ nu wu ɖɔ xo do wɛ ɖe lɛ e bi wu a wutu ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ yi xwe
hwenɛnu ɔ jɛ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe ji ji
ee jihan xoɖɛ gudo e ɔ e byɔ mɛ lɛ bi ɖɔ wa kple ɖe tɛnmɛ ɖo angat ɖo aklunɔzangbe bɔ e
mi mɛ gege ɖi zɔnlin nu kilomɛtlu tantɔn yi kple ɔ tɛnmɛ ɖo xwe xwedo cruz tɔn tɔn gbe
e jiwu nu mi ɖɔ yɔkpɔvu ɖo mɛ wa kple ɔ tɛnmɛ lɛ e mɛ e lɔ tlɛ nɔ xosin do nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ji
ee yi kple gege gudo e ɔ nɔvi damian santos nyi gbexosin mɛxomɔ ɖe nyi tokpɔnlagan e byɔ mi ɖɔ nyi xwe emitɔn gbe
mi zan hwenu gege ɖo zan enɛ mɛ do ɖɔ xo do biblu ji
ðo hwe enɛ ɔ gege mitɔn yawu yi nukɔn ɖo nugbo tɔn biblu tɔn lɛ kpinkplɔn mɛ
kple yɔywɛ ɖe lɛ gudo kpowun ɔ nɔvi lɛ kanbyɔ nyi kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖɔ jlo blo baptɛm a
yi gbe ɖɔ ɛɛn e jlo mi
mi yi tɔsisa sɛkpɔ finɛ e ɖe mɛ bɔ mi mɛ we blo baptɛm ɖo fevrier
mi mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ ɖo mi blo baptɛm nyi klisanwun wutu ɔ mi ɖo jla wɛn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ jezu ɖɔhun
nu enɛ wa wɛ ɖe e sin nukunmɛ a bɔ e ɖɔ kpo ɖo vu din ɖɔ mawuxo
ɔ e do mɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ huzu a
ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo ɖe akpa do nu mawu e
hwenɛnu wɛ adan xo ɖɔ ɖo e nu mi
e kanɖeji su ali do mi nu ɖɔ mawuxo ɖe o
bɔ enɛ wɛ bɔ jo nu lɛ do nyi gudo azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe
xwedo cruz tɔn ylɔ mi ɖɔ nyi wa nɔ akpa emitɔn ɖo angat
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nyi kpo vi nyɔnu yetɔn kpɛvi bi nɔ nyi nora e kpo ɖɔ mi gbexosin
mi mɛ we lɛ gbexosin ɖo
nora ɖo wa wɛ ɖo to ɖevo mɛ bɔ nyɛ kpo ɖo gudo nɔ nu ɔ wɛ ɖo angat
hwenu gbexosin ɔ blo xwe atɔn gudo e ɔ stewart ee nyi nɔvi sunnu ɖe gosin alaxɔ mɛ e xwle xoɖiɖɔ ɖe jɛji ɖo tokpletɛn angat tɔn
glɛnsigbe wɛ e do bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ sin xwe nu xo e ɖɔ e do tagalog gbe mɛ
nu ɖevo bɔ glɛnsigbe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ ɖe ɖo tagalog gbe mɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ wema enɛ lɛ gege do glɛnsigbe mɛ
mɛ ɔ yi nukɔn tawun ɖo glɛnsigbe mɛ tin xoɖiɖɔ enɛ mɛ wa wa ɖo hweɖevolɛnu
gbe gbe tin xoɖiɖɔ nɔvi stewart tɔn mɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nu agun xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖɔ alaxɔ ɖo nɔvi sunnu gbexosin we wɛ ɖo betɛli
nu wu wɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ hwenu lɛ yi tɔn sin xota nyi nukɔnyiyi yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn e ɖo etats unis e
nyi ɖokpo ɖo mɛ e ylɔ lɛ e mɛ
din ɔ jo fi ma mi e do yi ɖo betɛli
wa betɛli ɖo juin ɖe
betɛli ɔ ɖo ayikungban gblo tɔn nyi ɛtaa ɖokpo jɛji e ji bɔ xwe xoxo ɖe lobɔ atin ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ do
nɔvi sunnu tlɛnnɔ wɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo finɛ
zanzan tɛɛn ɔ nɔ ɖo adoxwɛsa
enɛ gudo ɔ sin gan tɛnnɛ mɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo avɔnyaxɔsa nɔ avɔ lɛ
nɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ ɖo hwelɛkɔ lɛ
hwenu lɛ tlɛ lɛkɔ sin akɔjɔkple tɔn ɔ gudo e ɔ kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli
ðo ɔ e vivi nu mi ɖɔ e ylɔ nyi kpo nɔvi sunnu ɖevo kpo sin philippines bonu mi yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn sin klasi ɔ
nu mi mɔ wa ɖo etats unis lɛ e gege nyi nu nyi jonɔ nu mi
nugbo ɔ nu lɛ gbɔn vo tawun nu nu tuun ɖo gletoxo mɛ lɛ e
nyi kpo lɛ kpo ɖo galadi
ði ɔ mi ɖo nu ma alɔ nu mi a lɛ e zinzan ɖi nunyamɔ kpo nu e nɔ zan do ɖa nu lɛ e kpo
ayi mɛ nɔ ci e lɔ gbɔn vo tawun
gbe ɖokpo zanzan ɔ sin xɔ mɛ mɔ bɔ fi bi we
azɔn nukɔntɔn mɔ laglasi linfin e nɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ wa mɔ ɖɔ gbɛmɛ fa fa
nu ɖo co huzuhuzu enɛ nuti ɖo ɖagbeɖagbe sin vivi ɖu wɛ ɖe ɖo galadi e kpa a
lɛ nɔ zan wlɛnwin nukplɔnmɛ tɔn ɖagbe lɛ
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ e mi ɖo galadi e mi bɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ee yi kunnuɖewema ɔ gudo e ɔ e ɖe nu mi ɖɔ ma wa gbexosin titewungbe sin nu taan ɖe ɖo bronx ɖo
mɛ ɔ ɖo juillet ɔ yi togun ɔ tɔn tɔn e blo ɖo tokpɔnlavi ɖokpo ɔ mɛ e
ðo ɔ gudo ɔ lɛkɔ yi ɖevo wa gbe ɖo philippines
nɔvi ɖo alaxɔ ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ din ɔ yi wa
enɛ hun ali nu mi bɔ afɔ do afɔdo aklunɔ ɔ tɔn mɛ ɖo eyɛ gbɔn to ɖo zɔ lɛ e kpo toxo ɖo zɔ lɛ e kpo mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ
e nu mi bonu ma kpe nukun do lɛdo ɖe wu finɛ wɛ nyi lucon sin gbe ɖaxo ɖe ji tɔtɛntinto klo hugan ɖo philippines e nɛ
tokpɔn bulacan tɔn nueva ecija tɔn tarlac tɔn kpo zambales tɔn kpo
nu yi toxo enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ ɖo xo sokan madre tɔn lɛ zlɛ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ yi gbe enɛ lɛ mɛ zinzɔn nɔ vivo ɖebu mɛ a
agun lɛ gege nyi agun kpɛvi e ɖo ayi lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ nu nɔvi lɛ bonu blo tuto kple lɛ kpo kunnuɖegbe tɔn kpo tɔn ganji ɔ e nɔ su nukun yetɔn mɛ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e mi do lɛdo ɖe mɛ bɔ kpe nukun do xa bicol tɔn ɔ bi wu
kanɖo ɖeɖee jɛ gblolo bɔ gbexosin titewungbe lɛ jɛ wa ji ɖo fi e mitɔn ɖe a lɛ e wɛ ɖo finɛ hugan
ðo xwe ɖokpo gbe ɔ adado ɖokpo gee ɖo finɛ e wɛ nyi do e fɔ kpo we nyi e
hwenu xa kpo lɛ ji e ɔ jɛ do ɔ mɛ bɔ nyi lɔ jɛ mɛ
e byɔ taan gege ɖo asi cobɔ wu sɔgbe nu zanzan nuɖuɖu ɔ
enɛ hwenu wɛ jɛ nora kpo nyi kpo gbexosin ɖo bulacan e flin ji
hwenɛnu ɔ e nyi gbexosin titewungbe ɖo toxo dumaguete tɔn mɛ bɔ yi ɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ mi wlan nu miɖee nu taan ɖe bɔ ɖo ɔ mi wli alɔ
aklunɔzan gbla nukɔntɔn bɔ do alɔwliwli mitɔn wu e mɛ wɛ mi yi agun ɖe ɖo tɔtɛntinto rapu rapu tɔn mɛ
finɛ ɔ mi ɖo fan so lɛ ɖi zɔnlin gege awajijɛ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ nyi kpo asi kpo wa nu nɔvi ɖeɖee ɖo xa jɛ gblolo lɛ e mɛ e
ee mi zan xwe ɛnɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ gudo e ɔ mi mɔ mɛylɔwema ɖe wa ɖo alaxɔ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ janvier wɛ nyi hwenu mi betɛli tɔn wu mi kpo ɖe din e e
ɖo xoɖiɖɔ ɖe xwle mɛ wɛ ɖo ɖe ji bɔ mɛɖe ɖo tintinmɛ do cebuano mɛ wɛ
ee ɖo betɛli e ɔ mawu do nu mi bɔ nukun do mɔ ali jiwu nugbo ɔ yi nukɔn ɖe ɖo philippines e
hwenu asi a wa betɛli azɔn nukɔntɔn e ɔ wɛ ɖo to ɔ bi mɛ
din ɔ jɛji wɛ ɖo philippines bɔ mɛ kanweko mɔkpan ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli lɛ e ɖo gudo nɔ nu ɖo taji e wɛ
ðo ɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo xwe lɛ vlamɛ wutu ɔ xɔ ɖo betɛli ɔ lɛ e wa kpe a
enɛ wu ɔ ɔ ɖɔ mi fi mi gba xwe klo hugan e ɖe ɖo e
wemazinxɔsa ɔ tɔn kpo nyi kpo gbɔn xwe ɖo alaxɔ ɔ kpa fi gege nɔ nɔ e gbe kanbyɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe jlo sa ayikungban tɔn vlafo a ji
ɖo xoɖiɖɔ nɔvi albert schroeder tɔn ɖe tinmɛ wɛ
gbe ɖokpo ɔ mi ɖo nukun tɔn ɖebu a bɔ ɖe kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ mi jlo xɔ ayikungban emitɔn a ji ɖo e jlo tɛn yi etats unis wutu
enɛ hun nu sin nu mi ɖɔ e jɛ a e ɖe
ɖevo wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi lɔ sa do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo do e lɛ e ɖɔ lɔ sa
mi tlɛ wa xɔ ayikungban nya ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ lɛ kun nɔ sa nu o e tɔn
ðo taan kpɛɖe gudo ɔ alaxɔ ɔ gblo hu e ɖe e azɔn atɔn jɛji
kudeji ɖɔ jehovah mawu wɛ jlo bɔ nu ci
nu mi lɛkɔ yi ɔ nyi wɛ nyi yɔkpɔvu hugan ɖo xwedo betɛli tɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ
din ɔ asi kpo nyi kpo wɛ nyi mɛ nyi mɛxo hugan lɛ e
jo jo nyiɖee do bɔ aklunɔ ɔ kpla mi yi fi ɖebu jlo e e nu mi ɖebu a
nugbo ɔ lɛ nya mi sin xwe yetɔn gbe jehovah mi xwedo ɖaxo mɛ lɛ ɖe e ɖe
xo nu kpɛvi ɖe lɔ a ɖo jehovah nɔ mi nu sin hudo mi ɖo e bi ɖo ɖebu e nu mi ɔ kɔn
nu enɛ lɛ jehovah nyi kpo nora kpo kpodo kpo e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun bɔ mi nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ lɔ jehovah
e wa nu gbɔn
ali ɖokpo ɔ lɛ ɖɔhun hun nu nyi lɔ bɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ayi bi kpo ɖɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ ba ɖu vivi nyɔna gege tɔn
kpo awajijɛ kpo wɛ kpo ɖo alɔ ɖo wɛ ɖo nukɔnyiyi nugbo ɔ tɔn mɛ ɖo philippines
jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖe wema enɛ lɛ wema enɛ lɛ tiin din a
cote wɛ nyi to nɔ gle hugan e ɔ wɛ e nɔ zan do blo cokolaa
ðo ninɔmɛ elɔ mɛ ɔ klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo ɖokpo ɖokpo sixu nu kunkpla xo enɛ lɛ e kpo nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ kpo
enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ wa gbeta bɔ ɖo ayixa ɖe ɖo mawu nukɔn e ɖe kɔn
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ gbeɖiɖe enɛ kan klisanwun lɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ asu kpo asi kpo ɖokpo ɖokpo wɛ wa gbeta nu zan do ɖo dogbo nu xwedo yetɔn gbɔn e tɔn kɔn alo ɖɔ hwenu ji vi do e
nu tɛ lɛ ji ɖo tamɛ do
klisanwun lɛ ɖo zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ do nu ɖebu zan do blo tuto hwenu ji vi do lɛ e tɔn
mɛ ɔ nyi alɔ nu wlɛnwin wa xoɖiɖe lɛ e
jlo do ɖe xo gba biblu tɔn ɖɔ xo do sisi ɖiɖo nu wu e
e hɛn ɔ e zan nu e nɔ do vikpo mɛ e a
mi ɖɔ xo do xo enɛ ji ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe wexwɛ tɔn mɛ
gege diu gbakpe bɔ e nɔ zan hwe enɛ e tɔn nyi nu alanɔ ɖe bɔ e nɔ do vikpo alo xomɛ do ali nu xo mimɔ
xota ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun tuun diu enɛ ɔ nɔ gbɔn e ganji o
mɛ tuun ɖo ali enɛ e gege ɖɔ ɖɔ diu ɔ nɔ blo bɔ nuɖe nɔ jɛ ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ ali nu afɔnasin sperme sunnu ɔ tɔn bonu e yi nyɔnu ɔ sin azin kɔn bonu spermatozoide tɔn lɛ ɖokpo byɔ mɛ o
enyi ɔ byɔ azin nyɔnu ɔ tɔn mɛ a ɔ sixu jɛ nyɔnu ɔ wu a
kunnuɖenu ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɔ sixu byɔ azin ɔ mɛ hweɖelɛnu
azin mɛ ɔ byɔ e sixu su ɖo kan mɛ azin ɔ nɔ gbɔn e jɛ mɛ alo e sixu yi vikpo ɔ mɛ
enyi diu ɔ kpo ɖo finɛ ɔ e sixu ali nu azin mɛ byɔ e bonu e yi fi e nɔ nɔ ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ e o bɔ e su xo nɔ su gbɔn e a
enyi e ɖo ɖe tɔn ɔ e ci xoɖiɖe ɖɔhun
sin hwenu xota enɛ ɖo e ɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖe lɛ tiin ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti linu alo ɖo nukɔnyiyi ɖe lɛ a
sin hwenɛnu ɔ diu alɔkpa we ɖevo tiin
ðokpo tiin bɔ e blo ganvɔ bɔ enɛ gbakpe ɖo etats unis ɖo
ɔ ɖevo ɖo bɔ enɛ nɔ tun sin ɖe
nu tɛ lɛ e tuun do diu alɔkpa we enɛ lɛ sin wu
ee wu ganvɔ ɖe e mi ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ e ci ɖɔ diu nɔ blo bɔ e nɔ vɛwu nu afɔnasin ɔ bɔ e xo vikpo ɔ zlɛ yi mɔ azin nyɔnu ɔ tɔn ɖɔhun
ɔ ganvɔ diu wu e blo ganvɔ ɖo e tɔn nɔ hu ɖo afɔnasin ɔ mɛ lɛ e
e ɖɔ ɖɔ diu enɛ nɔ huzu ada nu nu mɛ vi nɔ nɔ ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ e
ee nɔ tun sin alɔkpa ɖe e diu alɔkpa ɖe lɛ tiin ɖo sin alɔkpa ɖe bɔ e nɔ ci ee e nɔ mɔ ɖo ee e nɔ do ali nu xo mimɔ lɛ e mɛ e ɖɔhun
diu enɛ lɛ nɔ tun sin ɔ do vikpo ɔ mɛ
e ci ɖɔ diu alɔkpa enɛ nɔ hu azin nyɔnu ɖe lɛ tɔn ɖɔhun
enyi azin ɔ ɖo finɛ a ɔ sixu byɔ mɛ a
nu enɛ ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ sin ɖo diu enɛ lɛ mɛ e nɔ blo bɔ nu mɛ vi nɔ nɔ ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ e nɔ wun
e nɔ blo bɔ sin kpinkpɛn nɔ nɔ vikpoli ɔ e nɔ syɛn bɔ mɛ ɔ e nɔ su ali do afɔnasin ɔ bonu e gosin nyɔnuxwe ɔ mɛ byɔ vikpo ɔ mɛ o
nu vovo enɛ lɛ xo mi ɖɔ lɛ e yi xu ɖeɖee diu alanɔ ɔ nɔ wa e ji
mi ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ e ci ɖɔ diu alɔkpa we lɛ bi wɛ nɔ huzu ada nu nu mɛ vi nɔ nɔ ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ e
enyi azin nyɔnu ɔ tɔn wa bonu ɔ byɔ mɛ ɔ
e sixu byɔ vikpo ɔ mɛ kpewu yi fi e nɔ tawun ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ e a
enɛ bɔ xo ɔ su ɖebu cobo gble a
e ɖɔ e kun nɔ ya bonu e nɔ gɔn fi e nɔ ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ e e nɔ wa nyi gbɔn nu ɖeɖee e nɔ do ali nu xo mimɔ lɛ e gbɔn hweɖelɛnu e o
enɛ wu ɔ mɛɖebu sixu ɖɔ tɛ afɔ ji ɖɔ diu wu ganvɔ ɖe e alo ee nɔ tun sin e kun sixu gbeɖe bonu ɔ gɔn azin ɔ mɛ byɔ o a
e ɖo co kunnuɖenu ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti linu ɖɔ ɖo nu ɖeɖee xo mi ɖɔ wa yi lɛ e wutu ɔ e kun nɔ ya bonu e nɔ zan diu mɔhun lɛ mɔ xo o
klisanwun asu kpo asi kpo ɖo tamɛ do diu zinzan ji wɛ lɛ e sixu ɖɔ xo xa dotoo tuun ɖo ali enɛ e do diu ɖeɖee e nɔ zan ɖo xa yetɔn mɛ lɛ e le lɛ e kpo awovinu ɖeɖee nu nyɔnu ɔ lɛ e kpo ji
asu kpo asi kpo ɔ ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo jɛ dotoo ɔ ɖesu ji ɖɔ nu wa e nu a
mɛɖesunɔ sin xo wɛ
asu kpo asi kpo ɔ ɖesu wɛ wa gbeta yetɔn kɔn hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ emi hɛn xomɛ mawu tɔn hun ɖo ayixa ɖe ɖo nukɔn tɔn do timɔtee nwt timɔtee wu
wema nɔ ɖɔ nu do lanmɛ nɔ ganji wu ɖo angleterre e ɖe ɖɔ diu wu ganvɔ ɖe hugan e nɔ hugan ɖo kanweko ji
enɛ ɖɔ nu e ze nyɔnu ɖeɖee nɔ zan diu ɖe lɛ e ɖo ɔ e nɔ ya bonu mɛ ɖokpo mɔ xo ɖo xwe ɖokpo mɛ a
diu wu ganvɔ ɖe a lɛ e nɔ a
ðo diu ɖo sin alɔkpa ɖe e nɔ blo bɔ nu mɛ vi nɔ nɔ ɖo vikpo ɔ mɛ e nɔ wun wutu ɔ dotoo ɖe lɛ nɔ wlan nu nyɔnu asu alo ɖeɖee asu a bɔ glegbe jijɛ nɔ vɛwu lɛ e bonu e
e tuun nuwlanwlan lɛ tɔn
e mɔ ɖɔ nugbo wɛ tɔn
e ɖo nunywɛ nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ hwlɛngan e tɔn
etɛwu ɖe lɛ nɔ xo nu hwenu vi yetɔn lɛ jlo ze yeɖee jo nu mawu blo baptɛm e
biblu mɔkpan wɛ nɔ ze yeɖee jo nu jehovah nɔ blo baptɛm
nu klisanwun ɖe wɛ nu ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖo nukun ɖo hwenu vi sunnu alo vi nyɔnu towe blo baptɛm e wɛ do jaan wu
vlafo mɔ bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe lɛ blo baptɛm wa jɛ nu xo ji ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ nunywɛnu jɛn e nyi ɖɔ e zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ a ji mɛ ɖe lɛ tlɛ wa jo nugbo ɔ do lɔ
enɛ wu ɔ sixu xo nu ɖɔ vi emitɔn klisanwun wezun ɔ bɔ nukɔnmɛ ɔ e sixu wa ɖyɔ bɔ wanyiyi nukɔntɔn e ɖo nu nugbo ɔ e wa bu
sixu do gan bonu nu mɔhun wa jɛ o vi towe bonu e su mɔ hwlɛngan yi gbɔn
do mɔ xosin ɔ ɔ nu mi gbeje timɔtee tɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ mɛ timɔtee huzu klisanwun ɖe ɖe e yi nukplɔnmɛ klisanwun tɔn lɛ gbɔn
akpaxwe nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn atɔn tɛ lɛ wu wɛ pɔlu ɖe we xa timɔtee do
e ci ɖɔ ɖo hwenu pɔlu yi lisitli azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e wɛ timɔtee tuun sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn ɔ ɖɔhun
timɔtee sixu kpo ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ hwe ɔ cobo nɔ ze eɖee bi jo nu nu wɛ e ɖe e
xwe we gudo ɔ e huzu pɔlu tɔn
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ pɔlu kɛnu do nu elɔ lɛ wu nuwlanwlan lɛ tuuntuun kplɔnkplɔn mɔ ɖɔ nugbo wɛ nu e lɛ e nyi kpo nunywɛ nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ hwlɛngan gbɔn nu ɖi nu klisu jezu gblamɛ ɔ ɖiɖo kpo
hwenu ɖo nu vi towe lɛ wɛ e ɔ tɛ lɛ mɔ ɖɔ zan
ðo nyi klisanwun ɖe wutu ɔ ɖɔ vi towe tuun nuwlanwlan lɛ wɛ nyi akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e kpo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e kpo ɖo egbe
nu tlɛ nyi yɔkpɔvu tawun ɔ e sixu nuwukpikpe yetɔn nu tɔn kunkpla mɛ xo biblu ɖɔ lɛ e kpo lɛ kpo e
tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn ɖeɖee lɛ sixu zan vi yetɔn lɛ e
sixu tamɛ do ee ɖo gbe towe mɛ lɛ e ɖe lɛ ji
flin ɖɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e ji wɛ e ɖo do do sɔnu nu kancica syɛnsyɛn ɖe xa jehovah
etɛ nyi tinmɛ e mɔ ɖɔ nugbo wɛ e nyi tɔn
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ timɔtee mɔ ɖɔ nugbo wɛ nyi wɛnɖagbe kunkpla jezu e
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo nuwlanwlan lɛ mɛ e ɖo taji
timɔtee mɔ ɖɔ nu e emi lɛ e ɔ nugbo wɛ e nyi
ðo gbe dodo ɔ mɛ ɔ tinmɛ xogbe enɛ tɔn wɛ nyi e ganjɛwu alo e kudeji ɖeji ɖɔ nuɖe nyi nugbo
sin vu ɖokpoo wɛ timɔtee mɔ nu jɛ akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ
ɖo hweɖenu ɔ kunnuɖenu e xokple lɛ e ɛ ganjɛwu bɔ e kudeji ɖɔ jezu wɛ nyi mɛsiya ɔ
ðo ali ɖevo ɔ nu ji e ku do e so nu nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn
nugbo ɔ nu ji timɔtee ku do bɔ e kunkpla wɛnɖagbe ɔ lɛ e syɛn ɖesu bɔ e blo baptɛm huzu ahwanvu ɖe nu pɔlu ɖo ɔ mɛ
sixu vi towe lɛ bɔ kudeji ɖɔ nu ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e nyi nugbo gbɔn
e timɔtee gbɔn e ɔ sixu vi towe lɛ bɔ kudeji ɖɔ nugbo wɛ nyi nu ɖi nu lɛ e gbɔn
jɛ nukɔn ɔ nɔ ɖo suulu
ðo nyi ɖe wutu ɔ ɖo taji ɖe ɖo ali enɛ ɖo taji ɔ hwenu vi towe lɛ nɔ kan nu byɔ e
ðo ayi elɔ wu
klisanwun ɖe ɖɔ emi ɖo suulu ɖo hwenu e ɖo vi nyɔnu tɔn wɛ e gbɔn
mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo suulu mɔhun tɔn a
thomas nyi nu nyɔnuvi xwe mɛvi ɖe e ɖɔ vi nyɔnu nɔ kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee xo e nɔ ɖɔ e ɔ enɛ yɛkan mɛ wɛ jehovah gbɔn blo bɔ nu ɖo lɛ e do tiin a
alo etɛwu mi nɔ ɖo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ wa ɖo to ɔ mɛ lɛ e mɛ ɖi gan mɔ tɛn do nu lɛ bloɖo a
e ɖɔ ɔ e tuun nu gege do nugbo ɔ wu kpowun wɛ bɔ e ku do nugbo ɔ ji a
thomas gbɔn e ɔ nu kpinkplɔn mɛ nɔ byɔ suulu
thomas ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e ɖɔ xo ɖo azɔn mɔkpan nu taan ɖe
e ɖo zan mawuxowema ɔ do xo do xo wu xa vi nyɔnu tɔn bonu e do ku do nu wɛ e ɖe lɛ e ji
thomas ɖɔ hwenu mi jɛ nu taji lɛ ji e ɔ nyi kpo asi kpo nɔ jlo tuun nu vi nyɔnu mitɔn ɖi nu nu nu wɛ e ɖe e doo mɔ nu jɛ wu a ji
enyi e kan nu byɔ ɔ e nɔ tawun
nu ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ enyi e yi gbe nu nuɖe kpowun kan nu byɔ a ɔ nɔ hu mi
mi sixu nɔ nu sɔgbe xa xwe vi lɛ ɖo e kpo nuwukpikpe yetɔn kpo lɛ e
nu jɛ nu wɛ ɖe lɛ e ji ku do ji ɔ kpe nu wu hugan nɔ jɛhun do nu ɖi nu lɛ e ji ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ nukɔn jɛ yetɔn lɛ ji
ði ɔ vi towe lɛ sixu zan biblu do tin nu nɔ jɛ ɖo ku gudo e mɛ nu mɛ a
tinmɛ ɖo biblu ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ zawe nu a
xo mawu tɔn do ayi vi towe tɔn mɛ byɔ suulu gandido lɛ xɔ akwɛ
etɛ vi towe lɛ hugan
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ towe ɖo taji hwenu ɖo gan do wɛ bonu vi towe ku do nu ji e
stephanie ee nyi nɔ nu vi nyɔnu atɔn e tinmɛ ɖɔ sin hwenu vi lɛ kpo ɖo vu bi e wɛ nɔ kanbyɔ nyiɖee ɖɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo nu vi lɛ do nu wu kudeji ɖɔ jehovah tiin e wanyiyi tɔn kpo ali jlɔjlɔ tɔn lɛ kpo wu a
vi lɛ nɔ mɔ vaan ɖɔ yi wan nu jehovah degbedegbe a
etɛ nyi nunywɛ
etɛwu mi sixu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ e kun nyi xwe mɛɖe ɖo e kpowun wɛ bɔ e zin o
mi mɔ gbɔn e ɔ timɔtee ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ lɛ e ku do nu e ɖi nu lɛ e ji
etɛ ɖɔ wɛ pɔlu ɖe ɖɔ nuwlanwlan lɛ sixu bɔ timɔtee ɖo nunywɛ nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ hwlɛngan ɔ
etude perspicace des ecritures akpaxwe ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ nu e ɖɔ nunywɛ xo ɖo biblu mɛ ɔ nu elɔ lɛ nɔ nuwukpikpe ɔ zan nutuuntuun kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo do ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ kpa mɛ e nyi alɔ nu awovinu lɛ alo kpa nu e kpewu wli nu gbe nya wɛ e ɖe lɛ e alo ɖe we xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu wa
e nyi flijɛ xlojijɔ tɔn
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ yɔkpɔvu ɔ xlonɔnu wɛ e nɔ wa
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ nunywɛ nyi flijɛ xlojijɔ tɔn e sixu nyi kunnuɖenu ɖɔ mɛɖe zin e tɔn
nukɔnyiyi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ e nyi xwe wɛ nɔ a loɔ sisi mɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo nu jehovah e kpo gbesisɔmɛ e nɔ ɖe setonu nu gbeɖiɖe tɔn lɛ e kpo wɛ nɔ xa ðɛhan
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe sixu ɖɔ emi ɖo nunywɛ bɔ emi mɔ hwlɛngan e gbɔn
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee zin ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e ɔ jlo yetɔn lɛ alo kɔgbidinumɛ yetɔn lɛ tɔn nɔ bonu nɔ xo yi aɖisi nɔ xo yi amyɔ nɔ doya nu tɔjihun gbɔn e ɖɔhun a efɛ
e wa ɔ ɖo tuun nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ gbɔn nuwiwa yetɔn lɛ gblamɛ bɔ e ma wutu ɔ nɔ yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e ɖo dandan ɖɔ e ɖo nunywɛ alɔkpa enɛ co ba mɔ hwlɛngan xa nunywɛxo
sixu vi towe lɛ bɔ ɖo nunywɛ enɛ gbɔn
nu taji tɛ lɛ ji mɛ winnyawinnya ɖo linlin wɛ blo baptɛm e ɖe ɖo tamɛ do
sixu vi towe lɛ bɔ tamɛ do nyɔna ɖo tonusise nu mawu tɔn lɛ mɛ e ji gbɔn
e ɖo co e byɔ ɖo asi towe hu nu nyi nu ɖagbe e kpo nu nyi nu nyanya e kpo ɖiɖɔ nu vi towe
ɖo bɔ tamɛ do nukanbyɔ lehun lɛ ji etɛwu biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ e nyi alɔ nu nuwalɔ ɖeɖee sixu dɔn mɛ do jlo agbaza tɔn wiwa mɛ lɛ e
etɛ wɛ bɔ kudeji ɖɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ nyi nu ɖagbe hwebinu eza
e ɖo vi ɖo jlo blo baptɛm e ɖe bɔ e tamɛ do nu ɖevo ji e wɛ nyi nu e nɔ do klisanwun nyinyi nɔ byɔ lɛ e wu e
le tɛ lɛ wɛ
vɔsisa tɛ lɛ e nɔ byɔ
le lɛ zɛ vɔsisa lɛ wu flafla gbɔn
nu enɛ lɛ wɛ nyi nu ɖeɖee mɛɖe sixu mɔ ɖo baptɛm tɔn gudo e
enɛ wu ɔ nu ɖagbe tawun wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e tamɛ do nu mɔhun lɛ ji cobo ɖe afɔ taji enɛ
nu vi blo baptɛm e ɖe sin nuɖiɖi jɛ xixo ji ɔ etɛ lɛ ɖo gbeje
nu ɖo baptɛm vi sunnu towe alo vi nyɔnu towe tɔn gudo ɔ e jɛ nu xo do nuɖe lɛ wu ji ɔ
nu ɖe wɛ nu hun tuun ɖɔ emi nɔ ɖeɖɛ mɔhun lɛ gbɔn e wɛ bɔ vi sunnu alo vi nyɔnu towe wa gbeta ɔ kɔn yi wan nu nuɖiɖi towe hugan alo ɖo wu zɔ
kanɖeji nu xo enɛ dɔn adɔn wa hwi kpo vi towe kpo tɛntin o nu e kpo ɖo vu alo e nyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɔ nɛ
nu gbe nya e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ gudo nu vi towe kpo wanyiyi kpo ɛ bonu e kpa ɛ
enyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe ɖo nu xo wɛ ɔ lɛ sixu ɛ gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya blo baptɛm e ɖe do nujɔnu mɛ ze eɖee jo nu jehovah
e do akpa enɛ mɛ ɖɔ emi yi wan nu mawu jlo tɔn wiwa ɖo hu nu ɖevo ɖebu xa
nɔ flin nu mɔhun vi towe ɖo hwenu e jɛxa do e wa kpo kpo
cobonu wa hun zan tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn sɔnu nu lɛ e ganji
wiwa sixu hun ali nu bɔ le do mɛɖee zize jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm nyi nujɔnu ɖo nyɔna lɛ e ji
ði ɔ sixu mɔ weɖexamɛ zan lɛ e ɖo les jeunes reponses pratiques akpaxwe ɔ sin xota ɖevo lɛ ee ɖo vivɔnu wema ɔ tɔn nɔ nyi les parents e glɔ
e ɖɔ yawu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya towe sinsɛn towe o
ðo ninɔmɛ gege mɛ ɔ hwɛjijɔ tawun ɖe nɔ tiin
hwɛjijɔ ɖevo lɛ sixu nyi mɛɖokponɔ ninɔ alo e sixu ɖɔ klisanwun winnyawinnya ɖevo lɛ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
xota ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ wu ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ enɛ lɛ kun kan dodonu ji nu ɖi nu lɛ e jinjɔn e ɖe o
ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee sixu bɔ mawu sinsɛn vɛwu e hwe bi ɔ ɖo din lɛ e wɛ hwɛjijɔ enɛ lɛ kan hugan
enɛ gudo ɔ xota ɔ gege do klisanwun ɖe sixu mɛ winnyawinnya tɔn sin nuɖiɖi ɖo xixo wɛ e gbɔn e wu
lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ ɖo nunywɛ nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ hwlɛngan e gbɔn
mi mɔ gbɔn wa yi e ɔ enɛ byɔ ɖɔ e nu biblu ɖɔ lɛ e kpowun a loɔ e bonu ku do nu wɛ ɖe lɛ e ji
nu ji ku do lɛ e ɖo syɛn tawun ɖo enɛ wɛ bɔ ze yeɖee jo nu jehovah ɛ kpo ayi bi kpo
xo jehovah tɔn gbigbɔ tɔn kpo gan do wɛ ɖe vi towe lɛ e kpo bonu ɖo nunywɛ nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ hwlɛngan e
nu kpinkplɔn tɔn etɛ biblu mɛ tawun
tɔn lɛ nyi ɖagbe lɛ sixu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kpo mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo bɔ mɔ nu jɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ tin mɛ
e sixu mɔ do gbe gege mɛ ɖo jw org ji yi ji do flansegbe mɛ zin bible et vous outils bible
nɔ setonu gbɔn tɛgbɛ e ɔ nɔ wa kpo xɛsi kpo kpodo kpan nu hwlɛngan mitɔn nyi hwlɛngan kpikpe fili
baptɛm nyi afɔ taji ɖe co etɛwu e ɖo ɖi xɛsi alo hɔn a
sixu wa nu hwlɛngan hwiɖesu tɔn gbɔn
etɛwu hwiɖee ze jo nu jehovah e xɔ akwɛ nu
etɛwu baptɛm nyi afɔ taji ɖe bɔ e ɖo ɖe
xwewu xwewu ɔ biblu donu mɔkpan nɔ blo baptɛm
enyi hun e jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa
etɛwu e ɖo ɖi xɛsi do mɛɖee zize jo nu jehovah wu alo hɔn a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ baptɛm nɔ hun ali nu nyɔna gege e byɔ
ðo ali tɛ
ðo baptɛm towe sin azan gbe ɔ xosin ɛɛn nu nukanbyɔ elɔ sɔgbe kpodo vɔsisa jezu klisu tɔn kpo ɔ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ towe lɛ gudo ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah wa jlo tɔn a
baptɛm towe ze ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah e akpa ɖe wɛ bɔ do do nujɔnu mɛ ɖɔ emi yi wan nu jehovah bɔ jlo tɔn wiwa jɛ nukɔn nu nu bi ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ
enyi akpa ɖe a
e wa nu wɛ a
hwiɖee do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah nyi nuɖe bonu wa nyi do gbeɖe a
mɛ ɖo jehovah glɔ a e ɖo sataan sin acɛ mɛ
hwlɛngan towe wɛ mya nukun nu awovi a
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ enyi nɔ ahwan tɔn mɛ jehovah nyi e xo mavɔmavɔ kpo ɔ e vivi tawun
nyɔna tɛ lɛ hwiɖee zize jo nu jehovah nɔ hɛn wa
gudo ninɔ nu jehovah ci a tamɛ do nyɔna ɖeɖee mɔ ɖo ze hwiɖee jo blo baptɛm wu e ji
din ze towe jo nu jehovah e ɔ sixu ɖɔ kpo jiɖiɖe ɖaxo kpo hu tɔn ɖɔ jehovah ɖo ji ɖi xɛsi a
etɛ sixu wa nu mi
sixu ɖo wujɔmɛ ɖaxo ɖevo hugan ɖo gbɛmɛ hu ɖɔ nɔ ahwan mawu tɔn mɛ bonu nu towe nukun tɔn mɛ a
ali tɛ mɛɖee zize jo nu jehovah nyi mɛɖesunɔ sin xo ɖe
tɛ lɛ nyi mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kɛɖɛ tɔn a
ðo blo baptɛm nyi klisanwun ɖe wutu ɔ kancica ɖo xa jehovah e nyi xwedo sin nuɖokan ɖe kabi ayikungban ɖe bɔ ɖu gu tɔn a
e wa ɔ hwiɖesu lɔ mɛ wɛ hwlɛngan towe ɖe din enyi kpo ɖo towe lɛ lɔ mɛ ɔ nɛ
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ e flin enɛ
ðo sixu tuun mɛ wa gbɔn din ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e hwebinu a
ði ɔ enyi blo baptɛm hwenu xwe towe ɖo jɛ vlamɛ e ɔ linlin lɛ kpo kɔgbidinumɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo wa nu hwenu ɖo winnyawinnya xwe lɛ xo zlɛ wɛ e
vi nyɔnu ɖo xwe e tinmɛ xo enɛ gbɔn le nu e gatoo jijizan sin xwe tɔn vi ɖe ɖo wemaxɔmɛ a ɖo e nyi jehovah tɔn wutu ɔ e ya bonu e a
ɖo xwe yɔywɛ ɖe lɛ gudo hwenu jlo xoɖoxamɛ tɔn wa syɛn hugan e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e kudeji hugan ɖɔ tonusise nu jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ nyi nu ɖagbe hugan ji e do hwebinu e
mɛxo ɖeɖee blo baptɛm lɛ e gege nɔ wa mɔ bɔ nu ɖo nukun a lɛ e nɔ nuɖiɖi yetɔn
mɛtɛnkpɔn mɔhun lɛ sixu nyi alɔwliwli tɔn lanmɛ nɔ ganji tɔn alo tɔn
ali tɛ ze ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah e nyi hwenu do e kɛɖɛ xo a ɖe
etɛ filipunu lɛ sixu
bonu nɔ gbeji ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ ɔ flin ɖɔ emi do akpa nu jehovah ɖɔ gbɔn ɖebu ɔ emi ɛ
enɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn ɖɔ enyi emitɔn lɛ kpo emitɔn lɛ kpo ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ a ɔ emilɛ kpo ðɛh
ðo ninɔmɛ lɛ bi mɛ ɔ sixu hlɔnhlɔn ɖo jehovah zan sɔgbe xa ze ze hwiɖee jo e xa filipunu lɛ
etɛ nyi tinmɛ nu hwlɛngan hwiɖesunɔ tɔn kpo xɛsi kpo kpodo kpan tɔn
jehovah ɖɔ nyi emitɔn
tɔn nyinyi sɔyi kpo nu hwlɛngan hwiɖesunɔ tɔn kpo byɔ gandido
enɛ wu wɛ filipunu lɛ ɖɔ nɔ wa kpo xɛsi kpo kpodo kpan nu hwlɛngan mitɔn nyi hwlɛngan kpikpe
xo enɛ lɛ ɖɔ ɖo gbeje lebe nu kancica ɖo hwi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gbɔn e nɔ gbeji nu tlɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖebu mɔ wɛ ɔ nɛ
sixu ɖeji do hwiɖee wu din a
mɛ tlɛ mawu nu xwe gege lɛ e ɖe lɛ tlɛ wa zɛ gbe
enɛ wu ɔ afɔ tɛ lɛ sixu ɖe nu hwlɛngan hwiɖesunɔ tɔn
etɛ nukplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn byɔ etɛwu e nyi nu taji
zunzun xa jehovah nɔ byɔ e ɖoto e ɖɔ xo
biblu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn wɛ nyi ali taji mi nɔ ɖoto jehovah ɖe e
enɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ gbɔn xo mawu tɔn kpo wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ xixa tamɛ do ji kpo gblamɛ
ee ɖo wa wɛ e ɔ flin ɖɔ biblu kpinkplɔn enɛ kun nyi wemaxɔmɛ sin nukplɔnkplɔn ɖe kpowun o
e ɖo ci ɖɔ ɖo nu do tamɛ wɛ mɔ tɛn do din nu tɛnkpɔn wemaxɔmɛ tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun a
nukplɔnkplɔn nɔ hɛn le wa e ci tomɛyiyi hwenu sixu do nu nu mɔ jijɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ e ɖɔhun
enɛ bɔ sɛkpɔ mawu bɔ e lɔ sɛkpɔ ja
tɛ lɛ ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn kɔn
tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn ɖe lɛ mi do bonu ɖu le tuto nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɖagbe ɖe tɔn
ði ɔ bible e nɔ mɔ ɖo adolescents glɔ ɖo jw org ji e sixu bɔ nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ ɖo biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ
ðo jw org ji ɔ nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn etɛ biblu mɛ tawun
sixu mɔ nu ɖevo lɛ ɖo xota les jeunes
ɖo reveillez vous
avril tɔn mɛ e mɛ
nukplɔnkplɔn kpo tamɛ linlin kpo nɔ wa nu taji ɖe ɖo do hwlɛngan towe takunmɛ mɛ xa ðɛhan
etɛwu ɖɛxixo nyi nu taji nu mɛ blo baptɛm nyi klisanwun e ɖe
nukplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn wɛ nyi ali mi nɔ ɖoto jehovah ɖe e ɖokpo bɔ ɖɛxixo nyi ali mi nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖe e
klisanwun ɖe ɖo ɖɛxixo do mɔ nu e blo tɔn tɔn kpowun e a jɛn ɖɛxixo nyi taɖagbe sin bo bɔ e ɖo taɖagbe bɔ gan do wɛ e ɖe ɖo ali ɖe lɛ e kpa mɛ a e nɛ
e wa ɔ xoɖiɖɔ do nujɔnu mɛ xa mitɔn wɛ e nyi
jehovah jlo ɖoto xa filipunu lɛ
enyi ɖo alɔkpa ɖe ɖo wɛ ɔ weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn nunywɛ kpe ɖo ali enɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu linlin towe do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah ðɛh
ganjɛwu doo ɖɔ enɛ a
nɔvi mitɔn livi mɔkpan sixu jiɖe ɖɔ enɛ emi
e sixu hwi lɔ
etɛwu ɖo nɔ doku nu jehovah hwebinu
ðɛxixo nɔ hun ali nu bɔ wa nu zɛ alɔdo byɔbyɔ jehovah wu
biblu ɖɔ tuun nu mawu wa nu ɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ tagba mitɔn lɛ sixu gba ayi do nu mi bɔ mi wɔn nyɔna tobutobu mi mɔ lɛ e
ɖo xwe blo baptɛm hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah jɛxa ku mi nɔ do lɛ e hu mɛ ɖevo ɖebu ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ
mi ɖo doku hwenu ali tɔn hun lɛ e bi ɖo nu e mi lɛ e wu
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ tamɛ do hwiɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ ɖagbewiwa jehovah tɔn gbɔn e ji
axɔsu davidi hwexonu tɔn mawu hwlɛn sin mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛnsyɛn gege mɛ e ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ do mɛ jehovah e e
ðɛh wemafɔ enɛ nu mɛɖesunɔ mɔ e xɔ akwɛ gbɔn e
hwenu nɔ xa biblu kpo wema mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔ yi kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ e ɔ nɔ se wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ xo lɛ do mawu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ nɔ gbeji gbɔn e wu
ee ɖo wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ hwiɖesunɔ ɖo ayi jehovah ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ gbɔn e wu
hwiɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ ɖagbewiwa jehovah tɔn gbɔn
klisanwun lɛ bi ɖagbewiwa jehovah tɔn ɖo ali ɖe enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mawu ylɔ bɔ sɛkpɔ e kpo vi tɔn kpo
jezu ɖɔ enyi mi do ɔ dɔn mɛɖe wa nu mi a ɔ e sixu wa a
jaan mɔ ɖɔ xo enɛ lɛ ɖu a
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe sixu ɖɔ jehovah dɔn lɛ bɔ nyɛ ɖo gudo kpowun wɛ
hwenu hwiɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm e ɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo wujɔmɛ ɔ ɖo kancica ɖe xa ɛ
din ɔ e wa tuun tawun
biblu jiɖe mi ɖɔ mɛ yi wan nu mawu ɔ mawu tuun kɔ
nɔ hwebinu bonu tɛn mɛ ɖe ɖo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ e xɔ akwɛ nu su nukun towe mɛ
ɔ sixu bɔ nuɖiɖi towe syɛn gbɔn
ali ɖevo sixu ɖagbewiwa jehovah tɔn ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo ayi e nɔ nɔ gudo nu gbɔn hwenu ɖo nu ɖi nu lɛ e ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e wu
sixu wa enɛ ɖo kunnuɖegbe kpo wemaxɔmɛ kpo
vlafo sixu tuun nu wu wɛ e tuun yi wɛn ɔ gbɔn e a
etɛ sixu
nukɔntɔn ɔ tamɛ do nu wu ku do nu ɖi nu lɛ e ji e wu
nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɖo jw org ji lɛ e ɖo gbe towe mɛ a
enyi ganjɛwu a hun zan hwenu kije e sɔnu nu enɛ lɛ bonu nu tamɛ do nu ɖi nu lɛ e nu wu ɖi nu nu e kpo sixu tin mɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e kpo ji
etɛ sixu bɔ ɖu ɖo nu nɔ xo nɔ ɖɔ xo do nuɖiɖi towe lɛ wu a e ji
enyi tlɛ sɔnu ɔ e sixu wa jɛ bɔ xo nu do nu ɖi nu lɛ e ɖiɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖo xwe blo baptɛm hwenu e ɖo xwe e yi gbe nu xo enɛ ɖɔ tuun nu ɖi nu e hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ vɛwu nu mi bɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ e
e ɖi xwi xa enɛ gbɔn
e ɖɔ nɔ kpowun nɔ din a
lɛ nɔ ɖɔ nu nɔ wa lɛ e faa kpowun
enɛ wu ɔ ɖɔ nu lehun ɖe hwenu ɖo biblu wɛ ɖo azan ɖe ɔ wu enɛ gudo ɔ nɔ gbɛkan do xo ɖɔ wɛ ɖe e
ee ɖo wa wɛ e ɔ e wa bɔwu nu mi bi
bɔ nukɔnmɛ ɔ nɔ vo ganji
linlin nɔ ɖo do nuɖiɖi towe wu e sixu bɔ ɖɔ xo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
ee ɖo sisi ɖo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ bɔ nu yetɔn ɖo ayi mɛ ɖu nu wɛ e ɔ e wa bɔkun nu hugan bɔ ɖoto
olivia ɖo xwe blo baptɛm hwenu xwe tɔn ɖo jɛ vlamɛ e ɖɔ ɔ xɛsi nɔ ɖi mi hwebinu ɖɔ enyi dɔn biblu do ɖe mɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ mi do mɔ mawuvi kɔxee
enɛ gudo ɔ e nɔ nu gbɔn a
olivia nɔ ayi do xɛsi tɔn ji a e wa ɔ e tamɛ gbɔn le mɛ winnyawinnya gege tuun nu ɖebu do jehovah tɔn lɛ wu a
midɛɛ lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi nɔ mɔ e
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn e wɛ sixu ɖɔ yi wɛn ɔ gbɔn e
nu nyi ɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ mi kun nɔ go ɖo mɛ mi nyi e wutu o
tlɛ sixu wɛn mitɔn ɖo mi ku do nu ɖɔ wɛ mi ɖe e ji a wutu
etɛ lɛ nu hwlɛngan towe byɔ
mi mɔ gbɔn e ɔ nu hwlɛngan mɛtɔn nyi nu taji ɖe
nu ɖeɖee e byɔ lɛ e ɖe lɛ wɛ nyi xo mawu tɔn xixa kpo tamɛ linlin kpo ɖɛxixo jehovah kpo tamɛ linlin do ali ɖeɖee e do nu hwiɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ ɖe e ji kpo
enɛ wa bɔ tin nu ɖi nu lɛ e mɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ xa ðɛhan
etɛwu gan nɔ do do hwlɛngan towe tamɛ e xɔ akwɛ
jezu ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe jlo xwedo mi hun jo tito eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ do ɖiɖa yatin tɔn xwedo mi
e nɔ hun ali nu nyɔna gege din bɔ mɔ mavɔmavɔ ɖo mawu tɔn mɛ
enyi ee tɛn sin jɔtɛn yetɔn lɛ e ɖo alɔ do vi yetɔn lɛ wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ etɛwu ɖo gbeje gbe xo ɔ ganji
vi lɛ sixu gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖo wemaxɔmɛ kpo fi ɖe e kpo
enyi vi ɖe se gbe hu ɖokpo ɔ e sixu hɛn le wa
lɛ ɖo ɖɔ agun nɔ do gbe xa ɔ mɛ tɔn e ɖe alo agun nɔ do jonɔgbe e ɖe yiyi wɛ mɛ winnyawinnya yetɔn lɛ bɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nugbo ɔ tɔn hugan yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a ji
etɛ do gesi wɛ xogbe elɔ lɛ ɔ ɖe hwenu jezu kanbyɔ ɖɔ yi wan nu mi hu elɔ lɛ a
e
e ci ɖɔ hwevi e wli do nu mɛ bɔ ɖo akpa yetɔn finɛ lɛ e alo ɔ do gesi wɛ jezu ɖe ɖɔhun
ðo ku jezu tɔn gudo ɔ lɛkɔ yi tɔn xoxo ɔ kɔn e wɛ nyi hwehuhu
klisanwun lɛ ɖo tɛn mɛ yetɔn ɖe ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ e wex
nugbo ɔ ablaxamu tɔn wɛ nyi sala
e blo bɔ e bɔkun nu wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ bonu tuun wekwin kpɛvi ɖo kpo fifonu xokwin lɛ tɔn e kpo ɖo vo nu xokwin dodo ebleegbe tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e e
du monde nouveau avec notes et references lɔ zan wlɛnwin mɔhun ɖo tinmɛ ɖo do lɛ e mɛ wex
ðe lɛ ɖie mawu nɔ do mɔ nu
xɔ akwɛ hugan nuɖokan lɛ
mi nɔ ɖo sisi nu ayixa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn jlo ze ɖagbe
matie ayi ɖo jozɛfu ji ɖɔ xo do e wa nu gbɔn hwenu e se ɖɔ ɖo xo e wɛn wɛnsagun ɔ do e ɖɔ e hɔn yi ejipu e kpodo kɔ e wa sin ɖo nukɔnmɛ e kpo wu
luki ayi tɔn ɖo ji hugan ɖi ɔ e ɖɔ xo do yi elizabɛti e kpo wa nu gbɔn hwenu jezu ci tɛmpli mɛ e kpo wu wex
tinmɛ xokwin kpo xogbe kpo e zan ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e tɔn ɖyɔ ɖo xwe lɛ gblamɛ
nukɔnyiyi toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn wa nu do gbe e nɔ do kpaa lɛ e wu
mi ɖo wɛnsagun ɖe wɛ a
jezu ɖɔ do ahwanvu tɔn lɛ wu ɖɔ wɛnsagun yetɔn lɛ ɖo jixwe ɖo mawu nukɔn
wanyiyi alɔkpa tɛ nyi ɖaxo hugan ɔ
ðo wanyiyi junjɔn nugbododo lɛ ji wutu ɔ e wɛ nyi wanyiyi ɖaxo hugan ɔ
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ e keya nu mɛ ya wu do mɛ
ðu ðo hun xo do ayi towe tamɛ wɛ ðe e ji juil
yi gbe nu nunina ðaxo hugan mawu tɔn a
ali ðebu nɔ gble din alo lin din a australie fev
awajijɛ e nɔ mɔ ðo gbɛzan bɔkun e ɖe zinzan mɛ e mai
huzu sɔgbe xa agun towe ɔ nov
hwetɛnu mi blo ðevo
mexico aout
kanɖodonuwu kpo wanyiyi kpo hu tɔn ɖaxo tɔn mai
mɛ nɔ nu mɛ ɔ e nu bɔ e nunina nov
klisanwun tɔn sin nuwiwa ðokpo oct
ze yeɖee jo ðo turquie juil
ze yeɖee jo kpo jlo kpo nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ lɛ jan
aniwu matie kpo luki kpo kpi do gbɛzan jezu tɔn wu e gbɔn vovo
