dec
didɛ ðo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ nɔ kɔ do nyɔna lɛ mɛ
mi ðu le mawu tɔn tɔn ðo ali gege
fev
nu jehovah byɔ e wiwa nɔ hɛn nyɔna lɛ wa
matthews oct
jo nu lɛ do nyi gudo xwedo aklunɔ ɔ
fajardo dec
kudeji nyi klisu tɔn ðe
psarras avril
mɔ nyɔna ðo xa sunnu zin ðo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e wutu
sinclair
zɔnlin ði xa lɛ e ðo le nu mi
hwenu ɖe ðo kuzɔn jɛ wɛ e
jozɛfu alimateenu ɔ oct
nu zɛ mɛ lɛ ci ðo wexo e wu juin
gayiwusi nɔvi tɔn lɛ gbɔn e mai
mawu do nu ayi ðo e abigayilu juin
mawu ylɔ ɛ ðɔ axɔvi sala
nu biblu ðɔ do kpo ku kpo wu e
nu tɔn mawu nukunmɛ henɔci
oct
nyikɔ biblu tɔn ɖe ðo hwexonu tɔn ɖe ji mars
we pɔlu ðe xa mɛ ðɔ e ma sun tɔjihun o ðo tomɛyiyi ɖe hwenu e mɛ
mimɔ
ðo gbesisɔmɛ ðo suulu nɔte a
nɔ hɔn yi su jehovah a
nov
akpa do ɔ
alɔdido jonɔ lɛ nu jehovah kpo xomɛhunhun kpo mai
alɔdido vi jonɔ lɛ tɔn mai
sixu kpo ðo ji ðo mɛtɛnkpɔn hwenu jan
yi wan nu mi hu elɔ lɛ a
ðeji do jehovah wu nɔ wa ðagbe jan
ði nu wa nu kpo nunywɛ kpo
e
blo bonu nu wa lɛ bi nyi wiwa juil
etɛ lɛ wa yi hwenu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wa e
hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi aout
linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ nov
gbɛxixɔ ɔ nunamɛ nu vɔ e ɖe sin mawu fev
ɔ bi tɔn nɔ wa nu jlɔjlɔ hwebinu avril
jehovah nɔ do gbɔ nu mi ðo mɛtɛnkpɔn mitɔn lɛ bi mɛ juin
mi ðe xoxo ɔ nyi ayi ɛ do zɔ nu miɖee gbɔn e aout
mi ɔ do ðe nyi ayi a gbɔn e aout
linlin jehovah tɔn jɛ
fev
lɔn nu nu ðebu xo ajɔ ɔ yi sin asi towe o nov
mawuxo ɔ
ðo hlɔnhlɔn
ðo ali togun mawu tɔn wɛ ðo egbe
fev
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ emi wa nu hwlɛngan mitɔn dec
kpa jah
etɛwu juil
nɔ ðɔhwɛ jlɔjlɔ nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ jehovah ðɔhun nov
nɔ gudo nu jehovah nyi e juin
nɔ avi xa mɛ ðo avi wɛ lɛ juil
nu wu jlɛjininɔ kpo ðo taji e jan
nugbo ɔ hɛn fifa wa a loɔ hwi wɛ e hɛn wa oct
nu linlin mɛɖee zize jo tɔn towe kpa nu jehovah
jehovah kpo ayi towe bi kpo
ayi towe ðo xo ðaxo ðo atɛ ji e ji juin
nu enɛ lɛ do asi nu mɛ wu e ðeji do lɛ e jan
sɔnu nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe
ðo nukun ðo mawu wɛ dec
tuun ðɔ e dec
wli nu mɛ e jɛxa ðɔ e wli e mars
xo mawu mitɔn ðɔ ɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi
yi wan titewungbe nu mɛ ðo nuwiwa lɛ mɛ oct
nu e ɖo alɔkpa ɖevo mɛ a ɔ wemafɔ e ɖe do wema elɔ mɛ lɛ e gosin biblu fɔngbe tɔn mawuxowema mɛ bɔ mi wlan ɖo alɔkpa mɛ e nɔ wlan nu gbɔn ɖo egbe e
biblu tɔn lɛ ðo taji egbe wɛ a
nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn lɛ nunywɛ hwebinu tɔn lɛ
e ca wɛ a alo e jɛ nukɔn
gbavi
biblu nɔ bɔ e nɔ nyi alɔ nu tagba lɛ
biblu nɔ bɔ e nɔ ðeɖɛ tagba lɛ
biblu nɔ bɔ e nɔ dɛ ðo tagba lɛ
biblu kpo sɔgudo towe kpo
nu tobutobu tiin ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti sin egbe tɔn mɛ lɛ e bɔ biblu ɔ doxo bɔ e sixu zan a wɛ a
nu e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɔ mawu wɛ bi do ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ ɖo le timɔtee
atɔxwɛ elɔ ɖɔ xo do biblu sixu ali mi ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn sin akpaxwe lɛ bi mɛ gbɔn e ji
eo wɛ mɛðe lɛ ðɔ
dotoo ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ biblu tɔn lɛ xwixwedo ɖo egbe ci wema jɛ vlamɛ tɔn lɛ zinzan do nu mɛ ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti linu ɖɔhun
mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu biblu a e ɖe tlɛ sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ hwi xwedo xoxo ɖe tɔn do zan e ɖe a ji
ðo xogbe ɖevo mɛ ɔ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ biblu ɔ ca tawun
etɛwu mɛɖe zan xoxo mɔhun ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti sin egbe tɔn mɛ
e ɖɔ ɔ tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn kpaa kpo mɛɖesunɔ tɔn maxamaxa lɛ kpo wɛ nɔ ɖo weɖexamɛ kpo lɛ kpo wɛ hwebinu
tuto televiziɔn ji tɔn lɛ nɔ xwle weɖexamɛ akɔwe lɛ lɛ kpo wema lɛ kpo tɔn mɛ hwɛhwɛ
bɔ xwe nɔ zin wema lɛ e nɔ ɖe e geze gbɔn e sin wema maxamaxa bɔ enɛ nɔ do glɔ nu dɔkun jijɛ sin gege
nu tobutobu e nɔ ɖo cɛju ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ e nɛ bɔ etɛwu e yi alɔdo biblu nyi wema ɖe bɔ e wlan fo sin xwe ɖie e tɔn
mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu biblu a lɛ e sin hwɛ jɔ ɖɔ wema mɔhun zinzan ci nunywɛ xwitixwiti sin wema ca e alo tɔn xoxo ɖe zinzan ɖɔhun a ce
nu e ɖɔ nugbo ɔ nujlɛdonuwu enɛ sɔgbe a
nunywɛ xwitixwiti nɔ yawu huzu nu nyi e huzu a
mɛ lɛ kpo ɖo blo gbɔn bɔ yetɔn ɖo e ɖo awajijɛ nɔ ayijayi mɛ gbɔn e ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖo xwedo mɛ gbɔn e kpo ɖo ɖagbe lɛ gbɔn e kpo wɛ
biblu ɔ doxo co e kɛnu do hudo enɛ lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo wu
e ɖɔ ɖɔ mitɔn wɛ emi gosin
e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ali mi ɖo akpaxwe gbɛzan mitɔn tɔn lɛ bi mɛ mi nuwukpikpe bonu mi ɖi xwi xa tagba ɖebu e wa jonɔ mi e
timɔtee hu ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ weɖexamɛ emitɔn lɛ nɔ zan hwebinu le kun nɔ ca gbeɖe o
biblu ɔ ɖesunɔ ɖɔ mawuxo ɔ ɖo eblee lɛ
nu enɛ lɛ e biblu ɖɔ e sixu nyi nugbo doo a
e ca wɛ a alo e wɛ nyi wema zan hu bi e wema gbɛɖe ɔ
linlin atɔxwɛ elɔ tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ e bonu mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi nukɔntɔn ɖo bunɔ ɖeɖee e bɔ lɛ e mɛ
do nukun mɛ ɖisa yi nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn ɖe ɖo hwexonu sin nu e fɔ lɛ e wɛ wa xweyigbe
nu lɛ gege ɖo do ca ɖu
ðe lɛ tlɛ wɔ ɖo fi ɖe lɛ
ɖokpo kpo ɖo bute e blo ɖo e kpo ɖo gbɔn fi bi
ɔ ɖɔ eo eyɛ ɖi xwi xa jɔhɔn kpo ji syɛn hugan lɛ e kpo
boya e kpaca tawun bɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ e do blo
ðo ali ɖe ɔ biblu ci nu hwexonu tɔn nukunɖeji enɛ ɖɔhun
wema xoxo ɖe wɛ e ɖibla doxo hu wema lɛ bi
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ wema xoxo ɖevo lɛ tiin
ɖi nu xoxo hwexonu tɔn ɖu lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ gege gble tawun ɖo taan blo e wutu
ði ɔ nu ɖɔ do nunywɛ xwitixwiti wu lɛ e wa huzu ɖo kunnuɖenu e mɔ agaɖanu din lɛ e wu
e wa ɖo wɛn ɖɔ we nɔ ɖe xa mɛ do lanmɛ nɔ ganji wu lɛ e wa nyanya nu mɛ hu ɖɔ wa ɖagbe nu mɛ
bɔ nu ɖe kpo nu wema hwexonu tɔn lɛ gege a akpaxwe yetɔn gege wɛ bu alo gble bi
biblu ɔ gbɔn vo nu bi
xwe hu din bɔ e jɛ wlanwlan ji co biblu ɔ kpo ɖo bute
enyi e tlɛ ahwan biblu ɔ azɔn gege nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e do e hu ɖo fi ɖe lɛ ɔ nu e ɖɔ lɛ e ɖyɔ a
sixu nɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn lɛ sixu zan ɖo egbe doo a
do mɔ xosin ɔ hun kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ tagba syɛnsyɛn tɛ lɛ mɔ wɛ lɛ ɖe ɖo egbe
ðetɛ lɛ nyla hugan
nu nu mɛ nɔ jɛ tagba nu fifa do tiin lɛ ɖo e ylɔ ɖɔ mawu vi
matie enyi kpewu hun gbɔn alɔkpa bi mɛ kpewu gbɔn e nɔ fifa mɛ xa lɛ bi hlɔmanu lɛ
nublawukunumɛ hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ
nu nu mɛ nɔ ku nublawu nu nɔzo yetɔn lɛ e ɖo e ku nublawu nu
matie nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ enyi mɛɖe wa nu nyi do nu mɛɖe ɖo mɛ hweɖebunu hun nɔ kɛ miɖee
ɖo nɔ hwɛ kɛ miɖee aklunɔ kɛ e ɖɔhun kolosinu lɛ
ɖokpo gee ji wɛ mawu ɖo togun lɛ bi gbɔn ma kpe ayikungban ɔ bi sese ji
loɔ ɖo akɔta ɖebu mɛ ɔ mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nɔ xwedo hwɛjijɔ ɔ mɛ enɛ sin nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ
mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn ɔ mɛ bonu e nɔ nɔ kpe nukun
wan nu kpo nublibliwiwa kpo
miɖee do wu ɖo nu ɖo nu gbɔn ɖebu ɔ jɔ ɔ ɖo dɔkun tɔn lɛ mɛ a
luki e se agalilɛ xo nublibliwiwa abi sin xo ɖo tɛntin mitɔn o ɖo mɛɖeɖovo mawu tɔn wɛ nyi efɛzinu lɛ
nugboðiðɔ
mi ɖo jlo nɔ zan ɖagbe alo nɔ ɖɔ nugbo nwt ɖo nu bi mɛ
eblee lɛ mɛ nɔ jɛ ajo ɔ jo ajo do wa efɛzinu lɛ
alɔdido mɛ ðo hudo mɛ lɛ e ðo taji
nɔ akɔnkpinkpan mɛ nɔ gbawu do mɛ mɛ a lɛ nɔ alɔ nu mɛ ɖo gan a lɛ nɔ ɖo suulu do mɛ bi wu
e nyi wɛ biblu jijɔ enɛ lɛ kpowun a
e mi nugbododo mɔhun lɛ xɔ akwɛ e kpo mi zan ɖo gbɛzinzan mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo
enyi mɛ lɛ nɔ xwedo nukplɔnmɛ xo mi ɖɔ wa yi lɛ e wɛ ɔ tagba syɛnsyɛn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖekpo tawun a ce
hun nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ zan wa do ganmɛ tawun ɖo egbe
le tɛ nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn lɛ sixu hɛn wa nu ɖo din
nya ɖo nunywɛ hu lɛ bi e ɖɔ gbe ɖokpo ɖɔ nunywɛ mawu tɔn ɖe hwɛjijɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn gbɔn nuwiwa tɔn lɛ mɛ
matie nugbo wɛ a ce
nu nɔ ɖe nunywɛ nugbo e wɛ nyi nu mɛ zinzan tɔn nɔ kɔ do e
sixu nɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ enyi biblu zan nugbo ɔ e hɛn huzuhuzu lɛ wa gbɛzan mɛ a ce
sixu zan do ɖeɖɛ tagba ɖi xwi xa wɛ ɖe din lɛ e gbɔn
tamɛ do elɔ ji
gbɛzan tɔn tawun jɛmɛ
ajijimɛ ɔ awe ɖebɔdoɖewu lɛ xo e
vi tɔn ɖyɔvi ɔ ku
alɔwliwli tɔn kija
akwɛzinkan tɔn
e flin ɖɔ mɛ nyi e bu do mi ɖo vi asu alo xwe a
wa mɔ xo elɔ lɛ nyi nugbo e ceɖeceɖe mitɔn nɔte ɖo xwe kanɖe gban mɛ wu ɖe ganji lɛ tɔn nyi xwe kanwe
nɔ mɔ nuɖe zɛ tagba kpo kpo wu a ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn nɔ wa yi blewun bɔ mi nɔ zɔn xɛ ɖido ku ðɛhan
ðo taan vɛwu enɛ mɛ ɔ mɔ alɔdo ɖo biblu mɛ
nu biblu wa e jiwu tawun
xota atɔn bɔ lɛ e gbɔn e ɔ mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ mɔ ɖɔ biblu emi hwenu emi xwedo tɔn lɛ do ɖeɖɛ tagba emitɔn lɛ e
nu ɖevo wɛ e do blo biblu ɔ wutu wɛ nu nyi a
linlin mawu tɔn lɛ wɛ nyi lɛ tɔn a wutu wɛ a tɛsalonikinu lɛ
vlafo hwiɖesu mɔ ɖɔ hwegli bɔ tagba mɛ
enyi tagba lɛ jlo hugan ɔ fitɛ nɔ mɔ gbɔdonumɛ alɔdo kpo weɖexamɛ lɛ kpo ɖe
mi gbeje ali taji biblu sixu zan ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ ɖe e atɔn
e sixu blo nu elɔ lɛ gbɔn e
nyi alɔ nu tagba lɛ ɖo fi e blo ɖe e
ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ hwenu e
xota bɔ lɛ e ɖɔ xo do nu atɔn enɛ lɛ wu
ðo xota elɔ kpo atɔn bɔ lɛ e kpo mɛ ɔ e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɖe lɛ
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ weɖexamɛ emitɔn lɛ gosin mawu nu e do nu mɛ do ɖe mɛ do ali ji do ɖe nuwanyido lɛ
timɔtee nugbo jɛn wɛ a
tamɛ do nunywɛ biblu tɔn mɛ lɛ gbɔn bɔ gbɛmɛ tagba syɛnsyɛn ɖe lɛ ma wa kpa zinkpo ɖo yetɔn a gbɔn e ji
xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ e mɔ ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ nɔ emi bɔ emi nɔ ahan mu
biblu ahan nunu ɖo ji a e ɖɔ do ahannumunɔ sin o
nunywɛxo ahan syɛnsyɛn zinzan nyi do nɔ wa nu gege do agbaza wu nɔ hɛn kancica ɖagbe ɖo mɛ lɛ tɛntin e gble nɔ bɔ livi mɔkpan nɔ ku fyan xwe xwewu xwewu
enyi mɛ lɛ nɔ xwedo weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn nunywɛ kpe lɛ e ɔ sixu nyi alɔ nu tagba enɛ lɛ gege
blo
din ɔ e ɖɔ wa mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ ahan nunu kun ɖo lɛ ɖekpo wɛ o
zan nunywɛ ɖo filipunu lɛ mɛ e e ɖɔ hu do nu ɖebu wu o loɔ xoɖɛ byɔ nu hudo lɛ mawu
zan ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ nu adohu adohu kpo kpo vunbla mi ɔ nɔ savo nu jehovah
nɔ ɖɔ xomɛ jɛ nɔ ɖo mi e nu nu mi e kpo flu flu e kpo ji nɔ savo ɖɔ e mi nu mɔ nyiɖee mɛ
nu ayi hɔn ɔ nɔ kudeji ɖɔ jo enɛ lɛ bi do
aca enɛ bɔ nɔ ayi ɖo nu ɖo e ji hu nu ɖo a e
wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ ahan ɖe kun jɛ gbeɖe o
nublibliwiwa ɖo nu ɖeɖee nɔ bɔ e nɔ mɔ nɔ flu lɛ e mɛ
nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu tagba mɔhun lɛ e ɖɔ xo do nu ɖeɖee nɔ bɔ e nɔ wa nublibli lɛ e wu ɖi alɔlwɛ sɔgbe a e ɖuɖu kpo fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn kpinkpɔn kpo
alɔlwɛ ɖuɖu xa mɛɖe bɔwu tawun wɛ dɔnkpɛvu nɔ nyi samuel e ɖɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nyɔnu ɔ sin nu wɛ nɔ jɛji nu mi dandan a sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ nu nyɛtɔn jɛ eyɛ tɔn ji enɛ nɔ bɔ e sixu ɖu alɔlwɛ do
samuel mɔ ɖɔ e nɔ dohwɛ emi hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ emi nɔ ɖu alɔlwɛ xa mɛ hwenu emi tlɛ ɖo linlin tɔn a e enɛ wu ɔ e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi gbɔ ɖu alɔlwɛ ɔ nujɔnu tɔn
aca enɛ ɖo
e ɖɔ din ɖɔ aca nyanya ɖe wɛ ɖo e nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo cejɛnnabi sin walɔ lɛ
e tamɛ do nunywɛxo ji e ɖɔ enyi vi ɖe ɖo walɔ ɖe lɛ zan wɛ ɔ e nɔ tuun vi alɔkpa e nyi e e ɖo ɖagbe jlɔjlɔ zan wɛ kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ e nɔ tuun
enɛ ɛ gbɔn
samuel wu ɖɔ alɔlwɛ emi nɔ ɖu e kun nyi walɔ ɖe o kun lɛ sɔgbe o
e ɖɔ din ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya nɔ ɖo alɔlwɛ ɖu wɛ e nɔ ɖo jijɔ ɖeɖee nɔ bɔ e mɔ nɔ wa nyi asu ɖagbe alo asi ɖagbe a lɛ e
jɛ tamɛ do nu ci nu asi wa hwenu e mɔ bɔ ɖo alɔlwɛ ɖu xa nyɔnu ɖevo wɛ e ji
enɛ bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ aca enɛ kun wa ɖagbe nu mi o
wu e bɔ e wɛ bɔ e sɔgbe a
samuel huzu jijɔ
alɔlwɛ ɖuɖu e nyi alɔ e ɛ bɔ e nɔ zɔ nu nublibliwiwa
antonio sin ninɔmɛ nyla tawun ɖo nublibliwiwa linu e huzu kannumɔ nu fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn kpinkpɔn
e wli alɔ xa nyɔnu e yi wan e ɖe co e nɔ jo eɖee do nu aca enɛ hwɛhwɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ tamɛ linlin do ji emi tawun
antonio ɖɔ fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn do mi ɖo elɔ mɛ bɔ ɖiɖe mɔhun lɛ sixu ci ayi mɛ nu mɛ
wemafɔ enɛ mi bɔ tamɛ do mɛ tɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ nɔ gosin lɛ e wu
ɖo nɔ yawu flin ɖɔ awovi wɛ fɔtoo nublibliwiwa tɔn lɛ gosin
din ɔ tuun ɖɔ jehovah jɛn sixu mi bɔ ɖo ayi nyiɖee ba do ɖi xwi xa ahwan enɛ e linlin ayi kpo alɔwliwli kpo e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ biblu tawun tawun sixu mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ e
tagba ɖeɖee ɖo finɛ gbigbɔ lɛ e
nu mi xo mawu tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi ɖeɖɛ tagba vɛwu mɔhun lɛ gbɔn e
biblu tɔn zan lɛ e sixu mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu tagba ɖe lɛ
gbɛmɛ tagba ɖe lɛ nɔ gbigbɔ nɔ xɔ xwe gege hweɖelɛnu sixu do ɖɔ do bi cobɔ mi wa wu
biblu nunywɛ e zan do ɖeɖɛ tagba mɔhun lɛ nɔ nu mɛ nɔ gbigbɔ lɛ e a
tamɛ do ɖe lɛ ji
rosie ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖe gbɔn ɖo linlin mɛ e nɔ nyla hu ɖe gbɔn nugbo nugbo e bɔ nɔ hu mi do wu hwɛhwɛ
wemafɔ biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ ɛ
ðokpo wɛ nyi matie sɔ ja ɔ o ɖo sɔ ja ɔ wa kpodo tagba eɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
tagba ɖokpo ɖokpo hɛn wa ɔ kpe nu enɛ ɔ
din ɔ rosie ɖɔ ɖɔ xo jezu tɔn enɛ lɛ emi bɔ kun nɔ hu emi do nu sixu jɛ ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e wu o
yasmine mɔ ɖɔ wa hugan emi
nɔ azan we ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo mɛ bɔ amlɔ nɔ glo mi ɖo zan ɖe lɛ mɛ
wemafɔ tɛ ɛ
e kɛnu do wu e ɖɔ nu ɖo nyi nu wɛ lɛ bi sin agban ɖo ji mawu tɔn ɖo e ɖo nukun kpe do wu wɛ
yasmine ɖɔ hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ ɖokan do ɖɛxixo jehovah wu bɔ e se ɖɛ lɛ
e ci ɖɔ e ɖe agban kpinkpɛn ɖe sin nu mi wɛ ɖɔhun
nyɔnu nɔ nyi isabella e ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo na na mɛ ɔ gu tɔn wɛ ɖu ɖo nu lɔ nɔ wa e nɛ
nɔ nu nu nyi nu taji lɛ e nɔ gbɔjɛ alo ɖo televiziɔn wɛ
aca nyanya ɖe wɛ ɖo e nɔ bɔ e nɔ wa ɖo adohu adohu ji nɔ kpe nukun do ɔ wu nɔ wa ganji a
nugbododo ɛ e ɖo timɔtee mɛ e ɖɔ do gan hwiɖee jo nu mawu nyi mɛ e jɛxa ɖɔ mawu sixu ɖe gbe e nyi winnya hu do e wa lɛ wu a e
isabella ɖɔ jlo ɖɔ winnya hu jehovah do wu ɖo ɖo na na mɛ kpowun wutu a
e wa kpewu yi nukɔn tawun
nɔ nɔ amlɔ bɔ nɔ hu mi tawun
nu enɛ wa ɖagbe ɖebu nu mi a
nunywɛxo kelsey wemafɔ enɛ ɖɔ ayiɖotenanɔ nɔ tamɛ cobo nɔ wa nu loɔ xlonɔ ɔ gugu tɔn wɛ e nɔ ɖo agban
e tinmɛ nu tamɛ linlin do wemafɔ enɛ ji ɛ e nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e wa nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ to e wa ɔ gbɔn e jɛ nukɔn
asu mi jo vi ɛnɛ do akɔn nu mi wɛ kirsten ɖɔ
nugbododo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn tɛ ɛ
nunywɛxo ɖɔ hwebinu e nɔ ɖo nɔvi bɔ e do alɔ mɛ adangbomɛ hwenu
kirsten alɔdo mɛ nɔ jehovah eɖɔhun lɛ e tɔn
alɔdo tɛ e mɔ
nɔvi lɛ mi ɖo ali gege
mɛɖe lɛ atin lɛ kpo folowa lɛ kpo nu mi ɖo hɔn
azɔn atɔn wɛ kpɛvi ɖe nyi kpo vi lɛ kpo bɔ mi tɛn sin xwe ɖe gbe jɛ ɖevo gbe
mɛ ɖokpo mi bɔ mɔ
xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e lɔ ɖi xwi xa mɛɖokponɔ ninɔ
ee awe lɛ bi xo e gudo e ɔ e flin ɖɔ nɔ mɔ bɔ mɛ lɛ bi nɔ ɖo awajijɛ mɛ ɖo nyɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo nyiɖokponɔ nɔ flu bi
wemafɔ ɖeɖee ɛ lɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ðɛhan mawu wɛ nɔ hɛnnu mɛ ɖo mɛɖe a lɛ
e tinmɛ ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ tinmɛ wemafɔ enɛ tɔn kun nyi ɖɔ ɖo xwe ɖe din o
e wa ɔ wa mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ mawu nɔ mi xwe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ayijayi sin tɛn ɖe wɛ bɔ e nɔ do ɖagbe xa mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu jehovah lɛ e ɖo finɛ
tuun ɖɔ ɖo kpo jehovah kpo cobo kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo
hun ðɛhan mi ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ do ɖo nu vivi nu hu nu bi e enɛ ɔ e nu ɖo hun mɛ nu lɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ nu ɖeɖee sin vivi sixu ɖu xa mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu jehovah nyi ɖɔhun lɛ e ba do do xa
nɔ myɔ nukun do nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ
jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖi xwi xa tagba lɛ mɛ bi ɖɔhun
biblu nɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ bɔ nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ hweɖebunu e blo e
nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ sixu mɛ ɖo tagba ɖeɖee e sixu ɖeɖɛ din a lɛ e ɖi azɔn jɛmagbɔ kpo aluwɛ kpo mɛ a
weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan sixu bɔ mɔ ɖeɖee lɛ e
tagba ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e sixu nyi alɔ nu alo ɖeɖɛ din a
ði ɔ enyi towe ɖe ku alo azɔn jɛmagbɔ ɖe ɔ sixu wa nu ɖe zɛ dɛ ɖo towe lɛ gbɔn e wu a
biblu sixu ɖo ninɔmɛ baɖabaɖa mɔhun lɛ mɛ a
ɖɔ ɖu azɔn ɖe sin gu bɔ nɔ mɔ syɛnsyɛn hwebinu
bi
nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ tawun e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ kpewu nɔ ayi tɔn ɖo biblu kplɔnkplɔn kpo gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ kpo ji a
xo jezu ɖɔ ɖo matie mɛ e ɛ tawun e ɖɔ mawu kpe nu bi wu
wa mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ ali gege wɛ e sixu nu ɖe
ðo tɔn lɛ nɔ bɔ nuxixa nɔ vɛwu hweɖelɛnu tawun wutu ɔ e jɛ biblu kpo wema jinjɔn biblu ji e xa do kan ji lɛ e kpo ɖoto ji
enyi wu ku ɖo e sixu kpewu wa nu e nɔ wa lɛ e a wutu ɔ xo ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e nɔ do gbɔ e ɖɔ nu e jlo ɖagbe do nu mɛ ɔ nu ɖo mɛ si ɔ wɛ mawu nɔ nɔ yi nunina enɛ enyi nu ɖo mɛ si a ɔ wɛ e nɔ a
xo enɛ lɛ flin ɖɔ nu e wa lɛ e su mawu nukunmɛ ɖo e wa nu ninɔmɛ tɔn tɛn ɖɔ e wa lɛ e bi
xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e flin ɖɔ hwenu vi nyɔnu xwe mɛvi ɔ ku gudo e ɔ ɔ syɛn bɔ tuun nu a
nu lɛ ci ɖe gbɔn e a
e ɖo co xo ɖo ðɛhan mɛ lɛ e do gbɔ ɔ ɖɔ ɖo finɛ ɖɔ enyi nu gege ɖo hun mɛ nu mi ɔ gbɔ nɔ do nu mi e wɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mi
e ɖɔ xoɖɛ jehovah ɖɔ e mi bonu mɔ nu ɖeɖee wa bɔ lɛ ɖekpo lɛ e
e eɖee jo nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e eɖee do sinmɛnɔ vi lɛ nɔ sa do mɛ e wu tlɛ ɔ e nɔ kpo ɖo zan do sa nu do mɛ wɛ
ɖokpo ɔ nu gble do e co e mɔ ɖɔ emi sixu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
e flin ɖɔ wa wu ɖɔ enyi zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ kpo linlin biblu tɔn lɛ kpo do do gbɔ nu mɛ nɔ biblu xa lɛ e ɔ jehovah nɔ do gbɔ nu nyiɖesu
e mɛ ɖeɖee gbɔn aluwɛ syɛnsyɛn mɛ bɔ biblu ɖɔ xo yetɔn lɛ e do wema ji
e mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ biblu xixa jɛn sixu mɛ bɔ e dɛ
nukunɖiɖo ɖo mɛ e do gbɔ e ɖɔ mawu wa mɛ ɖagbe lɛ kpodo mɛ nyanya lɛ kpo sin ku
ku e kudeji ɖɔ jehovah vi nyɔnu tɔn e syɛn sɔ
ɖɔ nɔ mɔ vi ɖo sɔgudo
azan gbe mɔ ɛ e ɖo sunzanwema tɔn ji
nɔ mɔ mi mɛ we lɛ ɖo jikpa mitɔn mɛ mɔ ɛ yi wan gbɔn gbe gbe ji e ɖɔhun
xoyidokanji mɔhun lɛ gege ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn jw org ji
biblu sixu bɔ mɔ gbɔdonumɛ ɖo hwenu tlɛ nyla hu bi lɛ e mɛ
xosin biblu tɔn ɖo wɛn
e ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖo xa mɛ nɔ suxo ylɔ ɛ lɛ bi mɛ nɔ ylɔ ɛ kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo lɛ
ðɛhan nu enɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ a ce
e ɖo co mawu se ɖɛ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ tɔn nugbo nugbo lɛ e tɔn gbɔn
hwɛhwɛ ɔ tagba lɛ nɔ gbɔjɔ kanmɛ nu mi ɖo agbaza lixo nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e lixo kpo gbigbɔ lixo kpo
nunywɛxo jehovah nɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖevo mɛ nu cikɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ kpe e
ezayii pɔlu dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛnsyɛn lɛ e ɖɔ mɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi ɔ wɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ sixu kpe nu enɛ lɛ bi wu
filipunu lɛ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn hlɔnhlɔn pɔlu
hwi lɔ sixu byɔ mawu ɖɔ e gbigbɔ luki
enyi ɖo hudo alɔdo tɔn do sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ zan ɔ
ahwanvu jaki wlan ɖɔ enyi nunywɛ hwedo mɛɖe ɖo mimɛ hun byɔ mawu nu e ɛ ɖo mawu nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ bi kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
jaki sixu wa nu sɔgbe xa ɖɛ towe lɛ gbɔn biblu xixa kpo nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ zinzan kpo gblamɛ
jaki enyi ɖo wa wɛ ɔ hwiɖesunɔ mɔ nunywɛ ɖo weɖexamɛ tɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn e
gbɔn fifa nina mi gblamɛ
filipunu lɛ byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e fifa
enyi tagba towe lɛ yawu fo a ɔ
yawu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ mawu wɔn emi o
enyi tagba towe lɛ gbigbɔ ɔ mawu sixu akɔnkpinkpan kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo bɔ dɛ
kɔlɛntinu lɛ biblu ɖɔ hwenu wa su bɔ e ɖeɖɛ tagba mitɔn lɛ bi
mi ðɔ ɖɔ ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wɛ zan xwete ɖo ablu gɔngɔn mɛ
hwe yi xɔ xoxo co hu a ɖo ganji e ɖe ɖo alɔ towe mɛ wutu
hwenu ta do asa mɛ e ɔ mɔ nu jɛ nu ɖo nukɔn towe zaan lɛ e bi wu
bɔ hwenu ta do zɔ e ɔ e xo ablu ɔ zlɛ yi fi linlin
ðo ali ɖe lɛ ɔ biblu ci mɔhun ɖɔhun
mi mɔ gbɔn ɖo xota wa yi lɛ e mɛ e ɔ xo mawu tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa tagba ɖeɖee ɖo nukɔn mitɔn tlolo lɛ e wɛ nyi tagba ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn ɖeɖee mi nɔ mɔ ɖo egbe tɔn mɛ lɛ e
biblu nɔ wa nu hu
e ta weziza do sɔgudo ji nu mi bɔ mi mɔ ali kpla mɛ yi awajijɛ sin jɛmɛ nu mi e mɛ e
ðɛhan gbɔn e
nu mi tamɛ do ali biblu nɔ mi nukunɖiɖo do sɔgudo wu ɖe e we ji e nɔ mi bɔ gbɛzan mitɔn nɔ ɖo nɔ mi zun nɔ ayi sɔyi e xa mitɔn gbɔn e mi
biblu weɖexamɛ ɖeɖee mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa tagba mitɔn lɛ e e hugan weɖexamɛ sin wema ɖe kpowun
wiwa jɛn sixu bɔ mitɔn ɖo
ði ɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn ɖokpo ɖie nunamɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mɛ hu nuyiɖomɛsi
sixu flin hwenu mɛ ɖo hudo mɛ e ɖe e a
alo hwenu ɖoto towe ɖe bɔ e ɖɔ nu ci e a
e vivi nu ɖɔ mɛɖe ɖo awajijɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ a ce
mi nɔ mɔ awajijɛ hugan bi e hwenu mi nɔ nu mɛ nɔ ɖo nukun nuɖe a e
wema ɖokpo ɖɔ e sixu mɛɖee jo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ tamɛ gɔn le gege mɔ a afi nu e ɖo nukun ajɔ ɖe cobo wa ɔ nɛ
e ɖo co enyi mi miɖee jo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ tamɛ ɖo taji ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee sixu su tɔn mi a lɛ e tamɛ ɔ mi nɔ mɔ ajɔ tɔn
mi nɔ ɖo nu taji ɖevo lɛ mɛ
nugbo ɔ mi nɔ wa alɔ ɖo alɔ mɛ xa ɔ ɖesu e nɔ mɔ mɔhun lɛ do mɔ nu e nya lɛ e
hu bi ɔ biblu mi ɖɔ jehovah mawu nugbo ɔ sinsɛn sixu bɔ mitɔn ɖo nugbo
xo tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi kpa wli ɛ sisi e jɛxa e
enyi mi wa ɔ mi nɔ kpewu nɔ wa nu sixu kpaca mɛ e ɖe mi nɔ hɛn mitɔn sin xomɛ hun
nugbo ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ yi nunywɛ bonu xomɛ hun mi
nunywɛxo enyi mi wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn sɔgbe kpo nugbododo ɖeɖee ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e kpo ɔ mi nɔ hɛn mitɔn wanyiyinɔ jixwe tɔn ɔ sin xomɛ hun
ðo e nɔ kpe nukun do mi wu nɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖu le ɖo tɔn lɛ xwixwedo mɛ e

biblu mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ enyi mi kpo ɖo nunywɛ byɔ mawu wɛ do nujɔnu mɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ e mi

mawu jlo nyi mitɔn jaki

jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo ɖo a
ðo hweɖenu ɔ nunywɛ nukunɖeji lɛ mɔ tawun ɖɔ eo wɛ nyi xosin ɔ
din ɔ nɔ yi gbe ɖo kpaa mɛ ɖɔ jinukunsin kpo ayikungban kpo ɖo

nɛ ayikungban ɔ ci
ðo hwexonu ɔ mɛ lɛ ɖɔ ayikungban ɔ ci gbajaa
ðo xwe kanweko tɔn mɛ ɔ nunywɛ glɛki tɔn lɛ ɖɔ e ci toboo
xwe mɔkpan jɛ nukɔn nu enɛ ɖo xwe kanweko tantɔngɔ tɔn mɛ ɔ biblu ezayii ɖɔ xo do tobotobo ayikungban ɔ tɔn wu zan xokwin e sixu lilɛ do globu e ezayii nwt
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ ɔ nuɖiɖo lɛ sixu gble ɖo jinukunsin a
nunywɛ xwe kanweko ɛnɛgɔ tɔn aristote ɖɔ ayikungban ji jɛn nu lɛ nɔ gble ɖe ɖɔ nu lɛ kun nɔ gble alo huzu ɖo jinukunsin fi sunvi lɛ nɔ nɔ e o
linlin enɛ nɔ ayi nu xwe kanweko mɔkpan
ɖo xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ ɔ nunywɛ lɛ wa ɖe linlin nu nɔ gble tɔn ɔ
e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu lɛ bi ee ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e kpo ee ɖo jinukunsin lɛ e kpo nɔ wa gble
ðɛhan william thomson ɖi nu ɖɔ biblu mɛ gbɔn e ɔ mawu sixu jlo ɖo alɔ nu gblegble mɔhun bonu e su kun do nu nuɖiɖo tɔn lɛ o
etɛ ji planɛti lɛ ɖi ayikungban mitɔn jinjɔn
aristote mɛ ɖɔ nu ɖo jinukunsin lɛ e bi wɛ e jan do nu tobotobo lɛ mɛ nu tobotobo enɛ lɛ ɖe ɖo ɖe mɛ bɔ ayikungban ɔ wɛ ɖo tɛntin mɛ nu
ðo xwe kanweko tɔn ɔ nunywɛ lɛ jɛ gbe yi ji ɖɔ sunvi lɛ kpo planɛti lɛ kpo kun ɖo nu ɖe ji o
ɖo wema jɔbu tɔn xwe kanweko tɔn mɛ ɔ mi xa ɖɔ ɔ hɛn ayikungban ɔ ɖo e ɖo nuɖe ji a jɔbu
biblu nyi dotooxwe sin wema ðe a co nugbododo ðe lɛ ðe nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ yi nukɔn tawun e do lanmɛ nɔ ganji xo lɛ wu
azinzɔnnɔ lɛ hinhɛn ɖo zɔ
mɔyizi ɔ byɔ ɖɔ gudunɔ lɛ ɖo nɔ zɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
e jɛ xwe ɖie hwenu jɛmɛji lɛ hu mɛ e cobɔ dotoogan lɛ wa mɔ ɖɔ e zan nugbododo enɛ bɔ e kpo ɖo wa wɛ jɛ din levii vi lɛ wemata kpo kpo
alɔ hwenu e cyɔ wu gudo e

adagbigbo hwenu
mawu ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ sunnuvi ɖe ɖo gbo ada ɖo gbɛzan tɔn sin azan tantɔngɔ ɔ gbe
levii vi lɛ ðo yɛyɛvi ɖe sin lanmɛ ɔ nuwukpikpe hun nɔ ɖo nɔ yawu xu ɖo akpa nukunmɛ e nɔ sɔgbe ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ nukɔntɔn ɔ gudo
ðo biblu sin taan mɛ ɔ cobonu akpa dotooxwe tɔn lɛ tiin ɔ ninɔ nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo cobo gbo ada nyi alɔcyɔnmɛji nunywɛ tɔn ɖe

gbesisɔ tɔn
hwɛhwɛ ɔ wlɛnwin nukinkan tɔn nɔ zan do mɔ sɔgudo lɛ e ɖe nɔ ɖe
e tlɛ nyi ɖɔ wlɛnwin ɖokpo ɔ lɛ wɛ zan ɔ nu vovo wɛ nɔ mɔ
ði ɔ enyi mɛɖe kan nu byɔ we do nu ɖokpo ɔ ji do sɔgudo wu bonu zan majikibiblo sin kati ɖokpo ɔ lɛ ɔ ganji wɛ ɔ xosin lɛ bi ɖo nyi ɖokpo ɔ
hwɛhwɛ ɔ xosin lɛ nɔ gbɔn vovo
e xo nu do wlɛnwin lɛ nɔ zan do kan nu lɛ e wu
lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ yɛblɛnu kpowun wɛ kati lɛ alo awinnya wewe tobotobo lɛ nyi bɔ nɔ yetɔn lɛ zan nɔ do xosin mɛ ɔ lɛ e wu do wa gbeta lɛ kɔn
ði ɔ alɔ bi e ɖe kan nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ byɔ do nukun xosin mɛ ɔ e kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ganji do ɖɔ nuɖe lɛ do mɛ ɔ wu
enɛ gudo ɔ ɔ xɔ ɖɔ emi mɔ nu jɛ nu lɛ kpo ninɔmɛ mɛ ɔ ɖo manywɛ mɛ lɛ e kpo wu
ðo ɖe lɛ kpewu ɖu ɖo axisinɔ yetɔn lɛ ji wutu ɔ yi akwɛ gege ɖo si
sunvi kpinkpɔn kpo nukinkan kpo sin nuwiwa lɛ nɔ ɖɔ e ɖɔ sɔgudo mitɔn ci e
nugbo jɛn wɛ a
biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi ɖo nuwukpikpe ɖɔ nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e alo nu mi wa e bɔ gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e nɔ kunkpla sɔgudo mitɔn jozuwee
mawu lɛ ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖevo wu ɖo sunvi kpinkpɔn kpo nukinkan sin nuwiwa lɛ kpo e mawu wan nu amɔɛkinkan nuwiwa alɔkpa lɛ bi
mi mɔ xogbe elɔ lɛ ɖo biblu mɛ mɛɖebu ɖo mɛ blo majiki abi e kan fa o mɛɖebu kan amɔɛ abi e ɖu aze o mɛɖebu ɖo bo nu mɛ o mɛɖebu yi bo o
ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do xɛxo ɖɔ ɖo delphes e cresus gbɔn e wu enɛ bɔ e ci ahwan ɖo axɔsu pɛsi tɔn nukɔn
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ jiwu kunkpla axɔsu pɛsi tɔn jɛnu e ɖo biblu mɛ
xwe cobɔ e ji axɔsu silusi ɔ ezayii nyi gbeyiɖɔ eblee ɖe e ɖɔ nyikɔ tɔn kpo e ɖu ɖo toxo ɖaxo babilɔnu ji gbɔn e kpo
ezayii xo jehovah ɖɔ ɔ ɖie
ɖegbe do xu lɛ ɖɔ xu bi ɖegbe do nɔ sa kɔn do mɛ lɛ bɔ bi
wlɛnwin silusi tɔn bɔ ahwangɔnu tɔn lɛ ɖi zɔnlin gbɔn tɔdo ɔ mɛ byɔ toxo ɔ mɛ
ee silusi yi toxo ɔ gudo e ɔ e jo kan jwifu ɖeɖee ɖo kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu lɛ e gbe bɔ lɛkɔ yi jeluzalɛmu e su kun do sin xwe ɖie e gba
ezayii mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖɔ nu silusi axɔsu e e ɖɔ ganjɛwu akɔta lɛ do acɛ towe yi acɛ sin axɔsu lɛ si hun toxo lɛ sin hɔntogbo ɖo susu lɛ nu
pɛsinu lɛ byɔ toxo ɔ mɛ gbɔn hɔn vi wenɔ ɖo to ɔ sin ahoho wu bɔ jo nyi nuvo ɖo manywɛ mɛ lɛ e
enyi babilɔnunu lɛ tuun tuto silusi blo e wɛ nyi ɔ su hɔn ɖeɖee ɖo nuvo kpannukɔn ɔ lɛ e bi
e nyi gbɔn e ɔ nuɖe ɖo alɔ cyɔn toxo ɔ ji wɛ a
ɖokpo kpowun wɛ enɛ nyi ɖo maxamaxa ɖeɖee ɖo biblu mɛ jɛnu tɛnwin lɛnwin lɛ e mɛ
biblu gbɔn vo nu ɖeɖee lɛ nɔ ɖɔ nɔ tɔn jo nu numɛsɛn adingban tɔn yetɔn lɛ hwɛhwɛ e eyɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ gosin mɛ ɖɔ xo elɔ e ɖɔ nu wa wɛ ɖe ɔ sin do
nu jɛ a wa jɛ ɔ ɖɔ sin tɛgbɛ ezayii
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nyikɔ tɔn sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi e nɔ blo nɔ huzu
enɛ ɖe nuwukpikpe e ɖo tuun nu jɛ ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e blo bɔ sɔgbe xa jlo tɔn e
enɛ mi jiɖe ɖɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖe akpa e do lɛ e bi
jlo tuun nu biblu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ do hwe mitɔn wu lɛ e a
sin xwe ɖie wɛ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu vɛwu lɛ tiin ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
azan gudogudo tɔn etɛ tɔn
e nyi ayikungban ɔ alo lɛ tɔn wɛ a tagba dakaxixo kpo ɖo do nu lɛ wɛ sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie lɛ e kpo tɔn wɛ
nu mi gbeje ɖeɖee ɖɔ xo do azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ wu e klewun ɖe
timɔtee azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ emitɔn jɛn nɔ yi wan nu akwɛ nɔ mɔ yeɖee nɔ yigo nɔ nyla do mawu wu nɔ vɛtoli nu yetɔn lɛ nɔ do alɔgudokpɛ nu mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu nu nyi mawu tɔn lɛ ɖe a
mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖɔ emitɔn jɛn nɔ yi wan nu akwɛ nɔ yigo lɛ e wɛ do mi a
nɔ mɔ bɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo nukun nu ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ hugan nɔ gɔn nu wa alɔ ɖo alɔ mɛ xa a ce
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wu ɖɔ tonumase nu lɛ gbakpe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bɔ ɖo kpaa mɛ ɔ lɛ nɔ yi wan nu gbɛɖuɖu hu mawu
bɔ nu lɛ ɖo nylanyla wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
matie wa se ahwanfunfun sin zingidi ɖo fi sɛkpɔ lɛ nɔ se ahwanfunfun sin xo ɖo fi lin do lɛ
sɔgbe kpo nulinlɛn ɖe kpo ɔ mɛ nabi ahwan lɛ kpo tohwan lɛ kpo hu sin e hu livi enɛ zɛ tovi ɖo to gege mɛ lɛ e bi sin wu
tamɛ do ɖasin aluwɛ kpo kpo ɖaxo enɛ hɛn wa e ji
nu enɛ lɛ nuɖe akɔta lɛ bɔ ɖo nu ahwan a
matie adɔ
tutomɛ ɔ tɔn nɔ kpe nukun do nuɖuɖu xo wu e ɖɔ ðo elɔ mɛ mi nɔ sɔnu nu nuɖuɖu gege nu livi ɖe e mɛ ɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖo tɛnnɛ ji kpo ɖo xovɛ yi xɔ wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
nu hu mɛ ɖokpo ɖo atɔn ji kpo ɖo nuɖuɖuhwedomɛ alɔkpa ɖe lɛ sin se wɛ
nulinlɛn lɛ ɖɔ yɔkpɔvu livi atɔn wɛ nɔ ku xwewu xwewu ɖo adɔ wu
luki ayikungban danwu ɖesu
xwewu xwewu ɔ ayikungban danwu ɖaxo ɖaxo nɔ wa nu do lɛ wu
ayikungban danwu nɔ hɛn xɔ lɛ gble tawun bɔ ayikungban danwu ɖaxo ɖokpo nɔ tiin xwewu xwewu
sɔgbe kpo nulinlɛn ɖe kpo ɔ ɖo kpo kpo vlamɛ ɔ ayikungban danwu hu
matie e jla axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bonu e nyi kunnuɖiɖe nu lɛ bi
jehovah tɔn lɛ yetɔn hu livi tantɔn e ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ ɖo kunnu ɖe wɛ gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji ɖo to mɛ
nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn toxo ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ kpo gletoxo ɖo zɔ lɛ e kpo mɛ nɔ jla gbɔn zunkan lɛ kpo sokan lɛ kpo mɛ
ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu e enɛ yi jɛ ba mɛ ɖo wɛ mawu ɖe e ɔ ɔ vɔ
etɛ nyi tinmɛ tɔn
e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖo nu acɛkpikpa lɛ tɔn gbɔn axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn gblamɛ
akpa tɛ lɛ jɛnu ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn
xa xota bɔ lɛ e mɔ nu jɛ wu
xota kunnuɖenu sɔgbe e ɖe tɔn
e kpe ðuðeji tɔn ðe ðo tɛntin hlɔma tɔn ðo italie bɔ jonɔ gosin vovo ɔ tɔn xwe lɛ e bi nɔ yi
kpe ɔ nɔ wli nu hlɔma tɔn mɛ lɛ yi wan lɛ e ðokpo e wɛ nyi titus
kpe titus tɔn ɖo dotin ɖaxo we do ɖe nu taji jɛ ɖo hwexonu bɔ e tuun ganji e ɖe
e ɖo co nu mɛ lɛ tuun ganji a e wɛ nyi ɖɔ kancica dɔn mɛ e ɖe ɖo kpe ɔ kpo biblu kpo tɛntin kpe titus tɔn nɔ gudo nu gbesisɔ jiwu biblu tɔn lɛ tɔn kɛnu
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn tɔn sin ɔ axɔsuɖuto hlɔma tɔn bretagne kpo gaule kpo din ɔ france yi ejipu bɔ ɖu ayijayi kpo nukɔnyiyi kpo bunɔ ɖe sin vivi ɖo gbe ɔ ji
xa ɖe ɖo zɔ nɔ nu hlɔma hwɛhwɛ e wɛ nyi tokpɔn hunnyahunnya tɔn judee tɔn
rome ɖɔ ðo to ɖo hlɔma sin acɛ lɛ e mɛ ɔ kpɛɖe jɛn wan syɛnsyɛn judee ɖɔhun
jwifu lɛ wan nu gan to ɖevo mɛ tɔn ɖeɖee nɔ keya nu aca yetɔn lɛ a e bɔ hlɔmanu lɛ mɔ syɛnsyɛn jwifu lɛ tɔn do mɔ mɛmasi ɖaxo ɖe
jwifu gege ɖo nukun ɖɔ gan ɖe sixu wa hwlɛn ɖe hlɔmanu wan nu lɛ e siin izlayɛli ɖo ɔ xɔ
ɖo tɔn ɔ jezu klisu ɖɔ ɖɔ awe ɖe wa xo jeluzalɛmu
jezu ɖɔ ayi ɖe lɛ wa nu bɔ mitɔn lɛ ahwan xa toxo ɔ jan gbɔn fi bi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ xo jezu tɔn lɛ gba hun do nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ
ee ahwanvu lɛ mɔ tɛmpli jeluzalɛmu tɔn ɖo azan tɔn atɔn gbe e ɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖo mɛ suxo ɖɔ awinnya ɖagbeɖagbe elɔ lɛ xɔ ɔ savɔ gbɔn e
nugbo ɔ tɛmpli ɔ sin awinnya ɖe lɛ ɖiga nu mɛtlu gblo nu mɛtlu yi ji nu mɛtlu
e ɖo co jezu ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ mɔ wɛ ɖe din ɔ hweɖenu wa su bɔ awinnya lɛ ɖe kpo ɖo ɖe ji a bi wɛ e luki
jezu ɖɔ nu ɖɔ hwenu wa mɔ lɛ nyi ahwan jan jeluzalɛmu toxo ɔ nywɛ ɖɔ hwenu e gba do ɔ sɛya
enɛ ɔ mɛ ɖo judee gbeji lɛ hɔn yi so lɛ ji mɛ ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ hɔn bonu mɛ ɖo gleta lɛ lɛkɔ wa toxo ɔ mɛ o
luki xo jezu tɔn jɛnu a
xwe gban nukun atɔn wa yi bɔ judee kpo ɖo wan nu hlɔmanu lɛ sin acɛ e ɖe e wɛ
ɖo tɔn hwenu tokpɔngan hlɔma tɔn gessius florus ee do judee e wa akwɛ ɖo tɛmpli ɔ sin akwɛgba mɛ e ɔ xomɛ sin jwifu lɛ tawun
zaanɖe kpowun ɔ jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ jan go do jeluzalɛmu hu ɖo ahwankpa hlɔma tɔn mɛ ɖo finɛ lɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi jɛ emiɖesunɔ si sin hlɔma lɔ mɛ
atɔn gudo ɔ cestius gallus nɔ nukɔn nu hlɔma tɔn jɛji bɔ wa jeluzalɛmu su kun do nu
hlɔmanu lɛ yawu byɔ toxo ɔ mɛ wɔ do ɖo tɛmpli ɔ gudo lɛ e
enɛ gudo ɔ ɖo hwɛjijɔ zawe a e ɖe wu ɔ do gudo fɔ
nu vivi nu jwifu lɛ bɔ zun do ji tlolo
hwenu hlɔma tɔn lɛ kpo jwifu lɛ kpo jo toxo ɔ do e ɔ klisanwun ɖeɖee hɛn akpagbanumɛ jezu tɔn ayi mɛ lɛ e hɔn sin jeluzalɛmu tunta so lɛ ji ɖo ɔ gudo matie
xwe bɔ e mɛ ɔ hlɔma sɔnu nu ahwankpa tɔn ahwangan sunvinɔ vespasien kpo vi tɔn titus kpo bɔ huzu kpannukɔn judee
e ɖo co ee hlɔma tɔn neron ku ɖo tɔn gudo tlolo e ɔ vespasien lɛkɔ yi hlɔma jɛ tɛn tɔn mɛ jo ahwan fun xa judee wɛ ɖe e kpo kpo do nyi vi tɔn titus lɔ mɛ
ðo juin tɔn ɔ titus ɖegbe nu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ gbo atin ɖeɖee ɖo judee gbeji lɛ e bɔ do xa do jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ nu kilomɛtlu do
septembre mɛ ɔ hlɔmanu lɛ nu ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ e do toxo ɔ kpo tɛmpli tɔn kpo gba do lɛ tɛnwin lɛnwin jezu ɖɔ gbɔn jɛ nukɔn e
luki sɔgbe kpo nulinlɛn ɖo ji e ɖe kpo ɔ jɛ wɛ ku ɖo jeluzalɛmu kpo xa kpo ɖo toxo ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo mɛ
ðo tɔn ɔ titus lɛkɔ yi italie bɔ tovi hlɔma tɔn lɛ xɔ ɖaxo ɖe
ee ahwan ɔ mɔ dɔkun tobutobu enɛ lɛ e ɔ tawun gbɔn ali hlɔma tɔn lɛ ji
ee ɖo batoo e yi lɛ e ahwanfunnu ɖaxo ɖaxo gosin ahwangbenu lɛ e kpo nu e sin tɛmpli jeluzalɛmu tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo mɔ wɛ e ɔ e vivi nu tawun
titus jɛ tɔn vespasien sin tɛnmɛ ɖo tɔn nyi
titus ku ajijimɛ kpowun ɖo xwe we gudo
nɔvi tɔn kpɛvi domitien jɛ tɛn tɔn mɛ yawu ɖuɖeji kpe ɖe ɖo titus nyikɔ mɛ do xɔ
kpe titus tɔn ɖo hlɔma ɖo egbe
egbe ɔ kanweko mɔkpan wɛ nɔ yi kpe titus tɔn xwewu xwewu ɖo hlɔma nɔ dɔn tawun
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ kpe enɛ do mɔ jiwu e ɖe mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ e nɔte nu hlɔnhlɔn hlɔma ɖo e cobɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɔ e nɔte nu wuntun ɖɔ e su kun do nu jeluzalɛmu kpo tɛmpli tɔn kpo e
e ɖo co mɛ nɔ xwe sɔ nɔ xa biblu ɔ lɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ kpe titus tɔn ɖo tinmɛ taji ɖe
e ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe jla gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji wɛ jezu ɖɔ gbɔn e
matie wema biblu tɔn nɔ nyi daniyɛli e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto enɛ nyi acɛkpikpa mawu tɔn
wemata wema enɛ tɔn ɖɔ acɛkpikpa alo axɔsuɖuto lɛ tɔn ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ xo sin babilɔnu hwexonu tɔn ji jɛ hwe mitɔn
wemafɔ ɔ ɖɔ nu ɖo nukɔn ja e ɖɔ
axɔsu enɛ lɛ sin hwenu ɔ mawu jixwe tɔn ɖe axɔsuɖuto mɛɖe sixu gba a e ɖokpo
acɛkpikpa tɔn jɛ akɔta ɖevo si gbeɖe a
axɔsuɖuto enɛ ɔ gba axɔsuɖuto ɖo ayi lɛ bi hu acɛ nu bɔ tiin nyi a
biblu tɔn enɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖɔ ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖyɔ tɛn nu acɛkpikpa tɔn lɛ nɔ ayi sɔyi hɛn tuto wa ayikungban ɔ ji nu lɛ
ci ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ
akpa jiwu ɖeɖee jɛnu ɖo malin malin mɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖie
ahwan tiin a
ðɛhan mawu wɛ su ahwan kun do gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
e ga lɛ e hwan lɛ e do ahwankɛkɛ lɛ
akpa enɛ jɛnu nugbo ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn
azɔn tiin a
ezayii tovi ɖe ɖɔ ɖo azɔn jɛ wɛ a
tamɛ do mɛ mɛɖebu jɛ zansukpɛzɔn alo azɔn ɖevo ɖebu ɖe a e ji
dotooxwe lɛ kpo lɛ kpo ɖe ɖe a
lanmɛ syɛn hunsin ɖagbe wɛ ɖo lɛ ɖo sɔgudo ɖo ayikungban ji
ðɛhan ji jɛ ɖo to ɔ mɛ tunfla
ayikungban ɔ ɖe nuɖuɖu gege bɔ mɛ bi mɔ ɖu
adɔ kpo nuɖuɖuhwedomɛ kpo tiin a
alenina mimɔ kpo ku kpo tiin a
mawu sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku tiin a aluwɛ tiin a alenina tiin a mimɔ tiin a nu xoxo lɛ bu
nu sin akpa wanyiyinɔ mitɔn jehovah mawu do e nɛ
xo vivi kpowun wɛ nu enɛ lɛ nyi a
mɛ gege jlo nɔ enɛ sin akpa e do bɔ biblu tinmɛ e mɛ nugbo co ɖo hwɛjijɔ vovo lɛ wutu ɔ linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ sɔyi e nɔ vɛwu nu mɛ gege bɔ mɔ nu jɛ mɛ
enɛ kpaca mɛ a ɖo mi ɖɔhun ɖe nɔ mɔhun mɛ ɖɔ xo nu mi a
lɛ ɖo hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo sin fɛn mɛ ɖo alenina mimɔ kpo tagba kpo nyi agban kpinkpɛn e sin hwenu linlin ɖie bɔ enɛ wu ɔ mɛ gege gbɔ yi gbe ɖɔ ɖe kun kpo hu elɔ mɛ mi ɖe e o
enɛ gbɔn vo bi sese nu linlin mitɔn jehovah mawu ɖo nu lɛ e
do mi bonu mi ku do akpa mawu do lɛ e bi ji ɔ e do zogbe xo e ɖɔ e ji ɖɔ e lɛkɔ wa agba a e blo nu e e blo nu gbe ɛ do e ezayii
e tinmɛ ɖo biblu mɛ ɖɔ jehovah nyi mawu nɔ ɖo adingban a e
etɛ mi ɖo wa ɖu akpa mawu do lɛ e sin le
mɔ nu ɖeɖee bɔ mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ e ɖo wema elɔ sin wexwɛ bɔ lɛ e ji
nukunðiðo jiwu tɛ nɛ
mitɔn ɖɔ emi mi mavɔmavɔ ɖo ayikungban ji fi
e ɖo co mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu bɔ e ɖi
mɛ bi ɖo ku hweɖenu wɛ nɔ ɖɔ
jɔwamɔ sin nu wɛ kpo ku kpo nyi
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ e sixu nɔ sɔyi e nyi ɖo ayikungban ji fi a
nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e ku yi jixwe gudo ɔ kɛɖɛ jɛn e nɔ sɔyi
cobonu xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ ɔ e ɖɔ gbeje xosin biblu nu nukanbyɔ atɔn elɔ lɛ e e blo gbɔn e taan nabi e nɔ e gbɔn
etɛ nyi linlin dodo mawu tɔn nu ayikungban ɔ kpo lɛ kpo
ku byɔ lɛ mɛ gbɔn
ðo alɔkpa mawu blo ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji lɛ e bi mɛ ɔ lɛ tɔn kpe we a
biblu ɖɔ lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ e da ɖo akpajlɛ mawu tɔn mɛ bɔ ci eɖɔhun
e ɖɔ e da lɛ bɔ ɖo jijɔ mawu ɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ɖi wanyiyi kpo nujlɔjlɔwiwa kpo
ɔ e blo lɛ bɔ ɖo nuwukpikpe tamɛ ɖo nuwukpikpe tuun nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ tuun mawu ɖo kancica ɖagbe xa ɛ
e wɛ bɔ mi nɔ ɖu wɛkɛ ɔ sɔ e nujiwu ɔ tɔn lɛ nu nuxixo kpo xo lomilomi kpo sin vivi
taji bi ɔ lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ ɖo nuwukpikpe ɔ

e wa ɔ nu towe nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ ɖesu
mawu nɔ ganjininɔ mitɔn tawun nɔ kpe nukun do mi wu kpo wanyiyi kpo
mawu mavɔmavɔ sin nukun mɔ nu jɛ fi bi e nɔ ɖo mɛdida kpo mɛ ɖagbe kpo wɛ nunywɛxo

enyi mi tuun ɖɔ mawu nɔ ɖo ayi ganjininɔ mitɔn wu nɔ kpe nukun do mi wu kpo wanyiyi kpo ɔ e sixu huzu nuɖe ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ a

e ɖo mɔ co hannah nɔ xo nu ɖɔ jehovah nɔ ɖo ayi emi wu alo yi wan nu emi a ji a
etɛ bɔ e huzu linlin
e tinmɛ ɖɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe wɛ huzuhuzu lɛ
flin xoɖiɖɔ biblu tɔn se xwe gege ɖie bɔ e ɖɔ xo do vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu tɔn ji e ɖe byɔ ayi mɛ tawun e jiɖe mi ɖɔ jehovah yi wan nu mi
ɔ biblu kplɔnkplɔn kpo kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ kpo yiyi bɔ nu gege do jehovah wu mɛ alɔkpa e nyi e kpo ali nu mitɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ ɖe lɛ e kpo
nu hannah ɖɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ
sixu kudeji ɖɔ mawu mɔ nu jɛ nu nɔ ci nu e mɛ nɔ flin gbɔn

sɔgbe xa americain sante mentale ɔ vinɔ ɖe nɔ se ɖo vijiji gudo e nɔ ɖibla sin hlɔnhlɔn e sa ɖo ajidonu e kpo nu ci e kpo wu e nyi e gbɔ nuɖe wa wu wɛ a

biblu ɖɔ mawu ɔ wanyiyi wɛ e nyi

e ɖo co sixu kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ jɛ hwetɛnu mawu ɔ jo sataan do ɖo acɛ gannaganna kpa wɛ yi jɛ
mi mɔ gbɔn e ɔ mawu wan nu nunyanyawiwa bɔ mɔ wɛ mi ɖe e nɔ tawun

nuɖiɖi wɛ hwedo e wutu wɛ e savo a

zaanɖe din

hlɔnhlɔn jɔwamɔ tɔn lɛ hwenu jezu kpo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo yiyi wɛ ɖo galilee xu ɔ ji e ɔ jɔhɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe jlo fli tɔjihun yetɔn
kolosinu lɛ jezu ɖɔ nu jɔhɔn ɔ kpowun ɖɔ e
azɔn e tuun jezu ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e ɖo nuwukpikpe gbɔ azɔn nu lɛ kpo sekunɔ lɛ kpo jɛ lɛ gudunɔ lɛ alo alɔkpa ɖevo ɖebu ji
e gbɔ azɔn nu azinzɔnnɔ lɛ bi matie
nuɖuɖuhwedomɛ jezu zan hlɔnhlɔn tɔn ɛ lɛ e do blo bɔ nuɖuɖu kpɛɖe
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ azɔn we wɛ e nuɖuɖu mɔkpan ɖo tɔn hwenu matie
ku mɛ atɔn jezu sin ku bɔ biblu ɖɔ e nyi wɛn ɖɔ jehovah ɖo hlɔnhlɔn mɛkuku lɛ
nu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu ɖevo lɛ mɛ do azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ wu hun wemata wema etɛ biblu sixu mi
tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ bɔ sixu yi ɖo www jw org ji
mawu blo agbaza mitɔn kpo nuwukpikpe jiwu ɖe kpo bɔ enyi akpa jɛ mi wu ɔ e nɔ ku
enyi e gblewu wutu alo nuɖe kan wutu nu mɛ ɔ agbaza ɔ nɔ sɔnu nu nuɖe lɛ do hu akpa ɔ ɖaxo alo kpɛvi
johns hopkins agbaza ɔ nɔ yawu wa nuɖe do ɖo hun ɔ do kan mɛ hun nɔ sa gbɔn lɛ e nɔ blo bɔ akpa ɔ sin nukunmɛ nɔ xu han nɔ hlɔnhlɔn agbaza kan lɛ
tamɛ enyi ɔ blo agbaza mitɔn bonu e hu akpa ɖo mi wu ɔ mi sixu ganjɛ akpa e do ɖɔ emi mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo nu nɔ gba hun do nu mi lɛ e ji e wu a ce
ɔ ɖɔ e gbɔ azɔn nu mɛ ayi yetɔn xo akpa lɛ sunsun ɖasin nu alo bla akpa yetɔn lɛ nu nwt
ðɛhan enyi nu wa wa yi e alo ee wa din e ɖe ɖo hun gba do nu wɛ ɔ sixu kudeji ɖɔ jehovah bla akpa towe lɛ nu din kpo sɔgudo kpo gbɔn
mawu ɖɔ ɖi xɛsi o ɖo ɖo xa
ɖo nukun do gbɛmɛ wɛ o ɖo nyi wɛ nyi mawu towe
ezayii mɛ tuun ɖɔ jehovah nɔ kpe nukun do emi wu e ɖe nɔ ɖo fifa ayi mɛ tɔn kpo hlɔnhlɔn e do ɖi xwi xa vovo lɛ e kpo
pɔlu ylɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn enɛ ɖɔ fifa mawu tɔn hugan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn bi ɔ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi ɔ wɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ sixu kpe nu enɛ lɛ bi wu filipunu lɛ
mawuxowema ɔ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi mi ɖo do akpa jehovah do nu lɛ do sɔgudo wu e lido
ði ɔ ɖɔ nu e wa wa e kpo nu wu mi sixu ɖeji do wu tɔn ɖɔ e blo e kpo nu mi
e sunsun ɖasin bi sin lɛ nukunmɛ
jehovah su mɔ wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e kpo nɔ hu mi lɛ e kpo bi sin kun do jɛ ɖeɖee tlɛ nuti ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ nukunmɛ a lɛ e ji
mɛ ɖo ayijinjɔn ɖo axɔsuzinkpo ɔ ji ɖo jixwe tɔn mɛ nyi axɔsu nu nuɖiɖo lɛ bi e zan hlɔnhlɔn tɔn kpo acɛ tɔn kpo do gbo kpo nyi ali ji nu mɔ wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e do alɔ sin hudo mi ɖo e mi
jehovah jiɖe mɛ ɖɔ akpa emitɔn lɛ nyi xo nugbo nyi xo wu e ɖeji do lɛ e
enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi jehovah ɖe akpa e do lɛ e a ɔ e kɔn ci do nyikɔ tɔn kpo mawu nugbo e nyi e kpo wu
e sunsun ɖasin bi sin nukun yetɔn mɛ ku tiin a aluwɛ tiin a alenina tiin a mimɔ tiin a nu xoxo lɛ bu
wɛkɛ ɔ kpo biblu kpo bi ɖe mɛ alɔkpa mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ nyi e kpo jijɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
nuɖiɖo lɛ nɔ mi bonu mi huzu mawu tɔn co biblu ɔ ɖɔ tlɔlɔ ɖɔ sɛkpɔ mawu enɛ ɔ e sɛkpɔ
jaki ɖɔ mawu lin do ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn a

le tawun tawun tɛ lɛ jiɖe mɔhun ɖiɖo do jehovah wu nɔ hɛn wa
gosin japon e tɔn
nɔ klisanwun ɖe wɛ ɛ co e wa byɔ jaguda japon tɔn nɔ nyi yakuza e mɛ
e ɖɔ ɖi ɖɔ mawu wan nu mi bɔ nɔ ɖɔ nyi wu wɛ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo akpa lɛ e do taji ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee kpo nyi kpo tawun lɛ e ku
yi gbe ɖɔ nuhɛngble sin do emi e kpo linlin ɖo xo emitɔn mɛ e kpo wɛ bɔ sin nu kun nɔ blawu ɖebu nu emi o
ee kpo asi tɔn hannah kpo biblu e ɔ e blo huzuhuzu jiwu ɖe ɖo gbɛzan tɔn kpo linlin tɔn kpo mɛ
hannah ɖɔ nukun ɖesunɔ mɛ wɛ asu blo huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ ɖe
din ɔ ɖɔ kpo jiɖe kpo ɖɔ mawu ɖe tiin nɔ kpe nukun do mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wu nugbo
e ɖɔ mɛɖebu ku a ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖeɖee lɛkɔ sin hwɛ yetɔn gudo nugbo nugbo lɛ e
e nɔ ɖoto nu ɖeɖee mi sixu ɖɔ nu mɛɖe a bɔ e jɛn mi ɖɔ lɛ e kpo nu ɖeɖee mɛɖe kpowun mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ a lɛ e kpo
malin malin mɛ din ɔ jehovah ɖe tagba lɛ mimɔ lɛ kpo yajiji lɛ bi kpo siin

mawu ɖo nu mimɔ lɛ bi
zaanɖe din ɔ mɛdida ɖe a nyi kɔ fi e nɔ ɔ mɔ ɛ a
to ɔ nyi mɛ nɔ yeɖee hwe lɛ tɔn bɔ fifa ɖo dogbo mɔ ɔ wɛ nyi nu nɔ vivi nu e ðɛhan
sɛkpɔ mawu enɛ ɔ e sɛkpɔ jaki
nu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu ɖevo lɛ mɛ do nu wu mawu bɔ mimɔ do tiin e mɛ hun wemata wema elɔ tɔn etɛ biblu sixu mi
ze yeɖee jo kpo jlo kpo ðo madagascar
e nɔ hlɔnhlɔn ðevo mɛ nu cikɔ e
enyi mi mɔ ɖɔ gbɛmɛ tagba lɛ wa ɖi bu mi ɔ etɛ mi sixu wa
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do xota xwe tɔn mitɔn wu nu wu mi ɖo jo jehovah do bɔ e mɔ ali do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi e kpo e wa gbɔn e kpo
flin ɔ nɔ bɔ togun mawu tɔn nɔ nɔ bu
e blo flin ku klisu tɔn tɔn ɖo samedi mars
mi sixu sɔnu din nu nuwiwa enɛ gbɔn
mi ɖu tɛn tɔn mɛ yiyi sin le gbɔn
nuwiwa xwewu xwewu tɔn enɛ nɔ so nu buninɔ togun mawu tɔn tɔn gbɔn fi bi gbɛn
xosin lɛ ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
etɛwu e nu mɛ ðo nu bi e
jehovah wɛ nu mi ɖo lɛ e bi gosin
e ɖo co e nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi zan akwɛ mitɔn do nɔ gudo nu tutoblonunu tɔn ɖo wiwa wɛ ɖo egbe e
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do nu wu mi nɔ ɖu le nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ do kpa nu jehovah tɔn e kpo nu nɔ nyi gbɔn e kpo wu
wanyiyi alɔkpa tɛ nɔ awajijɛ adodwe ɔ mɛ
mɔ vogbingbɔn ɔ ðo lɛ tɛntin
wan yiyi nu mawu wɛ nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ adodwe ɔ e nyi wanyiyi masɔgbe alɔkpa e nɔ mɔ vaan ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ e a
sylviana ee nyi gbexosin ɖe ɖo xwe e ɖɔ nu ɖo nu ɖeɖee tɛn yi fi hudo gbexosin tɔn ɖe lɛ e mɔ lɛ e se wɛ ɔ akpakpa nɔ mi ɖɔ nyi lɔ awajijɛ mɔhun
e ɖɔ ɖɔ xɛsi nɔ ɖi mi bɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ tɛnsisɛ yi fi hudo ɖe e ɖe zɛ nuwukpikpe lɛ wu
akpakpa nɔ hwi lɔ do ɖo fi hudo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖe e wu bɔ ɖo kinkanbyɔ hwiɖee wɛ ɖɔ emi kpewu a ji wɛ a
enyi nu nɔ ci nu hun awakanmɛ ku o
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo mɔkpan ɖu ɖo nu ɖo do afɔ mɛ nu wɛ bɔ kan nu yetɔn lɛ e ji
do mɔ jehovah hun ali nu ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ gbɔn e ɔ mi yi madagascar ee nyi tɔtɛntinto ɖaxo hugan ɛnɛgɔ ɔ ɖo ayikungban ji e
ðo xwe wo wa yi lɛ e vlamɛ ɔ kpo gbexosin kpo jɛji gosin to mɛ yi wa ɖo fi enɛ nɔ ɖe ɖo aflika bɔ mɛ gege nɔ ɖo sisi nu biblu ɖe e
ɔ ayi ɔ ji tɔn gege ɖo jlo tɛn kan nu wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla ɖo tɔtɛntinto ɖaxo enɛ mɛ
nu mi ɖɔ xo do mɛ ɖe lɛ wu
perrine kpo louis kpo
louis kpo perrine kpo nyi asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖo xwe jɛji e gosin france yi madagascar
nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ nɔ ɖo tamɛ do sixu gblo ada nu yetɔn gbɔn tɛnsisɛ yi gbe ɖevo ji gblamɛ e ji wɛ bɔ perrine nɔ ɖo nu xo do tɛnsisɛ ɔ wu wɛ
e tinmɛ ɖɔ xɛsi nɔ ɖi mi do fi tuun a e yiyi wu
nɔ hu mi do xwedo mitɔn agun mitɔn xwe mitɔn fi ma mi lɛ e bi kpo nu mi nɔ wa gbe bi gbe lɛ e kpo jijodo wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ceɖesunɔ lɛ wɛ nyi nu ɖaxo hugan ji ɖo ɖu ɖe lɛ e
ðo ɔ perrine sɔnu nu akɔnkpinkpan bɔ e kpo louis kpo tɛn
nu ci do gbeta kɔn wa e wu
ee gudo e ɔ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ nuɖiɖi syɛn ɖo mɔ alɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
etɛ hlɔnhlɔn asu kpo asi kpo ɔ bɔ nɔ fi yi e hwenu tagba lɛ wa e
savo nu jehovah ɖo ɖɛ mɛ ɖɔ e emi hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo emi ɖo mɔ tɛn dɛ e
mi kpe nu wu ayi ɖo awajijɛ mitɔn nɔ mi e ji
jehovah do nu dɛ louis kpo perrine kpo dɛ e zɛ
louis ɖɔ ðo octobre ɔ mi yi wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn tɔn nu asu kpo asi kpo lɛ ɖo france
wemaxɔmɛ enɛ yiyi nyi nunina manawɔn ɖe sin jehovah
ðo kunnuɖewema ɔ yiyi hwenu ɔ xomɛ hun asu kpo asi kpo ɔ ɖɔ e do madagascar
nadine kpo didier kpo
hwenu didier kpo nadine kpo ee nyi asu kpo asi kpo ɖe e tɛn sin france yi madagascar ɖo e ɔ xwe ɖo wɛ ɖe
didier ɖɔ mi wa gbexosin hwenu mi ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ mi vi atɔn mi ɖo lɛ e
ee su e ɔ mi tamɛ do ɖo gbe ɖevo ji ji
nadine yi gbe ɖɔ linlin mi ɖo ɖɔ mi jo vi mitɔn lɛ do e bɔ nɔ xo nu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ nu tɛn yi gbe ɖevo ji ɖo fi hudo ɖe e ɔ mi go ɖo wu
xo ɖɔ lɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ mi tɛn
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo zɔ nu vi mitɔn lɛ tawun din e vivi nu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ xo xa hwɛhwɛ
malgache gbe kpinkplɔn vɛwu nu didier kpo nadine kpo
nadine ɖɔ kpo nukiko ɖe kpo ɖɔ mi nyi xwe mɛvi a
e kpa gbɔn
tlolo ɔ nɔ agun nɔ do flansegbe e ɖe mɛ
nukɔnmɛ hwenu mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ zan hwenu hugan do gbe ayi ɔ ji tɔn e ɔ tɛn yi agun nɔ do malgache gbe e ɖe mɛ
nadine ɖɔ mɛ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo kunnuɖegbe lɛ e gege nɔ yi wan nu biblu kplɔnkplɔn
hwɛhwɛ wɛ nɔ doku nu mi nu mi e
jɛ nukɔn ɔ ɖɔ ku wɛ ɖe
yi wan nu gbexosin wiwa ɖo fi enɛ
ɖo kple agun tɔn ɖe wu kpe nukun do wɛ gbe ɖokpo mɔ nu jɛ xosin wɛ nɔvi lɛ ɖe e ɖe mɛ a
nu sixu ɖɔ e kpowun wɛ nyi e
ee doku nu nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nu xosin tɔn gudo e ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee junjɔn gudo tɔn lɛ e jɛ alɔ blo nu mi ji do ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ xosin e e kun sɔgbe o
ðo ɖaxo ɖe ji ɖo ɔ thierry kpo asi tɔn nadia kpo nukpinkpɔn do nu nya nu nɔ mawu su lɛ e gbe
nukpinkpɔn do nu enɛ ɖɔ xo do timɔtee wu e byɔ ayi yetɔn mɛ blo bɔ jlo ɖo yi wa ɖo fi hudo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe e jɛji
thierry ɖɔ ee nukpinkpɔn do nu ɔ fo bɔ mi ɖo alɔ xo wɛ e ɔ nya ganjɛ asi wu kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ fitɛ mi yi
bɔ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ nu ji tamɛ do wɛ emi lɔ ɖe e nɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ e lin a bɔ jɛ afɔ ɖe lɛ ɖe ji mɔ tɛn do kpe nu enɛ wu
nadia ɖɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ mi jɛ nu ɖo mi si lɛ e ɖekpo ji bɔ nu wa kpo nu mi e bi wa nɔ tomɛyiyisaki ɛnɛ mɛ
amyɔxwe bi nadia kpo marie madeleine kpo
aɖisixwe bi thierry
wa madagascar ɖo jɛ vivi yetɔn tɔn ɖu ji sin hwenɛnu
nadia ɖɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ gbɔn e nɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo mi
nadia sin nɔ nyi marie madeleine nɔ nɔ france e gblewu do
ee asu kpo asi kpo ɔ ɖɔ xo xa dotoo marie madeleine tɔn gudo e ɔ byɔ nɔ yetɔn ɖɔ e wa nɔ madagascar kpo emi kpo
e ɖo xwe hwenɛnu co e sɔ ɔ kpo awajijɛ kpo
nu ci do gbe ɖevo ji ninɔ wu
e ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ vɛwu bɔ e huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ lɛ nuwumakpe lɛ ɖo finɛ co mɔ ɖɔ zan ɖo agun ɔ mɛ tawun
riana ɖo xoɖiɖɔ ɖe xwle mɛ wɛ do tandroy gbe mɛ
riana nyi nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo xwe vɛlɛɛ
e su ɖo alaotra mangoro fi ɖe wɛ bɔ jinukun nɔ ɖe tawun ɖo zanzanhweji madagascar tɔn
e nɔ tawun ɖo jlo gbɛkan do wema kpinkplɔn ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔ
ee e biblu gudo e ɔ e ɖyɔ linlin tɔn
e ɖɔ do gan fo wemaxɔmɛ linsinmɛ tɔn nu jehovah ɖɔ nu din nu tɛnkpɔn gudo tɔn ɔ gbexosin
ee riana yi kunnuɖewema tɔn gudo e ɔ e ɖe akpa tɔn
e kpo nɔvi sunnu gbexosin ɖe kpo tɛn bɔ e mɔ hwenu klewun ɖe tɔn jɛ gbexosin wa ji
e ɖɔ gbeta ɖagbe hugan e kɔn wa e nɛ
e ɖɔ atavi kpo lɛ ɖokpo kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ nyi yi kplɔnyiji alavɔ
loɔ jlo jo gbexosin do ɖo nu ɖebu wutu a
e lin a bɔ riana jlo wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e
etɛ so nu jlo tɔn enɛ
e ɖɔ lɛ wa mitɔn mɛ nu ɖo lɛ e habu
ajo enɛ bɔ tamɛ do xo jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ e kple dɔkun mɛtɔn lɛ ɖo jixwe e ji
wa gbeta ɔ kɔn syɛnsyɛn ba mɔ tɛn do xo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kple
finɛ wɛ antandroy lɛ nɔ nɔ
etɛwu e yi
ɖokpo jɛ nukɔn nu ajo ja nu ɖo ɔ mɛ e ɔ riana biblu kplɔnkplɔn kpo sunnu antandroy we kpo
e xogbe ɖe lɛ do gbe yetɔn mɛ tamɛ do antandroy ɖeɖee se wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn a lɛ e ji
e ɖɔ xoɖɛ jehovah ɖɔ e mi nu ma tɛn yi xa nɔ do tandroy gbe e ɖe mɛ
nya ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ etɛwu wa fi
bonu mɛ ɖo fi lɛ e mɔ ɔ fi hwɛ gosin e wɛ nɔ yi
aklunɔzan gblamɛ we gudo ɔ riana gosin xa mɛ nu bi xu ɖe e yi ɖaxo ɖe ɖo e wa nu gbɔn e kanbyɔ eɖee wɛ
ðo azan gudo tɔn ɖaxo ɔ tɔn ji ɔ nɔvi ɖe nuɖe do riana sin akpomɛ
akwɛ kpe e lɛkɔ yi antandroy yawuu jɔ klewun ɖe e wɛ
riana ɖɔ mɔ alɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo tɛn enɛ mɛ
sixu kpo ɖo alɔ do mɛ ɖeɖee ali hun bɔ nu do jehovah wu a lɛ e wɛ
bɔ e wa ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
riana ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖe nu mi bɔ nɔ xwle xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi mɛ azɔn we ɖo ɖokpo mɛ
jehovah ɖo mi wɛ gbɔn tutoblonunu tɔn gblamɛ
egbe ɔ riana kpo ɖo wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla mɛ nɔ do tandroy gbe jlo nu do jehovah wu lɛ e gege wɛ
nu mi syɛnsyɛn ɖu ɖo lɛ ji do kan nu mitɔn ɔ mi mɔ nyɔna jehovah tɔn
ðo ayi sylviana nyi madagascar bɔ mi ɖɔ xo tɔn ɖo xota elɔ tɔn e ji
flin ɖɔ e nɔ ɖi xɛsi nɔ ɖɔ fi hudo ɖe e yiyi zɛ nuwukpikpe emitɔn lɛ wu
etɛwu e nu gbɔn
e tinmɛ ɖɔ afɔ amyɔxwe tɔn ɔ hwedo ɖisixwe tɔn ɔ wu nu santimɛtlu
sylviana amyɔxwe kpo sylvie kpo aɖisixwe nu doratine ɖo azan gbe e blo baptɛm e
e ɖo co ɖo ɔ sylviana nu sylvie ee nyi nɔvi nyɔnu gbexosin ɖe ɖo agun tɔn mɛ e bɔ tɛn yi gletoxo kpɛvi ɖo kilomɛtlu do jɔtɛn yetɔn e ɖe mɛ
nuɖiɖi xo mɛ ɖeɖee tɛn yi fi hudo ɖe lɛ e tɔn gbɔn e ɔ enyi mi do gan ɖu ɖo ɖe ji kan nu mitɔn ɔ miɖesu nɔ mɔ akpa elɔ jehovah do nu tɔn lɛ e nyi nugbo gbɔn e akɔnkpinkpan alɔ nu
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e nɔ syɛn
ɔ miɖee zize jo kpo jlo kpo ɖo xa e mɛ mi ɖe e alo ɖo to ɖevo mɛ nɔ sɔnu nu mi nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖo mi ɖo ɔ mɛ e
didier xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e tinmɛ ɖɔ ɖo fi hudo ɖe e nyi ɖagbe ɖe nu sɔgudo
mɛ nɔ jlo do lɛ e gege ɖevo lɛ enɛ do mɛhwenu
mɛ enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ gosin republique tcheque france allemagne guadeloupe luxembourg nouvelle caledonie suede suisse royaume uni kpo etats unis kpo
wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ jɛ tɛn tɔn mɛ din
hwebinu tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo wa wɛ ɖo gbe ɖevo ji jɛxa lɛ e sixu wema mɛ yi wemaxɔmɛ ɔ ɖo to mɛ gosin e alo ɖo to ɖevo mɛ e nɔ blo wemaxɔmɛ ɔ do yetɔn mɛ ɖe e
nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo xa mɛ ɖeɖee tɛn sin agun towe mɛ yi fi hudo ɖe e e
nɔ kan nu byɔ do yetɔn kpo ganjininɔ yetɔn kpo wu nux nwt
sixu bɔ ɖo cobo mɔ nɔ wa sin zɔ mɔ tɛn do nɔ fi yi e a
alo nu lɛkɔ wa jɔtɛn yetɔn blo taan ɖe ɔ sixu mɔ ɖe nu a mɛ
hwenu lɛkɔ wa jɔtɛn yetɔn alo ɖi sa klewun e ɔ sixu mɔ xɔ ɖe nu a jaan
nu mɛ tɛn yi fi hudo ɖe lɛ e ɖo agun towe mɛ hun nu tuun ɖɔ nu yetɔn nɔ su nukun towe mɛ tawun
nɔ kpa nu gan do gbe towe e
kan nu byɔ do xwedo yetɔn wu
nu ɖo nu nɔ wa lɛ e mɛ
xwe tɔn sin xota mitɔn mɛ nɔ ganjɛ jehovah wu lɛ ɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖevo nɔ wa nu eza
ezayii
kɔlɛntinu lɛ
fɔtoo ɖo lɛ e
tuun gbɔn e ɔ tagba elɔ mɛ tawun
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo gege ɖo xwi ɖi xa azɔn syɛnsyɛn lɛ wɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sin xwe sɛyi co ɖo nukun kpe do hɛnnumɔ mɛxomɔ lɛ wu wɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ xo kan tawun cobo nɔ mɔ dandannu gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ yayanɔ nu xwedo yetɔn
mi tuun ɖɔ mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ ɖo xwi ɖi xa tagba mɔhun lɛ gege wɛ ɖo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ enyi tagba enɛ lɛ ɖokpo kpowun a
e nɔ byɔ taan gege kpo hlɔnhlɔn nujɔnu tɔn kpo ɖo asi yetɔn e tlɛ kɛnu do akwɛzinzan e nɔ byɔ lɛ e wu a
e ɖo co ɖeji do akpa mawu tɔn lɛ wu bi nuɖiɖi ɖo ɖɔ sɔgudo ɖagbe ɖe jawe e do a
e nɔ vivi nu jehovah
wusyɛn tɛ ezayii do lanmɛ nu mi nu tɛ mi miɖee a ɔ mi sixu wa wa
e nɔ wa ci nu hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ tagba gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ zɛ nu sixu ɖi xwi xa e wu wɛ a
wɛ e nyi hun tuun ɖɔ e kun nyi hwiɖokponɔ wɛ nu nɔ ci o
e ɖo co nɔ jo gbe a loɔ nɔ hɔn yi su jehovah nɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn
e blawu ɖɔ mɛɖe lɛ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖo egbe ɖɔ ali ɖagbe hugan ɖi xwi xa tagba gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ jo nugbo ɔ do ci ɖɔ nuwiwa klisanwun tɔn mitɔn lɛ ɔ agban wɛ nyi kun nyi nyɔna ɖe o ɖɔhun
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ xa xo mawu tɔn a nɔ yi kple agun tɔn lɛ a nɔ ɖo kunnuɖegbe yiyi nu sataan ɖo biba wɛ ɖɔ blo e nɛ
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ gan do wɛ sataan ɖe nu mi e yi a
awovi tuun ganji ɖɔ alɔɖiɖo ɖo klisanwun tɔn lɛ mɛ bi sixu hlɔnhlɔn mi e nu mi ɖo hlɔnhlɔn a
nu mi mɔ ɖɔ gan jɛ vivɔ ɖo mi wu ji ɖo agbaza lixo alo nu nɔ ci nu mi e linu ɔ mi ɖo yi zɔ nu jehovah a
jɛ nukɔn ɔ nu mi ɖɔ xo do nuwukpikpe jehovah ɖo hlɔnhlɔn mi bɔ e ɖo ezayii mɛ e wu
mɛɖebu kpewu xa sunvi ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi a
nunywɛ lɛ ɖi ɖɔ sunvi liva wɛ ɖo mitɔn voie lactee ɔ mɛ
e ɖo co jehovah nyikɔ ɖe sunvi ɖokpo ɖokpo
etɛ enɛ mi
nu jehovah nɔ ɖo ayi nuɖiɖo tɔn enɛ lɛ ɖo funfun ɖo xomɛ a e wu ɔ do nukun mɛ nu nɔ ci do hwi mɛ ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ bɔ e nyi ɖo e do ji towe wutu a nyi ɖo wanyiyi ɖo e wu wutu e ðɛh
ða ɖo nu ɔ ɖesu ɔ mawu tuun nabi e nyi e
ðɛh nwt nugbo ɔ e nɔ ɖo ayi mɛtɛnkpɔn nɔ mɔ lɛ e wu sixu hlɔnhlɔn bɔ dɛ ɖo mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo
etɛ mi jiɖe ɖɔ jehovah kpewu mi hlɔnhlɔn
jehovah wɛ nyi jɔtɛn hlɔnhlɔn e tɔn
ði ɔ mi gbeje hlɔnhlɔn e hwesivɔ e
david bodanis nɔ wlan nu ɖo nunywɛ xwitixwiti linu e ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ hlɔnhlɔn hwesivɔ nɔ ɖo segɔndu ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ e sɔ ee bɔnbu nɔ gbidi nu tawun e liva mɔkpan nɔ e
ɖevo nu ɖɔ ɖɔ hwesivɔ ɔ hlɔnhlɔn e nɔ ɖo segɔndu ɖokpo mɛ e kpe su nu sin hudo lɛ ɖo nu xwe e sin do
mɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn hwesivɔ e sixu mi hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo mi ɖo ɖi xwi xa tagba ɖebu e a ce
jehovah sinsɛn nɔ hɛn awajijɛ gege wa
e ɖɔ ɖɔ mitɔn lɛ vo ɖo mɛfifa wɛ nyi nyi
nu nɔ ci nu mi hwenu mi lɛkɔ e
mi nɔ vo ɖo ayi mɛ nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hugan ɖi xwi xa mɛtɛnkpɔn gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ
nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ nɔ fa kɔ nu mɛ nugbo
na ɖɔ xo e ɖɔ ɖo matie mɛ e nyi nugbo e ɖe
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nyi kayla ɖo xwi ɖi xa nucikɔnumɛ magbokɔ kpo syɛnsyɛn ɖe kpo wɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ vɛwu tawun bɔ e yi kple lɛ
e ɖo co ee e do gan yi kple ɖe gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ xoɖiɖɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do awakanmɛ ku mɛ wu
ali e xwle xoɖiɖɔ ɔ mɛ ɖe e ɖe bɔ
e flin nu mi ɖɔ ɖo nɔ yi kple lɛ
gan e do yi kple enɛ ji e vivi
etɛ ɖɔ wɛ pɔlu ɖe wlan ɖɔ hwenu ɖo gan a ɔ hwenɛnu wɛ nɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn
mi tlɛ ɖo nuwukpikpe gbɔn ɖebu ɔ nu hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn wa e ɖo dogbo
nu mi mɛ bi ɖo hɛn ayi mɛ e nɛ
pɔlu ɖo nuwukpikpe vovo lɛ co e sixu wa nu jlo e lɛ e bi a ɖo nuwukpikpe tɔn ɖo dogbo wutu
hwenu e ɖɔ nu nɔ ci e nu mawu e ɔ mawu ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu kpe nu wu a ɔ wɛ hlɔnhlɔn nɔ ɖe nuwiwa tɔn lɛ bi degbedegbe
e wa ɖɔ hwenu ɖo gan a ɔ hwenɛnu wɛ nɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn kɔ
etɛ ɖɔ gbe e ja
pɔlu wa mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ alɔdo mɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖaxo e ɖe tɔn mɛvo ɔ emi kun sixu kpe nu ɖe wu wa o
gbigbɔ mawu tɔn sixu su do hlɔnhlɔn hwedo pɔlu e tɔn
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu mi lɔ
nu hlɔnhlɔn mi ɖo e wa sin jehovah ɔ mi ɖo hlɔnhlɔn nugbo
jehovah davidi bɔ e ɖi xwi xa kpannukɔn ɛ lɛ e gbɔn
davidi ɖesu mɔ hlɔnhlɔn gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn sin nuwiwa hwɛhwɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
ahoho ɖe lɛ alo tagba ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ mi sixu kpo hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn kpo a mi ɖo hudo alɔdo jehovah tɔn tɔn
tinmɛ gbigbɔ ɔ nɔ wa nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖi xwi xa tagba lɛ e
hlɔnhlɔn tɔn kɛɖɛ kpe bonu e zɔn yi fi linlin a
jɔhɔn zozo ɖe nɔ ɛ hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo e ɖo e nɔ bɔ e nɔ hlɔnhlɔn xwe
enɛ wu ɔ nu nu syɛn tawun e ɖe kpannukɔn hun flin
savo nu jehovah bonu e hlɔnhlɔn sin hudo ɖo e gbɔn nyi gbigbɔ e gblamɛ
jaan awajijɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi sixu byɔ gbigbɔ ɔ hweɖebunu mi ɖo hudo tɔn e ganxixo ɖo ji
mi sixu mɔ tawun ɖɔ mi ɖo hudo alɔdo mawu tɔn tɔn hwenu tagba ɖe ɖo mi kpo agun ɔ tɔn ɖe kpo tɛntin e
etɛwu tagba mɔhun lɛ nɔ wa
etɛwu tagba nɔ wa ɖo klisanwun lɛ tɛntin
etɛ jozɛfu sin mi do jehovah wu
tagba sixu wa ɖo lɛ tɛntin ɖo mi mɛ bi wɛ nyi wutu
nugbo ɔ hweɖelɛnu nɔ wa tiin bɔ xo alo nuwalɔ lɛ tɔn do nu mi alo mitɔn lɛ do nu
nu enɛ sixu nyi mɛtɛnkpɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe
mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖevo lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ jehovah nɔ tɛn mi bonu mi ɖe gbejininɔ mitɔn ɖo bu xa sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee ze yeɖee jo nyi co e yi wan nu lɛ e
jehovah jo jozɛfu do a e jo hwi lɔ do a akpaxwe ɔ
jehovah mɔ nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ e bɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wa nu xa tɔn jozɛfu ɔ gbɔn wɛ e ɖe e tawun
e ɖo co e xo ɔ mɛ a
nukɔnmɛ hwenu e dohwɛ jozɛfu ɖɔ e jlo ɖoxo xa potifaa sin asi gannugannu su do ganmɛ e ɔ jehovah kɛnu a
e jo jozɛfu do gbeɖe a
e wa ɔ jehovah blo bɔ nu jozɛfu nɔ wa lɛ bi nɔ ɖo yiyi wɛ bib
nu mi jo xomɛsin do ɔ le tɛ mi mɔ ɖo gbigbɔ kpo agbaza kpo lixo
ɖevo ɖie
nu agɔ e wa xa davidi lɛ e ɔ e wa nu xa mɛ nabi ɖe gbɔn a
nu ɖo co mawu tɔn enɛ ɔ tɛn mɛhɛndoxomɛ bonu e ɛ do zɔ nu mawu a
e wa ɔ e wlan ɖɔ jo xomɛsin do jo hunnylanyla do sin xomɛ o taa wa nu nyi do
xomɛsin jijodo nɔ hɛn le tawun tawun ɖevo lɛ wa nu mi
xomɛsin sixu dɔn azɔn ɖe lɛ wa ɖi hunyiji hunwadozɔn kpo hunzɔn kpo
e sixu wa nu do alin mɛtɔn kpo xomɛnu e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ pancreas e kpo wu e sixu bɔ nu nɔ nuɖuɖu ɖo xomɛ lɛ e
nu xomɛ sin mi ɔ mi nɔ tamɛ ganji hwebinu a
xomɛ gblagbla sinsin sixu wa kɔ do nɔ ayi e ɖe mɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ ayi jɛ ayi nu mɛ ɔ agbaza mɛtɔn nɔ nɔ ganji
mi sixu blo kpa mi gbɔn weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn nunywɛ kpe lɛ e zinzan gblamɛ
mi ɖo dohwɛ gbɔ xa mɛ wa nu nyi do do mi e ɖe gbɔn
xa efɛzinu lɛ
e nɔ kpaca mi hwenu mi ɖo nuagɔwaxamɛ ɔ tɔn dɛ ɖe wɛ e a
hwenu ɖe alo xwedo mitɔn tɔn ɖe ɖɔ xo ɖe alo wa nuɖe nu mi tawun e ɔ e sixu ci kliwun nu mi
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi kun kpewu wɔn nu jɛ e kpowun o
mi lɔn bɔ mɛhɛndoxomɛ syɛn nɔ nu xwe gege wɛ a
alo mi xwedo weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn nunywɛ kpe e ɖeɖɛ tagba ɔ ɖo yiya mɛ wɛ a
nu mi hɛn xo ɔ do ayi mɛ ɖo lili wɛ ɔ e vɛwu bɔ mi dohwɛ gbɔ xa nɔvi mitɔn
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔvi ɖe wa nu nyi do nu bɔ kpewu wɔn a
afɔ tawun tawun tɛ lɛ sixu ɖe dohwɛ gbɔ xa ɛ
byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e bonu ɖɔ xo ɖo xa nɔvi towe ɖo ali ɖagbe
mawu yi wan
jehovah nɔ wa nu xa tɔn lɛ kpo kpo nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi lɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
enɛ gudo ɔ tamɛ do nu ɖɔ e ji
yawu ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu towe tuun wa nu ɔ do do xomɛsin nu o loɔ kpo jɛ hwe tɛn
hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ ɖo ali ɖe ɔ hwi lɔ sixu wa nuɖe nyi do wɛ bɔ tagba ɔ
sixu ɖɔ nu lehun do ɔ boya nu ɔ ci nu mi e syɛn tawun hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ nu mi wɛ sɔ e ɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ
nu ɔ kɔ do nu ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe e mɛ a ɔ sixu ali ɖevo dohwɛ gbɔ xa ɛ ɖe e
ðo avla enɛ mɛ ɔ xoɖɛ do nɔvi towe tamɛ byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e do
byɔ mawu ɖɔ e bonu ayi towe ɖo jijɔ tɔn ɖagbe lɛ ji
ðebu xo ɔ wa nyi gbɔn e ɔ sixu kudeji ɖɔ gan nujɔnu tɔn do dohwɛ gbɔ xa nɔvi towe nyi mawu tɔn e vivi nu jehovah tawun
ali tɛ jehovah sixu gbɔn mi bɔ mi mɔ miɖee mɛ hwenu mi hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe gudo e
etɛwu mi ɖo yi gbe
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun jɛxa jehovah o ɖo hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wutu
axɔsu davidi ɖi xwi xa hwɛ dido mɛɖee e ɖɔ agɔ jɛ do jehovah ɔ nu ɖɔ a jɛn wɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo vo sa wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe bɔ gan ɖo wu ɔ bi nɔ jɛ vivɔ ji
awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ davidi ɖi xwi xa tagba ɔ sunnu zin ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɖɔhun
e wlan ɖɔ ɖɔ hwɛ lɛ enɛ ɔ hwɛ ɔ ɖe agɔ jɛ ɔ sin kɔ nu mi
ɖo yi gbe nu alɔ e nɔ do mɛ gbɔn agun ɔ gblamɛ e
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ee e hwɛ ɔ kɛ bɔ e lin gudo e ɔ ayixa towe wa ɖo tagba do nu wɛ ɖo hwɛ enɛ lɛ hu wa yi e wu
pɔlu tɔn sixu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun jɛxa jehovah o lɛ e gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e nɔ wa jɛ hweɖelɛnu bɔ awakanmɛ nɔ ku pɔlu ɖo nu e wa nyi do wa yi lɛ e wu
nu ɖo co pɔlu ɖɔ ɖɔ gbɔn nyɔna mawu tɔn gblamɛ ɔ huzu mɛ nyi din e
nu lɛkɔ sin hwɛ hu wa yi lɛ e gudo nugbo nugbo yi nu wa lɛ e sin gbe e blo gbɔn e bi ɔ sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ jehovah ku nublawu nu
enɛ wu ɔ ganjɛwu ɖɔ jehovah hwɛ kɛ yi gbe nu hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ tɔn eza
ðɔ xota xwe tɔn tɔn
ðo elɔ sɛkpɔ vivɔnu bi wutu ɔ mi sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ gbɛmɛ tagba lɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ
e ɖo co ɖeji ɖɔ mɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖevo mɛ nu cikɔ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ kpe e sixu nu ɖebu sin hudo ɖo dɛ e
nɔvi nɔvi lɛ ɖo gbe ɔ e nɔ e nɔ vivi mɛ nya ðɛh
hɛn le wa nu miɖesunɔ gbɔn
so nu buninɔ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ e gbɔn
mi bɔ mi nɔ xo buninɔ kan gbɔn
nuwiwa tɛ dɔn mɛ ɖo bu hugan ɖo xwe tɔn mɛ etɛwu
ðo mars ɔ togun mawu tɔn kpo gege kpo kple hwenu hwe ɖo xɔ yi wɛ e blo nuwiwa xwewu xwewu tɔn nyi aklunɔ sin nuɖuɖu ɔ e
ee hwe ɖo xɔ yi wɛ e ɔ livi mɔkpan kple blo flin ku jezu tɔn tɔn
xwewu xwewu ɔ flin ku jezu tɔn tɔn wɛ nyi nuwiwa nɔ dɔn lɛ ɖo bu hugan bɔ e nɔ blo gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji e
mi do nukun mɛ jehovah kpo jezu kpo sɔ hwenu ɖo livi mɔkpan mɔ wɛ bɔ ɖo nuwiwa taji enɛ sin domɛ yi wɛ e
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɔ mɛ wɔbuwɔbu ɖe mɛɖebu sixu xa mɛ ɖo ahwan ɔ mɛ lɛ bi a gosin to lɛ bi mɛ gosin akɔta lɛ bi mɛ gosin togun lɛ bi mɛ gosin gbe e nɔ do lɛ bi mɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ xota elɔ xosin
nukanbyɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo atɛ ji bɔ xota elɔ xosin miɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ sixu sɔnu nu flin ɔ ɖu le tɛn tɔn mɛ yiyi tɔn gbɔn
ali tɛ lɛ flin ɔ sixu so nu buninɔ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ e ɖe
miɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ sixu so nu buninɔ gbɔn
flin gudo tɔn ɖe tiin gbe ɖokpo a
nu e nyi ɔ hwetɛnu wɛ
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi yi flin ɔ sin tɛnmɛ
tamɛ do e ɖo taji sɔ ɖɔ e yi flin ɔ tɛnmɛ e ji
flin ɖɔ kple agun tɔn lɛ nyi akpaxwe sinsɛn biblo mitɔn tɔn
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ jehovah kpo jezu kpo nɔ ɖo ayi mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ do gan nɔ yi kple taji hugan xwemɛ xwemɛ tɔn enɛ domɛ lɛ e wu
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ mi jlo ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ nu e sin lanmɛ ɖo ganji alo ninɔmɛ taji ɖe wu a ɔ mi ɖo flin ɔ tɛnmɛ
ðo azan jɛ nukɔn nu flin ɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ mi sixu kije ayi mitɔn ɖɔ mi nɔ zan ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ a ji gbɔn
ðo azan jɛ nukɔn nu flin ɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ mi sixu hwenu xoɖɛ xwe sɔ gbeje kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e ganji
xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ mi sixu wa enɛ gbɔn
gbɔn ayi mitɔn kije kije ɖɔ mi nɔ zan ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ a ji gblamɛ
ɖo nu wu kpe lɛ e bi xwii wa wɛ nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn nɔ nu mɛ lɛ a
nuwiwa lɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖi nu nugbo ɖɔ mi ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ bɔ acɛkpikpa sataan tɔn xwe vivɔnu a
jiɖe ɖo do jehovah kpo jezu kpo wu hwenu ze gbɛzan jo nu jehovah mawu e ɖo wɛ jɛn kpo ɖe din a
ali ɖokpo tɛ sixu kpla mɛ yi gbɛmɛ
mɛxo ɖe nɔ sɔnu nu flin ɔ gbɔn ɖo xwewu xwewu mi sixu wa nu mɔhun gbɔn
xa wema jinjɔn biblu ji ɖeɖee flin ɔ nyi nu taji gbɔn e tamɛ do ji xa jaan
ali ɖokpo mi sixu gbɔn mɔ mavɔmavɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi tuun jehovah ɖi nu nu jezu nyi viɖokponɔ tɔn e
do sɔnu nu flin ɔ etɛwu blo tuto nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn bɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah kpo jezu kpo e ɖe lɛ a
ðo ayi nu mɛxo agun tɔn hwenu linlin tɔn ɖe nɔ wa e wu
xwe lɛ vlamɛ ɔ e xo xota atɔxwɛ tɔn ɖeɖee ɖɔ xo do flin ɔ kpo wanyiyi jehovah kpo jezu kpo mi e kpo wu tawun lɛ e kple
aklunɔzan gblamɛ jɛ nukɔn nu flin ɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ e nɔ xota enɛ lɛ xa nɔ tamɛ do nuwiwa enɛ nyi nu taji e wu
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ xota mɔhun gbɔn gudo lɛ e ɖokpo alo we
mɛxo enɛ mɔ ɖɔ gbɔn xota enɛ lɛ xa nu wemafɔ biblu tɔn e sɔnu nu flin ɔ lɛ e xixa kpo tamɛ linlin do ji kpo gblamɛ ɔ emi nɔ nu lɛ xwewu xwewu
taji hugan ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e mɔ ɖɔ wanyiyi ɖo jehovah jezu kpo emi kpo tɛntin e nɔ ɖo xwe lɛ bi mɛ
etɛ jezu xoɖɛ byɔ ɖo zan mɛ e ɖo aklunɔ sin nuɖuɖu ɔ ayi e
etɛ ɖɔ jehovah sinkɔn nu ɖɛ jezu xo e
ðo zan mɛ jezu blo nuwiwa aklunɔ sin nuɖuɖu ɔ tɔn azɔn nukɔntɔn e ɔ e xoɖɛ ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ bi nɔ bu ɖu vivi buninɔ ɖokpo ɔ xɔ akwɛ nu emi kpo emitɔn kpo e tɔn
xa jaan
nugbo ɔ jehovah sinkɔn nu ɖɛ enɛ vi tɔn ɔ xo e e bɔ din ɔ livi mɔkpan ɖi nu ɖɔ jehovah vi tɔn do
flin ɔ ci kple togun mawu tɔn nɔ blo lɛ e ɖɔhun kpowun a ɖo e nɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ buninɔ ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ tɛntin bɔ mɛɖebu sixu dɔn a
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ gosin to vovo mɛ ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn vovo lɛ e nɔ kple ɖo ɖo fi mi nɔ blo kple ɖe lɛ e
ðo fi ɖe lɛ ɔ e nɔ ya bonu mɛ ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn vovo lɛ e nɔ kple ɖo ɖo kple sinsɛn tɔn ɖe wu a alo mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ wiwa do mɔ numasɔgbe
buninɔ mɔhun nɔ jehovah kpo jezu kpo nukunmɛ
wɛn tɛ jehovah do ezekiyɛli bɔ e kunkpla buninɔ
xa ezekiyɛli
xota nu lɛ kanbyɔ lɛ e ee ɖo atɔxwɛ juillet tɔn mɛ e tinmɛ ɖɔ jehovah do wɛn nukunɖiɖo tɔn ɖe ezekiyɛli ɖɔ akɔta izlayɛli tɔn ɔ nɔ bu hwenu yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji gudo e
wɛn enɛ ɖɔ buninɔ togun mawu tɔn tɔn bɔ nu ɖo nyi wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
sin ɖido ɔ jehovah jɛ tuto blo nu mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ ji kpɛɖe kpɛɖe xokple mɛ enɛ lɛ wɛ e do kpo judaa tɔn ɔ wu
enɛ gudo ɔ ee mɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn xo kpoɖo nu mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ bɔ e do kpo jozɛfu tɔn wu lɛ e ɖo jijɛji wɛ e ɔ we enɛ lɛ huzu lɛngbɔhwan ɖokpo
jehovah ɖɔ emi xo kpo we lɛ kple bɔ huzu ɖokpo gee ɖo alɔ emitɔn mɛ
buninɔ xɔ akwɛ xo e ɖɔ ɖo wema ezekiyɛli tɔn mɛ e nɔ jɛ we xwewu xwewu hwenu mɛ yi do ɖe kpo lɛ e kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ kple nɔ blo flin ku jezu tɔn tɔn e
etɛ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo sixu wa cyɔn alɔ buninɔ enɛ ji so
mi sixu so nu buninɔ ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ e gbɔn
ali nukɔntɔn mi sixu so nu buninɔ togun mawu tɔn tɔn ɖe e wɛ nyi gbɔn nusisɔ nu mɛɖesɔhwe gblamɛ
hwenu jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ yeɖee hwe
tamɛ linlin do tinmɛ wɔxuxu ɔ kpo vɛɛn ɔ kpo ɖo e ji sixu mi bɔ mi so nu buninɔ gbɔn
ali wegɔ mi sixu so nu buninɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi gbɔn tamɛ linlin do tinmɛ wɔxuxu flin tɔn ɔ kpo vɛɛn ɔ kpo ɖo e ji
jɛ nukɔn nu zan bunɔ enɛ ɔ tamɛ tawun do nu wɔxuxu mɛ e do a e kpo vɛɛn vɔvɔ ɔ kpo nɔte e wu e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ wa ɖo zan enɛ ɖesu mɛ kɔ
wɔxuxu ɔ nɔte nu agbaza jezu tɔn e jo do xɔ nu mi e bɔ vɛɛn ɔ nɔte nu hun tɔn kɔn nyi ayi e
mi ɖo wa nu hu nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nukɔntɔn enɛ ɖiɖo kpowun do nu wɔxuxu ɔ kpo vɛɛn ɔ kpo nɔte e wu
flin ɖɔ vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn jezu tɔn ɔ wanyiyi ɖaxo hugan we e mi lɛ e wɛ wanyiyi jehovah mi gbɔn vi tɔn jo do takun mitɔn mɛ e kpo wanyiyi jezu gbɔn jlo do tɔn jo nu mi e kpo
tamɛ linlin do wanyiyi yetɔn ji ɖo mi bɔ mi lɔ yi wan nu
wanyiyi mi kpo mawu mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖo nu jehovah e ci kan ɖe ɖɔhun sin mi ɖo nɔ bɔ buninɔ mitɔn nɔ syɛn
nu mi ɖo hwɛ kɛ mɛ wɛ ɔ buninɔ kan xo wɛ mi ɖe nɛ akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
ðo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖɔ xo do axɔsu ɖe kpo kannumɔ tɔn kpo wu e mɛ ɔ jezu tinmɛ nyi wɛn ɖɔ jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo mi si gbɔn
ali atɔngɔ mi sixu so nu buninɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi gbɔn hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo jlo kpo gblamɛ
ðo ayi nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖo matie mɛ e wu
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ akpakpa nɔ mi bɔ nɔ zan nu jezu mɛ lɛ e a
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wa nu nyi do do mi lɛ e a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nuwanyido lɛ ɖe nɔ syɛn hu ɖe bɔ ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e nɔ vɛwu tawun ɖɔ lɛ kɛ mɛ
nujlɛdonuwu enɛ nu ɖo nukun wɛ jehovah ɖe ɖo mi si e mi
xa matie
jezu tinmɛ nyi wɛn ɖɔ enyi mi hwɛ kɛ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ hwenu hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe ɖe tiin bɔ mi wa mɔ e a ɔ jehovah kun hwɛ kɛ mi lɔ o
xo enɛ tamɛ mɛ tawun
mi nɔ cyɔn alɔ buninɔ xɔ akwɛ enɛ ji hwenu mi hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ jezu mi gbɔn e e
enyi mi hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi nyi fifa kan
flin we elɔ pɔlu ɖe xa mɛ e e ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo do gan fifa dɔn ca bɔ nyi ɖokpo ɔ do hɛn buteninɔ gbigbɔ ɔ ɖo
efɛ ðo flin sin taan elɔ mɛ ɖo taji ɔ zan mɛ e blo flin ɔ e ɔ tamɛ tawun do nɔ wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e wu
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ nɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ kun nɔ hɛn mɛ do xomɛ o a
e tuun mi ɖɔ nɔ do gan tawun nɔ so nu fifa kpo buninɔ kpo a
nukanbyɔ taji tawun ji mi tamɛ do ɖo taan elɔ mɛ ɖo xwe ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɛ
mi sixu ɖɔ mi nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ ɖo wanyiyi mɛ gbɔn
ali ɛnɛgɔ mi nɔ so nu buninɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi gbɔn wanyiyi jehovah mawu wanyiyinɔ ɔ ɖɔhun gblamɛ
jaan mi jlo gbeɖe ɖɔ do mawu mitɔn lɛ wu ɖɔ ɖo yi wan nu ɖo nyi nɔvi lɛ wutu nu e ɖɔ nugbo ɔ yi wan nu a
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ e kun ɖɔ kpowun ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ mɔ miɖee gbɔ o
loɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ wa ɖo wanyiyi mɛ
vogbingbɔn ɖe
ðo agun mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ alɔkpa lɛ bi wɛ jehovah dɔn wa eɖee
jaan ðo jehovah dɔn wutu ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e yi wan nu
etɛwu mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu mitɔn ɖe kun jɛxa wanyiyi mitɔn o
mi ɖo ci wanyiyi jehovah ɖegbe nu mi ɖɔ mi e ji a jaan
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ e wa blo flin gudo tɔn ɖe
gbe ɖokpo wa su bɔ e blo flin azɔn gudo tɔn ɔ
mi wa gbɔn tuun
ðo wema nukɔntɔn pɔlu kɔlɛntinu lɛ e mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ nu klisanwun yi do ɖe lɛ ɖɔ nu nɔ flin ku jezu tɔn xwewu xwewu ɔ ku aklunɔ ku ɔ jla wɛ ɖe jɛ hwenu e wa do ɔ kɔ
xokwin wa ɔ nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ kpo jawe xo jezu ɖɔ ɖo tɔn kunkpla vivɔnu ɔ sin hwenu e mɛ e kpo
mɛ mawu lɛ e xixokple enɛ ɖo gesi do hwenu klisanwun yi do ɖe ɖeɖee kpo ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji lɛ e bi mɔ ajɔ jixwe tɔn yetɔn yi e wɛ
nu enɛ jɛ ɖo ɖaxo ɔ sin akpaxwe nukɔntɔn ɔ gudo e jɛ jɛ nukɔn nu ahwan haamagedɔni tɔn
enɛ gudo ɔ lɛ nu jezu ahwan xa axɔsu ayikungban ɔ ji tɔn lɛ ɖu
nuɖe flin gudo tɔn e blo jɛ nukɔn nu mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ xixokple do jixwe e wɛ nyi gudo tɔn ɔ ɖo jezu wa
etɛwu kanɖeji wa flin xwe elɔ mɛ tɔn tɛnmɛ
nu mi kanɖeji ɖu le flin ɔ tɔn gbɔn tɛn tɔn mɛ yiyi ɖo mars gblamɛ
nu mi byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e mi bonu mi kpo ɖo buninɔ ɖo togun tɔn mɛ so wɛ
flin ɖɔ gbe ɖokpo wa su bɔ mi blo flin gudo tɔn ɔ
din ɔ nu mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi yi tɛn tɔn mɛ nu buninɔ sin vivi e nɔ ɖu ɖo flin ɔ hwenu e xɔ akwɛ nu mi
ðo riberalta ɔ asu kpo asi kpo gbexosin we ɖo wema lɛ do jɔmɛhun ɖe mɛ wɛ
mawu mitɔn mi ɖo kpikpa wɛ ɖo nyikɔ towe ɖagbeɖagbe ɔ su wɛ
etɛwu jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi nu xɔ akwɛ mitɔn lɛ emi
hwexonu tɔn lɛ nɔ gudo nu jehovah sin lɛ tɔn ɖo akwɛ linu gbɔn
tutoblonunu ɔ nɔ zan akwɛ e nɔ egbe lɛ e gbɔn
jehovah nɔ zan nuɖokan tɔn lɛ kpo kpo gbɔn
jehovah nyi mawu ɖe
nu mi ɖo lɛ e bi wɛ nyi etɔn
jehovah tɔn wɛ nyi sika lɛ bi kpo ganvɔ lɛ bi kpo etɔn wɛ nyi ayidɔkun lɛ bi bɔ e nɔ zan do mi nu hudo mi bɔ mi ɖu vivi tɔn lɛ e ðɛh
ajee gege ɖo biblu mɛ jehovah zan nuɖokan tɔn lɛ ɖo nujiwu linu do togun tɔn gbɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ nu ɖebu hwedo a
jehovah jezu bɔ e blo nujiwu nuɖuɖu mɛ tlɛ mɔ akwɛ do su hudo ɖe sin do
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
jehovah ɖo nuɖokan ɖo dogbo a e nɔ zan do kpe nukun do nuɖiɖo tɔn ayikungban ji tɔn lɛ wu
e ɖo co e byɔ tɔn lɛ ɖɔ zan nuɖokan yetɔn lɛ do nɔ gudo nu tutoblonunu emitɔn tɔn
xota elɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ
nu mi nɔ gudo nu jehovah tɔn ɔ etɛ ɛ wɛ mi ɖe nɛ
mi nɔ nu jehovah ɖo mi yi wan bɔ nu e nɔ wa nu mi lɛ e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ wu
nu mi gbeje nu jehovah wa do takun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e bi xwii ɔ e nɔ jiwu nu mi tawun
hwenu axɔsu davidi ɖo nu tinmɛ do hudo tiin ɖo tɛmpli e ja gbigba gbe e sin ali lɛ e wu wɛ e ɔ e yi gbe ɖɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ nyi nu mi ɖo lɛ e bi le nu mi tlɛ nu ɖebu jehovah ɔ nu e mi lɛ e mɛ jɛn mi ɖe nu sin ɛ xa
biblu ɖɔ nu wanyiyi nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ e nyi akpaxwe taji sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ tɔn ɖe gbɔn
nu nina nɔ ɖe jehovah sinsɛn mitɔn
jehovah gbɔn mɔyizi ji ɖegbe nu akɔta izlayɛli tɔn ɖɔ nɔ wa nukɔn emitɔn ɖo nuwiwa xwewu xwewu tɔn atɔn lɛ wu
etɛwu nu nina mɛ nɔ wa ɖagbe nu mi
fɔtoo ɖo e
nunamɛ nɔ wa ɖagbe nu mi
nux nwt
mi sixu tamɛ do vi vu ɖe akwɛ sin akwɛ kpɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ ɛ e mɛ e ɖe ji
e nɔ su nukun tɔn lɛ tɔn mɛ
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ jehovah ɖesu nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nu xɔ akwɛ mitɔn lɛ nina emi nɔ wa ɖagbe nu mi
ðo biblu sin taan mɛ ɔ togun mawu tɔn ze ɖagbe jɔ fun do tuto xɔgbigba tɔn tawun tawun ɖe lɛ mɛ gbɔn
nɔ gudo nu tɔn gbɔn
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ togun jehovah tɔn nɔ nu do nɔ gudo nu tɔn
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ togun jehovah tɔn nu ɖo tuto xɔgbigba tɔn tawun tawun ɖe lɛ wu
ðo axɔsu joasi hwenu ɔ lɛ zan akwɛ e xokple lɛ e do xwe jehovah tɔn bloɖo
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɔ togun jehovah tɔn nu do nɔ gudo nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nukɔn nu ɔ lɛ e
ðo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ ɔ levii vi lɛ nɔ ɖu gu akɔta kpo lɛ e nɔ ɖu gbɔn e a
ɖokpo ɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ nawe ɖe lɛ nɔ nu ɖo lɛ do do alɔ jezu kpodo ahwanvu tɔn wewe lɛ kpan luk
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ fi vovo wɛ nunina mɔhun lɛ nɔ gosin
hwenu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo fun jɔ do goxɔ ɔ gbigba mɛ wɛ ɖo gbetotlo ɔ mɛ e ɔ nu hɛn sin ejipu lɛ e sixu ɖo nu lɛ e mɛ
mi sixu wa nu jehovah nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ ɖo biblu sin taan mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun gbɔn
nu nɔ ci nu do wu e jɔ bɔ nɔ nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ sin e wu
egbe ɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi lɔ nu ɖo linlin tawun tawun ɖe lɛ wu
ði ɔ e blo tuto gba kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe bɔ agun towe zan wɛ a
alo e jlo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn zan wɛ ɖe din e bloɖo wɛ a
mi sixu se ɖɔ e ɖo hudo akwɛ tɔn alaxɔ ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ e bloɖo zan do ɖaxo mi xwe e ɖe tamɛ alo do nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɖo adla ɖe gudo
mi nɔ nu do nɔ gudo nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo wa wɛ ɖo hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn kpo alaxɔ lɛ kpo mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ lɛ e
nunina mitɔn lɛ nɔ lɛ gbexosin titewungbe lɛ kpo mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo lɛdo tɔn sin wa wɛ lɛ e kpo
mi mɛ bi sixu nɔ gudo nu jehovah ɖo wiwa wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ e
mɛ gege nɔ nu nɔ ɖe yeɖee a
mi nɔ lɔn bonu mɛɖe nɔ tuun ɖɔ mi ɖo akwɛ do gba ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ e mɛ wɛ a alo mi sixu nu gbɔn jw org ji
mi sixu ɖɔ nu kpɛ wɛ mi ɖe e kun nuɖe o
nɔvi mitɔn lɛ jɛ mɛ tlɛ ɖo mɛ lɛ e ji ci masedwaninu ɖeɖee nuɖe ɖo si a cobɔ byɔ ɖɔ e jɔwu emi bonu emi nu hun alɔ do nu nugbo lɛ e ɖɔhun kɔ
nɔ blo tuto nu akwɛ mɔ e nɔ zan e jɛxa gbɔn e
e ɖe afɔ ɖe lɛ mɔ tɛn do ganjɛwu ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo akwɛ ɔ ma wɛ lɛ e kpe nukun do nu lɛ bi wu kpo gbejininɔ kpo e nyi nu nɔ aklunɔ nukunmɛ ɔ kɛɖɛ wɛ blo a loɔ blo nu nɔ lɛ nukunmɛ e
xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
gbɔn ɛsidlasi kpo pɔlu kpo tɔn xwixwedo gblamɛ ɔ tutoblonunu mitɔn nɔ xwedo tuto tawun tawun ɖe lɛ hwenu jlo kpe nukun do nunina lɛ wu zan e
nukun tɛ mi ɖo do sin tutoblonunu ɔ xwe nu lɛ ɖo agaɖanu din e
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn
ðo xwe gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ e blo tuto jiwu lɛ e gege
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ wa byɔ ɖɔ akwɛ sin gba ɔ mɛ e hu ee wa mɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ tutoblonunu ɔ nɔ ali ɖeɖee e ɖe akwɛzinzan lɛ kpo ɖe e nɔ sin xwe nu ɔ mɔ tɛn do zan nu hun alɔ do lɛ e do wa nu gege
nunina towe lɛ nɔ nɔ gudo nu wa gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ wɛ mi ɖe e akpaxwe
etɛ lɛ e nɔ zan nunina towe lɛ do wa
ali tɛ lɛ ɖu le nu enɛ lɛ tɔn ɖe
ðo xwe gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ bɔ jw org kpo televiziɔn jw tɔn kpo
e ɖe les saintes ecritures du monde nouveau do gbe gege mɛ
ðo ɔ e blo akɔjɔkple tɔn azan atɔn tɔn xota tɔn nyi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn nɔ mya nukun nu jɛ nukɔn
mɛ ɖeɖee yi tɛn enɛ lɛ mɛ lɛ e ɔ e jiwu nu bɔ sixu a
mɛ gege ɖɔ le tobutobu ɖu wɛ ɖe ɖo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn mɛ e su nukun yetɔn mɛ e
ði ɔ asu kpo asi kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɖo asie sin to ɖe mɛ e ɖɔ do televiziɔn jw tɔn wu ɖɔ toxo kpɛvi ɖe mɛ wɛ e ɖe nu mi
enɛ ɔ wu ɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mi lin do tutoblonunu ɔ nɔ yawu wɔn jehovah tɔn gblo ada sɔ e
ee mi jɛ tuto vovo nɔ din gbɔn televiziɔn jw tɔn ji lɛ e ji e ɔ e nɔ flin mi ɖɔ mi ɖo kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e ɖe mɛ
televiziɔn jw tɔn ɔ nɔ jiwu nu nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo mitɔn ɖo xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖesu
hwɛhwɛ wɛ mi nɔ se bɔ nɔ ɖɔ ɖo tuto sunmɛ sunmɛ tɔn ɖe kpinkpɔn gudo ɖɔ emi sɛkpɔ mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn wɛ e ɖo gbigba wɛ alo ɖo bloɖo wɛ
hwenu agun honduras tɔn sin lɛ jɛ kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn yetɔn ɔ zan ji e ɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ tawun ɖo mi mɔ ɖɔ mi nyi akpaxwe xwedo jehovah tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e tɔn nɔ ɖu vivi kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn enɛ jiwu e tɔn nu enɛ lɛ bi bɔ mi nɔ ku ɖɔ mi ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ e wa huzu aɖi
mɛ gege nɔ ɖe nusumɛnukunmɛ mɔhun hwenu mɔ biblu alo wema ɖevo lɛ bɔ e lilɛ do gbe yeɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ ɖu le ɖe tɔn alo mɔ le nɔ sin kunnuɖiɖe ɖo toxo ɖaxo lɛ kpo kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn kpo mɛ e
tutoblonunu ɔ ɖo nu wa gbɔn wɛ ɖo egbe e nyi wɛn ɖɔ jehovah ɖo gudo nu ɔ gbɔn
e vɛwu nu lɛ bɔ ɖi ɖɔ nu e kpo jlo kpo lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ e nɔ zan do wa enɛ lɛ bi
hwenu ɖaxo ɖe tɔn yi wemazinxɔsa mitɔn ɖe e ɔ e jiwu ɖɔ lɛ kpo nu e kpo jlo kpo lɛ e wɛ e nɔ zan do lɛ bi kun nɔ blo tuto nu dɔn akwɛ wa lɛ e ɖe tɔn o e
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu wa wɛ mi ɖe e kun sixu blo o
nugbo wɛ
mi tuun ɖɔ gudo jehovah ɖe nu ɔ e kɛɖɛ wɛ bɔ nu do ɖo nyi wɛ jɔb
nu mi nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɔ nyɔna tɛ lɛ mi nɔ mɔ
mi sixu vi mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ lɛ kpo bɔ lɔ gbɔn
jehovah mi su hun ali ɔ nu mi bɔ mi nɔ gudo nu ɖaxo wa wɛ e ɖe ɖo egbe e
jehovah ɖɔ mɛ nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ e ɔ e nu bɔ e
xota elɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu gbɔn
jehovah tɔn wɛ nyi nu mi ɖo lɛ e bi
hwenu mɛ lɛ ɖo nu wɛ nu tɛmpli ɔ e ɔ nu yeɖesunɔ ɖo jlo jehovah ɔ do xomɛhunhun nu ɖo kpo xomɛ kpo
nu mi kpo ɖo awajijɛ mɔ wɛ gbɔn nu jehovah mi lɛ e ɛ gblamɛ
nu nu togun jehovah do ɖo mawu e ðɛh
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu wanyiyi zɛ xwe wu e ɖiɖo nu miɖee gbɔn
etɛwu mɛ yi wan nu akwɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ a
mi sixu jlo mi nɔ ɖo nu gbɛɖuɖu e gbɔn
etɛwu taan mɛ mi ɖe e gbɔn vo nu tɔn lɛ bi
taan mɛ mi ɖo nɔ ɖe wɛ e gbɔn vo nu tɔn lɛ bi
biblu ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ jehovah ɖo mɛ wɔbuwɔbu ɖe xokple wɛ gosin to lɛ bi mɛ gosin akɔta lɛ bi mɛ gosin togun lɛ bi mɛ gosin gbe e nɔ do lɛ bi mɛ
e mɔ bonu gege wa yi wan nu mawu kpo nɔzo yetɔn kpo gbɔn a
wanyiyi masɔgbe tɛ nɔ do gesi mɛ ɖeɖee jɛ zɔ nu mawu lɛ e
mawuxowema ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo azan mitɔn gbe ɔ mɛ jɛ zɔ nu mawu lɛ e nɔ ɖe wanyiyi masɔgbe mɛ cejɛnnabi ɖe e
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ ðo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ emitɔn jɛn alo nɔ yi wan nu yeɖee nwt nɔ yi wan nu akwɛ nɔ yi wan nu gbɛɖuɖu hu yi wan nu mawu tim
wanyiyi cejɛnnabi tɔn enɛ nyi ɖokpo ɔ kpo wanyiyi klisanwun tɔn kpo a flijɛ tɔn wɛ
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota elɔ mɛ etɛwu
pɔlu tuun wanyiyi cejɛnnabi tɔn ɔ gbakpe e ɖɔ ɖɔ e sixu wa nu do klisanwun lɛ wu
enɛ wu ɔ e nu mi ɖɔ mi lɛkɔ sin nɔ ɖe wanyiyi masɔgbe lɛ e gudo tim
mi sixu ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ sin linlin do mi e do gan bɔ nu mitɔn jehovah mawu wanyiyinɔ ɔ sin nukunmɛ gbɔn
nu mi gbeje vogbingbɔn ɖo wanyiyi mawu ɖɔ mi ɖo e kpo wanyiyi xo e ɖɔ ɖo timɔtee mɛ e kpo
wiwa mi bɔ mi wanyiyi mi ɖo ɖo nyi wanyiyi alɔkpa nɔ hɛn awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ wa e ɛ jlaɖo
etɛwu e nyla ɖɔ e ɖo wanyiyi ɖo ji e nu mɛɖee a
lɛ nɔ yi wan nu yeɖee wɛ ɔ wlan
e nyla ɖɔ e yi wan nu mɛɖee wɛ a
jezu ɖɔ yi wan nu nɔzo towe hwiɖesunɔ ɖɔhun
mi xa ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ asu lɛ ɖo yi wan nu asi yetɔn lɛ yi wan nu agbaza yeɖesunɔ tɔn gbɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ wanyiyi sɔgbe e ɖiɖo nu mɛɖee nyi nu ɖagbe
sixu mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu yeɖee zɛ xwe wu lɛ e gbɔn
wan yiyi nu mɛɖee xo e ɖɔ ɖo timɔtee mɛ e nyi wanyiyi alo ee sɔgbe e a
wanyiyi sɔgbe a nyi cejɛnnabi tɔn e wɛ
mɛ yi wan nu yeɖee zɛ xwe wu lɛ e nɔ ayi ɖo yeɖee ji hugan e ɖo nyi gbɔn e xa hlɔmanu lɛ
nɔ keya nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ a
nu nu lɛ yi ganji a ɔ nɔ dohwɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ hwɛ yetɔn lɛ sin gbe yi
biblu ɖe mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu yeɖee lɛ e do ajija nɔ eɖee wun do mɔ yozo nɔ xa tɔn xwiɖixwiɖi lɛ nyite nu mɛ e wu
etɛ lɛ mɛ wan yiyi nu mawu nɔ kɔ do
akɔwe biblu tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ wan yiyi nu mɛɖee wɛ jɛ nukɔn ɖo jijɔ pɔlu bɔ gbakpe ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ e mɛ ɖo eyɛ wɛ nɔ dɔn ɖevo lɛ wa
ɔ wlan ɖɔ nu nu togun jehovah do ɖo mawu e
jehovah nyi mawu awajijɛnɔ ɖe bɔ togun tɔn nɔ ɖe jijɔ enɛ
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu wan yiyi nu miɖesunɔ gbɔn
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi gbeje wan mi yi nu mawu e
enyi wanyiyi mi ɖo nu miɖesu e ɖo yɛ cyɔn ee mi ɖo nu mawu e ji wɛ ɔ mi sixu wa gbɔn tuun
mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nɔ zan weɖexamɛ enɛ ɖo gbɛzan mɛ a
ɖo jlo mawu tɔn wa wɛ vɛnavɛna a
nɔ do gan nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo agun ɔ kpo ɔ kpo mɛ a
mɛɖee zize jo nɔ bɔkun hwebinu a
e nɔ byɔ gandido kpo mɛɖee do kpo
etɛ sixu mi awajijɛ hu ɖɔ mi tuun ɖɔ nu mitɔn nɔ wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn nukunmɛ
etɛ wan yiyi nu mawu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ wa
wan yiyi nu mawu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ jo wa ba mɔ akwɛ gege lɛ e do mɔ tɛn do jehovah bi
ericka nɔ nɔ etats unis e nyi dotoo ɖe
e nya tɛn ɖaxo lɛ mɛ gbe ɖo linu a loɔ e huzu gbexosin hwebinu tɔn wa gbɔn to gege mɛ xa asu tɔn
ee e gudo e ɔ e ɖɔ nu gege mi mɔ ɖo hwenu mi ɖo fi e nɔ do jonɔ gbe ɖe e ɖe kpo mi zun lɛ e kpo bɔ nyɔna lɛ gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
etɛwu wan yiyi nu akwɛ nɔ bonu e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ a
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ lɛ nɔ yi wan nu akwɛ
xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie ɔ gbexosin irelande tɔn ɖe ɖɔ xo nu nya ɖe do mawu wu
nya ɔ ɖe akwɛkpo tɔn ɖe akwɛ wemanɔ ɖe lɛ fɔ do ji go ɖɔ mawu ɖie
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mɛ gege ɖɔ xo e ɖɔ e gannaganna a mɛ gege wɛ yi wan nu akwɛ kpo nu e sixu xɔ lɛ e kpo ɖo ɔ mɛ
biblu ɖɔ mɛ yi wan nu akwɛ ɔ akwɛ nɔ kpe e gbeɖe a mɛ yi wan nu dɔkun ɔ nu e ɖo ɔ nɔ kpe e gbeɖe a
mi mɛ bi wɛ ɖo hudo akwɛ tɔn
bi le
mi sixu yawu mɔ nu jɛ hwɛjijɔ wu e byɔ kloklo a e wu
ee e ɖo tintinmɛ wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ emi kun jlo jɛ ajojija mɔ mɛ o ɖo ajo mawu su a
loɔ etɛwu e byɔ dɔkun ɖo ɖɛ tɔn mɛ a
e wlan ɖɔ enyi ɖo nu din ɔ taa wa hu nu ɖɔ jehovah
sixu flin mɛ nɔ ɖeji do mawu wu a bɔ dɔkun yetɔn wu wɛ nɔ ganjɛ lɛ e
we tɛ jezu ɖe xa mɛ do akwɛ wu
mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu akwɛ lɛ e sin nu sixu mawu nukunmɛ a
sixu mawu dɔkun a
e ɖɔ jɛ nukɔn nu enɛ ɖɔ kple dɔkun ɖo ayikungban ji fi nuvinuvi nɔ ɖu nu ɖe bɔ nu nɔ jɛko ɖe bɔ nɔ do nɔ nu ɖe ɔ o
gbɛzan bɔkun e ɖe zinzan sixu bɔ mawu sinsɛn gbɔn
mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ e kun nyi awajijɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ bɔkun e zinzan nɔ hɛn wa nu mɛ o loɔ e nɔ bɔ e nɔ mɔ hwenu do jehovah
ee nɔ nɔ etats unis e sa xwe ɖaxo e ɖo e kpo tɔn kpo ɖo e tuun ɖɔ wiwa bɔ emi wa gbexosin xa asi emitɔn
nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ nɔ lɛkɔ wa xwegbe kpo kpo ɖo tagba tɔn lɛ wutu
hwebinu wɛ asi nyi gbexosin hwebinu tɔn ɖe e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ tawun
e nɔ ɖɔ gan ɖagbe hugan ɔ wɛ ɖo
din ɔ nyiɖesu nyi gbexosin ɖe bɔ mi mɛ we lɛ ɖo wa nu mɛ ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e wɛ nyi jehovah
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu wan yiyi nu akwɛ gbɔn
mi sixu gbeje linlin mi nɔ ɖo do akwɛ wu e gbɔn
do gbeje linlin mi nɔ ɖo do akwɛ wu e ɔ e ɖɔ mi mi xosin nu nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ gbɔn e ɖi nu nu nu biblu ɖɔ do akwɛ wu e doo nɔ zan sɔgbe xa a
akwɛ biba wɛ nɔ mya nukun nu mi jɛ nukɔn ɖo gbɛzan mɛ a
nu agbaza tɔn lɛ nɔ xɔ akwɛ nu mi hu kancica ɖo xa jehovah kpo togun tɔn kpo e wɛ a
ɖeji do jehovah wu doo ɖɔ e kpe nukun do hudo lɛ wu a
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ e kun flu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo nukun lɛ e o
e ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ mɛ gege nɔ yi wan nu gbɛɖuɖu egbe
jehovah ɖɔ mi su nu bɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ lɛ e bi sin ali do miɖee alo ɖo wu zɔ nu bi a
biblu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu lɛ ɖɔ hun ɖu nu kpo awajijɛ kpo vɛɛn towe kpo xomɛhunhun kpo nut
gbɛɖuɖu alɔkpa tɛ xo timɔtee ɖɔ
ðo timɔtee mɛ ɔ e do gesi gbɛɖuɖu gbe nyinya nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e wɔn nu mawu e
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ wemafɔ ɔ kun ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ lɛ yi wan nu gbɛɖuɖu hu mawu o wɛ e ɖɔ ɔ enɛ ɖɔ yi wan nu mawu ɖo ba ɖe mɛ
loɔ e ɖɔ hu yi wan nu mawu alo hu ɖɔ yi wan nu mawu alɛnuwema
akɔwe ɖe wlan ɖɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wemafɔ enɛ kun ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ yi wan nu mawu ɖo ba ɖe mɛ o
ɖiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ kun yi wan nu mawu ɖebu o
akpagbanumɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo wanyiyi zɛ xwe wu e ɖo nu gbɛɖuɖu wɛ lɛ e
tɛ jezu ɖo gbɛɖuɖu kpaxwe
jezu ɖɔ emi ɖo linlin ɖo ji bɔ nu bi vɔ e do gbɛɖuɖu wu
e yi alɔwliwli ɖe kpo ɖaxo ɖokpo kpo tɛnmɛ
jezu jo eɖee do nu gbɛɖuɖu gbɛzinzan a
e jehovah ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ zan eɖesu bi degbedegbe do takun mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn mɛ
bonu mɛ gege do nɔ ɔ e eɖee jo kpo jlo kpo dɛ ɖo ku e ku ɖo yatin ji e
jezu ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee xwedo afɔdomɛ tɔn lɛ e ɖɔ nu nu hwenu e wa ɖo zun wɛ ɖo ɖedo wɛ ɖo nuvu bi ɖo do wɛ ɖo nyɛ wutu e
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu wan yiyi nu gbɛɖuɖu gbɔn
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi gbeje le do mi yi wan nu gbɛɖuɖu e
mi sixu gbeje le do mi yi wan nu gbɛɖuɖu e gbɔn
e ɖɔ mi kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ kple lɛ kpo kunnuɖegbe tɔn kpo wɛ nɔ gbɔn gudo bɔ ayiɖeɖayi lɛ nɔ jɛ nukɔn nu mi a
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ bɔ fɛn do nyiɖee ɖo nu enɛ lɛ kpaxwe ɖo jlo mawu wutu a
nɔ tamɛ do jehovah nu nɔ do ɖe ayi lɛ e gbɔn e ji a
nu mi yi wan nu mawu nugbo ɔ enyi nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ a lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ mi nyi alɔ a loɔ mi nyi alɔ nu nu mi mɔ ɖɔ e sixu lɛ e xa matie
mɛ ɖetɛ lɛ sixu ɖo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ gbeɖe a
ee lɛ nɔ mɛ nu xwe gudo din e ɔ sataan tɔn sin vivɔnu ya
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo wanyiyi zɛkpa e nu yeɖee akwɛ kpo gbɛɖuɖu kpo lɛ e wɛ ayikungban ɔ ji
akpakpa nɔ ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ wɛ do nu sixu ɖo lɛ e wu bɔ jlo yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ
e wa ɔ e ci ɖɔ gbɔn e ɖɔhun wɛ nu nu mɛ mawu jakɔbu tɔn nyi ganjɛwu e mɛ nukunɖiɖo tɔn bi do jehovah mawu tɔn ji e ðɛh
wan yiyi nu mawu nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu gbɔn
enɛ wɛ ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ bɔ zaanɖe din ɔ nyɔna e sixu a lɛ e ayikungban ɔ ji
awajijɛ adodwe nɔ ayi sɔyi e wɛ jlo mawu tɔn wiwa nɔ mɛ bɔ enɛ tuuntuun nɔ bɔ mi nɔ hɛn xomɛ acɛbinɔ ɔ tɔn hun
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yi wan nu jehovah lɛ e ɖo awajijɛ sɔyi
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi gbeje jijɔ ɖeɖee wanyiyi cejɛnnabi tɔn nɔ dɔn wa lɛ e nyi flijɛ jijɔ ɖeɖee jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ lɛ e tɔn gbɔn e
mɔ vogbingbɔn ɖo hwɛjijɔnɔ lɛ kpodo mɛdida lɛ kpo tɛntin e
linlin mi nɔ ɖo do miɖesunɔ wu e mɛ gbɔn
mi nɔ wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɛn e mɛ gbɔn
mi nɔ do gan bɔ jijɔ mitɔn gbɛn e mɛ gbɔn
tagba tɛ togun mawu tɔn nɔ mɔ ɖo egbe
dotoogan gege nɔ ɖo fi jɛmɛji ɖo nu gba ɖe wɛ lɛ e
nɔ kpe nukun do azinzɔnnɔ lɛ wu ɖo wutu
e ɖo co nu ɖo wa wɛ ɔ ɖo cyɔn alɔ yeɖee ji wa azɔn gble wɛ ɖe e o
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi mɛ gege ɖo ɖo wa xa mɛ ɖeɖee linlin yetɔn kpo jijɔ yetɔn lɛ kpo sɔgbe xa jijɔ mawu tɔn lɛ a e wɛ
enɛ nɔ do tagba nu mi tawun
ðo wema wegɔ pɔlu timɔtee e mɛ ɔ e tinmɛ jijɔ nɔ do gesi mɛ ɖeɖee jɛ zɔ nu mawu lɛ e e ɖɔ jijɔ enɛ lɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
xa timɔtee
