nugbo wɛ ɖɔ ɖo jijɔ enɛ lɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ wutu ɔ e sixu ci kliwun nu mi nuwalɔ kpo linlin mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo jijɔ mɔhun lɛ e tɔn kpo sixu wa nu do mi wu nux
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do jijɔ nɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ e nyi flijɛ jijɔ togun mawu tɔn ɖo lɛ e tɔn gbɔn e wu
mi mɔ mi sixu ɖo alɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo fɛɛ cobo cyɔn alɔ miɖee ji bonu jijɔ yetɔn nyanya lɛ wa wa nu do mi wu o gbɔn e
mɛ ɖetɛ lɛ do gesi wɛ jijɔ xo e ɖɔ ɖo timɔtee mɛ lɛ e ɖe
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ hwenu vɛwu lɛ tiin ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ e jijɔ nyanya ɖeɖee do gesi mɛ lɛ ɖo taan enɛ lɛ mɛ e
nu pɔlu ɖo wema e timɔtee e mɛ e ɖɔhun ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ jijɔ ɖeɖee e do wema e timɔtee e mɛ e ɔ jijɔ ɖeɖee e mɔ ɖo fi ɖevo ɖebu ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ a lɛ e
pɔlu jijɔ nyi mawu tɔn a lɛ e kpo xogbe elɔ kpo lɛ nɔ
enɛ ɖɔ sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo bi wɛ nɔ ɖe jijɔ mɔhun lɛ
e ɖo co lɛ bi wɛ nɔ ɖo jijɔ mɔhun lɛ a
klisanwun nugbo lɛ ɖo jijɔ gbɔn vo tawun lɛ e xa malacii
sixu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yigo zɛ xwe wu lɛ e gbɔn
alɔkpa mɔhun lɛ nɔ jlo ɖesu ɖɔ e nɔ si emi emi
akɔwe ɖe wlan do mɛ goyiyi ayi tɔn mɛ e ɖe wu ɖɔ vɔsakpe kpɛvi ɖe ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ bɔ e nɔ nu eɖee ɖo finɛ
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ goyiyi zɛ xwe wu nyla tawun bɔ mɛ tlɛ nyi mɔ goyiyi mɔhun ɖo mɛɖe si ɔ e nɔ mɔ
mɛ tlɛ nyi lɛ e sixu huzu gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah nɔ wan nu goyiyi
goyiyi nɔ su ali do mɛ bɔ e nɔ sixu sɛkpɔ mawu a
ðɛh jijɔ awovi tɔn wɛ
oziyasi nyi axɔsu judaa tɔn ɖe e nɔ gbeji nu xwe mɔkpan
loɔ biblu ɖɔ ee acɛkpikpa tɔn jinjɔn ayi ɔ e jɛ go yi ji eɖee nyi gbe
e nɔ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah mawu tɔn a e wa jɛ gbe ɖokpo bɔ e hun yi jehovah xwegbe jlo do ɖo vɔsakpe ji
nukɔnmɛ ɔ axɔsu ezekiyasi ɖesu jɛ afɔ tɛ ayi ji taan klewun ɖe jɛn e wa
etɛ lɛ sixu bɔ davidi huzu etɛwu e yigo a
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ huzu ɖo ɖɛkpɛ mɛ gege tuun ɖo nuwukpikpe hanjiji tɔn ɖo wu alo ɖo tɛn ɖaxo mɛ wutu
davidi ɖo nuwukpikpe enɛ lɛ ɖokpo kpowun a bi wɛ e ɖo e eɖee hwe ɖo gbɛzan tɔn bi mɛ
ee e hu goliyati gudo bɔ axɔsu sawulu vi nyɔnu tɔn ɛ bonu e nyi asi tɔn e ɔ davidi ɖɔ nyi mɛɖe a
daa xwedo ɔ kpo hɛnnu tɔn kpo nyi nuti ɖo izlayɛli a
nyɛ nyi axɔsu sin vi
etɛ davidi bɔ e eɖee hwe
enyi davidi ɖo jijɔ nuwukpikpe kpo wujɔmɛ lɛ kpo ɔ mawu nya alo eɖee hwe wutu tɔn wutu wɛ ðɛh
etɛ mi bɔ mi ɖe mɛɖesɔhwe
davidi ɖɔhun ɔ mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ do gan egbe ɖe mɛɖesɔhwe
tuun mi tuun ɖɔ jehovah mɛ hugan mɛ bi ɖo wɛkɛ ɔ mɛ e nɔ ɖe jijɔ nɔ dɔn mɛ nyi mɛɖesɔhwe e e nɔ jiwu nu mi
mi tuun ɖɔ wanyiyi kun nɔ jla ajɔ nu eɖee o e kun nɔ yigo o kɔ
enyi mi nɔ miɖee hwe ɔ enɛ sixu bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ sɛkpɔ jehovah
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ totlitli nu lɛ gbɔn ɖo egbe
etɛ mawuxowema ɔ byɔ vi lɛ ɖɔ wa
pɔlu tinmɛ mɛ ɖo ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ e nɔ wa nu xa yeɖee gbɔn e
e wlan ɖɔ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ vi lɛ nɔ vɛtoli nu lɛ
e nɔ zaan din bɔ e mɔ nu jɛ nugbododo enɛ wu
etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bɔ setonu nu yetɔn lɛ
vi lɛ sixu nya xɛ ɖo yeɖee ji bonu linlin totlitli tɔn ɔ wa nu do wu o gbɔn nu yetɔn lɛ wa nu lɛ e ji linlin tamɛ do gblamɛ
nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖagbe do yetɔn lɛ wu ɔ e sixu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖevo lɛ bɔ lɔ ɖo linlin sɔgbe e do lɔ tɔn lɛ wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖo wanyiyi jɔwamɔ tɔn nu vi yetɔn lɛ a ɔ e vɛwu ɖɔ vi lɛ setonu nu sin ayi mɛ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ nu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ ɖo wanyiyi adodwe nu emi ɔ e nɔ ɛ bɔ e nɔ wa nu nɔ hɛn xomɛ yetɔn hun lɛ e e tlɛ nyi hwenu e ɛ bonu e tlito e ɔ nɛ
austin yi gbe ɖɔ nɔ hwɛhwɛ kpa nu nu e ɖo wa lɛ e co lɛ nɔ mi ɖo ji lɛ e nɔ tinmɛ hwɛjijɔ wu lɛ do ɖo ayi e nɔ hun sin ali nyite vaan
enɛ nɔ mi bɔ nɔ setonu
nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nɔ kpe nukun do wutu bɔ enɛ nɔ bɔ nyi lɔ nɔ hɛn xomɛ yetɔn hun
jijɔ nyanya tɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ lɛ kun ɖo wanyiyi nu nɔzo yetɔn lɛ o
ba tɛ mɛ klisanwun nugbo lɛ nɔ yi wan nu nɔzo yetɔn lɛ ɖo
pɔlu jijɔ nyanya ɖevo ɖeɖee ɖɔ mɛ lɛ kun nɔ yi wan nu nɔzo yetɔn lɛ o e
e sɔgbe ɖɔ alɔgudokpɛ dido nu mɛ wɛ bɔ do nu lɛ wu ɖo jijɔ enɛ nɔ ɖe mɛ ɖeɖee xomɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ do wu e nɔ su nukun yetɔn mɛ a lɛ e
lɛ nɔ nɔ gbeji a
nɔ ku nublawu nu mɛ a nɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo jlo dohwɛ gbɔ xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ o
nɔ nyla do mawu wu nɔ sa mɛ ɖu nɔ do xogbe zɛkpa lɛ e alo mɛzunzun xogbe lɛ nu lɛ jɛ mawu ji
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ jehovah lɛ e ci mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo wanyiyi egbe a lɛ e ɖɔhun a ɖo jehovah lɛ ɖo wanyiyi adodwe nu nɔzo yetɔn lɛ
hwebinu wɛ nu enɛ nyi nugbo
xa jaan
jezu ɖe wanyiyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
jezu ɖe wanyiyi ɖaxo mɛ ɖevo lɛ
e jla wɛnɖagbe kunkpla axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn e nu mɛ lɛ sin toxo ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ
e gbɔ azɔn nu lɛ afɔkponɔ lɛ gudunɔ lɛ kpo tokunɔ lɛ kpo
mɛ gege wan nu jezu co e eɖesunɔ tɔn jo do takun yetɔn mɛ
wanyiyi jezu ɖo e ci wanyiyi tɔn e ɖɔhun
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mawu tɔn ɖɔhun mɛ ɖevo lɛ
wanyiyi mi nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ e sixu bɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah gbɔn
wanyiyi mi nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ e nɔ dɔn wa mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ
ði ɔ nya ɖe ɖo thailande bɔ wanyiyi e mɔ ɖo nɔvi lɛ tɛntin ɖo ɖaxo ɖe hwenu e dɔn ɛ tawun
ee e lɛkɔ xwe xwe e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e nɔ wa biblu xa emi azɔn we ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo mɛ
e jla mawuxo nu hɛnnumɔ tɔn lɛ bi bɔ ɖo ɔ gudo ɔ e ɖe bɔ e xa biblu azɔn nukɔntɔn ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ
do gbeje ba mɛ mi nɔ yi wan nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo e ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ nɔ do gan mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo xwedo agun kpo kpo mɛ a
nɔ do gan nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ jehovah nɔ wa gbɔn e a
kanlin jijɔ tɛ lɛ mɛ gege nɔ ɖo egbe
mɛɖe lɛ huzu yeɖee do ɖagbe ji gbɔn
jijɔ ɖeɖee mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ lɛ e nyi hwɛjijɔ ɖevo ɖeɖee wu klisanwun lɛ ɖo nɔ zɔ nu mɛ mɔhun lɛ e
mɛ ɖeɖee nyi mawu a lɛ e nɔ wan nu ɖagbe wiwa alo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ ɖevo lɛ lilɛ gbɔn e ɔ nɔ wan nu ɖagbe alo jɛ agɔ do nuɖagbewiwa lɛ bi
nɔ ɖu ɖo yeɖee ji a nɔ nylahun
mɛ gege ɖo kanlin jijɔ mɔhun lɛ wa yi din ɔ huzu gbɛzan yetɔn ɖo jijɔ ɖagbe lɛ
huzuhuzu ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ ɔ biblu ɖɔ
xa ezayii
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ fifa mɛ ɖe e gbakpe fi bi ɖo jehovah tuuntuun to ɔ
eza ðo kanlin lɛ sixu nu do jehovah wu a wutu ɔ lɛ wɛ enɛ sin jijɛnu ɖo gbigbɔ kpaxwe kan
nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan nɔ huzu gbɛzan mɛtɔn
biblu lɛ bɔ huzu mɛ alɔkpa nyi e gbɔn
mɛ gege tiin nylahun hla ɖɔhun din ɔ nɔ nɔ fifa mɛ xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
sixu xa nu do wu ɖo xota ɖebɔdoɖewu nɔ nyi biblu nɔ huzu gbɛzan mɛtɔn bɔ e nɔ mɔ ɖo jw org ji e mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee wa tuun jehovah nɔ ɛ lɛ e ci mɛ ɖeɖee nyi mawu ɖo nukunta nɔ nu nyi hlɔnhlɔn titewungbe nu sinsɛn ɔ nɔ wa nu ci ɖɔ ɖo mawu wɛ bɔ nuwalɔ yetɔn nɔ nu vo lɛ e ɖɔhun a
e wa ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nylahun lɛ e mɛ mawu blo bɔ e ci eɖesunɔ ɖɔhun ɔ do
nu mɛ lɛ nɔ do mawu wu e nɔ bɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo huzu sɔgbe xa nugbododo tɔn lɛ
e nɔ bɔ nɔ huzu nu ɖi nu lɛ e jijɔ yetɔn lɛ kpo nuwalɔ yetɔn kpo
huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ nɔ bɔkun a gbigbɔ mawu tɔn sixu mɛ ɖeɖee jlo nugbo nugbo wa jlo mawu tɔn lɛ e
mi sixu ɖo wu zɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo jijɔ mawu tɔn a lɛ e bonu wa nu do mi wu o gbɔn
vogbingbɔn ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ mawu kpo mɛ nɔ wa a lɛ e kpo tɛntin e ɖo we jɛ wɛ
mi mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo mawu wɛ lɛ e ɖo miɖee bonu jijɔ gblegble mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wa wa nu do mi wu o
mi nɔ wa nunywɛnu nɔ xwedo weɖexamɛ gosin mawu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi lɛkɔ sin ɖeɖee xo e ɖɔ ɖo timɔtee mɛ lɛ e gudo e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi kun sixu nyi alɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo jijɔ mawu tɔn a lɛ e bi o
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi kpo kpo yi wemaxɔmɛ xa alo nɔ kpo kpo
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu dɔn linlin yetɔn lɛ sixu dɔn mi e kpo nu wiwa ɖɔhun kpo
mi nɔ wa gbɔn kancica ɖagbe ɖe ɖiɖo xa jehovah gblamɛ
cobonu mi ɖo kancica mɔhun ɔ mi ɖo nɔ biblu nɔ do xa mɛ ɖeɖee kanɖeji jehovah lɛ e
mi nɔ ɖɔ xo gbɔn e kpo nuwalɔ mitɔn kpo nɔ hɛn le wa nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn
mi ɖo do gan mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
nɔ zan ali hun nu lɛ e do ɖekunnu byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e nu ɖɔ nu sɔgbe e ɖo hwetɔnnu
mi ɖo nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ nu mi
nu mi nɔ wa ɔ walɔ ɖagbe mitɔn lɛ kpa nu mawu e nyi miɖesu a
e mi ɖɔ mi jo nyanya zinzan kpo jlo gbɛmɛ fi tɔn lɛ kpo do nɔ wa nu sɔgbe e nɔ zan jlɔjlɔ nɔ gbeji nu mawu
xokwin glɛkigbe tɔn e lilɛ do jidomɛ alo hwɛdomɛ e wɛ nyi e zan xokwin enɛ ɖo biblu mɛ bɔ e nyi tɛnmɛ nyikɔ ɖe nu sataan ee nyi ɔ e
ɛɛn e nɔ zan ɖo hweɖelɛnu
mi ɖɔ xo do ɖokpo ji
ɖɔ mɛ ɖo wa nu wɛ ɔ enyi mɛ ɔ nyi mɛmaɖomɛɖe kpo e nyi wamamɔnɔ kpo ɔ mi ɖo tafu a
nu e jɛ hwɛ mitɔn nu jehovah o ɖo hwɛ wɛ e nyi nɔ kɔ nu
e mɔ nuwlanwlan kunkpla hwɛ ylɔylɔ mɔhun ɖe nyi xwe kanweko tɛnwegɔ tɔn e ɖo ɖibla yi acidɔdi
nuwlanwlan ɔ ɖɔ hwenu nyɛ towe ɔ nukun ɔ do mɛ kpe ɖo azan nabi ɖe ɖie e ɔ hoshayahu shobay vi ɔ nyɛ towe sin awu ɖaxo ɔ
enyi tokpɔngan ɔ wa nyi etɔn e lɛkɔ nu awu ɖaxo nyɛ towe tɔn a hun hwɛ ku nublawu nu mi wa
hwɛylɔylɔ enɛ ɔ e nyi kɔlilɛ nu awu ɖaxo jɛ ɖɔkplɛ mɛ e ɖe tɔn xo kɛɖɛ ɖɔ nu mi wɛ e ɖe a wɛ hwenuxo simon schama ɖɔ
ði nu setonu nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo ðɔhun
tuun jehovah nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo tuun gbɔn e a
nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo mɔ tagba ɖokpo ɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo egbe lɛ e gege
etɛ bɔ nɔ gbeji setonu
wa tuun jehovah ganji bɔ e sin enɛ wu bɔ nu ɖebu sixu wa nu do gbeji ɖe e wu a gbɔn
xota we elɔ lɛ nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ
gbɛzan tɔn jehovah kpe nu bi wu
etɛ nyi tinmɛ e nyi gbigbɔ tɔn tɔn
yi nukɔn huzu gbigbɔ tɔn ðe
ðo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi nyi e kpo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ sixu mi e kpo
enɛ gudo ɔ ɖo xota wegɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ mi do nu mi sixu nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe enɛ ɖo gbɛzinzan mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn mɛ gbɔn e
awajijɛ jijɔ mawu nɔ mɛ e ðe
nɔwee
daniyɛli
etɛwu mi sixu mɔ akɔnkpinkpan ɖo nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo tɔn mɛ
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ mɛ ezekiyɛli wlan xo ɖo ezekiyɛli mɛ e ɖe
ðo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖe lɛ ɖi azɔn akwɛyozo alo yadonumɛ ɖi xwi xa wɛ vlafo wɛ a
e nɔ vɛwu nu hweɖelɛnu bɔ kpo ɖo awajijɛ nɔ ɖo ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ e ɖo wɛ wɛ a
enyi ɔ nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo tɔn akɔnkpinkpan
e ɖo co zunfan gbejininɔ yetɔn huzu nuɖiɖi kpo tonusise kpo tɔn ɖo mawu nukunmɛ xa ezekiyɛli
ezekiyɛli wlan xogbe nyi xota ji mi ɖo xo ɖɔ do wɛ e ɖo babilɔnu ɖo ezek
jeluzalɛmu toxo ɔ sin kun susu do xo e ɖɔ e sin jijɛnu sɛkpɔ nu nyi ɖo
mɛ klewun ɖe jɛn tamɛ do jujɔ nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo tɔn ji bɔ e ɖo wuntun nukɔn nu bɔ gan ezek
jelemii baluki evɛdi mɛlɛki kpo hlekavu vi lɛ kpo ɖo mɛ klewun enɛ lɛ mɛ
ɖokpo ɔ ɖo egbe ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee jehovah do mɔ mɛ hwɛ ɖe ɖo kɔ a bɔ ci nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo ɖɔhun lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ e ɖo wuntun bɔ gan hwenu e su kun do nu elɔ e nuɖe
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi nu wu jehovah mɛ enɛ lɛ do mɔ nujlɔjlɔwiwa tɔn e
hwenu mi ɖo xo ɖɔ do mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ji wɛ e ɔ mi ayi ɖo mɛ gbɔn din lɛ e kpo mi sixu ɖi nu setonu ɖɔhun gbɔn e kpo ji
tɛ lɛ mɛ nɔwee gbɔn etɛwu dɛ e dɛ e jiwu
mɛ nɔwee gbɔn din lɛ e
ðo daagbo daagbo nɔwee tɔn henɔci hwenu ɔ lɛ hɛn tawun
dakaxixo ɖo jijɛji wɛ
ðo nɔwee hwenu ɔ daka kpe ayikungban ɔ bi ji
wɛnsagun nyanya lɛ gbaza do asi bɔ ji wɛnsagun adaɖe adaɖe ee nyla hun lɛ e
jehovah xomɛ do nɔwee wu
mi tamɛ do nu ɖɔ wɛ xo enɛ ɖe do nya enɛ wu e ji
nɔwee yi xa mawu ɖo nyanya enɛ jɛ nukɔn nu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ e mɛ nu xwe alo xwe mɛ gege nɔ nɔ xɔ ɖo egbe e kpowun a
ali tɛ lɛ nɔwee ɖe akɔnkpinkpan ɖaxo ɖe
nɔwee zan gbɛzan ɖagbe kpowun a e nɔ ɖɔ mawu ɖɔ mɛ lɛ zan gbɔn ɔ sin xo kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo nɔ ɖe nuɖiɖi e ɖo nu jehovah e ɖo agbawungba
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ e ɖo hwɛ nu ɔ gbɔn nuɖiɖi e ɖo ɔ gblamɛ
hwenu nɔwee ɖo tɔjihun ɖaxo ɔ blo wɛ e ɔ tɛ lɛ e mɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nɔwee tuun ɖɔ enɛ bɔ e ca nu emi doya nu emi
e ɖo co e setonu wa nu kpo nuɖiɖi kpo
ɖevo nɔwee mɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e kpe nukun do asi tɔn kpo vi tɔn lɛ kpo wu ɖo agbaza lixo
e ɖo co e gbɛzan tɔn bi ɖo nu agbaza tɔn lɛ ji a mawu ji wɛ e ɖo
hwenu e tlɛ ɖo ɖu xwe alo ɖo asi tɔn e kɔn e ɔ e ayi tɔn ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji
e wa nu xwe ɖevo ɖo sinvɔgbɛ ɔ gudo
mi sixu ɖi nu setonu nɔwee ɖɔhun gbɔn
etɛ jehovah nɔ do mɛ nɔ zunfan nugbododo tɔn lɛ e bi wu
mi sixu ɖi nu setonu nɔwee ɖɔhun gbɔn e
jaan e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e nɔ sin gbɛzinzan mitɔn wu bɔ ɔ nɔ wan nu mi
nugbo ɔ mi nɔ jɛhun do mawu tɔn lɛ ji ɖi ɖeɖee kunkpla alɔwliwli kpo nublibliwiwa kpo lɛ e gbɔn e bɔ e ɖɔ nu agɔ lɛ do mi wu ɖo to ɖe lɛ mɛ xa malacii
e ɖo co nɔwee ɖɔhun ɔ mawu wɛ mi nɔ ɖi xɛsi e nyi a
mi tuun ɖɔ eɖokponɔ wɛ mavɔmavɔ mi luk
enyi mɛ lɛ tlɛ ɖo cica nu wɛ alo ɖo xo mɔ ɖɔ do wu wɛ kabi enyi akwɛyozo ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖo nu towe e tɛnkpɔn wɛ ɔ kpo ɖo mawu yi xa wɛ a
enyi ɖi nu setonu nɔwee ɖɔhun ɔ sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah kpe nukun wu fili
ɖiɖe ɖo e
mɛ daniyɛli gbɔn din lɛ e
daniyɛli nɔ kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu toxo ɖe wɛ bɔ vodunsinsɛn kpo awovinuwiwa kpo
nu enɛ nu jwifu lɛ jɛ daniyɛli ji e
ɔ nukun ɖo daniyɛli kpo tɔn atɔn lɛ hananiya micaɛli azalya kpo ji din ɖo e bonu nu axɔsu ɔ
nu ɖu e tlɛ lɛ ɖo nyi
zaanɖe kpowun ɔ nuɖuɖu kpo nu e kpo huzu nu
jijɔ ɖagbe tɛ lɛ daniyɛli
nukun tɛ jehovah do daniyɛli
nu ɖevo vɛwu nu daniyɛli e sixu kunkpla nuwukpikpe bunɔ e ɖo bɔ e sin enɛ wu bɔ e mɔ wujɔmɛ bunɔ ɖe lɛ e
jiɖe mawu ɖo do daniyɛli wu e sɔgbe a
daniyɛli nɔ gbeji setonu jɛ vivɔnu gbɛzan tɔn tɔn
nugbo ɔ xwe tɔn ɖibla yi hwenu wɛnsagun mawu tɔn ɖɔ xo elɔ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo e daniyɛli hwi mɛ mawu yi wan ɔ
ðo nu daniyɛli tɔn mawu nukunmɛ wutu ɔ e blo bɔ e ɛ gan ɖaxo ɖokpo ɖo acɛkpikpa babilɔnu mɛdi kpo pɛsi kpo tɔn mɛ
nu enɛ do gbɔ nu jwifu kannumɔ lɛ jɛ ezekiyɛli ji sɔ hwenu mɔ alɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo nu enɛ mɛ e
jehovah mɛ do gbejininɔ yetɔn wu lɛ e do mɔ mɛ e yi wan lɛ e akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
ali tɛ lɛ ninɔmɛ mitɔn lɛ ci daniyɛli tɔn ɖɔhun ɖe
etɛ daniyɛli tɔn lɛ sin sixu egbe tɔn lɛ
mi sixu ɖi nu setonu daniyɛli ɖɔhun gbɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ mi lɔ nɔ gbɔn vo bɔ mɛ lɛ tlɛ nɔ mi
enyi mi nɔ miɖee hwe nɔ ɖeji do wu tɔn kpo tonusise kpo ɔ mi xɔ akwɛ bɔ e yi wan nu mi lɔ ajee nwt
daniyɛli tɔn lɛ tɔn sixu nu lɛ gbɔn e
nunyanyawiwa gbakpe ɖo judaa hwenu daniyɛli kpo ɖo vu bi e co e su yi wan nu mawu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enɛ kun nyi nukpedonunu ɖe kpowun o
tɔn lɛ ɛ ganji wutu wɛ
enɛ wu ɔ lɛ emi jo gbe do vi mitɔn lɛ kpinkplɔn wu o loɔ kpo suulu kpo
ninɔmɛ vovo tɛ lɛ mɛ jɔbu gbɔn din
mɛ jɔbu gbɔn din lɛ e
ninɔmɛ vovo we mɛ wɛ jɔbu gbɔn ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
e jɛ dɔkun bɔ mɛ gege tuun bɔ e nɔ ɖo sisi tawun
jɔb e ɖo co jɔbu nɔ mɔ eɖee do mɔ nusuɖaxo alo nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo hudo mawu tɔn o a
nugbo ɔ jehovah ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe wɛ e nyi bɔ e nɔ mɔ nu jɛ do ɖe ɖɔ do wu tɔn a e nɔ wa nu jlɔjlɔ e ɖo gbeji nu mi e nɔ hɔn nu nunyanyawiwa jɔb
e byɔ kpo ɖaxo ɖe kpo mɛ
mi tuun nu e sataan ɔ wɛ do hwɛ agɔ jɔbu ɖɔ cejɛnnabi wutu wɛ e ɖo mawu wɛ
jehovah myɔ nukun do hwɛdomɛ nyanya enɛ a
e wa ɔ e hun ali nu jɔbu ɖe gbejininɔ tɔn ɖɔ ayi mɛ cejɛnnabi ɖe a e ɖe wɛ emi bɔ emi ɖo mawu wɛ
etɛ jiwu nu ɖo gbejininɔ jɔbu tɔn mɛ
etɛ jehovah wa nu xa jɔbu gbɔn e do wutu tɔn
sataan doya baɖabaɖa ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖe lɛ nu jɔbu bɔ e sin enɛ wu bɔ jɔbu dohwɛ mawu
ee mɛtɛnkpɔn ɔ fo bi e ɔ jehovah ɛ nu e ɖo jɛ nukɔn nu mɛtɛnkpɔn ɔ lɛ e ɖo donu we ji blo bɔ e nɔ nu xwe jak
ðo taan enɛ lɛ lɔ mɛ ɔ e kpo ɖo eɖee ze jo nu jehovah wɛ bi
jɔbu ku ɖo xwe kanweko mɔkpan gudo cobɔ ezekiyɛli wlan xogbe nyi xota ji ɖɔ xo do wɛ mi ɖe e
mi sixu ɖi nu setonu jɔbu ɖɔhun gbɔn
hwenu mi ɖo nu wa xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e ɔ mi sixu ɖe mawu tɔn gbɔn
mi sixu ɖi nu setonu jɔbu ɖɔhun gbɔn e
nugbo ɔ hwɛjijɔ mi ɖo wa e zɛ ee jɔbu ɖo e wu
ðo ayi nu elɔ wu mi tuun nu gege do sataan kpo wlɛnwin tɔn lɛ kpo wu
kɔ gbɔn wema jɔbu tɔn gblamɛ ɔ mi tuun nu wu mawu bɔ mimɔ do tiin e
ðo daniyɛli tɔn mɛ ɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn nyi acɛkpikpa ɖe do ɔ bi ji ɖo klisu jezu lɔ mɛ
mi tuun ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto enɛ wa ɖe mimɔ lɛ bi siin zaanɖe din
nu mɛ jɔbu gbɔn din e ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ ɖe klisanwun mitɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ gbɔn din wɛ lɛ e
nut nwt mi da hwɛ nu a e wa ɔ mi ɖɔ mi mɔ nu jɛ ninɔmɛ yetɔn mɛ se xa
xogbe ɖo mɛ e nu jɛ ɖo gbɛzan nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo tɔn mɛ e gbɔn
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
gbɔn xo jehovah mɛ nu e gblamɛ ɔ jehovah jiɖe mi ɖɔ emi blo bɔ emitɔn lɛ syɛnlin ɖo hlɔnhlɔn
xo enɛ lɛ kan mawu lɛ ɖo egbe
mi mɛ bi wɛ jlo ɖɔ jehovah hlɔnhlɔn mi bɔ mi syɛnlin ɖo ɛ wɛ mi ɖe e mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi jlo ɖi nu setonu nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo ɖɔhun
mi mɔ gbɔn ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ e ɔ tuun tuun jehovah ganji e wɛ nyi nu taji bɔ nɔ gbeji e
ezekiyɛli yi kannumɔgbenu ɖo
e wlan ezekiyɛli hwenu ɖo xwe blo wɛ ɖo kannumɔgbenu e alo ɖo
nɔwee sin nɔ ɖo sisi nu mawu nɔ nyi lamɛki e ku hwenu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ kpo xwe e
enyi nɔwee sin nɔ kpo nɔvi tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo hwenu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ e hun ɖe gan a
etɛ mi bɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu mawu ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e kpaca mɛ ɖɔ nugbododo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn lɛ ɖo bubu wɛ a
ðo elɔ mɛ ɔ mi sixu nyi yɔkpɔvu ɖo nu kunkpla nu nyanya e mɛ nyi mɛxo ɖo linlin mi tɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn kɔ
linlin mɔhun ɖo nunywɛxo mɛ finɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah nɔ nunywɛ zan e xwe nu nwt
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ lɛ nɔ kpewu nɔ tuun nu nyi hwɛjijɔ e nu nyi nu jlɔjlɔ e nu sɔgbe e
nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo ɖo nunywɛ enɛ ezek
nu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu togun mawu tɔn ɖo egbe
mɔ nu jɛ nu e ɖo tuun cobo hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun lɛ e bi wu a
nu taji ɔ wɛ nyi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɖiɖo do wutu tɔn
ayi mitɔn ɖo enɛ ji bonu mi gbeje nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo wa gbɔn tuun mawu e nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ enɛ wa ɖagbe nu gbɔn e kpo mi sixu sɔnu nu nuɖiɖi yetɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn e kpo
nɔwee wa gbɔn tuun jehovah nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɛ gbɔn
nɔwee wa gbɔn tuun jehovah e
sin hwenuxo tɔn tɔn ɔ sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo lɛ nu do mawu wu ɖo ali titewungbe atɔn nɔ nuɖiɖo nukun nɔ mɔ lɛ e nu ɖo ɖi xɛsi nu mawu lɛ e ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ nyɔna gbɛzinzan sɔgbe xa nugbododo jlɔjlɔ mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ e eza
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ e nyi nu kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔwee ɖi nu mawu a loɔ e sɔnu nu nuɖiɖi syɛn tawun e
nɔwee wa gbɔn tuun linlin mawu ɖo nu lɛ e
nu se wɛ e ɖe ɔ mɛ wɛ nuɖiɖi nɔ sin
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e nu gege ɖo hɛnnumɔ tɔn lɛ
tɔn lamɛki nyi nya ɖe nɔ ɖo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ kpo adamu kpo e ɖo mɛ ɖiɖe ɖo e
mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ nyi tɔn matusala mɛtucɛlaxi kpo daagbo daagbo tɔn yɛlɛdi kpo yɛlɛdi ɔ kpo ɖo cobɔ e ji nɔwee bɔ e kpo e kpo nɔ nu xwe cobɔ yɛlɛdi ɔ ku
nu nɔwee ɖo hwe enɛ e byɔ ayi tɔn mɛ ɛ mawu bib
nuɖiɖi hɛn nukunɖiɖo nɔwee tɔn lido gbɔn
nukunɖiɖo nɔ bɔ nuɖiɖi nɔ lido
mawu mɛ nu lamɛki ɖɔ vi elɔ nɔwee ɖe mi sin mɔ wɛ mi ɖe ɖo ayikungban jehovah donu ɔ ji e mɛ vivo mi
nɔwee nukunɖiɖo tɔn ɖo mawu ji
abɛli kpo henɔci kpo nɔ jɛ nukɔn e ɖɔhun ɔ e ɖi nu ɖɔ kunkan ɔ nu ɔ bib nwt
nɔwee mɔ nukunnu jɛ ɖo mɛ e wu a e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e mɔ ɖɔ enɛ hɛn nukunɖiɖo hwlɛngan tɔn
akpa enɛ e do ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn mɛ e sɔgbe xa wɛn henɔci jla ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu ɖo hwɛ nu mɛ mɛdida e
ju e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wɛn henɔci tɔn jɛnu bi ɖo haamagedɔni hwenu e hɛn nuɖiɖi kpo nukunɖiɖo nɔwee tɔn kpo lido
ali tɛ lɛ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe ɖiɖo nya xɛ ɖo nɔwee ji ɖe
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɖiɖo do mawu wu wa ɖagbe nu nɔwee gbɔn e
ði ɔ ɖo nɔwee yi xa mawu wutu ɔ e do xa mɛ nɔ mawu a lɛ e a
bib nwt ɔ nɔwee tuun ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖɔ ji gba ayikungban ɔ ji
nu enɛ wa jɛ we vaan hwenu ji vi sakasaka lɛ e
mawu wa nu nɔwee ɖɔ emi ze sin do vɔ ɔ
mi sixu ɖi nu nɔwee ɖɔhun gbɔn
mi sixu sɔnu nu nuɖiɖi nɔwee tɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn e
nu taji ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ xo mawu tɔn ganji nɔ ayi ɖo nu wɛ mi ɖe e ji jo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ enɛ do nu e ɖo mi wu ali mi
nuɖiɖi kpo nunywɛ gosin mawu e kpo nya xɛ ɖo mi ji sin wlɛnwin sataan tɔn e bibi do sɔnu lɛ e kpo gbigbɔ nyanya ɔ tɔn kpo si
jaan e tlɛ sixu bɔ mɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e wɔn nu ɖo wɛn ɖɔ azan ɖaxo mawu tɔn sɛkpɔ lɛ e
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ hwenu jezu taan mɛ mi ɖe e do nɔwee sin azan wu e ɔ e kun dakaxixo alo nublibliwiwa ji o loɔ awovinu ɖo amlɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo mɛ e ji wɛ e xa matie
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ zan gbɔn wɛ ɖe e ɖɔ tuun jehovah nugbo nugbo a
nuɖiɖi ɖo e nɔ mi bɔ nɔ zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo jlɔjlɔ mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ jla a
nu xosin towe lɛ nugbo nugbo ɖɔ hwi lɔ nɔ yi xa mawu
etɛ ze daniyɛli ze eɖee jo nu mawu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e do e yi e wu
jijɔ daniyɛli tɔn tɛ lɛ jlo ɖo
daniyɛli wa gbɔn tuun jehovah e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ daniyɛli tɔn lɛ ɛ ganji ɛ bɔ e yi wan nu jehovah kpo xo tɔn kpo
daniyɛli hɛn wanyiyi enɛ wu ɖo gbɛzan tɔn bi mɛ
e tlɛ nyi ɖo hwenu e kpo e ɔ e nɔ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ kije wɛ
etɛwu ɖe hwenu ɖo vo xa ɖɛ enɛ tamɛ ayi towe ɖo nu e do daniyɛli wu e ji ganji a
ali tɛ lɛ daniyɛli ɖe nunywɛ mawu tɔn ɖe
mawu do nu daniyɛli ɖo gbeji e nɔ kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo e wu gbɔn
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɖiɖo do mawu wu wa ɖagbe nu daniyɛli gbɔn e
babilɔnu ninɔ vɛwu nu jwifu ɖe tawun
ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ ze yeɖee bi jo nu emi
nunywɛ mawu tɔn ɛ bɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbododo ɖɔ ɖɔ e setonu nu acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo ba ɖe mɛ e wu
ðo xwe kanweko mɔkpan gudo ɔ jezu nugbododo ɖokpo ɔ mɛ luk
daniyɛli sixu hwɛjijɔ ɖɔ azan gban nyi xwe mavɔmavɔ a
e lɔn nu axɔsu do e jɛ nukɔn nu nu biblu byɔ lɛ e a
e hɛn ɔ e xoɖɛ ɖo nuglɔ bɔ mɛɖebu tuun a
e tuun ɖɔ aca emi ɖo nɔ xoɖɛ gbe bi gbe e ɔ mɛ lɛ tuun ganji
enɛ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ daniyɛli tɔn ɖo co e lɔn bonu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ e jo mawu tɔn do a
jehovah do nu gbeta kɔn daniyɛli tamɛ cobo wa kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo e hwlɛn ɛ ɖo nujiwu lixo ɖo ku baɖabaɖa ɖe si
mi sixu sɔnu nu nuɖiɖi daniyɛli tɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn
mi sixu sɔnu nu nuɖiɖi daniyɛli tɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn e
xo mawu tɔn xixa kpowun wɛ bɔ e ɖo nuɖiɖi syɛn e a loɔ nu taji ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e mɔ nu jɛ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo tamɛ do nu mi xa lɛ e ji
ðɛxixo kpo ayi mɛtɔn bi kpo hwɛhwɛ ɖo taji titewungbe hwenu mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ wa kpannukɔn mi e alo ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu ɖevo lɛ mɛ
jɔbu wa gbɔn ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e do mawu wu
jɔbu wa gbɔn tuun jehovah e
jɔbu nyi izlayɛli vi a
e nyi kan kpla do kan wu ablaxamu izaki kpo jakɔbu kpo tɔn bɔ jehovah ɖe nuɖe lɛ do eɖesunɔ kpo linlin e ɖo nu lɛ e kpo wu
jɔbu nu gege do nugbo xɔ akwɛ enɛ lɛ wu e gbɔn e ɔ biblu tinmɛ a
nu mi nɔ jijɔ mawu tɔn nukun nɔ mɔ a lɛ e ɖo nuɖiɖo tɔn nukun nɔ mɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ nuɖiɖi mitɔn nɔ lido akpaxwe ɔ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ elihu kpo jehovah kpo bi zan nuɖiɖo lɛ do flin jɔbu ɖɔ nu e ɛ do mawu sɔ e wu ɔ e kun nuti o
ali tɛ lɛ jɔbu ɖɔ emi tuun jehovah ganji ɖe
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ɖiɖo do mawu wu wa ɖagbe nu jɔbu gbɔn e
jɔbu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ wu tawun
e tuun jehovah ganji wa nu sɔgbe xa nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ enɛ
e mɔ ɖɔ emi hugan mɛ ɖevo lɛ a loɔ e ɖɔ dɔkunnɔ kpo wamamɔnɔ kpo bi sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu emi
e ɖɔ mawu ɖokpo ɔ wɛ blo mi bi e wɛ blo nyɛ kpo kpan do nɔ mitɔn mitɔn xomɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jɔbu kun tɛn e ɖo ɖo e kpo dɔkun e jɛ e kpo bonu nu e ɖo linlin masɔgbe do eɖesunɔ alo mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu o
e gbɔn vo nu mɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn jɛ dɔkun ɖo ɔ mɛ e gege gbɔn e
jɔbu vodunsinsɛn alɔkpa lɛ bi e tlɛ lɔn vodun ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ a
e tuun ɖɔ sinsɛn biblo nuvu jɛ mɛɖee zize jo nu dɔkun ji ɖɔ emi mawu ɖo jixwe ɔ xa jɔbu
e nɔ alɔwliwli do mɔ nu ɖe nyi kancica ɖe ɖo sunnu ɖokpo nyɔnu ɖokpo tɛntin
e tlɛ alɛ xa nukun tɔn ɖɔ emi kun ɖyɔvi ɖe ɖoxo xa ɛ o
e tuto alɔwliwli tɔn mawu ɖo edɛni mɛ e sin do ɖo ɖe xwedo bib
nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe ɖiɖo do jehovah kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo wu nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖagbe lɛ kpo ayiɖeɖayi sɔgbe lɛ e kpo gbɔn
mi sixu sɔnu nu nuɖiɖi jɔbu tɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn e
e ɖɔ ɔ nu taji ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e do jehovah wu jo e do nu e nɔ ali mi ɖo akpaxwe gbɛzan tɔn mitɔn lɛ bi mɛ
ði ɔ davidi ɖɔ do jehovah wu ɖɔ e wan nu mɛ yi wan nu alannuwiwa e davidi nu mi do dido wu xa ðɛhan
nunywɛ tɛ wemafɔ enɛ lɛ do linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo e wu
nunywɛ enɛ ɖo ɖo nu nɔ mya nukun nu lɛ e nɔ zan ɛntɛnɛti gbɔn e nɔ do lɛ e kpo ayiɖeɖayi cyancyan kpo linu gbɔn
etɛ mi bɔ mi mɔ nu jɛ nu mi ɖo tuun cobo hɛn xomɛ mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ tɔn hun e bi wu
ðo nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo jehovah kpo ayi yetɔn bi kpo wutu ɔ e jo eɖee do bɔ mɔ ɛ
e bɔ mɔ nu jɛ nu ɖo dandan bɔ wa do hɛn xomɛ tɔn hun lɛ e bi wu
enɛ wu ɔ huzu nujlɔjlɔwiwa tɔn zan yi e ɖe nugbo nugbo
ðɛh enɛ wu ɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ tuun jehovah nɔwee daniyɛli kpo jɔbu kpo tuun gbɔn e a
enɛ ɔ sɛkpɔ towe jixwe tɔn ɔ ganji hu tɔn
wa nu kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo kpodo nunywɛ kpo ɖo egbe tɔn ɖo jijɔ mawu tɔn a e mɛ nux
xwe jɛ nukɔn nu jiji nɔwee tɔn ɔ mawu ɛ yi bib
lɛ nɔ jlo zan gbɛzan awajijɛnɔ ɖe sɔgbe
ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ bi nɔ mɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖeɖee vɛwu bɔ e ɖi xwi xa lɛ e
tim nuagɔwaxamɛ lanmɛ ɖo ganji aluwɛ alo nu ɖevo ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo adohu adohu kpo kpo nu mɛ lɛ e sixu bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ a
awakanmɛ tlɛ sixu ku mawu tɔn lɛ lɔ bɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo awajijɛ o
enyi nu mɔhun wa ɔ sixu ɖo awajijɛ gbɔn
do xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi mɔ nu jɛ nu awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ nyi e kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo awajijɛ ɖo wɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn e kpo wu jɛ nukɔn
enɛ gudo ɔ mi nu mi sixu wa kpo ɖo awajijɛ ɖo wɛ e kpo mi sixu so gbɔn e kpo
mi ɖo wlu awajijɛ ɖo xa nukiko alo xomɛhunhun tofwe a
ɖe ɖie ahannumunɔ ahan syɛnsyɛn ganji e ɖe sixu ɖo nu wɛ magbokɔ
nu ahan ɔ ɔ e nɔ nu a e sixu byɔ aluwɛ alo ɖaxo ɖe mɛ
awajijɛ nyi jijɔ ɖe ɖo ayi gɔngɔn mɛtɔn mɛ
e tinmɛ ɖɔ e nyi akpakpa nɔ mɛ ɖo nu ɖagbe e mɔ alo ee ɖo nukun wɛ e ɖe e wu e
awajijɛ nyi xomɛhunhun ɖe nɔ nɔ ayi enyi ninɔmɛ mɛ e ɖe e kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ nɛ
ði ɔ e xo lɛ ɖo ɖɔ xo do klisu wu wutu
gosin ɔ nukɔn bɔ xomɛ hun tlala ɖo mɔ ɖɔ mawu mɔ emi do mɔ mɛ jɛxa ji do jezu nyikɔ mɛ e
e nɔ ji mi kpo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ mɔhun kpo a jɛn e nɔ wa kpowun a e nɛ
etɛwu
ðo awajijɛ ɖo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn nɔ mɛ e mɛ
nu mi sɔnu nu awajijɛ ɔ mi kpe nu wu hugan ɖi xwi xa nu nɔ ɖo nu mi ɖo gbɛmɛ lɛ e
jehovah jlo ɖɔ nu ɖagbe lɛ kɛɖɛ ayikungban ɔ ji e nyi nu nyanya mɔ wɛ mi nɔ ɖe hwɛhwɛ egbe din lɛ e a
nu nyanya wa wɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖe e nɔ xo awajijɛ jehovah tɔn yi a
xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ hlɔnhlɔn kpo awajijɛ kpo wɛ ɖo nɔtɛn tɔn
jehovah ɖɔhun ɔ mi bɔ nu ɖo nukun wɛ mi ɖe bɔ ɖo jijɛnu wɛ a lɛ e ɖo adohuhu nu mi zɛ xwe wu a
mi sixu mɔ mɛ ɖeɖee xo biblu ɖɔ bɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ mɛ e gege tɔn
enɛ lɛ ɖo finɛ co ablaxamu kpo ɖo awajijɛ ɖo ɖo ayi mɛ wɛ
e wa gbɔn
jezu ɖɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo wɛ e nyi nu mitɔn ablaxamu ɖo e ɖo nukun ɖo wiwa wɛ
jaan mi sixu xwedo ablaxamu tɔn gbɔn tamɛ linlin do nu do awajijɛ nu mi ɖo nukɔn ja lɛ e ji gblamɛ hlɔ
ði ɔ ee dɛ ɖo xo e xo do adaka mɛ do gankpa mɛ e gudo e ɔ zanvlɔɖowe ɔ kpo ɖo ɖɛ xo wɛ ɖo ji mla mawu wɛ mɛ
ɔ bonu pɔlu kpo silasi kpo do mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo nu ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe e mɛ ɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖo se ɖo nyikɔ klisu tɔn wu wutu
mi sixu xwedo yetɔn gbɔn ayi ɖo ɖagbe ɖo mawu kpo gbejininɔ kpo mɛ e ji gblamɛ fili
ði ɔ ɖo novembre ɔ jɔhɔn ɖaxo ɖe gba nu ɖo philippines sin tɛntin hɛn xwe lɛ tɔn gble
xwe george tɔn ɖo toxo tacloban tɔn mɛ e gble bi
e ɖɔ nu enɛ jɛ co nɔvi lɛ ɖo awajijɛ mɛ
nu ɖevo tɛ lɛ jehovah mi bɔ e sin wu bɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ mɛ
tamɛ do nu elɔ ji mi tuun wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn
e wɛ nyi mitɔn mawu mitɔn kpo mitɔn kpo ðɛh
hwenu pɔlu ɖo vogbingbɔn ɖo mi kpo kpo tɛntin e wɛ e ɔ e wlan ɖɔ nu mɛɖebu mɔ gbeɖe se gbeɖe a ɔ nu mɛɖebu gbeɖe a ɔ mawu blo nu enɛ nu mɛ yi wan lɛ e
midɛɛ lɛ wɛ nyi mɛ mawu ɖe nubudo enɛ gbɔn gbigbɔ ji e
mi ɖɔ xo do nu ɖevo jehovah blo nu mɛ tɔn lɛ e ji
e tlɛ nyi ɖo din ɔ jehovah mi mawu lɛ sin kplekplemɛ ɖagbe ɖe ðɛh
xo mawu tɔn jiɖe mi ɖɔ jehovah cyɔn alɔ mi ji sin sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo si
klisanwun nɔ nɔ awajijɛ mɛ e ɔ awajijɛ tɔn sixu jɛji a
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ nu bonu xomɛ hun xomɛ nɔ hun nyɛ gbɔn e bonu awajijɛ mitɔn ɔ nu bi vɔ
sixu gan do wɛ ɖe bonu awajijɛ towe jɛji e do myɔ wu
ɖo naki do myɔ ɔ mɛ bonu e ji hugan
ɖokpo ɔ ɖo nuɖuɖu hwiɖee ɖo gbigbɔ lixo bonu awajijɛ towe do jɛji
flin nu elɔ gbigbɔ wɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn awajijɛ
ðo e da mi bonu mi ɖo sisi nu mawu blo nu e lɛ nu ɖo taji bɔ bi ɖo wa e nɛ
ee ɖo nu nu awajijɛ wɛ e ɔ ɖu le gege sin vivi
enyi ɖo awajijɛ kpo xomɛhunhun kpo ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ din ɔ lanmɛ towe ɖibla nɔ ganji hugan ɖo sɔ
nu kplɔnyiji alavɔxwe nebraska tɔn ɖo etats unis e sin ɖe wlan hwenu e gbeje nuɖe lɛ do lanmɛ nɔ ganji wu gudo e nɛ
nugbo ɔ enyi awajijɛ towe ɖo jijɛji wɛ ɔ lanmɛ towe ɖibla wa nɔ ganji hugan
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ co mi sixu ɖo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ nɔ ayi e cobonu nu nyi ɔ gbigbɔ mi mɔ gbɔn ɖɛxixo nukpinkplɔn kpo tamɛ linlin do xo jehovah tɔn ji kpo gblamɛ e jɛn nyi tɔn
enyi mi nɔ tamɛ do nyɔna ji mi ɖɔ xo do wa yi lɛ e ji xwedo nuɖiɖi mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn sin wa jlo mawu tɔn ɔ awajijɛ mitɔn jɛji
ðo ali enɛ lɛ bi ɔ mi lɔ sixu yi gbe nu nugbo ɖo ðɛhan mɛ e finɛ ɖɔ lɛ ɖo jehovah mɛ ɖo tɔn
nu mɔ nu ɖevo hlɔnhlɔn awajijɛ towe e hun gbavi ali ðevo ðeɖee blo bɔ awajijɛ towe jɛji ðe e
nɔ zan gbɛzan bɔkun e blo tuto nu gbɛzan towe luk
nɔ nɔ ji do hwiɖesunɔ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo wu fili nwt
mɛ tɔn wɛ e beishenbai berdibaev
ku tiin a bɔ e tlɛ mɛ ku lɛ e wa
asi mairambubu wɛ se xo enɛ lɛ hwenu e do ɖo yiyi wɛ e
e dɔn ɛ bɔ e jlo mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ hwenu ɔ nɔte bɔ mɛ lɛ jɛte e ɔ e kanwezun jɛ nyɔnu ɖɔ xo enɛ lɛ e gudo
nyikɔ tɔn nɔ nyi apun mambetsadykova bɔ e nyi jehovah tɔn ɖe
xoɖiɖɔ xa ɖe nɔ mɛtɔn ɖo nu ɖo hwe enɛ lɛ nu apun wa mi ɖo nukɔnmɛ lɛ e huzu gbɛzan mitɔn
e ji mi ɖo ɖo alo gle tɔn ɖe ɖo tokmok kpa ɖo kirghizstan
xwedo mitɔn ɔ kirghizstan lɛ mɛ wɛ e gosin bɔ mi nɔ do kirghizstan gbe
glesi wɛ nyi lɛ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo sin ayitehɔnnu jɛ gbadanu
e nɔ nuɖuɖu lɛ hwɛhwɛ xwe jɛn e nɔ
mamaa nɔ jɛ tagba tawun cobo nɔ kpe nukun do nɔvi nyɔnu kpɛvi kpo nyi kpo wu
xwe kpowun jɛn yi jɛ wa ji hwebinu ɖo gle ɔ
sokan teskey tɔn
ðo mɛ winnyawinnya wɛ nyi wutu ɔ nɔ tamɛ do linlin wu mi ɖo ɔ mɛ e alo sɔgudo wu a
gbeɖe ɖɔ nugbo jiwu ɖeɖee kunkpla jehovah mawu kpo linlin tɔn kpo lɛ e huzu gbɛzan a
wɛn enɛ byɔ kirghizstan gbakpe fi gbɔn e nyi ɖe akpakpa mɛ
nu lɛ bi ɖo jɔtɛn ɖo totaligbe kirghizstan tɔn
nugbo kunkpla jehovah mawu e do ɖɔ do ɖo kirghizstan ɖo
bonu nu do nyi ɔ nugbo ɔ ɖo ɖu ɖo linlin masɔgbe do ɖɔ do lɛ e ji
etɛwu des republiques socialistes sovietiques urss mɛ wɛ kirghizstan egbe tɔn ɔ nɔ
jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo wu zɔ nu toxoɖiɖɔ ɖo fi urss kpa acɛ do lɛ e bi
jaan enɛ wu ɔ e do mɔ acɛkpikpa communiste tɔn tɔn lɛ doya nu
linlin masɔgbe ɖebu sixu bonu xo mawu tɔn gɔn ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ sin ayi mɛ byɔ a
nugbo ɔ nu xɔ akwɛ ɖo gbɛzan bi mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ jehovah kpe nu bi wu mak
e do nu jehovah tɔn lɛ e bɔ ɖo kirghizstan
etɛwu nu nyi
akpaxwe siberie tɔn e kpla acɛkpikpa communiste tɔn tɔn lɛ yi gannugannu e lɔ ɖo urss mɛ
hwenu e ɖe e ɔ mɛ gege wa kirghizstan bɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ hɛn nugbo ɔ wa
mɛ enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ nyi emil yantzen ee e ji ɖo kirghizstan ɖo e
e emil do yadonumɛkpa ɖe mɛ bɔ e xo go jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo finɛ
e yi nugbo ɔ lɛkɔ wa xwe ɖo
emil wa ci sokuluk kpa ɖo jɔtɛn
sokuluk finɛ wɛ e ɖo agun nukɔntɔn ɔ ayi ɖe ɖo kirghizstan ɖo
vinter
xwe ɖokpo gudo ɔ vinter tɛn wa sokuluk
e doya nu nɔvi sunnu enɛ azɔn mɔkpan
azɔn we wɛ e nu xwe ɖo wu e ɖo zɔ nu ɔ e wutu enɛ gudo ɔ e blo xwe wo ɖo gankpa mɛ nu xwe ɖo kannumɔgbenu
yadonumɛ lɛ bonu sinsɛn nugbo ɔ gɔn kan vun a
eduard varter
ðo ɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ ɖo kirghizstan mɛ gege gosin allemagne ukraine kpo russie kpo
eduard varter nɔ kannumɔgbenu blo baptɛm ɖo allemagne ɖo e lɔ
ðo kpo kpo vlamɛ ɔ acɛkpikpa nazi tɔn eduard do yadonumɛkpa ɖe mɛ bɔ ɖo xwe yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ acɛkpikpa communiste tɔn urss tɔn ɛ do kannumɔgbenu
ðo ɔ nɔvi sunnu enɛ tɛn yi toxo kant tɔn sɛkpɔ jɔtɛn tawun e mɛ
elizabeth aksamai sultanalieva
elizabeth ee nyi jehovah e ɖe lɔ nɔ nɔ kant
nu wɛ e nɔ do mɔ nu ɖu
ðo tɔn bi alɔ tawun wutu ɔ dotoogan lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nɔ ɛ
aksamai nu gbe wa elizabeth kan nu gege byɔ ɛ do nu wu mi ɖo ɔ mɛ e kpo ninɔmɛ mɛ mɛkuku lɛ ɖe e kpo wu
elizabeth xosin nu nukanbyɔ aksamai tɔn lɛ tlɔlɔ sin biblu mɛ
aksamai huzu ɖe
ðo hwe enɛ ɔ e nikolai chimpoesh gosin moldavie e nyi lɛdo tɔn bɔ e wa nu xwe
e nyi agun lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ nikolai nɔ yi a loɔ e nɔ blo tuto bɔ e nɔ wema mitɔn lɛ zin nɔ ma
gan lɛ ɖo ayi wa wɛ e ɖe lɛ e wu
enɛ wu ɔ eduard varter do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nikolai kpo weɖexamɛ elɔ kpo nu gan lɛ kan xo byɔ hun ɖɔ nu nyi wɛn ɖɔ hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn ɖo brooklyn e wɛ wema mitɔn lɛ nɔ gosin
kponɔ kgb tɔn ɔ sin nukunta tlɔlɔ le
ɖo ɖi xɛsi nu nuɖe a
ðo enɛ gudo zaan ɔ e ylɔ nikolai wa hɔnkan kgb tɔn ɖo kant e
e ɖɔ nu jɛ gudo e kponɔ ɔ kan fi mi nɔ wema mitɔn lɛ sin e byɔ
ɖɔ ɖɔ brooklyn wɛ nɔ mi
e tuun xo e ɖɔ e a
e jo mi do bɔ yi ylɔ mi gbeɖe a
mɔhun lɛ nɔ nɔ aceji nɔ ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ vunvun kpe jɔtɛn wɛ ɖo totaligbe kirghizstan tɔn
asi mairambubu wɛ se nugbo xɔ akwɛ ɔ sin xo azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ bɔ gbɔn gbla tɔn mɛ ɔ xwedo mɔ nugbo ɔ ɖo
mairambubu gosin naryn ɖo xa kirghizstan tɔn mɛ
gbe ɖokpo ɖo aout ɔ e wa nɔvi nyɔnu kpɛvi finɛ wɛ mi mɔ miɖee ɖe azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ
nu mairambubu tɔn jɛ ji tɛn tɔn mɛ
mi wli alɔ ɖo azan ɖokpo ɔ ji
apun mambetsadykova
ðo janvier hwenu mairambubu ɖo ɖe mɛ xwe axi xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖe mɛ e ɔ e ɖoto wu kɛnu do ɖo xota elɔ tɔn e
asi jlo mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mɛ hu enɛ wu ɔ e kan nyikɔ nawe ɔ tɔn kpo adlɛsi tɔn kpo byɔ
e ɖɔ nyikɔ emitɔn nɔ nyi apun e nɔ aceji tawun ɖo jɛ kpo kpo vlamɛ ɔ e kpo ɖo lɛ tɔn wɛ
e ɖɔ adlɛsi tɔn nu asi a e wa ɔ mitɔn wɛ e yi
asi wa xwegbe kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
mairambubu ɖɔ se nu ɖagbeɖagbe ɖe lɛ
nyɔnu ɖe ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ zaanɖe din ɔ lɛ kun ku ɖe o
gbekanlin lɛ lɔ tlɛ nɔ wa adan a
e ɖi xɛxo ɖe nu mi
apun wa mi ɖo atɔn gudo
ɖevo lɛ wa jɛ gudo bɔ gbɔn enɛ sin yɛkan mɛ ɔ mi xo go nukɔntɔn nyi kirghizstan lɛ e
nɔvi nyɔnu enɛ lɛ mi nugbo jiwu lɛ e do jehovah kpo linlin e ɖo nu lɛ e kpo wu xa wema du paradis au paradis reconquis nu mi
ðo wema enɛ ɖokpo gee wɛ ɖo tokmok wutu ɔ mi alɔ do wlan miɖesu
nu nukɔntɔn mi lɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖo mɛ e
enɛ jɛnu gbɔn jezu nyi axɔsu mɛsiya mawu e gblamɛ
wɛn nujɔnu tɔn ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ bɔ mɛ bi ɖo se
mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ wu mi ɖo wɛnjijla ɔ mɛ e din
e lin a bɔ biblu jɛ gbɛzan mitɔn huzu ji
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo tokmok ylɔ mi wa alɔwliwli ɖe tɛnmɛ
tlolo jɛn asi kpo nyi kpo ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ lɛ sin nuwiwa gbɔn vo
ahan syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɖo alɔwliwli ɔ tɛnmɛ a bɔ nuwiwa lɛ yi ɖo tito ji
e gbɔn vo tawun nu alɔwliwli ɖeɖee mi yi bɔ jonɔ lɛ nɔ ahan mu wa nu sɔgbe a lɛ e nɔ zan xogbe gblegble lɛ e
mi yi kple klisanwun tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɖo tokmok e mɛ
atinkan mɛ wɛ mi nɔ blo kple lɛ ɖe enyi ayi mɛ ɔ nɛ
nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo tuun ɖɔ kponɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo mi wɛ enɛ wu ɔ nɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖokpo nɔ nyi
ðo avivɔ hwenu ɔ mi nɔ blo kple lɛ ɖo xɔ ɖe mɛ
kponɔ lɛ nɔ wa xwe ɔ gbe hweɖelɛnu nɔ kan nu wa wɛ mi ɖe e byɔ
hwenu mairambubu kpo nyi kpo blo baptɛm ɖo juillet ɖo chuy ɔ mɛ e ɔ mi nɔ aceji tawun
nɔvi lɛ zɔn kpɛvi kpɛvi mɛ wa kple ɖo zungbo ɔ mɛ
mi jihan axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe ɖoto xoɖiɖɔ e xwle mɛ jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e e
ðo ɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖe byɔ ɖo asi ɖɔ ma yi mɛ ɖo jlo ɖo toxo balykchy tɔn mɛ e ɖe
enyi mi do pipan sin xwe mitɔn gbe yi ɔ ganxixo ɛnɛ wɛ mi nɔ blo
ee mi jla wɛn ɔ ɖo balykchy azɔn gege gudo e ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo jlo tawun ɖo finɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ali ɖe wɛ hun nu mi bɔ mi kan nu mitɔn
mairambubu kpo nyi kpo nɔ yi balykchy hwɛhwɛ
mi nɔ nɔ finɛ nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ gege nɔ yi kunnuɖegbe nɔ blo kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ
wema mɛ lɛ lɛ e jɛji tawun
mi nɔ wema lɛ sin tokmok do mishok mɛ saki ɖe wɛ bɔ e nɔ dokwin
enɛ mɛ wema e we tlɛ nɔ kpe nu mɛ lɛ ɖo sunmɛ sunmɛ e a
nu mi ɖo pipan mɛ xwe balykchy alo nu mi gosin ɔ mi nɔ kpewu nɔ ɖekunnu nu mɛ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo ali ji lɛ e
ee mi yi balykchy azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo xwe tantɔn gudo e ɔ e ɖo agun ɖe ayi ɖo ɖo finɛ
tokmok mi nɔ gosin nɔ yi balykchy ɖo xwe enɛ lɛ mɛ e byɔ akwɛzinzan gege
mi ɖo akwɛ gege a enɛ wu ɔ mi wa gbɔn kpewu
nɔvi sunnu ɖe nɔ akwɛ mi hwɛhwɛ nɔ su akwɛzinzan mitɔn lɛ bi sin do
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu ɖebu kun glo jehovah o
ðo ɔ nyi mɛxo agun tɔn nyi wɛ nyi mɛxo agun tɔn kirghizstan nukɔntɔn ɖo to ɔ mɛ
ðo agun ɖo jɔtɛn ɖo tokmok e mɛ ɔ ali ɖevo lɛ hun ɖo ɔ mɛ
mi nɔ biblu xa mɛ winnyawinnya kirghizstan gege ɖo wemaxɔ lɛ mɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya mi nu xa lɛ e ɖokpo nyi alaxɔ tɔn sin ɖe bɔ we ɖevo lɛ nyi gbexosin titewungbe lɛ
mi nɔ miɖee jo nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ ji
ðo kpo kpo tɔn ɔ wema mitɔn lɛ ɖo russie gbe mɛ bɔ mi nɔ blo kple mitɔn lɛ lɔ do gbe ɔ mɛ
mɛ gege ɖo agun ɔ mɛ nɔ do kirghizstan gbe ee nyi anɔnugbe yetɔn e
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ lilɛ xoɖiɖɔ lɛ do gbe enɛ ɔ mɛ do nu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo ɔ wu ganji
nyi kpo asi kpo nu vi mitɔn tantɔn ɖo
alɔnu nyi kpo mairambubu kpo tɔn jan ɖo nukun kpikpe do xwedo mitɔn ɖo jijɛji wɛ e wu mɛ
mi nɔ kpla vi mitɔn lɛ yi kunnuɖegbe kpo kple agun tɔn lɛ kpo
xwe kpowun jɛn vi mitɔn gulsayra ɖo yi wan nu xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ lɛ ɖo alito kpo xoɖiɖɔ nu do biblu wu kpo
bɔ vi mitɔn lɛ yi wan nu wemafɔ biblu tɔn lɛ kpinkplɔn do tamɛ
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ vi mitɔn lɛ kpo vivu mitɔn lɛ bi kpo nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo agun ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ tawun
ðo vi mitɔn lɛ kpo vivu mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɔ ɖo jehovah wɛ alo ɖo kple lɛ yi wɛ xa yetɔn lɛ
enyi nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo jɛ jehovah tɔn wa ji ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ ɖo kpo kpo vlamɛ lɛ e se huzuhuzu nukunɖeji sin vivi mi ɖu lɛ e ɔ e kpaca
ðokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ sin kpo kpo vlamɛ ɔ mi ɖo vivo jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ bɔ mɛ gege kple ɖo nu kple lɛ
nyi kpo asi kpo ɖo ɔ mɛ
ðo ɔ nyi kpo asi kpo yi ɖaxo ɖe azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo ata fi enɛ wɛ nɔ nyi almaty ɖo kazakhstan ɖo egbe
ðo ɔ nɔvi kirghizstan lɛ blo ɖaxo ɖe ɖo anyumlimlisafɔtɛn spartak tɔn ɖo bichkek azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ
jɛ nukɔn nu azan ɔ lɛ zan aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo do jla anyumlimlisafɔtɛn ɔ ɖo
e jiwu nu gan anyumlimlisafɔtɛn ɔ tɔn bɔ e ɖɔ mi zan fi ɔ su ɖokpo
ðo ɔ nu manawɔn ɖe jɛ enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖe wema nukɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ do kirghizstan gbe mɛ
din ɔ hwebinu wɛ lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn ɖe nɔ lilɛ xojlawema mitɔn lɛ do gbe mitɔn mɛ ɖo alaxɔ bichkek tɔn mɛ
ðo ɔ acɛkpikpa kirghizstan tɔn yi gbe nu mitɔn ɖo linu
tutoblonunu ɔ ɖo nukɔnyiyi ɖo jɛji wɛ ɖo fi din egbe ɔ agun wɛ ɖo fi bɔ kanɖo gbe glɛnsigbe kirghizstan gbe russie gbe tokunɔgbe russie tɔn tɔn turquie gbe uighur gbe kpo ouzbekistan gbe kpo tɔn
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo enɛ lɛ gosin gbe vovo ji lɛ e bi ɖo jehovah wɛ ɖo bu
jehovah blo bɔ huzuhuzu nukunɖeji enɛ lɛ blo
jehovah huzu gbɛzan
su ɖo glesi wamamɔnɔ ɖe sin xwedo mɛ bɔ xwe jɛn yi
jehovah zan mi bɔ nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe nugbo xɔ akwɛ biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖeɖee yi hu mi tawun lɛ e
nugbo ɔ jehovah blo bɔ numaɖonukun lɛ jɛ ɖo gbɛzan mɛ
jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ e tiin din a
mawu nɔ didɛ kpo gbɔdonumɛ kpo mɛ e blo bonu ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ klisu jezu ɖo e hlɔ nwt
mi sixu tuun gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe gbɔn
etɛ mɛ ɖo ɖagbe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e sixu mi
etɛwu mi ɖo do gan ɖo linlin klisu tɔn
linlin tɛ mɛ gege nɔ ɖo do gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi wu
nukanbyɔ taji kunkpla gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi e tɛ lɛ mi gbeje
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo ɖɔ gbigbɔ tɔn nyi e bɔ ɖo awajijɛ hugan bɔ e mi bɔ ɖi xwi xa tɛnkpɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn lɛ kpa mi
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo bresil ɖɔ xwe mi blo ɖo alɔwliwli mɛ lɛ e nyi awajijɛ sin hwenu titewungbe ɖe ɖo gan mi do nyi gbigbɔ tɔn e wutu
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo philippines ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ gbigbɔ tɔn nyi e bɔ ɖo fifa ayi mɛ tɔn bɔ e mi bɔ nɔ wa nu xa nɔvi gosin ninɔmɛ vovo mɛ lɛ e gbɔn e
xogbe mɔhun lɛ nɔ ɖe gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo ali sɔgbe e ɖe
enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ sixu yi nukɔn nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe ɖu le nu ɖeɖee e ɖɔ ɖo lɛ e tɔn bi gbɔn
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi xosin nu nukanbyɔ taji atɔn
etɛ nyi tinmɛ e nyi gbigbɔ tɔn tɔn
tɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi yi nukɔn nyi gbigbɔ tɔn
gan do wɛ mi ɖe ɖo linlin klisu tɔn e mi bɔ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn gbɔn
tinmɛ biblu do agbaza tɔn wu e gbɔn vo nu tinmɛ e do gbigbɔ tɔn wu e gbɔn
e tinmɛ ɖɔ agbaza tɔn kun nɔ yi gbe nu nunina mawu tɔn gbigbɔ ɔ nɔ mɛ lɛ e o le xlonɔ xo wɛ e nɔ mɔ xo enɛ lɛ do mɔ kun sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ o
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ gbigbɔ tɔn ɔ mɛɖe wɛ e nyi nɔ ɖɔ hwɛ do nu bi alo gbeje nu lɛ bi nwt ɖo linlin klisu tɔn
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn
ali tɛ lɛ agbaza tɔn gbɔn vo nu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe
etɛ lɛ nɔ do gesi agbaza tɔn
mi ɖɔ xo do nuwalɔ mɛ nyi agbaza tɔn e tɔn ji
ɔ sin nuwalɔ lɛ nɔ jinjɔn jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ ji
pɔlu tinmɛ ɖɔ e wɛ nyi gbigbɔ ɖo wa wɛ din ɖo nɔ setonu nu mawu a lɛ mɛ e
nɔ ayi ɖo jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ ji enɛ wu ɔ mɛ habu nɔ wa nu ɖo nukun yeɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ lɛ e nɔ do gan ɖebu ba zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ a
jijɔ enɛ lɛ wɛ nyi kinklan sin kan xixo ɖiɖo do glɔ nu hwɛgun nɔvi nɔvi lɛ nɔ dɔn yeɖee yi e sisi ɖo nu tito nyinyi tɔn nu nuɖuɖu kpo ahan kpo ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
nu agbaza tɔn mɔ tɛnkpɔn ɔ awakanmɛ nɔ ku bɔ e nɔ jo gbe
etɛ lɛ e nɔ do tuun gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe
gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe nɔ kpɛn do mawu sin akpaxwe e gbɔn vo nu agbaza tɔn
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo linlin gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e nɔ do gan nɔ wa nu mawu ɖɔhun
efɛ enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ do gan nɔ ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nu lɛ wu e nɔ nu lɛ jehovah nɔ gbɔn e
mawu nyi mɛ nujɔnu tɔn ɖe nu
gbɔn vo nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo linlin agbaza tɔn lɛ e ɖo nɔ do gan bɔ nuwiwa yetɔn lɛ bi nɔ sɔgbe xa nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ
ðɛh mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo linlin gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e nɔ ayi ɖo agbaza tɔn lɛ ji a e wa ɔ nɔ do gan nɔ ɖe nu gbigbɔ nɔ mɛ ɔ
etɛ biblu ɖɔ do mɛ ɖo linlin gbigbɔ tɔn e wu
biblu ɖɔ xo ɖagbe tawun do mɛ ɖo linlin gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e wu
matie ɖɔ awajijɛnɔ wɛ nu mɛ ɖeɖee tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ tɔn e ɖo yetɔn wɛ nyi axɔsuɖuto jixwe tɔn nwt
hlɔmanu lɛ le ɖo gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi mɛ e ɖɔ enyi ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo hwɛhuhu sin nu lɛ ji ɔ ku wɛ e nɔ kpla mɛ yi ayixa mɛtɔn ɖo gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ ji ɔ e nɔ kpla mɛ bɔ e nɔ mɔ nɔ mɔ fifa
gbɔn ayi ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ji gblamɛ ɔ mi nɔ nɔ fifa mɛ xa mawu kpo miɖesunɔ kpo din nɔ ɖo nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn ɖo sɔgudo
etɛwu e byɔ gandido cobɔ e kpewu nyi gbigbɔ tɔn nɔ sɔyi
nyanya ɖe mɛ wɛ mi ɖe
ðo jlo agbaza tɔn lɛ do mi wutu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi do gan tawun ba mɔ tɛn do nyi gbigbɔ tɔn bɔ e nyi mi nyi gudo ɔ mi ɖo do gan nɔ sɔyi
enyi mɛɖe nyi gbigbɔ tɔn a ɔ do ɖe jɛ wu tɔn bɔ jɔhɔn nyanya elɔ tɔn wa su do enɛ
etɛ sixu mi bɔ nu mɔhun jɛ a
mi sixu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
gbigbɔ tɔn tɛ lɛ tɔn mi gbeje
vi ɖe sixu zin enyi e nɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ do gan nɔ xwedo ɖagbe yetɔn ɔ nɛ
ɖokpo ɔ mi sixu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo enyi mi nɔ mɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e nɔ xwedo yetɔn ɔ nɛ
ɖagbe kpo nyanya kpo bi wɛ ɖo biblu mɛ
ɖo nu gbe nya wɛ mi ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn wutu ɔ nu mi ayi ɖo ɖagbe ɖeɖee mi sixu xwedo lɛ e ji
etɛ jakɔbu tɔn sixu mi
jakɔbu ɖɔ emi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn gbɔn
jɛ nukɔn ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do jakɔbu wu
e ɖo dɛ ɖo nɔvi tɔn nɔ ayi ɖo nu agbaza tɔn lɛ ji ɖo biba hu wɛ e
nu enɛ ɔ e ɖo dɛ ɖo zan asi tɔn ɖo zinzan ɛ do wa nu wɛ magbokɔ e
e ɖi nu nu akpa mawu do nu ablaxamu e do gan kpe nukun do xwedo tɔn wa bunɔ ɖe ɖo linlin jehovah tɔn sin jijɛnu mɛ e wu
bib xo jakɔbu nɔ ɖɔ lɛ e kpo nu e nɔ wa lɛ e kpo nɔ ɖɔ nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ kpo jlo tɔn kpo ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ
ði ɔ hwenu jakɔbu mɔ ɖɔ esawu ɖo gbe emitɔn nya wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nu mawu ɖɔ kɛnklɛn hwlɛn mi
etɛ tɔn sixu mi
etɛ ɖɔ nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛɖe wɛ ɖo linlin gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ mi wa gbɔn tuun
ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ wɛ jozɛfu kpo kpo yeɖee co ɖoxo xa yeɖee cobo ji jezu a etɛ enɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ linlin mawu tɔn kunkpla mɛsiya ɔ e nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ
tɔn mi bɔ mi tamɛ do mi sixu jlo mawu tɔn ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e ji a ce
ali tɛ jezu ɖi tɔn ɖe
mi sixu xwedo jezu tɔn gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu wɛ
ðo gbɛzan tɔn kpo tɔn kpo bi mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ emi jlo wa nu jehovah nyi emitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ e ɖɔhun
linlin tɔn nu nɔ ci e kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo ci jehovah tɔn ɖɔhun bɔ e nɔ zan sɔgbe xa jlo mawu tɔn kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo
jaan ði ɔ jehovah se xa mɛ gbɔn bɔ gbeyiɖɔ ezayii tinmɛ e do nu ci nu jezu bɔ wɛnɖagbe wema ɖɔ e wu
xa ezayii
nu mi xo go mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hudo alɔdo tɔn lɛ e ɔ mi nɔ wa nu jezu ɖɔhun nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwebinu se xa a
ɔ jezu eɖee bi jo nu ɔ kpo nu kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ kpo
luk nu nɔ ci e kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ bi kpo nɔ ɖɔ gbigbɔ tɔn wɛ
etɛ gbigbɔ tɔn azan mitɔn gbe tɔn lɛ sixu mi
gbɔn vo nu biblu tɔn lɛ ɔ gbigbɔ tɔn gege ɖevo lɛ ɖe ɖo azan mitɔn gbe yi nukɔn tawun ɖo jijɔ klisu tɔn lɛ mɛ
vlafo ɖo ayi kanɖodonuwu yetɔn ɖo ɔ mɛ nɔ yi mɛ gbɔn jiwu e yetɔn alo jijɔ ɖagbe ɖevo ɖo lɛ e wu
mi ɖɔhun ɔ xo hun xa ganmaɖo yetɔn lɛ kpo nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ kpo hwenu ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba sɔnu nu jijɔ mawu tɔn enɛ lɛ e
rachel ee nyi nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo bresil e ɖɔ yi wan nu nusisɔ ɖo ji ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ nɔ sɔnu ɖo ji ganji a
nugbo ɔ kpinkplɔn mi bɔ do gan jɛxa e huzu gbigbɔ tɔn
huzuhuzu lɛ biblo bɔkun nu mi a wa ɖo hugan
e ɖɔ wa jɛ ayi ɖe sin nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e ji ji
wa jɛ ayi ji ɖɔ nuɖe jɛ hwihwedo mi ji ɖo gbɛzan mɛ nuɖe wɛ ɖo taji tawun hu
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ wa ayi ɖo jehovah sinsɛn ji
sin hwenɛnu ɔ reylene nyi ɖagbe ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖiɖo nu akpa jehovah do ɖo matie mɛ e linu
e ɖɔ ganjɛwu bi ɖɔ jehovah kpe nukun do wu ye
vlafo tuun mɛɖe lɛ ɖo agun towe mɛ bɔ ze mɔhun
do ci klisu ɖɔhun ɔ etɛ e byɔ ɖɔ mi wa
mi sixu jo miɖee do nu linlin klisu tɔn gbɔn
miɖesunɔ mɛtun ɔ sixu wa nu klisu ɖɔhun gbɔn
ðo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ ɔ biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin klisu tɔn
ðo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ ɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ klisu jezu ɖo e
enɛ wu ɔ do ci klisu ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo tuun nu ji e nɔ tamɛ do e kpo mɛ alɔkpa e nyi e kpo ganji
enɛ wɛ bɔ nu mi ci jezu ɖɔhun ɔ mi ci jehovah ɖɔhun hugan
mi sixu wa gbɔn
ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ mɔ nujiwu e blo lɛ e se xoɖiɖɔ e xwle mɛ lɛ e mɔ e wa nu xa alɔkpa lɛ bi gbɔn e kpo e nɔ zan nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ gbɔn e kpo
ɖɔ nu e wa ɔ bi wɛ mi mɔ mɛ
loɔ midɛɛ lɛ sixu mɔ ɛ tlɔlɔ a
gbɔn wema matie luki kpo jaan kpo tɔn xixa kpo tamɛ linlin do ji kpo gblamɛ ɔ linlin klisu tɔn lɛ jo miɖee do wɛ mi ɖe nɛ
tamɛ linlin klisu ɖɔhun mi gbɔn
kpinkplɔn tamɛ klisu ɖɔhun sixu mi gbɔn
nuɖuɖu hunsin ɖagbe tɔn nɔ hlɔnhlɔn agbaza gbɔn e ɔ wɛ linlin klisu tɔn ayi mitɔn nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo gbɔn
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ mi nɔ wa tuun nu klisu wa ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ e
enɛ nɔ wa mi bɔ mi nɔ wa gbeta bɔ mi ɖo ayixa ɖagbe bɔ nu mitɔn mawu nukunmɛ lɛ e kɔn
yi gbe ɖɔ le enɛ lɛ mi hwɛjijɔ wu mi aklunɔ jezu klisu do awu ɖɔhun lɛ e a hlɔ
etɛ lɛ do gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi wu ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
mi do nu nu e nyi gbigbɔ tɔn nyi e
mi mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nyi gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ e sin ɖagbe lɛ sixu nu mi
gudo mɛ din ɔ mi nu do linlin klisu tɔn ɖiɖo nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ yi nukɔn nɔ huzu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe gbɔn e wu
e ɖo co e kpo akpaxwe gbigbɔ tɔn ɔ tɔn gege ɖevo lɛ bɔ mi ɖo gbeje
ði ɔ mi sixu gbeje ba mɛ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo e gbɔn
nu ɖevo tɛ lɛ mi sixu wa nyi gbigbɔ tɔn
bɔ gbigbɔ tɔn mi nyi e nɔ mi ɖo gbɛzinzan mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn mɛ gbɔn
jo miɖee do nu gbigbɔ ali
enyi mi ɖo miɖee gbeje wɛ ɖɔ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn a ji ɔ etɛ ji mi sixu tamɛ do
etɛ mi ɖo wa ba yi nukɔn huzu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe
linlin klisu tɔn ɖiɖo mi ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn mɛ gbɔn
etɛ nɔvi sunnu ɖokpo mɔ ɖɔ e hwedo emi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e ɖɔ wa nu nyanya ɖe gbeɖe a nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ɔ tɔn tɔn wɛ nɔ blo
nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo nukunta nɔ yi kple lɛ bi nɔ nyi gbexosin tɔn ɖo hweɖelɛnu ɖo xwemɛ xwemɛ
nuɖe hwedo mi
robert ɖesunɔ wu ɖɔ nuɖe jɛ do cobo wa wli alɔ a
e kpo asi tɔn kpo nɔ zan hwenu ɖo do kan nu byɔ yeɖee do xota biblu tɔn lɛ ji
e nɔ vɛwu nu asi tɔn nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe e cobonu e nɔ xosin lɛ a loɔ winnya nɔ ɖo robert hu wɛ magbokɔ ɖo e tuun xosin e nɔ lɛ e a wutu
e ɖɔ e ci ɖɔ tuun nu ɖe a ɖɔhun
nɔ ɖɔ nu nyiɖee ɖɔ nu nyi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nu asi ɔ ɖo wa nuɖe
e wa nugbo
e ɖɔ nɔ biblu nɔ nɔ jɛ nukunnu mɔ jɛ nu mɛ mɔ nu jɛ a lɛ e wu ji
wa ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ bɔ ɖo taji bi ɔ tawun kpo jehovah kpo
etɛ nu jɛ do robert wu e sixu mi
nu taji tɛ lɛ wu mi ɖɔ xo do
nu jɛ do robert wu e sixu nu taji ɖe lɛ mi
mi sixu ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖe lɛ do biblu ji nɔ yi kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu enɛ lɛ dandan ɖɔ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn a
alo mi sixu yi nukɔn bɔ enyi mi gbeje miɖee ganji ɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ kpo nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo fili
do mi bonu mi kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɔ mi xosin nu nukanbyɔ taji atɔn ɖo xota elɔ mɛ etɛ mi bɔ mi gbeje ninɔmɛ mɛ mi ɖe tawun ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e
mi sixu nyi gbigbɔ tɔn kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ gbɔn gbɛn
gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi sixu mi ɖo gbɛzinzan mitɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tɔn mɛ gbɔn
weɖexamɛ ɖo efɛzinu lɛ mɛ e kan
hwenu mi jɛ mawu ji e ɔ mi blo huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ
huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ wa ɖagbe nu mi ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn sin akpaxwe lɛ bi mɛ
din mi blo baptɛm e ɔ huzuhuzu lɛ vɔ a
e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi kpo ɖo ayixa mitɔn kpodo linlin mitɔn kpo huzu wɛ
efɛ ðo mi nyi a wutu ɔ mi bi ɖo kpo ɖo huzuhuzu lɛ blo wɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi gbeje miɖee
bonu mi kpo ɖo wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ mi ɖo gbeje miɖee ganji
mɛ winnyawinnya wɛ mi nyi a alo mɛxo wɛ mi nyi ɔ mi sixu kan nu elɔ lɛ byɔ miɖee ɖo ayi huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ wu ɖo gbɛzan mɛ bɔ ɖɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ba nyi gbigbɔ tɔn a
gbɛzan ɖo klisu tɔn ɖɔhun ci wɛ a
etɛ ninɔmɛ nɔ ɖo ɖo kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ ji e kpo nuwalɔ kpo nɔ do ba mɛ nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo e wu
etɛ lɛ nɔ do nu nɔ jlo mi lɛ e wu
etɛ aca nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn nusisɔ tɔn kpo tɔn kpo alo nɔ yi weɖexamɛ lɛ gbɔn e nɔ do wu ye
enyi mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ wa kpannukɔn mi ɔ nɔ wa nu gbɔn
yi nukɔn zɛ nukplɔnmɛ nukɔntɔn lɛ wu huzu klisanwun zin tawun e ɖe a
tamɛ linlin do xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ tɔn ji sixu mi bɔ mi ba mɛ mi yi nukɔn ɖo e
enyi mi gbeje ba mɛ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo e ɔ etɛ sin hudo mi sixu ɖo
bonu mi do gbeje ba mɛ mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo e ɔ mi sixu ɖo hudo alɔdo mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn tɔn ɖo hweɖelɛnu
pɔlu ɖɔ agbaza tɔn sixu nɔ tuun ɖɔ emi jɛ do ɖo mawu nukɔn
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖo linlin klisu tɔn lɛ e nɔ yawu ɖo ayi wuntun akpagbanumɛ tɔn nɔ linlin agbaza tɔn lɛ e wu
enyi dɔn ayi mitɔn wa wuntun enɛ lɛ ji ɔ mi nɔ yi gbe nɔ xwedo weɖexamɛ yetɔn lɛ a
wiwa ɖɔ mi jlo nyi gbigbɔ tɔn nut
hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ biblu tɔn ɖiɖo kun kpe nu e nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe o
ɖo vivɔnu gbɛzan tɔn tɔn ɔ e nɔ gbeji nu jehovah nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe a axɔ
enɛ wu ɔ gbɔn vo nu nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ biblu tɔn ɖiɖo ɔ etɛ sin hudo mi ɖo
e byɔ ɖɔ mi kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
mi wa gbɔn
etɛ mi bɔ mi ɖo nuɖiɖi xo a e
etɛ gbe mi ɖo nya hwenu mi ɖo nu wɛ ɖo tamɛ wɛ e
pɔlu byɔ klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖɔ su ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ
afɔ taji ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e wema hɛn miɖee ðo wanyiyi mawu tɔn mɛ
wema enɛ kpinkplɔn fo bɔ tuun zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ gbɔn ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ e
enyi wema enɛ fo ɔ sixu wema ɖevo ɖeɖee sixu bɔ nuɖiɖi towe xo a lɛ e
ðo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi nɔ do gan nɔ nyi alɔ nu nu ɖeɖee ali nu mi bɔ mi yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a lɛ e
etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu wa nyi gbigbɔ tɔn
enyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe wɛ nu ɔ ɖo nuɖe lɛ ɖo gbe yetɔn nya wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
nɔvi sunnu nɔ ɖo betɛli e ɖe do ɖo aca nɔ ɖɔ xo xa mɛ ɖeɖee jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e ɖo lɛdo tɔn lɛ ji jɛ nukɔn nu tuto ɔ sin
gege mɛ enɛ lɛ tɔn nyi mɛ winnyawinnya
nɔvi ɔ nɔ kan nu gbe jlo nya ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e byɔ
xosin mɛ gege tɔn nɔ ɖɔ tuun nu jlo wa do jehovah lɛ e ceɖeceɖe vlafo byɔ hwebinu tɔn alɔkpa ɖe mɛ alo wa ɖo fi hudo tɔn ɖe e
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ ci ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe lɛ kun ɖo xosin ɖe nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ o ɖɔhun
enɛ vlafo ɖɔ kun ku do nu gbe nya ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ji ganji ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ o wɛ a
ðo nyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe wutu ɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ nɔ ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ kpowun ɖo lɛ nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ nyi wa wutu wɛ a
nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah hugan ɖo nyiɖesu ɖo kancica ɖe xa ɛ wutu wɛ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun nyi mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ weɖexamɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ e nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe e kan o
bonu mi do sixu yi nukɔn ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ etɛ mi ɖo wa
biblu tɔn tɛ mi sixu xwedo
gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi nyi nu taji
ku kpo kpo sin xo wɛ hlɔ
e byɔ ɖɔ mi nyi cobo zin ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi yi nukɔn
e ɖo co mi ɖo do gan
xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie wa yi ɔ nɔvi john barr nɔ ɔ mɛ e ɖo xo ɖɔ do luki ji wɛ ɖɔ mɛ gege nɔ hwe ɖo nɔ jɛ tagba ɖe yi nukɔn a
mi ɖo ci jakɔbu ɖɔhun hwenu e ɖo alɔ do xa wɛnsagun ɖe wɛ e ɔ e jo gbe a jɛ hwenu e mɔ nyɔna ɖe e
bib nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e sixu mɔ vivi biblu xixa tɔn mi ɖo xa biblu ɔ wema ayiɖeɖayi tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun kpowun a
mi ɖo do gan mɔ nu xɔ akwɛ gbigbɔ tɔn ɖeɖee mi lɛ e
nɔ xo mawu tɔn ganji nɔ tamɛ do nu xa wɛ ɖe e ji
nɔ zan nu wɛ ɖe lɛ e kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo
nɔ jo linlin towe kpo ayi towe kpo do nu gbigbɔ nɔ ali
nɔ yi gbe nu alɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ do e bonu e nɔ su nukun towe mɛ
etɛ mi bɔ mi zan kɔlɛntinu lɛ
tɔn kpo weɖexamɛ tɔn kpo sixu mi gbɔn
etɛ sixu wa nyi gbigbɔ tɔn
gbavi afɔ ðeɖee sixu ðe yi nukɔn ðo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e
ee mi ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ nyi gbigbɔ tɔn e ɔ gbigbɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi bɔ mi huzu linlin mitɔn
kpo alɔdo gbigbɔ ɔ tɔn kpo ɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ mi sixu jɛ tamɛ ji jezu ɖɔhun
enyi mi mɔ ɖɔ linlin mitɔn nɔ mi do agbaza sin nu lɛ alo jlo nyanya lɛ kɔn ɔ mi ɖo jo gbe a
e jo gbe a
jehovah bɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ e ɖo linlin klisu tɔn
mi lɔ sixu wa
nukɔnmɛ ɔ ɖɔ nu tawun tawun ɖeɖee mi sixu wa lɛ e
xa
ee mi ɖo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo mi wu e bi zan wɛ ɖo nu nu mɛɖeejiɖuɖe didɛ kpo wan yiyi nu nɔvi kpo wɛ e ɔ mawu mi bɔ mi yi nukɔn nyi gbigbɔ tɔn
e ɖɔ nɔ kan nu elɔ byɔ hwiɖee gbe bi gbe etɛ ji do egbe yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
linlin klisu tɔn mi ɖo e mi ɖo xo mi nɔ ɖɔ ɖo mitɔn ji alo wemaxɔmɛ lɛ e kpo walɔ mi nɔ zan ɖo fi enɛ lɛ e kpo mɛ
e mi ɖo gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa gbe bi gbe lɛ e mɛ
ðo mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖebu hɛn kancica ɖo mi kpo mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ kpo tɛntin e gble a
enyi mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ wa mi ɔ linlin klisu tɔn mi ɖo e mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa
cobonu mi wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɔ mi ɖo nɔte nu do nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ ji nugbododo biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ mi bɔ wa gbeta ɖe kɔn
etɛ klisu wa ɖo ninɔmɛ elɔ mɛ
gbeta tɛ hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun
do miɖee nɔ nu gbɔn ɔ mi ninɔmɛ klewun ɖe lɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ mi nugbododo biblu tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe e ɖe kɔn e ɖokpo
ðɔ linlin klisu tɔn nɔ mi gbɔn hwenu mi ɖo gbeta lɛ kɔn wa wɛ do mɛ mi e wu e mɛ mi do xa lɛ e wu e
mɛ e e biba
nugbododo ɔ ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ
e sixu zan xo enɛ ɖo hwenu e ɖo mɛ e e wɛ e gbɔn
lɛ
ðo ayi nugbododo ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e wu
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ sixu bɔ zan nugbododo enɛ ganji
ði ɔ e sixu zan hwenu e ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ji e nɔ zun ɖe lɛ e zan wɛ e gbɔn
alo etɛ ɖo wa hwenu mɛ tuun a lɛ e ɖɔ hwi wa ji tɔn lɛ xa emi e
gbeta kɔn nɔ wa lɛ e mi bɔ su ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
linlin gbigbɔ tɔn ɖiɖo nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nyi alɔ nu nuɖe a lɛ e gbɔn
bɔ mi nɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
bɔ mi nɔ ɖeɖɛ lɛ gbɔn
akpagbanumɛ ɖe ɖo xo pɔlu ɖɔ klisanwun tɔn lɛ e mɛ
xa eblee lɛ
nyi nuɖewanu a e tɛ lɛ mi ɖo nyi alɔ
wɛ nyi ɖebu sixu hɛn nu gble do mɛ wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nyi nu yaya alo nuɖe a lɛ e
nugbododo enɛ sixu mi ɖo nukanbyɔ ɖebu sixu wa kpannukɔn mi ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ e kɔn ɖi elɔ wiwa ci ɖɔ e ɖo agbaza tɔn lɛ wa wɛ ɖɔhun vlafo a ce
ɖo elɔ hɛn akwɛ wa tawun bɔ e ɖo xwixwle mi wɛ e wɛ a
etɛwu ɖo xo kpoɖo nu tutomɛ ɖo gan do wɛ jla ninɔmɛ ɔ tɔn ɖo lɛ e a
gbeta kɔn nɔ wa lɛ e mi bɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe a
nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya
ðo mawuxoɖiɖɔ so ji tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ jezu ali mɛ ceɖeceɖe do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya wu
gbigbɔ tɔn ɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe wɛ e nɔ nya
nugbododo enɛ hinhɛn do ayi mɛ mi bɔ mi xosin nu nukanbyɔ lehun lɛ ɖo yi kplɔnyiji alavɔ wɛ a
gbeta kɔn nɔ wa lɛ e mi bɔ ɖe fifa sin ali do nyiɖee a
lɛ
we pɔlu ɖe xa agun hlɔma tɔn e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖeɖɛ lɛ gbɔn
hlɔ ðo mi nyi ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ nɔ nɔ fifa mɛ xa lɛ bi
enyi lɛ wa tiin ɔ mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn
e nɔ vɛwu nu mi bɔ mi jo xo do wɛ a alo e tuun mi ɖɔ mi nyi nɔ ɖe fifa sin ali do eɖee e wɛ a ja
klewun ɖe kpowun wɛ nyi enɛ tamɛ linlin do nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ ji sixu mi gbɔn bɔ mi wa gbeta e nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe wa kɔn lɛ e kɔn
gbigbɔ tɔn nyinyi sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ hugan ɖo mi nɔ zan ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe e mɛ
robert xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ tɔn e ɖɔ ee ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe xa jehovah gudo e ɔ wa nyi asu ɖagbe hugan ɖe nyi ɖagbe hugan ɖe
ɖo awajijɛ
enyi mi nɔ nya nukɔnyiyi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo sin gbe ɔ mi lɔ sixu ɖu vivi nyɔna ɖokpo ɔ tɔn
enyi mi nyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ hugan ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ din ɖu vivi jɔ ɔ tɔn ɖo sɔgudo tim
dɔkun ðo nu xoxo sɛxwetɛn mitɔn lɛ e
ee batoo ɔ ɖo belfast fi kpo xu kpo kple ɖe e gbɔn din wɛ e ɔ kpɛvi ɖo e mɔ so ɖeɖee gbemu bla e bɔ weziza tɔn ta
mai wɛ
mɛ ɖokpo ɖo mɛ bɔ azɔn ɔ nɛ eyɛ ɖo irelande yi wɛ nɛ charles
russell wɛ batoo ee bloɖo wɛ e ɖe e ɖaxo we ɖo nukɔn nu nɔvi russell ɖokpo nyi batoo gblegble kpo wegɔ tɔn olympic kpo
e fi e nɔ blo batoo ɖe e sin ɔ e mɔ biblu wo ɖo ɖo age ɔ ji bɔ ɖo wiwa tɔn
xwe jɛ nukɔn nu enɛ ɔ nɔvi russell wa gbeta ɔ kɔn nɔ yi tomɛ ɖebɔdoɖewu lɛ ɖo amɛlika do sixu gbɔn enɛ yɛkan mɛ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
irelande wɛ e ɖo juillet
jɛ toxo chicago tɔn mɛ e ɔ e mɔ bɔ hwe ɖo xɔ yi wɛ hwenu age queenstown tɔn ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e e sixu flin tɔn lɛ jɔtɛn yetɔn gbɔn e ganji
ee nɔvi russell kpo tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo toxo mɛ nu bi ɖo tito ji ɖe lɛ e kpo gletoxo ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ kpo mɛ gbɔn wɛ e ɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo fi ɔ jinukun lɛ mya go su yiya
azɔn tɛnwe wɛ nɔvi russell yi irelande
jlo mɛ lɛ tɔn e nyite ɖo tomɛyiyi tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ hwenu e wa bɔ kanweko donu mɔkpan alo hweɖelɛnu ɔ donu mɔkpan nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖoto e hwenu e lɛkɔ wa e
ðo tomɛyiyi tɔn wegɔ ɔ hwenu ɖo mai ɔ e jla xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi sin kple lɛ ɖo belfast kpo dublin kpo do xojlawema ayi ɔ ji tɔn lɛ mɛ
russell ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ wa lɛ e bi ɖoto ganji se xota kunkpla nuɖiɖi ablaxamu tɔn kpo nyɔna sɔgudo tɔn ja nu lɛ e kpo nyi akpa e do xwle nu e e
ðo jlo ɖaxo mɛ lɛ ɖo ɖo irelande e wutu ɔ russell ɖɔ emi yi finɛ ɖo tomɛ atɔngɔ emi yi ɖo elɔpu e hwenu
nɔvi do gbe hwenu e byɔ batoo ɔ mɛ ɖo belfast ɖo avril zanzan gbe ɖokpo ɖo e
xota xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi ɔ tɔn e jla ɔ wɛ nyi bɔ nukɔnmɛ ɖo gbadanu enɛ ɔ wa tɛn tɔn mɛ
ðo dublin ɔ jɛma tawun nɔ nyi mɛɖaxo e kpo
chretienne jeunes tɔn kpo blo bɔ jɛji ɔ huzu kpannukɔn biblu lɛ
nu mi lɛkɔ yi hwe ɔ ba nu sixu jɛ ɖo nuwiwa enɛ hwenu e
nugbo biblu tɔn mya nukun nu nya ɖe bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi yi xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi irish jla e sin domɛ
e fa cobonu e mɔ fi ɖe junjɔn ɖo mɛ lɛ mɛ a
nya ɔ ayi tɔn ɖo nyi dawe hwa wewenɔ ɖe ɖo atan do wiwi gaga ɖe e ji
ɔ zan mɔ gbezeyiaga tɔn a co gbe tɔn kpe xɔ ɔ mɛ bi kpewu blo bɔ ayi mɛ wa lɛ e tɔn nɔ xoɖiɖɔ ɔ ji nu ganxixo ɖokpo adaɖe
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ wa lɛ e xo alɔ do ɖɔ emi yi gbe
hwenu nu ɔ fo e ɔ nya ɔ sɛkpɔ nɔvi lɛ do ɖo mɔjɛmɛ hugan
mɛ mɔ nu jɛ lɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ gege wɛ mɔ nugbo ɔ gbɔn
hwenu nɔvi russell gosin ɖo mai do batoo mauretania ɖo tomɛyiyi tɔn ɛnɛgɔ ɔ hwenu e ɔ e kpla mɛ nɔ zan nuwlanmɔ do wlan nu e ɖokpo e wɛ nyi nɔvi huntsinger bonu hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ ɖo xu ɔ ji e ɔ e xa xota atɔxwɛ tɔn lɛ bonu e wlan
xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi nɔvi russell xwle mɛ ɖo belfast e ɔ ayi ɔ ji wɛ wa tɛn tɔn mɛ bɔ gbɔ nɔte ɖo tɛnmɛ ɖe a wutu nɔvi
russell ɖo batoo lusitania mɛ
tomɛyiyi xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ tɔn e lɔ nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ kpo ee wa yi e kpo
ayihɔngbe tɔn ɔ lɛ byɔ batoo nɔ wema mɛ lɛ hɛn yi liverpool e mɛ wa byɔ batoo nukunɖeji lusitania ee xwe e mɛ
xojlawema irish ɔ jla xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi ɔ mai
xoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ bi e jla lɛ e ɔ nɔvi russell xwle mɛ ɖo tomɛyiyi tɔn ayizɛngɔ ɔ kpo tɛnwegɔ ɔ kpo hwenu ɖo
ðo avril mɛ ɔ biblu ɖo belfast ylɔ mɛ bɔ ɖoto xoɖiɖɔ xota tɔn nyi nu ðo ku gudo e e
kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo kple dublin tɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ gudo nu ɔ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
nɔvi russell wɛ xwle xoɖiɖɔ enɛ lɛ mɛ ɖo hwe enɛ lɛ co e tuun ɖɔ mɛɖe kun ɖo dandan o ɖo e nyi tɔn a mawu tɔn wɛ
nyɔna tɛ e hɛn wa
xwe we ɖie ɔ batoo ɔ syɔ
lusitania ɔ wa gba ɖo irelande sin age afɔligbe tɔn ɔ ji ɖo mai
vi sunnu ɖaxo sin acɛ esawu tɔn jakɔbu xɔ e wɛ bɔ e huzu mɛsiya ɔ tɔn a
mi ɖɔ xo do nu enɛ ji wa yi
e ci ɖɔ xo mitɔn ɖɔ wɛ ɖɔhun sɔgbe xa nu mi xa ɖo eblee lɛ mɛ e
wemafɔ enɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ esawu nyi alo nu lɛ gɔn nukun tɔn mɛ su bɔ e do nuɖuɖu ka ɖokpo wu sa viɖaxo sin acɛ e ɖo e nu jakɔbu
nukɔngbevi leya ji nu jakɔbu alo izlayɛli e wɛ nyi hwlibɛni
nukɔnmɛ ɔ vi sunnu nukɔntɔn jakɔbu sin asi hlacɛli e yi wan hugan e ji e wɛ nyi jozɛfu
hwenu hwlibɛni wa winnyanu e ɔ e vi sunnu ɖaxo sin acɛ ɔ nu jozɛfu
luki wa kunkan mɛ mɛsiya ɔ wa gosin e
jɛsee sin vi sunnu nyi davidi e nyi nukɔngbevi a
kpode wɛ e nyi nu vi sunnu tantɔn jɛsee tɔn lɛ
e ɖo co kunkan mɛsiya ɔ tɔn wa gbɔn davidi ji
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mɛ bɔ bɔ kunkan ɔ wa gbɔn gbla tɔn mɛ e wɛ nyi nyi nukɔngbevi davidi tɔn a e
ðiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ vi sunnu ɖaxo nyinyi kun nyi nuti o a
vi sunnu ɖaxo ɔ ɖo tɛn tɔn ɖe mɛ bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ e wɛ nɔ nyi mɛ nɔ bɔ do xwedo ɔ tɔn wu e
e wɛ nyi vi sunnu ɖu gu nuɖokan lɛ tɔn ɖo donu we ji e bib
joz
din ɔ mi lɛkɔ yi eblee lɛ mɛ e ɖɔ mɛɖe nyi abi alo nu lɛ gɔn mɛɖe nukunmɛ su esawu ɖɔhun o esawu do nuɖuɖu ka ɖokpo wu sa viɖaxo sin acɛ e ɖo e
nu taji ɔ wu ɖo fi a
pɔlu ɖo xo ɖɔ do kunkan mɛsiya ɔ tɔn wu wɛ ɖo fi a
e to do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖe ali jlɔjlɔ gbɔn ji
nu blo ɔ ci esawu ɖɔhun
nu lɛ su nukun tɔn mɛ a bɔ nu e ɖɔ tlɔlɔ ɔ e wa suɖunu
kpo nu mi ɖɔ din lɛ e bi kpo ɔ etɛ mi sixu ɖɔ din do kunkan mɛ jezu nyi mɛsiya ɔ e wa sin e wu
hweɖelɛnu ɔ kunkan ɔ nɔ gbɔn vi sunnu ɖaxo ɔ ji e nɔ nyi hwebinu a
baptɛm nu e byɔ ðo klisanwun lɛ si e ðe
lɛ emi nɔ vi mitɔn lɛ bonu yi nukɔn blo baptɛm a
etɛ ɖo nyi nu gbe mi nya hwenu mi ɖo biblu xa mɛɖe wɛ e
etɛwu e nyi nuwanyido ɖe ɖɔ e dan lɛjɛlɛjɛ do baptɛm biblo wu
etɛ bɔ klisanwun ɖe lɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu vi yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ ɖo na na nu baptɛm biblo
mi do nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖo xota we elɔ lɛ mɛ
mɛ yiyi e ðo hudo tɔn tawun
ali tawun tawun tɛ lɛ mi sixu yi mɛ ɖe
mi sixu nyi jonɔ ɖagbe gbɔn
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ ji
gbɛzan tɔn jehovah flu mi gbeɖe a
nugbɛnumɛ nyi wanyiyi mawu tɔn tɔn
ðoto nu lɛ enɛ ɔ
xota we elɔ lɛ mi bɔ wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu mi e sɔ bɔ e nɔ mɔ ɖo nu e nɔ nu mi ɖɔhun e mɛ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ
mawu nɔ nu nu mi gbɔn
mi ɖo yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ tɔn gbɔn
mi sixu nɔ nu nu miɖee gbɔn
xosin lɛ ɖo xota we elɔ lɛ mɛ
etɛ nɔte wɛ ɖe
bonu e blo baptɛm nu mɛ
kolosinu lɛ
jaki
etɛ ji klisanwun lɛ nɔ ku do cobɔ vi yetɔn lɛ blo baptɛm
nu gege ɔ ɖɔ nu kpo mamaa kpo ɖɔ jlo blo baptɛm bɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo nu mi hwɛhwɛ
jlo kudeji ɖɔ tuun gbeta kɔn wa e nyi nujɔnu e
ðo decembre ɔ azan manawɔn enɛ kpe
brandt wɛ tinmɛ nu ɖeɖee do gbeta kɔn e wa blo baptɛm e gbɔn
egbe ɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ nɔ vi yetɔn lɛ nu wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn
na na ɖiɖo nu baptɛm biblo alo lɛjɛlɛjɛ dindan ɖo hwɛjijɔ nuɖe a lɛ e wu sixu dɔn tagba lɛ wa ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
etɛwu nɔ hu lɛdo tɔn ɖe lɛ
lɛdo tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ hu emi ɖo nɔ mɔ mɛ winnyawinnya xwe yetɔn ɖo jɛ vlamɛ su ɖo xwedo klisanwun tɔn lɛ mɛ blo baptɛm a lɛ e wutu
etɛwu e sixu sin
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ lɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ dan lɛjɛlɛjɛ do baptɛm biblo wu
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi nu do nu nɔ bɔ ɖe lɛ nɔ vi yetɔn lɛ bonu yi nukɔn blo baptɛm a lɛ e ɛnɛ wu
etɛ ɖu ayi mɛ nu tɔn lɛ
nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu tɔn xo mi ɖɔ ɖo akpaxwe nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ jlo tuun nu vi nyɔnu yetɔn su ɖo ba ɖe mɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu baptɛm nyi e kpo e nyi nu taji e kpo wu alo gbɔ a ji yetɔn enɛ sɔgbe
lɛ sixu tuun gbɔn ɖɔ vi yetɔn jɛxa ze eɖee jo nu mawu sɔgbe
gbe jezu ɖe ɖo matie mɛ e sixu lɛ hwenu ɖo nu vi yetɔn lɛ wɛ e gbɔn
mi ɖɔ xo gbɔn ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ e ɔ biblu ɖɔ xwe ɖe jɛn mɛɖe ɖo ɖo cobo blo baptɛm a
e ɖo co lɛ sixu ɖu le tamɛ linlin do nu e nu mɛɖe bonu e huzu ahwanvu byɔ e ji
xogbe glɛkigbe tɔn e lilɛ do e nu akɔta lɛ bi bonu huzu ahwanvu ɖo matie mɛ e sin tinmɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nu ɖo linlin tawun ɖe wu enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ huzu ahwanvu
ahwanvu ɖe nyi mɛ xo jezu tɔn lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu kanɖeji setonu lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ nu gbe klisanwun lɛ bi ɖo nya e wɛ nyi ɖɔ vi yetɔn lɛ sin vu kpo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ emi bɔ huzu ahwanvu klisu tɔn blo baptɛm e
e ɖo co biblu ɖɔ mɛɖe tlɛ ɖo vu ɔ e sixu ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ tɔn su nukun tɔn mɛ
biblu ɖɔ xo do timɔtee wu gbɔn e bɔ mi wa gbeta tɛ kɔn do baptɛm e blo e wu
ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ganji lɛ e sixu vi yetɔn lɛ gbɔn
timɔtee nyi ahwanvu ɖe nugbo ɔ do ɖo etɔn sin vu
pɔlu ɖɔ ɖɔ timɔtee nugbo ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ lɛ e sin vu
timɔtee su ɖo xwedo klan ɖo sinsɛn lixo e ɖe mɛ co nɔ tɔn nyi jwifu e kpo tɔn kpo nu bɔ mawuxowema ɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ
tim bɔ ɖo hwenu timɔtee sin xwe ɖo jɛ vlamɛ e alo hwenu e ɖo xwe vɛlɛɛ e ɔ e nyi ahwanvu wu e ɖo ayi sixu bunɔ lɛ mɛ ɖo agun mɛ e mɛ
mɛ ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo tamɛbibɔ sin vu nɔ wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn nɔ ɖɔ emi jlo blo baptɛm
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ lɛ e nɔ gbidi kɔ nu vi yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ blo baptɛm a
e wa ɔ nɔ vi ɖokpo ɖokpo nu yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo sɔgbe xa nuwukpikpe mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn
xomɛ sixu hun lɛ hwenu vi ɖe hɛn xo ɖo nunywɛxo mɛ e mɛ e
lɛ hɛn enɛ mɛ kan nu elɔ byɔ yeɖee vi ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpe e ze eɖee jo nu mawu blo baptɛm a
e byɔ ɖɔ mɛ jlo blo baptɛm e ɖe ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e bi tɔn wɛ a
e sɔgbe ɖɔ ɖo lɛ nyi ɖo xwedo ɔ mɛ wutu ɔ ɖɔ vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ e ba do enɛ ji do ze yeɖee jo nu mawu
enyi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ lɛ bi jɛn e byɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe ɖo cobo ze eɖee jo nu mawu blo baptɛm a
ðo baptɛm gudo ɔ ahwanvu lɛ bi ɖo bɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe bɔ ɖo e ɖo jijɛji wɛ
xa kolosinu lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ba tɛ mɛ e byɔ ɖɔ ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ ɖo cobo blo baptɛm
etɛ mi sixu ɖo kunkpla pɔlu kpo ɔ kpo e mɛ
hwenu pɔlu yi tomɛ azɔn wegɔ ɔ ɖo tɔn e ɔ e yi filipu
ðo zan ɔ mɛ ɔ ayikungban danwu hunhun gankpa ɔ sin dodo lɛ bɔ hɔn lɛ bi hun
ɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ lɛ hɔn jlo hu eɖee bɔ pɔlu suxo ylɔ ɛ
pɔlu kpo silasi kpo kpe nu wu ɖekunnu nu ɔ kpo xwedo tɔn kpo
nugbo do jezu wu e su nukun yetɔn mɛ gbɔn ɔ bɔ ɖe afɔ tɛ
etɛ enɛ sixu mi
sɔgbe kpo aca yetɔn kpo ɔ ɔ sixu nyi ahwangan ɖo gbɔjɛ mɛ e ɖe
enɛ wu ɔ do ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ e do mawuxo ɔ wu ɔ e ɖo nugbo taji biblu tɔn lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e nyi mawu tɔn byɔ e mɛ kanɖeji setonu nu nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ
ðo taan klewun ɖe gudo ɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn do nugbo taji mawuxowema ɔ tɔn lɛ wu kpo su nukun tɔn mɛ gbɔn e kpo ɛ bɔ e blo baptɛm
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kpo ɖo nu do nu ji wɛ ɖo baptɛm tɔn gudo
kpodo enɛ kpo ɖo ayi mɛ ɔ enyi nukplɔnmɛ taji mawuxowema ɔ tɔn lɛ nu tinmɛ mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu kpo baptɛm kpo ɖo e su vi towe sin nukunmɛ tawun ɔ etɛ sixu wa
klisanwun lɛ sixu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nu vi ɔ ɖɔ e yi mɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ bonu ɖɔ e sɔgbe blo baptɛm a ji
gbeta tɛ kɔn ɖe lɛ wa
etɛ ɖo nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu ɖe jɛ nukɔn
ɖe lɛ nɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ e hugan ɖɔ vi emitɔn sunnu alo nyɔnu jo baptɛm biblo do mɔ tɛn do yi nukɔn ɖo wema kplɔnkplɔn sin ali ɖo ɖagbe ɖe
e sixu ɖɔ linlin mɔhun nyi linlin ɖagbe ɖe e vi yetɔn bɔ tɔn ɖo doo a
taji hugan ɔ e sɔgbe xa mawuxowema ɔ a
tɛ xo mawu tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖɔ e zan xa
e ɖo taji ɖɔ e flin ɖɔ elɔ kpo nu lɛ e bi kpo nɔ klan gbe xa jlo jehovah tɔn kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo
ja jaan kancica syɛnsyɛn vi ɖe ɖo xa jehovah e wɛ ɛ hugan bɔ e ahwan xa sataan tɔn kpo linlin sɔgbe xa linlin mawu tɔn a lɛ e kpo
nugbo ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ hwenu mi jehovah ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo mitɔn mɛ e jɛn mi ɖo awajijɛ nugbo ɔ yi nukɔn xa ðɛhan
etɛwu ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖɔ vi yetɔn jo baptɛm biblo do
sixu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nu vi blo baptɛm a ɔ e sixu ɖe e sin agun mɛ a
lɛjɛlɛjɛ dindan do baptɛm biblo wu bɔ e ɖo gbe nu jehovah a wɛ a
e ɖo co nuwanyido tawun wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e ɖɔ vi blo baptɛm a e kun sixu ɖo gbe nu jehovah o
etɛwu e nyi baptɛm wɛ e blo cobo ɖo gbe nu jehovah a
e wa ɔ enyi vi ɖe tuun nu ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ e kpo ee nukun tɔn mɛ a e kpo ɔ e ɖo gbe nu mawu xa jaki
nusumɛnukunmɛ enɛ cyɔn alɔ vi towe ji ɛ nɔ ali jlɔjlɔ jehovah tɔn ji eza
ðo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ nyi lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo wutu ɔ sixu do hlɔnhlɔn hlɔnhlɔn ji nu gan do wɛ lɛ ɖe e gbɔn xo ɖagbe lɛ ɖiɖɔ do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya wu gblamɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu wa gbexosin tɔn nu xwe jɛji e flin xo e ɖɔ xa nɔvi charles
russell hwenu e ɖo xwe kpowun e wa ɖagbe e
e ɖɔ cɛju wɛ mi ɖɔ xo do nu nya wɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e ji
nugbo ɔ xogbe ɖagbe lɛ kpo xogbe wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo sixu wa ɖagbe nu taan gege
agun ɔ tɔn lɛ sixu gbɔn ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu emi e jɛxa gbɔn e gblamɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe nɔ xosin gosin ayi tɔn mɛ ɖɔ e tamɛ ganji lɛ e a
e nɔ zan ali hun ɖo wemaxɔmɛ lɛ e do ɖekunnu a
nɔ yawu kpa mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kpo ayi bi kpo
etɛwu blo tuto ɖɔ xo xa mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe jɛ nukɔn nu kple alo ɖo kple gudo do ɖe nu tɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu e a
ðo ali enɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ mɔ ɖɔ emi lɔ nyi akpaxwe agun ɖaxo ɖe tɔn ðɛh nwt
baptɛm nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo nukun sɔgudo tɔn ɔ gbɔn
awajijɛ tɛ klisanwun lɛ bi nɔ do gan ɖo
sin hwenu lɛ ji vi yetɔn e wɛ ɖo ɖo linlin ɔ ɖɔ emi ɛ huzu ahwanvu ɖe ɛ bɔ e eɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm
lɛ emi alɔdido vi mitɔn lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu ɖe wɛ nyi nu gbe mi ɖo nya e akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
hwenu brandt wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi jlo blo baptɛm e ɔ tɔn nɔ ɖo sisi nu mawu lɛ e jlo kudeji ɖɔ e sɔgbe ɖe afɔ nyi nujɔnu hugan ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ e
e ɖɔ nu jehovah ɖɔ e vivi nu emi tawun ɖɔ vi nyɔnu kpɛvi emitɔn wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ze eɖee jo
xwe jɛji gudo ɔ ɖɔ wɔn zan enɛ gbeɖe a
mɛ lɛ ɖu vivi awajijɛ ɖokpo ɔ tɔn hwenu mɔ bɔ vi mitɔn lɛ yeɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm e
lɛ sixu nu ɖo les jeunes
reponses pratiques akpaxwe mɛ e ji gbɔn xa vi yetɔn wex
nukanbyɔ mitɔn lɛ sin xosin ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mitɔn gungbe avril tɔn mɛ wex
baptɛm ee sɔgbe xa enɛ e ɖo hwlɛngan wɛ din nwt
nwt
enyi vi ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ emi jlo blo baptɛm ɔ klisanwun ɖe lɛ nɔ wa nu gbɔn
etɛwu e nɔ kanbyɔ mɛ jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e ɖɔ ze yeɖee jo nu jehovah a ji
klisanwun lɛ ɖo vi nyɔnu yetɔn xwe tɛnnɛ mɛvi nɔ nyi e wɛ hwenu e kpo mɛ jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e kpo e
e ze gbe do ji xosin nu nu we ɔ kanbyɔ lɛ e bɔ xosin tɔn zawe ganji
tɔn lɛ go ɖo gbeta kɔn vi nyɔnu yetɔn wa ze eɖee bi jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm e wu
jɛ nukɔn nu enɛ ɔ nɔ tɔn xo nu kpɛɖe
e kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ kpo ɖo vu din blo baptɛm vlafo a ce
e mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e jlo wa e wu ganji doo a
e hu ɖɔ e nɔte kpɛɖe cobo blo baptɛm a e
nu wanyiyinɔ gege nɔ kanbyɔ yeɖee hwenu vi yetɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ emi jlo blo baptɛm e ɖe lɛ nɛ
baptɛm nyi nu taji e gbɛn
etɛwu e sixu baptɛm do tɔjihun nɔwee hwenu tɔn wu
hwenu ɖo xo ɖɔ do baptɛm wu wɛ e ɔ e kɛnu do tɔjihun nɔwee blo e wu ɖɔ baptɛm ee sɔgbe xa enɛ e ɖo hwlɛngan wɛ din
nɔwee wa mawu ɛ e kpo gbejininɔ kpo
nukplɔnmɛ tɛ ɖo nujlɛdonuwu tɔn mɛ
kunnuɖenu etɛ tɔn
e nɔ kunnuɖenu ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe ze eɖee jo nu jehovah sɔgbe kpo nuɖiɖi e ɖo nu klisu sin ku e kpo
nɔwee ɖɔhun ɔ ahwanvu ɖeɖee ze yeɖee jo nu mawu lɛ e nɔ setonu nɔ wa e do alɔ mɛ nu e
enɛ bɔ mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu kpo baptɛm kpo nyi nu taji tawun ɖe
mɛ nɔ dan lɛjɛlɛjɛ do baptɛm wu ɖo hwɛjijɔ nuɖe a lɛ e wu e ɖo nukunɖiɖo mavɔmavɔ tɔn tɔn wɛ
afɔ tɛ lɛ mɛɖe ɖo ɖe cobo blo baptɛm
etɛwu klisanwun nɔ biblu xa mɛ e ɖe ɖo hɛn baptɛm nyi nu taji gbɔn e do ayi mɛ hwenu e ɖo nu xa vi tɔn alo biblu ɖe wɛ e
ðɔ tinmɛ baptɛm jaan blo nu mɛ lɛ e ɖo e ðo baptɛm jaan blo nu mɛ lɛ e mɛ ɔ ɖetɛ gbɔn vo nu bi
mɛ ɖeɖee jaan blo baptɛm lɛ e wa do ɖɔ emi lɛkɔ sin mɔyizi emi gba lɛ e gudo
jezu hu hwɛ ɖe a enɛ wu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo a
hwenu jezu ɖo tɔn wa wɛ ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ lɔ blo baptɛm nu mɛ
jaan baptɛm jaan blo nu mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ baptɛm lɔ blo nu mɛ e nɔte nu kɔ mɛ lɛ sin mɔyizi gba lɛ e gudo e
e ɖo co ɖo ku jezu tɔn kpo sin ku tɔn kpo gudo ɔ baptɛm biblo ɖo tinmɛ ɖevo nu ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ
ðo sin ku jezu tɔn gudo ɔ gbe tɛ e ɖe nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ
tin nu baptɛm klisanwun tɔn nyi e mɛ
ðo xwe tɔn ɔ jezu sin ku e eɖee sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo vlafo nu yɔkpɔvu lɛ ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
jezu gbɔn mɛ ɖɔ baptɛm biblo nyi nuɖe bɔ e byɔ ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee yi gbe do kɔ nu klisanwun nyinyi byɔ lɛ e mɛ e si
mɛɖebu jlo mawu e jlo gbɔn e ɖo tuun jezu ɖo ɖo linlin mawu tɔn sin jijɛnu mɛ e yi gbe
enyi mɛ ɔ wa gudo ɔ e hɛn ɔ e blo baptɛm
baptɛm biblo ɖo sin mɛ ɖokpo mawu yi gbe e nɛ
ɔ nɔ hwɛjijɔ nuɖe a lɛ e nɔ dan lɛjɛlɛjɛ do baptɛm biblo wu a mɛ
etɛ etiopiinu huzu jwifu ɖe e kpo pɔlu kpo sin sixu mi do baptɛm wu
mi tamɛ do etiopiinu huzu jwifu lɛkɔ xwe xwe hwenu e lɛkɔ sin mawu gbe ɖo jeluzalɛmu e ji
wɛnsagun jehovah tɔn ɖe mɛ nu filipu ɖɔ e sɛkpɔ etiopiinu ɔ ɖɔ wɛnɖagbe jezu tɔn ɔ sin xo
etiopiinu ɔ wa nu gbɔn
nu e wa bɔ e kunnuɖenu ɖo wɛn e ɖɔ nugbo e e su nukun tɔn mɛ ɖesu
wegɔ ɔ wɛ nyi jwifu nɔ doya nu klisanwun lɛ e ɖe tɔn
e ji ɖo togun eɖee jo nu mawu e ɖe mɛ
nya enɛ nɔ ɖokan do aca jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ wu e wa ali hugan e ɖe
jezu klisu e sin ku su e ɖesunɔ wɛ ɖekunnu tlɔlɔ
nya ɔ wa nu gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ tuun nya jwifu enɛ e wa ylɔ ɖɔ pɔlu e
flin ɖɔ ee e mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo kunkpla jezu ɖo ɖo linlin mawu tɔn sin jijɛnu mɛ e wu tlolo e ɔ e wa nuɖe
e dan lɛjɛlɛjɛ cobo blo baptɛm a xa
etɛ nɔ biblu lɛ egbe bɔ nɔ blo baptɛm
enyi mi mɔ mɛ lɛ bonu ze yeɖee jo nu mawu blo baptɛm ɔ e nɔ ci nu mi
biblu gege wɛ nɔ wa nu gbɔn egbe sixu nyi mɛ winnyawinnya alo mɛxomɔ
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo nuɖiɖi nu nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ bɔ e su nukun yetɔn mɛ nugbo nugbo lɛ e ɔ akpakpa nɔ do yeɖee zize jo nu mawu blo baptɛm wu
xomɛ nɔ hun jehovah tɔn lɛ hwenu biblu ɖe yi nugbo ɔ yi nukɔn blo baptɛm e
xomɛ nɔ hun klisanwun lɛ hwenu mɔ bɔ vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo ahwanvu ɖeɖee jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e mɛ e tawun
ðo xwe tɔn tɔn mɛ ɔ mɛ jɛji wɛ ze ze yeɖee jo nu jehovah e gbɔn baptɛm gblamɛ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ahwanvu enɛ lɛ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ baptɛm nyi nuɖe bɔ e byɔ ɖo klisanwun lɛ si
afɔ tɛ lɛ ɖe cobo blo baptɛm
afɔ tɛ lɛ biblu ɖe ɖo ɖe cobo blo baptɛm
nuɖiɖi enɛ nɔ ɔ nɔ nyi alɔ nu nuwalɔ ɖeɖee mawu wan lɛ e nɔ jɛ nu wa ji sɔgbe xa nugbododo jlɔjlɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe nɔ ɖo nuwalɔ bɔ e ɖe e sin agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖebu mɛ ɔ e kun sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ze emiɖee jo nu mawu nugbo nugbo o
mɛ nɔ wa nu jlɔjlɔ e ɔ e nɔ yi kple agun tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo ɔ kpo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin nɔ hwlɛn gan e kpo mɛ
enyi ahwanvu ɖe ɖe afɔ enɛ lɛ ɔ jɛn e sixu ze eɖee jo nu jehovah ɖo ɖɛ nuglɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ sɔgbe bɔ ɖo enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖe ze e ze eɖee jo e gbɔn baptɛm gblamɛ ɖo agbawungba
nɔ hɛn baptɛm nyi nu taji e ayi mɛ nɔ enɛ towe a
etɛwu biblu lɛ ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ baptɛm nyi nuɖe bɔ e byɔ ɖo klisanwun lɛ si
enyi mi ɖo alɔdo vi mitɔn lɛ kpo biblu lɛ kpo wɛ bonu ɖe afɔ taji enɛ lɛ ɔ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ ahwanvu nyinyi nujɔnu tɔn ɔ byɔ ɖɔ e blo baptɛm
enyi mi hɛn enɛ do ayi mɛ ganji ɔ mi ɖɔ xo ɖo kpo mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖo hugan
mi gbɔ xo ɖɔ do mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu kpo baptɛm kpo nyi nujɔnu e wu ɖo hwenu e jɛxa do lɛ e a
etɛwu mi nɔ gbidi kɔ nu mɛɖebu bonu e blo baptɛm a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖe biblu ɖe alo mɛ ɖevo ɖebu kun ɖo agun ɔ mɛ gbidi kɔ nu mɛɖe bonu e blo baptɛm o
jaan e wa ɔ enyi mi ɖo nu mɛ lɛ wɛ ɔ mi ɖo gandido ɖo kancica ɖe xa mawu nyi nu taji e ji
xwe nabi ɖe jɛn e ɖo ɖo cobo blo baptɛm a
tinmɛ enyi biblu ɖe blo baptɛm ɖo sinsɛn ɖe mɛ ɔ etɛwu e ɖo blo baptɛm nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ
e nyi xwe nabi ɖe jɛn e ɖo cobo blo baptɛm a
biblu ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ su nɔ zin ɖo ba vovo mɛ
mɛ gege blo baptɛm hwenu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo
biblu ɖevo lɛ tiin bɔ hwenu xwe yetɔn sɛyi e wɛ wa nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ mɔ baptɛm biblo nyi nu taji e bɔ vlafo ɔ xwe mɛ ɖe lɛ tɔn nɔ zɛ xwe wu
biblu mɛxomɔ ɖe kanbyɔ tɔn ɖɔ dandan jɛn emi blo baptɛm a ji e blo baptɛm wa yi ɖo sinsɛn vovo lɛ mɛ ɖo xwe lɛ gblamɛ
ɔ kpo tɔn kpo wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖɔ xo do xo ɔ wu lɛ e ji gbɔn
ɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu biblu byɔ e wu din bɔ e lin a blo baptɛm
e ɖibla ɖo xwe co e ɖɔ baptɛm biblo kun ɖo dandan o a
enɛ wu ɔ ahwanvu lɛ blo baptɛm ɖo sinsɛn ɖevo mɛ ɔ ɖo blo xa
etɛ ji e sɔgbe ɖɔ e tamɛ do ɖo baptɛm mɛtɔn sin azan gbe
gbe gbe mɛɖe blo baptɛm e nɔ nyi hwenu awajijɛ tɔn tawun ɖe
e nyi hwenu e tamɛ do nujɔnu mɛ e ɖe
gbɛzinzan sɔgbe xa ze e ze mɛɖee jo nu mawu e nɔ byɔ syɛnsyɛn ɖe
ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ ɖo nɔ nu yeɖesunɔ a loɔ nɔ nu mɛ ku do tamɛ bɔ e ɛ wa do tamɛ e kɔ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
linlin mɔhun lɛ wɛ ɖo ayi mɛ nu sin nɔ hwenu e kan nu xo mi ɖɔ ɖo lɛ e byɔ eɖee e
enyi ɖe wɛ nu ɔ sixu kan nu lehun lɛ byɔ hwiɖee vi sɔgbe nu baptɛm doo a
e ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sɔgbe e ze eɖee jo nu mawu sɔgbe a
bɔ nu kunkpla wemaxɔmɛ yiyi tɔn kpo e wa wa e kpo lo
enyi vi blo baptɛm wa hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɔ lo
ðo wemata bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ kpo klisanwun lɛ sixu ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do baptɛm wu gbɔn e kpo ji
cobonu e yi gbe ɖɔ biblu ɖe jɛxa ba blo baptɛm nyi jehovah tɔn ɖe ɔ e nɔ kan nu we byɔ ɖo lɛ nukɔn bɔ nɔ sinkɔn tɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ wɛ nyi sɔgbe kpodo vɔsisa jezu klisu tɔn kpo ɔ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ towe lɛ gudo ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah wa jlo tɔn a
etɛwu e sɔgbe ɖɔ e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e ze yeɖee jo nu jehovah bi
xwe ɖokpo jɛ nukɔn nu gbe jezu ɖe ɖɔ e nu akɔta lɛ bi bonu huzu ahwanvu nu e blo baptɛm nu e ɔ e nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ do nu e ɖo nukun ɖo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ si e wu
jezu sin gbɛzan bi junjɔn jlo tɔn tɔn wiwa ji
enɛ wu ɔ biblu ɖeɖee jlo setonu nu nu sin gbe jezu ɖe lɛ e bi lɛ e ɖo jo tito yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ do ze yeɖee bi jo nu jehovah
ðo nɔ xwedo jezu tɔn wutu ɔ nɔ jlo jehovah tɔn wiwa do mɔ nu nyi nu taji hugan ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ e
ðo hwɛjijɔ enɛ lɛ wu ɔ e nɔ byɔ mɛ jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e ɖɔ do zogbe ji ɖɔ emi ze emiɖee jo nu jehovah wa jlo tɔn
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ mi nɔ yi nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo
ali tɛ lɛ hun nu mi bɔ mi kan nu mɛ yiyi
adan tɛ lɛ gbo klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ
ðo hweðenu ɖo xwe tɔn kpo tɔn kpo vlamɛ ɔ wlan nu mɛ nyi jonɔ ɖo ayikungban ji gbakpe kpo galati kpo kapadɔsi kpo azii kpo kpodo bitinii kpan sin tokpɔn mɛ lɛ e
hwenu vɛwu ɖe mɛ wɛ nɔ ɖe
wlan ɖɔ hwenu nu lɛ bi vɔ do ɔ ya
e kpe xwe wo cobɔ mɛ jwifu lɛ ɖe e vɔ a
etɛwu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ yi yeɖee
gbɔn vo nu enɛ ɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi lɛ ɖɔ hunhun nuɖɔ cobo yi miɖee o
ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ yi ɖee enɛ wɛ nyi mɛ ɖeɖee tuun nɔ nɔ xa lɛ e
yi nɔ yi mɛ e gbɔn
mɛɖe ylɔ bɔ yi nɔ xa ɛ ɖo xwe tɔn gbe a hwenu enɛ nɔ flin nu ɖagbe lɛ kabi
hwenu ɖe ayi kpo mɛɖe lɛ kpo ɖo agun towe mɛ e ɔ zun xa e syɛn a ce
nu mi nɔ yi nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo ɔ mi nɔ tuun mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo hu mi tuun gbɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛ e
ee ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖo nylanyla wɛ ɖo sin azan gbe e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ jɛ hu tɔn
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
ali tɛ lɛ hun nu mi bɔ mi kan nu yi mi nɔ yi miɖee e
mi sixu ɖu ɖo nu nɔ gbo kpo nyi ali ji nu mi bɔ mi yi mɛ ɔ e nɔ glo lɛ e ji gbɔn
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi nyi jonɔ ɖagbe
mi sixu nɔ yi mɛ ɖo kple klisanwun tɔn mitɔn lɛ ji gbɔn
enyi jonɔ ɖe wa mɔ mɛɖe kpa junjɔn a ɔ sixu byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e wa junjɔn akpa towe a
e sixu su nukun tɔn mɛ tawun ɖɔ e ɛ bɔ e xwedo tuto ɔ lobɔ vlafo ɔ e tlɛ hun wemafɔ biblu tɔn xa wɛ e ɖe lɛ e
nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn mi ɖo nɔ ylɔ wa xwe mitɔn gbe e
nu e ylɔ mɛɖe bonu e wa ɖu nu xa mɛ ɔ biba wɛ e ɖe zun xa ɛ nɔ fifa mɛ xa ɛ
mɛ alɔkpa tɛ lɛ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn mi ɖo nɔ ylɔ lɛ e
mɛ ɖeɖee kpo mi kpo nɔ zan ɖo hwɛhwɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e
hwenu hwenu vɛwu lɛ wa e ɔ mi nɔ yi do miɖee wu a
mi ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn nɔ fifa mɛ kpo bi kpo
e jɛxa ɖɔ e ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ ɖo ɔ ɔ ɖyɔ mɛ e nɔ atɔxwɛ ɖo betɛli etats unis tɔn e gosin gbadanu tɔn wa gbadanu tɔn
aniwu
ðo ɖɔnuese ɔ mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu kple ɔ yawu fo do mɛhwenu ɔ e bɔwu nu xwedo betɛli tɔn lɛ tɔn bɔ nɔ yi jonɔ yeɖee tɔn
alaxɔ ɖevo lɛ lɔ wa wa nu ɖokpo ɔ
tuto enɛ bɔ xwedo betɛli tɔn lɛ hu tɔn
mi sixu yi tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn tɔn ɖeɖee nɔ wa mi lɛ e gbɔn
enyi gosin agun ɖevo mɛ lɛ e lɛdo tɔn lɛ kpo alaxɔ tɔn lɛ kpo wa mi ɔ ali nɔ hun nu mi bɔ mi nɔ yi
xa jaan
ali ɖagbe mi sixu wa ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi gbɔn kɔ fifa nu alo nuɖuɖu nina gblamɛ
hwebinu wɛ e nɔ nyi awajijɛ sin nu e nɔ vivi ɖo taji hugan ɔ e nɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e nu mi a
e byɔ ɖɔ e nu hwenu linlin
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖe ɖo ɖe nu a lɛ e sixu a
jonɔ hwenu linlin tɔn lɛ ðo hwexonu ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ mɛ yiyi nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e xɔ mɛ wa jonɔ mɛ bɔ e ɖeji do wu tɔn e ɖe
hwɛhwɛ wɛ lɛdo tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo hudo fi nɔ e tɔn hwenu yi agun lɛ e
wemaxɔmɛvi ɖeɖee yi wemaxɔmɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ e sixu ɖo hudo fi nɔ e tɔn jɛn mɛ ɖeɖee ze yeɖee jo wa lɛ e lɔ sixu ɖo hudo tɔn
adla lɛ sixu bɔ xwedo gege xɔ kpo ɖo sixu ɖo hudo fi nɔ e tɔn jɛ hwenu mɛ ɖo wa wɛ lɛ e sixu xwe yetɔn jlaɖo e
enyi ninɔmɛ towe tlɛ ɖe a ɔ sixu yi gbe bɔ mɛɖe nɔ akpa towe a
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo coree du flin ɖɔ emi yi mɛ ɖeɖee wa wemaxɔmɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ e do xwegbe
e wlan ɖɔ tlolo ɔ xo nu ɖo mi wli alɔ e ɔ e lin a bɔ mi ɖo xwe kpɛvi ɖe gbe
ɖo wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ nɔ xa mi wutu ɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ tawun
etɛwu e byɔ ɖɔ yi mɛ ɖeɖee wa agun towe mɛ lɛ e
mɛ ɖeɖee wa agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e mɛɖe alo xwedo ɖe sixu tɛn wa xa towe mɛ
mɛ ɖe lɛ sixu wa gbe ɖo fi hudo ɖe e
e sixu gbexosin ɖe do ɖɔ e wa agun towe
ðo ali ɖe lɛ ɔ mɛ bi wɛ jo nu ma lɛ e do wa xa ɖe kpo agun ɖe kpo mɛ bɔ vlafo ɔ tlɛ gbe ɖe alo aca ɖe
enyi ylɔ bonu fa kɔ ɖu nuɖe alo ɖi sa ɔ enɛ bɔ zun lɛ huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ ɔ
ðɔ nu ɖɔ e kun byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo nu gege cobo yi mɛ o e ɖe
e byɔ nu gege cobɔ e yi mɛ a
xa luki
gbadanu ɖokpo ɔ nu ci nu asi tawun do gan ɛ e ɖo kpikpa mi wɛ a
enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ ɖo mɛ gbadanu ɔ mɛɖe wa xuxu hɔn mitɔn
biblu ɖe wɛ hɛn yovozɛn atɔn wa nu mi
mi kpla ɛ byɔ xɔ mɛ ɛ sin kɔfu ɖokpo
enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ mi do tii ɛ cokolaa zozo
mi se swahili gbe a jɛn e lɔ se glɛnsigbe a e nɛ
le tɛ lɛ ɖo mɛ yiyi mɛ
xo nu do mɛ yiyi wu a
enyi wɛ ɔ ali ɖagbe hun bɔ ɖu vivi ɖagbe lɛ kpo zunzun nɔ ayi sɔyi e ɖe kpo tɔn e sixu yi tɛ
mɛ yiyi nyi ɖokpo ɖo ali ɖagbe hugan e sixu nyi alɔ nu mɛɖokponɔninɔ ɖe lɛ e mɛ
sixu kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ etɛwu mɛɖe lɛ nɔ xo nu do wiwa wu
enyi hwenu kpɛɖe mimɔ alo hlɔnhlɔn kpɛɖe ɖiɖo do yi mɛ alo yi gbe nu e ylɔ e vɛwu ɔ etɛ sixu wa
hwenu kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo jehovah lɛ sin alɔnu jan tawun bɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ nɔ ɖo nu gege wa
mɛɖe lɛ sixu kpowun ɖɔ emi kun ɖo hwenu alo hlɔnhlɔn yi mɛ o
enyi ninɔmɛ towe nɛ ɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ gbeje tuto towe lɛ tɔn
sixu blo huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ bɔ mɔ hwenu kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo nɔ yi mɛ alo yi gbe nu e ylɔ vlafo ɖɔ hwi wa jonɔ emi e a
nuɖe nyla ɖɔ e hwenu wa a e ɖɔ lɔ ɔ nu ɖagbe e sixu wa e nɛ
