e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hwiɖesunɔ sixu jlo do ɖe kan kpo nu ɖo dandan a e ɖe lɛ
tɛ sixu nɔ hu mɛɖe lɛ do jonɔyiyi wu
nu nɔ ci nu do hwiɖesunɔ wu e e jlo ɖɔ yi jonɔ bɔ wa mɔ ɖɔ emi kun sixu kpewu o a
winnya nɔ hu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ xɛsi nɔ ɖi ɖɔ ɔ kun yawu fo o alo ɖɔ ayi ɖiɖe sixu nɔ jlo jonɔ lɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo nu ɖe a bɔ nɔ ɖɔ emi kun sixu yi jonɔ agun ɔ tɔn ɖevo lɛ nɔ wa gbɔn e gbeɖe o
flin ɖɔ nu taji ɔ kun nyi xwe vɛnkpɛnvɛnkpɛn ɖe ɖiɖo o loɔ e ɖo tuto ji dɔn mɛ
etɛ sixu ɖe nɔ hu mɛ do jonɔyiyi wu e kpo
nu nɔ hu do jonɔyiyi wu hun tuun ɖɔ e kun nyi emiɖokpo wɛ o
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe ɖo grande bretagne ɖɔ enyi e ɖo nu wɛ yi jonɔ ɔ kpɛɖe nɔ hu mɛ
nu ɖebu ca kan xa wa nu jehovah wɛ mi ɖe e bi tɔn nɔ nyi gbɔn e ɔ jɛn awajijɛ kpo le kpo e nɔ mɔ lɛ e nɔ zɛ adohuhu lɛ wu flafla tɔn e nɛ
junjɔn ayi kpo jonɔ lɛ kpo bonu mi kafee ɖɔ xo ɖo kpowun ɔ e nɔ vivi nu mi
flin ɖɔ nu e ɖɔ nu jonɔ lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ ɔ e nɔ hwebinu
ayiɖeɖayi lɛ wɛ sixu nyi ali ɖokpo hun bɔ e kan nu byɔ do nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɔ lɛ e wu e
mɛxo ɖevo wlan ɖɔ nu ylɔ mitɔn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e wa xwe gbe ɔ e nɔ bɔ nɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu hugan nɔ tuun bɔ ɖo taji ɔ nɔ tuun wa nugbo ɔ mɛ gbɔn e
e ɖɔ nu yetɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ ɔ e nɔ bɔ ayiɖeɖayi lɛ nɔ vivi
nɔvi nyɔnu gbexosin nɔ yi wemaxɔmɛvi ee nɔ wa wemaxɔmɛ yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn vovo lɛ do xwegbe e ɖe ɖɔ tlolo ɔ hu mi ɖo xwe ɔ ɖo ji tawun bɔ tavo kpo zinkpo kpo zankpo ɖe lɛ
lɛ ɖokpo sin asi ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ hu mi ɖebu o
e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ hwenu emi kpo asu emitɔn kpo ɖo wa wɛ e ɔ aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖagbe hugan emitɔn lɛ wɛ nyi ɖeɖee emi zan kpo gbigbɔ tɔn sixu nɔ ɖo nu ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖokpo ɔ lɛ gbe nya wɛ e enɛ wɛ nyi jehovah sinsɛn kpo bɔkun e ɖe zinzan kpo
enɛ flin mi nu nɔ nɔ ɖɔ nu mi mɛ vi tɔn lɛ hwɛhwɛ e e ɖu nu ɖo fi wanyiyi ɖe ɔ e hu
jonɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn yiyi sixu mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo linlin masɔgbe mi nɔ ɖo do wu e ji gbɔn
nu nɔ ci nu do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e mɛɖe ɖo agun towe mɛ do xomɛsin nu a
tlolo ɔ sixu ɖo linlin masɔgbe lɛ do mɛ enɛ wu bɔ enyi wa nu ɖebu ɖɔ gbo a ɔ nu sixu nɔ sɔyi
vovo mi nyi e sixu wa nu do linlin ɖagbe ɖo yi jonɔ mɛtɔn e wu
alo mɛɖe wa nu nyi do do wa yi bɔ mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu tawun bɔ emi wɔn
bonu kancica ɖo mi kpo mɛɖe kpo tɛntin e alo ee tlɛ ɖo mi kpo mitɔn kpo tɛntin ɔ do ɔ biblu byɔ mi ɖɔ mi nɔ yi jonɔ mɛ tɔn xa nunywɛxo nwt
enyi nɔ yi jonɔ mɛ tɔn ɔ e sixu ɖe hwɛgbe kpo mɛhɛndoxomɛ kpo kpo
e sixu bɔ mɔ jijɔ ɖagbe mɛ ylɔ e tɔn lɛ jijɔ enɛ lɛ wɛ jehovah do dɔn ɛ wa nugbo ɔ mɛ
jaan enyi wanyiyi mɛ bonu e byɔ mɛɖe ɖɔ e wa jonɔ mɛ hwenu mɛ ɔ ɖo nukun tɔn do a e ɔ e sixu bɔ e gbɔn e syɛn bi
sixu ɖɔ wanyiyi wɛ bɔ wa gbɔn
ali mi sixu ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi gbɔn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ xo ɖo filipunu lɛ mɛ e xwixwedo gblamɛ e ɖɔ nɔ miɖee hwe ɖo mɛ ɖe lɛ nukɔn bonu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ hugan emi
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo hugan mi ɖo ali ɖe lɛ vlafo ɖo nuɖiɖi hu mi nɔ dɛ hu mi ɖo akɔnkpinkpan alo jijɔ klisanwun tɔn ɖevo lɛ hu mi
enyi mi nɔ ali mɔhun ɖeɖee hugan mi ɖe lɛ e ɔ enɛ bɔ wan mi yi nu e syɛn lobɔ ali hun nu mi bɔ mi yi kpo ayi bi kpo
hwɛhwɛ wɛ lɛ nɔ sɔnu tawun cobɔ jonɔ lɛ nɔ wa akpaxwe ɔ
etɛwu mi ɖo yi ayiɖeɖayi tɛnmɛ e ylɔ mi do bɔ mi yi gbe tɔn e ɖe tɛnmɛ
mi ɖo wa gbɔn davidi kanbyɔ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ nɔ xwe towe gbe
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ xo do jijɔ ɖeɖee mawu nɔ ɖo nukun ɖo jonɔ nɔ xwe tɔn gbe lɛ e si e wu
ðokpo ɖo jijɔ enɛ lɛ mɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ xo mitɔn lɛ nɔ nyi nugbo e ɖɔ e do akpa ɖe ɔ e nɔ ɖe
wiwa ɖe wanyiyi kpo sisi kpo a
e wa ɔ mi ɖo yi gbe nu mɛɖe ylɔ mi e bɔ nu ɖebu e mi ɖo tɛn ɔ mɛ e ɖo su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
luk enyi ninɔmɛ e sixu kpa a e ɖe bonu mi gɔn jɛn wɛ ɔ e ɖɔ mi ɖe wanyiyi kpo yakenumɛ kpo yawu ɖɔ do mɛhwenu
sisi mi nɔ ɖo nu aca xa mɛ mi ɖe e tɔn e sixu bɔ mi nyi jonɔ ɖagbe gbɔn
ðo aca ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ jonɔ e ɖo nukun a lɛ e mɛ ɔ e nɔ yi ɖo aca ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɔ e nɔ hu ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu mɛ ɔ jɛ nukɔn
ðo fi ɖe lɛ ɔ mɛ ylɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ nu ɖagbe hugan ɖo e do wli nu jonɔ lɛ bɔ xwedo ɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ wa ɖu nu gbɔn gudo
ðo xa ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ jonɔ lɛ lɔ nɔ jɔ fun do nuwiwa ɔ mɛ ɖo xa ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɔ e nɔ mɛ ylɔ mɛ ɔ sin nukunmɛ ɖɔ jonɔ ɔ jɛ tagba ɖebu lɔ o
ðo aca ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ e nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ enyi e ylɔ jonɔ lɛ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ alo wegɔ ɔ hun kpo sisi kpo ɖo ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɔ enyi e hun e sɔgbe a
nu mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi bonu xomɛ hun mɛ ylɔ mi lɛ e ɖɔ ylɔ mi
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi nɔ yi mi ɖee
e mɔ ɖaxo mɔ wɛ mi ɖe ɖo egbe e ɖɔhun a
ðo lɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ wutu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi blo bonu wanyiyi ɖo mi kpo nɔvi lɛ kpo tɛntin e syɛn
mɛ tɔn wɛ e nohrer
ɖo vi nyɔnu ɛnɛ e bɔ doku nu adolf hitler kpo folowa lɛ kpo ɖo alɔ mɛ hwenu e xwle xoɖiɖɔ ɖe mɛ gudo e mɛ
etɛwu e nyi lɔ
nɔ ɖo nuwiwa acɛkpikpa nazi tɔn lɛ tɔn mɛ tawun nɔ kun gan xa ɔ mɛ tɔn tɔn ɖe
nɔ nɔ yi sinsɛn katolika tɔn nyi sinsɛnvi akowunka ɖe ɖɔ nyi huzu ɖe
mɛ nukunɖeji we enɛ lɛ ɖo cɔcɔ do nu mi wɛ co byɔ acɛkpikpa nazi tɔn mɛ a huzu a
nu ma tinmɛ nu wu wɛ e nu
su ɖo graz ɖo autriche
hwenu ɖo xwe tɛnwe e ɔ e mi do wemaxɔmɛ ɖe bonu sinsɛn sin
ɖo finɛ ɔ mɔ bɔ yɛhwenɔ lɛ nɔ ɖoxo xa lɛ tawun
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ yi gbe bɔ gosin wemaxɔ ɔ mɛ ɖo xwe ɖokpo gudo
nukɔnmɛ ɔ wemaxɔmɛ ɖo wemaxɔ ɖo e ɖe mɛ
zanmɛ gbe ɖokpo ɔ wa kpla mi sin finɛ yi fi ayijayi ɖe e ɖo e ɖo bɔnbu do graz wɛ tawun
mi bibɛtɛn ɖo schladming
ee mi ana ɖe gudo tlolo e ɔ ana ɔ gba bi
ðo hweɖevonu ɔ jɔmɛhun ɖe ɖo zinzɔn gbɔn do wɛ bɔ mɛ lɛ e tu do kpo nyi kpo ɖo kɔxo mitɔn
hwenu ahwan ɔ fo e ɔ mɔ ɖɔ sinsɛn ɔ kpo acɛkpikpa ɔ kpo bi flu mi
ðo ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖokpo jɛ wɛn biblu tɔn nɔ ji
nɔ ɖoto yetɔn lɛ tlɛ jɛ mamaa xwedo yi kple agun tɔn ɖe lɛ ji
ðo e kudeji ɖɔ nugbo ɔ ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ e blo baptɛm ɖo
ðo hwe ɔ ɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ nyɔnu mɛxomɔ lɛ sin ɖe wɛ agun xa ɔ mɛ tɔn nyi ɖɔhun
nukɔnmɛ ɔ mi yi kple ɖo agun ɖevo mɛ bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya gege ɖo finɛ e nyi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ lɛ sin ɖe a
ee mi lɛkɔ wa graz e ɔ jɛ kple lɛ bi yi ji e lin a bɔ nyi lɔ kudeji ɖɔ nu wɛ ɖe lɛ e ɔ nugbo wɛ
wa tuun jehovah tuun ɖɔ e nyi mawu nɔ nɔ gudo nu tɔn lɛ nɔ flu a e ɖe
e nɔ wa hwenu mi tlɛ mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo ninɔmɛ hu mi lɛ e mɛ gbɔn din wɛ miɖokponɔ e ðɛh
jlo ma nugbo ɔ xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
nɔvi lɛ ji wɛ
ɛnɛ lɛ gosin xwegbe nyi ɖo fi ɖevo lɛ
yi ɖo gletoxo vovo mɛ ɖe lɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ biblu
nugbo ɔ nɔvi lɛ bi wa huzu jehovah tɔn lɛ
ðo aklunɔzan gbla wegɔ mɛ ɖo kunnu ɖe wɛ sin hɔn ɖe kɔn jɛ hɔn ɖe kɔn e ɔ xo go nawe ɖe bɔ xwe tɔn ɖo jɛ vlamɛ jɛ biblu xa ɛ ji
e yi nukɔn blo baptɛm bɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ asu tɔn kpo vi sunnu tɔn we lɛ kpo lɔ wa
nukplɔnkplɔn enɛ yi gbɔn e hɛn nuɖiɖi lido
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo sɔnu nu nukplɔnkplɔn ɖokpo ɖokpo ganji
ðo ali ɖe ɔ nɔ wa do nyiɖee enɛ gudo ɔ nɔ wa do sixu nu
ðo avril ɔ ze ze nyiɖee jo nu jehovah e gbɔn baptɛm biblo gblamɛ
ðo ɔ yi akɔjɔkple tɔn ɖo allemagne france kpo angleterre kpo
hwenu ɖo londres e ɔ xo go albert schroeder
e nyi ɖo wemaxɔmɛ biblu kpinkplɔn tɔn galadi tɔn bɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ e wa nɔ ɔ mɛ
hwenu mi ɖi sa yi hɔnmɛ grande bretagne tɔn e ɔ nɔvi schroeder wema dodo biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ mi
enɛ bɔ yi wan nu jehovah kpo nugbo ɔ kpo hugan bɔ kudeji hu tɔn jla nugbo ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ e
nyi kpo gbexosin kpo ɖisixwe ɖo gbexosin titewungbe sin wa wɛ ɖo mistelbach autriche
jɛ hwebinu tɔn wu ɖo
gbexosin ee nu mi e gbɔn vo nu mi tawun
nyɛ ɖo xwe gosin toxo ɔ mɛ eyɛ ɖo xwe nyi to ɔ mɛ
nɔ bɔ ganmɛ yi ɖo zanzan lɛ cobo eyɛ nɔ yawu
gbadanu su ɔ nɔ yawu a eyɛ nɔ yawu
e ɖo co weɖexamɛ biblu tɔn lɛ zinzan mi bɔ mi do vogbingbɔn enɛ lɛ wu a ɖu vivi gbexosin mitɔn tɔn kpa mi
mi mɔ tagba taji ɖevo lɛ
yadonumɛ ɖe lɛ tlɛ wa mi mawu jo mi do a
tlolo kpowun ɔ cuku wɔbuwɔbu ɖe do nyi kpo wegɔ kpo bɔ bi hun yetɔn lɛ nyi nuvo
mi hɛn alɔ miɖee tɔn bɔ tlɛ xoɖɛ ɖɔ jehovah kɛnklɛn enyi wa mi hun nu mi yawu ku
mi mɔ ɖɔ jehovah wɛ cyɔn alɔ mi ji
enɛ gudo ɔ mi ɖɔ mawuxo gbɔn gletoxo enɛ mɛ bɔ nu vivi nu mi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ lɛ yi mi tawun
vlafo e kpaca ɖɔ cuku lɛ kun gblewu mi o alo ɖɔ mi kpo ɖo mitɔn wu ɖo nu enɛ jɛ do xɛsi mi e gudo
mɛ ɖe lɛ wa huzu lɛ
nu ɖevo gba ayi do nu mi
gbe ɖokpo ɔ mitɔn ahan mu wa xwe ɔ gbe ɖo adan nu mi wɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi hu mi le mi nɔ doya nu mɛ ɖo xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e
asi tɔn xo ɛ e kpa ɛ a
xɔ mitɔn mɛ wɛ mi ɖe ɖo ɖo nu enɛ lɛ bi se wɛ
mi yawu fɔ zinkpo lɛ ɖo hɔn ɔ jɛ agban mitɔn lɛ do ji
ee mi hun hɔn ɔ e ɔ mi mɔ ɛ ɖo bɔ e fan kpekan ɔ wa bi hɛn jivi ɖaxo ɖe ɖo alɔ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi nu mitɔn lɛ bi hɔn gbɔn hɔn ɖo xɔ ɔ gudo e gbɔn ali ɖo jikpa ɔ mɛ e ji lɛkɔ wa gbeɖe a
mi yi otɛli ɖe xaya xɔ ɖokpo
toxo ɔ tɛntin wɛ otɛli ɔ ɖe bɔ biblu mitɔn ɖe lɛ jlo nu ɖo finɛ
e lin a bɔ mi nɔ blo kple nɔ nyi oplon agunwe e ɖo xɔ mitɔn mɛ finɛ nɔ atɔxwɛ ɖo finɛ bɔ mɛ nɔ wa
mi nɔ mistelbach nu xwe ɖokpo jɛji
enɛ gudo ɔ e mi do feldbach ɖo tofɔligbe zanzanhweji graz tɔn
gbexosin ɖevo wɛ nu mi din bɔ agun ɖe ɖo fi enɛ lɔ a
mi nɔ atinxɔ kpɛvi ɖe mɛ ɖo singbo wegɔ ɔ ji
jɔhɔn nɔ byɔ xɔ ɔ mɛ gbɔn ali gbɔn atin lɛ vlamɛ e enɛ wu ɔ mi xojlawema lɛ do su ali enɛ lɛ
mi ɖo sin ɖo ɖe mɛ
mi blo nu enɛ lɛ do a
ðo yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ e ɖo kanɖo ɖe ayi
gudo mɛ ɔ xwedo mi nu xa e ɖe sin wa nugbo ɔ mɛ
nu mɔhun lɛ bɔ jehovah nɔ nɔ gudo nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nya nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbe nɔ flu a e su nukun mɛ gbɔn e syɛn
lɛ tlɛ sixu mi a ɔ jehovah ɖo finɛ nu mi hwebinu ðɛh
ðo ɔ e blo akɔjɔkple tɔn ɖe ɖo ɖo yankee kpo kpo
nyikɔ yi bɔ alaxɔ autriche tɔn kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ nyi jlo yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn sin klasi ɔ a ji
sixu wujɔmɛ mɔhun ɖe gbɔn
yi gbe tlolo ɖɔ ɛɛn
ðo klasi ɔ mɛ ɖo galadi ɔ poetzinger kpa wɛ jinjɔn
e dɛ ɖo nu baɖabaɖa lɛ ɖo yadonumɛkpa lɛ mɛ ɖo nazi
e lɔ wa nɔ ɔ mɛ ɖo nukɔnmɛ
ðo wemaxɔmɛ ɔ hwenu ɔ nɔ ɖe kpa mi nɔ kanbyɔ hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ etɛ nyi tinmɛ xo enɛ tɔn do allemagne gbe mɛ
nyɛ yi paraguay
ðo kpo ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ tawun wutu ɔ ɖo byɔ gbe cobo yi to enɛ mɛ
ee e gbe mi gudo e ɔ yi paraguay ɖo mars
e mi ɖo lɛ sin xwe ɖe gbe ɖo asuncion bɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɖevo kpo nyi kpo wɛ nɔ
e lin a bɔ xo go ɖe wɛ yi kunnuɖewema klasi ɔ tɔn
taan ɖe gudo ɔ mi wli alɔ xo gbɛmɛ tagba lɛ zlɛ ɖo
enyi mi mɔ tagba hweɖebunu ɔ mi nɔ xa akpa jehovah tɔn ɖo ezayii mɛ e ɖi xɛsi o ɖo ɖo xa
akɔnkpinkpan
enɛ jiɖe mi ɖɔ enyi mi ɖo gan do wɛ nɔ gbeji nu mawu axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ e kun flu mi gbeɖe o
e ya e ɔ e mi do xa ɖe mɛ sɛkpɔ dogbo bresil tɔn
ðo finɛ ɔ sinsɛngan lɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖɔ nɔ nyi awinnya do lɛ sin xwe mitɔn gbe xwe ɔ ɖo ganji a
wa jɛ biblu xa kponɔ lɛ sin gan ji
gan ɔ blo bɔ kponɔ lɛ ci xwe mitɔn kpa nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo bɔ mɛ nɔ doya nu mi lɛ e nɔ wa ɖe a
e nɔ zaan e ɔ mi tɛn nɔ ɖeɖee hugan ɖo bresil sin dogbo kpa lɛ e mɛ
nu enɛ hɛn le wa ɖo mi kpewu blo kple lɛ ɖo paraguay kpo bresil kpo
cobonu mi gosin finɛ ɔ agun kpɛvi we ɖo finɛ
nyi kpo asu kpo hwenu mi ɖo wa wɛ ɖo asuncion paraguay e
dotoo ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ kun sixu ji vi o enɛ wu ɔ e kpaca mi hwenu mi se ɖo ɖɔ ɖo xo e
mi wa yi ci hollywood ɖo floride sɛkpɔ sin xwedo
nu xwe nabi ɖe ɔ nyi kpo kpo sixu nyi gbexosin a
mi ɖo kpe nukun do xwedo mitɔn wu
mi kpo ɖo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ wɛ
hwenu mi wa floride ɖo novembre ɔ e kpaca mi ɖɔ ayi ɔ ji lɛ kun yi wan nu yovo lɛ o bɔ mɛwi lɛ nɔ blo kple ɖo vo nɔ ɖɔ mawuxo ɖo fi vo
e mɔ alɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo tuto enɛ mɛ vaan ɖo finɛ din ɔ agun gege ɖo xa ɔ mɛ
e blawu ɖɔ ku ɖo ɖo taglomɛ tɔn ɖe wutu
asu ɖagbe ɖe wɛ e nyi nu mi nu xwe mɛɖe wɛ e nyi yi wan nu jehovah nɔvi gege
ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ mɔ ɛ hwenu e sin ku bɔ lanmɛ tɔn ɖo ganji e mɛ
e su nukun mɛ ɖɔ nɔ hwebinu tɔn mɛ nu xwe jɛji mɔ awajijɛ kpo ajɔ gege kpo
ði ɔ nyi kpo kpo mɔ bɔ biblu mitɔn blo baptɛm
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi mɔ ɖe lɛ
mi enɛ lɛ do hwɛjijɔ gbeɖe gɔn mawu kpo gbejininɔ kpo a
e wa ɔ mi nɔ sɛkpɔ ɛ ɖeji do wutu tɔn ɖɔ e ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖo hwenu do e kpo e gbɔn e kpo
e wa nugbo tim
nɔ jɛ do tɔn tawun gbexosin wiwa bɔ nɔ dɛ
nɔ mɔ ɖɔ ali taji ɖe wɛ e nyi bɔ gbɔn do nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tlɛ ma nukunɖiɖo sin ku tɔn ɔ xa
nugbo ɔ ɖo ali gege wɛ jehovah flu mi gbeɖe a ɖe tlɛ sixu xa bi lɔ a
nɔvi sunnu we ɖo tlati ɖe xwle ɖe wɛ ɖo ana ɖe ji ɖo kastilac nukɔn do ɖaxo ɖe wɛ bɔ e ɖo xwe kanweko ɔ mɛ sɛkpɔ toxo tɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɛ ɖe kun sixu ɖɔ pɔlu ci e tawun ɖo egbe o
ðiɖe pɔlu tɔn nɔ nɔ wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ e ɔ wɛ junjɔn kunnuɖenu dobanunu dokunkun tɔn lɛ ji a
nuɖe lɛ pɔlu ci e
ði ɔ atɔxwɛ tɔn ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖokpo e ɖɔ nu nu kan pɔlu ci e ɔ
ðo les actes paul et thecle ee nyi nuwlanwlan xwe tɔn ɖe e mɛ ɔ alɔkpa mɛ e pɔlu ci e gbɔn ɖo finɛ e ɖibla nyi ee hugan e nyi aca nugbo ɖe
oxford christian tɔn ɖɔ do nuwlanwlan hwexonu tɔn enɛ wu ɖɔ e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ nuɖe lɛ ɖo les actes paul et thecle mɛ kun sɔgbe ɖo hwenuxo linu o a
les actes paul et thecle ɔ e nɔ ɖo sisi tawun ɖo hwenu e wlan bɔ xwe kanweko yɔywɛ ɖe wa yi gudo e kunnuɖenu ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ wema tɔn dodo ɔ ɖo glɛkigbe mɛ ɖo gbe ɖevo lɛ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖiɖe ɔ tɔn ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ e sɔgbe xa e ci bɔ wema hwexonu tɔn ɖe lɛ e
hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ nu ɖevo lɛ tiin ɖo taji hu pɔlu ci e
mi ɖo flin ɖɔ nujiwu jezu ɛ e gblamɛ wɛ e huzu klisanwun gbɔn
tamɛ do le tobutobu mi sixu ɖu ɖo wema ɖeɖee mawu pɔlu wlan lɛ e mɛ e ji
wɛn enɛ ɖo taji hugan ɖebu e ɖo do pɔlu sixu ci e wu e
etɛ cevuna sin mi do nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn wu
nu mi ɖo nu nu mɛ wɛ ɔ mi sixu xwedo jehovah kpo vi tɔn kpo tɔn gbɔn
nu e nu nu mɛ bonu e se ɔ nyɔna tɛ
biblu nɔ ɖɔ xo do nugbɛnumɛ wu gbɔn hwɛhwɛ
nu se xokwin nugbɛnumɛ ɔ etɛ nɔ wa ayi towe mɛ
bɔya tlolo ɔ nɔ nu jɛ todɔnnumɛ ji e byɔ nu hu
nu nyi ɖo nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn nɔ ɖɔ e yi wan nu mi jlo ɖɔ mi mɔ mavɔmavɔ
nugbo ɔ linlin nukɔntɔn wu e nɔ nu nu mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nu mɛ e nɔ vi e yi wan e bɔ e nɔ su gbɔn e ɖɔhun
nugbɛnumɛ sixu byɔ nukplɔnmɛ kpo todɔnnumɛ kpo gbɔn
nɔ tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ johnny tuun ɖɔ emi kun ɖo xo ɖo xɔ ɔ sa o sin
nɔ tɔn nu gbɔn
e sixu nu dɔn to
nu e ɖo nu johnny wɛ ɔ e sixu flin hwɛjijɔ wu nu e wa e sɔgbe a e
e blo bɔ johnny mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ tonusise nu mɛtɔn lɛ nɔ hɛn le wa nu mɛ tinmɛ ɖɔ do lɛ e ɖo dandan kun zɛkpa o
bonu nɔ ɔ do xo e ɖɔ lɛ e ji ɔ e sixu dɔn to e jɛxa gbɔn e
ði ɔ e sixu yi ɔ sin johnny si nu taan ɖe
enɛ ɔ sixu johnny ɖɔ nu e tlito ɔ e nɔ se xɔxɔ tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ ɖo sisi nu acɛ jehovah ɖo nugbododo lɛ e kpo acɛ e ɖo nu nu mi hwenu mi tɛ afɔ nugbododo lɛ ji e kpo
nu mitɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mawu tawun bɔ e jlo ɖɔ mi wa nu bɔ mi se lɛ e a
alɔkpa tɛ ji jehovah nɔ kɔn nyɔna do
etɛ mi do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
xo mawu tɔn nyi nukɔntɔn mi nɔ mɛ e nɔ bɔ mi nɔ kpewu nɔ e zan ɖagbe gbɔn ɔ mɛ
xa titu nwt
nu mi xosin nu nukanbyɔ taji atɔn nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn nɔ ɖe wanyiyi e ɖo nu mi e gbɔn
etɛ mɛ mawu nu ɖo hwexonu lɛ e sin sixu mi
ali tɛ lɛ nugbɛnumɛ jehovah tɔn nɔ ɖe wanyiyi e ɖo nu mi e ɖe
wanyiyi nɔ jehovah bɔ e nɔ nu nu mi nɔ mi nɔ mi bonu mi nɔ wanyiyi tɔn mɛ nɔ ɔ ji
jaan e nɔ ɖe mi kpo alo zun mi gbeɖe bonu mi mɔ ɖɔ mi kun nuti o a
nukun tɛ nɔ do nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn nɔ gosin xo tɔn alo wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ mɛ klisanwun lɛ alo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ e
nugbo ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ ɖe mi ɖo ali ji kpo xomɛfifa kpo kpodo wanyiyi kpan hwenu mi wa nu nyi do bɔya ɖo manywɛ mɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖe wanyiyi jehovah ɖo nu mi e mi
enyi nugbɛnumɛ tlɛ byɔ ɖɔ e yi ɖe lɛ sin mɛ si ɔ enɛ nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mawu tɔn gbɔn
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nugbɛnumɛ sixu byɔ nu hu we ɖiɖe xa mɛ
nu mɛ ɔ hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ ɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ e yi e ɖo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e sin asi tɔn
e tlɛ nyi ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ nugbɛnumɛ enɛ lɔ ɖe wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu mi e
ði ɔ nu e yi mɛɖe ɖo e sin asi tɔn ɔ e sixu ɛ bɔ e mɔ nu jɛ e nyi nujɔnu sɔ ɖɔ e ayi ɖo biblu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn tamɛ linlin kpo ɖɛ kpo ji hugan e mɛ
ðɛh e sixu wa lɛ
nu e tlɛ ɖe mɛɖe sin agun mɛ ɔ wiwa lɔ nɔ ɖe wanyiyi jehovah tɔn ɖo e nɔ cyɔn alɔ agun ɔ ji sin nu wa nu do wu tɔn lɛ e si
do nugbɛnumɛ xɔ akwɛ e ji ɔ nu mi gbeje mɛ jehovah nu lɛ e tɔn we wɛ nyi cevuna ee nɔ ɖo axɔsu ezekiyasi hwenu e kpo ee nyi nɔvi hwe mitɔn tɔn ɖe e kpo
ðo cevuna nyi kpa acɛ do hɔnmɛ e vlafo hɔnmɛ ezekiyasi tɔn e wutu ɔ e ɖo acɛ tawun
e tlɛ kun yɔdo vɛnkpɛnvɛnkpɛn ɖe nu eɖee nɔ kun ahwankɛkɛvi ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ eza
nu mi miɖee hwe huzu nuwalɔ mitɔn ɔ mi mɔ nyɔna mawu tɔn akpaxwe
ðo cevuna eɖesunɔ tɔn wutu ɔ mawu nya ɛ sin tɛn tɔn mɛ eliyakimu do ɖyɔ ɛ
e eliyakimu do bonu e yi ɖɔ xo xa lɛ eɖokpo wɛ zɔn a
mɛ we ɖevo lɛ xwedo e bɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖo mɛ nɔ nyi cevuna nyi hwe ɔ
enɛ sixu ɖɔ cevuna kun jo eɖee do nu xomɛsin kpo mɛhɛndoxomɛ kpo wa nu do wu tɔn o loɔ e eɖee hwe yi gbe nu kpɛvi enɛ
etɛ lɛ enɛ sixu mi
nu taji tɛ lɛ cevuna sin sixu mi
jehovah wa nu xa cevuna gbɔn e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu gbɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ cevuna ɖo tɛn mɛ e ɖe e a
nu jɛ do wutu tɔn e flin mi akpagbanumɛ elɔ e ɖɔ mɛɖe ja cu kpe gbe ɔ goyiyi wɛ e nɔ
enyi ɖo nunina ɖebu alo wa nu ɖebu ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ ɔ jo nu jehovah a kɔ
wegɔ ɔ nu jehovah nu cevuna syɛnsyɛn e sixu ɖɔ e ɖo nukun ɖɔ e huzu jijɔ
flin ɖɔ enyi mi miɖee hwe ɖo mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ nukɔn ɔ e lin oo e oo e tɔn mi
xa
nu mawu nɔ nu mi kpo wanyiyi kpo e sixu nyi ali ɖeɖee e nɔ ɖo mi wu ɖe e enɛ wu ɔ nu mi ci ɖɔhun ɖo alɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ
atɔngɔ ɔ jehovah wa nu xa cevuna gbɔn e nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe mɛ ɖeɖee e gbe ɖɔ nɔ nu nu mɛ e ɖi lɛ kpo klisanwun lɛ kpo
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nugbɛnumɛ jehovah tɔn nɔ ɖɔ e wan nu hwɛhuhu e sixu ɖɔ mɛ hu hwɛ e sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ
mɛɖe lɛ wa nu gbɔn hwenu e xo mawu tɔn do nu nu e
xo mawu tɔn nɔvi sunnu ɖe bɔ e huzu linlin tɔn gbɔn nyɔna tɛ lɛ e mɔ
e blawu ɖɔ nu e nu nu mɛɖe lɛ gudo ɔ nɔ ayi yetɔn ɖo se e ji tlɛ nɔ lɛkɔ sin mawu kpo togun tɔn kpo gudo
e ɖɔ e kun sixu mɛ mɔhun lɛ o wɛ a
e ɖe sin agun mɛ bɔ ɖo taan ɖe gudo ɔ e yi enɛ gudo ɔ e nɔ ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ a
xwe ɖe lɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu mɛxo agun tɔn do ɛ e ɖe ɖɔ e wa biblu xa emi
mɛxo ɔ flin ɖɔ goyiyi wɛ nɔ wa nu xa
e nɔ mɔ xo ɖɔ do mɛxo ɖeɖee kpe nukun do xo tɔn wu bɔ e ɖe e sin agun mɛ lɛ e wu
ðo nukpinkplɔn bɔ lɛ e hwenu ɔ mi do nu wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖɔ xo do goyiyi kpo nu e nɔ ji lɛ e kpo wu e
jɛ eɖee ji do nujɔnu mɛ ɖo xo mawu tɔn ci ɖɔhun e mɛ e yi wan nu nu e mɔ e a
e yi gbe nɔ wa xwedo tɔn sin tɔn hɛn awajijɛ gege wa nu asi tɔn kpo vi tɔn lɛ kpo luk
mɛxo agun tɔn ɔ kpo ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ gbe ɖokpo ɔ ɖɔ nuɖe byɔ ayi mɛ nu mi tawun
e ɖɔ mɔ nugbo ɔ din e ɔ e blo xwe mɔkpan tlɛ wa gbexosin tɔn lɔ
din wɛ sixu ɖɔ nugbo nugbo ɖɔ yi wan nu jehovah
e lin a bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ miklo nu mɛ lɛ ɖo kple lɛ hwenu ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ
wujɔmɛ enɛ su nukun tɔn mɛ tawun
tɔn mi ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe eɖee hwe ɖo mawu nukɔn yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ ɔ nyɔna e nɔ mɔ lɛ e nɔ tawun
mi ɖo nyi ɖagbe cobo nyi ɖagbe
mɛɖesɔhwe kpo jlo kpo enɛ bɔ e ɖo sisi nu bɔ nɔ vo nɔ ɖɔ xo hwenu ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ alo ɖo nu nu wɛ e
mi jezu tɔn
etɛ lɛ jezu mi do nugbɛnumɛ sɔgbe e kpo nukplɔnmɛ sɔgbe e kpo wu
jezu nɔ ɖoto tɔn nɔ setonu hwebinu enyi wiwa tlɛ vɛwu tawun hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɛ
jaan mɛɖesɔhwe jezu tɔn kpo tonusise tɔn kpo bɔ ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ nɔ sɛkpɔ ɛ bɔ enɛ bɔ e nyi nɔ se xa mɛ e ɖe
xa luki
jezu xomɛ ɖe wanyiyi hwenu suulu ɖiɖo tɔn tlɛ gbɔn tɛnkpɔn mɛ e
jijɔ ɖagbe tɛ lɛ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ bɔ kpe nukun do mawu tɔn wu ganji
mɛ ɖeɖee e ɖo agun mɛ bɔ nu nu mɛ sɔgbe xa biblu lɛ e bi nɔ wa kpo nunywɛ kpo hwenu xwedo klisu tɔn e
nugbo ɔ wiwa nɔ ɖɔ jlo ɖɔ mawu kpo vi tɔn kpo ɖo emi wu
nɔ kpa acɛ gannaganna nu mɛ e do asi nu ɖɔ kpe nukun do wu lɛ o loɔ nyi nu lɛ
etɛ jehovah byɔ ɖo lɛ si
mawu nɔ lɛ bɔ nɔ wa e nu e gbɔn
nugbododo taji enɛ lɛ zan ɖo xwedo mɛ
do xo enɛ nyi nujɔnu sɔ
biblu ɖɔ enyi klisanwun lɛ nu nu vi ɖe e jɛxa gbɔn e a ɔ ɖo gbe tɔn nu jehovah
nu e yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn ɔ nyɔna tɛ lɛ e nɔ mɔ
etɛ mi do ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
nu mi yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ gosin mawuxowema ɔ mɛ e wa nu jehovah kpo jezu kpo ɖɔhun hwenu mi ɖo nu nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e ɔ nyɔna sin mɛ lɛ e tunfla
mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɔ ɖɔ e yi wan nu emi nugbo emi xɔ akwɛ ɖo ayijayi mɛ nyɔna ɖo nukɔn ja lɛ e sin kpowun wɛ nyi enɛ
xa ezayii
nu mi nɔ nukun enɛ do nugbɛnumɛ jehovah tɔn ɔ nu e nyi nugbo nugbo e su nukun mitɔn mɛ enɛ wɛ nyi ɖagbeɖagbe wanyiyi ɖo dogbo mawu ɖo nu mi e tɔn
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi kan nu akpaxwe nugbɛnumɛ tɔn ɖevo kunkpla xwedo kpo agun kpo e
ali tɛ lɛ jehovah nɔ ɖo suulu nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nu nu miɖee ɖe
lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ nu nu jehovah jlo gbɔn e gbɔn
mi sixu ɖu le nu ɖebu e sixu zan biblu do nu mi ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ e tɔn bi gbɔn
jehovah wɛ nyi jɔtɛn nunywɛ tɔn bɔ e nɔ hun alɔ do ma nunywɛ enɛ xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
jaki ɖɔ enyi nunywɛ hwedo mɛɖe ɖo mɛ hun byɔ mawu nu e ɛ ɖo mawu nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ bi kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
ali mawu nɔ nunywɛ mi ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi hwenu mi yi gbe bɔ e nu nu mi e
bɔ nunywɛ enɛ sixu cyɔn alɔ mi ji ɖo nu wa nu do mi wu ɖo walɔ ɖagbe kpo gbigbɔ kpo lixo e mɛ
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
e ɖo co jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn mitɔn lɛ mi yi e kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ bɔ e nɔ vɛwu nu mi bɔ mi yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ alo ɖo linlin sɔgbe e
mi nɔ blo bɔ nugbɛnumɛ nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ hwenu mi ɖu le lɛ e bɔ e nɔ wan mawu yi nu mi e
nunywɛxo ɖɔ vi jehovah dɔn to nu hun hu o ɖo jehovah nɔ nu nu mɛ e yi wan e
nugbo ɔ nu mi wɔn gbeɖe ɖɔ nu mitɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu jehovah o xa eblee lɛ
nu mi do nu nugbɛnumɛ sin akpaxwe vovo ɛnɛ din nu nu mɛɖesunɔ lɛ sin nugbɛnumɛ nugbɛnumɛ ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ kpo nu ɖevo nyla hu hwenu kpɛɖe tɔn e nɔ se ɖo nugbɛnumɛ wutu e kpo
e sixu vi ɖe bɔ e nɔ nu nu eɖee gbɔn
nu nu mɛɖesunɔ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖe mɛɖeejiɖuɖe mɔ tɛn do blo bonu nuwalɔ kpo linlin mɛtɔn lɛ kpo
ði ɔ hwenu vi ɖe jɛ kɛkɛ afɔdokwin ji tlolo e ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖokpo nɔ hɛn kɛkɛ ɔ bonu e o
enyi kɛkɛ kunkun ɔ jɛ mima vi ɔ ji ɔ ɔ nɔ hɛn ayi nɔ jo e do bɔ e nɔ kun nu taan klewun ɖe
e jo vi ɔ do bi hwenu kɛkɛ ɔ ma ɛ ganji e
ɖokpo ɔ enyi lɛ vi yetɔn kpɛvi lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ xwe sɔ do wa nu nu aklunɔ jlo gbɔn e ɔ alɔ do vi yetɔn lɛ wɛ ɖe bonu nɔ nu nu yeɖee ɖo nunywɛ nɛ efɛ
etɛwu nu nu mɛɖesunɔ nyi mɛ ɔ sin akpaxwe taji ɖe
nu e ɖɔ ɔ enyi mi jɛ ayi azɔn tɛnwe ɔ etɛwu mi ɖo jo gbe a
e ɖo co ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ ahwanvu ee tlolo e zin a
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ e sixu wa zin gbɔn kplɔnkplɔn mɛ ci klisu ɖɔhun e do gblamɛ efɛ
nu nu mɛɖesunɔ nyi akpaxwe taji ɖe ɖo nu nɔ ɖɔ e ɖo zinzin wɛ lɛ e mɛ
e ɖe afɔ nyi do ɖɔ e bi alo e gbɔ nu nu mɛɖee bi sese a
nunywɛxo ɖɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ jɛ ayi azɔn tɛnwe ɔ e azɔn tɛnwe
etɛ ɛ bɔ e kpa ɛ
e nyi hlɔnhlɔn eɖesunɔ tɔn a gbigbɔ mawu tɔn wɛ xa filipunu lɛ
mɛɖeejiɖuɖe nyi ɖokpo ɖo gbigbɔ enɛ nɔ e mɛ mɛɖeejiɖuɖe ɔ ca kan tawun xa nu nu mɛɖesunɔ
mi sixu huzu xo mawu tɔn ɖagbe lɛ gbɔn
ðɛxixo kpo ayi bi kpo biblu kplɔnkplɔn kpodo tamɛ linlin kpo nyi nu ɖeɖee ɖo taji nɔ bɔ e nɔ nu nu mɛɖesunɔ e
enyi xo mawu tɔn kpinkplɔn nɔ vɛwu nu ɔ lo
vlafo nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun sixu kpe nu kplɔnkplɔn wu o
nukɔntɔn ɔ xoɖɛ jehovah byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e nu tɛ nuɖe lɛ hwiɖee mɔ hwenu do xo tɔn
enɛ gudo hun wa nu sɔgbe kpo ɖɛ xo e kpo vlafo gbɔn taan klewun ɖe zinzan ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn ɔ kɔn gblamɛ
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ ɔ nukplɔnkplɔn ɔ wa bɔwu nu vivi nu hugan
nugbo ɔ enyi nɔ ze hwiɖee bi jo nu linlin xɔ akwɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ taan klewun klewun enɛ lɛ xɔ akwɛ nu tawun tim
nu nu miɖee sixu mi bɔ mi kpe nu gbigbɔ tɔn gbe nya wɛ mi ɖe e wu gbɔn
nu nu miɖee nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ kpe nu gbigbɔ tɔn gbe nya wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e wu
mi ɖɔ xo do xwedo tɔn ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ kanɖodonuwu emitɔn ɖo ɖiɖekpo wɛ e sin ji
enɛ kpodo ɖɛxixo kpo bɔ e lido mɔ hlɔnhlɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
e nɔ ji vi lɛ bonu nɔ tuun nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ a wɛ e ɖo akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ sixu klisanwun lɛ bɔ vi yetɔn lɛ kplɔnkplɔn bonu jehovah kpa
klisanwun lɛ ɖo wujɔmɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ vi yetɔn lɛ nu nu aklunɔ jlo gbɔn e efɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun nɔ ji vi lɛ bonu nɔ tuun nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ o
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e ji bɔ ɖo ayixa e ɖo ayixa enɛ ɔ alo nu
vi ɖeɖee e nu kpodo wanyiyi kpo lɛ e nɔ wa mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo ayijayi mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e nyi nu taji ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ jehovah tɔn
hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ linlin e nɔ ɖo lɛ e kpo wlɛnwin e nɔ zan lɛ e kpo gbɔn vo sin aca ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ gbɔn vo sin jijimɛ ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ
nu lɛ ɖoto mawu ɔ nɔ dla avi ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ kplɔnkplɔn kɔn a nɔ xwedo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɔ e alo linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ do a
nu mi do nuɖe wu ɔ nu mi nɔwee tɔn
hwenu jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ e blo tɔjihun ɖe e ɔ nɔwee sixu ganjɛ nu e mɔ lɛ e wu do blo a
e blo tɔjihun ɖe a
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo ganjɛ jehovah wu blo nu e ɖɔ e enɛ wɛ nyi jehovah ɖɔ gbɔn e
etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ co nɔwee blo ganji
e gbɔn mɛ ze ɖagbe ɖe nu vi tɔn lɛ wiwa ɖo nyanya enɛ jɛ nukɔn nu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ e mɛ nyi jɛ bonu e kan a bib
lɛ tɔn nyi nu taji sɔ ɖo vi yetɔn lɛ kpinkplɔn mɛ gbɔn
klisanwun lɛ sixu wa nu mawu e gbɔn
e wa ya ɔ vi mitɔn lɛ sixu wa doku enɛ tɔn nu
nɔvi sunnu ɖe wlan ɖɔ lɛ mi gbɔn e su nukun mɛ tawun
wa nu wu kpe e bi mɔ nu jɛ ayi mɛ
nukɔnyiyi ɖo ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɔ ku ɖaxo bi ɔ yetɔn wɛ
e ɖo co lɛ nɔ do gan co vi ɖe lɛ nɔ jo jehovah do
ɖeɖee wa nu wu kpe lɛ e bi bonu nugbo ɔ byɔ ayi vi ɖe tɔn mɛ e ɖo dohwɛ yeɖee a
enyi e ɖe vi ɖe sin agun mɛ ɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ setonu nu mawu gbɔn
xwedo ɖe ɖu le tonu lɛ se nu jehovah e tɔn gbɔn
mi nɔ e ɖe vi nyɔnu tɔn sin agun mɛ bɔ vi nyɔnu ɔ wa gosin xwegbe e tɔn
nɔ ɔ ɖɔ nɔ hwɛjijɔ lɛ ɖo wema mitɔn lɛ mɛ mɔ tɛn do sixu zan hwenu ɖo xa vi nyɔnu kpo vi tɔn kpo
e ɖɔ ɖɔ asu mi kpo kpo bɔ mɔ ɖɔ vi mitɔn kun ɖo alɔ mitɔn mɛ din o mi kun ɖo wa nu ɖo xa ɛ o
nɔ ɔ ɖɔ e nɔ ylɔ mi alo wlan nu mi ɖo ɖibla nyi gbe lɛ bi gbe
e nɔ ɖo sisi nu asu kpo nyi kpo tawun ɖo e tuun ɖɔ mi setonu nu mawu wutu
flin ɖɔ jehovah nɔ nu nu mɛ gbɔn e nɔ ɖe nunywɛ tɔn kpo wanyiyi tɔn kpo e sixu a e
nɔ flin hwebinu ɖɔ e vi tɔn jo do mɛ lɛ bi sin takunmɛ jɛ vi towe ji
mawu ɖɔ mɛɖebu dɔn a
xa
enɛ wu ɔ ɖɔ emi ɖi nu nu nugbɛnumɛ kpo jehovah tɔn kpo
e tlɛ vɛwu nu hun wa nu jehovah ɖɔ e
mi nɔ ɖu le nu jehovah nɔ mi gbɔn devi ɔ ji e tɔn gbɔn
jehovah ɖɔ emi kpe nukun do agun klisanwun tɔn ɔ wu cyɔn alɔ ji tɔn nu
mi nɔ mɔ nuɖuɖu enɛ ɖo alɔkpa gege ji bɔ nɔ nu xɔ akwɛ lɛ mi alo nu nu mi ganji
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ azɔn nabi xoɖiɖɔ ɖe alo xota ɖo xojlawema mitɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖe mi bɔ huzu linlin alo nuwalɔ lɛ
enyi mɔ ɖɔ azɔn gege hun
mi sixu ɖu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sin le gbɔn
mi sixu wa gbɔn bɔ wa nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ
mi sixu ɖu nunina xɔ akwɛ enɛ lɛ sin le gbɔn
xa eblee lɛ
flin ɖɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ yi wan nu mi jlo ɖɔ mi zin ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ði ɔ nu ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ mi jɛ kple lɛ gɔn ji alo ɖɔ akpakpa nɔ mi do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ wu e jɛ ɖiɖekpo ji ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ yawu wa mi
ɖoto mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖe we junjɔn biblu ji sɔgbe lɛ e xa mi do hɛn mi lido
nɔ mɔ ɖɔ alɔdo mɔhun nyi wan jehovah yi nu e tɔn a
hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ e sixu vɛwu nu mɛxo lɛ bɔ sɛkpɔ mi ɖe we sin hudo mi ɖo e xa mi
sixu blo gbɔn bɔ kpɛn mɛxo ɖo agun towe mɛ lɛ e a
mɔ ɖɔ alɔ do wɛ ɖe ɔ nyi wanyiyi mawu ɖo nu e tɔn
e nyi le tɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ ɖu a loɔ lɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖe e kɔn
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖu le alɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ do e kpo wanyiyi kpo e tɔn gbɔn
ðo nu mɛ nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe gbɔn din wa yi e wutu ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu bɔ emi yi wan nu jehovah
wa adan do mi alo mɔ xo ɖɔ do wutu a loɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi hlɔnhlɔn mi
ðo kple agun tɔn lɛ bi gudo ɔ jan gbɔn ɖebu ɔ e hwe bi ɔ mɛ ɖokpo nɔ ɖo mɛ nɔ kan ɖe gbɔn e byɔ mi
e sin nu wa wa yi e wutu bɔ e nɔ vɛwu nu mi bɔ mɔ ɖɔ jɛxa wanyiyi mawu tɔn
azɔn gege wɛ jehovah gbɔn agun ɔ kpo mɛxo lɛ kpo gblamɛ mi ɖɔ emi yi wan nu mi
etɛ sixu nyla hu ɖebu nugbɛnumɛ sixu dɔn wa lɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nugbɛnumɛ sixu bɔ e mɔ nu ɖevo tlɛ nɔ dɔn wa hu enɛ wɛ nyi nu nyanya nugbɛnumɛ xixo nyi sixu dɔn wa lɛ e ebl
mi we kpo axɔsu sedesiyasi tɔn kpo
hwenu jɛ wan nu abɛli ji jɛ biba hu ji e ɔ mawu ɖɔ nu do nujɔnu mɛ ɖɔ wɛ gbɔn bɔ sin xomɛ nyla nukunmɛ
ɖoto mawu a
nu enɛ bɔ dɔn nyi dandan tɔn a lɛ e wa nu eɖee
enyi e nugbɛnumɛ jehovah tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ mɔ e do enɛ wu ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ e kun syɛn o
axɔsu nyanya ɖe nɔ nyi sedesiyasi ɖo hwenu vɛwu jeluzalɛmu tɔn lɛ mɛ
azɔn mɔkpan wɛ gbeyiɖɔ jelemii byɔ sedesiyasi ɖɔ e jo nyanya zan wɛ e ɖe e do axɔsu ɔ xo nugbɛnumɛ tɔn lɛ nyi
etɛ ɖo sɛxwetɛn nu mɛ ɖeɖee yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn lɛ e kpo mɛ ɖeɖee lɛ e kpo
hwɛhwɛ wɛ ɔ nɔ nugbɛnumɛ jɛ nu nu mɛɖesunɔ ji do mɔ nu e ɖe
xlonɔnuwiwa enɛ kɔ do nu nyanya mɛ nu mɛ nɔ wa lɛ e zaanɖe
nunywɛxo ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ hɛn nu e jo do o hɛn do wu syɛnsyɛn ɖo e wɛ nyi towe
ali e gbɔn do jɛ mɛɖee kannu nugbo nugbo e
jehovah mawu nɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ mɛ e
mɛ gbɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖo biba wɛ nɔ yeɖee kannu hugan
linlin tɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖo ɖo do mɛɖeekannuninɔ wu
xota we elɔ lɛ ɖɔ xo do nu mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ nyi e mi ɖo gbɔn e kpo mi sixu zan miɖee kannu mi ɖe ɖo ba ɖe mɛ e din bɔ miɖesunɔ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo ɖu le tɔn gbɔn e kpo wu
taji bi ɔ mi mi jehovah mawu nɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ mɛ e su gbɔn e
sunnu agbanɖotananɔ lɛ emi timɔtee tɔn nu
wa nu jehovah mawu nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ e ðɔhun
nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee din hu tɔn lɛ bi
xota elɔ lɛ ɖɔ jehovah nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu tɔn lɛ hwebinu bɔ xwedo tɔn ɖo xwe lɛ vlamɛ
mi mɔ nu wu e mya nukun hu tɔn ɖɔ mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee e
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ emi ðo ayi mitɔn ðo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya ji wɛ a
enyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖo agun mɛ lɛ e ayi yetɔn ɖo xomɛ jehovah tɔn hinhɛn hun ji ɔ nɔ ɖu le tɔn
xota elɔ hwɛjijɔ ɖeɖee wu e nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe sin vu e kpo hwɛjijɔ wu e kunnuɖegbe yiyi ɖo tɛn nukɔn ɔ mɛ e kpo
enyi vi ɔ ɖe sin kannumɔgbenu ɔ gosin kannumɔgbenu nugbo jaan
etɛ nyi mɛɖeekannuninɔ ɖo ba ɖe mɛ
lɛ hɛn mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ bu gbɔn
mɛɖeekannuninɔ tɛ sin akpa jezu do mi sixu ɖo mɛɖeekannuninɔ enɛ gbɔn
etɛ ɖɔ lɛ ɖo tagba jɛ wɛ nɔ yeɖee kannu
etɛ mɛ tagba jijɛ enɛ lɛ kɔ do
egbe ɔ e nɔ ɖɔ xo gege do kpo mɛɖeekannuninɔ kpo wu
ðo akpaxwe ɔ tɔn gege ɔ lɛ jlo vo sin acɛ gannaganna kpa nu mɛ akɔ cyancyan kpo kpo si
mɛ ɖevo lɛ xo kan ɖo vivo ɖɔ xo do nu jlo e ji jɛ yeɖee kannu
e ci ɖɔ ɖo fi vovo lɛ bi e nɔ jlo tawun vo wa nu jlo e alo zan jlo e
nu ɖevo sese wɛ nu enɛ lɛ gbe nyinya nɔ dɔn wa
enɛ lɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ mɔ nu wɛ ɖe e a
eo e wa ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ e nɔ dɔn nu baɖabaɖa lɛ wa bɔ e nɔ ku
nu enɛ lɛ bi ɖɔ xo elɔ mawu do ayi mɛ nu axɔsu bɔ e wlan e nyi nugbo e ɖɔ ɖe nɔ kpa acɛ gannaganna nu nɔzo tɔn nɔ wa nu do wu tɔn nut
ahwanvu jaki nu taji bɔ e ɖo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ e
e wlan ɖɔ mɛ nɔ gbeje nɔ ɖe mi sin mɛ kannu ɔ ceɖeceɖe nɔ ɖokan ɔ mawu xoɖɛ do mɛ enɛ ɔ ji ɖo nu e nɔ wa ɔ mɛ
e nu hudo asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ bɔ ɖo awajijɛ lɛ e bi jɛ mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ ji
mɛɖeekannuninɔ tɛ sin vivi adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖu
enyi mi ɖo sin wemata we nukɔntɔn lɛ xa wɛ ɔ e vɛwu ɖebu cobonu mi mɔ ɖɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ lɛ ɖo biba wɛ ɖo egbe e tɔn a e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e vo sin xɛsi kpo yadonumɛ kpo si
asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖo ɖebu do nuɖuɖu azɔn kpo ku kpo wu a bib
etɛ sin hudo ɖo ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ tɔn nyi flijɛ nu mɛ gege nɔ e tɔn
mɛ gege nɔ egbe ɖɔ enyi nɔ yeɖee kannu nugbo ɔ ɖo ɖo acɛ ɔ nɔ wa nu ɖebu jlo lɛ e enyi wiwa ji nu ɖebu ɔ nɛ
tinmɛ mɛɖeekannuninɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e nyi nuwukpikpe ɖiɖo do nu ɖeɖee jlo mɛ e ji wa nu enɛ lɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ ðo linu ɔ lɛ nɔ nɔ yeɖee kannu enyi kplekple ɖe ɖo dogbo sɔgbe a ɖo dandan a alo ɖo ji a lɛ e nu a ɔ nɛ
enɛ ɖɔ nu e ɖɔ ɔ dogbo ɖe lɛ ɖo dandan cobɔ mɛ ɖo kplekple enɛ mɛ lɛ e bi ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ ɖo acɛ e tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ nukanbyɔ ɔ din wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo acɛ dogbo sɔgbe ɖo dandan ɖo ji e mɛ
etɛwu jehovah ɖokponɔ wɛ nyi mɛ ɖo eɖee kannu bi e
mɛɖeekannuninɔ alɔkpa tɛ sin vivi lɛ sixu ɖu
nuɖe flin xogbe ɖagbeɖagbe ɖeɖee axɔsu davidi zan do tinmɛ tɛn bunɔ xɔ tawun bɔ jehovah kɛɖɛ ɖe e mɛ e xa
sɔgbe xa xo enɛ ɔ nuɖiɖo ɖo jixwe kpo ayikungban ji kpo lɛ e bi ɔ ba ɖe mɛ jɛn ɖo yeɖee kannu ɖo
ɖo tuun ɖɔ jehovah mawu wɛ ɖo acɛ gudogudo tɔn ɔ dogbo sɔgbe ɖo dandan ɖo ji lɛ e
nu jehovah mawu blo nu lɛ ɖo tlolo e nɛ
ðɔ nu mi jɔ kpo kpo bɔ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo awajijɛ e ɖe lɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ tɔn ɖo ɖo ali gege e dogbo ɖe lɛ
jɔ kpo ɖe lɛ kpo dogbo jɛn lɔ nyi
ði ɔ mitɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ nu kpo ɖo ɔ ɖo ɖu nu wa nu ɖevo lɛ
ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ biblo ɖɔ emi kun ɖo emiɖee kannu o wɛ a
nut nu e jɔhɔn fifa ɖu nuɖuɖu e yi wan e alo amlɔ gbɔjɛ ganji zanzan ɔ e nɔ vivi a
mi nɔ wa nu enɛ lɛ ɖo taji e kpo awajijɛ kpo mi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ nyi agban kpɛn mi ɖebu lɔ a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wɛ nu ci nu adamu kpo ɛvu kpo
jehovah byɔ ɖo adamu kpo ɛvu kpo si ɖɔ ji gbakpe ayikungban ɔ ji kpe nukun bib
gbeɖiɖe enɛ xo mɛɖeekannuninɔ yetɔn yi sin si ɖo ali ɖe lɛ wɛ a
ðebu a
egbe ɔ nu mɛɖe wa gbeta ɔ kɔn nɔ tlɛnmɛ alo wli alɔ ji vi a ɔ enɛ ɔ jlo jehovah ɖo nu lɛ e ji a
alɔwliwli kpo vi lɛ kplɔnkplɔn kpo ɖo yetɔn lɛ co mɛ gege nɔ wa gbeta enɛ ɔ kɔn
kɔ nwt etɛwu
ðo enyi nu bi ɖo nu ganji ɔ wiwa nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu lɛ
etɛwu gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn ɖo mɛ e sɔgbe ɖo dandan alo ɖo ji
gbeɖiɖe enɛ gɔn gbe sɔ ɖo dandan a ɖo ji a ɖo ali ɖe vlafo wɛ a
e xo mɛɖeekannuninɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo tɔn yi wɛ a
nugbo ɔ akɔwe biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖɔ xo do gbeɖiɖe enɛ sɔgbe gbɔn e ji
ði ɔ akɔwe ɖokpo ɖɔ gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn ɖo mɛ e ɖɔ mawu ɖokponɔ wɛ tuun nu nyi nu ɖagbe nu lɛ e mawu ɖokponɔ wɛ tuun nu nyi nu ɖagbe nu e
bonu lɛ ɖu vivi nu ɖagbe tɔn ɔ ɖo ɖeji do mawu wu setonu
enyi tlito ɔ e jo do bɔ yeɖesunɔ wa gbeta nu nyi ɖagbe kpo nu nyi ɖagbe a e kpo tɔn kɔn nu yeɖee
agban ɖe wɛ bɔ lɛ ɖesunɔ sixu hɛn nu e kpa a
gbeta kɔn adamu kpo ɛvu kpo wa e kɔ do awexomɛ mɛ
mi ɖo ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ kpo acɛ e ɖo nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ e kpo nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ a etɛwu
enyi mɛ lɛ ɖo gbe jehovah ɖe nu adamu e xa wɛ ɖo egbe ɔ mɛ gege nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun jo adamu do nu e wa nu jlo e e o
xo enɛ nɔ ɖɔ e ɖɔ nɔ wlu mɛɖeekannuninɔ nɔ gbɔn e kpo acɛ e ɖo nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ e kpo ɖo
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ɖo yeɖesunɔ si ɖɔ ɖɔ emi setonu nu mawu alo gbɔ
mi ɖo yi gbe ɖɔ mi kun nɔ tuun nu ɖeɖee mɛ gbeta kɔn mi wa lɛ e kɔ do e hwebinu o jɛn mi tuun nu kɔ do ɖagbe ji nu mi hwebinu a e nɛ
dogbo ɖo lɛ e nɔ wa nu ɖaxo ɖe
gbɔn gbeɖiɖe jehovah tɔn enɛ gblamɛ ɔ e wanyiyi do adamu kpo ɛvu kpo ali zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ ɖe e
e wa gbɔn
etɛwu gbeta kɔn adamu kpo ɛvu kpo wa e nyi gbeta baɖabaɖa ɖe
do nuɖe wu
e wa nyi gbɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mitɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn vɛtoli
gbeta kɔn adamu kpo ɛvu kpo wa wa e bɔ jɛ yeɖee kannu ɖo ali ɖe wɛ a
nu nyi kpowun ɖo jehovah acɛ lɛ bonu yeɖesunɔ nɔ nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ a xa jelemii
mi sixu do ɖo jɔmɛhun ɖe kun wɛ e wu
enyi ɖe yi fi e xwe e ɔ e ɖo nɔ xwedo ali sin nu e nu jɔmɛhun e ɖe hwebinu
jɔmɛhun kunkun tɔn egbe tɔn lɛ nɔ bɔ e blo bɔ ɖe zan tɔn ɖo jɔmɛhun ɔ mɛ e ɖo nu wa ɖo xa mɛ nɔ kpe nukun do jɔmɛhun sin ali lɛ wu e wɛ hwenu e ɖo yiyi wɛ e mɔ tɛn do yi fi e xwe e
enyi ɔ jlo wɔn nu enɛ nɔ ɖo fi jlo e lɛ e gbɔn wɛ kpowun ɔ nu mɛ e kɔ do e sixu nyla tawun
enɛ ɖɔhun ɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo wa nu jlo lɛ e
ali jehovah e
ðo jlo nɔ yeɖee kannu wutu ɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo e e kpo
mi sixu jɛ miɖee kannu nugbo nugbo gbɔn
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ nɔ hɛn le gege wa enyi e ɖo dogbo ɖebu nu mɛɖeekannuninɔ a ɔ do nukun ɔ ci e mɛ
hwɛjijɔ enɛ wu wɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ kplekple e blo tuto lɛ e bi tɔn lɛ ɖo enɛ lɛ ɖo cyɔn alɔ mɛ ji bɔ ɖo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ ɖo dogbo nu mɛɖeekannuninɔ lɛ tɔn
e nɔ fa hwebinu a
tamɛ do tobutobu lɛ nɔ e ji do kpo kpo tobutobu e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ jɛn tin enɛ lɛ mɛ blo bɔ e nyi e ji
jezu klisu e ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ tɔn gbɔn e ɖo ali bɔkun e ɖe
jaan ðo jezu tɔn ee bɔ e jɛ mɛɖee kannu nugbo e mɛ ɔ e byɔ nu we ɖo mi si nukɔntɔn ɔ mi yi gbe nu nugbo e mɛ e wegɔ ɔ mi huzu ahwanvu tɔn
wiwa bɔ mi jɛ miɖee kannu nugbo nugbo
etɛ sin kannu gosin wɛ mi ɖe
jezu yi nukɔn tinmɛ ɖɔ mɛ nɔ hu hwɛ e ɖebu ɔ hwɛ sin kannumɔ wɛ e nyi
etɛwu mɛɖeekannuninɔ sin akpa jezu do e sixu bɔ mi gosin kannumɔgbenu nugbo
mɛɖeekannuninɔ sin akpa jezu do nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ e hugan mɛɖeekannuninɔ alɔkpa mɛ gege nɔ e flafla tɔn
hwenu jezu ɖɔ enyi vi ɔ ɖe sin kannumɔgbenu ɔ gosin kannumɔgbenu nugbo e ɔ kan tuntun nu lɛ sin kannumɔgbenu ɖaxo hugan nɔ e sin xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe enɛ wɛ nyi hwɛ sin kannumɔ
hwɛhuhu sixu dɔn mi bɔ mi wa nu nyanya sixu ali nu mi bɔ mi gbɔ nu mi tuun ɖɔ e sɔgbe e wa alo gbɔ nu mi tuun ɖɔ mi kpewu e wa
ðo ali enɛ ɔ mi nyi kannumɔ nu hwɛhuhu bɔ nu mɛ e nɔ kɔ do e wɛ nyi aluwɛ bɔ ku nɔ wa su
xa hlɔmanu lɛ
hwenu e ɖe gɛdɛ ɖeɖee hwɛhuhu nɔ do mɛ e siin e jɛn mi sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖu e tɔn
mi sixu gosin kannumɔgbenu nugbo gbɔn
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi se gbe nu mi ɔ xo enɛ ɖɔ e byɔ nuɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ si alo dogbo ɖe lɛ tiin bɔ e xwedo cobɔ e ɖe mɛ sin kannumɔgbenu
jezu tɔn gbɔn e ɔ mi jɛ miɖee kannu nugbo hwenu mi jɛ vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn tɔn sin le ɖu ji bi e
etɛ bɔ gbɛzan mitɔn ɖo bɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ
nu mi mɛ ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ nɔ xwedo nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ ɔ e bɔ mitɔn ɖo bɔ mi
enɛ wa hun ali nu mi bɔ mi ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖɔ mi wa jɛ miɖee kannu bi sin kannumɔgbenu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo tɔn si xa hlɔmanu lɛ
xota bɔ e ɖɔ xo do mi sixu zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ mi ɖo din e kpo nunywɛ kpo mɔ tɛn do sixu jehovah mawu ee nɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ mɛ sɔyi e su gbɔn e ji
fi gbigbɔ aklunɔ tɔn ɖe ɔ mɛɖeesijijɛ ɖo finɛ kɔ
ali tɛ lɛ gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn ɖe mi sin kannumɔgbenu ɖe
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu mɛɖeekannuninɔ mawu mi e zinzan nyi do gbɔn
etɛ mi sixu blo zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn kpo nunywɛ kpo
etɛwu kannumɔgbenu ninɔ kpo mɛɖeekannuninɔ kpo xo ɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ ɖo pɔlu hwenu
pɔlu ali mɛ lɛ yi bonu jɛ yeɖee kannu nugbo nugbo
hlɔmanu tɛntin klisanwun tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖe e nɔ go ɖo jɛ nukɔn ɖo hwɛɖiɖɔ kpo mɛɖeekannuninɔ kpo linu wutu
hlɔnhlɔn kpo kpo axɔsuɖuto hlɔma tɔn ɖo e habu sin kannumɔ lɛ wa wa yi e wu
ðo hweɖenu ɔ ɖo kanweko ji mɛ ɖo hlɔma lɛ e tɔn wɛ nyi kannumɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kannumɔgbenu kpo mɛɖeekannuninɔ kpo sin xo ɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu lɛ kpaa jɛ klisanwun lɛ lɔ ji
wema pɔlu wlan lɛ e ɖo xo gege ɖɔ do mɛɖeekannuninɔ wu
mɛ lɛ nɔ tawun ɖɔ e huzu e nɔ wa nu xa lɛ gbɔn e alo nu lɛ nɔ yi gbɔn ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu e nu gbe pɔlu nya ɖo tɔn hwenu e nɛ a
pɔlu kpo klisanwun tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo nukun ɖɔ acɛkpikpa tɔn ɖe alo tutoblonunu ɖe wɛ dɔn mɛɖeekannuninɔ wa a e wa ɔ syɛnsyɛn mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ se wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn klisu jezu tɔn xɔ akwɛ bɔ e sixu a e
pɔlu ali tɔn lɛ bɔ tuun jɔtɛn mɛɖeekannuninɔ nugbo ɔ tɔn
ðo wema wegɔ e wlan klisanwun ɖo kɔlɛnti lɛ e mɛ ɔ e nyi wɛn ɖɔ fi gbigbɔ aklunɔ tɔn ɖe ɔ mɛɖeesijijɛ ɖo finɛ kɔ
etɛ bɔ pɔlu ɖɔ xo ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e
etɛ mi ɖo wa ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ gosin jehovah e tɔn
ðo wema pɔlu wlan kɔlɛntinu lɛ e mɛ ɔ e to ɖɔ xo do mɔyizi ɖo hwenu e gosin wɛnsagun jehovah tɔn ɖe nukɔn gudo jɛte sin sinayii so ɔ ji e wu
ee mɛ lɛ mɔ mɔyizi e ɔ xɛsi jɛ ji bɔ mɔyizi gbɔ cyɔn avɔ nukunmɛ
etɛ ɖɔ gbe pɔlu ja
mi gbɔn ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ e ɔ jehovah mɛ ɖo nu lɛ bi e wɛ nyi mɛ ɖokpo gee nɔ ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ alo ee ɖo dogbo a e tɔn e
e ɖɔ e ɖo jehovah nukɔn alo fi gbigbɔ aklunɔ tɔn ɖe e ɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ ɖo finɛ
cobonu mi ɖu vivi mɛɖeekannuninɔ enɛ tɔn ɖu le tɔn ɔ mi ɖo lɛkɔ wa aklunɔ enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo kancica mɛɖesunɔ tɔn ɖe xa ɛ
hwenu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo gbetotlo mɛ e ɔ jehovah wa nu xa gbɔn e ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
mɛɖeekannuninɔ alɔkpa tɛ gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn nɔ mɛ
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ kannumɔgbenu ninɔ ɖo agbaza lixo kun ɖo nu mɛɖeekannuninɔ jehovah mi e o
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi ɖo mɔ xosin
mɛɖeekannuninɔ ca kan xa gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn e hugan kannumɔgbenu gigosin ɖo agbaza lixo
gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ gosin kannumɔgbenu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo tɔn nɔ bɔ e nɔ nyi kannumɔ nu sinsɛn nuvu kpo nuwalɔ tɔn lɛ kpo a gandido tɔn sixu kpe enɛ wu gbeɖe a hlɔ
mɛɖeekannuninɔ susunɔ tɛ ɖie
sixu mɔ se bɔ ɖo yetɔn kpi wɛ ɖo jw ji
zin interviews et temoignages dans
mi ɖo nu do nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ ji mi sixu ɖɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn xɔ akwɛ nu mi gbɔn
etɛ mi sixu blo zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn kpo nunywɛ kpo
izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ jehovah e kun su nukun yetɔn mɛ o gbɔn
nu mi mɔ nunina ɖe xɔ akwɛ tawun sɔ e ɔ e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ mɛ nu ɔ mi e ɖɔ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ
mɛɖeekannuninɔ jehovah izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖe sin kannumɔgbenu ɖo ejipu e su nukun yetɔn mɛ a
do nukun mɛ hwevi ayikpɛn ma ayomasa kpo ayo kpo mya nukun nu hu mɛɖeekannuninɔ mawu nugbo ɔ jehovah bɔ ɛ e
nukplɔnmɛ ɖagbe ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi nu mi
pɔlu wa nu sɔgbe xa we e ɖe xa mɛ ɖo kɔlɛntinu lɛ mɛ e gbɔn mi sixu wa nu ɖokpo ɔ gbɔn
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ bi ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ mawu xomɛ gbɔn vi sunnu tɔn jezu klisu ji e nyi yetɔn bɔ xo fo o xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
flin wubla kpo kpo mɛ pɔlu nɔ ɖo ayixa mɛ hwenu e mɔ ɖɔ emi nyi kannumɔ nu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo e
e ɖɔ kpo nusumɛnukunmɛ kpo ɖɔ kpa nu mawu gbɔn jezu klisu aklunɔ mitɔn ji
pɔlu tɔn xwixwedo bɔ mi lɔ gbeɖe ɖɔ kannumɔgbenu hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo tɔn jehovah ɖe mi sin e nyi mitɔn bɔ xo fo a
gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ mi sixu mawu kpo ayixa ɖe kpo mɔ awajijɛ nujɔnu tɔn ɖo wiwa mɛ ðɛh
akpa tɛ gba nu mɛ do mɛɖeekannuninɔ mɛtɔn zinzan wu
awovinu tɛ lɛ nɔ kpannukɔn mi ɖo egbe
nu mi do mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn zinzan do hwɛjijɔ su jlo agbaza tɔn mitɔn lɛ sin do wu
xa
akpagbanumɛ enɛ flin nu jɛ do izlayɛli vi lɛ wu ɖo gbetotlo mɛ e a ce
awovinu ɖokpo ɔ sixu xa mi lɔ ɖo egbe e tlɛ sixu syɛn hu lɔ
sataan kpo tɔn kpo nɔ xwle nu dɔn mɛ hugan ɖo nusisɔ kpo kpo nuɖuɖu kpo ahan nunu kpo gbɔjɛyiyi kpo ayiɖeɖayi kpo linu lɛ e mi nu nu gege ɖevo lɛ
hwɛhwɛ wɛ bi lɛ e nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee dɔn mɛ lɛ e bɔ mɛ enɛ lɛ nɔ vivi do jla nu mi ɖo hudo tɔn doo a lɛ e gege
e bɔwu sɔ bɔ mi jɛ mɔ enɛ lɛ mɛ zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn nyi do e
weɖexamɛ tɔn kunkpla akpaxwe taji gbɛzan tɔn ɖevo lɛ ɖi gbeta kɔn mɛɖe wa do wema kplɔnkplɔn kpo kpo wu e
ði ɔ e nɔ gbidi kɔ nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ tawun ɖo egbe bonu jɛxa ba yi kplɔnyiji alavɔxwe nukunɖeji lɛ
enyi gbeta enɛ lɛ sixu kunkpla gbɛzan mɛtɔn tawun lɛ e wa kpannukɔn mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ bi dɔn mɛ tawun
etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kpo yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ
etɛ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ hwenu mi ɖo mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn zan do wa gbeta miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn wɛ e
mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ ɖo emiɖesunɔ sin xo wɛ gbeta enɛ lɛ kɔn wiwa nyi wutu ɔ emi zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ emitɔn wa nu jlo emi e enyi ayixa emitɔn yi gbe ɔ nɛ
bɔya ayi yetɔn ɖo xo pɔlu ɖɔ nu klisanwun ɖo kɔlɛnti lɛ e do nuɖuɖu wu e ji nuɖe jlo mi bonu ja wiwa gbe ɔ mɛ ɖevo sin ayixa wɛ ɖɔ fi wa yi jɛ ɔ nu mi a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo miɖee kannu wa gbeta miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kɔn do wemaxɔmɛ yiyi kpo kpo wu mi ɖo flin ɖɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn ɖo dogbo bɔ gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e bi ji nuɖe
hwɛjijɔ enɛ wu wɛ pɔlu to ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ e nu bi sin gbe
e nu lɛ bi sin gbe e ɖo co nu lɛ bi wɛ nɔ wa ɖagbe a
linlin tɛ wu e ɖe mi sin kannumɔgbenu
ðo akpa gba nu mɛ do mɛɖeekannuninɔ zinzan nyi do wu e mɛ ɔ e linlin wu e ɔ nu mɛ e
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ mitɔn mawu tɔn ɖɔhun
tɛ nɔwee kpo xwedo tɔn kpo ze nu mi
mi nɔwee kpo xwedo tɔn kpo tɔn
lɔn do jlo do lɛ e tɔn kpo nu gbe nɔ nya lɛ e kpo mɛ a
kpewu wa gbɔn
e blo mawu ɖɔ gbɔn ɔ
etɛ jehovah mi ɖɔ mi blo egbe
ðo mi nyi ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ e mawu mi e do tuun mi ganji xa luki
e jɔwu mi bɔ mi xwedo jezu tɔn lɛ bonu tuun jehovah mawu nɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ mɛ e ɛ
enɛ bɔwu a e ɖo gege
ðo to ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ lɛ nɔ nɔ ɖo wɛn mitɔn wɛ mɛɖe lɛ tlɛ nɔ nylahun do mi
togun jehovah tɔn nɔ wa nu gbɔn nu nu kunkpla ɔ e
enyi mi mɔ nu mɛ gege mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ ɔ mya nukun tawun ɖo hwenu mi ɖe din e nɔ zan gbɛzan bɔkun e do ɖo hwebinu tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ tawun kɔ
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ wa ɖo fi e ɖe nu agun yetɔn e mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ tɛn yi fi hudo ɖe e
gbeɖiɖo lɛ ɖɔ ɖo xwe wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ gbexosin hwebinu tɔn lɛ tɔn jɛji hugan enɛ ɖɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ jɛji byɔ gbexosin hwebinu tɔn lɛ sin ahwan mɛ
etɛ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo enɛ lɛ bɔ zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ yetɔn kpo nunywɛ kpo
mi ɖɔ xo do john kpo judith kpo ee wa ɖo to mɔkpan mɛ ɖo xwe wa yi lɛ e mɛ e ji
flin ɖɔ hwenu e wemaxɔmɛ gbexosin tɔn ɖo e ɔ nu ji e nɔ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo jlo tɛn yi wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e
wa nu xwe tobutobu enɛ lɛ e wa ɖagbe nu gbɔn
john ɖɔ mɔ ɖɔ nyiɖee bi jo nu ɖagbe hugan tuun e
jehovah huzu mɛ nujɔnu tɔn ɖe nu mi hugan ci wanyiyinɔ ɖe ci e ɖɔhun nu mi
din ɔ mɔ nu jɛ nu jaki sin tinmɛ nyi e wu ganji sɛkpɔ mawu enɛ ɔ e sɛkpɔ
mɛ ninɔmɛ yetɔn bonu wa nu taan gege a lɛ e mɔkpan zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ yetɔn kpo nunywɛ kpo gbɔn
ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn gbɔn vo nu john kpo judith kpo tɔn bɔ e nɔ bɔ taan klewun ɖe jɛn sixu wa hwebinu tɔn
e ɖo co mɛ gege nɔ zan ali hun nu bɔ yeɖee jo ɖo yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e e
ði ɔ hwenu e ɖo hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn gba wɛ ɖo warwick e ɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo wɛ mɛɖe lɛ wa nu aklunɔzan gblamɛ we yi jɛ xwe ɖokpo alo hu ɖo fi ɖebu e ɖe nu do e
mɛ gege jo yetɔn lɛ do mɔ tɛn do wa ɖo finɛ
sɔgudo jiwu tɛ ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo mɛɖeekannuninɔ mawu e zan wɛ din kpo nunywɛ kpo lɛ e
nu mi ɖo gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e mɛ ɖɔ mɛɖeekannuninɔ enɛ xɔ akwɛ nu mi
mi zan mɛɖeekannuninɔ enɛ e jlo mi gbɔn e alo zan nyi do a e wa ɔ mi zan ali hun nu mi lɛ e bi do jehovah e blo gbɔn e bi
ðo xwe wa yi e mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ sunnu mɔkpan wɛ e bɔ nyi mɛxo agun tɔn kpo tɔn kpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ
enyi nyi ɖokpo ɖo nɔvi sunnu enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nɔ jɛ awa ɖo wujɔmɛ tɔn towe enɛ wu
kpɛɖe sixu hu
jason nyi mɛxo agun tɔn winnyawinnya ɖe e ɖɔ hwenu nyi mɛxo agun tɔn tlolo e ɔ mɔ ɖɔ lɛ hugan mi
enyi nu nɔ ci nu hwiɖesunɔ hun sixu ɖu kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ gbɔn
mi tamɛ do timɔtee ee nyi klisanwun ɖe e tɔn ji mɛ
e ɖo co ɖo xwe wo gudo ɔ pɔlu ɖɔ nu agun ɖo filipu e ɖɔ ɖo linlin wɛ ɖɔ zaanɖe din ɔ timɔtee do
etɛ bɔ timɔtee nyi mɛxo agun tɔn nukunɖeji mɔhun ɖe
nu tɔn sixu e
nu mɛ lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ tawun
ganjininɔ yetɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ tawun bɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ zan eɖee do yetɔn mɛ
lɔn ci lɛ bi yiyi do ganmɛ nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ tawun hu lɛ e ɖɔhun o
william ee nyi mɛxo agun tɔn e nɔ si e sin xwe jɛji ɖie e ɖe nɔ ɖe we elɔ lɛ xa nɔvi sunnu agbanɖotananɔ lɛ yi wan nu nɔvi lɛ
e nɔ ɔ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
hlɔma wɛ pɔlu ɖo wema ɔ wlan ɖe wɛ
e wu ɖɔ nɔvi ɖeɖee ɖo finɛ lɛ e ɔ nu yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ mya nukun nu hugan
nɔ zan yeɖee bi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
timɔtee ɖo a
hwenu ali lɛ hun bɔ e blo bɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ yi nukɔn e ɔ nuwiwa tɔn ci ezayii ɖɔ xo elɔ e tɔn ɖɔhun nyɛ yi mi do eza
sixu blo bɔ nu hwiɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ ji gbɔn
jɛ nukɔn ɔ tuun nu ɖo taji lɛ e
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖɔ e mɔ do nu nu nyi nujɔnu hugan lɛ e
fili nwt nu ɖo taji nu mawu lɛ e do ɖo nu ɖo taji nu lɛ e
wegɔ ɔ jo nu ɖo dandan a lɛ e do
jo nu nɔ yi hwenu kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo lɛ e do
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu timɔtee ɖɔ hɔn nu jlo nyanya mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ ɖo lɛ nujlɔjlɔwiwa nuɖiɖi wanyiyi kpodo fifa kpo tim
timɔtee nyi fɔnlinnɔ a
e xa pɔlu syɛnsyɛn bɔ enɛ bɔ kancica wanyiyi tɔn ɖo tɛntin e syɛn
nɔ han ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn mɛ ɖo egbe a
enɛ nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa tawun sixu bɔ mi sɛkpɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ ɖo nu gege hwebinu wa ɖo aklunɔ sin ɔ mɛ enɛ nyi nu gbe nya e kɔ nwt
e nɔ zan nu e lɛ e
pɔlu wlan timɔtee ɖɔ xwedo nu elɔ lɛ telele nukplɔnmɛ gbɛzinzan linlin nuɖiɖi suuluɖiɖo wanyiyi didɛ ɖo nu
tim nwt ðo timɔtee nɔ zan nu e lɛ e wu ɔ e jɛxa bɔ e ɖaxo lɛ kɔ
ɖo ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
enyi ɖo a hun etɛwu mɛ mɔhun ɖe a
tom nyi mɛxo agun tɔn nu xwe gege e flin ɖɔ nu ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛxo agun tɔn mɔ nu e ɖe bɔ e nu ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ mi
hwɛhwɛ wɛ nɔ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e ɖe we xa mi bɔ nɔ zan weɖexamɛ tɔn lɛ
enɛ yawu bɔ sɔnu nu jiɖiɖe
eɖesunɔ nɔ ɖo nu wɛ
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu timɔtee ɖɔ hwiɖee do xɛsi ɖi nu mawu lɔ ji
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu timɔtee ɖɔ ðokan do mawuxo xixa ɖo agun mɛ kpodo mawuxoɖiɖɔ kpo wu ɖokan do nukplɔnmɛ wu
hwiɖesunɔ ɖo kpo ɖo wa ɖo nuwukpikpe towe lɛ wu wɛ
nyi ɖagbe nɔ nɔ tuun gudogudo tɔn e tutoblonunu ɔ lɛ e
ɔ ɖeji do hwiɖee wu din vlafo ɖɔ emi tuun nu gege tlɛ do nu nu a ɔ emi sixu ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ ɖebu o
e nɔ ganjɛ gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn wu
hwenu pɔlu ɖo tamɛ do timɔtee tɔn ji wɛ e ɔ e flin ɖɔ gbigbɔ ɖo mi mɛ ɔ bonu hɛn nukplɔnmɛ titewungbe e do asi nu lɛ tim
bonu timɔtee kpewu cyɔn alɔ tɔn ji ɔ e ɖo ganjɛ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn wu
donald ee nyi mɛxo agun tɔn nu xwe gege e ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ agbanɖotananɔ lɛ ɖo lebe nu kancica ɖo kpo mawu kpo tɛntin e
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wa lɛ e ɖo hlɔnhlɔn mɔ do hlɔnhlɔn ji wɛ
enyi e mɔ nɔvi agbanɖotananɔ lɛ gege ɖi hwɛ ɖɔhun ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ tawun
jason xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e ɖɔ sin hwenu nyi mɛxo agun tɔn e ɔ nu gege bɔ jiɖiɖe jɛji
kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a
timɔtee tɔn xwixwedo do ɖo nu gbe nya e
enɛ ɔ hwi lɔ nyi nyɔna ɖe nu togun mawu tɔn
ðo mi nɔ xwle nu junjɔn biblu ji lɛ e mɛ wutu ɔ mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ e sixu yi ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ɖevo lɛ ji alo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ji e nɔ zun ɖe lɛ e ji
biblo ɖɔ nu do tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn lɛ zinzan wu lɛ e ji hɛn tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ wa
etɛwu mɔhun lɛ ɖo dandan
mɛɖebu sixu wema alo mitɔn ji acɛ nu nɔ ɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ e ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ɖevo ji a
nu ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn ji lɛ e bi ji wɛ acɛ nu nɔ ɔ tɔn ɖe
lɛ kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ zan wema mitɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn yetɔn lɛ ji do flu jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo
enyi mi acɛ nu nɔ ɔ tɔn kpo wuntun mitɔn kpo ɖo nu mitɔn lɛ ji ɔ mi nɔ ɖo nu ji mi do ɖo linu do su ali do nu zinzan nyi do mɔhun e
nu mitɔn lɛ yiyi ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ɖevo ji zɛ jw org wu sixu nyi awovinu ɖe
devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ kɛɖɛ wɛ jehovah nusisɔ nu nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ɔ mɛ
tuto ji tɔn alo tablɛti ji tɔn atɔn gee wɛ mi ɖo wɛ nyi jw jw kpo jw languagekpo
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ tuto enɛ lɛ kun jla o sataan tɔn hɛn bli a
enyi nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn gbɔn ali ɖevo wa ɔ ganjɛwu ɖebu ɖe ɖɔ e kun huzu ada alo hɛn bli o a ðɛh
e dɔn nɔvi mitɔn ɖe lɛ do ɛntɛnɛti ji tɔn lɛ mɛ bɔ enɛ bɔ mɛ lɛ mɔ xo ɖɔ do nyikɔ jehovah tɔn wu
mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖe ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn yeɖesunɔ tɔn alo ɖe ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ji e nɔ zun ɖe lɛ e ji a
ali mɛ lɛ yi jw org ji bɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbakpe
mi jlo ɖɔ mɛ lɛ bi ɖu le yetɔn
enɛ wu ɔ ðɔ nu do zinzan tɔn wu lɛ e gbɔn e ɔ sixu wema mitɔn ɖe do mɛɖe gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji alo fi e gbɔn mɔ wema ɔ ɖo jw org ji e do mɛ ɔ
gbexosin titewungbe asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖo wɛnɖagbe jla wɛ ɖo xa jɛ gblolo sɛkpɔ toxo balykchy tɔn e mɛ
nu mi kpa mawu nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖo mi nɔ mɔ lɛ bi mɛ e kɔ
jehovah ɖɔ emi nyi mawu nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ e ɖe gbɔn
jezu ɖesu ɖɔ emi nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ gbɔn
lɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi yetɔn lɛ gbɔn
wusyɛn tɛ jehovah do lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖo edɛni mɛ tɔn hwenu
tlolo ɖo edɛni mɛ tɔn gudo ɔ e wa nuɖe do hwɛjijɔ kunkan adamu tɔn sɔgudo tɔn lɛ ɖɔ
nukunɖiɖo ɖe nu lɛ
jehovah do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔwee gbɔn
jehovah tɔn nɔwee nɔ ɖo mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu mawu a lɛ e tɛntin bɔ e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ jehovah e
jehovah ɖɔ nu nɔwee ɖɔ emi vɔ nyanya enɛ ɖɔ nu e ɖo wa bonu xwedo tɔn gan e
wusyɛn tɛ e do lanmɛ nu jozuwee
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e do xɛsi ɖe jozuwee ɖɔ e kpla togun mawu tɔn yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji
enɛ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖu ɖo ahwangɔnu hlɔnhlɔnnɔ akɔta lɛ tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo ayi ɔ ji lɛ e ji
jozuwee ɖo hwɛjijɔ gege do ɖi xɛsi
jehovah tuun wɛ bɔ e ɖɔ nu mɔyizi ɖɔ e jiɖiɖe jozuwee
mawu ɖɔ ðɔ xo ɖo ɔ nu jozuwee do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɛ akɔnkpinkpan ɖo e wɛ ɖo togun ɔ nukɔn nɔ wɛ bɔ do asa ɔ bɔ e yi to mɔ ɔ nu bɔ e nyi yetɔn
wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ jiɖe mɛ e tɛ ɖie
wusyɛn tɛ jehovah do lanmɛ nu togun tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ
jehovah do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu vi tɔn gbɔn
e nyi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kpowun wɛ jehovah nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ a loɔ e nɔ ɖɔ xo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn lɛ nu togun tɔn blebu
xogbe tɔn elɔ jehovah do e do gbɔ nu jwifu ɖo kannumɔgbenu ɖo babilɔnu lɛ e e ɖɔ ɖi xɛsi o ɖo ɖo xa
ɖo nukun do gbɛmɛ wɛ o ɖo nyi wɛ nyi mawu towe
eza
klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖo jiɖiɖe ɖokpo ɔ jɛn e nyi nu togun mawu tɔn egbe tɔn xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
xogbe enɛ lɛ hlɔnhlɔn jezu ɖo tɔn ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ mɛ e
lo kunkpla sikagankwɛ lɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ gbɔn
gan ɔ zan xogbe elɔ lɛ do wli nu tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wa nu ɖo ganji ɖagbe wɛ nu
enɛ ɔ wu ɔ wa xa mi
wusyɛn tɛ jezu do lanmɛ nu tɔn lɛ
wusyɛn tɛ e do lanmɛ nu ɖo vo
azɔn gege wɛ flu jezu
jezu a e wa ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ tlɛ ɛ ɖɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi tɔn lɛ jaan
ezekiyasi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ahwangan lɛ kpo togun judaa tɔn kpo gbɔn
cobonu vi jehovah tɔn tlɛ wa ayikungban ji ɖe do e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ gbɔn e wu ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ tuun ɖɔ e ɖo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ
hwenu asiliinu lɛ adan nu ezekiyasi e ɔ e kple ahwangan lɛ kpo togun judaa tɔn kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
xo enɛ judaa xɔsu ezekiyasi ɖɔ ɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun ɔ xa
etɛ wema jɔbu tɔn mi do wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ wu
jɔbu ɖo hudo gbɔdonumɛ tɔn mɛ cobo nuɖe tɔn atɔn nɔ do nu mɛ e do wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ wu
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ enyi emi ɖo tɛn yetɔn mɛ wɛ ɔ emi ɖɔ xo do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu emi ɖo xo ɖɔ nu wɛ bɔ mɔ wɛ ɖe ɔ ɖekpo jɔb
nukɔnmɛ ɔ elihu kpo jehovah ɖesunɔ kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu jɔbu jɔb
etɛwu vi nyɔnu jɛfutee tɔn ɖo hudo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn
jɛxa wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ mɔhun ɖo egbe
vi nyɔnu jɛfutee tɔn nyi mɛ ɖevo ɖo hudo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖo hwexonu e
cobonu jɛfutee yi ahwan xa vi lɛ ɔ e ɖɔ enyi jehovah emi ɖuɖeji ɔ mɛ nukɔntɔn wa kpe emi ɖo ahwan ɔ gudo e ɔ emi ze e jo bɔ e wa nu jehovah ɖo fi ɔ
nu jɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ vi nyɔnu tɔn nyi viɖokponɔ tɔn e wɛ wa kpe e jɛ ɖuɖeji sin awa ɔ xa ɛ
ayi jɛfutee tɔn gbado
e ɖe akpa tɔn vi nyɔnu tɔn ɖo alɔji e do siloo bonu e yi wa ɖo goxɔ ɔ mɛ nu gbɛhwenu tɔn kpo e bi hwɛ
e jo acɛ e ɖo wli alɔ ji vi blo bɔ nyikɔ xwedo ɔ tɔn kpo gu xwedo ɔ tɔn kpo kpo ɖo e do
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo hudo gbɔdonumɛ kpo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ kpo tɔn tawun
biblu tɔn ɔ ɖɔ e ɖo walɔ enɛ ɔ ayi ɖo izlayɛli
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi tɔn lɛ gbɔn
ðo zan jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn e mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ
wema mɛ lɛ tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu agun lɛ tawun ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn lɛ mɛ kpo ɖo mi lɔ hɛn lido wɛ jɛ egbe akpaxwe
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi tɔn lɛ gbɔn akɔnkpinkpan tɔn sin gblamɛ ɖo pantekotu hwenu wa ɖo enɛ ɔ gudo
xo mawu mɛ nu bɔ e wlan nɔvi lɛ e nyi jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖe ɖo xwe lɛ gblamɛ nyi jɛ egbe
mi ɖo hudo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ enɛ tɔn tawun ɖo egbe din mi ɖo akpa jehovah tɔn lɛ sin jijɛnu e
xo mawu mɛ nu jaan bɔ e wlan lɛ e nyi jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖe nu klisanwun lɛ ɖo xwe kanweko lɛ vlamɛ gbɔn
jaan ɖesu nyi sosyɛn ɖe ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
wɛnɖagbe sin akpakpa mɛ tɔn e kpi do jezu tɔn wu e nyi jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖe nu klisanwun lɛ ɖo xwe kanweko wa yi lɛ e vlamɛ nyi jɛ egbe
wɛnɖagbe wema tɔn kɛɖɛ mɛ wɛ xo jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ wanyiyi wɛ nyi wuntun bɔ e tuun ahwanvu emitɔn nugbo lɛ e ɖe xa jaan
nu xɔ akwɛ nugbo ɔ tɔn ɖevo lɛ ɖo wema mɛ jaan tɔn atɔn lɛ mɛ
enyi hwɛhuhu huzu agban ɖo kpinkpɛn mi wɛ bonu mi xa ɖɔ jezu sin hun nɔ mi we sin hwɛ mitɔn lɛ bi mɛ ɔ mitɔn nɔ jɛ do a ce
jaan enyi ayi mitɔn kpo ɖo hwɛ do mi wɛ bonu mi xa ɖɔ mawu hugan ayi mitɔn ɔ ayi mitɔn nɔ bɔ ɖasin nusumɛnukunmɛ tɔn nɔ wa nukun mitɔn lɛ ji a ce
jaan jaan kɛɖɛ wɛ wlan ɖɔ mawu ɔ wanyiyi wɛ e nyi
jaan ðo wema mɛ tɔn wegɔ ɔ kpo atɔngɔ ɔ kpo mɛ ɔ e kpa klisanwun nɔ ɖo zan wɛ ɖo nugbo mɛ lɛ e jaan jaan
wusyɛn tɛ pɔlu do lanmɛ nu klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi lɛ tawun e wɛ nyi pɔlu
e ci ɖɔ e ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn ayi bɔ e lin a e ɔ gege lɛ tɔn nɔ nɔ jeluzalɛmu finɛ wɛ nyi fi ɔ nɔ nɔ e mɛ
klisanwun ɖo judee lɛ e jla wɛn kunkpla klisu e mɛ ɖeɖee e sin sinsɛn jwifu lɛ tɔn wu bɔ ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu ɖokpo wɛ tiin e
xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu filipu gbɔn
xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn ɖɔ emi nyi jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖe nu mɛ ɖeɖee nyi lɛ e kpo klisanwun lɛ bi kpo
hwenu filipu nyi ɖe e ɖo kunnu ɖe do klisu wu wɛ nu samaliinu lɛ e ɔ mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ gudo bi
mɛ we do ɖo mɛ kpo jaan kpo bonu xoɖɛ do enɛ lɛ sin takunmɛ nu mɔ gbigbɔ
ðagbe tɛ wema ɔ e wa nu agun klisanwun tɔn xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ
ee gbigbɔ ali enɛ lɛ bɔ tamɛ do mawuxowema ɔ ji gudo e ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nu enɛ kun ɖo dandan o wlan wema ɖe agun lɛ do enɛ takunmɛ
e ɔ tɔn lɛ do bɔ yi xa wema ɔ nu agun lɛ
ee xa wema ɔ xomɛ hun ɖo xo ɖo wema ɔ mɛ lɛ akɔnkpinkpan mɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ mɔ xosin ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
egbe ɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu xwedo betɛli tɔn sin lɛ mɛ nɔ wa hwebinu tɔn bunɔ ɖe ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn mɛ klisanwun nugbo lɛ ɖe e bi kpo
le wiwa hɛn wa ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn mɛ e ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nɔ hɛn wa e wɛ nyi ɖɔ wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ ɔ nɔ dɔn xomɛhunhun wa
ɔ ɖo ɔ ɔ ɖe alɔnuwema leko wa jehovah alɔnuwema enɛ nyi jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖaxo ɖe nu mɛ gege gbɔn ɔ mɛ
mɛ ɖo tɛn nukunkpikpe nu wu tɔn mɛ lɛ e kɛɖɛ jɛn xwedo jehovah tɔn ɖo wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ linu a
xosin nukanbyɔ enɛ tɔn ɔ mi mɔ ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
etɛwu pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu yeɖee din hu tɔn lɛ bi
ɖo hudo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖo egbe
sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ
etɛwu pɔlu byɔ klisanwun eblee tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖɔ nɔ kanmɛsyɛn yeɖee din hu tɔn lɛ bi
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nu mi kpe nukun do miɖee wu wanyiyi sin do lanmɛ nu miɖee ɖo wanyiyi nɔ ɖagbewiwa sin do lanmɛ nu miɖee wa ɖagbe
loɔ mi nɔ kanmɛsyɛn miɖee ɖo aklunɔ sin azan ɔ ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ mɔ gbɔn wɛ ɖe din e
azan jehovah tɔn enɛ wa ɖo xwe tɔn hwenu hlɔmanu lɛ ɖo hwɛ jehovah ɖɔ e nu jeluzalɛmu e
etɛwu wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu miɖee ɔ e nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi ɖo egbe
akpagbanumɛ tɔn enɛ sɔgbe xa hwe mitɔn
enɛ wu ɔ nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ tɔn ɔ e nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi bonu mi mɔ tɛn do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu hweɖebunu hudo tɔn tiin e
etɛ pɔlu ɖɔ do wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ wu
mi bi wɛ nɔ ɖo hudo xo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi e tɔn sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu
pɔlu ɖɔ mɛ e tlɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e ɔ e nɔ wa byɔ ɖɔ e hɛn e lɔ lido
gbexosin lɛ ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
mɛ gege ɖaxo ɖe lɛ cobo mɔ tɛn do ɖo gbexosin wa wɛ
mɛ enɛ lɛ bi wɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ mɔ tɛn do zan hwenu gege ɖo ɔ mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
mɛ ɖeɖee e ɖo dandan ɖɔ jo hwebinu tɔn ɔ do ɖo hwɛjijɔ vovo ɖe lɛ wu bɔ e kpo ɖo ayixa yetɔn mɛ lɛ e ɔ enyi e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɔ e su nukun yetɔn mɛ
klisanwun ɖeɖee ɖo yadonumɛ alo azɔn dɛ ɖe wɛ lɛ e ɖo hudo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn
ezayii gbɔn e ɔ etɛ nyi mɛxo lɛ tɔn
gbɔn vo nu xoɖiɖɔ do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɔ mɛxo lɛ sixu hɛn mɛ ɖevo lɛ lido gbɔn
pɔlu ze ɖe bɔ e ɖo xwedo
e wlan klisanwun doya wɛ e ɖe ɖo tɛsaloniki lɛ e ɖɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ mitɔn jo do mitɔn mɛ ɖo wan mi nyi nu e wu e nyi wɛnɖagbe mawu tɔn ɔ kɛɖɛ wɛ mi jla a ɖo nu mi tɛ
e nyi wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu nɔvi lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ pɔlu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ a loɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ zan e ɖesunɔ do do alɔ
mɛxo lɛ sixu ɖe we xa mɛ ɖo ali do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ e gbɔn
jezu ɖesunɔ ze e wa gbɔn e tɔn nukunɖeji ɖe ɖo ku kpo sin ku tɔn kpo gudo
e ɖo we syɛnsyɛn ɖe lɛ ɖe xa agun ɖe lɛ ɖo azii kpɛvi ɔ ɖo ayi e wa gbɔn e wu
e ɖɔ nu agun lawodisee tɔn ɖɔ mɛ yi wan lɛ ɔ nɔ nu nu bi nɔ nu bi
lɛ emi nɔ vi mitɔn lɛ bonu nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ a
mi bi sixu ɖo miɖee hinhɛn lido mɛ gbɔn
wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu mɛ nyi mɛxo lɛ kɛɖɛ sin a
pɔlu byɔ klisanwun lɛ bi ɖɔ nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖagbe do alɔ mɛ nugbomɛ hwenu e xo wa ɖagbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e e
efɛ mi bi ɖo ɖo aceji ɖo ayi hudo mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo e wu
pɔlu ɖe we xa klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ alɔ mitɔn kuyɛ lɛ hlɔnhlɔn koli mitɔn ɖo wɛ lɛ e
e marthe hwenu e jɛ nu taan ɖe e gbɔn
marthe ee nyi nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe jɛ nu taan ɖe e wlan ɖɔ gbe ɖokpo ɔ ɖo ɖɛ xo do byɔ wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ wɛ wa xo go nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ ɖe ɖe wanyiyi kpo kpo mi nu sin hudo ɖo tawun ɖo hwe ɔ e nɛ
vlafo nɔvi nyɔnu mɛxomɔ ɔ tuun ɖagbe xo tɔn lɛ wa nu marthe e a
ali ɖagbe tɛ lɛ mi sixu zan weɖexamɛ ɖo filipunu lɛ mɛ e ɖe
pɔlu ɖe we elɔ xa mɛ ɖo agun filipu tɔn mɛ lɛ e bi enɛ wu ɔ enyi wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖebu ɖe ɖo klisu mɛ hun enyi gbɔdonumɛ wanyiyi tɔn ɖebu ɖe hun enyi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖebu ɖe hun enyi wanyiyi e kpo kpo ɖebu ɖe hun blo bonu awajijɛ tunfla gbɔn linlin ɖokpo ɔ kpo wanyiyi ɖokpo ɔ kpo ɖiɖo gblamɛ nɔ nɔ bu bi nɔ ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ
nudindɔn kpo cejɛnnabi kpo do wa nu ɖebu o loɔ nɔ miɖee hwe nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ hugan emi nɔ nu nyi ɖagbe mitɔn lɛ e kɛɖɛ o loɔ nɔ nu nyi ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ lɔ tɔn e fili nwt
ðɔ jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖe lɛ
enyi mi se ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee mi wa yi lɛ e ɖo gbeji ɔ e sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi e nyi gbɔn nu jaan e ɖɔhun e ɖɔ se ɖɔ vi lɛ ɖo zan wɛ ɖo nugbo mɛ ɔ nuɖe nɔ hun xomɛ nu mi hu a
awajijɛ ɖeɖee gbexosin awakanmɛ gbɔjɔ e ɖe mɔ lɛ e yayanɔ flinflin sixu do gbɔ
ðɔ ali mi sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖo wa wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo lɛ e ɖokpo
lɛdo tɔn gege ɖɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu sɔ hwenu mɛɖe wema nusumɛnukunmɛ tɔn klewun ɖe do kpo asi yetɔn kpo sin agun e ɖe mɛ e e
ðɔ nu e nɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ si cobɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ e
enyi mi vɛdo ɖɔ mi kun sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ o ɖo mi kun xo ɖɔ ɖe o wu hun nuwanyido wɛ e nyi
e byɔ nu gege cobɔ e nyi jɔtɛn gbɔdonumɛ tɔn a bɔya nukiko ɖe hwenu ɖo gbe do mɛɖe wɛ e kpe xoxo
nɔvi sunnu winnyawinnya ɖe mɔ alɔdo hwenu e flu tawun e gbɔn
henri mɔ ɖɔ ali ɖokpo emi xwedo emitɔn bɔ e lɛkɔ wa nugbo ɔ mɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ emi kpo ɖo gbeji nɔ wɛ
e mɔ gbɔdonumɛ ɖaxo ɖe hwenu e xa ðɛhan sofonii kpo kpo e
mi bi sixu hɛn miɖee lido do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ wu axɔsu ɖo ayi
etɛ pɔlu mɛ
marthe kpo henri kpo tɔn ɖɔ mi sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi ɖo hudo gbɔdonumɛ tɔn e ɖe
axɔsu wlan ɖɔ e ɖɔ xo nu e jɛ ɔ e nɔ tawun
atɔxwɛ alo nu ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn ji lɛ e xixa sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ wu ku lɛ e
pɔlu ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ jiji ɖo sixu nyi jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn ɖe
e wlan ɖɔ nɔ ɖɛhan lɛ do nu miɖee nɔ do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee
nɔ ze kudonumɛ sin ayixa do jihan tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ lɛ nu mawu
wusyɛn dido lanmɛ nu miɖee ɖo nu taji nyi wɛ din mi mɔ azan jehovah tɔn ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e
towe do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah enɛ ɔ nu wa wɛ ɖe lɛ jɛnu nux
nunywɛxo zinzan sixu hɛn le wa nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ gbɔn
nu tɛ lɛ gbe mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu nya
etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bɔ ayi yetɔn a
tɛ nɔ kpannukɔn mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bi do nuɖe wu
fɔtoo ɖo e klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ sixu ɖi xwi xa mɔhun gbɔn
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo tito blo wɛ yi to linlin ɖe mɛ ɖo nuwiwa taji ɖe wu
cobonu yi ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ blo taan gege ɖo mɛ
ðo ɔ lɛ ɖo gege bɔ gege ɖo finɛ bɔ hu
e tawun ɖɔ tuun nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe e mɛ ganji enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ xwe fi xwe e
xwe fi ɖebu kpowun e ɖe mɛ byɔbyɔ ɖɔ wli ali nyanya ɖe
mɛ winnyawinnya egbe tɔn lɛ sixu ci enɛ lɛ ɖɔhun
tomɛyiyi gaga ɖe ɖo enyi wɛ do a loɔ gbɛzinzan yetɔn wɛ nyi xo ɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ sixu hu ɖo ali ɖo nuvo nu alo gbeta kɔn wa lɛ e wu
fitɛ ɖo tunta
xota elɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖɔ gbɛzan yetɔn junjɔn jlo ɖo hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun e ji
e byɔ ɖɔ do gan nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee ayi yetɔn ɖo jehovah sinsɛn ji lɛ e sixu ɖeji ɖɔ e kɔn nyɔna tɔn do ji blo bɔ nu wa wɛ ɖe ɖo gbɛmɛ lɛ e jɛnu xa nunywɛxo
nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya sin vu nɔ tawun
etɛwu
mi gbeje hwɛjijɔ atɔn
we nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya nɔ bɔ kancica e ɖo xa jehovah e nɔ syɛn atɔngɔ ɔ le nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya sin vu nɔ hɛn wa e
hwɛjijɔ nukɔntɔn tɛ wu e ɖo nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe
hwɛjijɔ nukɔntɔn wu mi nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi jehovah ɖɔ wanyiyi tɔn kpo nu e wa nu mi lɛ e kpo su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
nɔ jihan kpo awajijɛ kpo do kpa nu alɔ towe do blo lɛ e
towe nuɖiɖi towe biblu agun ɔ kpo nukunɖiɖo jiwu ɖo nu sɔgudo e kpo
mawu ɖɔ nyɔna enɛ lɛ su nukun towe mɛ gbɔn e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ mya nukun nu enɛ bɔ sɛkpɔ ɛ
ðagbe tɛ nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya nɔ wa nu kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e
etɛ lɛ gbe mi sixu nya hwenu mi kpo ɖo vu e
pɔlu ɖɔ mawu nɔ dohwɛ agɔ a e wɔn wa e a wanyiyi ɛ ɔ e wɔn a ebl
kpo ɖo vu din gɔn nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nya a
xwe wo wɛ christine ɖo hwenu e blo tuto nɔ xa lɛ sin gbɛzan tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ e
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ biblu ɔ blebu xixa jɛ nukɔn nu baptɛm tɔn wɛ nyi nu gbe e jɛ nyinya ji e
ɖo xwe blo baptɛm bɔ nɔvi nyɔnu tɔn noemi ɖo xwe blo
mɛ we lɛ jɛ gan do ji kpe betɛli tɔn gbe nya wɛ ɖe e wu
etɛwu nu ɖo taji nu bɔ nya gbe yetɔn lɛ e sin jɛ gan do ji kpe wu a xa filipunu lɛ nwt
nuɖe gbe nyinya sixu bɔ gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa bɔwu nu mɛ gbɔn
etɛwu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi kun yi kplɔnyiji alavɔ o
hwɛjijɔ atɔngɔ wu mi ɖo nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe sin hwenu mi ɖo vu e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ca kan xa gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa e
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo wa gbeta lɛ kɔn do wemaxɔmɛ yiyi kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo wu
gbeta lɛ kɔn wiwa ci ali ɖagbe ɖe hwenu e wa alikplehɔnkantɛn ɖe e ɖɔhun
enyi tuun fi xwe e ɔ ali ɖagbe ɔ vɛwu nu a
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ enyi tuun nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe lɛ e ɔ gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn wiwa bɔwu
nunywɛxo ɖɔ mɛ nɔ ku hun nɔ to nu wa gbe e ja ɔ nɔ mɔ nu gege
nu yawu blo tuto nya nu ɖagbe lɛ gbe ɔ yawu kpe nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe e wu
damaris fo wemaxɔmɛ linsinmɛ tɔn nɔ nukɔn nu mɛ lɛ bi
e hɛn ɔ e yi gbe nu ajɔ e do e bɔ e yi ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔxwe ɖe e e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi hwenu klewun tɔn ɖe
sin hwenu ɖo vu e wɛ gbexosin wiwa ɖo ayi mɛ nu mi
nu ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔ wɛ ɔ sixu ɖu akwɛ gege e vɛwu tawun ɖɔ ma mɔ sixu wa nu taan klewun ɖe e
damaris ɖo gbexosin wa wɛ din sin xwe ɖie
e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi nya nu ɖagbe sin gbe wa gbeta sɔgbe e kɔn hwenu emi ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e a
e ɖɔ fi nɔ ɖe e ɔ azɔn gege wɛ nɔ wa nu ɖo xa lɛ
nu wɛ ɔ nɔ wa e ɖɔhun wɛ ɖo wiwa wɛ din
mɛ gege tiin ɖo awajijɛ ɖebu ɖo yetɔn kɔn a
gbeta kɔn wa wa gbexosin e mi bɔ nyi alɔ nu gbɛzan mɛtɔn bi zize jo nu nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e lobɔ e hun ali nu mi bɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ nu xwe mɔkpan
etɛwu e jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa mɛ winnyawinnya mitɔn lɛ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
e jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa mɛ winnyawinnya mɔkpan ɖo agun lɛ mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
yeɖee jo nu jehovah ayi yetɔn bi do nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya ji ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn bi mɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya enɛ lɛ nɔ ɖu vivi gbɛzan awajijɛnɔ ɖe tɔn bi bɔ ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ nɔ nɔ xwedo jehovah tɔn ɖo nuwiwa yetɔn lɛ bi mɛ
wemaxɔmɛ yiyi kpo gbɛzan xwedo tɔn kpo ɖo nuwiwa enɛ lɛ mɛ
wlan ɖɔ ðeji do jehovah wu kpo ayixa towe bi kpo
jlo tɔn ɖo nu nɔ wa lɛ bi mɛ enɛ ɔ e ali
etɛwu ɔ ɖo nyi nu nukɔn nukɔntɔn gbe mi nya e
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ mitɔn hugan
mɛ winnyawinnya gbɛzinzan tɔn jinjɔn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hinhɛn hun ji e nɔ ayi ɖo ɔ ji hugan
jezu klisu ji ɖɔ e ɖo jla wɛnɖagbe mawu tɔn ɔ akɔta lɛ bi
sixu alɔɖiɖo hwɛhwɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ do ɖo nu gbe nya e a
sixu nyi gbexosin a
enyi ɔ nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu a ɔ lo
sixu blo gbɔn bɔ kunnuɖiɖe towe hugan
nu taji we sɔnu ganji gɔn nu tuun e ma xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ o
sixu sɔnu ɖekunnu gbɔn
etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu blo sɔnu ba ɖekunnu
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe zan ali hun e ɖekunnu ɖo wemaxɔmɛ gbɔn
do ɔ sixu xosin nu nu towe lɛ nɔ kanbyɔ kpaa e ɖe
ði ɔ nukanbyɔ ɖokpo ɖie etɛwu kpo ɖo alɔji
xota nu e gbidi kɔ nu mi ba ðoxo xa mi ɔ tɛ wa
ee ɖo alɔnuwema nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ kanbyɔ e sin xosin mɛ e ali bɔ sɔnu nu xosin hwiɖesunɔ tɔn xa kolosinu lɛ
enyi ali tɔn hun nu hun do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu towe lɛ bonu yi jw org ji yeɖesunɔ
nu luca blo e nɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e xo nu e byɔ gbe tɔn jla numasɔgbe enɛ lɛ ɖo bɔ ɔ yi gbe
luca tinmɛ nuɖiɖi tɔn kɛɖɛ kpowun a loɔ e tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn klasi ɔ bi
e vivi nu luca tawun ɖɔ e kpewu ɖekunnu
etɛwu mi ɖo jo gbe hwenu lɛ wa e a
enyi yiyi tlɛ wa vɛwu hweɖelɛnu ɖo ali ɔ ji hun awakanmɛ ku o
enyi tlɛ wa mɔ lɛ hun jo nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe lɛ e do o
xwe wɛ katharina ɖo hwenu e kunnuɖiɖe nu tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo do ɖo nu gbe e nya e
mɛ ɖokpo ɖo mɛ zun azɔn gege enɛ do xɛsi a
walɔ ɖagbe e zan hwenu e tlɛ ɖo enɛ lɛ mɔ wɛ e wa ɖagbe nu tɔn ɖevo nɔ nyi hans e tawun
nu mɛ e kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e xa wema mitɔn lɛ biblu blo baptɛm
katharina tɛn hwenɛnu nɛ e tuun nu enɛ lɛ jɛ e ɖe a
gbe katharina jo ɖo kunnuɖiɖe nu tɔn lɛ kɔn a e tawun
enyi e ɖo kɔ gbidi nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ wɛ ɔ etɛ ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu ahwan xa kɔgbidinumɛ lɛ tɔn gbɔn
jɛ din ɔ xota elɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn gbɛzan towe bi junjɔn jlo ɖo jehovah e ji
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖevo ɖeɖee ɖo xwe towe lɛ e ɔ gbɛɖuɖu sixu nyi nu nɔ mya nukun nu ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ e sixu jlo ɖɔ nu emi
e lin oo e ya oo ɖo ɖɔ emi kanɖeji tawun do gbeta kɔn emi wa lɛ e wu
nu kɔgbidinumɛ towe lɛ tɔn ayi towe o
sixu ɖu ɖo kɔgbidinumɛ ji ɖo ali gege
nu ɖevo e wɛ nyi ɖɔ yi gbe ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo weɖexamɛ tɔn
mɛɖesɔhwe bɔ yi gbe nu we towe lɛ kpo mɛ zin ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo ɖe xa e xa
kpi ɖɔ mɛɖesɔhwe nɔ hɛn le wa e ɖe
mɛɖesɔhwe christoph bɔ e yi gbe nu we ɖagbe e ɖe xa ɛ e
ee e blo baptɛm gudo nɔ zaan e ɔ e nɔ yi fi e nɔ lanmɛ ɖe e jɛ lanmɛ ji ɖo finɛ hwɛhwɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖevo ɖeɖee ɖo finɛ lɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɖɔ e nu emi ɖo lɔnyiji fɔnkan emitɔn mɛ
christoph ɖɔ xo do xo ɔ ji xa mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe bɔ mɛxo ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e tamɛ do awovinu e sixu ji lɛ e ji ɖi linlin agbahwlɛnhwlɛn tɔn sixu wa nu do wutu tɔn lɛ e cobo wa gbeta ɖe kɔn
e ɖɔ nu christoph co e byɔ ɔ mɛ
e wa jɛ hweɖenu bɔ e mɔ ɖɔ dakaxixo lɔnyiji fɔnkan ɔ mɛ tlɛ nyi awovinu tawun
e wa ɖɔ xo nu mɛxo agun tɔn gege bɔ bi ɖe we junjɔn biblu ji e xa ɛ
jehovah ɖagbe lɛ do mi bɔ ɖoto e nugbo wɛ ɖɔ yawu wa a wa wa
hwiɖee hwe yi gbe nu weɖexamɛ a
etɛ jehovah nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖo egbe
nublanɔwu tɛ wu mɛ nyi mɛxo e ɖe lɛ nɔ wa
mɛ winnyawinnya din kpo ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ ɔ
jehovah ɖɔ hwi mɛ nyi mɛ winnyawinnya e ɔ awajijɛ ayi towe mɛ
xota elɔ ali nu sixu nyi ɖe e ɖokpo ji
ayi towe ɖo nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya ji jehovah do tito towe lɛ bi mɛ
nu yawu jɛ blo ji ɔ yawu mɔ jehovah tɔn alɔcyɔnmɛji tɔn kpo nyɔna tɔn kpo
mɛɖe nɔ nɔ winnyawinnya mɛ sɔyi a
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ yawu su nɔ huzu mɛxo
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee nɔ ayi yetɔn ɖo nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya ji egbe lɛ e nyi mɛxo bi ɔ gbeta kɔn wa lɛ e hun xomɛ nu tawun
nu nyi gbɔn nu mirjana ee nyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe ɖo nuwukpikpe tawun ɖo lɔnyiji fɔnkan sin ali e nɛ
e byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e ɖo agbahwlɛnhwlɛn yihun e nɔ ðo avivɔ hwenu lɛ e mɛ e byɔ hwebinu tɔn mɛ
ðo xwe gudo ɔ mirjana kpo ɖo hwebinu tɔn wa wɛ ɖo kpo asu tɔn kpo
e tinmɛ ɖɔ hlɔnhlɔn kpo dɔkun kpo nɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi a nu ɖe a
mawu kpo gandido lɛ ɖo ali klewun klewun ɖe lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kpo nyi nu gbe e nya bɔ ɖo tawun nɔ ayi sɔyi e
enyi e ayi ɖo nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya ji ɔ e nɔ mɔ le ɖe lɛ sin xwe nu
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ wa gbɔn nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya kpo ɔ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ kpo gblamɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu kudeji ɖɔ syɛnsyɛn wa wɛ emi ɖe e kun nyi do o
nɔvi sunnu yetɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖo gudo yetɔn kpo wanyiyi kpo bɔ nu yetɔn do alɔ mɛ nu jehovah ɔ nu wa wɛ ɖe lɛ e jɛnu
xogbe ebleegbe tɔn e zan e bɔ e sixu lilɛ ɖo alɔkpa we enɛ lɛ ɖebu ji
enɛ wu ɔ nu elɔ lɛ bɔ e ji wɛ e do do jlaɖo gbɔn
nuvɔjlaɖo enɛ ɔ xokwintinmɛwegbo lɛ kpo e nɔ to xokwin lɛ gbɔn e kpo nɔ gudo
tinmɛ e nu xokwin nukɔntɔn ɖo wemafɔ ɔ mɛ nyi xokwin ebleegbe tɔn asher e wɛ bɔ e tuun kancica ɖo ðɛhan kpo wemafɔ ɖeɖee jɛ nukɔn nu lɛ e kpo tɛntin e
e sixu lilɛ xokwin asher ɔ gbɔn alɔkpa gege mɛ
ði ɔ e sixu mɔ nu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ e nyi xogbe nɔ do gesi nyikɔ alo xokwin e zan wa yi e ɖe e ɖi nu mɛ
mɛ wɛ nyi e mɔ nu jɛ mɛ gbɔn ɖo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ xoxo ɔ mɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ nu ɖagbe ɖeɖee xo e ɖɔ ɖo wemafɔ jɛ mɛ e ɔ mɛdida ɖeɖee xo e ɖɔ ɖo wemafɔ jɛ nukɔn e mɛ lɛ e wɛ e zan
asher ɔ sixu nyi nu mɛ e kɔ do e alo nu e ji e bɔ e sixu lilɛ gbɔn le mɛ ɔ alo enɛ ɔ
enɛ ɔ wɛ nyi e lilɛ gbɔn ɖo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ tɔn kpo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn ɖevo lɛ kpo mɛ e
e jlaɖo gbɔn e sɔgbe xa wemafɔ ɖɛhan ɔ tɔn kpo lɛ e
enɛ ɔ ee e zan ɖo wemafɔ ɔ mɛ e bɔ e mɔ nu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ nyɔna xo e ɖɔ ɖo wemafɔ jɛ mɛ lɛ e ɔ hwɛjijɔnɔ ɖeɖee byɔ ɖɔ e hwlɛn emi gan yi emi sin mɛdida lɔ mɛ e wɛ kan wemafɔ
nu enɛ e jlaɖo e ɖo wemafɔ ɔ mɛ xokwin awajijɛnɔ e zan azɔn we ɖo wemafɔ enɛ mɛ din e bi ali ɖokpo ɔ sɔgbe
hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ ebleegbe dodo ɔ kun ɖo wuntun nuxixa tɔn lɛ ɖe o ɖi ɔ e ɖo gbohwlaxwi fɛnnɔ a
enɛ wu ɔ lɛ wɛ ɖo e nɔ wlan xo lomilomi ɖo ebleegbe mɛ gbɔn e xo do xo ɔ e kpo wemafɔ biblu tɔn ca kan xa xo ɔ e kpo do tuun tinmɛ sɔgbe e
e jlaɖo gbɔn e sɔgbe xa wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖevo ɖeɖee ɖɔ xo do akpa mawu do ɖɔ emi kɔn nyɔna do togun emitɔn ɔ ji e
ðo e xokwin asher ɔ jlaɖo din wutu ɔ ɖɛhan elɔ ɖe nukunɖiɖo nujɔnu tɔn davidi ɖo e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu mawu hwlɛn akɔta izlayɛli tɔn sin tɔn lɛ lɔ mɛ gudo ɔ e kɔn awajijɛ kpo nukɔnyiyi kpo sin nyɔna do ji
ði ɔ ɖɔ jehovah xoɖɛ do vi ji lɛ jinukun lɛ mitɔn lɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo nyibu mitɔn lɛ kpo ji bɔ
nugbo ɔ hwenu davidi vi ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ e ɔ akɔta ɔ ɖu vivi fifa kpo nukɔnyiyi e mɔ a e kpo tɔn
do su ɔ nu e jlaɖo ɖo ðɛhan ɔ mɛ e huzu nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn sin nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo lɛ e a
gbɛzan tɔn nu lɛ wuɖewuɖe bɔ vivɔnu tɔn wa tawun
fifa sixu mɔ gbɔn
jehovah yi wan nu mɛ ðeɖee linsyɛnsyɛn yetɔn nɔ bɔ nɔ lɛ e
nu wu mi nɔ gege e
xota nukɔntɔn xota we elɔ lɛ tɔn ɖɔ xo do nujlɛdonuwu jezu do viwuntin kpo ɔ kpo wu e ji tinmɛ nu mi do mitɔn wu e
xota wegɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do hwɛjijɔ junjɔn biblu ji nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ wa mitɔn kpo linsyɛnsyɛn kpo e gege ji
tuun towe
mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ emi gbi dɔn ðo awovi nukɔn
sataan wɛ nyi mitɔn
ba tɛ mɛ e nɔ wa nu do mi wu yi jɛ
dogbo tɛ lɛ hlɔnhlɔn tɔn ɖo
mi bi jɛ klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ ji sixu ɖi xwi xa ɛ gbɔn
xota we elɔ lɛ sinkɔn nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ tɔn mi bɔ mi hlɔnhlɔn gbeta kɔn mi wa gbi dɔn ɖo awovi nukɔn e
nukun yiya wɔbuwɔbu ðe
mɛ tɔn wɛ e samuel
e ji mi ɖo atinxɔ ɖe mɛ ɖo toxo kpɛvi e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ indiana ɖo etats unis e mɛ
ee e ji nyɛ gudo e ɔ nɔ wa ji nɔvi sunnu kpɛvi we lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpɛvi ɔ kpo
atinxɔ mɛ e ji mi ɖe e
hwenu ɖo yi wɛ e ɔ nu ɖe huzu a
nyi ɖokpo ɖo vi tɛnwe mɛ lɛ ji e mɛ nu gege do glelilɛ wu hwenu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e
gle kpɛvi kpɛvi lɛ do toxo tɔn bɔ agbade wɛ mɛ lɛ nɔ do hugan
hwenu e ji mi e ɔ ɖo wa nu glesi xa ɔ mɛ tɔn lɛ ɖokpo wɛ
ee ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ e nɔ kun glelɛmɔ ɖe gbɔn e bɔ glelilɛ sin wlɛnwin taji ɖevo lɛ ma mi
mɔ sin winnyawinnya mɛ a
xwe wɛ e ɖo hwenu e ji mi e bɔ nɔ ɖo xwe
nu ɖo co nyi mɛ cewuncewun ɖo agbaza mɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn yi wan nu mi mɛ vi tɔn lɛ bi ɖɔ xɔ akwɛ tawun
e ɖo akwɛ gege gbeɖe a e bɔ mi ɖo xɔ ɖo nɔ mɔ awu do nɔ mɔ nuɖuɖu e ɖo finɛ nu mi hwebinu
xwe wɛ e ɖo ku
bɔ nɔ ɖo xwe ku
mɛ ɖebu jehovah a
ðo nɔvi lɛ mɛ ɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖokpo wa mɛxo agun tɔn sin sin hwenu e tuto enɛ ɖo jɛ tɔn e
e nɔ kpla mi yi sinsɛn baptiste tɔn ɖo aklunɔzangbe lɛ bi
xwe wɛ ɖo se atɔnɖobu sin xo azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ
e kpaca mi bɔ kanbyɔ nɔ ɖɔ jezu sixu nyi vi ɔ nyi ɔ ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ gbɔn
flin xosin tɔn vi nubudo wɛ
mi sixu mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ a
nubudo wɛ e nyi nu mi nugbo
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ blo baptɛm ɖo tɔsisa xa ɔ mɛ tɔn ɖe mɛ e mi do ɔ mɛ azɔn atɔn nyi wuntun atɔnɖobu tɔn
hwenu ɖo xwe jɛ nukɔn nu ahwan mɛ byɔbyɔ e
hwenu ɖo wemaxɔmɛ linsinmɛ tɔn e ɔ ɖokpo nɔ nyi akpotokwin do mɔ akwɛ huzu linlin nu mi ɖɔ nyi lɔ
enɛ wu ɔ jɛ kpinkplɔn ji nyikɔ nɔ akpotokwin nyinyi tɔn nɔ nyi gloves e mɛ
e ma mi a bɔ ee nɔ mɛ nu taan kpɛɖe gudo e ɔ jo do
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e yi mi do ahwankpa etats unis tɔn mɛ wa mi do allemagne
hwenu ɖo finɛ e ɔ gan lɛ mi do fi e nɔ ganbɔdoganwu lɛ ɖe e ɖo ɖɔ ɖo nuwukpikpe jɔwamɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ nɔ mɛ
jlo ɖɔ ma do ɖo
e jlo mi ɖebu ɖɔ ma nɔ mɛ a enɛ wu ɔ ee fo xwe we ɖo e ɔ kpodo kpo ɔ ɖe mi sin ɔ mɛ ɖo
e lin a bɔ byɔ ahwankpa gbɔn vo tawun e ɖe mɛ
blo xwe we ɖo ahwankpa etats unis tɔn mɛ
jɛ finɛ ɖo gbɛzan mɛ ɔ nyi asuka ɖo ba ɖe mɛ
sunnu ɖe ɖo ci bɔ e nɔ mɔ ɖo fimu lɛ alo xa mɛtɔn mɛ e wa nu do wu ye tawun
linlin wɛ nyi ɖɔ lɛ kun nyi sunnu ganji o
jɛ nuɖe lɛ ji bɔ e wa huzu gbɛzan
gbe ɖokpo ɔ ɖo vɔvɔ ɖo e kun wɛ gbɔn toxo ɔ mɛ bɔ nyɔnu we alɔ nu mi
tuun nya mɛxo ɔ e sin nɔvi nyɔnu kpɛvi lɛ wɛ
jehovah tɔn wɛ nyi
yi atɔxwɛ kpo reveillez vous
kpo ɖo asi yetɔn nɔ mɔ ɖo kpaa mɛ ɖɔ atɔxwɛ lɛ din ɖo nukun mɛ
ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nu
tɔn nu mi a
wɛ ɖyɔvi lɛ nu kanbyɔ mi
ɖɔ tɔn
akpa enɛ do e nu mi kpɛɖe mɔ ɖɔ kun sixu gɔn o
enɛ wu ɔ zan enɛ mɛ ɔ yi
nuwiwa yɔkpɔvu lɛ tɔn jiwu nu mi tawun
sixu ɖi a tuun nu gege do biblu wu
yi amisa ɖo aklunɔzangbe enɛ lɛ bi xa nɔ co nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpɛɖe jɛn ɖo do biblu wu
din ɔ kanɖeji nu
xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie ɔ kan nu byɔ nɔ do jehovah tɔn lɛ wu bɔ e ɖɔ nu mi kpowun ɖɔ nɔ nya mɛxomɔ e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ jehovah e
din ɔ mɔ ɖɔ nukun lɛ ɖo hunhun wɛ
yawu yi nukɔn ɖo tuun ɖɔ mɔ nugbo ɔ
ee yi kple nukɔn nukɔntɔn enɛ blo tɛnnɛ gudo e ɔ blo baptɛm ɖo mars
enyi tamɛ do linlin xoxo nɔ ɖo do nu sunnu nyinyi nyi e wu ɔ e nɔ vivi nu mi ɖɔ nu sunnu jɔ sunnu nyi bɔ biblu ɖɔ e ɔ
e xo hun a e wa ɔ e bɔ e tafu e ɖɔ gbɔn e
gbexosin ɖo xwe bɔ e mɛ ɖo
e lin a bɔ ɖo nu taan ɖe
wa gbeta ɔ kɔn gloria e nyi ɖokpo ɖo ɖyɔvi ɖeɖee ylɔ mi wa oplon agunwe ɔ tɛnmɛ e mɛ
gbeta enɛ kɔn wa e nu mi gbeɖe a
xɔ akwɛ ɖe wɛ gloria nyi hwenu ɛ e nyi xɔ akwɛ ɖe egbe
nu nyɛ ɔ e xɔ akwɛ hu diamaa ee xɔ akwɛ hu bi e bɔ e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ ɛ
nyi ɖokpo ɖo vi mɛ lɛ ji e mɛ
e ku hwenu ɖo xwe e
hwenɛnu wɛ jɛ nu ji ðo nɔ ku wutu ɔ blo tuto ɖe xa gan wemaxɔmɛ ɔ tɔn
ɖo xɔ gudo tɔn ɔ mɛ ɖo wemaxɔmɛ linsinmɛ tɔn hwenɛnu bɔ kanbyɔ gan ɔ ɖɔ e kpo nyi kpo sixu nɔ wa wemaxɔmɛ ɖo azan vovo ji a ji
wiwa bɔ ɖokpo ɖo mi mɛ ɖo xwegbe kpe nukun do nɔvi mitɔn kpɛvi lɛ wu bɔ nuɖuɖu gbada tɔn sɔgbe cobɔ mitɔn gosin wa
gan wemaxɔmɛ ɔ tɔn yi gbe bɔ mi xwedo tuto enɛ jɛ hwenu yi kunnuɖewema tɔn e
xwedo lɛ tɔn we nɔ biblu xa mi bɔ mi mɛ ɖo vi lɛ mɛ huzu jehovah tɔn
winnya nɔ hu mi co nɔ ɖu vivi kunnuɖegbe yiyi tɔn
gloria kpo nyi kpo wli alɔ ɖo fevrier
ðo juillet tɔn mɛ ɖo xwe enɛ mɛ ɔ mi wema mɛ wa ɖo betɛli ɖo mi jlo tawun wa ɖo hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn wutu
nɔvi sunnu simon kraker kan xo byɔ mi
e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ betɛli kun ɖo asu kpo asi kpo lɛ yi wɛ o
jlo mi ɖo wa ɖo betɛli e bu do mi gbeɖe a e lin cobɔ nu wa nyi
mi wlan wema hɔnkan ɔ tɔn mitɔn byɔ ɖɔ e mi do fi hudo ɖe e
fi ɖokpo gee sin ali jɛn hun nu mi e wɛ nyi ɖo arkansas
ðo hwe enɛ lɛ ɔ agun we wɛ ɖo ɖokpo nyi yovo lɛ tɔn bɔ ɖokpo nyi mɛwi lɛ tɔn
e mi do mɛwi lɛ sin agun mɛ gee ɖe e
sixu kan nu wu mɛ ɖiɖe ɖo vo ɖo agun jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn mɛ e byɔ
xosin ɔ kpowun wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖewagbɛn ɖe ɖo hwenɛnu a
ɖe lɛ ɖo ayi nɔ sinmɛ agbaza tɔn vovo kple ɖo do mɔ ɔ dakaxixo sin adan nu mɛ tawun
ðo fi gege ɔ nɔvi lɛ sin hwɛ jɔ bɔ ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ enyi sinmɛ agbaza tɔn vovo kple ɖo mawu ɔ e hɛn kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn yetɔn gble
enyi mɛwi ɖe ɖo wɛn jla wɛ sin hɔn ɖe kɔn jɛ hɔn ɖe kɔn ɖo yovo lɛ sin xa mɛ ɔ wli sixu xo e
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi kpo ɖo wɛn ɔ jla wɛ ɔ mi nɔ setonu nu lɛ nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ nu lɛ wa huzu do ɖagbe ji
mi nɔ mɔ ɖe lɛ ɖo mitɔn mɛ
enyi mi ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi e ɖe nu mɛwi lɛ e ɔ mi nɔ tuun a hweɖelɛnu nɔ xuxu hɔn nu yovo lɛ
mi ɖo yawu tuun nu mi wa e mi ɖo xwle wɛn ɔ mɛ klewun alo yi gbe ɖɔ nu wɛ mi wa nyi do ɖido
ðo fi ɖe lɛ ɔ nu lɛ ɖe gbɔn ɖo hwenɛnu e nɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi ɖo syɛnsyɛn kpe nukun do miɖee wu mɔ tɛn do wa gbexosin mitɔn
gloria nɔ wa nu mɛɖe lɛ
e yi gbe ɖo fi lɛ ɖokpo bɔ sixu nɔ ɛ bonu taan e nɔ zan e ɔ mi zan wevlɔɖo tɔn ɔ ɔ fo
nɔ mi hwemɛ nuɖuɖu ɖe bɔ nyi kpo gloria kpo nɔ ɖu cobo nɔ yi xwe
ðo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ ɔ gloria nɔ avɔ nu xwedo ɖe
ðo yovo lɛ ɖokpo xwe ɔ mi nɔ sunsun flɛtɛli lɛ gloria nɔ sunsun ɖo xɔ mɛ bɔ nyɛ nɔ sunsun ɖo kɔxo
mi nɔ blo nu kezezan ɔ bi enɛ wu ɔ nɔ mi hwemɛ nuɖuɖu
gloria nɔ ɖu nu ɖo xɔ ɔ mɛ ɖo vo nu xwedo ɔ bɔ nyɛ nɔ ɖu nu ɖo ɖo fi e nɔ gan ɖo e
xwedo ɔ xomɛ nɔ wa nu nɔ nu gbɔn kpowun wɛ
flin hwenu nɔte ɖo sansinsatɛn gbe ɖokpo e
ee mi jɛ sansin do mitɔn mɛ kpe gudo e ɔ kanbyɔ mɛ sa nu nu mi e ɖɔ gloria sixu zan afɔɖayitɛn ɔ a ji
e nyla nukunmɛ mi ɖɔ e su
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ mi zan hwenu jiwu lɛ xa nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɔ mi yi wan nu mitɔn
hwenu mi wa tlolo e ɔ mi yi nɔ nɔvi wa mɛ nyi kplekple mɛxo lɛ tɔn tɔn ɖe nɔ wa ɖo egbe e ɖe
asi tɔn nyi klisanwun hwenɛnu a bɔ gloria jɛ biblu xa ɛ ji
ðo taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ jɛ biblu xa vi nyɔnu yetɔn kpo asu tɔn kpo ji
nɔ ɔ kpo vi ɔ kpo bi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn jehovah blo baptɛm
mi ɖo lɛ ɖo agun mɛ yovo lɛ ɖe e
nɔ ylɔ mi nu gbadanu nuɖuɖu ɖo blo ɖo zinflu mɛ
ku klux klan kkk nyi tutoblonunu ɖe nɔ akɔ cyancyan kpo dakaxixo kpo su ɖo nu gba wɛ tawun hwenɛnu
flin ɖɔ mɔ nya ɖe junjɔn hɔn tɔn nukɔn ɖo zan mɛ e ɖo mɛkuku lɛ xwe ɖu wɛ e gbe ɖokpo go do awu wewe dɔn awu ɔ sin aza cyɔn kkk lɛ nɔ blo gbɔn e
nu mɔhun lɛ bonu nɔvi lɛ gɔn xomɛ a
ðo aluun mɛ gbe ɖokpo ɔ mi ɖo hudo akwɛ tɔn do hun yi ɖaxo ɖe bɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖe yi gbe xɔ mitɔn bonu mi do sixu mɔ akwɛ yi
ɖokpo gudo ɖo gbe ɖokpo ɔ nu cikɔ nu mi hwenu mi ɖi zɔnlin sin hɔn ɖe kɔn jɛ hɔn ɖe kɔn biblu xa mɛ lɛ ɖo hwesivɔ mɛ gudo e
hwenu mi wa xwegbe e ɔ nuɖe ɖo mi
mi mɔ bɔ e gan mitɔn ɖo xwe ɔ nukɔn
nɔvi mitɔn
ðo ɔ e ylɔ mi ɖɔ ma wa wemaxɔmɛ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖo lansing ɖo
e ɖokpo blebu do nu mɛ ɖeɖee nyi agun tɔn lɛdo tɔn kpo agbegbe tɔn lɛ kpo e
hwenu yi mɛylɔwema ɔ e ɔ ɖo a bɔ akwɛ han mi
alokanxwe ɖe ɖo ɖɔ xo xa mi do ɖe wu
nu yi mi ɔ nyɛ wɛ nyi mɛwi nukɔntɔn ɖo enɛ e
wa ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ emi yi mi do ɔ
etɛ wa
ɖo akwɛ ɖe do hun yi a
tamɛ tawun do gbeyiyi nu ɔ kpo wemaxɔmɛ yiyi ɔ kpo wu
nugbo ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wlan wema e ylɔ mi e hwenu nu wɔn gbeɖe a e ɖe jɛ e
nɔvi nyɔnu asu tɔn nyi klisanwun a e ɖe ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ xuxu hɔn mitɔn zanzan tɛɛn gbe ɖokpo wemakpo ɖe nu mi
akwɛ mɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ ɖɔ yi wemaxɔmɛ ɔ nu gege kpewu gbɔn e lɛkɔ wa mi
nukɔnmɛ ɔ kanbyɔ alokanxwe ɔ ɖɔ sixu jɛ wa ji ɖo finɛ aklunɔzan gblamɛ gudo a ji
gbidigbidi ɖɔ eo
e ɖɔ nuɖe nu mi a
wa gbeta kɔn
e vivi nu mi ɖɔ kun do enɛ mɛ o
gloria flin hwenu mi zan ɖo gbɔn e ɖie yi wan nu fi mi ɖekunnu ɖe e
mɛ jɛ wɛ nɔ biblu xa
