enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ ɖekunnu sin xwe ɖe gbe jɛ xwe ɖe gbe zanzan lɛ bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ mi nɔ biblu xa mɛ lɛ ɖo kezezan kpo e mɛ hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi nɔ bɔ zanmɛ tɔn nɔ xo
tlɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun jlo mi nu ma ɖyɔ byɔ mɛ o nu ɖevo wɛ ɖo jehovah sin ayi mɛ
e wa nu sɔgbe xa nugbo
hwenu mi ɖo gbexosin wa wɛ ɖo e ɔ mi wema mɛ huzu gbexosin titewungbe
mi ɖo nukun tawun ɖo agbegbe tɔn mitɔn jlo ɖɔ mi ɖo agun ɖe mɛ ɖo texas gbexosin titewungbe wɛ e ɖɔ mi nyi ɖo finɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔte nɔte ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ɖɔ mi xosin ɖe jɛn mi nɔ wa mɔ wemagbavi mitɔn ɖe
janvier wɛ
nɔvi leon ee nyi alaxɔ etats unis tɔn tɔn din e wɛ e nyi lɛdo tɔn ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ xa mi
xɛsi ɖi mi do lɛdo tɔn nyinyi wu
xwe ɖokpo alo taan kpɛɖe jɛ nukɔn nu huzuhuzu ɔ agbegbe tɔn james
e do mi fi ɖeɖee sixu blo huzuhuzu ɖe lɛ e kɛnu do nuwukpikpe ɖeɖee lɛdo tɔn ɖagbe ɖe ɖo ɖo lɛ e wu
ɖo ɔ mɛ nu taan klewun ɖe cobo wa mɔ ɖɔ ɖo hudo weɖexamɛ enɛ tɔn
ee e nu mi gudo e ɔ nɔvi thompson wɛ nyi agbegbe tɔn nukɔntɔn wa xa e
nu gege ɖo nɔvi sunnu enɛ
alɔ sunnu elɔ lɛ do mi e su nukun mɛ
ðo hwenɛnu ɔ e nɔ klewun ɖe lɛdo tɔn lɛ
zan aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo lɛdo tɔn ɖe hwenu e ɖo agun ɖe wɛ e
enɛ gudo ɔ e lɔ zan aklunɔzan gblamɛ bɔ e mi hwenu ɖo agun ɖevo wɛ e
e ɖe we xa mi ali mi
enɛ gudo ɔ miɖesunɔ
flin ɖɔ ɖɔ nu gloria ɖɔ e jo mi do nugbo wɛ a wa ɖo ayi nu taji ɖe wu
ee wa nyi ɖe e kpo ee fred ee nyi xwedo betɛli tɔn tɔn ɖe e do mi e kpo kpo ɖo nukun mɛ su wɛ jɛ egbe
akɔ cyancyan gbakpe tawun ɖo hwenɛnu
e su gbe ɖokpo bɔ kkk lɛ ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wɛ ɖo toxo mi e ɖe mɛ ɖo tennessee
xwe afɔɖayitɛn sunnu lɛ tɔn wu ɖɔ nya kwiji tawun ɖe nu do wutu ci yovo ɖo akɔ cyancyan ɖe mɛ e ɖɔhun e ɖe jɛ gudo
nɔvi sunnu yovo tawun hu nyɛ alo kwijikwiji ɔ e lɔ byɔ afɔɖayitɛn ɔ hwenu midɛɛ lɛ byɔ mɛ gudo e
e kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ nu bi ɖo yiyi wɛ ganji sin nɔvi
ɔ zan afɔɖayitɛn ɔ a yawu sin finɛ
ðo xwe lɛ gblamɛ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ akɔ cyancyan ɔ e kun nyi sinmɛ agbaza tɔn mɛɖe ɖo e wu wɛ e nɔ sin tawun o loɔ hwɛhuhu wu wɛ e nɔ sin hwɛhuhu adamu tɔn wa nu do mi bi wu
ɖɔ enyi nɔvi ɖe ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn alɔkpa ɖebu ɔ nɔvi jɛn e nyi bɔ enyi e byɔ ɖo ɔ e ku do mɛtɔn mɛ
mɔ nyɔna gege kpo nu nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ lɛ e gege kpo ɖo xwe enɛ lɛ vlamɛ
ajɔ ɖevo ɖo ali ji ja
ðo aout ɔ mi ku nu xwe gege e huzu aɖi
e ylɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa wa ɖo betɛli etats unis tɔn mi wema mɛ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e ɔ xwe ɖo wɛ e ɖe nɛ
bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi jɛ wa ji ɖo betɛli
vɛdo ɖɔ nɔvi sunnu agbanɖotananɔ ɖo betɛli lɛ e jlo ɖɔ ma nu taan ɖe kpowun wɛ sin nu lɛ wa yi gbɔn a
xɔ akwɛ ɖe wɛ gloria nyi hwenu ɛ e nyi xɔ akwɛ ɖe egbe
nɔvi sunnu ɖo finɛ lɛ e ɖo kpe nukun do nu ɖo taji bɔ kplekple mɛxo lɛ tɔn kpo lɛdo tɔn ɖo to ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo kanbyɔ lɛ e gege wu
nɔvi sunnu mi lɛ e ɖo suulu mi gbɔn e su nukun mɛ tawun
e ɖo co mɔ ɖɔ enyi e ɖe nu mi do finɛ din ɔ ci mɛ e ɖɔhun
gloria kpo nyi kpo yi wan nu gbɛzan betɛli tɔn
hwebinu wɛ mi nɔ yawu zanzan lɛ bɔ aca enɛ nɔ tawun ɖo betɛli
ðo xwe ɖokpo gudo ɔ huzu tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn
enɛ gudo ɖo ɔ e nu mi bɔ nyi ɖokpo ɖo ɔ mɛ
enɛ nu gege mi taji bi ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu klisu wɛ nyi gan nu agun klisanwun tɔn e nyi ɖebu a
sin ɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ
jehovah ɖo ayi yaya enɛ nɔ wa taan tɔn nɔ wa wa nyi nukunkpikpe do figi wu e figi ɔ nuɖuɖu ɖe wɛ bɔ e nɔ do mɔ nu lɛ kɛɖɛ nɔ ɖu e
mawu nu amɔsi nyi gbeyiɖɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hɛn nyɔna gege wa ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɖe wɛ
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ jehovah ɖo ayi nyɛ mɛ nyi glesi wamamɔnɔ ɖe sin vi e wu ɖo indiana kɔn nyɔna gege do ji nyɔna lɛ din bɔ tlɛ sixu ɖɔ bi a
nux nwt mɔ tawun ɖɔ gbɛzan wuɖewuɖe ɖo agbaza lixo e fo kpo nyɔna gbigbɔ tɔn ɖaxo ee tlɛ sixu gbeɖe a lɛ e kpo
ðo mi ɖo wlu e ɖe mɛ wutu ɔ mi ɖo do gan tawun cobo mɔ fifa
enyi mi tlɛ mɔ fifa ɔ ɖo ba ɖe mɛ ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ mi nɔ do gan tawun bonu e sun glo mi o
etɛ xo mawu tɔn ɖɔ bɔ e sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ fifa jɔ fifa nɔ ayi sɔyi e
mi sixu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ lɔ wa gbɔn
taji bi ɔ mi ɖo zun xa mawu cobo mɔ fifa nɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi e
mi sixu wa gbɔn
adohu adohu gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ xo fifa mɛ gege tɔn yi
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ e nɔ sɛkpɔ mi nɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn do mi
ezayii ɖɔ hwɛjijɔ hɛn fifa wa e mɛ ayi jɛ ayi kpo jiɖiɖe kpo sɔyi
mi sixu mɔ fifa nujɔnu tɔn ɔ gbɔn tonusise nu jehovah sin ayi mɛ gblamɛ eza
pɔlu fifa bɔ e nyi gbigbɔ tɔn sin akpaxwe atɔngɔ ɔ
mi ɖɔ xo do ali gbigbɔ sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ fifa ɖe e we ji
ðɛh
ði ɔ mi nɔ mɔ e nɔ nɔ fifa mɛ gbɔn e kpo nu wu fifa do nyi nu taji e kpo
enyi mi nɔ xoɖɛ do ganjɛ gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn wu ɔ mawu nɔ blo bɔ fifa ayi mɛ tɔn mɛ ɖeɖee zun xa ɛ lɛ e kɛɖɛ nɔ mɔ e nɔ gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ hlɔ
david ɔ linlin tɔn nyanya lɛ nɔ ɖo xoɖiɖɔ tɔn mɛ
cobonu e ze gbɛzan tɔn jo nu mawu ɔ e nɔ mɔ xo ɖɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu hwɛhwɛ nɔ do gbe nu xwedo tɔn
e wa ya e ɔ david mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo blo huzuhuzu lɛ huzu mɛfifa
e mɔ fifa gbɔn
e ɖɔ jɛ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ zan ji ɖo gbɛzan mɛ
e yi gbe ɖɔ jɛ din ɔ kpo ɖo xwi ɖi xa xomɛsin wɛ ɖo su ɖo xwedo nɔ sin xomɛ e ɖe mɛ
etɛ ɛ bɔ e huzu mɛfifa hugan
xosin tɔn ɖie ðɛxixo ganjɛ jehovah wu
david kpo rachel kpo ɔ we kpowun wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi mi zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ byɔ mawu ɖɔ e gbigbɔ tɔn mi bonu e mi ɔ mi mɔ fifa
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mi ɖo nyanya ɖe mɛ mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖo fifa ayi mɛ tɔn so nu ɖo xwedo mitɔn kpo klisanwun lɛ kpo tɛntin e
nu sixu nyi doo a
nyɔna tɛ lɛ nɔ sin gandido xo fifa kan mɛ
awajijɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mɛ gege yi gbe
e sin enɛ wu bɔ linlin nukunɖiɖo ɖe tiin a tɔn alo xomɛ sinsin ɖo nu ɖo jijɛ do mɛ wɛ lɛ e wu tɔn nɔ ɖi bu a
mɛ lɛ bi wɛ nɔ yi wɛn mitɔn ganji a e hwe bi ɔ mɛɖe lɛ nɔ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ
jaan e ɖo co gbigbɔ mawu tɔn nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ xwle wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo fifa mɛ kpodo sisi kpo
mɛ ɔ mi nɔ xwedo jezu do ɔ wu ɖo matie mɛ e finɛ ɖɔ enyi byɔ xwe ɖe gbe hun ɖɔ fifa nɔ xwe ɔ ji
enyi fifa jɛxa mɛ ɖo xwe enɛ gbe lɛ hun fifa mitɔn nɔ ji e jɛxa a hun fifa mitɔn lɛkɔ xwedo
mi nɔ so nu fifa hwenu mi sɛkpɔ gan ɖo to lɛ e jɛ mɛ ɖeɖee klan gbe xa mitɔn lɛ e ji kpo sisi kpo e
ði ɔ e sin linlin agɔ acɛkpikpa ɖo to aflika tɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖokpo ɖo e wu ɖɔ e kun gba kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ o
do ɖeɖɛ xo ɔ ɖo fifa mɛ ɔ e ɖe wa ɖo aflika to enɛ mɛ e yi mɔ ɖaxo to ɔ tɔn ɖo londres ɖo angleterre
nu lɛ wa yi ɖo
e ɖɔ hwenu jɛ fi e nɔ yi mɛ ɖe e ɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛ nɔ yi mɛ e ɔ gbe e sin akɔ mɛ wɛ e gosin ɖo nusisɔ tɔn wutu wɛ
enɛ wu ɔ do gbe e do gbe eɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ
e kpaca ɛ bɔ e kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ etɛ hɛn wa
ɖɔ kpodo sisi kpo ɖɔ jlo mɔ ɖaxo ɔ
e tɛ kan gan ɔ wa mɔ mi do gbe mi do gbe ayi ɔ ji tɔn mɛ
tinmɛ nɔvi ɔ kpo sisi kpo e ɖe nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ agɔ ɔ ɖo do mitɔn wu e kpo linlin agɔ e ɖo e kpo habu siin
taan ɖe lɛ gudo ɔ acɛkpikpa aflika to enɛ tɔn yi gbe nu mitɔn e e
nɔvi lɛ tawun do xo enɛ fo do fifa mɛ e wu
nugbo ɔ nu wa xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo sisi kpo nɔ hɛn le ɖagbe gege wa fifa lɔ ɖo le enɛ lɛ mɛ
egbe ɔ togun jehovah tɔn nɔ ɖu vivi paladisi gbigbɔ tɔn mɛ fifa e ɖe tɔn
so nu fifa mɔhun enyi sɔnu nu akpaxwe gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ tɔn ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ ɔ nɛ
taji bi ɔ nu towe jehovah nukunmɛ bɔ mɔ fifa tunfla nɔ ayi sɔyi e ɖo mawu tɔn mɛ
nukun jɛ ayikungban ɖagbe ji lɛ ɔ mɛ linsyɛnsyɛn yetɔn nɔ bɔ nɔ lɛ e wɛ luk
enyi mi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖo fi ɖeɖee mɛ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn mitɔn ganji a ɖe lɛ e ɔ etɛwu awakanmɛ sixu ku mi
etɛwu mi bi sixu wa nɔ e ɖe
etɛ mi bɔ linsyɛnsyɛn bɔ mi kpo ɖo wɛ
etɛwu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ jla wɛn ɔ ɖo fi mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo kɔ wu ɖe a lɛ e tɔn nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
tinmɛ ɖo do e
sergio kpo olinda kpo nyi asu kpo asi kpo gbexosin ɖe ɖo etats unis ɖo xwe jɛji
agaɖanu din ɔ se wɛ ɖe ɖo afɔ yetɔn lɛ mɛ e bɔ tɛnsisɛ ɖo nu wɛ
e ɖo co wa gbɔn nu xwe mɔkpan e ɔ nɔ ɖi zɔnlin yi tokpletɛn fi nɔ ɖe ɖo to ɔ mɛ e ɖo zanzan lɛ nɔ jɛ finɛ ɖo tɛnwe mɛ
nɔ ci ɖe kpa nɔ xwle wema jinjɔn biblu ji lɛ lɛ
mɛ gege nɔ nu asu kpo asi kpo ɔ nɔ ci finɛ nɔ nu do mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ lɛ e
wewe mɛ ɔ nɔ ɖi zɔnlin ɖido xwegbe
ayihɔngbe tɔn ɖo tɛnwe mɛ ɔ nɔ yi tokpletɛn ɔ
azɔn ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo mɛ ɔ asu kpo asi kpo enɛ jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖo fi enɛ nu xwe ɖokpo blebu ɖo zanzan lɛ
sergio kpo olinda kpo ɖɔhun ɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo gege jla wɛn ɔ nu xwe mɔkpan ɖo jɔtɛn yetɔn bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo kɔ wu a
enyi ninɔmɛ mɔhun mɛ wɛ ɖe hun mi kpa kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo nu linsyɛnsyɛn towe
dɔn gbi ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ e nyi jɔtɛn wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn nu mɛ gege jɛ nu lɛ e ji
gbejininɔ yetɔn nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ nɔ van kan nɔ ɖo mɛ
yetɔn nɔ akpakpa mi
etɛwu
do hlɔnhlɔn kan mi kanɖeji wa jezu mi e yi fo ɔ nu mi do nu xosin nukanbyɔ atɔn elɔ lɛ tɔn etɛwu awakanmɛ sixu ku mi ɖo hweɖelɛnu
mi sixu gbɔn
etɛ mi bɔ linsyɛnsyɛn mitɔn bɔ mi kpo ɖo wɛ
nuwalɔ nyanya gege jwifu lɛ tɔn tɔn ci nu pɔlu
etɛwu nu ci nu pɔlu
enyi awakanmɛ ku hwenu nɔ ɖo wɛn jla wɛ ɖo fi mɛ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ ɖe a e hun ninɔmɛ towe sɔgbe xa pɔlu tɔn nɛ
e ɖo co e kpewu jwifu gege bonu huzu mawu nugbo lɛ a
e wa ɔ mɛ gege xo tɔn bɔ mɛɖe lɛ tlɛ doya
nu jwifu enɛ lɛ wa e ci nu pɔlu
etɛwu nu ci nu pɔlu
enɛ wu ɔ e nu pɔlu tawun hwenu e mɔ bɔ nublawukunumɛ mawu tɔn e
etɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ nɔzo mitɔn lɛ
etɛwu e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ awakanmɛ sixu wa ku mi ɖo hweɖelɛnu
etɛwu nu miɖesunɔ mɔ lɛ e bɔ mi tuun ɖɔ nyɔna gege ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee wa gbeta ɔ kɔn jehovah lɛ e
enyi mi tamɛ do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo fi mi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe lɛ e ji ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ nu miɖee ɖɔ enyi mi sixu mɛ enɛ lɛ bonu mɔ nu ɖo wu din wɛ lɛ e wɛ ɔ e mɛ nya
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ kpo ɖo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu wɛ bonu nu do nugbo kunkpla jehovah kpo linlin e ɖo nu lɛ e kpo wu
e ɖɔ ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖeɖee mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ lɛ e ɖɔ mi hɛn nunina ɖagbe ɖe wa nu
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mɛ lɛ nu mi e ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi sixu mɔ ɖo ayi mɛ
ðo nu nɔ ci nu mi wutu ɔ enɛ ɖɔ mi kun ɖo nuɖiɖi o a loɔ ayi mitɔn wɛ ɖo ɔ wu
ninɔmɛ nɔ hɛn awakanmɛ ku mɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖo finɛ co mi nɔ dɛ
elena nyi gbexosin nu xwe jɛji e ɖɔ xo elɔ do nu gege mitɔn mɔ ɖɔ ɔ vɛwu
e ɖo co ɖevo ɖebu ɖe hu enɛ bɔ wa a
mi wa gbɔn
etɛwu mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ fi mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ ɖe e ci gbɔn ɖebu ɔ mitɔn sixu
do xosin nu nukanbyɔ taji enɛ ɔ nu mi do nu nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn we mɛ e kɛnu do nina wu ɖe e
nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖɔ xo do viwuntin ɖe wu
nɔte nu ɔ viwuntin ɔ kpo lɛ kpo
mi jlo mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ tɛ
ðo ayi nu jezu ɖɔ nu tɔn lɛ e wu enyi gege ɔ wɛ e nyi nu bɔ nyi ahwanvu
jezu jehovah do ɖe wu eɖesunɔ do viwuntin titewungbe ɔ wu bɔ lɛ wa nɔte nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ etɛ nyi ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ ɖo e
ðo nujlɛdonuwu enɛ mɛ ɔ jezu ɖɔ alɔkpa wɛ ɔ tlɔlɔ le a e tinmɛ taji ɖe mi bɔ mi mɔ xosin ɔ
ðo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn mɛ ɔ etɛwu ɔ sixu nyi ahwanvu lɛ a
jijɔ tɛ nɔ zɔn xa nu jehovah byɔ ɖo mi si lɛ e
jezu ɖɔ xo do tɔn wu ɖɔ ɖebu ɖo wu nɔ a ɔ nɔ siin
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo nujlɛdonuwu enɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ klisanwun ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo e wɛ nyi mɛ mawu jɔwu mi bɔ mi bɔ huzu ahwanvu lɛ e a
e nyi a ɔ kpewu nu mɛɖe bonu e huzu ahwanvu a ɖo nɔ jla wɛn ɔ ɖo fi mɛ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ ɖe ganji a lɛ e wutu e ci ɖeɖee xo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ kun o lɛ e ɖɔhun
gbeta enɛ kɔn wiwa sɔgbe a
ðo mi sixu hɛn mɛ lɛ gannugannu ɖɔ huzu ahwanvu a
wiwa sɔgbe xa ali jehovah nɔ ɖe wanyiyi ɖe e a ɖo enɛ ɖɔ e nɔ ɖe tɔn ɖeɖee kpe nu hugan e ɖe wiwa wu a lɛ e sin mɛ
nu ɖebu jehovah byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa e ɔ nu wu mi kpe lɛ e jɛn nɔ nyi hwebinu
tɛ wiwa nɔ bɔ mi nɔ
nujlɛdonuwu tɛ mi do
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɔ ɖo nyi ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn sixu kpewu wa e ɖe
tɛ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ
wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn tɔn jijla wɛ
etɛ nɔte nu nukun ɔ kpo ayikungban ɔ kpo ɖo nujlɛdonuwu ɔ mɛ
etɛ bleehwin ɖe
ðo nujlɛdonuwu e do ɔ wu e mɛ ɔ nukun ɔ wɛ nyi mawuxo ɔ alo wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn
ayikungban ɔ nɔte nu ayixa tɔn
nukun jɛ ayikungban ɖagbe ji ɔ wu ɖɔ su bɔ enyi mi ɖɔ ɔ e wa huzu bleehwin ɖe
enɛ gudo ɔ e nukun mɔhunkɔtɔn donu kanweko
alɔkpa tɛ bleehwin ɖe nɔ
akpaxwe nujlɛdonuwu ɔ tɔn enɛ kan mitɔn gbɔn
linsyɛnsyɛn mi tɔn nɔ bɔ mi nɔ gbɔn
nujlɛdonuwu e do ɔ wu e kan mitɔn gbɔn
mi nɔ wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn sin nukun ɖevo gbɔn
do do nuɖe wu ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖe lɛ alo klisanwun mitɔn lɛ ma wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn xa mi ɖo xwe ɖe lɛ ɖie wa yi
e vivi nu ɖɔ ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ci nukun ɖe ɖɔhun e byɔ ayi mitɔn mɛ
ayikungban ɖagbe xo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖɔ e wli nukun ɔ hɛn gbɔn e ɔ mi lɔ yi gbe nu wɛn ɔ
nu mɛ e kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ci nukun ɖe ɖɔhun e wu ɖɔ su bɔ enyi mi ɖɔ ɔ e wa huzu bleehwin bɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
bleewhin ɖe nɔ nukun lɛ nɔ nyi hwin ɖevo lɛ a gbɔn e ɔ wɛ mi nɔ e nɔ nyi wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn sin nukun ɖevo e nɔ nyi ahwanvu lɛ a
hweɖebunu mi jla wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ ɖo ali ɖebu e ɔ nukun e do ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ e vunvun kpe wɛ mi ɖe nɛ
luk enɛ wu ɔ nujlɛdonuwu elɔ mi ɖɔ enyi mi kpo ɖo wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla wɛ ɔ linsyɛnsyɛn mi tɔn nɔ bɔ mi nɔ
etɛ nujlɛdonuwu jezu do viwuntin kpo ɔ kpo wu e sixu mi
nukplɔnmɛ enɛ ci nu
mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ nina mitɔn kun nɔ sin mɛ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ gbɔn ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ e wu o
e wa ɔ gbejininɔ miɖesunɔ tɔn wu wɛ e nɔ sin
ajɔ ɔ sɔgbe xa e wa e e nyi nu mɛ e wa e kɔ do e a
matilda ee nyi gbexosin ɖe sin xwe ɖie e ɖɔ tuuntuun ɖɔ jehovah nɔ mi nu gandido mitɔn lɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mi
sɔgbe xa hlɔmanu lɛ ɔ hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ wu pɔlu jo gbe do mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ e wu a
etɛ mi bɔ linsyɛnsyɛn mitɔn bɔ mi kpo ɖo wɛ
mi ɖɔ wa yi gbɔn e ɔ awakanmɛ ku pɔlu ɖo jwifu lɛ ɖoto wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn a wutu
e ɖo co e jo gbe do wu a
ðo nukɔnmɛ ɖo wema pɔlu wlan klisanwun ɖo hlɔma lɛ e mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ nu ci do jwifu enɛ lɛ wu e ɖo ayi nu e ɖɔ e wu nu wɛ ɖe kpo ayi bi kpo ɖo byɔbyɔ ɖo mawu si wɛ nu jwifu lɛ ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɔ hwlɛngan
hwɛjijɔ bɔ pɔlu kpo ɖo tɔn wa wɛ e tɛ lɛ ji e
e nɔ jlo e ɖo ayi mɛ ɖɔ jwifu ɖe lɛ mɔ hwlɛngan
hlɔ wegɔ ɔ pɔlu ɖɔ xo do nu e nɔ byɔ ɖo mawu si nu jwifu lɛ e wu
e nɔ savo nu mawu ɖo ɖɛ mɛ ɖɔ e jwifu ɖokpo ɖokpo bonu yi wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn
atɔngɔ ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu wa ɖo mawu si sin akpakpa ɖaxo ɖe ɖo ji
e mɔ jijɔ ɖagbe ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ lɛ si
pɔlu tuun ɖɔ enyi e ali akpakpa nɔ ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ e ganji ɔ sixu huzu ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ e nyi gbɔn nu eɖesu e
mi sixu wa nu pɔlu ɖɔhun gbɔn
na lɛ
nukɔntɔn ɔ mi nɔ bɔ jlo syɛnsyɛn mi ɖo mɛɖebu ɖo ninɔmɛ ayi mɛ tɔn jɛxa mavɔmavɔ lɛ e bu a
wegɔ ɔ mi nɔ savo nu jehovah ɖo ɖɛ mɛ ɖɔ e hun ayi ayijlɔjlɔnɔ lɛ tɔn
mɛ nwt silvana ee nyi gbexosin ɖe sin xwe ɖie e ɖɔ cobonu byɔ xwe ɖe gbe ɖo fi mi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe e ɔ nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e mi bonu ma ɖo linlin ɖagbe
atɔngɔ ɔ mi nɔ ɖo ayi jijɔ ɖagbe mɛ lɛ ɖo e wu
nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe blo baptɛm sin xwe jɛji ɖie e ɖɔ nɔ nu kpɛvi kpɛvi ɖebu sixu ɖɔ mɛɖe ɖo jlo e e sixu nyi nukiko ɖe mɛ kpinkpɔn kpo kpo alo nu e kanbyɔ do nujɔnu mɛ e ɖe
nugbo ɔ pɔlu ɖɔhun ɔ mi sixu syɛnlin
etɛ ɖo mɛ e sixu mi
na mitɔn sixu wa ɖagbe nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo mi wɛ lɛ e gbɔn e tɔn
xa
nɔ ɖo ayi nusisɔ mitɔn ɖo paan e mɛ sisi mitɔn kpo nukiko mitɔn kpo wu
ðo nukɔnmɛ ɔ nuwalɔ mitɔn sixu mɛ ɖe lɛ bɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ linlin emi ɖo do mi wu e kun sɔgbe o
sergio kpo olinda kpo xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e ɖo ayi huzuhuzu mɔhun wu
sergio ɖɔ ðo azɔn wutu ɔ mi yi tokpletɛn ɔ a nu taan ɖe
hwenu mi wa lɛkɔ yi e ɔ lɛ kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ etɛ jɛ
mi jɛ do mitɔn
olinda ɖɔ kpo nukiko ɖe kpo ɖɔ lɛ blo alɔ nu mi bɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ suxo mi ɖɔ ku do
tlɛ byɔ xojlawema mitɔn lɛ
e kpaca asu kpo asi kpo ɔ ɖɔ nya ɖe nɔte ɖo kɛkɛvi yetɔn kɔn folowa ɖe doku nu ɖo wa wɛ ɖe e wu
etɛwu kanɖeji bɔ linsyɛnsyɛn towe bɔ
jezu ɖesunɔ tuun ɖɔ wɛn jijla nu to mɛ tɔn mɛ lɛ vɛwu xo nugbo ɖe wɛ bɔ wɛnɖagbe wema ɛnɛ lɛ bi wlan
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ xo nujlɛdonuwu enɛ ɖɔ lɛ e do gesi mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo jixwe lɛ e nukplɔnmɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo nujlɛdonuwu ɔ mɛ bɔ mawu lɛ bi ɖu le tɔn
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nina kunkpla jijɔ gbigbɔ nɔ mɛ e ɖiɖo ɖo xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do mi mitɔn do kpa nu nyikɔ mawu tɔn alo jla axɔsuɖuto ɔ gbɔn e ji
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛ ɔ jezu zan nukundido kpo nukun yiya kpo tɔn do tinmɛ nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin ɔ
enyi gege ɔ wɛ e nyi nu bɔ nyi ahwanvu jaan
hwɛjijɔ junjɔn biblu ji tɛ lɛ mi ɖo kpo ɖo wɛn ɔ jla wɛ
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ mi hɛn nu wu mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ e ayi mɛ ganji
e mi bɔ mi syɛnlin ɖo mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
taan kpɛɖe jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn ɔ xo tɛ e ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ mi hɛn nu wu mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ e ayi mɛ
etɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
ðo zan jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn e mɛ ɔ e zan hwenu gege do ɖɔ xo nu tɔn lɛ jiɖe ɖɔ emi ɖo wanyiyi e nu
e nujlɛdonuwu ɖe do viwuntin ɖe wu bɔ mi ɖɔ xo ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ
jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ gege
ðo glɛkigbe mɛ ɔ xogbe enɛ ɖɔ jezu ɖo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu wɛ bonu kpo ɖo gege wɛ enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ syɛnlin ɖo wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla kɔn jaan
e nyi nu ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ wa e kɛɖɛ wɛ e ɖɔ nu a loɔ e ɖɔ nu wu ɖo wa e nu
e hwɛjijɔ ɖeɖee wu wa ɔ e
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ mi ɖɔ xo do hwɛjijɔ enɛ lɛ wu
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi ɖɔ xo do hwɛjijɔ jinjɔn biblu ji wu mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ e ɛnɛ ji
ɔ mi gbeje nu ɖeɖee jehovah mi bɔ mi bɔ mi syɛnlin e ɛnɛ
hwɛjijɔ wu mi jla wɛn ɔ e ɖetɛ ɖo jaan mɛ
etɛ viwun sin xo nujlɛdonuwu jezu tɔn ɖɔ e nɔte etɛwu nujlɛdonuwu enɛ sɔgbe
ðo ayi wu ɖɔ jezu tɔn jehovah do alo ee nɔ kpe nukun do viwun wu e wu
e eɖesunɔ do viwuntin ɖe wu wa ahwanvu tɔn lɛ do lɛ wu
jaan enɛ wu ɔ e sɔgbe ɖɔ viwun sin lɛ nɔte nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ nɔ e
jezu ɖɔ nu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ enyi gege ɔ wɛ e nyi nu
ali tɛ lɛ mi nɔ hɛn nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖo ji ɖe
wu e jɔ bɔ hɛn nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖo ji e nɔ ci nu
ali tɛ mitɔn nɔ hɛn nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖo ji ɖe
ɖo ayi nu gbeyiɖɔ ezayii ɖɔ e wu jehovah ahwankpa lɛ tɔn wɛ nyi mɛ ɖo do mɔ e
eza nwt mi nɔ hɛn nyikɔ mawu tɔn ɖo ji gbɔn nyikɔ enɛ kpinkpɔn do mɔ nyikɔ ɖeɖovo ɖe ɖo nyikɔ lɛ bi mɛ kpo alɔdido mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu do mɔ nu kpo gblamɛ
ee nyi gbexosin sin xwe ɖie e ɖɔ tuun tuun ɖɔ e jɔwu mi bɔ ɖekunnu do mɛ da wɛkɛ ɔ e takunmɛ e su nukun mɛ
jezu linsyɛnsyɛn ji gbɔn
wanyiyi ɖaxo mi ɖo nu jehovah kpo jezu kpo e wɛ nyi hwɛjijɔ taji ɖevo wu mi nɔ jla wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn e
ðo enyi gbɛzinzan mɛtɔn nɔ xwe ɖe jɛ ɖe gudo ɖɔ e nyi ahwanvu nugbo klisu tɔn ɖe ɔ e byɔ linsyɛnsyɛn
jezu linsyɛnsyɛn ji zan xokwin nɔ alo ɖo ɔ azɔn gege ɖo akpaxwe klewun elɔ ɖo jaan mɛ e mɛ
mi nɔ ɖɔ mi jlo nɔ wanyiyi klisu tɔn mɛ gbɔn
mi nɔ ɖɔ mi jlo nɔ wanyiyi klisu tɔn mɛ bɔ nu mitɔn kpo ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ wɛ gbɔn
enyi e ɖɔ ɖo klewun mɛ ɔ jezu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ setonu nu mi
nu jezu ɖesunɔ wa lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa ɖo e ɖɔ ɖɔ nyɛ nyi sin lɛ ɖo wanyiyi tɔn mɛ ɔ ɖɔhun
jezu ze ɔ jaan
kancica tɛ ɖo tonusise kpo wanyiyi kpo mɛ
nu nu kan kancica ɖo tonusise kpo wanyiyi kpo mɛ e ɔ jezu ɖɔ nu tɔn lɛ wa yi ɖɔ mɛ hɛn lɛ ayi mɛ nɔ nyi lɛ ɔ mɛ enɛ wɛ yi wan nu mi
jaan jehovah kpo jezu kpo nɔ hɛn mi ɖo wanyiyi yetɔn mɛ ɖo wanyiyi mi e wutu
hwɛjijɔ ɖevo tɛ mi ɖo jla wɛn ɔ
xo jehovah tɔn ɖo ezekiyɛli kpo kpo mɛ e nɔ mi bɔ mi kpo ɖo wɛn jla wɛ gbɔn
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ e ylɔ nɔwee ɖɔ xa nwt
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɖo mawuxo e ɖɔ jɛ nukɔn nu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ e mɛ ɔ e nu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ ɔ vɔ
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ
ðo ayi nu jezu ɖɔ e wu ðo lɛ ɖe gbɔn ɖo azan enɛ lɛ jɛ nukɔn nu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ e gbe ɖo ɖuɖu wɛ ɖo nunu wɛ bɔ sunnu lɛ ɖo asi kpla wɛ bɔ e ɖo nyɔnu lɛ asu wɛ jɛ gbe gbe nɔwee byɔ tɔjihun mɛ bɔ ɖo ayi wu a jɛ hwenu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ wa bi yi do e ɔ wɛ fi ɖiɖe vi ɔ tɔn ɖe
nwt mɛ lɛ yi wɛn ɔ a co nɔwee jla wɛn akpagbanumɛ tɔn e mɛ e kpo gbejininɔ kpo
egbe ɔ mi nɔ jla wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn nɔ hun ali nu lɛ bonu nu do linlin mawu ɖo nu e wu
hwɛjijɔ wu mi jla wɛn ɔ e ɖetɛ ɖo matie mɛ
ðɔ pɔlu kpo silasi kpo ɖe ɖo filipu gbɔn e
hwɛjijɔ taji ɖevo wu mi nɔ kpo ɖo wɛn jla wɛ e ɖie mi yi wan nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ
enɛ gudo ɖo ɔ ayikungban danwu ɖe hunhun gankpa ɔ hun hɔn lɛ
xɛsi jɛ ɔ ji ɖo e ɖɔ lɛ hɔn yi jlo hu eɖee
pɔlu suxo ɖɔ wa nu do hwiɖee wu o
flu bi e kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ ɖo wa bɔ mawu hwlɛn mi gan
ɖɔ ɖɔ ði nu nu aklunɔ jezu enɛ ɔ mawu hwlɛn gan mɛ
ɔ tɔn kunkpla mitɔn gbɔn
etɛ mi nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa
ðo ayi nu elɔ wu hwenu ayikungban ɔ danwu gudo e wɛ ɔ wa huzu ayixa byɔ alɔdo
ɖokpo ɔ ɖo egbe ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yi wɛn biblu tɔn ɔ a lɛ e sixu huzu ayixa alɔdo hwenu nuɖe jɛ ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ ci ayikungban danwu ɖɔhun e
mɛ ɖevo lɛ tiin bɔ e sixu nyi ɖɔ alɔwliwli yetɔn kija ɖo malin malin mɛ din e wɛ zlɛ
ɔ e sixu nyi ɖɔ azɔn syɛnsyɛn e mɔ nu mɛɖe lɛ e wɛ bɔ flu bi alo ku ɖe ku do e wɛ gba hun do nu
enyi nu mɔhun lɛ jɛ ɔ mɛ flu bi lɛ e ɖe lɛ sixu kan nu byɔ do nu nɔ wɔn lɛ e wu ɖi nu wu ɔ do tiin e
vlafo tlɛ sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ ɖo wa bɔ mawu hwlɛn mi gan
enyi mi xo go mɛ enɛ lɛ ɔ sixu ɖoto wɛn nukunɖiɖo tɔn ɔ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɖo yetɔn mɛ
charlotte ee ɖo hwebinu tɔn mɛ sin xwe ɖie e ɖɔ lɛ bu ɖo egbe
e byɔ ɖɔ e hun ali ɖe nu bonu ɖoto wɛnɖagbe ɔ
ejvor ee nyi gbexosin ɖe sin xwe ɖie e ɖɔ egbe ɔ mɛ gege flu mɛ hu hwenu wa yi lɛ e bi
nugbo ɔ wan yi nu nɔzo nyi hwɛjijɔ wu e jɛxa bɔ e kpo ɖo ɔ wa wɛ e ɖokpo
nunina tɛ xo jaan ɖɔ
awajijɛ jezu tɔn huzu mitɔn gbɔn
awajijɛ nɔ mi ɖo mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
ðo zan ɖokpo enɛ jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn e mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ xo do nunina tɔn lɛ bɔ syɛnlin e gege ji
nunina tɛ lɛ wɛ
sixu hɛn le wa nu mi gbɔn
awajijɛ
gbɔn e
mi ɖɔ gbɔn wa yi e ɔ jezu eɖee do viwuntin ɖe wu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ do lɛ wu
enyi lɛ ɖo viwuntin ɔ wu jɛn wɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ sin kpo nuɖuɖu kpo nɔ gosin viwuntin ɔ mɛ e
ɖokpo ɔ enyi mi ɖo bu xa klisu ganji gbɔn afɔdomɛ tɔn lɛ xwixwedo gblamɛ ɔ mi mɔ awajijɛ ɖokpo ɔ e mɔ ɖo jlo tɔn tɔn wiwa wu e
jaan hanne ee nyi gbexosin ɖe sin xwe jɛji ɖie e ɖɔ awajijɛ nɔ mɔ hweɖebunu lɛkɔ sin ɔ mɛ e nɔ mi bɔ nɔ kpo ɖo jehovah tɔn wa wɛ
nugbo ɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo mi nɔ mɔ e nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi bɔ enyi fi mi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe ɔ vɛwu ɔ mi nɔ kpo
etɛwu fifa nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ kpo ɖo wɛ
fifa xa jaan
jezu to ɖɔ nu tɔn lɛ ɖo zan jɛ nukɔn nu ku tɔn e mɛ ɖɔ fifa wɛ
nunina enɛ nyi fifa e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ gbɔn
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun ɖɔ mawu kɔn nyɔna do mi ji bɔ mi ɖo fifa ayi mɛ tɔn nɔ ayi sɔyi e
lɛ sixu kpo ɖo jezu tɔn nyi wɛ gbɔn
zunzun
ee jezu ɖɔ jlo emitɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ awajijɛ emitɔn lɛ ɖo e ɔ nu bi vɔ gudo e ɔ e tinmɛ wanyiyi mɛɖesunɔ do tɔn nyi nu taji e
nunina xɔ akwɛ tawun wɛ zunzun xa jezu nyi
etɛ lɛ ɖo wa kpo ɖo tɔn nyi wɛ
xwe we jɛ nukɔn nu xo enɛ jezu ɖɔ e ɔ e ɖɔ nu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ jla do ali ɖɔ axɔsuɖuɖu jixwe tɔn sɛya
gbeɖiɖe jezu tɔn xwixwedo vɛwu e hɛn ɔ e kpa bɔ mɛ ɔ kpo ɖo tɔn nyi wɛ
gbɔn alɔdo nunina ɖevo tɔn gblamɛ wɛ
nunina enɛ nɔ ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ gbɔn
nunina tɛ lɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi ɖo egbe
jezu ɖɔ byɔ nu ɖebu ɔ ɖo nyikɔ mɛ ɔ e bi
jaan akpa enɛ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn lɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ kun mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ bi o bɔ gan yetɔn gosin ayikungban ji ɖo malin malin mɛ e jo do nyi yaya kpowun a
nugbo ɔ taan kpɛɖe ɖo enɛ gudo ɔ mɔ jehovah se ɖɛ ɖeɖee xo byɔ alɔdo lɛ e gbɔn e mɛ
mi sixu kudeji ɖɔ jehovah sinkɔn nu ɖɛ mi xo do byɔ alɔdo e akpaxwe ɔ
jɛn e nyi gbɔn ɖo egbe
ee mi nɔ syɛnlin nɔ ɖo wɛ e ɔ mi nɔ ɖu vivi zunzun xa jezu tɔn
ɔ mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah ɖo gbesisɔmɛ sinkɔn nu ɖɛ mi nɔ xo nɔ byɔ alɔdo do ɖu ɖo ɖeɖee mi sixu mɔ hwenu mi ɖo wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla wɛ e ji lɛ e fili
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun ɖɔ mawu kɔn nyɔna do mi ji nɔ se ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ bɔ mi zun xa jezu
etɛwu mi nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ wɛ
etɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi fo mawu tɔn
mi ɖɔ xo gbɔn ɖo xota elɔ mɛ e ɔ mi nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ wɛ do kpa nu jehovah hɛn nyikɔ tɔn ɖo ji do ɖe wanyiyi mitɔn jehovah kpo jezu kpo do nu mɛ lɛ ganji ɖe wanyiyi mi ɖo nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ e
ɔ nunina elɔ lɛ mawu mi e nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi bɔ mi fo tɔn wɛ nyi awajijɛ fifa zunzun kpo ɖɛ lɛ kpo
xomɛ hun jehovah sɔ hwenu e ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ mi ɖo gan do wɛ kpo mitɔn bi kpo gege e
ðo xo gudogudo tɔn jezu ɖɔ xa tɔn lɛ e mɛ ɔ e jiɖe azɔn gege ɖɔ mɔ sinkɔn nu ɖɛ yetɔn lɛ jaan
gbexosin we ɖo tlati ɖe xwle ɖe wɛ ɖo azinkan to ɔ tɔn nyi freetown e ɖo taan mɛ ji nɔ ja tawun ɖo to ɔ mɛ e
mi tuun linlin sataan tɔn lɛ ganji kɔ
ba tɛ mɛ sataan sixu wa nu do mi wu yi jɛ
sataan nɔ wa nu do lɛ wu gbɔn
etɛ do mitɔn wu
ðo edɛni mɛ ɔ etɛ jehovah do mitɔn wu
e ðo wɛn ɖɔ adamu tuun ɖɔ lɛ kun sixu ɖɔ xo o
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo tuun nu ɖe do nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ wu a
tlolo jɛn jehovah jɛ nuɖe lɛ do enɛ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo e wu ji do akpa ɖɔ e su kun do nu enɛ ɖo gudo mɛ
jehovah nu mɛ ɖɔ nuɖiɖo gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ gbɔn ɔ ji ɖɔ xo e ɖo hlɔnhlɔn klan gbe xa mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu mawu lɛ e nu taan ɖe bib
etɛwu e ci ɖɔ e kun ɖɔ xo gege do sataan wu cobɔ mɛsiya ɔ wa o
ðo jehovah nyi wutu ɔ e ɖɔ wɛnsagun nyikɔ vi tɔn gu do ji tɔn e tɔn nu mi gbeɖe a
ðo ebleegbe dodo ɔ mɛ ɔ wema atɔn gee jɛn ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ ylɔ enɛ sin nyikɔ wɛ nyi jɔbu kpo zakalii kpo
etɛwu e ɖɔ xo gege do wutu tɔn cobɔ mɛsiya ɔ wa a
e ci ɖɔ jehovah kun xɔ nu sataan din gbɔn xo gege ɖiɖɔ do e kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo wu ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e gblamɛ o ɖɔhun
hwenu nu nyi bɔ mɛsiya ɔ wa e ɔ jehovah zan jezu kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ kpo do ɖe nu mi tuun egbe lɛ e gege do sataan kpo wɛnsagun xo kpoɖo lɛ e kpo wu
enɛ sɔgbe ɖo jezu kpo mɛ yi do ɖe lɛ kpo wɛ jehovah zan do nu sataan kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ kpo hlɔ
jehovah jezu kpo wɛnsagun lɛ kpo ɖo gudo nu mi
kpo alɔdo yetɔn kpo ɔ mi sixu gbi dɔn ɖo mitɔn nukɔn
mi ɖo tuun nukanbyɔ taji atɔn elɔ lɛ sin xosin ba tɛ mɛ sataan sixu wa nu do mi wu yi jɛ
e nɔ wa nu do lɛ wu gbɔn
dogbo tɛ lɛ hlɔnhlɔn tɔn ɖo
ee mi ɖo xo ɖɔ do nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ ji wɛ e ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do nu mi lɛ e ji
etɛwu acɛkpikpa tɔn lɛ sixu su hudo taji hugan lɛ tɔn lɛ sin do a
wɛnsagun habu xo kpoɖo nu sataan ɖo tɔn mɛ
jɛ nukɔn nu sinvɔgbɛ ɔ ɔ sataan ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ bɔ ɖoxo xa nyɔnu lɛ
nuɖe hwenu wɛnsagun enɛ lɛ jo xwedo mawu tɔn do e ɔ huzu jɛ sataan sin acɛ mɛ
e nyi hunnyahunnya dɔn nyi ayi kɛɖɛ wɛ enɛ lɛ nyi a
sataan axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin nuvlɛnu ɖe eɖee do ɖo axɔsu
sataan do acɛkpikpa tɔn lɛ bi gbɔn tutoblonunu tɔn nukun nɔ mɔ a e gblamɛ
nu enɛ jɛ we vaan hwenu sataan axɔsuɖuto gbɛmɛ fi tɔn lɛ bi jezu ɖɔ xo elɔ e to enɛ lɛ kpodo dɔkun yetɔn lɛ bi kpo ɖo alɔ mɛ wɛ e nu lɛ bi do bɔ nɔ mɛ jlo mi e
sataan nɔ zan acɛkpikpa lɛ kpo sinsɛn nuvu kpo nu tutoblonunu tɔn kpo gbɔn
sataan nɔ gbɔn sinsɛn nuvu ji do ɖo adingban do jehovah
ɔ e ci ɖɔ awovi kanɖeji blo bɔ gege wɔn nyikɔ jehovah tɔn ɖɔhun
sataan nɔ xo adingban kan gbɔn tutoblonunu tɔn gblamɛ
ði ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ tutoblonunu enɛ nɔ lɛ ɖɔ ali ɖagbe hugan e ɖo awajijɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nya akwɛ gbe xo nuɖokan gege kple nux
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu nu agbaza tɔn lɛ e sixu wanyiyi ɖo nu mawu e hu
jaan nu we tɛ lɛ adamu ɛvu kpo wɛnsagun gu lɛ e kpo tɔn sixu mi
enyi mi tuun ba mɛ sataan sixu wa nu do mi wu yi jɛ e ɔ le tɛ nu mi
e hwe bi ɔ adamu ɛvu kpo wɛnsagun gu lɛ e kpo tɔn nu taji we mi
nukɔntɔn ɔ akpaxwe we wɛ ɖe bɔ mi ɖo ɖokpo
wegɔ ɔ le ɖo dogbo lɛ e jɛn mɛ ɖeɖee xo kpoɖo nu sataan lɛ e nɔ mɔ
e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖo linlin ɖo ji e do acɛkpikpa ɔ tɔn lɛ wu nɔ bɔ akpakpa nɔ mi do mitɔn wu
mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖo sisi nu acɛkpikpa to tɔn lɛ
jaan ðo mi tuun nu sataan ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ nyikɔ ɖagbe jehovah ɖo e do wa e wutu ɔ enɛ nɔ mi hugan bɔ mi nɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ do nugbo ɖeɖee kunkpla mawu mitɔn e wu
mi nɔ go ɖɔ nyikɔ enɛ ɖo mitɔn nɔ zan nyikɔ ɔ nɔ tuun ɖɔ ajɔ e do mi ɖo wanyiyi mi ɖo e wutu e hugan wanyiyi e sixu ɖo nu akwɛ alo nuɖokan lɛ e flafla tɔn eza
sataan sixu ɖo mɔ do wli nɔvi tɔn wɛnsagun lɛ gbɔn
etɛ mɔ mɛ wɛnsagun gege jɛ e sixu mi
sataan nɔ zan wlɛnwin nɔ tawun lɛ e do wa nu do lɛ wu
ði ɔ e nɔ ɖo mɔ do lɛ bonu wa nu e gbɔn e
ɔ e nɔ do xɛsi bɔ nɔ acɛ tɔn glɔ
mi mɔ sataan zan do wli nɔvi tɔn wɛnsagun lɛ gege e e
e ɖo zan hwenu gege do nu ganji cobo dɔn do ahwan tɔn mɛ
bib nwt vlafo e nyi ali hun nu wɛnsagun enɛ lɛ bɔ ɖoxo xa nyɔnu lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ sataan zan do a loɔ e nu ɖɔ do lɛ ji
ðebu wɛ e tlɛ nyi ɔ jehovah ɖo nu wlɛnwin enɛ lɛ bi bɔ sin vɔ ɔ
enɛ su ali do gan sataan kpo wɛnsagun lɛ kpo do ɖo hwenɛnu e
sataan nɔ ɖo mɔ nu mi gbɔn nu elɔ lɛ gblamɛ nublibliwiwa e go e jɛxa gbɔn a e kpo awovinuwiwa kpo akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
etɛ lɛ nu enɛ jɛ e sixu mi
nukun kpɛvi do mɔ nublibliwiwa tɔn alo awovinu ɖo cejɛnnabi mɛ e gbeɖe o
wɛnsagun ɖeɖee xo kpoɖo nu sataan lɛ e wa ɖo xa mawu nu xwe mɔkpan
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi sixu mawu nu xwe gege ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn sin akpaxwe ayikungban ji tɔn ɔ mɛ
e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ mi nɔ gbeje ayi mitɔn mɛ hwɛhwɛ nyi alɔ nu linlin blibli lɛ nɔ go e jɛxa gbɔn a e o xa kolosinu lɛ
mɔ ɖevo sataan nɔ zan nɔ kpa ɛ e wɛ nyi nudobiba do nuɖoyɛswimɛ lɛ wu
egbe ɔ e nyi sinsɛn nuvu lɛ kɛɖɛ ji wɛ e nɔ gbɔn nɔ nudobiba do awovi lɛ wu sin jlo do lanmɛ nu lɛ a e nɔ gbɔn nɔ sɔnu nu ayiɖeɖayi lɛ e ji
fimu lɛ ayihundida ji tɔn lɛ kpo xojlajla sin nu ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ blo bɔ awovinuwiwa nɔ ci nu akpakpa mɛ e ɖɔhun
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu mɔ mɔhun mɛ jijɛ gbɔn
mi ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ tutoblonunu mawu tɔn ayiɖeɖayi sɔgbe e kpo ee sɔgbe a lɛ e kpo nu mi a
enyi mɛ nɔ biblu xa alo mɛ nɔ yi lɛ e mɔ ayiɖeɖayi nɔ lɛ e ɔ ɖɔ nɔ wa nu nɔ mɛ lɛ e a
ba mɛ mi nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa xo mi nɔ ɖɔ lɛ e ɖo e ɔ ba enɛ mɛ wɛ e vɛwu nu sataan wli mi do mɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo jaan
sataan nɔ do xɛsi mi gbɔn mitɔn acɛkpikpa lɛ nɔ e kɔgbidinumɛ lɛ tɔn kpo gbeklanxamɛ xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo gblamɛ akpaxwe ɔ
sataan sixu do xɛsi mi gbɔn mi sixu ɖi xwi xa gbɔn
nu mɔ ɖiɖo nu mɛ ɔ sataan nɔ do xɛsi mi bonu mi gɔn gbeji nɔ nu jehovah
ði ɔ e sixu zan acɛkpikpa lɛ bɔ mitɔn
alo e sixu mitɔn lɛ ɖo mitɔn ji abi wemaxɔ mitɔn mɛ bɔ ca nu mi ɖo jlo mi ɖo zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo walɔ ɖagbe tɔn biblu tɔn lɛ e wu
mi sixu ɖi xwi xa gbɔn
nukɔntɔn ɔ mi ɖo ɖo nukun ɖɔ e ahwan mi tlɔlɔ sataan ɖo ahwan xa mi wɛ
gudo tɔn ɔ mi ɖo ganjɛ jehovah wu mɔ hlɔnhlɔn do xo taji ɖo atɛ ji e wu
sataan sixu hɛn mi gannugannu bɔ mi wa nu jlo mi a e wɛ a
mɛ gege nɔ nɔ vi mɛ nɔ wa nu sɔgbe xa linlin sataan tɔn
enyi mi kanɖeji wa jlo mawu tɔn ɔ sataan sixu wa nu ɖebu xo gbeji mi ɖe nu mawu e yi a jɔb nwt
dogbo ɖevo tɛ lɛ sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖi xɛsi gɔn ɖɛ xo do ji jehovah a
sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo dogbo ɖevo lɛ
ði ɔ fi ɖebu ɖo biblu mɛ ɖɔ sixu tuun nu ɖo linlin alo ayi mɛɖe tɔn mɛ e a
mak bɔ enyi mi ɖɔ xo do ji alo xoɖɛ do ji ɔ lo
mi ɖo ɖi xɛsi ɖɔ sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo sixu se ɖɛ mitɔn do wa nu wɛ a
xosin ɔ wɛ nyi eo
mi nɔ ɖi xɛsi nɔ gɔn ɖagbe lɛ wa ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ ɖo awovi sixu mɔ mi kpowun wutu a
ðo ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi ɖi xɛsi gɔn ɖɛ xo do ji ɖo awovi taa se wutu a
e byɔ ɖɔ mi tuun mitɔn xɛsi ɖo ɖi mi do wu tɔn a
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ lɛ sixu ɖu ɖo sataan ji
jaan enyi mi huzu kpannukɔn ɛ ɔ e hɔn yi zɔ nu mi
etɛ sixu blo tawun gbi dɔn ɖo awovi nukɔn
xota bɔ e xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ
ðo jehovah nyikɔ sunvi lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wutu ɔ ðɛh e sɔgbe bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ wɛnsagun lɛ bi jɛ ee wa huzu sataan e ji ɖo nyikɔ yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ
ðo gbe dodo lɛ mɛ ɔ azɔn gee jɛn e mɔ tɛnmɛ nyikɔ sataan ɔ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e mɛ mɔ ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do glɛkigbe mɛ e mɛ azɔn jɛji
fɔ ahwanfunnu mawu lɛ bi kpla sixu nɔte ɖo mɔ awovi nɔ ɖo nu mɛ lɛ nukɔn efɛ
ðɔ nu ɖeɖee ɖo ahwanfunnu gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn mɛ lɛ e
etɛwu e ɖo dandan ɖɔ mi fɔ ahwanfunnu enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kpla
etɛ do ɖeɖee mɛ winnyawinnya mitɔn lɛ lɛ e wu
etɛwu klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ nɔ kpewu nɔ ɖu ɖo ahwanfunfun xa nuɖoyɛswimɛ nyanya lɛ ji
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛ mi do
pɔlu gbɛzan klisanwun tɔn mitɔn do sɔja ɖeɖee kpannukɔn sɔja ɖevo lɛ ɖo ahwan xa wɛ e wu
e ɖo co mitɔn lɛ tiin nugbo nugbo
sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo nyi ɖo nunywɛ tawun
e tlolo ɔ e sixu mɔ ɖɔ nukunɖiɖo mitɔn
ðo taji ɔ e sixu mɔ ɖɔ e yawu kpe klisanwun winnyawinnya lɛ wu
nukunɖiɖo yetɔn sixu bɔ ɖu ɖo nuɖoyɛswimɛ nyanya hu hlɔnhlɔn lɛ e ji gbɔn
nugbo ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu ɖu nɔ ɖu nugbo
etɛwu
sɔja e ganji lɛ e ɖɔhun ɔ nɔ fɔ ahwanfunnu mawu lɛ bi kpla xa efɛzinu lɛ
hwenu pɔlu ɖo nujlɛdonuwu enɛ tinmɛ wɛ e ɔ vlafo ahwanfunnu sɔja hlɔma tɔn lɛ nɔ fɔ kpla e wɛ ɖo ayi mɛ
hwenu mi ɖo wa wɛ e ɔ ɖo ayi nu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe lɛ ɖɔ do kpo le kpo ɖeɖee e nɔ mɔ hwenu e fɔ ahwanfunnu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kpla e wu
fɔ ahwanfunnu towe lɛ bi kpla a
nugbo ɖo biblu mɛ e ci gojiblanu hlɔma tɔn tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun gbɔn
sɔja hlɔma tɔn ɖe sin gojiblanu nɔ ɖo kpacakpaca ɖe lɛ bɔ enɛ lɛ nɔ cyɔn alɔ tɔn ji
e sɔnu bonu e ɖe ahwanfunnu sɔja ɖe fɔ kpla sin wa alinkan lɛ e sin kpinkpɛn kpo
gojiblanu ɔ ɖo nuwlinu syɛnsyɛn ɖe lɛ bɔ nɔ hɛn sɔja ɔ sin hwi kpo jivi kpo
enyi sɔja ɖe sin gojiblanu tɔn ganji ɔ e sixu ɖeji gbi dɔn ɖo ahwangbenu
ɖokpo ɔ nugbo ɖeɖee mi nɔ ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e nɔ cyɔn alɔ mi ji sin nukplɔnmɛ adingban tɔn ɖeɖee sixu wa nu do mi wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e si
jaan jaan ba mɛ mi ɖo wanyiyi nu nugbo ɖeɖee gosin mawu lɛ e ɖo e ɔ ba enɛ mɛ wɛ e nɔ bɔwu nu mi bɔ mi ganwu mitɔn do ɖo enɛ wɛ nyi gbɛzinzan sɔgbe xa nugbododo jlɔjlɔ mawu tɔn lɛ ðɛh
jaan ɔ enyi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ mi ɖo do nugbo ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e ji e zawe ganji ɔ mi sixu gbi dɔn kpo jiɖiɖe kpo jɛhun do ji ɖo lɛ nukɔn
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ ɖɔ nugbo
enyi nugbo biblu tɔn jinjɔn ayi ganji ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ ɔ e mi bɔ mi zan sɔgbe kpo e kpo nɔ ɖɔ nugbo hwebinu
etɛwu mi nyi alɔ nu adingban ɖiɖo
ðo adingban ɖiɖo nyi ahwanlyannu sataan nɔ zan nɔ tawun e ɖokpo
adingban ɖiɖo nɔ hɛn nu gble do mɛ ɖo e kpo mɛ ɖi nu lɛ e kpo bi wu
e sixu vɛwu
ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ nugboɖiɖɔ hwebinu sixu ci nu ɖo dandan a e ɖɔhun ɖo taji ɔ hwenu adingban ɖiɖo sixu bɔ e sin ninɔmɛ vɛwu ɖe mɛ e
bɔ etɛwu e nɔ nɔ ɖɔ nugbo hwebinu
e ɖɔ enyi ɖɔ nugbo ɔ nɔ ɖo ayixa ɖe ɖo jehovah nukɔn
bɔ lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nɔ tuun ɖɔ emi sixu ɖeji do wu ye
victoria ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ enyi nɔ ɖɔ nugbo nɔ jɛhun do nu ɖi nu lɛ e ji ɔ e sixu do xɛsi
mɔ le nukunɖeji lɛ hwebinu ɖo jiɖiɖe nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi sɛkpɔ jehovah bɔ mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu lɛ e nɔ si
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ nugbo nyi gojiblanu ɖo mitɔn hwebinu
nugbo nyi gojiblanu akpaxwe
etɛwu hwɛjijɔ ci ganwu ɖe ɖɔhun
enɛ lɛ ɔ e nɔ nya bɔ nɔ sɔgbe xa sɔja ɔ bɔ e nɔ zan anyukan ɖe do lɔn ɖo
nu mlɛgan ɖɔhun ɖe kpo nɔ dɔn nu ca e ɖe kpo wɛ e nɔ zan do wa enɛ
agbaza sɔja ɔ tɔn gosin wa alinkan e ɔ enɛ lɛ e anyukan do lɔn e nɔ bu bi
awu alɔkpa enɛ nɔ bɔ sɔja ɖe nɔ sixu tɛn ganji a nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e nɔ hwɛhwɛ ɖɔ lɛ kpo ɖo tɛn yetɔn mɛ ganji a ji
e nɔ bɔ hwi e xu e alo ga e do e e byɔ hun tɔn alo wujɔnu ɖeɖee bɔ e ɖo e ɖe mɛ a
nujlɛdonuwu enɛ nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ sixu cyɔn alɔ ayi mitɔn ji gbɔn e sɔgbe nux
nu mi nɔ ɖɔ e sɔgbe lɛ e ɔ xo nɔ tawun sixu bonu mi mɔ alɔcyɔnmɛji sin hudo mi ɖo e a
etɛwu e jɛxa ɖɔ e do nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ wu
nɔ mɔ hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ kpɛn agban alo ɖo dogbo nu mɛɖesusininɔ towe wɛ a
daniel ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nɔ mi ɖo nɔ zan sɔgbe xa nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ wutu
nu hwenu ɖe ɔ ɖeji do nugbododo lɛ wu a bɔ awakanmɛ ku mi
e ɖu gbɔn
e ɖɔ wa mɔ le ɖeɖee ɖo gbɛzinzan sɔgbe xa nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ e
enyii ɖe lɛ jɛ gee ji mɛ ɖevo lɛ jo do
yetɔn huzu gbɔn e blawu tawun
madison ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ wu kpo nu wa sɔgbe xa nu lɛ ɖɔ e alo e kpo vɛwu nu mi
e ɖu gbɔn
nɔ flin nyiɖee ɖɔ ɖo nyikɔ jehovah tɔn ɖo bɔ tɛnkpɔn lɛ nyi ali sataan gbɔn wli mi e
hwɛjijɔ nyi ganwu akpaxwe
afɔkpa nujlɛdonuwu tɔn tɛ klisanwun lɛ nɔ do
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi nɔ vo ganji hwenu mi ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ e
sɔja hlɔma tɔn ɖe do afɔkpa tɔn lɛ a ɔ e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɖi zɔnlin yi ahwan a nɛ
anyu atɔn wɛ e nɔ kple do blo afɔkpa enɛ lɛ bɔ afɔkpa ɔ nɔ hɛn afɔ tɔn lɛ ganji
e ɖo co e nɔ byɔ akɔnkpinkpan cobɔ e ɖɔ xo hwenu ali tɔn hun nu mɛ e
roberto ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ xɛsi nɔ ɖi mi do kunnuɖiɖe nu lɛ wu
mɔ ɖɔ winnya nɔ hu mi
nu gudo ɔ tuun nu wu winnya ɖo hu mi e a
mɛ winnyawinnya gege mɔ ɖɔ enyi emi sɔnu ganji do jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɔ emi nɔ vo hugan do wa
etɛ sixu wa do ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
julia ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ nɔ fɔ wema mitɔn lɛ do saki mɛ nɔ ɖoto linlin lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo nu ɖi nu lɛ e kpo enɛ ɔ nɔ kpewu nɔ tamɛ do nu e wu
enyi sɔnu ɔ nɔ kpewu nɔ ɖɔ xo nu do nu hɛn le wa nu tawun lɛ e ji
makenzie ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ enyi nɔ xomɛ nyi ɖagbe ɔ kpewu ɖo linlin ɖe do nu towe lɛ ɖo xwi ɖi xa wɛ e wu
nɔ nɔ xa wema e nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ e bi
mɛ ɔ sixu ali lɛ yi nu ɖo biblu mɛ alo jw org ji lɛ e ɖe kɔn do
xo enɛ lɛ gbɔn e ɔ ba mɛ nɔ sɔnu jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo e ɔ ba enɛ mɛ wɛ afɔkpa nujlɛdonuwu tɔn ɔ do afɔ towe lɛ wu ganji ɖo
kan ɖo do wɛnɖagbe wu nyi afɔkpa akpaxwe
ðɔ ga myɔnɔ sataan sixu zan do wu e ɖe lɛ
gaglonu ee hlɔma tɔn lɛ nɔ hɛn e ɖo gblo zɛɛn zɛɛn webɔ webɔ nɔ bu ɔ sin yi koli
e nɔ zan do cyɔn alɔ eɖee ji sin ahwanfunnu kpo ga tobutobu e do e e kpo si
ida ee ɖo xwe e ɖi xwi xa linlin e nɔ ɖo ɖɔ emi kun nuti o e
e ɖɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah kun sɛkpɔ mi o e kun nyi o
e ɖi xwi xa linlin enɛ gbɔn
ida ɖɔ kple lɛ nɔ hlɔnhlɔn nuɖiɖi tawun
ɔ nɔ xosin ɖo kple lɛ ji gbeɖe a nɔ jinjɔn ayi kpowun ɖo nɔ ɖɔ mɛɖebu kun ɖoto nu ɖo ɖɔ e o
din ɔ nɔ sɔnu nu kple lɛ nɔ xosin azɔn we alo atɔn
e vɛwu nu blo ɔ nɔ mɔ nyiɖee mɛ
nugbo tɛ ji ida sin
miɖesu wɛ ɖɔ
tɛ e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖo nuɖiɖi mitɔn hɛn lido wɛ e
nuɖiɖi nyi gaglonu akpaxwe
nukunɖiɖo ci gangbakun ɖe ɖɔhun gbɔn
gangbakun ɖe lɛ nɔ ɖo ɖe bɔ sɔja ɖe sixu hɛn do alɔ mɛ
nukunɖiɖo nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ayi mitɔn ɖo akpa mawu tɔn lɛ ji nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ tagba mitɔn lɛ ɖo ali sɔgbe e
enyi mi ɖɔ gangbakun mitɔn ganji ɔ mi ɖo xwe do mi hɛn do alɔ mɛ a
sataan sixu mi bɔ mi ɖe gangbakun mitɔn gbɔn
mi sixu gbɔn ɖɔ sataan tɔn kun flu mi o
e wa nu xa jezu gbɔn e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ sataan tuun ɖɔ nukunɖiɖo jezu tɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ e wa do lɛ ji
jezu ɖo nɔte jɛ hwenu jehovah ɖo do e
jɛ nukɔn nu enɛ ɔ e ɖo jiya ku
enɛ wu ɔ sataan byɔ jezu ɖɔ e blo bonu nukunɖiɖo tɔn yawu jɛnu
sataan ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi e nu emi ɔ e sixu ɖo nu enɛ lɛ bi kun nɔ linlin mɛ o
enɛ wu ɔ sataan nɔ hun ali tɔn lɛ ɖo nuvo nu mi bonu mi ɖu mɔhun sin vivi din
e jlo ɖɔ mi nya nuɖokan lɛ gbe jɛ nukɔn ɖo bi din
klisanwun winnyawinnya gege ɖɔhun ɔ kiana ɖo xwe e lɔn nu enɛ flu a
e ɖɔ tuun ɖɔ nu ɖokpo ɖeɖɛ tagba mitɔn lɛ bi e wɛ nyi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn
nukunɖiɖo syɛnsyɛn enɛ wa ɖagbe nu linlin tɔn kpo nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn
nɔ zan nuwukpikpe lɛ nu ɖagbe nyiɖesunɔ tɔn alo kan do kan ji a
e wa ɔ nɔ zan hwenu kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo do nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya mɛ
hwlɛngan nyi gangbakun akpaxwe
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ nuwukpikpe biblu zinzan tɔn mitɔn
hwi hlɔma tɔn lɛ nɔ zan ɖo taan mɛ pɔlu wlan wema mɛ tɔn e sin nɔ ɖo santimɛtlu bɔ e sɔnu bonu e huzu kpannukɔn mɛtɔn kpe ahwan xa ɛ
hwɛjijɔ wu sɔja hlɔma tɔn lɛ ahwan ganji e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ nɔ zan ahwanfunnu yetɔn lɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe
pɔlu xo mawu tɔn do hwi ɖe wu bɔ jehovah mi
sixu blo gbɔn bɔ nuwukpikpe towe lɛ
sebastian ee ɖo xwe e ɖɔ nu ɖo biblu xa wɛ ɔ nɔ wlan wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖokpo sin wemata xa lɛ e bi mɛ
xo wemafɔ yi wan ganji lɛ e kple
mɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ linlin jehovah tɔn ma do mi hugan
daniel xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e ɖɔ nu ɖo biblu xa wɛ ɔ nɔ wemafɔ ɖeɖee ɖɔ e mɛ nɔ mɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e e
mɔ ɖɔ enyi mɛ lɛ ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ akpakpa nɔ mɛ do biblu wu bonu e nɔ wa nu wu e kpe e bi do ɔ nɔ yi mɛ ganji
hwi gbigbɔ do alɔ mɛ nu e akpaxwe
etɛwu e byɔ ɖɔ mi jo miɖee do nu sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo do xɛsi mi a
mɛ winnyawinnya xo mi ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ mɛ lɛ e gbɔn e ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ mi jo miɖee do nu sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo do xɛsi mi a
do xɛsi nugbo e sixu ɖu ɖo ji
zaanɖe din ɖo axɔsuɖuɖu xwe tɔn klisu tɔn hwenu ɔ e yi acɛ sin si bi bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e su kun yetɔn do
mi tuun mitɔn wlɛnwin tɔn lɛ kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ mi sixu gbi dɔn ɖo nukɔn tɔn
ɖaxo ɖo nyzhnya apsha ukraine ɖo
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ ɖu vivi nukun wɔbuwɔbu ɖe yiya tɔn ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ
nu mi xogbe enɛ lɛ nyi nugbo ɖo ali bunɔ ɖe ɖo xa transcarpatie ukraine tɔn ɖe mɛ gbɔn e
ðo toxo do xa enɛ e atɔn kpowun mɛ ɔ agun kpo axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jɛji kpo wɛ
nugbo ɔ nu e xo mɛ ɖo toxo atɔn enɛ lɛ bi mɛ e kple ɔ mɛ ɖo mɛ ji nyi jehovah tɔn
e ɖɔ ɖɔ nɔ yi gbe nu nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e hwebinu a
enyi e nuɖe lɛ ɖo biblu mɛ ɔ nɔ xwe sɔ nɔ ɖoto
ði ɔ agun ɖokpo ɖo xwe mɛɖesunɔ tɔn gee wɛ ɖo fi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe e
lɛ huzu sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ enɛ gbɔn
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo gege nɔ yeɖee jo do jla wɛn ɔ ɖo xa mɛ hudo ɖe lɛ e
ionash ee nyi nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo xwe e ɖɔ nu e ma xwe lɛ ɖo ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ ɔ xwe gbe jɛn jla wɛn ɔ ɖe
nɔ ɖekunnu ɖo gletoxo ɔ mɛ jɛ agaɖanu din lanmɛ gble e ɔ blo kilomɛtlu yi xa e ɖe nu agun ɖe a e mɛ yi jla wɛn ɔ do hongrie gbe mɛ ɖo finɛ
lɛ ɖo cobo ɖo xa ɖevo lɛ mɛ
ionash ɖɔ do do pipan ɔ nɔ ɖo ɛnɛ mɛ zanzan nɔ jla wɛn ɔ jɛ mɛ gbadanu hwenu pipan ɔ nɔ lɛkɔ e
nɔ blo azɔn we alo atɔn ɖo aklunɔzan gbla ɖokpo mɛ
e mɔ ɖɔ gan enɛ lɛ emi do e xɔ akwɛ a
e ɖɔ mɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo ɖo alɔkpa enɛ mɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mɛ ɖo agun ɖeɖee ɖo xa enɛ mɛ lɛ e bi sixu yi fi linlin lɛ a
mɛ bi jɛ mɛxomɔ lɛ ji do gan ɖekunnu gbɔn xa e ɖe nu lɛ e bi mɛ
nu mɛ e kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu e xo mɛ wa flin ɔ ɖo toxo atɔn enɛ lɛ mɛ ɖo e bi kple ɔ e ɖibla yi lɛ tɔn donu we alo mɛ ɖo to ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi tɔn sin wevlɔɖo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu mi tlɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi ɖebu ɔ nu gege kpo bɔ mi wa ɖo aklunɔ sin ɔ mɛ kɔ nwt
toxo enɛ lɛ sin nyikɔ wɛ nyi hlybokyy potik serednye vodyane kpo nyzhnya apsha kpo
axɔsuɖuɖu nyi gbɛmɛ fi tɔn a
mi bi nyi ðokpo jehovah kpo jezu kpo nyi ðokpo gbɔn e
mɛ nɔ ɖo jezu hwenu lɛ e klan ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ ninɔmɛ tɔn tɔn kpo vogbingbɔn akɔ tɔn lɛ kpo wu
ðo xota we elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ klisu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bɔ ɖo bu nɔ ɖu ɖo linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu ee nɔ klan mɛ e ji gbɔn e
mi mɔ yetɔn sixu mi bɔ mi wa nu ɖokpo ɔ ɖo elɔ klan e mɛ gbɔn e
e hɛn ɔ e blo bɔ nu tɔn mawu nukunmɛ
nu mawu tɔn lɛ kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo ayixa towe
nu ayixa mitɔn nyi ɖe ɔ mi ɖo ɛ
wanyiyi jehovah mi kpo nugbododo kpo ee mi bɔ mi ayixa mitɔn nu lɛ jehovah nɔ gbɔn e e
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do mi sixu zan nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ ɖo ali ɖagbe ɖe gbɔn e ji
weziza mitɔn kpa nu jehovah
jezu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ blo bonu weziza yetɔn do kpa nu mawu
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do nu tawun tawun ɖeɖee mi sixu wa mi bɔ mi blo bɔ weziza mitɔn hugan e ji
gbɛzan tɔn mɔ gbɔdonumɛ ðo lɛ bi mɛ
hlɔnhlɔn gbedomɛ tɔn
wa ɔ mɛ ɖekunnu nu nugbo ɔ jaan
jezu ɖɔ tuto toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn lɛ kun mya nukun nu emi o gbɔn
linlin ɖo ji e tɛ jezu byɔ mɛ ɖɔ e ɖo do takwɛ nina wu
linlin tɛ klisanwun lɛ nɔ ɖo do adakaxixo wu
ɔ klan sɔ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi xosin ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn elɔ mɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo tofɔligbe elɔpu tɔn ɖo nu e wa wa yi e flin wɛ ɖɔ sin hwenu ɖo vu e ɔ nu agɔ kɛɖɛ jɛn e nɔ wa xa mɛ lɛ bɔ nɔ mɔ
enɛ wu ɔ tuto toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖo to mɛ e nɔ gudo nu nu mɛ gege nɔ mɔ do mɔ linlin tɔn lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ nu xwe gege ɔ nyi nyɔnu ɖe tɔn
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo tofɔligbe aflika tɔn bɔ ɔ e lɔ nɔ mɔ hwɛjijɔ nu dakaxixo
e ɖɔ ɖi ɖɔ akɔ wɛ hugan ɖe lɛ bi byɔ toxoɖɔgbɛta ɖe mɛ
e mi ɖɔ mi nɔ hwan do hu mitɔn lɛ enyi tlɛ nyi akɔ mitɔn ɖo gudo nu toxoɖɔgbɛta ɖevo ɔ nɛ
linlin ɖo jijɛji wɛ ɖo egbe tɔn ɔ mɛ e ɖo nuwiwa mɛ atɔn enɛ lɛ tɔn mɛ
dakaxixo jɛ mɛɖee kannu ɖo kan vun wɛ kinklan ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu ɖo ɖɔ do do wɛ ɖo to gege mɛ ɔ wan nu jonɔ lɛ ɖo jijɛji wɛ
biblu ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ alɔkpa lɛ bi ɖo linlin tɔn ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ a
tim nwt din ɔ ɖo kinklan wɛ hugan e ɔ klisanwun lɛ sixu nya xɛ ɖo buninɔ yetɔn ji gbɔn
jezu ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ ɖe gbɔn ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ hwenu hunnyahunnya toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn bɔ to ɔ ɖo xixo wɛ e gbigbeje sixu nu gege mi
nu mi ɖɔ xo do nu taji atɔn wu etɛwu jezu ɖo tuto nɔ klan mɛ lɛ e ɖebu mɛ a
e ɖɔ mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo nyi alɔ nu alɔɖiɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ mɛ gbɔn
jezu mi ɖɔ mi kun sixu hwɛjijɔ nu dakaxixo mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu o gbɔn
nu tɛ lɛ ɖo nukun wɛ jwifu lɛ ɖe ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu ɖo jezu hwenu
nuɖonukun enɛ lɛ wa nu do ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ wu gbɔn
jwifu jezu jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ lɛ e gege nɔ jlo tawun jɛ yeɖee kannu sin hlɔma to ɔ si
jwifu lɛ alo lɛ nɔ mɛ lɛ bonu ɖo linlin enɛ lɛ
gege enɛ lɛ tɔn xwedo linlin judasi galileenu ɔ ɖo lɛ e
mɛsiya ɖe wɛ nya enɛ nyi ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ flu mɛ gege
hwenuxo jwifu nɔ nyi josephus e ɖɔ ɖɔ judasi enɛ to tɔn mɛ lɛ bonu gu nu nu ɖɔ nyi xɛsinɔ ɖo yi gbe nɔ nujɔ hlɔmanu lɛ wutu
hlɔmanu lɛ hu judasi mɛ
ɖe lɛ tlɛ xo daka do kpe nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe e wu
gbɔn vo nu enɛ lɛ ɔ jwifu kpaa lɛ lɔ ɖo wiwa mɛsiya ɖɔ toxo e ɖe tɔn nukun myamya
mɛ gege ɖi nu ɖɔ mɛsiya ɔ ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɖe ayi ɖo ayikungban ji ɖo izlayɛli
bɔ hwenu nu nyi e ɔ jwifu gbakpe gbe ɖevo ji lɛ e lɛkɔ wa jɔtɛn yetɔn
flin ɖɔ jaan ɔ kanbyɔ gbe ɖokpo ɖɔ hwi wɛ nyi mɛ ɖo wa bɔ mi ɖo e a
jaan sixu tuun nu elɔ mɛ ɖevo wɛ wa blo nu ɖo nukun wɛ jwifu lɛ ɖe e bi a
nu ahwanvu we kpe jezu sin ku e ɖo ali emawusi tɔn ji lɛ e lɔ ɔ nu ɖo nukun wɛ ɖe do mɛsiya ɔ wu e jɛ a xa luki
enɛ gudo zaan ɔ jezu tɔn lɛ kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ aklunɔ hwenɛnu wɛ axɔsuɖuɖu izlayɛli tɔn ɔ do alɔ mɛ nu izlayɛli a mɛ
etɛwu galileenu lɛ ɖɔ jezu nyi axɔsu yetɔn
jezu jla linlin yetɔn ɖo gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ ɖo nukun wɛ galileenu lɛ ɖe do mɛsiya ɔ wu e bɔ jlo jezu nyi axɔsu yetɔn
ee jezu nuɖuɖu sunnu gudo e ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ e vivi nu lɛ
ee jezu mɔ ɖɔ wa emi kpo hlɔnhlɔn kpo emi axɔsu ɔ e gosin finɛ tunta sokan ɔ mɛ eɖokponɔ
jezu tinmɛ alɔkpa wa wɛ e ɖe tawun e nu ahwan ɔ
e wa hɛn nyɔna gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ wa nu akɔta ɔ e nyi agbaza tɔn lɛ a
e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nɔ jɛ tagba do nuɖuɖu nɔ gble ɔ tamɛ o loɔ nɔ jɛ tagba do nuɖuɖu nɔ nɔ ayi sɔyi mavɔmavɔ e tamɛ jaan
jezu nyi wɛn ɖɔ emi kun ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu ɖo ayikungban ji o gbɔn
taan kpɛɖe jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ɖɔ emi ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɖe ayi ɖo ayikungban ji ɖo jeluzalɛmu
e do lo ɖe do sikagankwɛ lɛ wu do jla linlin enɛ ɖo
lo ɔ ɖɔ jezu nyi nya nukunɖeji ɖe e ɖo yi nɔ tawun
jezu e ɖo wu zɔ nu acɛkpikpa hlɔma tɔn gbɔn e
jezu yi gbe ɖɔ axɔsuɖuɖu nyi gbɛmɛ fi tɔn a
jaan e ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ mɛ a ɖo axɔsuɖuto tɔn ɔ jixwe wɛ e nɔ
e ɖɔ nu pilatu ɖɔ emitɔn ɖo ayikungban ji wɛ nyi ɖɔ emi ɖekunnu nu nugbo ɔ xa jaan
tagba ɔ tɔn lɛ ji wɛ ayi towe ɖe a alo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn
aniwu e sixu vɛwu bɔ ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi nyi alɔ nu gudo ninɔ nu tuto hunxixo jɛ mɛɖee kannu tɔn lɛ
e sixu nɔ bɔwu
ɖe ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ mɛ ɖo xa mitɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖo nyi wɛ
linlin wanyiyi ɖo nu to mɛtɔn tɔn gblo ada bɔ mɛ gege kudeji ɖɔ mɛɖee kannu ninɔ ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu bɔ gbɛzan emitɔn
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ cyɔn alɔ buninɔ klisanwun tɔn yetɔn ji gbɔn ayi ɖo wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla ji gblamɛ
na agban kpinkpɛn nɔ kɔ ji nu jwifu lɛ ɖo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ e sin ɖokpo
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nuagɔwaxamɛ lɛ nɔ do nu jlo toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn lɛ
takwɛyiyi nyi toxoɖiɖɔ sin xo ɖe ɖo ji tawun ɖo jezu hwenu nugbo ɔ judasi galileenu xo mi ɖɔ wa yi e tɔn ɔ mɛxixa sin tuto e blo do ganjɛwu ɖɔ togun ɔ nujɔ hlɔma to ɔ e wɛ do
e nɔ byɔ takwɛ gege tovi hlɔma tɔn lɛ jɛ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo to ɖo jezu wɛ lɛ e ji ɖi ɔ nɔ su takwɛ nu ɖo lɛ e tɔn ayikungban yetɔn tɔn kpo xwe yetɔn lɛ kpo tɔn
mɛxoɖu lɛ tɔn tawun bɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo agban kpinkpɛn ɖe
lɛ sixu xɔ tɛn acɛkpikpa tɔn ɖe ɖo nusisa hwenu mɛ akwɛ ɖaxo hugan e wɛ nɔ yi nu ɔ e ɖe hwenu bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ wlo nu e xokple lɛ e ɖu
zacee nyi ɖe ɖo jeliko e huzu dɔkunnɔ gbɔn mɛ lɛ xixo ɖu gblamɛ
jezu tɔn lɛ dɔn ɛ do toxoɖiɖɔ sin xo ɖe mɛ gbɔn
etɛ xosin jezu tɔn mi
takwɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖo fi e ɔ takwɛ ɖe wɛ nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e yi gankwɛ ɖokpo ɖo tovi hlɔma tɔn ɖokpo ɖokpo si xa matie
jwifu lɛ nɔ hunhun nuɖɔ do takwɛ enɛ wu tawun
takwɛ enɛ susu nɔ ɖɔ ɖo acɛkpikpa hlɔma tɔn
elodu tɔn xo enɛ wa atɛ ji e ɖo nukun ɖɔ enyi jezu takwɛxo ɔ ɔ e sixu dohwɛ ɛ ɖɔ e nyi
jezu nɔ aceji nɔ mɛ ɖe ji ɖo takwɛ susu xo ɔ mɛ a
e ɖɔ nu nyi hlɔma tɔn tɔn ɔ jo nu hlɔma tɔn nu nyi mawu tɔn ɔ jo nu mawu
jezu nɔ mɛɖe ji bonu ayi gosin nu taji hugan ɔ ji a
enɛ wɛ nyi axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ee wa ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ nugbo nugbo e
e gbɔn yɛkan enɛ mɛ ɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bi
ɖo nyi alɔ nu alɔɖiɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ mɛ enyi e nyi ɖɔ toxoɖiɖɔ sin xo wɛ e ci nu sɔgbe e ɖɔhun gbɔn ɖebu ɔ nɛ
ali ɖagbe hugan tɛ e sixu ahwan nuagɔwaxamɛ ɖe
jehovah tɔn gege jo linlin ji nɔ ku do ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu lɛ e do kpa
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo grande bretagne ɖɔ ee nu do lɛ wu ɖo kplɔnyiji alavɔ gudo e ɔ ɖo linlin tɔn lɛ
jɛhun do acɛ mɛwi lɛ tɔn ji ɖo mi mɔ nuagɔwaxamɛ tɔn gege
nyi mɛɖe nɔ ɖu ɖo nudindɔn lɛ ji tawun co akpɔɖomɛ ji wɛ nu lɛ wa fo ɖo nu mi
tuun ɖɔ nu nɔ nuagɔwaxamɛ ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn wu lɛ e ɖo gosin ayi lɛ tɔn mɛ a
hwenu jɛ biblu ji e ɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo jɛ nu enɛ lɛ ɖe sin ayi nyiɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ ji
nɔvi nyɔnu yovo ɖe wɛ ɖo suulu mi gbɔn
alɔkpa tɛ jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nyi alɔ
ðo jezu hwenu ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ sinsɛn lɛ nɔ wlu yeɖee ɖo kpo toxoɖiɖɔ kpo
wema palestine christ ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ mɛ jwifu lɛ ma yeɖee do lɛ e sɔgbe tawun alo kpɛɖe xa nu mi nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ lɛ e
elodu sin xo e ɖɔ ɖo fi e ɖibla ɖo gesi do elodu tɔn wɛ
ðo toxoɖiɖɔ linu ɔ falizyɛn lɛ nɔ gudo nu mɛɖee kannu ninɔ jwifu lɛ tɔn
matie tɔn ɖɔ jezu ɖɔ xo do saduseɛn lɛ wu ɖo enɛ mɛ
jezu nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ do zogbe ji ɖɔ nɔ zɔ nu nukplɔnmɛ alo ɖeɖee atɔn enɛ lɛ nɔ nɔ gudo e
toxoɖiɖɔ kpo sinsɛn sin xo lɛ kpo nɔ dɔn dakaxixo kpo nuagɔwiwa kpo wa gbɔn
etɛwu e nuagɔwaxamɛ do hwɛjijɔ nu dakaxixo a
enyi sinsɛn kpo toxoɖiɖɔ kpo wlu ɖo ɔ e sixu bɔkun bɔ adakaxixo
jezu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ ɖo ɖo wu zɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
enɛ ca kan xa hwɛjijɔ wu lɛ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo blase hu jezu e
ɛ do mɔ mɛ nɔ hwlɛn agba xa mɛ ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ kpo sinsɛn kpo linu nyi awovinu nu tɛn mɛ ɖe e e
ɖɔ enyi mi jo e do bɔ e ɖo nu wa gbɔn wɛ ɔ mɛ bi ɖi nu bɔ hlɔmanu lɛ wa gba sinsɛnxɔ mitɔn gba to ɔ do nu mi
jaan enɛ wu ɔ ðaxo kayifu nɔ nukɔn ɖo se e bla hu jezu e mɛ jaan
kayifu sɔja lɛ do ɖɔ yi wli jezu ɖo zanmɛ
jezu tuun ayixa baɖabaɖa enɛ hɛn e enɛ wu ɔ ɖo nuɖuɖu gudo tɔn e ɖu xa tɔn lɛ e hwenu ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ fɔ hwi ɖe lɛ hɛn
luk ðo zan gudo tɔn enɛ mɛ ɔ zan hwi lɛ ɖokpo kpe nu ahwan ɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ xomɛ wɛ sin ɖo nu agɔ e wa xa jezu ɖo zan mɛ e wli e wutu
xa jaan
hunxixo do nuagɔwaxamɛ tamɛ nyi nuɖe bɔ e jo do nyi alɔ mɛ nu mawu
xo mawu tɔn klisanwun lɛ bɔ nyi alɔ nu lɛ gbɔn
enyi jehovah egbe tɔn ɔ vogbingbɔn tɛ e nɔ mɔ
nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ nɔ tofɔligbe elɔpu tɔn bɔ mi ɖɔ xo tɔn ɖo e lɔ nu enɛ
e wu ɖɔ dakaxixo nɔ dɔn nujlɔjlɔwiwa wa a
mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ jlo dakaxixo do ɖeɖɛ ninɔmɛ lɛ e ɔ ku mɛ wɛ e nɔ kɔ do nu hwɛhwɛ
nɔ dɔn akpɔɖomɛ wa nu mɛ gege ɖevo lɛ
xomɛ hun mi tawun ɖɔ ɖo biblu mɛ ɖɔ mawu ɖokponɔ jɛn sixu blo bɔ nujlɔjlɔwiwa tiin nugbo nugbo ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji
ðo xwe gudo tɔn wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ wɛn ɖo jijla wɛ e nɛ
nɔvi sunnu nɔ nɔ tofɔligbe aflika tɔn e xo mawu tɔn nyi hwi gbigbɔ do alɔ mɛ nu mi e ɖo hwan tɔn sin domɛ nɔ jla wɛn fifa tɔn ɖe nu nɔzo tɔn lɛ gosin akɔ ɖebu mɛ ɔ nɛ efɛ
ee nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ nɔ tɛntin elɔpu tɔn e huzu jehovah tɔn ɖe gudo e ɔ e wli alɔ xa nɔvi sunnu ee nyi akɔ mɛ e wan e ɖe
mɛ atɔn enɛ lɛ bi blo huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ ɖo jlo ci klisu ɖɔhun wutu
huzuhuzu enɛ lɛ nyi nu taji e
enyi jehovah elɔ klan e ɔ e ɖo nɔ vivi tawun ɖɔ buninɔ tiin ɖo togun tɔn tɛntin xa sofonii
ali atɔn tɛ lɛ mi sixu xo buninɔ kan ɖe
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
mi mɔ ɖɔ mi sixu xo buninɔ klisanwun tɔn sin kan ɖo ali atɔn mi nɔ ɖeji do axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ wu ɖɔ e wa jla nuagɔwiwa lɛ ɖo mi nɔ ɖɔ mi kun nɔ mɛɖe ji ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ linu o mi nɔ nyi alɔ nu dakaxixo
e ɖo co hweɖelɛnu ɔ linlin agɔ ɖiɖo sixu nyi awovinu nu buninɔ mitɔn
bi nyi ɖokpo nyɛ kpodo hwi kpo nyi ɖokpo gbɔn e jaan
linlin agɔ alɔkpa tɛ lɛ ji ahwanvu jezu tɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖo ɖu ɖe
xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn tɛ lɛ ɖɔ lɛ sixu ɖu ɖo kinklan ji
etɛ mi sixu wa so nu buninɔ ɖo togun mawu tɔn tɛntin e egbe
etɛ jezu byɔ ɖo ɖɛ gudo tɔn e xo xa tɔn lɛ e mɛ
etɛwu buninɔ xo ɔ sixu ɖu ayi mɛ nu jezu
buninɔ nyi nuɖe ɖu ayi mɛ nu jezu ɖo gbadanu nuɖuɖu gudo tɔn e ɖu xa tɔn lɛ e hwenu
hwenu e ɖo ɖɛ xo kpo kpo wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ jlo e ɖo ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ bi nyi ɖokpo emi kpo emitɔn kpo nyi ɖokpo gbɔn e e xa jaan
buninɔ yetɔn ɖekunnu hlɔnhlɔnnɔ ɖe nyi wɛn ɖɔ jehovah jezu do ayikungban ji bonu e wa jlo mawu tɔn
wanyiyi nyi ɖe bɔ e do tuun ahwanvu jezu tɔn nugbo lɛ bɔ e so nu buninɔ yetɔn jaan
e sɔgbe ɖɔ jezu buninɔ ji
e ɖo ayi kinklan alo ɖe wu ɖo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ tɛntin e tlɛ ɖo ayi enɛ wu ɖo hwenu e ɖu nuɖuɖu gudo tɔn ɔ xa e
hweɖevonu ɔ jaki kpo jaan kpo byɔ jezu ɖɔ e tɛn nukunɖeji hugan lɛ emi ɖo axɔsuɖuto tɔn mɛ mak
etɛ lɛ sixu so nu kinklan tiin ɖo ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ tɛntin e
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi gbeje
jlo tɛn ɖaxo biba tɔn kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi nu bɔ kinklan do tiin ɖo ahwanvu klisu tɔn lɛ mɛ e a
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi gbeje nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ jezu ɖi xwi xa linlin agɔ e ɖo do wutu tɔn lɛ e gbɔn
e ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ ɖo nuwiwa yetɔn xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛ a nɔ bu nugbo nugbo gbɔn
nukplɔnmɛ tɔn mi bɔ mi nɔ bu gbɔn
e ɖo linlin agɔ do jezu ɖesunɔ wu
hwenu filipu ɖɔ nu natanayɛli ɖɔ emi mɔ mɛsiya ɔ e ɔ natanayɛli yi gbe ɖɔ nu ɖagbe ɖe sixu sin nazalɛti a
ɖokpo ɔ judeenu nukunɖeji lɛ wan nu jezu ɖo e nyi galileenu ɖe wutu
jaan judeenu gege nɔ galileenu lɛ do mɔ mɛ sɔ a e
jwifu ɖevo lɛ nɔ zun jezu nɔ ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ samaliinu
jaan samaliinu lɛ gbɔn vo nu jwifu lɛ ɖo akɔ kpo sinsɛn kpo wutu
judeenu lɛ kpo galileenu lɛ kpo bi nɔ ɖo sisi nu samaliinu lɛ a nɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu jaan
linlin agɔ tɛ e ɖo do ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ wu
ɖokpo ɔ jwifugan lɛ wan nu ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ
falizyɛn lɛ nɔ xwe do mɛ e donu lɛ e sin ahwan mɛ
jaan nɔ mɛɖebu nu ɖo wemaxɔmɛ sinsɛn tɔn lɛ a alo nɔ xwedo aca yetɔn a e do mɔ nuvɔnɔ kpo yaya ɖe kpo
ahwanvu lɛ lɔ wa ɖo linlin agɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu
do nɔ bu ɔ ɖo huzu nu ji ayixa yetɔn ku do lɛ e
na lɛ do linlin agɔ ɖiɖo sixu wa nu do mi wu gbɔn e
egbe ɔ linlin agɔ lɛ nɔ vunbla gege mitɔn
e sixu ɖo linlin agɔ do mi wu alo miɖesunɔ sixu ɖo ɖe lɛ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu
nɔvi nyɔnu nyi gbexosin ɖe ɖo australie din e tinmɛ ɖɔ ee ayi ɖo nu agɔ e wa xa aborigene hwexonu tɔn lɛ kpo egbe tɔn lɛ kpo ji e ɔ wan nu yovo lɛ e jɛ syɛnsyɛn ji
wangbɛnumɛ enɛ syɛn tawun ɖo acɛ e gba nyɛɖesunɔ wu e wutu
bɔ jɛ wan nu mɛ nɔ do glɛnsigbe lɛ e ji
jezu ɖi xwi xa linlin agɔ e ɖo do wu tɔn lɛ e gbɔn
linlin agɔ lɛ ɖiɖo ɖo hwe mitɔn sixu do ɖɔ do tawun e nyi gbɔn ɖo jezu hwenu e ɖɔhun
jezu ɖi xwi xa gbɔn
e ɖekunnu nu dɔkunnɔ kpo wamamɔnɔ kpo falizyɛn lɛ kpo samaliinu lɛ kpo jɛ lɛ kpo lɛ kpo ji
wegɔ ɔ gbɔn nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ kpo tɔn kpo gblamɛ ɔ e ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ ɖo ɖu ɖo nuvɛdomɛ alo linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu ji
nugbododo taji tɛ bɔ klisanwun lɛ nɔ nɔ bu
e ɖɔ nɔvi nɔvi wɛ bi nyi
xa matie
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ali mi nyi nɔvi nɔvi ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi bi gosin kunkan adamu tɔn mɛ
ɔ huzu xwedo gbigbɔ tɔn tawun e ɖe tɔn bɔ wanyiyi kpo nuɖiɖi kpo bɔ ɖo bu
etɛwu jwifu lɛ ɖo nɔ yigo ɖo fi jɔ sin e wu a
jezu nuɖe mɛ do e ɖu ɖo linlin agɔ e nɔ ɖo do jɔtɛn mɛtɔn wu e ji gbɔn e gbɔn
ee jezu tinmɛ nyi wɛn ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ miɖee ɖi nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo gudo e ɔ e hudo mɛɖesɔhwe tɔn ji xa matie
mi ɖo ayi wu gbɔn e ɔ goyiyi dɔn kinklan ɖe lɛ wa lɛ tɛntin
bɔ goyiyi ɖo fi jɔ sin e wutu lɔ sixu dɔn tagba wa
jwifu lɛ ɖo hwɛjijɔ yigo ɖo gosin kunkan ablaxamu tɔn mɛ wutu wɛ a linlin enɛ do ɖɔ do tawun ɖo jwifu gege sin ayi mɛ
jezu goyiyi ɖo fi e jɔ sin e wutu
do ɛ xosin ɔ ɔ jezu nujlɛdonuwu ɖe do samaliinu do kpe nukun do jwifu lɛ xo e ɖe wu e wu
jwifu ɖo dindin wɛ lɛ e wɔn nu nya enɛ awe xo e bɔ nu tɔn blawu nu samaliinu ɔ
jezu su nu enɛ ɖɔ nu lɛ ɖɔ ci samaliinu enɛ ɖɔhun
luk jezu ɖɔ samaliinu ɖe sixu nu wan yi nu nɔzo nugbo nugbo nyi e jwifu lɛ
bonu ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ kpewu wa yetɔn ɔ ɖo ɖu ɖo goyiyi kpo linlin agɔ nɔ ɖo do mɛ wu e kpo ji
jezu sɔnu nu jɛ nukɔn ɖo enɛ gblo ada e wu gbɔn ayi yetɔn ɖo jijɔ ɖagbe jonɔ lɛ ɖo e ji gblamɛ
e nyi kunnu kɛɖɛ wɛ jezu ɖe nu nyɔnu samaliinu ɔ a loɔ e nɔ toxo samalii tɔn ɖe mɛ nu azan we ɖo wɛn e hɛn e mɛ lɛ nukunmɛ wutu jaan
lɛ wa nu gbɔn hwenu jezu nu nyɔnu samaliinu ɖe e
ɖiɖe ɖo e etɛ ɖɔ jaki kpo jaan kpo kun mɔ nu jɛ nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn mɛ o
e bɔwu nu lɛ ɖebu bonu ɖe linlin agɔ ɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e sin ayi mɛ a
jaan sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo nu nyɔnu lɛ ɖo agbawungba a bɔ e wa nyi nyɔnu samaliinu ɖo jijɔ ɖagbe a e ɖe
lɛ byɔ jezu ɖɔ e ɖu nu
sinkɔn e e ɖɔ e ze eɖee bi jo nu gbigbɔ tɔn ɔ wɔn nu xovɛ sin e
kunnuɖiɖe jɛ kunnuɖiɖe nu nyɔnu samaliinu ɖe ji wɛ nyi jlo tɔn tɔn bɔ enɛ ci nuɖuɖu ɖɔhun jaan
jaki kpo jaan kpo wli nukplɔnmɛ enɛ a
hwenu ahwanvu lɛ xwedo jezu xwe samalii e ɔ fi ɖo zanmɛ e ɖo gletoxo samalii tɔn ɖe mɛ
samaliinu lɛ ɖɔ emi kun yi o enɛ wu ɔ jaki kpo jaan kpo sin xomɛ byɔ ɖɔ e ylɔ myɔ sin jixwe bonu e su kun do nu gletoxo ɔ bi
jezu nu nu do nujɔnu mɛ
luk enyi gletoxo yi e ɔ jɔtɛn jaki kpo jaan kpo tɔn ɖo galilee gbeji e wɛ e ɖe ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ wa nu gbɔn a ji
e ci ɖɔ linlin agɔ ɖo do mɛ wu wɛ do nu wangbɛnumɛ yetɔn ɖɔhun
e ci ɖɔ xomɛ gblagbla jaan sin e wa ɖo hwenu e jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn samalii ɖo nukɔnmɛ e ɖɔhun mɛ
ðo pantekotu xwe tɔn gudo tlolo ɔ xo ɖe ɖɔ akɔ cyancyan tiin enyi e ma nuɖuɖu nu asukusi ɖo hudo mɛ lɛ e ɔ e nɔ wɔn nu asukusi nɔ do glɛkigbe lɛ e mɛ
linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do gbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wu lɔ sixu ɖo nu nɔ tagba lɛ e mɛ
lɛ yawu jla ninɔmɛ ɔ ɖo sunnu jɛxa lɛ e bonu kpe nukun do nuɖuɖu mima ɔ wu
sunnu gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ e e bi wɛ ɖo glɛki nyikɔ
enɛ sixu dɔn asukusi e jɛ do lɛ e hugan
blo huzuhuzu lɛ nɔ ɖe mɛɖebu ɖo vo a gbɔn
ðo xwe tɔn ɔ nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin ɔ gbakpe akɔta lɛ mɛ hugan
ɖo aca nɔ do xa jwifu lɛ kɛɖɛ
hwenu mawu wa nyi wɛn ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ kun nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ o gudo e ɔ jla wɛn ɔ kɔnɛyi nyi sɔja hlɔma tɔn ɖe e xa
enɛ gudo ɔ nɔ ɖu nu xa nyi jwifu a lɛ e nɔ do xa
hwenu wlan wema tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ jwifu nɔ nɔ azii kpɛvi lɛ e kpo klisanwun nyi jwifu a nɔ nɔ finɛ lɛ e kpo e ɔ e ɖɔ xo kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo do kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu ze do wan yi nu lɛ bi wu e nu lɛ jaan tim
linlin yetɔn lɛ huzuhuzu byɔ hwenu co wa
e tuun klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ ɖɔ nyi mɛɖe nɔ ɖe wanyiyi yeɖee
ðo klisanwun nukɔntɔn lɛ ɔ do wutu ɔ wa lɛ bi do mɔ mɛ ɖo ɖo mawu nukɔn e
mi sixu ɖe linlin agɔ mi nɔ ɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e sin ayi mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
na lɛ
egbe ɔ e sixu byɔ hwenu ɖo mi lɔ si cobɔ mi ɖe linlin agɔ mi nɔ ɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e sin ayi mitɔn mɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo france tinmɛ hun xo wɛ e ɖe e ɖɔ jehovah mi nu wanyiyi nyi e nu wanyiyi nyi e kpo nu wanyiyi ɖiɖo nu alɔkpa lɛ bi nyi e kpo
kpo ɖo kpinkplɔn wɛ ɖu ɖo linlin agɔ nɔ ɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e ji e nɔ bɔwu hwebinu a
enɛ wu wɛ kpo ɖo ɖɛ xo do enɛ takunmɛ wɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo espagne bɔ ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɔ kpannukɔn ɛ hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ ɖi xwi xa wan nɔ nu akɔ ɖe lɛ e bɔ nɔ ɖu hwɛhwɛ
tuun ɖɔ ɖo kpo ɖo ahwan enɛ wɛ
doku nu jehovah ɖɔ ɖo xwedo ɖo bu e ɖe mɛ
mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo sixu gbeje miɖee do nujɔnu mɛ
mi ɖo ayi linlin agɔ ɖe lɛ wu vlafo byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖi xwi xa nɔvi nyɔnu we enɛ lɛ ɖɔhun wɛ a
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ mi ɖo nɔ yi mɛ lɛ bi
mi sixu wa ɖo ali tawun tawun ɖe lɛ gbɔn
e ɖɔ ɔ e hun hɔn nu mi bɔ mɛ ɔ mi sixu huzu akpaxwe xwedo mawu tɔn tɔn xa hlɔmanu lɛ
ðo mi nyi cobɔ jezu xomɛ do mi wu yi mi wutu ɔ e sɔgbe ɖebu ɖɔ mi mɛ ɖevo ɖebu a
jehovah lɛ nɔ nunywɛ gosin e nɔ nɔ bu ɖo wanyiyi mɛ akpaxwe ɔ
ðo mi nyi jehovah wutu ɔ mi nɔ nunywɛ gosin nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo a nɔ xo fifa kan e
ja enyi mi zun xa toɖevomɛnu lɛ yi gbe nu aca gbɔn vo nu mitɔn lɛ e tlɛ gbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn vlafo ɔ e nɔ vivi nu mi
enyi mi wa ɔ fifa nɔ sa tɔsisa ɖe ɖɔhun bɔ hwɛjijɔ nɔ xo xu ɖɔhun eza
enyi wanyiyi huzu ayi mitɔn kpo linlin mitɔn kpo ɔ etɛ nɔ jɛ
e mɔ biblu kplɔnkplɔn wa ɖagbe gbɔn e ɖɔ huzu ɖo ayi ɖe kpo linlin ɖe kpo
e wli alɔ xa nɔvi nyɔnu nɔ do glɛnsigbe e ɖe
huzuhuzu mɔhun lɛ nyi kunnuɖenu ɖe ɖɔ wanyiyi klisanwun tɔn sixu ɖu ɖo linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu ji e nɔ wa nugbo
mi ðo jehovah wɛ ɖo mi jlo ɖɔ nu mitɔn nukun tɔn mɛ wutu kabi
sin nu nɔ mawu nukunmɛ nɔ kɔn nyɔna do ji
ðo biblu sin taan mɛ ɔ mɛɖe lɛ hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn fɛɛ co nu yetɔn mawu nukunmɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ tiin ɖo jijɔ ɖagbe lɛ co nu yetɔn nukun tɔn mɛ a
enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ etɛ jehovah nɔ jɛ nukɔn ɖo mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ
hlobowamu ee nyi judaa xɔsu ɖe e tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ xosin ɔ
hlobowamu sin wɛ nyi ee ɖo izlayɛli nu xwe e axɔ
ku ɖo tɔn
enɛ gudo ɔ hlobowamu gosin totaligbe jeluzalɛmu tɔn yi sikɛmu bonu e ɛ axɔsu
vlafo ɖɔ e xo nu do afɔ do afɔdo ee ɖo nunywɛ tawun e tɔn mɛ wu a
hlobowamu sixu mɔ nukɔn ɖɔ zaanɖe din ɔ nuwukpikpe emiɖesunɔ ɖo ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ e gbɔn tɛnkpɔn gbɔn
e wa jɛ hweɖenu bɔ togun ɔ tɔn lɛ wa tɔn ɖɔ nu ɖo ayi mɛ ɖu nu wɛ lɛ e tlɔlɔ ɖɔ agban kpinkpɛn wɛ towe ɖiɖa mi
hwɛ din ɔ nu ɖe kan kpo nu syɛnsyɛn wa wɛ mi ɖe ɔ ɖe agban kpinkpɛn towe ɖiɖa mi ɔ kpo nu mi ɔ mi wa nu
hlobowamu sixu mɔ ɖɔ e ɖo mɔ nu emi
enyi e wa nu togun ɔ byɔ e ɔ e kpo xwedo tɔn kpo nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖo ɖe gbɛɖuɖu sin nu ɖe lɛ kpo byɔ nu kpɛɖe togun ɔ
ðo alɔ ɖevo mɛ ɔ enyi e ɔ togun ɔ sixu gu
etɛ e wa
axɔsu ɔ to kan nu byɔ mɛxomɔ ɖe we xa lɛ e
hlobowamu xwedo weɖexamɛ yetɔn wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi wa nu xa togun ɔ syɛnsyɛn
e yi gbe nu ɖɔ do agban kpinkpɛn nu ɖo dido wɛ
ze lanba do lanba mɔhun we wɛ nyɛ ze do
etɛ enɛ mi
ðo mɔ nu wutu ɔ sixu mɔ nu mɛ gbeta ɖe sixu wa kɔ do e ɖe we ɖagbe xa mi jɔb
gu bɔ hlobowamu xo ahwankpa tɔn kple
jehovah byɔ xo ɔ mɛ gbɔn gbeyiɖɔ cemaya ji ɖɔ yi ahwan xa nɔvi mitɔn izlayɛlinu lɛ o ɖɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn lɛkɔ yi xwe
ðo emi wɛ bɔ nu enɛ lɛ bi jɛ axɔ
do nukun mɛ enɛ sixu wlu ayi mɛ nu hlobowamu gbɔn e
etɛ togun ɔ do axɔsu enɛ adan ɖɔ emi lanba emitɔn zan e mɔhun we do dɔn to nu togun emitɔn bɔ zaanɖe kpowun ɔ e wɔn nu gu ɖaxo enɛ e wu
do wu
e ɖo co ee axɔsu ɔ kpo ahwankpa tɔn lɛ kpo se nu mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖɔ ɔ setonu lɛkɔ yi xwe
etɛ enɛ sixu mi
nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi setonu nu mawu enyi wiwa tlɛ bonu e mi ɔ nɛ
tonusise nu mawu nɔ bɔ nu mɛtɔn nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ bɔ e nɔ kɔn nyɔna do mɛ ji
e setonu jo tito e blo ahwan xa akɔta e ɖo ayi e do enɛ gudo ɔ e ayi tɔn ɖo toxo judaa kpo kpo tɔn kpo ɖo acɛ tɔn mɛ e gbigba ji
e hlɔnhlɔn toxo ɖe lɛ blo bɔ syɛn
taji hugan ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ nu hwenu ɖe ɔ e do jehovah tɔn lɛ wu
ee axɔsuɖuto akɔta wo izlayɛli tɔn tɔn ɖo hlobowamu e zin do vodunsinsɛn mɛ bi e ɔ finɛnu gege do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu hlobowamu nɔ yi jeluzalɛmu do gudo ɖe nu sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ e
enɛ wu ɔ tonusise hlobowamu tɔn bɔ acɛkpikpa tɔn lido
hwenu acɛkpikpa hlobowamu tɔn lido bi e ɔ e wa nu e ɖo nukun a e ɖe
e jo jehovah tɔn do jɛ vodun ji
hwɛjijɔ ɖebu wɛ e nyi ɔ akɔta ɔ bi xwii xwedo e
enɛ wu ɔ jehovah bɔ axɔsu ejipu tɔn cicaki yi judaa toxo gege
hlobowamu syɛnsyɛn toxo enɛ lɛ co nu nyi axɔ
hlobowamu wa nu gbɔn hwenu e se wɛn nugbɛnumɛ tɔn enɛ e
e wa nu ɖo ganji
biblu ɖɔ axɔsu ɔ kpo gan lɛ kpo yi hwɛ yetɔn lɛ gbe ɖɔ jehovah sin hwɛ jɔ
enɛ wu ɔ jehovah hwlɛn hlobowamu kpo jeluzalɛmu kpo bɔ e su kun do nu a
enɛ gudo ɔ hlobowamu kpo ɖo acɛ kpa do axɔsuɖuto tofɔligbe tɔn ɔ ji wɛ
jɛ nukɔn nu ku tɔn ɔ e hun alɔ do nu vi sunnu tɔn lɛ gege e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e blo bonu gu do nɔvi yetɔn abiya jɛ tɛn tɔn mɛ e ji o
mɛ ɔ hlobowamu ɖe nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ e ɖo a e
hlobowamu wa nu ɖagbeɖagbe enɛ lɛ co nu tɔn mawu nukunmɛ a
biblu sin xwe nu axɔsuɖuɖu tɔn ɖɔ hlobowamu wa nu nyla jehovah nukunmɛ e
ðo jlo jehovah tɔn wiwa mya nukun a
hlobowamu gbɔn vo nu axɔsu davidi ɖo e ɖo kancica nujɔnu tɔn ɖe xa jehovah a wutu
e wa nu ɖagbe ɖe lɛ do akɔta jehovah tɔn takunmɛ
e sɔnu nu kancica syɛnsyɛn ɖe xa jehovah a alo e ɖo jlo nujɔnu tɔn hɛn xomɛ tɔn hun a
enɛ wu ɔ e jɛ nunyanyawiwa kpo vodunsinsɛn kpo mɛ
sixu kanbyɔ ɖɔ hwenu hlobowamu yi gbe nu nugbɛnumɛ mawu tɔn e ɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ ɛ wa a
alo hwɛ tɔn lɛ wɛ nugbo nugbo bɔ e ɖo jlo hɛn xomɛ mawu tɔn hun a
nukɔnmɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ ɔ e jɛ nu nyanya wa ji
e gbɔn vo nu axɔsu davidi nyi tɔn e e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ davidi wa nuɖe lɛ nyi do ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ ɔ e yi wan nu jehovah eɖee bi jo nu sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ lobɔ hwɛ tɔn lɛ nugbo nugbo axɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hlobowamu tɔn sixu nu taji ɖe mi
e ɖɔ e nɔ nu sin hudo xwedo mɛtɔn ɖo e e wa nu xɔ akwɛ e ɖe
nu nu mitɔn mawu nukunmɛ ɔ nu nukɔntɔn ɖo taji bɔ mi blo e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ gudo nu sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ
nu nyi enyi mi ɖo wanyiyi e nu jehovah ɔ nɛ
e nɔ naki do myɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ ji gbɔn e ɔ mi ɖo blo bɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu mawu e ɖo syɛnsyɛn wɛ gbɔn xo tɔn kpinkplɔn hwɛhwɛ tamɛ linlin do nu mi xa e ji kpo kanɖiɖo do ɖɛxixo wu kpo gblamɛ
mɛ ɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah e do nu jlo mi ɖo hɛn xomɛ tɔn hun ɖo nu mi nɔ wa lɛ e bi mɛ e
e mi bɔ enyi mi wa wa nuɖe nyi do ɔ hwɛ mitɔn nu mi nugbo nugbo
mi ci hlobowamu ɖɔhun a loɔ mi do sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ wu ju
gbejimanɔ tɔn bɔ jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ e ma axɔsuɖuto ɔ axɔ
ku
tlɛ sixu nɔ alɔ mɛ do do gbe nu mɛ
aca kpo xogbe gbedomɛ tɔn lɛ kpo sixu gbɔn vo sin ayi ɖe ji jɛ ɖevo ji linlin ɖokpo ɔ ji wɛ gbedomɛ ɖe nɔ junjɔn
nugbo ɔ gbemadomɛ alo gbe yi nu gbe mɛ ɖevo do mɛ e sixu ci wanyiyi ɖo nu mɛ ɖɔhun alo nyi zinzan nyanya ɖe tɔn
mɛ bi ɖo aca nɔ do gbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ a
mɛɖe lɛ sixu xo nu do gbedomɛ wu ɖo winnya wu alo nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi kun nuɖe o
mɛɖe lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu bɔ e do gbe nu mɛ ɖevo ɖeɖee sinmɛ agbaza tɔn aca alo ninɔmɛ yetɔn gbɔn vo nu mɛtɔn e
e ɖo co gbedomɛ tlɛ ɖo klewun e ɖe sixu wa ɖagbe tawun
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ etɛ gbedomɛ sixu wa
etɛ xo mawu tɔn sixu mi do gbedomɛ wu
tlolo ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ mɛ ɖo nugbo ɔ wɛ e ɖe tɔn wɛ wemafɔ enɛ lɛ nyi
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ si lɛ bi yi wan nu nɔvi mitɔn ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ lɛ
enɛ lɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ si yi wan nu
pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ nɔ yi miɖee ganji klisu yi gbɔn e
ɖeɖee ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ɖɔ gbedomɛ sixu wa nu hugan bloblo bonu mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɔ ɖɔ e yi emi
hwenu hwe ɔ su bɔ jehovah vi sunnu tɔn do xomɛ e ɔ e wɛnsagun ɖe do bonu e yi ɖɔ xo
wɛnsagun ɔ to do gbe e enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ mawu jɔwu aklunɔ ɖo xa
se e ɔ ayi tɔn gbado tuun nu wu wɛnsagun ɖe ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ e a
ee wɛnsagun ɔ mɔ e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖi xɛsi o ɖo mawu jɔwu
e tinmɛ ɖɔ mawu ɖo linlin wɛ ɖɔ e ji mɛsiya ɔ
sin ayi gbado a e wa ɔ e setonu ɖɔ aklunɔ sin wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbɔn ɔ nyi nu mi luk
etɛ tɔn enɛ sixu mi
mi ɖo nɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔ do gbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
pɔlu tuun mɛ gege ɖo agun ɖeɖee ɖo azii kpɛvi ɔ kpo elɔpu kpo sin kan mɛ lɛ e
mi mɔ enɛ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ wemata ɔ mɛ
e kɛnu do fwebee wu ɖɔ ɖɔ e nyi nɔvi mitɔn nyɔnu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu nɔvi lɛ ɖɔ yi ganji ɖo aklunɔ sin nyikɔ mɛ mɛ ɖo mɛɖeɖovo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ blo gbɔn ɖo yeɖee tɛntin e ɖɔ ɖɔ ɛ ɖo nu kɔn nu tɔn hudo e ɖe lɛ e bi mɛ
pɔlu do gbe plisilu kpo akilasi kpo eyɛ ɖokponɔ wɛ doku nu a agun klisanwun nyi jwifu a lɛ tɔn lɛ ɔ bi doku nu
e do gbe ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ e tuun ɖo egbe a lɛ e mɛ wɛ nyi wanyinamɔ tɔn epenɛti nu tlifɛnu kpo tlifɔsu kpo ɖo wa nu aklunɔ wɛ lɛ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gbe enɛ lɛ e do klisanwun lɛ kpodo wanyiyi kpo bɔ se e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu hɛn nuɖiɖi yetɔn lido
nugbo ɔ gbedomɛ nɔ ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi e kpo mɛ kpikpa lɛ kpo nɔ bɔ zunzun nɔ ganji nɔ blo bɔ mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ nɔ bu
hwenu pɔlu jɛ tɔjihunglintɛn puzɔlu tɔn tunta hlɔma e ɔ klisanwun ɖo finɛ lɛ e wa tofɔligbe kpe e
ee pɔlu mɔ e ɔ e doku nu mawu bɔ wu ya ɛ
wiwa yayanɔ tlɛ sixu hlɔnhlɔn mɛ awakanmɛ ku e alo mɛ ɖo wubla mɛ e
ja nwt e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e bɔwu nu mɛ xa wema tɔn lɛ e bɔ yi gbe nu weɖexamɛ tɔn hwenu mɔ ɖo gbedomɛ enɛ mɛ ɖɔ kpo e kpo bi wɛ nyi nu ɖokpo ɔ ɖo mawu nukɔn e
nugbo ɔ gbedomɛ kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo sixu hun ali bɔ e tlɛ ɖɔ xo ɖo do nu taji lɛ wu
gbedomɛ wa ɖagbe tawun e ɖe ɖiga a ɔ e ɖo gosin ayi mɛ ɖɔ e ɖo wanyiyi nujɔnu tɔn nu mɛ
ee e ɖo wezun ji byɔ xɔ ɔ mɛ e ɔ nɔvi sunnu ɖe lilɛ nu do e ɖɔ kuabɔ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ kɛnu a yi junjɔn ayi kpowun
aklunɔzan gblamɛ yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ e sɛkpɔ nɔvi sunnu ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ sin hweɖenu ɔ emi ɖo xwi ɖi xa ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ ɖo xwegbe
e ɖɔ xomɛ sin mi tawun gbadanu enɛ ɖibla gɔn kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ
flin nu ɖe do kple ɔ wu zɛ gbedomɛ towe wu a
e bɔ mɔ ɖɔ e yi mi tawun
nɔvi sunnu enɛ tuun ɖagbe gbedomɛ klewun enɛ wa e a
e ɖɔ hwenu e ɖɔ nu xo klewun enɛ lɛ wa e nu mi e ɔ gan do e vivi nu mi tawun
enɛ do wu ya lanmɛ nu nyi lɔ
enyi mi tuun gbedomɛ mitɔn lɛ tlala ɔ gbe mi nɔ do klisanwun mitɔn lɛ e xɔ akwɛ e ɔ mi wa ɖagbe nu kpo miɖesunɔ kpo
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi nukun kpɛvi do hlɔnhlɔn gbedomɛ tɔn gbeɖe o
ali hun nu nɔvi nyɔnu we bɔ ɖo wɛn ɔ xwle ɖe wɛ ɖo montevideo ee nyi hɔnkan uruguay tɔn e
towe lɛ wu wɛ nɔ tamɛ do ðɛh
ayixa towe sixu wa nu walɔ ɖagbe tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun gbɔn
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi su yi wan nu mawu tɔn lɛ
nukɔnyiyi zin ca kan xa ayixa mitɔn gbɔn
nu nyi sin hwenu ɖo ayikungban ji e
ayixa mitɔn ci ɖe ɖɔhun gbɔn
mɛ ɖeɖee ayixa yetɔn ganji a lɛ e sixu ci batoo ɖo yiyi wɛ ɖo ji bɔ boussole tɔn ɖo ganji a e ɖɔhun
enyi e xwe tomɛ bonu mɛtɔn ɖo ganji a ɔ e sixu ci mɛɖee ɖɔhun
e bɔwu tawun bɔ jɔhɔn kpo lɛ kpo blo bɔ batoo ɖe wli ali nyanya
ɖo ganji e ɖe sixu ɔ blo bɔ batoo ɔ nɔ ali ɖagbe ji
ayixa mitɔn sixu ci walɔ ɖagbe tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun
cobonu ayixa mitɔn ali mi ganji ɔ mi ɖo ali
enyi e ayixa ɖe ganji a ɔ etɛ mɛ e sixu kɔ do
ayixa mɔhun tlɛ sixu ylɔ nu nyanya ɖɔ nu ɖagbe
jaan wɛ mɛ ɖeɖee hu ahwanvu etyɛni lɛ e wɛ mɛ ɖevo ɖeɖee wa nu ɖɔhun lɛ e lɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ayixa yetɔn nyi tɔn
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ ayixa mitɔn gɔn wa a
kpo nugbododo kpo ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ lɛ e nu e do nu mɛ do ɖe mɛ do ali ji do ɖe nuwanyido lɛ do e zan ɖagbe gbɔn ɔ mɛ
nu mi gbeje kpo nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo sixu mi bɔ mi ayixa mitɔn gbɔn e
mi nɔ ɖu le mawu tɔn lɛ xwixwedo tɔn gbɔn
do ɖu le mawu tɔn lɛ tɔn ɔ mi ɖo wa nu hu lɛ xixa alo tuuntuun kpowun
wanyiyi kpo sisi kpo mi ɖo nu e ɖo syɛn
mi nɔ wa gbɔn tawun
nu taji ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ nu lɛ jehovah ɖɔhun
dotoo towe blo tuto ɖe nu bɔ e byɔ ɖɔ nɔ ɖu nu ɖe lɛ lanmɛ huzu nɔ zan gbɔn e
ee wa nu sɔgbe xa tito enɛ gudo e ɔ mɔ ɖɔ e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ alɔ dotoo towe do bɔ gbɛzan towe e su nukun towe mɛ tawun
ɖokpo ɔ mitɔn lɛ mi bɔ nɔ cyɔn alɔ mi ji sin nu hwɛhuhu sixu hɛn gble do mi wu lɛ e si bɔ mɛ ɔ mitɔn nɔ
enyi mi xwedo biblu tɔn lɛ do adingban ɖiɖo ayi winniwinni zinzan ajojija nublibliwiwa dakaxixo kpo awovinuwiwa kpo wu ɔ tamɛ do le mi nɔ mɔ lɛ e ji xa nunywɛxo nuɖe
nu ci ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah kpo tɔn lɛ kpo e nu su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e nɔ jɛji
nujɔnu tɔn ee ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e xixa kpo tamɛ linlin do ji kpo sixu mi bɔ mi wa etɛ
e byɔ ɖɔ mi jiya nu mɛ mawu tɔn lɛ gbigba nɔ kɔ do e tɔn cobo nu xɔ akwɛ lɛ a
nuwanyido mɛ ɖeɖee gba mawu tɔn lɛ tɔn bɔ e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ e sixu nu mi
nunywɛxo ɖɔ mɛ ɖo nunywɛ e ɖoto yi nunywɛ do nunywɛ ji
ði ɔ tamɛ do axɔsu davidi mɔ hwenu e setonu nu jehovah tɔn a ɖoxo xa bɛtisabe gudo lɛ e ji
enyi tɛnkpɔn mɔhun kpannukɔn mi ɔ mɔ hlɔnhlɔn hɔn a
jo gbe davidi ɖɔhun wɛ a alo hɔn jozɛfu ɖɔhun
enyi mi tamɛ do nu nyanya hwɛhuhu ji lɛ e ji ɔ mi sixu hlɔnhlɔn ayi mitɔn wan nu nunyanyawiwa
etɛ ayixa mitɔn nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ wa
nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ayixa mitɔn kpo nɔ ɖo gbɔn
e ɖo co ɖevo lɛ alo akpaxwe gbɛzinzan tɔn ɖevo lɛ tiin bɔ biblu tawun ɖe a
ðo ali enɛ lɛ ɔ mi sixu tuun nu mawu yi gbe e kpo nu e wan e kpo gbɔn
fi ayixa mitɔn mi biblu do e nɔ ɖe e nɛ
kpo wanyiyi kpo ɔ jehovah mi nugbododo lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖo xa ayixa mitɔn mi biblu do e
ezayii enyi mi nɔ zan linlin mitɔn kpo ayi mitɔn kpo do tamɛ do nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ ji ɔ mi ayixa mitɔn ali nɔ ɖo wu tɔn nɛ
gudo mɛ ɔ e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn
etɛ nyi tinmɛ nugbododo lɛ tɔn
jezu zan gbɔn bɔ tawun
nugbododo ɖe nyi nugbo taji e nɔ zan bɔ e nɔ nyi dodonu nu linlin ɖe alo nuwiwa ɖe e
do mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbododo ɖe mɛ ɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e tuun linlin mɛ ɔ e tɔn kpo hwɛjijɔ ɖeɖee wu e ɖe lɛ e kpo
ðo jezu tɔn mɛ ɔ e nugbo taji ɖe lɛ mɛ bɔ nugbo enɛ lɛ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ bɔ tuun nu mɛ nuwalɔ yetɔn ɖe lɛ kɔ do e
ði ɔ e mɛ ɖɔ xomɛsin sixu dɔn dakaxixo wa bɔ jlo nyanya sixu dɔn agalilɛ wa
klisanwun zin e ɖe nɔ ayixa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
ayixa mitɔn lɛ sixu gbɔn vovo gbɔn
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ mɛ ɔ klisanwun ɖo ayixa e biblu do e vovo we sixu wa gbeta vovo kɔn
nu mi ɖɔ xo do ahan syɛnsyɛn nunu ji
biblu ɖɔ e ahan syɛnsyɛn ɖo ji o a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ ayixa klisanwun ɔ tɔn sixu nɔ dohwɛ ɛ e ɖo ayixa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn
xo ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ mɛ e sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo sisi nu ayixa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn gbɔn
enyi nu ɖo acɛ wa e ɖe wiwa sixu bɔ nyi nu nɔvi ayixa tɔn gbɔn vo nu towɛ e ɖe ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ jo nu enɛ do a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi mɛ ɖe kun bonu nɔvi ɖe lɛkɔ yi gbɛzan hɛn nu gble do wu tɔn tawun e kɔn o kɔ
enɛ wu ɔ enyi nɔvi ɖe ɖɔ emi kun ahan o bonu mɛ ylɔ ɛ e gbidi kɔ ɔ e nyi wanyiyi sin nu a
timɔtee ɖagbe ɖe ɖo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ sin nukɔnyiyi linu gbɔn
hwenu timɔtee sin xwe sixu ɖo jɛ vlamɛ e alo hwenu e sixu ɖo xwe vɛlɛɛ e ɔ e gbo ada bonu e nyi nu jwifu e xwe wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla gbe lɛ e o
timɔtee ɖɔhun ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwiɖee do nu ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn a
etɛ nukɔnyiyi zin byɔ
ali tɛ wanyiyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ ca kan xa mi zin gbɔn e ɖe
klisanwun lɛ bi ɖo jlo yi nukɔn zɛ nukplɔnmɛ nukɔn nukɔntɔn kunkpla klisu lɛ e wu do gan zin
ebl nwt e nɔ nɔ yayanɔ kpowun nɔ zin a
mi ɖo do gan alo ɖo ɖo wa wɛ kpewu
enɛ do ɖo nu gbe nya e a
jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu miɖee ɔ wɛ mɛ lɛ bi ɖɔ nyi ahwanvu nugbo
jaan jezu sin nɔvi jaki ylɔ wanyiyi ɖɔ axɔsu ɔ
ja nwt pɔlu ɖɔ nu e yi wan nu mɛ hun ɔ bi sese setonu wɛ e ɖe
hlɔmanu lɛ e wanyiyi ji gbɔn e nyi nukpacamɛ ɖe a ɖo biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mawu ɔ wanyiyi wɛ e nyi
enyi mi nɔ tamɛ do nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ ji ɔ ayixa mitɔn huzu ɖe hugan akpaxwe ɔ
ee mi ɖo gan do wɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo zin e ɔ etɛwu nugbododo lɛ ɖo ɖo taji hugan nu mi
enyi ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ nyi klisanwun zin e ɖe ɔ mɔ ɖɔ nugbododo lɛ huzu nu taji nu hugan
nu nyi ɖo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ nu do ninɔmɛ tawun tawun lɛ bɔ nugbododo lɛ zinzan gblo ada tawun
mɛ ɔ eɖesu wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn hugan mɛ e do xa lɛ e
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo nu sin hudo mi ɖo wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn e
mi ɖo nu sin hudo mi ɖo wa gbeta ɖagbe hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun lɛ e kɔn bi a
ganji enyi mi nɔ zan kpo nugbododo kpo ɖeɖee ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo kpo ɔ mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ titewungbe bɔ nu mi do wa nu ɖagbe bi ɔ bi ɖo asi mitɔn
nɔ zan nu ɖeɖee mɛ bɔ e nu bɔ agun klisanwun tɔn sɔnu lɛ e ɖi des publications des temoins jehovah anademewe dodinnanu ton kunnudeto jehovah ton le wemasɛxwetɛn tɔn wemasɛxwetɛn ɛntɛnɛti ji tɔn tɔn kpo jw kpo ganji
nu mi wa nu sɔgbe xa kpo nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ɔ nyɔna tɛ lɛ nɔ sin mɛ
mawu tɔn lɛ kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo xwixwedo nɔ hɛn nyɔna gege wa ðɛhan ɖɔ gbɔn e yi wan nu towe looo
nu ɔ wu wɛ ɖo nunywɛ hu lɛ ɖo e nɔ ayi mɛ sɔyi
tuun nu hu lɛ bi ɖo towe lɛ wu wɛ nɔ tamɛ do
ɖo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ hu degenɔ kpikpoe lɛ ɖo towe lɛ nyinyi nɔ mya nukun nu mi
mi sixu ɖo nunywɛ nutuuntuun kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ kpo enyi mi nɔ zan hwenu nɔ tamɛ do mawu tɔn lɛ kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo ji ɔ nɛ
weziza mitɔn ɖo lɛ nukɔn bonu kpa nu mitɔn
nu alɔɖiɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ ali ɖevo tɛ lɛ mi sixu blo bɔ weziza mitɔn ɖe
buninɔ klisanwun tɔn nɔ dɔn mɛ lɛ wa nugbo ɔ mɛ gbɔn
etɛwu acejininɔ ɖo taji tawun ɖo egbe
hwɛjijɔ taji tɛ mi ɖo
enyi mi se togun jehovah tɔn ɖo su wɛ gbɔn e ɔ e nɔ akpakpa mi tawun
xwe wa yi e mɛ ɔ mi biblu xa jɛji ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
tɛ ali nu mi bonu mi gɔn kin ɖo tɛntin yetɔn sunvi ɖɔhun a
sɔgbe kpo xogbe jezu tɔn ɖo matie mɛ e kpo ɔ etɛ mi gbeje
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ togun jehovah tɔn nɔ do gbe vovo gege
e ɖo co enɛ nɔ su ali do mi bonu mi nɔ gɔn bu nɔ do kpa nu mitɔn jehovah a
su wɛ mi ɖe e buninɔ sin vivi mi nɔ ɖu e kpo aceji mi nɔ nɔ nɔ e kpo bi nɔ so nu kpa nu jehovah wɛ mi ɖe e
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do nu mɔhunkɔtɔn blo gbɔn e ji xa matie
nu wɛnɖagbejijla ɔ mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ weziza mitɔn
nu mi wa nu kpo kpo ɔ le tɛ lɛ mi sixu mɔ
xota ɔ tinmɛ ɖɔ e ɖo blo gbɔn wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla nu mɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji lɛ e gblamɛ blo bɔ gbɛzan tɔn sɔgbe xa weziza sin ali lɛ
ɔ mi sixu kpa nu jehovah gbɔn klisanwun gbɛzinzan mitɔn gblamɛ
lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nɔ ɖo ayi nuwalɔ mitɔn lɛ wu
nu mi nɔ do do e kpo gbe mi nɔ do kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo e kpo nɔ ɖɔ nu gege do mɛ mi nyi e kpo mawu alɔkpa wɛ mi ɖe e kpo wu
jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ enyi byɔ xwe ɖe gbe hun do gbe ɔ nwt
egbe ɔ aca enɛ ɖo fi gege a
nuwiwa kpo jiɖiɖe kpo nu nɔ do ɖe hwenu ɖo hwɛjijɔ wu wa tɔn e tinmɛ wɛ e sixu ɖe adohuhu alo xomɛsin tɔn kpo
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nukiko dɔn mɛ e wɛ nɔ bɔ ɖagbe ɖe nɔ
wlɛnwin enɛ nɔ hwenu nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo nɔ zan kɛkɛvi lɛ ɖo kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn hwenu e
nu ɖo alɔ ɖo ɖo mɔhun mɛ wɛ ɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ yi wɛn ɔ ganji hwenu e nu do do gbe e
asu kpo asi kpo mɛxomɔ ɖe gblo ada nu yetɔn gbɔn
asu kpo asi kpo mɛxomɔ ɖe ɖo angleterre bɔ azɔn ɖo dogbo nu xwe ɖe gbe jɛ xwe ɖe gbe tɔn yetɔn tawun
wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi blo bɔ weziza emitɔn ɖo xwe yetɔn kpa
nɔ wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ do tavo ɖe ta hwenu lɛ nɔ wa kpla vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo ɖo akpa yetɔn e e
nudobiba mɛ gege bɔ yi wema les jeunes
reponses pratiques akpaxwe kpo ɔ kpo nu alɔnuwema lɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu gbexosin ɖe ɖo agun yetɔn mɛ xo kpoɖo nu ɖo tito kunnuɖiɖe tɔn yetɔn enɛ mɛ
alɔ tɛ sixu do mɛ wa xa towe mɛ lɛ e
ðo xwe gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ mɛ ahwan nya sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gege tɛn yi to ɖevo lɛ mɛ
sixu mɛ enɛ lɛ bɔ tuun jehovah kpo linlin tɔn kpo gbɔn
nu hun e nɔ do gbe mɛ gbɔn kpaa do mɛ enɛ lɛ wa xa towe mɛ e sin gbe mɛ gbɔn e
jw nyi sixu bɔ wa e ɖe
ɔ sixu nukɛgbe klewun klewun jlo yetɔn nyite e
zan e tɛ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo kple aklunɔzan gblamɛ tɛntin tɔn mitɔn hwenu
lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ ɖo kple lɛ mɛ gbɔn
jehovah gbɔn wanyiyi gblamɛ sɔnu nu kple gbɛzan kpo kpo tɔn bonu mitɔn do bi alɔ nu mi
zan bɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖo kple enɛ ji e nɔ mi mɛ gege bɔ mi nɔ ɖeji hugan hwenu mi nɔ ɖo mɛ lɛ wɛ nɔ ɖo biblu wɛ e
mɛ wa lɛ e gege nɔ wu ɖɔ vi mitɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo kple lɛ mɛ
lɛ vi mitɔn lɛ bonu weziza yetɔn gbɔn kpinkplɔn bonu nɔ xosin do xogbe yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ gblamɛ
tɛ sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn nɔ wa ɖo buninɔ kan xixo mɛ
ali lɛ sixu wa ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi tuto sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn gbesisɔ tɔn ɖe biblo
mɛ gege nɔ televiziɔn jw tɔn kpinkpɔn do tuto enɛ mɛ ɖo hweɖenu ɖo ɔ mɛ
nu tuto ɔ kpe ɔ etɛwu ɖe hwenu ɖo vo ɖɔ xo do sixu zan nu lɛ e gbɔn e ji a
nu lɛ ɖo nukun kpe do sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn wu wɛ ɔ ɖo flin ɖɔ sin hudo vi kpɛvi ɖe ɖo e sixu gbɔn vo tawun nu ee sin hudo mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe ɖo e
enyi nɔ do mɛxomɔ lɛ ɔ e hɛn lido tawun akpaxwe ɔ
mi bi sixu xo buninɔ kan ɖo agun ɔ mɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ bonu weziza yetɔn gbɔn
nu klisanwun winnyawinnya ɖe wɛ nu ɔ etɛwu dido mɛxomɔ lɛ do ɖo nu gbe nya e a
sixu byɔ kpo sisi kpo ɖɔ kpi nu mɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖe sin nu
mɔ ɖɔ e hɛn lido tawun bɔ akpakpa tlɛ hwi kpo kpo bi hugan bɔ blo bɔ weziza nugbo ɔ tɔn
wiwa so nu buninɔ sixu mɛ lɛ bɔ jlo bɔ weziza yetɔn
gandido towe lɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ do gbe nu jonɔ lɛ kpo nukiko dɔn mɛ e ɖe kpo vlafo tlɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ jinjɔn akpa towe
ɖe jonɔ lɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ enɛ ɔ vo ci ɖɔ xwegbe wɛ ɖe ɖɔhun
enyi e nu bɔ kpe nukun do kple kunnuɖegbe tɔn ɖe wu ɔ sixu do gan mɛxomɔ lɛ bonu ɖo ɔ mɛ
ɖo fi ɖekunnu ɖe sɔgbe xa e a
ðo ali ɖe lɛ ɔ sixu ɖe kpo mɛ winnyawinnya sixu e ɖe kpo
sixu mɛ ɖeɖee lanmɛ yetɔn alo ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo dogbo nu nu sixu wa lɛ e e ɖɔ emi mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ yetɔn mɛ
nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu gbɔn e kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ towe kpo sixu mɛ winnyawinnya kpo mɛxomɔ kpo mɛ mɔ nu e kpo mɛ mɔ nu a e kpo bɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo
akpakpa ɔ ɖɔ nɔvi nɔvi lɛ ɖo gbe ɔ e nɔ e nɔ vivi mɛ nya
ee izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo gbe e ɔ nuwiwa mɛ ɖevo nɔ jehovah lɛ e tɔn wa ɖagbe nu tawun bɔ ɖu le yetɔn
e ci e nɔ kɔn do nu mɛ e nɔ ɖo wan ɖagbe nɔ wa ɖagbe nu agbaza gbɔn e ɖɔhun
enyi ɖo wa wɛ ɔ e jɛxa ɖɔ e kpa
sixu ɖo wanyiyi ɖaxo enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ blo hu nɔ wa ɖo gbesisɔmɛ a kɔ
etɛ lɛ sixu wa gblo ada nu gandido towe lɛ bonu weziza nugbo biblu tɔn tɔn ɖo xa mɛ ɖe e
kpo nuwalɔ tɔn towe lɛ kpo sixu dɔn nɔzo ɖe wa nugbo ɔ mɛ
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ nukun tɛ nɔzo lɛ nɔ do mi
nɔ ɖe afɔ ɔ jɛ nukɔn nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ a
enyi ɖo xo ɖɔ ɖo xa ɖevo lɛ wɛ hun nɔ kanbyɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ yetɔn kpo walɔ ɖagbe yetɔn kpo wa ɖagbe nu nɔzo yetɔn lɛ yetɔn lɛ kpo yetɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn e
etɛwu wunzɛn ninɔ ɖo taji
enyi mi jlo ɖɔ weziza mitɔn ganji ɔ mi ɖo nɔ aceji do taan mɛ mi ɖo nɔ ɖe wɛ e wu
ðo hwenu vɛwu elɔ lɛ ɖo syɛnsyɛn wɛ wutu ɔ mi bi ɖo nɔ wunzɛn
jehovah wa nu do tɔn mɛ
din hwɛ ɔ mi ɖo sɔnu nu suuluɖiɖo nɔ wunzɛn hu tɔn
nɔ xa xo mawu tɔn ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe nɔ nɔ wunzɛn nɔ xoɖɛ
xwedo ɖagbe nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖeɖee wunzɛn nɔ e kpo weziza yetɔn jo do hɔn e kpo hɛn awajijɛ wa lɛ e tɔn
ɖagbe ɖokpo ɖo xota ju ton son owhe kandegban mɛ ɖo atɔxwɛ gungbe avril tɔn mɛ wexwɛ
nuwiwa kpo kpo nɔ hɛn mɛ lido lɛ e gbɛzan towe mɛ
ðo xwe kanweko wa yi e mɛ ɔ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ hɛn alɔnu yetɔn jan wa nu gege
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ mi ɖo nu hugan lɛ e wa wɛ ɖo egbe
mi ɖo biblo wɛ bɔ weziza mitɔn ɖo wɛ ɖo ali ɖe bɔ e ɖɔ nu nyi a
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi nɔ wunzɛn nyi gbɔn
enɛ wu ɔ nunina jehovah mi nyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ e nɔ su nukun towe mɛ
xa efɛzinu lɛ
hweɖevonu mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe wa e ɔ zan ali enɛ hun nu e yi nunywɛ ɖo tɔn ɖu we e ɖe xa e sin le
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe ɖo angleterre ɖo xwi ɖi xa tagba ɖe lɛ wɛ ylɔ mɛxo agun tɔn we bɔ sɔ ɔ
asi ɔ mɔ ɖɔ asu emitɔn kun sɔgbe xa emi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo o
asu ɔ yi gbe ɖɔ emi kun nyi ɖagbe o le emi kun blo tuto sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn gbesisɔ tɔn ɖe tɔn o
e nɔ kpe nukun do ahwanvu tɔn lɛ wu nɔ su nu hudo lɛ e sin do mɛxo lɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu asu ɔ ɖɔ e xwedo jezu tɔn
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu asi ɔ ɖɔ e ɖo suulu
nukɔnmɛ ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpa asu ɔ nu gan e do lɛ e
do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɖɔ e do gan ganjɛ gbigbɔ wu bonu e ɛ nu e huzu ɖagbe ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
xwedo ɔ sin nu ɖu ayi mɛ nu e kpo gudo nɔ e kpo bɔ weziza tɔn
enyi blo bonu weziza towe ɔ etɛ sixu ɖo nukun
ɔ jihan ɖɔ nu nu mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu jehovah lɛ mɛ nɔ ali jehovah ɖe lɛ
