nu nɔ blo bɔ weziza towe nɔ gbɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ yiylɔ bonu wa mawu nuwiwa ɖo ali ɖe do xo fifa kan kpo acejininɔ kpo gblamɛ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ awajijɛ towe jɛji
mɛ tɔn wɛ e edward bazely
ðo tɔsisa indus tɔn sin age gbadahweji tɔn ɔ ji ɖo fi e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ pakistan ɖo egbe din e wɛ toxo sukkur tɔn hwexonu tɔn ɔ ɖe
finɛ wɛ e ji mi ɖe ɖo novembre
ðo hwe enɛ ɔ glɛnsinu ɖe wema gege ɖo bu ee ɖo sinmɛ nɔ e ɖe lɛ
wema junjɔn biblu ji enɛ lɛ mi bɔ huzu ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ
e nɔ ylɔ wema enɛ lɛ ɖɔ nyi sin kplekple
ee ɖo nuwukpikpe sixu do nu nu ɖɔ e ɔ mɔ ɖiɖe ɖo do nu tamɛ linlin e ɖo mɛ
e sin enɛ wu bɔ sin vu ɔ xovɛ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ biblu tɔn tɔn wema nukunɖeji enɛ lɛ xwle mɛ e nɔ sin mi
hwenu wɛkɛ hwan wegɔ ɔ jlo su kun do nu e ɔ gbɛzan jɛ huzuhuzu do nyanya ji ji
lɛ klan bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ yeɖee
sixu tuun nu bɔ mɛ we yi wan lɛ e jo yeɖee do gbɔn e a
ðo wanyiyi linu ɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ e ɖe nu mi mi ɖɔhun
nyi viɖokponɔ bɔ e ci nu mi ɖɔ kun sixu mɔ gbɔdonumɛ kpo alɔdo kpo ee sin hudo ɖo tawun e o ɖɔhun
nɔ kpo nyi kpo wa ci karachi ee nyi azinkan nu tokpɔn ɔ e
gbe ɖokpo ɔ fred hardaker ee nyi dotoogan mɛxomɔ ɖe nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ e xuxu hɔn mitɔn
nuɖiɖi ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e ɖo ee wema lɛ xwedo e ɖɔhun
e xwle biblu kpinkplɔn ɖe nɔ
nɔ ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ sixu yi gbe
nɔvi hardaker jɛ nu xa mi ji ɖo aklunɔzan gbla bɔ e mɛ
aklunɔzan gblamɛ yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ jɛ kple lɛ yi ji ɖo nɔvi hardaker sin dotooxwe mɛɖesunɔ tɔn
mɛxomɔ nɔ kple ɖo finɛ nɔ mawu
do gbɔ nu mi kpe nukun wu ye vi ɖe ɖɔhun
e lin a bɔ nɔvi hardaker ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ nyi nɔ xwedo emi yi kunnuɖegbe
e mi glamafonu zinzan bonu mi do sixu xo xoyidokanji mɛ xoɖiɖɔ junjɔn biblu ji klewun klewun lɛ ɖe e
xoɖiɖɔ lɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo tlɔlɔ sin enɛ wu bɔ lɛ yi wan nu wɛn ɔ a
kunnuɖiɖe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ akpakpa mi
akpakpa nɔ mi tawun do nugbo biblu tɔn wu bɔ yi wan nu nugbo enɛ mima xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
ee ahwankpa japon tɔn byɔ e ɔ gan grande bretagne tɔn lɛ ɔ kɔ gbidi nu jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖe e jɛji
gudo mɛ ɖo juillet ɔ kɔgbidinumɛ enɛ wa nu do nyiɖesunɔ wu
gan wemaxɔmɛ ɔ tɔn ee nyi sinsɛngan anglicane tɔn ɖe e nya mi ɖo e ɖɔ ɖɔ nyi mɛɖe bɔ nuɖe kun nɔ jɛmɛ nu mi o
e nu nɔ bɔ e kan nu do xa lɛ wɛ ɖe e
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e mi do ɖo peshawar toxo ɖe wɛ ɖo kilomɛtlu do tofɔligbe
ðo nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn kpo mɛ do xa lɛ e kpo kpo wutu ɔ kanmɛ gbɔjɔ mi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ðo ɔ lɛkɔ yi karachi ɖo wɛ
ee ɖo e ɔ yi dotoogan hardaker sin dotooxwe mɛɖesunɔ tɔn
e yi mi kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo
ðo e ɖɔ wa gbeje lanmɛ wutu ɔ e kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ etɛ ɖo do nu wɛ
yi gbe ɖɔ dotoogan lanmɛzɔn jɛ wɛ ɖe a gbigbɔ lixo jɛ azɔn ɖe wɛ ɖe
ɖɔ e biblu xa mi
e ɖɔ hwetɛnu
mi biblu ɖo gbadanu bɔ e jiwu tawun
e ci nu mi ɖɔ jɛ ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e ɖɔhun
nɔ wa nu bi su ali do mi bonu do xa lɛ o din tɔn ɔ kanɖeji nugbo ɔ do ɖo
ðo aout ɔ blo baptɛm do ze ze nyiɖee jo nu jehovah e
e nɔ zaan e ɔ gbexosin hwebinu tɔn sin hwenu ɖo xwe e
fi nukɔntɔn wa gbexosin ɖe e wɛ nyi quetta finɛ wɛ nyi ahwansla grande bretagne tɔn
ðo ɔ to ɔ ma huzu kpo pakistan kpo
nu enɛ jɛ e bɔ adakaxixo mɛ wu ɖo sinsɛn linu gbakpe sin enɛ wu bɔ mɛ gege hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ bɔ nu e ɖo mɛ hɔn sin to yetɔn mɛ lɛ e gbɔn ɖo hwenuxo mɛ e xo ɖɔ wɛ ɔ e lɔ nyi ɖokpo
livi wɛ yi bibɛtɛn ɖo fi ɖevo lɛ
malɛnu ee ɖo lɛ e yi pakistan bɔ hindu kpo sikh kpo ɖo pakistan lɛ e yi ci
hwenu nu hannyahannya enɛ ɖo jijɛ wɛ e ɔ zunfan pipan e ɖe nɔ gblɛlɛ mɛ yi quetta
yi lɛdo tɔn ɖe ɖo ɖo
ðo quetta ɔ mɔ george ee nyi gbexosin titewungbe ɖo xwe e
george mi kɛkɛ afɔdokwin xoxo ɖokpo bɔ nɔ kun gbɔn sokanmɛto ɔ mɛ
ðo vlamɛ ɔ jɛ biblu xa mɛ ji bɔ biblu enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ wa nugbo ɔ mɛ
ðokpo ɖo mɛ nyi ahwangan ɖe bɔ nyikɔ tɔn nɔ nyi sadiq masih e george kpo nyi kpo bɔ mi lilɛ wema junjɔn biblu ji ɖe lɛ do gbe nɔ nyi ourdou nyi pakistan sin gbe e mɛ
sadiq wa huzu ɖe
xwe wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn ɖo batoo elizabeth mɛ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ lɛkɔ yi karachi xa kpo forrest kpo wɛ nyi gosin wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn tlolo
yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin nu xɔ akwɛ lɛ mi
gbe ɖokpo ɔ kpla nɔvi yi tomɛ wɛnɖagbejijla tɔn ɖo gbadahweji pakistan tɔn
ðo so ɖaxo lɛ sin akpa ɔ mi mɔ gletoxo ɔ mɛ nɔ do ourdou bɔ nugbo biblu tɔn sin kɔ xu lɛ e gege
xwe we gudo ɔ nyi lɔ jɛxa yi wemaxɔmɛ galadi tɔn lɛkɔ yi pakistan nyi lɛdo tɔn
nɔ lɛ sin xwe ɖe gbe ɖo lahore bɔ nɔvi sunnu atɔn ɖevo lɛ nu mi
e blawu ɖɔ ɖo ɔ ɖo lahore lɛ e ɔ e vɛwu bɔ nɔ mɔ nu jɛ yeɖee gbe mɛ sin enɛ wu bɔ alaxɔ ɖe mi fi vovo
e ci ɖe nu mi bɔ mɔ ɖɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
lɛkɔ yi karachi bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ yi londres ɖo angleterre kpo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
ðo londres ɔ xwedo betɛli londres tɔn tɔn sin lɛ gege nɔ agun mɛ
pryce hughes ee nyi alaxɔ tɔn ɖe e mi kpo wanyiyi kpo
gbe ɖokpo ɔ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ e wa jɛ hweɖenu bɔ joseph
ee ɖo nukun kpe do ɔ wu wɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e ɖe we ɖe xa emi do nujɔnu mɛ
hwenu nɔvi hughes hwɛjijɔ nu eɖee e ɔ nɔvi nu syɛnsyɛn
e kpaca mi ɖɔ mɔ bɔ nɔvi hughes nu hwenu e ɖo nu jɛ e flin wɛ e
e ɖɔ ɖɔ tlolo ɔ e nu emi ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo weɖexamɛ syɛnsyɛn enɛ tɔn le wanyiyi jehovah tɔn tɔn ɖe wɛ
e xwe yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo blo baptɛm ɖo
wa se ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ cobonu ku ɔ e lɔ nu xa jehovah tɔn lɛ
ðo ɔ wli alɔ xa nɔvi nyɔnu danemark tɔn ɖe wɛ tɛn wa jɛ londres
ðo xwe bɔ e mɛ ɔ mawu do nu mi bɔ mi ji vi nyɔnu ɖe ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ e wɛ nyi nukɔnvi vi mi ɖo lɛ e tɔn
mɔ wujɔmɛ tɔn ɖevo lɛ ɖo agun tɔn mɛ
ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ lanmɛ ɖo ganji tɔn byɔ ɖɔ mi tɛn jɛ fi ninɔmɛ ayi mɛ tɔn hun myɔ ɖe e ɖe
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo ɔ mi tɛn yi adelaide ɖo australie
klisanwun mɛxomɔ yi do ɖe wɛ ɖo agun mitɔn adelaide tɔn ɔ mɛ
nɔ nɔ nukɔn nu ɔ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo
blewun jɛn mi aca gbigbɔ tɔn mitɔn lɛ
ðo ɔ kpo nyi kpo ji vi mitɔn ɔ nyi ɖɔ daniel
azɔn nɔ nyi trisomie e ɖo do wɛ baɖabaɖa tɔn bɔ mi ɖo nukun ɖɔ e kun nɔ ɖe o
jɛ din ɔ e nɔ vɛwu nu mi bɔ tinmɛ mi mɔ e
mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi kpe nukun do hudo tɔn lɛ wu bɔ taan ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ɔ mi nu vi mitɔn ɛnɛ ɖe lɛ a
hweɖelɛnu ɔ do we ɖo hun tɔn mɛ nɔ bɔ jɔhɔn nɔ hwe nɔ jɛ sinmɛ do ji bɔ mi nɔ ɖo dandan mɛ nɔ wezun yi dotooxwe
lanmɛ tɔn ɖo ganji a co e bi tawun bɔ ninɔmɛ tɔn nɔ dɔn mɛ
e yi wan nu jehovah tawun
enyi xwedo mitɔn ja ɖɛ xo gbe cobo ɖu nu ɔ e nɔ xo alɔ tɔn we lɛ kple nɔ ze do yi gbe nɔ ɖɔ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo ɖɔ nicɛ
enɛ gudo jɛn e nɔ ɖu nu
hwenu daniel ɖo xwe ɛnɛ e ɔ e hun tɔn
nu cikɔ nu kpo nyi kpo ɖo agbaza kpo nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e kpo linu tawun
mɔ ɖɔ ɖibla syɛnsyɛn ɖe
hwenu awakanmɛ wa ku mi bi e ɔ lɛdo tɔn mitɔn neville bromwich wa hɔn mitɔn
zan enɛ ɔ mɛ ɔ ɖasin ɖo nukun tɔn lɛ ji bɔ e kɔ nu mi
mi bi
wanyiyi kpo kpo sin xogbe tɔn lɛ do gbɔ nu mi bɔ sixu a
e gosin mi ɖo ɖokpo mɛ ayitehɔnnu
enɛ gudo zaan ɔ daniel ku
ku tɔn wɛ nyi nu ɖo nu mi hugan ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ e
mi dɛ ɖo mitɔn ɖeji ɖɔ nu ɖebu jɛ ku ji kun sixu klan daniel sin wanyiyi jehovah tɔn wu o
hlɔ mi ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ kpo akpakpa mɛ kpo nɔ xa ɛ hwenu mawu ɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ e jaan
gbɔn ɖaxo we enɛ lɛ mɛ cobo kpo ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn nyi wɛ jɛ egbe
nu mɛ gbɔn din lɛ e mi bɔ nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn mɛ nɔ se xa ɖo taji ɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo xwi ɖi xa lɛ wɛ e
nɔ nɔ da hwɛ nu a
e wa ɔ nɔ kanbyɔ nyiɖee ɖɔ ninɔmɛ ee mɛ gbɔn din lɛ e wa nu do nu nɔ ci nu e kpo linlin yetɔn kpo wu gbɔn
sixu ɖɔ nu yetɔn ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi gbɔn
sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu bɔ wa jlo jehovah tɔn gbɔn
yi wan nu tɔn wiwa tawun ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
nugbo ɔ enyi do gbɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo fa kɔ nu ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ do gbɔ nu nyiɖee fa kɔ nu nyiɖee
kpo ɖo awajijɛ mɔ wɛ ɖo tɔn biblo mɛ
nu ci nu ɖɔ xo elɔ e ɖɔhun wɛ e ci nu nyi lɔ enyi nu gege ɖo hun mɛ nu mi ɔ gbɔ jehovah nɔ do nu mi e wɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mi ðɛh
e nɔ gudo nu mi ɖo xwedo tɔn lɛ gbeklanxamɛ sinsɛn tɔn awakanmɛ ku mɛ mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo kpo mɛ
nugbo ɔ jehovah nyi nujɔnu tɔn ɖe nu mi
ɔ gbadahweji pakistan tɔn ee nyi pakistan ɖo egbe e kpo zanzanhweji pakistan tɔn ee nyi bangladesh ɖo egbe e kpo wɛ kple nyi pakistan
xota enfant trisomique les difficultes les joies ɖo reveillez vous
juin tɔn mɛ
nu ɛnɛ tɛ lɛ mi sixu blo bɔ hanjiji mitɔn
toxo bibɛtɛn tɔn wɛ e ma ɖo to ɔ mɛ bɔ e wlibo nu ali yi mɛ lɛ e ganji
enɛ bɔ mɛɖe sixu yawu mɔ fi e hɔn yi ɖo wex
e su do jlo mi ɖo ba ɖo nɔ wɛ e tɔn su hudo mi ɖo ba jɛ miɖee kannu sin hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo si e sin do
ðɛhan do gesi sin ku jezu tɔn gbɔn
jezu nyi mɛsiya ɔ e hu
mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo vi sunnu ɖaxo sin acɛ lɛ e kɛɖɛ sin kunkan mɛ jɛn mɛsiya ɔ gosin a
hweɖelɛnu ɔ kunkan ɔ nɔ gbɔn vi sunnu ɖaxo ɔ ji e nɔ nyi hwebinu a
davidi nyi vi sunnu ɖaxo jɛsee tɔn a e ɖo co mɛsiya ɔ gosin kunkan tɔn mɛ wex
ðo mɔyizi ɔ ɔ e nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo azɔn alɔkpa ɖe lɛ jɛ wɛ lɛ e ɖo zɔ nu mɛ kpo lɛ e
etɛwu e sɔgbe ɖɔ klisanwun ɖe yi wan nu eɖee ɖo ba ɖe mɛ
mi ɖo yi wan nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ miɖesunɔ ɖɔhun
afɔ tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖe yi nukɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
mi ɖo xo mawu tɔn tamɛ bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ mi zan nu mi e
etɛwu do biba nu sin wuntun kpo nukinkan kpo nyi nu taji bɔ e tuun sɔgudo lɛ e a
nukun tɛ mi ɖo do e ylɔ mi wa nuɖuɖu ɖe tɛnmɛ e
mi ɖo wa ɖo nu sin nuɖe wu a
nu tɛ lɛ timɔtee tɔn sixu sunnu agbanɖotananɔ lɛ
nu mɛ lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu timɔtee tawun bɔ e nɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
e nɔ syɛnsyɛn ɖo ɔ mɛ nɔ zan nu e lɛ e
e nɔ ɖo nu wɛ eɖesu nɔ ganjɛ gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn wu
ze yeɖee jo kpo jlo kpo ðo birmanie
ðɔ e tuun
nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mɛ gege bɔ nɔ nya gbe tɔn ɖo egbe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɔ tuun
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do nu wu mi ɖo ayi mitɔn ɖo mɛ tuuntuun taji hugan ɔ ji e ji enɛ wɛ nyi tuun jehovah nɔ tuun tɔn lɛ e
mi ɖɔ xo do jehovah nɔ ɖɔ emi tuun mɛ bɔ ɖo hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ nyi ɖo ali maɖonukun tawun lɛ gbɔn e ji
fitɛ wɛ nukun towe lɛ ðe
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi gbeje nu wu nya mɔyizi wujɔmɛ e ɖo yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji e kpo e
xota ɔ mi bɔ mi mɔ mi nyi alɔ nu mɔ mɛ mɔyizi jɛ e mɛ jijɛ gbɔn e
ðo jehovah sin ahwan mɛ
jehovah tɔn wɛ mi nyi
jehovah sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emitɔn wɛ lɛ bi nyi
enɛ wu ɔ e nɔ byɔ mi ɖɔ mi ze miɖee bi jo nu emi
mɛɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbeji nu mawu nɔ zan tonumase sin gbɛzan
ðo xota nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ mi nu taji ɖe lɛ ɖo biblu tɔn kunkpla mɔyizi kpo kpo e mɛ
ðo xota wegɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do ali vovo mi sixu ɖe ɖɔ wu jehovah jɔ mi bɔ mi nyi etɔn nyi togun tɔn e su nukun mitɔn mɛ e ji
nɔ se xa lɛ bi
sixu blo gbɔn bɔ biblu kplɔnkplɔn towe ðo vivi hugan e
xogbe enɛ lɛ jezu do ɖo xwe ɖie e sɔgbe tawun xa ninɔmɛ mɛ birmanie ɖe ɖo egbe e
ðo birmanie ɔ gee wɛ nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ livi
jehovah jinukunnɔ ɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo mɔkpan bɔ gosin to vovo mɛ wa to elɔ ɖo tofɔligbe zanzanhweji asie tɔn e mɛ ɖo nukun gbigbɔ tɔn ɔ kɔn ɖo fi
etɛ bɔ gosin jɔtɛn yetɔn lɛ
e bɔ tɛn gbɔn
nyɔna tɛ lɛ sin vivi ɖu wɛ ɖe
dotoo ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ e kun kun o nu xwe we
e nu kazuhiro
e kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ sixu kpo ɖo gbexosin yi wan e wa wɛ gbɔn
e xoɖɛ jehovah byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e hun ali ɖe nu emi bonu emi kpo ɖo gbexosin emitɔn wa wɛ
kazuhiro kpo mari kpo
kazuhiro ɖɔ ɖokpo gudo ɔ ɖe ɖo wa wɛ ɖo birmanie se nu gbo mi e
e ylɔ mi ɖɔ ðo birmanie ɔ hun e nɔ do tawun e wɛ nyi sin hun lɛ
enyi wa fi ɔ ɖo hudo tɔn cobo kpo ɖo towe wa wɛ a
kanbyɔ dotoo ɖɔ ninɔmɛ lɔn nu mi bɔ yi birmanie a ji
e kpaca mi ɖɔ dotoo ɔ ɖɔ dotoogan ɖe nɔ kpe nukun do taglomɛzɔn wu gosin birmanie wa japon din
ɛ
enyi azɔn ɔ nu ɖe ɔ e sixu kpe nukun do wu
tlolo ɔ kazuhiro wlan nu alaxɔ birmanie tɔn gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji byɔ ɖɔ emi kpo asi emitɔn kpo jlo wa gbexosin ɖo to enɛ mɛ
azan gudo kpowun ɔ alaxɔ ɔ yi gbe ɖɔ wa mi ɖo hudo gbexosin gege tɔn
kazuhiro kpo asi tɔn mari kpo sa yetɔn yi kunnuɖewema togudoyiyi tɔn yetɔn lɛ su jɔmɛhun dido kwɛ lɛ
ɖo wa wɛ ɖo kanɖo nɔ do tokunɔgbe e ɖe mɛ ɖo mandalay din
kazuhiro ɖɔ ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ nuɖiɖi mi ɖo nu akpa mawu do ɖo ðɛhan mɛ e lido towe jo nu jehovah ganjɛ wu tɔn e wa tɔn
ðo ɔ e jɔwu jehovah tɔn ɖo birmanie lɛ e ɖɔ e blo ɖaxo bunɔ ɖe ɖo to yetɔn mɛ
mɛ gege gosin to ɖevo lɛ mɛ wa
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖokpo nɔ nyi monique ɖo xwe gosin etats unis ɖo mɛ wa lɛ e mɛ ɖɔ ee lɛkɔ sin ɔ gudo e ɔ xoɖɛ jehovah do afɔ ɖo ɖe bɔ ɖo gbɛzan mɛ e ji
ɖɔ xo xa lɛ do nu gbe nya ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e ji
mi bi mɔ ɖɔ ɖo lɛkɔ yi birmanie e byɔ taan kpɛɖe kpo ɖɛ gege xixo kpo cobɔ wa gbeta gudo tɔn ɔ kɔn
monique tinmɛ nu wu wɛ e
monique kpo kpo
jezu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ akwɛ nabi zan ɔ
enɛ wu ɔ kanbyɔ nyiɖee ɖɔ ɖo akwɛ kpe e tɛn a
enyi tlɛ zan hwenu gege ɖo ɖe mɛ a ɔ kpewu kpe nukun do nyiɖee wu ɖo to enɛ mɛ a
e ɖɔ mɔ tlolo ɖɔ kun ɖo akwɛ kpe bɔ tɛn yi ɔ sin ɖevo xwe e o
enɛ wu ɔ e kpewu wa tɛn ɔ gbɔn luk
hu mi ɖo ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ ma jo do
gan wa a e wa ɔ e doku nu mi ɖo ɖagbe wu
monique ɖo wa wɛ ɖo birmanie sin decembre
nu ci do ɖo fi hudo ɖe e wu
e ɖɔ e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ ɖo fi
nɔ biblu xa mɛ atɔn
biblu lɛ ɖokpo ɖo xwe
hwebinu wɛ e nɔ do gbe mi kpo nukiko ɖe kpo nɔ zunfan mi
hwenu e ɖɔ nyikɔ mawu tɔn nɔ nyi jehovah e ɔ enɛ ɛ bɔ ɖasin wa yi
e ɖɔ azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ nɛ ɖo gbɛzan mɛ bɔ se ɖɔ mawu nɔ nyi jehovah
nyi mɛxo nu tawun mi nu taji hugan ɖo mɛ e
ðasin wa yi do nyi lɔ
nu mɔhun lɛ nɔ bɔ ɖo fi hudo ɖe e nɔ hɛn awajijɛ ɖaxo wa
ðo agaɖanu din ɔ e jɔwu monique bɔ e yi wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ
nu ɖevo mɛɖe lɛ bɔ wa birmanie e wɛ nyi to enɛ tɔn annuaire des temoins jehovah kpi e
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nyi ɖo xwe jɛji nɔ nɔ tofɔligbe zanzanhweji asie tɔn
e ɖo hwebinu tɔn ɖe nɔ wa ɖo annuaire ɔ mɛ e ɛ bɔ e tamɛ do ɖo birmanie ji
ðo ɖo hwenu yi ɖaxo bunɔ ɔ ɖo yangon e ɔ mɔ asu kpo asi kpo ɖe bɔ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi hudo ɖe ɖo xa mɛ e nɔ do gbe ɖe ɖo birmanie e e
ðo nɔ do gbe wutu ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn kanɖo nɔ do gbe ɖo finɛ e
xo kpoɖo nu monique bɔ mi tɛn yi mandalay
jehovah do nu mi bɔ mi mɔ hwenu klewun tɔn ɖe nɔ nu mɛ ɖo wemaxɔ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ bɔ fi mi mɔ xɔ do e sɛkpɔ finɛ
gbɛmɛ nɔ hun bɔ mi nɔ mɔ tagba ɖe lɛ co ɖu vivi ɔ tɔn ɖo finɛ
mɛ ɖo birmanie lɛ e nɔ zan bɔkun e ɖe nɔ si mɛ nɔ jlo ɖe hwenu ɖo vo ba ɖoto wɛnɖagbe ɔ
nu e mɔ jehovah ɖo biblo wɛ bɔ ɔ ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ gbɔn e ɔ e nɔ akpakpa mɛ tawun
kudeji tawun ɖɔ jehovah wɛ jlo ɖɔ ma ɖo mandalay fi
jumpei ɖo xwe bɔ asi tɔn nao ɖo xwe
nɔ agun nɔ do tokunɔgbe e ɖe mɛ ɖo japon
etɛ bɔ wa birmanie
jumpei ɖɔ nu gbe asi kpo nyi kpo nɔ nya hwebinu e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e ɖo to ɖevo mɛ
nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo agun mitɔn nɔ do tokunɔgbe ɖo japon e mɛ tɛn yi birmanie
akwɛ kpɛvi ɖe jɛn ɖo sɛxwetɛn nu mi co mi lɔ tɛn ɖo mai
nu ci do fi e nɔ do tokunɔgbe ɖe ɖo birmanie e wu
mɛ lɛ ɖo jlo tawun
nu mi mɛ lɛ do tokunɔgbe mɛ ɔ e nɔ jiwu nu
e vivi nu mi tawun ɖɔ mi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn wa nu jehovah ɖo fi
nao kpo jumpei kpo
ee akwɛ wa han jumpei kpo nao kpo e ɔ jehovah gbɔn
ðo xwe atɔn gudo ɔ mi ɖibla zan akwɛ ɖo sɛxwetɛn nu mi e bi ɖo akwɛ nabi ɖe su xɔ kwɛ xwe ja e tɔn a
asi kpo nyi kpo xoɖɛ kpo ayi bi kpo azɔn gege
ajijimɛ kpowun ɔ mi mɔ wema mɛ ɖe sin alaxɔ mɛ bɔ e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa gbexosin titewungbe taan klewun ɖe tɔn sin
mi ɖeji do jehovah wu mɔ ɖɔ e kun jo mi do o
e kpe nukun do mi wu ɖo ali lɛ bi
agaɖanu din ɔ jumpei kpo nao kpo lɔ yi wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ
etɛ simone ee nyi nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo xwe nyi italie e kpo asi tɔn ee ɖo xwe nyi nouvelle zelande e kpo bɔ tɛn yi birmanie
ɖɔ birmanie tɔn e kpi do annuaire tɔn mɛ e wu wɛ e sin
simone ɖɔ wujɔmɛ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo birmanie
ninɔ ɖo fi bɔkun tawun bɔ sixu zan hwenu gege do nu jehovah
mi ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi hudo ɖe e ɔ akpakpa nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ jehovah nɔ kpe nukun do mi wu ðɛh
ɖɔ ɖo awajijɛ din tawun hu tɔn
mi ɖo bɔkun e ɖe zan wɛ
nɔ zan hwenu gege xa asu bɔ mi
mi mɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖevo lɛ
mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo linlin agɔ do lɛ wu a bɔ nɔ ɖe jlo gbɔn e jiwu
simone kpo kpo
ɖɔ gbe ɖokpo ɔ ɖekunnu nu kplɔnyiji alavɔvi ɖe ɖo axi mɛ blo tuto yi mɔ ɛ hweɖevonu
ee yi e ɔ e kpla tɔn ɖokpo wa
din ɔ nɔ biblu xa mɛ
simone ɖɔ mɛ ɖo xa ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ do mɛ nɔ nu do
mɛ gege nɔ ɖo jlo
e ɖɔ kpowun ɔ mi nɔ mɔ hwenu gege do kpe nukun do enɛ lɛ wu
sachio kpo mizuho kpo
afɔ tawun tawun tɛ lɛ e byɔ ɖɔ e ɖe cobo wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ba tɛn yi birmanie
mizuho ee gosin japon e ɖɔ asu sachio kpo nyi kpo nɔ hwebinu yi wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e fitɛ mi yi
ee mi xa birmanie tɔn e kpi do annuaire tɔn mɛ e gudo e ɔ xo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu mɛ tɔn mi xa lɛ e mi bɔ mi jɛ tamɛ ji ɖɔ mi sixu kpewu wa ɖo birmanie a ji
sachio ɖɔ ɖɔ mi wa gbeta ɔ kɔn yi blo aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo ɖo yangon ee nyi toxo nukunɖeji birmanie tɔn e mɛ ayi ɔ ji
tomɛyiyi nudobiba tɔn klewun enɛ bɔ mi kudeji ɖɔ mi ɖo tɛn yi finɛ
danica kpo kpo
ɖɔ xovɛ gbigbɔ tɔn nɔ sin mɛ lɛ e wɛ mi tawun
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu xwedo ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ wa ɖo fi birmanie ɖɔhun ɖe
ðagbe enɛ wa nu xwedo mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e gbelu
alokan kpo nu ɖevo lɛ kpo wɛ nɔ jan alɔ nu mɛ winnyawinnya gege
vi mitɔn lɛ nɔ xogbe lɛ kplɔnkplɔn do hɛn alɔnu yetɔn jan
nɔ nɔ sixu ɖɔ xo xa mɛ ɖeɖee biblu ma do a lɛ e gbɔn e sixu xosin ɖo kple lɛ ji gbɔn e ɔ nuwiwa gbigbɔ tɔn gege ɖevo lɛ nɔ akpakpa
oliver kpo kpo
oliver ee nyi nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo xwe gosin etats unis e tinmɛ nu wu e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ do mɔhun wu e ɖɔ nu jehovah ɖo ayi ɖevo ji gbɔn vo fi ma mɛ e nɔ hɛn nyɔna gege wa
xwegbe gigosin mi bɔ sɔnu nu jiɖiɖe nɔ ganjɛ jehovah wu ɖo ninɔmɛ ɖebu mɛ wa mɔ nyiɖee ɖe e
egbe ɔ oliver kpo asi tɔn kpo kpo ɖo wa wɛ kpo kanɖodonuwu kpo ɖo fi e nɔ do gbe ɖe e
trazel
trazel ee nyi nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo xwe gosin australie e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo birmanie sin
e ɖɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee ninɔmɛ yetɔn yi gbe lɛ e si tawun ɖɔ wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e
mɔ ɖɔ enyi ɖo jlo wa nu jehovah ɔ e kɔn nyɔna do gandido towe lɛ ji
ku gbeɖe ɖɔ zan gbɔn le a
xogbe akpakpa mɛ tɔn enɛ lɛ mɛ ɖo birmanie fi hudo ɖe lɛ e do e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu bonu tamɛ do alɔdido ayijlɔjlɔnɔ ɖo fi e wa mitɔn gbɔn a lɛ e ji
mɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo fi hudo ɖe lɛ e ɖo gbehwan elɔ nyi wɛ ɖɔ kɛnklɛn wa birmanie wa do alɔ mi
mawu nɔ dohwɛ agɔ a e wɔn wa e a wanyiyi ɛ ɔ e wɔn a ebl
ali ɖaxo hugan tɛ e sixu tuun mi ɖe
etɛ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ do tuun jehovah nɔ tuun mi e wu
jehovah ɖɔ emi tuun kpo jezu kpo bi gbɔn
jlo tɛ mi bi nɔ ɖo etɛ enɛ nɔ byɔ
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ tuun nɔ si tawun e ɖe wɔn nyikɔ towe ee nyla hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e tlɛ tuun a
nu ci nu
ðo ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn nɔ jlo ɖɔ e yi mi
jlo mi ɖo ɖɔ nu mitɔn su mɛ ɖevo lɛ nukunmɛ e sixu wa zɛkpa gbɔn
jlo jɔwamɔ tɔn gege ɖevo lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ jlo mi nɔ ɖo ɖɔ nu mitɔn su mɛ ɖevo lɛ nukunmɛ e ɔ hwɛhuhu mitɔn sixu bɔ e wa zɛkpa alo e sixu slo kɔ
e sixu bɔ mi jlo ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpa mi ɖo ali sɔgbe a e do ɖɔ tuun mi
sataan tɔn nɔ do nu jlo xixɔ kpo mɛ kpikpa kpo tɔn bɔ enɛ nɔ ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn sin mɛ ɖokpo gee e jɛxa nugbo nugbo ɖɔ e tuun e ji e wɛ nyi mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ jehovah mawu nuɖe
ðo jezu hwenu ɔ sinsɛngan ɖe lɛ ɖo linlin sɔgbe a e do nu e tuun mɛ nyi e wu
jezu nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ miɖee do lɛ wu ɖo nu nɔ vivi nu lɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo awu gaga mɛ ɖo sa ɖi wɛ e nɔ do gbe ɖo tokpletɛn lɛ nɔ jinjɔn zinkpo nukunɖeji lɛ mɛ ɖo lɛ nɔ jinjɔn tɛn nukɔn nukɔntɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo jonɔgbe
xota elɔ mi bɔ mi ɖo linlin sɔgbe e enɛ wɛ nyi linlin jehovah mawu ɖɔ mi ɖo e
mɛ taji hugan tɛ tuun mɛ bɔ e
mɛ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ e ɖo ayi emi wu gbɔn ɖo wema kplɔnkplɔn kpo ayiɖeɖayi elɔ tɔn kpo linu e wɛ midɛɛ lɛ ɖɔ e ɖo ayi mi wu gbɔn a
e wa ɔ pɔlu tinmɛ gbɔn ɖo xo elɔ mɛ e wɛ mi e ɖɔ din tuun mawu ɔ ɖɔ din tuun mawu ɔ lɔ a din mawu tuun ɔ sixu lɛkɔ yi numaɖinu enɛ lɛ ɖo gan a lɛ kɔn gbɔn etɛwu jlo huzu kannumɔ nu enɛ lɛ tɔn
wujɔmɛ jiwu ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mawu nyi gan acɛbinɔ wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn e sixu tuun mi
akpakpa ɖo ɛ wɛ bonu e ɖo kancica syɛn e ɖe xa mi
akɔwe ɖe ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ mi huzu mɛ ɖeɖee wu e nɔ ɖo ayi ɖo ali ɖagbe lɛ e
mɔyizi ɖesunɔ ɖu nyɔna mɔhun ɖe sin vivi
enyi jehovah wa tuun miɖesunɔ ɔ mi sixu mɔ nyɔna jiwu lɛ
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ jehovah tuun mi
e nɔ tuun mi hwenu mi yi wan ze gbɛzan mitɔn jo e xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
etɛ sixu bɔ kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble
e ɖo co kancica xɔ akwɛ mi ɖo xa mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ e ɔ mi ɖo wlibo
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ yi nukɔn bɔ mawu tuun
e ɖo co pɔlu ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖokpo enɛ lɛ ɖɔ lɛkɔ yi numaɖinu lɛ kɔn
nu ɖɔ wɛ pɔlu ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ kpo ba mɛ yi nukɔn jɛ din e kpo ɔ etɛwu lɛkɔ yi nu nyi xlonɔnu xɔ akwɛ a bɔ jo do lɛ e kɔn
pɔlu ɖɔhun ɔ hwenu mi tuun jehovah tlolo e ɔ mi sixu jo nu bɔ mi nyi mɛ nukunɖeji ɖo sataan tɔn mɛ lɛ e do xa filipunu lɛ
bɔya mi jo ali ɖeɖee hun nu mi bɔ mi yi kplɔnyiji alavɔ e do alo mi kan e do kan ji nu mi alo ali hun nu mi bɔ mi mɔ akwɛ gege ɖo elɔ tɔn sin ali lɛ e e
nunina hanjiji tɔn alo nuwukpikpe lɔnyiji fɔnkan tɔn sixu bɔ mi nyi mɛ nukunɖeji alo jɛ dɔkun mi do gudo nu enɛ lɛ bi
xlonɔnu wɛ e nyi din ɖɔ mi gbeta ɖagbe enɛ lɛ kɔn mi wa e do mɔ nu yi tɛ mɛ lɛ e
linlin mɔhun ɖiɖo sixu dɔn mi bɔ mi jɛ nu mi ylɔ ɖɔ elɔ sin numaɖinu ɖo gan a lɛ e ji
etɛ do hlɔnhlɔn hlɔnhlɔn ji nu kan mi kanɖeji ɖɔ jehovah tuun mi e
mi sixu blo gbɔn do hlɔnhlɔn hlɔnhlɔn ji nu kan mi kanɖeji ɖɔ jehovah tuun mi bɔ e nyi ɔ a e gbɔn
xa eblee lɛ tɔn lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo xɔ akwɛ tawun bɔ e nɔ kɔɖiɖe do mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ gbeji lɛ e do mɔ hwɛagɔdido
jehovah wa yi ɖɔ togun emitɔn sin nu nukun emitɔn mɛ
jehovah ɖo hweɖelɛnu ɖɔ nu togun emitɔn tɔn nukun emitɔn mɛ ɖo ali jiwu lɛ e
nu enɛ jɛ e jiwu bɔ ɖo xwe gudo ɔ mɛ ɖo ɔ sin akpa enɛ xwe lɛ e kpo ɖo xo ɖɔ wɛ
ðo hwenɛnu ɔ e su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun ɖɔ mi blo bɔ mawu mitɔn tuun mi bɔ e kun nyi elɔ o
ali tɛ jehovah nɔ tuun mɛ ɖe bɔ mi ɖo hɛn do ayi mɛ
mi ɖo hɛn nugbo taji wegɔ ɖe ayi mɛ jehovah sixu ɖɔ emi tuun mi ɖo ali ɖeɖee mi sixu nɔ ɖo nukun tɔn ɖe gbeɖe a lɛ e
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wa nu ɖagbe lɛ bonu lɛ do sixu ɖo ayi wu wutu kpowun lɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ jehovah kun ɖe o
ðo mɛ ɖevo lɛ xɔ nu wutu ɔ mɔ ajɔ yetɔn bi yi xa matie
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ emitɔn nɔ mɔ nu jɛ mɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo acɛ bɔ e doku nu ɖo ɖagbe wa nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ e wutu e
e ɖo co jehovah nɔ mi hweɖelɛnu mi ɖo nukun tɔn a gbɔn e
jehovah ɖɔ emi tuun nyi ɖyɔvi ɖe e gbɔn
hwenu ɔ xo bɔ e ji vi mawu tɔn nyi ɖe e ɔ jehovah nyi ɖyɔvi ɖe ɖo alɔji e nyi nɔ vi bunɔ enɛ tɔn
nɔ nɔ toxo nazalɛti tɔn nuɖe a lin do jeluzalɛmu kpo tɛmpli tɔn ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɔ kpo e mɛ xa luki
etɛwu e wujɔmɛ enɛ nu
wɛnsagun gabliyɛli ɖɔ ɖɔ mawu jɔwu
e nyi gbigbɔ tɔn sɔ e ɖo nukɔnmɛ hwenu e ɖo xo ɖɔ nu hɛnnumɔ tɔn elizabɛti wɛ e
ali tɛ e ɖɔ e tuun jezu e jɛxa gbɔn e ɖe ɖo hwenu e ji e kpo hwenu e kpla ɛ yi tɛmpli mɛ ɖo azan gudo e kpo
hwenu ji jezu e ɔ jehovah wli nu gan nukunɖeji alo jeluzalɛmu kpo bɛteleyɛmu kpo tɔn lɛ gbɔn nu jɛ e ɖiɖɔ nu gblamɛ a
mi vogbingbɔn ɖo jehovah nɔ wa nu gbɔn e kpo awovi nɔ wa nu gbɔn e kpo tɛntin e
jiji jezu tɔn enɛ e jla gbɔn e wa bɔ vi xomɛvɔnɔ gege ku
ji jezu ɖo azan gudo e ɔ e byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e xwle vɔsanu ɖe jehovah ɖo tɛmpli mɛ ɖo jeluzalɛmu finɛ ɖo kilomɛtlu do bɛteleyɛmu luk
hwenu jozɛfu nu jezu ɖo ali ji e ɔ sixu kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ ji jɛ e ɖɔ xo ɖo ali bunɔ ɖe do do gesi jezu wa ɖo sɔgudo e wɛ a ji
e ɖɔ e tuun jezu nugbo e nyi sixu ɖo nukun tɔn gbɔn e a
e wa ɔ jehovah zan nya nɔ nyi nɔ xwedo lɛ nɔ jɛhun do mawu sin lɛ ji e kpo asukusi nyi gbeyiɖɔ nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nyi ɖo xwe e kpo do ɖɔ vi ɔ huzu mɛsiya sin akpa e do e alo klisu luk
bɔ
jehovah kpo ɖo ɛ wɛ ɖɔ emi tuun ɖo nukun e kpe do vi tɔn wu ɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo e a
mawu blo bɔ e wlan nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo xo tɔn lɛ kpo do biblu mɛ
e ci ɖɔ kun kpewu xa jezu ɖo xwe atɔn adaɖe e wa tɔn e mɛ o ɖɔhun
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nu gege gbɔ wu tɔn e kpewu nɔ ku jezu tɔn sin tɛnmɛ
jaan nukɔnmɛ ɔ nɔ jeluzalɛmu xa ahwanvu lɛ ɖo azan ɖeɖee jɛ nukɔn nu pantekotu ɔ lɛ e hwenu ɖo finɛ ɖo pantekotu ɔ hwenu hwenu gbigbɔ jɛ ji e mɛ
e ci ɖɔ gbigbɔ ɖe e lɔ mɛ ɖevo ɖo finɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun
nu nu nyi hun e ɖɔ ali hun bɔ e nɔ jixwe xa jezu sɔyi
ali ɖagbe e ɛ ɖe ɖo gbejininɔ tɔn tɔn wu e
hwenu jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ jehovah ɖɔ nu tɔn nukun emitɔn mɛ gbɔn
jezu ɖɔ sinsɛngan alo hwetɔnnu tɔn lɛ kpa nu emi a
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ sɔ hwenu jehovah ɖɔ xo sin jixwe tlɔlɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ vovo atɔn mɛ do ɖɔ emi tuun e e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gbɔn vo nu jezu ɔ jaan ɔ kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi mɛ ɖevo se xo enɛ lɛ e
xwe ɖokpo jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn ɔ tɔn atɔn se bɔ jehovah ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ do jezu wu vi wɛ mɛ elɔ nyi xomɛ nɔ hun mi do wutu tɔn ɖoto e
azan klewun ɖe jɛ nukɔn nu ku jezu tɔn ɔ jehovah ɖɔ xo nu vi tɔn sin jixwe jaan
ali jehovah ɖe ɖɔ emi tuun vi emitɔn e ɔ etɛ e sixu
jehovah jezu su e ɖo nukun tɔn gbɔn a e gbɛn
e yi gbe bɔ e hu ɖo yatin ji e winnya e nɔ mɔ ɖo ku mɔhunkɔtɔn mɛ ɔ a ɖo e bonu ɔ xɔ a loɔ tɔn kɛɖɛ xɔ
ebl jehovah ɖɔ emi tuun gbɔn
hwenu jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e ɖɔ jlo emitɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ emi lɛkɔ yi jixwe ɖo emi ɖo ɖo emitɔn e
etɛ jehovah wa
ali ɖaxo e tuun gbɛzan gbejininɔ tɔn jezu tɔn ɖe e
etɛ mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu biba ɖɔ nu mitɔn elɔ nukunmɛ
hɛn do ayi mɛ ganji ɖɔ jehovah nɔ tuun tɔn lɛ hwebinu nɔ bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ ali ɖeɖee ɖo nukun tɔn ɖe a lɛ e wɛ e nɔ wa ɖe
tuun nyɔna maɖonukun ɖo mi ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e
din mi ɖo didɛ ɖo lɛ kpo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ kpo wɛ ɖo nyanya elɔ mɛ e ɔ nu mi hɛn do ayi mɛ hwebinu ɖɔ elɔ kpo e sixu ɖɔ emi tuun mi gbɔn e kpo bi wɛ ɖo wiwa yi wɛ
jaan wanyiyinɔ mitɔn jehovah nɔ dohwɛ agɔ wɔn mi wa e kpo wanyiyi mi ɛ e kpo a
ebl ɛɛn e ɖɔ nu mitɔn nukun emitɔn mɛ tlɛ sixu wa ɖo ali ɖe lɛ bɔ mi sixu do nukun mɛ din a
ðo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn ɖevo mɛ ɔ e lilɛ xokwin numaɖinu ɔ do nu yaya
kɔ hwi mɛ axɔsuzinkpo towe ɖo jixwe ɔ ðɛh
ali tɛ nukun mitɔn lɛ ɖo jehovah ɖe
etɛwu mɔyizi wujɔmɛ e ɖo yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji e kpo
etɛ nu jɛ do mɔyizi wu e sixu mi
etɛ nukun mitɔn lɛ ɖo jehovah ji nɔ byɔ
jehovah wɛ sixu nyi xosin tlolo e bɔ enɛ wɛ nyi xosin ɖagbe hugan ɔ
etɛ e jehovah nɔ byɔ
e jehovah kpinkpɔn do ali ɖe nɔ gan tɔn ɖe e wu
enyi do mɔ nuɖuɖu alo alɔcyɔnmɛji kɛɖɛ wutu wɛ ɖe nɔ gan tɔn lɔ a loɔ e ɖo gan tɔn hwebinu mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu e nɔ lɛ e mɛ enɛ gudo ɔ e wa nu gbɔn
ɖokpo ɔ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ mi ɖo nɔ do nu xo mawu tɔn do mɔ nukunnu jɛ jlo jehovah ɖo nu miɖesunɔ e wu enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ mi xwedo enɛ
etɛ sixu ayi mitɔn bɔ mi gɔn nukun mitɔn lɛ ɖo jehovah ji
mi tlɛ tuun nu wu e ɖo taji ɖɔ e jehovah hwebinu e ɔ ayi mitɔn sixu wa ɖo hweɖelɛnu
nu jɛ do jezu tɔn nɔ nyi mata e wu e nɛ
enyi nu mɔhun jɛ do mɔhun ɖe ji hwenu jezu ɖo xa ɛ cɔɔ le e ɔ e ɖo kpaca mi ɖɔ nu mɔhun sixu jɛ do mi wu a
etɛ lɛ sixu ɖe nukun mitɔn lɛ sin jehovah kpinkpɔn ji
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi gbeje nuwiwa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn sixu ayi mitɔn gbɔn e
mi mi sixu ayi mitɔn ɖo jehovah ji gbɔn e
etɛwu e sixu kpaca mi ɖɔ wujɔmɛ mɔyizi ɖo yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji e ɔ e kpo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mɔyizi nɔ jehovah bonu e ɛ ali
nugbo ɔ e kpan ɖi e ɖo eyɛ mawu e nɔ mɔ a e mɔ wɛ ɖɔhun
xa eblee lɛ
etɛ bɔ mɔyizi ɖe afɔ nyi do
izlayɛli vi lɛ gosin ejipu gudo e ɔ e kpe we a bɔ tagba syɛnsyɛn ɖe nu tlɛ nyi cobɔ wa sinayii so ɔ kɔn
togun ɔ jɛ nu hunhun ɖɔ ji ɖo sin ɖe a wutu
jɛ nu hunhun ɖɔ do mɔyizi wu ji bɔ ninɔmɛ ɔ wa syɛn bɔ mɔyizi suxo ylɔ jehovah ɖɔ etɛ wɛ wa nu togun elɔ
jehovah yi gbe nu mɔyizi gbɔn zawe lɛ e nina ɛ gblamɛ
e kpo tɔn zin do holɛbu so ɔ wu bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ sin gba wu
mi xa ɖɔ mɔyizi blo nu jehovah ɖɔ ɔ ɖo tomɛxo izlayɛli tɔn lɛ nukunmɛ
izlayɛli vi lɛ mɔ sin bɔ tagba ɔ fo tin
e nuwiwa izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn do mɔ mawu e nyi e tintɛnkpɔn e nyi do mɔyizi ji kpowun a
xa ðɛhan
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ nu nyanya wɛ izlayɛli vi lɛ wa
hwenu xwe izlayɛli vi lɛ blo ɖo gbetotlo mɛ e xwe vivɔnu e ɔ tagba tɛ
ee ninɔmɛ mɔhun ɖevo wa ɖo xwe gudo ɖo ɖibla yi vivɔnu gbetotlo mɛ ninɔ yetɔn tɔn e ɔ etɛ jɛ
izlayɛli vi lɛ wa mɔ yeɖee ɖo fi e wa ylɔ ɖɔ mɛliba e
fi ɖevo wɛ nyi fi elɔ sɛkpɔ kadɛci ɖo dogbo akpadido yikungban ɔ tɔn kpa
ɖo ninɔmɛ elɔ mɛ ɔ mɔyizi wa nu mawu gbɔn e a
mɔyizi wa nu gbɔn ɖo enɛ hwenu
e nukun tɔn lɛ ɖo jehovah ji
din tɔn ɔ jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ e zin nu do so ɔ wu a
mɔyizi ɖɔ xo nu so enɛ a
e wa ɔ e ɖe xomɛsin tɔn suxo do togun ɔ ɖɔ emi ɖoto
mi sixu kpewu ɖe sin sin so elɔ mɛ nu a
jehovah wa nu gbɔn ɖo nu mɔyizi wa e wu
jehovah sin xomɛ tawun do mɔyizi wu
etɛwu jehovah wa nu gbɔn
mi mɔ gbɔn ɖo e ɔ jehovah sin xomɛ ɖo mɔyizi xwedo e ɛ lɛ e a wutu
kpo mɔyizi zin do so ɔ wu e ɖe ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn sin nujiwu jehovah wa e wu gbɔn
mɛɖe zin kpo do awinnya enɛ lɛ wu gbɔn ɖebu ɔ e sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ sin sin mɛ a
so ɖo mɛliba wegɔ ɔ sin xa mɛ lɛ e gbɔn vo tawun bɔ hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ nyi awinnya syɛn a lɛ e
ðo so ɖo so enɛ lɛ mɛ wutu ɔ hwɛhwɛ wɛ sin nɔ ɖo ayikungban ɖo xa enɛ lɛ mɛ bɔ e sixu wa kan ayixa zan
hwenu mɔyizi zin kpo do so enɛ wu azɔn we e ɔ ali wɛ eɖesunɔ hun nu xomɔɖɔdonuwu ɖɔ sin gosin so ɔ mɛ e kun sin jehovah wu o ɖɔ xa ɔ mɛ ɖesu ɖe e wɛ a
xo mɔyizi ɖɔ nu so ɔ a zin kpo e ɖɔ e jlo ɖɔ emi lɔ nyi tɔn bɔ nujiwu enɛ jɛ wɛ a
hwɛjijɔ ɖevo tɛ wu jehovah sixu sin xomɛ do mɔyizi kpo kpo wu
e sixu tinmɛ xomɛ jehovah sin do mɔyizi kpo kpo wu e gbɔn alɔkpa ɖevo
ðo ayi nu mɔyizi ɖɔ nu togun ɔ e wu mi sixu kpewu ɖe sin sin so elɔ mɛ nu a
xokwin mi mɔyizi zan e sixu ɖɔ e ɖo gesi do e kpo kpo wɛ
xogbe enɛ mɔyizi do e ɖɔ e kun ɖo sisi ɖebu nu jehovah ee nyi jɔtɛn nujiwu enɛ tɔn nugbo ɔ e o
e ci ɖɔ xo ɖo ðɛhan mɛ do zogbe linlin enɛ mi ɖo e ji ɖɔhun e ɖɔ do xomɛsin nu mawu ɖo mɛliba sin ɔ kɔn bɔ mawu dɔn to nu mɔyizi ɖo yedɛɛ lɛ wu ɖo do xomɛsin nu mɔyizi bɔ e kɛnu nyi do
ðebu wɛ e nyi gbɔn ɔ nuwalɔ mɔyizi tɔn ayi mɛ lɛ tɔn sin jehovah jɛxa e wu
hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ nugbo
etɛwu hwɛ jehovah ɖo nu mɔyizi e jɛxa sɔgbe
ðo mɔyizi kpo kpo ɖo nu togun jehovah tɔn wutu ɔ ɖo gbe ɖo ba ɖaxo ɖe mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e jɛxa sɔgbe ɖɔ jehovah ɖo hwɛ ɖokpo ɔ nu mɔyizi ɖo nuwiwa tɔn wu
ɖe lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ e lɔn nu e lɔ yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji a
etɛ bɔ mɔyizi gu
etɛ bɔ mɔyizi ɖo linlin tɔn mɔhun
ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ ðɛhan ɖɔ do xomɛsin nu mawu ɖo mɛliba sin ɔ kɔn bɔ mawu dɔn to nu mɔyizi ɖo yedɛɛ lɛ wu ɖo do xomɛsin nu mɔyizi bɔ e kɛnu nyi do
izlayɛli vi lɛ ɔ jehovah ji wɛ gu do co mɔyizi wɛ sin xomɛ
eɖee ji e ɖu ɖe a e bɔ e tamɛ do nu e ji lɛ e ji cobo ɖɔ xo a
mɔyizi jo nuwalɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn do bɔ e ayi tɔn sin jehovah kpinkpɔn ji
xwe tobutobu mɔyizi ɖi xwi xa izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn e bɔ nu cikɔ bɔ ɖo e
nu ci nu mɔyizi e wɛ ɖu ayi mɛ hugan gbɔ tamɛ do e sixu kpa nu jehovah gbɔn e ji a
etɛwu nuwalɔ mɔyizi tɔn lɛ ɖo ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
enyi mɔyizi nyi gbeyiɖɔ ɖe e sin ayi sin jehovah kpinkpɔn ji ɖe afɔ nyi do ɔ blewun jɛn nu ɖokpo ɔ sixu jɛ do miɖesunɔ ji
ðo nujlɛdonuwu linu ɔ mi lɔ xwe ayikungban ɖe ji mɔyizi ɖɔhun e wɛ nyi sin akpa jehovah do nu mi e
do kpe nu gbe nya wɛ mi ɖe e wu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ nukun mitɔn lɛ ɖo jehovah ji nɔ wa jlo tɔn hwebinu
jaan etɛ lɛ afɔ mɔyizi ɖe nyi do e ɖo mi
etɛ mi bɔ mi jo miɖee do nu akpɔɖomɛ a
enyi miɖesunɔ tlɛ wa ɖo xwi ɖi xa ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɔ lɛ wɛ hwɛhwɛ ɔ awakanmɛ ku mi do nuɖagbewiwa wu a
xa hlɔmanu lɛ
nu mi wa a hlɔn miɖesunɔ gbɔn alɔkpa ɖe ɔ e ɖɔ mi kun ɖo sisi nu jehovah o
nɔ xwedo gudogudo tɔn lɛ ceɖeceɖe
mɛ ɔ mi nɔ wa nu lɛ hwebinu mi nɔ wa gbɔn wa yi e a
ðo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi ɖo aceji wa nu zɛ nu e wlan ɔ wu a kɔ
wiwa bɔ mi nɔ nukun mitɔn lɛ do jehovah ji
etɛ mɔyizi wa nu gbɔn ɖo nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wu e ɖo mi
enyi mi tlɛ ɖo xwi ɖi xa nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wɛ ɔ mi sixu blo bɔ kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble a gbɔn
nu nuwanyido mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn hɛn kancica ɖo hwi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble o
enyi mi nɔ nukun nujlɛdonuwu tɔn mitɔn ɖo jehovah ji ɔ mi lɔn nu nuwiwa mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn do nu mi alo hɛn kancica mi kpo e kpo tɔn gble a
enɛ ɖo taji tawun enyi mi ɖo ɖe lɛ ɖo tutoblonunu mawu tɔn mɛ mɔyizi ɖɔhun ɔ nɛ
e wa ɔ enyi e gege nu mi ɔ e ɖo nukun nu gege ɖo mi si
luk enyi mi yi wan nu jehovah nugbo nugbo ɔ nu ɖebu nyi nu mi alo ɖe mi ɖo vo nu wanyiyi tɔn a ðɛh
etɛ mi ɖo kanɖeji wa
ðo hwenu vɛwu elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ nu nukun mitɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo mɛ axɔsuzinkpo tɔn ɖo jixwe e wɛ hwebinu do sixu mɔ nu jɛ jlo tɔn wu
nu mi lɔn gbeɖe bonu nuwalɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn hɛn kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble o
nu jɛ do mɔyizi ji e tɔn hlɔnhlɔn nu enɛ nyi nu taji gbɔn e ɖo linlin mitɔn kpo ayi mitɔn kpo mɛ
mi ɖo sin xomɛ gblagbla ɖo nuwanyido mɛ do mi lɛ e tɔn wu a e wa ɔ nu mi kanɖeji ɖo jehovah mawu mitɔn wɛ jɛ hwenu e xomɛ do mi wu e ðɛh
e nɔ ylɔ mɛ we lɛ bi ɖɔ mɛliba ɖo tagba ɖo ayi enɛ lɛ ji e wu ɖiɖe to tɔn ɔ ɖo nudoname dogo ɖo wiwe le ledogbedevome aihon yoyo ton mɛ e mɛ
enyi e jlo ɖe hlɔnhlɔn nujiwu tɔn e ɖo e hun e ɖe sin sin so elɔ mɛ nu mi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ aca ɖe kpowun wɛ nyi enɛ
nu lɛ kanbyɔ lɛ e ɖo atɔxwɛ flansegbe octobre tɔn mɛ
kplekple mɛxo lɛ tɔn gbeje ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ e jɛxa bɔ e ɖo hwɛɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖe ayi a ji
ði ɔ kancica wanyiyi tɔn ɖe ɖo tɛntin yetɔn wɛ a
e ɖe we xa do nɔ wa nu xa yeɖee gbɔn e ji wa yi wɛ a
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ bɔ xɔ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ
sɔnu tɔn ba wa wɛ a
ali hun nu bɔ hɛn ɔ gɔn fi ɖokpo ɔ wɛ a
alo ninɔmɛ lɛ yi gbe bɔ e mɔ hwɛjijɔ nu wɛ a vlafo numaɖonukun ɖe kabi ajijimɛ sin nu tawun ɖe wɛ jɛ bɔ ɖewagbɛn han bɔ fi ɖokpo ɔ a
ðo ninɔmɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo gbɔn vo wutu ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu gbeje nu ɖevo lɛ
enyi kplekple mɛxo lɛ tɔn mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu lɛ wu gudo ɔ ɖɔ nuwalɔ mɛ we lɛ tɔn byɔ ɖɔ e ɖo hwɛɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖe ayi a ji
blo elɔ ninɔmɛ mɛ e nɔ biblu xa ɖo jlo e ɖe ɖe ɖo gankpa bulgarie tɔn lɛ mɛ e
nu e ɖo alɔkpa ɖevo mɛ a ɔ wemafɔ e ɖe do wema elɔ mɛ lɛ e gosin biblu fɔngbe tɔn mawuxowema mɛ bɔ mi wlan ɖo alɔkpa mɛ e nɔ wlan nu gbɔn ɖo egbe e
ɖo sisi nu jehovah mawu mitɔn nɔ ɛ eɖokponɔ gee wu wɛ ɖokan do nɔ
kpo kpo ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ jehovah co wa gbɔn bɔ nu yetɔn nukun tɔn mɛ a
mɔyizi kpo kpo zan ali hun nu e do ɖɔ emi ɖo jehovah sin ahwan mɛ gbɔn
mi sixu ɖu nublawukunumɛ jehovah tɔn kpo hwɛsɔkɛ mɛ tɔn kpo sin le bi gbɔn
etɛwu e nyi nunywɛnu ɖɔ e nɔ jehovah sin ahwan mɛ
e ɖɔ e do jehovah wu
mɛɖebu nyi hlɔnhlɔnnɔ alo wanyiyinɔ hugan mawu mitɔn a
e ɖo co mawu ɖe lɛ xo nu hwenu ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ byɔ ɖɔ nɔ jehovah sin ahwan mɛ e
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo jehovah sin ahwan mɛ bɔ ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ zan do xomɛsin lɛ e tɔn ji
nukplɔnmɛ taji lɛ ɖo enɛ lɛ mɛ sixu mi bɔ mi nɔ gbeji bi nu jehovah
etɛwu jehovah sɛkpɔ etɛ e ɖɔ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun nɔ nu ɖevo zɛ jehovah wu o
e ɖo co mawu yi gbe nu sinsɛn biblo tɔn a
nunyanyawiwa sin kwin ɖe lɛ ɖo ɖɔ do do wɛ ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ
jaan jehovah sɛkpɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu nu ɖagbe wɛ wa ɔ ze do ji ee wa nu ɖagbe a ɔ hwɛhuhu ɖo ayi jinjɔn ɖo hɔn towe jlo ɖu ɖo ji towe lɔn o
hwenu ali hun nu bɔ e nɔ jehovah sin ahwan mɛ e ɔ etɛ e wa
enyi jla linlin tɔn ɖo kpowun wɛ ɔ nu tɔn jehovah nukunmɛ
ɖoto weɖexamɛ ɔ a
ðo hwenu ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ e sixu nɔ gbeɖe ɖɔ emi wa gu do jehovah ji
ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ e wa nu e gbeɖe a e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e gu do jehovah ji hu nɔvi eɖesunɔ tɔn
linlin alɔkpa tɛ lɛ sixu bɔ nu mitɔn jehovah nukunmɛ a
ði ɔ mɛɖe sixu jɛ nu nu jlo xoɖoxamɛ tɔn lɛ kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo ji alo e jɛ wan nu klisanwun tɔn ɖe ji
jaan linlin enɛ lɛ sixu dɔn mɛ do hwɛhuhu mɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu nɔ tuun linlin mitɔn lɛ kpo nuwalɔ mitɔn lɛ kpo jehovah nɔ mɔ nu lɛ bi bɔ enyi mi ɖo ahwan tɔn mɛ bi a ɔ e nɔ tuun xa jelemii
jehovah nɔ mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo linlin hwɛhuhu tɔn lɛ ji hwenu mi ɖo ahwan tɔn mɛ ganji e gbɔn
e ɖo co jehovah nɔ yawu jo gbe do mi wu a
enyi afɔ mɛɖe ɖe lɛ e jɛ zɔ nu jehovah ɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɔ ɖɔ lɛkɔ wa enɛ ɔ lɛkɔ wa
kancica ɖagbe ɖo kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gble gbɔn
axɔsu tɔn sixu nu gege mi
mawu ɛ nunywɛ ɖaxo tɛmpli jeluzalɛmu tɔn jiwu e gbigba sin do alɔ mɛ
tlito nyɔnu
e kpla xɔnnɔ ɖevo ɖo xwe tɔn gbe
enɛ wu ɔ tlito nu mawu tɔn ɖɔ e toɖevomɛ nyɔnu o e
blo vɔsakpe ɖokpo nu vodun asitaatee bɔ e hwe bi ɔ e blo ɖevo nu vodun kemɔci
sisi ɖo nu akpagbanumɛ mawu tɔn lɛ a e ɔ etɛ mɛ e kɔ do
jehovah nɔ nukun kpɛvi do nunyanyawiwa gbeɖe a
biblu ɖɔ jehovah sin xomɛ do ɖo e ɖe ayixa tɔn sin jehovah ɖe eɖee ɛ azɔn we ɔ wu hwe enɛ lɛ wɛ jehovah do ɖɔ e vodun o
nyi jehovah do lɛ a
e sin enɛ wu bɔ nu tɔn mawu nukunmɛ a e nɔ gudo a
kunkan tɔn lɛ sixu do axɔsuɖuto izlayɛli tɔn ɔ blebu a bɔ mɔ nu baɖabaɖa gege tɔn nu xwe mɔkpan axɔ
etɛ sixu wa nu do kancica ɖagbe mi ɖo xa jehovah e wu
e nyi gbɔn nu e ɔ nu nɔ wa nu do kancica mi ɖo xa jehovah e wu e taji hugan ɖokpo wɛ nyi mɛ ɖeɖee mi zun xa bɔ tuun nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ alo nɔ ɖo sisi a lɛ e e
mɛ ɖe lɛ sixu ɖo do xa agun ɔ wɛ sixu nɔ ɖo gan ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu nyi hɛnnumɔ mitɔn nɔzo mitɔn mitɔn alo mitɔn ɖeɖee nɔ jehovah a lɛ e
ðebu wɛ e nyi gbɔn ɔ enyi mitɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo sisi ɖaxo nu nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ a ɔ sixu wa hɛn kancica mi ɖo xa ɛ e gble
etɛ towe lɛ nɔ wa do kancica ɖo hwi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e wu
etɛ sixu mi bɔ enyi mi ɖo zunzun ɖe alo gbɔ ɔ mi tuun
kan xa sixu kunkpla kancica ɖo xa jehovah e gbɔn e byɔ hwiɖee
xa blo bɔ e wɛ a
etɛ ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ
ði ɔ nu ɖo ji lɛ e akwɛ nunywɛ xwitixwiti sin nu lɛ e ayiɖeɖayi alo nu agbaza tɔn ɖevo lɛ gbe nyinya ji wɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo do hugan a
jezu nu mɛ ɖɔ nu ayi mɛtɔn mɛ ɔ wɛ mɛtɔn nɔ ɖɔ
izlayɛli vi lɛ gosin ejipu nɔ zaan e ɔ etɛ jehovah ceɖeceɖe
izlayɛli vi lɛ wa nu gbɔn hwenu mawu byɔ ɖɔ ze yeɖee bi jo nu emi e
nu jɛ hwenu izlayɛli vi lɛ gosin kannumɔgbenu ɖo ejipu gudo tlolo e sixu nu ɖevo lɛ mi
togun ɔ kple ɖo sinayii so ɔ kpa
ðo finɛ ɔ jehovah ɖe eɖee ɖo ali jiwu ɖe
enyi hwɛ ɖo finɛ ɔ wa nu gbɔn do gbejininɔ sin akpa enɛ jehovah mawu do e wu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ wa nu izlayɛli vi lɛ wa e
e nɔ zaan kpowun e ɔ numaɖonukun ɖe gbejininɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn
ninɔmɛ tɛ gbejininɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn
wiwi ɔ ji kɛwun ɔ kpo wuntun jiwu ɖevo mawu lɛ e kpo do xɛsi izlayɛli vi lɛ
e ci ɖɔ finɛ mɔyizi nɔ ɖe bɔ nɔ mɔ ɛ e kɔ wɛ nuɖiɖi yetɔn kpla do hugan ɖɔhun
hu bɔ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ blo vodun ɖokpo nu mi bonu e nɔ nukɔn nu mi
izlayɛli vi lɛ yeɖee gbɔn etɛ jehovah wa
togun ɔ tuun ɖɔ vodunsinsɛn nyi hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe huhu do jehovah
tin zaanɖe kpowun ɔ jɛ sika nyibuvi ɖe ji
tonumase nuwiwa izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn enɛ ɖo gannaganna co yeɖee ɖɔ emi kpo ɖo jehovah sin ahwan mɛ etɛ
tlɛ ylɔ nyibuvi enɛ ɖɔ xweɖuɖu do kpa nu jehovah
jehovah wa nu gbɔn
e mɔ ɖɔ kun nɔ gbeji nu emi o
jehovah ɖɔ nu mɔyizi ɖɔ togun ɔ wa nu gblegble lɛkɔ sin ali emi ɖɔ gbɔn ɔ ji
mɔyizi kpo kpo ɖɔ emi ɖo jehovah sin ahwan mɛ ganji gbɔn
ɖo vodun ɔ biblo mɛ tlolo e lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn gudo nu levii vi kpo lɛ e nɔ jehovah sin ahwan mɛ
enyi ahwan jehovah tɔn mɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ enɛ lɛ nɔ a loɔ ɖe yeɖee ɖo vo nu lɛ ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ
nunywɛnu wɛ nyi enɛ ɖo gbe nɛ gbe ɔ donu mɔkpan wɛ ku ɖo vodunsinsɛn wu
etɛ xo pɔlu ɖɔ do nu jɛ ɖo sika nyibuvi ɔ hwenu wu e mi
pɔlu dɔn ayi mɛtɔn wa nu jɛ ɖo sika nyibuvi ɔ hwenu e ji nu mɛ ɖɔ wɛ nu enɛ lɛ jɛ lɛ nyi nu mi bonu mi jɛ vodun ji mɛɖe lɛ blo gbɔn ɖo mɛ ɔ ɖɔhun o
e wlan nu enɛ lɛ jɛ lɛ do nu mi ɖo hwenu mi ɖe din ɔ hwenu lɛ sin vivɔ sɛya
pɔlu gbɔn e ɔ mɛ tlɛ nyi mawu nugbo lɛ e sixu jɛ nu nyanya ɖe lɛ wa ji
mɛ ɖeɖee jo gbe ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn mɛ lɛ e sixu ɖɔ emi kpo ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe ɖo xa jehovah wɛ
enyi e ɖɔ ɖɔ e jlo nyi jehovah tɔn alo e ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo gbeji kpowun hwebinu ɖɔ nu mɛtɔn jehovah nukunmɛ a kɔ
hwenu mɔyizi yawu jɛte sin sinayii so ɔ ji a e ɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ jɛ mɛ ɖokpo ɔ ɖo e sixu ci nu klisanwun lɛ ɖo egbe ɖɔ hwɛɖɔzan jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ kpo sin wiwa ɖo lɛjɛlɛjɛ dan wɛ ɖɔhun wutu ɔ sixu jɛ mɛ
enɛ lɛ sin jijɛ sixu ci nu wa jɛ ɖo sɔgudo bi alo nu sixu jɛ a e ɖe ɖɔhun nu mɛ
nu mi miɖee a ɔ linlin mɔhun sixu mi bɔ nu agbaza tɔn lɛ mya nukun nu mi jɛ nukɔn nu jlo jehovah tɔn wiwa
bɔ e wa ya ɔ mi sixu yi zɔ nu jehovah wa do nuwalɔ mi ɖo ganji ɖo gbigbɔ lixo ɔ mi sixu gbeɖe ɖɔ mi wa nu gbɔn a lɛ e mɛ
mi ɖo wɔn gbeɖe ɖɔ jehovah nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mi setonu nu emi kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo ze miɖee bi jo nu emi a
mi tlɛ ɖe afɔ nyi do ɔ jehovah sixu mi gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah kun nɔ yawu jo gbe do mɛ ɖeɖee ɖe afɔ nyi do lɛ e wu o
jehovah hwɛ kɛ
egbe ɔ jehovah sixu nu mi gbɔn biblu tɔn ɖe wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ alo we klisanwun ɖe ɖe xa mi e gblamɛ
enyi gbeji mi ɖe nu jehovah e gbɔn tɛnkpɔn mɛ ɔ etɛ mi ɖo kanɖeji wa
linlin ɖe wu wɛ jehovah tɔn mi kɔ
ɔ hun ali nu mi bɔ mi jijɔ nyi mawu tɔn a e kpo jlo ɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
xa titu nwt
enyi mi ɖo elɔ mɛ jɛn wɛ ɔ ninɔmɛ ze mi ze miɖee bi jo nu jehovah e lɛ e wa kpannukɔn mi
nu mi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ hwebinu nɔ ahwan tɔn mɛ ɖo jehovah mawu mitɔn wɛ mi ɖo ɖo sisi eɖokponɔ gee wu wɛ mi ɖokan do nɔ
awajijɛnɔ wɛ nyi akɔta sin mawu nyi jehovah e togun e nyi nuɖokan eɖesunɔ tɔn e ðɛh nwt
ðɔ nu mi nɔ blo gbɔn miɖee zize jo nu jehovah kpo baptɛm biblo kpo gblamɛ e ɖe lɛ
etɛwu mi ɖo mɛ ɖevo lɛ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ mi ze miɖee bi jo nu jehovah
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi nɔ yi mi lɛ nu hwɛ kɛ xomɛ do wu
etɛwu jehovah ɖo acɛ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ bi nyi emitɔn
ðo hwenuxo tɔn mɛ ɔ mawu ɖe lɛ bɔ nyi etɔn ɖo ali bunɔ ɖe
e do gesi ɖo biblu mɛ ɖɔ nyi jehovah tɔn ɖo ali bunɔ ɖe
ozee tɔn jɛnu hwenu jehovah mɛ ɖeɖee nyi jwifu a lɛ e do mɛ ɖu gan xa klisu ɖo sɔgudo lɛ e sin ahwan mɛ e
bɔ klisanwun egbe tɔn tobutobu ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn lɛ e lo
ɖo kancica bunɔ ɖe sin vivi ɖu xa jehovah wɛ ɖo egbe
egbe ɔ lɛngbɔhwan kpɛvi ɖo nukunɖiɖo jixwe tɔn e kpo ɖevo lɛ ɖo nukunɖiɖo ayikungban ji tɔn e kpo kple nyi lɛngbɔhwan ɖokpo bɔ jehovah nɔ tawun ɖi togun tɔn
ðɔ ali mi sixu doku nu jehovah ɖe nu blo e blo bɔ mi ɖo kancica ɖe xa ɛ e ɖokpo
jezu blo nu mɔhun gbɔn
mi nɔ jehovah ɖɔ nu e wa nu mi e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn miɖee zize jo kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo gblamɛ
jezu wa nu mɔhun ɖe hwenu e ɖɔ ɖo baptɛm tɔn hwenu ɖɔ mawu jlo towe wiwa nɔ vivi nu mi e
e ji jezu bɔ e nyi akpaxwe togun eɖee jo nu mawu e tɔn cobɔ e ze eɖee jo ɖɔ emi wa jlo jehovah tɔn
jehovah wa nu gbɔn hwenu jezu blo baptɛm e
nu lɛ bi nyi jehovah tɔn co ze mi ze miɖee jo e nɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ gbɔn e do nuɖe wu
biblu tɔn ɔ ɖɔ ee e blo baptɛm fo ɔ jezu sin ɔ mɛ tlolo ɔ jinukunsin kɛwun bɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ci ɖɔhun wa jɛte do ji tɔn
tlolo ɔ e se gbe ɖe sin jixwe bɔ e ɖɔ vi wɛ mɛ elɔ nyi xomɛ nɔ hun mi do wutu tɔn tlala
ði ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ nya ɖe do folowa ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ do jikpa tɔn mɛ
e su gbe ɖokpo bɔ vi nyɔnu tɔn folowa lɛ ɖokpo wa ɛ folowa ɔ nyi nya ɔ tɔn a ce
nyɔnuvi ɔ sixu ɛ nu nyi etɔn e gbɔn
wanyiyinɔ ɖe tlɛ tamɛ do nukanbyɔ mɔhun lɛ ji a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ folowa ɖokpo enɛ vi nyɔnu tɔn ɛ e xɔ akwɛ hu ɖevo kpo ɖo jikpa tɔn mɛ lɛ e bi
e nɔ vivi nu jehovah tawun hwenu mi jlo do ze miɖee bi jo e tin
xa malacii nwt
nu ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm a hun tamɛ do afɔ enɛ ɖiɖe nyi nu titewungbe e ji
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ sin gbe gbe wa e ɔ nyi jehovah tɔn jɛn e nyi gbɔn nu kpo lɛ e bi
jehovah lɔ nɔ wa tuun mɛ ɖeɖee jlo do ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ lɛ e nɔ wlan nyikɔ yetɔn do flin wema tɔn mɛ
etɛ jehovah byɔ ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee sin nyikɔ e wlan do flin wema tɔn mɛ lɛ e si
enyi e wlan nyikɔ mitɔn do flin wema jehovah tɔn mɛ bonu e tuun mi ɖɔ mi nyi togun emitɔn ɔ enɛ nɔ byɔ nuɖe lɛ ɖo mi si dandan
malacii ɖɔ tawun ɖɔ mi ɖo ɖi xɛsi nu jehovah tamɛ do nyikɔ tɔn ji
nu mi mɛ ɖevo alo nu ɖevo ɖebu ɔ e ɖe nyikɔ mitɔn sin gbɛwema nujlɛdonuwu tɔn jehovah tɔn mɛ tin
nuwiwa enɛ lɛ ɖo klewun bɔ tlolo jɛn nɔ huzu nu xoxo
vogbingbɔn zawe e tɛ ɖo ɖo mɛ nɔ jehovah lɛ e kpo mɛ nɔ ɛ a lɛ e kpo tɛntin
xota wa yi e ɖɔ xo do biblu tɔn kunkpla kpo izlayɛli vi lɛ kpo e ji
bi wɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nɔ jehovah ze yeɖee bi jo a
enɛ lɛ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ mɛ nyi jehovah tɔn nugbo e ɖo do nujlɔjlɔwiwa wu bi hɔn nu nunyanyawiwa
etɛwu e ɖo zawe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ mi ze miɖee bi jo nu jehovah
mi sixu jehovah ɖɔ e mi bɔ mi nyi togun tɔn e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖo ali ɖevo
nɔ ali hun lɛ e nɔ zan do ɖɔ nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ a
jehovah mi bɔ mi nyi togun tɔn enyi mi nɔ xo nu do mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ mi nyi etɔn wu ɔ e tawun ðɛh xa
nɔ zan gbɔn e nɔ ceɖeceɖe ɖɔ nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ a
mɛɖe lɛ blo gbɔn bɔ e nɔ xo nu do jehovah tɔn nyi e wu
ði ɔ e ɖe we gege xa mi do nusisɔ kpo kpo wu co mɛɖe lɛ nɔ alo sɔnu ɖo ji a
nɔ do avɔ nɔ mɛ nɔ ɖe lɛ e tlɛ nɔ do yi kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ tɛnmɛ
nu mɛ e nɔ kɔ do e wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo mɛ mɛ ɔ e nɔ vɛwu bonu e tuun nu jehovah tɔn wɛ nyi alo ɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ nyi ja
weɖuɖu yetɔn kpo nuwiwa yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖo lɛ nɔ zɛ nu sɔgbe bɔ klisanwun lɛ blo lɛ e wu
nɔ fɔtoo yeɖesunɔ tɔn masɔgbe lɛ ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ji e nɔ zun ɖe lɛ e ji nɔ wlan numasɔgbe lɛ ɖo tɛn enɛ lɛ ji nu enɛ lɛ jɛxa gbigbɔ tɔn a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e sixu nɔ nu nu ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn mɛ ɖo hwɛhuhu syɛnsyɛn ɖe wu nuwalɔ yetɔn sixu wa nu do yetɔn ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖo walɔ ɖo togun jehovah tɔn mɛ lɛ e wu xa
nu mi jlo cyɔn alɔ kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e ji ɔ gbɛzinzan tɛ ɖo dandan
ɔ nɔ sin jlo nyanya lɛ nukun ɖo mɛ gban mɛ kpo goyiyi dɔkun jijɛ nɔ mɛ e kpan ɖo ajo syɛn ɖesu
jaan ɖo mi nyi jehovah tɔn wutu ɔ e nu mi ɖɔ mi jo nyanya zinzan kpo jlo gbɛmɛ fi tɔn lɛ kpo do nɔ wa nu sɔgbe e nɔ zan jlɔjlɔ nɔ gbeji nu mawu
etɛwu mi ɖo wa nu xa klisanwun mitɔn lɛ kpo kpo kpodo wanyiyi kpan
mi nɔ wa nu xa klisanwun mitɔn lɛ gbɔn e nɔ kancica bunɔ mi ɖo xa jehovah e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e
jehovah tɔn wɛ lɔ nyi
nu mi hɛn enɛ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ kpo wanyiyi kpo do wa nu xa nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo hwebinu
jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu miɖee ɔ wɛ mɛ lɛ bi ɖɔ nyi ahwanvu nugbo jaan
tɛ ɖo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do togun tɔn wu e
do mi ɖo wa nu xa miɖee ɖo agun ɔ mɛ gbɔn e do nuɖe wu ɔ nu mi gbeje nu elɔ
nuzinzan ɖo tɛmpli jehovah tɔn mɛ lɛ e nyi nu e ɖe ɖo vo nu sinsɛn biblo ɔ kɛɖɛ lɛ e
mɔyizi ɔ ɖɔ e kpe nukun do nuzinzan enɛ lɛ wu gbɔn e bɔ mɛɖebu tɛ afɔ enɛ lɛ ji e ɔ e hu
etɛ lɛ jehovah nɔ to nɔ ɖo to ɖo wɛ
awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ malacii ɖɔ jehovah nɔ to nɔ ɖo to ɖo togun tɔn wɛ hwenu nɔ ɖo nu wa xa yeɖee wɛ e
nwt nugbo ɔ jehovah tuun mɛ nyi etɔn lɛ e
mi sixu ɖɔ wu jehovah jɔ mi bɔ mi nyi togun tɔn e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ akpakpa nɔ mi bonu mi wu jehovah jɔ mi bɔ mi nyi togun tɔn e su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e
nunywɛnu tawun wɛ tuun mi tuun ɖɔ mi nyi etɔn ze miɖee bi jo kpo jlo kpo e nyi
mi yi wan nu klisanwun mitɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nu ɖo mi tuun ɖɔ lɔ nyi jehovah tɔn hlɔ
biblu ɖɔ jehovah nɔ jo togun tɔn do a
ku ɖesu tlɛ sixu ɖe mi ɖo vo nu wanyiyi jehovah tɔn a hlɔ
enyi mi ɖo ɔ mi ɖo nu aklunɔ
enyi mi ku ɔ mi ku nu aklunɔ
din ɔ mi ɖo nyɔna gege sin vivi ɖu wɛ
ðo mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi sixu mɔ mɛɖe lɛ bɔ nylahun do mi alo tlɛ wa nu xa mi ɖo ali nyanya
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enyi mɛ lɛ wa nu gbɔn ɔ e sixu vɛwu nu mi bɔ mi kpo ɖo se xa mɛ ɖeɖee mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ lɛ e wɛ
ɖe nɔ mɔ hudo mɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖe e kpo tagba yetɔn lɛ kpo nɔ bɔ e nɔ jlo
enyi mi nɔ se xa mɛ ɖeɖee mi nɔ xo go ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e jɛ ɖiɖekpo ji ɔ kanɖodonuwu mitɔn kpo mi nɔ gbɔn e kpo lɔ sixu jɛ ɖiɖekpo ji
enyi tlɛ vɛwu ɖo hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu wa gbɔn
nu xwe mɔkpan ɔ jehovah dɛ ɖo ci e kɔn do nyikɔ tɔn wu e
suuluɖiɖo tɔn nɔ ɖɔ e xomɛ
mi wa gbɔn tuun enɛ
mi linlin jehovah ɖo do ninivunu hwexonu tɔn lɛ wu e
nɔ xo daka co jehovah ɖɔ nu jonasi ɖɔ jlo ɖɔ nyɛ ku nu blawu nu ninivu to ɔ a toxo ɖaxo enɛ ɔ mɛ ɖe ɔ jlo ɖɔ ku nu blawu a
jehovah ninivunu lɛ do mɔ mɛ ɖe ɖo ɖe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo a e bɔ nublawukunumɛ ɛ ɖegbe nu jonasi ɖɔ e nu
jehovah ɖɔhun ɔ lɛ xɔ akwɛ nu mi
mi sixu wa nu eɖɔhun bɔ akpakpa mi bɔ mi mɛɖebu sixu se xo mitɔn e enyi tlɛ ci mɛ se a e ɖɔhun ɔ nɛ
jezu ɖi tɔn bɔ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hudo mɛ ɖo gbigbɔ lixo lɛ e sin nu blawu
ee jezu mɔ mɛ enɛ lɛ ɔ nu yetɔn blawu ɖo e mɔ ɖɔ nu do bɔ wu ku bɔ ci ɖo a lɛ e ɖɔhun
enyi mɛ lɛ ɖe jlo tlolo a hun nu ɖo o
ninɔmɛ lɛ nɔ huzu ɖo ɔ mɛ jɛn linlin mɛɖe nɔ ɖo do nugbo ɔ wu e lɔ sixu huzu
enyi mɛ lɛ yi wɛn mitɔn ganji a ɔ mi ɖo nu tawun e kan nu wu yi wɛn ɔ gbɔn e byɔ miɖee
mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖo linlin masɔgbe ɖe do biblu alo sinsɛn klisanwun tɔn wu ɖo nyanya ɖeɖee mɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi klisanwun lɛ e lɛ e wutu
vlafo e ɖo adingban nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ do nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e wu
nu nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn e wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi yi mi ganji ɔ mɛ ɖo xa yetɔn mɛ e alo xwedo yetɔn tɔn lɛ sixu
mɛ mi nɔ xo go ɖo ɔ mɛ e ɖe lɛ sixu nɔ yi mi ganji ɖo awe ɖeɖee xo wa nu do wu tawun lɛ e wu
ɖe nɔ nyi ɖɔ ðo fi mi nɔ ɖe e ɖe lɛ ɔ mɛ gege ɖo finɛ bɔ ahwan hɛn nu gble do wu bɔ nu ɖo kan lɛ e bi gble
ðo xa enɛ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ yawu xo go mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wɛn mitɔn lɛ e
kpo ɖo se xa mɛ wɛ gbɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun mɛ
e ɖɔ hwenu e xo daka wutu e ɔ hɛn nunywɛxo ayi mɛ finɛ ɖɔ bi e nɔ yawu sin xomɛ a
ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo fi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe lɛ e tɔn flinflin mi bɔ ɖe
mɛ mi nɔ xo go lɛ e bi wɛ nyi a
mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ enyi ɖo ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖeɖee mi nɔ yi ɖekunnu lɛ e tɔn mɛ ɔ yi wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbɔn
ði ɔ enyi e ɖo adingban do jehovah tɔn lɛ wu azɔn mɔkpan ɖo ɔ lo
ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɔ vlafo mi lɔ sixu gbɔ wɛn ɔ yi ganji bɔ e byɔ ɖɔ e se xa mi
pɔlu se xa mɛ ɖeɖee tlɛ nyi lɛ e
e wɔn nu eɖesu wa wa yi lɛ e a
e ɖɔ ɔ nyla do wutu tɔn doya ɖɔ alannu
e tuun ɖɔ jehovah kpo jezu kpo ɖe nublawukunumɛ ɖaxo emi
ɖokpo ɔ e sixu mɔ e wa nu gbɔn e ɖo nuwiwa mɛ ɖeɖee e nɔ jla wɛn ɔ lɛ e tɔn mɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ pɔlu nɔ xo go mɛ ɖeɖee sin ayi mɛ adingban nukplɔnmɛ lɛ do ɖɔ do ɖe tawun lɛ e
e nɔ wa nu gbɔn
ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu pɔlu ɖo atɛni e ɔ e mɔ vodun gbɔn ɖo to ɔ mɛ ɔ bɔ e sin xomɛ tlala
nu enɛ do xomɛsin nu pɔlu e sin yɛkan mɛ jɛn e gbɔn ɖekunnu ɖo ali ɖagbe ɖe
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ nyi dorothy ɖɔ ðo fi mi nɔ ɖekunnu ɖe e ɔ e mɛ gege ɖɔ mawu syɛn nukun nɔ ɖo hwɛ nu mɛ
ee mi ɖo nukɔn sɛyi wɛ tawun ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ e ɔ mi sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ nuwalɔ mɛ mi nɔ jla wɛn ɔ lɛ e ɖe lɛ tɔn tɛgbɛ ɔ e ɖo nylanyla wɛ
mi lɔn nu enɛ nu mitɔn alo bɔ mi awajijɛ mitɔn kpo a
jehovah sixu mi hlɔnhlɔn bɔ mi nɔ wa nu ɖagbe do ɖu ɖo nu nyanya ji
enyi jlo ɖe ɔ nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah do xomɛ nɔ byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e mi nu ma mɛ ɔ e nɔ wa gbɔn e
enɛ nɔ bɔ nɔ ɖe ayi sin nu ci nu mi lɛ e ji nɔ tamɛ do sixu mɛ ɔ gbɔn e ji
mi kpo ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo ninɔmɛ ayi mɛ tɔn jɛxa mavɔmavɔ lɛ e wɛ
mi sixu tamɛ do mi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mitɔn lɛ gbɔn e ji
jessica ɖɔ enyi e yi mi mɛ ɖe gbɔn e a ɔ nɔ nɔ ayi a
jehovah tuun mɔ wɛ mi ɖe ɖo ɔ mɛ e ganji
enyi mi xwedo nublawukunumɛ tɔn sin ɔ e vivi e
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ e tuun hwenu e ɖo nu elɔ do e
jɛ hwe enɛ ɔ mitɔn ɖo nu mya nukun e nyi wɛ
e kpla akɔta izlayɛli tɔn ɔ yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji bɔ ɖaxo lɛ ɖo nukɔn
jehovah jiɖe e ɖɔ e kpa ɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɖɔ kpan do gan
nyi lɛ bi
nɔ xa zan kpo keze kpo nɔ blo nu e ɖɔ ɔ bi
nu nu gbɔn ɔ nɛ joz
mi sixu xa biblu ɖo gbesisɔmɛ xwedo nugbododo tɔn lɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn kpannukɔn mi lɛ e mɛ
gege mitɔn sixu yi gbe ɖɔ mi kun nyi ɖagbe hugan o bɔ nukplɔnkplɔn nɔ vɛwu nu mi
xo mawu tɔn kplɔnkplɔn sixu nyi nuɖe nɔ vivi nu tawun
ajɔ xɔ akwɛ lɛ ɖo hwenu ɖo dɔkun gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ kije wɛ e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nɔ nukɔn nu akɔta ɖe jozuwee ɖɔhun a hwi lɔ ɖo hwiɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ nu e wlan nu le towe e nɔ xwedo
enyi wa ɔ mɔ nu wa lɛ e sin bɔ nu nu
xoɖɛ cobo jɛ nu ji
linlin mawu ɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ e wlan do biblu mɛ nu le towe
enɛ wu ɔ enyi ɖo biblu xa wɛ hun nɔ alɔdo tɔn do mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ hɛn nu lɛ do ayi mɛ zan ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ ɛsd nwt
kan nu elɔ lɛ byɔ hwiɖee hwenu ɖo biblu alo wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ xa wɛ e
etɛ akpaxwe elɔ mi do jehovah wu
enɛ kunkpla wɛn taji ɖo xo tɔn mɛ e gbɔn
sixu zan nukplɔnmɛ enɛ lɛ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
ɖo nu xa wɛ hun nɔte tamɛ
enɛ kunkpla nu mɔ wa yi lɛ e ninɔmɛ mɛ ɖe din e alo nu sixu wa jɛ sɔ lɛ e gbɔn
sixu zan nugbododo biblu tɔn enɛ lɛ kpo weɖexamɛ enɛ lɛ kpo gbɔn ɖo gbɛzan mɛ
alo tamɛ do nu nuwiwa gbɔn vo nu nu biblu ɖɔ e sixu ji lɛ e ji
etɛ mɔ se alo etɛ sin wan se
hwiɖee ɖo mɛ wu nu ɔ jɛ do lɛ e sin tɛnmɛ
tamɛ linlin do nu enɛ lɛ ji bɔ nukplɔnkplɔn towe ɖo ɖo
zan nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɖe lɛ e bonu dobanunu towe
ɖe ɖo gbe towe mɛ lɛ e ma e sixu nyi ee ɖo ɛntɛnɛti ji e alo wema e zin e ɖe
xo nu cobo byɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ bonu e nɔ zan gbɔn ganji e o
ði ɔ des publications des temoins jehovah alo anademewe dodinnanu ton kunnudeto jehovah ton le bɔ mɔ nu e wlan do xota gege ji e mɔ tinmɛ wemafɔ biblu tɔn gege tɔn
zan nudoname dogo ɖo ledogbedevome aihon yoyo ton mɛ lɛ e enyi e do gbe se e ɖe mɛ ɔ nɛ
e tinmɛ zan lɛ e do ninɔmɛ ayi mɛ tɔn nu lɛ jɛ ɖebɔdoɖewu gbɔn e kpinkpɛn kpo nu lɛ tɔn kpo kpodo nu ɖevo ɖevo lɛ kpo ji
wlan nu taji lɛ e nu bonu flin nu lɛ e
taji bi ɔ ma xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ
sixu zan nuɖe ɖo nu enɛ lɛ mɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ a
ðo ali enɛ lɛ ɔ hɛn nu lɛ e do ayi mɛ kpowun a zan nu le mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn
ðo kunnuɖenu lɛ a
nɔ zɔn do nu ðo wexo e ji do ða hwɛ o
xota nukɔntɔn ɔ ɖɔ xo do ɖeɖee mi sixu mɔ hwenu mi ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖo kunnuɖenu lɛ e wu
e kɛnu do nugbododo biblu tɔn ɖeɖee sixu mi bɔ mi blo bɔ nuwukpikpe mi ɖo nu lɛ ɖɔ sɔgbe a ji e e wu
xota wegɔ ɔ gbeje ali mɛ lɛ nɔ yawu zɔn do nu ɖo wexo e ji do da hwɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖe e atɔn
e ɖɔ xo do mi sixu kpo ɖo gan do wɛ nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo hwenu mi ɖo nu wa xa mɛ lɛ wɛ e a gbɔn e wu
gbɛzan tɔn kanɖeji bɔ awakanmɛ ku mi a
awajijɛnɔ wɛ nyi mɛ nɔ nu mɛ lɛ e
nɔ ðo xa jehovah gbe bi gbe
jehovah ɖo lɛ bonu nɔ ganji ɖo awajijɛ
enyi sixu mɔ nɔ wa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe lɛ e nɔ so nu linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ sin nukɔnyiyi gbɔn e ɔ ɖo awajijɛ
xota nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn elɔ lɛ kɛnu do le alɔ hunhun do nu mɛ ɖo ali vovo nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e wu
suuluɖiɖo didɛ ðo linlin ɖe wu
nunamɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mɛ mɛ
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo kpo jijɔ nunamɛ tɔn kpo
kancica tɛ ɖo nunamɛ kpo awajijɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ e kpo mɛ
hwɛjijɔ jinjɔn biblu ji tɛ lɛ mi ɖo nɔ nu mɛ
nuɖiɖo lɛ ɖɔ jehovah nyi gbɔn
cobonu jehovah jɛ nu lɛ da ji ɔ e ɖo eɖokpo e eɖesunɔ kɛɖɛ a
e wa ɔ e nuɖiɖo tɔn ɖo nunywɛ lɛ e wɛ nyi wɛnsagun lɛ kpo lɛ kpo
mawu awajijɛnɔ ɔ jehovah yi wan nu nu ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ nina mɛ
etɛwu nunamɛ nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖo awajijɛ
etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
ðo jehovah gbɔn wanyiyi gblamɛ da gbɔn wɛ
biblu mi mi sixu nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ gbɔn e
nu mi ɖɔ xo do nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ ji do xo enɛ wu
mi mɔ alɔhundonanumɛ bɔ nu mitɔn mawu nukunmɛ gbɔn e kpo nusisɔ nu jijɔ enɛ mi bɔ mi kpe mawu nu mi e wu wa gbɔn e kpo
mi gbeje alɔhundonanumɛ mitɔn ca kan xa awajijɛ mitɔn gbɔn e kpo nu wu mi ɖo kpo ɖo nu nu jijɔ enɛ wɛ e kpo
alɔhundonanumɛ tɔn tɛ jehovah kpo jezu kpo nu mi
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi nɔ nɔ blo bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ nɔ awajijɛ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ wli
klisanwun nugbo lɛ nɔ wa nu klisu ɖe do lɛ sixu hun alɔ do nu mɛ gbɔn e wu e ɖɔhun
jezu ɖesunɔ ɖɔ wɛ ɖe gbɔn nu nyɛ ɔ e mi wu wɛ wa a loɔ mɛ gbe wɛ wa jo do xɔ nu mɛ gege
enɛ wu ɔ pɔlu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ ɖɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ klisu jezu ɖo e
eɖesunɔ ɔ nu e ɖo ɔ bi ze ninɔmɛ tɔn
fili
e ɖɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ sixu xwedo jezu tɔn telele hugan nɔ blo gbɔn e a xa
enyi mi nɔ xwedo jehovah kpo jezu kpo tɔn bɔ ganjininɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi bɔ mi nɔ ali mi sixu su hudo yetɔn ɖe lɛ e sin do ɔ e bɔ mi ɖu vivi jehovah tɔn tɔn
nugbo ɔ ɖo lo jezu do do samaliinu nyi nɔzo ɖagbe ɔ wu e mɛ ɔ e nyi wɛn ɖɔ emi ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ nɔ jo nu nyi ɖagbe nu e do nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ enyi mɛ lɛ gosin ninɔmɛ ɖevo mɛ ɔ nɛ xa luki
flin nukanbyɔ jezu bɔ e do lo kunkpla samaliinu nyi nɔzo ɖagbe ɔ e a
jwifu ɖe kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ nyi nɔzo
xosin jezu tɔn ɖɔ samaliinu ɔ ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ enyi mi jlo ɖu vivi mawu tɔn tɔn ɔ nɛ
cejɛnnabi kpo alɔhundonanumɛ kpo ca kan xa xo ɖo atɛ ji e gbɔn
sataan ɖɔ ɖɔ adamu kpo ɛvu kpo jɛ lɛ bi ji vo hugan enyi nɔ ayi ɖo yeɖesunɔ ji lobɔ nu yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu hugan tonusise nu mawu ɔ nɛ
adamu lɔ wa nu kpo cejɛnnabi kpo jlo ɛvu nukunmɛ
cejɛnnabi nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ a e wa ɔ flijɛ tɔn wɛ e nɔ hɛn wa
enyi mi nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ mi kudeji ɖɔ ali mawu nɔ wa nu ɖe lɛ e wɛ hugan
etɛwu nu mɛ ɖo nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu asu kpo asi kpo nukɔntɔn ɔ
ganjininɔ nuɖiɖo lɛ tɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu ɔ tawun sɔ e ɔ ɖokpo ɔ wɛ awajijɛ mɛ ninɔ vi nukɔntɔn lɛ ji lɛ e tɔn ɖo nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu enɛ lɛ gbɔn e nɛ
e sɔnu nu palaɖisi ɔ bonu e kpe ayikungban ɔ bi ji nu le kunkan adamu tɔn ɔ blebu tɔn
tuto ɖaxo enɛ byɔ ɖɔ xwedo enɛ ɖo kan wɛ e ɖo
etɛwu bloblo bonu palaɖisi ɔ kpe ayikungban ji ɖo hɛn awajijɛ wa
do nukun mɛ awajijɛ kpo le kpo enɛ wiwa hɛn wa lɛ e
yeɖee zize jo nu ɖagbe mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn hɛn nyɔna ɖaxo lɛ kpo awajijɛ ɖaxo kpo wa nu
mi sixu wa ɔ kpo nu kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin e mi e kpo gbɔn
egbe ɔ jehovah togun tɔn ɖɔ e jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ nu mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu
do kpe enɛ wu wa ɔ ganjininɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɖo nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi do nujɔnu mɛ
enyi nu ɖagbe lɛ ɖi wan yi nu mawu kpo wan yi nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ kpo wɛ nɔ mi do enɛ kɔn ɔ jɛn mi sixu dɛ
egbe ɔ enyi miɖesunɔ nɔ jlo do zan hwenu mitɔn nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ kpo hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn kpo ɖo mawu mi e kɔn ɔ mi sixu ɖo xa mawu
wujɔmɛ jiwu tɛ ɖie
nu ɖe nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa sɔ alɔdido lɛ bonu mɔ nu jɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ wu a akpaxwe ɔ
le tɛ lɛ nu kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin ɔ nɔ hɛn wa
hwenu mitɔn kpo hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn kpo zinzan ɖo ɔ kpo nu kpinkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu kpo sin ɔ kɔn nɔ hɛn awajijɛ ɖaxo wa
gege mɛ ɖeɖee kpe nukun do biblu kplɔnkplɔn yi nukɔn lɛ e wu e tɔn ɖɔ nu ɖɔ nu nɔ hɛn le wa e kun kpiti o
enyi e mɔ bonu biblu enɛ lɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ bonu e su nukun yetɔn mɛ nu nuɖiɖi yetɔn ɖo do wɛ bɔ ɖo huzuhuzu lɛ blo wɛ jɛ nugbo ɔ ma xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ ji ɔ e nɔ hun xomɛ nu mɛ tawun
jezu ɖesu mɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo hwenu e ɔ mɛ lɛ e lɛkɔ wa kpodo xomɛhunhun kpan ɖo nu ɖagbeɖagbe mɛ yetɔn kɔ do bɔ mɔ lɛ e wu e luk
enyi gbɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e mɔ bɔ wɛnɖagbe ɔ huzu gbɛzan mɛ lɛ tɔn ɔ e nɔ hun xomɛ nu
nu mi nyi nɔvi nyɔnu tlɛnnɔ ɖe e tɔn e tɛn yi xa ɖe mɛ ɖo zanzanhweji elɔpu tɔn ɖo fi hudo tɔn ɖe e do kan nu tɔn
e wlan ɖɔ ali gege hun nu mi ɖo fi bɔ biblu xa mɛ bɔ yi wan tawun
enyi lɛkɔ wa xwegbe ɔ nɔ mɔ taan ayi ɖo nyiɖee ji a
nɔ tamɛ do mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nu xa lɛ e ji nɔ nu do kpo adohu adohu yetɔn lɛ kpo ji
nɔ ali ɖeɖee sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖe lɛ e kpo ali tawun tawun sixu ɖe lɛ e kpo
wa kudeji ɖɔ nunamɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mɛ hu nuyiɖomɛsi mɛ
nu ɖe nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa sɔ alɔdido lɛ bonu mɔ nu jɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ wu a akpaxwe ɔ
enyi mɛ nabi ɖe tlɛ nɔ yi wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɖo mitɔn mɛ a ɔ mi sixu ɖo awajijɛ gbɔn
enyi mɛ lɛ tlɛ nɔ ɖoto mi a bonu mi nɔ hun ali lɛ nu bonu yi wɛnɖagbe ɔ ɔ mi sixu ɖo awajijɛ
enyi mɛɖe lɛ tlɛ yi wan nu wɛn mitɔn a ɔ gandido mitɔn lɛ xɔ akwɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ xa eblee lɛ
ɖe ɖo linlin ɖagbe ɖe ɖo ali enɛ
e wlan do tɔn wu ɖɔ mi do hu sin xoɖɛ kpo nukunɖiɖo ɔ kpo ɖɔ jehovah blo bɔ e su kɔ
nu e hun alɔ do nu mɛ lɛ ɔ gege yetɔn nɔ wa nu gbɔn
mɛ gege nɔ ɖɔ alɔ e hun do nu emi e su nukun emitɔn mɛ
jezu ɖɔ nu mɛ enɛ ɔ mawu nu
enyi wa ɔ e su nukun yetɔn mɛ gbɔn e sixu dɔn ɖagbe ɖebɔdoɖewu lɛ wa
enɛ wu ɔ nɔ nu mɛ enyi e su nukun yetɔn mɛ kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ nɛ
enyi e nu mɛ azɔn ɖokpo kpowun ɔ e sixu tuun ɖagbe tobutobu e wa e gbeɖe a
etɛ ɖo nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ
ɖagbe ɖe nɔ nu mɛ ɖo nu wa e wu a
jezu tuun enɛ do ayi mɛ hwenu e nu elɔ mɛ e enyi ylɔ hun ylɔ wamamɔnɔ lɛ kpodo sekunɔ lɛ kpo afɔkponɔ lɛ kpodo lɛ kpo
enɛ ɔ nu nu ɖo mɛ enɛ lɛ sixu wa ja tɔn su gbe a
mɛ ɖevo ɖɔ nu nu mɛ nɔ wamamɔnɔ ji e
nugbo ɔ mi ɖo nɔ nu mɛ ɖo alɔdido mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ hɛn awajijɛ wa nu mi
nunamɛ alɔkpa tɛ wɛ bɔ ɖo awajijɛ
hwenu pɔlu ɖe xo sin xo jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ nunamɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu mɛ hu nuyiɖomɛsi e mɛ e ɔ ɖiɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ e nɔ nu agbaza tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ mɛ a loɔ e nɔ akɔnkpinkpan mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hudo mɛ lɛ e ali mɛ
gbeta tɛ kɔn gege wa do alɔhundonanumɛ wu
xota ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ hwenu wa lɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gudo e ɔ awajijɛ emitɔn jɛji
lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ alɔdido mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo taji cobɔ e blo bɔ mɛtɔn ɖo tawun ɖo e nɔ su hudo taji tɔn lɛ sin do
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ mɔ do nu nu ɖo ali enɛ ganji lɛ e nɔ byɔ ɖo lɛ si ɖɔ yeɖee jo mɛ bi ɖu le tɔn lɛ e bonu yeɖesunɔ nɔ ganji hugan ɖo agbaza mɛ ɖo awajijɛ
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ ɖo nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ
ðo mɛ ɖeɖee nu yeɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ wɛ nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu jɛ nukɔn nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn lɛ e wɛ do mi wutu ɔ e sixu vɛwu nu mi bɔ mi nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ
jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ we hugan lɛ bi e wɛ nyi wan yi nu jehovah kpo ayi mitɔn mitɔn linlin mitɔn nu hlɔnhlɔn mitɔn bi kpodo wan yi nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ miɖesunɔ ɖɔhun kpan mak
jehovah nɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nu jezu ɖesu nɔ wa e nɛ
do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ wa nu ɖokpo ɔ ɖo e bɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ
enyi mi ɖo jijɔ alɔhundonanumɛ tɔn nɔ ɖo mi nɔ wa nu xa mawu kpo nɔzo mitɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn mɛ ɔ e bɔ mi kpa nu jehovah hɛn le wa nu miɖesunɔ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo
enyi kpo ɖo wa wɛ ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ yi wan nu bɔ nu towe nɔ su nukun yetɔn mɛ bɔ hwi lɔ ɖo awajijɛ
nunywɛxo ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ nɔ nu mɛ ɔ e nu bɔ e mɛ nɔ sin mɛ ɔ e e bɔ e ɖi kɔ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ sixu nɔ nu mɛ xomɛ do mɛ wu alo hun alɔ do nu mɛ ɖo ali gege wa ɖo klisanwun gbɛzinzan towe kpo towe kpo sin ninɔmɛ gege mɛ bɔ e hɛn le gege wa
xota bɔ e ɖɔ xo do enɛ lɛ ji
wa ɖo wɛ mi ɖe xa mawu kɔ
gbɔn alɔdido xwedo towe kpo mawu lɛ kpo gblamɛ
gbɔn mɛ yiyi gblamɛ
gbɔn hwiɖee zize jo kpo ada gbigblo nu towe kpo gblamɛ
ðɔ ali mi sixu xa jehovah ɖe e ɖe lɛ
ɔ sin tito wɛ nyi ɖɔ lɛ wa nu ɖo xa ɛ bonu linlin tɔn do jɛ
lɛ nyi din co lɛ sixu kpo ɖo wa ɖo xa jehovah wɛ gbe bi gbe
ði ɔ mi ɖo wa ɖo xa mawu wɛ gbɔn wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto tɔn tɔn jijla kpo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu kpo gblamɛ
wɛnjijla kpo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu kpo kɛɖɛ wɛ nyi ali mi nɔ xa jehovah ɖe e a
enyi nu nɔ wa do nukɔnyiyi linlin jehovah tɔn tɔn takunmɛ e ɔ nɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wu ɔ etɛwu e nyi nunywɛnu a
hwenu mi ɖo xota elɔ gbeje wɛ e ɔ nu sixu wa nu jehovah lɛ e do nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu wa e wu o
flin ɖɔ mɛ lɛ bi sin xwe kun nyi ɖokpo ɔ o lanmɛ ɖo ganji ninɔmɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo nuwukpikpe lɛ kpo gbɔn vovo
etɛwu e sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛɖebu nɔ kpe nukun do xwedo tɔn wu e ɖo nu wa ɖo xa jehovah wɛ
jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ nɔ kpe nukun do xwedo yetɔn wu
ði ɔ ɖo do mɔ akwɛ nu towe lɛ
nɔ gege nɔ nɔ xwegbe nɔ kpe nukun do vi yetɔn lɛ wu
vi nyi mɛxo e ɖe lɛ ɖo kpe nukun do yetɔn azinzɔnnɔ lɛ wu
enyi mɔhun lɛ ɖo kɔ ji nu ɔ sixu nɔ kpewu nɔ ɖe hwenu gege ɖo vo nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin lɛ jlo gbɔn e
ɖeji
nu ɖo nukun kpe do xwedo towe wu wɛ ɔ e nɔ vivi nu jehovah kɔ
klisanwun lɛ nɔ wa nu ɖo xa jehovah enyi nɔ vi yetɔn lɛ bɔ nɔ nya nu gbigbɔ tɔn lɛ gbe ɔ nɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee wa lɛ e gege wa mɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɖɔ vi sunnu yetɔn lɛ kpo vi nyɔnu yetɔn lɛ kpo ɖo hwebinu tɔn wa wɛ ɖo fi ɖo zɔ tawun do e
mɛ ɖe lɛ nyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ nyi gbexosin ɖo fi hudo tɔn ɖe e bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli
zɔ ɖe do xwedo ɔ e sixu ɖɔ yeɖee mimɔ hwɛhwɛ jlo gbɔn e vɛwu
nɔ yeɖee do lɛ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu vi yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ yi nukɔn ɖo yetɔn mɛ
nu tuun ɖɔ vi yetɔn lɛ ɖo nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo tɛn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ wɛ ɔ nɔ ɖo awajijɛ kpo xomɛhunhun ɖaxo kpo
jaan vlafo nu ci nu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi vi sunnu emitɔn samuwɛli jehovah e ɖɔhun wɛ e nɔ ci nu gege enɛ lɛ tɔn
nɔ nu ɖevo hu a
sixu kpewu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ agun towe tɔn lɛ gbɔn
fɔtoo ɖo e
etɛwu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo agun towe mɛ lɛ e ɖo ayi mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hudo mɛ lɛ e wu a
vlafo sixu zan hwenu ɖo xa mɛxomɔ nɔvi nyɔnu klisanwun ɖe tɔn hwenu nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ yi nukun kpe do nu ɖevo lɛ wu gbe e
alo sixu mɛ ɖeɖee ɖo hudo alɔdo tɔn lɛ e gbɔn hwiɖee zize jo ze yi kple lɛ xwle axi nu alo yi mɛ ɖo dotooxwe e ɖe gblamɛ
enyi ɖo wa wɛ ɔ sixu wa nu ɖo xa jehovah bɔ e sinkɔn nu ɖɛ ɖe xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
etɛ mɛ yiyi nɔ byɔ
nu e nɔ do tuun mawu tɔn lɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi mɛ yiyi
xo mawu tɔn kpi ɖe lɛ bɔ mi ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mɔhun
sixu ɖo xa mawu gbɔn hwebinu tɔn nɔ wa mi lɛ e yiyi gblamɛ a
mi olaf tɔn
e flin ɖɔ ɖo xwe nabi ɖe ɖie ɔ mɛɖebu kun ɖo agun emitɔn mɛ kpewu nɔ yi lɛdo tɔn yetɔn nyi tlɛnnɔ ɖe e do xwegbe o
olaf nyi dɔnkpɛvu ɖe e byɔ tɔn nyi a lɛ e ɖɔ lɛdo tɔn ɔ sixu nɔ akpa yetɔn a ji
yi gbe ɖɔ nu olaf ɖɔ ɖɔ eyɛ nɔ zinkpo ganjɛmɛ mɛ
huzuhuzu enɛ xɔ akwɛ tawun
olaf flin nu lɛ gbɔn le aklunɔzan gblamɛ jiwu ɖe wɛ
lɛdo tɔn ɔ nɔ zanzan tɛɛn tɛgbɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo do xota dɔn mɛ lɛ e gege ji ɖo nuɖuɖu hwenu
wusyɛn e do lanmɛ nu mi e do nu jlo bɔ hwebinu tɔn
ðo xwe wa yi lɛ e gblamɛ ɔ olaf wa ɖo fi vovo
enyi e ci ɖɔ mitɔn tlɛ su mɛ lɛ nukunmɛ tlolo a ɔ hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ mi ɖo nɔ wa
sixu nɔ ɖe wanyiyi jonɔ lɛ ɖo ali gege enyi e tlɛ tuun gan do wɛ ɖe lɛ e nu tlolo a ɔ nɛ
hwenu ɖe ɖo nukun kpe do biblu kplɔnkplɔn ɖe wu wɛ ɖo espagne e ɔ e ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ yesica nyi tɔn nɔ nɔ equateur e nɔ ɖo avi wɛ magbokɔ
ɔ kan nu wu wɛ e byɔ ɛ
yesica ɖɔ hwenu emi wa to ɔ mɛ e ɔ e do emi bi bɔ gbe ɖokpo ɔ emi kun ɖo nuti ɖu o
sin kɛɖɛ jɛn e ɖo vi tɔn
yesica ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ blo bɔ vi ɔ xoɖɛ byɔ alɔdo
enɛ gudo zaan ɔ we wa ɛ yesica xomɛ do wu a vun wema xwle e e
e kanbyɔ ɖɔ nuɖuɖu jlo ɖɔ ma vi nyɔnu e ɖie a
nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ do gbɔ gan do lɛ e bi nyi
nukɔnmɛ ɔ jo xasun mɛ nuɖuɖu ɖe e ɖe do nyi hɔn tɔn ji
xomɛ do yesica wu e byɔ ayi mɛ bɔ nu e flin ɖɔ emi kun ɖo ayi xosin mawu nu ɖɛ emitɔn e wu o ɔ e nɔ
din ɔ e kanɖeji jehovah
ɖagbe alɔhundonanumɛ nɔvi lɛ tɔn wa e nut
ðɔ ninɔmɛ biblu sin taan mɛ tɔn ɖɔ e ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn ɖo togun mawu tɔn mɛ e ɖe lɛ hudo tɛ lɛ sunnu yeɖee jo lɛ e nɔ su do tɔn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ ɖo egbe
ðo ninɔmɛ gege mɛ ɖo hwenuxo izlayɛli hwexonu tɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ e ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn
egbe ɔ ali gege hun nu hwi lɔ bɔ zan hwenu towe nuɖokan towe lɛ kpo nuwukpikpe towe lɛ kpo do nɔvi sunnu towe lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu towe lɛ kpo
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ wa lɛ e nɔ jlo mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo ali tawun tawun ɖe lɛ kpo gbigbɔ sin nu lɛ kpo mɛ
mɛ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kanbyɔ ɖɔ hwi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa alo kpe nukun do wema lɛ fi e ɖekunnu ɖe lɛ e nu lɛ jijlaɖo alo nu ɖevo lɛ wu a ji wɛ a
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ kpe nukun do mɔhun wu lɛ e ɖɔ nu ɖɔ alɔdido mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ awajijɛ mɛ hugan
mɛɖee zize jo nu tuto yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ hun ali gege bonu e zun lɛ akpaxwe ɔ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖu le e zun ɖo tuto xɔgbigba tɔn yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ e tɔn gbɔn
hwɛhwɛ wɛ mɛ ɖeɖee ze yeɖee jo nu tuto yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ e nɔ zun lɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe wɛ ɖo tuto kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ gbigba tɔn mɛ nu xwe
ðo xwe lɛ vlamɛ ɔ e dɔn nɔvi nyɔnu winnyawinnya gege do wu
e mɔ ɖɔ ali ɖagbe ɖe wɛ hun bɔ emi kpo enɛ lɛ kpo do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu emiɖee ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
hwiɖee jo nu tuto xɔgbigba tɔn mɔhun lɛ a
nu tuun kpo gbɔ kpo ɔ sixu hwiɖee jo a
sixu kpewu ɖo adla ɖe hwenu gbɔn
nu adla lɛ ɔ ali gege nɔ hun nu togun mawu tɔn bɔ e nɔ xa mawu gbɔn alɔdido nɔvi lɛ ɖo ali tawun tawun lɛ gblamɛ
ði ɔ nɔ akwɛ do mɛ ɖeɖee awe xo lɛ e
gabriela ee nyi nɔvi nyɔnu pologne ɖe bɔ xɔ tɔn ɖibla kija bi ɖo singbamɛ ɖe wutu e ɔ hwenu nɔvi ɖo agun sɛkpɔ ɛ lɛ e mɛ e wa ɛ e ɔ e hun xomɛ tawun
e ɖɔ jlo ɖɔ xo do nu gble do mi lɛ e wu a nu agbaza tɔn lɛ kpowun wɛ nyi
mɛ e ɖo adla ɖe gudo lɛ e ɖɔ ɖɔ nu enɛ jɛ e bɔ emi mɔ ɖɔ emi mɔ nyɔna hugan
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ xa jehovah nɔ bɔ e nɔ su hudo enɛ lɛ sin do e ɖesunɔ nɔ ɖu vivi awajijɛ ɖaxo tɔn xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
mɛɖee zize jo sixu hlɔnhlɔn kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e gbɔn
stephanie kpo ɖevo lɛ kpo mɔ awajijɛ ɖo xa mawu mɛ gbɔn alɔdido ɖeɖee ɖo bibɛtɛn wɛ wa etats unis lɛ e gblamɛ
xwedo ɖeɖee gosin fi ahwan gba nu ɖe lɛ e bɔ mɔ xɔ mɛ nɔ e
stephanie ɖɔ ee mɔ wanyiyi kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn yetɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e e ɔ e hun xomɛ nu su nukun yetɔn mɛ nu enɛ mi
e ɖɔ ɖɔ xwedo lɛ ɖɔ mi emi e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ yedɛɛ lɛ wɛ mi hugan
jijɔ tɛ gbeyiɖɔ ezayii
axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ sixu ɖo linlin ezayii tɔn ɖɔhun gbɔn
jlo xa jehovah hugan a
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ tɛn wa ɖo fi tutoblonunu ɔ ɖo hudo tɔn ɖe hugan e a
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun ɖo dandan ɖɔ mawu lɛ tɛn yi fi ɖo zɔ do xwe yetɔn e cobo hun alɔ do nu mɛ o
hwenu jehovah kanbyɔ ɖɔ
ɖo jlo ɔ bɔ ninɔmɛ towe lɛ sɔgbe bɔ yi gbe gbɔn nu hudo nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ tɔn a
hudo tɛ lɛ ɖe
nu nu kan ɔ kpo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛ lɛ bonu huzu ahwanvu sin ɔ kpo e ɔ jezu ɖɔ nukun ɖo gege ɖo gle mɛ nukun lɛ nyi kpɛɖe
savo nu jinukunnɔ ɔ nu e do jinukungbo tɔn mɛ
sixu wa ɖo fi hudo ɖe e vlafo nyi gbexosin a
alo sixu mɛɖe wa a
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo gege mɔ ɖɔ ali ɖagbe hugan e ɖe wanyiyi mawu kpo nɔzo mɛtɔn kpo ɖe e wɛ nyi gbexosin nyinyi ɖo fi mɛ ɖo jinukungbo ɔ mɛ e sin hudo ɖe e
sixu tamɛ do ali ɖevo ɖeɖee gblo ada nu towe ɖe e ji a
awajijɛ gege wɛ nɔ sin wiwa mɛ
enyi jlo gblo ada nu wa nu jehovah wɛ ɖe e ɔ ali ɖevo tɛ lɛ hun
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa ɖo betɛli alo ɖo yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ sin xɔ ɖe gbigba mɛ a
e sixu nyi nu hwenu klewun ɖe alo nɔ gosin zɔ nɔ wa ɖo finɛ hwebinu wɛ e nɔ ɖo hudo mɛ ɖeɖee sixu jehovah ɖo fi ɖebu e do e kpo ɖebu e e kpo tɔn
enɛ sixu byɔ ɖɔ ɖo xa mɛ hudo tawun ɖe tiin ɖe e e tlɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖo nuwukpikpe tlɛ mɔ nu ɖo ali ɖevo ɔ nɛ
jlo ɖɔ e bonu kpe nu wu hugan wa towe a
enyi ɔ sixu jɛxa ba yi wemaxɔmɛ nu axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ
wemaxɔmɛ enɛ nɔ sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo hwebinu tɔn mɛ lɛ e bonu do sixu gblo ada nu nu yɛhwexɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo ɔ mɛ
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ nyikɔ nu wemaxɔmɛ enɛ lɛ e ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ba yi gbe nu ɖebu e ɖo kunnuɖewema yetɔn yiyi gudo lɛ e
etɛ sixu ɖo nukun mɔ gbɔn xa jehovah ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe gblamɛ
ðo mi nyi togun jehovah tɔn wutu ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ hun alɔ do nu mɛ wuntun ɖagbewiwa kpo wanyiyi kpo tɔn ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi nɔ kpe nukun do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu gbe bi gbe
ɖe kpo asi tɔn kpo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ xwe agun ɖevo gbe
wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ macinu yɛwunkɔnnyidowu tɔn ɖe mɔ gbezeyiaga tɔn ɖe kpo nu yeɖesunɔ tɔn habu kpo do kɛkɛ afɔdokwin yetɔn lɛ ji
etɛwu mi ɖo nɔ nu mi nɔ xa lɛ e kpo nu mi nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti alo alokan ji lɛ e kpo
enyi mɛ ɖevo lɛ funfun adingbanxo lɛ kpe do mi wu ɔ mi sixu xwedo jezu tɔn gbɔn
nugbododo biblu tɔn atɔn tɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi ɖɔ xo mi se alo xa lɛ e sɔgbe a ji
nuwukpikpe taji tɛ mi ɖo sɔnu aniwu
ðo mi nyi klisanwun wutu ɔ mi ɖo blo bɔ nuwukpikpe mi ɖo nɔ xo mi se alo xa lɛ e e gblo ada nɔ wa gbeta sɔgbe lɛ e kɔn nux
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enyi mi ɖo kunnuɖenu lɛ ɔ kɛɖɛ jɛn mi sixu wa gbeta sɔgbe lɛ e kɔn
nunywɛxo ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ nɔ ku hun nɔ se xo cobo nɔ kɛnu a ɔ e nɔ ɖe xlonɔ e nyi ɔ nɔ do winnya eɖee
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do vovo tintɛnkpɔn ɖo kunnuɖenu lɛ kpo gbeta sɔgbe lɛ e kɔn wiwa kpo nɔ byɔ lɛ e ji
ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do nugbododo biblu tɔn zan lɛ e kpo ɖeɖee sixu mi bɔ mi blo bɔ nuwukpikpe mi ɖo xo mi se alo xa e e e kpo ji
etɛwu mi ɖo zan nugbododo ɖo nunywɛxo mɛ e
egbe ɔ xo gege wɛ nɔ vunbla mi
xo e nɔ ci ɖɔ sixu vɔ a lɛ e ɛntɛnɛti televiziɔn kpo wɛndomɔ ɖevo lɛ kpo ji
nugbododo biblu tɔn tɛ sixu mi
nunywɛxo ɖɔ ayivɔ vun ɔ nɔ ɖi nu nu nu e ɖɔ lɛ bi mɛ ayi tɔn ɖo ɔ nɔ tamɛ cobo nɔ wa nu
filipunu lɛ mi bɔ mi nu mi xa lɛ e gbɔn
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ mi do nu nu tuun xo sɔgbe e
gbavi nu mi bɔ mi mɔ do nu kunnuɖenu lɛ e ɖe lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ nu mi xa lɛ e kpo sɔxwixwe kpo tawun
xa filipunu lɛ
mi ɖo gu hwenu mitɔn nɔ yi tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn xojlajla tɔn wu mi xo nu do lɛ e ji alo xa gbeɖiɖo ɖeɖee ɖo jiɖe a bɔ e funfun kpe gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji lɛ e a
e nyi nu taji tawun ɖɔ e nyi alɔ nu tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn lɛ sɔnu lɛ e
linlin yetɔn wɛ nyi ɖɔ do kpo mɛ nu togun mawu tɔn slo kɔ nu nugbo ɔ
xo maɖotaɖe lɛ bɔ e wa gbeta maɖotaɖe lɛ kɔn
nukun kpɛvi do hlɔnhlɔn xo tɔn lɛ sixu ɖo do linlin towe kpo ayi towe kpo ji e gbeɖe o tim
ðɔnuese lɛ ðɔnuese ɖo jw org ji lɛ e nɔ yawu ɖɔ nu taji gudogudo tɔn ɖeɖee ɖo jijɛ wɛ ɖo togun jehovah tɔn mɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e ɖo klewun mɛ
presse akpaxwe enɛ ɖo jw org ji hwebinu nɔ gblo ada nu gbeɖiɖo ɖeɖee kunkpla nu ɖeɖee nɔ do afɔ mɛ nu mi ɖo vivo mimɔ ba mawu kɔn e e kpo mi nɔ hɛn sɔ mɛ ɖo adla hwenu gbɔn e kpo
televiziɔn jw tɔn televiziɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji tɔn enɛ nɔ kunkpla jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ wa gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ e e
ði ɔ nu jɛ ɖo mɔyizi hwenu hwenu e do ɖɔ yi do nu akpadido yikungban ɔ lɛ e lɛkɔ wa ɖo gbe nyanya e e
vlafo ɖɔ ɖo wa ɖo gbe nyanya lɛ e hugan wutu ɔ yedɛɛ lɛ wɛ ɖɔ nugbo
do nu xo ɔ a ɖeji do jehovah wu a e wa ɔ ɖi nu nu gbeɖiɖo sɔgbe a e
xlonɔnu tɛ nɛ
enyi mi se bɔ mɛ lɛ ɖo xo baɖabaɖa ɖɔ do togun jehovah tɔn wu wɛ ɔ etɛwu e ɖo ci kliwun nu mi a
mi ɖo ɖo aceji tawun hwenu e ɖo gbe adingban tɔn lɛ do togun jehovah tɔn wu bɔ mi yi jɛ mɛ e
wɔn gbeɖe ɖɔ sataan nɔ dohwɛ mawu lɛ o
cobonu mi nuɖe do gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti alo alokan ji ɔ etɛ ji mi ɖo tamɛ do
wema do towe lɛ kpo mɛtuunmɛ towe lɛ kpo gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti alo alokan ji nɔ vivi nu wɛ a
enyi nu xa wɛn ɖe ɖo xojlawema lɛ mɛ alo se xo ɖe ɔ nu nɔ ci nu nɔ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn ma wɛn akpakpa mɛ tɔn ɖe e ɖe wɛ e sixu nɔ ci nu
cobonu nuɖe do gbɔn alokan alo gbɔn ɛntɛnɛti ji hun nɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ ganjɛwu ɖɔ nu jlo funfun kpe e nyi nugbo a
ɖo kunnuɖenu lɛ doo a
enyi ɖeji a hun sixu ɖo adingbanxo funfun kpe kplekple nɔvi lɛ tɔn mitɔn mɛ wɛ ɖo manywɛ mɛ
enyi xo nu hun zin sunsun zin o
etɛ lɛ nɔ blo ɖo to ɖe lɛ mɛ
ðo manywɛ mɛ ɔ mi sixu wa nu ɖo xa gbɔn
mi nu jɛ ɖo sovietique xoxo ɔ e
kponɔ nuglɔ tɔn e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ kgb e funfun adingbanxo lɛ kpe ɖɔ nɔvi nukunɖeji gege ɖu kpa flu togun jehovah tɔn
mɛ gege ɖi nu nu adingbanxo mɔhun lɛ bɔ e sin enɛ wu bɔ klan jo tutoblonunu jehovah tɔn do
e blawu tawun
xomɛhunhun sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mɛ gege wa lɛkɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ mɛ ɖe lɛ lɛkɔ gbeɖe a
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu nu baɖabaɖa mɔhun gbɔn
ɖɔ emi kun funfun gbeɖiɖo masɔgbe alo ee ɖo kunnuɖenu ɖebu a lɛ e o
jɔ xlo alo gu o
kanɖeji ɖɔ emi ɖo kunnuɖenu lɛ
nu mi ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba mɔ kunnuɖenu sɔgbe lɛ e ɔ ɖevo tɛ nɔ kpannukɔn mi
gbeɖiɖo mɛ nugbo adaɖe alo xo agboɖe ɖe lɛ e nyi ɖevo e nɔ mɔ hwenu e ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ wa gbeta sɔgbe lɛ e kɔn e e
mɛ e mɔ nugbo gee ɖo ji ɖe e ɔ enɛ nyi tɔn ɖo ji
mi sixu blo gbɔn bɔ tɔn mɛ nugbo klewun ɖe ɖe e mi a efɛ
mi nu jɛ do izlayɛli vi ɖeɖee nɔ judɛɛn ɔ sin gbadahweji ɖo jozuwee hwenu lɛ e ji e
akpaxwe gbeɖiɖo ɔ tɔn enɛ sɔgbe
izlayɛli vi ɖeɖee ɖo gbadahweji ɔ tɔn lɛ e zɔn do xo agboɖe enɛ ji wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ nɔvi emitɔn lɛ gu do jehovah ji enɛ wu ɔ xo yeɖee kple ahwan mɛ ɖo zanzanhweji lɛ e xa jozuwee
awajijɛ sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ cobonu yi ahwan ɔ to ɖe lɛ do bonu yi xo ɔ tɔn
etɛ sunnu enɛ lɛ se
izlayɛli vi ee ɖo akɔta hwlibɛni tɔn gadi tɔn kpo akɔta manasee tɔn kpo mɛ lɛ e blo vɔsakpe ɔ bonu e nyi flin sin nu ɖe e nyi do a
blo vɔsakpe ɔ bonu mɛ lɛ bi tuun ɖo sɔgudo ɖɔ lɔ nyi jehovah
e hun xomɛ nu izlayɛli vi enɛ lɛ sɔ ɖɔ zan hwenu do tuun xo ɔ tɔn kun zɔn do xo agboɖe enɛ se e wu hu nɔvi yetɔn lɛ o e
etɛ bɔ e wa nu xa mɛfibaalu ɖo ali agɔ
davidi sixu nyi alɔ nu nuagɔwiwa enɛ gbɔn
nugbo agboɖe alo xo kankpoe e funfun kpe do mi wu lɛ e sixu bɔ e wa nu xa mi lɔ ɖo ali agɔ
mi axɔsu davidi kpo mɛfibaalu kpo tɔn
ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ e ɖo adingban do mɛfibaalu kɔ ɖo davidi
davidi do nu xo ɔ a yi ayikungban mɛfibaalu tɔn lɛ bi sin asi tɔn
jezu ɖi xwi xa jidomɛ lɛ gbɔn
etɛ mi sixu wa hwenu mɛɖe funfun adingban kpe do mi wu e
enyi e do ji ɔ lo
e do ji jezu kpo jaan ɔ kpo lɔ xa matie
jezu wa nu gbɔn hwenu e ɖɔ xo agɔ do wu tɔn e
e zan hwenu tɔn bi kpo hlɔnhlɔn tɔn bi kpo do jɛhun do eɖee ji a
e wa ɔ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ gbeje kunnuɖenu lɛ wɛ nyi nu e nɔ wa lɛ e kpo nu e nɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo
jezu ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ nunywɛ mawu tɔn ɖe hwɛjijɔ eɖesunɔ tɔn gbɔn nuwiwa tɔn lɛ mɛ
nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe ɖo finɛ bɔ e ɖɔ mi
enyi mɛɖe funfun adingban kpe do mi wu ɔ mi zan gbɔn e wɛ bɔ mɛ ɖe ɖi nu nu adingban enɛ a
nugbo ɔ jezu tɔn gbɔn e ɔ gbɛzan ɖagbe klisanwun tɔn miɖesunɔ nɔ zan e sixu sunsun nugbo agboɖe kpo hwɛdomɛ adingban tɔn lɛ kpo sin mi wu
nunywɛ miɖesunɔ tɔn wu ginganjɛ sixu nyi mɔ ɖe gbɔn
ɖokpo kpowun wɛ kunnuɖenu lɛ xixokple nyi hwenu mi jlo wa gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn e
bɔ nu mi ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie ɔ lo
mi sixu sɔnu nu nuwukpikpe tamɛ linlin tɔn kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ tɔn ɖagbe ɖe kpo
e sixu nɔ si mi tawun ɖo ayi mitɔn nɔ ɖo hwebinu e wu
nuwukpikpe enɛ ɔ sixu nyi mɔ ɖe wɛ a
ganji enyi mi jɛ jiɖe ɖo do nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ miɖesunɔ tɔn wu ji din ɔ e sixu huzu mɔ ɖe nu mi
nu nɔ ci nu mi e kpo nujlomɛ miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo sixu jɛ acɛ kpa nu linlin mitɔn lɛ ji
awovinu tawun wɛ enɛ nyi
biblu nu mi nyi wɛn ɖɔ mi ganjɛ nunywɛ miɖesunɔ tɔn wu o nux
tom mɔ mɛ we lɛ bɔ ɖo nu wɛ ɖo ɖe e sin vivi ɖu wɛ tawun zunfan yeɖee kpo wanyiyi kpo
nu mɔ wɛ tom ɖe e jɛ do ji tawun
nu elɔ jɛ e bɔ john kpo asi tɔn kpo yeɖee wɛ a
etɛ jɛ do asi tɔn wu
enyi ɖo tɛn tɔn mɛ bɔ nu mɔhun jɛ ɔ nu ci nu
tom ɖo kunnuɖenu lɛ bi doo cobo yawu wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ john kun ɖo gbeji nu asi tɔn o a
ðo nukɔnmɛ ɖo zan enɛ mɛ ɔ tom ylɔ john ɖo alokan ji
do nukunmɛ tom tɔn jɛ do sɔ hwenu e se ɖɔ nyɔnu ɔ nyi nɔvi nyɔnu jɔnwun john tɔn ɖi sa wa toxo ɔ mɛ e
etɛ enɛ sixu mi
mi mɔ nu gbɔn ɖebu ɖo klisanwun gbɛzinzan mitɔn mɛ ɔ nu mi mɔ lɛ e kɛɖɛ nɔ gbeɖe ɖɔ kunnuɖenu lɛ sɔgbe a
lɛ sixu wa nu do gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e wu gbɔn
nu ɖevo sixu vɛwu ɖo xo lɛ dida ɖɔ sɔgbe a ji e mɛ e wɛ nyi hwenu ɖe ɖo mi kpo nɔvi ɖe kpo tɛntin ɖo agun ɔ mɛ e
nu mi nɔ ayi ɖo ɖeɖee ɖo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo mi kpo tɛntin e ji hwebinu ɔ mi sixu jɛ nu vɛdo ji
bɔ enyi mi wa se xo masɔgbe ɖe do nɔvi enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu yawu ɖi
linlin masɔgbe lɛ ɖiɖo do nɔvi mitɔn lɛ wu sixu bɔ mi wa gbeta jinjɔn kunnuɖenu ɖebu ji a lɛ e kɔn do wu
mi tɛn linlin masɔgbe mɔhun lɛ a e wa ɔ mi tuun ɖɔ dandan sin nu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ mi yi wan nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ nɔ jlo do hwɛ kɛ kpo ayi mitɔn bi kpo xa kolosinu lɛ
nugbododo biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi gbeje xo lɛ ɖɔ sɔgbe a ji
etɛ mi gbeje ɖo xota bɔ e mɛ
kunnuɖenu lɛ biba kpo dida ɖɔ sɔgbe a ji kpo bɔwu ɖo egbe a ɖo xo tobutobu mi nɔ se egbe lɛ e ɔ xo nɔ gbeɖiɖo lɛ nɔ nyi nugbo agboɖe bɔ mi nyi e lɔ ɖo finɛ
etɛ mi ɖo vɛwu enɛ kɔn
mi ɖo tuun nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ nɔ zan
nugbododo enɛ lɛ ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ xlonɔnu kpo winnyanu kpo wɛ nukikɛ do xo ɖe wu jɛ nukɔn nu kunnuɖenu lɛ mimɔ nyi
gudo tɔn ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi mɔ nu ɖebu ɖo klisanwun gbɛzinzan mitɔn mɛ hun mi miɖee ganjɛ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ miɖesunɔ tɔn wu o
nux enyi mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ mi zan kunnuɖenu gosin fi lɛ e do wa gbeta ɖagbe lɛ kɔn do nu nunywɛ kpe lɛ e ji ɔ nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ cyɔn alɔ mi ji
ɖevo kpo ɖo
mi nɔ jlo mɛ lɛ ci ɖo wexo e do da hwɛ nu
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi gbeje awovinu ɖo nu mɔhun wiwa mɛ e nu sixu mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu lɛ e
annuaire des temoins jehovah mɛ wexwɛ kpo annuaire tɔn kpo mɛ wexwɛ
nɔ zɔn do nu ɖo wexo e ji do da hwɛ o loɔ nɔ ɖɔhwɛ jlɔjlɔ jaan nwt
levii vi lɛ
ezayii gbɔn e wlan do aklunɔ mitɔn jezu klisu wu e ji do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi jiɖe mi
ezayii ɖɔ ɖɔ jezu kun e ɖe ɔ do ɖɔhwɛ xa mɛ o le e se xo ɖe kpowun ɔ e kun nɔ ze do ɖɔhwɛ o
e do hwɛjijɔ nu wamamɔnɔ
ðo mi ɖo mɛ mɛ ɖiɖe ɖo vo kpo linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ wu kpo e ɖe mɛ wutu
mi bi jlo tawun ɖo nu bi vɔ bɔ e zɔn do nu ɖo wexo e ji da hwɛ nu mi gbeɖe a e
ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe wɛ mi nɔ mɔ xo ɖɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu
ɖo mi nyi wutu ɔ mi nɔ kpewu nɔ ɖɔ xo do wu ɖo ali sɔgbe e jezu ɖɔhun a
nu nukun mitɔn lɛ mɔ e nɔ jlo wa nu do mi wu
hwenu jezu ɖo ayikungban ji e ɔ e ɖegbe nu mi ɖɔ nɔ zɔn do nu ɖo wexo e ji do da hwɛ o loɔ nɔ ɖɔ hwɛ jlɔjlɔ
jaan e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jezu jlo ɖɔ mi ci emi ɖɔhun nɔ zɔn do nu nukun mitɔn lɛ mɔ e wu da hwɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ o
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do nu ɖo wexo bɔ lɛ nɔ zɔn do da hwɛ nu mɛ e atɔn ji wɛ nyi sinmɛ agbaza tɔn alo akɔ dɔkun kpo xwe kpo
ðo akpaxwe lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ mi gbeje ali tawun tawun mi setonu nu jezu ɖe lɛ e
etɛ lɛ jɛ bɔ linlin e ɖo do mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e wu e gbeje
ɖiɖe ɖo e nugbo ɖevo tɛ jehovah bɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu
do nukun mɛ linlin ɖeɖee wa ayi mɛ nu hwenu e ylɔ ɛ wa kɔnɛyi nyi jwifu a e xwegbe ɖo sezalee e mɛ
jwifu hwe ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖɔhun ɔ su kpo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e nyi mɛ blibli
nuɖe lɛ jɛ bɔ linlin e ɖo e gbeje
azɔn atɔn wɛ do nujɔnu mɛ
nu e ɔ gbe ɔ nɔ gosin jixwe nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu mawu ɖɔ e hɛn ɔ e ɖu ɔ hwɛ ɖɔ e mɛ o
ee gudo e ɔ nu gbe ɔ ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ɖɔ e bu vo
enɛ gudo tlolo ɔ mɛ kɔnɛyi lɛ e wa
ee gbigbɔ ali gudo e ɔ e hwlɛndo xwedo mɛ e lɛ e yi kɔnɛyi xwe
enyi zɔn do nu ɖo wexo e ji da hwɛ nu kɔnɛyi wɛ ɔ e byɔ xwe tɔn gbe gbeɖe a
jwifu lɛ nɔ byɔ mɛ nyi jwifu a lɛ e xwe a kpowun bɔ xo fo
ɖo linlin agɔ jinjɔn ayi ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ lɛ e co etɛwu e hwlɛndo xwedo mɛ lɛ yi kɔnɛyi xwe
numimɔ mɔ e kpo ganjɛwu gbigbɔ ɛ e kpo wa ɖagbe tawun
ee ɖoto nu kɔnɛyi ɖɔ e gudo e ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ɔ akpakpa ɛ bɔ e ɖɔ xo elɔ lɛ gbigbɔ do ayi mɛ e mɔ din nugbo ɖɔ mawu kun nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ o
loɔ ɖo akɔta ɖebu mɛ ɔ mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nɔ xwedo hwɛjijɔ ɔ mɛ enɛ sin nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ
etɛ wu jehovah ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ bi mɔ nukunnu jɛ
mi tuun nugbo ɔ co etɛ sixu nɔ vɔ sin ayi mitɔn mɛ
jehovah gbɔn ji klisanwun lɛ bi nu mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ emi kun nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ o
e nɔ ayi ɖo vogbingbɔn ɖo sinmɛ agbaza tɔn akɔ tɔn to tɔn hɛnnu tɔn alo gbe lɛ tɔn mɛ e ji a
nu su ɖo to ɖe mɛ abi xwe ɖe gbe bɔ e nɔ ɖo linlin agɔ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu ɔ
sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi kun nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ o ɖo ayi gɔngɔn towe mɛ ɔ linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu vɔ bi a
mi sixu ɖoto jezu ɖo nu ɖo wexo e wu ji zinzɔn do do da hwɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
etɛ sixu mi bɔ mi hɔn ɖɔ nu linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu sin ayi mitɔn mɛ
etɛ gbeɖiɖo nɔvi sunnu agbanɖotananɔ ɖe tɔn
mi zan xo mawu tɔn gbeje miɖee ganji ɖɔ linlin agɔ alɔkpa ɖebu ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu kpo ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ vlafo a ji
bɔya linlin mɔhunkɔtɔn lɛ do ɖɔ do tawun ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ bɔ mi ɖo ayi wu a
ði ɔ nɔvi sunnu agbanɖotananɔ ɖe ɖo asu kpo asi kpo ɖo walɔ ɖagbe ɖo hwebinu tɔn mɛ e ɖe wa e sin gbe ɖo wɛ
asu ɔ gosin akɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ yawu nukun kpɛvi do e ɖe mɛ
ðo gbeɖiɖo tɔn mɛ ɔ e ɖɔ nu ɖagbe gege do asu ɔ wu wa su ɖɔ e gosin akɔ enɛ mɛ co nuwiwa tɔn lɛ kpo e nɔ zan tɔn gbɔn e kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ wu ɖɔ e gosin akɔ enɛ mɛ kun dandan ɖɔ e nɔ blibli ji alo zan mɛ gosin akɔ enɛ mɛ lɛ e gege nɔ zan gbɔn e ɖɔhun o
ɖo ayi nukplɔnmɛ ɔ wu a
mi ɖo ɖebu ɖo agun mɛ ɔ mi ɖo nɔ gbeje miɖee ceɖeceɖe ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi gbe nu alɔ e do mi e bonu mi mɔ tɛn do tuun nu linlin agɔ kpɛvi ɖe ɖo ayi mitɔn mɛ a ji
nu ɖevo tɛ mi sixu wa
mi sixu ɖɔ mi ɖo wanyiyi ɖaxo gbɔn
enyi mi ɖo wanyiyi ɖaxo ɔ mi tɛn wanyiyi enɛ bɔ e nɔ linlin agɔ ɖiɖo do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu sin tɛnmɛ
