jijɔ tɛ lɛ bɔ jezu sin nɔ nyi jehovah mawu tɔn
etɛwu mi sixu ganjɛwu ɖɔ mi sixu huzu mawu tɔn
ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ azɔn atɔn wɛ e ylɔ ablaxamu ɖɔ mawu tɔn
ezayii jaki eɖokponɔ wɛ e ylɔ tlɔlɔ ɖɔ mawu tɔn ɖo biblu mɛ
enɛ ɖɔ ablaxamu ɖokponɔ wɛ nyi zun xa jehovah e a
biblu ɖɔ mi mɛ bi sixu ɖo wujɔmɛ enɛ
sunnu kpo nyɔnu kpo ɖi xɛsi nu jehovah ɖi nu huzu tɔn lɛ e tɔn gege ɖo xo mawu tɔn mɛ xa ðɛhan
ɖo mɛ tobutobu ɖe nuɖiɖi yetɔn bɔ pɔlu ɖɔ xo yetɔn lɛ e mɛ
mɛ vovo enɛ lɛ bi wɛ nyi mawu tɔn eblee lɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do jehovah tɔn xo biblu ɖɔ lɛ e atɔn wu ganji hwliti asukusi mɔwabunu kpo ɖo fannafanna e ezekiyasi axɔsu judaa tɔn ɖe kpo jezu sin nɔ ɔ kpo
etɛ ali mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo huzu mawu tɔn ɖe e mi
nu syɛnsyɛn tɛ ji hwliti ɖo do etɛ bɔ e syɛn
nɔemii kpo vi tɔn si hwliti kpo ɔpa kpo ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wɛ sin mɔwabu wa xwe izlayɛli
hwenu ɖo ali ji e ɔ ɔpa wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi lɛkɔ yi xwe ɖo mɔwabu
nɔemii kudeji ɖɔ emi lɛkɔ yi jɔtɛn emitɔn ɖo izlayɛli
gbeta tɛ kɔn hwliti wa
e ɖo do nu syɛnsyɛn ɖe ji
e lɛkɔ yi xwe tɔn gbe ɖo mɔwabu nɔ kpo xwedo tɔn kpo wɛ a alo e nɔ xa nɔemii asu tɔn nɔ ba yi bɛteleyɛmu hwliti
mɔwabu wɛ mɛ hwliti tɔn lɛ nɔ nɔ
e sixu lɛkɔ yi bɔ sixu kpe nukun do wutu tɔn
e tuun mɔwabunu lɛ se gbe nɔ do e tuun aca yetɔn lɛ
nɔemii sixu do nu enɛ lɛ ɖe sin akpa nu hwliti ɖo bɛteleyɛmu a
nɔemii ɖo xɛsi ɖi wɛ ɖɔ emi kun kpewu mɔ asu kpo xɔ kpo o
enɛ wu ɔ nɔemii ɖɔ ɖɔ e lɛkɔ yi mɔwabu
mi mɔ gbɔn e ɔ ɔpa lɛkɔ xwe togun tɔn kpo vodun tɔn lɛ kpo kɔn
hwliti hwliti ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun lɛkɔ yi togun emitɔn kpo vodun yetɔn lɛ kpo kɔn o
gbeta nunywɛ kpe e tɛ kɔn hwliti wa
etɛwu bowozi ɖɔ ɖɔ hwliti wa hɔn hwla ci jehovah sin lɛ glɔ
e ci ɖɔ hwliti ɔ asu tɔn alo nɔemii wɛ e nu do jehovah wu ɖe ɖɔhun
e ɖɔ jehovah kun ci vodun mɔwabu tɔn lɛ ɖɔhun o
e yi wan nu jehovah tuun ɖɔ e wɛ emi ɖo yi wan
enɛ wu ɔ hwliti wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe e kɔn
e ɖɔ nu nɔemii ɖɔ togun towe wɛ nyi togun mawu nɔ ɔ wɛ
hwliti enyi mi nu do wan hwliti yi nu nɔemii e ji ɔ e nɔ jiwu nu mi
nu jiwu hugan e wɛ nyi wanyiyi e ɖo nu jehovah e
wanyiyi enɛ jiwu nu bowozi bɔ e wa kpa ɛ ɖo mawu mavɔmavɔ sin glɔ e wa hɔn hwla ci e wu
xa hwliti
xogbe bowozi zan lɛ sixu flin mi xɛvi ɖe nɔ hɔn hwla ci nɔ tɔn mɛ gbɔn e ɖɔhun
hwliti ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖebu ɖɔ nywɛ ɔ a
etɛ sixu mɛ ɖo nu xo do gbɛzan yetɔn zize jo nu jehovah wu wɛ lɛ e
mɛ gege nɔ nu do jehovah wu nɔ hɔn hwla ci glɔ tɔn a
nɔ xo nu do gbɛzan yetɔn zize jo nu jehovah kpo baptɛm bloblo kpo wu
enyi nu nɔ ci nu hun tamɛ do nu wu nɔ xo nu e ji
mɛ bi wɛ nɔ mawu ɖe alo vodun ɖe
jozuwee nunywɛ sin nu ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi mawu nugbo ɔ
enyi ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah hun ɖɔ emi ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖɔ e nyi bibɛtɛn nu nɛ
bɔ e bɔ kpo ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ nu ɖo tagba ɖebu kpe wɛ ɔ nɛ
nu mawu wa nu hwliti e nɛ
tinmɛ ninɔmɛ ezekiyasi tɔn
ninɔmɛ ezekiyasi tɔn gbɔn vo nu hwliti tɔn tawun
eyɛ ɖo akɔta ɖeɖovo mawu tɔn mɛ
izlayɛli vi lɛ bi nɔ gbeji a
ezekiyasi sin axɔsu akazi nyi mɛ nyanya
e ɖo sisi nu tɛmpli mawu tɔn a dɔn mɛ lɛ bɔ vodun lɛ
akazi tlɛ do ezekiyasi sin nɔvi ɖe lɛ gbɛɖe gbɛɖe do nu vodun
vuhwenu ezekiyasi tɔn ɖebu a axɔsu lɛ
etɛwu e sixu bɔwu nu ezekiyasi mɔ do jehovah wu
etɛwu mi ɖo mɔ do mawu wu a
egbe ɔ mɛɖe lɛ sin ninɔmɛ nɔ ci ezekiyasi tɔn ɖɔhun ɖebu lala a bɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo hwɛjijɔ wunvo mawu mavɔmavɔ alo mɔ do tutoblonunu tɔn wu
nunywɛxo mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ xwedo emitɔn sin ninɔmɛ nyanya sixu bɔ emi zan nyanya alo emi nu emitɔn lɛ wa nyi do lɛ e wa
ezekiyɛli linlin enɛ lɛ sɔgbe a
mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖebu wunvo jehovah a
e wɛ nɔ bɔ nu nyanya lɛ nɔ jɛ do lɛ wu a
jɔbu nugbo wɛ ɖɔ lɛ sixu vi yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ wa nu ɖagbe alo nyanya
nunywɛxo kolosinu lɛ enɛ ɖɔ ninɔmɛ xwedo mitɔn tɔn wɛ ɖɔ mɛ alɔkpa mi nyi e a
ðo jehovah mɛɖesusininɔ mi enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi wa nu ɖagbe alo nu nyanya
ezekiyasi zan nunina xɔ akwɛ enɛ gbɔn
mɛ winnyawinnya gege nɔ yi nugbo ɔ su ɖo xwedo alɔkpa ɖebu mɛ ɔ nɛ akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
etɛ bɔ ezekiyasi nyi ɖokpo ɖo axɔsu ɖagbe hugan judaa tɔn lɛ mɛ
e xwedo nyanya tɔn tɔn a
e wa ɔ e ɖoto gbeyiɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ganji ɖi ezayii micee kpo ozee kpo
e setonu nu weɖexamɛ yetɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɖe ɖo ali ji yetɔn lɛ kpo ganji
enɛ ɛ bɔ e jla nu tɔn dɔn nyi ayi lɛ e gege ɖo
e sla wu nu tɛmpli ɔ byɔ mawu ɖɔ e hwɛ togun ɔ hu lɛ e kɛ ɛ e su kun do nu vodun gbɔn to ɔ mɛ lɛ e bi
nukɔnmɛ hwenu asilii xɔsu senakelibu sin adan ahwan jeluzalɛmu e ɔ ezekiyasi ɖe akɔnkpinkpan ɖaxo kpo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo kpo
e ɖeji do jehovah sin alɔcyɔnmɛji wu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu togun tɔn
e wa su hweɖenu bɔ ezekiyasi jɛ afɔ tɛ ayi ji ee jehovah nu e ɔ e eɖee hwe
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ ezekiyasi nyi jiwu ɖe bɔ mi xwedo
e jo ninɔmɛ xwedo tɔn tɔn do bonu e hɛn gbɛzan tɔn gble a
e wa ɔ e ɖɔ emi nyi jehovah
ezekiyasi ɖɔhun ɔ mɛ gege ɖɔ emi nyi jehovah tɔn gbɔn ɖo egbe
timɔtee klisanwun gege gosin xwedo sin ninɔmɛ a lɛ e mɛ egbe co tɛnkpɔn zun xa jehovah
ezekiyasi ɖɔhun ɔ ɖɔ e kun nyi xwedo emitɔn sin ninɔmɛ wɛ ɖɔ mɛ alɔkpa emi nyi ɖo sɔgudo e nu emi o
mawu mɛɖesusininɔ mi bɔ mi sixu zan do ɛ do kpa ezekiyasi ɖɔhun
etɛwu e nu e ci nu vɛwu tawun e ɖɔhun
xosin tɛ e nu gabliyɛli sin xo lɛ
ezekiyasi nɔ ɖo xwe gege gudo e ɔ ɖyɔvi nɔ nyi e zun bunɔ ɖe xa jehovah taji ɖe do alɔ mɛ
e mɔ xo ji vi mawu tɔn kpe nukun
jehovah ɖo yi wan nu do wu tɔn cobo sixu jɔwu bunɔ enɛ ɛ
e wa nu gbɔn hwenu e se enɛ sin xo azɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ e
mi nɔ yawu ɖɔ xo do wu ɖaxo e jɔ e wu hwɛhwɛ
etɛ sixu nyi ɖe lɛ ɖo nu do xɛsi lɛ e mɛ
ði ɔ wɛnsagun gabliyɛli ɖɔ ɖɔ sunnu kun ɖoxo xa ɛ o mɔ xo
gabliyɛli wa ɖɔ ɖɔ emi tinmɛ mɔ xo ɔ gbɔn wɛ ɖe e nu xwedo tɔn kpo mɛ ɖo xa tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo a
etɛ
e blo gbɔn bɔ jozɛfu ɖi ɖɔ e kun gɔn gbeji nɔ nu emi o gbɔn
ɔ e ɖo ɖaxo ɖe kpe nukun do vi mawu tɔn wu ɖɔhun
mi tuun nu ɖu ayi mɛ nu lɛ e bi a mi tuun nu e wa hwenu gabliyɛli ɖɔ xo gudo e
etɛwu nuɖiɖi tɔn nyi nuɖiɖi nukunɖeji
sin nuɖiɖi nyi nuɖiɖi nukunɖeji nugbo
e ɖo gbesisɔmɛ wa nu e ɛ lɛ e bi ɖi nyɔnu ɖe ɖɔhun
e ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah kpe nukun do emi wu cyɔn alɔ emi ji
ɖo nuɖiɖi ɖaxo mɔhun gbɔn
e ji mi kpo nuɖiɖi kpo a
mi sixu ɖo nuɖiɖi enyi mi tɛnkpɔn sɔnu byɔ mawu ɖɔ e do nu gandido mitɔn lɛ ɔ nɛ
galatinu lɛ nw efɛzinu lɛ syɛnsyɛn do hɛn nuɖiɖi tɔn lido
nu mi e nɔ ɖoto xo e ɖɔ lɛ e gbɔn e kpo nu wu e nɔ ɖɔ xo do lɛ e kpo
etɛ ɖɔ nyi ɖagbe ɖe
nɔ ɖoto xo gbɔn e
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nɔ ɖoto xo kun nɔ zɔn xo ji o
jaki nyi ɖagbe ɖe
biblu ɖɔ e nɔ ɖoto nu e se lɛ e ganji ɖo taji ɔ nu e se do jehovah wu lɛ e
e nɔ zan hwenu do tamɛ do nu taji mɔhun lɛ ji
enɛ tɔn ɖokpo wɛ nyi hwenu e ji jezu bɔ lɛ do wɛn gosin wɛnsagun ɖe e e
nukɔnmɛ hwenu jezu ɖo xwe e ɔ e ɖɔ xo ɖe jiwu nu
ðo ninɔmɛ we enɛ lɛ bi mɛ ɔ ɖoto nu e se lɛ e bi ganji flin hɛn do ayi mɛ ganji xa luki
etɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo gbɔn e sixu mi
nu wu e nɔ ɖɔ xo do lɛ e
biblu ɖɔ nu gege nu mi do nu wu nɔ ɖɔ xo do lɛ e wu a
e mɔ xoɖiɖɔ tɔn gaga bi ɔ ɖo luki mɛ
xo enɛ lɛ ɖɔ tuun nu ɖeɖee ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn e wlan do ebleegbe mɛ e e ganji
gbɔn nɛ e
xo tɔn lɛ ci xo ɖeɖee samuwɛli sin nɔ ɖɔ ɖo ɖɛ tɔn mɛ lɛ e ɖɔhun
samuwɛli e ci ɖɔ ɖe xo sin biblu mɛ azɔn ɖo xoɖiɖɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ ɖɔhun
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e yi wan nu xoɖiɖɔ do nugbo ɖeɖee e ɖo tɔn ɖaxo hugan jehovah e wu
ali tɛ lɛ mi sixu ɖi nu ɖɔhun ɖe
ɖɔhun ɔ jehovah sixu ɖe lɛ mi hweɖelɛnu bɔ mi ɖɔ wiwa tɔn vɛwu nu mi din
nu mi wa nu ɖɔhun yi gbe nu ɔ kpo mɛɖesɔhwe kpo ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah mi
mi sixu ɖi nu ɖɔhun enyi mi nɔ ɖoto jehovah ganji nɔ tamɛ do nu mi do e kpo linlin tɔn lɛ kpo wu e ji ɔ nɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ mi sixu ɖɔ nu mi e nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo ðɛhan luki hlɔmanu lɛ
enyi mi xwedo nuɖiɖi sin nukunɖeji ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ɔ etɛ sin ganjɛwu mi sixu ɖo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ hwliti ezekiyasi kpo kpo nyi jehovah tɔn ablaxamu nyi gbɔn e ɖɔhun
ɖo mɛ tobutobu mawu jɔwu bɔ nyi tɔn lɛ e mɛ
nu mi kpo ɖo nuɖiɖi sin nukunɖeji enɛ lɛ xwedo wɛ
eblee lɛ enyi mi wa ɔ mi sixu ɖo nukun ajɔ e nɔ mɔ ɖo zunzun xa jehovah sɔyi mɛ lɛ e
alo gbe gbe blo baptɛm e wɛ a
e sixu nyi azan enɛ wɛ nyi azan taji hugan nyi awajijɛzan hugan ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ
gbe nɛ gbe ɔ e vivi nu nɔvi sunnu towe lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu towe lɛ kpo tawun ɖɔ mɔ bɔ ɖɔ emi yi wan nu mawu kpo ayi towe towe linlin towe kpo hlɔnhlɔn towe bi kpan
ɖu vivi awajijɛ ɖaxo tɔn ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ sin hwenu blo baptɛm e
e ɖo co ɖe lɛ hɛn awajijɛ ɖo e ɖe lɛ bu
etɛwu enɛ jɛ
hwɛjijɔ tɛ lɛ mi ɖo kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo
wɛn axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn nɔ awajijɛ ɖaxo mi
ðo jehovah ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ ɖe nyanya elɔ siin ɖo malin malin mɛ ɖo mawu tɔn ɔ ayi
sofonii ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ xomɛsinzan mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn sɛkpɔ
azan ɖaxo mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn ɔ sɛkpɔ bi kɛnnɛkɛnnɛ
enyi mi mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔte din zɛ xwe wu ɔ mi sixu hɛn awajijɛ mi ɖo e bu
enɛ sixu bɔ mi jɛ gudo yi ji ɖo mawu mitɔn mɛ nunywɛxo
enyi mi nɔ zan hwenu xa nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo ɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ mi kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo
zinzan ɖagbe togun jehovah tɔn tɔn wɛ sixu dɔn mi wa sinsɛn biblo nugbo ɔ mɛ mi bɔ mi jɛ mawu ji kpo awajijɛ kpo
enyi e dɔn to nu nɔvi sunnu mitɔn ɖe alo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn ɖe ɖo e setonu nu mawu tɔn lɛ a wu ɔ etɛ sixu jɛ
enɛ sixu tuntun awakanmɛ nu mɛɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ bɔ hɛn awajijɛ yetɔn bu
agbaza sin nu lɛ lɔ sixu bɔ mi hɛn awajijɛ mitɔn bu
gbɔn nɛ e
sataan tɔn nɔ tɛnkpɔn blo bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo xɔ nu ɖeɖee sin hudo mi ɖo tawun a lɛ e
enɛ wu ɔ mi sixu flin xogbe jezu tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛɖe sixu gan we a ɖo e wan nu mɛ ɖe yi wan nu mɛ ɖe abi e setonu nu mɛ ɖe vɛtoli nu mɛ ɖe
matie mi sixu jehovah kpo awajijɛ kpo tɛnkpɔn ɖo nu elɔ tɔn jlo mi lɛ e bi ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ a
jehovah sinsɛn nyi agban nɔ kpɛn mɛ yi wan lɛ e a
jaan flin ɖɔ jezu ɖɔ wa mɛ agban kpinkpɛn hinhɛn cikɔ lɛ e bi bonu gbɔjɛ
yi nukplɔnmɛ lɛ se bonu mitɔn lɛ vo ɖo mɛ fifa wɛ nyi nyi
ðo nukplɔnmɛ lɛ vɛwu a su lɛ nyi a
matie klisanwun nugbo nyinyi nɔ fa kɔ nu mi nɔ mi awajijɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖeɖee wu mi ɖo awajijɛ ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ lɛ e
nu mi atɔn xabakuku
mi nɔ mitɔn mawu awajijɛnɔ ɔ
timɔtee nw mi tuun ɖɔ mi ɖu mitɔn sin axɔ do ɔ
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi kpo ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo enyi mi blo baptɛm e ɔ xwe jɛ do gbɔn ɖebu ɔ nɛ
hector lɔn nu nuɖe xo awajijɛ tɔn yi a gbɔn nukun ɖiɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ kpo kan ɖiɖo do nu wu kpo gblamɛ
mi ɖɔ xo do hector ɖo jehovah wɛ nyi sin xwe ɖie e ji
e kpo co e kpo ɖo jehovah sinsɛn sin vivi ɖu wɛ
ðɛhan hector nɔ sixu wa nu ɖe ɖo mawu tɔn mɛ a ɖo asi tɔn sin azɔn wu e hɛn awajijɛ tɔn bu a
e ɖɔ e blawu nu mi ɖɔ asi sin lanmɛ ɖo nylanyla wɛ bɔ nukun kpikpe do wutu tɔn lɛ vɛwu lɔn bonu nu enɛ xo awajijɛ ɖo mawu nugbo ɔ sinsɛn mɛ yi a
nɔ do gan nɔ ɖokan do ɔ wu nɔ tɛnkpɔn bɔ nukun ɖiɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ nɔ nɔ tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo linlin mɛ bonu wa hɛn awajijɛ bu o
jehovah sɔnu nu vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn ɔ bonu mi do sixu nɔ ɖo awajijɛ mɛ
nugbo ɔ mawu yi wan nu viɖokponɔ tɔn jo bonu mɛ ɖi nu lɛ ɖebu dɔn o loɔ bi mɔ mavɔmavɔ
jaan enyi mi ɖe nuɖiɖi ɖo nunina wanyiyi tɔn mawu tɔn nyi gbɛxixɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ e sixu hwɛ mitɔn lɛ kɛ mi mi sixu mɔ mavɔmavɔ
hwɛjijɔ ɖagbe ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi nugbo bɔ nu do su nukun mitɔn mɛ
gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e mi bɔ mi jehovah ɖo awajijɛ mɛ
nɔvi sunnu ɖe nɔ nyi jesus nɔ nɔ mexique e ɖɔ nyi kannumɔ nu
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nɔ ɖo wa wɛ magbokɔ nu ganxixo gege azan ɖe jɛ ɖe gudo enyi e tlɛ ɖo dandan a ɔ nɛ
nɔ blo do mɔ akwɛ kpowun wɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ wa nu do jehovah kpo e vi tɔn lɛ gbɔn e kpo wu
ɖo jlo tawun ɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ze jo nu jehovah bɔ ee nu ɔ nu xwe gudo e ɔ wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ jo do hwebinu tɔn jɛji
jesus jehovah sinsɛn kpo awajijɛ kpo gbɔn e nɛ
mi nɔ zan ɖe nɔ mi awajijɛ
flin towe ci cobɔ wa tuun jehovah e a
pɔlu flin klisanwun ɖo hlɔma lɛ e ɖɔ nyi kannumɔ nu hwɛhuhu huzu kannumɔ nu hwɛjijɔ
ðo ɖo zan wɛ wutu ɔ sixu ɖo mavɔmavɔ nukun
hlɔmanu lɛ mi lɔ nɔ xwedo nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ enɛ wu ɔ mi gan sin nublanɔwu kwijikwiji zinzan kpo adakaxixo nɔ dɔn wa lɛ e kpo si
enɛ nɔ bɔ e nɔ ɖo awajijɛ
gbɛzan sin xwe ɖagbe hugan lɛ wɛ nyi ɖeɖee zan ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ e jaime
mi ɖɔ xo do jaime ji
e ɖi nu ɖɔ mawu tiin a nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu lɛ jɔ nu yeɖee nyi
jaime jɛ kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ yi ji bɔ nɔ yi wan nu mɛ gbɔn ɖo finɛ e ɛ jo gbɛzinzan tɔn xoxo ɔ do
do wa ɔ e ɖo byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e ɛ bonu e ɖi nu
jaime ɖɔ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe ɔ mɔ ɖɔ wanyiyinɔ ɖe tiin nyi mawu
tonusise nu nugbododo jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ cyɔn alɔ ji
enyi huzu wɛ a ɔ e sixu hu mi e hu ɖo kwinnyinyi mɛ nɔ e ɖe lɛ gbɔn e
gbɛzan sin xwe ɖagbe hugan lɛ wɛ nyi ɖeɖee zan ɖo jehovah sinsɛn mɛ e
flin ɖɔ mi ɖo jlo mawu tɔn wa wɛ ɖo mavɔmavɔ
galatinu lɛ kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ nu mi dɛ wa syɛnsyɛn ba do sɔnu nu jijɔ ɖeɖee sin hudo mi ɖo ba xo ɖaxo ɔ zlɛ kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo lɛ e jaki
mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah ajɔ dɛ mi dɛ ɖo nu e tɔn mi ɖo e tuun mi wa e kpo wanyiyi mi e kpo nyikɔ tɔn kpo e
enyi mi kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo awajijɛ kpo ɔ mi ci davidi ɖɔhun e ɖɔ ayi ɖo mawu mavɔmavɔ ji hwebinu
mawu mavɔmavɔ ɖo xa mi nuɖe nɔ gba ayi do nu mi a
enɛ ɔ wu wɛ xomɛ hun mi ɖo awa jɛ wɛ bɔ ayi jɛ ayi ðɛhan
mawu mavɔmavɔ blo bonu alɛ nyi kpo hwi kpo ɔ mi nɔ gbeji sɔyi bonu vi mi ji lɛ lɔ nɔ gbeji samuwɛli
axɔsu sawulu vi jonataan nɔ gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn
mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu mawu hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ e kun jɛxa bonu mi si mɛ ɖo acɛ kpa do mi wɛ e e gbɔn
enyi mi mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ kun mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ mitɔn mɛ o alo wa nu xa mi ɖo ali agɔ ɔ mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn
etɛwu jonataan zun xa davidi e nyi gbejininɔ sin nukunɖeji ɖe
nyavi davidi ɖo akɔnkpinkpan gbɔn e ɖo jiwu nu jonataan
davidi hu goliyati nyi nya jinganjingan ɖe e enɛ ɔ sin wa nu jonataan sin izlayɛli xɔsu sawulu
ɖɔ emi nɔ gbeji nu emiɖee hwebinu
jehovah jonataan bonu e wa jɛ izlayɛli sin axɔsu ɖo zinkpo ji e tɛnmɛ a davidi co e nɔ gbeji nu davidi
hwenu sawulu ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ hu davidi e ɔ jonataan jɛ mɛ ɖo tɔn wu
jonataan tuun ɖɔ davidi ɖo gbetotlo holɛca tɔn mɛ enɛ wu ɔ e yi akɔnkpinkpan ɛ ɖɔ e kpo ɖo jiɖiɖe ɖo do jehovah wu wɛ
jonataan ɖɔ nu davidi ɖɔ ɖi xɛsi nu nu ɖebu o ɖo sawulu sixu wli a
ɖu axɔsu ɖo izlayɛli bɔ nyɛ bɔ do wu nɔ glɔ towe samuwɛli
etɛ ɖo taji nu jonataan hu gbejininɔ nu davidi
hwɛhwɛ ɔ ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ gbeji lɛ e sin nu nɔ nukun mitɔn mɛ
gbeji jonataan nɔ nu davidi e kɛɖɛ wu wɛ nu tɔn nukun mitɔn mɛ a
eo gbejininɔ nu mawu wɛ nyi nu taji hugan ɖo gbɛzan jonataan tɔn mɛ
e ɖɔ ɔ hwɛjijɔ wu e nɔ gbeji nu davidi hwan wu a e nɛ co davidi wɛ e axɔsu jo eyɛ do
jonataan tlɛ davidi bonu e ɖeji do jehovah wu
mɛ we lɛ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah nɔ gbeji nu yeɖee
ɖe akpa do nu yeɖee e mawu mavɔmavɔ blo bonu alɛ nyi kpo hwi kpo ɔ mi nɔ gbeji sɔyi bonu vi mi ji lɛ lɔ nɔ gbeji samuwɛli
etɛ bɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ nugbo nugbo
mi lɔ ɖo nɔ gbeji nu xwedo mitɔn mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e kpo
tɛsalonikinu lɛ ee ɖo taji hugan e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ gbeji nu jehovah
e wɛ nyi mɛ mi e
enyi mi nɔ gbeji ɔ mi nɔ ɖo awajijɛ nugbo nugbo
mi tuun ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ gbeji nu mawu enyi e tlɛ nyi ɖo hwenu vɛwu lɛ mɛ ɔ nɛ
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do jonataan tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah ɖo ali ɛnɛ elɔ lɛ e ji hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ e kun jɛxa bonu mi si mɛ ɖo acɛ kpa do mi wɛ e e hwenu mi ɖo mɛ mi ɖo nɔ gbeji e wɛ e hwenu ɖe mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ mitɔn mɛ a alo wa nu xa mi ɖo ali agɔ e kpo hwenu mi mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu bɔ mi ɖe akpa ɖe e kpo
etɛwu e vɛwu nu togun izlayɛli tɔn bonu e nɔ gbeji nu mawu hwenu sawulu nyi axɔsu e
jonataan kpo togun izlayɛli tɔn kpo ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn mɛ
axɔsu sawulu jonataan sin tlito nu jehovah bɔ e ɛ
samuwɛli e ɖo co mawu jo sawulu do kpo ɖo axɔsu ɖu wɛ nu xwe gege
enɛ wu ɔ e vɛwu nu togun ɔ bɔ e nɔ gbeji nu mawu hwenu axɔsu e ɖo axɔsuzinkpo mawu mavɔmavɔ tɔn ji e ɖo nu nyanya wa wɛ ɖesu e
etɛ ɖɔ jonataan nɔ gbeji nu jehovah
jonataan nɔ gbeji nu jehovah
flin nu jonataan ɖɔ nu sawulu hwenu e jɛ to tli nu mawu ji gudo tlolo e
samuwɛli ðo hwenɛnu ɔ ahwangɔnu lɛ tɔn ɖaxo ɖe hɛn ahwankɛkɛvi wa ahwan izlayɛli
jɛn sawulu ɖo bɔ e kpo jonataan kpo kɛɖɛ jɛn ɖo ahwanfunnu
hu jonataan a
samuwɛli jonataan ɖɔ nu ɖevo ɖɔ mi kpo mi kpo ɔ jehovah sixu hwlɛn mi gan nu ɖebu glo e a
jonataan ɖo nuɖiɖi nu jehovah bɔ e do
jehovah blo bɔ ayikungban ɖe danwu bɔ hu lɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ jɛ yeɖee hu ji bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji samuwɛli
jonataan wa nu xa tɔn gbɔn
sawulu kpo ɖo to tli nu jehovah wɛ co jonataan kpo ɖo to nu se nu tɔn wɛ e blo gbɔn e
ði ɔ ahwan ɖo do jɛhun do togun jehovah tɔn tamɛ samuwɛli
mi nɔ nɔ gbeji nu mawu hwenu mi nɔ ɖo sisi nu mɛ ɖeɖee si acɛkpikpa ɖe lɛ e gbɔn
jonataan ɖɔhun ɔ mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn tonusise nu acɛkpikpa to tɔn lɛ gblamɛ ɖo fi ɖebu mi nɔ nɔ e e blo gbɔn e
nu wu mi ɖo nɔ ɖo sisi nu gan ɖe enyi e tlɛ nyi a bɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ e kun jɛxa ɖɔ mi si o e nɛ
nugbo ɔ mi ɖo ɖo sisi nu mɛ ɖeɖee jehovah acɛkpikpa mɛ lɛ e bi kɔlɛntinu lɛ eblee lɛ
mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ wa nu xa asu mitɔn alo asi mitɔn kpo sisi kpo enyi e tlɛ nɔ jehovah a ɔ nɛ akpaxwe ɔ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖɔ xo xa ɛ o alo nɔ ɖɔ danu ɖo e nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ wutu
e tlɛ nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɛ yi vi lɛ sin asi tɔn
olga ze nu nyanya do su nu nyanya xɔ a
e nɔ wa nu wu e kpe e bi do sixu nyi asi ɖagbe ɖe
e nɔ ɖa nu nɔ nya avɔ tɔn lɛ nɔ kpe nukun do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu ɖo xwedo tɔn mɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ nu e kpewu ɔ e nɔ kpla ɛ bɔ nɔ yi asu tɔn sin mɛ lɛ kpo tɔn lɛ kpo
ði ɔ hwenu asu tɔn jlo yi ɖi tɔn ɖo toxo ɖevo mɛ e ɔ e sɔnu nu nu sin hudo ɖo ɖo tomɛyiyi ɔ hwenu lɛ e bi
ðo cyɔɖiɖi ɔ hwenu ɔ e nɔte ɛ ɖo amisaxwe ɔ nukɔn
xwe gege gudo ɔ olga sin asu nɔ wa nu xa ɛ gbɔn e ɖo e ɖo suulu tawun nɔ si hwebinu wutu
din ɔ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ ɖɔ e yi kple lɛ nɔ ɛ yi lɔ
e lɔ tlɛ nɔ nɔ kple lɛ tɛnmɛ hweɖelɛnu
jonataan tuun mɛ e ɖo nɔ gbeji e gbɔn
hwenu sawulu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi hu davidi e ɔ jonataan ɖo do nu syɛnsyɛn ɖe ji
e jlo nɔ gbeji nu tɔn e jlo nɔ gbeji nu davidi
e nu davidi ɖɔ e hɔn hwla enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu wu sawulu ɖo jo davidi do nyi e nu sawulu xa samuwɛli
wanyiyi mi ɖo nu mawu e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔ gbeji gbɔn
alice nyi nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe ɖo australie e ɖo mɛ e ɖo nɔ gbeji e
hwenu e ɖo biblu wɛ e ɔ e ɖɔ nu wɛ e ɖe e nu mɛ tɔn lɛ
e ɖɔ nu wu e jlo ɖu nataaxwe xa a e nu tinmɛ nu wu wɛ e nu
ðo ɔ e nu xwedo tɔn sin mɛ lɛ bɔ ɖo nukɔnmɛ ɔ xomɛ sin tawun do wutu tɔn
ɖɔ alice kun nɔ keya nu emi ɖebu o
enɛ gudo ɔ nɔ tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun jlo mɔ ɛ ɖe gbeɖe o
alice ɖɔ e nu mi bɔ flu bi ɖo yi wan nu mɛ lɛ tawun
e ɖo co kudeji ɖɔ jehovah kpo vi tɔn kpo wɛ nɔ tɛn nukɔntɔn mɛ ɖo ayi mɛ bɔ blo baptɛm ɖo bɔ e ji matie
mi ɖo lɔn nu gbejininɔ nu nu ɖebu ɖi lɔnyiji lɔnfɔnkan sin ɖe wemaxɔmɛ ɖe alo to ɖe ɖo taji hu gbejininɔ mitɔn nu jehovah a
ɖo e nɔ enɛ ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ wutu ɔ e nɔ mɔ hwenu gege do yi kunnuɖegbe alo do yi kple lɛ a
ɖɔ ɖɔ gbejininɔ nu wemaxɔmɛ ɔ hu mawu wa nyi nu taji nu emi
enɛ wu ɔ e wa gbeta ɔ kɔn ɖɔ emi jo ayihun enɛ dida nu wemaxɔmɛ emitɔn do matie
gbejininɔ nu mawu sixu mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa tagba mi nɔ kpe ɖo xwedo mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
hweɖelɛnu ɔ gbejininɔ nu xwedo mitɔn sin vovo ɖo hwe ɖokpo ɔ sixu vɛwu
nɔ kpo asi kpo nɔ mɔ yeɖee gbɔ a
e lɛ ɖɔ jlo ɖo mɛ ɖe si gble ɖo mɛ ɖe si a
tamɛ do nu biblu ɖɔ e ji mɔ ɖɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ ɔ emi ɖo ɖo asi emitɔn si nɔ gbeji
enɛ wu ɔ e mɔ wlɛnwin asi tɔn nukunmɛ e ɖe
enɛ gudo ɔ e tinmɛ nu wu e ɖo xomɛ do nɔ tɔn wu e nu asi tɔn
tinmɛ nu wu e ɖo ɖo sisi nu asi tɔn e nu nɔ tɔn xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
sawulu wa nu xa jonataan ɖo ali agɔ gbɔn
mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu jehovah hwenu nɔvi sunnu ɖe wa nu xa mi ɖo ali agɔ e
mawu wɛ axɔsu sawulu co e wa nu xa vi eɖesunɔ tɔn ɖo ali agɔ
e tuun nu wu jonataan yi wan nu davidi e a
enɛ wu ɔ hwenu jonataan jlo davidi e ɔ xomɛ sin sawulu ɖesu do winnya vi tɔn ɖo togun mɛ
jonataan kpo ɖo sisi ɖo nu tɔn wɛ
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ e nɔ gbeji nu jehovah kpo davidi mawu nyi axɔsu izlayɛli tɔn bɔ e kpo samuwɛli
enyi nɔvi sunnu ɖe wa nu xa mi ɖo ali agɔ ɔ mi ɖo wa nu gbɔn
ðo agun mitɔn lɛ mɛ ɖo egbe ɔ nɔvi sunnu lɛ nɔ tɛnkpɔn wa nu jlɔjlɔ xa mɛ bi
wɛ nu
enɛ wu ɔ e sixu wa jɛ bɔ gbɔ nukunnu mɔ jɛ nu wu mi wa nuɖe e mɛ
samuwɛli enɛ wu ɔ enyi e mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mi wa e mɛ ɖo agɔ hun nu mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah
ninɔmɛ tɛ lɛ mɛ mi ɖo nɔ gbeji nu mawu ɖe nyi cejɛnnabinɔ a
sawulu ɖɔ jonataan huzu axɔsu bɔ do emi wu e e jlo ɖɔ e nyi davidi a
samuwɛli jonataan yi wan nu jehovah nɔ gbeji
enɛ wu ɔ jonataan nyi cejɛnnabinɔ a e wa ɔ e huzu davidi sin ɖe akpa e do e
nugbo ɔ mɛɖebu yi wan nu jehovah nɔ nɔ gbeji e do akpa ɖe ɔ e nɔ ɖe nu ɖebu gbo e ɔ e nɔ ɖe
ðɛhan ðo mi ɖo gbeji nu mawu wutu ɔ mi ɖe akpa mitɔn lɛ
ði ɔ enyi mi wa gbeta ɖe kɔn xa mɛɖe ɖo ajɔ linu ɔ mi ɖo wa nu sin gbeta kɔn mi wa e enyi e tlɛ wa vɛwu ɔ nɛ
enyi mi ɖo tagba mɔ wɛ ɖo alɔwliwli mitɔn mɛ ɔ mi wanyiyi mi ɖo nu jehovah e gbɔn gbejininɔ nu asu mitɔn alo asi mitɔn gblamɛ xa malacii
enyi mi wa gbeta ɖe kɔn xa mɛɖe ɖo ajɔ linu ɔ mi wa nu sin gbeta kɔn mi wa e ɖo mi ɖo gbeji nu mawu wutu akpaxwe ɔ
nukplɔnkplɔn elɔ gbɔn
jonataan ɖɔhun ɔ mi jlo nɔ gbeji nu mawu enyi e tlɛ nyi ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ ɔ nɛ
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi nɔ gbeji nu nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo hwenu do xomɛsin nu mi e
enɛ ɔ mi hɛn xomɛ hun jehovah nu wu mi nɔ ɖo awajijɛ hugan e nɛ
nunywɛxo mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ e wa nu nyi ɖagbe hugan nu mi e nu mi hwebinu kpe nukun do mi wu
ðo xota bɔ e mɛ ɔ mi mɔ nu kpo kpo nɔ ɖo davidi sin hwenu e ɖe lɛ tɔn sixu mi lɛ e
akpaxwe ɔ e ɖyɔ nyikɔ ɖe lɛ
mi nɔ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah mi yi wan nu jehovah nɔ setonu hwebinu
ðo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ tamɛ do nu e jlo ɖɔ mi wa lɛ e ji bɔ ɖo enɛ gudo ɔ mi nɔ setonu ɖo mi yi wan hu mɛ ɖevo alo nu ɖevo ɖebu
acɛkpikpa ɖo to ɔ lɛ acɛkpikpa kpo gan kpo ɖeɖee jehovah yi gbe bɔ do mi lɛ e wɛ
etɛ wɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ jlo ɖɔ wa
mi ɖu gbejininɔ sin axɔ do
etɛwu jonataan wa nu xa davidi gbɔn e gbɔn vo bi sese nu wa xa ɛ e gbɔn
jijɔ tɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu mawu gbɔn e
davidi ɖɔ emi ɖo gbeji nu mawu gbɔn
sawulu kpo tɔn kpo ɖo davidi wɛ ɖo gbetotlo judaa tɔn mɛ hu
bi enɛ wu ɔ davidi kpo abicayi kpo zɔn kɛɖɛɛkɛɖɛɛ gbɔn lɛ vlamɛ yi sawulu kpa
e ɖɔ nu abicayi ɖɔ hu o
enyi mi hu axɔsu mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ gɔn to dɔn nu mi wɛ vɛdo a
enɛ gudo ɔ davidi ɖɔ mawu lɔn nu hu mɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ axɔsu e o samuwɛli
davidi tuun nu e ɖo wa ba nɔ gbeji nu jehovah e
e tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo si sawulu tlɛ nu jɛ wu gblegble e ji lɔ a
ðo mawu wɛ sawulu nyi izlayɛli xɔsu
egbe ɔ jehovah nɔ jlo ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ bi nɔ gbeji nu emi ɖo sisi nu mɛ ɖeɖee e yi gbe bɔ acɛkpikpa ɖo si lɛ e e nyi gbɔn ɖo hwexonu e ɖɔhun xa ðɛhan
abicayi nɔ gbeji nu davidi gbɔn
abicayi ɖo sisi nu davidi ɖo e tuun ɖɔ mawu wɛ ɛ axɔsu wutu
e ɖo co ee davidi nyi axɔsu gudo e ɔ e hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ
e ɖoxo xa ulii sin asi bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu jowabu ɖɔ e blo bonu ulii ku ɖo ahwan ɔ hwenu
ɔ abicayi nyi ahwangɔnu ɖe sin gan jlo e ɔ e zan acɛ enɛ do eɖee axɔsu e wa gbeɖe a
davidi nyi ɖe ɖo gbejininɔ nu mawu linu gbɔn
ɖevo tɛ lɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do
davidi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah ɖo gbɛzan tɔn bi mɛ
hwenu e ɖo dɔnkpɛ mɛ e ɔ e hu nya jinganjingan goliyati ɖo jehovah kpo izlayɛli vi lɛ kpo zun wɛ e
samuwɛli hwenu davidi nyi axɔsu e ɔ gbeyiɖɔ jehovah tɔn nataan nu ɖo hwɛ ɖeɖee e hu lɛ e wu
tlolo jɛn davidi yi gbe ɖɔ emi hu hwɛ lɛkɔ sin hwɛ tɔn lɛ gudo
samuwɛli nukɔnmɛ hwenu davidi kpo e ɔ e nu xɔ akwɛ gege bonu e do gba tɛmpli jehovah tɔn
davidi wa nu syɛnsyɛn lɛ nyi do co e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ e kun gɔn gbeji nɔ nu mawu gbeɖe o
ðɛhan ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do davidi kpo mɛ nɔ hwenɛnu lɛ e kpo tɔn ɖe lɛ ji mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu jehovah hu mɛ ɖevo ɖebu gbɔn e
mi ɖɔ xo do jijɔ ɖevo ɖeɖee mi bɔ mi blo lɛ e ji
etɛ nuwanyido abicayi tɔn sixu mi
gbeji nɔ nu davidi wɛ abicayi ɖe jlo hu sawulu
samuwɛli nu enɛ nu taji ɖe mi enyi mi jlo mɛ mi nɔ gbeji do nukɔn e hun mi tamɛ do nugbododo biblu tɔn ɖeɖee sixu mi ɖo ninɔmɛ mitɔn mɛ e ji
enyi nu taji hugan ɖɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah hu mɛ ɖevo ɖebu
e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu xwedo mitɔn kpo mitɔn lɛ kpo co etɛwu mi ɖo miɖee
e sɔgbe ɖɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu mɛ mi yi wan e ɖe ɖi ɖe alo xwedo mɛ tɔn sin ɖe
ɖo mi nyi wutu ɔ nu nɔ ci gbɔn nu mi e sixu flu mi
jelemii enɛ wu ɔ enyi mɛ mi yi wan e ɖe wa nu nyanya jo nugbo ɔ do ɔ mi ɖo flin ɖɔ e nyi nu taji hugan ɖɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah hu mɛ ɖevo ɖebu xa matie
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nɔ gbeji nu mawu ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe mɛ gbɔn
enyi e ɖe xwedo towe sin mɛɖe sin agun mɛ ɔ sixu jehovah ɖɔ emi ɖo gbeji
ði ɔ anne sin nɔ e ɖe sin agun mɛ e ylɔ anne gbe ɖokpo ɖo alokan ji ɖɔ emi jlo jonɔ ɛ
tinmɛ ɖo vivɔnu e
anne sin nɔ ɖɔ emi kun vo ɖebu o ɖo xwedo emitɔn ɖɔ emi kun ɖɔ xo kpo emi kpo o wutu
nu enɛ ku wu nu anne tawun bɔ e ɖɔ emi xosin gbɔn wema wlan mɛ ɖe gblamɛ
cobonu e wlan wema ɔ e to tamɛ do nugbododo biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ ji
kɔlɛntinu lɛ jaan enɛ gudo ɔ e tinmɛ kpo kpo do wema ɔ mɛ ɖɔ nɔ emitɔn wɛ jo xwedo ɔ do hwenu e hu hwɛ kɔ sin hwɛ tɔn gudo e
anne ɖɔ nu nɔ tɔn ɖɔ ali ɖokpo e sixu ɖo awajijɛ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e lɛkɔ wa jehovah jaki
jijɔ tɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu mawu
mawu davidi hwenu tɔn lɛ nyi
mi jijɔ enɛ lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn e
etɛwu jlo hu davidi
sawulu vi jonataan kpo ahwangan izlayɛli tɔn kpo mɔ hwenu davidi goliyati wa jo nu axɔsu sawulu e
jonataan huzu davidi nɔ gbeji
samuwɛli wa a
e wa ɔ e tlɛ sawulu ɖo nukɔnmɛ bonu e hu davidi
samuwɛli ðɛhan jonataan kpo kpo bi wɛ tuun ɖɔ mawu jlo ɖɔ davidi nyi axɔsu bɔ do sawulu wu e
ee sawulu ku gudo e ɔ nɔ gudo nu davidi a
e wa ɔ e tɛnkpɔn sawulu vi icibɔcɛti axɔsu
nukɔnmɛ ɔ sixu jlo eɖee axɔsu boya enɛ wu wɛ e ɖoxo xa axɔsu sawulu sin asi lɛ ɖokpo
samuwɛli etɛwu jonataan kpo kpo ɖo linlin vovo sese do davidi wu
ðo jonataan nɔ gbeji nu jehovah eɖee hwe wutu wɛ ɖo jijɔ enɛ lɛ a
etɛwu abusalɔmu nɔ gbeji nu mawu a
abusalɔmu axɔsu davidi vi nɔ gbeji nu mawu a ɖo e eɖee hwe a wutu
e jlo nyi axɔsu enɛ wu ɔ e kɛkɛvi ɖokpo xo kple xo kanɖe wo kple bɔ nɔ ɖo wezun ji ɖo kɛkɛvi ɔ nukɔn
samuwɛli e blo bɔ izlayɛli vi gege nɔ gbeji
e tlɛ jlo hu tɔn e tuun fɛɛ ɖɔ jehovah ɛ izlayɛli xɔsu samuwɛli
mi sixu ɖu biblu tɔn ɖeɖee kunkpla abusalɔmu kpo baaluki kpo e sin le gbɔn
enyi mɛɖe nɔ eɖee hwe a nɔ jlo gan tɛn ɔ e vɛwu nɔ gbeji nu mawu
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi yi wan nu jehovah jlo nyi cejɛnnabinɔ nyi mɛ nyanya kpo abusalɔmu kpo ɖɔhun a
mi ɖo miɖee jɛ akwɛ sin do ji alo jɛ bɔ mi mɔ miɖee e ji a
enɛ hɛn mi kpo jehovah kpo nyi e gble
nu taan ɖe ɔ jelemii tɔn baaluki jlo nu e ɖo a e sin enɛ wu bɔ e ɖo awajijɛ ɖo mawu mɛ a
enɛ gudo ɔ jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo xɔ gba ɔ gba wɛ ɖo atin ɔ hɔn wɛ
ɖo blo wɛ gbɔn to ɔ bi mɛ bɔ hwɛ ɔ ɖo do wɛ
hwiɖee o
jelemii baaluki ɖoto jehovah
mi lɔ ɖo ɖoto e ɖo e su nyanya elɔ do ɖo malin malin mɛ
enyi ɖɔ nu nɔvi ɖe ɖɔ e yi ɖo mɛxo lɛ hun ɖɔ emi xomɛ do wutu tɔn nɔ gbeji nu jehovah nɛ
nu wu mi sixu nyi cejɛnnabinɔ nɔ gbeji nu mawu a e
daniel nyi nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖo mexique e ɖo mɛ e nɔ gbeji e
e jlo ɖyɔvi nɔ jehovah a e ɖe
e wa mɔ ɖɔ cejɛnnabi wɛ kpowun bɔ emi ɖo nu jlo emi e wa wɛ
e ɖo gbeji nɔ nu jehovah wɛ a ɖo eɖee hwe
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ vi ɔ sin xo nu mɛxo agun tɔn mɔ nu e ɖe
daniel tinmɛ ɖɔ e mi ɖɔ enyi nɔ gbeji nu mawu ɔ nyi ɖo ɖo nu wlanwlan vi ɔ
ee xoɖɛ gege nu hwenu gege gudo e ɔ nu wa e nɛ
malin malin mɛ ɔ awajijɛ ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ e jɛji
din ɔ daniel nyɔnu yi wan nu jehovah e nyi lɛdo tɔn
enyi mɔ ɖɔ towe hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe ɔ ɖɔ tɛnkpɔn bɔ mɛxo lɛ ɛ a
nataan nɔ gbeji nu mawu kpo davidi kpo bi hwenu davidi hu hwɛ e gbɔn
enyi mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah ɔ mi sixu nɔ gbeji nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo ali ɖagbe hugan ɔ
gbeyiɖɔ nataan nɔ gbeji nu jehovah nɔ gbeji nu davidi
ee davidi yi mɛsi hu mɛ ɔ sin asu gudo e ɔ jehovah nataan do davidi bonu e ɖe e ji
nataan setonu nu jehovah
e wa nu kpo nunywɛ kpo ɖɔ xo nu davidi kpo kpo
e jlo davidi bɔ e mɔ hwɛ e hu lɛ e syɛn sɔ e
enɛ wu ɔ e kpi nya dɔkunnɔ ɖe sin lɛngbɔvi ɖokpo nya wamamɔnɔ ɖe ɖo e
ee davidi se e ɔ xomɛsin ɖesu do nu nya dɔkunnɔ ɔ wa e wu
enɛ gudo ɔ nataan ɖɔ hwi wɛ nyi nya xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe e
davidi mɔ ɖɔ emi hu hwɛ do jehovah samuwɛli
sixu nɔ gbeji nu jehovah kpo towe alo hɛnnumɔ towe kpo gbɔn
hwi lɔ sixu nɔ gbeji nu jehovah do nukɔn nɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn nuwiwa kpo kpo gblamɛ
ði ɔ sixu ɖo kunnuɖenu ɖɔ nɔvi ɖe hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe e
sixu jlo nɔ gbeji ɖo taji ɔ enyi mɛ ɔ nyi ɖe alo xwedo towe sin ɖe ɔ nɛ
tuun ɖɔ e ɖo taji ɖɔ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah hugan
enɛ wu ɔ setonu nu jehovah nataan ɖɔhun wa nu xa nɔvi ɔ kpo kpo
ðɔ ɖɔ e ɖo byɔ mɛxo lɛ tɔn le e ɖo yawu ɖɔ nu
enyi e wa a ɔ hwiɖesu ɖo yi ɖɔ nu mɛxo lɛ
wiwa ɖɔ ɖo gbeji nu jehovah
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ xomɛ do nɔvi ɔ wu ɖo mɛxo lɛ sixu ɛ ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe xa jehovah
ɖe e ji kpo kpo xa levii lɛ galatinu lɛ
etɛwu hucayi ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn do nɔ gbeji nu mawu
hucayi nyi ɖokpo ɖo axɔsu davidi tɔn lɛ mɛ
hwenu togun ɔ jlo abusalɔmu axɔsu e ɔ hucayi ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn do nɔ gbeji nu davidi kpo mawu kpo
e tuun ɖɔ abusalɔmu kpo tɔn lɛ kpo wa jeluzalɛmu bɔ davidi hɔn
samuwɛli etɛ hucayi wa
e jo davidi do nɔ gudo nu abusalɔmu wɛ a
davidi kpo bɔ mɛ gege jlo hu co hucayi nɔ gbeji ɖo jehovah wɛ davidi axɔsu wutu
enɛ wu ɔ hucayi yi kpe davidi ɖo olivutinso ɔ ji samuwɛli
hucayi tɔn setonu nu davidi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah
davidi xoɖɛ ɖɔ jehovah hucayi nu jɛ e nɛ
abusalɔmu ɖoto hucayi e ɖoto axitofɛli a samuwɛli
etɛwu mi ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn do nɔ gbeji
mi ɖo hudo akɔnkpinkpan tɔn nɔ gbeji nu jehovah setonu nyi nu xwedo mitɔn sin mɛ lɛ mitɔn lɛ kpo acɛkpikpa lɛ kpo byɔ mi lɛ e wɛ mi wa a
e nɔ setonu nu nɔ nɔ gbeji nu e nyi e ɖo wa wu wɛ a wan e yi nu e wɛ
hwenu e jɛ nu kpo jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ji e ɔ tɔn lɛ jlo ɖɔ e ɖo
enɛ blawu nɔ vɛwu tawun do ɖɔ nu ɖɔ emi xwe kple
ɖɔ sin xomɛ tawun nu xwe gege do nu mi ɖɔ nyi nɔ wa emi ɖe o
xoɖɛ byɔ akɔnkpinkpan do zunfan nu ji do e
din ɔ linlin yetɔn ɖyɔ kpɛɖe bɔ sixu hwɛhwɛ xa nunywɛxo
ɖu le nukplɔnkplɔn elɔ tɔn gbɔn
mi jlo ɖi kpo abusalɔmu kpo a ɖo nɔ gbeji a
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mi nyi nɔ wa nu nyi do
nu mi jehovah ɖɔ gbejininɔ wɛ nyi nu taji hugan ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ
enyi mi nyi kpo kpo ɔ mi ayi ɖo nu jlo mi lɛ e ji a ee jlo jehovah lɛ e ji wɛ mi ɖo
enyi mi nyi kpo kpo ɔ mi tɛnkpɔn mɛ ɖevo lɛ wa nu xa jehovah jlo ɖɔ mi wa gbɔn e
enyi mi nyi nyi ɔ mi setonu nu jehovah hwenu e tlɛ vɛwu e kpo hwenu xɛsi ɖi mi e kpo
etɛ nɔ nyi tinmɛ e zin tɔn daniyɛli ɖe jijɔ enɛ gbɔn
sixu ɖɔ gbeta kɔn wa blo baptɛm e gosin ayi towe mɛ gbɔn
etɛ nɔ nyi mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu e ca kan xa baptɛm gbɔn
e wlan xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo nu mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee jlo blo baptɛm lɛ e
etɛ nɔ do xomɛhunhun nu togun mawu tɔn egbe
klisanwun lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo sixu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bonu tuun tinmɛ baptɛm tɔn gbɔn
xo enɛ lɛ ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe wɛ ɖɔ nu christopher ɖo xwe e
mi nɔ mɔ bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya mɔkpan nɔ blo baptɛm gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ xwewu xwewu
nu enɛ nɔ hun xomɛ nu mi tawun
klisanwun lɛ kpo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ nu enɛ ji mɛ winnyawinnya mɔhun lɛ do e nyi jlo yeɖesunɔ tɔn do ɖɔ do ɖo ayi yetɔn mɛ a ji
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu kpo baptɛm kpo nyi gbɛzan ɖe tɔn nu klisanwun ɖe
gbɛzan enɛ bɔ mɛ ɔ mɔ nyɔna jehovah tɔn gege sataan jɛ gudo tɔn
nunywɛxo nu wu klisanwun lɛ ɖo zan hwenu do nu ahwanvu klisu tɔn nyinyi byɔ lɛ e vi yetɔn lɛ e nɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee yetɔn lɛ nyi klisanwun a lɛ e ɔ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ kpo kpo bɔ tuun tinmɛ mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu kpo baptɛm kpo tɔn
xa luki
matie etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bɔ kudeji ba jehovah sɔyi
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe wɛ nu bɔ jlo blo baptɛm a
enyi wɛ hun e jɛ ɖɔ e kpa
wujɔmɛ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi bɔ e blo baptɛm nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ
ɔ baptɛm ɔ nuɖe wɛ bɔ klisanwun ɖe ɖo blo nyi afɔ taji ɖe bɔ e ɖo ɖe gan ɖo ɖaxo ɔ hwenu
matie baptɛm biblo towe ɖɔ ɖɔ emi jehovah sɔyi
jlo tawun ɖe akpa enɛ enɛ wu ɔ nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ bɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu baptɛm a ji
ɖie zin ganji ɖɔ ɖɔ blo baptɛm a
nyiɖesunɔ ɖo jlo wa a
tuun tinmɛ mɛɖee zize jo nu jehovah tɔn a
nu mi ɖɔ xo do nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ ji
etɛwu baptɛm nyi mɛxo lɛ kɛɖɛ sin nu a
etɛ nyi tinmɛ e zin tɔn nu klisanwun ɖe
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ nyi mɛxo lɛ e kɛɖɛ jɛn blo baptɛm alo xwe nabi ɖe jɛn e ɖo cobo blo a
mi xa ɖo nunywɛxo mɛ ɖɔ enyi vi ɖe ɖo walɔ ɖe lɛ zan wɛ ɔ e nɔ tuun vi alɔkpa e nyi e e ɖo ɖagbe zan wɛ kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ e nɔ tuun
mɛ tlɛ kpo ɖo vu sixu tuun nu nujlɔjlɔwiwa kpo mɛɖee zize jo nu ɔ nyi e kpo
enɛ wu ɔ baptɛm nyi afɔ taji ɖe sɔgbe bɔ mɛ winnyawinnya ɖɔ emi zin ze eɖee jo nu jehovah e ɖe ɖe nunywɛxo
etɛ nyi tinmɛ e zin tɔn
enyi xwe nabi e ɖo e alo e su gbɔn e wɛ nɔ dandan ɖɔ e zin a
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ mɛ zin lɛ e tuun nu ɖagbe ɖo nu nyanya mɛ gbɔn nuwiwa yetɔn lɛ gblamɛ bɔ e ma
eblee lɛ mɛ zin e nɔ tuun nu nyi nu ɖagbe e nɔ kanɖeji ɖo ayi tɔn mɛ blo
enɛ wu ɔ e vɛwu bɔ nuɖe dɔn ɛ wa nu nyanya
e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mɛɖe jɛn nɔ ɖɔ hwebinu ɖɔ e wa nu ɖagbe a
e jɛ ɖɔ e ɖo nukun ɖɔ mɛ winnyawinnya blo baptɛm e ɖe wa nu ɖagbe enyi tɔn lɛ alo mɛxo ɖevo ɖebu tlɛ ɖo finɛ a ɔ nɛ do filipunu lɛ wu
tinmɛ nu daniyɛli ɖi xwi xa hwenu e ɖo babiblɔnu e daniyɛli ɖɔ emi zin gbɔn
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe sixu ɖɔ emi zin gbɔn nugbo a
ganji tamɛ do daniyɛli tɔn ji
winnyawinnya wɛ e sixu ɖe kɛɖɛ bɔ e kpla ɛ sin tɔn lɛ yi babilɔnu
daniyɛli wa mɔ eɖee ɖo mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ setonu nu gbeɖiɖe mawu tɔn a lɛ e tɛntin ajijimɛ
nu mi ayi ɖo ninɔmɛ daniyɛli tɔn ji kpɛɖe
e tɛnmɛ bunɔ ɖe ɖo babilɔnu
e ɖo mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee e xwe sɔ bɔ nɔ axɔsu ɔ lɛ e mɛ
daniyɛli e ci ɖɔ daniyɛli mɔ tɛnmɛ e sixu mɔ gbeɖe ɖo izlayɛli a e ɖo babilɔnu ɖɔhun
daniyɛli wa nu gbɔn
e yi gbe bɔ babilɔnunu lɛ huzu alo nu nuɖiɖi tɔn wɛ a
ðebu a
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ hwenu daniyɛli ɖo babilɔnu e ɔ e tuun do ayi tɔn mɛ ɖɔ emi kun hɛn emiɖee bli o enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔ zɔ nu nu ɖebu ca kan xa sinsɛn nuvu e
daniyɛli daniyɛli tawun ɖɔ emi zin
mɛ winnyawinnya zin e nɔ wa nu mawu tɔn ɖɔhun ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ nɔ wa nu ɔ sin ɖɔhun ɖo wemaxɔmɛ a akpaxwe ɔ
etɛ daniyɛli tɔn sixu
mɛ winnyawinnya zin e ku do nu e ɖi nu lɛ e ji e tlɛ nyi ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ ɔ nɛ
e ci aganma ɖɔhun huzu sinmɛ sɔgbe kpo fi e ɖe e kpo a
e nɔ wa nu mawu tɔn ɖɔhun ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ nɔ wa nu ɔ sin ɖɔhun ɖo wemaxɔmɛ a
e wa ɔ e nɔ gbeji e tlɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn mɛ ɔ nɛ xa efɛzinu lɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe nɔ ɖu tamɛ linlin do e wa nu gbɔn ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ e ji sin le
gbɔn e
etɛ nyi tinmɛ baptɛm tɔn
e ɖo co enyi jlo blo baptɛm ɔ nunywɛnu wɛ e nyi ɖɔ gbeje kanɖeji setonu nu gbeɖiɖe jehovah tɔn lɛ e
kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ setonu nu jehovah nu taan ɖe a
nu do wa nu gbɔn azɔn gudo tɔn e nuɖiɖi towe e ji
kpewu wa nu sɔgbe bɔ ɖo wa e a
daniyɛli ɖɔhun ɔ mɛɖe do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ hwi zan nuwukpikpe towe lɛ ɖo sataan tɔn mɛ a
enyi nu mɔhun ɔ kpewu mɔ nu jɛ nu jehovah jlo ɖɔ wa e wu a efɛzinu lɛ
etɛwu e nyi nu taji ɖɔ tuun xosin nukanbyɔ mɛɖesunɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ tɔn
ðo bɔ tuun baptɛm nyi nu taji e wu wɛ
baptɛm nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ taji ɖe nu jehovah
ɖɔ emi yi wan ɛ kpodo ayi towe bi kpo yi sa
mɛ blo baptɛm lɛ e bi ɖo kanɖeji nɔ gbeji nu akpa do nu jehovah e xa
etɛ ji mɛ ɖo nu do baptɛm wu wɛ e ɖo ku do
etɛ bɔ ɖo linlin sɔgbe e do baptɛm nyi tuto jehovah tɔn e ji
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ togun jehovah tɔn bi jɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ji jlo do ɛ
ezayii enɛ wu ɔ mɛ jlo blo baptɛm e ɖe ɖo kudeji ɖɔ emiɖesunɔ wɛ ɖo jlo tɔn
enɛ sixu byɔ ɖo asi towe ɖɔ gbeje jlo towe ganji ɖo taji ɔ enyi nugbo ɔ mɛ wɛ su do ɔ nɛ
hwenu ɖo wɛ e ɔ mɔ bɔ mɛ gege blo baptɛm bɔya mɛ ɖe lɛ tlɛ sixu nyi towe kpo nɔvi towe ɖesu lɛ kpo
ɖɔ emi ɖo xwe ɖe alo mɛ lɛ bi ɖo baptɛm blo wɛ wutu kpowun ɖɔ emi ɖo blo baptɛm o
sixu kudeji ɖɔ emi ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ kpo jehovah kpo do baptɛm wu gbɔn
zan hwenu do tamɛ do nu wu baptɛm do nyi nu taji e ji
mɔ hwɛjijɔ gege ɖo xota elɔ kpo ee bɔ e kpo mɛ
etɛ sixu bɔ enyi gbeta kɔn wa blo baptɛm e gosin ayi towe mɛ kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ tuun
ali ɖɔ baptɛm jlo blo e gosin ayi hwiɖesunɔ tɔn mɛ a ji ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbeje ɖɛ towe lɛ
azɔn nabi nɔ xoɖɛ jehovah
ɖɛ towe lɛ nɔ nɔ tlɔlɔ gbɔn
xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ e sixu hwi kpo jehovah kpo e
ðɛhan azɔn gege wɛ jehovah nɔ sin nu ɖɛ mitɔn lɛ gbɔn biblu gblamɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ali ɖevo sixu ɖɔ jlo kpo jehovah kpo ɛ sin ayi mɛ wa ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbeje nu kplɔnkplɔn towe sin tuto
nɔ jlo do ɖo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn mitɔn mɛ a
xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ e bɔ enyi hwiɖesu wɛ ɖo jlo baptɛm tɔn ɔ tuun
tinmɛ vogbingbɔn ɖo mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu kpo baptɛm kpo tɛntin e
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe lɛ sixu nɔ tuun vogbingbɔn ɖo mɛɖee zize jo kpo baptɛm bloblo kpo mɛ e ganji
mɛɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ze gbɛzan emitɔn jo nu jehovah ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu baptɛm a
nu sixu nyi a
mɛɖee zize jo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e xoɖɛ nu jehovah ɖɔ e ɛ sɔyi
nu blo baptɛm ɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ emi ze emiɖee jo nu jehovah
enɛ wu ɔ cobonu blo baptɛm ɔ ɖo tuun nu mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu nyi e sin tinmɛ
etɛ nyi tinmɛ mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu tɔn
enyi ze gbɛzan towe jo nu jehovah ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi huzu etɔn bi sin hwenɛnu nɛ
ɖɔ eyɛ wɛ nyi nu taji hugan ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ matie akpa mɔhun dido nu mawu nyi nujɔnu tawun
matie enɛ wu ɔ sixu ɖɔ emi tuun ɖɔ emi kun nyi emiɖesunɔ tɔn o ɖɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ emi nyi din gbɔn hlɔmanu lɛ
nu tito mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ jijodo nyi e do nuɖe wu etɛ ɖɔ wɛ mɛ ze eɖee jo nu mawu e ɖe tawun
nu mi ɖokpo
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖe ɖe
e ɔ sin wema nu ɖɔ towe wɛ nyi ɔ
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ hɛn cavi lɛ
nyi wɛ nɔ kun ɔ e nyi hwɛ a
etɛ do nunina enɛ wu
etɛ do towe ɔ e wu
hwenu mɛɖe ze tɔn jo nu jehovah e ɔ e ɖɔ ɖo ze nu wɛ
towe wɛ nyi
jehovah ɖo nukun ɖɔ mɛ enɛ ɖe akpa e do e
enyi mɛ enɛ jɛ to tli nu jehovah ji byɔ mɛ xa mɛ nɔ mawu a e ɖe ɖo nuglɔ ɔ
alo enyi mɛ enɛ yi gbe nu bɔ e sixu mɔ hwenu ɖe nu ɔ a alo bɔ e jɛ kple agun tɔn lɛ gɔn ji hwɛhwɛ ɔ
e ci ɖɔ e hɛn ɔ sin cavi lɛ ɖɔhun
hwenu mi ze gbɛzan mitɔn jo nu jehovah e ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ towe wɛ nyi e nyi ɖesu a
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ wa nu jehovah jlo ɖɔ mi wa lɛ e enyi tlɛ sɔgbe xa midɛɛ lɛ tɔn lɛ a ɔ nɛ
nu mi wa nu jezu ɖɔhun e ɖɔ jɛte sin jixwe blo jlo a loɔ nu jlo mɛ mi do ɔ blo gbe ja wa jaan
xo kpo christopher kpo ɖɔ lɛ e ɖɔ baptɛm nyi wujɔmɛ ɖe nɔ hun ali nu nyɔna lɛ gbɔn
wu e jɔ bɔ sixu blo baptɛm e nɔ ci nu
baptɛm nyi nu taji ɖe bɔ e
wujɔmɛ ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi ɖɔ e ze mɛɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee yi wan nu jehovah mɔ nukunnu jɛ nu mɛɖee zize jo nyi e wu e nɔ xo nu do gbɛzan yetɔn zize jo nu mawu blo baptɛm wu a
wa e nɔ nu a
nyi mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe blo baptɛm e ɖɔ yi wan nu jehovah nu ɖe sixu mi awajijɛ hugan nɔ ɛ a
ganjɛ nu ɖe wu ɖo gbɛzan mɛ hu gbeta kɔn wa blo baptɛm e a
bɔ christopher xo e ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ tɔn e
etɛ e nɔ do baptɛm e blo hwenu e ɖo xwe e wu
e ɖɔ ɖɔ e nɔ vivi nu emi tawun ɖo nu taji enɛ e emi blo e wu
e nyi gbexosin hwebinu tɔn hwenu e ɖo xwe e bɔ hwenu e ɖo xwe e ɔ e nyi tɔn
egbe din ɔ e ɖo wa wɛ ɖo betɛli
e ɖɔ baptɛm wɛ nyi nu ɖagbe blo e
awajijɛ gbɛzan mɛ ɖo nu jehovah kpo tutoblonunu tɔn kpo wutu
enyi jlo blo baptɛm ɔ sixu sɔnu gbɔn
xota bɔ e xosin nu nukanbyɔ enɛ
mawu jlo towe wiwa nɔ vivi nu mi ðɛhan
e sixu kudeji ɖɔ e mɔ nugbo ɔ gbɔn
etɛ nyi tinmɛ kpo mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu sin nuwiwa lɛ kpo tɔn
tamɛ linlin do gbɛxixɔ ɔ ji sixu bɔ tɛnkpɔn jehovah ɖɔ e su nukun towe mɛ gbɔn
tinmɛ nu wu baptɛm nyi afɔɖiɖe taji ɖe e etɛ mɛɖe ɖo tuun cobo blo baptɛm etɛwu
mɛ winnyawinnya wɛ nyi jlo blo baptɛm a
enyi hun wu ɖaxo ɖe wɛ e nyi bɔ e jɔ
e ɖɔ gbɔn ɖo xota wa yi e mɛ e ɔ baptɛm nyi nu taji bɔ e
e nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ ze hwiɖee jo nu jehovah enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɛ sɔyi bɔ jlo tɔn wiwa nyi nu taji hugan ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ
ðo enɛ nyi akpa taji ɖe bɔ e nɔ do nu mawu wutu ɔ hwenu zin ganji bɔ hwiɖesunɔ ɖo jlo tɔn mɔ nu jɛ nu mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu nyi e mɛ e kɛɖɛ jɛn blo baptɛm
e ɖo co sixu ɖɔ emi kun ɖo gbesisɔmɛ blo baptɛm o
alo sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ loɔ towe lɛ sixu ɖɔ hwi ɖo nɔte su hu mɔ nu hu ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ
etɛ ɖo wa
nu awakanmɛ ku o
loɔ zan hwenu enɛ do yi nukɔn do sixu jɛxa blo baptɛm ɖo malin malin mɛ
enyi enɛ ɖo ayi towe mɛ ɔ sixu nya nu atɔn elɔ lɛ sin gbe nu ji ku do lɛ e alo nu ɖi nu lɛ e nuwiwa towe lɛ nu nɔ su nukun towe mɛ lɛ e
etɛ timɔtee tɔn sixu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ
tamɛ do xosin nu nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ e ji etɛwu ɖi ɖɔ mawu tiin
etɛwu kudeji ɖɔ biblu nyi xo mawu tɔn
etɛwu nɔ nyi mawu tɔn lɛ nɔ wa nu ɔ ɖɔhun a
nukanbyɔ enɛ lɛ sixu bɔ xwedo weɖexamɛ pɔlu tɔn elɔ tɛnkpɔn mɔ do nu jlo mawu tɔn e wɛ nyi nu ɖagbe nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ e
hlɔmanu lɛ etɛwu ɖo blo enɛ
timɔtee tɔn sixu
e mɔ nu jɛ mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ganji ɖo nɔ tɔn kpo nɔ tɔn nɔ kpo ɛ mawuxowema ɔ wutu
e ɖo co pɔlu ɖɔ nu timɔtee ɖɔ syɛnlin ɖo nu mɔ ɖɔ nugbo wɛ e nyi ɔ mɛ
timɔtee timɔtee ɖo kudeji ɖɔ mawuxowema ɔ mɛ wɛ e sixu mɔ nugbo ɔ ɖe
nɔ tɔn kpo nɔ tɔn nɔ kpo wɛ ɖɔ e yi gbe nu nugbo ɔ wutu wɛ e wa kpowun a e ɖesu tɛnkpɔn mɔ do nu nugbo ɔ kudeji xa tɛsalonikinu lɛ
etɛwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ nɔ do nu nu sin vu
vlafo mɔ nugbo ɔ din e ɔ xwe jɛ
enyi hun nu tamɛ linlin do hwɛjijɔ ɖeɖee wu ɖi nu e ji mya nukun nu
enɛ bɔ nuɖiɖi towe lido sin kɔgbidinumɛ towe lɛ tɔn linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ alo linlin hwiɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ wu bonu ɖe afɔ nyi do a
enyi nɔ do nu nu hwenu kpo ɖo winnyawinnya mɛ e ɔ kpewu xosin nu nukanbyɔ towe lɛ tɔn lehun lɛ etɛwu kanɖeji ɖɔ mawu tiin
enyi mawu yi wan nu mi ɔ etɛwu e nɔ bɔ nu nyanya lɛ nɔ jɛ
e sixu blo ɖɔ mawu tiin hwebinu gbɔn
tinmɛ nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖeɖee ɖo etewe biblu plon mi
glɔ ɖo ɛntɛnɛti ji e sixu bɔ nu ji ku do e lido gbɔn e
nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn ɖo gbesisɔmɛ e sixu bɔ mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ lɛ ɖu ɖo ji blo bɔ nu ji ku do lɛ e lido
mi ɖo wema sixu bɔ wa e gege
mɛ gege mɔ ɖɔ e bɔ e alɔnuwema cinq questions a kpo wema il createur qui soucie vous kpo
ɖokpo ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya gege ɖu vivi xota ɖebɔdoɖewu ee nɔ ɖo jw org ji nɔ nyi etewe biblu plon mi etɛ biblu mɛ tawun
e tɔn
mɔ ɖo nuhe biblu plon mi glɔ
e sɔnu nu nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɖebɔdoɖewu enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo bonu bɔ ku do xota biblu tɔn ɖe sin nukplɔnmɛ ji hugan
ɖo biblu wɛ enɛ wu ɔ sixu tuun xosin nu nukanbyɔ ɖo nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn ɔ mɛ e ɖe lɛ
ganjɛ xosin towe lɛ wu a
nukplɔnkplɔn tɔn lɛ bɔ tamɛ ganji do wemafɔ biblu tɔn vovo ji enɛ gudo ɔ bɔ wlan nu ɖi nu lɛ e sin hwɛjijɔ lɛ do wema ɔ ji
enɛ bɔ tuun tinmɛ nu ɖi nu lɛ e nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn e
enyi nɔ yi ɛntɛnɛti ji ɔ xota ɖebɔdoɖewu ɖo etewe biblu plon mi
glɔ lɛ e zinzan ɖo nu kplɔnkplɔn hwiɖesunɔ tɔn hwenu sixu bɔ nu ji ku do lɛ e lido
hwiɖesunɔ ɖo tɛnkpɔn mɔ do ɖɔ nu emi lɛ e nyi nugbo
enɛ bɔ sɔnu nu baptɛm
nɔvi nyɔnu winnyawinnya ɖe ɖɔ cobonu do baptɛm bloblo ji ɔ biblu mɔ ɖɔ sinsɛn nugbo ɔ ɖie
etɛwu e sɔgbe ɖɔ e ɖo nukun ɖɔ klisanwun blo baptɛm e ɖe ɖo nuwalɔ sɔgbe xa nuɖiɖi tɔn lɛ e
biblu ɖɔ nuɖiɖi nɔ ɖe eɖee gbɔn nuwiwa lɛ mɛ a ɔ nyi nuɖiɖi kuku
jaki enyi nu ji ku do lɛ e lido ɔ gbɔn nuwiwa towe lɛ gblamɛ
kpewu zan biblu ylɔ ɖɔ e nɔ ɖo sisi nu mawu alo ɖo mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu sin nuwiwa lɛ nw xa
tinmɛ nu nyi e
etɛ nyi
enyi nuwiwa towe lɛ ɔ ɖo walɔ lixo
hwenu e bonu wa nu sɔgbe a e e ɔ tamɛ ganji do nu ɖagbe kpo nu nyanya kpo ji a
eblee lɛ ninɔmɛ tawun tawun ɖe lɛ sixu ɖe bɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ ɔ jo gbe ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn alo kɔgbidinumɛ tɔn lɛ mɛ a sixu flin a
ðo ɔ nyi ɖagbe nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ a
nɔ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah wɛ a alo nɔ tɛnkpɔn ci towe lɛ ɖɔhun bonu doya nu o
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ mɛ ɖe kun tiin o
hweɖelɛnu ɔ winnya sixu hu mɛ tlɛ jehovah nu xwe gege lɛ e bɔ mɔ ɖɔ mawuxoɖiɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ vɛwu
mɛ ze eɖee jo nu mawu e nɔ go ɖo jehovah tɔn e nyi e wu enɛ gbɔn walɔ tɔn gblamɛ
ðɔ nu ɖo mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu sin nuwiwa lɛ mɛ e ɖe lɛ
etɛ nɔ do nu enɛ lɛ wu etɛ nyi mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu sin nuwiwa lɛ
nu nɔ wa ɖo agun ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖi kple lɛ yiyi kpo mawuxoɖiɖɔ kpo
nu ɖevo lɛ tiin bɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ mɔ a bɔ lɔ ɖi ɖɛ nɔ xo jehovah ɖo nuglɔ lɛ e kpo nu kplɔnkplɔn towe ɖesunɔ kpo
mɛ ze gbɛzan tɔn jo nu jehovah e ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ nyi agban kpinkpɛn a
e ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ axɔsu davidi ɖɔhun e ɖɔ mawu jlo towe wiwa nɔ vivi nu mi towe ɖo ayi mɛ ganji ðɛhan
azɔwanu tɛ sixu bɔ ɖo mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu sin nuwiwa lɛ
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe lɛ ɖu le tɔn gbɔn
do bonu tuun nu gbe nya lɛ e ɔ mi ɖo ɖe ɖo les jeunes reponses pratiques sin wexwɛ kpo kpo ji
ðo enɛ ji ɔ sixu wlan xosin ɖo nu nukanbyɔ elɔ lɛ e ɖɛ towe lɛ nɔ nɔ tlɔlɔ gbɔn
nɔ ɖe wanyiyi ɖo nu jehovah e gbɔn
enyi towe lɛ nɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ a ɔ hwɛ nɔ blo a
tɛnmɛ ɖe ɖo ɔ ji bɔ sixu wlan nu hwiɖesunɔ nya ɖo ɖɛxixo nu kplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn kpo wɛnɖagbejijla kpo linu e
mɛ winnyawinnya ɖeɖee ɖo nu do baptɛm bloblo ji wɛ lɛ e gege mɔ ɖɔ enɛ nyi azɔwanu xɔ akwɛ ɖe
nɔvi nyɔnu winnyawinnya nyi tilda e ɖɔ zan enɛ do nya nuɖe lɛ gbe
kpe nu enɛ lɛ wu blo ɖebɔdoɖewu bɔ xwe ɖokpo gudo ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ nu baptɛm
nɔvi sunnu winnyawinnya nɔ nyi patrick e lɔ kpewu blo nu ɖokpo ɔ
e ɖɔ tuun nu gbe nya wɛ ɖe lɛ e ɖo wlan wutu ɔ syɛnsyɛn do sixu kpa mi
akpaxwe ɔ
tinmɛ nu wu mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu ɖo nyi mɛɖesunɔ xo e
nukanbyɔ ɖo ɔ ji lɛ e ɖokpo wɛ nyi enyi towe lɛ alo towe lɛ jo jehovah sinsɛn do ɔ hwɛ kpo ɖo wa wɛ a
enyi ze towe jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm ɔ hwiɖesunɔ ɖo kancica ɖe kpo e kpo
enɛ wu ɔ nu wa nu jehovah wɛ ɖe e ɖo sin towe lɛ alo mɛ ɖevo ɖebu wu a
towe kpo mɛɖee zize jo nu mawu sin nuwiwa towe lɛ kpo ɖɔ kudeji ɖɔ emi mɔ nugbo ɔ jlo xwedo nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ
zaanɖe ɔ jɛxa blo baptɛm
etɛ ɖo mɛɖe huzu klisanwun
e sixu gbɛxixɔ ɔ su mɛ nukunmɛ gbɔn e do nuɖe wu gbɛn
gbe ɖokpo ɔ nya tuun mɔyizi ganji e ɖe kanbyɔ jezu ɖɔ tɛ wɛ ɖo taji ɖo lɛ bi mɛ
jezu yi gbe ɖɔ yi wan nu aklunɔ mawu towe kpodo ayi towe bi kpo kpodo towe bi kpo kpodo linlin towe bi kpo
matie jezu tinmɛ ɖɔ wan yi nu jehovah wɛ ɖo nyi hwɛjijɔ wu mɛɖe blo baptɛm huzu klisanwun ɖe e
ali ɖagbe hugan blo bɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu jehovah e lido ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ tamɛ ganji do gbɛxixɔ nyi nunina mawu tɔn ɖaxo hugan ɔ nu lɛ bi e ji xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ jaan
enyi blo ɔ ɖɔ nunina jiwu enɛ su nukun towe mɛ
e sixu tinmɛ gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun towe mɛ gbɛn e gbɔn le mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo ku wɛ bɔ mɛɖe wa hwlɛn gan
yi xwe sunsun wu wɔn nu mɛ enɛ wa nu e kpowun wɛ a
mɛ hwlɛn towe gan e hwebinu ɖɔ e su nukun emitɔn mɛ
ali ɖokpo ɔ ɔ mi ɖo jehovah kpo jezu kpo ɖɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ tawun
mi ɖu mitɔn sin axɔ do
hwlɛn mi sin hwɛhuhu kpo ku kpo si
ðo yi wan nu mi wutu ɔ mi ɖo nukunɖiɖo din nɔ sɔyi ɖo palaɖisi mɛ ɖo ayikungban ji
etɛwu ɖo ɖi xɛsi do hwiɖee zize jo nu jehovah wu a
jehovah sinsɛn bɔ gbɛzan towe gbɔn
nu jehovah wa nu lɛ e su nukun towe mɛ a
enyi hun ze hwiɖee jo blo baptɛm nu sɔgbe bɔ wa e nɛ
hwiɖee zize jo nu mawu wɛ nyi akpa dido ɖɔ emi wa jlo tɔn sɔyi
akpa enɛ dido do xɛsi nu wɛ a
nu ɖagbe hugan ɔ wɛ jehovah nu e mɛ nɔ wa jlo tɔn lɛ e
eblee lɛ hwenu ze gbɛzan towe jo nu mawu blo baptɛm e ɔ towe gble a e wa ɔ wɛ e hugan
nɔvi sunnu ɖo xwe din blo baptɛm hwe a e ɖe ɖɔ enyi nyi mɛxo hu hwenɛnu wɛ ɔ nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nyiɖee ze jo nu jehovah e hwlɛn mi sin wezun kinkan ɖo nu ɔ tɔn lɛ gudo mɛ
nu ɖagbe hugan ɔ wɛ jehovah nu
cejɛnnabinɔ wɛ nu sataan e ɖagbe towe a
enyi xwedo e ɔ e sixu nu ɖagbe ɖebu a
e sixu nu e ɖo a e gbɔn
e ɖo wɛn ɖagbe ɖe a sɔgudo ɖagbe ɖe ɖe a
sɔgudo nyanya kɛɖɛ jɛn e sixu ɖo nu ɖo nu ɖo ɛ e nɛ
etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya ɖe sixu wa do sixu yi nukɔn ze eɖee jo nu jehovah blo baptɛm
gbavi do bonu yi nukɔn
gbɛzan towe zize jo nu jehovah wɛ nyi afɔ ɖagbe hugan ɖe e
ɖo gbesisɔmɛ blo a
enyi hun ɖi xɛsi do akpa mɔhun dido wu o
loɔ enyi mɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo gbesisɔmɛ o hun zan ɖo xota elɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ
pɔlu ɖɔ nu nɔvi filipunu lɛ ɖɔ kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ
ameliorer mes prieres novembre
trouver du plaisir a bible avril
qui suis je octobre
plaisir a etudier bible fevrier
pourquoi aux reunions chretiennes avril
trouver du plaisir a dieu wemata
pourquoi je peur defendre mes croyances wemata
pourquoi suivre les normes bible wemata
devenir dieu wemata
devrais je faire baptiser wemata
e wɛ bɔ wujɔnu tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ agbaza tɔn lɛ bi ɖo bu efɛzinu lɛ
mi nɔ nɔ bu gbɔn hwenu mi ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ e
etɛ lɛ mi sixu wa agun mitɔn nɔ bu
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe sixu nɔ bu gbɔn
sin ɔ etɛ e do tuun mawu tɔn lɛ
jehovah kpo jezu kpo ɖo bu sin hwenu e jɛ nu lɛ da ji e ɖokpoo
jehovah da jezu jɛ nukɔn nu nu lɛ bi
enɛ gudo ɔ jezu xa ɛ nɔ akpa tɔn hwebinu ɖɔhun
nunywɛxo jehovah lɛ lɔ nɔ wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee ɖo ɖo wa e kɔn
ði ɔ nɔwee kpo xwedo tɔn kpo nɔ bu blo tɔjihun ɔ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo blo goxɔ ɔ nɔ tun ɖo vovo nɔ tɛn sin fi ɖe jɛ fi ɖe
ðo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ jihan nɔ xo nu ɖo do kpa nu jehovah kpo ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ kpo
togun jehovah tɔn kpe nu enɛ lɛ bi wu ɖo wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee wutu
etɛ e jɛ ɖɔ e wu ɖo agun klisanwun tɔn nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ
klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ lɔ wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee
pɔlu tinmɛ ɖɔ ɖo nuwukpikpe vovo lɛ kpo vovo lɛ kpo co bi nɔ bu
bi xwedo gan yetɔn jezu klisu
bɔ midɛɛ lɛ ɖo egbe mi sixu wa nu ɖo xa miɖee ɖo ɔ agun ɔ kpo xwedo mɛ kpo gbɔn
nu tɛ jaan mɔ
ðo xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ jaan mɔ wɛnsagun tɛnwe ɖo kpɛn kun wɛ ɖo numimɔ ɖe mɛ
hwenu wɛnsagun ɔ kun kpɛn tɔn e ɔ jaan mɔ sunvi ɖokpo sin jixwe wa jɛ ayikungban ji
sunvi enɛ cavi ɖe do hun hɔn domaɖo azan ɖe tɔn
azizɔ ɖaxo ɖe sin do ɔ mɛ do nukɔn bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ kle wɔbuwɔbu ɖe sin azizɔ ɔ mɛ
kle enɛ lɛ wa nu nyanya ɖe nu atin lɛ alo gbehan lɛ a e wa ɔ sin nukɔn wuntun mawu tɔn ɖe a lɛ e kɛɖɛ wu wɛ do
jaan tuun ɖɔ kle lɛ sixu hɛn nu gble ɖesu blo ɖo ejipu mɔyizi hwenu
kle ɖeɖee jaan mɔ lɛ e nɔte nu klisanwun yi do ɖe ɖeɖee ɖo wɛn ɖo hlɔnhlɔn e ɖe do sinsɛn nuvu lɛ wɛ e
livi mɔkpan nɔ ɖo ayikungban ji lɛ e lɔ xo kpoɖo nu
we lɛ bi ɖo bu ɖo ɔ kɔn
enɛ mɛ gege bɔ gosin sinsɛn nuvu mɛ gosin sataan sin acɛ mɛ
tɛ togun mawu tɔn ɖo wa
ali ɖokpo gee tɛ sixu enɛ ɖe
e ɖe nu mi bɔ mi jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ lɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ cobɔ ɔ vɔ
ɖaxo ɖe wɛ enɛ nyi
cobonu mi mɔ mɛ gege e sixu blo gbɔn e ɔ mi ɖo ɖo tito ji ganji ɖo mitɔn mɛ
mi nɔ mɔ ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ e nɔ mi bonu mi wa
nu mi blo kple kunnuɖegbe tɔn gudo ɔ mi nɔ nɔ yi do wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ
mi nɔ xwle wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ
nugbo ɔ mi nɔ ma wema enɛ lɛ nu mɔkpan gbɔn ɔ mɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ byɔ mi ɖɔ mi ɖo wema bunɔ ɖe lɛ mima mɛ
hwenu ɖo enɛ wa wɛ e ɔ tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo bu xa livi mɔkpan ɖevo lɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ bɔ lɔ ɖo wɛn ɖokpo ɔ jla wɛ
ɖo wa ɖo xa wɛnsagun ɖeɖee ɖo alɔdo togun mawu tɔn wɛ ɖo wɛnɖagbejijla ɔ kɔn e
le nɔ sin wɛnɖagbejijla gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ sin ɔ mɛ e xixa ɖo annuaire mɛ nɔ akpakpa mɛ tawun
ðo tɛn enɛ mɛ ɔ mi bi nɔ se nu ɖokpo ɔ lɛ
xoɖiɖɔ lɛ nukpinkpɔn do nu lɛ kpo lɛ kpo nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi nu mitɔn hugan lɛ e jehovah
mi nɔ ɖo bu xa nɔvi mitɔn lɛ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ hwenu mi nɔ yi flin tɛnmɛ xwewu xwewu e
kɔlɛntinu lɛ mi nɔ kple ɖo azan ɖokpo ɔ ji nisaan sin azan ɔ gbe hwenu hwe yi xɔ e nɔ ɖɔ nu jehovah wa nu mi e su nukun mitɔn mɛ nɔ setonu nu gbeɖiɖe jezu tɔn
ðo aklunɔzan gbla jɛ nukɔn nu flin ɔ lɛ e mɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖo nɔ ylɔ lɛ bonu wa nu mi ɖo nuwiwa taji enɛ tɛnmɛ
enyi mi ɖo ɔ etɛ mi nɔ kpewu nɔ wa
kle ɖokpo sixu hɛn nu ɖe gble a
jɛn miɖokponɔ sixu jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ lɛ bi a e nɛ
ɖo mi nɔ ɖo wutu ɔ mi kpewu ɖɔ xo nu livi mɔkpan do jehovah wu mɛɖe lɛ bɔ kpa wli
nujlɛdonuwu tɛ pɔlu zan do nu klisanwun lɛ bonu nɔ bu
mi sixu wa nu ɖo ɖo agun ɔ mɛ gbɔn
pɔlu zan agbaza sin tinmɛ ɖɔ klisanwun ɖokpo ɖokpo sixu blo bɔ agun ɔ nɔ bu xwedo jezu nyi gan nu agun ɔ e
e ɖɔ ɖɔ tɛnmɛ tɛnmɛ ɖo agbaza ɔ wu lɛ bi nɔ wa nu ɖo hɛn agbaza ɔ ɖo bu ganji
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ winnyawinnya wɛ mi nyi oo mɛxo wɛ mi nyi oo lanmɛ ɖo ganji nu mi alo e gbɔ oo etɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mitɔn ɖo wa
jezu ɖe mɛxo lɛ bonu ali agun ɔ bɔ e jlo ɖɔ mi si xwedo yetɔn lɛ
eblee lɛ wiwa nɔ bɔwu hwebinu a
mi sixu byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e alɔ nu mi
gbigbɔ tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi xwedo ɖebu mɛxo lɛ mi e
enyi mi nɔ miɖee hwe nɔ wa nu ɖo xa mɛxo lɛ ɔ e agun ɔ e
agun mitɔn nɔ bu bɔ wan mi yi nu miɖee e ɖo jijɛji wɛ
tɔn lɛ nɔ agun ɔ bonu e nɔ bu gbɔn
lɛ lɔ nɔ ɖo buninɔ agun ɔ tɔn mɛ
nɔ syɛnsyɛn nɔ mɛxo lɛ bɔ nu nɔ wa lɛ e bi nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
ði ɔ lɛ nɔ tɛnkpɔn bɔ mi nɔ ɖo wema kpe mi ɖo ɔ mɛ e nɔ do kuabɔ nu jonɔ wa kple lɛ e
nɔ syɛnsyɛn blo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖo nɔ jlaɖo
enyi mi nɔ ɖo xa nɔvi sunnu enɛ lɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖo bu nɔ jehovah ɖo tito ji do wu
etɛ mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ sixu wa do agun ɔ nɔ bu
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe lɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖo agun ɔ mɛ nu xwe gege
din ɔ sixu wa nu gege tɔn ɖɔhun a ɖo ɖo mɛxo nyi wɛ wutu
nɔvi sunnu dɔnkpɛvu lɛ sixu
enyi e ɔ sixu kpe nukun do gege wu ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
enyi lɛ nɔ syɛnsyɛn ɔ sixu wa kpewu nyi mɛxo ɖo sɔ
timɔtee mɛxo dɔnkpɛvu ɖe lɛ tlɛ yi nukɔn nyi lɛdo tɔn ɖo alɔ do nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo wɛ ɖo agun gege mɛ
etɛ sixu mɛ lɛ bi ɖo xwedo ɔ mɛ bɔ wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee
mi sixu xwedo mitɔn sin lɛ bɔ wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee gbɔn
sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn bloblo ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ sixu
enyi lɛ kpo vi lɛ kpo nɔ zan hwenu ɖo do nu do jehovah wu ɔ wanyiyi ɖo nu yeɖee e nɔ jɛji
ðo sinsɛn biblo ɔ hwenu ɔ sixu sɔnu nu nu ɖɔ ɖo kunnuɖegbe e enɛ bɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
asu kpo asi kpo ɖe sixu wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee gbɔn
matie enyi mɛ we lɛ bi yi wan nu jehovah nɔ ɛ ɖo ɔ ɖo awajijɛ ɖo alɔwliwli yetɔn mɛ nɔ bu
ɖo ɖo wanyiyi nu yeɖee ablaxamu kpo sala kpo izaki kpo hlebeka kpo kpodo ɛlukana kpo kpo ɖɔhun
samuwɛli enyi asu kpo asi kpo ɖe nɔ wa ɔ mɛ we lɛ bi nɔ nɔ bu nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah xa
sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn sixu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ kpo mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo bɔ sɛkpɔ yeɖee akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
enyi asu towe alo asi towe ɖo jehovah wɛ a ɔ etɛ sixu wa do hɛn alɔwliwli towe lido
biblu ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ mi kun ɖo mɛ nɔ jehovah a e o
kɔlɛntinu lɛ e ɖo co nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe lɛ kpo ɖo xa mɛ nyi jehovah tɔn a e
mɛ ɖe lɛ yeɖee cobɔ mɛ ɖokpo wa mɔ nugbo ɔ ɖo mɛ
mɛ ɖevo lɛ sixu jehovah ɖe bɔ mɛ e wa jo agun do
e nɔ fa hwebinu a
ði ɔ kpo asu tɔn david kpo nɔ jehovah ɖo
e wa ya e ɔ david jo kple lɛ yiyi do
kpo ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ nyi asi ɖagbe ɖe nɔ ɖe jijɔ klisanwun tɔn lɛ
e nu vi tɔn lɛ do jehovah wu kpo ɖo kple lɛ kpo lɛ kpo yi wɛ
xwe lɛ gudo hwenu vi lɛ su bɔ bi jɛ vo e ɔ kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ enyi e tlɛ vɛwu tawun ɔ nɛ
david wa jɛ xojlawema nɔ jo do lɛ e xa ji
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e jɛ kple lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo yi ji
david lɛkɔ wa jehovah xwe gudo bɔ xomɛ nɔ hun e kpo asi tɔn kpo ɖɔ ɖo jehovah ɖo wɛ din
mɛ wli alɔ bɔ e lin lɛ e sixu mɛ wli agaɖanu lɛ e gbɔn
sataan nɔ nya xwedo lɛ gbe ɖo egbe
nu wu wɛ asu kpo asi kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ lɛ e ɖo nɔ wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee e ɖokpo nɛ
wli alɔ e ɔ e lin kpo e gbɔ kpo hun nɔ tamɛ do nu sixu ɖɔ alo wa hɛn alɔwliwli towe lido e ji
enyi wli alɔ din e ɔ e lin wɛ ɔ sixu nyi nu mɛ wli alɔ ɖo agaɖanu din lɛ e
sixu ylɔ bɔ wa nɔ xa ɖo sinsɛn biblo xwedo tɔn hwenu
mɔ ɖɔ e wli alɔ e ɔ e lin kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ e ɖo nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mɛɖee nɔ bu titu
etɛ nɔte wɛ mawu ɖo bu lɛ e ɖe
hwenu izlayɛli vi lɛ nɔ yi ɖu xwe lɛ ɖo jeluzalɛmu e ɔ nɔ wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee
nɔ sɔnu nu nu sin hudo ɖo lɛ e bi nu tomɛyiyi ɔ
enɛ gudo ɔ nɔ yi ɖo nɔ yeɖee
ðo tɛmpli ɔ mɛ ɔ bi nɔ kpa jehovah ɖo nɔ ɛ ɖo
luki egbe ɔ ɖo mi ɖo nu wɛ yi nɔ ɔ mɛ wutu ɔ mi ɖo nɔ bu wa nu wu mi kpe lɛ e bi wa nu ɖo xa miɖee
sixu tamɛ do ali ɖevo sixu wa ɖe lɛ e ji
ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖo gbe a tlɛ nɔ xo hun ɖo nu gege wu
e su nukun mitɔn mɛ ɖɔ jehovah mi bɔ mi mɔ fifa mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo ɔ mɛ
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ togun tɔn ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ e jlo gbɔn e
taji ɔ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn elɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ togun jehovah tɔn ɖo bu hu tɔn
ezayii kpo micee kpo ɖɔ gbɔn e ɔ mi ɖo mawu mavɔmavɔ so ɔ ji yi ɖo wɛ
ezayii xa micee
awajijɛ tiin sɔ hwenu mɛ ɖo ayikungban ɔ ji lɛ e bi ɖo bu wa nu ɖo xa yeɖee do jehovah e
ali ɔ ɖie wli ɖido ezayii
tɛ jehovah ɖo nɔwee kpo mɔyizi kpo hwenu
tɛ mawu klisanwun lɛ
mi sixu ɖɔ mi ɖo mawu tɔn wɛ gbɔn
akpagbanumɛ tɛ hwlɛn gege gan
fɔtoo ɖo e tɛ togun mawu tɔn ɖo sixu hwlɛn tɔn
nɔte ðoto
xokwin enɛ lɛ nɔ kpanuxwɛ ɖe ji ɖo pinpangan xo ali ɖe e kpa ɖo gbadahweji amɛlika tɔn nu xwe jɛji
bonu lɛ xa pinpan ɖo wezun ji e ɖe o wutu wɛ
ayi ɖiɖo akpagbanumɛ enɛ wu hwlɛn mɛ gege tɔn gan
jehovah nɔ wa nu zɛ wuntun ayijayi tɔn lɛ nina mi wu
e nɔ ali togun tɔn bonu e do sixu mɔ mavɔmavɔ nɔ zɔ nu awovinu lɛ
jehovah ci wanyiyinɔ nɔ ali tɔn lɛ nɔ nu bonu do sixu nyi alɔ nu ali nyanya lɛ e ɖɔhun xa ezayii
lɛ ɖo ali yi ku e ɖe ji gbɔn
sin hwenuxo tɔn tɔn ɖokpoo wɛ jehovah nɔ nu tawun tawun ɖe lɛ lɛ alo ali
ði ɔ ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn mɛ ɔ jehovah zawe e lɛ bonu e bɔ nɔ sɔyi ɖo awajijɛ
adamu kpo ɛvu kpo yetɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ tɔn
ɛvu ɖoto nu sataan ɖɔ gbɔn ɖe ji e bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ adamu ɖoto asi tɔn
fitɛ enɛ kɔ do
mɛ we lɛ bi jiya ku ɖo nukunɖiɖo ɖe a
ɔ ɖo tonumase yetɔn wutu ɔ lɛ bi ɖo ali yi ku e ɖe ji
etɛwu e ɖo hudo ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɖo sinvɔgbɛ ɔ gudo
ninɔmɛ lɛ linlin mawu tɔn gbɔn
mawu ɖeɖee hwlɛn gan lɛ e nɔwee
ðo sinvɔgbɛ ɔ gudo ɔ jehovah ɖegbe nu lɛ ɖɔ ɖu hun alo o
etɛwu
jehovah jlo gbe lɛ din ɖɔ ɖu
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ wutu ɔ ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn ɖo ɖu mɛ hun kpo ɖe ɔ a
e wɛ nyi ɔ mi enɛ wu ɔ e lɛ do wu
ði ɔ e ɖegbe ɖɔ e kun ɖo hu mɛ o
mawu nɔ kpo hun kpo do mɔ nu
e dɔn to nu mɛɖebu zan nyi do e
nɔwee nɔ wa yi gudo e ɔ mawu kpo ɖo ali togun tɔn wɛ
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi mɔ e nɔ ali gbɔn e sin ɖe lɛ
enɛ lɛ bɔ gbeta kɔn mi wa ɖɔ mi xwedo jehovah tɔn yi ɔ mɛ e lido
etɛwu e ɖo dandan ɖɔ togun mawu tɔn setonu nu ɖeɖee e gbɔn mɔyizi ji e
etɛ izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo wa
mɔyizi hwenu ɔ jehovah ɖeɖee zawe lɛ e togun tɔn do walɔ yetɔn kpo sinsɛn biblo yetɔn kpo wu
ðo ninɔmɛ lɛ huzu wutu wɛ
izlayɛli vi lɛ nyi kannumɔ ɖo ejipu nu xwe jɛji
ðo finɛ ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ mɛkuku lɛ vodun lɛ nɔ wa nu ɖevo nɔ ɖe sin mawu wu lɛ e gege
hwenu togun mawu tɔn gosin kannumɔgbenu ɖo ejipu e ɔ ɖo ɖevo lɛ sin hudo
huzu akɔta xwedo jehovah tɔn lɛ kɛɖɛ e ɖe
wema alɔdlɛndonu tɔn ɖe lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ xokwin ebleegbe tɔn e lilɛ do e ca kan xa xokwin ɖe bɔ tinmɛ tɔn nɔ nyi ali mɛ nu mɛ
ɔ cyɔn alɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ ji sin nublibliwiwa kpo sinsɛn nuvu kpo e nɔ mɔ ɖo akɔta do lɛ e mɛ e si
enyi izlayɛli vi lɛ setonu nu mawu ɔ e nɔ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do ji
enyi ɖo kɔ wutu tɔn a ɔ nɔ jiya tɔn ɖesu xa
e ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn ɖo hwɛjijɔ ɖevo wu
ɔ ɖo nu nu izlayɛli vi lɛ wɛ nu nu taji ɖe ɖo linlin jehovah tɔn mɛ e wɛ nyi wiwa jezu klisu nyi mɛsiya ɔ e tɔn
ɔ nɔ flin izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ nyi
e nɔ bɔ nɔ tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo gbɛxixɔ ɖe tɔn enɛ wɛ nyi vɔsisa ɖe hwɛ yetɔn lɛ siin bi kpatakpata e
nugbo ɔ ɔ ci hwenu klewun tɔn ɖe ɖɔhun kpla mɛ bɔ e tuun klisu ɔ galatinu lɛ
etɛwu mi ɖo xwedo nugbododo ɖo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ lɛ e
mi mɛ klisanwun lɛ lɔ sixu ɖu le jehovah ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e tɔn
mi sixu nɔte nugbododo ji ɔ junjɔn lɛ e
e bɔ e wlan enɛ lɛ do biblu mɛ bonu do sixu nu mi bɔ nugbododo ɖo mɛ lɛ e ali mi
loɔ nyɛ ɖo ɖiɖɔ nu wɛ ɖɔ mɛɖe nyɔnu ɖe ɖo linlin wɛ ɖoxo xa ɛ ɔ e xa nyɔnu enɛ ɖo ayi mɛ xoxo
ninɔmɛ ɖevo tɛ lɛ bɔ ɖevo ɖo dandan
ee jezu wa nyi mɛsiya ɔ gudo e ɔ jehovah lɛ ɖe nu ɖevo lɛ do linlin tɔn wu
etɛwu enɛ ɖo dandan
ðo xwe mɛ ɔ jehovah akɔta izlayɛli tɔn agun klisanwun tɔn nyi togun tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ ninɔmɛ togun mawu tɔn tɔn nyi ninɔmɛ ɖevo
etɛwu e ɖevo lɛ agun klisanwun tɔn
enɛ lɛ gbɔn vo nu ɖeɖee e izlayɛli vi lɛ e gbɔn
jehovah mɔyizi ɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ bonu e zan gbɔn e kpo ɛ gbɔn e kpo
xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ mɛ ɔ e nyi akɔta ɖokpo mɛ wɛ togun mawu tɔn gosin a loɔ akɔta gege kpo xa gege kpo mɛ wɛ gosin bɔ e nɔ ylɔ din ɖɔ izlayɛli gbigbɔ tɔn
kple nyi agun klisanwun tɔn ɖo akɔjijɛ ɖe mɛ
jehovah lɛ do zan gbɔn ɛ gbɔn e ji alo gblo ada nu ɖe ɖo ali enɛ lɛ e
nugbo ɔ mawu nɔ ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ a
loɔ ɖo akɔta ɖebu mɛ ɔ mɛ nɔ ɖo sisi nɔ xwedo hwɛjijɔ ɔ mɛ enɛ sin nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ
nɔ xwedo klisu sin ɔ ɖo taji ɔ nugbododo e wlan do ayixa yetɔn mɛ nyi do awinnya ji a e ji wɛ enɛ jinjɔn
gbɛzan klisanwun tɔn sin akpaxwe we tɛ lɛ klisu sin ɔ kan
izlayɛli gbigbɔ tɔn nɔ ɖu le jehovah gbɔn jezu ji e tɔn tawun
cobonu jezu ɖo akɔjijɛ ɔ ayi ɔ e ɖegbe taji we
ðokpo kunkpla ɔ
bɔ wegɔ ɔ ɖɔ xo do klisanwun lɛ ɖo wa nu xa yeɖee gbɔn e ji
enɛ lɛ ɖe nu klisanwun lɛ bi enɛ wu ɔ kan mi bi ɖo egbe enyi mi ɖo nukunɖiɖo nɔ sɔyi ɖo ayikungban ji alo jixwe ɔ nɛ
etɛ nyi nu ɖo ɔ mɛ
ðo hwexonu ɔ lɛ ɖo gosin akɔta ɖevo lɛ mɛ wa izlayɛli jehovah
axɔsu lɛ jezu wa ɖegbe mi mɔ ɖo matie mɛ e xa
jezu ɖɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ yi mɛ lɛ bi
ðo pantekotu xwe tɔn ɔ jehovah ɖɔ emi ɖɔ e jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
gbe enɛ gbe ɔ agun ɔ sin mɔ gbigbɔ yi jɛ xo ɖɔ do gbe vovo mɛ ji nu jwifu lɛ kpo mɛ huzu jwifu lɛ e kpo
enɛ gudo ɔ e gblo ada nu ɔ jɛ samaliinu lɛ ji
bɔ ɖo xwe tɔn ɔ ɔ kan jɛ kosi a lɛ e ji
enɛ ɖɔ klisanwun lɛ ɖo jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ bi ɖo ɔ mɛ
etɛ jezu sin ɔ byɔ
etɛ jezu e mi
jezu ɖokpo do mi wa nu xa nɔvi sunnu lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo gbɔn e wu xa jaan
mi ɖo nɔ ɖe wanyiyi mitɔn gbe bi gbe mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ mitɔn jo do yetɔn mɛ
nuɖe wɛ bɔ mɔyizi ɔ byɔ a matie jaan
jezu wɛ nyi ɖaxo hugan mɛ ɖe wanyiyi ɖo cejɛnnabi mɔhun e tɔn
e yi wan nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ku do takun yetɔn mɛ
e ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ bi blo nu ɖokpo ɔ
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo ɖo gbesisɔmɛ mɔ xa nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo tlɛ ku do takun yetɔn mɛ tɛsalonikinu lɛ
jezu devi ayiɖotenanɔ ɔ bonu e nɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ahwanvu tɔn lɛ do hwetɔnnu
matie taji ɖeɖee togun mawu tɔn nɔ mɔ hwenu ninɔmɛ lɛ nɔ ɖyɔ e ɖo nuɖuɖu enɛ mɛ
ninɔmɛ mitɔn lɛ nyi ninɔmɛ gbɔn
mi ɖo nɔ wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ bɔ zaanɖe din ɔ mi gbɔn ɖaxo e mɔ mɔhunkɔtɔn a e ɖe mɛ
timɔtee ɔ e nya sataan kpo awovi tɔn lɛ kpo sin jixwe ayikungban ɔ ji bɔ ɖo gege dɔn wa nu lɛ wɛ
mi ɖo to nu se nu gbeɖiɖe jezu tɔn wɛ nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ nu gege ɖo gbe gege mɛ hugan tɔn
mi ɖo wa nu gbɔn nu mi wɛ e ɖe lɛ e
tutoblonunu mawu tɔn azɔwanu gege mi bonu mi do sixu wa ɔ
nɔ zan a
mi nɔ mɔ lɛ do mi zan azɔwanu enɛ lɛ gbɔn ganji e ji ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ ji
nɔ mɔ ɖɔ enɛ lɛ gosin mawu a
enyi mi mɔ nyɔna mawu tɔn ɔ mi ɖo xwedo ɖeɖee e nɔ mi gbɔn agun klisanwun tɔn gblamɛ lɛ e bi
enyi mi nɔ setonu din ɔ e bɔwu nu mi bɔ mi xwedo lɛ ɖo ɖaxo ɔ hwenu hwenu e su kun do nu sataan sin nyanya ɔ bi e
matie enɛ gudo ɔ mi ɖo hudo ɖevo lɛ tɔn ɖo mɛ wa nu kpodo hwɛjijɔ kpo ɖe bɔ sataan ɖebu a e
ðo ɔ mɛ ɔ e hun wema ɖe lɛ bɔ ɖeɖee kunkpla ɖo palaɖisi mɛ e ɖo mɛ akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
ðo mɔyizi hwenu ɔ akɔta izlayɛli tɔn ɖo hudo lɛ tɔn enɛ wu ɔ mawu ɔ
nukɔnmɛ ɔ agun klisanwun tɔn wa xwedo klisu sin ɔ
ɖokpo ɔ biblu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ ɖo ɔ mɛ ɔ e hun wema ɖe lɛ bɔ lɛ ɖo mɛ nu mi xa
wema enɛ lɛ ɖibla tinmɛ nu jehovah ɖo lɛ si hwenɛnu e
enyi mɛ lɛ bi jɛ mɛ e sin ku lɛ e ji nu enɛ lɛ ɔ tuun nu mawu ɖɔ wa e
wema enɛ lɛ mi bɔ mi nu gege do jehovah nɔ nu gbɔn e ji
mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ biblu mɛ enɛ wu ɔ mi bi nɔ wa nu xa miɖee kpo wanyiyi kpo kpo sisi kpo kpodo kpan ɖo palaɖisi mɛ
ezayii do nukun mɛ nu tobutobu miɖesunɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖo axɔsu mitɔn jezu klisu tɔn glɔ e
mi sixu mɔ mavɔmavɔ
enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo nɔte xa nu biblu ɖɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ tinmɛ e ɖo nu mi e mɛ ðoto gbɔn tonusise nu mawu tɔn gblamɛ din
gbejininɔ nɔ bɔ nu mɛtɔn nɔ mawu nukunmɛ
xota elɔ nu jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo bɔ nɔ gbeji ɖo hwenu ninɔmɛ lɛ tlɛ vɛwu e
mi nu wu tintɛnkpɔn bonu nu mɛtɔn mawu nukunmɛ byɔ ɖebu ɔ e sa e
didɛ ðo ɔ wa kpikpe
bonu mi mɔ mavɔmavɔ ɔ mi ɖo dɛ jɛ vivɔnu
xota elɔ ɖɔ xo do nu mi bɔ mi dɛ e ɛnɛ ji ɖɔ xo do mɛ dɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo e atɔn sin ji
e tinmɛ kpikpe didɛ enɛ ɖo wa ɖo mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo wu e
etɛwu mi ðo nɔ kple mawu
nu gege wɛ sixu bɔ kple lɛ yiyi ɖo gbesisɔmɛ vɛwu nu mi
xota elɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bɔ mi kpo ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ yi wɛ ɖo e tinmɛ nu wu kple lɛ yiyi do nyi ɖagbe nu mi kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo nɔ hɛn xomɛ hun jehovah e
ðo wu zɔ ðo klan e ɖe mɛ
ðo xota elɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖɔ xo do nu mi bɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu jehovah lɛ e ɛnɛ ji
gbɛzan tɔn tɔn lɛ wa huzu nɔvi gbigbɔ tɔn nugbo lɛ
towe ci ahun ðɔhun a
xwedo mɛ ɖi nu ɖo sɔxwixwe nɔ mɔ nu sin akpa mawu do ɔ yi ɖo enɛ wu lɛ e tɔn eblee lɛ
jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo tɔn sixu mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa kɔgbidinumɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ gbɔn
nugbododo biblu tɔn tɛ lɛ mɔ ɖɔ sixu mɛ bɔ e ɖeɖɛ tagba mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ
xota elɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu bɔ nuɖe lɛ do do axɔsuɖuto ɔ tamɛ gbɔn
nuvɛwu tɛ kpannukɔn jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo
ðyɔvi ɖe kanwezun yi kpe tɔn
xomɛ hun tawun ɖo tɔn lɛkɔ sin ahwangbenu
nu tɔn wa e kpo nu e ɖɔ e kpo ɖo kpaca ɛ
do mi lele mɛ
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi ɖe nu jehovah ɖyɔ gbɛzan tɔn sɔyi
akpa tɔn byɔ ɖɔ vi nyɔnu tɔn kun alo ji vi gbeɖe o
tlolo ɔ vi nyɔnu ɔ xosin ɖagbe ɖe do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu tɔn do ɖe akpa e do nu jehovah e
xosin tɔn ɖɔ e ɖeji bi ɖɔ nu ɖebu jehovah byɔ emi e nyi nu ɖagbe
lɛ hwenu tɔn mɔ nuɖiɖi tɔn e ɔ e go tawun ɖo e tuun ɖɔ jlo ɖagbe vi emitɔn tɔn hɛn xomɛ hun jehovah
jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo ɖeji bi do jehovah kpo e nɔ wa nu gbɔn e kpo wu
nɔ gbeji e tlɛ nyi ɖo hwenu e vɛwu nu tawun e ɔ nɛ
jlo ɖɔ nu emitɔn jehovah nukunmɛ byɔ ɖebu ɔ sa
etɛwu jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo tɔn sixu mi egbe
e nɔ bɔwu hwebinu nu e nɔ gbeji nu jehovah a
e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mi ahwan nu nuɖiɖi
judi do mi nu mi wa ɔ mi jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo dɛ ɖo ɖe lɛ ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ gbɔn e
nɔ gbeji nu jehovah gbɔn
gbe tɛ jehovah ɖe nu izlayɛli vi lɛ hwenu yi akpadido yikungban ɔ ji e
sɔgbe kpo ðɛhan kpo ɔ etɛ gbo izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo tonumase yetɔn wu
gbe bi gbe ɔ jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo nɔ flin nu tonumase izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn ji lɛ e
xwe ɖie jɛ nukɔn ɔ jehovah ɖegbe nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ hu ɖo akpadido yikungban ɔ ji lɛ e bi setonu a
izlayɛli vi gege jɛ nu wa ji kanaanu nɔ vodun nɔ zan blibli lɛ e ɖɔhun xa ðɛhan
ðo tonumase izlayɛli vi lɛ tɔn wu ɔ jehovah nya xɛ ɖo ji ɖo yetɔn lɛ nukɔn a
lɛ ðɛhan e ɖo vɛwu tawun nu xwedo ɖeɖee yi wan nu jehovah lɛ e bonu nɔ gbeji ɖo xwe enɛ lɛ vɛwu e mɛ
e ɖo co biblu ɖɔ ɖe lɛ xo ɖi jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo nu ɛlukana kpo samuwɛli kpo
kudeji hɛn xomɛ jehovah tɔn hun samuwɛli
ðo hwe mitɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ nu nɔ wa nu kanaanu lɛ ɖɔhun
nɔ ayi yetɔn bi ɖo agalilɛ adakaxixo kpo akwɛ kpo ji
jehovah zawe lɛ e nu mi
e jlo nya xɛ ɖo izlayɛli vi lɛ ji ɖo kɔgbidinumɛ mɔhun lɛ si e ɔ jɛn e jlo nya xɛ ɖo mi lɔ ji e nɛ
nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ nu mi a
kɔlɛntinu lɛ mi ɖo wa nu wu mi kpe lɛ e bi nyi alɔ nu linlin ɔ tɔn lɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ mi wa nu wu mi kpe lɛ e bi wa a
etɛ jɛfutee sin mɛ lɛ ɖesu wa
jɛfutee wa nu gbɔn
ðo jɛfutee hwenu ɔ lɛ kpo vi lɛ kpo doya nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖo tlito nu jehovah wutu
lɛ nu enɛ ɔ jɛfutee mɔ ɖo tɔn lɛ kpo tomɛxo izlayɛli tɔn lɛ kpo lɔ mɛ
ðo tɔn lɛ hwanwu wan wutu ɔ hɛn ɛ gannugannu gosin ayikungban e ɖu gu tɔn e ji
lɛ jɛfutee lɔn nu acɛ gba mɛ wu yetɔn wa nu do wu tɔn a
hwenu tomɛxo lɛ ylɔ ɛ ɖɔ e wa emi e ɔ e wa tlolo
lɛ etɛ sixu jɛfutee wa nu gbɔn
nugbododo tɛ lɛ ɖo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ sixu jɛfutee
etɛ nyi nu taji hugan nu jɛfutee
jɛfutee nyi hlɔnhlɔnnɔ ɖe tuun izlayɛli tɔn kpo mɔyizi ɔ kpo ganji
jehovah wa nu gbɔn xa togun tɔn e ɛ nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ do ɖagbe kpo nyanya kpo wu
lɛ jɛfutee zan nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ enɛ ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ hwenu e jlo wa nu vovo lɛ e
e tuun linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do xomɛsin kpo hlɔnbiba kpo wu e kpo mawu jlo ɖɔ togun emitɔn yi wan nu yeɖee lɛ gbɔn e kpo
nu enɛ ɔ ɔ ɛ e wa nu xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ jɛ mɛ wan lɛ e ji gbɔn e xa levii vi lɛ
e ci ɖɔ jozɛfu sin jɛfutee ɖɔhun
e sixu jozɛfu ku nublawu nu nɔvi tɔn lɛ gbɔn e co wan wɛ
tamɛ linlin do enɛ wu sixu jɛfutee wa nu jehovah jlo gbɔn e
nu jɛfutee tɔn lɛ wa e tawun
ahwanfunfun do nyikɔ jehovah tɔn kpo togun tɔn kpo tamɛ nyi nu taji nu jɛfutee hu nu ci e
linlin tɔn enɛ bɔ jehovah do nu e kpo izlayɛli vi lɛ kpo eblee lɛ
mi sixu jo nugbododo mawu tɔn lɛ do bɔ mi bɔ mi zan klisanwun gbɔn ɖo egbe
jɛfutee tɔn nu mi a
mi ɖo lɔn nu xomɛsin bonu mi jo jehovah sinsɛn do a
jɛ kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ gɔn ji alo ɖɔ emi kun zan hwenu kpo agun ɔ kpo o gbeɖe o
mi wa nu jɛfutee ɖɔhun setonu nu jehovah
enɛ mi bɔ mi ɖu ɖo ninɔmɛ vɛwu lɛ ji bɔ mi lɔ nyi ɖagbe ɖe hlɔmanu lɛ kolosinu lɛ
jɛfutee tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo hudo alɔdo mawu tɔn tɔn cobo hwlɛn izlayɛli vi lɛ gan sin vi lɛ lɔ mɛ
e nu jehovah ɖɔ enyi e blo bonu emi ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji ɔ emi ɛ mɛ nukɔntɔn gosin xwe emitɔn gbe wa kpe emi hwenu emi lɛkɔ e vɔ e nɔ do ɔ ɖɔhun
lɛ etɛ nyi tinmɛ enɛ tɔn
jehovah wan nu do enɛ wu ɔ mi tuun ɖɔ jɛfutee kun ɖo do wɛ tlɔlɔ o
ðo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ ɔ e nɔ do e nyi nunina bunɔ ɖe bɔ mɛɖe nɔ xwle jehovah bi
enɛ wu ɔ ɖiɖɔ wɛ jɛfutee ɖe ɖɔ mɛ emi jehovah e wa ɖo goxɔ tɔn mɛ nu gbɛhwenu tɔn kpo e bi
jehovah ɖoto jɛfutee ɛ ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji bi
lɛ jɛfutee jehovah
etɛ xo jɛfutee tɔn ɖo lɛ mɛ e do nuɖiɖi tɔn wu
tamɛ do xo e ɖɔ ɖo xota elɔ tɔn e ji
hwenu jɛfutee lɛkɔ sin ahwangbenu e ɔ mɛ nukɔntɔn wa kpe e wɛ nyi vi nyɔnu tɔn eɖokponɔ gee wɛ e ɖo
jɛfutee nɔ gbeji nu akpa tɔn a
e vi nyɔnu tɔn jehovah ɛ ɖo gɔxo tɔn mɛ nu gbɛhwenu tɔn kpo e bi a
nugbododo ɖo mawu ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖo jɛfutee wa nu sɔgbe e
e sixu flin xo e ɖɔ ɖo mɛ e e wɛ nyi ɖɔ togun mawu tɔn ɖo jlo do nu tɔn hugan e jehovah
ɔ ɖɔ hwenu mɛɖe ɖe nu jehovah e ɔ e blo nu e ɖɔ e ɖe hwe a
sixu nɔ ɖo jɛfutee hwenu e ɖɔhun ɔ jɛfutee ɖo ɖe akpa e do e enyi e tuun nu e byɔ ɖo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo eɖesu kpo si e ɔ nɛ
ðo vi nyɔnu tɔn wa ɖo goxɔ ɔ mɛ wu ɔ e gbeɖe a e ji vi gbeɖe a
enɛ wu ɔ mɛɖebu ɖu jɛfutee sin nyikɔ kpo ayikungban tɔn kpo sin gu a
lɛ e ɖo co jɛfutee ɖɔ kpo gbejininɔ kpo ɖɔ do akpa nu mawu mavɔmavɔ hun sixu gɔn ɖiɖe nɛ
lɛ jehovah yi ɖaxo jɛfutee sa e do
nɔ gbeji jɛfutee ɖɔhun a
akpa tɛ gege mitɔn do
mi sixu ɖɔ mi ɖo gbeji gbɔn
hwenu mi ze mitɔn jo nu jehovah e ɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa jlo tɔn e gbɔn ɖebu ɔ nɛ
mi tuun ɖɔ e kun nɔ bɔwu hwebinu nu e ɖe akpa enɛ o
mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn hwenu e byɔ mi ɖɔ mi wa nu mi yi wan a e e
enyi mi ɖu ɖo nu ci nu mi lɛ e ji jlo do setonu nu mawu hun mi ɖɔ mi nɔ gbeji nu akpa mi do e nɛ
mi sixu se ɖo lanmɛ ɖo vɔsisa mitɔn wu nyɔna jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ tunfla hwebinu
malacii bɔ jɛfutee sin vi nyɔnu ɔ lo
e yi akpa tɔn do e gbɔn
mi sixu ɖe nuɖiɖi jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo ɖɔhun gbɔn
vi nyɔnu jɛfutee tɔn wa nu gbɔn nu akpa tɔn do e
akpa jɛfutee do e gbɔn vo nu tɔn
ɖɔ emi vi sunnu emitɔn samuwɛli wa ɖo goxɔ mawu tɔn mɛ nyi nazilinu ɖe
samuwɛli ɔ yi gbe bɔ nazilinu ɖe sixu ɖo xwedo
e vi nyɔnu jɛfutee tɔn jo bi vɔ e nɔ do ɔ ɖɔhun enɛ wu ɔ e mɔ awajijɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖo xwesi nyinyi alo nɔ nyinyi mɛ e a
lɛ tamɛ
e jlo e ɔ e sunnu hugan ɖo to ɔ mɛ e ɖo tɔn wɛ nyi gan ɖo izlayɛli
din ɔ e huzu ɖo goxɔ mawu tɔn mɛ
ɖyɔvi enɛ wa nu gbɔn
e ɖɔ jehovah tɔn wɛ jɛ nukɔn ɖɔ nu tɔn ɖɔ wa nu xa mi hwiɖesunɔ ɖɔ gbɔn sin towe mɛ e
lɛ e jlo e nɔ ɖo nu asu alo vi e do do sixu jehovah
mi sixu ɖo linlin mɛɖee do tɔn eɖɔhun gbɔn
mi sixu ɖi nu jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo ɖɔhun gbɔn
xo ɖo eblee lɛ mɛ e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu bɔ nɔ hwiɖee do gbɔn
klisanwun dɔnkpɛvu kpo ɖyɔvi kpo mɔkpan nɔ jlo do asudida alo asidida alo vijiji do jɛ fi mi ɖe din e
ðo jlo ayi yetɔn bi ɖo jehovah sinsɛn ji hugan
ɔ mɛxomɔ mitɔn ɖe lɛ hwenu zan xa vi yetɔn lɛ alo vivu yetɔn lɛ e do
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ blo tuto nɔ gblo ada nu nɔ wa nu jehovah e ɖo flin sin taan mɛ
e wɔn vɔsisa wanyiyinɔ enɛ lɛ tɔn gbeɖe a
xa eblee lɛ bɔ hwɛ lo
kpewu nuɖe lɛ do ba do jehovah hu gbɔn e a
etɛ biblu tɔn kunkpla jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo e mi mi sixu wa nu ɖɔhun gbɔn
etɛ jɛfutee ɖu ɖo tagba gege ji
e jo jehovah do ali ɖo gbɛzan tɔn mɛ
e lɔn nu mɛ lɛ e gbidi kɔ a
mɛ lɛ flu co e nɔ gbeji
jehovah do nu jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo ɖo jlo do sa e wu
e gbɔn mɛ we lɛ ji blo bɔ izlayɛli vi lɛ kpo ɖo sinsɛn ɛ wɛ
hwenu mɛ ɖevo lɛ tlɛ jo nuɖagbewiwa do e ɔ jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo nɔ gbeji nu jehovah
biblu ɖɔ xwedo mɛ ɖi nu ɖo sɔxwixwe nɔ mɔ nu sin akpa mawu do ɔ yi ɖo enɛ wu lɛ e tɔn
eblee lɛ nu mi wa nu jɛfutee kpo vi nyɔnu tɔn kpo ɖɔhun hɛn do ayi mɛ ɖɔ enyi mi nɔ gbeji ɔ jehovah do nu mi
e nɔ do e e ɖɔ e nɔ do lɛ e sin xo ɖo mɔyizi ɔ mɛ
enyi izlayɛli vi ɖe jlo jehovah ɖɔ nu e wa nu emi e su nukun emitɔn mɛ tawun ɔ e nɔ kanlin ɖe bɔ lɛ nɔ do ɖo vɔsakpe ɔ ji nɔ nyi e nɔ do bi e
flin sin taan taan jɛ nukɔn nu flin ɔ e flin ɔ ɖesu hwenu kpo taan bɔ zaan lɛ e kpo wɛ nɔ nyi
hweɖelɛnu ɔ xwejisun lidosun kpo nuxwasun kpo bi nɔ
nɔ aceji bonu suulu didɛ nw ɖo ɔ wa kpikpe bonu zin jɛ ayi ɖo nu ɖebu mɛ a jaki
etɛ bɔ dɛ
nukunɖeji mɛ dɛ ɖo nu lɛ e tɔn tɛ lɛ tuun
ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ didɛ ɖo ɔ wa kpikpe
etɛ dɛ kpo mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo dɛ e sixu mi
ɖiɖe ɖo e sɔgbe kpo luki kpo ɔ etɛwu didɛ ɖo taji
kpo mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo nya madiaani vi lɛ kpo mɛ nu lɛ kpo zanmɛ bɔ ayi hɔn nu kilomɛtlu
nu cikɔ nu
loɔ ɖu ɖo ahwan ɔ ji a ɖo ahwan xa sɔja
ðo enɛ lɛ gbidi kɔ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ nu xwe mɔkpan wutu ɔ sixu do gudo fɔ a
mi lɔ ɖo ahwan vɛwu cikɔ nu mɛ ɖe wɛ
mitɔn lɛ wɛ nyi sataan e kpacɛ e kpo miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ kpo
mɛɖe lɛ ɖo mi mɛ ɖo ahwan xa enɛ lɛ wɛ sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie
kpo alɔdo jehovah tɔn kpo ɔ mi ɖu ɖo ahwan gege ji
mi ɖu bi a
hweɖelɛnu ɔ nu sixu cikɔ nu mi do ahwan ɔ funfun wu
kabi ninɔ nyanya elɔ sin vivɔnu sixu kpe mi
jezu nu mi ɖɔ mi mɔ tɛnkpɔn lɛ kpo nukunvandomɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ kpo ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn lɛ mɛ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi mi dɛ ɔ mi ɖu
xa luki
etɛ nɔ nyi didɛ
etɛ mi bɔ mi dɛ
etɛ mɛ dɛ wa yi lɛ e sin sixu mi
mi sixu blo bɔ didɛ mi ɖo ɔ wa kpikpe gbɔn jaki
ðo biblu mɛ ɔ didɛ ɖo nu nyi e yi gbe nu ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe xo kpowun a
e kunkpla linlin alɔkpa mi nɔ ɖo do mɛtɛnkpɔn mitɔn lɛ wu e kpo nu nɔ ci nu mi do wu e kpo
didɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔ nɔ gbeji nɔ ku hun
wema alɔdlɛndonu tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ didɛ nyi jujɔ ɖe nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖo nukun nu syɛnsyɛn nɔ xo nu kpla hwenu mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ kpannukɔn mi e a
e nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ lido nɔ syɛn so enyi mi tlɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn hugan bi lɛ e mɛ ɔ nɛ
e nɔ bɔ mi nɔ ɖu ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn enɛ lɛ ji bɔ mi nɔ ɖe ayi mitɔn sin se wɛ mi ɖe e ji nɔ ɖo nu nya wɛ mi ɖe e ji
etɛwu mi sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ wanyiyi wɛ nɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ dɛ
wanyiyi nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ dɛ xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
ðo ali tɛ lɛ
wan yi nu jehovah nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ dɛ ɖo nu ɖebu e do lɛ e
luki wan yi nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ dɛ ɖo nuwanyido yetɔn lɛ
byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e hlɔnhlɔn
jehovah wɛ nyi mawu sɔxwixwe didɛ nw kpo kanmɛsyɛnsyɛn kpo nɔ gosin e
hlɔmanu lɛ eɖokponɔ gee wɛ mɔ nukunnu jɛ ninɔmɛ mitɔn nu nɔ ci nu mi e kpo nu mi nyi e kpo wu bi
enɛ wu ɔ e tuun nu sin hudo mi ɖo tawun do sixu dɛ e
biblu ɖɔ ji nuɖe jlo mɛ ɖo sisi lɛ ɔ e nɔ blo nu su xo ɔ e nɔ se nɔ hwlɛn gan
ðɛhan mawu nɔ sinkɔn nu ɖɛ mi nɔ xo do sixu mɔ hlɔnhlɔn dɛ lɛ e gbɔn
enyi mi byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e mi bonu mi dɛ ɔ e ɖɔ emi ɖe ali nu mi bɔ mi sin mɛ
xa kɔlɛntinu lɛ
e nɔ wa gbɔn ðo hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu ɖe mɛtɛnkpɔn ɔ siin
ɖo ninɔmɛ gege mɛ ɔ e hlɔnhlɔn mi bonu mi do sixu ku hun ɖo nu lɛ bi kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
kolosinu lɛ lobɔ ɖo jehovah tuun dogbo agbaza mitɔn tɔn ayi mitɔn tɔn kpo nu nɔ ci nu mi e kpo tɔn ganji wutu ɔ e lɔn gbeɖe bonu ninɔmɛ ɖe syɛn bɔ gbejininɔ glo mi a
nu nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn hɛn nuɖiɖi towe lido
etɛwu nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖo taji
ɖokpo ɔ mi ɖo hudo nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn gege tɔn do sixu dɛ kpe nu nya wɛ mi ɖe e wu
mi ɖo kudeji hwenu nu nukplɔnkplɔn mɛɖesunɔ tɔn nɔ yi kple lɛ
nu enɛ lɛ wiwa mi nu sin hudo mi ɖo hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido e jaan
sɔgbe kpo jɔbu kpo ɔ etɛ ɖo atɛ ji hwenu mi ɖo tɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ e
hwenu ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ e ɔ etɛ ji sixu tamɛ do
flin ɖɔ emi ɖo nɔ gbeji nu mawu
hwenu mi ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ e ɔ nu hugan mi nɔ se lɛ e wɛ ɖo atɛ ji
gbejininɔ mitɔn nu mawu tɛnkpɔn wɛ e ɖe
mi nɔ wa nu gbɔn ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ mɛ e nɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ jehovah do mɔ axɔsu wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn jɛ e a ji
gbɔn e
mawu tɔn sataan klan gbe xa acɛkpikpa tɔn zun hwenu e ɖɔ ɖɔ cejɛnnabi wutu wɛ lɛ nɔ ɛ e
sataan ɖɔ nɔ jo nu e ɖo ɔ bi nɔ do hwlɛn eɖee tɔn gan
enɛ gudo ɔ sataan ɖɔ do jɔbu wu ɖɔ nu alɔ towe jɛ wu tɔn din bonu ɖɔ e donu agbawungba a ji
jɔbu sataan ɖyɔ sin hwenu e ɖɔ xo enɛ e wɛ a
xwe mɔkpan gudo ɖo hwenu e nya sataan sin jixwe e ɔ e kpo ɖo hwɛ do mawu lɛ wɛ zan keze
egbe ɔ sataan kpo ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ cejɛnnabi wutu wɛ lɛ nɔ mawu
e ɖo biba wɛ nukunmyatakin ɖɔ mi acɛ mawu ɖo ɖu axɔsu e ɛ ɖe o
hwenu ɖo mɔ wɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖe mɛ e ɔ nɔ tamɛ do nu elɔ ji
sataan kpo awovi lɛ kpo ɖo akpa ɖokpo xwe
ɖo nu wa e ɖo ɖiɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ hwi jo gbe
lɔ mɔ gan do wɛ ɖe e ɖo wusyɛn do lanmɛ nu wɛ
xomɛ hun ɖɔ kpewu ɖo didɛ wɛ ɖo gbeji nu jehovah
bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ se bɔ jehovah ɖo ɖiɖɔ nu wɛ ɖɔ vi yi nunywɛ bonu xomɛ hun mi enɛ ɔ hɛn ɔ kɛnu nu mɛ nɔ ɖo nu ɖɔ wɛ e nunywɛxo
jezu ayi ɖo ajɔ didɛ tɔn hɛn wa lɛ e ji
sixu wa nu jezu ɖɔhun ayi ɖo ajɔ didɛ nɔ hɛn wa lɛ e ji gbɔn
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖo tomɛ yi wɛ
ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ e wa byɔ ɖɔ gbɔn ali gaga gbɔn do glɔ e ɖe ji
mi ɖe e sixu ci tomɛyiyi enɛ ɖɔhun
hwenu syɛnsyɛn lɛ sixu wa bɔ sixu wa mɔ ɖɔ tagba emitɔn lɛ hugan emi
nu sixu ci nu jezu
e do winnya ɛ bɔ e mɔ gege hwenu e xwe e do yatin ji e
hwenu vɛwu hu bi ɖo tɔn mɛ e wɛ enɛ nyi
etɛ ɛ bɔ e dɛ
biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo awajijɛ e ɖo ɔ flin wɛ
e tuun ɖɔ mɛtɛnkpɔn ɔ wa nɔte lobɔ ajɔ ɖo jixwe nu emi e nɔ ayi sɔyi
egbe ɔ tagba mɔ wɛ ɖe lɛ e sixu vɛwu flin ɖɔ wa nɔte
miɖokponɔ wɛ ɖo dɛ wɛ a
do do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu klisanwun lɛ bonu dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn vovo nɔ gosin sataan lɛ e ɔ wlan ɖɔ lido ɖo nuɖiɖi mɛ syɛnlin ɖo awovi nukɔn ɖo tuun ɖɔ nɔvi mitɔn gbakpe ɔ bi mɛ lɛ ɔ ɖokpo ɔ mɔ wɛ ɖe
nu mɛ ɖeɖee dɛ ɖo ji lɛ e mɔ lɛ e mi nɔ gbeji gbɔn e mi ganjɛwu mi ɖɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖu flin mi ɖɔ gbejininɔ mitɔn hɛn le wa
jaki nu mi ɖɔ xo do ɖe lɛ ji tinmɛ ɖo vivɔnu e
etɛ e fɔ ɖo jikpa edɛni tɔn sin ali lɛ e sin mi
lɛ nyi wɛnsagun susunɔ lɛ
ee adamu kpo ɛvu kpo hu hwɛ gudo e ɔ jehovah ɖe ɖe lɛ ɖo ayikungban ji
enɛ gbɔn vo nu ee nɔ wa ɖo jixwe e tawun
yetɔn sixu mi mi dɛ gbɔn ɖo hwenu e ɖe syɛnsyɛn ɖe nu mi e
nw biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ enɛ lɛ hlun nu ɖɔ alo mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo hugan e ɖe nu emi e a
nu cikɔ nu do ɔ wu a jo gbe a
e wa ɔ wa yetɔn yi jɛ hwenu e fo do e vlafo ɖo xwe jɛji gudo ɖo sinvɔgbɛ ɔ hwenu
jɔbu kpewu dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn tɔn lɛ gbɔn
nya jɔbu
alo vlafo syɛnsyɛn kabi towe ɖe wɛ ku
nu ɖebu wɛ e tlɛ nyi ɔ jɔbu tɔn sixu do gbɔ nu
jɔbu jɔbu tuun nu wu tagba vovo lɛ kpannukɔn ɛ ajijimɛ e a co e jo gbe a
nu taji ɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e yi wan nu jehovah jɛ do a
jɔbu hwe ɔ kpo e nyla kpo ɔ jɔbu nɔ ɖo mawu nukunmɛ
enɛ ganjɛwu jɔbu ɖɔ jehovah ɖo tagba tɔn lɛ ɖo hwetɔnnu
jɔbu bɔ nu jɛ e nɛ
mawu mavɔmavɔ ninɔmɛ tɔn bi bloɖo
nu jɔbu ɖo lɛ bi ɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɛ mɔhunkɔtɔn donu we
sɔgbe kpo kɔlɛntinu lɛ kpo ɔ didɛ pɔlu tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
nukunvandomɛ syɛnsyɛn alo yadonumɛ ɖi xwi xa wɛ ɖe a
mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe wɛ nu alo lɛdo tɔn ɖe wɛ nu bɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ tunfla a
enyi wɛ ɔ pɔlu tɔn sixu
e doya nu pɔlu syɛnsyɛn bɔ agun lɛ sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ hwebinu
kɔlɛntinu lɛ pɔlu jo gbe a bɔ tɔn do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
ɖokpo ɔ dɛ dɛ wɛ ɖe e sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ dɛ
kpikpe tɛ didɛ ɖo wa
na mi sixu blo bɔ didɛ wa kpikpe gbɔn e tɔn ɖe lɛ
mawu mɛ nu ahwanvu jaki wlan ɖɔ nɔ aceji bonu suulu didɛ nw ɖo ɔ wa kpikpe bonu zin jɛ ayi ɖo nu ɖebu mɛ a
jaki didɛ sixu wa kpikpe ɖo mi wu gbɔn
hwenu mi ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɖe mɛ ɔ mi sixu wu ɖɔ mi ɖo nɔ ɖo suulu nu ɖo nɔ su mi nukunmɛ alo mi ɖo ɖe wanyiyi hu tɔn
hwenu mi ɖo didɛ wɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɔ e ɔ mi ɖe jujɔ enɛ lɛ hu mi nɔ blo gbɔn e bɔ mɛ ɔ gbɛzan klisanwun tɔn mitɔn
enyi mi dɛ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ ɔ gbɛzan klisanwun tɔn mitɔn nɔ akpaxwe ɔ kpo ɔ kpo
ðo didɛ ɖo nu sixu blo bɔ mi nyi klisanwun ɖagbe lɛ wutu ɔ mi jlo gba jehovah tɔn do ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn ɔ a
ði ɔ enyi ɖo xwi ɖi xa linlin blibli lɛ wɛ hun lɔn gbeɖe jɛ tɛnkpɔn mɛ o
byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e bonu ɖe linlin masɔgbe lɛ sin ayi mɛ
hɛnnumɔ towe ɖe ɖo gbe klan xa wɛ wɛ a
jo gbe gbeɖe o
kudeji kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ jiɖe ɖo do jehovah wu e syɛn
flin ɖɔ do ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ ɔ mi ɖo dɛ hlɔmanu lɛ jaki
nu wu e ɖo taji ɖɔ e dɛ jɛ vivɔnu e do nuɖe wu ee mi ɖo sisɛkpɔ vivɔnu ɔ wɛ e ɔ jiɖe tɛ mi sixu ɖo
e nyi hwenu klewun ɖe kpowun wɛ mi ɖo dɛ a jɛ vivɔnu wɛ
tamɛ do tɔjihun ɖo syɔsyɔ wɛ e ɖe wu
do gan ɔ mɛ ɖo tɔjihun ɔ mɛ lɛ e ɖo lintɔ jɛ age ji
mɛ jɛ ɔ ji tlolo bɔ awakanmɛ ku e kutɔ
ɖokpo ɔ mɛ sɛkpɔ age ɔ ji bi jo gbe e kutɔ
enyi mi jlo nɔ ɔ mɛ ɔ mi ɖo ɖo didɛ wɛ zɔn mi yi
nu mi ɖo linlin pɔlu ɖo e e ɖɔ awakanmɛ ku mi a kɔlɛntinu lɛ
pɔlu ɖɔhun ɔ mi kudeji bi ɖɔ jehovah mi bɔ mi dɛ jɛ vivɔnu
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ klisu yi wan nu mi ɔ do alɔ mi bɔ mi ɖo ɖuɖeji bi gbidigbidi
ðo ɖeji ɖɔ nu ɖebu kun sixu ɖe mi ɖo vo nu wanyiyi tɔn o mi ɖo oo mi ɖo ku oo nu ɖebu sixu ɖe mi ɖo vo nu wanyiyi tɔn a wɛnsagun lɛ acɛkpikpa lɛ kpodo hlɔnhlɔn ɖo jixwe lɛ ɖebu kpo sixu ɖe mi ɖo vo nu wanyiyi tɔn a jɛn nu ɖo jijɛ wɛ egbe lɛ kpodo ee wa jɛ sɔ lɛ e kpan sixu ɖe mi ɖo vo nu wanyiyi tɔn a e nɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ nugbo wɛ ɖɔ nu cikɔ nu mi hweɖelɛnu
nu mi wa nu kpo mɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ɖɔhun
nu cikɔ nu co jo gbe a
ɖo yetɔn lɛ gudo lɛ
akpaxwe ɔ didɛ ɖo nu togun mawu tɔn egbe tɔn gbigbeje lɔ sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
nɔvi mitɔn ɖo ethiopie malawi kpo russie kpo lɛ e tɔn ɖo annuaire tɔn tɔn kpo tɔn kpo mɛ
akpaxwe ɔ biblu ɖɔ nabi e ɖe enɛ e a
nɔ ɖokan do ɖo nɔvi mɛ wu
kple agun tɔn lɛ nɔ wa ɖagbe nu mi gbɔn e
mi nɔ mɛɖevo lɛ hwenu mi yi kple lɛ gbɔn e
e nɔ ci nu jehovah hwenu mi yi kple lɛ e
klisanwun lɛ nɔ ɖɔ kplekple ɖo nɔ akpakpa emi gbɔn
fɔtoo ɖo e etɛ ji mi ɖɔ xo do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
hwenu corinna ɖo xwe e ɔ e wli nɔ tɔn ɛ yi ɖo fi e nɔ ɖo syɛnsyɛn kɔ ji nu mɛ ɖe e ɖo fi ya fi ɖe
nukɔnmɛ ɔ e kpla corinna sin xwe tɔn gbe blo kilomɛtlu mɔkpan do ji tɔn yi siberie
finɛ ɔ e nɔ ɖo gle ɖe bɔ e nɔ doya kannumɔ ɖe ɖɔhun
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e nɔ hɛn ɛ gannugannu ɖɔ e ɖo hwenu avivɔ nɔ glasi tɛntin wɛ e ɖe ɖɔhun e e nɔ do awu sixu jɔhɔn e a
corinna ɖɔ mi jo mitɔn do ɖo gbadanu ɖi zɔnlin yi pipaan gaa ɖo kilomɛtlu do finɛ e
