tagba jɛ yi kple ɔ e vivi nu corinna tawun
e ɖɔ ðo kple ɔ ji ɔ mi atɔxwɛ jihan axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ
e do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi tawun bɔ nu mi mɔ lɛ e lɔ hɛn nuɖiɖi mitɔn lido
togun jehovah tɔn sin mɛ lɛ nɔ jlo nɔ xa yeɖee hwebinu
ði ɔ akpakpa nɔ klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ ɖɔ kple jehovah nu do wutu tɔn
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ hwi lɔ nɔ jlo yi kple lɛ
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu towe lɛ bi kpo ɖɔhun ɔ sixu mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu bɔ e nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
boya ɖo nu hwenu gege alo ɖo nu gege wa alo nu nɔ cikɔ nu hwebinu
enyi wɛ ɔ etɛ mi bɔ mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi nɔ yi kple mitɔn lɛ
mi sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu biblu mitɔn lɛ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo bɔ yi kple mitɔn lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ gbɔn
xota elɔ tinmɛ nu wu kple lɛ yiyi nyi ɖagbe nu mi nɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ hɛn xomɛ hun jehovah e tinmɛ ɖo vivɔnu e
kple lɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nu do jehovah wu gbɔn
kple lɛ nɔ mi
kple lɛ bi nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nu do jehovah wu
ði ɔ e lin din a bɔ agun gege wema donsepo jehovah ɖo biblu kplɔnkplɔn agun tɔn sin hwenu
e ci nu hwenu mi ɖɔ xo do jijɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wu bɔ se nu nɔ ci nu nɔvi towe lɛ do wutu tɔn e
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ enɛ bɔ yi wan nu jehovah
ðo kple lɛ ji ɔ mi nɔ nu ɖevo lɛ do biblu wu gbɔn toɖiɖo xoɖiɖɔ lɛ lɛ kpo biblu xixa kpo ganji gblamɛ
nɛɛmii tamɛ do nu tobutobu mi nɔ mɔ hwenu mi nɔ ɖo nu nu biblu xixa wɛ e kpo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ ɖɔ bɔ mi nɔ se lɛ e kpo ji
kple lɛ bɔ zan nu ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e bɔ towe gbɔn
kple lɛ nɔ mi mi zan nu mi ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ gbɔn e
tɛsalonikinu lɛ ði ɔ yi atɔxwɛ kplɔnkplɔn ɖe tɛnmɛ bɔ jlo wa nu gege ɖo jehovah tɔn mɛ blo bɔ ɖɛ towe lɛ alo hwɛ kɛ nɔvi sunnu ɖe alo nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe a
kple mi nɔ yi ɖo aklunɔzan gblamɛ tɛntin e sixu mi jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ alo mɛ ɖevo lɛ bɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ nugbo biblu tɔn lɛ mɛ gbɔn e mi matie
kple mitɔn lɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi nɔ hlɔnhlɔn mi gbɔn
kple lɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
sataan tɔn nɔ tɛnkpɔn nu nuɖiɖi mitɔn sixu bɔ mi flu bi alo awakanmɛ ku mi
kple mitɔn lɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi nɔ mi hlɔnhlɔn bonu mi kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ
xa
hwɛhwɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖɔ xo do ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e nɔ jɛnu gbɔn e ji
enɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo ganjɛwu ɖɔ akpa jehovah do do sɔgudo wu lɛ e jɛnu
enyi hwenu nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo xwle xoɖiɖɔ yetɔn lɛ mi e kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi a loɔ nɔ wa hwenu nɔ xosin nɔ jihan sin ayi mɛ do kpa nu jehovah e
kɔlɛntinu lɛ ɔ hwenu mi nɔ ɖɔ xo xa jɛ nukɔn nu kple lɛ kpo kple lɛ gudo kpo e ɔ enɛ nɔ fa kɔ nu mi ɖo mi ɖo nu mitɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nugbo nugbo lɛ e gege kɔlɛntinu lɛ
kple mitɔn lɛ nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi nɔ mi hlɔnhlɔn bonu mi kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ
etɛwu e ɖo taji tawun ɖɔ mi nɔ wa kple lɛ
ðo kple lɛ ji ɔ mi nɔ mɔ alɔdo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn
jezu nɔ zan gbigbɔ enɛ do ali agun lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi ɖo se nu ɖɔ nu agun lɛ wɛ gbigbɔ ɖe ɔ ganji
gbigbɔ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖi xwi xa mɛtɛnkpɔn lɛ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ kpo akɔnkpinkpan kpo
e sixu mi bɔ mi wa nu sɔgbe lɛ e
enɛ wɛ bɔ mi ɖo wa nu wu mi kpe e bi nɔ yi kple mitɔn lɛ mɔ alɔdo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn
enyi nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo mɔ mi ɖo kple lɛ ji se nu mi xosin jihan ɔ e nɔ gbɔn
gbavi nu e lɛkɔ xwe xwe ɔ e nɔ mɔ eɖee mɛ hwebinu
ðo kple lɛ ji ɔ ali nɔ hun nu mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo ɖɔ mi yi wan nu
mɛ gege ɖo agun mitɔn mɛ ɖo didɛ wɛ ɖo tagba syɛnsyɛn lɛ
pɔlu wlan ɖɔ nu mi kpe nukun do miɖee wu
eblee lɛ mi sixu ɖɔ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ sin nu nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi gbɔn kple lɛ yiyi do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu miɖee lɛ gblamɛ
enyi mi yi kple lɛ ɔ mi nɔ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɖɔ mi jlo nɔ xa ɖɔ xo xa nɔ ɖɔ nu ɖe nu e ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
mi nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu hwenu se xosin mitɔn lɛ kpo mi nɔ ji sin ayi mɛ lɛ e kpo e kolosinu lɛ
tinmɛ xo jezu tɔn ɖo jaan mɛ e mi bɔ mi tuun nu wu e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi nɔ kple kpo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo e gbɔn e enyi mi nɔ wa kple lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɔ mi sixu mɛ mɛ tɔn lɛ e ɖe gbɔn
xa jaan
jezu eɖee do ɖe wu bɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ci lɛngbɔhwan ɖe ɖɔhun
tamɛ do nu elɔ wu enyi we ɖo so ɖe ji bɔ we ɖevo ɖo tɔdo ɖe mɛ lobɔ ɖokpo ɖo fi ɖevo ɔ enɛ lɛ nyi lɛngbɔhwan ɖe a
gbeɖe ɖo bu wɛ lɛngbɔhwan ɖe nɔ nɔ nɔ xwedo ɔ
ɖokpo ɔ mi ɖo nɔ zɔ nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ gbɔn kple lɛ gingɔn gblamɛ a
mi ɖo nɔ bu nyi lɛngbɔhwan ɖokpo xwedo ɖokpo
kple mitɔn lɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔ bu xwedo wanyiyinɔ ɖe ɖɔhun
ðɛhan mɛɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ bɔ xwedo yetɔn tɔn lɛ ɖi yetɔn lɛ alo nɔvi sunnu yetɔn lɛ alo nɔvi nyɔnu yetɔn lɛ
jezu ɖɔ emi xwedo ɖe yi wan nu kpe nukun do wu
enyi nɔ yi kple lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ ɔ sixu huzu ɖe nɔ ɖe nɔvi sunnu ɖe alo nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe nu mɛɖe ɖo agun ɔ mɛ
tamɛ linlin do enɛ ji bɔ mi jlo wa nu wu mi kpe e bi nɔ yi kple lɛ bi
ɔ azɔn nɔ do tagba nu mi tawun nɔ bɔ kple lɛ yiyi nɔ vɛwu nu mi
enyi yi finɛ ɔ sixu ɖu vivi nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn jiwu jehovah sɔnu tɔn lɛ e tɔn
hwenu se bɔ agun mitɔn jihan xota tɔn nyi whiwheno ton e azɔn nukɔntɔn e ɔ ɖasin wa yi do mi
e vivi tawun
nu nɔ mi bɔ nɔ se nu e yi gbe mɛ lɛ bi tɔn bɔ ji xwedo
finɛ yiyi nɔ tawun george xwe
enyi mi setonu nu jehovah tɔn ɖɔ mi nɔ wa kple lɛ e ɔ e nɔ ci
ðo kple lɛ ji ɔ mi nɔ nu sin acɛ jehovah ɖo e
ðo e wɛ nyi ɔ wutu ɔ mi ɖo doku wli kpa xa
mi sixu wa ɖo kple lɛ ji hwenu mi xoɖɛ jehovah jihan do kpa ɛ ɖɔ xo do wutu tɔn e
ali jiwu ɖe wɛ hun nu mi ɖo aklunɔzan gbla lɛ bi mɛ bɔ mi nɔ jehovah
jehovah nɔ ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ mi jlo tawun yi kple lɛ bɔ gan mi nɔ do nɔ yi lɛ e nɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ
tonu mi nɔ se nu gbeɖiɖe jehovah tɔn ɖɔ mi nɔ yi kple lɛ e nɔ ci
jehovah blo mi bɔ mi ɖo setonu
e ɖegbe nu mi ɖɔ mi nɔ kple ɖo ɖo taji ɔ din mi ɖo vivɔnu ɔ sɛkpɔ wɛ bi e
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi setonu nu gbeɖiɖe enɛ ɔ xomɛ nɔ hun jehovah
jaan e nɔ ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ mi jlo tawun yi kple lɛ bɔ gan mi nɔ do nɔ yi lɛ e nɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ eblee lɛ
mi nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah kpo vi tɔn kpo ɖo kple lɛ ji gbɔn
enyi mi yi kple lɛ ɔ mi nɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi jlo sɛkpɔ e kpo vi tɔn kpo
ðo kple lɛ ji ɔ mi nɔ biblu bɔ jehovah nɔ nu mi ɖo wa e kpo mi ɖo zan mitɔn gbɔn e kpo mi
ezayii enyi mɛ tlɛ nɔ jehovah a lɛ e ɖe lɛ wa kple lɛ ji ɔ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mawu ɖo ali mi wɛ
kɔlɛntinu lɛ jehovah nɔ nɔ gudo nu kple mitɔn lɛ kpo gbigbɔ tɔn kpo bɔ nu mi nɔ ɖo finɛ lɛ e nɔ gosin tɔn
enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi yi kple lɛ ɔ mi nɔ ɖoto nu jehovah nɔ ɖɔ lɛ e nɔ mɔ e yi wan nu mi e nɔ sɛkpɔ ɛ
jezu nyi gan nu agun ɔ e ɖɔ fi mɛ we abi mɛ atɔn kple ɖe ɖo nyikɔ mɛ ɔ ɖo tɛntin yetɔn
matie biblu ɖɔ ɖɔ jezu ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wɛ ɖo agun lɛ tɛntin
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah kpo jezu kpo ɖo xa mi nɔ ɖo hlɔnhlɔn mi wɛ ɖo kple mitɔn lɛ ji
nɔ ɖɔ e nɔ ci nu jehovah hwenu e nɔ mɔ bɔ nɔ ɖo nu wu kpe lɛ e bi wa wɛ do sixu sɛkpɔ e kpo vi tɔn kpo e
kple lɛ yiyi nɔ mawu ɖɔ mi jlo setonu gbɔn
enyi mi nɔ yi kple lɛ ɔ mi nɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi jlo setonu
jehovah nɔ hɛn mi gannugannu ɖɔ mi wa nu e ɖɔ e a
ezayii enɛ wu ɔ enyi mi setonu nu gbeɖiɖe tɔn ɖɔ mi nɔ wa kple lɛ e ɔ mi nɔ ɛ ɖɔ mi yi wan nɔ yi gbe ɖɔ e ɖɔ nu mi wa e nu mi
hlɔmanu lɛ ði ɔ enyi gan mitɔn byɔ mi ɖɔ mi zɛ xwe wu bɔ mi yi kple mitɔn lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ a ɔ etɛ mi wa
alo acɛkpikpa lɛ sixu ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi mɛɖe kple jehovah ɔ e gbo akwɛ e yi ganmɛ alo e nu syɛnsyɛn ɖe do dɔn to
kabi ɖo hweɖelɛnu ɔ mi sixu nɔ jlo kpowun wa nuɖe lɛ gɔn kple lɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo mɛ ɔ mi wɛ ɖo ɖɔ nu mi wa e
enyi mi setonu nu jehovah hweɖebunu ɔ xomɛ nɔ hun nunywɛxo
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ kple lɛ ɖo taji tawun nu klisanwun xwe kanweko nukɔntɔn ɔ tɔn lɛ
kple klisanwun tɔn lɛ nɔ ci nu nɔvi george gangas
ee klisanwun lɛ kple ɖo pantekotu xwe tɔn gudo e ɔ nɔ kple hwɛhwɛ nɔ jehovah
nɔ ɖokan do lɛ sin nukplɔnmɛ kpodo ɖo nɔvi mɛ kpo wu
acɛkpikpa hlɔma tɔn kpo sinsɛngan jwifu lɛ tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo do nu wɛ ɔ nɔ gɔn kplekple ɖo a
e nɔ bɔwu a co nɔ wa nu wu kpe lɛ e bi nɔ kpo ɖo kplekple ɖo wɛ
egbe ɖesu ɔ kple lɛ nɔ su jehovah lɛ nukunmɛ tawun bɔ tɛn tɔn mɛ ninɔ nɔ vivi nu
george gangas nyi ɖokpo ɖo ɔ mɛ nu xwe jɛji e ɖɔ nu nyɛ ɔ xa nɔvi lɛ ɖo kple lɛ ji nyi ɖokpo ɖo nu nɔ mi awajijɛ hugan ɖo mɛ e mɛ e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
nɔ nɔ mɛ nukɔntɔn yi kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ lɛ e mɛ nɔ mɛ gudo tɔn sin mɛ lɛ e mɛ enyi e blo ɔ nɛ
enyi ɖo xo ɖɔ xa mɛ mawu tɔn lɛ wɛ ɔ awajijɛ nɔ ayi mɛ
ɖo tɛntin ɔ e nɔ ci ɖɔ xwegbe wɛ ɖe xa xwedo ɖɔhun ɖo palaɖisi gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ
hwi lɔ nɔ ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ do jehovah sinsɛn wu a
enyi hun nɔ ɖo nu wu kpe lɛ e bi wa wɛ do nɔ xa nɔvi lɛ ɖo kple lɛ ji enyi e vɛwu ɔ nɛ
jehovah ɖɔ ɖo linlin ɖokpo ɔ axɔsu davidi ɖɔhun eyɛ ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ yi wan nu xwe gbe ɖe e ðɛhan
akpaxwe ɔ nɔvi sunnu mitɔn kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn ɖe lɛ kpo nɔ sixu yi kple lɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ a ɖo ninɔmɛ do a e ɖe lɛ wu
ði ɔ sixu ɖo azɔn syɛnsyɛn ɖe jɛ wɛ
sixu kudeji ɖɔ jehovah tuun ninɔmɛ yetɔn bɔ gan do wɛ ɖe do ɛ lɛ e bi nɔ su nukun tɔn mɛ tawun
mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu bɔ nɔ ɖoto kple lɛ gbɔn alokan ji alo xo lɛ yiyi do kan ji wa xo nu gblamɛ
akpaxwe ɔ gbavi hwɛjijɔ ðeɖee wu mi nɔ yi kple lɛ e
jehovah nɔ mi
e nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi
mi nɔ mɔ alɔdo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn
ali nɔ hun nu mi bɔ mi nɔ nɔvi mitɔn lɛ ɖɔ mi yi wan nu
mi nɔ nɔ bu xa nɔvi mitɔn lɛ
mi nɔ nu sin acɛ jehovah ɖo e
mi nɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi jlo sɛkpɔ e kpo vi tɔn kpo
mi nɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi jlo setonu
mi nɔ kple nɔ mawu mi yi wan nu jehovah jlo setonu enɛ wu ɔ akpakpa nɔ mi bɔ mi kpo nɔvi mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔ kpa
fɔtoo ðo akpa ɔ ji e
nɔvi lɛ nɔ wa nu wu kpe e bi nɔ jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ wayuu sin mɛ lɛ
mɛ enɛ lɛ yi wan nu mawuxo sise
hwɛhwɛ ɔ nɔ yi toxo ɔ mɛ nɔ sa nu ɖagbeɖagbe ɖeɖee nɔ blo lɛ e
ðo toxo ɔ mɛ ɔ nɔ se wɛnɖagbe ɔ gbɔn kunnuɖiɖe agbawungba tɔn gblamɛ
e nɔ sa wema elɔ a
nu e ɖo alɔkpa ɖevo mɛ a ɔ wemafɔ e ɖe do wema elɔ mɛ lɛ e gosin biblu fɔngbe tɔn mawuxowema mɛ bɔ mi wlan ɖo alɔkpa mɛ e nɔ wlan nu gbɔn ɖo egbe e
enyi nu biblu nɔ ɖɔ lɛ e tlɛ nɔ jɛ ji nu mɛ lɛ ɔ nɔ mɔ hwebinu ɖɔ e ɖo dandan ɖɔ emi xo mawu tɔn ɖo xa mi a
mi gavin tɔn
e nɔ yi kple ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ e jlo ɖɔ e biblu xa emi a
gavin tinmɛ ɖɔ emi kun tuun nu nabi ɖe ɖo biblu mɛ o emi kun jlo nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɔ nu jɛ wu o
e ɖo xɛsi ɖi wɛ ɖɔ e byɔ emi ɖɔ emi byɔ sinsɛn mɛ e jlo ɖɔ e flu emi a
etɛ e sixu blo bɔ e gavin a
tamɛ do nu ɖagbe nukplɔnmɛ biblu tɔn lɛ sixu wa nu mɛɖe e wu
jehovah ɖɔ nu izlayɛli vi lɛ ɖɔ xo lɛ ja ahun ɖɔhun
gba fo ɖo gbigba kɔn nyi gbe ji wɛ ɖɔhun
nu mi nuɖe lɛ do ahun wu mitɔn do sixu lɛ bi ganji timɔtee
ahun nɔ gba fo
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe wɛ ahun nɔ sɔnu nu fifa ɖo jɔhɔn mɛ nɔ wa kun sin tewuntewun
xogbe jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ja ahun ɖɔhun gbɔn
mi nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu ɖɔ yeɖesunɔ nu wa gbeta yeɖesunɔ tɔn kɔn
enyi mi keya nu mɛ lɛ gbɔn ɔ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ yi gbe nu nu mi ɖɔ e bɔ mitɔn hugan
enyi mi nu do ali vovo mi mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖe bɔ nu gege do nugbo ɔ wu e ji ɔ mitɔn fa kɔ nu
nɔvi sunnu nɔ nyi chris xwle biblu kplɔnkplɔn gavin jɛ nukɔn e do cɔcɔ bonu e yi gbe a
e wa ɔ e tɛnkpɔn mɔ ali vovo e blo bɔ do biblu ji vivi nu gavin hugan e
enɛ gudo ɔ chris tinmɛ ɖɔ biblu tɔn bɔ emilɛ kudeji ɖɔ biblu nyi xo nugbo
mɛ ɔ ɖɔ xo gege ɖo do lɛ jɛ gbɔn e wu
enɛ lɛ fa kɔ nu gavin bɔ gudo mɛ ɔ e yi gbe nu biblu kplɔnkplɔn
ahun ɖo dandan nu
enyi alun ɖo izlayɛli ɔ ji sixu nɔ ja nu gege
fifa ahun nɔ e mɛvo ɔ atin lɛ xu ku
jehovah ɖɔ ɖɔ hwe mitɔn ci aku wɛ ɖo ɖɔhun enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ xo ɖɔ wɛ jehovah ɖe ɔ sin kɔ xu lɛ
micee jaan wɛn jla wɛ mi ɖe e ɖo nuɖuɖu jehovah tɔn ɖeɖee mɛ nugbo ɔ sin kɔ xu lɛ e mɛ
wɛn enɛ xɔ akwɛ nu mi a
ahun nyi nyɔna ɖe gosin jehovah
mitɔn sixu nyi nyɔna ɖe alo nunina ɖe nu mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yi lɛ e
biblu kplɔnkplɔn nyi nyɔna ɖe nu gavin ɖo e ɛ mɔ xosin nu nukanbyɔ tɔn lɛ bi
e yawu yi nukɔn blo baptɛm lobɔ din ɔ e kpo asi tɔn joyce kpo nɔ ɖu wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jijla sin vivi
jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla gbɔn ayikungban ɔ bi ji wɛ
mitɔn do ahun wu sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ nukunnu jɛ mɛ ɖɔ kan mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ van ɖo ɔ mɛ e nyi nu xɔ akwɛ
sin nɔ kun tewuntewun lɛ e nɔ wa nu ɖe a enyi livi mɔkpan kɔn nyi ayi ɔ ayikungban ɔ nɔ fa
ɖokpo ɔ nu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ wa ɖo ɔ mɛ e sixu nɔ sɔ ɖo nukun mitɔn mɛ
enyi e xo gandido jehovah livi mɔkpan lɛ tɔn kple ɔ e nɔ mɔ ɖɔ e ɖekunnu gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
matie mitɔn nɔ ci nyɔna gosin jehovah e ɖɔhun nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ a
ganji wɛn mitɔn ci ahun ɖɔhun enɛ wɛ nyi ɖɔ e gba fo fa ɖo dandan nu
mɛ tɔn wɛ lɛ e felisa kpo araceli fernandez kpo
xwe gege ɖie ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu kpɛvi araceli sin xomɛ suxo ɖɔ ɖɔ xo ɖe nu mi o
jlo ɖoto xo ɖebu do sinsɛn towe wu a
e nɔ mi
wan nu
xogbe tɔn lɛ gblewu mi tawun
xwe wɛ ɖo din cobo kpo ɖo xo enɛ lɛ flin wɛ ceɖeceɖe
ɖɔ hwenu e fo nuɖe do ɔ e hu hwenu e e felisa
felisa su ɖo xwedo wamamɔnɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ ɖo espagne xwedo nɔ yi katolika bɔ mi nyi sinsɛnnɔ tawun
nugbo ɔ hɛnnumɔ wɛ nyi yɛhwenɔ alo nɔ ɖo amisaxwe
nɔ nɔvi sin vi ɖokpo nyi yɛhwenɔ nyi ɖo wemaxɔmɛ katolika tɔn ɖe
ee e ku gudo e ɔ paul ii wli ɖɔ e nyi mɛ
nɔ wa bɔ nɔ nɔ wa
mi mɛ tantɔn wɛ ji nyɛ wɛ nyi viɖaxo ɔ
hwenu ɖo xwe e ɔ tohwan ɖe ɖo espagne
ahwan ɔ gudo ɔ e wli do ganmɛ ɖo acɛkpikpa ɔ yi wan nu linlin toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn tɔn lɛ a
e vɛwu nu nɔ mɔ nuɖuɖu kpe mi bi e
enɛ wu ɔ e nɔvi nyɔnu kpɛvi atɔn araceli lauri kpo ramoni kpo do toxo bilbao tɔn mɛ bonu yi nɔ lɛ kpa ɖo yɛhwenɔkpa ɖe mɛ
nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ mɔ nuɖuɖu kpe e ɖo finɛ
araceli ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ hwe ɔ lauri ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ bɔ ramoni ɖo xwe ɖo wɛ
mi jɛ mɛ mitɔn lɛ sin do tawun
nu wɛ mi nɔ jla ɖo ɖo yɛhwenɔkpa ɔ mɛ xwe we gudo ɔ lɛ mi do yɛhwenɔkpa ɖaxo ɖe mɛ ɖo saragosse fi e nɔ kpe nukun do mɛxomɔ lɛ wu ɖe e
mi ɖo syɛnsyɛn jla adoxwɛ ɔ sa ɖo enɛ nɔ bɔ nu nɔ cikɔ nu mi tawun
felisa hwenu nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ yi yɛhwenɔkpa mɛ ɖo saragosse e ɔ nɔ kpo nylɔ nyi yɛhwenɔ ɖo xa ɔ mɛ e kpo ɖɔ ɖɔ emi nyi lɔ do
jlo blo bɔ nɔ zɔ nu nyavi yi wan nu mi e
jlo yi zan hwenu ɖe ɖo yɛhwenɔkpa ɖe mɛ ɖo yi wan nu mawu wutu
nɔ yi amisa gbe bi gbe bɔ tlɛ jlo huzu katolika tɔn ɖe nɔ nɔvi vi ɖo aflika e ɖɔhun
yɛhwenɔkpa saragosse tɔn espagne amyɔxwe lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn nacar colunga tɔn ɖisixwe
ɖo yɛhwenɔkpa ɔ mɛ ɔ mɔ ɖɔ kun sixu wa nu jlo wa lɛ e gege o
lɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mi bonu ma mawu ɖo to ɖevo mɛ gbɔn e a
enɛ wu ɔ xwe ɖokpo gudo ɔ lɛkɔ wa xwe wa kpe nukun do nylɔ nyi yɛhwenɔ e wu
nɔ wa lɛ bɔ mi nɔ zan ɖɛxojɛkan do xoɖɛ ɖo ɖo gbadanu lɛ bi
yi wan nu folowa lɛ tito ɖo amisaxɔ ɔ mɛ nɔ nu ɖiɖe kpo mɛ enyii lɛ kpo tɔn
araceli hwenu ɖo saragosse e ɔ do akpa nukɔntɔn ɖeɖee ɖo dandan cobɔ e nɔ huzu ɖe e
enɛ gudo ɔ lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ emi klan nɔvi nyɔnu lɛ kpo nyi kpo
enɛ wu ɔ mi do yɛhwenɔkpa ɖe mɛ ɖo madrid lauri do yɛhwenɔkpa ɖe mɛ ɖo
ramoni ci saragosse
do akpa wegɔ ɖeɖee e nɔ do cobo nɔ huzu ɖe e ɖo madrid
mɛ gege wa nɔ yɛhwenɔkpa ɔ mɛ ɖi wemaxɔmɛvi lɛ kpo mɛxomɔ lɛ kpo
e sin enɛ wu bɔ
nɔ ɖo yɛhwenɔkpa mɛ ɔ sin dotooxwe
nɔ ci ɖe ɖɔhun e
ɖɔ mi zan hwenu gege do xa biblu nu
nu vo sese wɛ mɔ
mɛɖebu nɔ zan biblu alo tlɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo do mawu abi jezu wu a
latin gbe kpɛɖe nu do mɛ enyii katolika tɔn lɛ sin gbɛzan wu
syɛnsyɛn wɛ mi nɔ zan hwenu mitɔn gege do wa kpowun
wa byɔ mɛ
mɔ ɖɔ ɖo akwɛ do mɛ lɛ e hu ɖɔ ma ɖo yɛhwenɔkpa mɛ do do dɔkun nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖɔ xo nu ɖaxo bi ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ jlo yi
e su mi do xɔ ɖe mɛ
e vɛdo ɖɔ enɛ bɔ huzu gbe wɛ sin
lɛ ɖe mi sin xɔ ɔ mɛ hwenu ɖo ayi wu ɖɔ kpo ɖo biba gosin yɛhwenɔkpa ɔ mɛ wɛ jɛn wɛ e ɔ su mi do xɔ ɔ mɛ
ee blo azɔn atɔn gudo e ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ enyi wlan nu elɔ ɔ nyi sixu yi ɖo yiyi wɛ ɖo jlo sataan jo mawu do
e ci kliwun nu mi
jlo tawun yi wlan xo enɛ lɛ a
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ jlo ɖɔ xo nu yɛhwenɔ ɖe bɔ ɖɔ nu jɛ lɛ e
e byɔ gbe yɛhwenɔgan ɔ ɖɔ emi lɛkɔ nu mi yi yɛhwenɔkpa ɖo saragosse e mɛ
yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɖo ɔ gbe mi ɖɔ ma yi
enɛ gudo zaan ɔ lauri kpo ramoni kpo lɔ gosin yɛhwenɔkpa mɛ
felisa
felisa taan kpɛɖe gudo ɔ wli alɔ yi nɔ cantabrie ɖo tokpɔn espagne tɔn ɖe mɛ
kpo ɖo amisa yi wɛ ɖo gbesisɔmɛ
aklunɔzangbe ɖokpo ɖo amisa ɔ yɛhwenɔ ɔ suxo kpo xomɛsin kpo ɖɔ wema elɔ
ɖo wema enɛ a jlo ɖo ɖokpo
azan yɔywɛ ɖe gudo ɔ nyɔnu we wa xwe gbe
jehovah tɔn wɛ nu bɔ wema enɛ mi
xa zan enɛ ɖokpo ɔ mɛ
hwenu nyɔnu lɛ lɛkɔ wa e ɔ kanbyɔ mi ɖɔ nyi jlo biblu a ji bɔ ɖɔ ɛɛn
wema nugbo ɔ
nɔ jlo hɛn xomɛ mawu tɔn hun hwebinu
enɛ wu ɔ nugbo ɔ do jehovah wu jɛ wan yi ji tawun
nɔ jlo ɖɔ xo nu mɛ lɛ bi do wutu tɔn
ðo ɔ blo baptɛm
hweɖebunu kpewu do e ɔ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ ɖɔ xo nu xwedo do nugbo ɔ wu
xwedo mɛ jɔ ɖe e ɖo taji ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu araceli nɔ zyan va ɖɔ nu ɖi nu e kun sɔgbe o
araceli ðo e doya nu mi tawun ɖo yɛhwenɔkpa ɔ mɛ wutu ɔ xomɛ nɔ sin mi bɔ ɖo awajijɛ do sinsɛn wu a
kpo ɖo amisa yi wɛ ɖo aklunɔzangbe lɛ bi nɔ zan ɖɛxojɛkan do xoɖɛ gbe bi gbe
kpo ɖo nukunnu mɔ jɛ biblu mɛ wɛ nɔ byɔ mawu ɖɔ e mi
felisa ɖɔ nu e lɛ e nu mi
akpakpa nɔ ɛ do nu e ɖi nu lɛ e wu bɔ ɖɔ e hun taɖu
yi gbe nu nu ɖɔ wɛ e nɔ ɖe lɛ e a
araceli
nukɔnmɛ ɔ lɛkɔ wa madrid ɖo wutu bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ
xwe ɖo xwe ji jɛ wɛ e ɔ wu ɖɔ mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ yi amisa ɖo gbesisɔmɛ lɛ e kun nɔ zan sɔgbe xa nukplɔnmɛ jezu tɔn lɛ o
enɛ wu ɔ jo amisa yiyi do
ɖi nu nu mɛ enyii lɛ alo xo ɔ a ɖi ɖɔ yɛhwenɔ ɖe sixu hwɛ lɛ kɛ mɛ a
tlɛ wuntun sinsɛn tɔn lɛ bi kɔn nyi gbe
tuun nu nu wa wɛ ɖe lɛ e sɔgbe a
awakanmɛ ku mi kpo ɖo ɖɛ xo mawu wɛ ɖɔ jlo tuun
mi
flin ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wa xuxu hɔn azɔn mɔkpan hun gbeɖe a
ɖeji do sinsɛn ɖebu wu a
nɔvi nyɔnu lauri ɖo france bɔ ramoni ɖo espagne
ðo ɔ jɛ biblu ji xa jehovah tɔn lɛ
ganjɛwu ɖɔ felisa ɖɔhun ɔ kun tuun ɖɔ emi ɖo adingban gege wɛ o
nukɔnmɛ ɔ xo go angelines e nyi ɖokpo ɖo mɛ ɖo xa mɛ lɛ e mɛ bɔ mi huzu
e lɔ nyi ɖokpo ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛ
angelines kpo asu tɔn kpo kanbyɔ mi azɔn gege ɖɔ nyi jlo biblu xa emi a ji
nɔ ɖɔ kun sinsɛn xo o wu ɖɔ nyi jlo tawun tuun nu do biblu wu
gudo mɛ ɔ ɖɔ nu ɖɔ e
nu xa biblu ɖesu jɛn zan
ɖo lilɛdogbeɖevomɛ biblu tɔn nacar colunga tɔn
felisa hwenu blo baptɛm ɖo e ɔ wɛ ɖo santander nyi hɔnkan cantabrie tɔn e
mi ɖo yi fi linlin jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ mɛ lɛ bi ɖo gletoxo kanweko mɔkpan ɖo tokpɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ mi nɔ do gaga nɔ wa do kpɛvi sin gletoxo ɖe mɛ jɛ ɖevo mɛ
xwe lɛ ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ biblu xa mɛ gege bɔ mɛ blo baptɛm ɖo mɛ
mɛ nu xa lɛ e gege nɔ yi katolika
ɖo ɖo suulu do wu
nyi ɖɔhun ɔ ɖo hudo hwenu tɔn do tuun ɖɔ nu emi ɖi nu lɛ e kun sɔgbe o
tuun ɖɔ biblu kpo gbigbɔ jehovah tɔn kpo kɛɖɛ jɛn sixu mɛɖe huzu linlin tɔn mɔ nu jɛ nugbo ɔ mɛ
eblee lɛ asu bienvenido nyi kponɔ e blo baptɛm ɖo bɔ nɔ jɛ biblu ji e lin co e ku a
araceli hwenu jɛ biblu xa jehovah tɔn lɛ ji e ɔ ɖɔ kun sixu ɖeji do wu o
hwenu ɖo yiyi wɛ e ɔ nɔ nu gbɔn ɖe a
enyi biblu kɛɖɛ wɛ lɛ nɔ xa mɛ a loɔ nɔ setonu nu nukplɔnmɛ tɔn lɛ
flin ɖɔ xoɖɛ ɖɔ e nu jehovah ɖo jo mi do a hun ali gege nu mi bɔ mɔ nu wɛ ɖe e e wɛ nyi nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ nugbo biblu tɔn
byɔ nɔvi nyɔnu felisa ɖɔ e hwɛ kɛ mi ɖo numasɔgbe ɖɔ lɛ e wu
sin hwenɛnu ɔ mi nɔ dɔn nu xa miɖee ɖe a e wa ɔ mi nɔ ɖu vivi xoɖiɖɔ do biblu ji tɔn
blo baptɛm ɖo hwenu ɖo xwe e
felisa din ɔ ɖo xwe
asu ku bɔ nɔ sixu wa nu gege tɔn ɖɔhun a
araceli yi wan nu xo ɖɔ do jehovah wu nu yɛhwenɔ kpo kpo ɖeɖee nɔ xo go lɛ e bi vlafo ɖo nyi wutu
ɖu vivi ɖagbe tɔn xa mɛ ɖe lɛ bɔ mɛ gege yi wema lɛ kpo xojlawema lɛ kpo
ðo taji ɔ flin yɛhwenɔ ɖokpo
ee ɖɔ xo xa ɛ nu hwenu kpɛɖe gudo e ɔ e yi gbe nu nu ɖɔ wɛ ɖe e
enɛ gudo ɔ e ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ fitɛ sixu yi kpo xwe ɖo e kpo
etɛ agunvi lɛ kpo xwedo kpo ɖɔ
ɖɔ ɖɔ bɔ etɛ mawu ɖɔ
e mɔ ɖɔ hwɛ jɔ bɔ mɔ ɖɔ wu ku
e ci ɖɔ e kun ɖo akɔnkpinkpan huzu o ɖɔhun
sixu wɔn gbe gbe asu ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ emi jlo xwedo mi yi kple e gbeɖe a
e ɖo xwe jɛji cobo yi kple azɔn nukɔntɔn bɔ enɛ gudo ɔ e kple gbeɖe a
e biblu jɛ kunnuɖegbe yi ji
mi wa nu ɖagbe gege ɖo ɖo ɔ mɛ bɔ nɔ flin
baptɛm bloblo tɔn kpo we e ɔ e ku
felisa hwenu jɛ jehovah ji e ɔ nɔvi nyɔnu kpɛvi atɔn klan gbe xa mi
nukɔnmɛ ɔ lɔ wa yi nugbo ɔ
enɛ nyi ɖokpo ɖo nu ɖagbe hugan e mɔ lɛ e mɛ
gbɔn vo nu enɛ ɔ mi sixu ɖu vivi hwenu zinzan ɖo ɖɔ xo do mawu mitɔn jehovah kpo xo tɔn kpo wu tɔn
gudo tɔn ɔ mi bi ɖo jehovah wɛ
araceli ɖo xwe felisa ɖo xwe bɔ ramoni ɖo xwe
mɛ bi kpo ɖo jehovah wɛ kpo gbejininɔ kpo
lauri ku ɖo e lɔ nɔ gbeji nu jehovah
nu nyi mawu tɔn ɔ jo nu mawu matie
etɛ jehovah nɔ do acɛkpikpa tɔn lɛ wu
etɛ mi ɖo wa hwenu e vɛwu nu mi bɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ e
etɛ jehovah ɖeɖee ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ lɛ e sixu mi
mi sixu setonu nu mawu kpo acɛkpikpa tɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn
titu enɛ sixu blo gbɔn
matie mi nɔ nu nyi hlɔma tɔn tɔn ɔ jo nu hlɔma tɔn hwenu mi nɔ setonu nu ɖeɖee acɛkpikpa lɛ lɛ e nɔ ɖo sisi nu gan lɛ nɔ su takwɛ lɛ e
hlɔmanu lɛ e ɖo co enyi acɛkpikpa ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ mi wa nuɖe bonu e sɔgbe kpo jlo mawu tɔn kpo a ɔ mi nɔ nɔ wa kpo sisi kpo hwebinu
mi nɔ ɖɔ mi kun nɔ ɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ o gbɔn
ali mi nɔ nu nyi mawu tɔn ɔ jo nu mawu ɖe e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ ɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ elɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ a
mi nɔ nɔ zɔ nu nu enɛ lɛ
ezayii ðo jehovah wɛ jo lɛ do bɔ ɖo acɛkpa wɛ wutu ɔ mi nɔ klan gbe xa a
mi nɔ ɖo alɔ ɖo nuwiwa nɔ wanyiyi ɖiɖo nu akɔta mɛtɔn lɛ e mɛ a
hlɔmanu lɛ mi nɔ tɛnkpɔn ɖyɔ acɛkpikpa lɛ alo ɖo ɖo lɛ wa nu gbɔn e mɛ a mi nɔ gan alo huzu a
etɛwu mi ɖo ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ
hwɛjijɔ ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ wa nu jezu ɖɔhun eyɛ nyi ɔ tɔn a
e ɖo alɔ ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ alo ahwan mɛ a
jaan hwɛjijɔ ɖevo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi nɔ nɔ gudo nu axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn
ðo mi nɔ nɔ gudo nu acɛkpikpa lɛ tɔn lɛ a wutu ɔ mi nɔ ɖo ayixa ɖe hwenu mi nɔ jla ɖɔ axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn kɛɖɛ jɛn ɖeɖɛ tagba ɖeɖee lɛ nɔ mɔ lɛ e bi e
sinsɛn nuvu lɛ nɔ ɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ lɛ mɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ klan lɛ
ɖo midɛɛ lɛ nɔ ɖo wu zɔ wutu ɔ mi ɖo bu xa nɔvi sunnu mitɔn lɛ kpo nɔvi nyɔnu mitɔn lɛ kpo gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
mi wa gbɔn tuun dɔ wu ɖiɖo zɔ nu ɔ wa vɛwu
etɛwu mi ɖo sɔnu din ba ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ
e sixu nyi ɖɔ fi mi nɔ nɔ e ɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi ɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ mɛ a
sataan tɔn ɔ sin vivɔnu ɖo sisɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ jɛn e vɛwu nu mi bɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ sɔ
egbe ɔ lɛ nɔ ɖo gbe a nɔ tamɛ a bɔ ɖo kinklan wɛ
timɔtee nu enɛ wa nu do nɔvi mitɔn ɖe lɛ wu ɖo huzuhuzu toxoɖiɖɔ tɔn ɖeɖee wa to yetɔn mɛ ajijimɛ lɛ e wutu
mi sixu sɔnu nu wu ɖiɖo zɔ nu ɔ gbɔn e ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do acɛkpikpa lɛ tɔn lɛ wu e
hwenu jehovah da lɛ e ɔ e acɛ bonu kpacɛ do yeɖee a
jelemii e nɔ lɛ bi do mɔ xwedo ɖokpo
acɛkpikpa tɔn lɛ klan lɛ ɖo nɔ vivi ɖɔ to emitɔn hu to lɛ bi
acɛkpikpa lɛ ci acɛkpikpa ɖagbe ɖɔhun ɔ sixu kpewu ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ bi a
ɔ do kɛn axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn jɛ acɛkpa ji sin e
malin malin mɛ din ɔ axɔsuɖuto enɛ su kun do nu acɛkpikpa tɔn lɛ bi xa ðɛhan
mi ɖo wa nu xa mɛ ɖeɖee nyi gan ɖo acɛkpikpa ɖe mɛ lɛ e gbɔn
mawu yi gbe bɔ acɛkpikpa lɛ tɔn lɛ do tiin ɖo sixu blo bɔ fifa kpɛɖe tiin bɔ nu lɛ nɔ tito ji kpɛɖe
enɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ jla axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe
hlɔmanu lɛ mawu tlɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ mi xoɖɛ nu mɛ si acɛkpikpa ɖe lɛ e bonu mi do sixu ɛ ɖo fifa mɛ
timɔtee enyi e wa nu xa mi ɖo ali agɔ ɔ mi sixu byɔ mɛ si acɛkpikpa ɖe lɛ e ɖɔ mi
nu pɔlu wa e nɛ
luki enɛ wu ɔ mi ɖo linlin ɔ do ayi mɛ nu mɛɖe ɖɔ gan acɛkpikpa ɖe tɔn ɖo awovi sin acɛ mɛ a
biblu tinmɛ nu mi ɖɔ mi kun ɖo zun mɛɖe o titu
linlin tɛ mi ɖo nyi alɔ
mi nɔ setonu nu mawu nɔ nɔ gudo nu ɖe alo toxoɖɔgbɛta ɖe a enyi linlin yetɔn lɛ tlɛ sixu wa ɖagbe nu mi ɔ nɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ e sixu nɔ bɔwu nu mi
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ kun xo kpoɖo nu lɛ o ɖɔ hwɛ yetɔn jɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ e kpa wɛ a
efɛzinu lɛ enyi mi jlo ɖo wu zɔ ɔ mi ɖo nyi alɔ nu linlin ɖɔ ɖɔ akpa ɖe xwe sin hwɛ jɔ alo akpa ɖe xwe hu akpa ɖe ɔ xwe e
enɛ jɛ we ɖo xo mi nɔ ɖɔ e kpo nu mi nɔ wa e kpo mɛ
hwenu e vɛwu bɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ e ɔ mi sixu ɖo ayi fa xomɛ gbɔn
ali wegɔ e ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e ɖo ayi ɖɔhun fa xomɛ ɖɔhun xa matie
mi nɔ ɖo ayi hwenu mi nɔ tamɛ do tagba ɖeɖee ɖo nukɔn ja lɛ e ji e
mi nɔ fa xomɛ hwenu mi nɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn enɛ lɛ mɛ e
nu mi ɖɔ xo do ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ ɖe lɛ kpo nu mi sixu wa ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ e kpo ji
etɛ wu mi ɖo miɖee do hwenu mi ɖo xo ɖɔ xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ e
lɛ
mi ɖo miɖee tawun hwenu mɛ lɛ toxoɖiɖɔ sin xo lɛ nyi atɛ ji e
ði ɔ hwenu mi ɖo xo ɖɔ nu mɛɖe do axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn wu wɛ e ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ mi yi gbe nu linlin toxoɖɔgbɛta ɖe tɔn abi gan ɖe tɔn alo mi kun yi gbe o a
mi ɖɔ xo do nu gan lɛ jlo wa ɖeɖɛ tagba ɔ tɔn lɛ e ji a e wa ɔ mi zan biblu do axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn ɖeɖɛ tagba lɛ gbɔn bi e
enyi mɛ lɛ jlo dɔn nu do xota ɖe ɖi sunnu sunnu alo nyɔnu nyɔnu kabi xoɖiɖe ji hun ɖɔ nu mawuxo ɔ ɖɔ e kpo hwɛ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ xwedo nu enɛ ɖo gbɛzan towe mɛ gbɔn e kpo nu
nu se lɛ e do xo jɔ xo ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e wu
xojlajla lɛ
hweɖelɛnu ɔ lɛ nɔ ɖɔ xo ɖo ali ɖe nɔ ɖɔ ɖo gudo nu toxoɖɔgbɛta ɖe tawun
enɛ nɔ jɛ we tawun ɖo to ɖeɖee mɛ acɛkpikpa lɛ nu ɖɔnuese lɛ ɖe e
enyi xojlajla lɛ alo lɛ ɖo gudo nu ɖe ɔ mi ɖo miɖee jɛ linlin ɖokpo ɔ ɖo xa ji a
do bonu ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ nɔ nyi alɔ nu xojlajla nɔ nɔ gudo nu toxoɖiɖɔ lɛ e kpinkpɔn alo xixa
e wa hun tɛnkpɔn ɖeɖee nɔ nɔ ɖe ji a lɛ e
nɔ nu se lɛ e do xo jɔ xo ɖo biblu mɛ lɛ e wu hwebinu timɔtee
enyi nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ nyi nu taji hugan nu mi ɔ e sixu vɛwu bɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ gbɔn
agbaza sin nu lɛ nyinya
enyi akwɛ kpo nuɖokan mitɔn lɛ kpo nyi nu taji nu mi din ɔ mi sixu mɔ ɖɔ wu ɖiɖo zɔ nu ɔ vɛwu
ðo gudo ɔ malawi tɔn gege ɖo jo nuɖokan yetɔn lɛ bi do ɖo ɖɔ emi kun byɔ ɖe mɛ o wutu
e blawu ɖɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ kun jo ɖagbe mɛ ɖe e do o
nɔvi nyɔnu e nɔ ylɔ ɖɔ e flin nu elɔ mɛɖe lɛ kpo mi kpo yi kannumɔgbenu wa byɔ ɔ mɛ ɖo nukɔnmɛ lɛkɔ yi xwe ɖo jlo dɛ ɖo vɛwu ɖo sla bibɛtɛn tɔn ɔ mɛ lɛ e a wutu
mɛ mawu tɔn lɛ gege wa a
ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ sin enɛ wu bɔ ɖo akwɛ gege a alo nu yetɔn lɛ bi bu a eblee lɛ
etɛ jehovah nɔ do lɛ wu
enyi mi jɛ gigo zɛ xwe wu ji do to mitɔn wu ɔ mi sixu wa gbɔn tuun
goyiyi
lɛ nɔ yawu yigo alo nɔ fle ɖo sinmɛ agbaza yetɔn tɔn akɔta yetɔn aca yetɔn toxo yetɔn alo to yetɔn wu
jehovah nɔ ɖɔ ɖe alo kplekple tɔn ɖe hu ɖevo a
mi bi wɛ ɖo ɖo nukun tɔn mɛ
jehovah blo mi bɔ mi gbɔn vo nu miɖee bɔ mi sixu ɖu vivi vogbingbɔn enɛ tɔn nu mi
mi ɖo nɔ go ɖo to mitɔn alo akɔta mitɔn wu ɖɔ e hu ɖevo lɛ bi a
enyi mi nɔ nu gbɔn ɔ e sixu vɛwu nu mi tawun bɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ
enyi goyiyi alɔkpa enɛ jɛ ayi mitɔn mɛ byɔ ji ɔ mi sixu wa gbɔn tuun
enyi nɔvi sunnu alo nɔvi nyɔnu gosin ɖevo ji e ɖe ɖe we ɖe xa ɔ nɔ yawu ɖɔ mi nɔ wa nu lɛ ganji ɖo fi nɔ wɛ a
enyi wɛ hun flin weɖexamɛ taji elɔ nɔ miɖee hwe ɖo mɛ ɖe lɛ nukɔn bonu mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo nɔ mɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɖe lɛ hugan emi filipunu lɛ
ɖɛxixo sixu mi gbɔn
biblu tɔn tɛ
ali atɔngɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ ɖe e wɛ nyi jiɖiɖe do jehovah wu
xoɖɛ byɔ gbigbɔ e sixu bɔ ɖo suulu kpo mɛɖeejiɖuɖe kpo
jijɔ enɛ lɛ hwenu acɛkpikpa ɔ wa mɛtitafunu alo nu agɔ ɖe e
byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e nunywɛ bonu do sixu tuun ninɔmɛ sixu bɔ wu ɖiɖo zɔ nu ɔ vɛwu nu e
byɔ ɛ ɖɔ e bonu wa nu sɔgbe e ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ mɛ
jaki ðo ɖo gbeji nu jehovah wutu ɔ e sixu ze do gankpa mɛ alo doya nu ɖo ali ɖevo lɛ
nu nyi hun xoɖɛ byɔ akɔnkpinkpan do sixu tinmɛ nu wu ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ e nyi wɛn nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ
sixu kudeji ɖɔ jehovah bɔ dɛ xa
wemafɔ biblu tɔn ɖeɖee bɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ lɛ e kpo ɖeɖee tinmɛ ɔ ci e kpo
biblu sixu mi bɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ gbɔn
gbavi xo mawu tɔn hɛn nu ji ku do e lido
jehovah biblu mi do hɛn mi lido
tamɛ do wemafɔ ɖeɖee bɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ e ji
tɛnkpɔn wemafɔ enɛ lɛ do tamɛ nɔ flin ɖo hwenu ɖo biblu ɖo alɔ mɛ a e
nu ɖeɖee mawu ɖɔ do sɔgudo wu bɔ ɖo nukun ɖo wɛ lɛ e ɔ biblu sixu blo bɔ nukunɖiɖo enɛ lido
mi ɖo hudo nukunɖiɖo enɛ tɔn do dɛ ɖo yadonumɛ lɛ
hlɔmanu lɛ wemafɔ ɖeɖee tinmɛ nu ɖeɖee ɖo biba wɛ tawun ɖu vivi tɔn ɖo ɔ mɛ lɛ e nɔ mɔ hwiɖee ɖo
etɛ mawu ɖeɖee ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ e tɔn lɛ sixu mi
nu ɛnɛgɔ mi bɔ mi ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ e wɛ nyi tamɛ linlin do jehovah lɛ tɔn ji
ðo biblu sin taan mɛ ɔ mɛ gege wa nunywɛnu bɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ
flin cadlaki mɛcaki kpo abɛdi nɛgo kpo ɖɔ emi kun bocyɔ nɔte nu acɛkpikpa babilɔnu tɔn e o xa daniyɛli
biblu tɔn enɛ nɔ gege ɖo egbe bɔ nɔ nɔ ɖɔ emi kun to mɛ emi ɖe e sin asya o
jezu ɖo ɖo toxoɖiɖɔ alo nu ɖevo nɔ klan lɛ e mɛ a
e tuun ɖɔ ɖagbe emitɔn ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ
hwe mitɔn ɔ gege nɔ gbeji ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ
e doya nu ɖe lɛ ɖo mɛ wli mɛ ɖe lɛ do ganmɛ tlɛ hu mɛ ɖe lɛ ɖo nɔ gbeji nu jehovah wutu
yetɔn lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi
nɔvi sunnu ɖe nɔ nɔ turquie ɖɔ e hu franz nyi nɔvi sunnu dɔnkpɛvu ɖe e ɖo e ɖɔ emi kun byɔ hitler sin ahwankpa mɛ o wutu
agun towe tɔn lɛ sixu bɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ gbɔn
etɛ kudeji wa
nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu kpo ɖo agun towe mɛ lɛ e sixu bɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ
enyi ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe mɛ hun nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ tuun
sixu biblu do ɖe we ɖagbe xa
ɔ enyi agun ɔ tɔn lɛ mɔ nu jɛ ninɔmɛ towe wu ɔ sixu do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
byɔ ɖɔ xoɖɛ do towe mɛ
mi lɔ ɖo nɔ gudo nu nɔvi mitɔn lɛ xoɖɛ nu
matie do mɔ nyikɔ nɔvi ɖeɖee ɖo ganmɛ lɛ e tɔn ɔ xota ɖo jw org ji nyi temoins jehovah emprisonnes raison leur foi pays e zin presse zin veille juridique
nyikɔ ɖe lɛ byɔ jehovah ɖɔ e nɔvi sunnu kpo nɔvi nyɔnu enɛ lɛ kpo bonu nɔ gbeji efɛzinu lɛ
ee mi ɖo vivɔnu ɔ sɛkpɔ wɛ e ɔ mi sixu ɖo nukun ɖɔ acɛkpikpa lɛ ɖo cɔcɔ do nu mi wɛ bɔ mi nu
enɛ wu wɛ e ɖo taji ɖɔ mi sɔnu din ɖo wu zɔ ɖo elɔ klan e mɛ
akpaxwe acɛkpikpa lɛ xo ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe hwenu e ɖɔ hlɔma tɔn e
akpaxwe ɔ wema les temoins jehovah predicateurs du royaume dieu wexwɛ kpo gbavi dieu ee ɖo wexwɛ ɔ ji ɖo wema le royaume dieu
tamɛ linlin do nunywɛxo matie kpo jaan kpo ji bɔ kan kanɖeji ɖɔ kun wa o e syɛn
wemafɔ enɛ lɛ mi bɔ jɛ adan ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn hwenu a andriy ukraine
ezayii mi bɔ ɖo wu zɔ nu ɔ ɖo mɛtɛnkpɔn hwenu
nɔ mɔ ayijayi tiin ɖo ɔ mɛ hwenu mɛ ɖe ahwanfunnu do gblewu nɔzo tɔn a e ɖo ayi mɛ wilmer colombie
weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn tɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo
nu tɛ lɛ klisanwun ɖe sixu kanbyɔ eɖee hwenu e jlo ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ xa mɛ ɖevo lɛ e
e sixu zan nu atɔn xo matie ɖɔ lɛ e do ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe ɖe lɛ gbɔn
hwɛgbe ɖo lɛ tɛntin e tɛ lɛ xo wɛ e ɖɔ ɖo wema tɔn mɛ
hwɛjijɔ ɖokpo wɛ nyi ɖɔ e lɛ bonu tuun nu wu ɖo nɔ xo fifa kan e
e mi sixu blo gbɔn e mi
biblu tɔn ɖɔ xo do lɛ xa hwɛgbe lɛ gbɔn e ji e xixa nɔ hɛn le wa nu mi
nu enɛ lɛ bi nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ tuun mi ɖo wa nu gbɔn e alo mi ɖo wa gbɔn a e ɖo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ hlɔ
xota elɔ tinmɛ nu wu jehovah lɛ ɖo nɔ ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ e kpo sixu kpewu gbɔn e kpo
ɔ e ɖɔ xo do nugbododo biblu tɔn ɖeɖee sixu mi bɔ mi ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ ɖo kancica ɖagbe xa nɔzo mitɔn lɛ kpo jehovah mawu kpo e ji
linlin tɛ gbakpe ɔ mɛ
etɛ lɛ e ji
sataan wɛ nyi mɛ nukɔntɔn wu kpo hwɛgbe ɖo lɛ tɛntin e kpo sin e
kpo togun nɔ nɔ jlokoko lɛ e kpo wɛ ɔ mɛ bɔ enɛ nɔ dɔn goyiyi cejɛnnabi kpo agbahwlɛnhwlɛn kpo wa
mɛɖebu jo eɖee do bɔ jlo enɛ vunbla ɛ e ɔ linlin sataan tɔn ɖɔ ɖɔ ɖagbe mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ gbe nyinya keya nu wiwa hɛn nu gble do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu gbɔn e nyi nunywɛnu e yi gbe wɛ e ɖe nɛ
jezu mɛ lɛ ɖɔ nɔ ɖeɖɛ lɛ gbɔn
jezu lɛ ɖɔ nɔ xo fifa kan enyi e tlɛ ci ɖɔ wiwa hɛn nuɖe lɛ gble do wu nu ɔ nɛ
ði ɔ e byɔ ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ nyi mɛfifa nyi fifa kan jo nu nɔ dɔn xomɛsin wa lɛ e do nɔ yawu do hwɛ gbɔ yi wan nu yetɔn lɛ
aniwu e ɖo taji ɖɔ e nɔ yawu dohwɛ gbɔ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ bi ɖo kanbyɔ yeɖee
enyi mi nɔ dojijɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn kɛ kpo jlo kpo a ɔ mi sixu kpo mawu kpo a xa luki efɛzinu lɛ
klisanwun lɛ bi ɖo tamɛ ganji do hwɛ kɛ mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo fifa mɛ ninɔ xa kpo ji nugbo nugbo tɔn
nɔ hwɛ kɛ towe lɛ kpo jlo kpo a
xa nɔ vivi nu a
jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ emitɔn lɛ nɔ hwɛ kɛ mɛ
enyi ayixa towe ɖɔ nu ɖɔ hwi ɖo jla nuɖe lɛ ɖo ɖo ali enɛ hun xoɖɛ alɔdo jehovah tɔn do sixu kpewu
enyi e do xomɛsin xomɛ nu mi ɔ etɛ mi ɖo wa
ðo lɛ bi wɛ nyi wutu ɔ e ya ɔ mɛɖe ɖɔ nuɖe alo wa nuɖe nyi do nu jɛn wɛ
nut
hwenu nɔvi sunnu we lɛ wa ɖo ɖoɖo e ɔ nɔvi sunnu sin xomɛ ɔ e jɛ xo mɔ ɖɔ do nu nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ ɖɔ e wu ji
e ɖo co nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɔ flin ɖɔ ji nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ jehovah kpo gbejininɔ kpo ɖo ninɔmɛ syɛnsyɛn lɛ mɛ nu xwe e kudeji ɖɔ nɔvi nyɔnu ɔ kun ɖɔ nuɖe nyi do nu o
ee nɔvi sunnu nukɔntɔn ɔ tamɛ zaan e ɔ e ɖɔ hwɛ towe jɔ
bɔ xo ɔ nɔte ɖo finɛ
etɛ nu enɛ jɛ e
mɛ ɖo wanyiyi e nɔ bu nu do nuwanyido klewun klewun lɛ
xa nunywɛxo
nut enɛ wu ɔ nu nukɔntɔn ɖo kanbyɔ hwiɖee hwenu mɛɖe wa nu xa kpo kpo alo kpo mɛmasi kpo e wɛ nyi ɖɔ hɛn ɔ a e
dandan jɛn ɖo haga ji a
nɔvi nyɔnu ɖe wa nu gbɔn do nukɔn hwenu e mɔ xo ɖɔ do wu tɔn e
linlin mawuxowema ɔ tɔn tɛ ɛ bɔ awajijɛ tɔn bu a
e sixu vɛwu ɖɔ mi nu nu hwenu e mɔ xo ɖɔ do mi wu e
gbexosin mi ylɔ ɖɔ e tɔn
e ɖɔ xo masɔgbe lɛ do tɔn kpo e nɔ zan hwenu tɔn gbɔn e kpo wu
nu enɛ sin xomɛ nu bɔ e yi weɖexamɛ ɖo nɔvi sunnu zin lɛ e
e ɖɔ wemafɔ zan do ɖe we xa mi e mi bɔ kpo ɖo linlin sɔgbe e ɖo do linlin mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn wu wɛ bɔ ayi ɖo mɛ ɖo taji hugan e ji e wɛ nyi jehovah
wemafɔ enɛ flin ɖɔ xomɛ jehovah tɔn hinhɛn hun gbe wɛ e ɖo nya
gbeta enɛ kɔn wa e bɔ e wa nu kpo nunywɛ kpo nu xo masɔgbe e ɖɔ do wu tɔn lɛ e
enyi klisanwun ɖe mɔ ɖɔ hwɛgbe ɖe ɖo nɔzo emitɔn kpo emi kpo tɛntin ɔ e ɖo wa nu gbɔn
etɛ ablaxamu ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe ɖe gbɔn e sixu mi
mi mɛ bi wɛ nɔ wa nu nyi do gbɔn alɔkpa gege mɛ
etɛ ɖo wa
jezu ɖɔ enyi wa vɔsakpe nukɔn ja nuɖe xwle mawu gbe flin ɖɔ hwɛgbe ɖe ɖo nɔzo emitɔn kpo emi kpo tɛntin hun jo vɔsanu xwle mawu gbe wɛ ja ɔ do nyi vɔsakpe ɔ kɔn yi dohwɛ gbɔ xa nɔzo towe enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ wa ze vɔsanu towe xwle mawu
ðo ayi nu gbe ɖo nya e wu
e nyi ɖe fi nɔvi towe ɔ jɛdo ɖe e wutu wɛ a do yi nu hwɛ wa nyi do e gbe dohwɛ gbɔ wutu wɛ
fifa mɛ ninɔ xa mawu mitɔn lɛ ɖo taji hu nu bi
mɛ we lɛ bi wɛ ɖo kanlin bɔ yetɔn lɛ ɖɔ jlɛ ɖo fi kanlin lɛ ɖu nu ɖe e wu
nu enɛ jɛ ɖo e kpo lɔti kpo tɛntin gudo tlolo e ɔ jehovah do nyɔna gege sin akpa
bib
enyi mawu lɛ wa nu sɔgbe xa nugbododo tɔn lɛ ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo ɔ e lɔn gbeɖe bonu nu gu sɔyi a
hwenu e do gbe nu ɖe e ɔ e wa nu gbɔn
ɖaxo tɔn ɖe wɛ tɛ kan nɔvi sunnu ɖe kanbyɔ ɛ ɖɔ e ze eɖee jo ɖo ɔ ji a ji nɔvi sunnu ɔ do gbe ɖe lɛ ci alokan ɔ
kwinkwin ɖe wɛ ɖo e kpo xoxo ɔ kpo tɛntin kpo ɖo tɔn mɔ wɛ
ɔ sin xomɛ a e sixu kpowun a
aklunɔzan gblamɛ ɖokpo gudo ɔ mɛ we lɛ mɔ yeɖee ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn ɖe mɛ
ee xoɖɛ gudo e ɔ ɖɔ xo nu ganxixo ɖokpo bɔ nɔvi sunnu ɔ kpi tɔn
ɔ ɖoto e se xa ɛ wa biblu do tinmɛ nuɖe lɛ bɔ mɛ we lɛ gbado kpo nukiko kpo
enɛ ɔ gudo ɔ nɔvi sunnu ɔ ɔ ɖo ɔ ji wa doku nu ɔ ɖɔ e fa xomɛ xomɛ do emi wu
hwetɛnu mi ɖo zan weɖexamɛ ɖo matie mɛ e
e ɖo co jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ e ɖɔ ninɔmɛ ɖe lɛ nu agun ɔ
xa matie
e ɖo ɛ do mɔ mɛ nyi jwifu a e ɛ do mɔ
egbe ɔ mi ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo ɖe e sin agun ɔ mɛ
nu enɛ nyi ayihundanu a gbɔn e ɖɔ nuwanyido ɔ kun nyi klewun ɖe kpowun o
nuwanyido mɔhun lɛ sixu nyi mɛtitafu alɔkpa ɖe alo sixu nyi jidomɛ hɛn mɛ ɔ gble
ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ kɛɖɛ mɛ wɛ e ɖe afɔ atɔn xo jezu ɖɔ lɛ e ɖe
e sixu byɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ xo xa nɔvi towe azɔn gege do sixu ɖe e ɖo ali ji akpaxwe ɔ
nu nya wɛ jezu ɖe ɖe we enɛ xa mɛ e wɛ nyi ɖɔ e nɔvi ɖe kpo wanyiyi kpo
jɛ nukɔn ɔ e ɖo tɛnkpɔn ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe ɔ mɛ ɖevo lɛ mɛvo
enyi enɛ glo hun hwi kpo lɛ alo mɛ ɖevo sixu bɔ e ɖɔ nuwanyido ɖe tiin nugbo a ji lɛ e kpo ɖɔ xo xa ɔ
enyi bonu kpewu ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe ɔ xa nɔvi towe hun ɖe e ɖo ali ji nɛ
hwenu e tɛnkpɔn azɔn gege ba ɔ glo bi e jɛn e ɖɔ nu mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ
etɛ ɖɔ e hɛn ɔ e xwedo weɖexamɛ jezu tɔn nyi wanyiyi sin nu
ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee mɛ e byɔ ɖɔ nɔvi lɛ ɖe afɔ atɔn xo e ɖɔ ɖo matie mɛ e ɖe lɛ e nɔ tiin a
enɛ tawun ɖo e ɖɔ e nɔ yawu mɔ ɖɔgbotinsa bɔ ninɔmɛ ɔ nɔ wa jɛ fi e jɛ byɔ ɖɔ e ɖe lɛkɔ a e sin agun ɔ mɛ e a
hwɛhwɛ ɔ ɔ nɔ mɔ hwɛ tɔn lɛ nɔ jla ninɔmɛ lɛ ɖo
mɛ e wa nu nyi do e sixu mɔ ɖɔ emi kun ɖo hwɛjijɔ tawun ɖe kpo ɖo hwɛ mɔ nu mɛ ɔ wɛ o sixu gbɔ hwɛ kɛ ɛ
hwenu e ɖe afɔ we jɛ nukɔn lɛ e bɔ e sixu kunnuɖenu tewungbeju nu jɛ e tɔn ceɖeceɖe e jɛn mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ sixu mɛ
enyi mi tɛnkpɔn nɔ fifa mɛ xa miɖee lɛ ɔ nyɔna tɛ lɛ mi mɔ
enyi elɔ kpo ɖo jɛn wɛ ɔ lɛ kpo ɖo nyi wɛ kpo ɖo nuwanyido nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ wɛ
do sixu ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ ɔ mi ɖo tɛnkpɔn nɔ fifa nɔ jɛhun
ðo taji hu bi ɔ mi ɖo kancica ɖagbe ɖe xa jehovah mawu nɔ fifa mɛ ɔ
mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ kpo wanyiyi kpo e wɛ nɔ ɖu vivi nyɔna mɔhun lɛ tɔn
akpaxwe ɔ mɛ ɖevo ɖeɖee ɖeɖɛ hwɛgbe lɛ ɖo fifa mɛ e ɖe lɛ ɖie jakɔbu e kpo esawu kpo bib
jozɛfu e kpo nɔvi tɔn lɛ kpo bib
e kpo eflayimunu lɛ kpo
hwɛ sixu mɔhun ɖevo lɛ wu ɖo biblu mɛ
wɛn nɔ jla e kpo nu wu nɔ jla e kpo mɛ
yetɔn gblo ada gbɔn e mɛ
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ xo jezu tɔn ɖo matie mɛ e nyi atɛ ji
mɛ gege tuun jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo yetɔn lɛ wu enyi hun xomɛ do mi wu alo tlɛ klan gbe xa mi syɛnsyɛn ɔ nɛ
vlafo sixu xo go mɛɖe ɖo towe mɛ bɔ e ɖɔ ɖɔ emi kun yi gbe nu nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e o emi nɔ ɖo sisi nu mi ɖo mitɔn wu
ði mi tuun gbɔn e ɔ jezu ɖɔ ɖɔ e jla wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ wa wɛ mi ɖe e nyi jezu tɔn sin jijɛ
enyi mi ɖɔ ɖɔ midɛɛ lɛ wɛ ɖo enɛ wa wɛ ɔ go wɛ e nyi bɔ mi yi a
sinsɛn gege wɛ nɔ mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ
e ɖo co gan nɔ do lɛ e nɔ hu kunnuɖiɖe mɛɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ nuwiwa sinsɛn tɔn lɛ alo amisa biblo ɖo televiziɔn abi ɛntɛnɛti ji a
nu jezu ɖegbe nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ wa e jɛn nyi enɛ lɛ a
sɔgbe kpo matie kpo ɔ nu ɛnɛ tɛ lɛ ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ ɖo wa
ahwanvu jezu tɔn lɛ ɖo bla alɔ do wu nɔte bɔ mɛ lɛ nɔ wa yetɔn wɛ a
nu bonu setonu nu nu lɛ bi
mi ɖo blo bɔ mɛ lɛ huzu ahwanvu blo baptɛm nu nu bɔ etɛ nyi nu nukɔntɔn mi ɖo wa e
akɔwe biblu tɔn ɖokpo ɖɔ do gbeɖiɖe enɛ wu ɖɔ e yi ɔ ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn wɛ e sixu nyi gbɔn ali ji alo gbɔn ji
gandido ahwanvu ɖokpo ɖokpo tɔn xo ɖɔ wɛ jezu ɖe a alo wɛnɖagbejijla e blo tuto e ɖe xo ɖɔ wɛ e ɖe
xa matie
e wa ɔ e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ e zan ɖɔ lɛ syɛnsyɛn ɖe wɛ bɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ mɛ gege nɔ xisi alɔ do luk
wɛn tɛ e ɖo jla
wlɛnwin tɛ lɛ e ɖo zan
ba tɛ mɛ ɔ ɖo gblo ada ɖo
taan nabi e ɖo blo
etɛwu sixu ɖeji ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ ɖo wɛn jezu ɖɔ e jla e jla wɛ
jezu jla axɔsuɖuɖu mawu tɔn sin wɛnɖagbe bɔ e ɖo nukun ɖɔ ahwanvu emitɔn lɛ lɔ wa
tɛ lɛ ɖo wɛn enɛ jla akɔta lɛ bi wɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
ɖe lɛ tlɛ yi gbe ɖɔ wɛ
yɛhwenɔ ɔ ɖɔ mɛ bi jɔ xlo bɔ sinkɔn ɖokpo ɔ wɛ nɔ ɖɔ wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn
enɛ lɛ jɔ xlo ɖe a gbe ɖokpo ɔ do wɛ ɖe e ɖo nyi gbɔn nu klisanwun nugbo lɛ e
kɔ bɔ atɔxwɛ ee ðo axɔsuɖuto jehovah tɔn jla wɛ e sin wɛn ɖɔ wɛ ɖe
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ sinsɛngan klisanwun lɛ tɔn lɛ kun ɖo wɛn jezu ɖɔ e jla e jla wɛ o
sinsɛngan klisanwun lɛ tɔn lɛ ɖo axɔsuɖuto mawu tɔn jla wɛ a
enyi wa ɖɔ xo do axɔsuɖuto ɔ wu gbeɖe ɔ mɛ gege nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu nɔ ci nu mɛ e alo ninɔmɛ ɖe wɛ ɖo ayi klisanwun ɖe tɔn mɛ
e wa ɔ nataaxwe kpo paskwa kpo hwenu jɛn nɔ flin jezu
ðo tuun wɛn ɖo jla e a wutu ɔ e ɖo kpaca mɛ ɖɔ nu ɖo mɛ bɔ e wa enɛ e lɔ bu do do wɛ a
numasɔgbe tɛ mɛ bɔ e wa ɔ a
etɛ ɖo mɛ bɔ e wa ɔ
e ɖo nyi do jɔ akwɛ gba xɔ ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ wutu a
mɛ ɖo wɛn ɔ jla wɛ lɛ e ɖo le yeɖesunɔ tɔn ɖo wa e wu a
xa
enɛ zawe e ɖo finɛ co sinsɛn gege wɛ akwɛjijɔ alo gandido jɛ dɔkun nɔ vivi
ɖo kpe nukun do sinsɛngan nɔ ɖu sunfifokwɛ lɛ e wu nu gege ɖevo lɛ
ðo ninɔmɛ gege mɛ ɔ klisanwun lɛ tɔn lɛ xo dɔkun gege kple nuɖe
etɛ e sixu ɖɔ do jehovah tɔn lɛ wu ɖo akwɛjijɔ linu
kɔ
e nɔ yi agbanmɛkwɛ ɖo kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn yetɔn lɛ mɛ alo ɖo yetɔn lɛ ji a
ɖe ɖɔ do jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ wa e wu ɖɔ nu nukɔntɔn gbe nɔ nya e wɛ nyi jla wɛn ɔ nu mɛ
ɖo sinsɛngan nɔ wɔ akwɛ ɖu lɛ e ɖe a
etɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ wa enɛ
ðo klewun mɛ ɔ mi nɔ jlo miɖesunɔ tɔn do wa enɛ ɖo mi yi wan nu jehovah yi wan nu nɔzo mitɔn lɛ
jlo do wa nu enɛ ɔ ɖo ezayii mɛ e sin jijɛ wɛ
wlɛnwin tɛ lɛ jezu kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ kpo zan do jla wɛn ɔ
wlɛnwin tɛ lɛ jezu kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ kpo zan do jla wɛnɖagbe ɔ
nɔ yi lɛ ɖo fi ɖebu e sixu mɔ ɖe e ɖo tokpletɛn lɛ kpo xwe lɛ gbe kpo
wlɛnwin enɛ ɖo tuto ji e ɖɔ e kun ɖe mɛɖe ɖo vo ɖo mɛɖe mɛ o
gan do wɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖe ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jijla linu e ci ɖo togun jehovah tɔn tɔn kpa
sinsɛn klisanwun lɛ tɔn lɛ wa nu gbɔn ɖo ali enɛ
gege yetɔn tiin bɔ sinsɛnvi yetɔn lɛ jo bi do nu sinsɛngan nɔ su axɔ lɛ e kpo xomɛhunhun kpo
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ hweɖelɛnu ɔ sinsɛngan ɖe lɛ sixu tɛnkpɔn wɛnɖagbejijla alɔkpa ɖe lɛ
ði ɔ ɖo xwe sin ɔ paul ii wlan do wema mɛ ɖe mɛ ɖɔ sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie wɛ ɖo wɛnɖagbejijla ɔ sin gbe ɖe wɛ
ɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ enɛ ɔ e sixu jo do nu mɛ tuun lɛ e tɔn ɖe a loɔ togun mawu tɔn sin lɛ bi sin wɛ
mɛ nabi sɔ enɛ
jehovah tɔn lɛ lo
yedɛɛ lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ ɖo jijla wɛ ɖɔ jezu nyi axɔsu ɖo acɛ kpa wɛ sin
ði jezu gbɔn e ɔ ɔ nɔ mya nukun nu tawun
mak wema ɖe ɖɔ ji ɔ nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu jehovah tɔn lɛ hu nu ɖevo lɛ bi
mɛ wlan wema ɔ e ɖɔ do xo ɖe ɖɔ e wu ɖɔ enyi kpannukɔn xovɛ mɛɖokponɔ ninɔ kpo azɔn kpo ɔ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ mɛ nɔ wɔn gbeɖe ɖɔ ɖo taji nu emi e wɛ nyi wɛn gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe dido do ɔ sin vivɔ ja e kpo nu e ɖo wa ba gan e kpo wu a
pillars american congregations partners jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo wɛn enɛ jla wɛ nɔ zan wlɛnwin ɖeɖee jezu kpo ahwanvu tɔn lɛ kpo zan e
ba tɛ mɛ ɔ ɖo gblo ada ɖo
e ɖo blo bɔ lɛ huzu ahwanvu gbɔn akɔta lɛ bi mɛ
etɛ ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ blo bɔ jezu tɔn kunkpla ba mɛ ɔ gblo ada ɖo e jɛnu
fɔtoo ɖo lɛ e
do mɔ nukunnu jɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ blo bɔ jezu tɔn kunkpla ba mɛ ɔ gblo ada ɖo e jɛnu gbɔn e wu ɔ nu mi gbeje nuɖe lɛ
din ɔ nabi ɖo axɔsuɖuto ɔ jijla sin jinjɔn biblu ji e wa wɛ e
gbɔn ɔ bi mɛ ɔ livi tantɔn wɛ jlo do ɖo mawuxo ɖɔ wɛ ɖo to mɛ
jiwu ɖe wɛ nyi enɛ bɔ e ɖo wiwa wɛ nu kpo jehovah tɔn kpo a ce ðɛh
mi ma wema lɛ xojlawema lɛ tlati lɛ nu mɛylɔwema ɖaxo kpo flin kpo tɔn lɛ livi mɔkpan
mi ɖe wema vovo lɛ do gbe hugan mɛ
ðo xwe wa yi e kɛɖɛ mɛ ɔ wema junjɔn biblu ji liva ɛnɛ livi wɛ mi
ðo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn sɔgbe ɖo lixo e ji ɔ nu gege tiin do gbe hugan mɛ
ɖevo tɛ ɖo mɔhun wa wɛ
mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ɖo jehovah tɔn lɛ ji
taan nabi e ɖɔ e xɔ
sinsɛn ɖevo tɛ kpo ɖo wɛnɖagbe ɔ jla wɛ ɖo azan gudogudo tɔn taji elɔ lɛ mɛ
mɛ mi nɔ xo go ɖo ɔ mɛ e ɖe lɛ sixu ɖɔ gbigbɔ ɔ ɖo mi ji midɛɛ lɛ wɛ ɖo ɔ wa wɛ
loɔ e nyi kan mi ɖo do ɔ wu e wɛ ɖɔ gbigbɔ mawu tɔn ɖo mi ji a
sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu ɔ sinsɛn ɖe lɛ tɛnkpɔn wa nu jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ wa hwɛhwɛ e nɔ kpewu a
mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ wa enyii ɖe lɛ nu taan ɖe nɔ lɛkɔ yi nɔ wa lɛ e kɔn
mɛ ɖevo lɛ tlɛ sixu tɛnkpɔn gbɔn xwegbe xwegbe co etɛ jla wɛ ɖe
etɛwu mi sixu ganjɛwu ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ ɖo wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla wɛ ɖo egbe
etɛ bɔ mi kpewu kpo ɖo enɛ wa wɛ
ɖetɛ lɛ ɖo wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn jla wɛ doo ɖo egbe
mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖɔ kpo adɔgbigbo kpo ɖɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wɛ
ðo wɛn jezu ɖɔ e jla e jla wɛ mi ɖe e wɛ nyi wɛnɖagbe axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn
ðo mi nɔ yi mɛ lɛ wutu ɔ mi ɖo wlɛnwin sɔgbe lɛ e zan wɛ
nu sɔgbe e wɛ nɔ mi do mitɔn kɔn e wɛ nyi wanyiyi e nyi akwɛ a
ba ɖaxo bi ɔ mɛ wɛ mitɔn ɖe nɔ gbɔn akɔta lɛ bi kpo gbe lɛ bi kpo mɛ
lobɔ mi kpo ɖo enɛ wa wɛ majomajo xwewu xwewu bɔ vivɔnu ɔ wa
nu wa wɛ togun mawu tɔn ɖe ɖo hwenu titewungbe elɔ lɛ mɛ e jiwu tawun
etɛ bɔ e do sixu kpe nu enɛ lɛ bi wu
nu mi bi yi gbe bonu mitɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ kpo ɖo wa ɖo mi wu wɛ bonu mi wa nu wu mi kpe e bi wa mitɔn tim
etɛ lɛ sixu bɔ le ɖo nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe lɛ mɛ e gu mi
wlɛnwin tɛ lɛ sixu mi bɔ mi ɖu le akpaxwe biblu tɔn lɛ bi tɔn
do biba nu nu ɖeɖee e sɔnu tɔn nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ e kpo ee mi nɔ xwle mɛ lɛ ɖo kunnuɖegbe lɛ e kpo sixu hɛn le wa nu mi gbɔn
linlin tɛ jehovah tɔn lɛ nɔ ɖo do biblu ɔ wu
akpaxwe biblu tɔn tɛ yi wan hugan
jehovah tɔn lɛ yi wan nu biblu ɔ
nukplɔnmɛ wu e sixu ganjɛ lɛ e wɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ ɖo akɔnkpinkpan kpo nukunɖiɖo kpo
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi bi wɛ yi wan nu akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe lɛ hugan
mɛɖe lɛ yi wan nu wɛnɖagbe wema lɛ tawun akpaxwe enɛ tinmɛ mɛ alɔkpa jehovah nyi e gbɔn vi tɔn gblamɛ
jaan mɛ ɖevo lɛ tiin bɔ akpaxwe biblu tɔn mɛ ɖe lɛ e wɛ nɔ jɛji nu hugan ɖi ee nu jɛ ɖo malin malin mɛ lɛ e sin ɖo e nuɖe
bɔ ɖo mi mɛ mɔ akɔnkpinkpan ɖo ðɛhan lɛ mɛ alo ɖagbe lɛ ɖo wema nunywɛxo tɔn mɛ a
mɛ bi tɔn wɛ biblu ɔ nyi nugbo
nu nɔ ci nu mi do wema mitɔn lɛ wu
tɛ lɛ mi nɔ ɖe wema lɛ
ðo mi yi wan nu biblu ɔ wutu ɔ mi yi wan nu wema junjɔn biblu ji mitɔn lɛ
ði ɔ nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn mi nɔ mɔ gbɔn wema lɛ alɔnuwema lɛ xojlawema lɛ kpo wema ɖevo lɛ kpo gblamɛ e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
nu wema ɖeɖee nɔ kan jehovah tɔn lɛ bi kpaa e ɔ mi nɔ mɔ wema junjɔn biblu ji ɖevo lɛ bɔ yedɛɛ lɛ nɔ kan ɖe lɛ
ðe lɛ tiin bɔ e sɔnu tɔn do mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ yetɔn lɛ
wema mitɔn e zin lɛ e kpo ee ɖo tɛn ɛntɛnɛti tɔn mitɔn ji lɛ e kpo gege tiin bɔ e sɔnu tɔn nu mɛ nyi a lɛ e
etɛ mi sixu ɖeji ɖɔ e nɔ xɔ akwɛ ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ
gege mitɔn sixu nɔ jlo mɔ hwenu ba xa biblu ɔ kpo wema junjɔn biblu ji lɛ kpo
e ɖɔ xo jɔ xo ɔ mi sixu kpewu hwebinu ayi ɖo nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn ɖe nu mi e bi ji ɖo ba ɖokpo ɔ mɛ a
e ɖo co awovinu ɖe tiin bɔ mi ɖo ɖo aceji
etɛ sixu bɔ nu jehovah sɔnu e ɖe lɛ gu mi
awovinu ɔ wɛ nyi ɖɔ enyi mi nɔ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu gbigbɔ tɔn e sɔnu e ɖe lɛ kun kan midɛɛ lɛ o ɔ le ɖe lɛ sixu gu mi
ði ɔ enyi e ci ɖɔ akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe kun sɔgbe xa ninɔmɛ mitɔn o ɔ lo
alo enyi wema ɖe tiin bɔ midɛɛ lɛ ɖo mɛ e ɖu tawun lɛ e mɛ a ɔ lo
mi nɔ keya nu nu mɔhun lɛ a wɛ a alo mi tlɛ nɔ wɔn nu bi kpowun wɛ a
mi sixu nyi alɔ nu mɔhun gbɔn
nu ɖo taji hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖo hɛn mɛ ɖɔ mawu wɛ nyi jɔtɛn nu gbigbɔ tɔn e sɔnu nu mi lɛ e tɔn
e ɖɔ gbɔn gbeyiɖɔ ezayii ji ɖɔ nyɛ mawu mavɔmavɔ ɔ nyɛ wɛ nyi mawu towe nyi wɛ ɖɔ nu nu ɔ nu
aniwu mi ɖo nɔ xa biblu ɔ kpo ayixa ɖokpo kpo
nɔ xa kpo ayixa ɖokpo kpo
biblu ɖɔ nyi wɛn ɖɔ ji nu e wlan do mawuxowema ɔ mɛ ɔ mawu wɛ bi do ayi mɛ nu mɛ lɛ bɔ ɖo le
enɛ wu wɛ mi ɖo nɔ xa mawuxowema ɔ kpo ayixa ɖokpo kpo
hwenu nɔ ɖo biblu xa wɛ e ɔ nɔ tɛnkpɔn nɔ flin ɖɔ nukplɔnmɛ gege wɛ e sixu mɔ ɖo akpaxwe ɖe wɛ nɔvi sunnu ɖe ɖɔ
e ɖɔ ɖɔ enɛ flinflin nɔ mi bɔ nɔ nu zɛ nu ɖo wɛn e wu
biblu xixa towe ɖo le ɖaxo hɛn wa nu wɛ a
hwenu mi ɖo biblu xa wɛ e ɔ nu tɛ lɛ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee
etɛ nu ɖeɖee e byɔ ɖo mɛ jɛxa ba nyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ e si e mi do jehovah wu
nɔ kan nu byɔ
hwenu ɖo akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe xa wɛ e ɔ nɔ yi ji nɔ kan nuɖe lɛ byɔ hwiɖee ɖi etɛ nu elɔ mi do jehovah wu
sixu zan nu elɔ ɖo mɛ gbɔn
sixu zan do mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
enyi mi tamɛ do nukanbyɔ mɔhun lɛ ji ɔ e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ mi ɖu le gege ɖo biblu xixa mitɔn mɛ
xa timɔtee
e ɖo co enyi mi do nu xosin nukanbyɔ bɔ lɛ e tɔn ɖe lɛ ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ nu enɛ lɛ e byɔ ɖo mɛ jɛxa ba nyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ e si e sixu hɛn le wa nu mi bi ɖo ali gege
etɛ nu elɔ mi do jehovah wu
nu enɛ lɛ jehovah byɔ ɖo mɛ jɛxa lɛ e si e ɖɔ e ɖo nugbododo titewungbe ɖe lɛ bɔ nɔvi agbanɖotananɔ lɛ ɖo xwedo
jehovah jlo ɖɔ mi nɔ ayijayi mɛ ɖo kpɛvi e ɖe lɛ e glɔ
eza enɛ wu ɔ nu ɖeɖee mawuxowema ɔ byɔ ɖo mɛ jɛxa ba nyi mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ e si e flin mi ɖɔ nu mitɔn nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu jehovah tawun
hwenu mi ɖo nu ɖeɖee e byɔ ɖo mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ si e xa wɛ e ɔ mi sixu zan ɖo gbɛzan miɖesu tɔn mɛ gbɔn
mi sixu zan nu enɛ lɛ do mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu ɔ nɔvi sunnu agbanɖotananɔ ɖe ɖo nɔ zan nu enɛ lɛ biblu byɔ e do gbeje eɖee akpa xwe e sixu yi nukɔn ɖe lɛ e
nɔvi sunnu ɖo gan do wɛ ba nyi e ɖe ɖo ɖo ayi jijɔ enɛ lɛ wu tawun ɖo e ɖo tɛnkpɔn ɖo e kpewu gbɔn e
mi sixu zan jijɔ enɛ lɛ klisanwun lɛ ɖo ɖo e do lɛ alo biblu lɛ bɔ mɔ ali ɖeɖee mɛxo agun tɔn jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn lɛ gbɔn vo nu sinsɛngan klisanwun lɛ tɔn lɛ ɖe e
ɔ hwenu mi ɖo jijɔ enɛ lɛ xa wɛ e ɔ mi sixu flin gan do wɛ mɛxo agun tɔn miɖesunɔ tɔn lɛ ɖe do mitɔn mɛ lɛ e
etɛ lɛ mi sixu zan azɔwanu ɖe nu mi lɛ e do
na nu ɖeɖee do akpaxwe biblu tɔn ɖe e sixu ɖe nukplɔnmɛ ɖo vaan tlolo a lɛ e gbɔn e sin ɖokpo
nɔ do nu nu
mi sixu zan azɔwanu ɖe nu mi lɛ e do do nu nu ɖi nu lehun lɛ
wlan akpaxwe mawuxowema ɔ tɔn elɔ
nu mɔhun lɛ sixu mi bɔ nukplɔnmɛ ɖo vaan tlolo a lɛ e zawe nu mi
ði ɔ ɖo ayi ezekiyɛli wu e ɖɔ enyi to ɖe tiin bɔ mɛ lɛ hu hwɛ do mi jo mi do ɔ alɔ jɛ wu
enyi mi do nu nu kpɛɖe ɔ mi mɔ ɖɔ xwe wɛ e wlan akpaxwe ezekiyɛli tɔn enɛ
hwe enɛ ɔ nɔwee kpo jɔbu kpo ku bɔ xwe kanweko mɔkpan wa yi bɔ mawu kpo ɖo gbejininɔ zan e flin wɛ
daniyɛli kpo ɖo
nu e nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ e nɔ gbɔn
sixu hɛn le wa nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ gbɔn
klewun ɖe lɛ ɖie
nu e sɔnu nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ e
ðo xwe wa yi lɛ e mɛ ɔ wema mitɔn lɛ gege wɛ e nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ
ðe lɛ ɖo wema enɛ lɛ mɛ bɔ e sɔnu do nu ɖu ɖo kɔgbidinumɛ lɛ ji ɖo wemaxɔmɛ alo winnyawinnya hwenu tɔn lɛ ji
wema enɛ lɛ xixa sixu hɛn le wa nu mi bi gbɔn
enyi mi xa ɔ e nɔ flin nu ɖeɖee ɖi xwi xa wɛ mɛ winnyawinnya mitɔn lɛ ɖe e mi
mɛ ɔ mi nɔ kpewu nɔ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu
etɛwu klisanwun mɛxo lɛ lɔ ɖo nɔ xa nu ɖeɖee e nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ e
nu ɖeɖee ji wema ɖeɖee e sɔnu nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ e ɖɔ xo do e gege tiin bɔ yedɛɛ lɛ kɛɖɛ wɛ e kan a
xota enɛ lɛ kpo gege ɖevo lɛ kpo ji wɛ e ɖɔ xo do ɖo wema ɖeɖee e sɔnu nu mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ e mɛ
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e sɔnu nu nu enɛ lɛ ɖo alɔkpa ɖe dɔn mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ nugbododo mawuxowema ɔ tɔn zan hwebinu lɛ e ji wɛ jinjɔn bɔ mi bi sixu ɖu le nuɖuɖu gbigbɔ tɔn enɛ lɛ tɔn
alɔ ɖevo tɛ wema mitɔn lɛ nɔ do mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ
nu alɔ wema mitɔn lɛ nɔ do mɛ winnyawinnya lɛ bɔ nɔ ɖu ɖo tagba lɛ ji e ɔ nɔ bɔ nɔ su ɖo gbigbɔ lixo nɔ sɛkpɔ jehovah
sixu do alɔ mɔhun klisanwun mɛxo lɛ lɔ
ði ɔ xota ɖe ɖo reveillez vous
avril tɔn mɛ nyi les jeunes trouver du plaisir a bible
xota ɔ ɖɔ xo do wlɛnwin gege ji bɔ gbavi ɖokpo bɔ e sixu ɖo biblu mɛtɔn mɛ zan
xota enɛ hɛn le wa nu mɛxo lɛ lɔ a
hwebinu wɛ biblu xixa nɔ vɛwu nu mi wɛ nyɔnu xwesi ɖo vi e ɖe wlan
xwedo wlɛnwin ji xota ɔ ɖɔ xo do lɛ e ɖo gbavi ɔ zan wɛ ganji
din ɔ akpakpa nɔ mi do biblu xixa wu
mɔ din ɖɔ wema biblu tɔn lɛ xo nu do akpa ɖokpo ɔ mɛ ci avɔkan ɖeɖee ɖe lɔn ɖe do ɖe mɛ bɔ kanvɔ ɖɛkpɛɖɛkpɛ ɖe e ɖɔhun
le tɛ lɛ nu ɖeɖee e sɔnu bɔ mi nɔ xwle mɛ lɛ ɖo kunnuɖegbe e xixa sixu hɛn wa nu mi
nu e sɔnu nu mɛ nyi a lɛ e
sin wɛ mi ɖo vivi atɔxwɛ e nɔ ɖo kple ji bɔ e sɔnu tɔn nu jehovah tɔn lɛ e tɔn ɖu wɛ
xojlawema mitɔn mi nɔ xwle mɛ lɛ ɖo kunnuɖegbe lɛ e lo
enɛ lɛ lɔ xixa sixu hɛn le wa nu mi a
nujlɛdonuwu ɖe ɖie
mi ɖɔ ɖɔ gbe ɖokpo wɛ bɔ jɛ nukɔn nu xoɖiɖɔ agbawungba tɔn ɔ wu ɖɔ mɛ ylɔ e ɖe wa kplexɔ axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn mɛ
e ɖo gaan ɖɔ xomɛ hun
hwenu ɔ ɖo xoɖiɖɔ tɔn xwle mɛ wɛ e ɔ e ci ɖɔ ɖo tamɛ do jonɔ enɛ ji wɛ ɖɔhun
mi sixu ɖu le mɔhun hwenu mi xa nu mi nɔ xwle mɛ lɛ ɖo kunnuɖegbe lɛ e e
ði ɔ nyi a ɖe hɛn ɔ e mɔ nukunnu jɛ xogbe ɖeɖee e zan do ɖɔ xo do xota biblu tɔn lɛ ji ɖo atɔxwɛ mi nɔ xwle mɛ lɛ e mɛ e wu
ɖokpo ɔ wɛ e nyi nu gege xota e ɖo jw org ji lɛ e tɔn ɖi ee ɖo akpaxwe nukanbyɔ biblu tɔn lɛ sin xosin kpo nu mɛ lɛ nɔ yawu kanbyɔ lɛ e kpo glɔ lɛ e
hwenu mi xa nu enɛ lɛ e ɔ nugbo mi tuun lɛ e nɔ su nukun mitɔn mɛ
ɖokpo ɔ reveillez vous
nɔ blo bɔ ganjɛwu mi ɖo ɖɔ mawu nugbo ɔ tiin e nɔ lido hwɛhwɛ nɔ mi mi jɛhun do nu mi ɖi nu lɛ e ji gbɔn e xa
mi sixu jehovah ɖɔ mi kun nyi ɖumakpamɛsinɔ o gbɔn
nw nu mi ɖo gbigbɔ sin nu ɖe nu mi lɛ e bi zan wɛ zɔn mi yi
akpaxwe ɔ wema mɔhun ɖe lɛ wɛ nyi les jeunes
reponses pratiques akpaxwe kpo kpo nu xota ɖebɔdoɖewu les jeunes ee nɔ din ɖo ɛntɛnɛti kɛɖɛ ji lɛ e
tɛnkpɔn tuun nu aklunɔ jlo ɖɔ wa e efɛ
etɛ gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e sixu wa nu miɖesunɔ kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo
hwenu biblu tawun ɖe mi a e ɔ mi sixu tuun nu jehovah nukunmɛ e gbɔn
jehovah tawun tawun gege mi ɖo xo tɔn mɛ
kɔ ɔ vi mawu tɔn jezu klisu ɖegbe sɛ hun akpakpa mɛ e elɔ nu ahwanvu tɔn lɛ ɖɔ yi nu akɔta lɛ bi bonu huzu ahwanvu
ylɔ ɔ vi ɔ kpodo gbigbɔ ɔ kpo sin nyikɔ do blo baptɛm nu nu bonu setonu nu nu lɛ bi
mawu tɔn lɛ kpo gbeɖiɖe tɔn lɛ kpo nɔ cyɔn alɔ mɛ ji
tonusise nu bɔ sisi mɛɖesunɔ tɔn mi ɖo e jɛji mi lanmɛ syɛn hunsin ɖagbe do awajijɛ awajijɛ ji nu mi ɖo xwedo mɛ
ee ɖo taji hu bi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ gbeɖiɖe jehovah tɔn lɛ xwixwedo jɛ ee ɖɔ ɖɔ e ɖo ɔ mɛ e ji bɔ nu mitɔn nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ nɔ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do mi ji
etɛwu biblu lɛ mi do ninɔmɛ gbɛmɛ tɔn lɛ bi wu a
nukanbyɔ tɛ lɛ mi do ɖo xota elɔ mɛ
e ɖo co ninɔmɛ gege tiin bɔ biblu tawun ɖe do wu a
ði ɔ kunkpla nuzinzan alɔkpa sɔgbe xa klisanwun lɛ e tɔn lɛ ɖo mawuxowema ɔ mɛ a
enɛ ɖe nunywɛ jehovah tɔn gbɔn
nusisɔ lɛ kpo aca lɛ kpo nɔ gbɔn vo ɖo ɔ sin akpa vovo lɛ xwe nɔ ɖo ɖyɔɖyɔ wɛ sin hweɖenu jɛ hweɖenu
enyi biblu nusisɔ kpo kpo alɔkpa jɛxa lɛ e wɛ ɔ ca ɖo egbe
ðo hwɛjijɔ mɔhun lɛ wutu ɔ mawuxo ɔ do gege do nukunkpedomɛwu dotooxwe tɔn kpo ayiɖeɖayi klisanwun lɛ yi gbe lɛ e kpo wu a
enɛ wu ɔ mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo kpo xwedo tɔn lɛ kpo vo wa gbeta jlo lɛ e kɔn ɖo ninɔmɛ enɛ lɛ mɛ
wɛ enɛ ɖe ɖɔ nu mi nɔ wa hwenu e byɔ ɖɔ mi wa gbeta taji lɛ kɔn bɔ ɖe lɛ sixu kunkpla mitɔn tawun e kun nɔ nyi nuɖe ɖo jehovah nukunmɛ o a
enyi mi wa gbeta ɖebu kɔn bɔ e gba biblu tɔn ɖe a ɔ mitɔn jixwe tɔn yi gbe kpowun wɛ a
etɛ mɛ gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e sixu kɔ do nu mi kpo mɛ ɖevo lɛ kpo
mɛɖe lɛ sixu mɔ ɖɔ gbeta kɔn miɖesunɔ nɔ wa lɛ e kun ɖo taji o
e ɖo co do wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe jehovah nukunmɛ lɛ e kɔn ɔ mi ɖo gbeje kpo nugbododo ɖo xo tɔn mɛ lɛ e kpo setonu nu
ði ɔ bonu nu mitɔn mawu nukunmɛ ɔ mi ɖo wa nu sɔgbe xa tɔn kunkpla hun e
gbeta taji ɖeɖee kɔn miɖesunɔ nɔ wa lɛ e sixu kunkpla ganjininɔ mitɔn ɖo gbigbɔ lixo
nu ɖebu ji mi do e kunkpla kancica ɖo mi kpo jehovah kpo tɛntin e e sixu nyi do ɖagbe ji alo do nyanya ji
sisi do nu sɔgbe e ji hɛn kancica mi kpo mawu kpo tɔn lido bɔ ee sɔgbe a e wu
ɔ gbeta sɔgbe a e kɔn wiwa sixu hɛn nu gble do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu ɖo gbigbɔ lixo e sixu doya nu alo tlɛ nyi nu abi e sixu buninɔ agun ɔ tɔn mɛ
e ɖo wɛn ɖɔ gbeta mɛɖesunɔ tɔn kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e ɖo taji xa hlɔmanu lɛ galatinu lɛ
etɛ ji gbeta mitɔn lɛ ɖo jinjɔn
etɛ mi ɖo wa ɖo ninɔmɛ mɛ biblu ɖe tlɔlɔ ɖe a lɛ e
ðo ninɔmɛ mɔhun lɛ mɛ ɔ miɖesunɔ wɛ ɖo gbeje lɛ wa nu jehovah nukunmɛ kɔn nyɔna tɔn e mi ɖo wa nu jɛji nu miɖesunɔ e kpowun a xa ðɛhan
enyi biblu tɔn ɖe kɛnu do ninɔmɛ ɖe wu a ɔ mi sixu mɔ do nu nu jehovah ɖɔ mi wa e gbɔn
sixu kanbyɔ hwiɖee ɖɔ enyi xo jehovah tɔn tawun ɖe do ninɔmɛ ɖe wu a ɔ mi sixu tuun nu nukun tɔn mɛ e gbɔn
efɛzinu lɛ ɖɔ tɛnkpɔn tuun nu aklunɔ jlo ɖɔ wa e
ðo ninɔmɛ wu biblu tɔn ɖe kɛnu do tlɔlɔ a e mɛ ɔ mi sixu tuun jlo mawu tɔn gbɔn
jezu mɔ do nu nu jehovah jlo ɖɔ e wa e gbɔn
tamɛ do jezu mɔ do nu nu tɔn jlo ɖɔ e wa e gbɔn e ji
ðo ninɔmɛ xo biblu ɖɔ lɛ e we mɛ ɔ jezu to xoɖɛ wa blo nujiwu do nuɖuɖu gege
e ɖɔ emi kun awinnya lɛ do huzu nuɖuɖu hwenu xovɛ sin bɔ awovi ɛ ɖo gbetotlo mɛ e o xa matie
ðo linlin mawu tɔn ma do jezu wutu ɔ e tuun ɖɔ emi kun ɖo awinnya lɛ do huzu nuɖuɖu o
jezu mɔ nu jɛ wu ɖɔ jlo mawu tɔn kun nyi ɖɔ emi zan hlɔnhlɔn mɔhun nu ɖagbe emiɖesunɔ tɔn o
ðo e wa a wutu ɔ e ɖɔ jehovah wu wɛ emi ganjɛ ali emi ɖuɖu kpo nunu kpo emi
etɛ mi bɔ mi wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn
enyi mi jlo wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn jezu blo gbɔn e ɖɔhun ɔ mi ɖo ganjɛ jehovah wu bonu e ali mi
mi ɖo wa nu sɔgbe xa nunywɛxo elɔ lɛ ðeji do mawu mavɔmavɔ wu kpo ayixa towe bi kpo
ganjɛ nunywɛ hwiɖesunɔ tɔn wu o
linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ tuuntuun gbɔn biblu kplɔnkplɔn gblamɛ sixu mi bɔ mi mɔ do nu nu mawu ɖɔ mi wa ɖo ninɔmɛ tawun ɖe mɛ e
nujlɛdonuwu ɖe ɖie mi ɖɔ ɖɔ nyɔnu xwesi ɖe ɖo axi xwle wɛ
e mɔ afɔkpa ɖe jlo e
enɛ wu ɔ e kanbyɔ eɖee ɖɔ enyi zan akwɛ tobutobu elɔ din ɔ e ci nu asu
ðo hwenu nɔ e wutu ɔ linlin asu tɔn nɔ ɖo do akwɛzinkan yetɔn lido a e wu e ma ɛ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ e mɔ do nu linlin asu tɔn ɖo do nu mɔhun xixɔ wu e
ɖokpo ɔ hwenu linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ kpo ali tɔn lɛ kpo ɖo mi ma wɛ kpɛɖe kpɛɖe e ɔ nuwukpikpe mitɔn do mɔ do nu nu mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ ɖɔ mi wa ɖo ninɔmɛ vovo lɛ mɛ e nɔ
nu tɛ lɛ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee hwenu mi xa alo biblu ɔ e
gbavi hwenu ðo xo mawu tɔn wɛ e ɔ kanbyɔ hwiɖee ðɔ
mi ɖo wa nu ðɛhan davidi ɖɔhun eyɛ jihan ɖɔ mawu mavɔmavɔ ali gbɔn ɔ mi zan gbɔn ɔ mi
kpla mi gbɔn nugbo towe lixo nu mi ɖo hwi wɛ nyi mawu
hwi wu wɛ nɔ ganjɛ gbe bi gbe
fitɛ sixu zan ɖe
wɛ a
ɔ mɛ wɛ a
enyi mi mɔ nu jɛ fi mi zan nukplɔnmɛ ɔ ɖe e wu ɔ e sixu bɔwu bɔ mi mɔ do nu mi sixu zan gbɔn e
wema mitɔn lɛ kpo kple lɛ kpo sixu mi bɔ mi tuun nu jehovah nɔ do ninɔmɛ vovo lɛ wu e gbɔn
nu ɖevo sixu bɔ linlin jehovah tɔn ma do mi e wɛ nyi ɖɔ mi ɖo ayi biblu tɔn nɔ gosin tutoblonunu tɔn e wu
ði ɔ e sɔnu nu des publications des temoins jehovah kpo anademewe dodinnanu ton kunnudeto jehovah ton le kpo bɔ mi bɔ mi tuun linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do ninɔmɛ ɖeɖee mɛ e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ miɖesunɔ wa gbeta lɛ kɔn ɖe e gege wu
tamɛ linlin do nu mi wɛ e ɖe e ji mi bɔ mi mɔ do nu linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ yi do ayi mɛ
wagbɔ tɔn ɔ mi kpewu nɔ wa gbeta ji mawu wanyiyinɔ mitɔn kɔn nyɔna do lɛ e kɔn
na linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ gbigbeje sixu mi bɔ mi wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn gbɔn e tɔn ɖokpo
linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ tuuntuun sixu mi bɔ mi wa gbeta nunywɛ kpe lɛ e kɔn gbɔn e sin ɖe ɖie
ðo mi nyi axɔsuɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ wutu ɔ mi sixu byɔ hwebinu tɔn ɔ mɛ nyi gbexosin hwebinu tɔn
bonu enɛ do sixu blo ɔ mi jɛ nu ji blo bɔ gbɛzinzan mitɔn bɔkun
hwe ɖokpo ɔ ɔ sixu jɛ mi hu ji ɖɔ enyi mi ɖo nuɖokan gege a ɔ mi ɖo awajijɛ jɔ awajijɛ a ji
nugbo ɔ biblu tɔn ɖe ɖɔ ɖɔ mi nyi gbexosin a mi sixu nyi lɛ ɖo jehovah wɛ zɔn mi yi
xa luki
sɔgbe kpo nu taji biblu tɔn enɛ lɛ kpo ɔ enyi mi xoɖɛ byɔ jehovah tɔn ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi mɔ do nu linlin tɔn lɛ a ce
enyi nusisɔ alɔkpa ɖe jehovah nukunmɛ ɔ sixu tuun gbɔn
ɖevo ɖie mi ɖɔ ɖɔ nusisɔ alɔkpa jɛji nu mɛɖe lɛ ɖo agun ɔ mɛ a e ɖe jlo
loɔ biblu tɔn tawun ɖe bonu tuun a
etɛ jehovah do ninɔmɛ enɛ wu
weɖexamɛ enɛ ɖu klisanwun sunnu lɛ
ðo mi nyi jehovah ze miɖee jo lɛ e wutu ɔ e nyi nu nɔ nukun mitɔn mɛ lɛ e kɛɖɛ wɛ nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi a loɔ nu nusisɔ kpo mitɔn kpo sixu wa do mɛ ɖevo lɛ wu e nɔ ɖu ayi mɛ nu mi
enyi mi nɔ ɖo tamɛ do nublibli lɛ ji wɛ ɔ e nɔ ci nu jehovah
hwenu mi ɖo ayiɖeɖayi lɛ wɛ e ɔ mi sixu tuun nu jehovah nukunmɛ e gbɔn
e ɖo wa gbeta taji lɛ kɔn gbɔn
biblu ɖɔ ɖo jehovah hwenu lɛ ɖo daka xo wɛ nɔ ɖo nu nyanya kɛɖɛ wɛ hwebinu e
enɛ mi ɖɔ kuku do xoɖoxamɛ ji nyla ɖo e sixu bɔ e hu hwɛ syɛnsyɛn mawuxowema ɔ sɔgbe xa linlin jehovah tɔn a e ɖe
jaki nu enɛ tuuntuun ɖo mi bɔ mi nyi alɔ nu ayiɖeɖayi nɔ linlin kpo jlo blibli lɛ kpo sin do lanmɛ nu mɛ lɛ e
klisanwun lɛ nɔ ɖo yibowa cobo nɔ wema fimu alo ayihundanu mɛ nu jehovah wan lɛ e nɔ ɖe e do ɖe ayi a
linlin jehovah nɔ ɖo do nu mɔhun lɛ wu e ɖo wɛn ɖo xo tɔn mɛ
gbeta vovo lɛ kɔn wɛ e sixu wa ɖo ninɔmɛ gege mɛ bɔ jehovah kpo ɖo xomɛhunhun ji
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ e kun sɔgbe ɖɔ mi ɖɔ nu mɛ ɖevo lɛ ɖɔ ɖɔ nu mi wa e nu mi o
enyi gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e nɔ jehovah nukunmɛ ɔ le tɛ lɛ mi nɔ mɔ
enyi gbeta kɔn mi nɔ wa lɛ e nɔ jinjɔn linlin jehovah tɔn lɛ ji ɔ mi nɔ sɛkpɔ ɛ ja
nu mitɔn nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ bɔ e nɔ kɔn nyɔna tɔn do mi ji
enɛ nɔ blo bɔ nuɖiɖi mi ɖo nu mitɔn jixwe tɔn ɔ e nɔ lido
enɛ wu ɔ nu biblu tɔn lɛ kpo nugbododo tɔn lɛ kpo ali mi ɖo ɖe linlin mawu nɔ ɖo do ninɔmɛ vovo lɛ wu e
nugbo wɛ ɖɔ mi wa nu lɛ do jehovah wu jɛn wɛ hwebinu
jɔb e ɖo co kanɖodonuwu sixu bɔ din fi mi ɖe e ɔ mi ɖo nunywɛ nutuuntuun kpo nukunnumɔjɛnumɛ sin hudo mi ɖo e kpo nɔ wa gbeta sɔgbe lɛ e kɔn
etɛ nu elɔ mi do ali jlɔjlɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ wu
ɖo xwegbe ɖo
jo mawu do nu e huzu gbɔn ayi mitɔn sin huzuhuzu gblamɛ hlɔ
aniwu mi ɖo kpo ɖo mɛ ɔ do wɛ ɖo baptɛm gudo
etɛwu mawu nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi do gan ɖu ɖo ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ ji
etɛ mi sixu wa bonu xo mawu tɔn nɔ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn huzu wɛ
huzuhuzu tɛ lɛ biblo sixu vɛwu nu mi ɖo baptɛm mitɔn gudo
enyi huzuhuzu lɛ biblo vɛwu hu mi gbɔn e ɔ nu tɛ lɛ mi sixu kanbyɔ
fɔtoo ɖo lɛ e
hwenu kevin mɔ nugbo ɔ e ɔ e nuɖe hugan ɖɔ e kpo jehovah kpo ganji a
xwe mɔkpan wɛ e ɖo akɔxixo azɔnunu ahannumu kpo geenunu kpo mɛ
e ɖeji do jehovah kpo hlɔnhlɔn xo tɔn ɖo nɔ huzu mɛ e kpo wu wa ebl
ði ɔ e mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu tawun nu emi ɖɔ emi ɖu ɖo xomɛ yiyawu sin ji
kevin yi gbe ɖɔ xomɛsin ji ɖuɖu ɖe vɛwu nu mi hu ɖɔ ma nyi alɔ nu walɔ nyanya xoxo lɛ
kevin blo huzuhuzu e byɔ lɛ e gbɔn ɖɛxixo syɛnsyɛn kpo biblu kplɔnkplɔn hwɛhwɛ kpo gblamɛ
kevin ɖɔhun ɔ mi mɛ gege wɛ ɖo blo huzuhuzu taji ɖe lɛ jɛ nukɔn nu baptɛm mitɔn bonu gbɛzan mitɔn do sixu sɔgbe xa nu biblu byɔ lɛ e
ði ɔ mi sixu mɔ ɖo miɖee mɛ ɖɔ mi nɔ mɔ xo ɖɔ do nu wu nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu nɔ jlo ɖɔ mɛ nu alo ɖo ganmaɖo ɖevo lɛ
huzuhuzu lɛ biblo ɖo ali enɛ vɛwu hu mi ɖo e vlafo wɛ a
e nyi wɛ ɔ mi sixu kanbyɔ miɖee ɖɔ blo huzuhuzu ɖaxo ɖaxo lɛ wa yi bɔ etɛwu nu klewun klewun lɛ jijlaɖo nɔ vɛwu nu mi
sixu yi nukɔn yi gbe bɔ biblu huzu gbɛzan gbɔn
etɛwu nu mi nɔ wa lɛ e bi sixu jehovah nukunmɛ a
mi mɛ wa tuun jehovah yi wan lɛ e bi wɛ jlo kpo ayi mitɔn bi sese kpo nɔ wa nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ lɛ e
e ɖo co enyi jlo mitɔn tlɛ syɛn gbɔn ɖebu ɔ ninɔmɛ hwɛhuhu tɔn mi ɖo e bɔ mi nɔ wa nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ e hwebinu a
walɔ tɛ lɛ mi ɖo jo do cobo blo baptɛm
ganmaɖo tɛ lɛ sixu kpo ɖo do nu mi wɛ ɖo baptɛm gudo
mi jo walɔ hwɛhuhu tɔn ɖeɖee bɔ mi jɛxa ba nyi agun klisanwun tɔn sin lɛ a e do
jlo ɖe lɛ sixu doya nu mɛ nu xwe gege
mi nyi co etɛ bɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi nyi jehovah tɔn
etɛwu mi ɖo gɔn hwɛsɔkɛ byɔ jehovah a
hwɛhuhu sin gu mi ɖu e ɖo gbo kpo nyi ali ji nu mi bonu mi gɔn kpo jehovah kpo alo gɔn sinsɛn ɛ a
tamɛ do nu elɔ ji hwenu jehovah dɔn mi bɔ mi huzu tɔn e ɔ e tuun ɖɔ mi ɖe afɔ nyi do hweɖelɛnu
bɔ e tuun ɖɔ mi wa jɛ do hweɖelɛnu
e ɖo co enɛ su ali do jehovah bonu e gɔn biba ɖɔ mi nyi emitɔn a
wanyiyi mawu bɔ e nu xɔ akwɛ ɖe mi e wɛ nyi vɔsisa gbɛxɔnumɛ tɔn vi tɔn tɔn
biblo ci ɖɔ mi ɖɔ mi kun sin do alɔ mitɔn lɛ hwenu kwiji e o ɖɔhun
e ɖɔ lɔ ɔ lɛkɔ lɛ e wɛ e sɔnu nu gbɛxixɔ ɔ
enɛ wu ɔ ɖo gbɛxixɔ ɔ wutu ɔ mi ɖo hwɛhuhu sin ninɔmɛ co mi hɛn ɔ mi nyi jehovah tɔn xa timɔtee
etɛwu mi ɖo myɔ nukun do ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ a
mi nɔ myɔ nukun do ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ kpowun a
e nɔ byɔ ɖɔ mi tɛnkpɔn ɖu ɖo jlo hwɛhuhu tɔn mitɔn lɛ ji tlɛ su kun do nu ɖeɖee mi sixu su kun do lɛ e
enyi ɖɔ mi blo baptɛm e ɔ e lin a alo mi ɖo nugbo ɔ mɛ sin xwe mɔkpan ɖie wɛ ɔ mi ɖo kpo ɖo miɖee jla ɖo wɛ kɔ
nw mi wa gbɔn tuun ɖɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi ɖo mɛ ɔ do wɛ zɔn mi yi
e byɔ ɖɔ mi ɖo gan do wɛ zɔn mi yi do sixu jla miɖee ɖo mɛ ɔ do
xogbe ɖo huzuhuzu wɛ ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ ɖɔ mɛ ɔ do kun nyi gbe ɖokpo sin nu o
nu enɛ do wusyɛn lanmɛ nu mɛ tawun ɖo e mi ganjɛwu ɖɔ enyi ɖo jehovah wɛ lin kpo e gbɔ kpo ɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi kpo ɖo nukɔn yi wɛ kpo ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ ba ɖo jujɔ klisanwun tɔn nɔ ɖe mɛ ɔ lɛ e ɖo wɛ

nu tɛ lɛ mi sixu kanbyɔ

aniwu e byɔ ɖɔ mi do gan tawun
jehovah hɛn ɔ e nɔ su kun do nu jlo masɔgbe mitɔn lɛ kpowun bɔ jujɔ eyɛtɔn lɛ nɔ bɔwu nu mi a e
etɛwu jehovah nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi do gan ɖu ɖo ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ ji
enyi mi do nukun nuɖiɖo wɛkɛ ɔ tɔn lɛ mɛ ɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ jehovah ɖo hlɔnhlɔn tawun
kpodo xomɛhunhun kpo wɛ jehovah nɔ hlɔnhlɔn jɛxa e tɔn lɛ hwenu ɖo hudo tɔn e
bɔ etɛwu e nɔ wa a
jehovah mi nunina e sixu do nuɖe wu a e e wɛ nyi mɛɖesusininɔ
enyi mi ɖɔ miɖesunɔ ɖɔ mi wa jlo mawu tɔn nɔ do gan tawun nɔ wa ɔ mi nɔ jehovah ɖɔ mi yi wan tawun jlo nukun tɔn mɛ
mi nɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ jɛhun do e nyi e ji
nux e ɖo mɔ co enyi jehovah ɖe gan ɖebu mi do xa jlo masɔgbe mitɔn lɛ ba do nukun tɔn mɛ e siin bi ɔ go mi go ɖɔ mi ɖo gbeji nu e nyi e nɔ jɛhun e nyi nuti a
enɛ wu wɛ jehovah ɖɔ nu mi ɖɔ mi zan hlɔnhlɔn ɖo mi wu ɔ bi do ɖo jujɔ tɔn lɛ
e nɔ ɖo nukun ɖɔ mi do gan syɛnsyɛn ɖo acɛ do linlin mitɔn lɛ kpo nu nɔ ci nu mi lɛ e kpo ji
hlɔ enyi mi do gan ɖo ali enɛ nugbo nugbo ɔ mɔ mi nɔ mɔ ɖɔ biblu ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn huzu wɛ e nɔ jɛmɛ nu mi tawun
etɛ lɛ mi sixu wa ɖo jujɔ jehovah yi wan lɛ e
gbavi biblu kpo ðɛxixo kpo huzu gbɛzan yetɔn
etɛ mi sixu wa ba ɖo jujɔ jehovah tɔn lɛ nukun tɔn mɛ
mi ɖo wa nu hu tuto mɛɖee jijlaɖo tɔn ɖe xwixwedo
mi ɖo kpo ɖo gan do wɛ xwedo mawu tɔn lɛ ɖo hlɔmanu lɛ ɖɔ ji nɔ wa nu ɔ nɔ wa gbɔn e o loɔ jo mawu do nu e huzu gbɔn ayi mitɔn sin huzuhuzu gblamɛ
enɛ ɔ sixu tuun jlo mawu tɔn e wɛ nyi nu ɖagbe nu nɔ nukun tɔn mɛ e nu sɔgbe bɔ nu bi vɔ e
jehovah nɔ gbɔn xo tɔn kpo gbigbɔ tɔn kpo gblamɛ nɔ mi bɔ mi nɔ mɔ nukunnu jɛ jlo tɔn wu nɔ wa nɔ huzu gbɛzan mitɔn ɖo ba mɛ e jɛ sɔgbe xa nu e byɔ ɖo mi si lɛ e
biblu xixa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe tamɛ linlin do wemafɔ biblu tɔn lɛ ji kpo ɖɛxixo byɔ gbigbɔ kpo ɖo ɖo gan ɖeɖee do wɛ mi ɖe lɛ e mɛ luk
ee mi ɖo gbigbɔ mawu tɔn tɔn xwedo wɛ ɖo linlin mitɔn lɛ jla ɖo wɛ sɔgbe kpo jlo jehovah tɔn e ɖo xo tɔn mɛ e kpo e ɔ linlin mitɔn lɛ xogbe mitɔn lɛ kpo walɔ mitɔn lɛ kpo wa ci mawu tɔn ɖɔhun
hwenu nu tlɛ nyi e ɔ mi ɖo ɖo aceji bonu ganmaɖo mitɔn lɛ zin mi dɛ o nux
nu biblu xixa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe ɔ mi ɖo nɔ zan wema klisanwun tɔn mitɔn lɛ do xo mawu tɔn kpodo linlin ɔ kpo ɖɔ mi xwedo jujɔ jiwu jehovah tɔn lɛ mɛɖe lɛ mɔ ɖɔ enyi e wemafɔ biblu tɔn kpo atɔxwɛ alo reveillez vous
sin xota kpo ɖeɖee nɔ mɛ bɔ e nɔ ɖo jujɔ klisanwun tɔn lɛ alo ɖu ɖo ganmaɖo ɖe lɛ ji e kple nɔ ji gbɔn ɔ e nɔ tawun
enyi huzuhuzu lɛ biblo nɔ ya nu mi a ɔ etɛwu awakanmɛ ɖo ku mi a
enyi e ci nu ɖɔ nukɔnyiyi towe ɖo gbigbɔ lixo kun ɖo yiya wɛ o ɔ flin ɖɔ nukɔnyiyi mɔhun nɔ byɔ hwenu gege
jujɔ mawu tɔn lɛ ɖiɖo nyi gbe ɖokpo sin nu a
mi ɖo ɖo suulu hwenu mi ɖo tintɛnkpɔn wɛ bonu biblu kpo ɖo huzuhuzu ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ blo wɛ ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn mɛ e
ðo ɔ e sixu byɔ ɖɔ mi nɔ zin miɖee ji do sixu wa nu sɔgbe xa mawuxowema ɔ e
e wa jɔwu jehovah tɔn lɛ bɔ nyi mɛ ɛ sɔyi
hwenɛnu ɔ e nɔ jɛ tagba cobo ɖe jujɔ mawu tɔn lɛ a e wa ɔ vivi wɛ e nɔ mɔ ɖo biblo mɛ
din ɔ gbɛxixɔ ɔ bɔ mi hɛn ɔ mi mawu mitɔn wanyiyinɔ ɔ
enyi mi miɖee do xo tɔn sin hlɔnhlɔn nɔ huzu mɛ e glɔ ɔ mi sixu wa din mi tlɛ kpo ɖo ninɔmɛ hwɛhuhu tɔn mitɔn mɛ e
etɛwu mi sixu kanɖeji ɖɔ biblu ɖo hlɔnhlɔn kpo ɖo gbɛzan mitɔn huzu wɛ
kevin xo mi ɖɔ ɖo e ɖokan do nu wu ɖu ɖo xomɛsin tɔn ji
e tamɛ do nugbododo biblu tɔn lɛ ji zan e yi gbe nu alɔdo klisanwun lɛ tɔn kpo weɖexamɛ yetɔn kpo
gudo mɛ ɔ e jɛxa bɔ e ɖe e nyi tɔn bɔ sin xwe ɖie ɔ e nyi mɛxo agun tɔn ɖe
e ɖo co e mɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo ɖo aceji wa jɛ ayi ɖo gbigbɔ lixo o
kevin tɔn ɖɔ biblu nɔ togun mawu tɔn bonu kpo ɖo huzuhuzu ɖagbeɖagbe lɛ blo wɛ ɖo gbɛzan yetɔn mɛ
enɛ wu ɔ nu mi ɖo xo mawu tɔn ɔ jo do wɛ zɔn mi yi nu e kpo ɖo mi huzu wɛ bonu mi kpo jehovah kpo
russell nɔ mɔ xo ɖɔ do mawu tɔn lɛ wu nɔ do su nu tawun
victoria yi wan nu mɛnuɖiɖɔ
linda nɔ ɖi xɛsi nu tawun hweɖebunu e ɖo ɔ mɛ e
klisanwun atɔn enɛ lɛ blo baptɛm e mɔ ɖɔ e vɛwu nu emi tawun ɖɔ emi ɖyɔ ɖo ganmaɖo yetɔn lɛ syɛn ɖesu
e ɖo co mɛ bi wɛ do gan tawun ɖu ɖo ganmaɖo yetɔn lɛ ji
nu e
russell ðɛxixo jehovah savo kpo biblu xixa ayihɔngbe ayihɔngbe kpo mi
tamɛ linlin do kpo weɖexamɛ mɛxo agun tɔn lɛ tɔn kpo ji mi tawun
mɔ ɖɔ kun ɖo nɔ zun xa mɛ ɖeɖee yi wan nu mɛnuɖiɖɔ lɛ e ɖe o
ðɛhan mi bɔ mɔ ɖɔ kun jlo nɔ mɛ ɖeɖee mɛ ɖevo lɛ nɔ xoɖɛ ɖɔ mawu hwlɛn emi ɖo si e mɛ o
linda xa tlati mitɔn lɛ ganji do sixu sɔnu ba xwle mɛ
xa mɛ ɖeɖee nɔ ɖo ɔ sin akpaxwe vovo lɛ mɛ e mi tawun
kpo ɖo ɖɛ xo jehovah wɛ ganjɛ wu tɔn
xogɔtɔ nɔ gɔ xo a
avun wɛ bɔ lɛngbɔ ɖo gbe nya wɛ
sɔ bese nyi kpa gudo dɔn xwe ɖe xwe
gɛnnu mɔ lisɛ glo kɛ ɔ kpe
xɛ ɖe kpɔn ɖe zunzɔn
alɔ ɖe wɛ nɔ klɔ alɔ ɖe
lɔn wɛ nyi mawu lɔn
nya jayi ɖo gbowɛlɛ sota bɔ tecici glo
xwe wɛ
aɖu kpo ɖɛ kpo nɔ nɔ kɛn a
afɔkpakpa nɔ ɖɔ xomɛ ali a
axɔ su ɔ axɔ nɔ gbo
jɛ atan mɛ ɔ nɔ jɛ gba mɛ
nywɛ ayi yi ɔ wɛ zan ku ɖe nɛ
aɖu xomɛ ɖo vo
atin wu ɖiɖi xomɛ kacakaca
hwan xɛ ɔ nɔ lɛ xo xɛ a
jonɔgbe nyɔ lɔ asihwlɛnsin mɛ wɛ nɔ mɔ ɖe
koklo nyɔ ɖɛkpɛ bɔ adɔtɛn tɔn gble
nya hu sɛ hɔn nukun ɖo hɔnlinu
degɔn ɖɔ vivi ɔ emi sɔ kpo afɔ kpan mɛ
acɔ ɖo finfan wɛ ɔ xwe
cakatu wɛ tɔn bɔ mɔ glo tɔn hla sɔ ɛ ɖu le ɔ mɔ a
nya xwe yi gbe yi zin bokɔnɔ tɔn dɛ ɖɔ fayiyi wɛ jɛn ɖe nɛ a
nyɔnu ɖo vi ji wɛ bɔ ajotɔ xwegbe kpe nukun vi ji ɖe ɔ wu
mɔ logozo tuwun ɖɔ xu tɔn gban
jujɔ wɛ nɔ xwe ɖo jujɔ wɛ nyi gbɛtɔ
xwe geli nɔ xo amyɔsun a
nya ɖe ɖo fɛca asɔ wli ajinaku nunyɔnumɛ ɖe hu le a
dɛgbo gba hun ɖɔ hwɛ ɖaxɔsu xwe
nyi dɛɛnvi ɔ dɛɛn nyi nywɛvi ɔ nywɛ
aze syɛn nyi ɖɔ azevi syɛn a
ɖɔ nywɛvi ɔ nɔ nywɛ ɖɔ dɛɛnvi ɔ nɔ dɛɛn
aklanɔ ɖe nɔ ɖɔ emitɔn a
gbɔno nɔ byɔ gbɔ bɔ nɔ ɖɔ gbɔ ɖo kanmɛ
ahwan wɛ nɔ gbɔ co nɔ ɖɔ ahwan xo
fevi hlɔn ɔ glɔ wɛ nɔ nɔ
hwevi nubyaxa ɖo sabɔ yɛ wɛ nɔ jɛ
hwevi nubyaxa ɖo sabɔ
afin ɖu dexlohun sɔ fɛca nuɖe ɖu ku ɔ nyɔ hu nuɖe ɖu ku
ɖo ayi syansyan nɔ sɔ mɛ ɖakɔn a
gbɛ ɔ tɔdema wɛ nɔ xo yi ɖisi nɔ xo yi amyɔ
bokɔno ɖe etɔn ɔ nɔ mɛ tɔn a
byɔ nyɔɖaxo ɖo tɛnji mɛ nɔ mɔ bɔ nyɛ mɔ
agu
akɔ ɖɛ xo xɔntɔnsatɔ
atin jɔhɔn nɔ kpe jɔhɔn a
lɛgba byɔ dokɔ ayi wɛ jɛ wɛ
awyi sɔ ɖo nɛnu zɛn mɛ xo lɛɛ nyi xo
kanlin kpo zɔn ɔ ayi tɔn ɖo xo tɔn mɛ
ajaxɔsu koklo tafɔ ayɔxɔsu kɔɖonu ji ɖɔ nɔ lannyitɔ
mɛ jajo tɔ tɔn ɔ mɛ wɛ jajo
sɛ kpɔ mɛ wɛ akodokwin nɔ vivi ɖe
ajaka ɖu sɛ ɔ xwetɔ nɔ tafɔ ji tɔn
kɛ ɔ alɔtɔ nɔ byɔ mɛ a
nɔ hun bɔ gbe tɔn nɔ vɛ
wɛ awi vi nɔ wu
gbɔ yi zunkanmɛ ɔ sɔ nɔ xwe
kɛkɛ nyɔ ɔ avɔkan wu
nabi su mɛ ɔ wɛ nɔ bɛ
ɔ wɛ nɔ wu
ji gbɛ jija bɛ kanbyɔ migan ɔ ja jɛn ja
gbɛ bla ɔ nɔ gbɛ dɔn dɛ a
kpɛɖe kpɛɖe wɛ atan nɔ kun nɔ gɔ
tewun tewun atan nɔ kun nɔ gɔ
ahlinhan dayɛ jɛ sɔ lɔn xɛ ɖe yi
jɛ ji nɔ hun a
nyi bese gbɔn kpa bɛ jɛ dotɔ mɛ xwe dɔn xwe
ɖalɔ ata wu ɔ vami
awasagbe ɖaɖɔ nɔxwe mɛ ɖe jɛn ɖe mɛ nɛ
avɔ ɖo mɛ wu ɔ avivɔ wɛ nɔ mɛ
atin mɔ nɔ wɛn daganmalɔ mɛ dɛdɛ lisa
akwɛ caa ɖasi towe hun xɔ ɖowungoli axɔ
zun koklo zɔnlin ɔ agbadekun
ɖu wɔ tɛ adingbannɔ xo
kpɔ nya agbanlin xwe wekomɛ mɛ ɖo nuvɔnɔ gbe mɛ yi fɛn
nukuntɔnnɔ vi yi gbe hu agbanlin alɔ jɛn ɖo tɔn wu cobo ɖi
agluzavi byɔ nɔ tɔn ɖɔ etɛ wu wɛ tɔn ɖi aji ɔ tuwun
kpo ɖo mɛsi ɔ wɛ nɔ hu
ɔ kpo jɛ avun xwe
enyi mɛɖe gbɔn cɔncɔn hun mɛ ɔ yi xɔ xu
akanmu glagla kpe azɔ glagla
akwete ku ɔ tɔn nɔ ayihun a
zege bli bli xomɛsla danxomɛ dalɔ mɛ
nya hɛn tɔ tɔn cyɔ bɔ hla yi nyɛ wɛ nɔ kpɛn
vi ku ahwanjigɔnu sɛ ɖe hwɛn
nɔ tuwun mɛ nyi xwe nɔ a
nyɔnu ji vi gban fɔ nukɔn ɖu gbe wɛ ja a
kpo jɛ avun xwe
akiza hɔn towe ɔ gbe jɛn wu
hweenu wɛ xɛnɔ ji xɛ ɔ nuɖe jɛn yɔkpɔvu lɛ nɔ ayihun
kinikini wu aɖu adla jɛ gbe ji
kwekwe kpo azan ɔ nɔ ɖo vi donu
nya ɖe lɛ gle awinya ɖɔ xwe su ɔ bi ɔ tɛn nɔ tɛn kpɔn deji
ganɖoba ɖu wɔ tɛ asu tɔn xɔ yi hwenu wɛ ɖe
ɖu vivi ɔ nɔ ɖu vlɛ mɔ
ɖu bese gbɛ bese
koklo nɔ nɔ azin ji sɔ mɔ a yɔ xɛ
alixo ɔ nɔ gbɔn ɔ nɔ kple ɖo
ɖabɔbɔ gbɛ xa yakpɔvu lɛ wɛ ɔ gbɔ kwin wɛ nɔ mɛ mɛ
ɔ mɛ xomɛ wɛ nɔ nɔ
kuutɔ nya mɛ ɖo hunjava ɖɔ emi jawe
nɔi nyi xwenɔ ɖo kloklo a
nukunnɔ nyi fɔn gbɛ
gblegble yonu wɛ ɖe cobo dɛɛn
nɔ kpo ɖɔhun
ɖɔ alɔtɔ adlokpo ɖɔ nyi javalu yɔkpɔvu bahɛntɔ lɛ hwɛ
nawun ku ɔ nawun jɔ vi
ɖe nyi hun yi fle mɛ
jayi bɛ gbe
nya ɖe xwe ada sunsun yonu đe ɔ ɖe nɔ
jlo nya kɔ ɔ kɔ ɖɔhun wɛ nɔ ci
mɛ nɔ sɔ nyi gbe ɔ wɛ nɔ mɔ sɔ
zan kpodo keze kpan zɛnzɛn wɛ ɖe
byɔ aziln davɔ mɔ tɔn
ɖɔ emi ɖu emitɔn mɛɖe datakin mɛ ɔ
gbade jɛn bi ɖiɖa ɔ myɔ wɛ nɔ hɛn ci
nyɔnu ɖe nuɖe ɔ asakpla tɔn nɔ xo a
gbɛnɔtɔ ɖe mɔ nɔ gbɛ gbɛxo
mɛ ɖe nyɔ zobɛ a
ajanuhla nubyaxa gbɛ mɛ bɔ sɛ ɖo
wɛ jɛ tɔ bɔ bɛ glo
ɖo tilntiln yonu ɔ wɛ nɔ yi mɔ
tɔn afɔ tɔn wɛ afɔ nɔ mɔ gbɛ nyɔ mɛ ɖayimlɔmlɔ
tɔvi ɖɔ zan ku nɔvi ɖɔ wɛ ɖo zan mɛ
mɔ xo ɖo mɛ ɔ vijiji wɛ nɔ jlo
acu kun ɖu kɔ jɛn ɖu bɔ xo
bese gɔ xo vlaya ɖe gɔ xo acɔ a
ɔ afɔ nɔ ku
xovɛ yɔ bɛ ɖo awinya ji gbɛmɛ ɔ nuɖe ɖo nukun nyɔ hu nuɖe ɖo nukun
xɔ gban ɔ amlɔ nɔ gban a
nɔ jajo ɖaxi mɛ nɔ sɔ ɖo gudo a
nɔ wu ɖo nukɔn nɔ ze hwla a
nya hu gbɔ bɔ xɔntɔn byɔ asa tɔn nɛ nunamɛ xo gbɔn
atɔn xeciɖi ci
glexwenu gɔn gɔn ci bi ɔ yɛyi mɛ wɛ nɔ ɖo
xɔgbonutɔ ahan gba kɔfo bi ɔ yɛyi wɛ
nɔ xɔ sɔ nɔ zɔn afɔ a
nɔ yi aɖukantɛn sɔ nɔ bwebwe a
aɖusunsunnɔ ɖo adingban bɛ gba wɛ manɔ manɔ
hunkle xotɔ adɔmɛ ɖe
gbɔ ɖe ɔ wɛ hunɖe tɔn nɔ nɔ
zun ɖe gla ɔ tɔn nɔ gla
adɔ dɔ nukun nɔ dɔ a
nɔ xuta xwe atɔn ɔ mɔ agasa xwe nukun a
gudunɔ damlɔ fɔn mɔ ɖo zan ji aɖawun ɖazɔnsi
malɛnu bla ɖu dokɔ sɛ jɛn xɔ mɛ ɖe mɛ
mɛ kpo nyɔ mɛ mɔ nyɔ
titigweti mɔ ku hɔn nɔ ku sɔ
zege bli xwe savalu bɔ ji xo alɔ ɔ alɔ nɔ ɖu bi a
nya ɖe yi ahwan xwe bɔ lɛ ɖu sɛ wɛ tɛ gbɔjɛ a
akwε caa ɖasi towe hun xɔ ɖowungoli axɔ
adoglwe nyi atɔn nɔ fli a
avun kpɔn hla nɛ avun hla gbɔn
vi nɔ ɖe xwɛ ahowe nɔ ɖe xwɛ a
aziln amule nɔ keje kpɔn
ɖo wu ɖo adɔ wu a
akwɛ ɔ awɔntinmɛfun wɛ dɔn ɔ nɔ vɛ
nɔ mɔ mɛ zogbe nɔ ɖɔ bla wu a
nusɔnu ɖe nyi bawa akwɛ wɛ xɔ vavo
nɔ tuun mɛ nyi bɔ xwe nɔ a
ajaka savɔ sɔ glɛnzin ganhunu mɛtɔn mɛtɔn wɛ
nɔ nyi nya nɔ nyi nyavi a
nɔ hu dudotɔ a
kɔta nɔ nɔ kpɔ a ɖe nyi kɔta ɖe nyi gbakwɛgbakɛ
lɛgba ɖo nɔ sɔ xwetɔ ɖo a
alɔ ɖe nɔ xwil ɔ nɔ bla a
ɖo ɔ nɔ ɖo anya mɛ a
nɔ ɖo bɔ nɔ xwe aza koli
alɔvi atɔɔn lɛ bi ɖo zɛnzɛn a
ajɔtɔ mɔ gbɔ keze ɖɔ gbɔ ɖo sɔ wɛ
savinu mɔ kɔgbɛn ɖɔ lɔnlɔn
savinu mɔ yovovu ɖɔ elɔ vu tɔn tiln a
gbɔ mɔ ɖo nɔ ɔ wɛ nɔ ɖu
hwɛ ɖakɔ a
nyaɖe xwe kwekwetin ji nuɖe glo mɛ ɔ nɔ
nya azɔ gbɔn awaji ji ja hun ɖe ji
nyɔɖaxo ɖo wɔ ji bɔ ajotɔ sɔ nɔ ɖo hunhun wɛ nɔ nywɛ nɛ
aɖu ɖu gantin
agban glo segbanhɛntɔ ɔ jɛgbanhɛntɔ kpe wu a
vɔ koliko kpɔn ajinaku klanklan
xɔ kɛkɛ ɖokpo kɛkɛ ɔ mɔ nyɛ ɔ xɔ a
agbanlin nukunnɔ hu wɛ hwenu alɔ jɛ tɔn wu jɛn tuwun
ɖɔ nyaɖe ɖɔ kutitɔ ɖo ɖo hɔn tɔn bɛ ɖɔ ji afɔ ku yi ɔ yi
jɛ ku mɛ ɔ nɔ heelu
ajaxɔsu vi ɔ sɔ mla ayɔxɔsu vi ɔ mɛ xomɛ wɛ nɔ nɔ
kanbyɔ numɔnɔ ɖɔ fitɛ asi tɔn ɖe ji wɛ nyi bɔ kpla a
kɔsukɔsu nɔ nyi ɖo mɛlɔ mɛ a
nya ɖe yi ahwan asi tɔn zɔn ɔ jɛn nɔ mya nukun
afin nɔ nyɔ hwɛ ɖasesa mɛ
wɔlɔgɛdɛ ɖalɔ wu
glɛnziln nubyaxa hlikɛ nyi towe ɔ ɖɔ asa ɖie abɔ ɖie ɖie
xɛ nɔ ɖo gozɛn ɖokpo ɔ mɛ a bɛ jan
atin gɔdwɛgɔdwɛ ji nɔ gbɔn nɔ yi mɔ jlɔjlɔ
atin wu didi xome kacakaca
byɔ ahwlikpɔnuwa ɖɔ axi wɛ aji nukanbyɔ xo wε nɔ gɔ a
kutitɔ ɖɔ emi ɖo kpɔn mɛɖe ɖo gbɛnde mɛ afɔ ku ɔ yi
nya agoo ɖagbo nyawɔn ɖo ɔ nɔ ɖɔ
nyi kpakpa negbe wɛ
vi wɛ nɔ ɖe xwɛ ahowe nɔ ɖe xwɛ a
nuwanumɔnɔ mɔ axijijε yɛ ɔ nyi hun
tɛgbɛ ɔ vijɔvi savɔ
ajaka ɖumasɛ ɔ xwetɔ wɛ nɔ tafɔ ji tɔn
wezunkantɔ nɔ zɛ ayi wu a
ajanu gbɛ kanɖe yi gban
nɔ ɖo ayi syansyan nɔ sɔ mɛ ɖakɔn a
nya hɔn yi slɔ ɖo aluunmɛ migan ɖɔ nyɔ doo
agbannɔ kpete
wɛ nɔ nɔ agɔn a
asi xo mɛ nyɔ hu tlɛn xo mɛ
awasagbe mɔ kinikini afɔdomɛ ɖe kɔ enyi mɛɖe ɔ nɔ lɛ gudo tɔn
akwɛyimaxakpɔntɔ ɔ ajotɔ wɛ nyi
ɖu mɔ vɔn ɔ
awadakpɛkpɛ nɔ xɔ avɔ nɔ ɖo xwe gbejigbeji wɛ nɔ gbɔn
ɖanɔ ɖe lɔn ɔ nɔ ɖo a
wli yovo yi ɖo yovotomɛ mɛwil lɛ ylɔ ɖɔ xlonɔ wɛ ɖe
mɛ mɛɖe yi le ɔ wɛ ahwa nɔ sɛn ɖɔ ɖe
wu kple ɖo kpɔ bɔ xomɛ ɖo vo
logozo zun xɔntɔn xa gwin gonɔ lɛ wɛ ɖo ɖo wɛ
ɖe hwenu ɔ nɔ bla mɛ ɖo nukɔn ɖevo hwenu ɔ nɔ bla ɖo gudo
hun ɖe ɖyɔ ɔ wefɔ tɔn nɔ ɖyɔ
aɖu ɖe towe jawe
aze ɖo wu lɛe gboto wɛ
nucatɔ nɔ kɛkɛ a
kutitɔ ɖe mɔ nɔ sɛ xwe
agbogudonu mɔ kɔgbɛn ɖɔ lɔnlɔn
kojwe nɔ ku kojwe aditi nɔ ku aditi
gankuku a gankuku ɔ sɛnu wɛ
ganganwunxotɔ ɖɔ adɔ mɛ wɛ ɖe
ahwlikpɔnuwa sɔ tɔn yi ɖo koklo kpo mɛ ɖɔ tuwun ɖe ɔ ɖo bibɛ wɛ a
dɛdɛ kabakaba aganma nɔ lya hun
sɔn xwe nɔ gɔn xwe a
gannaganna ɔ bese wɛ nɔ hu
ɖo xwe ɔ ajaka nɔ jɛ glojo
awi ɖo xwe ɔ ajaka nɔ nyi xɔgan
ɖo xwe ɔ ajaka nɔ ɖu xɔtɔ
nya ɖe yi ahwan slɔ aluunmɛ nyɔ doo kɛɖɛ
kpɔn gudo jɛ nukɔn ɔ gbɔn gudo ɖe nɛ
ku hun ayi towe jɛ vivi sislɛ ɖɔhun
tantansin wɛ jɛ bɔ atan
byɔ kunsun tɔfɔnu ɖe nɛ
ɖɔ xɛsinɔ ɖɔ ahwan ɖɔ nuɖe hun mɛ
nɛ mɛ gbɔ gbɔn bɔ kpo wu
logozo yi gbe xɔ xwe atɔn jɛ kpa wu wezun wɛ mɔ wezun nɛ a
wamamɔnɔ ɖe nɔ ɖɔ nugbo ɖavɔ kija mɛ a
ajotɔ jɛ malɛnu xwe linlɔn towe kpo ɖokpo
hloci mɔ nɔ mɔ xɛ nɔ
gbɔvi ɖe mla ɔ hla nɔ sɔ ɛ ɖu
yɔkpɔvu nyɔ alɔ klɔ ɔ wɛ nɔ ɖu xa mɛxo
bese yi ahwan ɔ mɛ kun kpɛn
nya ɖo ganxo byɔ xaya
nyɔnu nyla ɖo anɔkan
nukunnɔ tantan kɔn nyi mɛ wu ɖɔ bɛ ɖɔ hwenu ɖo tlɔn wɛ ɔ mɔ wɛ a
xɔgbonutɔ ahan gba kɔfo egbe tɔn sɔ tɔn ɖayi
akwɛmɔtɔ myɔ alɔ ɔ akwɛ gba ɖe wɛ nɔ zan nɔ mɔ ɖevo
gbatɛsɔtɔ yi xɔ nyibu wɛ anyu ɖo towe ɖu wɛ ɖe dɛɛn
wamɔnɔ hunyɔ akwɛnu wɛ
mɛ nɔvi nɔ ɖo aslɔtin ji bɛ nɔ ɖu aslɔ xɛlu a
xwa jɛn ku co tɔn xwlɛ zɛn
gudo gbowɛlɛ wɛ emi kpɛnzɔn
kanlin ɖo ɔ gbɛ wɛ nɔ nya sukpɔ
wanvu ɖu ɔ wu wɛ ɖe
sɛ jlo ɔ alɔ
mɔ sɔ jɛ tɛn ɔ xwle a
tɔ nɔ ɖi jawe nɔ wezun yi kpe a
nyigwle nɔ ɖa akla nɔ jla ɖe a
azejɛtɔ mɔ tekan bɔ wu nɛ
aglovunvun nɔ gbɛ ɖe a
kɛn cavi bɔ hɔn vɛ hun
atanmɛyitɔ yi ɔ ahanɖatɔ nɔ ɖa a
akpo mɛ gbo bɔ adɔ bɛ ɖɔ gbɔ ɔ voci wɛ
mɛ gbɔ tolixɔsu bɔ adɔ gbɔ voci wɛ
vodun kpotɔnɔ bɛ ji vi hunwanu
ɖagbewatɔ nɔ nɔ a
koklo nɔ nɔ wɔn jixwe a
nya ɖe hu sɛ hɔn nukun ɖo hɔnlinu
alɔtɔ wɛ bɔ nyɛ ɔ wewe mɔ nɔ ɖe wu a
ablanɔ nɔ gbɛ bɔ aminɔ nɔ jɛ ku a
xwle ajagbe kpɔmalɛnnyi bɛ ɖɔ nyi sɛ ɖe ɔ ɖe amakanmɛ ɛnɛ a
hun tɔ tannyinɔ byɔ nyi ɖoɖo wu wɛ ɔ jikpo jɛn wu
atin gɔndɔngɔndɔn ji nɔ gbɔn nɔ yi ɖiɖi ɔ ji
ɖɛ xo xɔntɔn satɔ
sɛ gbɛ mɛ ɔ gbɔ nɔ gbɔ
ɖo atinsa ɖo kɛ wɛ ɔ xɛ wɛ nɔ nyɛ mɛ
ɖu abɔbɔ tɛ nya ɖe ɖɔ mli kɔ bɛ ɖɔ emi nɔ mli ɔ jɛn nɛ
aɖuwekɔtɔ towe kpo ja
tɔn azɔn gbe ɔ amasin wɛ nɔ hwɛn
ayi wɛ nɔ ayikun
dekpa xuxu nubyaxa dezan nɔ tɛntin hwi ɖɔhun co ɖo
xɔ xɔ zɛn a
mɛ nyɔnui nywɛ ɖie
nudobatɔ gbɛ
nukun mɔ ɔ ji nɔ kwi a
zonyi koklo wɛ nɔ mɔ tɔn ɖe ɖe mɛ a
zonyi koklo wɛ ɖo bɛnu ɖe a
nɔ daziin bɛ nɔ wu fyo a
ɖyɔvi anɔ gbagba wɛ tɔli ɖalaga ɖe a alɔ ɔ ɖe
ɖɔ kpotɔnɔ ɖɔ mlɔ wɛn yi kwɛ gbɛ wɛ nɔ ɖu
nɔ vi mɛ nɔ sɔ zan ɖe ji a
koklo ajagbetɔ jɛ dotɔ mɛ emi kun ɖo mɛ ɖe
sɔ ahwlikpɔnuwa bɛ ɖo biba wɛ ɖo koklo xɔ mɛ mɛɖe tuwun xɔ mɛ mɔ ɖe a
zan ku nuli
tɔ nɔ xwe bɛ nɔ hun a fifa jɛn nyi
nyi xɔgbonutɔ nɛ
ajinaku jɛ ke nɛ jɛ ji nɛ
nyɔxwevi lɛ nɔ lɔn kpogɛ yetɔn wu a
wamamɔnɔ xɔ avɔ
kanlin wadan kinikinifɔ
aganma yi huntin yi fɔ alɔkɛ atɔn vɛ ganjɔgan ɖe wɛ adii felele wɛ
xoxo ɔ wɛ nɔ gbɛ yɔyɔ ɔ
adɔ bɔ nya ɖe kpɔjn gudo yonu tɔn kpo mɛmɛ tɔn ɖo mɛ wɛ ɔ sɔn nɔ ɖɔ wɛ a
aviti hu ɔ nɔ
byɔ gbade wɔxɔsu hwenu ji ɖo jija wɛ ɔ nukun tɔn a
byɔ takwɛ hunvali co ku a
koklo gaɖa ku adɔn gbo kɔ
yi atɔn fli zɛn a
akwɛxɛ nɔ zɔn ɖokpo a webɔ webɔ wɛ zɔn
jɛn ɖa bagban
zɛ hwɛ nyɔ kɔ
zun kpɛn zun tɔn kpɛn tɔn
nɔ jlɛ ke asa wu a
aɖu ɖe towe jawe
kulutɔ nubyaxa yɔkuntɔ kpe ɖo ali yoboyobwenu
kpa xisixisi wamɔnɔ gɔ kpo ɔ
kpikpo ɖama
afin nɔ ɖo mɛ co nukun tɔn nɔ ɖo hɛnkɛn
nɔ ɖu sɛkwɛ sɛ nɔ dɛ a
nya ɖu axɔ bɔ vodun tɔn wata kpe axɔsebla mɔɖe wu a
glo ɔ kitikiti nɔ glo a
xwe wli bɔ nuwanumɔnɔ lɛgba xɔ ɖɔ ɖe ɔ ɖe nɔ

ɖo kpɔn wema ɖokpo
ɖo kpɔn
ɖo vi atɔn sunnu wε nyɔnu ɖokpo
ɖo vi atɔn sunnu wε nyɔnu ɖokpo
ɖo wema xɔ wε
ɖo wɔxuxu sεn wε
ɖo xasun lε wε kεn yovoslɔ lε
ɖo xo zɔ wε

ɖo xwe ɖokpo ɖo togo
ɖo xɔntɔn gbe miɖee wε

ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wε dεdε

ɖo zɔnlin ɖi wε gbɔn ayikungban lilε ji

ɖu gɔ xo
ɖɔ xojɔxo miɖe
ɖɔ ɖɔ kɔku hwla asiba gbɔ
mimɔ ε akpakpa ɖo ɖo sisɔ wε
mitɔn wε nyi mɔto enε ɔ
miɖe lε etε nɔ
myɔɖε ɔ ɖagbe ɖe wε

mɔto lε ɖe nɔ hunɖotεn ɔ
mɔto ɔ kpodo pipan ɔ kpo nɔ wezun

mɔto ɖokpo tɔn aɖisi mε
mε ɖɔ xo
mε bi nɔ nyi nukun tɔn kloklo ɖe nɔ ɖi hwezivɔ ɖɔhun
mε bi wε nɔ
mε bi ɖi ɖɔ nukɔn yiyi ɔ nyɔ
mε bi ɖo gbε wε

nyaɖe nyε awɔn ɖo ahwlikpɔnuwa nukɔn kpɔn gudo ɖɔ
nyaɖe nyε awɔn ɖo ahwlikpɔnuwa nukɔn kpɔn gudo ɖɔ

nyibusi ɔ kpodo vi tɔn kpo yi gbe
nyibusi ɖokpo yi zɔ ɖo gbε tɔn lε cuku ɔ jε nyinyε ji

nyɔnu lε wulεkpa ɖo aɖisin mε hɔn wegɔ ɔ
nyɔnu lε wulεkpa ɖo aɖisin mε hɔn wegɔ ɔ

nyɔnuvi kpεvi nɔ nɔ gle ɖe nɔ nyi boako
nyε gɔn ɔ jɔhɔn gbε jεn nɔ
nyε kpodo kpo vo kplɔn nutεnkpɔn ɖo gbadanu

nɔ ɖɔ emi sɔ
